igbo: Makoukou Célestine Ouezzin Coulibaly-Traoré, née Macoucou Traoré, (amụrụ n'ihe dị ka 1910-1914 - 1997) bụ onye ndú na-emegide ọchịchị na French West Africa
O nyere aka guzobe ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị nke Rassemblement Démocratique Africain na Côte d'Ivoire na Upper Volta, wee bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu ya na afọ 1948

N'afọ 1958, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke Upper Volta, ma eleghị anya na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ sonye na kansụl na gọọmentị ọ bụla na-asụ French na Odida anyanwu Afrika
A mụrụ Ouezzin Coulibaly na mpaghara Banfora na Odịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Burkina Faso nke taa, nke a maara mgbe ahụ dị ka Upper Volta
A maara ya mgbe a mụrụ ya dị ka Macoucou Traoré (ma ọ bụ Makoukou Traoré), ọ bụ nwa nwanyị Balla Traoré, onye bụ onyeisi Sindou Canton
Agụmakwụkwọ ya ruru na diplọma nkuzi
N'afọ 1930, ọ lụrụ Daniel Ouezzin Coulibaly, nweta aha Célestine n'afọ 1931 mgbe e mere ya na di ya baptizim dị ka ndị Roman Katọlik
O nyere aka guzobe ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị nke Rassemblement Démocratique Africain na Côte d'Ivoire na Upper Volta, wee bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu ya na afọ 1948

Ouezzin Coulibaly bụ otu n'ime ndị duuru ihe dị ka ụmụ nwanyị 1,500 gaa n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na Grand-Bassam na 24 Disemba, na afọ 1949 na-akpọ maka ntọhapụ nke di ha bụ ndị, dị ka ndị otu nnwere onwe PDCI-RDA, ndị ndị ọchịchị France tụrụ mkpọrọ n'ebughị ụzọ kpee ikpe
Ya na ndị isi ibe ya Anne-Marie Raggi, Marguérite Sacoum, Odette Yacé na Marie Koré, enwere ike iwere ya dịka otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke nnwere onwe nke Ivory Coast
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1958, a họpụtara Ouezzin Coulibaly ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze, ụlọ na ọrụ nke Upper Volta
Nhọpụta ya bụ nke mbụ maka nwanyị na French West Africa, o yiri ka ọ bụ mmepe na-ekwe nkwa
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụghị mgbanwe dị ka ọ nwere ike iyi ka ọ mere nanị izu isii mgbe ọnwụ di ya, onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Council na Upper Volta
Ọ bụ ezie na ọnwụ ya nwere ike ịbụ akụkụ dị mkpa na nhọpụta ya, dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ a zụrụ azụ na otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole gụrụ akwụkwọ na mba ahụ, ọ ruru eru maka ọnọdụ ahụ n'ezie

Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ọkwa ahụ na 1959, n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ so na nzukọ mba ahụ, eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọ nwetaghị ọkwa gọọmentị mgbe nnwere onwe Upper Volta na afọ 1960 nwere ike iwere ya dị ka nzọụkwụ azụ maka ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ụmụ nwanyị
Na-anọchite anya Upper Volta, a họpụtara Ouezzin Coulibaly ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke French Community na 30 Eprel, na afọ 1959 ebe ọ nọdụrụ na Kọmitii maka Transport na Telecommunications
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ ruo na 16 Machị, na afọ 1961
Célia Posser bụ onye ọka iwu na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na São Tomé na Príncipe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na kọmitii nke Praịm Minista Maria do Carmo Silveira n'etiti afọ 2005 ruo afọ 2006 dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke steeti maka nchịkwa ọha na eze na nkwukọrịta ọha na eze
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị gọọmentị, ọ nọgidere na mba ahụ iji gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu ma họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke otu ndị ọkàiwu mba n'ọnwa Machị 2017

Célia Posser jere ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke steeti maka nchịkwa ọha na eze na nkwukọrịta mmekọrịta n'etiti afọ 2005 ruo afọ 2006 na Gọọmentị Iwu nke X nke São Tomé na Príncipe n'okpuru Praịm Minista Maria do Carmo Silveira
N'oge ọ nọ n'ọchịchị, ọ malitere ịnye ụlọ ọrụ redio na telivishọn nke gọọmentị ma nyekwa akwụkwọ ikike mgbasa ozi redio abụọ mbụ nke mba ahụ

Posser bụkwa onye nnọchi anya São Tomé na Príncipe na mkparịta ụka 2005 ya na Angola iji melite mmekorita na nchekwa, njem, ịkụ azụ na nkwukọrịta na iji kwurịta mgbaghara nke $ 21 nde ụgwọ a ji Angola
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Supreme Press Council nke agwaetiti ahụ (onye na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi)
Céline Banza (amụrụ na abali iri abuo Febuwari 1997) bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu na onye ọkpụkpọ egwu si Democratic Republic of the Congo
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke 2019 RFI Discoveries Music Award
A mụrụ Banza na Kinshasa
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya mgbe ọ dị obere ihe dika afo ele ma ele
Na mbido afọ 2010, ọ kwagara Kisangani, ebe ọ zutere ndị nyeere ya aka ịzụlite mmasị maka egwu, ịgba egwu, ime ihe nkiri, na ihe ngosi
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ laghachiri Kinshasa iji mụọ musicology na National Institute of Arts ebe ọ zutere ndị otu egwu ya
N'afọ 2017, Banza pụtara n'ụzọ dị mkpirikpi na The Voice Afrique Francophone
N'ime usoro ahụ, o mepụtara otu nke ya, 'Banza Musik', wee sonye n'afọ sochirinụ na ngosi 'Kinshasa 2050
ụmụ nwanyị mbụ! tupu ya etinye onwe ya na ọrụ egwu ọhụrụ ya ahu
N'afọ 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Jazz Kif na Kinshasa na Brazzaville
Ọ meriri mbipụta 2019 nke RFI Discovery Awards A họpụtara ya n'etiti ndị ikpeazụ iri maka ogo nke abụ ya na olu ya
Asalfo, Charlotte Dipanda, Tiken Jah Fakoly, Fally Ipupa, Josey, Angélique Kidjo, Youssou Niao, Oumou Sangaré na Singuila so na ndị ọka ikpe a
O weputara egwu izizi ya 'Te Rembi' n'afọ 2019 ma weputara abọm izizi ya n'afọ 2020
Céline Marthe Ratsiraka bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Madagascar, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ àmà àmá, na nwunye onye bụbu onye isi ala nwụrụ anwụ Didier Ratsiraka
Ratsiraka bụ nwanyị mbụ nke Madagascar nke nọkarịchara ogologo oge n'oche dika nwunye onye isi ala n'akụkọ mba ahụ, ebe ọ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ site n'afọ 1975 ruo afọ 1993 na site n'afọ 1997 ruo afọ 2002

Ọ bụ onye nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ime òtù ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Association for the Rebirth of Madagascar (AREMA) na-achị site n'afọ 1970s ruo 1990s, ọkachasị n'ime akụkụ aka ekpe nke òtù ndọrọndọrọ ahụ
A mụrụ Ratsiraka dịka Céline Velonjara
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke Pascal Velonjara, onye omeiwu n'oge ọchịchị ndị France na onye guzobere Parti des déshérités de Madagascar (PADESM)

N'afọ 1964, ọ lụrụ Didier Ratsiraka, onye ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri na-eto eto, n'emume ndị ụka Katọlik nke Ukọchukwu Armand Gaëtan Razafindratandra nọ n'isi ya Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ anọ ụmụ nwanyị atọ - Olga, Sophie, Annick - na otu nwa nwoke, Xavier
Didier Ratsiraka weekwara ọchịchị na 1975 dị ka onye isi oche nke Supreme Revolutionary Council
N'oge ọchịchị di ya site n'afọ 1975 ruo afọ 1993, Céline Ratsiraka ghọrọ onye àmà àmá, na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Madagascar nakwa otu ndorondoro AREMA nke na-achị dị ka nwanyị mbụ na nwunye onye isi ala

Céline Ratsiraka na nwanne ya nwanyị, Hortense Raveloson Mahasampo, bụ ndị ndú n'akụkụ aka ekpe nke otu AREMA, iji mee ka akụkụ aka ekpe na akụkụ aka nri nke nwekwara ndị àmà àmá dịka Pascal Rakotomavo na Rakotovao Razaka草 hara nhatanha
Ratsiraka na nwanne ya nwanyị hazikwara ma duzie ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị nke òtù ndọrọndọrọ ahụ, nke a maara dị ka AREMA Women
Tụkwasị na nke a, Céline Ratsiraka nọkwara n'isi n'òtù AREMA Cooperative Movement gụnyekwara ụlọ ọrụ itinye ego a na-akpọ PROCOOP

Didier na Céline Ratsiraka gbaara ga zoo na mba France n'ọnwa Julaị 2002, na-emechi nsogbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọnwa asaa na-esote ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 2001 n'etiti Ratsiraka na onye meriri n'eziokwu bụMarc Ravalomanana
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2013, ezinụlọ Ratsiraka laghachiri Madagascar ka ha gbachara ọsọ ga zoo na mba France ruo afọ iri na otu, ka di ya wee nwee ike ịzọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke afọ 2013
Ụlọ ikpe ntuli aka wepụrụ Ratsiraka na ndọrọndọrọ ahụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2013 maka na ọ dara iwu ibi n'ala ahụ opekata mpe ọnwa isii tupu ntuli aka eruo

N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 2021, a nabatara Céline Ratsiraka na di ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ ndị agha Soavinandriana (CENHOSOA) dị na Antananarivo, maka ọgwụgwọ nke 'obere ahụ ọkụ', dị ka ndị ikwu ha si kwuo
Didier Ratsiraka nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ site n'ọría nkuchị obi ka ụbọchị ole na ole gasịrị na abalị iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa Machị afọ 2021, ka ọ gbachara afọ iri asatọ na anọ
Côte d’Ivoire (République de Côte d’Ivoire), nke ana-kpo kwa, Republic of Côte d'Ivoire na Ivory Coast, bu otu obodo no na Afrịka

Călin Georgescu (amụrụ n'afọ 1962) bụ onye Romanian bụ ọkachamara na mmepe na-adịgide adịgide, nke a nabatara n'ọhịa, na ya na afọ iri na asaa nke ije ozi na mpaghara gburugburu ebe obibi na usoro United Nations
A họpụtara Georgescu ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke United Nations Global Sustainable Index Institute na Geneva na Vaduz maka oge 2015-2016
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke European Research Centre maka Club of Rome (2013[[2015)
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Club of Rome International na Switzerland
A mụrụ Georgescu na mpaghara Cotroceni nke Bucharest, nwa Scarlat Georgesco na Aneta Georgespu, nke a mụrụ Popescu
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Land Reclamation College, Nicolae Bălcescu Institute of Agronomy na Bucharest (1986) wee nweta PhD
ya na sayensị ala na 1999
Georgescu rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke National Center for Sustainable Development na Bucharest site na 2000 ruo 2013
Onye a kwadoro ikike na atụmatụ atụmatụ na atụmatụ ọha na eze, gọọmenti Romania họpụtara ya ka ọ hazie mmepe nke nsụgharị abụọ na-esote nke National Sustainable
Strategy Development (na 1999 na 2008), kwekọrọ na ntuziaka nke European Strategy for Sustainable Development

Ọ na-ejikọta ihe ọmụma zuru oke nke ụkpụrụ na omume nke mmepe na-adịgide adịgide na ahụmahụ aka na ubi site n'ịrụ ọrụ na ndị na-ahụ maka ọha na eze na nkeonwe yana ndị obodo na-arụ ọrụ iji chepụta, mejuputa na ịgbaso site na ịmecha ọrụ dị iche iche n'okpuru Mpaghara Mpaghara
Agenda 21 (nke United Nations Development Programme malitere na 1992) maka ihe karịrị obodo ịrị anọ nke mba Romania

Onye bụbu Senior Fellow na United Nations Development Programme, Georgescu nwekwara ọkwa dị iche iche na usoro UN, dị ka UN Special Rapporteur na mmetụta ọjọọ nke mmegharị iwu na-akwadoghị na ịtụfu ngwaahịa na ihe mkpofu na nsị na ịnụ ụtọ ikike mmadụ na onye nnọchi anya Kọmitii Mba UNEP maka Romania

O nwekwara ọkwa ndị dị ka Onye ndụmọdụ nke Minista na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Ministry of Environment, onye nduzi nke Ngalaba Na-emepụta Akụnụba nke Mba Nile na Ministry nke Mmekọrịta Mba Ọzọ nke Romania, Odeakwụkwọ General nke Romanian Association for the Club of Rome na onye isi nchịkwa nke Institute for Innovation and Development Projects

Dị ka nkwupụta e nyere na Nọvemba 2020, Georgescu kwuru na Ion Antonescu na Corneliu Zelea Codreanu bụ ndị dike site na ha 'ọ biri akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mba, site n'aka ha na-ekwu ma na'ekwu akụkọ mba ọ bụghị site site mu ndị na ya na ike ụwa nke na na - na
Alliance for the Union of Romanians (AUR), otu pati nke batara n'ụlọ omebe iwu Romanian na-esote ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Romenian na Disemba 2020
N'oge nsogbu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Romania na 2021 nke dugara n'iwepụ Cîțu Cabinet n'ọfịs, otu pati ahụ tụụrụ ya aro ọzọ
Ọtụtụ akụkọ mgbasa ozi katọrọ Georgescu maka nkwupụta ya na-akwado Russia, ụfọdụ ọbụna na'ime ha na na -ewere ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya ọdịmma Russia na Romania
Obasi (nke a makwaara dị ka 'Fiery' ma ọ bụ 'The Fiery One') bụ onye ntụzi ihe nkiri Naijiria, onye na-ese ihe na onye nchịkọta akụkọ
O nwetakwara ya ihe nrite Trailblazer of the Year na March 2015, na Africa Magic Viewers’ Choice Awards (AMVCA)
Amụrụ na obere obodo Owerri, Obasi tolitere na-ekiri ihe nkiri egwu egwu Hammer, na-agụ Stephen King novels na na-ekiri fim ya adapted
Site na nwata nke 3, ọ ga-ekiri ihe nkiri kpochapụwo na ndị dike kachasị amasị ya na ndị ọjọọ; na-emegharị ha n'akwụkwọ egwu egwu ejiri aka see
Ka ọ gachara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị gọọmentị, Owerri, CJ gụrụ sayensị sayensị na Mahadum Nigeria
N'afọ 2012, o hiwere ụlọ ọrụ Fiery Film, ya na nwunye ya, onye na-eme ihe nkiri TV na onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Oge Obasi
CJ's directorial mpụta mbụ bịara na 2014 na Ojuju; ihe nkiri egwu egwu zombie

Emere ihe nkiri a n'ememme dị iche iche gburugburu ụwa, gụnyere mmemme ihe nkiri Pan African na Los Angeles, Shockproof Film na Prague, olu ọhụrụ na nwa Ememe ihe nkiri na New York, Nollywood Week Festival na Paris, Fantasia Film Festival na Montreal, Africa International Film Festival ebe ọ nwetara ihe nrite nke ihe nkiri Nigeria kacha mma na ndị ọzọ; Na-enweta otuto zuru ụwa ọnụ site na mmasị nke ndị nkatọ ama ama n'ụwa niile dịka Todd Brown nke Twitch Film (ugbu a Screen Anarchy), Tambay A
Obenson nke Shadow & Act, na Frank Scheck nke The Hollywood onye nta akụkọ
Onye na-eme mpụ, O-Town, nke CJ
dekwara, na-akọ akụkọ banyere otu obere obodo mebere mpụ
O-Town sitere na Owerri, ebe amuru CJ
N'afọ 2018, CJ
duziri mmegharị ihe nkiri nke Nnedi Okorafor's african futuristic short story Hello, Moto
Na February 2017, Fiery Film Production họọrọ nkenke akụkọ wee malite mmepụta
O nwere ihe ngosi ụwa ya na International Short Film Festival Oberhausen, na 6 Mee, 2018
Ọrụ n'ọdịnihu

mara ọkwa ihe nkiri na-abịanụ aha ya bụ Mami Wata; dabere na akụkọ ifo Afrịka na-ewu ewu na mmụọ mmiri
Onye isi ahụ malitere mkpọsa igwe mmadụ na Indiegogo iji weta nchikota nke $120,000, na-atụ anya na ọ ga-abụ ọdịda 2018 isi ụbọchị mmalite foto

Alexander (May 4, 1923 - September 2, 1980) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, onye na-ede egwu, na onye na-eme egwuregwu
N'ịbụ onye Lebanọn na ndị Siria, a mụrụ ya dịka Charles Khalil Saad na Cairo, Egypt, na Mee 4, 1923
gara Mahadum Cairo site n'afọ 1938 ruo 1939 nakwa Mahadum America dị na Cairo site n'afọ 1940 ruo 1941
Ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Charles Khalil Alexander mgbe ọ kwagara United States n'afọ 1942
mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ọrụ Khadja na mmepụta nke The Merry Widow na Cairo Royal Opera House n'afọ 1942
Mgbe ọ nọ n'Ijipt, ọ bụ onye otu New Vic Players na nke Cairo Dramatic and Musical Society
gara n'ihu mee ihe ngosi Broadway mbụ ya n'afọ 1946 na Plymouth Theatre na ọrụ Steward na Hidden Horizon, mmepụta nke ga-emechi mgbe naanị iri na abụọ gasịrị
Mgbe Hidden Horizon gasịrị, CK
duziri oge ihe nkiri oge okpomọkụ na Duxbury, Massachusetts
Ọ laghachighị na Broadway ruo afọ 1950 mgbe ọ pụtara na ọrụ Uncle Louis na The Happy Time, ọzọ na Plymouth Theatre
Ọ pụtara na telivishọn na The Defenders, The Adams Chronicles, na The Scarlet Letter
Alexander guzobere òtù abụọ na-enweghị uru Off Broadway Company of Twelve na Theater Explorations Inc
nwụrụ na New York City na Septemba 2, 1980
dere n'okpuru aha nke ya na n'okpuru pseudonyms Mario Quimber na Basheer Qadar
O dere egwu maka Francesca da Rimini, The Campbells of Boston, As Happy As Kings, Harlequinades for the Mourners, na The Justice Box
O dekwara ihe niile maka The Applegates, egwuregwu ọ ga-apụta na The Public Theater n'afọ 1978
Cornelius Marion Battey (Amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọọst 26, afọ 1873 - rụọ ọnwa Maachị 14, afọ 1927) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto nke na-ese onyinyo foto nke ndị isi ojii Amerịka n'ụdị pictorialist
Foto ya nke ndị isi ojii pụtara n'ihu magazin NAACP The Crisis malite n'afọ 1910s
O mechara guzobe ma duzie ngalaba foto na Tuskegee Institute
A mụrụ Cornelius Marion Battey n'ọnwa Ọgọọst 26, n'afọ 1873 na Augusta, Georgia, mana a zụlitere ya na North
Ọrụ mbụ ya na foto bụ na ụlọ ọrụ na Cleveland, Ohio
Ọ kwagara Manhattan, New York City ma rụọ ọrụ afọ isii na Bradley Photographic Studio na Fifth Avenue, ebe o nwere ọkwa onye nlekọta
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Underwood & Underwood, otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ foto na-aga nke ọma na mmalite narị afọ nke 20, ebe ọ na-eduzi ngalaba retouching
Battey nwụrụ na Tuskegee, Alabama n'ọnwa Machị 14, n'afọ 1927 na Cedar Grove Cemetery na Augusta, Georgia
Nwunye ya, onye ya na ya mụrụ ụmụ atọ, nwụrụ na mbụ, n'afọ 1912
Mgbe Battey nwụsịrị, a na-etinye ihe osise ya ma tinye ya n'ebe nchekwa n'ọnọdụ nke mechara bibie ha
N'ihi ya, ụlọ ọrụ Tuskegee nwere naanị mbipụta ole na ole dị ndụ site na afọ Battey nke ọrụ akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1989, a gụnyere ọrụ Battey na ihe ngosi 'Black Photographers Bear Witness 100 Years of Social Protest' na Williams College Museum of Art
Giscombe (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1950 Dayton, Ohio) bụ onye Africa-America na-ede uri, onye edemede, na prọfesọ nke Bekee na Mahadum California, Berkeley
Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na SUNY na Mahadum Albany na Cornell ebe ọ nwetara nzere, ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke magazin Epoch na 1970s na 1980s
Ọ kụziri na Mahadum Cornell, Mahadum Syracuse, Mahadim Illinois State, na Mahadim Pennsylvania State
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2015, ọ na-akụzi na Mahadum California, Berkeley
Ọrụ ya apụtala na Callaloo, Chicago Review, Hambone, Iowa Review, Boundary 2, wdg
Nsọpụrụ na onyinye Giscombeńs gụnyere Stephen Henderson Award na Poetry, American Book Award, na Carl Sandburg Prize
Tinyere mkpakọrịta sitere na National Endowment for the Arts, ego maka idee abụ, Council for the International Exchange of Scholars, na Canadian Embassy
E nweela ọtụtụ nkwanye ùgwù n'oge ọrụ Giscombe
Giscombe arụwokwa ọrụ dị ka onye ọkwọ ụgbọala tagzi, onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọgwụ, na onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Ọ kwetara na mmasị ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'ụgbọ oloko nwere mmetụta n'ihe odide ya, na-ekwu na ụzọ ụgbọ oloko ahụ 'abụghị mmetụta
na-aga n'ihu
nke jikọtara ya na ala na mmiri
Christopher Tagbo Onyekwelu (a mụrụ n'afọ 1898, a maghị ụbọchị ọ nwụrụ) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria nke rụrụ ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ n'ịzụlite ụlọ ọrụ na-edekọ egwu na mba ahụ
A mụrụ ya na Nawfia, Anambra Steeti ma gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị dị nso
Ọ malitere ịzụ ahịa nkwụ n'oge mbido 1920 wee resị ụlọ ọrụ Niger ọtụtụ ihe ọkụkụ

O mechara tinye aka n'ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị ka ịzụ ahịa n'ịzụ ihe mapụtara igwe na osikapa ragoon mana o mechara chọpụta na ụlọ ọrụ ndị si mba ọzọ bụ ndị asọmpi siri ike nke nwere ikike, njikọ na akụrụngwa ịchụpụ ndị asọmpi ha
Iji chọta onwe ya niche, ọ malitere ibubata gramophone maka ụlọ ọrụ na-edekọ ihe na mpaghara
Asọmpi mbata dị ntakịrị n'ihi na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ndị nka na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche nwere nkwado gọọmentị na-achị
Site n'enyemaka nke ụlọ ọrụ Europe ole na ole, o nwetara ụlọ ọrụ iji nyere aka ịdekọ teepu asụsụ obodo na mba ọzọ
N'ime afọ ole na ole, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị na-ekesa teepu edekọ na Nigeria
Mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ biri, ihe ka ọtụtụ ná ndị ha na ya na-akpa ná mba ọzọ bụ́ ndị nọ na Yurop kwụsịrị ịnakwere nkesa ha
Christopher wee kpebie ịrụ ụlọ ọrụ nke ya
Otú ọ dị, ọ were ogologo oge tupu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ghọọ eziokwu na site n'enyemaka nke German redio engineer Werner Becker, e wulitere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na ndekọ nke mbụ na December 1958 - Jenụwarị 1959
N'afọ 1961, ọ malitere njikọ aka
ya na Philips nke ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị na-ekesa ndekọ na ndị nrụpụta kacha ukwuu na Nigeria
C' si n'otu mkpụrụedemede ahụ dị na 'G' ndị Semites kpọrọ ya gimel
O nwere ike ịbụ na e nwetara akara ahụ site na hieroglyph ndị Ijipt maka èbè mkpara, nke nwere ike ịbụ ihe aha gimel pụtara
kamel, aha Semitic aha ya bụ gamal Barry B
Powell, ọkachamara n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ide ihe, na-ekwu 'O siri ike iche n'echiche otú gimel = 'kamel' nwere ike isi nweta foto nke camel (ọ nwere ike igosi ya
hump, ma ọ bụ isi na olu ya!)'

C4MIP (nké zuru oke, Coupled Climate Carbon Cycle Model Intercomparison Project) bụ ọrụ jikọrọ aka n'etiti International Geosphere-Biosphere Programme (IGBP) na World Climate Research Programme (WCRP)
Ọ bụ ihe nlereanya intercomparison oru ngo n'akụkụ usoro nke Atmospheric Model Intercomparison Project, mana màkà ụdị ihu igwe zuru ụwa ọnụ nké gụnyere usoro carbon na-emekọrịta ihe
CALPUFF bụ usoro nhazi nke Lagrangian puff dị elu, nke jikọtara ọnụ màkà ihe ngosi nkè mmetọ ikuku nké Atmospheric Studies Group kesara na TRC Solutions
Ọ bụ ndị mmepe ihe nlereanya na-elekọta ya ma TRC na-ekesa ya

Ụlọ ọrụ United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) anabatala ihe nlereanya ahụ na ntuziaka yá nà Air Quality Models dị ka ihe nlereanya kachasị mmá màkà ịtụle njem dị anya nke mmetọ na mmetụta ha na mpaghara Federal Class I na n'ọnọdụ ọ bụla màkà ụfọdụ ngwa ndị dị nso na-emetụta ọnọdụ ihu ígwè dị mgbagwoju anyà
Usoro ihe nlereanya a jikọtara ọnụ nwèrè isi ihe atọ na usoro mmemme preprocessing na postprocessing
Ihe ndị bụ isi nke usoro ihe nlereanya ahụ bụ CALMET (ihe nchọpụta 3-dimensional meteorological model), CALPUFF (ihe nlereanya mgbasa ikuku), na CALPOST (nchịkọta postprocessing)
Nke ọ bụla n'ime mmemme ndị a nwèrè interface onye ọrụ eserese (GUI)

Na mgbakwunye na ihe ndị a, enwèrè ọtụtụ nhazi ndị ọzọ enwere ike iji kwadebe data geophysical (iji ala eme ihe na ala) n'ọtụtụ usoro ọkọlọtọ, data ihu ígwè (elu, ikuku elu, mmiri ozuzo, na data buoy), na interface na ụdị ndị ọzọ dịka Penn State / NCAR Mesoscale Model (MM5), National Centers for Environmental Prediction (NCEP) Eta model na ụdị RAMS meteorological
E mepụtara ihe nlereanya CALPUFF iji gosipụta mgbasa nke ihe na-efe efe, puff ma ọ bụ isi ihe na-aga n'ihu na ébé mmetọ yá nà mgbasa nke ihe ndị na-efefe, ihe na-adịghị aga n'ihu
Ihe nlereanya ahụ gụnyekwara algọridim màkà ijikwa mmetụta nke downwash site na ụlọ ndị dị nso n'ụzọ nke plumes mmetọ
Ọ bụ Sigma Research Corporation (SRC) mepụtara ụdị CALPUFF na ngwụcha 1980 n'okpuru nkwekọrịta yana California Air Resources Board (CARB) ma e wepụtara ya na mbụ n'ihe dị ka 1990
Sigma Research Corporation mechara bụrụ akụkụ nke Earth Tech, Inc
Mgbè US EPA họpụtara CALPUFF dị ka ihe nlereanya kachasị mmá na ntuziaka ha na Air Quality Models, Earth Tech jere ozi dị ka ónyé nkesa a họpụtara nkè ihe nlereanya ahụ
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2006, ónyé nwe ihe nlereanya ahụ gbanwere site na Earth Tech gaa na TRC Environmental Corporation
N'ogè na-adịbeghị anya, e nyefere ónyé nwe ya na Exponent, bụ ndị na-ahụ màkà idebe na ikesa ihe nlereanya ahụ ugbu a (Disemba 2015)

Sodiq Abubakar Yusuf (amụrụ ya na Mee 6, 1985), nke amara aha ya bụ CDQ, bụ onye amaala egwu hipụ-họpụ nke ala Naịjirịa na onye na-ede egwu amaara maka otu egwu ya 'Nowo E Soke' nke gosipụtara Wizkid na Masterkraft' Indomie ebe egosiri ya na Olamide
Ọ bụ ezie na nke mbụ bụ ihe enyemaka maka ịmalite ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ egwu nke Naịjirịa, onye mechara nweta nrite ọrụ mbụ ya na 2016 Naịjirịa Muziki Vidiyo Awọdụ
Bianyere aha ya 'No Struggle No Success Entertainment', asụsụ egwu CDQ gụnyere rapụ na asụsụ Yoruba na mgbakwunye nke ad-libs dị ka ndị nke ama ama 'Woss Wobi' nke ọ chepụtara
Ọ bụ onye obodo Ilorin, Kwara Steeti, Naịjirịa; mana amụrụ ya na Orile, mpaghara Legọọsụ
Mgbe ọ laghachitere Lagos Steeti site na Ilorin ebe ọ gụsịrị agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị, ọ gara n'ihu ịga akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lagos Steeti ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na BSc na Ekọnọmiks
CDQ bidoro ịgba egwu nke ọma na 2008 mgbe ọ bụbu onye na-eti a egwu nkwado maka Da Grin tupu ọ malite ịrapụ n'asụsụ bekee ya na MI
Na 2013, o binyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na 'Masterkraft 's General Records' mgbe ọ merisịrị ọgụ rapụ na kwa izu 'Industry Nite' na Disemba 2012
Na 2014, o wepụtara ihe omimi ya nke akpọrọ 'Indomie' nke gosipụtara olu site na Olamide ebe rimisi nke egwu ahụ gosipụtara Davido

Egwu a nke Masterkraft rụpụtara mere ka ọrụ CDQ ka ọ pụta ìhè ma nyekwuru ya ohere nhọpụta aha ya abụọ na 2015 Naịjirịa Entertainment Awọdụ nakwa nhọpụta na ngalaba Ọkacha onye egwu Họpụ na The Headies 2015
Na atụmanya nke studiyo abọm izizi ya akpọrọ Quality, CDQ rịọrọ ọrụ nke Wizkid onye ya na ya wepụtara 'Nowo E Soke' dị ka onye ndu egwu na abọm ahụ
Onye duziri vidio egwu ahụ bụ Unlimited LA ma gaa n'ihu na-emeri ọkaibe nke Afuro Hipụ Họpụ Vidiyo na mbipụta 2016 nke Naịjirịa Muziki Vidiyo Awọdụ
Na 16 Ọgụstụ 2016, o kpughere ihe mkpuchi abọm tupu ewepụta ya site na General Records na 22 Ọgụstụ maka nyocha dị oke mma
Na 11 Nọvemba 2016, ọ malitere aha lebeelụ ndekọ ya bụ NSNS, mkpọbi aha maka No Fighting No Success Entertainment
Na 1 Feb 2017, ọ wepụtara ọkwa egwu mbụ ya akpọrọ 'Say Baba' nke Jay Pizzle mepụtara

CEB VER bụ ọkọlọtọ dị mma màkà ụlọ ọrụ carbon offset nke Commodity Exchange Bratislava mepụtara

Dabere na Kyoto Protocol's Clean Development Mechanism, CEB VER na-eguzobe ụkpụrụ màkà ịkwado, ịtụle, na nlekota oru ngo carbon offset na nhọrọ iji zụọ ahịa carbon ma jiri ha nyefee onwé ha màkà ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu, òtù ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ chọrọ ịbụ carbon neutral
Usoro na-egosipụta ngụkọta ziri ezi banyéré ego ole carbon nwere ike ịnye màkà ndị mmepe ọrụ
Enwere ike ịzụ ahịa carbon ndị a na Carbon Place
Usoro mbụ e nyèrè n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ CEB VER bụ CEB VER Solar
CETEP City University bụ mahadum nke onwe nke dị na Yaba, mpaghara Lagos Steeti, Ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naijiria
Mahadum ahụ na-enye nzere na ọkwa nke undergraduate na postgraduate mgbe e guzobere ya n'afọ 2005
CFAO Ghana, nke a makwaara dị ka CFAO Motors Ghana, bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ ala Ghana
E guzobere ya na 1909 ma bụrụ nke Paulo Fernandes na-eduzi ugbu a
CFAO Ghana bụ enyemaka nke CFAO Automotive, netwọk ụgbọ ala kacha ibu na Africa na mpaghara France nke mba ofesi
Ọ bụkwa onye nkesa Ghana pụrụ iche maka ụdị asaa ama ama n'ụwa niile bụ, Mitsubishi Motors, Suzuki, Fuso, DAF Trucks, na Bridgestone
iCFAO Motors Ghana na-ekpuchi Ghana dum site na alaka anọ ya na Accra, Tema, Kumasi na Takoradi
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ 129 na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji gboo mkpa ndị ahịa gụnyere mgbe - ọrụ ahịa
CFAO na-arụ ọrụ na ndị ahịa site n'ikesa ngwa ahịa na ngwa ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-ejikwa ụgbọ ala eme ihe
Enyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ikike ịtọlite, ịmalite ma rụọ ọrụ azụmahịa, ọrụ nka na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, yana ihe omume ọ bụla ọzọ jikọtara ya na ya
Companylọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ n'akụkụ atọ bụ moto, Teknụzụ na Europcar
Nkewa moto na-etinye aka na ire na ọrụ nke ụgbọ ala na akụrụngwa
Nkewa teknụzụ na-ere ma na-arụ ọrụ akụrụngwa na igwe
Ngalaba Europcar na-arụ ọrụ mgbazinye ụgbọ ala yana ihe omume ndị ọzọ metụtara ya
Ihe na-esonụ bụ ndepụta nke ndị nduzi nke CFAO Ghana

Ihe ịma aka Minisatellite Payload (CHAMP) bụ satellite German nkè e wepụtara n'ubochi irí na ise n'onwa Julaị afọ 2000 site na Plesetsk, Russia ma jiri ya mee ihe màkà nyocha ikuku na ionospheric, ya na ngwa ndị ọzọ nke geoscientific, dị ka GPS radio occultation, mkpebi nke ike ndọda, na ịmụ banyéré ala magnetik nke ụwa
Ọ bụ GeoForschungsZentrum (GFZ) Potsdam na-elekọta CHAMP
Ụgbọ mbara igwe bụ ngwa izizi nke ikpo okwu 'Flexbus' nke Astrium; GRACE bụ nké abụọ
Ụdị a gbanwere nke ukwuu na-efe efe dị ka ọrụ GOCE
Otu onboard BlackJack Global Positioning System (GPS) Flight Receiver, nke JPL nyèrè, na-enyere aka iji satellite na-esote satellite màkà ọnọdụ ụgbọ ala
Iji wepụ mmetụta nke ike mpụga, nke na-abụghị ike ndọda (dịka, ịdọrọ ikuku, nrụgide radieshon anyanwụ) satellite nwere ihe dị n'ime 3-axis STAR accelerometer
A na-eme ka nkwenye onwé onyé nke ọnọdụ orbital site na passive Laser Retro Reflector (LRR), nke na-enyekwa ohere ịhazi ọnọdụ isi site na laser ranging
A na-atụle àgwà ụgbọ mbara igwe site na iji Advanced Stellar Compass (ASC) nke Mahadum Nkà na ụzụ nke Denmark nyere
N'ịbụ nkè a kwụnyere na boom, satellite ahụ nwèrè Magnetometer Instrument Assembly System (MIAS) maka ịtụle ala magnetik
Ụgbọala ahụ nwèrè ike ịlele oghere eletrik nke ụwa n'akụkụ oghere magnetik na Digital Ion Drift Meter (DIDM)
CHAMP rụzuru ọrụ ya wee banyeghachi na ikuku ụwa n'ubochi irí na itoolu n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2010 mgbè afọ 10 gasịrị (ndụ imepụta afọ ise)
Ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị metụtara ya kpebiri na ọrụ ahụ na-aga nke ọma, ọkachasị dịka afọ ise mbụ nke imepụta ndụ gbatịrị nke ukwuu

Chukwuka Ekweani (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 16 n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1995), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Ckay (SEE-kay), bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ bịanyere aka na Warner Music South Afrika
Ọ bịanyere aka na Chocolate City, onye otu Warner Music Group onwe ya na-arụ ọrụ ADA
Egwu ya na mba ụwa 'Love Nwantiti', nke a makwaara dị ka 'Love Nwantiti (Ah Ah Ah),' bụ nke Chocolate City wepụtara n'afọ 2019
Na 29 Machị na afọ 2022, egwu ahụ malitere na nọmba otu, na-esote mmalite nke chaatị Billboard Afrobeats
Na 9 Mee na afọ 2022, ọ ghọrọ abụ Afrịka mbụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme iji gafere otu ijeri iyi na Spotify
A mụrụ Chukwuka Ekweani na Kaduna, steeti dị na mpaghara ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye Igbo sitere na Anambra Steeti dị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ nna ya, onye bụ onye na-eduzi ukwe na chọọchị ha kpaliri ịhụnanya ya maka egwu
Mgbe ọ na-etolite, ngwá egwu kpaliri ya, nke kpaliri ya ịmụta piano site n'aka nna ya
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, otu enyi ya kpọbatara ya na ngwanrọ mmepụta Fruity Loops
Chukwuka Ekweani malitere ọrụ egwu ya dị ka onye otu egwu, nke ya na ndị otu egwu abụọ ndị ọzọ mejupụtara, tupu ọ malite ọrụ ya dị ka CKay
N'afọ 2014, ọ kwagara Legos, mgbe achọpụtara ya
Mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na Loopy Music, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Chocolate City, na mbido afọ 2015
N'ịgbaso njikọta nke Loopy Music na afo 2016, ọ sonyeere ndị na-ese ihe na Chocolate City
Ọ bụ onye egwu nke mere egwu n'ụdị dị iche iche gụnyere Afrobeats, R&B na dancehall

Na 11 Septemba afọ 2017, ọ wepụtara egwu mbụ ya bụ Who the Fuck Is CKay?, site na Chocolate City Na 30 Ọgọstụ afọ 2019, ọ wepụtara egwu ya nke abụọ CKay the First site na Chocolate City, na 11 Febụwarị afọ 2021, ọ wepụtara egwu ya nke atọ Boyfriend site na Warner Music South Africa
Na 4 Mee afọ 2021, ọ kwadoro na Twitter na ọ bịaghịzi aka na Chocolate City, kama ọ bịanyere aka na Warner Music South Afrika
Na 2 Machị afọ 2018 ọ wepụtara 'Container', ihe ndekọ Afrobeat nke ụdị ịgba egwu gwara gwara nke South Afrika metụtara
Egwu a ghọrọ ihe ndekọ ọganihu, ma mee ka ọ nweta nnukwu ikuku na Naịjirịa
E wepụtara ya site na Chocolate City, Tempoe mepụtara ya
Na 6 Julaị afọ 2018, o wepụtara vidiyo egwu ahụ, nke Myth duziri ma gbaa na ebe dị iche iche na Legos
N'afọ 2019, mgbe a tọhapụrụ CKay the First, 'Love Nwantiti' ghọrọ nnukwu ndekọ na Naịjirịa
Na 14 Febụwarị afọ 2020, CKay wepụtara remix akpọrọ 'Love Nwantiti (Ah Ah Ah) nke gosipụtara Joeboy na Kuami Eugene
N'afọ 2021, ọ gara n'ihu na TikTok wee bụrụ ihe egwu mba ụwa, na-ese ihe nkiri na Europe, Africa, Australia na New Zealand, na-erukwa nọmba 23 na UK ma mee ka ọ banye na US Hot 100
Remix nke North Africa nke gosipụtara ElGrande Toto ghọrọ ihe a ma ama na mba Maghreb na Germany

CLIVAR (mgbanwe ihu igwe na amụma) bụ akụkụ nke World Climate Research Programme

Ebumnuche ya bụ ịkọwa ma ghọta mgbanwe ihu igwe na amụma na ógè ógè ógè ruo otu narị afọ, ịchọpụta usoro anụ ahụ na-ahụ màkà mgbanwe ihu igwe ma mepụta ihe ngosi na ikike ịkọ ọdịnihu màkà ihe ngosi ihu igwe
A họpụtara Dr Antonietta Capotondi dị ka ónyé isi óche PICES WG-49 na-anọchite anya CLIVAR n'afọ 2023
Ihe na-esonụ bụ usoro iheomume nkè CLIVAR na ihe ndị bu ya ụzọ
CLIVAR nwèrè ọtụtụ akụkụ na ìgwè na-arụ ọrụ dabere na ọmụmụ nke mgbanwe ihu igwe na amụma nkè ihe dị íchè íchè nke usoro ihu igwe ụwa
CLIVAR nwèrè akụkụ atọ zuru ụwa ọnụ
Ngalaba mpaghara na-elekwasị anya n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke usoro ihu igwe

Ebe ọ bụ na mpaghara dị íchè iche nke oké osimiri dị íchè íchè, ma nye ọrụ dị mkpa nke oké osimiri na ịchịkwa ihu igwe n'etiti afọ, afọ iri, na narị afọ nke CLIVAR tụlere, nkewa n'ime akụkụ dị íchè íchè dabere n'ụzọ dị ukwuu na mpaghara nke usoro oké osimiri

CMS Grammar School dị na Bariga, nke dịpụrụ adịpụ na Lagos na Lagos Steeti, bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị kachasị ochie na Naịjirịa, nke Church Missionary Society guzobere na 6 June 1859

James Pinson Labulo Davies mere ka ego maka CMS Grammar School, Lagos nwee ike, onye nyere Babington Macaulay £ 50 (nke ya na nde 134 dị ka nke 2014) iji zụta akwụkwọ na ngwá ọrụ maka ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
