Camilla Marie Nielsen née Jensen (1856-1932) bụ onye ọrụ ebere na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Danish nke a na-echeta maka mkpebi ya maka ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na mpaghara Frederiksberg nke Copenhagen
N'afọ 1887, ọ nwetara ala mebiri emebi na Ny Carlsberg Vej nke ọ gbanwere ka ọ nwee obere ụlọ 75 maka ezinụlọ ndị nọ ná mkpa nwere ụmụaka
N'afọ 1909, mgbe a họpụtara ya na bọọdụ nke ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka ọhụrụ nke Frederiksberg, o guzobere kichin ndị mmadụ nke na-emepụta ihe karịrị otu puku nri kwa ụbọchị maka ndị nwere nsogbu ego
N'ịbụ onye na-etinye aka na ndị Social Democrats, ọ lụrụ ọgụ maka ọnọdụ ụlọ ka mma na mmelite maka ụmụnwanyị na ụmụaka
Ọ bụghị naanị na ọ sonyere n'ọtụtụ òtù ọrụ ebere na Denmark kamakwa n'afọ 1915 ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị nnọchiteanya Danish na Women's Peace Congress na Hague

A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 20 Eprel 1856 na Særslev Parish dị nso na Jyderup na Holbæk Municipality, Camilla Marie Nielsen bụ otu n'ime ụmụ isii, mana naanị nwa nwanyị, nke onye nwe ala Jens Jensen (1823 - 1878) na nwunye ya Ane Kirstine née Kjølsen (1827 Xi1899)
N'afọ 1881, ọ lụrụ Andreas Frederik Larsen, onye ọrụ, onye ya na ya nwere otu nwa, Jens Frederik (1881)
Mgbe alụmdi na nwunye ahụ gbasara n'afọ 1903, ọ lụrụ onye ọkwọ ụgbọala bụ Christen Nielsen
A zụlitere Camilla Jensen n'otu nnukwu ala, na-aga akwụkwọ ụbọchị atọ n'izu
Ọ ghọrọ onye maara nke ọma n'ide akwụkwọ na mgbakọ na mwepụ nke na n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ nna ya n'ọrụ ugbo ya
Ọ nọrọ otu afọ na ọkara na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-arụzi nri na Algestrup Manor
N'afọ 1881, ọ lụrụ onye ọrụ ya na ya kwagara Copenhagen, na-ebi ndụ site na ọrụ ndị ha nwere ike ịchọta

N'afọ 1887, n'ihi kọntaktị ya na onye na-ahụ maka ihe onwunwe, ọ ghọrọ onye nwe ụlọ mebiri emebi na Ny Carlsbergsvej na Frederiksberg ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-arụzigharị obere ụlọ iri asaa na ise, na-akwụ ha ụgwọ dị ọnụ ala nye ezinụlọ ndị na-arụ ọrụ nwere ụmụaka
N'afọ 1903, ọ lụrụ onye ọ hụrụ n'anya mbụ ya bụ Christen Nielsen, onye ọkwọ ụgbọala nke kpaliri mmasị ya na Social Democrats
Ọ nwụrụ afọ anọ ka e mesịrị n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1907, na-ahapụ ya ka ọ na-elekọta onwe ya
N'ịbụ onye Social Democratic Women's Association gbara ume, na 1908 a họpụtara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na bọọdụ nke ego enyemaka Frederiksberg, ọnọdụ ọ nọgidere na-arụ maka ndụ ya niile

N'afọ sochirinụ, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ na-elekọta ụlọ kichin dị n'ógbè ahụ ebe ọ na-akwadebe ihe karịrị otu puku nri kwa ụbọchị nke ezigbo nri dị ọnụ ala, ọtụtụ n'ime mmefu ego ahụ bụ nke ego enyemaka na-akwụ
Site na mkpa ndị ọzọ sitere na Agha Ụwa Mbụ, n'afọ 1917 ọ na-elekọta Frederiksborg Folk Kitchen, na-emepụta nri abalị 3,000 kwa ụbọchị yana nri maka ụmụaka n'oge ọnwa oyi
N'ihi nkwado o nwere ike ịnakọta, ọrụ ahụ nke gara n'ihu ruo n'afọ 1931, emeghị ka obodo ahụ kwụọ ụgwọ ọ bụla

N'ihu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Nielsen bụ onye otu ndị otu Social Democratic Women's Association, ebe a họpụtara ya n'afọ 1917 ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndị isi nke Frederksberg Municipality, ebe ọ jere ozi ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1932
Mgbe Agha Ụwa Mbụ tiwapụrụ, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Danish Peace Society (Dansk Fredsforening)
Ya na Andrea Brochmann [da], ọ nọchitere anya Social Democrats na 1915 Women's Peace Conference na Hague, na-aghọ onye otu alaka Danish nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom
Ọ bụkwa onye otu ọtụtụ òtù ndị ọzọ na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka gụnyere Peter Sabroes Foundation na ụlọ ụmụaka, Odd Fellows Rebekka Home na ụlọ ụmụaka Princess Helena
Camilla Nielsen nwụrụ na 16 Disemba 1932 na Frederiksberg
E liri ya na Frederiksberg Cemetery
N'afọ 1928, e nyere Nielsen Medal of Merit

Camilla Waldman (a mụrụ na 22 Febụwarị 1968) bụ onye na-eme nkiri na South Africa, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka Anne de Villiers, Madam nke ụlọ ndị akwụna dị elu, na SABC1 soapie Generations, site n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2004 ruo Juun 2008
Waldman gụsịrị BA na Drama na Performer's Diploma, gụsịrị akwụkwọ cum laude na Mahadum Cape Town
Mgbe ahụ, ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ Jazzart Dance Theatre Company ma soro ha rụọ ọrụ afọ abụọ
Waldman pụtara na The Fall (2006), Dead Easy (2004) na Berserker
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya dịka Teresa de 'Medici na usoro TV Leonardo E sere oge mbụ nke Leonardo na South Africa n'ime ọkara nke abụọ nke afọ 2010
E mechara oge nke abụọ na Cape Town ma gosipụta ya n'afọ 2012
A mara ọkwa na 21 Jenụwarị 2013 na a gaghị enyeghachi Leonardo ọrụ maka oge nke atọ
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Jamie Bartlett
Di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ nwa nwoke, Hector, ma mesịa gbaa alụkwaghịm

CLEAR, Campaign for Lead Free Air, malitere n'afọ 1981 mgbè ónyé ọgaranya na-emepe ihe onwunwe, Godfrey Bradman, kpọtara ónyé na-eme mkpọsa na ónyé bụbu ónyé nduzi Shelter, Des Wilson iji nweta mmanụ ụgbọala na-enweghị isi na United Kingdom
Wilson mèrè mkpọsa ọha na eze ma soro Dr Robin Russell-Jones dị ka ónyé ndụmọdụ ahụike na sayensị a na-akwụghị ụgwọ
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1983, Royal Commission on Environmental Pollution (RCEP) bipụtara akụkọ nké gosipụtara ihe ize ndụ nke ndu na ahụike ụmụaka, ma tụọ aro na ekwesighi itinye ndu na mmanụ ụgbọala

N'ime ọkara awa nke a na-ebipụta akụkọ RCEP, odeakwụkwọ gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi, Tom King, màrà ọkwa na gọọmentị ga-akwado iwebata mmanụ ụgbọala na-enweghị isi, na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ga-enye ya n'ihu, nakwa na ndị na-emepụta ụgbọ ala ga-emepụta injin nwéré ike iji ya
N'ogè na-adịghị ányá, Wilson gbárá arụkwaghịm na CLEAR iji bụrụ Ónyé isi óche nke Friends of the Earth
Site n'afo 1984 ruo 89 Russell-Jones ghọrọ Ónyé isi oche nke CLEAR ónyé ọ nọchitere anya na kọmitii gọọmentị, Working Party on Lead in Petrol (WOPLIP)
N'ịbụ ónyé mezuru ebumnuche ya, e mechiri CLEAR n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro n'afọ 1989
N'ihi mkpa mkpọsa ahụ dị, Ọbá Akwụkwọ Wellcome, otu n'ime isi ihe onwunwe ụwa màkà ọmụmụ akụkọ ahụike, nwere nchịkọta nke ihe ndekọ CLEAR
A na-ewere CLEAR dị ka ihe atụ akwụkwọ nkuzi nké otu esi agba ọsọ ma merie mkpọsa gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi
Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ nke ónyé na-eme mkpọsa nwèrè ahụmịhe na nke na-akpali akpali (Wilson) dị oke mkpa màkà ihe ịga nke ọma nke CLEAR, ọ gaghị emezu ebumnuche ya na-enweghị ntọala sayensị siri ike

N'ikpeazụ, ọ dabere na dọkịta ụlọ ọgwụ (Russell-Jones) na ónyé ọkà mmụta sayensị a na-akwanyere ùgwù (Robert Stephens) nwèrè obi ike zuru oke na mkpebi nke ha iji tinye aha ọkachamara ha n'ihe ize ndụ n'ịchọ ihe kpatara ya
Mgbè a malitere CLEAR, ọkwa ọbara nke ndị ọrụ ahụike na UK weere dị ka ihe dị nchebe bụ iri atọ na ise micrograms kwa decilitre nke ọbara

N'afọ 1991, e belatara ọkwa nke US Centre for Disease Control (CDC) weere dị ka ihe dị nchebe ruo irí, mànà CDC kwenyere ugbu a na enweghị ọnụ ụzọ dị nchebe ma kọwaa ọkwa dị n'elu isé dị ka ihe kpatara nchegbu
A na-ebu ụzọ tinye ntutu Tetraethyl na gasoline n'afọ 1920 dị ka ónyé na-ahụ màkà ihe, nké bụ ụzọ dị ọnụ ala iji bulie ogo octane
Ọ gaghị ekwe omume iji catalytic converters na mmanụ ụgbọala dị ka isi na-ekpuchi platinum ma mee ka ihe na-akpali akpali ghara ịrụ ọrụ
N'ihi ya, e webatara gasoline na-enweghị isi na Japan na ngwụcha afọ iri isii, na US n'etiti afọ iri asaa iji mee ka o kwe omume iji catalytic converters ma si otú a belata mmetọ fotochemical

Otú ọ dị, site n'afo 1979, n'ihu ihe akaebe na-arịwanye elu nke mmetụta na-emerụ ahụ nke ndu na omume ụmụaka, mmepe neuro-cognitive na IQ, Ngalaba Ahụike na Nchebe Ọha (DHSS) nyèrè iwu akụkọ n'okpuru Ónyé isi óche nke Prọfesọ Lawther
Enweghịkwa aro ọ bụla iji belata ọkwa ndu a na-ewere dị ka ihe dị mma site na micrograms iri atọ na ise kwà decilitre nke ọbara

N'afọ 1980, ndị Conservation Society Pollution Working Party bipụtara nzaghachi nyé akụkọ Lawther nkè Prọfesọ Derek Bryce-Smith PhD, DSc, C Chem, FRSC, Prọfesor of Organic Chemistry na Mahadum Reading, na Dr Robert Stephens, PhD, DSC, C Chem FRSC na-agụ na Organic Chemy na Mahaduma Birmingham, mànà HMG guzogidere oku ha màkà mmanụ ụgbọala na-enweghị isi n'okpuru nrụgide sitere n'aka ndị na-emepụta ụgbọala na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ
Mbipụta mbụ nkè akwụkwọ akụkọ CLEAR depụtara ebumnuche mkpọsa ahụ

N'afọ 1982, CLEAR Charitable Trust haziri nzukọ mba ụwa banyéré mmetụta nkè ihe ndị dị ndụ nke ikpughe isi dị ala, na usoro ndị sochirinụ, Lead versus Health, nke Russell-Jones na Michael Rutter FRS, Prọfesọ nke Child Psychiatry na Institute of Psychiatry, jikọrọ aka dezie

Otu isi nke (8), Russell-Jones na Dr Bob Stephens dere òkè nke anwụrụ ọkụ na mmanụ ụgbọala na-enye site na Russell-Jone na Dr BobStephens, ma kwubie na anwụrụ ọkụ dị na mmanụ ụgbọala nwere ọ dịkarịa ala pasenti iri asaa na anwụrụ mmiri nke nwatakịrị dị afọ abụọ na obodo ọdịda anyanwụ
Herbert Needleman si Mahadum Harvard (Isi nke iri na abụọ) na Clair Patterson si California Institute of Technology (Isi nke abụọ)

N'afọ 1979, Prọfesọ Needleman bipụtara akwụkwọ dị mkpa na New England Journal of Medicine nké gosipụtara mmekọrịta na-adabere na ọgwụ n'etiti ọkwa dị elu nke ọta na ezé mmiri ara ehi na ọtụtụ nsonaazụ na-adịghị mma n'ime ụmụaka, gụnyere ihe ndọpụ uche, oke ọrụ, IQ dị ala na ọchịchọ inwe nkụda mmụọ n'ụzọ dị mfe

Clair Patterson wuru ụlọ nyocha dị ọcha na mmalite afọ iri ise iji tụọ obere isotopes na meteorite ígwè site na ọmụmụ nke usoro anyanwụ; nke pụtara na o nwèrè ike ịkọwa afọ nke ụwa na ijeri afọ 455, atụmatụ nkè a na-emetụbeghị
N'iji ụlọ ọrụ ya dị ọcha, Patterson nwere ike igosi na ọkwa okike nke ọkpụkpụ na samples prehistoric na pristine bụ usoro nke ịdị ala karịa atụmatụ gọọmentị, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-atụle mmetọ ọkpụkpụ

Ihe dị mkpa o nyèrè bụ ihe osise ya nke na-egosi na ọ bụrụ na otu ntụpọ na-anọchite anya ibu arọ nke mmadụ na-ahụ màkà nkà na ụzụ, na ntụpọ puku abuo na-anọchi anya ónyé ọrịa nwere nsị na-ahụ anya, mgbè ahụ, ibu arọ màkà ónyé okenye na-ebi na Western Society na-anọchitere anya ntụpọ narị ise
N'ihi na ọ dịghị ihe ọzọ na-egbu egbu, e nwere ọdịiche dị n'etiti ihe a maara na ọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na ihe a maara dị ka ihe na-egbu mgbu
Otú ọ dị, ihe méré nzukọ ahụ ji mepụta isi akụkọ bụ n'ihi na Prọfesọ Rutter, ónyé nọdụrụ na Kọmitii Lawther, gbanwere obi ya banyéré ihe kpatara isi, na njikọ ya na IQ dị ala n'ime ụmụaka

Campbell Olajide Ajiye bụ onye Naijiria a ma ama na-ese foto, onye na-agu egwu na onye na-emepụta ejiji na onye guzobere Alpha Money Self Made Billionaires Apparel (Amsmb) na Lagos, Atlanta na New York n'otu n'otu, ụdị ejiji mba ụwa
A mụrụ Campbell Olajide Ajiye n'obodo Akure, Ondo Steeti, Naịjirịa na 29 Septemba 1981, o tolitere na Akure ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na St
Finbarr's Primary School, Akure, wee gaa CAC Grammar School maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya tupu ọ gaa nweta asambodo diplọma mba ya na Polytechnic nke Ibadan
N'afọ 2016, Campbell kwagara United States ebe ọ gara n'ihu mụọ ejiji na nka na Savannah Kọleji nke nkà na imewe, SCAD Atlanta Georgia
Campbell kwagara Lagos wee malite inyere ọtú onye obodo aka na azụmahịa foto ya na ụlọ nri ngwa ngwa Sweet Sensation na Opebi Allen, Ikeja, Lagos Steeti onye kụzikwaara ya nka foto

E mechara were Ajiye n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto maka magazin a ma ama otu magazin mba uwa nke onye ọchụnta ego bi na UK nwere, o mechara gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ na onye na-ese foto maka Reality International Magazine nke nyere ya ọtụtụ ngosipụta na netwọk na ụwa ejiji ma na mpaghara ma na mba ụwa ma nwee ohere iso ndị ama ama ama na mba ụwa rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto tupu ọ hapụ ọrụ ahụ

Campbell Olajide Ajiye malitere ọrụ na Egwu na aha AJ Campbell mgbe ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto, ma soro ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na-emepụta ihe na ụlọ ọrụ egwu Naịjirịa dị ka OJB Jezreel, ID Cabassa, Mr
Daz, Sheyman, K-Solo na Puffy Tee iji wepụta ụfọdụ egwu egwu ama ama ma gosipụta ya na ọtụtụ egwu egwu egwu ya na ndị egwu egwu egwu kachasị elu
Ọrụ egwu ya adịteghị aka n'ihi ọrụ ọhụrụ ọ hụrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ejiji

N'afọ 2011 mgbe ọ nọ na Egypt, Campbell sitere n'ike onwe ịmalite ụdị ejiji ya The Alpha Money Self Made Billionaires (AMSMB) nke sitere n'ike Gianni Versace, Bevista, Roberto Cavalli na Louis Vuitton
Akara ahụ ghọrọ akara edebanyere aha na USA mgbe Campbell kwagara US n'afọ 2016 ma kemgbe ahụ enwetala nlebara anya na nkwado obodo na mba ụwa na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nke malitere n'afọ 2016
Campbell Cotts (21 Eprel 1902 - 19 Febụwarị 1964) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn nke a mụrụ na Cape Colony
Onye bụbu onye ọka iwu na onye na-ede uri, Cotts gụrụ akwụkwọ na Cambridge ma lụọ agha n'agha ụwa nke abụọ, nweta ọkwa nke 1st Lieutenant na Black Watch (Royal Highland Regiment)
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya gụnyere ịpụta na Broadway n'ihu Katharine Hepburn na mweghachi nke Shaw's The Millionairess na Shubert Theatre na 1952

Candice Hillebrand (nke a makwaara dị ka Candîce) (onye amụrụ n'abalị iri na iteghete nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1977 na Johannesburg, South Africa) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwú nke South Africa
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ngosi na onye ome ejiji nlereanya
A maara ya n'oge na-adịbeghị anya maka ị́kū Nina Williams na ihe nkiri Tekken nke afọ 2009, dabere na usoro egwuregwu vidio a ma ama,bụ Tekken
Ọrụ Hillebrand na ihe omume malitere na mbido ndụ ya site na ịkwado ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn ụmụaka South Africa, KTV, mgbe ọ dị afọ isii
Hillebrand gara n'ihu ịpụta n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi ma mee ihe nkiri na TV na ihe nkiri fiịm
N'afọ 2002, ọ bịanyere aka na Musketeer Records wee wepụta abọm mbụ ya, Chasing Your Tomorrows n'afọ 2003
Ọ pụtakwara na magazin Maxim
N'afọ 2008, e nyere Hillebrand ọrụ ịgosiputa dị ka Nina Williams, onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke usoro egwuregwu vidio a ma ama, Tekken
Candace Hill-Montgomery (amụrụ na Febụwarị 9, 1945) bụ ónyé édémédé America na ónyé na-ese ihe
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na foto, ngwakọta mgbasa ozi, na watercolors
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Queens, New York City
Dị ka Hill-Montgomery si kwuo, nne ya bụ ónyé nkwado siri ike màkà mmepe nka ya
Ọ gara Mahadum Fordham (BA, 1977) na Hunter College (MA, 1981)
Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, na 1979, Hill-Montgomery bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na-ebi na Studio Museum na Harlem ma gosipụta ọrụ ya na Artists Space
E nyere ya fellowship site na National Endowment for the Arts na 1981, na Guggenheim Fellowship na 1985
N'afọ 1980, o gosipụtara na Bronx Museum of the Arts, New Museum, Franklin Furnace, Fashion Moda, na Maryland Institute College of Art
N'afọ 1985, Hill-Montgomery haziri ihe ngosi nke ọrụ Lorna Simpson na Lucy R
Lippard nke akpọrọ Working Women/Working Artists/Worked Together
O sonyere na ngosi 'Race and Representation' na Hunter College Art Gallery na 1987
O bipụtara édémédé na Woman's Art Journal Ọrụ ya dị ugbu a na New Digital Archive Museum
Na Mee 2019, e gosipụtara nchịkọta Candace Hill-Montgomery na Sag Harbor Whaling & Historical Museum
Ọrụ nka Candace Hill-Montgomery na-eji ihe ndị dị n'uwe na uri iji gosipụta nsogbụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya site na iji ọchị na satire
Isiokwu ndị a na-akọwa n'ọrụ nka ya bụ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, ịda ogbenye na ụmụ nwanyị, ndị na-akwaga mba ọzọ na ụmụaka gbara ọsọ ndụ
Karịsịa, ihe osise ya 'Free Dom with Purchase' (ihe na-ezo aka na ụdị champagne a ma ama - Dom Pérignon) na-egosi nwanyị Harlem nke na-azụ ahịa ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ iji nyéré ọbọdọ ya aka
Maka ọrụ nka a, Candace Hill-Montgomery jiri akwa tebụl na napkins na uri e dere na ha
Candice Breitz (amụrụ n'afọ 1972) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na-acha ọcha na South Africa nke na-arụ ọrụ na vidiyo na foto
O merìrì 2007 Prince Pierre de Monaco Prize

A na-ejikarị ihe oyiyi na-agagharị agagharị emepụta ọrụ ya, na-elekwasị ányà na akụ na ụba nke mgbasa ozi na ọdịbendị nke ógè a, nke a na-anọchite ányá ya na njirimara nke ndị na-ede akụkọ ifo na ndị ama ama na enweghị mmasị zuru ụwa ọnụ
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite ányá South Africa na Venice Biennale
A mụrụ Breitz na Johannesburg
Ọ bi na Berlin ugbu a, ọ bụkwa prọfesọ na-arụ ọrụ na Mahadum Braunschweig nke Art kemgbe afọ 2007
Breitz na-eji ihe nkiri vidio a chọtara, na-ewepụta vidiyo site na ọdịbendị a ma ama
Breitz na-anọchite anya KOW (Berlin), Kaufmann Repetto (Milan / NYC) na Goodman Gallery (Johannesburg / Cape Town / London)
Breitz nwèrè nzere na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, Mahadum Chicago, na Mahadim Columbia
Ọ na-eme nkuzi na ogbako na ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị ka Zentrum Paul Klee, Stony Brook Manhattan, Smith College Museum of Art, na mmemmé ntụziaka Forecast

Ihe ntinye asaá nké Breitz na 2016, Love Story, na-ekerịta akụkọ onwé ónyé nké mmadụ isii gbapụrụ mbà ha n'ihi ọnọdụ mmegbu dịgasị iche iche Sarah Ezzat Mardini, Ónyé gbapụrụ na Siria agha; José Maria João, ónyé bụbu nwatakịrị onye agha si Angola; Mamy Maloba Langa, ónyé lanarịrị si Democratic Republic of the Congo; Shabeena Francis Saveri, ónyé na-eme ngagharị iwe site na India; Luis Ernesto Nava Molero, ónyé ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị si Venezuela; na Farah Abdi, onye na Somalia na-ekweghị na Chineke
A mụrụ Candida Alvarez na Brooklyn, New York, n'afọ 1955
Ọ bụ onye America na-ese ihe na prọfesọ na-arụ ọrụ na Painting na Drawing na School of the Art Institute of Chicago ebe ọ na-akụzi kemgbe afọ 1998
A mụrụ Candida Alvarez na Brooklyn na nné na nnà ndị si Puerto Rico bịa afọ abụọ tupu mgbè ahụ, ma too na Farragut Houses
Alvarez nwetara BFA na Mahadum Fordham na 1977 wee gụọ akwụkwọ na Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture na 1981
Ọ nwetara MFA ya na Yale School of Art na 1997, ma gụọ akwụkwọ na European Graduate School na Saas-Fee, Switzerland site na 2010-2012

Alvarez bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nke a maara màkà ngwakọta ya dị mgbagwoju anya nke ụdị abstract na figurative bara ọgaranya na pop, akụkọ ihe mere eme na nka nke ógè a, na-etinye akụkọ ụwa na ncheta onwe ónyé
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya na-eji silhouettes na agba siri ike, ma gosipụta mmasị na ịma mma nke ihe osise, kitsch, na ihe eji aka rụọ
Ọrụ Alvarez gụnyere ihe ọkpụkpụ, collages, abstraction, na figuration, na ihe dịgasị iche iche dị ka ákwà, ágbá acrylic, enamel, galkyd, na nkwado dị ichè ichè site na ákwà ruo n'akpa ákwà na vellum
Na Mambomountain, nke e gosipụtara site na Disemba 2, 2012 ruo Machị 24, 2013 na Hyde Park Art Center na Chicago, ihe osise Alvarez na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na-enye mgbagwoju anya nke ihe a maara

Na Drawinggreen, nke e gosipụtara site na Septemba 14, 2012 ruo Ọktoba 13, 2012 na Riverside Arts Center na Chicago, atụmatụ Alvarez na ihe osise a bụ ịgbanwe Freeark Gallery ka ọ bụrụ 'ihe ngosi na-atụgharị uche na akwụkwọ ncheta njem'
Dị ka Hyde Park Art Center si kwuo, n'ime ọrụ ndị a, 'oge na akụkọ ihe méré eme na njirimara na-agwakọta ọnụ n'elu ákwà, na-emepụta ọnọdụ ngwakọta nke ala a na-amaghị ama
' E tinyewo ihe osise ya na Kemper Museum of Contemporary Art na Kansas City
Ọ bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji na Japan bụ Rei Kawakubo nabatara ya
N'ime afọ iri abụọ gárá aga, ọ kụziri na School of the Art Institute of Chicago

N'ajụjụ ọnụ nke Hyde Park Art Center bipụtara, Alvarez kwuru, ébé ọ bụ na ọ gbapụrụ na nkọwa ndị yiri ka ha ezughi oke màkà ihe osise na-enweghị atụ, achọpụtara m ka m mikpuru onwé m na mmekọrịta nke na-agbaso, na-agbanwere, ma na-emebi ụwa nke akụkọ, foto ihu, imewe, na ihe ncheta ihe osise n'ime ihe osise-enweghị isiokwu
N'ikwu ya n'ụzọ dị nkenke, ọ dịghị ihe osise ọzọ; ọ bụ naanị ihe osise ka e nwere
Candis Angelene (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na otu nke ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1975) bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu
Abọm mbụ ya bụ Ancient Light ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ nke anọ na chaatị Classic FM (South Africa)
N'afọ 2009, Angelene wepụtara abọm izizi ya bụ Ancient Light Abọm ahụ nwetara nyocha dị egwu
[citation needed] Magazin South African nke Eprel 2010 Oprah Magazine kwuru 'Site n'ime mmụọ dị jụụ na nke na-eme ka obi ruo ya ala, abọm a ga-abụ nke anabata agbanyeghị mgbe n'ogologo ụbọchị gasịrị'
E wepụtara ya 2009 Number of Discs 1
Candis Mosely Pettway (November 25, 1924 na May 22, 1997) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A na-ejikọta ya na Freedom Quilting Bee na Gee's Bend otu ndị na-eme quilters, n'akụkụ ụmụ ya nwanyị Qunnie Pettway, Sally Mae Pettway na Edwina Pettway
Candis Mosely lụrụ Tank Pettway ma soro zụlite ụmụ iri na isii
Ruo ógè ụfọdụ, ha lekọtara nwa nwanne ha nwanyị Loretta Pettway
Mgbè ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ ya tolitere, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ kichin na ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị dị n'ógbè ahụ
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri ise, ọ malitere inwe nsogbu obi ma ghàrà ịrụ ọrụ
Ọ nwụrụ na 1997 mgbè ọ dị afọ 73
Mgbè ọ dara ọrịa n'ihi nsogbu obi, Pettway na-achịkọta obéré aṅụ na-ekpuchi n'ụlọ ya ugboro ugboro iji mee akwa nke ọma
Aṅụ ya na-agụnye nwanne nne ya Allie Pettway, Lucy Mingo, na nwa nwanyị Allie, Lola Pettway
Ịgbó, bu kwá Cannabis, Marijuana, na ganja, bu ihe onwulà hé ji àkụlō Ịgbó ímé maka ọgwù uchè

CANWARN, acronym màkà CANadian Weather Amateur Radio Network, bụ mmemme a haziri ahazi na-ahụ màkà ihu igwe siri ike na akụkọ nke Ngalaba Ọrụ Meteorological nkè Environment Canada haziri ma na-agba ọsọ
Ihe ndị otu CANWARN na-eme bụ nkè a na-akpọ eziokwu n'ala, ha na-akwado ma na-agbakwunye ozi na nyocha nkè satellite na radar yana ịnye ozi a na-apụghị ịhụ ányá site na teknụzụ ndị a
Ọ bụ ndị otu Windsor Amateur Radio Club na Windsor, Ontario chepụtara usoro ihe omume ahụ n'afọ 1986

Randy Mawson VE3TRW, Paul Robertson VE3HFQ, Jerry Beneteau VE3EXT na Bill Leal VE3ES guzobere usoro na usoro mbụ n'oge ahụ na ógé ọzụzụ mbụ e mèrè na Windsor n'oge oyi nke afọ 1986/1987 na Windsor Airport, ébé obibi n'oge Windsor Weather Office of Environment Canada
Paul VE3HFQ na Bill VE3ES na-etinye ákà ikpeazụ na ọdụ (VE3YQG) dị na Windsor Weather Office na mbido ọnwa Eprel 1987 mgbè a kpọrọ netwọk CANWARN mbụ ka ọ bụrụ iwu
A haziri ebe oké ifufe na Canada dịbu ma na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya na Environment Canada ma ọ nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma nke mmemme CANWARN mere
Na mmalite, CANWARN dabeere na ndịda Ontario na etiti Alberta mana o mechara too iji kpuchie mba ahụ dum site na mmalite afọ 1990
United States bịdọrọ mmemme nyocha nke oké ifufe n'ime afọ ndị 1950s
Tupu nke ahụ, ọ nwekwara naanị mmemme spotting mpaghara
N'afọ ndị 1970, ọ mụbara mbọ ịchọpụta ma malite mmemme Skywarn ya, nke kpaliri CANWARN
N'afọ 2000, Europe malitekwara ịhazi mbọ ndị a na-eme n'okpuru nkwado nke Skywarn Europe, nke nwéré alaka ndị na-achị onwé ha n'ihe dị ka mba iri na abụọ

'Cape Doctor' bụ aha ọbọdọ màkà ifufe siri ike, nke na-adịgide adịgide ma kpọọ nkụ nke na-efe n'ụsọ oké osimiri South Africa site n'oge opupu ihe ubi ruo n'oge ọkọchị (ọnwa Septemba rụọ Maachị na mpaghara ndịda)
A maara ya dị ka Cape Doctor n'ihi nkwenye ọbọdọ na ọ na-ehichapụ Cape Town na mmetọ na 'ọrịa'
Ọ bụ ezie na ifufe na-efegharị n'ébé sara mbara nke Western Cape Province, ọ bụ ihe a ma ama karịsịa na gbụrụ-gbúrụ Cape Peninsula, ébé ọ nwèrè ike ịdị ike ma na-akpasu iwe
Ndị Capetonians na-akpọkwa ya 'South-Easter'
Ọnọdụ ihu igwe dị mma na-esokarị South Easter
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụrụ na South-Easter na-esonyere ala dị ala dị ka ọ na-eme mgbè ụfọdụ n'oge opupu ihe ubi na oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ, nke a nwèrè ike ime ka nnukwu mmiri ozuzo daa na Western Cape
A maara ihe omume a dị ka Black South-Easter
Idei mmiri nke Laingsburg nke ọnwa Jenụwarị 1981 sitere na nnukwu mmiri ozuzo dị ka akụkụ nke Black South Easter
Ọ bụ ihe na-emegide onwe ya na ihe ndekọ ihu igwe màkà Cape Town na-egosi na ifufe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nkè ógè oyi nwèrè ike ịdị ike karịa South-Easter, ebe a na-enyeghị ifufe ndị a aha dị mma
Nke a nwèrè ike ịbụ n'ihi na ifufe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ na-esokarị mmiri ozuzo, nke nwéré ike ịda ruo ọtụtụ ụbọchị na ọbụna izu

Capital Airlines bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu nwere isi na Lagos, Naịjirịa, nke na-arụ ọrụ ụgbọ elu a haziri ahazi na nke na-ebu ịbụ n'ime mba Naịjịrịa site na ịsị ụlọọrụ ya dị na Murtala Muhammed International Airport na Ilorin International Airport
E hiwere Capital Airlines n'afọ 2003
N'etiti afọ 2005, Capital Airlines na Synergy Group jikọrọ aka iji rụọ ọrụ n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu ndị dị n'akụkụ Naịjirịa na imeghe ụfọdụ ọdụ ụgbọ elu ndị ọzọ, nke a na-ewere dị ka ihe na-agaghị ekwe omume

Gọọmentị Naịjirịa setịpụrụ oge a kara aka n'April 30, 2007 maka ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu niile na-arụ ọrụ na mba ahụ iji mee ndozighari ma ọ bụ bụrụ ndị a kwụsịrị ịrụ ọrụ, na mgbalị iji hụ na ọrụ na nchekwa ka mma
Capital Airlines mezuru ihe achọrọ n'ihe gbasara re-capitalization ma debanye aha ya maka ọrụ
N'afọ 2009, Capital Airlines ezughi ihe NCAA (Nigerian Civil Aviation Authority) chọrọ maka inwe ihe karịrị otu ụgbọ elu, na-amanye ya ịkwụsị ụgbọ elu niile Ọktoba afọ 2009
E mechara mechie ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 2010
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2007, Capital Airlines nyere ụgbọ elu a haziri ahazi site na Lagos gaa Abuja, Ilorin na Minna[Tinye edensibịa]
Capital Airlines nwere ụgbọ elu Embraer EMB 120 Brasilia turboprop atọ
Capital City Academy ( nke a na-akpọkarị CCA) bụ ọkachamara egwuregwu na nka nka na Willesden, North West London, na mpaghara Brent
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Sir Norman Foster na ndị injinia Buro Hapold mere ụlọ akwụkwọ a, Sir Frank Lowe na-akwado ya
Ewubere Capital City Academy iji dochie ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Willesden bu ya ụzọ
Emebere ụlọ ya na ogige egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'afọ 2003 wee meghee n'ihu ọha na 12 June 2003
Ọ dị nso na Willesden Sports Stadium na King Edward VII Ala egwuregwu
Kama ọ dị na nso Willesden Green, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ dị na parish nke All Souls, Willesden
Ụlọ akwụkwọ a dịkwa nso na Roundwood Park
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ malitere dịka Willesden County Grammar School na Uffington Road (mpụta Doyle gardens) na 1924 ma gbatịpụrụ ụlọ ndị ahụ na 1932
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ ụtọ asụsụ ise nke Kọmitii Mmụta Willesden na-elekọta site na 1947
Na Septemba 1940, Ogbunigwe gbasara ụlọ akwụkwọ anọ; Ogbunigwe V-1 na-efe efe rutere nso na 1944 na nkwụsị nke Doyle Gardens na All Souls Avenue
Maka otu afọ na 1966 ọ ghọrọ Willesden Grammar-Technical School mgbe ọ jikọtara ya na Willesden School of Engineering na Goodson Road nke a na-akpọbu Leopold Road Comprehensive
Na Septemba 1967, ọ sonyere na Pound Lane School na Pound Lane ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ zuru oke nke a maara dị ka Willesden High School
Na 2003, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ mmuta atọ mbụ na England, n'ebumnobi nke ịgbalị imeri mmezu agụmakwụkwọ na mpaghara enweghị isi
N'oge ahụ, Willesden High School nwere ụfọdụ nsonaazụ GCSE kacha njọ na UK
Onye bụbu Prime Minister UK Tony Blair mepere ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ
Frank McCourt onye Pulitzer nwetara ihe nrite nke Angela's Ashes gara na binye aka n'akwụkwọ ya maka otu ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere onyinye, na-enyocha nhọpụta nrite Carnegie na Kate Greenaway Medal nke afọ
Umụaka ahụ bụ Mini Series TV ewepụtara na ITV na Septemba 2008
Isi agwa bụ onye isi nkuzi nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Inspector Morse, Kevin Whately na-egwuri
A na-esere ihe nkiri ndị e debere na ụlọ akwụkwọ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ mmuta, na ụmụ akwụkwọ n'ezie, dị ka ndi mgbakwunye
Ederela ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ maka TV ndị nkuzi ọtụtụ oge ọkachasị n'ime afọ abụọ mbụ ya
ebe ọ na-abanye n'ime omimi banyere ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na saịtị mbụ nke Academy, Willesden High School
Nnukwu ọnụ ụlọ egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ bụ ebe ndị otu egwuregwu basketball nke PAWS London Capital nọ, otu n'ime ọgbakọ ndị isi na isi obodo
N'ịbụ ndị gosipụtara n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na British Basketball League afọ atọ, ndị Caps na-asọmpi ugbu a na Nkeji 1 nke Njikọ Bọọlụ Nkata Bekee
Cappa & D'Alberto PLC bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ na ụlọ nke nwere isi na Lagos Steeti
E depụtara ya na mbụ na Nigerian Stock Exchange mana ọ họọrọ ka ewepụ ya n'afọ 2009 mgbe enwere ike ire òkè ya na Counter
Tọrọ ntọala na 1932, ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ ndị Ịtali kacha ochie na Naịjirịa ma ọ kwadebere ụzọ maka ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-ewu ihe na Ịtali ka e guzobe na Naịjirịa
Cappa & D'Alberto guzobere site na Pietro Cappa na Viginio D'Albert n'afọ 1932, ndị si Ịtali kwabata biri na Naịjirịa
A mụrụ D'Alberto na Roasio na a mụrụ Cappa na Gifflenga
Ndị ọchụnta ego abụọ ahụ nwere ụzọ yiri nke ahụ gaa Afrịka, Cappa kwagara British West Africa n'afọ 1924 ma rụọ ọrụ na Ghana tupu ọ gaa Naijiria
Mgbe D'Alberto bịara Ghana n'afọ 1929 tupu ọ rute Naịjirịa n'afọ 1931
Ha abụọ zutere na Kaduna n'afọ 1931 ma otu afọ ka e mesịrị guzobe Cappa na D'Alberto na ọfịs na Oil Mill St, Lagos
Grato Cappa, nwanne Pietro mechara guzobe G Cappa n'afọ 1935
Na mbido akụkọ ihe mere eme ya, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ maka ozi Katọlik na Lagos na Abeokuta
O mechara were ọrụ dị anya site na isi ụlọ ya na Lagos dị ka iwu ụlọ gọọmentị na Yola nke a rụchara n'oge, na ụlọ ọgwụ Yola mgbe e mesịrị
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ wee soro na nkwekọrịta na Sokoto na iwu ogige na Jos
Ọrụ a kwadoro ụlọ ọrụ ahụ site na nnukwu ịda mba

N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, akụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nọ n'okpuru nchịkwa nke ndị ọchịchị Britain site na onye na-elekọta ihe onwunwe ndị iro, ma D'Alberto na Cappa laghachiri Ịtali ma ndị ọrụ Ịtali fọdụrụ na Jamaica ruo mgbe agha ahụ biri
Ndị mmekọ ahụ laghachiri n'afọ 1945 wee guzobe ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, mgbe ha weghachitere akụ ha fọdụrụnụ
N'afọ 1950, ọ nwetara ikike n'aka Candido Da Rocha iji wuo ọfịs ọhụrụ na Campbell St, Lagos

Ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ tupu nnwere onwe na Lagos gụnyere Holy Cross Cathedral na Humoani Mosque nke e wuru na 1930s na mgbe e mesịrị Kingsway Stores, Maternity Hospital, Lagos Island, Bristol Hotel na Western House
Na Ibadan, o wuru Cocoa House
N'afọ 1950, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ banyere na ngalaba mmepe ihe onwunwe site na nguzobe Igbobi Development Company
N'oge nnwere onwe, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ wuru ụlọ nkwado maka ndị ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ na Kainji dam, ụlọ ọrụ NEPA, Marina, Tafawa Balewa Square ma tinye aka n'iwu National Stadium na Surulere
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ wuru ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere Dunlop na Ikeja na Arewa Textile, Kaduna
Ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na Kainji gụnyekwara obodo New Bussa na ịkwaga ndị bi na mmiri ahụ metụtara
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1970, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-akwado onwe ya na ngwá ọrụ nke ya, cranes na ụgbọala
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-ewu ụlọ na Lagos Island, yana ọrụ ndị gụnyere Civic Center Towers, Mobil House, Zenon House, Union Marble building na Wings complex, Victoria Island
A capping inversion bụ elu inversion layer nké na-ekpuchi convective planetary boundary layer
Akụkụ nkè ókèala bụ akụkụ nké ikuku nké kacha nso n'ala
Dị ka o kwesịrị, anyanwụ na-ekpo ọkụ n'ala, nke na-ekwo ọkụ ikuku dị n'elu ya
Okpomọkụ na-apụta mgbè ikuku a na-ekpo ọkụ na-arịgo n'ime ikuku oyi (ikuku na-ekwo ọkụ adịghị arọ karịa ikuku oyi), usoro a na-akpọ convection
Akara convective dị ka nke a nwèrè ikike màkà mmepụta igwe ojii, ébé ọ bụ na condensation na-eme ka ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ na-arị elu ma na-ajụ oyi
Mgbanwe na-eme mgbè okpomọkụ nkịtị (ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ n'okpuru, ikuku oyi n'elu) na-agbanwe, na-emepụta nhazi siri ike nke ikuku oyi, nke na-anọdụ n'okpuru ikuku dị ọkụ, nke na'ekpo ọkụ
N'ihi ya, elu inversion layer bụ gburugburu ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ n'elu mpaghara ikuku oyi, mànà dị elu na ikuku (na-emetụkarị n'elu)

A capping inversion na-eme mgbè e nwèrè a boundary layer na a normal okpomọkụ profaịlụ (ekpo ọkụ ikuku na-ebili n'ime oyi na-ekpo ọkụ) na ikpo dị n'elu nke ahụ bụ a inversion layer (ekpo oyi n'okpuru okpomọkụ ikuku)
Ọdịdị igwe ojii sitere na ala ala ala 'na-ekpuchi' site na inversion layer
Ọ bụrụ na okpokoro ntụgharị ma ọ bụ 'okpokoro' siri ike nke ukwuu (nke dị nso n'elu), ọ ga-egbochi égbè eluigwe ịmalite
Okpu siri ike nwèrè ike ịkpata ọnọdụ alụlụ
Otú ọ dị, ọ bụrụ na ikuku dị n'elu anaghị akwụsi ike, enwèrè ike ịmanye elu siri ike site na ntụgharị capping
Usoro a na-ahọrọ nke na-ekwe ka mmiri kachasị ike mepụta égbè eluigwe na-akpatakarị ntiwapụ nke ihu igwe siri ike

Ọrụ nke ijide ntụgharị n'ịkwalite ike nke ihu igwe siri ike bụ nke a ghọtara na ụdị echiche nke ndị na-eme nchọpụta sayensị ikuku mepụtara na ngwụcha afọ 1960 ma bụrụ nke a ghọtara dị ka njirimara nke ikuku na-emepụta tornado dị ka ọ dị n'afọ 1954
Cara Mund (/ˈkɑːrə/ KAR-ə; amụrụ na Disemba 8, n'afọ 1993) bụ onye America mara mma nke Bismarck, North Dakota
N'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 2017, e chiri ya Miss North Dakota 2017
Na Septemba 10, 2017, e chiri ya Miss America 2018 na Atlantic City wee bụrụ onye asọmupi mbụ si North Dakota iji merie asọmupi ahụ
Cara Mund (/ˈkɑːrə/ KAR-ə; amụrụ na Disemba 8, n'afọ 1993) bụ onye America mara mma nke Bismarck, North Dakota
N'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 2017, e chiri ya Miss North Dakota 2017
Na Septemba 10, 2017, e chiri ya Miss America 2018 na Atlantic City wee bụrụ onye asọmupi mbụ si North Dakota iji merie asọmupi ahụ
A mụrụ Mund na Bismarck, North Dakota nye DeLora Kautzmann-Mund na Doug Mund
Ọ bụ nwanne nke oteaka Victoria Woodhull, nwanyị mbụ zọrọ ọkwa onye isi ala nke United States
Mund bụ onye na-emeri ihe nrite na onye na-agba egwu
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ zụrụ oge okpomọkụ anọ na Radio City Rockettes ma kpọọ ya otu n'ime 'Successful Rockette Women' na 2019
Kemgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, Mund haziri ihe ngosi ejiji ego kwa afọ nke na-abara Make-a-Wish Foundation uru

N'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Mund jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke National Honor Society nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ya, gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka otu n'ime ndị klas ya, a họpụtakwara ya 'o yikarịrị ka ọ ga-abụ Miss America'
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Brown na 2016 na nzere na azụmahịa, azụmaahịa, na òtù
Ihe omumu ya bu na Miss America Organization
Mund gara ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke sorority Kappa Delta
O kwuru na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ nyeere ya aka 'iche echiche banyere ụkwụ [ya]
Site n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ ruo n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2016, ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ maka Senator Republican John Hoeven na Washington DC
N'afọ 2018, ọ bụ onye ọbịa ya na State of the Union
Mund egosipụtala mmasị ịnọchite anya North Dakota na steeti na Senate nke United States yana ịbụ nwanyị nke mbụ a họro dịka Gọvanọ nke North Dakota
N'afọ 2019, Ụlọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya nke North Dakota mere mkpebi No
3035 iji sọpụrụ Mund
A kpọbatara ya na North Dakota Bluebook's 'Notable North Dakotans' ma mata ya dị ka otu n'ime 'Five Women Who Changed North Dakota's History'
Na Machị 11, n'afọ 2021, North Dakota State Museum gosipụtara ihe ngosi nke gosipụtara Mund
Tupu e kpue ya okpueze Miss America, o kwupụtara atụmatụ ya ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu

Mund bụ nwa akwụkwọ ugbu a [mgbe?] na Harvard Law School ebe ọ bụ onye nkuzi, onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke ọrụ maka Harvard Journal of Sports and Entertainment Law, onye otu Harvard Law School Mock Trial Association, na onye otu Women's Law Association
Ọ malitere ịma mma mgbe ọ bụ nwata, weghaara utu aha nke Little Miss North Dakota, Miss Pre-Teen North Dakota, na Miss Junior Teen North Dakota
Mund mechara sọọ mpi na Miss North Dakota's Outstanding Teen 2010 dị ka Miss Red River Valley's Outstanding Teen
Ọ gara n'ihu merie asọmupi ahụ, ma sọọ mpi na Miss America's Outstanding Teen 2011
ọ mechara bụrụ onye nke anọ na asọmupi Miss North Dakota Teen USA 2012
Mund sọrọ mpi na Miss North Dakota 2016 dị ka Miss Oil Country, ma bụrụ onye mbụ gbara ọsọ
Ọ laghachiri n'asọmupi ahụ n'afọ sochirinụ dị ka Miss Northern Lights 2017, ma bụrụ onye okpueze Miss North Dakota 2017, ebe ikpo okwu ya bụ 'A Make-A-Wish Passion with Fashion'
Mund nọchitere anya North Dakota na asọmupi Miss America 2018 nke emere na Boardwalk Hall na Atlantic City, New Jersey, na Septemba 2017
Nkwupụta okwu ya bụ 'A Make-A-Wish Passion with Fashion' N'asọmupi izizi, a kpọrọ Mund onye mbụ na-esote maka Quality of Life Award
Na Septemba 10, n'afọ 2017, Miss America 2017 Savvy Shields kpuchiri Mund Miss America 2018
Tinyere aha Miss America, ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ $ 50,000
Mund bụ onye asọmupi mbụ si North Dakota iji merie aha Miss America
Ọ bụkwa Miss America ikpeazụ ịsọ mpi na akụkụ uwe igwu mmiri nke asọmupi
N'oge ọchịchị ya, Mund jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya ọma nke mba nke afọ 2018 maka ụlọ ọgwụ Miracle Network nke ụmụaka ma soro USO rụọ ọrụ nke ọma

N'ịdị n'otu na #MeToo movement, o yi uwe ojii na 2018 State of the Union, na mbipụta March / April 2018 nke magazin Alumni nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Ivy League ya, ọ nọchitere anya nzukọ Miss America, na-ekwu na ọ bụ onye na-enye ụmụ nwanyị agụmakwụkwọ kachasị ukwuu nakwa na 'ọ dị mkpa karịa mgbe ọ bụla'
O gosikwara mmasị na mgbanwe ya site n'ime ihe dị mma gaa n'ụzọ ọ dị ugbu a, 'òtù ahụ mere kpọmkwem ihe ọ chọrọ ime, nke ahụ bụ inye ụmụ nwanyị ike ma nye ha nkà iji nwee ike iguzo onwe ha

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2018, Mund katọrọ Miss America Organization n'akwụkwọ ozi dị peeji ise, na-ekwu 'Ndị ndu anyị ugbu a anaghị anụ olu m ma ọ bụ chọọ ya, ha enweghịkwa mmasị ọ bụla ịmara onye m bụ na otú ahụmịhe m si metụta ọnọdụ nzukọ ahụ maka ọdịnihu
' Ọ gara n'ihu kwuo, 'Okwu banyere inye ụmụ nwanyị ike, na nkwuwa okwu na nkwuwa okwu, dị ukwuu; Otú ọ dị, eziokwu dị nnọọ iche
Ana m ebi ndụ dị iche
Ịgbachi nkịtị bụ inye m ike m na ike nke ụmụ nwanyị ga-eso m
Enweghị m obi iru ala na onye ọ bụla n'ime anyị na-achịkwa, na-achịkwa, na-agbachi nkịtị, ma ọ bụ na-emegbu mmadụ
' Na Jenụwarị 2020, ewefụrụ onye ndu ahụ
Na Disemba 8, n'afo 2019, Mund ghọrọ onye mbụ na naanị Miss America na-ekpe ikpe asọmupi Miss Universe
Cara (Chara, Fachara), nke a na-akpọkwa Teriya n'ihi obodo a na-asụ ya, bụ ntakiriasụsụ Plateau nke etiti Naịjirịa
Ihe dị ka mmadụ 3,000 na-asụ Cara n'obodo Teriya, Bassa, Plateau State, Nigeria
Ethnologue na-etinye Cara na Central Plateau
Ọrụ Beromic na-esote Blench (afo 2008)
Àtụ Platoid languages
Ogechi Ukonu (amụrụ 28 Mee afọ 2000) a maara dịka Caramel Plug bụ comedian si Naijiria
Ogechi bụ nwaafọ Naijiria amụrụ n Abia steti ma zulite na Canada
N'afọ 2018, Caramel malitere ọrụ ya mgbe o mepere ọwa youtube ya ma tinye vidiyo izizi ya ka ọnwa Disemba dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị ise n'afọ ahụ
Na 2019, ọ sonyeere Instagram wee bụrụ onye ama ama mgbe otu vidiyo ya malitere na Instagram
Na 2020, Caramel banyere na otu United Nations Habitat group iji nyochaa mmetụta nke Convid 19 na ndị ntorobịa na gburugburu ha
Na Disemba 23, 2020, ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya azụmahịa ejiji akpọrọ Payporte
CarbonFix Standard (CFS) bụ atụmatụ iji kwado ọrụ okpomọkụ iji gbochie carbon na ikuku
CarbonFix Standard bụ nke CarbonFix, otu na-enweghị uru nke dị na Germany, na-achịkwa
N'afọ 2012, ọ nwetara ya ma tinye ya na Gold Standard
E hiwere njikọ CarbonFix na afọ 1999
N'afọ 2007, njikọ ahụ mepụtara ụdị mbụ nke CarbonFix Standard, nke e gosipụtara na World Climate Conference na Bali, na ọnwa Disemba afọ 2007
Ọkọlọtọ ahụ nwere njirisi nke ọrụ oke ọhịa ga-emerịrị iji nweta asambodo
Achọrọ nlekọta ọhịa na-adịgide adịgide
Copenhagen, Denmark
ngwaahịa nkwukọrịta, ego ọhụrụ

The Carbon Neutral Cities Alliance (CNCA ma ọ bụ Ánn'Alliance) bụ njikọ aka nké ọbọdọ ndị na-eduga n'ụwa niile na-arụ ọrụ iji belata gas na-ekpo ọkụ site na pasenti iri asatọ ma ọ bụ karịa ka ọ na-erule afọ 2050 ma ọ bụ n'oge na-adịghị anya
Njikọ ahụ na-ezube idozi ihe ọ ga-ewe màkà iduzi ọbọdọ mba ụwa iji nweta mbelata ikuku ndị a dị omimi na otu ha nwèrè ike isi rụọ ọrụ ọnụ iji mezuo ebumnuche ha n'ụzọ dị irè ma dị irè
A mụrụ Alliance na Copenhagen n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 2014 na nzukọ nhazi nke ọbọdọ iri na asaa na-esonụ

Ọbọdọ ndị guzobere ọbọdọ gbakọtara ọnụ iji kesaa nkụzi na ịhazi na itinye n'ọrụ mbelata carbon miri emi ma kwekọrịta na ohere iji mee ka omume kachasị mma dị ngwa site na mmekorita na afọ mbụ nke Alliance, gụnyere

Ndị ọrụ Alliance bụ Urban Sustainability Directors Network (USDN) na mmekorita ya na Innovation Network for Communities (INC) na C40 Cities Climate Leadership Group (C40), ma Kresge Foundation, Barr Foundation, Summit Foundation, Rockefeller Brothers Fund, V
Kann Rasmussen Foundation, MacArthur Foundation, na Bullitt Foundation na-akwado ya
Carbon Trade Watch bụ otu nyocha onwé ya na-arụ ọrụ na mgbanwe ihu igwe na iwu ihu igwe site n'echiche ikpe ziri ezi
Ọ bụbu akụkụ nke Transnational Institute nké dị na Amsterdam
Kemgbe ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2010, Carbon Trade Watch bụ òtù iwu na-achị onwé ya nké dị na Barcelona, Spain
Òtù ọhụrụ a na-akpọ Environmental Justice Research Collective (EJRC), nwèrè otu ìgwè ahụ na ọrụ na-aga n'ihu nke Carbon Trade Watch yana ịgbasa n'ime mpaghara nyocha ọhụrụ

Site n'ilekwasị anya n'ọrụ ya na ọrụ na mkpọsa ndị ọbọdọ na-eduzi, Carbon Trade Watch na-ezube inye nyocha na-adịgide adịgide nké na-eme ka o doo anya na nyocha zuru oke na nke ikpe ziri ezi nke mgbanwe ihu igwe na iwu gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi anaghị echefu ma ọ bụ mebie
Dị ka akụkụ nke ọrụ ha, CTW na-ezube iso ma kwado òtù na ọbọdọ na atụmatụ mpaghara ha na ọgụ màkà ikpe ziri ezi na gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
N'ụzọ dị mkpa, ndị otu ahụ na-achịkọta ma na-asụgharị ọrụ na ndị ọzọ na mpaghara a iji nyéré aka mee ka mmekọrịta na nghọta dịkwuo mfe
Ọrụ há gụnyere ihe nkiri The Carbon Connection na akwụkwọ Carbon Trading How it works and why it fails
Carbon Trade Watch arụwo ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ikpe dị mkpa nké nyeere aka ịnye nsogbụ ọha na eze nke ahia ikuku
Ikpe ndị a emeela ka e nwee ọtụtụ ọmụmụ agụmakwụkwọ, na-etinye aka na ikpe ndị a n'ụzọ zuru ezu
Asụsụ Ọhụrụ nke Carbon, echiche mbụ mepụtara n'isiokwu William McDonoughz, nke e bipụtara na mbụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ Ọdịdị
McDonough, n'akụkụ ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Charlottesville, William McDonough + Partners, jiri Asụsụ ọhụrụ nke carbon mepụta usoro maka ịmepụta Carbon Positive Cities

Echiche a nwekwara njikọ chiri anya na Breathing Cities, nke o gosipụtara na Arctic Circle China Forum na Shanghai na Mee 2019 ma lekwasị anya n'ịtọhapụ obere carbon na obere kemịkal na-egbu egbu n'ime ikuku ma kama ọ gbanwere iji jikọta ike na-agbanwe agbanwe dịka geothermal dị ka ihe ngwọta maka mmetọ ikuku na mgbanwe ihu igwe
Ịmejuputa usoro carbon dị mma maka obodo bụ otu ụzọ isi lụso mgbanwe ihu igwe ọgụ
Ebumnuche bụ ka obodo dị iche iche nabata carbon dị ka akụ na ala, osisi na ụdị ala, ka ha na-ewepụ ya dị ka ibu ọrụ na ikuku

Ebumnuche nke obodo ndị nwere carbon bụ iji belata ibu ọrụ nke carbon ikuku ma na-amụba carbon dị n'ala dị ka akụ; jikọta ma na-eme emume mmepe obodo dị ka usoro okike dị n'otu, na-arụpụta ihe na nke na-eweghachi; mata ojiji bara uru nke carbon maka uru ha dị mkpirikpi na ogologo oge, akụ na ụba, na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya; melite mmekọrịta dị n'etiti obodo, mpaghara ya, na mpaghara ya, yana ịkọwa ọrụ ugbo dị ka ihe nhazi nke ụdị obodo na ọrụ

Na COP25 na Madrid, William McDonough na onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi nke mmiri Carlos Duarte gosipụtara Akụ na ụba carbon okirikiri na ihe omume na BBVA Ntọala Economy carbon okirikiri dabeere na echiche McDonoughz sitere na Carbon abụghị Onye iro ma na-ezube ije ozi dị ka usoro maka ịmepụta na ịhazi usoro dị irè maka njikwa carbon
McDonough jiri Akụ na ụba carbon okirikiri mee ihe iji hazie mkparịta ụka na ogbako G20 na Machị 2020
Ebe ọ bụ na e bipụtara Carbon Is Not The Enemy na mbụ, ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ dịka Scientific American na Fast Company etoola ya maka ịmegharị mkparịta ụka gbasara ikuku carbon
Ndị ọzọ ekwuola na mgbagwoju anya nke mgbalị a iji mepụta okwu ọhụrụ kpatara, Carbon positive bụ okwu ahịa, ma nwee mgbagwoju mgbagwoju ike n'ozuzu zere ya
Kemgbe mbụ a kpọtụrụ Carbon ziri ezi Cities aha, ọtụtụ obodo ejirila nke a dị ka nyocha nke ebumnuche gburugburu ebe obibi ha
Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu kpọrọ Baoding, China obodo nke mbụ
Kansụl Obodo Liverpool kwupụtakwara ebumnuche ha ịbụ obodo mbụ nwere carbon n'ụwa site na iji teknụzụ blockchain
Àtụ Chembox
Carbromal bụ ọgwụ hypnotic / sedative nke Bayer mepụtara na 1909 ma mesịa ree ya dị ka Adalin
Parke-Davis mechara ree ọgwụ ahụ na pentobarbital, n'okpuru aha Carbrital
Diethylmalonic acid [510-20-3] (1) bụ decarboxylated ka ọ bụrụ 2-ethylvaleric acid [20225-24-5] (2)
Mgbanwe Hell-Volhard-Zelinsky na-agbanwe ndị na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site na iji bịa nke a na 2-Bromo-2-Ethylbutyryl Bromide [26074-53-3] (3)
Mmetụta ya na urea na affords carbromal (4)
Carex cubensis bụ osisi na-eto eto na-etolite tussock n'ezinụlọ Cyperaceae
Ọ bidoro tobe n'akụkụ Cuba na Haiti
Carey K
Jenkins (nwụrụ n'afọ 1987) bụ onye America na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mpaghara Los Angeles n'etiti narị afọ nke iri abụọ
Ọ bụ onye ojii mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Southern California (USC) School of Architecture
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na USC na 1943, ọ jere ozi na ndị agha Air force
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka A
Quincy Jones na ngwụcha 1940s
Ọ bụ onye isi ojii mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Southern California (USC) School of Architecture
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na USC'afọ a 1943, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Army Air Force
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka A
Quincy Jones na ngwụcha afọ 1940
A maara Jenkins dị ka onye 'na-ejikọta nke ọma na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị'
The Los Angeles Tribune kwuru, sị 'James Garrott, Paul R
Williams, na Carey Jenkins, bụ naanị ndị Negro architects nwetara nkwekọrịta ọha na eze na slate a
ma e wezụga Williams ha na-enweta ha ugboro ugboro
Ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Beverly Hills na ngwụcha afọ 1960 na mmalite afọ 1970
Jenkins sonyeere Charles E
Fleming iji wuchaa Martin Luther King, Jr
General Hospital na mpaghara Watts na 1972
Na ngwụcha afọ 1970, Jenkins-Fleming, Inc
nwere ọfịs na obodo isii dị na United States na West Africa, Jenkins bụkwa onyeisi oche nke bọọdụ ahụ
Carin Visser bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Kemgbe afọ 2019 ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya na-adịgide adịgide na National Council of Provinces
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị nnọchi anya mpaghara North West
Ọ bụ onye otu National Assembly nke South Africa site na 2017 ruo 2018 na onye otu North West Provincial Legislature site na 2018 ruo 2019
Ọ bụkwa onye kansụl obodo nke Tswaing Local Municipality
Visser jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche mpaghara nke Democratic Alliance (DA) site na 2015 ruo 2020
Visser tinyere aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mpaghara nke Sannieshof dị ka onyeisi oche nke otu ndị na-akwụ ụgwọ obodo ahụ
Ọ sonyeere DA ma họpụta ya dịka onye kansụl PR nke Tswaing Local Municipality na ntuli aka obodo nke afọ 2011
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndú nke pati ahụ na kansụl
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche mpaghara nke DA na 2015 ma họpụta ya ọzọ dị ka onye kansụl na 2016
N'afọ 2017, DA zigara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya pati ahụ na National Assembly
Ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu na 1 Disemba
N'afọ sochirinụ, a họpụtara Visser na North West Provincial Legislature, na-ejupụta oghere nke arụkwaghịm Joe McGluwa mepụtara
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka MPL na 23 Ọgọst 2018
A họpụtara Visser ka ọ bụrụ onye ndú nke pati ahụ na ndị omeiwu
Mgbe ntuli aka 2019 gasịrị, ọ si na ndị omeiwu gaa na National Council of Provinces na-anọchite anya North West
Ọ bụ naanị onye nnọchi anya DA na ndị nnọchi anya mpaghara
N'afọ 2020, ọ kwụsịrị dịka onye isi oche mpaghara DA
A họpụtara onye kansụl Rustenburg DA, Luan Snyders, ka ọ nọchie ya
Àtụ Permanent delegates of the National Council of Provinces

Carine Mbuh Ndoum Yoh (amụrụ n'abalị̀ iri n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1993) bụ onye Cameroon na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye nga n'ihu maka inye goolu ọ gbara na Turkish Women's First Football League nye Ataşehir Belediyespor na ndị otu mba Cameroon
Nwanyị egwuregwu nwere ogo ogologo 156 m (5 in) na-agba n'ọnọdụ onye etiti
N'afọ 2010, Yoh gbara bọọlụ nye klọb obodo ya bụ Gentile Ladies Bamenda
N'oge ọzọ, ọ sonyeere Ecole Franck Rohliceck de Douala
Ndị otu Naịjirịa Confluence Queens FC si Panthère Security de Garoua na Cameroon nyefere Yoh n'afọ 2013-14 ka ọ ga gbaa bọọlụ na Nigeria Women Premier League
N'onwa Jenụwarị afọ 2016, ọ hapụrụ klọb ya dị na Lokoja iji kwaga Turkey maka Ataşehir Belediyespor, nke na agba na Turkish Women's First Football League
N'afọ 2010, 2012 na ọzọ n'afọ 2014, a nabatara ya n'òtù ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Cameroon
Ka ọ̀ dị na 27 Naechu 2016
Caritas Communications Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke nwere isi na obodo azụmahịa nke Naijiria nke Lagos na Abuja Ndị isi ahịa ya nọ na ngalaba ike, mmanụ na gas
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka atọ gụnyere Caritas PR, Caritas Communications na Caritas Digital, nke ụlọ ọrụ nne na nna, First Caritas Investments Limited na-achịkwa
N'afọ 2016, otu magazin Corporate Vision (CV) nke dị na United Kingdom kpọrọ Caritas Communications 'Reputation Management Consulting Firm' kacha mma na ACE 2016 African Corporate Excellence Awards

N'afọ 2019, onye isi oche Caritas Communications bụ Adedayo Ojo kwupụtara na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-eduga Naịjirịa isonyere Navigate Response, netwọk nkwukọrịta nsogbu zuru ụwa ọnụ nke na-ekpuchi ebe ndị dị mkpa n'oké osimiri na West Africa na Mediterenian
Adedayo Ojo guzobere Caritas Communications na afọ 1999, mana ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ ruo afọ 2009 mgbe ọ malitere ịrụcha ọrụ
[citation needed] Caritas nwere ọfịs na Naịjirịa na Ghana
YNdị ahịa mbụ nke Caritas nọ na ngalaba ike ma mesịa gbasaa netwọk na nkwukọrịta, ngalaba ọha na eze na nke ego yana ụlọ ọrụ ndị ahịa

N'afọ 2017, Caritas Communications duziri mkpọsa nchịkwa nsogbu maka ExxonMobil nke jupụtara na esemokwu ụlọ ọrụ na ndị ọrụ ya nke yiri egwu imechi mmepụta mmanụ na mpaghara mmanụ Naịjirịa nke Niger Delta

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2014, Caritas Digital, otu enyemaka nke Caritas Communications bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta mmekọrịta na Investis Limited, onye na-eweta ngwanrọ dịka ọrụ, iji tinye ngwọta nkwukọrịta ụlọ ọrụ dijitalụ na ụlọ ọrụ dị na West Africa

Caritas na afọ 2018 na mmekorita ya na Nigeria Institute of Public Relations, (NIPR) malitere mbipụta mbụ ya nke Caritas Reputation Leadership Roundtable Summit na Lagos na-elekwasị anya na ụkpụrụ, aha na teknụzụ na VUCA Economy
Caritas Communications bụ onye otu Association of Advertising Agencies of Nigeria (AAAN)
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Public Relations Consultant Association of Nigeria (PRCAN) yana Nigerian-British Chamber of Commerce
Carl bụ nhọrọ nke ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ngwa ngwa na West Coast nke United States West Coast nke Njikọ̀taọ̀hà
Ọ malitere site Carl Karcher ma na CKE ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ
Karcher hụrụ mmalite ya na mmepụta ihe ọkụkụ nke ọtụtụ ọkụ na-ekpo ọkụ dị na Los Angeles
Na 1945, Karcher malitere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Anaheim bụ Carl Barbeque Drive-I
Na 1956, Karcher mepere Carl mbụ Carl, ya mere aha ya aha ọhụrụ nke ụgbọala ya-na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ
A kọwara ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ahụ ngwa ngwa ya na ọkọlọtọ ya, kpakpando na-acha odo odo
Ngwa ngwa gbasaa Jr
Carl, ma ugbu a, ọ nwere 1000 ebe na mba 13, yana Mexico, Guam na Philippines
Ihe oriri ndi ozo gụnyere Cheeseburger Bacon Western ugboro abụọ na ọkara Burger dollar, mgbe a na-akpọ ya n'ihi na ọ ga-ekwe omume na otu ihe ahụ ga-abụ ihe dịka dollar isii na US n'ime ụlọ
M 1997, chọta ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ CKE Hardee, ọtụtụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ebe 2500 dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ
Ka oge na-aga, ụlọ oriri ndị dị na Hardee gbanwere dị ka ụmụaka Carl, jiri ọbụna ọkọlọtọ ahụ dịka kpakpando

Carl Beukes (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1976) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dka Paul McPherson na Isidingo na dịka onyeisi ndị mmụọ ozi Gabriel na Beukes bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na The National School of the Arts, ebe ọ gụrụ Speech & Drama Na mgbakwunye na ihe nkiri ya, telivishọn, na ọrụ ihuenyo ndị ọzọ, Beukes anọwokwa na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Macbeth, Certified Male, Amadeus, Popcorn, Art, Black Dog, na Tape
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2016, Beukes na-arụ ọrụ na-eduga na pilot nke Mars Project Drama maka CW
Beukes lụrụ di n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2014 ma nwee ezumike ya na Zanzibar
N'afọ 2003, ọ kwagara London ma biri ebe ahụ ọnwa iri na isii tupu ọ laghachi South Africa n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2004
Beukes ekwuola na ọrụ kachasị amasị ya bụ na Certified Male, Macbeth na Art '
N'ikwu okwu banyere atụmatụ ọdịnihu ya 'Ihe mgbaru ọsọ m ga-abụ inwe nguzozi nke ọrụ obodo na nke mba ụwa
Kemgbe m bụ nwata, achọrọ m iso ụmụ nwoke buru ibu rụọ ọrụ
Ọ ga-amasị m ime ụfọdụ ihe nkiri America ma banye na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, enwere m ụkwụ n'ọnụ ụzọ ma amalitere m ime nke ahụ
Ọ dị m mkpa ịnya ebili mmiri a mgbe ọ na-aga
Achọrọ m ịlaghachi ma mekwuo ihe nkiri
Ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri South Africa na-eto eto ma achọghị m ịghara ịbụ akụkụ ya
Ọ bụ achịcha m na bọta m ndụ m niile

Carl Clark (1933-2015) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto na onye agha United States
A mụrụ ya dị ka Carlton L
Clark na Boston, Massachusetts n'afọ 1933
Clark nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'akụkụ ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya na-arụ ọrụ na Baltimore, Maryland ebe ọ na-ewere echiche nke ndụ ndị Afrịka Amerịka
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ agha atọ na Korea na Vietnam, ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na Soshologi na Mahadum Nebraska, wee soro nzere bachelụ na Fine Arts na Maryland Institute College of Art
Foto Clark anọwo na ngosi na Baltimore Museum of Art, Brooklyn Museum of Art

Maryland Art Place, Museum of Fine Arts, Houston, Museum of the National Center of Afro-Amerịkan Artists na Boston, Royal Photographic Society of England, Smithsonian Institution, na School 33 Art Center na Baltimore
Carl Isioma Ihenacho (amụrụ na Mai 28, 1988) bụ onye bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ bọọlụ nke Amirika, Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji na steeti San jose
A mụrụ Carl Ihenacho na Carson, California ma bụrụkwa onye Naijiria

Ọ bụ ezie na nne Ihenacho ekweghị ka Carl ma ọ bụ nwanne ya nwoke nke obere Duke kpọọ bọọlụ Pop Warner, Duke Ihenacho sonyeere otu bọọlụ na Junipero Serra High School na Gardena, California n'afọ ikpeazụ
Na Serra, Carl Ihenacho na-egwuri egwu na njedebe na njedebe siri ike
Ihenacho bụkwa onye otu nke abụọ na-ahọrọ na league niile na onye ọhụrụ nke afọ nke otu ya n'afọ 2005
Ihenacho gbara bọọlụ na Mahadum San Jose Steeti wee malite egwuregwu 31
Ọ bụ onye otu nke abụọ nke ọwụwa anyanwụ ndị nta egwuregwu n'oge anọ ya na San Jose State
Ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke ise na ndepụta ọrụ mahadum maka nata maka ọdịda (335) ma bụrụ onye nke ise na akpa aka na azụ na 17
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2009, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ otu simesta n'oge na nzere bachelọ na nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ
Carl Ihenacho na nwanne ya nwoke nke obere Duke Ihenacho gbara bọọlụ na San Jose State site na 2007 ruo 2009
N'afọ 2008, ESPN họọrọ Carl na Duke Ihenacho dị ka otu n'ime ụmụnne iri kachasị elu na bọọlụ kọleji maka ịbụ otu n'etiti ndị egwuregwu kachasị elu na FBS bọọlụ
Àtụ NFL predraftNa Jenụwarị 26, 2011, Ihenacho bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nchekwa / ọdịnihu na San Diego Chargers
Ihenacho sonyere n'ogige ọzụzụ na Chargers ruo mgbe a hapụrụ ya na Septemba 3, 2011
Na Disemba 7, 2011, Ihenacho bịanyere aka na ndị otu ogba boolu ana akpọ raidas

Ihenacho malitere ọrụ ya na Izu 1 nke oge 2012 (Septemba 10), egwuregwu bọọlụ na abalị Monde na mmeri 22-14 n'ụlọ na San Diego na acha oku N'izu nke 2 (September 16), mmeri 35-13 na Miami Dolphins, Ihenacho dekọrọ nnata mbụ ya dịka ọkachamara
Na Septemba 25, 2012, ndị Raiders hapụrụ Ihenacho, mana ha bịanyere ya aka na ndị otu ọzụzụ ụbọchị abụọ ka emesịrị
N'oktoba 2, 2012, ndị Raiders gburu Ihenacho
Ihenacho lara ezumike nká na bọọlụ iji bụrụ onye na-enye ọzụzụ onwe onye mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya

Carla Barber Garcia (a mụrụ na ụbọchị nke 18 n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1990) bụ dọkịta na-ahụ maka ahụike na Spen, onye nlereanya na onye na-ahụ maka ịma mma nke e chiri Miss Universe Spain 2015 na Miss World Spain 2011
Ọ nọchitere anya mba ya na Miss Universe 2015 na Miss World 2011
Carla Barber nwetara nzere bachelọ na Medicine na Mahadum Las Palmas
Ọ malitere ọkachamara ya na ịwa ahụ plastik na Germany (Eduardus-Krankenhaus) mana ọ gụchara ya
O mepere ụlọ ọrụ ịwa ahụ mbụ ya na Madrid n'afọ 2017
N'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2019, ọ hapụrụ Spanish Society of Aesthetic Medicine mgbe a baara ya mba maka idapuo na iwe nke Deontological Code
García bụ onye mbụ na eso onye meriri na asọmupi Miss Spain 2010, nke Paula Guillo meriri
E mechara kpọọ ya Miss World Spain 2011 site n'aka òtù nzukọ Miss Spain
García sonyere na asọmupi Miss World 2011 na 6 Nọvemba n'afọ 2011 na London ebe ọ nọrọ na Top 15
E chiri García okpueze dị ka Miss Universe Spain 2015 na Marbella n'oge nmeme Starlite de la Costa del Sol nke emere na 30 Julaị n'afọ 2015 site n'aka onye na-achị achị Desirée Cordero
Dị ka Miss Universe Spain, García sọrọnyere mpi na Miss Universe 2015 mana enweghị ebe ọ nọ
Carla Liesching (amụrụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye na-ese ihe ọcha si Johannesburg, South Africa, nke bi na New York City
A mụrụ Carla Liesching na Cape Town n'afọ 1985 ma zụlite ya na obere obodo dị iche iche gburugburu SA, ọkachasị na Eastern Cape
Ọ natara BFA ya, ọkachamara na foto, vidiyo na ntinye ụda, na Mahadum Rhodes dị na Grahamstown wee kwaga Johannesburg ntakịrị oge ka ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2007
Ọ nọrọla kamgbe oge na-arụ ọrụ na Taipei, Taiwan ma na-arụ ugbu a na New York City
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha mmekọrịta mmadụ na nhazi, ọkachasị mgbanwe echiche na nhazi ala na akụkọ
Omume Liesching na-ekwu banyere echiche nke onwe n'ihe gbasara ebe, mmegharị, anya na nke

N'inwe mmasị na ụlọ ọrụ foto foto na ịkpụzi akụkọ njirimara, Liesching na-emepụta ihe ndekọ nke foto gburugburu ebe obibi, nke na-anụghachi azụ na ntinye aka izizi nke onye na-ahụ maka usoro nkewa mmadụ na nyocha pseudo-sayensị (dịka ọmụmaatụ, foto eji enyere aka na physiognomy, anthropology anụ ahụ, phrenology, Darwinism na colonialism) Ihe Liesching na-etinye na-agụnyekarị ihe ọkpụkpụ na ụda n'akụkụ ọrụ foto ya
Liesching na-anọchite anya ụlọ ngosi ihe nkiri Brundyn & Gonsalves nke dị na Cape Town
Usoro ya The Swimmers, na-egosi ndị mmadụ 'na mba na ọdịbendị si n'akụkụ ụwa niile, na-eyi ihe ọ bụla ma e wezụga uwe ịsa ahụ ha

Naanị ihe ndị dị n'azụ ya abụghị osimiri, ma ọ bụ oké osimiri [] Kama nke ahụ, Liesching na-etinye ndị ọ na-achị megide ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe a gbahapụrụ agbahapụ, mmiri na-adịghị agagharị agagharị, ubi ọka na ala obodo siri ike

[] n'ihi na ha etolitela n'ụwa nke gbanwere ngwa ngwa ma na-efunahụ isi ihe niile ya n'ụzọ [Ọ bụ ụzọ isi gosipụta ọchịchọ ha ịbụ otu, mkpa ha nwere banyere njirimara, ógè ha na-ebi - gba ọtọ - n'ihu ụwa dum
Carla Meninsky bụbu onye na-emepụta egwuregwu vidio na onye mmemme na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'afọ ndị mbụ nke Atari VCS
Ya na Carol Shaw (onye mepụtara 3-D Tic-Tac-Toe na River Raid), Meninsky bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị injinia atọ na Atari, Inc
iji mepụta cartridges egwuregwu vidio
O mechara bụrụ onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ihe onwunwe ọgụgụ isi
Nne Meninsky bụ onye mmemme na Carla mụtara mmemme na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, mana ọ gbanwere site na mgbakọ na mwepụ gaa na neuropsychology na imepụta ụbụrụ na Mahadum Stanford
N'ihi ọrụ nka ya, Meninsky nwere mmasị karịsịa na ọhụụ ma mesịa laghachi azụ na mmemme na nrọ ndụ ya niile nke ịmepụta ngwá ọrụ animation
Ọ malitere ọrụ kọleji ya na Stanford na-amụ mgbakọ na mwepụ mana o mechara gbanwee gaa na nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ n'ihi na ọ na-ada ụda karịa
Ọ mụtara Fortran bụ isi na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị site n'aka nne ya, onye bụ onye mmemme, ma site na nke a nwee mmasị na animation kọmputa
Meninsky sonyeere Atari mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Stanford na nzere na nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ

Maka Atari 2600 o dere egwuregwu ịgba ọsọ Indy 500 na Dodge 'Em (dị ka 1979 Head On coin-op sitere na Sega), ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri 1981 nke Atari's Warlords, na 2600 version nke Star Raiders (nke Doug Neubauer mepụtara maka ezinụlọ Atari 8-bit)
O mechara rụọ ọrụ n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Tempest nke a na-ahapụghị, mana prototypes dị
Meninsky rụrụ ọrụ maka Electronic Arts (EA) na ndị na-ebipụta egwuregwu ndị ọzọ ma mesịa malite ụlọ ọrụ mmemme nkwekọrịta nke ya
N'oge ọ na-ede nkwekọrịta na ịhụ ka ụlọ ọrụ ụfọdụ na-eleghara ikike ikike ọgụgụ isi anya, ọ malitere inwe mmasị na iwu ihe onwunwe ọgụgụ isi
Meninsky gụsịrị akwụkwọ na George Washington University Law School ma ugbu a na-arụ ọrụ iwu ihe onwunwe ọgụgụ isi
Dị ka onye EPIC Public Interest Opportunities Program Fellow, Meninsky gbara akaebe n'ihu US Senate na 2002
Àtụ Atari 2600
Carlos Fernández-Pello (amụrụ na Asturias, Spain) bụ onye otu ngalaba nke Mahadum kalifonia Berkeley, Ngalaba Injinia Mekanikal

Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dịka onyeisi na ngalaba Graduate na Berkeley, ebe ọ na-elekọta mmemme Graduate Diversity Program, Amirika indian Graduate programu , ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ nke Graduate Divishon mkpakọrịta, akwụkwọ, na weebụsaịtị
Mmasị nyocha ya dị na ọkụ, okpomọkụ na nnyefe oke, ọkụ microgravity, ọkụ micro na meso-scale, ọkụ na mgbasa ọkụ, smouldering na mgbanwe na ọkụ ọkụ
Fernández-Pello etinyela aka na ọrụ nkuzi na nyocha kemgbe afọ 1970 na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche
Carlos Fernández-Pello natara PhD
ya na Mahadum California, San Diego na 1975 n'okpuru nlekọta nke Forman A
Williams
Na mbido, ọ natara nzere MSc
(1973) na UC
San Diego, na Bachelor ya na Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (Spain, 1968)
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha postdoctoral na Harvard, Mahadum Princeton na Mahadum Northwestern, ọ sonyeere UC Berkeley na 1980

Kemgbe ahụ, ọ nọ n'ọkwá agụmakwụkwọ ndị a osote dean nke Graduate Division (site na 2003), osote onyeisi oche nke ihe ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Ngalaba Injinịa Mechanical (1997-2000), osote onye isi oche nke Graduate Council (2000-2001), prọfesọ (site na 1986), na osote prọfesor (1982-1986)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka injinia na ụlọ ọrụ na SENER (Spain)
Ọ bụ onye otu The Spanish Royal Academy of injiniaring , nke Amirika na ahụ maka ngalaba obodo di iche iche nke combushon Institut, na Amirika Institut nke Aeronautics and Astronautics

Ọzọkwa, ọ bụ onye otu mahadum nke na eme nchoputa di iche iche, nke Microgravity sayensị na applikashon consul ndị nduzi nke Center for Pure and Applied Mathematics na UC Berkeley, NASA Space Station Science and Appliations Advisory Committee, na Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory
Ọ bụ onye otu na-arụsi ọrụ ike na kọmitii ndụmọdụ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ na mpaghara ọkụ
Fernández-Pello nwere ahụmịhe nyocha n'ọtụtụ isiokwu nke ọkụ, mana a maara ya nke ọma maka onyinye ya na isiokwu atọ Ọkụ na-agbasa n'elu mmanụ siri ike, ọkụ na-ere ọkụ na obere ọkụ
Carlos Stephens aka Clos, bụ onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ si New Orleans, Louisiana
Ọ chọtara aha dị ka ónyé otu No Limit Records 'n'ime ụlọ mmepụta otu, Beats by the Pound
Ọ bụkwa naanị ónyé na-emepụta No Limit nwèrè nkesa mpụga màkà ónyé na-ese ihe
Kemgbe ọ hapụrụ akara ahụ, o hiwere ákàrà ndekọ nke ya Flame Entertainment
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Stephens nwere ihe karịrị nde iri asaa na ise na ahịa ndekọ

Stephens chịkọtara ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nde 900 na iyi ndị a na-enye site na MusoAi Stephens arụwo ọrụ n'ihe karịrị iri isii na ise isi ọrụ ma bụrụ ónyé a na-ekwu na ọ nwèrè atọ #1 Singles, iri na anọ gold albums, iri platinum, abụọ abụọ platinum, otu Triple platinum, & otu Quadruple Platinum Album

A mụrụ ya na New Orleans, Louisiana mana a zụlitere ya n'ógbè Gretna, Carlos malitere ịmepụta egwu màkà ìgwè ole na ole dị n'óbe ọbọdọ na mbido afọ iri itoolu nke a nyèrè ya ohere ịzụlite nkà ya na usoro mmepụta
Na 1994 Stephens ga-emepụta màkà Ron Gray 'The Bossman nke ga-abụ otu n'ime mmepụta ikpeazụ ya n'èzí tupu ọ banye na ndị otu mmepụta No Limit nke Beats by the Pound
N'ime afọ ole na ole sochirinụ, ọ ga-enye nnukwu mmepụta màkà ndị omenkà No Limit niile, na mmepụta mbụ ya na Silkk the Shocker's debut album The Shocker na 1996
N'afọ 1996, Carlos, site na ikike nke Master P, ghọrọ naanị ónyé na-emepụta ihe n'ime ụlọ iji guzobe nkesa na mpụga No Limit Records
Nke a nyere ya ohere ịtọhapụ ónyé omenkà mbụ ya, Skull Duggery na The Ghetto Commission na 1998
Ọ ga-emesị nweta nhọpụta màkà Ónyé Mmepụta nke Afọ ma bụrụ ónyé a họpụtara dịka otu n'ime 'Ndị Iri Atọ Kasị Ike' nke Hip-Hop site na The Source
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2008, Carlos ga-ewere oche ony6e nduzi na vidiyo izizi ya 'Be Fresh' maka C-Murder's album Screamin' 4 Vengeance
Stephens malitekwara ndụmọdụ, site na 31Minds LLC
naanị ebumnuche nke inyere ụlọ ọrụ aka na akara, na ịmepụta njikọ aka n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ n'ụzọ ndị na-abụghị nké omenala iji gbasaa mmata nke ngwaahịa ahụ

Carmela jeria, (onye Carmela Jeria Gomez mụrụ na Valparaiso, chille,July 16, 1886 - ?), bụ onye ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ, onye na-ede akwụkwọ, onye na'akwụkwọ, na onye ndú mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na nke ụmụ nwanyị
A na-akpọ ya 'onye nta akụkọ mbụ na-arụ ọrụ' nke mba ya, ọ bụ onye guzobere La Alborada, akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọrụ nwanyị mbụ e bipụtara na Chile
Ọnọdụ ọrụ na mmalite nke narị afọ ahụ dị oke egwu ma mee ka e guzobe ọtụtụ òtù ndị ọrụ ka Chile malitere iji ihe onwunwe ya mee ihe
Ọnọdụ akụ na ụba ya fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 50% dabere na saltpeter
Ọganihu akụ na ụba nke si na ya pụta mepụtara usoro mmekọrịta ọhụrụ na mba ahụ, ihe sitere na mbata ndị ọrụ na ojiji na-arịwanye elu nke ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
Usoro esemokwu ọrụ malitere na ndị ọrụ na-achọ ụgwọ ọrụ ka mma na oge ọrụ dị mkpirikpi
Ọtụtụ n'ime mgbawa ndị a bụ ndị ndị uwe ojii na ndị agha gọọmentị ji obi ọjọọ gbochie na ọtụtụ ndị nwụrụ anwụ

Abụọ n'ime ọtụtụ nnupụisi ahụ bụ Red Week (mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ọgba aghara anụ) na 1905 na ogbugbu Santa Maria School (nke a na- kpọkwara, ogbugbu na Santa María de Iquique School) na Disemba 21, 1907, nke mere ka ndị ọrụ gbasaa
Nne na nna Carmela Jeria bụ Maria Gómez na onye uwe ojii a ma ama na 'onye ọrụ ọgụgụ isi' Mauricio Jeria nke Valparaiso
Carmela rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ebi akwụkwọ na Gillet Lithograph Company ma mụta banyere akwụkwọ akụkọ site n'ime
Mgbe ọ dị obere, ọ ghọrọ onye otu ndị ọrụ na-ekwu okwu
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 19, Jeria guzobere akwụkwọ akụkọ ọhụrụ nke ụmụ nwanyị La Alborada (n'asụsụ Bekee, The Dawn), na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ na Chile ịghọ onye nta akụkọ na-arụ ọrụ
O bipụtara mbipụta abụọ kwa ọnwa malite na Septemba 10, 1905 site na Valparaiso
Mgbe mbipụta ole na ole gasịrị, mmepụta kwụsịrị tupu ịmaliteghachi na isi obodo mba ahụ, Santiago, na Nọvemba 11, 1906 dị ka mbipụta kwa izu na okwu 'Feminist Newspaper' na isi

Editorial mbụ nke Jeria, nke ọ bịanyere aka na Carmela Jeria G, na-ekwu, sị 'A mụrụ La Alborada na ndụ ndị nta akụkọ, na ebumnuche pụrụ iche nke ịgbachitere ndị na-arụ ọrụ na ọkachasị ndị na-arụrụ ọrụ
na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mkpebi siri ike maka omume, ihe onwunwe na ọgụgụ isi nke nwanyị na-arụkọ ọrụ yana maka ụmụnne anyị na-ata ahụhụ
Onye nchịkọta akụkọ ahụ gara n'ihu na-ekwu, 'Anyị ji ịnụ ọkụ n'obi chọọ ka ụmụ nwanyị ga-eru n'ọkwa ọganihu nke ụmụ nwoke otu ụbọchị'

N'iji peeji e biri ebi, Jeria gbasaa echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị metụtara ikike nke ndị ọrụ na ọkachasị ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ, na-akatọ ụzọ dị iche iche nke 'mmegbu' nke gbochiri ha, yana mkpa ụmụ nwanyị sonyere na nhazi nke òtù ndị ọrụ
Ọ na-edekarị kpọmkwem banyere ọgụ kwa ụbọchị nke ndị ọrụ nwanyị na mkpa ọ dị ilekwasị anya na nnwere onwe nwanyị
Onye na-akwado agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị, Jeria kwuru na agụmakwụkwọ ndị inyom ekwesịghị ijedebe n'ịzụ ndị nne dị njikere

Ọ na-ebipụta isiokwu mgbe niile na-akọwa nsogbu nke ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke na-arụ ọrụ (ndị na-etinye aka n'ịkụziri na ịtọhapụ ụmụ nwanyị), na-ekwu maka 'ịlụ ọgụ megide ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị na 'ohu nke ụmụ nwanyị ọrụ
Na Mee 1, 1907, Jeria kwuru okwu ụbọchị ọrụ nye mmadụ 40,000, mana site n'ime nke a, a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ na Gillet Lithograph, a kọrọ na ọ bụ n'ihi ọrụ ya dị ka onye ndu ọrụ na onye nta akụkọ na-arụ ọrụ
Mbipụta ikpeazụ nke La Alborada pụtara n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị na Mee 19, 1907 mgbe Jeria fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 21, ihe dị ka afọ abụọ mgbe ọ malitere ibipụta ya
Na Mee 1, 1908, enyi Carmela, onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye na-eme ihe ike Esther Valdés de Díaz, onye na'akwalite Association of Seamstresses, malitere akwụkwọ akụkọ ọrụ ọhụrụ, La Palanca

Na nchịkọta akụkọ mbụ ya, onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ ahụ kwetara na ọrụ La Alborada bụ nke mbụ mana o kwuru na Carmela tara ahụhụ site na 'mbibi nke ụlọ ya, na usoro nsogbu na-adịghị akwụsị akwụsị' nke, na mgbakwunye na 'ọrịa ogologo oge na obi ọjọọ', 'mere ka ọ kwụsị agha ntụli aka ya'
Onye nchịkọta akụkọ ahụ gara n'ihu kwuo na ọ maghị ihe ọ bụla gbasara ndụ enyi ya mgbe oge ahụ gasịrị, mana na Jeria kpaliri ndị na-eso ụzọ ga-aga n'ihu n'ọrụ ya

A na-ekwu na ọrụ Jeria nyere aka guzobe ọtụtụ òtù ụmụ nwanyị raara onwe ha nye mmegharị nke ikike nhọpụta, n'ikpeazụ na-eduga na ụmụ nwanyị Chile inweta ikike ịtụ vootu na ntuli aka ime obodo na 1934, na ntuliaka onye isi ala na 1952
Carmen Pretorius, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agụ egwú na onye nkwupụta ngosi nke South Africa

A maara ya maka ọrụ ya na fim Lien se Lankstaanskoene na Table Manners, maka mmeri ya na ihe nkiri ngosi ozigbo telivishọn High School Musical Spotlight South Africa, na maka ọrụ ya na egwu dị ka The Sound of Music na Chicago
A mụrụ Pretorius ma zụlite ya na Johannesburg, South Africa
Nna ya bụ injinia na nne na-ahụ maka anya
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ na imere ezinụlọ ya ihe mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ, ma malitekwa mmụta ịgba egwú mgbe ọ dị afọ isii ma Mmụ̀ta ịbụ abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
Egwu izizi ya bụ mmepụta ihe n'erughị̀ ogo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ

N'oge na-adịghị anya ka nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rutere ihe nrite ọla edo na South Africa Championship of Performing Arts ma mesịa nye ya ohere ịme na US mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii ma na Japan mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, n'ime afọ ikpeazụ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ meriri M-Net reality show High School Musical Spotlight nke South Africa na 2008, na dị ka ihe nrite ya gosipụtara dị ka Gabriella na mmepụta ogbo nke High School Musical

Emechara n'edetu Pretorius na Footloose yana dịka Sophie na Mamma Mia!, nke ha niile bụ tupu ọ gba afọ iri abụọ, na n'ime afọ ndị so,pụta n'egwu ndị ọzọ dị ka Cabaret na Chicago, wee gaa njem afọ anọ na Jersey Boys na The Sound of Music
Ọ natala awọdụ Naledi na nsọpụrụ Fleur de Cap
Ọ na-emekwa ihe nkiri na ihe onyonyo
O gosipụtara dị ka Lien na ihe nkiri Lien se Lankstaanskoene
Ọ pụtala na telivishọn dị ka Tiffany Steyn na Isidingo, ma na Binnelanders
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eweta ihe ngosi na Pasella, usoro obibi ndụ, nke na-agbasa na ọwa SABC 2
Oge dị ka 25 Maachị 2019, mgbe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri dị ka Roxie Hart na Chicago, ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ maka nzere bachelọ na Marketing site na IMM
Carmine Falcone bụ agwa akụkọ ifo na DC Comics, gosipụtara dị ka onye isi ndị na-eme ihe ike, onye iro nke Batman, na enyi ezinụlọ Wayne
N'ime omume ndụ, Tom Wilkinson gosipụtara agwa a na ihe nkiri na Batman Begins (2005) na John Turturro na The Batman (2022), yana John Doman na usoro telivishọn Gotham (2014)
Carmine Falcone mere mpụta mbụ ya na akụkọ nwere akụkụ anọ Batman Year One nke Frank Miller na David Mazzucchelli dere na 1987
N'ime ihe nkiri ahụ, Falcone bụ onye isi Mafia dị ike nke akpọrọ 'Onye Rome ', ebe a na-akpọ njigide ya na mpụ ahaziri ahazi nke Gotham City dị ka 'Alaeze Ukwu Rom' ọbụlagodi otu ugboro
Na Batman Afọ Mbụ, e mere ụlọ ya pent ụlọ n'ụdị ụkpụrụ ụlọ Rome
Falcone pụtara na miniseries Batman The Long Halloween site Jeph Loeb na Tim Sale
Omume a dabere na ihe ngosi Marlon Brando nke Don Vito Corleone sitere na ihe nkiri 1972 The Godfather

Loeb kwuru na N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ya na ezinụlọ Falcone yiri nke ezinụlọ Corleone Ike na amamihe Falcone dị ka Vito Corleone, àgwà nwa ya nwoke Alberto na ọdịdị nke Fredo Corleone, na nwa ya nwanyị Sofia na-ewe iwe kwekọrọ na nke
Sonny Corleone
N'ikpeazụ, nchụpụ nwa ya nwoke nke okenye Mario na Sicily, ọdịdị anụ ahụ na ọchịchọ ịkwado ezinụlọ Falcone bụ àgwà niile na-eso Michael Corleone
Na mgbagha na Long Halloween, onye omempụ Vincent Falcone na-ewetara nwa ya nwoke na-anwụ anwụ, Carmine (onye gbagburu ọtụtụ ugboro site n'aka onye iro ya, Luigi Maroni), na Thomas Wayne
N'ịtụ egwu Maroni ga-arụcha ọrụ ahụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ọha, ọ na-arịọ Wayne, otu n'ime ndị dọkịta kacha mma nke obodo, ka ọ rụọ ọrụ ịwa ahụ na Wayne Manor
Otu nwa okorobịa bụ Bruce Wayne na-ekiri nna ya na-azọpụta ndụ Falcone

Ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị na olili ozu Thomas na Martha Wayne, Carmine Falcone, na ekele maka Thomas zọpụtara ndụ ya na ugbu a akụkụ nke ezinụlọ mpụ nke nna ya, na-agwa Bruce na ọ nwere ike ịrịọ ya ihu ọma mgbe ọ bụla ọ chọrọ ya
Na Batman Afọ Mbụ, Falcone gosipụtara na ọ bụ onye kachasị ike na Gotham City, na onyeisi obodo a na-amaghị ama, ndị isi obodo, GCPD Commissioner Gillian B
Loeb, Detective Arnold Flass, na ọtụtụ ndị uwe ojii Gotham n'akpa ya na ihe niile
nke uwe ndị omekome obodo n'okpuru ya
Ike ya na-abịa n'okpuru agha na mbata nke ihe omimi vigilante Batman, onye bụ n'ezie Bruce n'onwe ya
N'otu ihe nkiri, Batman n'ihu ọha kụpịara oriri nri abalị Falcone iji kwusaa na a ga-ebuga ndị niile bịara nrụrụ aka n'ikpe ziri ezi

N'agbanyeghị mbọ Loeb na-agbasi mbọ ike ịkwụsị ya, mwakpo Batman na nzukọ Falcone na-aghọwanye ihe efu; N'otu oge, mgbe o were ụgbọ ala ndị omempụ ahụ tụba ya n'ime osimiri ahụ, Batman wakporo ụlọ Falcone, yipụ ya uwe ime ya ma hapụ ya ka ọ nọrọ n'ihe ndina ya
N'ịbụ onye e wedara n'ala, Falcone kpebiri igbu Batman
Otú ọ dị, Batman bụ ihe siri ike, ma na-emechu Falcone ihere site n'ịgbapụta onye ohi na-akpọ onwe ya Catwoman mgbe onye na-eme ihe ọjọọ na ndị ọrụ ya jidere ya na-agbalị ịpụnara ha ihe
N'ime usoro a, Catwoman na-ahapụ Falcone na-ata ahụhụ na-adịgide adịgide mgbe o jiri mkịrịka ọla nke ejiji ya kpụrụ ya
N'ikpeazụ, Falcone nyere nwa nwanne ya Johnny Viti iwu ka ọ tọọrọ ezinụlọ nke Detective Jim Gordon, enyi Batman, ma mgbalị ahụ emezughị
Mgbe nyocha Gordon na District Attorney Harvey Dent malitere iyi ike ya egwu, Falcone nyere iwu ka Johnny nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'ihi ụjọ na ọ nwere ike ikwu okwu
The dara hit results na Falcone ezinụlọ na-embroiled na a ìgwè mmadụ agha na Viti si onyeisi Carla na Chicago, onye n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ Carmine nwanne na-ewe iwe site na nwanne ya nwoke
Agha ahụ na-eje ozi naanị iji belata mmetụta Falcone na Gotham
N'oge The Long Halloween, ezinụlọ Falcone na-esighị ike na-ezubere maka onye na-egbu egbu aha ya bụ Holiday
Falcone na-egosipụta ịdị ọcha ya site n'iji nlezianya na-agwakọta igbu ọchụ na mmetụta iji chebe ezinụlọ ya na nyocha ndị uwe ojii
Ọnọdụ ahụ gbanwere mgbe Batman na Dent chọtara otu n'ime ụlọ nkwakọba ihe nke Falcone, nke nwere nde kwuru nde ego
Ha na-ere ego ahụ ọkụ, na-eti Falcone ihe ọ na-apụghị ileghara anya
Nke a na-akpali ya ime ihe na-enweghị atụ, na-ewe ndị 'freaks' a na-akwụ ụgwọ n'ụdị ihe na-aghọ Batman's Rogues Gallery
N'ịbụ onye na-ewe iwe site na mbọ Dent gbara iji mebie ọrụ ya (ma kwenye na Dent bụ ezumike nzuzo) ọ na-eme ka onye na-agba ọsọ mbụ ya bụ Sal Maroni gbuo Dent mgbe a na-ekpe ikpe maka igbu ọchụ
Falcone na-ahazi ka Maroni nweta vial acid, nke ọ tụbara na Dent n'oge a na-eme n'ụlọikpe na August 2, Falcone ụbọchị ọmụmụ
Acid ahụ na-emebi akụkụ aka ekpe nke ihu Dent, na-eduga ya ịghọ ihu abụọ

Na njedebe akụkọ ahụ, ihu abụọ na-eduga ndị fọdụrụ na Batman's Rogues Gallery (nke nwere Catwoman, Joker, Mad Hatter, Penguin, Poison Ivy, Scarecrow, na Solomon Grundy ) na mwakpo nke ụlọ nzuzo Falcone
Ihu abụọ wee gbuo Falcone n'onwe ya na-eso mpịakọta mkpụrụ ego nke dara n'akụkụ ahụ tụrụ ya
Nwa nwoke Falcone Alberto n'ikpeazụ kwuputara ogbugbu niile nke ezumike n'ịgbalị ịnakwere na azụmahịa ezinụlọ
Na Batman Ọchịchị Ọchịchịrị, a na-ezu ohi ili Falcone na ozu ya na-efu
A na-ebipụ mkpịsị aka ya ma zigara nwa ya nwanyị, Sofia Gigante, onye ndu ọhụrụ nke ezinụlọ Falcone
Ọ ghọtara nke a dị ka 'ozi nke ochie', na-egosi na mmadụ ga-ewepụ ihe niile na Falcones
A tụrụ Alberto n'ụlọ mkpọrọ iji chebe ya, ma malite ịnụ olu nna ya n'ụlọ
N'ikpeazụ, ozu ozu nke onye ọka iwu mpaghara rụrụ arụ Janice Porter, onye bụbu onye Carmine, na-ejedebe n'àkwà Alberto mgbe ọ na-ehi ụra
Nna ya pụtara n'enyo, kpọọ ya onye dara ada, ma gwa ya ka o gbuo onwe ya
N'ịmara na nna ya kpọrọ igbu onwe ya asị, Alberto na-achọpụta na olu ahụ bụ akụkụ nke aghụghọ, na-agbapụkwa enyo Olu nna ya na-eme ka ọ bụrụ Kalenda Man, bụ onye na-agbapụ ya ka ọ na-agbalị ịgbapụ
Mgbe Batman na Gordon nyochara, ha na-achọta akụkụ nzuzo maka Kalịnda Man ka ọ na-agagharị n'ụlọ ahụ kpamkpam
Ha wee mata na Scarecrow ejirila nsi egwu tinye sịga Alberto
Ọ bụghị ruo na njedebe ka ekpughere na ihu abụọ nwere ahụ Falcone dị n'aka ya, ebe ọ na-eji teknụzụ cryogenic nke Mr
Freeze mee ka oyi kpọnwụrụ ya
Selina Kyle na-eleta ili nkenke na njedebe nke akụkọ ahụ, bụ ebe e gosipụtara na ọ kwenyere na Falcone bụ nna mụrụ ya ma kpebisie ike ịmụta eziokwu
N'afọ 2011, ' The New 52 ' maliteghachiri ọganihu nke ụwa DC Comics
Carmine Falcone pụtara na mbipụta nke abụọ nke Batman Ebighị Ebi
A kọwara ya dị ka onye bụbu onye na-eme ihe ike kpebisiri ike ịnaghachi alaeze ya mgbe Kọmishọna Gordon, bụ onye napụrụ ihe niile n'aka ya, ka ahaziri maka igbu ọchụ

Atụmatụ Falcone iji weghachi ọchịchị Gotham City gara n'ihu nke ọma, dịka egosiri na ọ na-achịkwa onye isi obodo Gotham, Sebastian Hardy (onye jisiri ike nọrọ n'ọfịs ruo afọ ise n'ihi mmetụta Falcone), ebe ọ na-ejikwa ohere ọdịda Gordon na-enye ndị òtù nke iri ngo
GCPD ịrụ ọrụ ruru unyi ya
Mgbe Falcone na Mayor Hady na-agwa ndị uwe ojii ka ha chụtuo Batman, ndị agha ezinụlọ Falcone na-amalite ịwakpo ebe nchekwa ogwe aka nke Penguin onye iro ya

Mgbe Jason Bard na Vicki Vale nwetara ihe akaebe nke onye uwe ojii ọhụrụ Jack Forbes njikọ na Falcone, ha na-akpaghasị Hady ka ọ hapụ Falcone, na n'ihi ejidere Forbes maka mpụ ya, ọ na-enyekwa GCPD ohere ijide Falcone

A na-ekpughe na njedebe nke akụkọ ahụ na Falcone amaghị banyere nkata buru ibu megide Batman, ma gwa ya naanị na ọ ga-enwe ohere ịkụ ya site na akwụkwọ ozi na-amaghị aha zitere ya site n'aka ezi onye isi
Na 'DC ịlọ ụwa', dị ka akụkụ nke akụkọ akụkọ 'Agha nke Jokes na Riddles', nke na-eme mgbe ihe omume nke gasịrị, Falcone na-akpọtụrụ Joker na ntụziaka siri ike iji gbuo Riddler n'ime otu awa
Ndị ikom ya mechara kwụsị ọrụ ahụ, na-eduga ndị Joker ka e gbuo ndị ikom Falcone
Penguin wee weghara ọdịmma azụmahịa ya n'aha Joker
Ndị a bụ ndị ikwu Carmine Falcone
