The Carniriv ( English ) bụ mmemme kwa afọ, nke a na-eme na Port Harcourt, Nigeria
Carnival na-amalite izu ole na ole tupu ekeresimesi, ma na-adịru ụbọchị asaa
N'oge a, a na-eme ọtụtụ mmemme, ọtụtụ n'ime ha nwere ụfọdụ mkpa omenala na ma ọ bụ dị nsọ
Carol Frances Beerwinkel bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa onye jere ozi dị ka onye otu Western Cape Provincial Parliament site na Mee, na afọ 2009 ruo Mee, na afọ 2019
Beerwinkel bụ onye otu African National Congress
Beerwinkel bụ onye otu African National Congress
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Western Cape Provincial na ntuli aka 2009
Ọ malitere ọrụ na 6 Mee na afọ 2009
A họpụtara Beerwinkel ọzọ maka oge nke abụọ dị ka onye omeiwu mpaghara na ntuli aka mpaghara nke afọ 2014
Ọ hapụrụ ndị omeiwu mpaghara na 7 Mee na afọ 2019, ebe ọ na-etinyeghị ya na ndepụta ANC maka ntuli aka mpaghara nke afọ ahụ
Carol Howes (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 8 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1984) bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Zambia
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na afọ 2014 African Women's Championship
N'ọkwa klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Balcatta FC na Australia
Carol King (mụrụ 24 July 1963) bụ a Nigerian omee ihe nkiri, tespianụ, á kasị mara ya dị ka 'Jumoke' na usoro onyonyo Everyday People

N'ịbụ onye a maara maka 'ọrụ nne' ya na ihe nkiri TV, Carol egosila na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri onyonyo na ihe nkiri gụnyere The Gods Are Still Not To Blame and Dazzling Mirage, ihe nkiri 2014 nke Tunde Kelani duziri
Amụrụ na Lagos, na ndịda-ọdịda anyanwụ Nigeria mgbe ahụ ka nne na nna bu ndi Edo, Carol gara St
Soweto Primary School Lagos ebe ọ gụchara akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Awori Anglican Comprehensive High School Lagos ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta diploma na Insurance na mahadum Ahmadu Bello tupu enye ya nzere bachelor na Christian Religious Studies na Lagos State University
Caroline King bi ugbu a na Lagos State ma lụọ Captain Kolawole King bụ onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ atọ mgbe alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya dara
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri Carol malitere mgbe ọ gachara ihe ngosi maka ihe nkiri redio akpọrọ Achọrọ m Ịmara tupu ọ gaa n'ihu ịghọ aha ezinụlọ mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ na usoro TV Everyday People
O meela n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu ogbo, ihe nkiri, na ihe nkiri gụnyere Dazzling Mirage, Pasito Dehinde na The Gods Ka Na-agaghị Ata ụta
N'ịkwado maka ọrụ ya n'ọganihu nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri, Carol nwetara ihe nrite 'African Youth Role Model Award' na 2009
Carol Mokola (amụrụ na 1 Jenụwarị na afọ 1977) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ na Zambia
O sonyere na 100 mita ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 2004 Summer Olympics
Carol Mujokoro (amuru dịka Carol Chivengwa ) bu onye ọkụ egwu ụka amara ya na onye ukochukwu nke mbaZimbabwe
Carol Mujokoro bụ onye na-akụ egwu Ndị otu Kraịst nke Zimbabwe, onye na-ede abụ, onye na-ede abụ nakwa onye ụkọchukwu

Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ọkachamara ya na mmalite nke afọ 1990 wee debanye aha maka Diploma ihe ọmúmú akwụkwọ nsọ na Christian Leadership na Afrịka Multination for Christ College (AMFCC) site n'afọ 2008 wee ruo n'afọ 2010
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị diplọma n'aka AFCC, ọ gara n'ihu debanye aha maka nzere Akwụkwọ nsọ na Mahadum Enyi wee mechaa nweta nzere Master's na Dọkịta na Mahadum Triune
Mujokoro agagharịala nnukwu obodo ndị dị na Zimbabwe na-eme ihe nkiri n'egwú nakwa n'ọgba aghara ụka
Ọ gagharịakwala ọtụtụ mba SADC dịka onye akụ egwu
N'afọ 2003, ọ gara N'ala nsọ Israel kpọmkwem ka ọ hụ ala ebe Jizọs Kraịst bi na ịdekọ ihe oyoyo egwu maka abọ egwu Ngatimunamate
Ọ ghọrọ onye mbụ na-akụ egwu ozi ọma n' mba Zimbabwe nwetara ọrụ ahụ
Carol Mokgadi Phiri bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa, ọ bụkwa onye bụ onye omeiwu (MP) maka African National Congress
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa

Carol Tshabalala (amụrụ n'Ọgọst 11, 1981) bụ onye mgbasa ozi egwuregwu, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye nta akụkọ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya na onye na-ese okwu ugbu a na-arụ maka SuperSport International na Premier League Productions
A na-akpọkarị ya 'First Lady of Sport' nke South Africa, na-agunye bọọlụ, ịkụ ọkpọ na basketball
Ọ bụ onye Afrịka mbụ kwadoro FIFA Ballon d'Or na Zurich n'afọ 2011
Tshabalala malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye mmụta na ihe ngosi Sports Buzz na SABC mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ
Ọ ga-arụ ọrụ maka SABC dị ka onye mgbasa ozi egwuregwu site na 2000 ruo 2011
Ọ sonyeere SuperSport International n'afọ 2011, na 2016, sonyeere UK South Premier League Productions (IMG productions) dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi Extra Time na SuperSport ugbu a
Ọrụ Tshabalala na redio malitere na ụlọọrụ redio Kaya FM 959 dị ka onye nta akụkọ akụkọ egwuregwu site na 2005 ruo 2007
Ọ sonyeere Redio 2000 na 2008 dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi egwuregwu oge ụgbọala ma nọrọ ebe ahụ ruo 2013
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2022, a kpọrọ aha Tshabalala dị ka onye nnọchi anya akara maka onye na-agba chaa chaa egwuregwu Hollywoodbets
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2022, o kwupụtara nkwa ọlụlụ ya na Instagram, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-ezochi onye ọ chọrọ ịlụ
Carole Marie Byard (July 22, 1941 na January 11, 2017) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ese foto, na ónyé na-egbu foto
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe osise nke akwụkwọ ụmụaka, na onye natara Caldecott Honor, yana ọtụtụ Coretta Scott King Awards
A mụrụ Byard na Atlantic City, New Jersey, nne na nna William 'Bunny' Byard na Viola London-Byard
O nwèrè otu nwanne nwoke, nwanne nwoke tọrọ ya, Michael Byard, ónyé n'etiti ọrụ ndị ọzọ, bụ onye na-elekọta ubi
N'afọ 1943, nne Byard nwụrụ mgbè ọ dị obere, nnukwu ezinụlọ ya ghọkwara ihe dị mkpà nye ya
N'ihe dị ka n'otu ógè ahụ, e debara aha nna ya n'Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Ọ bụ nna ya na nne nne ya zụlitere Byard mgbe nne ya nwụsịrị
Nwanne nne ya nwanyị nke nta bụ Millicent biri na New York City, yabụ mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ ma nyéré nna ya aka, Byard nwere ike iso ya gaa biri
Site na 1964 ruo 1968, Byard gara New York Phoenix School of Design na 33rd na Lexington, ébé ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ihe osise, na ebe ọ ga-emesị gaa kụzie
Byard mụkwara lithography na H
Morimoto na Robert Blackburn

Byard kwùrù na ka ọ na-etolite, ọ na-enwe mmasị ịgụ akwụkwọ, ma hụ akwụkwọ n'anya, mana ọ na-eche mgbe niile na enweghị akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ foto nke ndị mmadụ dị ka ya, ezinụlọ ya, na ezinụlọ ya, yana otu ha si ebi ndụ dị ka ndị mmadụ
N'oge kọleji, e nwèrè ụmụ akwụkwọ ojii ole na ole

Na mgbalị iji jikọọ ya na ndị Black ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe, Byard gara 1971 Where We At exhibition na ọbọdọ a na-akpọ Where We At Black Women Artists 1971, ma nwee ike ijikọ ya na ndị ọzọ Black women na-ese egwu dị ka Faith Ringgold
Ọ ghọrọ akụkụ nke otu ahụ
N'afọ 1969 ma ọ bụ 1970, Byard si na Harlem kwaga na Westbeth Artists Community afọ abụọ mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji
Na Westbeth ndị agbata obi ya gụnyere Freddie Waits na nwa ya nwoke Nasheet Waits
Na Westbeth, e nwèrè Black Artists Guild nke Byard kwuru na ọ na-eto eto
The Black Artists Guild nke bụ otu ihe nkírí nke e guzobere na 1970
Byard gara ịhụ mmepụta nke Slave Ship, egwuregwu nke Amiri Baraka dere na Brooklyn Academy of Music
Otu onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ kpaliri ya ma mee nnukwu ihe osise dabere na egwuregwu ahụ
O gosipụtara na ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri bikwa na Westbeth, ma bụrụkwa akụkụ nke nzukọ a, dabere na ihe Malcolm X hapụrụ site na Organization of Afro-American Unity, na-eji ụkpụrụ asaa ahụ
Byard sonyeere otu ahụ ma sonye n'ide na ime nka
Carole Madeleine Kaboud Mebam (amụrụ na 17 Septemba na afọ 1978) bụ onye Cameroon na-eme egwuregwu nke maara nke ọma na 100 na 400 mita mgbochi
O nwekwara ihe ndekọ mba na 4 × 400 mita relay na 3 2708 nkeji, ya na ndị otu Mirelle Nguimgo, Delphine Atangana na Hortense Béwouda nwetara n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2003 na Paris
Carolina Castro (amụrụ n'afọ 1979) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye otu ọrụ si Argentina

Castro nwere akara ugo mmụta na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum nke Buenos Aires N'oge ọchịchị Mauricio Macri, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ na Ministry of Production, maka obere azụmaahịa na nke etiti
N'oge G20 na 2018 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mkparịta ụka azụmahịa zuru ụwa ọnụ

N'afọ 2019, Asociación de Fábricas Argentinas de Componentes (Association of Argentine Component Factories) ma ọ bụ AFAC họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya ngalaba ụgbọ ala na Kọmitii Nchịkwa nke Argentine Industrial Union (UIA)
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ nwetara ọkwa njikwa na UIA na akụkọ ihe mere eme ya dị afọ 130
Mgbalị ya enyerela aka ịkpata mgbanwe maka ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị n'ebe ọrụ
Castro bụ ọgbọ nke atọ na-arụ ọrụ na azụmaahịa ezinụlọ, Industrias Guidi, nke na-emepụta ihe ndị na-emepụta ụgbọala ma na-enye ha Toyota na General Motors
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ emebiela echiche dị iche iche site n'iwe ụmụ nwanyị n'ọrụ na mpaghara mmepụta na nkezi dị elu karịa ndị ọrụ ndị ọzọ

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, o bipụtara Rompimos el Cristal (Anyị na-agbaji Glass), akwụkwọ mkparịta ụka ya na ụmụ nwanyị 18 nke Argentina bụ ndị na-eme nke ọma na azụmaahịa, nka, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na sayensị
Carolina Milena Jaume Saporiti (amụrụ ya na 18 Ọktoba 1976) bụ onye obodo Ecuadorian na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ngosi

yaA mụrụ Carolina Jaume na 18 Ọktoba 1985 na obodo kachasị ukwuu nke Ecuador, Guayaquil, nne na nna ya bụ Rafael Jaume nke Puerto Rico na Diana Saporiti, onye bụbu onye na-emepụta ihe onyonyo si Ecuador
Jaume malitere n'oge na-eme ihe nkiri na TV, mana ọ hapụrụ n'oge ọ na-eto eto ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, mgbe ọ banyere n'asọmpi Queen of Guayaquil nke afọ 2004, a kpọrọ ya 'Star of October'
Jaume mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na TV n'afọ 2006 na telenovela Amores que matan [es] nke Ecuavisa mepụtara na usoro De 9 a 6, ebe ya na Xavier Pimentel [es], di ya n'ọdịnihu rụkọrọ ọrụ
N'afọ 2007, Jaume ga-amụ nwa nwanyị di na nwunye ahụ, mana alụmdi na nwunye ahụ kwụsịrị otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, n'afọ 2009
N'ikpeazụ, ọ ga-ahụ onwe ya na Channel One na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ngosi, mana ọ ga-ahapụkwa Channel One n'afọ 2015 wee lụọ onye ọchụnta ego Ecuadorian Allan Zenck ma mụọ nwa ọzọ
Site n'ebe ahụ, Jaume ga-enye aka na nhazi nke Mujer que se respeta na Claudia Camposano na Marcela Ruete
N'afọ 2016, Jaume laghachiri Ecuavisa ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka ikpe na oge nke ise nke Ecuador's Got Talent [es]
Otú ọ dị, n'ihi echiche dị iche na onye ọka ikpe ibe ya bụ Paola Farias, nkwekọrịta ya amaliteghị ma ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nke ugboro abụọ
Caroline Julie Porte Ansell (amụrụ 12 Jenụwarị 1971) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Conservative na United Kingdom
Ọ bụbu onye otu nzuko omeiwu (MP) maka Eastbourne kemgbe ntuli aka izugbe nke 2019
Ebu ụzọ họpụta ya dị ka onye omeiwu Eastbourne na ntuli aka izugbe nke afọ 2015, mana e meriri ya na ntuli aka 2017
N'ime afọ abụọ mbụ ya na House of Commons ọ na-enwe mmetụta n'ịlụso nsogbu mbata na ọpụpụ ọgụ n'aha ụfọdụ ndị mebere na imegide ihe gba ọtọ
Ansell jere ozi dị ka onye kansụl ime obodo maka ngalaba Meads na Eastbourne Borough Council site na 2012 ruo 2015 wee bụrụ onye osote onye ndu mmegide, yana Pọtụfoliyo onyinyo maka obodo gụnyere ụlọ
A mụrụ Ansell na 1971 na Eastbourne na ọ bụ ọdụdụ nwa n'ime ụmụ nwanyị anọ nke nne na nna Scotland
Agụmakwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ na steeti primarị, tupu agụchaa akwụkwọ na Beresford House School, ụbọchị nkeonwe na ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ụmụ agbọghọ dị afọ 6–18
Ọ gara mahadum na Royal Holloway, Mahadum London, ka ọ mụọ Bachelor of Arts na French
Ansell gụkwara akwụkwọ azụmahịa na mahadum nkeonwe École supérieure de commerce na mgbe ọ gbara afọ 30, nwetara nzere masta na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Brighton na 2001
Ansell rụrụ ọrụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ dị ka onye nkuzi French, naanị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nkeonwe
O ruru eru dị ka onye isi na 2008, mgbe ọ dị afọ 37, ma ọ maliteghị ọrụ na ọrụ a
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na nkwado na ụlọ akwụkwọ Cavendish dị na Old Town, Eastbourne n'otu afọ ahụ ka a chọpụtara na otu n'ime ụmụ ya nwere ụbụrụ ụbụrụ, nke mere ka ọ nweta ụbọchị izu ike site na nkuzi
Ansell enyela ihe dị iche iche kpatara mmasị na mkpali ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị; o kwuru n'okwu nwata ya na

'Abụ m onye nkụzi na mmasị maka agụmakwụkwọ, ma ọ bụ ihe mgbagwoju anya nke nwa m nwoke na-achọpụta ọrịa ụbụrụ ụbụrụ na-eyi ndụ egwu, mgbe ahụ dị afọ ise, nke gbanwere ndụ m ma mesịa kpọbata m n'Ụlọ nke Commons'
A họpụtara Ansell nke mbụ ka onye ndụmọdụ Conservative Party na 31 Mee 2012, mgbe ọ dị afọ 41
Ọ jere ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ afọ atọ, na-anọchite anya Meads ward nke Eastbourne Borough Council

N'oge ya dị ka onye kansụl, Ansell nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na-enweta nkwado ndị otu cross iji guzobe Eastbourne dị ka 'Eastern Gateway Town' na South Downs National Park na nkwado ndị ọchịchị maka ụzọ ụgbọ elu nke abụọ na ọdụ ụgbọ elu Gatwick
Ọ so na ndị otu ahụ iweghachite Meads Magic, mmemme ekeresimesi obodo nke na-ebute ọtụtụ puku mmadụ na mpaghara ahụ
Ndị otu pati mpaghara họpụtara Ansell ka ọ guzo dị ka onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi Conservative Party na ntuli aka izugbe 2015

Ansell meriri nhọpụta asọmpi maka otu n'ime oche ebumnuche kacha elu nke otu ya megide ndị na-eme ntuli aka nwere ahụike, iwu na ndị agha, gụnyere mmadụ abụọ n'ime ndị ọrụ omeiwu ya n'ọdịnihu Ben Howlett na Alberto Costa
megide amụma o meriri Stephen Lloyd, onye Liberal Democrat na-achị, na ọtụtụ vootu 733, ebe onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ The Independent kọwara tupu ntuli aka ahụ dị ka 'onye na-atụ egwu egwu… obodo'
Ọ gara n'ihu jee ozi na mpaghara Eastbourne afọ abụọ
Ansell kpalitere mmetụta ya na ndị ozi iji mee ka itinye ego buru ibu n'ime obodo ahụ

Nke a gụnyere £ 75 nde iji kwalite A27 nnukwu nsogbu maka Eastbourne na £ 5 nde sitere na mmemme Growth Local Growth Fund Round nke gọọmentị nyere maka mmepe Devonshire Park nke obodo yana oke £ 132 nde
echere maka ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke Eze site na otu ite ego ahụ

Ansell nyeere onye America Eastbourne onye bi na nne Katy I garlington, onye e kwere ka ọ nọrọ na UK mgbe Ansell tinyere aka na Home Office wee mee ka onye ozi mbata na ọpụpụ James Brokenshire kwụsị nchụpụ ya
A tọhapụrụ onye ọzọ bi na Eastbourne Atterbell Maplanka site na njide maka okwu mbata na ọpụpụ mgbe ntinye aka ọzọ sitere n'aka Ansell

Ansell gbakwara mkpọsa ahụ site n'aka ndị omempụ porn mejọrọ Olly Whiting iji nweta ikpe ziri ezi maka mpụ ya mgbe o biputere ọdịnaya na webụsaịtị US, na-arụ ọrụ na ndị uwe ojii mpaghara, Sussex PCC Katy Bourne na odeakwụkwọ ụlọ mgbe ahụ, Theresa May
Ansell rụrụ ọrụ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Eastbourne mpaghara Lauren Backler na mkpọsa ya iji belata afọ nyocha ọrịa kansa afọ site na 60 ruo 50 na England iji weta ya na Scotland
Backler nwụrụ nne ya n'ọrịa ahụ na Ansell haziri arụmụka ndị omeiwu na okwu a ma kpalie ndị ozi ka ha leba anya na mbelata afọ 50
Backler ghọrọ onye mmeri maka ndị ọrụ ebere Bowel Cancer UK wee kwalite mmata maka ọnọdụ ahụ na akara ngosi ya
Ansell tozuru oke ịhapụ EU na ntuli aka nke 2016 kwekọrọ na mpaghara mpaghara ya bụ onye tozuru oke site na 57% ruo 43% ime otu ihe ahụ
Tupu ya emee ebumnuche ya ịme ntuli aka maka Brexit, Ansell haziri ma na-eduzi arụmụka kasị ukwuu na okwu ahụ na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke England
Mkparịta ụka Big Eastbourne EU mere na ụlọ ihe nkiri Congress nwere ikike 1680 na obodo ahụ na 26 Mee 2016 mgbe Ogige Winter nke oche 900 dị obere maka ọnụọgụ ndị chọrọ ịga
Ansell kwadoro Theresa May na nhoputa ndi ochichi Conservative Party nke 2016
O kwuru banyere May 'N'oge ndị a siri ike, ekwenyere m na o nwere ahụmịhe na ntụkwasị obi ịbụ onye isi ala mara mma
Ikike ya enweghị atụ, n'ihi ya, ọ ga-enye iwu ka a kwanyere Ụlọ Nzukọ Alaeze ùgwù na ntụkwasị obi nke ọha'
Site na 2015 ruo 2017, Ansell were di ya n'ọrụ dịka onye enyemaka oge niile na ego ọha
N'afọ 2016, ndị isi na Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) kwuru na 'ọ tụrụ ha n'anya' n'ihi na a ka nwere ndị nnọchiteanya 18, gụnyere Ansell, bụ ndị na-arụ ọrụ ezinụlọ n'ọfịs ha
Nke a dabara n'iwu nke IPSA mezigharịrị na-eso mkparị mmefu ego MP iji gbochie iwere otu onye ezinụlọ n'ọrụ n'otu ụlọ ọrụ

ihe àmà nke nanị otu ihe atụ nke mmetọ n'okpuru usoro Ụlọ nke Commons' Mmachibido iwu ndị omeiwu iji ndị ezinaụlọ ha n'ụlọ ọrụ ga-amalite n'ọrụ n'afọ 2020

N'afọ 2014, o kwuru na ọ bụrụ na ọ bụ MP n'oge ndị omeiwu tozuru oke na alụmdi na nwunye nwoke na nwanyị, na ọ 'gaara akwado alụmdi na nwunye omenala'
O kwukwara na ya 'na-enwe ekele[d]' na n'oge arụmụka ahụ, ndị omeiwu Conservative 'kwuru maka mkpa nchekwa maka Ụka na maka ndị nwere okwukwe na ndụ ọrụ ha'

N'April 2017, a tụrụ onye ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ Mark Sands dị afọ 51 mkpọrọ maka ọnwa anọ maka ikesa ọtụtụ iyi egwu ọnwụ na-eduzi na Ansell site na mgbasa ozi ọha na eze n'ihi na ọ kwenyere n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi na ọ họpụtara maka mbelata uru nkwarụ
Onye mere mpụ ahụ ekwupụtabuola ikpe ya bụ 'izipu site na nzikọrịta ozi eletrọnịkị ozi na-akparị mmadụ'
Sands dere na mgbidi Facebook nke onwe ya, sị 'Ọ bụrụ na ị votu iji wepụ £ 30 n'ego m, m ga-eji aka m gbata n'ụlọ gị
wee gbuo gị' E nyekwara ya iwu mgbochi machibido ya ịkpọtụrụ Ansell
N'ịkpọrọ Sands, Onyeikpe mpaghara bụ Christopher James kwuru na mmejọ a dị oke njọ nke na ọ bụ naanị ikpe njide kwesịrị ekwesị

Na nkwupụta ewepụtara na-esochi ikpe Sands, Ansell kwuru, sị 'Enweghị m iwe ọ bụla megide Mark Sands maka ihe o mere, mana ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na ndụ ọha, karịsịa ụmụ nwanyị, aghaghị ịlụ ọgụ na mmegide yiri nke ahụ na iyi egwu na mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi mgbe ụfọdụ
kwa ụbọchị, ma ọ bụ oge ịkwụsị ya'
Ansell lụrụ Nicholas Ansell na 1997
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi PE na ụlọ akwụkwọ nkwado colla
Di na nwunye a nwere ụmụ atọ
Ọ bụ onye otu ụka Christian King na-ezisa ozi ọma ma na-agakwa Catholic Our Lady of Ransom Church na Eastbourne
Mgbe a nwara igbu mmadụ na ndụ ya na 1989, ndị ọrụ nzuzo dụrụ ya ọdụ ka ọ pụọ na South Africa
Ọ maliteghachiri ọrụ n’akwụkwọ akụkọ Johannesburg n’ụlọ ọrụ ha dị na Lọndọn
Na London, Allan weputara kọlụm ọhụrụ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ aha ya bụ Jani na nnukwu akara mkpado Jani Allan - na-akọ akụkọ sitere na London
Mgbe ọ nọsịrị izu isii na Lọndọn, Allan laghachiri ịrụ ọrụ n’ọfis Johannesburg
Mgbe otu izu laghachiri ọrụ, a gwara Allan ka ọ nyefee arụkwaghịm ya n'ihi na ọ 'ghọọla akụkọ'
Oge Allan nọ n'akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ kwụsịrị na Septemba 1989
Àtụ South East Conservative Party MPs
Caroline Cannon ma ọ bụ Aqugaq bụ onye ndu Iñupiaq na onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi sitere na Point Hope, Alaska
E nyere ya ihe nrite Goldman nke ebe obibi n'afọ 2012 maka ọgụ ya maka ichebe gburugburu ebe obibi mmiri megide mmetọ sitere na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ala

N'afọ 2020, Cannon so Robert Thompson, Rosemary Ahtuangaruak na Earl Kingik dee otu isi, 'Anyị ga-alụ ọgụ iji chebe Oké Osimiri Arctic na Ụzọ Ndụ Anyị,' na Robert Thompson, rosemary Ahtoangaruak da Earl Kingik na Arctic Voices (Seven Stories Press), nke Subhankar Banerjee dezigharịrị
Caroline Chikezie bụ onye omempụ nke Britain, a maara nke ọma maka ịkpọ Sasha Williams na 'As If', Elaine Hardy na 'Footballers' Wives' na nwanyị 'cyber' ​​na Torchwood
A mụrụ Chikezie na nne na nna Naijiria
Na iri na anọ, ezitere Chikezie ka ọ banye n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Nigeria iji gbalịa mee ka ọ hapụ nrọ ya ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Tupu nke a, ọ gara akwụkwọ ọmụmụ izu ụka na Italia Conti

Mgbe ọ laghachiri United Kingdom, o debara aha na Brunel University ebe ọ mụrụ Medicinal Chemistry (a na-atụ anya na ọ ga-ewega ụlọ ọgwụ nna ya na Naijiria), ma ọ hapụrụ mgbe ndị nkuzi kpebiri na ya enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na ndụ agụmakwụkwọ
O mechara nweta akara akwụkwọ na Academy of Live Recorded Arts
Mgbe arụ ọrụ na Holby City, Casualty, na ihe nkiri British na-emeri nke ukwuu, Chikezie nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka bitchy Sasha Williams na As If na 2001
N'afọ 2004, ọ na-ebute ọrụ dị ka enyi nwanyị nke Kyle Pascoe, Elaine Hardy na Usoro nke atọ Footballer's Wives Ọrụ telivishọn ndị ọzọ gụnyere 40, Judas Kiss, Fall Fall na Brothers and Sister
Ọ pụtara dị ka Lisa Hallett, onye so n'òtù nzuzo nke Torchwood bụ onye gbanwere ọkara ọkara mmadụ -Cyberman in 'Cyberwoman',
ihe merenụ Torchwood,
na dịka Tamara, onye na-achụ nta na mmụọ ọjọọ ibe ya, n'oge nke atọ nke mbụ Supernatural
Dị ka onye na-ese ihe nkiri, Chikezie emeela ka
Nasuada
na ihe nkiri ahụ Eragon
University of Lagos
Caroline Danjuma, onye a na -akpọbu Caroline Ekanem, bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa
O mere mpụta izizi ya na 2004, ọ gosiputara n'ime ụfọdụ ihe nkiri ama ama nke Chico Ejiro
Mgbe ezumike ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri kwụsịrị, ọ laghachiri na 2016, na -emepụta ma na -eme ihe nkiri Stalker
A mụrụ Caroline nye ndị nna Scottish na nne Nigeria
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ atọ
Ọ gụrụ maka njikwa nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi, ọdịdị ala na atụmatụ mpaghara na Mahadum Calabar
Ọ nwetakwara asambodo nke mmezu na omume nhazi site na Edinburgh Business School na 2016
Chico Ejiro, site na Rita Dominic, webatara Danjuma na ụlọ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa na ihe nkiri 2004 Deadly Care
Ọ gosiputara oma na fim ndị ọzọ gara nke ọma, gụnyere Deadly Kiss (2004), Missing Angel (2004), The Captor (2006), Foreign Affairs, Real Love, The Twist, The Second Time and The Beast and the Angel
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2017, a kwanyeere ya ugwu maka mmemme nkwado ya nke gbadoro ụkwụ n'ikike iwulite ndị ntorobịa Naịjirịa site na otu Pan-African
Danjuma adịchaghị na Nollywood mgbe ọ lụsịrị Musa Danjuma, nwanne ntakịrịTheophilus Danjuma n'afọ 2007
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ na otu nwanyị; ha kewara na 2016
Agbanyeghị na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ obodo na -ekwupụta afọ ọmụmụ ya n'etiti 1980 na 1981, Danjuma ekwuola ugboro ugboro na amụrụ ya na 26 June 1987
Caroline Faye Diop (amụrụ na 11 Julaị 1923 na Foundiougne, nwụrụ na 28 Julaị, na afọ 1992 na Dakar) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Senegal
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị mbụ na National Assembly of Senegal na afọ 1963 ma mesịa bụrụ (1978) minista n'okpuru Onye isi ala Abdou Diouf
Nna ya (Diène Faye) bụ Serer nke Joal
Caroline Gibello (amụrụ n'afọ 1974), bụ onye na-ese foto nà South Africa
N'afọ 2007, o guzobere ụlọ ngosi nka Galleria Gibello na Cape Town, South Africa
A kpọrọ usoro ọrụ ọganihu Gibello 'Na Stillpoint nke Turning World'
Nke a meghere ụfọdụ ọnụ ụzọ banyere ya ma mee ka ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ndị na-anakọta ihe osise, ndị na'ime ime ụlọ, na nchịkọta ihe osise mba na-anakọtara ọrụ ya
N'afọ 2008, Gibello gara Southern Africa na-eleta Namibia, Botswana na Mozambique
N'oge njem ya, o sere foto dị iche iche nke ghọrọ usoro 'Water & Dust' ya
O gosipụtara ọrụ ahụ na Centre for the Book na Cape Town, South Africa, n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2008
Ihe ngosi ahụ bụ njikọ aka n'etiti Gibello na ezigbo enyi, onye na-ese ihe osise na onye na-eme ihe osise, Sharon Boonzaier
Ihe ngosi ahụ nwere foto dị ọcha na otu ọrụ mmekorita
Ọrụ mmekorita ahụ nwere foto Gibello gbakwunyere na etchings nke Boonzaier na ihe osise mmanụ
Ndị nkatọ nabatara ihe ngosi ahụ nke ọma
N'azụ ihe ịga nke ọma nke ihe ngosi a, a kpọrọ Gibello ka ọ gosipụta na Mumbai (India) n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2009, Lake Como (Italy) n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2009 nakwa na Hamburg (Germany) n'afọ 2009
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2009, a họọrọ otu n'ime foto izizi ya site n'afọ 2002 n'ihe banyere mbipụta izizi nke National Geographic Traveler South Africa
A họrọla foto ya ọzọ maka mbipụta nke abụọ nke otu magazin ahụ
Site n'afọ 2010 ruo afọ 2017 Caroline gara n'ihu na-ewu nnukwu ndị na-eso ụzọ gburugburu ụwa
Ihe osise anụ ọhịa ya n'Afrịka na-anọdụ na mgbidi nke Reserve Bank South Africa, Mahadum Cape Town (UCT), Tuynhuys (The Presidency), yana Deutsche Bank (New York)
Caroline gosipụtara ọrụ ya maka ọnwa Mee 2018 na New York
Caroline Kamya (amụrụ n'afọ 1974) bụ onye Briten na Uganda nke na-eduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Kamya ma zụlite ya na Uganda, Kenya na UK
Kamya nwere nzere BSc na Architecture na Urban design na MA na TV Documentary site na Goldsmiths College
Kamya enwetala ihe karịrị onyinye iri na mba ụwa ma rụọ ọrụ na telivishọn na London tupu o guzobe ụlọ mmepụta ihe na Kampala, IVAD International
Chips and Liver Girls, nke ya na onye nduzi Danish Boris Bertram duziri na 2010, bụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi banyere ụmụ agbọghọ Ugandan na 'ndị ikom na-akwụ ụgwọ maka ọmụmụ akwụkwọ ha'
E sere ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi Fire Fly (2011) na China
Caroline Kent (amụrụ n'afọ 1975) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nkírí nke bi na Chicago, nke a maara nke ọma màkà nnukwu ọrụ ya
N'ịbụ onye ahụmahụ nke onwé ya na ihe nketa ọdịbendị ya kpaliri, Kent na-emepụta ihe osise na-enyocha ike na njedebe nke nkwurịta okwu
A mụrụ Caroline Kent na Sterling, Illinois, United States
N'ebe ahụ ka ya na nné ya, nnà ya, nwanne ya nwanyị tọrọ ya Angela, na ejima ya Christine tolitere
Nne ya, ónyé na-elekọta ụlọ na Mexico, na nna ya, ónyé Africa America na-ahụ maka ego, nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'omume ọrụ Kent
Ónyé na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka Midwesterner, Kent na-eji oge okpomọkụ ya na-etolite na-arụ ọrụ n'oge okpomọkụ na-ewepụ ọka ma na-arọ nrọ maka ndụ ka ukwuu na mpụga ókèala nke obere obodo ya
Caroline Kent na ejima ya, Christine Leventhal, nọ nso mgbè ọ na-etolite
Ha abụọ nwekọrọ usoro nkwurịta okwu pụrụ iche nke nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na ọrụ nka Kent
Kent tolitere n'ime asụsụ nke abstraction
N'afọ 1993, Kent hapụrụ ọbọdọ ya bụ Sterling ịga Mahadum Illinois State na agụmakwụkwọ egwuregwu maka track na field
N'oge gàrà aga, Kent gosipụtara obere mmasị na nka mana ọ hụrụ onwe ya ka ọ na-agafe ógè ya na gallery campus
N'ebe a, ihe ndị mbụ kpaliri ya gụnyere nka nke Russian Constructivists na ihe nkiri mba ọzọ
Kent bịara nwee mmasị na universality nke asụsụ anya a na-ahụ na nka, na-achọpụta na n'elu ákwà onye ọ bụla nwere otu mmalite, na-enweghị ịgafe ihe mgbochi asụsụ
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1998, Kent sonyeere Peace Corps, ebe ọ biri ma rụọ ọrụ na Transylvania, Romania ruo afọ abụọ
N'ebe a, Kent hụrụ onwe ya n'ike mmụọ nsọ site n'ọtụtụ ụcha pastel nke ga-emesị rụọ ọrụ dị mkpa na ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama
Mgbe Peace Corps gasịrị, Kent biri na Minneapolis ruo afọ iri na ise
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka osote prọfesọ nke Art, Theory, na Practice na Mahadum Northwestern
N'afọ 2017, Kent kwagara West Side Chicago, ébé ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na nne nke ụmụ atọ
Kohn Gallery na Los Angeles na Patron Gallery na Chicago na-anọchite anya Kent
Ihe osise Caroline Kent nwere nnukwu ihe osise, ihe osise na-enweghị atụ na ákwà
Ọrụ ya nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu site na ihe nketa Mexico ya bàrà ọgaranya na ahụmịhe onwé ya na asụsụ na ntụgharị ederede, nke sitere na ahụmịhụrụ onwe ya na ejima ya
Ihe omuma omenala ndị a na ahụmịhe onwe ónyé jikọtara n'ọrụ Kent iji gosipụta ụdị nkwurịta okwu ọhụrụ, na-enyocha ma ike na njedebe nke asụsụ
Ihe osise ya na-adịghị ahụ ányá na-ekwurịta etu esi aghọta asụsụ anya n'ụdị gbasaa, site na ihe osise abụọ na-adịghị anya na ihe ngosi atọ
Caroline Cheptanui Kilel (amụrụ na 21 Machị 1981) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-asọ mpi asọmpi ịgba ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ, gụnyere marathon
Ọ bụ onye mmeri na 2011 Boston Marathon na Frankfurt Marathon na 2010 na 2013
Kilel enwetala mmeri na marathons na Ljubljana, Taipei, Nairobi na Palermo
Ihe kacha mma ya maka anya bụ 2 22 34 (nke e debere na Frankfurt na 2013)
Ọ na-asọ mpi na ọkara marathons ma nwee ihe kachasị mma nke 1 08 16 n'ebe ahụ
Na 2003 World Cross Country Championships, ọ bụ onye nke asatọ na ogologo ọsọ, ebe ndị otu Kenya, nke Kilel so na ya, meriri ọlaọcha na asọmpi otu

Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị akara nke abụọ na 2003 Venice Marathon na 2004 Prague Marathon, ọ meriri asọmpi mbụ ya n'elu ebe a na-ahụkarị na Palermo City Marathon, na-akụ ihe karịrị nkeji ise site na ndekọ mbụ ya na oge ya nke 2 31 15
Ọ mechara nke iri na isii na 2005 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships wee merie Nairobi Marathon n'afọ ahụ
Na asọmpi ndị ọzọ, ọ meriri Semi-Marathon Marvejols-Mende wee bụrụ onye nke asaa na Hamburg Marathon
Ọ malitere ilekwasị anya naanị na ihe omume okporo ụzọ site na 2006 gaa n'ihu
O nwere akara atọ kachasị elu na Dublin Marathon na Prague Marathon n'afọ ahụ ma setịpụ ọkara marathon kacha mma nke 1 10 45 iji merie Great Scottish Run
Oge 2007 ya bụ ihe dị ala, ebe ọ na-anọghị n'elu ise na RAK Half Marathon na Seoul International Marathon na mbido afọ ahụ ma ọ naghị asọmpi mgbe Machị gasịrị

Ọ laghachiri n'ọrụ na Disemba 2008 ma nọrọ n'ọnọdụ dị mma; o setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma iji merie Pune Half Marathon wee gbaa oge nke abụọ kachasị ọsọ maka marathon (2 30 44) iji nweta aha na Taipei International Marathon
N'afọ 2009, ọ bụ onye nke atọ na asọmpi BIG 25 Berlin wee gaa 2009 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships na Birmingham, England
Ọ hapụrụ n'elu ikpo okwu, mechie nke anọ, ọ bụ ezie na o jisiri ike setịpụ ihe kachasị mma nke 1 08 16 yana inyere Kenya aka inweta ọla edo

Ọ gara n'ihu setịpụ ihe kachasị mma nke onwe ya site na mmeri na Ljubljana Marathon izu ole na ole ka e mesịrị, na-emeziwanye akara mbụ ya site na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nkeji ise ma na-etinye ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ na usoro ahụ
O nwetakwara mmeri na Great Scottish Run na Glasgow maka oge nke abụọ wee gaa n'elu ikpo okwu na Montferland Run 15K race
N'afọ sochirinụ, Kilel sonyere na 2010 Seoul International Marathon wee gbaa 2 26 58 maka ọnọdụ nke atọ
N'ọnwa Ọktoba ahụ, o nwere mmeri kachasị ukwuu na sekit ahụ, na-ewere aha ụmụ nwanyị na Frankfurt Marathon na ndekọ ọhụrụ na nke kachasị mma nke 2 23 25 awa, na-emeri Dire Tune site na 19 sekọnd
O sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe omume ndị ọzọ n'afọ ahụ, gụnyere mmeri na 20 kilomètres de Maroilles, Zwolle Half Marathon na Scottish Run
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011, Kilel meriri Boston Marathon na 2 22 36 na-eti onye America Desiree Davila, onye gbara ọsọ Boston Marathon kachasị ọsọ maka ụmụ nwanyị America, site na sekọnd abụọ
Ọ nọrọ na Boston iji sọọ mpi na BAA
10K, nke ọ merikwara na nkeji 31 58
N'ọnwa Septemba, ọ bịara nke atọ na Kenya nke Portugal Half Marathon, n'azụ Mary Keitany na Helena Kirop

Na asọmpi mbụ ya n'afọ 2012, ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Belaynesh Oljira na sprint finish na Houston Half Marathon Ọ tara ahụhụ n'ọnọdụ okpomọkụ na 2012 Boston Marathon ma ọ bụghị naanị na ọ gbachitere aha ya, mana ọ gwụbeghị ọsọ ahụ
Ọ meriri Taipei Marathon nke ugboro abụọ na Disemba ahụ, na-agba ọsọ na 2 30 19 awa
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na Houston Half Marathon, ọ bụ onye nke abụọ ọzọ na onye Etiopia, n'oge a na Mamitu Daska
Kilel dara n'ụzọ dị njọ na 2013 Tokyo Marathon, na-abịa 21st na 2 47 08 awa
O lekwasịrị anya na mita 10,000 mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, mana enwetaghị nhọpụta maka 2013 World Championships in Athletics
Ọ laghachiri n'elu ikpo okwu na Frankfurt Marathon na ihe ọhụrụ kachasị mma nke 2 22 34 awa (mkwalite nke abụọ)
Carolyn Branch Brooks (amuru Julaị 8, afo 1946) bu onye okachamara microbiologist nke America ama ama maka nyocha ya na mgbochi ogwu, nri nri, na arụpụta ihe ọkụkụ
A mụrụ Brooks July 8, afo 1946, na Richmond, Virginia nye Alaka Shirley Booker na Alaka Charles Walker, ndị nwe ụlọ ahịa ihe nri
Nne na nna ya ochie na nwanne ya nwaanyị nke tọrọ ya nyekwara aka zụọ ya
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'akụkụ ugwu Richmond
N'afọ ndị 1950, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke obodo na nke a mere ka ụlọ akwụkwọ sikwuoro ụmụaka ahụ ike n'ihi na ha aghaghị iji ụgbọ njem ọha
Brooks chọrọ ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ ochie ya ka ọ na-agbakwa ụgbọ ala ọha kwa ụbọchị n'ofe obodo
“Kwa ụbọchị, Carolyn na-abanye nnọọ n'ụgbọ ala, kwụọ ụgwọ ụgbọ ya, ma nọdụ n'azụ onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala, n'amaghị na, dị ka iwu nkewapụ n'oge ahụ si dị, na ọ kwesịrị ịnọdụ ala n'azụ bọs
Mgbe ihe ngosi izizi nke ikike obodo malitere na Richmond, ọ chọpụtara na ọ bụbu onye ndọrọndọrọ n'amaghị ya”
Mgbe ọ bụ nwata akwụkwọ ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọkọchị pụrụ iche maka ụmụ akwụkwọ sayensị Africa America emere na Mahadum Virginia Union na Richmond
N'ebe a, ọrụ onye ọkà okwu ọbịa na-arụ na microbiology ahụike kpaliri ya
Tinyere nkwado nke ndị nne na nna, Brooks nwere ọtụtụ ndị nkuzi mara mma bụ ndị gbara ya ume ịchụso mmasị ya na sayensị
Mgbe e nyechara ya akwụkwọ mmụta na mahadum isii dị iche iche, ọ họọrọ ịga Tuskegee Institute (Mahadum) dị na Alabama iji mụọ microbiology
Na njedebe nke afọ nke abụọ ya, ọ lụrụ Henry Brooks, nwa akwụkwọ mmụta na Tuskegee
N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ mahadum ọ mụrụ ụmụ mbụ ya abụọ, ma ụmụ nwoke
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afo 1968 wee gaa n'ihu nweta akara ugo mmụta masta na Tuskegee
Ọ mụrụ nwa ọzọ, nwa nwanyị n'oge a
Mgbe ọ na-enweta PhD na microbiology na Mahadum Ohio State, ọ mụrụ nwa nke anọ, nwa nwanyị ọzọ
Nnyocha doctoral ya lekwasịrị anya n'otú mkpụrụ ndụ T si ebibie nje ịba Plasmodium
Ọ gara n'ihu mụọ mkpa nri nri nke ndị agadi na Mahadum steeti Kentucky
Site na nyocha ya, ọ chọpụtara njikọ dị n'etiti ọnụọgụ mineral dị na ntutu isi na nri onye ọrịa, si otú a na-eme ka a mata ụfọdụ nsogbu ahụike nke nri adịghị mma na-akpata
Na afo 1981, Dr
Brooks nakweere ọnọdụ nyocha na nduzi na Mahadum Maryland Eastern Shore (UMES) na Princess Anne, Maryland
Mgbe afọ 13 gachara na UMES, ọ ghọrọ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Agricultural and Natural Sciences na onye ntụzi nyocha nke Mmemme Land-Grant 1890
N'afọ 1997, ọ ghọrọ onyeisi oche nke onyeisi oche na onyeisi ndị ọrụ
Na afo 2007, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nyocha mpaghara maka Association of the Research Directors nke afo 1890 Land Grant Universities
Nchọpụta Dokita
Brooks na UMES lekwasịrị anya na nrụpụta ọrụ ugbo

Nke a na-agụnye ịba ụba nke ihe ọkụkụ na-eguzogide ndị na-eri anụ site n'ọtụtụ ụzọ gụnyere mmepe nke ụmụ ahụhụ ụmụ ahụhụ na-arụ ọrụ na iji usoro ọrụ ugbo dị iche iche (dịka ọmụmaatụ, iji anụ ọkụkọ, ịwepụ nwa ehi, na composting ), na mmekọrịta ya na ụmụ nje

Ọrụ microbial Brooks lekwasịrị anya n'ụzọ sara mbara na symbiosis, gụnyere mmekọrịta dị n'etiti nje bacteria na -edozi nitrogen na ezinụlọ legume na mmekọrịta ndị ọzọ akọwapụtara n'etiti ụmụ nje na ihe ọkụkụ dị iche iche, gụnyere strawberries
N'ime afọ 1984-1985, ọ gara Togo na Senegal dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrika
N'ebe a, ọ nyochara ụzọ ọ ga-esi na-abawanye mmepụta nke mkpụrụ ahịhịa nke Africa, n'ikpeazụ na-eduga n'ịbawanye mmepụta nke ọtụtụ nri dị iche iche na West Africa
Dịka onye otu USAID - USDA, o nyere aka n'ịmelite mmekọrịta n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ nyocha na mahadum dị na South Africa
Ọ nọchitere anya UMES na nzukọ mahadum ndị ijypt

Ọ bụ Minton Laureate sitere na American Society of Microbiology, ewebata ya na USDA NIFA Hall of Fame, amatakwara dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị 100 kacha elu nke Maryland wee nata Ọkachamma na Nrite Nduzi site na ngalaba nnwale sitere na Association of Public Land Grant
Ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum

Cannon-Alfred (amuru Ọgọst 16, 1934 – Ọgọstụ 29, 1987) bụ onye ọkà mmụta ọgwụ America bụ onye guzobere ụlọọgwụ ahụike na South-etiti Los Angeles
Ọ bụ osote prọfesọ nke nkà mmụta ọgwụ na Keck School of Medicine nke USC na onye ọkachamara na-ahụ maka ọgwụ na Riker Laboratories
Cannon-Alfred kwadoro akwụkwọ ntuziaka ahụike maka Layman n'afọ 971
Cannon-Alfred mụrụ na August 16, 1934 na Tyler, Texas
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Emmett J
Scott High School n'afọ 1950
Cannon-Alfred bụ onye otu St James Colored Methodist Episcopal Church
Ọ gụchara nzere bachelọ na Mahadum Toledo n'afọ 1954
Cannon-Alfred nwetara MS na Mahadum Howard n'afọ 1957
Akpọrọ akwụkwọ akụkọ ya Studies na nnukwu mmetụta nke cortisone, na-ezo aka pụrụ iche na obi mmetụta nke potassium, digitalis na N-Allyl-Nor-Morphine (Nalline)
Cannon-Alfred jere ozi dị ka onye enyemaka ọkachamara n'ịgwọ ọgwụ na onye nkuzi nke nkà mmụta ọgwụ na Mahadum Howard n'etiti afọ 1957 na 1959
O nwetara PhD
na pharmacology sitere na Mahadum Georgetown n'afọ 1961
Akpọrọ akwụkwọ nchọcha ya The nature of Cocaine desensitization of Ephedrine Pressor nzaghachi
Cannon-Alfred goro dị ka onye ọkachamara na-ahụ maka ọgwụ na Riker Laboratories, n'afọ 1962 ọ nwetara ọnọdụ onye otu nyocha na California Riverside Hospital
Ọ nwetara onyinye nyocha afọ abụọ site na National Heart Institute n'afọ 1964, wee kwaga na Keck School of Medicine nke USC dị ka onye enyemaka prọfesọ nke nkà mmụta ọgwụ
Cannon-Alfred nyochara obi na autonomic pharmacology
Cannon-Alfred na di ya, J
Tyrone Alfred, dere Medical Handbook for the Layman
Ndị kansụl obodo Los Angeles kwanyere Cannon-Alfred na di ya ugwu maka akwụkwọ a wee nye ha mkpebi kansụl na emume nke afọ 1971 emere n'ụlọ ezumezu obodo
Ya na di ya hiwere ụlọọgwụ ahụike na ndịda etiti Los Angeles, na ọchịchọ Cannon-Alfred bụ ịzụrụ ụlọ dị n'ebe ahụ nke nwere ike ịbụ ndokwa ibi ndụ maka ndị agadi

Dame Carolyn Paula Hamilton DBE (amụrụ yá n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1951) bụ onye ọka iwu nke ọkachamara n'ihe banyere ikike ụmụaka
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi nke Coram Children's Legal Centre, otu ọrụ ebere mba nwere onwe ya nke raara onwe ya nye nkwalite na mmejuputa ikike ụmụaka nke dị na Mahadum Essex
Hamilton nwere ọkwa prọfesọ na Essex

Nna ya gbapụrụ na Nazi Germany mgbe ọ bụ nwata nwoke tupu Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na ụgbọ mmiri Kindertransport mbụ gaa England ma mesịa nweta ego na ala na ụlọ na ejiji

N'ime afọ 1995, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nke Coram Children's Legal Centre, otu ọrụ ebere mba nwere onwe ya nke raara onwe ya nye nkwalite na mmejuputa ikike ụmụaka nke dị na Mahadum Essex ebe Hamilton bụ onye otu ngalaba iwu

Mazloomi (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1948) bụ onye edemede America, onye nlekọta na ónyé na-emepụta akwa
Ọ bụ ónyé nkwado siri ike màkà igosi na idepụta akwa akwa ndị Afrịka na America
Akpụkpọ ụkwụ ya na-akọ akụkọ dị mgbagwoju ányà gbásárá ihe nketa ndị Africa America na ahụmịhe nke ógè a
A mụrụ Mazloomi na Baton Rouge, Louisiana, n'ezinụlọ ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na-eme ihe nkírí
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Northrop dị na Inglewood, California, ma rụọ ọrụ na Los Angeles dị ka injinia aerospace
Na mbido afọ 1970, ọ zutere akwa Appalachian n'ahịa dị na Dallas nke malitere mmasị ya màkà akwa akwa
Ọ gara n'ihu na nnwale ya mgbè ọ na-enweta PhD
ya na injinia aerospace na USC na 1984
Mazloomi lara ezumike nká ugbu a n'ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé injinia aerospace na ónyé nyocha nke Federal Aviation Administration
Ya na ezinụlọ ya bi na Ohio

Isiokwu ndị a na-ahụkarị gụnyere egwu, nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke nwanne nne nke nwéré njikọ juke Louisiana, na ahụmịhe ndị Africa na America n'oge Civil Rights Movement
Carolyn Parton (amụrụ n'afọ 1964) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa bí ma na-arụ ọrụ na Cape Town
Parton nwèrè mmasị karịsịa na mmetụta nkè ndị na-ese ihe na ǹkà ha na gburugburu ebe obibi
A na-eme ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya site na iji tubes na-acha uhie uhie na nke a tụfuru site n'aka ndị na-ese ihe ndị ọzọ, nke a na-emegharị n'ime ihe oyiyi ọhụrụ
Ọrụ Parton na-ekwu maka ihe mkpofu ndị e mepụtara na eserese ọdịnala na mmetụta gburugburu ebe obibi nke eserese ahụ n'onwe ya
Ibu nke ihe osise e ji mee ihe n'otu mpempe akwụkwọ na-ekpebi aha mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ

Osimiri Caroní bụ osimiri nke abụọ kacha mkpa na Venezuela, nke abụọ na-erute, na otu n'ime ogologo, 952 kilometres (592 mi) sitere na Tepui Kukenan, ebe o sitere na otu aha Kukenan, rue nkwekorita ya na Osimiri Orinoco nke o nwere
A na-etinye aha ahụ 'Caroni' malite na njikọ nke Kukenan na Yuruani, na 182 kilometres (113
site na isi iyi Kukenan na 770 kilometres (480 mi) site na mwepụ ya na Orinoco
Nzukọ ahụ na-ewere ọnọdụ na ndịda Venezuela, na Bolivar State, ịbụ akụkụ kachasị mkpa nke Orinoco, nke na-abụkarị n'ihi ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu
Basin dị elu nke Caroni dị na Gran Sabana ( Canaima National Park ) dị nso na ókèala Brazil
Caroni bụ otu n'ime osimiri nwere oke mpụta kacha elu n'ụwa, n'ihe gbasara ebe mmiri dị na ya
Nkezi mwepu bụ ano puku nari itghehite na iri use cubic metres per second (171,000 cu ft/s), nwere mgbanwe dị iche iche nke oge mmiri/akọrọ na-akpata
Nkezi kacha mwepu bụ 6,260 cubic metres per second (221,000 cu ft/s), na nkezi kacha nta bụ 3,570 cubic metres per second (126,000 cu ft/s)
N'ime oke akụkọ ihe mere eme bụ 17,576 cubic metres per second (620,700 cu ft/s)
Caroni na-enye 155 pasent nke mwepu nke osimiri Orinoco
Otu n'ime ihe e ji mara mmiri Caroni bụ agba gbara ọchịchịrị, nke na-akpata site na oke humic acids n'ihi ire ere ezughị ezu nke ọdịnaya phenol nke ahịhịa
Ya mere Caroni bụ nke osimiri ojii, dịkwa ka osimiri Negro, ma ọ bụ Rio Negro na Brazil, Venezuela na Colombia
N'ọgwụgwụ 1940s, a hụrụ ola diamond n'ime ọdọ mmiri Caroni dị nso na mpaghara ụwa ama ama ama ama nke na-enweta naanị ụgbọ elu na ụgbọ ala ụkwụ anọ
Osimiri ahụ na- ekpochapụ oke ọhịa ndị dị na Guayanan Highland
Basin nke Caroni kpuchiri 95,000 square kilometres (37,000 sq mi) na ọ bụ akụkụ nke Orinoco basin, osimiri kachasị mkpa nke Venezuela
Nke a pụtara maka nnukwu osimiri abụọ ahụ na ha nwere njirimara hydrographic yiri ya

The Caroni n'onwe ya na tributary na Paragua bụ osimiri nwere a steepụ, n'echiche na ọtụtụ ọdịda na rapids na-alternated na agbatị na nwayọọ slopes, na ọtụtụ meanders na oxbow ọdọ mmiri (na-ebipụ meanders)

Otu n'ime ọdịda kachasị mkpa nke osimiri ndị a na mpaghara ha nwere ike ịkpọ Angel Falls, na ọdịda kachasị elu nke ụwa, fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ 1,000 metres (3,300 ft), na Kukenan Falls, nke iri na ọnụ ọgụgụ ụwa nwere 610-metre (2,000 ft) ọdịda efu

Ndị ọzọ na-adaba na obere elu ma na oke mmiri dị elu, dị ka Aponwao Falls na Caruay dabara, na osimiri nwere aha ndị a Osimiri Toron, Osimiri Eutobarima, ọdịda nke La Llovizna na Osimiri Cachamay, ndị a ikpeazụ
atọ na Caroni n'onwe ya na nke ikpeazụ tupu ahapụ ya n'ime Orinoco

N'ihi ọ̀tụ̀tụ̀ mwepụta ya dị elu, yana nkezi kwa afọ nke 4,850 cubic metres per second (171,000 cu ft / s) na mkpọda ugwu, Caroni dabara adaba maka ọgbọ nke ike igwe oku mmiri na osisi anọ n'akụkụ ya ( Macagua I, II na III ), n'akụkụ ọnụ ya, Caruachi, ihe dị 30 kilometres (19 mi) n'anya, na n'ikpeazụ osisi Guri, n'etiti Necoima ma ọ bụ Necuima, ihe 80 kilometres (50
sitere na Puerto Ordaz

Osisi a nwere ọdọ mmiri ya, nke nwere mpaghara 4,000 square kilometres (1,500 sq mi), n'etiti osimiri, ma nwee ike nke 10,000 MW, ma ugbu a bụ nke atọ kasị ukwuu n'ụwa, na-esote mmiri mmiri atọ Gorges na China (22,500) MW) na Itaipu Dam na Paraguay na Brazil (14,000 MW)
Na nnukwu efere nke osimiri ndị na-etolite Caroni (Aponguao, Cuquenán na Yuruaní) na Gran Sabana na-agbasa, akụkụ nke Canaima National Park

Oku mmiri nke Caroni bụ otu n'ime ihe kachasị egwu na ịma mma nke ụwa, nke dị mma maka njem nlegharị anya oke ọhịa na savannah, nnukwu mmiri mmiri na cataracts na-apụghị ịgụta ọnụ, ọwa mmiri miri emi na ugwu dị elu, iyi na-agba ọsọ na mmiri dị ọcha nke ukwuu (agba ọchịchịrị gbara ọchịchịrị), fọrọ nke nta ka oji mgbe miri, blackwater osimiri, osimiri nwere pink aja, wdg

Ofu n'ime ihe ndị a ma ama nke oku mmiri nke Caroni, na-ekwu maka ndị njem nleta, bụ mmiri mmiri nke Aponguao, nke Kama (Kama Meru na asụsụ Caribbean) pemon, Eutobarima (na Caroni n'onwe ya, ọ bụ ezie na ọ dịghị mfe ịnweta), ọdọ mmiri ahụ
na osisi nke Guri, ogige ntụrụndụ nke mmiri mmiri na nke ndagwurugwu Kavak, ugwu ugwu (tepuis) nke Roraima na Kukenan

N'akụkụ Osimiri Caroní dị n'etiti njikọ ọnụ na Osimiri Icabarú na San Salvador de Paúl, e nwere ọtụtụ ebe a na-egwupụta ọla edo, ọkachasị n'akụkụ aka ekpe nke osimiri ahụ n'èzí ogige ntụrụndụ mba, mana enwere ike ịhụ ole na ole n'akụkụ aka nri
n'ime Canaima National Park
E wezụga mmetụta na-agbawa obi nke igbutu osisi na igbutu ọhịa iji kpochapụ ebe a na-egwupụta ogbunigwe, ihe ize ndụ ka ukwuu bụ iji mercury na-emerụ osimiri Caroní, anụ ọhịa ya na ndị bi n'akụkụ ya
Achọtala ọkwa dị elu nke mercury ọ bụghị nanị na osimiri Caroní kamakwa n'Ọdọ Mmiri Guri na n'akụkụ ala
Gọọmenti dị ugbu a nke Venezuela ekwela nkwa ibelata ọrụ Ngwuputa n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị na atụmatụ mmepe na-adigide maka Ngwuputa 2016-2018

Ngwuputa iwu na-akwadoghị n'okpuru ọchịchị Hugo Chávez, n'ihi na mba nke mines na-agba ọsọ site na ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-egwupụta akụ nke mba ụwa na nke a nwere mmetụta ọjọọ nke mmụba nke iji mercury dị ka usoro ha we ndị ọzọ siri ike ma dị ọnụ ahịa iji mee ihe n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị, ọrụ nkà na ụzụ
Eziokwu ahụ bụ na osimiri nke na-agafe n'akụkụ ogige ntụrụndụ na-emetụta mmepe a na-enye nsogbu karịsịa

Dabere na Houston, Texas, ọ bụ akụkụ nke ihe nkírí LA
Rebellion
A maara ya maka ihe nkiri ya na ọrụ mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta, ọkachasị maka ọrụ ya The Dawn at My Back Memoir of a Black Texas Upbringing
Blue bụ prọfesọ nyocha na Mahadum Houston
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji chekwaa ma mee emume akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ọbọdọ ndị Africa America na Houston
A mụrụ Carroll Parrott Blue na August 23, 1943 na Houston, Texas
Ọ tolitere n'oge nkewa na mpaghara nke atọ nke Houston

N'oge ọ bụ nwata, nne Blue bụ Mollie Carroll Parrott na-arụ ọrụ na màkà òtù ndị dị ka Negro YWCA, Garden Club, Texas Negro Democratic party, na ọtụtụ òtù ụka ndị lụrụ ọgụ màkà ikike ọbọdọ n'oge Civil Rights Era
Blue gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Jack Yates Colored High School
Blue malitere ịga Mahadum Boston na 1960 wee nweta BA
ya na akwụkwọ Bekee na 1964
O nwetara MFA ya na mmepụta ihe nkírí na Mahadum California, Los Angeles na 1980
Ọrụ ihe ngosi Blue lekwasịrị anya na ụmụ nwanyị nke ndị Afrịka na isiokwu nka anya
Ọrụ ntinye aka multimedia nke Blue sitere na ọrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ya

Carroll Sockwell (1943-1992) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé ihe osise ya, ihe osise, na mgbakọ ya na-anọchite anya ya na-adabere na omenala oge a na nke minimalist ma gosipụta ikike ijikọta geometric na mmegharị ahụ
A maara ya maka ikike ya iwebata ụcha na nkwenye na isiokwu ndị na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla na ndị dị mfe
O siri ike ịkpọ aha, a na-ahụ ọrụ ya dị ka ihe na-emegide onwé ya 'ọmarịcha ma nwee obi mgbawa, ọ dị mwute ma ka na-egwuri egwu, ọ dị oke egwu ma nweere onwé ya'
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, ọ chere ihe ịma aka ndị na-agaghị ya ike ma yie, dịka otu ónyé na-ekiri ihe na-eme, ka ọ bụrụ 'ónyé na-ese ihe nke site na ọmụmụ, àgwà na ógè malitere iburu ibu arọ'
Ka o sina dị, o yikwara ka ọ bụ ónyé iro ya kachasị njọ, na-eleghara mkpa ọ dị inweta ihe oriri anya ma na-ewepụ ndị gbalịrị inyere ya aka
A mụrụ Carroll Sockwell na Febụwarị 13, 1943, na Washington, DC
ma too n'ezinụlọ nke nne nne ya duziri
Nne ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka odibo na nna ya na-arụrụ ọrụ mgbè ụfọdụ dị ka ónyé ọrụ ma na-eje ozi mgbè ụfọdụ na ndị agha
Nne nne ya bụkwa odibo
Na mgbakwunye na ndị ikwu a, nwanne nne, nwanne nna, na ụmụnne anọ bikwa n'ụlọ ahụ
Ebe nna ya na-anọghị ya mgbè niile, nne ya na-elekọta ịzụlite ya ruo mgbè, na 1948, ọ malitere ógè afọ iri na ise nke ụlọ ọgwụ màkà schizophrenia
Mgbè ọ hapụrụ, nwanne nne ya ghọrọ ónyé na-elekọta ya
N'afọ 1958, mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na ise, e nyere Sockwell ihe nrite màkà ihe osise ya, 'Bridge With the Sun'
N'afọ 1966, o gosipụtara na ihe ngosi otu nke e méré na Tarot Gallery na Manhattan
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọrụ ya pụtara n'akụkụ ọrụ Michael Clark, Robert Newman, na Kenneth Wade na ngosi nke nka siri ike na Corcoran Gallery
O gosipụtara n'afọ sochirinụ na ihe ngosi otu NAACP kwadoro nke emere na Nordness Gallery na Manhattan
Ndị ọzọ na-egosi ihe ngosi gụnyere Norman Lewis, Charles McGee, Felrath Hines, Alma W
Thomas, Walter Williams
N'otu oge ahụ, ọrụ ya pụtara n'otu ìgwè ndị omenkà iri na asaa na Ringling Museum na Sarasota ma n'ihe dị ka n'oge a ọ gosipụtara na Margaret Dickey Gallery na District
N'afọ 1971, ihe ngosi onwe onye na Jefferson Place Gallery a na-akpọ 'Mirror Compositions' dọtara nkatọ dị mma na Washington Post na magazin Jet
Ónyé ọzọ, nke a na Corcoran, sochiri na 1974 ma n'otu afọ ahụ ọrụ ya pụtara na ngosipụta otu na Whitney na Brooklyn Museums
N'afọ ahụ, o mekwara ọrụ màkà ihe osise dị mita irí anọ n'ogologo màkà ngalaba ndị isi mgbaka nke DC
General Hospital
O mechara gosipụta na oghere azụmahịa Washington, gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ Middendorf, Fraser, na Fiedler
Ezinụlọ Sockwell biri n'ụlọ dị na Virginia Avenue n'ebe dị na Foggy Bottom ebe Watergate Hotel guzo ugbu a
Ọ gụnyere nné nné Sockwell, Sarah Wilson, yana nwanne nne ya, Edna Johnson, na di ya, Lonnie Johnson
Nné na nnà Sockwell bụ Luther na Annie Sockwell, na ụmụnne ya, ha niile bụ ụmụnne ndị okenye, bụ Edward (afọ iri na abụọ karịa ya), Paul (afọ asatọ), Luther (afọ isii), na Eugene (afọ ise)
A mụrụ nne ya na South Carolina n'ihe dị ka 1912; nna ya na North Carolina n' ihe dị ka 1903
Afọ ole na ole tupu a mụọ ya, ụmụ nwanyị ezinụlọ ahụ na-enweta ihe ha na-eri dị ka ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ n'ụlọ onwe
Lonnie bụ ónyé na-asa efere n'ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na Luther bụ ónyé ọrụ n'ebe ili ozu
Nna Sockwell bụ ónyé aṅụrụma ma a kọrọ na o nwèrè ezinụlọ abụọ ọzọ
Nne ya nwere isi mgbaka na 1948 ma nọrọ afọ irí na isé na St
Elizabeths Hospital
Nwanne nne Sockwell, Edna Johnson, lekọtara ya na ụmụnne ya na-achọghị
Otu n'ime ha gwara ónyé nta akụkọ na ọ chụpụrụ ha n'ụlọ ahụ, otu otu
N'oge dị iche iche Sockwell bụ ónyé ọrịa na St
Elizabeths na ngalaba ndị isi mgbaka nke DC
General Hospital
Ọ bụ nwoke na-edina nwoke ibe ya na ónyé Africa America
Ọ hapụghị akwụkwọ ozi igbu onwe ya ma gosipụta ónyé ọ bụla na ọ na-eche echiche igbu onwe ya
