Carter Brey (amụrụ n'afọ 1954) bụ onye America cello virtuoso
O nwere ọrụ solo na-arụpụta ihe site na 1981 ruo 1996 mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye isi cello nke New York Philharmonic, ọkwá ọ ka na-ejide taa
A mụrụ Carter Brey na Montclair, New Jersey ma too na Westchester County, New York
Ọ malitere ịkpọ violin mgbe ọ dị afọ 9 na cello mgbe ọ dị dingwaga 12 n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ bụ ezie na ọ tụgharịghị echiche ịghọ onye na-agụ egwú ruo mgbe ọ dị iri na isii
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Laurence Lesser na Stephen Kates na Mahadum Johns Hopkins's Peabody Institute ma mesịa soro Aldo Parisot na Mahadim Yale, ebe ọ bụ Wardell Fellow na Houpt Scholar
Ọ kụziri na Mahadum nke South Florida n'etiti oge ya na Peabody na Yale
N'afọ 1979, ọ sonyeere ndị Cleveland Orchestra ebe ọ gbara egwu oge abụọ

Brey bịara n'ihu mba ụwa n'afọ 1981 mgbe ọ meriri ihe nrite nke atọ nke asọmpi Rostropovich International Cello, nke mere ka ọ kpọọ Robert Schumann Cello concerto n'okpuru Mstislav Rostropovich na National Symphony Orchestra n'afọ 1983
N'afọ 1982, ọ meriri na Young Concert Artists International Auditions, nke dugara na New York City recital debut ya na 92nd Street Y

Mmeri asọmpi ndị a malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri cello ma kemgbe ahụ, ya na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ndị ọ bụla na-eme symphony orchestra na United States n'okpuru ndị nduzi dị ka Claudio Abbado, Lorin Maazel, Kurt Masur, Semyon Bychkov, Sergiu Comissiona, na Christoph von Dohnanyi
Dị ka onye na-agụ egwu ,Breyhas performed with the Tokyo string Quartet,

The Emerson string Quartet New York youth symphony and the chamber music society of Lincoln centrehe has performed at the spoleto festivals in tje United States and Italy the santa Dr chamber Music festival,the La Jolla Chamber music festival and elsewhere
Brey bi na New York City
Ọ sonyeere ngalaba nke Curtis Institute of Music na 2008
Akwa miri nke carter bu nke e wuru ya N'afọ 1901 bụ otu n'ime àkwà mmiri atọ jikọtara Lagos Island na isi ala, ndị ọzọ bụ Third Mainland na Eko bridges
N'oge e wuru ya, nke a bụ naanị njikọ àkwà mmiri dị n'etiti ala na Lagos Island
Àkwà mmiri ahụ na-amalite site na Iddo na isi ala ma na-agwụ na mpaghara Idumota nke Lagos Island
A gụrụ àkwà mmiri ahụ aha na inochi anya Sir Gilbert Thomas Carter, onye bụbu Gọvanọ nke Colony nke Lagos
Ọ bụ gọọmentị Britain na-achị mba ahụ wuru àkwà mmiri Carter na mbụ, tupu nnwere onwe Naịjirịa na 1960
Mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị, a kwatuchara àkwà mmiri ahụ, degharịa ya ma wughachi ya na ngwụcha afọ 1970
Alaka-Ijora akwa, na njedebe Iddo nke oghere a rụchara N'afọ 1973
Ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala n'elu àkwà mmiri ahụ emeela ka okporo ụzọ ghara ịdị ike na mgbakwunye na itinye aka na mmebi ngwa ngwa ya
N'afọ 2003, ụlọ ọrụ Nigerian Institute of Structural Engineers kwuru na ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala n'akụkụ ebe ahụ nwere ike ịkpata ọdịda ma ọ bụrụ na a hapụrụ ya n'enweghị adreesị
Iji dozie nsogbu a, gọọmentị Lagos Steeti etinyela ụgwọ 50,000 maka ndị mmadụ na-adọba ụgbọala ha n'akụkụ ebe ahụ

Tụkwasị na nke a, n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2006, Kọmishọna Na-ahụ Maka Njem nke Lagos State mara ọkwa na a ga-amachibido ụgbọala azụmahịa niile ịbanye n'àgwàetiti Lagos site na Carter Bridge iji gbochie bọs na ụgbọala ndị ọzọ ka ha ghara ịdọrọ ụgbọala na àkwà mmiri ahụ
Na mgbakwunye na mkpọchi na àkwà mmiri ahụ, a na-ele Carter anya dị ka ihe na-adịghị mma n'abalị n'ihi enweghị ọkụ n'okporo ámá
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2013, Gọvanọ Fashola nke Lagos Steeti nyere iwu ka ọkụ n'okporo ámá na Carter Bridge nke ọrụ Independent Power Project kwadoro
Ọrụ ahụ bụ nke State's Electricity Board (wwwlsebgovng) chepụtara, mepụta ma mezue site na iji ihe ndị dị n'ógbè na ndị na-ahụ maka teknụzụ
Cassius Marcellus Clay (November 11, 1912 February 8, 1990) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eti egwu
Ọ bụ nna nke onye mmeri ụwa ugboro atọ Muhammad Ali na Rahman Ali, na nna nna Laila Ali
Ọ lụrụ Odessa Lee O'Grady na 1934 ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe
A kọwara ya dị ka 'ónyé mara mma, onye na-eme ihe ike, ónyé na'eme mkpọtụ, onye na - na-arọ nrọ' na 'ónyé na-aṅụbiga mmanya ókè, onye na na-achụ papa'
Nwa ya nwoke Muhammad Ali kọwara ya dị ka 'onye na-agba egwú kachasị mma na Louisville'
A mụrụ Clay na Jefferson County, Kentucky, nwá Herman H
Clay (March 1876 February 1, 1954) na Edith E
Greathouse (December 1889 December 30, 1972)
A gụrụ ya aha iji sọpụrụ ónyé ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Republican nke narị afọ nke iri na itoolu na ónyé na-akwado abolitionist, Cassius Marcellus Clay
O nwere nwanne nwanyị na ụmụnne nwoke anọ, gụnyere Nathaniel Clay
Nne na nna nna Clay bụ John Clay na Sallie Anne Clay
Nwanne ya nwanyị Eva kwuru na Sallie bụ nwa afọ Madagascar
Dabere na nyocha DNA, nnè nnè Muhammad Ali bụ nwa nwa Archer Alexander (1815-1880)
Clay sere bọọdụ mgbasa ozi na ihe ịrịba ama
Ọ na-akpọkwa piano, na-amụta piano ma dee egwu
N'ihe dị ka 1933, ọ lụrụ Odessa Lee O'Grady
Ọ bụ ónyé na-aṅụbiga mmanya ókè, nke dugara na mgbagwoju anya iwu màkà ịkwọ ụgbọala na-enweghị uche, omume aghara aghara, na mwakpo na batrị
Mgbè a jụrụ ya na 1970 ihe mere na ọ ghọghị onye Alakụba dịka nwa ya nwoke mèrè, o kwuru, sị 'okpukpe m bụ nkà m, nke na-akwado m
Clay nwụrụ mgbè ọ dị afọ 77 na Febụwarị 8, 1990, mgbè ọ nwesịrị nkụchi obi mgbè ọ na-ahapụ ụlọ ahịa ngalaba na Kentucky
Arthur Adams gosipụtara Clay na ihe nkírí 1977 The Greatest na Giancarlo Esposito na ihe nkírí 2001 nke a họpụtara na Oscar Ali
Castle na Castle bụ usoro ndị Naịjirịa bidoro n'afọ 2018 ma na -asọba naanị na Netflix
Ọ bụ usoro iwu izizi nke ndị Naịjirịa na Afrịka nke gosipụtara akụkọ gbasara ezinaụlọ nke e ji ịhụnanya, ihe nkiri na nraranye mara

Castle na Castle nwere oge abụọ na-aga n'ihu na Netflix, ọ na -akpọkwa ụfọdụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Naịjirịa dịka Richard Mofe-Damijo, Dakore Akande, Deyemi Okanlawon, Daniel Etim Effiong na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ

Usoro a bụ akụkọ banyere ezinụlọ iwu (Di, nwunye na nwa) na-agba ọsọ ụlọ ọrụ iwu na-aga nke ọma nke na-ahụ onwe ha ugbu a na-agbachitere mmasị na-abụghị nke ụwa nke iwu nke n'aka nke ya ugbu a na-enwe mmetụta ọjọọ na alụmdi na nwunye ha nwere obi ụtọ na ezinụlọ dum

A tọhapụrụ oge otu n'ime usoro a na 2018 wee nweta ọtụtụ okwu dị mma site n'aka ndị na-akwado ya ma soro ya na oge abụọ nke ewepụtara na 2021 , na-ekwupụta mwepụta nke oge abụọ bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na onye ọrụ
-onye okike nke Castle na Castle, bụkwa onye isi oche, Ebonylife Mo Abudu
Oge 2 gosiputara ọtụtụ ndị n'ime ihe nkiri ma ọrụ nke nkiri dị ka Bisola Aiyeola, Bimbo Ademoye, Mimi Chaka, Elozonam Ogbolu na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Cat Hellisen (amụrụ 31 Mee na afo 1977) bụ onye South Afrika odee akwụkwọ akụkọ fantasy Mgbe oke osimiri na-ebili uhie, Ụlọ ájá na ihe nzuzo, na anụ ọhịa
A mụrụ Cat Hellisen na Cape Town wee biri na Cape Town na Johannesburg, South Afrika na Nottingham, England
Ha bi ugbu a na Scotland
Na afo 2015, Cat Hellisen meriri ihe nrite Short Story Day Africa na Ake Arts & Book Festival na Nigeria, nke onye ọka ikpe Prize Abubakar Adam Ibrahim nyere, maka akụkọ ha 'The Worme Bridge'
Akwụkwọ akụkọ

Ndị na- ebipụta akwụkwọ kwa izu na-ede banyere Mgbe Oké Osimiri Na-acha uhie uhie, 'Ụdị Hellisen na-akọwa nkọwa na-akpali akpali na nkọwa na-enweghị atụ, na-adọta ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ n'ime ihe ndị na-adịghị ahụkebe na ndị na-akpali akpali nke na-eme ka ụwa dị mgbagwoju anya nke Felicita,' mgbe Kirkus na-ekwu na 'ihe mgbagwoju anya nke ụlọ ụwa

na nkwubi okwu ghe oghe na-arịọ ihe ọzọ' N'akwụkwọ akụkọ bụ́ The Bulletin of the Center for Children's Books dere na nlebanya nwere kpakpando, sị, 'Ọchịchị, na-atụ egwu, na ọ bụghịkwa mgbapụta kpamkpam, nke a bụ ileba anya nke ukwuu na mkpụrụ nnupụisi na nsonaazụ onye ọ bụla ha na-aghọrọ mgbe ụfọdụ'
Kirkus na-akpọ akụkọ maka anụ ọhịa, '
na-eche echiche na lyrical
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe atụ bụ ihe a na-agaghị echefu echefu ma ọ dịghị mgbe ọ na-egbu maramara” na nlebanya nwere kpakpando

Ndị mbipụta akwụkwọ bụ Weekly nyekwara ya kpakpando, na-asị, “Ịgwakọta nsogbu nke oge a na ọbụbụ ọnụ anwansi oge ochie, akwụkwọ akụkọ Hellisen (When the Sea Is Rising Red) na-egbuke egbuke dị ka akụkọ ifo mara mma, ọbụna dị ka ọ na-eme ka eziokwu ndị na-adịghị mma pụta ìhè” Akwụkwọ akụkọ bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ for the Center for Children's Books na-atụ aro na nyocha nke kpakpando na-egosi na 'ndị agadi na-akwado akụkọ ifo na nkwughachi ha ga-atọ ụtọ na uri a, dị egwu, akụkọ akụkọ banyere nwa agbọghọ nke chere ihu na ihe kasị njọ nke ihe ndị mmadụ nwere ike ịhọrọ ma kama ikpebiri
ịpụ n'èzí nke nkọcha ahụ wee mee ụzọ nke ya' Voya na-enye kpakpando ọzọ wee dee, Onye na-elekọta anụ ọhịa bụ ihe na-egbuke egbuke ma mara mma nke akwụkwọ akụkọ
Ibe ọ bụla na-eji anwansi eme ihe'
Ihe odide a na-adọrọ mmasị onye na-agụ na-adọta n'ime ezinụlọ a na ihe ijuanya na-agafe ha
Anyị hụrụ na nke a bụ akwụkwọ dị ike nke na-aga n'ihu na-ewute onye na-agụ ya ma emesịa
Catarina Lorenzo (amụrụ na Machị 30, 2007) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe na Brazil si Salvador, Bahia
A mụrụ Lorenzo nye nne na nna na nne na nne na ochie ndị na-etinye aka na ikpe ziri ezi nke gburugburu ebe obibi
Ọ tolitere na-ekere òkè na ngagharị iwe maka nchebe nke osimiri na oké ọhịa na ịnya ụgbọ mmiri

Na Septemba 23, 2019, ya na ụmụaka ịrị na ise ndị ọzọ nke gụnyere Greta Thunberg, Alexandria Villaseñor, Ayakha Melithafa, na Carl Smith tinyere akwụkwọ mkpesa n'ihu Kọmitii Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu na-ahụ maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Nwatakịrị iji mee mkpesa maka enweghị ọrụ gọọmentị na nsogbu ihu igwe
Karịsịa, mkpesa ahụ na-ekwu na mba ise, ya bụ Argentina, Brazil, France, Germany, na Turkey, emezughị nkwa ha kwekọrịtara na Paris
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ sonyeere Greenkingdom, otu ndị ntorobịa mba ụwa na-eduzi Intersectional Environmental movement, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi maka ngalaba Brazil nke òtù ahụ
Ugbu a, ya na onye India dị afọ iri na anọ na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na onye na-agba mbọ maka ọdịmma ihu igwe Sameer Yasin bụ onye guzobere òtù ndị ntorobịa
Catharina 'Karin' Bröms (1665-1735), bụ onye Sweden na-arụ ọrụ ígwè
Ọ bụ onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ igwe Wij na Ockelbo n'etiti afọ 1686 (nke a na-akpọ 1708) na 1735
O guzobere ma nweta ọrụ ígwè ndị ọzọ ma mesịa nwee akụkụ ka ukwuu nke Ockelbo na parish ya
Bröms bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na-aga nke ọma nke jisiri ike zere ịda mbà n'ihe gbasara akụ na ụba na ụlọ ọrụ ígwè n'oge Great Northern War ma bụrụ onye a maara dị ka 'Her Grace at Wij'
Bröms bụ ada Sven Bröms, onye malitere ọrụ Wij iron na Ockelbo, na Catharina Helleday Ọ lụrụ mbụ na 1680 na onye a ma ama Johan Silfverklou, onye zụtara ọrụ ígwè n'aka nna ya na 1685

Mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1686, ọ ghọrọ onye nwe ya, n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ onye nwe ya na nwunye ya nke abụọ, Carolus Carlsson Bishọp nke Västerås Mgbe nwunye ya nke abụọ nwụrụ na 1708, ọ ghọrọ onye nwe ígwè ọrụ

Catharina Bröms bịara jikwaa ọrụ ígwè Ockelbo site na 1686 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ Ọ bụkwa onye mmekọ azụmahịa nke nwanne ya nwanyị Elisabeth 'Lisa' Bröms, onye na-arụkwa ọrụ dịka onye na-ahụ maka ígwè N'oge nke nwunye ya dị ka bishọp, Bröms na nwanne ya nwanyị sokwa n'ihe gbasara nhọpụta na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ụkọchukwu mpaghara The local folksong »om biskop Karin, domprost Lisa och gubben själv» ('Banyere Bishọp Karin, Vicar Lisa na agadi nwoke n'onwe ya') ka a tụgharịrị dị ka nkatọ nke nwanne nwanyị na-etinye aka na ihe ndị dị otú ahụ

Cathcart William Methven FRSE (ubochí irí abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 1849 Edinburgh rụọ úbọchị irí atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst 1925 Pietermaritzburg) bụ onye isi injinia na Greenock na Clyde, a họpụtara ya n'afọ 1888 dị ka ónyé injinia ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri na Durban
E wezụga ịbụ ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na ónyé nwere ike egwu, ọ bụ, n'ụzọ a na-adịghị ahụkebe, ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri nwere onyinye ma mepụta ọtụtụ ihe osise mara mma nke ihe nkiri Natal
O guzobere Durban Art Gallery n'afọ 1892
A mụrụ ya na nọmba irí na otu Roxburgh Street na Edinburgh n'ubochí irí abụọ na ànó n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1849 nwa William Methven
A na-eche na a na-akpọ ya aha nwanne nna ya, Cpt Cathcart Methven nke East India Company nwụrụ n'ịda site na ịnyịnya na Calcutta n'afọ 1823
Ọ mụtara ọrụ dị ka injinia na John Sang na Kirkcaldy site n'afọ 1866 rụọ afọ 1871
Mgbè áhụ, ya na Paley na Austin nke Lancaster rụkọrọ ọrụ dị ka Clerk of Works màkà iwughachi St John's Episcopal Church na Greenock
Ọ sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ London nke Robert Kinipple dị ka onye na-enyere onye injinia ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri aka na Greenock na Scotland
N'afọ 1886, ọ nọchiri Kinipple dị ka onye isi injinia nke Greenock Harbour Trust
Dị ka onye injinia Victorian a ma ama, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Institution of Civil Engineers (ICE)
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1888, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Fellow nke Royal Society nke Edinburgh
Ndị na-atụ aro ya bụ William Swan, John Gray McKendrick, George Chrystal, na Sir John Murray

Ọ kwagara South Africa n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nkè afọ 1888, mgbè a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ injinia ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke Durban, iwu ya bụ iwepụ ájá na-egbochi ụgbọ mmiri n'ọnụ ụzọ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri, na-amanye ndị njem na ibu ka ha jiri ọkụ na-ebugharị

Atụmatụ Methven iji kpochapụ ụlọ mmanya ahụ site n'ịgbatị North Pier na iji ihe mkpofu nke mmiri, mèrè ka ya na onye ọka iwu a ma ama, Attorney General na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Harry Escombe, onye chọrọ ịdabere na ịdọrọ naanị ya
N'ihi ya, a chụpụrụ Methven n'ubochí irí na otu n'ọnwa Julaị 1894
Nke a dugara na nnukwu ọgba aghara na arụkwaghịm Escombe
Ka oge na-aga, na 1918, gọọmentị South Africa nyere ya £ 500 iji kwado ọrụ ya na mmepe nke ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ
Ntuziaka ọzọ ya na a ga-emepe Umhlatuzi Lagoon dị ka ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke abụọ maka Natal, a gbakwara ya n'afọ ndị 1970 ma mara ya ugbu a dị ka Richards Bay

Enweghị afọ ojuju n'ịnọgide na-enweghị ọrụ, Methven bịdọrọ azụmahịa nke ya na-aga nke ọma dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nke injinia obodo na nke ụgbọ mmiri, onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na onye nyocha n'ubochí irí na atọ n'ọnwa Disemba afọ1895

O mere nyocha maka ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri niile dị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ na ndịda, site na Port St Johns (1897) ruo Port Alfred, Kalk Bay na Mossel Bay (1901), Richards Bay na Cape Town (1902), East London (1901 na 1910), Lourenço Marques (1909/10) na Beira na Port Elizabeth (1911)
Methven bụkwa onye isi oche nke Natal Institute of Architects (1905-1908) na Fellow nke Royal Institute of British Architects (FRIBA)
Methven rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere ndị otu Natal Institute of Architects
Ọ bụ onye na-egbu azụ na-anụ ọkụ n'obi na ónyé na-eti egwu
Mmekọrịta ya n'ụwa nka mere ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Natal Society of Artists na 1908, 1912 na 1915

O dere nkọwa màkà iwu akụkụ ahụ na Durban na Pietermaritzburg Town Halls, ma dezie A Century of Progress in Natal, afọ 1824 rụọ afọ 1924 bipụtara na Pieter maritzburg(Methven 1924) Ihe ngosi mbụ nke Methven mere na Johannesburg na 1921
Enwere ike ịhụ ọrụ ya na Africana Museum, Durban Art Gallery, Local History Museum and, Tatham Art Gallery na Killie Campbell Collections
O dekwara ọtụtụ ihe osise nke ọbọdọ ya, Greenock
Ọ nwụrụ na Pietermaritzburg na South Africa n'ubochí irí atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọọst n'afọ 1925
Ọ lụrụ di
Ụmụ ya gụnyere Alexander Methven nà Iain Lambert Methven
Ónyé na-enyere ya áká, James Buchanan Pentland-Smith, lụrụ nwa ya nwanyị nke okenye
A na-akpọ okporo ámá abụọ dị na Durban aha ya, otu dị na Maydon Wharf / 298802046°S 30998676°E /8802046; 30998 676 na nke ọzọ dị na Westville 30 °54′07′′E / 26816779°S 3090186°E/3090186
Cathe Friedrich, amụrụ na Julaị 20, 1964, bụ onye nkuzi mmeghari ahụ nke otu ACE nke Amirika, onye na-enye ọzụzụ onwe onye na onye ọchụnta ego si na Glasbiri nke jersi
Kemgbe ọ wepụtara vidiyo mbụ ya na 1989, Friedrich ewepụtala ihe karịrị vidiyo 190 nke ahụike
Ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ọ kụziri klas ahụike na Ihe omume Ahụike ugbu a
Ọ bụ onye nwe ihe omume izu ano nke ana egosi na Ihe omume glasboro, ebe ọ na-akụzi klas ahụike mgbe niile
N'afọ 2011, a nabatara ya ihe omume nke fem

Katidral bụ ụka nke nwere katidra (Latin maka 'oche') nke bishọp, si otu a na-eje ozi dị ka ụlọ ụka etiti nke dayọsis, ọgbakọ, ma ọ bụ episcopate Ụka ndị nwere ọrụ nke 'katidral' na-abụkarị ndị a kapịrị ọnụ maka ụka Ndị Kraịst nwere ndị isi n'ọgbakọ, dịka Katọlik, Eastern Orthodox, Anglican, na ụfọdụ ụka Lutheran Ụlọ ụka ndị na-arụ ọrụ nke katidral pụtara na mbụ na Italy, Gaul, Spain, na North Africa na narị afọ nke anọ, ma katidral aghọghị ihe zuru ụwa ọnụ n'ime Chọọchị Katọlik nke Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ ruo narị afọ nke 12, bụ nke oge ahụ ha zụlitere ụdị ụkpụrụ ụlọ usoro ụlọ ọrụ, na njirimara iwu dị iche na ụlọ ụka parish, ụka monastic, na ebe obibi ndị bishọp Katidral dị mkpa na ndị isi karịa ụka n'ihi na ọ bụ katidral ka bishọp na-achị ebe ahụ n'okpuru ikike nchịkwa ya
Àtụ Infobox church
Cathedral Church nke Christ Marina, Lagos bụ katidral ndi Anglican di na Lagos Island, Lagos, Nigeria
A tọrọ ntọala maka ụlọ katidral mbụ na 29 Machị 1867 ma guzobe katidral ahụ nafo 1869
Ihe owuwu nke ụlọ dị ugbu a na atụmatụ nke onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ Bagan Benjamin malitere na 1 Nọvemba 1924
Ọ bụ Prince of Wales (mgbe e mesịrị Eze Edward nke Asatọ) tọrọ ntọala ahụ na 21 Eprel 1925
E wuchara ya na 1946
Nafọ 1976, a tụgharịrị ihe Rev Dr Samuel Ajayi Crowther, onye Yoruba bụbu ohu nke ghọrọ bishọp Afrịka mbụ na Ụka Anglican, gaa na katidral
E nwere cenotaph e wuru ka ọ bụrụ ihe ncheta ya
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka Katidral Church of Christ Marina, ma bụrụ Katidral Anglican kacha ochie na Ụka Nigeria

N'oge dị iche iche na akụkọ ihe mere eme ya, katidral bụ oche nke archbishọp nke Province nke West Africa, oche nke archbishop na primate nke All Nigeria na oche nke archbishop nke Ecclesiastical Province nke Lagos
Ugbu a ọ bụ oche Bishọp Lagos

At various times in its history, the cathedral was the seat of the archbishop of the Province of West Africa, the seat of the archbishop and primate of All Nigeria and the seat of the archbishop of the Ecclesiastical Province of Lagos

N'oge dị iche iche na akụkọ ihe mere eme ya, katidral bụ oche nke archbishọp nke mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ Africa, oche nke archbishop na primate nke All Nigeria na oche nke archbishop nke Ecclesiastical Province nke Lagos

At various times in its history, the cathedral was the seat of the archbishop of the West African region, the seat of the archbishop and primate of All Nigeria and the seat of the archbishop of the Ecclesiastical Province of Lagos
Ọ bụ Oberlinger Orgelbau, Germany, wuru ọkpọkọ ahụ n'akụkụ aka nri nke ebe ịchụàjà ahụ nwere ihu abụọ - otu na-ele anya n'ebe ịchụàjà na nke abụọ na-elegharị anya n'akụkụ Aka nri
Otu n'ime ngalaba, Antiphonal, dị na organ loft n'elu ọnụ ụzọ mbata nke ụka ahụ
Na mbido narị afọ nke iri abụọ na otu, ụlọ ọrụ Bekee bụ Harrison & Harrison mezigharịrị ngwá ọrụ ahụ dum (ma wughachi njikwa); ọ nwere nkwụsị 64 na ntuziaka 4 na pedalboard
Ọ bụ ọkpọkọ kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa
Nafọ 1969, onye bu onye isi ala Naịjirịa n'oge ahụ, Yakubu Gowon lụrụ Miss Victoria Zakari, na mmeme nke Seth Irunsewe Kale duziri na Katidral
Katidral nke mmụta bụ ụlọ elu dị okpukpu 42 nke na-eje ozi dị ka etiti nke Mahadum Pittsburgh (Pitt) isi ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na mpaghara Oakland nke Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania

Na-eguzo na 535 feet (163 ), 42-story Late Gothic Revival Cathedral bụ ụlọ agụmakwụkwọ kachasị elu na Western Hemisphere na ụlọ mahadum nke abụọ kachasị elu (ụlọ nke ise kachasị elu maka agụmakwụkwọ) n'ụwa, mgbe isi ụlọ nke Mahadum Moscow State gasịrị
Ọ bụkwa ụlọ nke abụọ kachasị elu n'ụwa, mgbe Woolworth Building dị na Manhattan gasịrị
E nyere Katidral nke Mmụta ọrụ na 1921 ma mebie ala na 1926 n'okpuru onye ọrụ ngo Stone & Webster
E mere klas mbụ n'ụlọ ahụ na 1931 ma wuchaa mpụga ya n'October 1934, tupu nraranye ya na June 1937
Ọ bụ ihe ịrịba ama Pittsburgh edepụtara na National Register of Historic Places

Ụfọdụ ụmụ akwụkwọ Pitt na-akpọkarị 'Cathy' Katidral nke mmụta bụ ihe owuwu nchara nke ejiri limestone Indiana kpuchie ma nwee ihe karịrị ụlọ na windo 2,000 Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa nke mahadum, ma bụrụkwa ụlọ nke Dietrich School of Arts and Sciences, School of Social Work, na ọtụtụ ngalaba ya, yana Mahadum Honors College Ọ nwere ọtụtụ oghere pụrụ iche, gụnyere ụlọ ihe nkiri studio, ụlọ nri nri, ebe a na-amụ ihe, ụlọ ọrụ, kọmpụta na ụlọ nyocha asụsụ, 31 Nationality Rooms, na ọkara acre (2000 m2, 22,000 ft2), ụlọ akụkọ 4 dị elu, nke nwere oghere, gothic ọmụmụ na ụlọ mmemme Ụlọ ahụ nwere ihe atụ ndị a ma ama nke enyo, nkume, osisi, na ígwè arụrụ arụ, nke mahadum na-ejikarị eme ihe na foto, kaadị ozi, na mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ

Catherine Constantinides (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 27, 1982) bụ onye ndu echiche South Africa, onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi lekwasịrị anya na mgbanwe ihu igwe, nchekwa nri na mmiri na njikwa mkpofu, onye ọchụnta ego, onye na-akwado ikpe ziri ezi na onye na-agbachitere ikike mmadụ
Constantinides hiwere azụmahịa mbụ ya, SA Fusion, ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
O tinyere aka na mmeghe nke echiche Miss Earth na South Africa ma bụrụ onye e kpunyere okpueze nke Miss Earth South Africa mbụ na 2003
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye nduzi nke Miss Earth South Africa
Constantinides na Nelson Mandela ṅụrụ tii n'afọ 2003, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu
O kwuru na mmemme Gratitude200K 'Ọ bụ nnukwu ohere mgbe m gbara afọ iri abụọ na otu ịnata òkù site n'aka ya, ka mụ na ya ñụkọọ tii, tupu m gaa Miss Earth mba ụwa n'afọ 2003
Constantinides bụ onye so wee guzobe Generation Earth, otu ndị ntorobịa na-eduzi, maka gburugburu ebe obibi
N'ime afọ 2013 Constantinides bụ onye kacha nta n'ime ndị Afrịka iri abụọ aha ha pụtara na Achịbishọp Tutu Leadership Fellow
Constantinides edeela akwụkwọ maka Huffington Post banyere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbanwe ihu igwe na ọnọdụ dị na Western Sahara
Ọ bụ onye na-akatọ omume nke gọọmentị Morocco na Western Sahara, na-akọwa ókèala ahụ dị ka 'obodo ikpeazụ fọdụrụ na Africa'
O kwuru banyere Western Sahara dị ka 'ala Afrịka nọ n'ala ọzọ, ihe kpatara ya na ndị mmadụ chefuru echefu'
Na Mee 2016 a họpụtara Constantinides dị ka otu n'ime Mandela Washington Fellows dị ka otu onye so na Young African Leaders Initiative; atụmatụ nke United States Department of State
Constantinides natara South African Young Woman Entrepreneur Award for Women Empowerment n'afọ 2012
A na-asọpụrụkwa ya na South African Youth Entrepreneur award na South African Premier Business Awards
N'afọ 2015, e tinyere Constantinides na ọrụ '21 Icons Project', ọrụ nke na-eme ememe 'mmezu mmadụ site na foto, ihe nkiri na akụkọ'
The Mail & Guardian depụtara Constantinides dị ka otu n'ime mmadụ narị abụọ ndị na-eto eto na South Africa n'afọ 2014
A nabatara Constantinides na Ubuntu Youth Diplomacy Award na 2016 na mmemme nke Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mba ụwa na mmekorita, Maite Nkoana-Mashabane kwadoro

N'ịnata ihe nrite ahụ Constantinides kwuru 'Enwere m obi ụtọ na m ga-efegharị ọkọlọtọ anyị elu ma ga-anọgide na-abụ onye nnọchi anya mba anyị na ihe ndị dị m nso n'obi, dịka anyị na-ewu South Africa na Africa, anyị kwenyere na ọ ga-ekwe omume
Catherine Ewa Ekuta (ka mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 25 n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1979 na Lagos ) bụ onye judoka nke Naijiria nke sọrọ mpi na ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị dị mfe
O nwetara ọla edo na ọla nchara abụọ nke ọ bụla na ngalaba 57-kg na All-Africa Games (1999 (bronze), 2003 (gold) na 2007 (bronze))
Ihe nrite ọla edo ahụ bụ na 2003 All-Africa Games (Coja) Nigeria, na kilogram 57 ọ ruru eru ma nọchite anya mba ya Nigeria na 2004 Summer Olympics

Ekuta ruru eru maka ndị otu judo Naịjirịa abụọ na klas ụmụ nwanyị dị mfe (57 kg) na 2004 Summer Olympics na Athens, site n'inweta nrite ọla edo na 2003 All-Africa Games (Coja) Nigeria, na 57 kg), ọ nọkwa na nke atọ ma nata ọkwa site na African Championship na Tunis, Tunisia

Ekuta nwetara mmeri n'agba mmeghe, tupu ọ daa tatami ahụ na ippon na aka na-ebuli ma na-adọkpụ hip throw (sode tsurikomi goshi) site n'aka Lena Göldi nke mba Switzerland na nanị sekọnd iri anọ na anọ fọdụrụ na egwuregwu mbụ ya
Catherine Lamwaka (amụrụ na 25 Disemba, na afọ 1983) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye otu onye iri na otu ndi nzuko Ndi Omeiwu na Uganda na-anọchite anya Omoro District
Lamwaka bụ nwanyị so na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke obodo Uganda Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti maka Omoro District na onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement (NRM)
Òtù NRM bụ òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-achị Uganda n'okpuru onye isi oche nke Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, onye isi ala Uganda
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi obodo na-ahụ maka mpaghara Gulu na Pader District
Lamwaka malitere agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarịa nke Gulu ebe ọ gụsịrị ule praịmari ya

N'afọ 1996, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Sacred Heart, Gulu, maka agụmakwụkwọ O-level na A-level ebe ọ pụtara maka ule Uganda Certificate of Education (UCE) n'afọ 2000 na ule Uganda Advanced Certificate of education (UACE) n'afọ 2002
O mechara sonye na Mahadum Gulu ebe, n'afọ 2006, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelors na Development Studies
N'afọ 2008, ọ nwetara diplọma postgraduate na Public Administration and Management site na Uganda Management Institute
Kemgbe afọ 2016, Lamwaka abụwo onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Uganda, na-anọchite anya ndị obodo Omoro dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti
Ọ na-eje ozi na Kọmitii Nkwado Gọọmentị na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda ma bụrụ onye otu na osote onyeisi oche nke Uganda Women Parliamentary Association (UWOPA)

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'okpuru ọfịs onye isi ala dị ka Resident District Commissioner (RDC), Gulu District, site na afọ 2014 ruo na afọ 2015 na dị ka Residente District Commissioner, Pader District, site n'afọ 2010 ruo 2014
Lamwaka jere ozi dị ka onye ọrụ mmepe obodo maka Amuru District site na afọ 2007 ruo na afọ 2010, na mbido ọrụ ya dị ka onye enyemaka nyocha maka Gulu NGO Forum site na afọ 2006 ruo afọ 2007
Catherine Mahon (1869-1948), nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi oche nke Irish National Teachers' Organisation
A mụrụ Catherine Mahon na Laccah, County Tipperary na 15 Mee 1869 na onye ọrụ dị afọ iri atọ na asaa James Mahon na nwunye ya dị afọ iri na itoolu Winifred Mahon (née O'Meara)
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ asaa
Agụmakwụkwọ ya dị na ụlọ akwụkwọ mba Carrig tupu ya aga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Sisters of Mercy na Birr ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi site na Ọktoba 1884
N'oge ahụ, nke a bụ ụzọ isi nweta nzere onye nkuzi
Ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ ya site na akwụkwọ ozi wee gaa ule ikpeazụ na 1890
Ọ kụziri maka obere oge na Tulla Convent na County Clare
Ọ nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ndụ nkuzi ya na Tipperary - na ndị nọn Nenagh na dị ka onye isi nke Glenculloo
Mahon bụ onye isi site na Septemba 1891 ruo Eprel 1892 na obere ụlọ akwụkwọ nwere ụmụ akwụkwọ iri atọ na Glenculloo tupu ọ gaa bụrụ onye isi nke ụlọ akwụkwọ mba Carrig
Mahon bụ onye otu Gaelic League na Irish Women's Franchise League
Mgbe ọ bụ onye na-abụghị onye agha, o gosipụtara nkwado na The Irish Citizen
N'afọ 1906, Mahon malitere itinye aka na ndị otu ọrụ ndị nkuzi wee sonye na Birr Association wee kwuo okwu banyere ịkwụ ụgwọ nhata na nzukọ ndị nkuzi mba Irish kwa afọ
O gosipụtara enweghị ụmụ nwanyị na ndị isi INTO

N'ikwu okwu banyere isi ihe ọ wepụtara onwe ya maka ịtụle ọnọdụ onye isi oche nke njikọ ahụ na Machị 1907 ma, ọ bụ ezie na a họpụtaghị ya, ajụjụ ahụ dị n'ihu ọha nke na INTO mepụtara ọkwa ọhụrụ na ndị isi maka ụmụ nwanyị ma nye Mahon otu
N'ime afọ ndị mbụ nke itinye aka ya, Mahon nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ọtụtụ ebumnuche ya, ọ mụbara recruitment ma gbochie ndị nkuzi nwanyị ka a manyere ha ikpuchi ịsa ákwà na nri dị ka isiokwu
Mgbe a nabatara onyinye Birrell n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1908, Mahon kwuru na e guzobere onye isi nke ịkwụ ụgwọ hà nhata, ebe a na-ekesa onyinye ahụ na ndị nkuzi niile
N'ihi ya, o kwuru na e mere ihe nlereanya ahụ
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1911, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi ala n'enweghị onye na-emegide ya
N'afọ ahụ, ebumnuche ya bụ igbochi ndị nkuzi nọ na ezumike ịmụ nwa ka a chọọ ka ha nye onye nnọchi anya ha na ego nke ha
N'afọ 1912, a họpụtara Mahon ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi oche nke INTO
N'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ozugbo enwere nsogbu na ịchụpụ osote onye isi ala Edmond Mansfield na esemokwu dị n'etiti INTO na bọọdụ agụmakwụkwọ
E zigara Mahon na London ịrịọ onye isi odeakwụkwọ Augustine Birrell ka o mee nyocha
Ọ bụ ezie na odeakwụkwọ ahụ nwere ajọ mbunobi megide ọnọdụ ya, ọ kwetara na nkwupụta ya gosipụtara ikpe ahụ nke ọma ma guzobe kọmitii Dill
A họpụtara Mahon ọzọ na 1913 n'agbanyeghị na ọ na-eche otu oge
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị nkuzi, Irish School Weekly na 14 Disemba 1912 kwuru na 'ọchịagha nke meriri ndị agha ịnyịnya nke ndị iro n'ọgụ ọ bụla, ga-anọgide na-edu ndị agha'
Nke a nyere ya ohere inye ihe akaebe dị ka onye isi oche na Dill Commission nke gara n'ihu ịkwado ndị nkuzi ma tụọ aro mgbanwe mana ọ jụrụ ịtụ aro iweghachi Mansfield
N'ihi ya, n'afọ sochirinụ, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọchịchị
Ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ Easter 1916
A jụrụ ya ajụjụ maka nkwado olu ya maka ịrị elu Ista
Otu okwu nke bilitere n'afọ ikpeazụ ya n'ọchịchị bụ War bonus, nke nyere ụmụ nwoke okpukpu abụọ nke ụgwọ ụmụ nwanyị
Mahon mere mkpesa banyere nke a ma kwupụta ihe ịga nke ọma na Nọvemba 1916
N'afọ 1919, ọ katọrọ iwu agụmakwụkwọ nke Ian MacPherson ma kpọọ ndị isi INTO ndị na-agbachitere ndị Britain
O boro onye isi oche INTO na odeakwụkwọ ukwu T
O'Connell ebubo yiri nke ahụ
N'ihi ya, n'afọ 1920, e boro ya ebubo nkwutọ
Mahon jụrụ ịnabata ikike ụlọ ikpe Britain mana ozugbo a gbachiri ya, INTO kwụsịrị ikpe ahụ
Ọ nọpụrụ na ndụ ọha na eze na ọkwa mba site n'oge ahụ gaa n'ihu
A họpụtaghị nwanyị ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke INTO ruo mgbe Kathleen Clarke na 1945
Mahon bụ onye isi oche nke Tipperary Cottage Tenants' Association
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Fianna Fáil site na ntọala ya

Ọ lara ezumike nká na ngwụcha afọ agụmakwụkwọ na July 1934 wee gaa n'ihu bụrụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Mahon kwagara Dublin ebe ya na nne ya na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ di ha nwụrụ biri na Balbriggan site na 1937
N'ebe ahụ, ọ sonyeere Red Cross nke obodo ahụ
Ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ ka ọ nwụrụ ma lie ya
Catherine Musonda (amụrụ na 20 Febụwarị na afo 1998) bụ onye Zambia na-agba bọọlụ bụ onye na-edebe goolu maka Indeni Roses na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Zambia

Catherine Nakalembe bụ onye ọkà mmụta sayensị na-ahụ maka ihe dịpụrụ adịpụ na ọbọdọ Uganda na onye na-eme nchọpụta na Mahadum Maryland (UMD) na Ngalaba Sayensị Geographical na NASA Harvest Africa program Director
Nnyocha ya gụnyere ụkọ mmiri ozuzo, ọrụ ugbo na nchekwa nri
N'afọ 2020, e nyere Nakalembe onyinye nri Afrika
Ọ natara onyinye Group on Earth Observations nke mbụ onyinyé nke onye kacha mma na afo 2019
Ọ bụ onye nrite nke ihe onyinyé 2020 UMD Research Excellence Honoree
N'afọ 2022, ọ natara ihe nrite jubilii ọla edo nke Ugandan (onye nkịtị)
Onye isi ala Yoweri Museveni nyere ya nne na nna ya
Nakalembe lụrụ Sebastian Deffner, onye osote prọfesọ nke Physics na Mahadum Maryland, Baltimore County (UMBC)
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ
Catherine Namugala bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zambia
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke ndị omeiwu Zambia
Onye isi ala Edgar Lungu họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ, na 18 Septemba 2016
Ọ bụbu Minista nke Njem, Gburugburu Ebe Obibi na Ihe Ndị Dị n'Oké Ọdịdị na Cabinet Zambia
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu (MP), na-anọchite anya Mafinga (nke a maara dị ka Isoka East) na ndị omeiwu Zambia site na 2001 ruo 2016
Catherine Namugala jere ozi dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi site na afọ 2002 ruo afọ 2003
Site na 2003 ruo 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote minista maka mmepe obodo na ọrụ ọha na eze
N'afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu, na-anọchite anya Isoka East
N'afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mmepe obodo na ọrụ ọha na eze

Kemgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote minista n'ọfịs osote onye isi ala, tupu a họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ minista na-ahụ maka njem nleta na gburugburu ebe obibi na 2008 Na Febụwarị 2010, e nyere Catherine Namugala onyinye Minista njem nleta nke Afọ, na-emeri ndị asọmpi isii si Ghana, Namibia, Sierra Leone, Tanzania, Uganda na Zimbabwe
Na ntuli aka onye isi ala na nke ndị omeiwu N'afo nke Ọgọstụ 2016, Namugala onye soro na Movement for Multi-Party Democracy, họọrọ ịghara ịlụ ọgụ ọzọ n'oche ndị omeiwu ya
Kama nke ahụ, ọ kwadoro onye isi ala Lungu maka nhọpụta ọzọ maka Patriotic Front
Oriakụ Catherine Namugala alụghị di
Ọ bụ onye ótu Movement for Multiparty Democracy (MMD), otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Catherine Obianuju Acholonu (26 October 1951 - 18 March 2014) bụ onye edemede Naijiria, onye nchọpụta na onye nkụzi na-akụzi banyere Ọdịbendị na Ịzụ Ụmụaka n'Africa
O bu onye ndumodu puru iche na onye isi oche mbu president Olusegun Obansajo na nka na omenala, na onye otu ntoala nke njiko nke ndi edemede nke Nigeria (ANA)

Catherine Acholonu a mụrụ na Orlu na ezinụlọ Chief Lazarus OlumbaỌ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Orlu tupu ya aghọọ nwanyị mbụ nke Africa iji nweta akara ugo mmụta (1977) na PhD (1987) site na Mahadum Düsseldorf, Germany , Ọ na-akụzi na Alvan Ikoku College of Education Owerri, malite n'afọ 1978
Acholonu bụ onye edemede nke akwụkwọ 16, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-eji na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na mahadumNigeria, na ngalaba African Studies na USA na Europe

Ọrụ ya na ọrụ ya nwere nkwado na nkwado nke United States Information Service (USIS), British Council, the Rockefeller Foundation na n'afọ 1989, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ gaa ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ na USA, na-ekwuputa ọrụ ya n'okpuru United States Visitor's Program
Na 1990 Catherine Acholonu ji nkwenye nke Fulbright Scholar na Gọọmentị United States na-enye ya onyinye, nke ọ na-akụzi na kọleji anọ nke Consortium Westchester maka ọmụmụ mba ụwa, NY, USA

Catherine Uju Ifejika (amụrụ ya n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1959) bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria na Onye isi oche / Onye isi nke Brittania-U Nigeria Limited (BUNL); ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ala maka nyocha na mmepụta, na Brittania -U Ghana Limited (BUGL)
E kwenyere na ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị isii kachasị ike na mmanụ na mba ụwa nile na otu n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị kachasị baa ọgaranya ná mba Afírịka
Ọ natakwara ihe nrite mba na nke mba ụwa maka omume kachasị mma na idu ndú azụmaahịa
A maara Bond maka iji ma 'mgbasa ozi ochie' redio na 'mgbasa ọhụrụ' podcasting
Ọ bụ onye na-enye onyinye mgbe niile na CBC Radio's Spark, ma na-ede maka Rabbleca
Na CBC Radio, ọ bụ onye na-enyocha ihe nkiri na ọdịbendị ugboro ugboro na Definitely Not the Opera, mgbe ụfọdụ ọ pụtara dị ka onye na-eme mkparịta ụka na Saturday Night na Movies malite n'afọ 1999
Dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi, ọ na-akwado Reel Women, ihe nkiri na-eme kwa izu na onye Canada na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye edemede Judy Rebick
Ọ na-esokwa na-akwado The Sniffer, pọdkastị banyere teknụzụ na ọnọdụ, ya na Nora Young, kemgbe ọ dịkarịa ala afọ 2006
Ọ bụ onye na-elekọta podcast 'Prosecast', usoro ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ndị edemede Canada nke HarperCollins Canada kwadoro
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Bond bụ Night Town ka Iguana Books bipụtara n'afọ 2013
Ọ bụ akụkọ na-eme na 1970s Toronto
Cathryn Mataga (onye amụrụ William Mataga) bụ onye na-eme mmemme egwuregwu na onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ egwuregwu vidio Junglevision
N'okpuru aha William, o dere Atari 8-bit ezinụlọ egwuregwu maka Synapse Software na mbido ruo n'etiti afọ 1980, gụnyere Shamus, onye na-agba égbè flip-screen
Mataga mepụtara egwuregwu Shamus na 1982, nke a na-akpọ William maka ezinụlọ Atari 8-bit
A na-ekwu na ọtụtụ n'ime arịrịọ egwuregwu ahụ sitere na ọchị Mataga, dị ka ịmepụta 'nnukwu nsụgharị' nke egwu isiokwu Alfred Hitchcock na mmeghe egwuregwu ahụ
Mataga sochiri ya na ihe na-esote Shamus Case II na onye na-agba égbè Zeppelin
Steve Hales nke Synapse Software, n'ajụjụ ọnụ maka akwụkwọ Halcyon Days, kwuru na ya na Mataga mere ka onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ Ihor Wolosenko kwenye itinye ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'ime akụkọ ifo
Mataga mepụtara asụsụ mmemme akụkọ ifo na-emekọrịta ihe nke a maara dị ka BtZ (Kwuo mma karịa Zork) maka Broderbund, na mbido afọ 1980
Mataga so Hales na onye na-ede uri Robert Pinsky rụkọọ ọrụ na egwuregwu akụkọ ifo Mindwheel (1984)
Mataga bụ otu n'ime ndị mmemme na-arụ ọrụ na Stormfront Studios na Neverwinter Nights MMORPG mbụ
Don Daglow kwuru na Mataga bụ otu n'ime ndị mmemme gosipụtara nkwupụta Daglow na ọ nwere ike ime ka Neverwinter Nights nwee ihe ịga nke ọma
Dame Catherine Lilian 'Cathy' Warwick DBE bụ onye Scotland na-amụ nwa, onye isi otu ọrụ, na onye na-ahụ maka ikike ite ime
Ọ bụ Chief Executive nke Royal College of Midwives site na 2008 ruo 2017, ọ bụkwa Onye isi oche nke Trustees nke BPAS, otu n'ime ndị isi na-enye ọrụ ite ime na UK
Ọ nwetara nzere nọọsụ na Mahadum Edinburgh na 1975, wee gụchaa nkuzi midwifery otu afọ na ụlọ ọgwụ Queen Charlotte na 1976
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ nsọpụrụ nke Midwifery na King's College London School of Midwifery
A họpụtara ya CBE maka ọrụ nlekọta ahụike na 2006 Birthday Honors wee bulie ya na DBE na 2018 New Year Honors
Ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke isii na Health Service Journal's list of Clinical Leaders na 2015
N'October 2014, ọ duru nke mbụ iku site midwives na United Kingdom
Warwick bụkwa onye na-akwado nwanyị nke kwadoro nkwenye na ụmụ nwanyị kwesịrị inwe ike ime nhọrọ nke ha n'agbanyeghị ihe nhọrọ ndị ahụ nwere ike ịbụ
Cauliflower bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ akwụkwọ nri n'ụdị Brassica oleracea na ụdị Brassica, nke dị na ezinụlọ Brassicaceae (ma ọ bụ mustard)
Ọ bụ osisi na-eto kwa afọ nke na-amụba site na mkpụrụ
Dị ka ọ na-adịkarị, ọ bụ naanị isi ka a na-eri anụ na-acha ọcha a na-akpọ 'curd' mgbe ụfọdụ (nke yiri cheese curd)
Isi cauliflower nwere okooko osisi na-acha ọcha
Isi Cauliflower yiri nke broccoli, nke dị iche n'inwe okooko osisi dị ka akụkụ a na-eri eri
Brassica oleracea gụnyekwara broccoli, Brussels sprouts, cabbage, collard greens, na kale, nke a na-akpọ 'cole' ihe ọkụkụ, ọ bụ ezie na ha sitere n'ụdị dị iche iche
Pliny the Elder gụnyere cyma n'etiti osisi ndị a kụrụ akụ ọ kọwara na Natural History 'Ex omnibus brassicae generibus suavissima est cyma,' ('N'ime ụdị cabbage niile, nke kachasị amasị ya bụ cyma')
Nkọwa Pliny nwere ike na-ezo aka n'isi okooko osisi nke ụdị Brassica oleracea a zụlitere na mbụ

N'oge ụwa na-emepechabeghị anya, a na-ejikọta ụdị cauliflower na agwaetiti Saịprọs, na ndị botanist Arab nke senchiri nke irí na abụọ na nke ịrị na atọ a kpọrọ Ibn al-'Awwam na Ibn al-Baitar, na-azọrọ na mmalite ya bụ Saịpris

Njikọ a gara n'ihu n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Europe, ebe a na-akpọ cauliflowers mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka Cyprus colewort, ma enwere azụmahịa dị ukwuu n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Europe na mkpụrụ cauliflower sitere na Saịprọs, n'okpuru ndị ọchịchị French Lusignan nke agwaetiti ahụ, ruo na narị afọ nke iri na isii
François Pierre La Varenne jiri chouxfleurs mee ihe na Le cuisinier françois

A kpọbatara ha na France site na Genoa na narị afọ nke iri na isii, a na-egosikwa ha na Olivier de Serres' Théâtre de l'agriculture (1600), dị ka cauli-fiori 'dị ka ndị Itali na-akpọ ya, nke ka dị obere na France; ha nwere ọnọdụ dị ùgwù n'ogige ahụ n'ihi ịdị ụtọ ha', mana ha anaghị apụta na nnukwu tebụl ruo n'oge Louis nke iri na anọ
Ndị Britain webatara ya na India n'afọ 1822
Okwu ahụ bụ 'cauliflower' sitere na Italian cavolfiore, nke pụtara 'flowers cabbage'
Mmalite kachasị nke aha ahụ sitere na okwu Latin caulis (cabbage) na flōs (flowers)
Cauliflower siri ike izulite ma e jiri ya tụnyere cabbage, yana nsogbu ndị a na-ahụkarị dị ka isi na-etoghi eto na àgwà curd na-adịghị mma

N'ihi na ihu igwe bụ ihe na-egbochi mmepụta cauliflower, osisi ahụ na-eto nke ọma na okpomọkụ dị n'ehihie 21 - 29°C (70 - 85°F), na ọtụtụ anyanwụ, na ọnọdụ ala mmiri dị elu na ihe ndị dị ndụ na ala ájá
Oge kachasị eto maka cauliflower bụ izu asaa ruo ịzụ ịrị na abụọ site n'ụbọchị nzọgharị
N'ebe ugwu, oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ na July nwere ike ime ka owuwe ihe ubi tupu oge oyi
Ogologo oge nke anwụ na-achasi ike n'oge okpomọkụ nwere ike ime ka isi cauliflower na-acha uhie uhie
Enwere ike ịmepụta cauliflowers a na-etinye n'ime akpa dị ka flats, hotbeds, ma ọ bụ n'ọhịa

N'ime ala nke -adọbaghị, nke na-agbanye mmiri nke ọma ma na-eme nri, a na-akụ mkpụrụ osisi n'ọhịa otu sentimita (⁄½ in) ma na-agbatị site na ohere zuru oke nke ihe dị ka osisi ịrị na abụọ kwa sentimita ịrị atọ (½ in)
Okpomọkụ na-eto eto bụ ihe dị ka 18 °C (65°F) mgbe mkpụrụ dị ụbọchị ịrị abụọ na ise ruo ụbọchị ịrị atọ na ise
Mmetụta nke fatịlaịza na-eto eto na-amalite mgbe akwụkwọ na-apụta, na-ejikarị ihe ngwọta mmalite kwa izu
Ịgha mkpụrụ n'ọhịa na-amalite n'oge opupu ihe ubi ma nwee ike ịga n'ihu ruo n'etiti oge okpomọkụ
Ogologo ahịrị bụ ihe dị ka 38 - 46 cm (15 - 18 in)

Uto ngwa ngwa nke ahịhịa mgbe a gbasịrị ya nwere ike irite uru site na usoro ndị dị ka izere oyi oge opupu ihe ubi, iji ihe ngwọta mmalite dị elu na phosphorus, ịgba mmiri kwa izu, na itinye fatịlaịza
Nsogbu kachasị mkpa na-emetụta àgwà cauliflower bụ ogwe oghere, uto isi ma ọ bụ bọtịnụ, ricing, browning na ọkụ ọkụ
N'etiti nnukwu ahụhụ na-emetụta cauliflower bụ aphids, mgbọrọgwụ, cutworms, ụkpara, na flea beetles
Osisi ahụ nwere ike ire ure ojii, ụkwụ ojii, mgbọrọgwụ klọb, ntụpọ akwụkwọ ojii, na downy mildew
Mgbe cauliflower tozuru, isi -apụta dị ka ihe na-acha ọcha, dị mkpirikpi, na 15-20 cm (6-8 in) n'obosara, a ga-emekwa ka ọ jụọ oyi n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe owuwe ihe ubi gasịrị
Mmiri na-eme ka ikuku dị jụụ iji wepụ okpomọkụ n'ọhịa n'oge okpomọkụ nwere ike ịdị mkpa maka nchekwa kachasị mma
Nchekwa nwa oge nwere ike site na iji ọnọdụ nchekwa dị jụụ, nke dị elu
Ọtụtụ ụdị ụgbala, gụnyere Calliphora vomitoria, bụ ndị a maara dị ka ndị na-eme ntụ ọka nke cauliflower
E nwere nnukwu ìgwè anọ nke cauliflower
E nwere ọtụtụ narị ụdị azụmahịa nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na nke ugbu a na-eji gburugburu ụwa
A na-edebe ndepụta zuru oke nke ihe dị ka ụdị ịrị asatọ nke North America na Mahadum North Carolina State
Cauliflower na-acha ọcha na akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ
Green Romanesco cauliflower
Oroma cauliflower
Osisi cauliflower na-acha odo odo
Na 2020, mmepụta ụwa nke cauliflowers (gwakọta maka akụkọ mmepụta na broccoli) bụ nde tọn ịrị abụọ na ise na ọkara, nke China na India sotere
Ha nwere pasent ịrị asaa na abụọ nke ngụkọta ụwa
Ndị na-emepụta ihe nke abụọ, na-enwe 04 - 13 nde tọn kwa afọ, bụ United States, Spain, Mexico na Italy
Cauliflower ndụ bụ nwere mmiri dị pasent ịrị itoolu na abụọ, carbohydrates dị pasent ise, protein dị pasent abụọ ma nwee abụba na-enweghị isi (tebụl)

Otu gram (3½-ounce) nke cauliflower na-enweghị isi na-enye 104 kilojoules (25 kilocalories) nke ike nri, ma nwee ọdịnaya dị elu (20% ma ọ bụ karịa nke uru kwa ụbọchị, DV) nke vitamin C (58% DV) na ọkwa dị mma nke ọtụtụ vitamin B na vitamin K (13 - 15% DV; tebụl)
Ihe dị n'ime mineral ndị dị n'ihe oriri dị ala (7% DV ma ọ bụ obere)
Cauliflower nwere ọtụtụ phytochemicals na-adịghị edozi ahụ nke a na-ahụkarị n'ezinụlọ cabbage nke nọ n'okpuru nyocha mbụ maka ihe onwunwe ha nwere ike, gụnyere isothiocyanates na glucosinolates
Ịsị ya n'ọkụ na-ebelata ọkwa nke glucosinolates cauliflower, ebe usoro isi nri ndị ọzọ, dị ka steaming, microwaving, na stir friing, enweghị mmetụta dị ịrịba ama na ọkwa glucosinolate
Enwere ike isi cauliflower, sie ya, sie ya ọkụ, sie ya n'ọkụ, sie ya mmiri, sie ya na steam, sie ya mmanụ, ma ọ bụ rie ya na-enweghị isi
Mgbe a na-esi nri, a na-ewepụkarị akwụkwọ ndị dị n'èzí na ogwe osisi ndị dị arọ, na-ahapụ naanị okooko osisi (nke a na-eri eri 'curd' ma ọ bụ 'isi')
A na-eri akwụkwọ ya ma a na-atụfu ya mgbe niile
Cauliflower bụ obere calorie, na-enweghị gluten ọzọ na osikapa na ntụ ọka
N'agbata afọ 2012 na 2016, mmepụta cauliflower na United States mụbara 63%, ahịa ngwaahịa ndị dabeere na caulifloor mụbara rụọ 71% n'agbata 2017 na 2018
A na-eme osikapa cauliflower site na ịpị okooko osisi caulifloor wee sie ya na mmanụ
A na-eji okooko osisi cauliflower emepụta mkpo pizza caulifloor ma bụrụ nke a ma ama na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ pizza
Mashed cauliflower bụ ihe ọzọ na-enweghị carbohydrate karịa nduku esuru esu
Ndị na-eme mgbakọ na mwepụ achọpụtala Cauliflower maka akụkụ ya dị iche iche, nke a gbakọrọ na ọ bụ ihe dịka 28
Otu n'ime njirimara nke cauliflower bụ na alaka ọ bụla, ma ọ bụ 'module', yiri cauliflour dum
Àgwà ọzọ, nke dịkwa na ụdị osisi ndị ọzọ, bụ na oghere dị n'etiti 'modules,' ka ha na-adịwanye anya site n'etiti, bụ 360° nkewa site na ọnụ ọgụgụ ọla edo
Asụsụ Ce (Che), Kuce (Kuche), bụ asụsụ dị mkpa na mpaghara Plateau nke Naijiria
A makwaara ya site na aha ọbọdọ yá nà Plateau State, Rukuba
Ceccy Abena Ampratwum (onye a mụrụ n'abalị iri na atọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha otutu nkwago ya bụ Ceccy Twum, bụ onye Ghana na-agụ egwu ozioma na onye na-ede egwu
A mụrụ Ceccy n'ezinụlọ Maazị na Oriakụ Andoh bi na Accra, Ghana
Ọ lụrụ onye amụma Alex Twum ma ha mụrụ ụmụaka atọ
Ceccy Twum malitere agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Don Bosco Catholic Primary na Junior high na Winneba wee gaa Snapps College maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Accra
Ceccy Twum wepụtara abọm mbụ ya Me Gyefo ne Yesu n'afọ 2005, nke mere ka ọ pụta ìhè n'akụm egwu

Ya na ọtụtụ ndị egwu ozioma, gụnyere Mercy Chinwo, Joe Mettle, Ohemaa Mercy, MOG Music, Joyce Blessing, Nathaniel Bassey, Sinach, Frank Edwards, Empress Gifty Ceccy nwere ọtụtụ egwu kporo ekpo gụnyere Victory, Di Wo Hene, Your Grace, Amen

N'afọ 2018, egwu ya bụ Jehovah nwetere ya nhọpụta ya na Vodafone Ghana Music Awards dị ka abụ Oziọma nke afọ A họpụtakwara ya na nhọpụta Artiste Of Excellence West Africa na African Music And Media Awards
Ceccy na-akwado ihe omume Oziọma kwa afọ nke akpọrọ Gold Worship nke na-achịkọta ndị kwere ekwe si n'akụkụ niile nke ndụ iji fekọọ ofufe ọnụ
Meko M'anim (2008)
Golden Oil (2013)
Cecilia Akagu bụ Brigadier General na ndị agha Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego ma na-eje ozi na Accounts Directorate of the Army
Ọ lụrụ Clifford Wande onye bụkwa Brigadier General na ndị agha Naijiria
Ha bụ di na nwunye mbụ ruru ọkwa Brigadier General na ndị agha Naijiria
Cecilia Akagu bụ nwa afọ Ankpa na Ankpa Local Government Area nke Kogi Steetị, Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego nke Finance Corp na ndị agha Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye nduzi nke Army Accounts Inspectorate
Ọ lụrụ Maazị Clifford Wanda onye bụkwa Brigadier General na ndị agha Naijiria
Maazị Clifford Wanda si n'obodo Enugu Ngwo na Enugu North Local Government Area nke Enugu State, Nigeria
Brigadier General Cecelia Akagu na Brigadier Général Clifford Wanda abụghị ndị isi mbụ lụrụ di na nwunye na ndị agha Naịjirịa
Otú ọ dị, ha bụ di na nwunye mbụ ruru ọkwa Brigadier General dị ka di na nwunye
Cecilia Akagu na Clifford Wanda zutere na 1990 n'oge ha na-agụ akwụkwọ na ndị agha Naịjirịa
N'ịbụ ndị e nyere ọrụ, ha malitere usoro ntụziaka ha na Jaji
Ha bụ ndị ibe ha n'oge ntụziaka ahụ n'agbanyeghị na Cecilia Akagu bụ Lieutenant nke abụọ na Clifford Wanda bụ Lieutenant n'oge ọmụmụ ahụ
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ, nwa nwoke na nwa nwanyị

Cecelia Tapplette Pedescleaux, nke a makwaara dị ka Cely, (amụrụ n'August 6, 1945) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-eyi akwa ọdịnala na nka, nke ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe méré eme, ndị ọzọ na-eyi uwe ndị Africa-America, na atụmatụ akwa eji eme ihe n'oge Underground Railroad iji zigara ndị ohu na-achọ nnwere onwé ozi
E gosipụtara uwe elu ya na China, France, Washington, DC, New Orleans, na ébé ndị ọzọ na United States
E gosipụtara ihe ngosi nke 75 n'ime ùwé ya na Le Musée de Free People of Color na New Orleans (2013[[2014)
Mmasị Pedescleaux nwere na nkà akwa malitere mgbè ọ bụ nwatakịrị mgbè ọ malitere ịkpa akwa na ịkpa ákwà
Na ngwụcha afọ 1960, ọ malitere ịmepụta akwa dabere na atụmatụ ọdịnala
Ka ọ na-agụ ihe osise na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ gbasara ndị ohu America, ihe osise ya ghọrọ Afro-centric

O mepụtara akwa akwa dabere na nka Africa, dị ka akwa na-egbuke egbuke, nke nwéré ihe nnọchianya Ashanti Adinkra Gye Nyame, nke pụtara 'nakwere Chineke', site na Ghana nke egosiri na ngosi Inspiration nke Don Marshall na Sara Hollis haziri na Contemporary Arts Center
Akwụkwọ ahụ, Hidden in Plain View, nke Jacqueline Tobin na Raymond G
Dobard, Jr, prọfesọ nke Mahadum Howard, na-akọwa etu esi eji akwa akwa edepụta ozi nzuzo na ụzọ ndị ohu ji agagharị n'okpuru ala
Akwụkwọ a bụ ihe na-akpali Pedescleaux, onye nyochara ihe ndị Afrịka-Amerịka na ihe ndị na-eme ka ọ dị nro na ihe ndị metụtara ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè n'okpuru ala ma mepụta ọtụtụ n'ime ihe ndị ahụ
Cecil Higgs (ubochí irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Juun 1898, Thaba Nchu, Orange Free State rụo ụbọchị irí na isii n'ọnwa Juun 1986, Cape Town, South Africa) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa
Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ na nwa nwanyị nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ ise nke Clement Higgs na nwunye ya Florence
Na 1912, nná Higgs nwụrụ mgbè ọ dị afọ irí isé
N'afọ 1916, Higgs ghọrọ ónyé bi na Wesleyan Girls' High School (nke bụzi Kingswood College) na Grahamstown
E gbùrù nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye, Clement jr, na 1916 na Agha Ụwa Mbụ
Higgs debanyere aha ya na Grahamstown School of Art na 1918, mana na 1920 ọ banyere ụgbọ mmírí gaa England ma nọrọ na mbà ọzọ ruo afọ 13
Ọ zụrụ na London na Byam Shaw School of Art, na Goldsmiths' College na, site na 1926, na Royal Academy of Arts
Otú ọ dị, a kpọrọ Higgs ka ọ laghachi South Africa n'ihi ọrịa nné ya, ónyé nwụrụ na 1934
Higgs mere ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na ụlọ nzukọ sayensị nke Mahadum Stellenbosch na 1935, na-ezute ónyé na-ese ihe Wolf Kibel na ónyé na-akpụ ihe Lippy Lipshitz
N'afọ 1938, ya na Rene Graetz, Maggie Laubser na Lippy Lipshitz mere ihe ngosi
N'afọ 1938 ọ laghachiri Paris, mana ọ hapụrụ n'ihi Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Higgs sonyeere New Group nke na-enupụ isi megide ụdị nka ọdịnala
N'afọ 1939, Higgs malitere ọbụbụenyi ndụ ya na ónyé na-ese ihe n'England bụ John Dronsfield
N'afọ 1953, o mere naanị ihe ngosi onwé ya na Orange Free State
Higgs mechara biri na Sea Point, agbanyeghị mmetụta nke oké osimiri na ihe osise ya mere ka ọ bụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'oké osimiri
N'afọ 1964, o wuru ụlọ na Onrust
E mechara chọpụta na Higgs nwere ọrịa Alzheimer, na 1984 ọ kwagara na Protea Park Nursing Home, ebe ọ nwụrụ na 16 June 1986
N'afọ 1964, e nyèrè Higgs ihe nrite ọla edo nkè Suid-Afrikaanse Akademie van Wetenskap en Kuns
Cecil Kenneth Baker (1921 rụọ ọnwa Nọvemba 1996) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nà South Africa
A mụrụ Baker nà Harfield Road, Claremont, Cape Town, South Africa, nké bụ, n'oge a mụrụ ya, ọbọdọ ndị na-arụ ọrụ
O yiri ka ọ natara afọ ole na ole nke ụlọ akwụkwọ, ma zụọ onwé ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe, mana nnà ya gbara ya ume, ónyé na-enweta ego ya dị ka ihe na-ese ụlọ
Kenneth tolitere n'okpuru mkpochapụ nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ South Africa
Ọbọdọ a mụrụ yá bụ ebumnuche nkè gọọmentị nke ógè ahụ nke iwepụ ndị mmadụ n'ike, ebe ọtụtụ puku ezinụlọ kwagara n'ebe ndị ọzọ, dabere na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ezinụlọ Baker so n'ime ndị kwagara
Kenneth lụrụ Joan, ónyé na-akọ akụkọ, ha nwere ụmụ anọ
Joan na-akọwa esemokwu dị n'etiti ihe akụ na ụba chọrọ ịzụlite ezinụlọ na ọchịchọ ya ịbụ ónyé na-ese ihe ógè niile
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya a maara na mbụ bụ dị ka onye na-ede akara na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Cape, ebe o doro anya na ọ nwetara ụfọdụ mkpali màkà isiokwu nkè ihe osise yá
Ọ nwere ụfọdụ aha ọmá n'oge ndụ ya, na-eme ihe ngosi otu nwoke na otu, mana ọ na-ere ọrụ ya na ọnụahịa dị ala, na-anụ ụtọ eziokwu ahụ bụ na nke a mere ka ọ dịkwuo mfe
Kemgbe Kenneth nwụrụ na 1996, ọrụ ya na-adọta mmasị na-arịwanye elu, ọ na-apụta n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta nka Cape
A na-akọwa ụdị ya dị ka nke na-eme ihe nkiri na nke na-egosipụta ihe
Ọ na-ese ihe osise ala, ihe nkiri ọbọdọ, ihe oyiyi na ihe ndị nwụrụ anwụ
Ọrụ ya nwere ihe dị mfe, ma na-emetụtakarị isiokwu dịka ịda ogbenye na ihe ụtọ kwa ụbọchị
O sere ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ndụ n'okporo ámá na District Six, Ọbọdọ dị n'akụkụ ọbọdọ nke na-eme ihe na nke márá mma nke ndị ọchịchị mechara bibie dị ka ọkwa ikpeazụ nke mwepụ ọzọ a manyere
A na-amata Baker dị ka otu n'ime ndị ikwu ole na ole jidere ihe nke mmụọ nke District Six na usoro okike
Enwere ike ịhụ ozi ndị ọzọ, na ihe atụ nke ọrụ ya na

Maximilian Gustav Alfred Cecil Michaelis (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1913 - nwụrụ n'ubochí atọ n'ọnwa Mee n'afo 1997), bụ onye na-ese ihe nke na-arụkwa ọrụ na iko na ceramik, na onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka nke na-agba ume ọrụ aka na imewe
Ọ bụ naanị nwa nwoke nke Sir Max Michaelis, onye South Africa randlord

A mụrụ Cecil Michaelis na Cabourg, France, n'afọ 1913, nwa Sir Max Michaelis, nwa amaala Britain nke German-Jewish extraction bụ onye Randlord na South Africa, na Lady Lillian Elizabeth Michaelis ( ? - rụọ afọ 1969, London)
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ruskin School of Drawing and Fine Art na Oxford, wee kwaga Paris ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Henri Dimier na Othon Friesz, Georges Rouault na André Derain nyekwara ya ndụmọdụ
Ọ bụ ezie na akụ na ụba ezinụlọ ya gbochiri ọrụ iwu, Michaelis rụrụ ọrụ n'enweghị ike na nka ya, eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ ógè ọ na-ekewa mgbe ya n'etiti France, South Africa na Great Britain
N'afọ 1935 Sir Max Michaelis zụtara Rycote Park dị nso na Thame na Oxfordshire, n'ihe banyere ojiji Cecil mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Ruskin School of Drawing and Fine Art na Oxford
Ọ nọgidere bụrụ otu n'ime ebe obibi ya ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Otu n'ime ihe ndị pụrụ iche nke Michaelis bụ ịme teapot, ọkachasị na mgbochi mmiri
Ógè ọ na-eje ozi na ndị agha Britain na Sicily, ọ bụ onye ama ama màkà ịme ma na-akụzi imepụta teapots
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ebe site n'afọ 1940 ruo afọ 1980 na Paris, New York na London
N'ọgwụgwụ afọ 1930 ọrụ ebere ya guzobere Rycotewood College na obodo dị nso nke Thame dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ raara onwe ya nye ịzụlite ndị omenkà nwere nkà
N'afọ 2003, ọ jikọtara ya na Oxford City College na Rycote Furniture Centre ọmụmụ kwagara n'okporo ụzọ Oxpens
N'afọ 1988, o nyere akụkụ nke ala ya na Cape Town na Mahadum nke Cape Town iji guzobe
Cecile Cilliers (Mee 24, 1933 - June 16, 2018) bụ onye odeakụkọ na onye ode akwụkwọ nweere onwe ya
Onye edemede Madeleine van Biljon bụ nwanne ya nwanyị
A na-amakarị ya maka edemede ya, ma bipụtakwara n'etiti ndị ọzọ mkpokọta ụmụaka na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ okpukperechi
O tinyere aka na NG Kerk ma bụrụ nwanyị mbụ na-abụghị onye ozi a họpụtara osote onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Sinodal
Na mgbakwunye na arụmọrụ ya nke Christian Network Television's Program Focus Point, o gosikwara mmemme telivishọn Boeksusters na KykNET ya na nwanne ya nwanyị, Madeleine van Biljon
A mụrụ Anneke Cecile Pretorius na Franschhoek n'afọ 1933 dị ka ọdụdụ nke abụọ n'ime ụmụaka anọ
Onye edemede a ma ama bụ Madeleine van Biljon bụ otu n'ime ụmụnne ya nwanyị
O nwere nwanne nwanyị ọzọ, Rouxline (nke a na-akpọkwa Polla), na nwanne, Nicholas
Abraham Johannes (Braam) Pretorius, nna ya (amụrụ 10 Mee 1900 na Rustenburg, bụ onye odeakwụkwọ n'ụlọ ọrụ majistrate, nne ya bụ Madeleine Roux
Nna ya bụ onye omebe iwu na onye ọka ikpe kacha ogologo na South Africa
N'ihi ọrụ ya dị ka onye ọka iwu, ezinụlọ ahụ na-akwagharị ọtụtụ ebe
Cilliers malitere akwụkwọ ya na Paarl, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ gara Johannesburg na Jan Celliers Primary School
Ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya bụ na Montagu, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ
Mgbe afọ matric gasịrị, a kpọgara nna ya na Johannesburg wee debanye aha ya maka akwụkwọ odeakwụkwọ na Technical College
Agbanyeghị, ọ chọpụtara na nke a agaghị enye ya ọmarịcha ọrụ otu afọ gachara na Mahadum Pretoria ebe ọ nwetara nzere BA na Africaans-Dutch, Bekee, German, French and Art History dị ka isiokwu
Ndị otu Tuks Alumni Association kwanyere ya ugwu n'afọ 2011 site na onyinye Laureate
Ọ bụkwa nwa amaala ugwu nke Biesies Valley na Northern Cape
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ndị a
Lolo Cecilia Ezeilo bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, onye ọka iwu, onye ọrụ ebere na onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn, onye jere ozi dị ka osote Gọvanọ nke Enugwu Steeti kemgbe afọ 2015
A họpụtara ya nke mbụ na Mgbakọ Steeti Enugwu n'afọ 2011, na-anọchite anya mpaghara Ezeagu
Cecilia Francis (amuru 17 Septemba 1996) bu onye oso Naijiria nke nwere okachasi n'agba 100m, 200m na 4 x 100 mita
Cecilia nwetara ọla edo n'akụkụ Blessing Okagbare, Lawretta Ozoh na Ngozi Onwumere na ọsọ 4 x 100 mita relay na asọmpi Africa niile nke afọ 2015 na Brazzaville, Congo
Ọ nọchikwara anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi egwuregwu ụwa nke afọ 2015 na Beijing, China
Francis nwalere ihe nti ule maka anabolic steroid metenolone na 2013 African Youth Athletics Championship, dị ka onye dị afọ 16
E nyere ya iwu machibido egwuregwu otu afọ mgbe ya na ndị ọchịchị gbakọrọ aka na nyocha
Ndị otu egwuregwu Naịjirịa machiri onye nkuzi ya Abass Rauf maka ndụ, ma Lee Evans nwetara mmachi afọ anọ
Cecilia Ibru (amụrụ 22 Maachị n'afo 1946) bụ onye bụbu onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi ọrụ nke Oceanic Bank
Ibru bidoro oru ya na ndi Ibru Organization
N'afọ 2009, e jidere ya ma kweta ikpe ebubo aghụghọ
A tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ma maa ya ikpe ihe ruru otu ijeri euro
Di ya nwụrụ, Michael Ibru nwụrụ na Septemba n'afọ 2016

Ọkpara Edward na Victoria Sido, Ibru gụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ Grammar nke Saint Margaret na Ilesa site na n'afọ 1960 ruo n'afo 1965 wee gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Tutorial College dị na London site n'afọ 1967 ruo n'afọ 1968
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum London n'afọ 1971 na BS na sociology
Ibru gbasoro akwukwo omumu ya na mahadum ma nweta Masters of Philosophy nke School of Oriental and African Studies n'afọ 1977
N'afọ 1978, Ibru sonyeere Ibru Organization dika onye isi oru onye nduzi
Mgbe afọ abụọ rụchara ọrụ a, Ibru gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi ego mba ụwa, ọkwá ọ nọrọ ruo n'afọ 1990
Ibru bidoro ịrụ ọrụ na Oceanic Bank n'afọ 1990 dịka onye isi njikwa
Mgbe ya na Oceanic nọrọ afọ asaa, e buliri ya n’ọkwa onye isi ọrụ
Oceanic bidoro dị ka obere ụlọ akụ ezinụlọ nwere, mana o toro n'otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa kachasị na-ekwu okwu n'ihu ọha n'oge nlekọta Ibru
N'ọnwa asatọ iri na atọ n'afọ 2009 Ibru so na otu onye isi ụlọ akụ ise CEOs ndị a chụrụ
Mmadụ ise ndị gbanwere aha ya bụ Central Bank of Nigeria
Osote gọvanọ, Sarah Alade, kwupụtara na John Aloh ga-anọchi Ibru na Oceanic
Ndị ọzọ gbanwere n'otu ụbọchị ahụ gụnyere onye isi oche nke Union Bank of Nigeria, Dr
Bath Ebong, onye nọchiri ya Olufunke Iyabo Osibodu
Ibru pụtara n'ụlọ ikpe tinyere ndị isi ụlọ akụ atọ ọzọ na Naịjịrịa
Ha niile gọrọ ebubo eboro ha na ha tinyere aka n'ọgbaaghara ijeri kwuru ijeri ego
A mara ya ikpe na 8 Ọktoba n'afọ 2010 na ikpe 25 nke aghụghọ ma nye iwu ka ọ kwụghachi 129bn (ihe dị ka otu ijeri Euro, ma nye ya iwu ịga mkpọrọ ọnwa isii
Ndị uweojii na-ahụ maka nrụrụ aka wetara ebubo mpụ megide ndị isi si n'ụlọ akụ ise napụtara na ego 400bn naira ($ 26bn; £ 16bn) mgbapụta gọọmentị
Achọpụtara na ụlọ akụ niile nwere ego dị ala n'ihi mgbazinye ego na-adịghị mma
Ibru agbatịgo ụlọ ọrụ kredit nke ijeri NAIRA iri na isii na ụlọ ọrụ na-enweghị nkwado
Lọ ikpe ahụ napụrụ ya ihe karịrị otu narị ihe onwunwe dị na Naijiria, Dubai na United Steeti
Ibru kere Michael na Cecilia Ibru Foundation n'afọ 2006, nke na-enye ego iji kwado ọrụ aka, nlekọta ndị agadi, mmemme ahụike, mgbochi ọrịa, na mmepụta nri
Cecilia Johnson bụ nwanyị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Kansụl steeti Ghana
Ọ bụbu odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke 31 Disemba Women's Movement nakwa Minista nke Gọọmentị Obodo Ghana
Cecilia Ngibo Nku (a mụrụ n'abalị́ iri abụo na isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1992) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara Rivers Angels nke Nigerian Women's Championship bọọlụ
Nku gbara egwuregwu mbụ ya na mba ụwa n'afọ 2010 mgbe ọ na-agbara Naịjirịa bọọlụ na 2010 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
O so na ndị isi otu Naịjirịa nke meriri na 2014 African Women's Championship na Namibia
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2015, a kpọrọ Nku ka ọ gbaa bọọlụ maka otu Naịjirịa na 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup
Cecilia Oba Tito bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onyeisi obodo Yei na South Sudan
A họpụtara Oba n'afọ 2013, e gburu ya n'otu ogbugbu na 9 Nọvemba 2014
N'afọ 1974, a mụrụ Oba na Morsak Village, Yei, dịka onye otu agbụrụ Kakwa
Site na 1981 ruo 1987, Oba gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Kagelu
Site na 1987 ruo 1991, ọ gara Yei Girl's Secondary School, mana ọ kwagara Uganda n'ihi agha, na-aga Nyangilia Secondary School na West Nile
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1994, Oba mere usoro mmepe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya maka otu afọ na Nsameji National Institute
Oba jere ozi dị ka minista nke steeti Central Equatoria maka ihe gbasara kansụl
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya National Assembly of Sudan, o tinyere aka n'ịdepụta Iwu South Sudan
A họpụtara Oba dị ka onye isi obodo n'afọ 2013 ma chụpụ ya n'ọkwa ahụ na Septemba 2014
E gburu Oba na onye njikwa ụlọ ọrụ ya Emmanuel Lemi na 9 Nọvemba 2014 na Jebel, mgbe ọ dị afọ 40
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba, e jidere mmadụ anọ n'ihe metụtara igbu ọchụ abụọ ahụ
Gọọmentị kwuru na Nọvemba 2015 na nyocha na-aga n'ihu
Oba bụ Onye Kraịst
Ọ kwadoro ikike agụmakwụkwọ maka ụmụ nwanyị
Cecilia Barbara Atim Ogwal (amụrụ na onwa 12 June na afọ 1946) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, nwanyị ọchụnta ego na onye ndụmọdụ nchịkwa
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu maka Dokolo District Women's Constituency
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Uganda kemgbe na afọ 1996
A mụrụ Ogwal na Dokolo District, Northern Uganda, na onwa 12 June nke afọ I 1946
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Uganda
N'afọ 1967, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu, a nabatara ya na Mahadum nke East Africa na Nairobi (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Mahadum Nairobi) iji mụọ maka nzere Bachelor of Commerce
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Nairobi na afọ 1970
O nwekwara asambodo na Human Resources Management site na ihe a na-akpọ Institute of Public Administration, mana a maara ya ugbu a dị ka Uganda Management Institute
O nwere asambodo abụọ ọzọ; otu na Christian Based Values site na Haggai Institute, Singapore, na nke ọzọ na Public Private Partnership, site na Australia
Site na 1979 ruo 1980, Ogwal rụrụ ọrụ na Uganda Embassy na Kenya, dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na-alaghachi
Site na afọ 1980 ruo na afọ 1981, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa ọrụ na Uganda Advisory Board of Trade
N'afọ 1982, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere ụlọ akụ ego, na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ ruo n'afọ 1984
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Uganda Development Bank, site na afọ 1981 ruo na afọ 1986
Ọ banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, na-eje ozi dị ka onye na-anọchite anya odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Uganda People's Congress (UPC) site na 1985 ruo 1992
N'afọ 1994, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omebe iwu nke dere ma kwupụta Iwu Iwu Ugandan nke 1995
Ọ nọgidere bụrụ onye ọrụ dị elu na pati ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị UPC ruo n'afọ 2004
N'oge ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2006, Jimmy Akena, nwa onye guzobere UPC Milton Obote, tụfuru oche Lira Municipality ya
N'afọ 2011, Ogwal sonyere ma merie oche onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka mpaghara Dokolo nke e mepụtara ọhụrụ
N'oge a, ọ gbanwere òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị wee gbaa ọsọ dị ka onye otu Forum for Democratic Change
Ogwal bụ nwanyị lụrụ di nke nwere ụmụ asaa na ọtụtụ ndị nkuchi
N'afọ 1969, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na atọ, ọ meriri asọmpi 'Miss Uganda'
Ogwal bụ onye otu Kọmitii nke Physical Infrastructure nke na-ahụ maka nlekọta na ikpuchi ihe gbasara iwu metụtara ala, ụlọ, mmepe obodo, ọrụ na njem, na atụmatụ anụ ahụ
Ọ bụkwa onye otu kọmitii mmefu ego
A mụrụ ya na New York, nne na nna bu ndi Naijiria
O sonyere na 2017 Afrobasket nke umu nwanyị
ọ nyere 4pts, 24rebounds na 0,5 na-enye aka maka egwuregwu ọ bụla n'oge asọmpi maka D'Tigress
Ndị otu ahụ meriri Gold na asọmpi ahụ
Ọ gbara bọọlụ basketball nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa nke lagos a makwaara dị ka Elephant Girls n'oge 2017 FIBA Africa Mmeri iko maka ụmụ nwanyị asọmpi na Angola
Asọmpi a mere n’abalị 10–19 Nọvemba, ebe asọmpi Spanish amalitebeghị
O were 103pts, 53 rebounds na 1 na-enyere aka egwuregwu ọ bụla n'oge asọmpi ahụ
Cecilia Prugna (amụrụ n'abali asaa nke onwa Nọvemba afọ 1997) bụ onye Ịtali na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-anọ n'etiti(midfielder) Empoli na ndị otu mba Ịtali
N'abalị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2021, Prugna megharịrị nkwekọrịta ya na Empoli, nke edebere ya na klọb ahụ n'ihioge asọmpi nke afọ 2021 na 22
Prugna gbara bọọlụ mbụ ya nye ndị otu mba Ịtali n'abalị iri nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 2021, nke ọ batara dị ka onye nnọchiteanya Melissa Bellucci na egwuregwu megide Iceland
Cecily Bourchier Norden (née Bowker) (23 Disemba 1918 - 27 Ọgọst 2011) bụ odee, onye ọka ikpe n'ịnyịnya, onye mmeri na onye ngosi na onye na -azụ stud
A maara ya maka ntinye aka ya na ụlọ ọrụ ịnya ịnyịnya na South Africa
A mụrụ Norden na Grahamstown, South Africa, na 23 Disemba 1918
Ọ bụ naanị nwa nwanyị nke nwụrụ anwụ Dr Thomas Bourchier Bowker, onye otu nzuko omeiwu nke Albany site na 1936 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1964

Enyere ya Dọkịta Iwu Iwu site na Mahadum Rhodes na 1963/1964 maka ọrụ ya karịrị afọ iri abụo na ịse na mmalite nke Orange na Fish River Water Scheme na ụlọ nke Gariep Dam ; ọrụ ya dị ka onye guzobere 1820 Settlers National Monument Concept; na ọrụ ya n'ịkwado akwụkwọ iwu Mahadum Rhodes site na nzuko omeiwu

Nne Cecily bụ Gladys Elaine Bowker nwụrụ anwụ (née Hart), nwa nwa Robert Hart II, onye nchoputa na onye isi ochie nke Somerset East, Eastern Cape, na onye enyemaka ama ama nke ndị ọbịa 1820 n'oge afọ nsogbu ha
Gladys bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Rhodes na Grahamstown, na nzere BA/BSc jikọtara ọnụ

Cecily na ụmụnne ya nwoke abụọ, John na Hubert, tolitere na ugbo Glen Ovis na Signal Hill, nke dị na Great Fish River Valley, kilomita ịrị atọ na isii n'ebe ugwu nke Grahamstown, ebe ha na Merino atụrụ, Blackhead Persians, Holstein ehi, Ịnyịnya Arab na enyi nnụnụ
Cecily malitere ịnya ụgbọ ala mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ ma na-ede akụkọ kemgbe ọ dị afọ asaa

Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na nke mbụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abuo na Diocesan School for Girls (DSG) na Grahamstown ebe ọ na-egwu egwuregwu mbụ nke egwuregwu niile enyere, ma mesịa nweta Tenis Agba ya na Mahadum Rhodes
Ọ nwetara akwụkwọ ikike nnabata kacha elu nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Grahamstown jikọtara ọnụ n'afọ 1936
Na Mahadum Rhodes ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Bekee (Distinction) na Fine Art (1937-1940), wee nweta UED ya
Ọ kuziri bekee na Port Elizabeth kọleji nka
Ọ lụrụ Jack Norden (1941–1954) ma nwee ụmụ atọ, ụmụ ụmụ ise na ụmụ ụmụ abụọ

O biri afọ iri ịse na Middelburg, Eastern Cape, district na obodo, ebe ọ jere ozi na Council Town, Anglican Church Council, Midlands' Farmers' Association (Honorary Secretary), egwuregwu Union (Onye njikwa) na ọtụtụ kansụl maka dị iche iche
ụdị inyinya na ikpe inyinya mba, na otu maka ngalaba nke Saddle Horse Industry
O nweela ọtụtụ narị akụkọ ka ebipụtara n'ihe gbasara ịzụ ịnyịnya na ihe ndị ọzọ gbasara ọrụ ugbo na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Ọ na-agụkarị nkuzi na redio, ma dee ma gosipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ teknụzụ na ụmụaka
Akwukwo ya kacha mara amara bu Igosi inyinya na South Africa, mbipụta nke mbụ na nke abụọ (1971 na 1980)
Ọ bụ onye equitation na show onye na-agba ịnyịnya na ịzụ ịnyịnya
O nwere Maastricht Arabian Horse Stud na mpaghara Albany nke edebara aha ya na otu Ndị na-agba ịnyịnya breeders nke South Africa
N'oge a, o nwere ihe ùgwù iji sire Arabia a ma ama, Jiddan, mee ndị nne ya
Enwere ike ị nweta nkọwapụta n'igosi inyinya na South Africa Mbipụta nke abụọ, Isi nke XIV
Mgbe ọ kwagara n'Ugbo Oranje, na mpaghara Middelburg, n'afọ 1950 ọ zụtara stud stallion Boaz, onye Arabian dị ọcha nke si England butere
N'afọ 1953 ọ meriri Victor Ludorum maka isi ihe kachasị na National Arabian Horse Championship nke South Africa nke e mere n'afọ ahụ na Middelburg
Na Oranje, ọ zụlitekwara ọtụtụ onye mmeri SA Saddle Horses na Boerperde bụ ndị meriri na ihe ngosi asọmpi mba ha
Ọ nwụrụ na Port Alfred na 27 Ọgọst 2011 - rụtụ aka na akwụkwọ akụkọ 'Talk of the Town' nke dị na 30 Septemba 2011

Middelburg, Eastern Cape, South Africa na 27 Eprel 2002 na ụmụ amaala ya abụọ, Oriakụ Cecily Norden na Mazị Pietie Joubert, bụ ndị Saddle Horse Breeders' Society of South Africa họpụtara, sitere na South Africa dum, ka ha nata ọkwa Onye isi ala
Ihe nrite maka ọrụ pụtara ìhè maka mmepe ụlọ ọrụ Saddle Horse nke South Africa
Nke a bụ oge mbụ enyere onyinye a
Mmadụ anọ n'ime ndị ha na ha dịkọrọ ndụ sitere na mpaghara ndị ọzọ nwetakwara ihe nrite a

Saddle Horse Breeders' Society of South Africa hụrụ mmalite ya na ịrị abụọ na atọ Nọvemba 1942 n'okpuru aha ogologo nke gụnyere ụdị ịnyịnya ndị ọzọ na-agba, yana ihe a na-akpọ oge ahụ dị ka American Saddle Horses
Ugbu a ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ ọtụtụ nde dollar jikọtara na South African Stud Book Association na ọ na-ebubata narị narị Saddle Horses na America ma na-ebupụ ndị Saddlers nke ọkwa mmeri ụwa na United States
Enwere njikọ siri ike n'etiti mba abụọ ahụ na ndị na-azụ anụ, ndị na-enye ọzụzụ na ndị ikpe ịnyịnya na-eme mgbanwe mgbe niile

Cecily Norden so na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'afọ ndị tolitere n'ịkwalite ụlọ ọrụ Saddle Horse na South Africa, na-eje ozi na Kọmitii Executive dị iche iche na Họrọ Kọmitii Na-arụ ọrụ site n'afọ 1942 ruo afọ 1983, yana ịbụ onye na-azụ anụ ma na-egosipụta onwe ya ịnya ịnyịnya na mba niile na Ịnyịnya Saddle, Boerperd, Arab na Equitation klaasị

Ọ ruru eru dị ka a Senior Onyeikpe nke Saddle Horses, Boerperde, Palominos, Arabian inyinya, Welsh Ponies na Equitation, na ekpe ikpe na National Breed Championships maka ndị a niile udiri anumanu, nakwa dị ka ikpe na mpaghara na-egosi maka niile ụdị n'oge dum oge mgbe afọ 1942 ka
O nwere ihe dị iche nke ịbụ onye ikpe nwanyị mbụ ga-ekpe ikpe na National Saddle Horse Championship na Bloemfontein, South Africa (1968)

Cecily Norden na onye nwụrụ anwụ WJ van der Merwe rụrụ ọrụ ọnụ dị ka otu, dị ka Honorary Secretary na onyeisi oche-cum-President n'otu n'otu, site n'afọ 1945 ruo mgbe ha lara ezumike nká n'afọ 1983, na-adịghị mebiri emebi usoro nke oru ngo n'ime afọ iri anọ
Onye isi n'ime ọrụ ndị a, na mgbakwunye na ikpe ikpe na ihe ngosi na nyocha nke ịnyịnya na igosipụta onwe ya na ihe ngosi obodo niile, gụnyere ihe ndị a

Otu n'ime ihe dị ịrịba ama na mmepe nke ụlọ ọrụ ịzụ ahịa ịzụ ahịa na South Africa bụ ọrụ n'afọ 948 mgbe Cecily Norden na WJ van der Merwe họpụtara dị ka Kọmitii Nhọrọ maka ịhazi nkewa nke ụdị dị iche iche, nke kachasị mkpa bụ ndị na-azụ anụ Saddle Horse Breeders
' Society of South Africa

Ha n'onwe ha mere nyocha na akwụkwọ niile nke iwu ọmụmụ, iwu iwu, ụkpụrụ nke nkwekọrịta, ụkpụrụ na usoro nyocha nke ụdị ọkụ ugbu a, maka oge mbụ, kewara n'ime Saddle Horses, Boerperde, Arabians na Thoroughbred Hacks
A ga-ekpezi ụdị ndị a ikpe na klaasị dị iche iche na mgbanaka ngosi ahụ, yana iwu na ụkpụrụ siri ike nke ụdị ha

Nke a ga-ahụ na enwere ike idowe ịdị ọcha nke ụdị na ụdị agwa ma debanye aha ya n'akwụkwọ iwu, onye ọ bụla n'ime otu Breed Society nke ya, n'okpuru nche anwụ nke ndị nne, Ndị na-agba ịnyịnya breeders nke South Africa
(Emere Nzukọ Nzụkọ niile n'ọnụ ụlọ oche dị elu nke ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Azụmahịa ochie na Middelburg, n'igwe ojii nke anwụrụ sịga

Cecily Norden na WJ van der Merwe bụ odeakwụkwọ na onye isi oche nke Society ọhụrụ a malitere ọhụrụ, na, n'ime afọ ndị a, mgbasa ozi buru ibu mere ka ọ pụta ìhè na Middelburg District ghọrọ ebe etiti Arab Horse Breeding na South Africa, ebe obibi nke nnukwu ụlọ ahịa Arabian na-ebubata, gụnyere Isi iyi isi sire, Jiddan, onye ụmụ ya, tumadi mares, hiwere ndabere nke ọtụtụ studs n'ihi na ha ukwuu prepotency

WJ van der Merwe na Cecily Norden webatara wee hazie echiche ọhụrụ, nke Asọmpi Udiri Mba maka inyinya nwere ụkwụ ọkụ (nke mbụ emere na South Africa) - onye butere asọmpi ịnyịnya Saddle nke South Africa ugbu a
A na-eme ya ugbu a na Bloemfontein kemgbe afọ 1962

A na-enwe asọmpi mbụ nke afọ ọ bụla na Middelburg Cape Show, nke kwadoro eziokwu ahụ bụ Cecily Norden na WJ van der Merwe bụ odeakwụkwọ na onyeisi oche nke ihe ngosi a ruo afọ iri na abụọ, bụ nke kpuchiri oge mgbanwe a
Cecily Norden na WJ van der Merwe, dị ka odeakwụkwọ na onyeisi oche, meghere ọha mmadụ abụọ ọhụrụ ma guzobe kọmitii ha

Ewebatara ndị a n'ime otu Riding Horse Breeders' Society of South Africa nke kansụl Cecily Norden na WJ van der Merwe jere ozi, na n'okpuru ọkọlọtọ nke otu Saddle Horse Breeders' Society na-eto eto na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a
Otu ọhụrụ abụọ a rụrụ ọrụ n'okpuru ndị isi oche na kọmitii nke ha

Ihe ọzọ dị mkpa dị mkpa n'ịkwado ụlọ ọrụ Saddle Horse, na ịkwalite iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe na arụmọrụ, bụ imepụta otu ndị ọka ikpe nke South Africa n'okpuru nduzi mmalite nke WJ van der Merwe na Cecily Norden na 1965
Ha jere ozi dịka onyeisi oche na odeakwụkwọ nke otu a site na 1965 ruo mgbe ha lara ezumike nká na 1983

E hiwere nke a na WJ van der Merwe na Cecily Norden dị ka onyeisi oche mbụ na odeakwụkwọ, nke nwere usoro iwu nke ya, ụkpụrụ, usoro ọmụmụ dị mkpirikpi na ule, iji nyere ndị ọkàikpe aka na ihe ngosi ịnyịnya ugbo na-arụ ọrụ ha, yana kansụl nke ya, na-adabere na ndị ikpe
' Association

Tọrọ ntọala 23 Nọvemba 1942, ọ mechara bụrụ ndị otu Riding Horse Breeders' Society of South Africa (ederede edegharịrị na 1949 na 1957) nke kansụl WJ van der Merwe na Cecily Norden jere ozi, na n'okpuru nkwado ha nwere ike ịmalite na itinye ya
nkewa ọhụrụ na echiche dị iche iche site na nkwado nke Council, bụ ndị otu ya sitere na ndị na-azụ anụ nke ụdị ịnyịnya niile nwere njikọ

N'oge a nke mmepe dị mkpa nke Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, Onye isi oche nke ndị na-agba ịnyịnya na-azụ anụ bụ Mr Charl van den Heever, na onyeisi oche nke Saddle Horse Breeders' Society bụ Mr Hermann de Witt nke Beaufort West
Ndị odeakwụkwọ bụ Oriakụ Christine Sieberhagen na Mr Aubrey Richardson

WJ van der Merwe na Cecily Norden, dị ka onyeisi oche na odeakwụkwọ n'otu n'otu, haziri kwa afọ mkpụmkpụ ọmụmụ na ule (25 ederede na bara uru akwụkwọ na-ekpuchi ụdị nile, oche oche equitation wdg) iji tozuo Senior na Junior Judges, na-ebu nnukwu akụkụ nke nkuzi, na nhazi na akara ule

N'ime ọrụ ndị a, yana nhazi nke mkparịta ụka mgbe niile, otu kọmitii na-eguzosi ike n'ihe nke ndị na-azụ anụ, gụnyere Charl van den Heever na Aubrey Richardson na ndị isi nke ngalaba ndị ọzọ kwadoro ha

WJ van der Merwe, Cecily Norden na Aubrey Richardson (dị ka Tabulator) sụrụ ụzọ usoro ikpe atọ maka Saddle Horses na Middelburg Cape Regional Saddle Horse Championship, nke dugara na Hi-Low Sistemụ na-eji ugbu a
Òtù Ndị Ikpe kere ụdị ọchịchọ ahụ maka ịmata ihe nke na a kpọrọ akwụkwọ Iwu Iwu nke e sere onyinyo ya, n'afọ 1971 e bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ banyere ịnyịnya ikpe a ga-ebipụta na South Africa

Nke Cecily Norden dere, jiri nnukwu ntinye sitere na WJ van der Merwe, na nkwado raara onwe ya nye site na kọmitii niile dị mkpa nke Ndị na-agba ịnyịnya breeders, na karịsịa otu ndi Saddle Horse, nke nyekwara nkwado nke ndị mbipụta chọrọ
Cecily Norden rere mbipụta ahụ, a na-akwụghachikwa ego nkwado ahụ ngwa ngwa ka ahịa na-abawanye ma rere mbipụta ahụ
(Ndị mbipụta Bumley's, Port Elizabeth)
Ndị Tafelberg bipụtara mbipụta nke abụọ nke Showing Horses in South Africa Revised and Enlarged
Nke a bụ mbipụta sara mbara karị
Akwụkwọ abụọ a jere ozi iji weta njikọta n'ime ụlọ ọrụ Saddle Horse Breeding Industry, na iji kwado ikpe ikpe, nlekọta, ngosi na ihe ngosi
Ndị na-azụ ịnyịnya na ndị na-anụ ọkụ n'obi na-agụ ha nke ọma ma na-achọ ya na England na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na ebe nchekwa na USA
Cecily Norden na 1948

Cecily Norden bipụtara akụkọ ihe osise na Farmers Weekly (SA), Landbou Weekblad, SA Saddle Horse na ndị ọzọ Horse Journals na South Afriika na esenidụt, na ozuzu, ụkpụrụ nke conformation, ugbo, ụkpụrụ, ngosi, ikpe ikpe, equitation na mmepe nke Saddle
Ịnyịnya na ụdị anụ ọhịa ndị ọzọ na-agba ịnyịnya, ndị otu Ndị na-agba ịnyịnya breeders ndị South Africa kwadoro
Ndị a na-apụta mgbe niile, dị ka mgbasa ozi redio na ngalaba niile nke ịzụ ịnyịnya, na akụkọ mgbasa ozi mgbe niile na akwụkwọ akụkọ
Ebipụtakwara akwụkwọ abụọ ndị ọzọ dị obere
WJ (Willie) van der Merwe lara ezumike nká n'afọ 1983 n'ihi ọrịa na-arịwanye elu
Àgwà ya, iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe ya, onyinye ya maka ịnụ ọkụ n'obi na-akpali akpali, ịdọ aka ná ntị ya, amamihe ya, nghọta na nghọta doro anya nke echiche nyere aka n'ọchịchị ya dị ike
Achọpụtara m na ọ gaghị ekwe m omume ịnọ naanị m ma lara ezumike nká
Mgbe mmadụ na-adọkpụ ụgbọ ala dị ka ụzọ abụọ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri ịse, ọ nweghị ihe mkpali ma ọ bụ ike ime ya naanị ya
Mmadụ chọrọ ikuku n'okpuru nku ya' Cecily Norden
WJ Van der Merwe nwụrụ na Middelburg n'afọ 1995, ya na Cecily Norden nọ n'akụkụ ya
N'afọ 2009 Cecily Norden bi na Port Alfred na Eastern Cape, ya na ezinụlọ ya, na nso nso a mere ememe ụbọchị ọmụmụ 90th ya
Ọ na-ede akwụkwọ kwa ụbọchị, na-elekwasị anya na akụkọ ifo na akwụkwọ ụmụaka maka ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ ụmụ ya na-abawanye ụba
Na December 2010, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu na abụọ Cecily Norden nwere ỤBỌCHỊ ỤTỤ Ụtọ, akwụkwọ nke obere akụkọ banyere ndụ na tolite na Karoo, nke e bipụtara na nzuzo
Ọ banyela na mbipụta ya nke abụọ
Akwụkwọ nkeonwe, nkuzi, leta, foto na ndetu nke Cecily Norden, nwere ikike
