Cecily Sash (1924/1925 -2019) bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye na-emepụta ihe, na onye nkuzi na South Africa
Ọ kụziri nka imepụta ihe na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ
A mụrụ Cecily Sash n'afọ 1924 ma ọ bụ 1925 na Delmas, obere obodo dị na Transvaal, Union of South Africa nye nne na nna Bessie (née Liverman) na Max Sash
Site n'afọ 1943 ruo 1946, ọ gụrụ nka na Witwatersrand Technical College Art School na Johannesburg, na-amụ ihe n'okpuru Maurice van Essche
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Chelsea Polytechnic (nke bụzi Chelsea College of Arts) na London, n'okpuru Henry Moore; na Camberwell School of Art (nke bụ ugbu a Camberwell College of Art) na Victor Pasmore
N'afọ 1954, Sash nwetara akara ugo mmụta ya na Mahadum Witwatersrand
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ kụziri obere oge na Jeppe Girls São High School na Johannesburg
N'oge na-adịghị anya ọ malitere ịkụzi na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, ebe ọ nọgidere ruo n'afọ 1970
N'afọ 1965, e nyere ya onyinye Oppenheimer iji gaa n'ihu na-amụ agụmakwụkwọ nka na Britain na United States
N'afọ 1974, ọ kwagara Britain, ebe ọ biri na Welsh Marches
Sash bụ onye na-ese ihe, mana o jikwa mosaic na tapestries wee rụọ ọrụ
Ihe osise ya nwere oge dị iche iche nke gụnyere otu nke abstraction, na otu nke gburugburu ebe obibi
Sash sere ọtụtụ mgbidi South Africa nke e nyere iwu, nke gụnyere na ụlọ nchịkwa mpaghara Transvaal na Pretoria; Mahadum nke Witwatersrand; na Transvaal Institute of Architects
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị Amadlozi Group guzobere na 1961, nke gụnyere Cecil Skotnes, Edoardo Villa, Guiseppe Cattaneo, na Sydney Kumalo
A na-eji aha ahụ (Zulu nna nna ochie) mee ihe maka iji mara omenala ihe osise nke Afrịka
N'afọ 1965, a gụnyere Sash na ihe ngosi nke ndị na-ese ihe na South Africa na Grosvenor Gallery na London
Sash nwụrụ na 2019, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri itoolu na anọ
Cedric Nunn (amụrụ n'afọ 1957) bụ onye na-ese foto na South Africa nke a maara nke ọma maka foto ya na-egosi mba ahụ tupu na mgbe njedebe nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
A mụrụ Nunn n'ezinụlọ agbụrụ dị iche iche na Nongoma, KwaZulu, n'afọ 1957
A zụlitere ya na Hluhluwe, Mangete na Baynesfield
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Ixopo KwaZulu-Natal ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
Ọ kwagara Johannesburg n'afọ 1982 wee malite ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na ise
Nunn ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị na-ese foto a ma ama iji dekọọ nguzogide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'afọ ndi 1980s
Ọ gara n'ihu soro guzobe Afrapix, otu ndị na-ese foto nke na-enye akwụkwọ akụkọ na mpụga South Africa
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị a nwere foto nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, ya na Paul Weinberg, Peter Mackenzie na Omar Badsha
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi maka Market Photo Workshop, ụlọ akwụkwọ foto, gallery, na oghere ọrụ na Johannesburg, site na 1998 ruo 2000
Nunn bụkwa onye otu ndị isi nke ndị ọkachamara na-ese foto nke South Africa (PPSA)
Nunn arụwo ọrụ maka ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na-anaghi achọ uru, akwụkwọ akụkọ, ụlọ ọrụ waya, ụlọ ọrụ PR, na magazin
Ọ kụziri na Tisch School of the Arts na Mahadum New York, Mahadum nke Witwatersrand Wits School of Arts, na The School for International Training
N'afọ 2012, Nunn bipụtara akwụkwọ foto Cedric Nunn Call and Response
Akwụkwọ ahụ sonyeere ihe ngosi nke otu aha ahụ nke meghere na Mozambique, New York, na ụlọ ngosi dị iche iche na South Africa na Germany
Ihe ndị na-esonụ bụ edemede foto nke Nunn
Cedric Smith bụ onye America na-ese ihe
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na 2003 na McColl Center for Visual Art na Charlotte, North Carolina
A mụrụ Smith na Philadelphia na 1970 ma too na Thomaston, Georgia, ebe ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara mgbè ọ bụ nwata nwoke
Ọ bi na Macon, Georgia ugbu a
Ihe ngosi ngosi mbụ ya bụ na Barbara Archer Gallery na Atlanta
A tọhapụrụ isii n'ime foto ya dị ka posters site n'aka ónyé na-ebipụta Image Conscious nkè San Francisco
Celeste O'Connor (a mụrụ na Disemba 2, 1998) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri America amụrụ na Kenya
A maara ha maka igwu egwu Paloma Davis na ihe nkiri mbụ Amazon, Selah and the Spades
A mụrụ Celeste O'Connor na Disemba 2, n'afọ 1998, na Nairobi, Kenya
Nne na nna ha zụlitere O'Connor na nwanne ha nwoke nke nta na Baltimore, Maryland
Ha gara Notre Dame Preparatory School ma mụọ violin na ịbụ abụ na Peabody Preparatory
O'Connor na-aga Mahadum Johns Hopkins ma na-amụ banyere ahụike ọha na eze na ọgwụ
Ha agakwaala ọmụmụ ihe n'ihe ọmụmụ Islam
O'Connor nwere mmasị na ihe ndị na-ekpebi mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke ahụike gụnyere nchekwa nri, enweghị ụlọ, na agụmakwụkwọ

O'Connor mere ihe nkiri nke Gugu Mbatha-Raw na ihe nkiri Netflix nke afọ 2018, Irreplaceable You Ha pụtara na ihe nkiri afọ 2019, Wetlands N'afọ 2019, O'Connor mere Paloma Davis na ihe nkiri, Selah and the Spades Onye nta akụkọ Anagha Komaragiri nke The Daily Californian toro O'Connor 'n'ụzọ dị nro' na 'ọnụnọ dị oké ọnụ ahịa' ruo mgbe 'ọgwụgwụ siri ike'
A họpụtara O'Connor na ọnwa July afọ 2019 maka ihe nkiri afọ 2021, Ghostbusters Afterlife O'Connor abụghị nke abụọ
O'Connor bụ onye na-akwado imeziwanye ọdịiche na nnọchi anya na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ
Celestina Onyeka (a mụrụ na 15 Julaị 1984) ) bu nwanyi onye Naijiria na-agbachitere ha bọọlụ
O so n'egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa na asọmpi na 2004 Olimpiks Summer Na ọkwa klọb, ọ gbara ndị Pelican Stars
Celestine Hycieth Babayaro (a mụrụ na 29 Ọgọst 1978) bụ onye Naijiria bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye mgbachitere ma ọ bụ dị ka onye etiti ọgbọ
Babayaro nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ọrụ ya n'agbam bọọlụri Premier League, ọkachasị ịgbara Chelsea site na 1997 ruo 2005, o mesịa gaa na Newcastle United, site na 2005 ruo 2008
O nwere obere oge na MLS club LA Galaxy, ma ọ dịghị mgbe ọ na-egwuri egwu maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, ma bụrụ onye nweere onwe ya, tupu ọ lara ezumike nká na 2010
Babayaro nọchitere anya otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa site na 1995 ruo 2004, ma bụrụkwa otu onye n'otu egwuregwu Olympic abụọ, otu mba ụwa abụọ na otu atọ nke mba Afrịka

Amụrụ na Kaduna, Babayaro malitere ọrụ egwuregwu ya na mpaghara Nigeria Plateau United, tupu ọ kwaga Belgian club Anderlecht na 1994, ma mesịa mee onwe ya aha, na-enweta ọkwa mbụ nke ngwa ngwa n'agbanyeghị na ọ ka dị afọ iri na ụma
Babayaro setịpụrụ ndekọ dị ka onye ọkpụkpọ kacha nta ka ọ pụta ìhè na ịnweta kaadị uhie na UEFA Champions League
Achụpụrụ ya n'asọmpi ha na Steaua Bucuresti na eserese 1–1, gbara afọ 16 na ụbọchị iri asatọ na isii
Chelsea bịanyere aka na Babayaro mgbe onye scout Lewis Durkin hụrụ ya na Eprel 1997

Ọ kwagara maka ego mbufe nke £ 225 nde, ndekọ klọb akwụ ụgwọ maka onye ntorobịa n'oge ahụ O mere mpụta mbụ ya na UEFA Cup Winners'Cup , mana mmerụ ahụ dị na 6-1 meriri ndị asọmpi Tottenham Hotspur na Disemba 1997 wepụrụ ya maka ndị ọzọ
oge
Nke a pụtara na ọ tụfuru mmeri ha na 1998 Football League Cup Final na 1998 UEFA Cup Winners' Cup Final
Otú ọ dị, na Chelsea ọ gara n'ihu na-emeri 1998 UEFA Super Cup, FA Cup na Charity Shield na 2000, wee ruo 2002 FA Cup Final
Ọ nyekwara aka na ọsọ Chelsea na 1999–2000 UEFA Champions League
A chụpụrụ Babayaro na oge mgbakwunye megide Barcelona, ka ha siri na asọmpi ahụ na nkeji nkeji ikpeazụ
Ọ chere asọmpi n'aka Graeme Le Saux n'ime afọ asaa ya, mana ọ jisiri ike kpọọ egwuregwu 200 maka klọb ahụ
Ememme acrobatic ya na azụ azụ bụ ndị Fans nke klọb ahụ kwuru
Ụdị Wayne Bridge kwụsiri ike hụrụ na Babayaro malitere naanị egwuregwu anọ nke FA maka Chelsea na 2004-05 n'okpuru onye njikwa ọhụrụ José Mourinho
Chelsea kwụsịrị oge dị ka ndị mmeri Premier League
Na Jenụwarị 2005, ọ hapụrụ Chelsea ka ọ sonyere Newcastle United na ego a na-akọwaghị, ebe o guzobe onwe ya dị ka onye na-ahọrọ azụ azụ ekpe mbụ
Ọ gbara nke mbụ ya na ihe tụgharịrị bụrụ naanị goolu Newcastle ya na 3–1 meriri Coventry City na iko FA
Na Septemba 2006, ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ nyere Babayaro mmachibido egwuregwu atọ maka ịkụ onye ọkpọ Liverpool Dirk Kuyt n'ihu, ebe Liverpool were nkuku
Onye ọka ikpe Mark Halsey ahụghị ụra ahụ, mana ihe nkiri mechara gosi Babayaro kụrụ onye Dutch ahụ n'ihu
Babayaro nabatara ebubo a ma rịọ Kuyt mgbaghara

Na 10 February 2007, mgbe mmeri 2-1 meriri Liverpool, onye njikwa Newcastle mgbe ahụ Glenn Roeder kpughere na nanị awa 12 tupu mmalite, Babayaro kpọrọ ya na-ekwu na nwanne ya nwoke nke tọrọ David anwụọla site na ụkwara nta
N'agbanyeghị nke a, Babayaro siri ọnwụ na ọ ka ga-egwu egwu ma na-arụ ọrụ siri ike nke mere ka Roeder na ndị Fans na-eto ya
Ụdị ọma a gara n'ihu ruo mmeri United 3–1 megide Zulte Waregem, na iko UEFA
N'ihi ọtụtụ nsogbu mmerụ ahụ ya, e kpebiri n'otu n'otu, na 10 Disemba 2007, na a ga-ahapụ Babayaro na nkwekọrịta ya na ngwa ngwa ma kwenye ọnụ ọgụgụ nkwụghachi ụgwọ
Na 21 Jenụwarị 2008, Babayaro dị afọ 29 bịara na nkwekọrịta ya na LA Galaxy iji sonyere ha na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ, dị irè ozugbo
Site na njem a, onye Naijiria abanyeghachiri onye nchịkwa Galaxy Ruud Gullit bụ onye kpọbatara ya na Chelsea na 1997 ma nọrọ otu oge ịzụ ya ebe ahụ
Oge a ọzọ, ọ bụ Gullit goro n'oge na-adịbeghị anya chọrọ Babayaro na klọb ọhụrụ ya
Agbanyeghị, o wereghị ogologo oge maka ịkwaga ahụ gbanwere nke ukwuu

N'iche na ọ bịarutere n'otu nnukwu ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ America nke nanị otu afọ gara aga nyere David Beckham ihe a na-akọ na ọ bụ nkwekọrịta nde $250, Babayaro were iwe n'ihi ihe ọ weere dị ka ụlọ 'na-adịghị mma' - site n'ịga ụgbọ elu n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri
Economic class to sharing a hotel room on the road
Enweghị ntinye aka ya na ọzụzụ ọzụzụ na egwuregwu preseason gosipụtara mmetụta ndị ahụ, n'oge na-adịghịkwa anya ọ bịarutere n'akụkụ ọjọọ Gullit na onye isi ụlọ ọgbakọ na onye isi njikwa Alexi Lalas
Na 3 March, ndị Galaxy gbaghaara Babayaro mgbe ọ na-agba nanị 45 nkeji na preseason enyi na enyi megide FC Seoul, na-anata kaadị edo edo ma kwenye ntaramahụhụ na usoro ahụ
Ihe kpatara ntọhapụ a na-atụghị anya ya ekwupụtaghị n'ụzọ doro anya site na ụlọ ọrụ Galaxy n'ihu
'Mgbe oge nyochachara, e kpebiri na ọ ga-abụ maka ọdịmma nke ụlọ ọgbakọ na onye ọkpụkpọ ịgbagha ụzọ,' Lalas kwuru na nkwupụta
'Ọ bụ ihe nwute na ọ naghị arụ ọrụ, mana Ruud na ndị ọrụ nka na-arụsi ọrụ ike na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na-ejikọta otu a na a ghaghị ime mkpebi siri ike'
N'oge pre-sason maka 2008-09 English League season, Babayaro zụrụ azụ na Premier League club Portsmouth na òkù nke onye njikwa Harry Redknapp n'ebumnobi ịbịanye aka maka ndị ji FA Cup
Na 14 August 2008 Redknapp kpughere na ọ gaghị enye Babayaro nkwekọrịta na Fratton Park
Na 8 Julaị 2010, Babayaro kwupụtara ọkwa ezumike nka ya na football
Mgbe ọ so na ndị otu Naijiria meriri na asọmpi ụwa Under-17 na 1993, Babayaro mere mpụta mbụ ya na mba ụwa n'asọmpi Afro-Asia nke mba na 1995, megide Uzbekistan
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu ndị meriri ihe nrite ọla edo nke Nigeria na 1996 Summer Olympics na Atlanta, na-eme ka ndị otu egwuregwu asọmpi niile
Ọ gbara n'egwuregwu ọla edo n'onwe ya megide Argentina
Mgbe ọ nwesịrị mmerụ ahụ ikpere na December 1997 na Premier League, Babayaro gbakere n'oge na-adịghị anya iji mee ndị otu France 98
Ọ bụkwa onye isi Naijiria na asọmpi Summer Olympics nke afọ 2000 na Sydney, wee sonye na Korea/Japan 2002 FIFA World Cup
Babayaro so na ndị otu Naijiria ga-asọmpi iko mba Afrịka na Tunisia nke afọ 2004, mana ọ nwere arụmụka zipụrụ n'ụlọ, ya na Yakubu na Victor Agali maka enweghị ọzụzụ
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ dịghị mgbe ọ na-ekwupụta n'ihu ọha na ọ lara ezumike nká n'egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ụwa, mpụta ikpeazụ ya na otu mba bụ megide Morocco n'asọmpi otu
Nwanne Celestine Babayaro, Emmanuel, onye nche goolu, sokwa na otu ndị Nigeria nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo n'egwuregwu Olympic na 1996
A tọhapụrụ Babayaro maka mmeso ọjọọ na 1999
O mechara gbaa akwụkwọ akụkọ Daily Star akwụkwọ maka isi akụkọ na-egosi na e boro ya ebubo idina mmadụ n'ike wee nweta mgbaghara na mebie ya

Celestine Donkor bụ onye Ghana na-eti egwu ozioma na onye na-ede egwu
N'onwa Machị 2021, o so na nhọpụta ụmụ nwanyị iri atọ ama ama egwu bụ Top 30 Most Influential Women in Music site na 3Music Awards Women's Brunch Ọ hiwere Celestial Praise, egwu ozioma kwa afọ
A mụrụ Donkor n'ezinụlọ Maazị na Oriakụ Akakpo, ha abụọ sitere na mpaghara Volta nke Ghana
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na St Augustine Preparatory school na Abeka Lapaz wee gaa n'ihu na Nsaaniya Secondary Business School na Kasoa ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Ghana, Legon ebe ọ nwetara BA (Hons) Sociology and Information studies
Donkor na ọtụtụ ndị egwu ozioma, gụnyere Joe Mettle, Joyce Blessing, Ceccy Twum, Mkhululi Bhebhe, Edem, Philipa Baafi, Funny Face
O nwere ọtụtụ egwu , gụnyere 'Turning around', 'Bigger', 'Okronkronhene', 'Manim Nguase', 'Boobobo'
Abọm Agbebolo ya kachasị ọhụrụ mere ka ọ bụrụ onye nka nke afọ na National Gospel Music Awards
Ọ lụrụ Maazị Donkor onye ya na ya mụtara ụmụ nwanyị atọ
Celestine Ukwu (1940 - Mee 7, 1977) bụ onye na-eti egwu n’ala Igbo dị elu n’oge 60s na 70s kacha mara maka egwu ọ kụrụ “Ije Enu”, “Igede” na “Money Palava”

A kọwara ya dị ka “onye na-abụ abụ ma bụrụkwa onye ama ama” site n’aka onye nkatọ egwu Benson Idonije nke Radio Nigeria Abụọ, Ọrụ Ukwu agala ebe dị iche iche nke gụnyere ụwa music compilations na ike ike Guide to Highlife na ike ike Guide to Psychedelic Africa
A mụrụ Ukwu na Enugu, Enugu Steeti, Nigeria na ezinụlọ ndị na akụ egwu
Nna ya bụ onye na-eme mpaghara dị egwu, ikpa na ode ụdị egwu Igbo mgbe nne ya bụ onye na-abụ abụ n’òtù ụmụ nwanyị
Mgbe ọ dị obere, ọ malitere ịmụ ka esi agụ egwu na egwu egwu harmonium site na enyemaka nke nwanne nna ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị mbụ, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na-azụ ndị nkụzi afọ abụọ mana ọ kwụsịrị nkwa ma bido kuba egwu dị ka ọrụ
Ọ gara na ndị otu Mike Ejeagha 'Paradise Rhythm Orchestra' na 1962 na Enugu dị ka onye na-agụ ụda na maraca tupu ọ pụọ ịbanye na otu Mr
Picolo bụ ndị na-eleta Democratic Republic of Congo n'oge ahụ

Ọ laghachiri na Naịjirịa wee hiwe òtù nke ya akpọrọ Celestine Ukwu & Egwu Ya Royals nke Nigeria na 1966 bụ nke mechara gbasaa na 1967 mgbe agha obodo Naijiria gbasaa, tupu ọ tọhapụ abụ na ntiwapụ nke agha akpọrọ 'Hail Biafra '
Mgbe agha ahụ bisịrị, Ukwu hiwere otu ọzọ, Celestine Ukwu & His Philosophers National; ya na ha wepụtara otutu ọba, gụnyere Igede Fantasia nke mere ọfụma na ahịa

Celestino Mukavhi (a mụrụ ya na Septemba 27, 1972) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Ọ bụ nwa amaala nke mpaghara Bikita nke mpaghara Masvingo, Masvingo bụ nwa ikpeazụ a mụrụ n'ime ezinụlọ mmadụ itoolu
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo na-agụghị akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1975, e gburu nne ya n'ọkụ n'oge agha maka nnwere onwe
Mukhavi tolitere n'ala obodo, na-ahapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ n'afọ 1987 iji malite ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ugbo
N'afọ 1989, e gburu nna ya, a manyere ya ịkwaga Harare iji chọọ ọrụ ka mma
N'enweghị ebe obibi ruo oge ụfọdụ, ọ na-ehi ụra n'akụkụ ụzọ Chapungu mgbe Boira Mteki chọpụtara ya, onye kpọrọ ya ka ọ mụọ nka nke ịkpụ nkume
Masvingo mere, na-enyere ya aka ruo ọnwa isii
Ya na Agnes Nyanhong, Arthur Fata, Cosmas Muchenje, na Garrison Machinjili rụkọrọ ọrụ
Ọrụ ya nwetara nkwanye ùgwù na ihe ngosi Zimbabwe Roots nke afọ 1992; n'afọ 1993 ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe na Chapungu Sculpture Park
Ọ nọ na Zimbabwe ugbu a ma ọ na-aga n'ihu na-eme ihe ngosi nka
Mukavhi nwere mmasị na ezinụlọ ma bụrụ nwoke hụrụ udo n'anya
Ndị a bụ isiokwu mmadụ ga-ahụ na ọrụ ọkpụkpụ ya

O sonyere na 2012 London Olimpik na egwu na otu egwuregwu volleyball nke Algeria

Celia Elizabeth Rosser OAM (Amụrụ n'afọ 1930) bụ onye Australia na-ese ihe osise botanical, nke a maara nke ọma maka ibipụta The Banksias, usoro mpịakọta atọ nke akwụkwọ nwere ihe osise mmiri nke ụdị Banksia ọ bụla
A mụrụ ya Celia Elizabeth Prince, ọ malitere ise okooko osisi ọhịa Australia n'oge ọ malitere ọrụ nka ya
O bidoro ise Banksias mgbe ọ hụrụ Banksia serrata n'akụkụ ụlọ ya na Orbost, Victoria
Ihe ngosi mbụ ya bụ na Leveson Gallery na Melbourne n'afọ 1965, ma gụnye ihe osise mmiri atọ nke ụdị Banksia
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, o bipụtara Wildflowers of Victoria
N'afọ 1970, a họpụtara Rosser ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ese ihe na Mahadum Monash
O gosipụtara ihe osise Peter Bridgewater's The Saltmarsh Plants of Southern Australia na The Mosses of Southern Australia nke George Scott na Ilma Grace Stone
N'afọ 1974, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ese ihe na Mahadum Botanical Artist, ma malite ọrụ nke ise ụdị Banksia ọ bụla
Ọrụ ahụ were ihe karịrị afọ 25 iji mezue, ma mee ka e bipụta mpịakọta atọ nke akpọrọ The Banksias, nke Alex George dere
Mbipụta nke mpịakọta ikpeazụ n'afọ 2000 nọchitere anya oge mbụ na e sere ụdị nnukwu ụdị ahụ kpamkpam
Centalun bụ nke Boehringer Ingelheim mepụtara na 1962 ma bụrụ ọgwụ psycholeptic nwere mmetụta hypnotic na sedative, site na allosteric agonism nke onye na-anabata GABAA
A na-eji ya eme ihe n'oge gara aga maka sedation na usoro nke ụwa na ụdị àlà ahụike dịka ịwa ahụ, orthopedics na gynecology na ụdị nke ụwa na ụdị, ọ bụ ezie na ọ naghịzi eji ya eme ihe na ahụike
N'agbanyeghị akụkọ ihe mere eme nke iji ya eme ihe n'ụlọ ọgwụ, etinyeghị centalun n'ime CSA ma ya mere ọ ka na-enweghị nchịkwa dị ka ọgwụ mmegbu
Center for Study of African Economies (CSAE) na-eme nchọpụta banyere mmepe akụ na ụba na mmekọrịta ọha na eze n'Africa kemgbe 1986
Ụbọchị ndị a, otu nnukwu ìgwè ndị ọkachamara na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na-eme nchọpụta ọ bụghị nanị na mba Africa, kamakwa na mpaghara ndị ọzọ na-emepe emepe nke ụwa
CSAE bụ akụkụ nke Social Sciences Division na Mahadum Oxford, ya na ndị na-eme nchọpụta na Ngalaba Economics, Blavatnik School of Government, na Oxford Department for International Development￼

Ebumnobi Center a n'ịkwalite mpaghara ndị a bụ iwulite akụrụngwa nyocha nke ga-enye anyị ohere ịchụso ebumnuche nyocha anyị bụ isi - mmepụta nke nyocha mara mma nke agbadoro maka mmụba na arụmọrụ akụ na ụba Africa
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-emepụta Journal of African Economies, nke Oxford University Press (OUP) bipụtara, yana usoro akwụkwọ ọrụ nke ndị otu ya
Nnyocha e mere na CSAE bụ ma microeconomic na macroeconomic

Nke a pụtara na ọ na-eleba anya n'okwu ndị na-eche ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu ihu, ndị ọrụ ugbo, ndị ọchụnta ego ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ, dị ka okwu metụtara akụ na ụba zuru oke dị ka onu oriri na mgbanwe mgbanwe mgbanwe
Ndị ọrụ etiti na-ekere òkè na mmemme dịgasị iche iche n'ime Africa, gụnyere nchịkọta data maka ezinụlọ na ụlọ ọrụ, ọzụzụ, na mkparịta ụka na ma ndị azụmahịa na obodo na-eme amụma
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụkwa mmemme nke ọmụmụ ihe oge nri ehihie n'oge oge, ma na-agbakwa ogbako kwa afọ nke ezubere iche maka ndị ọrụ ya dị iche iche
Ntọala data dị mkpa nke Centerlọ Ọrụ na-ahụ maka ịnakọta dịkwa na webụsaịtị a
A na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a n'ụwa niile
Ndị otu CSAE nwere ike ikwurịta ọrụ ha na ekwentị ma ọ bụ site na ozi ịntanetị

Journal of African Economies (JAE) bụ ụgbọ ala iji mee nyocha akụ na ụba siri ike, lekwasịrị anya kpamkpam na Africa, maka ndị Afrịka na onye ọ bụla nwere mmasị na kọntinent ahụ - ma ha bụ ndị ndụmọdụ, ndị na-eme iwu, ndị ọkà mmụta, ndị ahịa, ndị na'ahụ maka ego, ndị ọrụ mmepe ma ọ bụ ndị ọrụ enyemaka
Ọ bụ Oxford University Press (OUP) na-ebipụta JAE, na-achịkwa na CSAE, ma nwee netwọk mba ụwa nke ndị na-ahụ maka njikwa na ndị na-ede akwụkwọ na ndị na'etiti
Enwere ike ịchọta ntụziaka maka ndị nwere mmasị itinye akwụkwọ na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ OUP

Central Bank of the Comros (Arabic, French) bụ etiti ụlọ akụ nke Comoros, otu agwaetiti dị n'Oké Osimiri India
Iwu nke BCC na-ekwu na ndị nduzi ya ga-enwe ndị otu asatọ ahọpụtara site na Gọọmentị Comorian, French Central Bank (Banque de France) na gọọmentị France
Osote onye isi oche nke Central Bank nke Comoros bụ onye ọrụ Banque de France, bụ onye na-ahụ maka amụma ego
Kemgbe 19 Nọvemba 1999, ọnụ ahịa ụlọ akụ etiti niile abanyela na Euro Overnight Index Index (EONIA) na-eduga na nkwụsi ike nke ọmụrụ nwa dị iche na euro

Na mgbakwunye, ụlọ akụ nchekwa ego abụọ (SANDUK na MECK) na-ekere òkè

A na-eme ka aha ya dị mkpirikpi ka ọ bụrụ CBG
Ụlọ akụ ahụ dị na Banjul ma guzobe ya n'afọ 1971
Buah Saidy bụ Gọvanọ ugbu a

Dị ka ụlọ akụ etiti, CBG na-ahụ maka ịnye ọrụ ụlọ akụ na gọọmentị Gambia, maka ijikwa ọnụego ọmụrụ nwa na mgbanwe mba ọzọ, maka imekọrịta ihe na ụlọ ọrụ Gambia, iji kwado microfinance, na maka ijikwa uru nke dalasi, nke bụ ego Gambia
Ụlọ akụ ahụ na-ahụ maka ijikwa ire nke mbikọ Gambian na ụgwọ ụlọ akụ na ahịa nchekwa mba ụwa
Ụlọ akụ ahụ na-etinye aka na nyocha akụ na ụba gbasara ọdịnihu Gambia na West Africa
CBG na-arụkọ ọrụ na GIPFZA, Gambia Investment Promotion and Free Zones Agency, n'ịmepụta azụmahịa 16 square kilomita na ogige mmepụta ihe dị nso na Banjul International Airport
CBG bụ naanị ụlọ ọrụ dị na Gambia nke enyere ikike inye dalasi Gambian
Àtụ Central banks
Central Bank of Egypt (CBE; Arabic) bụ ụlọ akụ etiti na ikike ego nke Arab Republic of Egypt

Ebe ọ bụ na e rere mkpụrụ ego ọla edo na ọlaọcha n’Ijipt ruo n’afọ 1834, ọ dịghị otu mkpụrụ ego e ji mee ka mba ahụ dị n’otu N'afọ 1834, e nwetara iwu nke kwuru na a na-emepụta ego ndị Ijipt nke dabeere na ọla abụọ (ọlaedo na ọlaọcha) N'ikwekọ n'iwu ahụ kwuru, a malitere imepụta ego n'ụdị ọla edo na ọlaọcha N'afọ 1836, e bu ụzọ webata paụnd Ijipt wee meghee maka ojiji ọha
Ụlọ akụ ahụ wepụtara pound Ijipt n'ụtụtụ nke abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2016
Ọrụ ya gụnyere
Ihe na-esonụ bụ ndepụta nke ndị Gọvanọ nke Central Bank of Egypt
Àtụ Central banks
Central Bank of Lesotho (Sotho e Kholo ea Lesotho) bụ etiti ụlọ akụ nke Lesotho, na ndịda Africa
Ụlọ akụ ahụ dị na Maseru Emmanuel Letete (na-amalite site na June 2022) E hiwere ụlọ akụ ahụ na 1978 ka Lesotho Monetary Authority
Ebe e si nweta ya
Àtụ Central banks
Central Bank of Liberia bụ ụlọ akụ etiti nke Liberia
Onyeisi ọchịchị ya ugbu a bụ J
Aloysius Tarlue
Ọfịs ụlọ akụ ahụ dị na Monrovia, isi obodo Liberia
Ụlọ akụ ahụ bụ onye otu Alliance for Financial Inclusion
Site na afọ otu puku narị itoolu iri asaa na anọ ruo afọ puku abụọ, ụlọ akụ etiti Liberia bụ National Bank of Liberia

E hiwere Central Bank of Liberia, nke a maara dị ka 'CBL', na ọnwa Octoba iri na asatọ, afọ otu puku narị itoolu iri itoolu na itoolu site n'iwu nke ndị omeiwu Liberia, wee malite ọrụ n'afọ puku abụọ, mgbe National Bank of Liberia
Central Bank of Madagascar (Malagasy ; French Banque Centrale de Madagascar, BCM) bụ ụlọ akụ etiti nke Madagascar

Ebumnuche nke ụlọ akụ ahụ bụ, yana mmekorita ya na gọọmentị izugbe, yana na nleba anya n'iwu nke ego, idobe akụ na ụba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ozuzu nke Madagascar; na idobe ego nchekwa ego nke mba Ọfịs ụlọ akụ dị na Antananarivo
Central Bank of Madagascar na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ịzụlite amụma ntinye ego ma bụrụ onye otu Alliance for Financial Inclusion

Banque Centrale de Madagascar sitere na Banque de Madagascar, nke nyere Madagascar-Comores CFA franc, malite na 1925, dị ka ego Madagascar Na 1945, mgbe e kechara Territory nke Comoros, e hiwere Banque de Madagascar et des Comores; n'otu oge na imepụta ọtụtụ ego franc ndị ọzọ nke Africa
Mgbe Madagascar nwechara nnwere onwe na France na 1960, Madagascar malitere inye Malagasy franc (MGF) ọzọ, ka e kewapụrụ ego Comoros na Madagascar

Na 1973, Madagascar hapụrụ mpaghara CFA franc na Malagasy franc bụ ndị ọchịchị nke Confederation Franc Africaine kwupụtara na ọ gaghị agbanwe agbanwe Institut d'Émission Malgache nke Madagascar nyere mkpụrụ ego na akwụkwọ ego Madagascar ruo 1974 mgbe e hiwere Banque Centrale de Madagascar Kemgbe 2005, Malagasy ariary (MGA), nke Banque Centrale de Madagascar nyere, bụ ego obodo ahụ
Ụlọ akụ ahụ na-enwe ngalaba nke microfinance na nke nyocha akụ na ụba
BCM na-akọ akụkọ na ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị Commission de Supervision Bancaire et Financière
Ụlọ akụ ahụ nwere alaka abụọ na ụlọ ọrụ asatọ
Alaka
Ụlọ ọrụ
Àtụ Central banks

Central Bank of Mauritania (French Banque centrale de Mauritanie, BCM; Arabic ) bụ etiti nke Mauritania, n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ AfrịkaỤlọ akụ ahụ dị n'isi obodo Nouakchott, dị na ndịda nke obí onyeisi oche Onye na-achị ya ugbu a bụ Cheikh El Kebir Moulay Taher
E guzobere ụlọ akụ ahụ site na iwu nke ndị omeiwu nke Mauritania, na 1973, 1974 na 1975
Onye isi ala Moktar Ould Daddah hiwere ya mgbe ọ wepụrụ Mauritania na ngalaba ego ndị France na-achị, Communauté Financière Africaine
Ebe e si nweta ya
Central Bank of Tunisia (Arabic, French) bụ ụlọ akụ etiti nke Tunisia
Ụlọ akụ ahụ dị na Tunis ma gọvanọ ya ugbu a bụ Marouane Abassi, onye nọchiri Chedly Ayari na 16 Febụwarị 2018
Tunisia nwetara nnwere onwe na 1956
E hiwere Central Bank of Tunisia afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị na 1958
N'ọnwa Disemba 1958, a kwụsịrị dinar Tunisian ọhụrụ e mepụtara na franc French
Ụlọ akụ ahụ na-edobe ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie nke gụnyere nchịkọta mkpụrụ ego Carthaginian enwetara
Tunisia nwere ọnụ ahịa dị ala n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
Dinar Tunisia dị obere na 2000-2010 karịa ego nke ndị agbata obi ya na-ebubata mmanụ, Egypt na Morocco
Ọnụ ego ọnụ ahịa bụ 49% n'afọ mmefu ego 2007-08 na 35% n'afọ mmefu ego 2008-09
BCT nwere ụlọ akụ alaka iri na abụọ
Kemgbe ntọala ya, ndị gọvanọ ndị a enweela ihe ịga nke ọma n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Àtụ Central banks

Central Bank of West African States (French Banque Centrale des États de l'Afrique de l'Ouest, BCEAO) bụ ụlọ akụ dị n'etiti na-ejere mba asatọ dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka ozi nke na-ekerịta ego CFA franc nke West Africa ma mejupụtara West African Economic and Monetary Union (UEMOA)
Ụlọ akụ ahụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ịmepụta iwu itinye ego ma bụrụ onye otu Alliance for Financial Inclusion
Onye bu ya ụzọ, Institut d'Emission de l'Afrique Occidentale Française et du Togo ('ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta ihe nke French West Africa na Togo'), ka e guzobere n'afọ 1955 wee ghọọ BCEAO n'afọ 1959
Nkwekọrịta nke guzobere West African Monetary Union (UMOA), nke a bịanyere aka na Mee 12, 1962, nyere BCEAO ikike pụrụ iche ịnye ego dị ka ụlọ akụ etiti maka mba asaa so na ya
Na June 30, 1962 Mali hapụrụ otu ahụ wee nabata franc Malian dị ka ego mba
Na Disemba 17, 1963 Togo sonyere na UMOA
Na May 30, 1973 Mauritania wepụrụ wee nakwere ouguiya dị ka ego mba
Na February 17, 1984, Mali sonyeghachiri na UMOA

Etiti Kilmanjaro (Central Kilimanjaro), ma ọ bụ Etiti Chaga (Central Chaga), bụ asụsụ Bantu nke Tanzania nke ndị Chaga na-asụ
Ha nwere olumba dị iche iche
Asụsụ Moshi bụ obodo Chaga na asụ ya, Moshi, na olumba dị ùgwù nke asụsụ Chaga

Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB) nkè India bụ nzukọ iwu kwadoro n'okpuru Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change (MoEFCCỌ dị iche iche E guzobere ya n'afọ 1974 n'okpuru Iwu Mmiri (Nchịkwa na Nchịkwa nkè mmetọ), 1974
A na-enyekwa CPCB ikike na ọrụ n'okpuru Iwu Mmiri (Nchịkwa na Nchịkwa nke Mmetọ), afọ 1981
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka ọzụzụ ubi ma na-enyekwa ọrụ teknụzụ na Ministry of Environment and Forests n'okpuru ndokwa nké Environment (Protection) Act, 1986
Ọ na-ahazi ọrụ nke State Pollution Control Boards site n'inye enyemaka na nduzi teknụzụ ma dozie esemokwu n'etiti ha
Ọ bụ nzukọ kachasị elu na mba ahụ n'ọhịa nchịkwa mmetọ, dị ka ngalaba teknụzụ nkè MoEFCC
Ónyé isi óche nke Kọmitii Ntinye nké Kọmiti nkè Gọọmentị India họpụtara na-eduzi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ónyé isi óche na-anọchite anya ugbu a bụ Shri Tanmay Kumar (ọnwa Ọgọst afọ 2021) na ónyé odeakwụkwọ bụ Dr
Prashant Gargava
CPCB nwèrè isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na New Delhi, nwéré ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara asaa na ụlọ nyocha ise
Kọmitii ahụ na-eme nyocha gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi na nyocha
Ọ bụ ọrụ ya màkà idebe ụkpụrụ mba n'okpuru iwu gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi dịgasị iche iche, na mkparịta ụka na ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara, agbụrụ, na gọọmentị ime obodo
Ọ nwèrè ọrụ nlekota nke mmiri na ikuku, ma na-edebe data nlekota
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụkwa ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ na ọkwa gọọmentị niile na mmemme mgbochi mmetọ dịgasị iché íchè na mgbalị nchekwa ike
Ọ na-adụ gọọmentị etiti ọdụ ka ha gbochie ma chịkwaa mmetọ mmiri na ikuku
Ọ na-enyekwa Gọọmentị nke Union Territories ndụmọdụ banyéré ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na isi mmalite ndị ọzọ nke mmiri na mmetọ ikuku
CPCB tinyere ndị ibe ya State Pollution Control Boards (SPCBs) na-ahụ màkà mmejuputa iwu metụtara mgbochi na njikwa mmetọ gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi
Kọmitii ahụ nwèrè ihe dịka ndị ọrụ ógè niile narị ise gụnyere ndị injinia, ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị, na ndị ọkachamara na-ahụ maka a nchekwa gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi
E guzobere CPCB na iri abụo na abụo ịdị ọcha nke iyi, olulu mmiri
E wepụtara Iwu Nchedo Gburugburu Ebe Obibi (EPA) n'afọ 1986 iji mechie oghere dị na Iwu Mmiri na Mmiri, site na ịgbakwunye ọrụ ụfọdụ na CPCB

CPCB na-arụ ọrụ na mbelata na nchịkwa nke mmetọ na mba ahụ site na ịmepụta data dị mkpa, inye ozi sayensị, ịnye ntinye teknụzụ màkà ịmepụta iwu na mmemme mba, ọzụzụ na mmepe nke ndị ọrụ na ịhazi ọrụ màkà ịkwalite mmata na ọkwa dị íchè íchè nke Gọọmentị na ọha na eze
E guzobere Kọmitii Nchịkwa Mmetọ Delhi (DPCC) n'afọ 1991 site na Central Government na-arụ ọrụ na (CPCB) na (NGT) iji chịkwaa mmetọ na Capital
CPCB na-eduzi site na Ónyé isi oche ya na-esote odeakwụkwọ ónyé otu
CPCB na-arụ ọrụ ya dị íchè íchè site na nnukwu ọrụ itoolu na-esonụ / isi mmefu ego
A na-ekewa isi ụlọ ọrụ CPCB ugbu a na ngalaba irí abụọ na abụọ
Nkewa ọ bụla nwèrè ónyé na-elekọta ya na ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke ọ bụla
CPCB eguzobewo ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara itoolu na-enye nri na steeti dị íchè íchè
Ọfịs mpaghara bụ ọfịs mpaghara nke CPCB na atụmatụ niile a kwadebere na isi ụlọ ọrụ bụ ha na-eme ya
Ọfịs mpaghara na-eme nyocha n'ọhịa ma zipụ akụkọ gbasara Nlekọta Mmiri, Nlekọta Mmụọ, Nnyocha Ụlọ Ọrụ na ọrụ ndị ọzọ metụtara ya na isi ụlọ ọrụ màkà ime ihe ọzọ
Ọfịs mpaghara ọ bụla na-elekọta ọnụ ọgụgụ a kapịrị ọnụ nké steeti
Ọfịs mpaghara dị na Bengaluru, Kolkata, Shillong, Bhopal, Lucknow, Vadodara, Chandigarh, Pune na Project Office na Agra
Central Yambasa ma ọ bụ Nuasua (Nuaswa) o bụ asụsụ Southern Bantoid nke Cameroon

Cephalopholis urodeta, darkfin hind, flagtail rockcod, chevron rockcod, duskyfin hind, duskyphin rockcod, flagtail otu onye ma ọ bụ V-tail otu onye, bụ ụdị azụ ray-nchara, a otu onye si na ezinụlọ sub Epinephelinae nke dị n'ezinụlọ Serranidae nke gụnyekwara anthias na oké osimiri basses
Azụ a na-apụta na Western Pasifik Oke osimiri na n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Indian Oke osimiri
Cephalopholis urodeta nwere ahụ nke na-erughị omimi karịa isi dị ogologo na ahụ dị gburugburu otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ dị omimi dị ka ogologo ọkọlọtọ
Profaịlụ dị n'etiti anya bụ convex na tupu arụ ọrụ gbara gburugburu nwere ọnụ serrated na ọnụ ala anụ
Ọnụ ya gafere anya
Dorsal fin nwere ogwu 9 na 14-16 sodt ụzarị ọkụ ebe anal fin nwere oghere 3 na 8-9 ụzarị dị nro
Akpụkpọ ahụ caudal dị gburugburu na akpụkpọ ahụ pelvic anaghị agbatị na anus
Te overa; agba nke azụ a na-acha uhie uhie na-acha nchara nchara, na-agba ọchịchịrị n'akụkụ ọdụ, na-acha ọcha na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na-acha odo odo n'ofe lobes abụọ nke caudal fin
Ha na-egosipụtakarị ogwe aka isii dị nro n'akụkụ, ogwe ndị a na-aga n'afọ, ma enwere obere ntụpọ oroma na-acha ọbara ọbara n'isi na azụ, yana ntụpọ ojii abụọ dị nso na ọnụ ọnụ ala
Akpụkpọ ahụ na-acha odo odo ma na-enwekarị nnukwu ntụpọ na-acha ọbara ọbara na-acha nchara nchara n'akụkụ mkpuchi gill
Nke a bụ obere ụdị nke grouper nke na-enweta ogologo zuru oke nke 28 sentimita (11 in)
A na-ahụ Cephalopholis urodeta na Christmas Island n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Indian Ocean mana ọ bụ ụdị nke Western Pasifik Oke osimiri
Ọ na-agbasa ruo n'ebe ugwu dị ka Okinawa na Ryukyu Agwaetiti nke ndịda Japan na ruo n' ndịda dị ka ndịda Great Barrier Reef nke Queensland na Australia
Ebe ọ dị na ya gbasaa n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ ruo French Polynesia na Pitcairn Island
E dekwara ya na Phoenix Islands, Jarvis Island, Palmyra Atoll, na Kingman Reef, yana Brunei
N'afọ 1958, a tọhapụrụ ihe karịrị 1,800 nke C
urodeta sitere na South Pasifik na nso Oahu na Hawaii mana ha enweghị ike iguzobe
A na-ahụ Cephalopholis urodeta na mmiri doro anya, nke na adịghị omimi na mpaghara ndị dị n'èzí nke reefs, na lagoons, n'azụ reef na n'elu reefs
Ha na-anọ naanị ha ma na-ahọrọ coral reefs dị mma n'ebe mmiri na adịghị omimi ebe ha na-eri obere azụ, nke mejupụtara 68% nke nri ya, na crustaceans
Ọ na-eme ruo omimi nke mita 60 (200ft)
Otu nwoke ga-enwe ókèala nke gụnyere nke ụmụ nwanyị isii
Nwoke ga-achọ ụmụ nwanyị n'ehihie
A na ewere ụdị a dị ka nke zuru ebe niile n'Oké Osimiri India, n'oge a, a na ewere ọdịdị Oké Osimiri India dị ka Cephalopholis nigripinnis
A maara ụdị abụọ ahụ ka ha na agwakọta na Christmas Island ebe edere ndị dị n'etiti
Cephalopholis urodeta pere mpe nke na ọ gaghị enwe mmasị na azụ ahịa, ọ bụ ezie na ndị na egbu azụ na ewere ya
Ọ na-apụta mgbe ụfọdụ na ahịa akwarium
Cephas Yao Agbemenu (amụrụ na 29 Mee 1951) bụ onye Ghanaan ji ọkwa prọfesọ nka nke na-akụzi na Mahadum Kenyatta na Nairobi, Kenya
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ osisi ọdịnala nke Africa nke na-ahụ ihe yiri ya n'etiti ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na ndụ ya
A mụrụ Cephas Yao Agbemenu na 29 Mee 1951 na Leklebi-Kame, na mpaghara Volta nke Ghana, West Africa
Ọ tolitere na Ghana, na-aga n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ebe nkuzi nka na ọrụ aka bụ akụkụ nke usoro mmụta
Ọ mụtakwara ọrụ ugbo, ịkọ ubi n'azụ ụlọ, ịkụ azụ, ịkwe ọnya na ịchụ nta
Ha niile chọrọ ezigbo nhazi na ikike anya iji mezue ọrụ ndị ahụ

Agbemenu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Evangelical Presbyterian Secondary School na Hohoe, Volta Region, ebe ọ natara asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ ya na nka, asụsụ Bekee, asụsụ Ewe, mgbakọ na mwepụ, sayensị n'ozuzu, ala
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Kpandu, Volta Region
Ọ gụsịrị na Advanced-Level School Certificate, isi ihe ọmụmụ ya bụ Art, Economics, Geography, General Studies n'afọ 1972

Na June 1976 ọ gụsịrị ma nweta nzere bachelọ na Fine Art na First Class Honours na Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology, Kumasi, Ghana, na-agụ akwụkwọ na Sculpture, Painting, Art History, English Literature, Art Appreciation na African Studies
Agbemenu mechara nweta nzere Master of Fine Arts na Mahadum Steeti nke New York na Buffalo (February 1980)
Isi okwu ya bụ Sculpture, gụnyere Wood Carving, POP, Concrete na Bronze casting, na Painting, Drawing na Art History dị ka ndị na-eto eto ya
Agbemenu malitere ịkụzi na Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ Kwame Nkrumah na 1977 na nka, ihe ọkpụkpụ na eserese
Ọ kụziri African Art, Sculpture, Black History n'echiche zuru ụwa ọnụ n'ọtụtụ mba dị iche iche, tinyere Ceramics, African History, Culture European Art History na African Carvings
N'afọ 1987 ọ malitere dị ka onye nkuzi dị elu na Ngalaba Fine Art, Mahadum Kenyatta, Nairobi, Kenya
Nkwurịta okwu Nkà Africa nke oge a; Ihe a tụrụ atụ na ọdịnala ọdịnala nke osisi Africa
E nyere Agbemenu nnukwu Fulbright Scholarship, nke mere ka o gaa United States iji kụzie na kọleji abụọ dị na Pennsylvania

Nke mbụ bụ Reading Area Community College nke dị n'obodo Reading, ebe ọ kụziri ihe gbasara ịkpụ osisi na Afrịka ma sonye na mkparịta ụka 'The Spiritual Dimension in Art' na Prọfesọ Art Tullio DeSantis na 2 Machị 2010
Agbemenu kwuru, sị 'Ọ dịghị mkpa ịchụso nka, mana echere m na ọ dị mkpa ịchụsoo echiche nka; echiche na enwere ihe ngwọta ọzọ
Agbemenu wee gaa Montgomery County Community College, Social Sciences Division, Blue Bell, Pennsylvania, c/o Dr
Aaron Shatzman site na Jenụwarị 2010 ruo June 2010 (Scholar-in-Residence Program)
Agbemenu kụziri nka na ọdịbendị Africa nke oge a, na mgbakwunye na iduzi klas studio na Traditional African Wood Carving
Ngwá ọrụ ndị bụ isi e ji mee ihe maka klas ya na-akpụ osisi bụ ndị kwụ ọtọ na spoon gouges, chisel, mma ịkpụ, veiner
E hotara ya ka ọ na-ekwu, sị 'A na-ahụ America dị ka obodo nke ihe ọmụma na ike
Ọ bụ ya mere ọtụtụ n'ime anyị ji họrọ ịbịa United States maka ọmụmụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
A ga-atụle ọnụnọ m na Montgomery County Community College na echiche na omume, n'ihe gbasara nghọta ọdịbendị n'oge a nke ijikọ ụwa ọnụ
Agbemenu bụ onye otu na onye nyere aka na African Proverbs, Stories and Sayings Committee nke Nna Joseph Healey bụ onye isi oche ya guzobere na Nairobi, Kenya
Na June 2008 Prọfesọ Agbemenu nyere onyinye iji chịkọta akwụkwọ nta nke 100 EWE Ghana Proverbs na African Symbols dị ka ihe atụ nke ilu, asụgharịrị n'asụsụ Bekee
E bipụtara ọrụ ahụ na ebe weebụsaịtị wwwafriprovorg
Isiokwu nke 'Nkwekọrịta na Udo'
E bipụtara A Collection of EWE Proverbs na ihe osise na nsụgharị nke Cephas Yao Agbemenu na 1 Nọvemba 2010
Ceridwen Dovey (amụrụ na afo 1980) bụ onye South Afrika na Ọstrelia ọkà mmụta gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na onye edemede
N'afọ 2009, akpọrọ ya onye 5 n'okpuru 35 họpụtara site na National Book Foundation na afo 2020 meriri Bragg UNSW Press Prize for Science Writing
A mụrụ Dovey na Pietermaritzburg, South Afrika, ma tolite n'etiti South Afrika na Ostrelia
Nne na nna ya nwetara aha ya site n'otu n'ime ndị na-akpa ike na akwụkwọ akụkọ Richard Llewellyn nke afo 1939 setịpụrụ na Wales, How Green bụ Ndagwurugwu M

Dovey gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Ostrelia na North Sydney Girls High School, tupu ọ gaa United States na 1999 ka ọ gụọ akwụkwọ na Harvard University dị ka onye na-agụghị akwụkwọ ebe ọ gụchara akara ugo mmụta nkwonkwo na Anthropology na Visual & Environmental Studies na afo 2003
N'oge ya na Harvard, Dovey mere akwụkwọ akụkọ nke gosipụtara mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị ọrụ ime obodo na South Africa mgbe apartheid gasịrị
O mere akwụkwọ akụkọ gbasara mmekọrịta ndị ọrụ ugbo mmanya na Western Cape nke South Afrika, Aftertaste, dịka akụkụ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ nsọpụrụ ya
Na afo 2004 Dovey rụrụ ọrụ obere oge maka mmemme telivishọn UGBUA ya na Bill Moyers na Channel Thirteen na New York City tupu ọ kwaga South Afrika iji mụọ ihe okike na Mahadum Cape Town

O dere akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya Blood Kin dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya maka MA na ide ihe okike n'okpuru nlekọta nke onye na-ede uri Stephen Watson, wee mee akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Social Anthropology na New York University
Ọ laghachiri na Sydney, Australia na afo 2010
Site na afo 2010 ruo afo 2015 ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka Institute for Sustainable Futures na Mahadum Teknụzụ Sydney
Ọ na-ede akụkọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo maka mbipụta dị iche iche, gụnyere newyorkercom na The Monthly
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ Dovey, Blood Kin bụ nke Atlantic Books (UK), Penguin (South Africa) na Penguin (Australia) bipụtara na July afo 2007, na Viking na North America na March afo 2008
E bipụtara ya na mba iri na ise, gụnyere Germany, France, Italy, Netherlands, na Sweden

Edepụtara ya na afo 2007 maka ihe nrite Dylan Thomas na ihe nrite John Llewellyn Rhys nke UK maka ndị na-ede akwụkwọ Britain/Commonwealth n'okpuru afọ 35 wee depụta ya na afo 2008 maka Nrite Commonwealth Writers' for Best Book (Africa)
Ọ na-akọ akụkọ banyere ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ndị agha na-emeghị eme site n'echiche nke onye ndu a kwaturu ihe osise, isi nri na isi isi
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ kpachaara anya nwee mgbagwoju anya na ntọala ya
Akwụkwọ nke abụọ Dovey, Only the Animals bụ nchịkọta akụkọ mkpirisi iri banyere mkpụrụ obi nke anụmanụ iri ndị e jidere na esemokwu mmadụ na narị afọ gara aga

Ọ meriri mmalite afo 2014 Readings New Australian Writing Award na Nhọrọ Ndị Mmadụ maka Fiction Award (njikọ na Joan London's The Golden Age ) na NSW Premier's Literary Awards, yana Queensland Literary Awards Steele Rudd Award maka nchịkọta akụkọ dị mkpirikpi
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Dovey nke atọ, N'ime Ogige Ndị Gbapụ, ka ebipụtara na mbido 2018
Ndị ode akwụkwọ na ndị edemede Ceridwen Dovey na JM Coetzee ka ebipụtara na Ọktoba 2018 dịka akụkụ nke usoro Black Inc's Writers on Writers
Life After Truth bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nke anọ nke Dovey wee bipụta ya na Nọvemba 2020
O bi na Sydney, Australia, ya na di ya, Blake Munting, na ụmụ ya abụọ
Nne na nna ya bi na Sydney na nwanne ya nwanyị, Lindiwe Dovey, bụ nnukwu onye nkuzi na African Screen Media na SOAS na London
Cerinah Nebanda (1988-2012) bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Uganda, na-anọchite anya Butaleja District Women's Constituency
Ọnwụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na anọ, na Disemba 2012, kpalitere esemokwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Otú ọ dị, n'ememe olili ozu Nebanda, Ọkà okwu Rebecca Kadaga jụrụ akụkọ a
Onye isi ala Uganda Yoweri Museveni gọnahụrụ na National Resistance Movement, otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ya na Nebanda nwụrụ anwụ nọ na ya, gburu ya

Akwụkwọ akụkọ Observer kọrọ na ụfọdụ ndị omeiwu Uganda (MPs) [onye?] kwenyere na Nebanda nwere nsí, ebe ọ bụ onye na-akatọ gọọmentị, nakwa na steeti ahụ 'na-ejide onye ọ bụla a na-enyo enyo na ọ na-agbasa usoro ahụ'
Otu n'ime ndị e jidere bụ ndị omeiwu abụọ, otu n'ime ha bụ Mohamed Nsereko
N'oge gara aga, akwụkwọ akụkọ The Daily Monitor kọrọ na e jidere onye na-ahụ maka ọrịa nke ezinụlọ Nebanda gwara ka ọ nyochaa ihe nlele ya mgbe ọ na-aga nyocha na South Africa
Na Jenụwarị 2, 2013, ndị uwe ojii kwupụtara na ha amalitela nyocha banyere ọnwụ Nebanda ma jikọta ya na ihe ha kpọrọ 'òtù ọgwụ ọjọọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ mba gụnyere Uganda, Pakistan, na South Sudan'
Na Jenụwarị 4, e jidere enyi nwoke Nebanda, Adam Suleiman Kalungi, na Kenya ma nyefee ya na Uganda maka ajụjụ ndị uwe ojii
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2014, a tọhapụrụ ya n'ebubo mpụ gbara ọnwụ ya gburugburu
Cers, nké ndị bi n'ebe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Narbonne na-akpọkwa Narbonnais, bụ ifufe kpọrọ nkụ nké na-ajụ oyi n'oge oyi ma na-ekpo ọkụ n'oge ọkọchị
N'ịbụ nké sitere na ikuku mmiri Atlantic na-agafe n'ógbè Toulouse, Cers na-esikwu ike site na ọdịiche Lauragais
Ifufe Cers na-adịkarị gafee mpaghara Aude na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ France
N'ụzọ pụrụ iche, ọdịda anyanwụ na-acha ọbara ọbara na igwe ojii lenticularis na-ekwukarị mbido nke Cers
Ọ nwèrè njikọ chiri anya na Mistral, mànà ókwú Cers na-ezo áká kpọmkwem na ifufe siri ike na bas-Languedoc
Ihe megidere ụdị ifufe a bụ Marin, ifufe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke na-eme gafee Iberian Peninsula
Cey Adams (b
New York, 1962) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, ónyé na-emepụta ihe osise na onye édémédé
Ọ bụ ónyé guzobere onye nduzi okike nke Def Jam Recordings ma mara ya màkà ọrụ ya na Beastie Boys, Public Enemy, LL Cool J, Jay-Z, na Mary J
Blige
A kọwawo ya dị ka 'ónyé a ma ama' màkà ọrụ ya na nhazi ihe osise hip-hop
Adams bụ onye na-ese ihe na ngwụcha afọ irí asaá na mmalite afọ irí asatọ
Ọ gụrụ ihe osise na New York's School of Visual Arts ma mesịa gosipụta ọrụ n'ọbọdọ ahụ n'akụkụ Jean Michel Basquiat na Keith Haring
N'afọ 1982, ọ pụtara na akụkọ ihe méré eme nke PBS Style Wars banyéré ihe odide ụgbọ oloko na New York
Cey Adams zutere Adam Horovitz na 1983, mmekọrịta chiri anya ya na Beastie Boys malitere na Adams na-emepụta mkpụrụedemede nke depụtara aha otu ahụ na mkpuchi nke 12' ha màkà Cooky Puss

N'otu oge ahụ, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Russell Simmons 'Rush Artist Management na-emepụta akara ngosi, ahịa njem, bọọdụ mgbasa ozi, na mkpọsa mgbasa ozi màkà ndị na-ese rap gụnyere Beastie Boys, Run DMC, De La Soul, na LL Cool J

Na ngwụcha afọ irí asatọ Adams na ónyé mmekọ ya Steve Carr guzobere Drawing Board, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ màkà ihe nkírí nke Def Jam Recording na-ahụ ányà na-ahụkarị ụdị ihe nkírí nke ndị na-ese ihe Def Jam na ndị na-eme ihe nkírí bịanyere aka na MCA, Universal, Warner Bros, Bad Boy na BMG

The Drawing Board mechiri na 1999 ma Adams malitere ịrụ ọrụ na mkpọsa mgbasa ozi ụlọ ọrụ màkà ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị ka Levi, Nike, HBO, Coca-Cola, Burton Snowboards, Moët & Chandon, Comedy Central, HBO, na Warner Bros
Adams gàrà n'ihu na-emepụta akara na akara ngosi, na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị ka Revolver Films na Asylum Records, na ndị na-ese egwu dị iche iche dị ka Foo Fighters, Don Henley, na Mary J
Blige
Site na 1999 - 2000 Adams rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé nduzi okike màkà Urban Magic, mmalite ịntanetị nke Magic Johnson na onyeisi oche Starbucks Howard Schultz guzobere
N'afọ 2000, o jikọtara aka mepụta ngalaba hip-hop nke Seattle's Experience Music Project
N'afọ 2001, Dave Chappelle goro Adams ka o mepụta akara ngosi màkà ihe ngosi ọhụrụ ya, 'Chappelle's Show' na Comedy Central

N'ịsọpụrụ ncheta afọ iri anọ na anọ nke ọmụmụ Hop Hip na Ọgọst 11, 2017, Google wepụtara Doodle nke mbụ nke ya nke gosipụtara ihe ngosi omenala nke ónyé na-ese ihe osise Cey Adams, turntables mmekọrịta nke ndị ọrụ nwere ike ịgwakọta ihe nlele sitere na egwu ndị a ma ama, na ọrụ nke akụkọ Hip Hop - na-ekwusi ike na ndị ọsụ ụzọ ya

Na mmekorita ya na ónyé na-ese foto Janette Beckman, Adams rụrụ ọrụ na ọrụ a na-akpọ 'Mash Up' ebe ndị na-ese ihe na-ese onyinyo 'remixed' foto Beckmanz nke ndị na-eti egwu hip hop, nke e wepụtara dị ka akwụkwọ na 2018
Maka mmalite nke ụlọ ahịa ọhụrụ Levi na Times Square na Nọvemba, 2018, Adams bipụtara ma tinye uwe
Cg'ose Ntcox'o (mgbe ụfọdụ Xhose Noxo), nke a maara dị ka Cgoise (c
1950 - October 6, 2013) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Motswana
Ntcox'o bụ onye otu agbụrụ Ncoakhoe nke ndị San, a mụrụ ya na mpaghara Ghanzi nke Botswana
Ọ bụ onye otu Kuru Art Project

Ná mmalite afọ ndị 1990 e gosipụtara ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya na gallery na London ma ndị nnọchi anya British Airways hụrụ ya, bụ ndị kpebiri ịzụta otu n'ime ibe ya ma jiri ya dị ka ntọala maka atụmatụ na atụmatụ agbụrụ ha
Onye nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ gara Afrịka ịhụ ya; n'okwu ya, e nyere ya 'otu mpempe akwụkwọ ma gwa ya
ka o mee obe'
N'agbanyeghị eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọ maghị akwụkwọ, a na-ewere azụmahịa a dị ka ihe na-ejide onwe ya ma mee ka ọ nyefee ikike maka ọrụ ya
O nwetara 12,000 pula maka ọrụ ya
N'oge ahụ di ya na-arịa ụkwara nta na nwa ya nwanyị enweghị ọrụ, ọ bụkwa ya na-ahụ maka ịkwado nnukwu ezinụlọ
N'oge ọrụ ya, ya na otu ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe na San si na Kuru Art Project na mbipụta nke Qauqaua, akwụkwọ ndị na-ese ihe nke e bipụtara na Johannesburg n'afọ 1996

N'afọ 1999, ọ sonyere otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe asatọ, anọ sitere na Kalahari na anọ sitere na New Mexico, iji sonye na mgbanwe ọdịbendị na Mahadum nke New Mexico nke ha ga-emepụta ọtụtụ lithographs n'isiokwu nke ndị aghụghọ na akụkọ ọdịnala
A na-anọchite anya ya na nchịkọta nke Portland Museum of Art na obodo Albuquerque, New Mexico, nke na-egosipụta lithograph ya Jujubu na Nxam Veldfood na City na County Government Building
N'afọ 2004, ọrụ ya pụtara na stampụ mpempe akwụkwọ nke Botswana nyere, otu n'ime usoro anọ na-egosi ọrụ ndị na-ese ihe n'oge a; ndị ọzọ nọchitere anya na set gụnyere Nxaedom Qhomatca na Qgoma Ncokg'o
N'oge ndụ Ntcox'o, onye na-ese ihe ibe ya bụ Coex'ae Qgam, onye ya na ya biri ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Ntcox'o n'onwe ya nwụrụ site na ọrịa strok, ọ fọrọ obere ka ọ ghara ị hapụ inwe ala
Châteauvieux Nwere ike izo aka n'ebe ndị a na France
Chéri Samba ma ọ bụ Samba wa Mbimba N’zingo Nuni Masi Ndo Mbasi (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 30 n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1956) bụ onye na-ese ihe si Democratic Republic of Congo
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka a maara nke ọma, ebe a na-etinye ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke Centre Georges Pompidou na Paris na Museum of Modern Art na New York
A na-ahụkwa ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke eserese ya na The Contemporary African Art Collection (CAAC) nke Jean Pigozzi A kpọrọ ya ka ọ sonye na 2007 Venice Biennale
Ihe osise ya fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mgbe niile na-agụnye ederede na French na Lingala, na-ekwu maka ndụ na Africa na ụwa nke oge a
Samba bi na Kinshasa na Paris
Na mbụ, aha Samba bụ David Samba, mana na mba ya enwere mmachibido iwu maka idebe / inye ndị mmadụ aha mbụ nke Ndị Kraịst, ya mere o kpebiri ịgbanwe ya na Samba wa Mbimba N’zingo Nuni Masi Ndo Mbasi
Mgbe e mesịrị, Samba nakweere aha Chéri Samba, nke ọ chọrọ ịgbanwe na Dessinateur Samba, mana ọ bụghị n'ihi mmekọrịta ya na ọha na eze
Aha ikpeazụ ya, Samba, nwere ihe abụọ pụtara n'asụsụ Kikongo, na-ezo aka n'omume ekpere ma ọ bụ omume ikpe
Nne na nna Samba nwere njikọ na omenala Kongo, mana Samba họọrọ ịmata onwe ya na omenala Kinshasa, nke bụ isi obodo nke mba ya
Samba na-ekwu na a gbanwere ya onye Katọlik, mgbe ọ na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ naghị ajụ ma ọ bụ gọnahụ Iso Ụzọ Kraịst, nke bụ okpukpe o tolitere na ya, mana ọ na-ekwu na ọ na-anwa iguzogide mgbalị ọ bụla itinye akara nkwupụta na okpukpe ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Katọlik, Samba gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Samba nọgidere na-abụ onye nke abụọ na klas, ma e wezụga otu afọ ebe ọ bụ onye mbụ
N'afọ nke atọ ya, Samba kwụsịrị
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, Samba na-ese ihe mgbe niile ma cheta na nna ya enweghị mmasị ịhụ ya ka ọ na-ese ihe
Okpukpe Cherí Samba bụ Katọlik na ntụgharị Zairian, nke metụtara ọtụtụ ihe osise ya dị ka Cherí Samba Beseeches the Cosmos
A mụrụ Chéri Samba na Kinto M’Vuila, Democratic Republic of Congo, dị ka ọkpara nke ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ iri
Nna ya bụ onye na-akpụ ọla na nne ya bụ onye ọrụ ugbo
N'afọ 1972, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, Samba hapụrụ obodo ahụ iji chọta ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe ịrịba ama na isi obodo Kinshasa, ebe ọ zutere ndị na-ese ihe dị ka Moké na Bodo
Otu ndị na-ese ihe a, gụnyere nwanne Samba nke nta bụ Cheik Ledy, bịara bụrụ otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ kachasị mma nke eserese a ma ama na mba ahụ
N'afọ 1975, Samba mepere ụlọ ọrụ nke ya
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ ghọkwara onye na-ese onyinyo maka magazin ntụrụndụ Bilenge Info
Na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese bọọdụ mkpọsa na onye na-ese ihe na-atọ ọchị, o jiri ụdị nke ụdị abụọ ahụ mgbe ọ malitere ịme ihe osise ya na ákwà sacking

Ọ gbaziri ojiji nke 'okwu bubbles' site na nka na-atọ ọchị, nke nyere ya ohere ịgbakwunye ọ bụghị naanị akụkọ kamakwa nkọwa na ihe ndị o dere, si otú a nye ya ụdị ntinye aka ya nke ijikọta eserese na ederede
Ọrụ ya mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ama ama n'obodo
Na 1979 Samba sonyere na ihe ngosi Moderne Kunst aus Afrika, nke a haziri na West Berlin
Ihe ngosi ahụ bụ akụkụ nke mmemme nke ememme mbụ Horizonte - Festival der Weltkulturen
Ọ bụ onye isi na ihe nkiri 1982 Kin Kiesse, na-enye echiche ya banyere ndụ na Kinshasa

Dị ka onye nduzi ihe nkiri ahụ, Mwezé Ngangura si kwuo, Samba nyere aka n'ime ihe nkiri ahụ, na-eme ka Mịnịstrị French nke Mmekọrịta, France 2 na telivishọn Congo kwenye na Ngangura nwere ike ime ihe nkiri na Kinshasa
Ọganihu Samba bụ ihe ngosi Les Magiciens de la Terre na Centre Georges Pompidou na Paris na 1989, nke mere ka a mara ya na mba ụwa
N'afọ 2007, onye nlekọta Robert Storr kpọrọ Samba ka ọ sonye na 52nd International Art Exhibition na Venice Biennale, nke isiokwu ya bụ 'Think with the Senses—Feel with the Mind'
Art in the Present Tense', nke The Huffington Post kọwara dị ka 'n'ezie 'ihe ngosi' nke narị afọ ọhụrụ a'
Ihe odide Samba bu n'obi imesi ịda ogbenye, nzuzu banyere ọdịbendị ya, nrụrụ aka, na ọgba aghara na ọrụ ya
Samba na-ekwu, “Ana m arịọku akọ na uche ndị mmadụ
Ana m ese eziokwu maọbụ ọ bụrụ na ọ na-awụ akpata oyi n'ahụ, ana m etinye ọchị na agba n'ime ya iji dọta ndị mmadụ
N'ihe odide ya, J'aime la couleur piece na-abanye n'agbụrụ na njirimara onwe onye
Ọ na-akọwa otú Samba si kwenye na ahụmịhe na usoro nke ịkwado na ịmegharị otu njirimara n'ofe mba ofesi ga-egosi otu esi ewusi obodo ike
Ọ na-esekarị onwe ya n'etiti nkọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ngosipụta naanị ya
Ihe ngosi otu
Chaïbia Talal ( Arabic ) (1929 - Eprel 2, 2004) bụ onye Morocco na-ese ihe
A mụrụ Chaïbia na Choutka, obere obodo dị nso na El Jadida, Morocco n'afọ 1929
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, nne na nna ya zigara ya Casablanca ka ọ gaa lụọ nwoke dị afọ iri asaa
Ka ọ na-erule afọ iri na anọ, ọ mụrụ nwa nwoke, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị di ya nwụrụ
Mgbe di ya nwụrụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eje ozi iji nweta ego iji kwado onwe ya na nwa ya nwoke
Talal raara onwe ya nye inye nwa ya nwoke agụmakwụkwọ, ọkachasị agụmakwụkwọ, ọ bụ ezie na Talal n'onwe ya ga-anọgide na-agụghị akwụkwọ ndụ ya niile
Mgbe ọ natara ihe osise site n'aka ndị bịara abịa na nrọ, a kpaliri ya ịmalite eserese
A nabataghị ọrụ ya nke ọma na mbụ na ụwa nka nke Morocco
Nwa Talal ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe a na-akwanyere ùgwù n'onwe ya, n'afọ 1965 a kpọbatara Talal na onye nduzi nke Museum of Modern Art na Paris, Pierre Gaudibert onye ọrụ ya masịrị ya
Mgbe nzukọ a gasịrị, e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Goeth-institute na Casablanca na Museum of Modern Art na Paris na 1966
N'ịbụ onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya, a maara Talal maka imebi ókèala ọdịnala
A na-ahazi ọrụ ya dị ka 'nka onye ezi' nke na-egosi echiche na-enweghị atụ site n'aka ndị otu na-abụghị omenala
Ọrụ ndị na-ese ihe site na CoBrA painting movement metụrụ ya n'ahụ
Ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ, dịka onye nta akụkọ Ahmed El Fassi, na-ewerekwa ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-enweghị uche
N'afọ 2015, onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Youssef Britel mepụtara ihe nkiri akụkọ ndụ, nke akpọrọ Chaïbia
Ọ bụ David Villemin na Youssef Britel dere ihe nkiri a, ma gosipụta Saadia Azgoun dị ka Chaïbia Talal
N'afọ 2004, Talal nwụrụ n'ihi nkụchi obi na Casablanca mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na ise
Chaba Fadela (amụrụ Fadela Zalmat, na Oran, Algeria, 5 Febụwarị 1962) bụ onye Algeria na-eti egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A zụlitere ya n'ógbè ndi dara ogbenye, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Algeria Djalti mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwu na Boutiba S'ghir's band wee malite ọrụ ndekọ ya na onye na-emepụta Rachid Baba Ahmed na ngwụcha afọ 1970
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ mebiri mmachibido iwu a machibidoro ụmụ nwanyị ịbụ abụ na klọb, ọ nwetakwara nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma na Algeria ngwa
Ọ zutere ma lụọ Cheb Sahraoui, ha abụọ malitekwara idekọ ọnụ dị ka mmadụ abụọ, malite na 1983 na 'N'sel Fik (You Are Mine)', nke ghọrọ otu n'ime ndekọ mba ụwa mbụ
Mango/Island/PolyGram Records wepụtara abọm nke egwu sitere na nnọkọ ndị ahụ na 1989
Fadela na Sahraoui gara mba ụwa ma dekọọ egwu n'ọtụtụ ebe n'afọ ndị 1980, na ihe ịga nke ọma
Mgbe ha nọ na New York na 1993 ha dekọrọ abọm Walli na onye na-emepụta ihe na onye na'ọtụtụ ngwá egwu Bill Laswell
Ha si Algeria kwaga France na 1994
Na ngwụcha afọ ndị 1990, mmekọrịta ọkachamara nke dị n'etiti Fadela na Sahraoui mebiri, ma kemgbe ahụ, Fadela gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-agụ egwu
Chabangu bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Charity Eke, onye àmà ama dika Chacha Eke Faani, bụ otu onye omee ihe onyoonyo n'ala Naijiria nke bi na Delta State
Ọ pụtara ihe oge ọ mechara otu ihe onyoonyo n'afọ 2012 The End is Near
A mụrụ Eke n' Ebonyi State, ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria

Ọ gara akwụkwọ Ọtaakara na Praimari n' ESUT Nursery & Primary School dị n'Ebonyi State, gụọ Akwụkwọ Sekọndarị na Our Lord Shepherd International School dị n'Enugu Ọ nwetere nzere BSc na Accountancy na Mahadum Ebonyi State University
Eke bụ nwa Ebonyi State Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka Agụmakwụkwọ, Professor John Eke
Ọ lụrụ Mazị Austin Faani onye Ntuziaka ihe Onyoonyoo n'afọ 2013, ha mụtara ụmụ nwanyi abụọ Kamara Faani na Kaira Faani

Agha nke Chad na Naijiria bụ agha dị mkpirikpi na nke na-adịghị ahụ mgbe nile bụ nke a lụrụ maka ịchịkwa agwaetiti dị na ọdọ Chad

Agha a bidoro mgbe ike nke onye isi ndị ọrụ nchekwa nke ndị agha Chad bụ Idriss Déby wakporo akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Borno Steeti, wee kwụsị na mgbe ndị agha Naịjirịa nke Muhammadu Buhari chụpụrụ ndị Chad ma wakpoo mpaghara ndị Chadi oge dị mkpirikpi
Agha a mere n’oge ọgbaghara Chad na Libya, nwa obere oge ka Chad nwesịrị agha obodo nke ndị nchekwa udo Naịjirịa chọtara onwe ha n’ọgbọ agha
Ọgbaghara ọzọ jikọrọ mmekọrịta Chad na Naijirịa bụ esemokwu mpaghara dị n'akụkụ Ọdọ Mmiri Chad, bụ nke butere esemokwu nke oge dị anya
N'abalị iri na-asatọ nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 1983, ndị agha Chad wakporo ma weghara agwaetiti iri na itoolu na Ọdọ Mmiri Chad
N'ịrụ ọrụ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị Naịjirịa, Muhammadu Buhari, onye isi ndị isi (GOC) nke ngalaba agha nke atọ nke Jos, mechiri ókèala Chad na Naijiria wee chịkọta ndị agha ya
Gọọmentị Naịjirịa n'okpuru Onye isi ala Shehu Shagari nyere iwu ka Buhari mepee ókèala, mana ọ jụrụ n'ihu ọha, họrọ ịchụpụ ndị agha Chadi na-enweghị ngọzi ndị gọọmentị
Ndị agha Naịjirịa weghachitere agwaetiti ndị ahụ nke gara nke ọma, ma chụọ ndị Chadi kilomita iri ise n'ofe okeala
Agha a bụ otu n’ime ihe butere igba okpuru ọchịchị Naịjirịa n’afọ 1983
Igosiputa enweghi ike nke onye isi ochichi Shagari na ndi isi oru ya nile, nke nyere Buhari aka ime ihe megide iwu ya, o gosiputara nsogbu di n’etiti ndi agha na ndi ochichi gọọmenti nkịtị
Ka ọnwa Decemba dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na otu n’afọ 1983, Muhammadu Buhari weghaara ọchịchị n’obodo Naịjirịa, wee mechie Second Nigerian Republic

Chadian Arabic (Arabic), nke a makwaara dị ka Shuwa Arabic, Baggara Arabic, Western Sudanic Arabic, ma ọ bụ West Sudanic Arabic (WSA), bụ ụdị Arabic dị iche iche na asụsụ mbụ nke nde mmadụ 16, ma ndị bi n'obodo ma ndị na-azụ ehi
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-asụ ya bi na ndịda Chad

Ogologo ya bụ oval site n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ gaa n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ na Sahel, ihe dị ka kilomita 1,400 (2,300 km) n'ogologo (12 ruo 20 degrees n'ebe ugwu) site na kilomita 300 (480 ) site n'enyemaka gaa n'okpuru (n'etiti 10 na 14 degrees n'akụkụ ugwu)
Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ókèala a niile dị na Chad ma ọ bụ Sudan
A na-asụkwa ya n'ebe ndị ọzọ dị nso n'Ọdọ Mmiri Chad na mba Cameroon, Nigeria, Niger
N'ikpeazụ, a na-asụ ya na slivers nke Central African Republic, na South Sudan
Na mgbakwunye, asụsụ a na-eje ozi dị ka asụsụ a na'ọtụtụ mpaghara
N'ọtụtụ ebe ọ dị, ọ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ asụsụ mpaghara ma na-abụkarị ọ bụghị n'etiti ndị isi
Asụsụ a enweghị aha ala nke ndị niile na-asụ ya na-eke karịa 'Arabic'
O bilitere dị ka asụsụ obodo nke ndị na-achị ehi na-akwagharị (baggāra, Standard Arabic baqqāra بَقَّارَة, pụtara 'ndị na-achị ehi', sitere na baqar)
Kamgbe e bipụtara ụtọasụsụ Igbo n'afọ 1920, a na-akpọ asụsụ a n'agụmakwụkwọ dịka 'Shuwa Arabic'; Otú ọ dị, a na-eji okwu ahụ bụ 'Shuwa' nanị n'etiti ndị na-abụghị ndị Arab na Borno State, Nigeria
N'ihe dị ka afọ 2000, onye ọkachamara n'asụsụ ahụ bụ Jonathan Owens tụpụtara okwu ahụ 'Western Sudanic Arabic'
Echiche ala nke 'Sudanic' nke Owens na-akpọku abụghị obodo Sudan nke oge a, kama Sahel n'ozuzu ya, mpaghara akpọrọ bilad al-sudan, 'ala nke ndị ojii', nke ndị Arab na-azụ azụ dị ka oge ochie
N'oge nke British colonialism na Africa, colonial nchịkwa jikwa 'Sudan' pụtara Sahel dum
Chadlia Saïda Farhat Essebsi (Arabic; 1 August 1936 意 15 September 2019) bụ nwanyị mbụ nke Tunisia (2014 意 2019) dị ka nwunye onye isi ala Beji Caid Essebsi
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ nke ise nke Tunisia, yana nke abụọ na-esote mgbanwe Tunisia
A mụrụ Farhat n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1936
Ọ lụrụ Beji Caid Essebsi, onye ọka iwu na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị afọ iri karịa ya, na 8 Febụwarị 1958
Di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ ụmụ anọ ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Amel na Salwa, na ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Mohamed Hafedh na Khélil
Farhat Essebsi ghọrọ First Lady nke Tunisia na 31 Disemba 2014 mgbe a na-ewepụta di ya dị ka onye isi ala
A kọrọ na echiche na-akpụ akpụ na Carthage Palace, Obí Onye isi ala, enweghị mmasị n'echiche nke ịkwagala n'ụlọ ya
Dị ka nwanyị mbụ, ọ na-ewere ọkwa dị elu, ma n'ihu ọha ma n'azụ ihe nkiri, karịa onye bu ya ụzọ, nwanyị mbụ Beatrix Marzouki

Farhat Essebsi nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi na 15 Septemba 2019, mgbe ọ dị afọ 83, ihe na erughị ọnwa abụọ mgbe di ya nwụ sịrị na n'otu ụbọchị ahụ dị ka ntuli aka mba iji chọpụta onye ga anọ chi onye isi ala Essebsi

Chaetodon trichrous (Tahiti butterflyfish) bụ ụdị azụ dị na ezinụlọ Chaetodontidae
A gụnyere ụdị a na subgenus Lepidochaetodon
N'afọ 1984, André na Roland Bauchot Maugé tụrụ aro itinye ụdị a na ụdị ọhụrụ Mesochaetodon
Chaetodon trichrous nwere ike iru ihe dị ka sentimita 12 (47 in)
Ọkara azụ nke ahụ na acha nchara nchara ruo oji, ebe akụkụ ihu na acha ntụ ntụ, na obere akara ojii kwụ ọtọ site na anya
Ọdụ ya na acha odo odo
Azụ ndị a na eri nri n'elu ihe siri ike na plankton
Ha na ebikarị naanị ha, abụọ ma ọ bụ n'ìgwè
Ụdị a dị na French Polynesia (Agwaetiti Marquesas, Society IslandsTahiti, Tuamotu Archipelago) na etiti ndịda Oke osimiri Pasifik
Chaetodon trichrous na ahọrọ ebe obibi ndị na adịghị omimi n'ụsọ oké osimiri, lagoon reefs na nkume reefs, na omimi n'etiti mita 3 na 25
Zakia Bent Haj Boubaker Marrakchi, onye a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Chafia Rochdi na Nana (November 7, 1910 - July 21, 1989) bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na mba Tunisia
A mụrụ ya n'abalị 7, ọnwa Nọvemba , afọ 1910, na Sfax dịka Zakia Bent Haj Boubaker Marrakchi, nne Rochdi bụ onye Turkey nke biri na Tripoli mgbe ọ bụ nwata
N'ịbụ nwa mgbei mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị n'obodo ya
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, Rochdi mụtara ịkpọ piano n'okpuru nduzi nke Prọfesọ
Hedi Chennoufi O mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 1920 n'okpuru nduzi nke Mohamed Chabchoub
N'ịchọ inweta nkwado ọha na eze, ọ gara n'isi obodo Tunis n'afọ 1929 ebe ọ sonyeere onye omenkà Tunisian a ma ama Fadhila Khetmi na mmemme mbụ ya

Ndị na-enwe mmasị na ya kpọrọ ya 'Diva nke ọha na eze' na 'Nana', ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà Tunisia ole na ole malitere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke ya na naanị nwanyị sonyere n'ịmepụta The Rachidia n'akụkụ Mustapha Sfar
O sonyekwara n'òtù ndị egwú dị iche iche na ndị egwu egwu dị egwu nke oge ahụ ma mepụta òtù nke ya a na-akpọ 'Nana Orchestra'
la Foundation Femmes et memorié nyere ya na ndị ọsụ ụzọ ndị ọzọ nke ụlọ ihe nkiri Tunisia otuto site n'ime emume ụbọchị 'Ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke Tunisia'
Ka ọ na-eru n'ọgwụgwụ nke ndụ ya, Rochdi raara onwe ya nye naanị ime ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị 21, ọnwa July, afọ 1989
Chafik Charobim (Nọvemba 4, 1894 na Cairo, 1975), bụ onye a ma ama na-ese ihe na onye na-ese onyinyo nke Ijipt nke sere 'Ijipt nke udo na nke dị jụụ nke senchiri gara aga'
Ọ hụrụ ihe okike n'anya n'ụdị ọ bụla ebe ihe osise ya na-egosi nnukwu ịhụnanya maka oké osimiri, ọzara na ndị Ijipt
Ọ hapụrụ ihe nketa nke ihe karịrị ihe osise 186
Chafik Charobim gụrụ ihe osise na Academy of Fine Arts na Rom
Ọ biri na Paris na Rome ruo afọ ole na ole ebe o sere ma gosipụta nka ya
O tinyere ndụ ya n'ise ihe
Ịhụnanya Charobim nwere maka nnwere onwe na mmasị nka mere ka o see ihe nkiri nke ndụ kwa ụbọchị n'Ijipt
O sere ndị ọkụ azụ, ndị obodo, ụmụ anụmanụ na ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ọ na-achị na ya nwere ịhụnanya maka okike na nnwere onwe
Ihe osise ya na-egosi Osimiri Naịl, ugbo, ụmụaka, anụmanụ na ihe niile mmadụ na-ahụ na ndụ ime obodo
Charobim nwere mmasị ise ihe n'oké osimiri
O nwekwara ezigbo ịhụnanya maka Mediterenian, ụgbọ mmiri ya, ndị njem nleta ya na ndị ọkụ azụ ya
Ebumnuche ihe osise ya bụ igosi Ijipt mara mma, ịhụnanya na udo ebe ndụ dị mfe na ndị mmadụ enweghị nchegbu
Charobim hụrụ Lebanọn n'anya nke mere ka o biri ebe ahụ ọnwa ole na ole kwa afọ
Charobim nwere mmasị ise obodo ya na kọfị ya, ndagwurugwu ya na ndị ya
Charobim dụrụ ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe ọdụ ka ha na-arụsi ọrụ ike mgbe niile n'ihi na o kwenyere na onye na-ese egwu na-arụ ọrụ bụ onye nwere obi ụtọ
Ọ dụrụ ha ọdụ ka ha rụọ ọrụ ike, na-ese ihe kwa ụbọchị ma na-agbaso usoro iheomume
Ọ na-eteta n'elekere ise nke ụtụtụ ma na-ese ihe ruo n'ehihie kwa ụbọchị
Charobim mere nke ọma na obere ihe osise, nke dị nro, ụcha na-ekpo ọkụ, nhazi na nhazi dị mma
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise ya a ma ama bụ
Chaga, nke a akpọrọ Kichaga ma ọ bụ Kichagga, bụ asụsụ Bantu nke ndị Chaga nke ugwu Tanzania, n'ebe ndịda Ugwu Kilimanjaro na-asụ
Ha na-asụkwa asụsụ itoolu Kivunjo, Kimarangu, Kirombo, Kimachame, Kisiha, Kikibosho, Kiuru, Kioldimoshi na Kingassa
Asụsụ ndị Chaga bụ
Chagoury Group bụ ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa mba Naijiria nke nwere isi na Lagos, Lagos Steeti
N'ịbụ ndị Gilbert R

Chagoury na Ronald Chagoury guzobere n'afọ 1971, azụmaahịa ha gụnyere iwu na mmepe ihe onwunwe, ihe igwe ntụ ọka, karama mmiri na ime ka ọ dị ọcha, imepụta iko, mkpuchi, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, imepụta oche, nkwukọrịta, njem, IT, nri na ego mba ụwa
Ọrụ gụnyere Eko Atlantic City, nke dị nso na Victoria Island na Lagos Steeti
A ga-ewu ọrụ ahụ n'ala e weghachiri nke furu efu n'ihi mbuze mmiri
Grands Moulins du Bénin Flour Mill malitere mmepụta n'afọ 1972 ma ugbu a na-emepụta metric ton narị abụọ na iri ịse nke ntụ ọka kwa ụbọchị, na ọka wit si France na USA
Ọrụ gụnyere Port Harcourt Flour Mills; Ideal Flour Mells; Nigerial Eagle Flour Molls; Niger Delta Flour Mils; Tin Can Island; Ragolis Waters; Glassforce; Pirotech; Silhouette Furniture
C & C Construction Company Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ mbụ n'ime ngalaba iwu nke Chagoury Group nke ụlọ ọrụ

Ọrụ ndị a rụzuru gụnyere Ideal Flour Mills; Nigerian Eagle Flour Molls; Tin Can Island Grain Receiving Facility na Storage Silos metụtara ya; The State Security Headquarters Building na Abuja, Nigeria; Ụlọ, ụlọ akwụkwọ na ntụrụndụ maka Elf Petroleum Nigeria Limited; ọrụ mmepe n'ụsọ oké osimiri na Osborne Road, Ikoyi
Ọrụ ndị dị ugbu a gụnyere Ocean Parade Towers, mmepe obibi mara mma na Banana Island na Lagos Lagoon; The Nigerian Defence Academy
ITB Construction bụ ụlọ ọrụ injinia na ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ nke nwere isi na Lagos Steeti ma nwee ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara na Abuja
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-elekwasị anya n'iwu ụlọ obibi na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụkwa ogidi ma na-enye ọrụ eletrik na ngwaahịa, gụnyere generators

Ọrụ ndị a rụzuru gụnyere National Assembly Complex na Abuja; Ọrụ mmepe obibi nke okpukpu iri na atọ na Victoria Island; na imewe na iwu ụlọ ndị ọrụ nke 800 maka ndị ahịa ALSCON's Aluminium Smelter Plant

Ọrụ ndị dị ugbu a gụnyere Intercontinental Hotel na Victoria Island (nke nwere okpukpu iri na itoolu, nke a ga-abụ ụlọ kachasị elu n'àgwàetiti ahụ); HQ ọhụrụ maka Magnum Trust Bank nke Nigeria; na isi ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ TOTAL na Port Harcourt

E guzobere Hitech Construction n'afọ 1988, ụlọ ọrụ injinia obodo ahụ bụ ọkachamara na ọrụ akụrụngwa n'ozuzu ya gụnyere ọrụ okporo ụzọ, ọkụ okporo ámá, ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè, usoro mmiri, àkwà mmiri, ihe mgbochi mmiri, ọrụ ala, asphalt, mmiri, atụmatụ ịgba mmiri, draging, na ntinye mmiri
Ndị ahịa Hitech gụnyere Aluminium Smelting Company nke Nigeria; Federal Ministry of Works; Abia State Government; Bayelsa State Government; Lagos State Government; na Nigerian Breweries PLC
Ọrụ ndị a rụzuru gụnyere mgbidi oké osimiri n'akụkụ Bar Beach, na Eko Atlantic
Nke a bụ ọrụ mbụ nke ụdị ya n'Africa iji 'x-blocs' dị elu, nnukwu blọk simenti dị ka x e mere iji kpochapụ ike nke ebili mmiri
E guzobere Fleetwood Transportation n'afọ 1989 ma nwee isi ụlọ ọrụ na Lagos, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ ụgbọ ala gụnyere ndị na-ebu ọka, flatbed, sided na tipper trucks
Fleetwood bụ onye otu Nigerian Association of Road Transport Owners (NARTO)
E guzobere n'afọ 1991, Ụlọ Ọgwụ Ideal Eagle bụ obere ụlọ ọgwụ onwe onye na Lagos Steeti
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-ejere ndị ọrụ Chagoury Group ozi, ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ mba Naijiria na-ejikwa ụlọ ọgwụ ahụ, gụnyere Royal Dutch Shell
Ihe onwunwe gụnyere Eko Hotel na Suites na Lagos; Hotel Presidential na Port Harcourt; na Courdeau Catering
Chaha ma ọ bụ Cheha (na Chaha na Amharic ቸሃ čehā ma ọ bụ čexā) bụ asụsụ Gurage a na-asụ n'etiti Etiopia, karịsịa n'ime mpaghara Gurage na mpaghara Southern Nations, Nationalities and Peoples
Ndị Gurage bi n'obodo ndị Etiopia na-asụkwa ya, ọkachasị Addis Ababa
Chaha bụ nke ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta phonology na morphologists maara maka ọdịdị ya dị mgbagwoju anya
Dị ka Ethnologue si kwuo, olumba nke SBG (Sebat Bet Gurage) bụ Chaha (čäxa), Ezha (äža), Gumer (ma ọ bụ Gwemare, gwämarä), Gura, Gyeto (ma ọ bụrụ Gyeta, gyäta), na Muher (ma ọ bụghị Mwahr, mwäxǝr)
Otú ọ dị, a na-ewere ụfọdụ n'ime ndị a dị ka asụsụ n'onwe ha mgbe ụfọdụ
Karịsịa, Muher dị iche na olumba ndị ọzọ nke na ọ bụghị ọbụna ka a na-emeso ya dịka onye otu Western Gurage nke SBG nọ na ya
Isiokwu a na-elekwasị anya n'asụsụ Chaha, nke a mụrụ karịa ndị ọzọ
Ọ gwụla ma egosiri ya n'ụzọ ọzọ, ihe atụ niile bụ Chaha
SBG nwere usoro fọnịm nke ọma maka asụsụ Semitic Etiopia
Enwere consonants ndị a na-emebu yana nke enweghị olu na ụda olu
Agbanyeghị, asụsụ Chaha nwekwara ọtụtụ consonants nke nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu karịa ọtụtụ asụsụ Semitic ndị Etiopia ndị ọzọ
E wezụga ụdaume asaa nke asụsụ ndị a, SBG nwere ihu oghe-mid (ɛ) na ụdaume azụ (ɔ)
Ụfọdụ olumba ahụ nwere ma ụdaume dị mkpụmkpụ na ogologo, ma ụfọdụ nwere ụdaume imi
Chaatị ndị dị n'okpuru na-egosi ekwentị nke asụsụ Chaha; kpọmkwem ole phonemes dị bụ ihe esemokwu n'ihi mgbagwoju anya nke SBG morphophonology

Maka nnọchiteanya nke ụda SBG, isiokwu a na-eji mgbanwe nke usoro a na-ahụkarị (ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị zuru ụwa ọnụ) n'etiti ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ na-arụ ọrụ na asụsụ Semitic nke Etiopia, mana ọ dịtụ iche na mgbakọ nke International Phonetic Alphabet
Mgbe akara IPA dị iche, a na-egosi ya na brackets na chaatị

na mgbakwunye na mgbagwoju anya na ngwaa morphology e ji mara asụsụ ndị Semitic niile, SBG na-egosipụta ọkwa dị mgbagwoju anya ọzọ n'ihi njikọ dị mgbagwoju anya dị n'etiti nhazi nke consonants na mgbọrọgwụ nke ngwaa na otu esi enweta ha n'ụdị ngwaa ahụ ma ọ bụ a
aha ewepụtara na ngwaa ahụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ngwaa pụtara 'emeghe' nwere mgbọrọgwụ nke nwere consonants {kft} (dị ka ọ na-eme n'ọtụtụ asụsụ ndị Semitic Etiopia ndị ọzọ)
N'ụdị ụfọdụ anyị na-ahụ consonants ndị a niile
Dị ka ihe atụ, nke atọ onye otu nwoke zuru okè Chaha ụdị pụtara 'ọ meghere' bụ käfätä-m
Agbanyeghị, mgbe ejiri otu ngwaa na-abụghị nke onwe, nke pụtara n'ụzọ siri ike 'meghere ya', a ga-agbanwe abụọ n'ime consonants a 'käfʷäč-i-m'
Chahla Benmokhtar (amụrụ 30, Decemba 1997 ) bụ nwa agbọghọ Algeria na egwu volleyball
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu volleyball ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Algeria
O sonyere na 2015 FIVB Volleyball Ukwu ụwa Prix
Na klọb ọ gbara maka Seddouk
VB na 2015

A chain bụ usoro nchịkọta nke ihe ndị ejikọrọ, a na-akpọ njikọ, nke a na-ejikarị ígwè eme, nke nwere njirimara zuru oke yiri nke eriri na ihi na ọ na-agbanwe agbanwe ma gbagọrọ agbagọ na mkpakọ ma na-aga na ahịrị, siri ike, na ibu na-ebu ibu na nrụgide
Akara nwere ike ịnwe njikọ abụọ ma ọ bụ karịa
Enwere ike ịkewa agbụ site na nhazi ha, nke enwere ike isi site na ojiji ha
Chakaia Booker's 'Anonymous Donor' na Renwick Gallery
Chakaia Booker (amụrụ n'afọ 1953 na Newark, New Jersey) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nke a maara màkà ịmepụta nnukwu ọrụ, ọrụ na-enweghị atụ màkà ma gallery na oghere ọha na eze n'èzí
A na-etinye ọrụ Bookerī n'ihe karịrị nchịkọta ọha na eze 40 ma gosipụta ya na United States, Europe, Africa, na Eshia
A gụnyere Booker na 2000 Whitney Biennial, natara Guggenheim Fellowship na 2005, na American Academy of Arts and Letters Award for Art na 2001
Booker ebiela ma rụọ ọrụ na New York City East Village kemgbe mmalite afọ 1980 ma nwee ụlọ mmepụta ihe na Allentown, Pennsylvania
A mụrụ Chakaia Booker na 1953 na Newark, New Jersey ma zụlite ya na East Orange, New Jersey
Ọ mụtara ịkwa ákwà site n'aka nné nné ya, nwanne nne ya, na nwanne ya nwaanyị
Ịrụzi, ịrụzi, na ịchịkwa ihe n'oge ọ bụ nwata bụ ntọala màkà Bookerz na-esote ụzọ màkà nka, ite, na ihe ọkpụkpụ, ọkachasị site na iji ụkpụrụ, ikwughachi, na owuwu modular
Booker nwetara BA na sociology na Mahadum Rutgers na 1976 na MFA na City College nke New York na 1993
Booker amụọla ịgba egwú Africa, ite, ịkpa ákwà, basketry, na t'ai chi, nkè niile metụtara ụzọ o si arụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe
Chakalaka bụ ihe oriri akwụkwọ nri mba South Africa, nke na-atọ ụtọ, nke a na-ejikarị achịcha, pap, samp, stews, ma ọ bụ curries

Chakalaka nwere ike ịmalite n'obodo ndị dị na mpaghara Johannesburg ma ọ bụ n'ebe a na-egwupụta ọlaedo gbara Johannesburg gburugburu, mgbe ndị ọrụ na-egwe ihe ndị dị na Mozambik na-abịa n'ọrụ na-esi nri (tomato, agwa) na chili iji mepụta ihe na-atọ ụtọ nke Portuguese iji soro papa
Ọtụtụ ọdịiche nke chakalaka dị, dabere na mpaghara na omenala ezinụlọ
Ụfọdụ nsụgharị gụnyere agwa, cabbage na butternut
Dịka ọmụmatụ, enwere ike iji agwa a na-eme n'ime ite, tomato a na-etinye n'ime akpa, yabasị, galik, na curry paste mee nri ahụ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime salad ndị a ma ama na South Africa, a na-ejikarị ya eme ihe na braai (barbecue) ma ọ bụ na nri ehihie Sunday
Enwere ike inye ya na oyi ma ọ bụ na okpomọkụ ime ụlọ
Asusu Chakali bụ asụsụ Gur nke ndi Ghana, nke a na-asụ n'ọtụtụ obodo nta dị na Wa East District nke di na mparara Upper West Region
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị Chakali na-asụ asụsụ abụọ na Wali
Asusu Chakali phonology bụ ihe iji ma atụ nke asụsụ Gur, na ụda, ụdaume nkwekọrịta, na ụdaume egbugbere ọnụ
Chakato (Jakato [ʒàkàtɔ̀] mà ọ bụ Jakattoe) bụ asụsụ West Chadic á na-asụ ná Plateau State, Nigeria
Ọ bụ Roger Blench chọpụtara yá ná 2016
Ìhè dị kà mmadụ 500 na-asụ yá n'otu ọbọdọ, Dokan Tofa, nkè dị n'okporo ụzọ Jos-Shendam ná Plateau State
Blench (2017) na-atụ aro ná Chakato nwèrè ike ịnwe njikọ ná ndekọ ụgha nke asụsụ Jorto
Ndị na-asụ Chakato na-ekwu ná asụsụ ha nwèrè njikọ chiri ányá ná Goemai
A na-asụ Jakato n'obodo Dokan Tofa ná obodo ntà ndị dị nso ná ndịda Plateau State
Obodo Dokan Tofa dị ihe dị ka kilomita 50 n'ebe ugwu Shendam
Jorto bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic nkè á na-ekwu ná á na-asụ ná Plateau State, Nigeria, mà depụta yá ugbua á ná Ethnologue
E webatara yá ná nyocha ethnographic nkè C
Ames na 1934
Glottolog lara ezumike nká ugbu a, dabere na ìhè áká ebe ọrụ ubi nkè Roger Blench gosipụtara nkè na-egosi na ọ nweghị ìhè áká ebe kwụụrụ onwé yá ná Jorto dị

N'aka nkè ọzọ, a jụrụ arịrịọ màkà ịla ezumike nká ná koodu Jorto ISO 639-3 jrt n'ihi ná otú ìgwè ná Naịjirịa nyochara mpaghara, nkè ọ bụ ezie ná há na-akpọ asụsụ ha 'Jakattoe', otu ndị àgbàtà obi na-eji 'Jorto'
Mànà ọnọdụ nkè koodu jrt n'onwe yá mèchàrà gbanwee nwa ógè kà ọ bụrụ 'Deprecated' na ngwụcha 2020
Na Jenụwarị 15, 2021, SIL weghachiri jrt ma gbanwee aha yá kà ọ bụrụ Jakattoe
Àtụ Languages of Nigeria
Chakhchoukha ma ọ bụ chekhechoukha (Arabic) bụ nri nri nri Algeria, a na-eri ya mgbe niile n'ememe, ọkachasị nke a ma ama na mpaghara Aurès
Nri ahụ nwere obere iberibe rougag (obere ogbe achịcha dị larịị) agwakọta ya na marqa, ihe a na-esi nri
Chakhchoukha bụ nri Chaoui nke mbụ nke agbasaala ugbu a n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke ndị Algeria
Okwu chakhchoukha sitere na tacherchert, 'ịda' ma ọ bụ 'ịgbaji n'ime obere iberibe' n'asụsụ Chaoula
A na-eji semolina dị mma eme rougag ma ọ bụ achịcha dị larịị ma, mgbe emechara ya, a na-eji aka dọwara ya ka ọ bụrụ obere iberibe
Mgbe ị na-eri nri n'otu n'otu, a na-etinye ihe dị ka aka abụọ n'ime efere ahụ wee wụnye ofe ma ọ bụ stew n'elu
Marqa ma ọ bụ stew nwere nwa atụrụ a pịrị apị nke e ji ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, tomato, yabasị a pịrị pịrị apụ na chick peas sie
A na-agbakwunye poteto, zucchini, karọt na ose na ngwakọta ahụ dabere na oge, mpaghara na ezinụlọ
Ihe ndị na-esi ísì ụtọ a na-eji eme nri bụ chillies na-acha ọbara ọbara, caraway, ras el hanout, ose ojii na cumin
E nwere ụdị nri a na Batna na obodo ndị dị nso, dị ka Barika, M'Sila na Biskra, nke na-eji ụdị achịcha dị iche
Chakosi, nke a makwaara aha ya Anufo, bụ asụsụ Central Tano nke a na-asụ na ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Ghana, north Togo, northwest Benin na Ivory Coast site na ihe ruru mmadụ 180,000
Chala (Cala) bụ otu asụsụ Gur nke ndi Ghana na asu
Àtụ Languages of GhanaÀtụ Gur languages
Chamba Leko bụ otu n'ime asụsụ abụọ ndị Chamba na-asụ, nke ọzọ bụ Chamba Daka
Ọ bụ onye otu Leko nke asụsụ Savanna, a na-asụkwa ya n'ebe ugwu Naịjirịa na Cameroon
A na-asụkwa Chamba 'Samba', Leko na 'Leeko', 'Lego' ma ọ bụ 'Lekon'
A makwaara asụsụ ahụ dị ka Suntai
Samba, nke a na-akpọ Samba Leeko, dị nnọọ iche na Chamba Daka, nke a na-akpọ Daga Mumi ('asụsụ Daka'), nke otu obere ndị Chamba ọzọ na-asụ na Nigeria
Asụsụ abụọ a ka Joseph Greenberg kewara n'otu n'otu n'otu 2 na 3 (lee asụsụ Adamawa)
Champions League bụ asọmpi egwuregwu, nke a na-ahụkarị n'òtù bọọlụ, nke ndị otu klọb dikasi iche-iche na-asọ mpi na asọmpi mba ha
Aha ahụ sitere na, ma na-ezo aka na, UEFA Champions League
Ọ pụkwara izo aka na
Makgathatso Charlotte Chana Pilane-Majake (amụrụ na 13 Febụwarị 1957) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye bụbụ osote minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ọha na eze na South Africa
Chanel Elisabeth Miller (amuru June 12, 1992) bu onye odee na nka America dabere na San Francisco, California na New York City
A maara ya n'amaghị ama mgbe a wakposịrị ya n'ụzọ mmekọahụ na campus nke Mahadum Stanford na 2015 site n'aka Brock Allen Turner
N'afọ sochirinụ, nkwupụta mmetụta onye ọ tara ahụhụ na ikpe ikpe ya wee malite nje mgbe BuzzFeed bipụtara ya n'ịntanetị, na-agụ ya ugboro nde 11 n'ime ụbọchị anọ
Akpọrọ Miller dị ka ' Emily Doe ' n'akwụkwọ ụlọikpe na akụkọ mgbasa ozi ruo Septemba 2019, mgbe ọ hapụrụ amaghị aha ya wee wepụta ihe ndekọ ya mara aha m
Akwụkwọ ahụ meriri 2019 National Book Critics Circle Award maka Autobiographies wee kpọọ ya n'ọtụtụ ndepụta akwụkwọ mba nke afọ
A na-ekwu na ọ bụ onye kpalitere mkparịta ụka mba na United States banyere ọgwụgwọ nke mwakpo mmekọahụ na ndị a metụtara site na ụlọ akwụkwọ kọleji na usoro ụlọikpe
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ekwu okwu n'ihu ọha
A mụrụ Chanel Miller na 1992 na Palo Alto, California, bụ okenye nke ụmụ nwanyị abụọ nke nne China na nna America
Nne ya si China kwaga ka ọ bụrụ onye edemede na nna ya bụ onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụgwọ ezumike nka
Miller gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Gunn High School na 2010
Ọ gara na Mahadum California, Santa Barbara 's College of Creative Studies site na nke ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na akwụkwọ na 2014

N'uhuruchi nke January 17, 2015, Miller so nwanne ya nwanyị gaa na Kappa Alpha fraternity party na Stanford University ; Mgbe e mesịrị n'abalị ahụ, ụmụ akwụkwọ abụọ Stanford gụsịrị akwụkwọ hụrụ Miller ka ọ dina n'ala n'azụ ihe mkpofu ya na nwa akwụkwọ Stanford ọzọ, Brock Turner dị afọ 19, n'elu ya
Miller amaghị ihe ọ bụla, a na-eche na ọ̀tụ̀tụ̀ mmanya na-egbu ọbara ya bụ 022% n'oge mwakpo ahụ
Mgbe Turner gbalịrị ịgbapụ, ụmụ akwụkwọ abụọ ahụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ jidere ya ma jide ya n'ala ka ha na-eche ka ndị uwe ojii bịarute
E jidere Turner ma kpee ya akwụkwọ n'ebubo mpụ mwakpo mmekọahụ ise, bụ nke ọ gọnarịrị na ọ bụghị ikpe
N'afọ 2016, a mara ya ikpe maka atọ n'ime ebubo ndị a ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ ọnwa isii, nke kpalitere iwe ọha na eze n'ihi ịdị nro nke ikpe ahụ
Akpọrọ onye ọka ikpe na-ekpe ikpe bụ Aaron Persky afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị

Nkwupụta mmetụta mmetụta nke 7,137 ogologo okwu nke Miller - onye e zoro aka na ya na akwụkwọ ụlọikpe na akụkọ mgbasa ozi dị ka ' Emily Doe ' - nke BuzzFeed bipụtara na June 3, 2016, ụbọchị mgbe a tụrụ Turner ikpe, ebigharịrị na isi akụkọ ndị ọzọ dị ka New York Times
Agụpụtara nkwupụta mmetụta nke onye ahụ metụtara ugboro nde 11 n'ime ụbọchị anọ ka ebipụtara ya, na-aga nje
Na Ọgọst 9, 2019, nkeji 60 wepụtara ajụjụ ọnụ Miller—onye kpebiri iji aha ya gaa ọha
Ọ kọwara akụkọ ya na nsonaazụ nke ịbụ onye a na-amaghị aha, wee zute ụmụ akwụkwọ abụọ ahụ kwụsịrị Turner
Ihe ncheta Miller nke akpọrọ Mara Aha M Ebipụtara Memoir na Septemba 4, 2019 site na Viking Books wee bụrụ onye na-ere ahịa kacha mma
Akwụkwọ ahụ meriri 2019 National Book Critics Circle Award for Autobiographies wee kpọọ ya otu n'ime akwụkwọ iri kachasị nke afọ site na Washington Post
Akwụkwọ akụkọ New York ahọrọkwara Mara Aha m maka 'akwụkwọ 100 ama ama nke 2019' Onyinye udo nke Dayton Literary ahọpụtara akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka onye mmeri na-abụghị akụkọ ifo 2020
Mgbe mwakpo ya gasịrị, Miller malitere ịga ọmụmụ ihe nka na nkwenye nke onye na-agwọ ya
N'oge okpomọkụ nke 2015, Miller gara klas nke na- ebipụta akwụkwọ na Rhode Island School of Design na Providence, Rhode Island
N'afọ 2020, ihe onyonyo nke Miller sere pụtara na ebe ngosi nka Eshia dị na San Francisco
Nke 70 ft (21 m) - ogologo na 13 ft (40 m) - ogologo mural na-egosi atọ vignettes nke a katuunu ọgụgụ, na nkebi ahịrịokwu 'M bụ', 'Abụ m', na 'M ga-abụ'
Emechiri ọha ụlọ ngosi ihe ngosi nka n'ihi COVID-19, n'agbanyeghị na a na-ahụ eserese ahụ site na windo chere Hyde Street ihu
