Àtụ Infobox television channel
Channels Television bụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na-arụ ọrụ na-arụpụta akụkọ na telivishọn na-arụ na Lagos, Naijiria
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ nne na nna, Channels Incorporated, na afọ 1992, otu afọ tupu gọọmentị Naijiria ewepụ usoro mgbasa ozi
Ọ malitere mgbasa ozi na afọ 1995
Isi ihe ọ na-elekwasị anya bụ ịmepụta akụkọ na mmemme ihe omume ugbu a na nsogbu ụlọ Naijiria
Ebumnache nke Channel bụ ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eche nche na iwu na ọrụ gọọmentị

E hiwere Channels Television na afọ 1995 dị ka ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn onwe onye nwere naanị ndị ọrụ 15 site n'aka onye mgbasa ozi na onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria bụ John Momoh na Sola Momoh, onye bụkwa onye mgbasa ozi
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere ọrụ na Lagos, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa ma kemgbe ahụ etolitela ịgụnye ọdụ atọ ndị ọzọ na Abuja, Edo na Kano steeti

O nwekwara ụlọ ọrụ na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ steeti ọ bụla na Naịjirịa, gụnyere ndị na-agbanye na ndị mmekọ n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ n'Afrika, yana mmekọrịta siri ike na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi mba ụwa nke na-enye ohere ịnweta ozi gburugburu ụwa
E nyere ọwa ahụ ikikere na Junn, na afọ 1993 ma kenye ya ugboro ugboro na UHF (Channel 39)
Ọ malitere izipu afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị n'okpuru aha, 'Channels Television', na mgbasa ozi mbụ nke ụwa bụ na 1st nke Julai, na afọ 1995, na John Momoh na-agụ akụkọ akụkọ mbụ
Channels TV na-agbasa ozi ugbu a nye ndị na-ege ntị karịrị nde mmadụ iri abụọ

Na Septemba, na afọ 2008, Onye isi ala Yar'Adua mechiri Channels Television, onye zigara Ngalaba Nchebe steeti Naịjirịa (SSS) iji mechie ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ma jide ndị isi ya n'ihi akụkọ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ banyere ọrịa Yar'Adia
Otú ọ dị, mgbe nyocha ahụ gasịrị, NAN kwupụtara na ọwa ahụ enyeghị nkwupụta ọ bụla gbasara onye isi ala ịpụ, kama kama nke ahụ, e mebiri kọmputa ya
Iji mee mkpesa, Channels TV kwụsịrị iji ọrụ waya NAN ruo ụbọchị a
E gosipụtara na ozi ịntanetị nke Channels TV natara bụ aghụghọ sitere na kọmputa dị na Ivory Coast
Ndị otu Channels Television emepụtala mmemme mmemme, nke natara otuto na mba ahụ dum
A na-ewere usoro ihe omume ya, 'News at Ten', dị ka akụkọ kachasị ewu ewu na nke a na-ele anya na Naịjirịa

Kemgbe afọ 2009, Channels Television na-ahazi ma na-akwado 'Channels National Kids Cup', ihe omume egwuregwu maka ụmụaka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ si steeti iri na isii nke Naịjirịa nke emere na Teslim Balogun Stadium na Lagos
Onye isi njikwa nke Channels Television, Steve Judo, kwuru na Channels Television bụ mgbasa ozi na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ma n'ihi ya họọrọ itinye aka na mmepe nke bọọlụ site na mgbọrọgwụ

Na Jenụwarị, na afọ 2012, a gbagburu onye nta akụkọ Enenche Akogwu, onye na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ na Kano maka Channels Television, mgbe ọ na-akọ akụkọ banyere mwakpo a haziri ahazi n'ebe ahụ nke òtù Islamist siri ike a maara dị ka Boko Haram kwuru
Dị ka ndị ọrụ ibe ya si kwuo, Akogwu pụtara mgbe a gbasịrị bọmbụ wee malite ise ihe nkiri nke ìgwè mmadụ gbakọtara n'ebe ahụ n'amaghị na ha bụ ndị òtù nzuzo ji égbè
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2014, Tezuka Productions na Channels TV jikọrọ aka na mgbasa ozi 8 nke Astro Boy, Little Astro Boy
Na Fraịde, 14 Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2015, Deutsche Welle kwuru na ya na 'Channels TV' bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta mmekọrịta iji gosipụta ọdịnala ogologo oge nke igosi echiche dị mma banyere Afrika
Peter Limbourg, onye isi nchịkwa nke Deutsche Welle kọwara Channels TV dị ka nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn na onye mmekọ zuru oke maka Deutsche Welle
Limbourg kwuru 'Anyị nọ na Deutsche Welle chere na anyị ga-akọ akụkọ banyere nnukwu ihe na-eme n'Africa, ọkachasị na Naịjirịa
John Momoh, Chief Executive Officer nke Channels TV kọwara mmekọrịta ahụ dị ka 'E si n'eluigwe mee'

O kwuru, sị, 'Nke a bụ akụkụ nke atụmatụ anyị iji kọọ akụkọ Afrịka, ọkachasị nke Naịjirịa, site n'echiche Afrịka ka anyị ghara ịhapụ isi ihe a nke nkọwa nke onye anyị bụ, ihe anyị na-eme na ihe kpatara ya, nye ndị ọzọ ka anyị gwa maka anyị'
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2015, Channels TV bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta na United Nations na akụkọ
Ban Ki-moon, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nation, nọchitere anya United Nation

Chara (nke ọzọ bụ Ciara ma ọ bụ Cīara) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asia nke dị iche iche nke North Omotic nke mmadụ 13,000 na-asụ na Southern Nations, Nationalities, na People's Region nke Ethiopia
Chara dị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Nayi, ọdịda anyanwụ Kullo, ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Mesketo na ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Gofa
Ndị na-asụ Chara bi na South Nations, Nationalities, na Peoples Region, na mpaghara Debub Omo, n'akụkụ abụọ nke Osimiri Omo
Ndị na-asụ Chara gbasasịa n'ime obodo atọ dị na Etiopia Geba a mesha, Buna Anta, na Kumba
Ndị na-asụ obodo nwekwara ike na-asụ Melo, Wolaytta (54% myirịta lexical na Chara) n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ, yana Kafa n'ọdịda anyanwụ
Ogbugbu mmadụ (CA) bụ mgbalị a kpachaara anya ma na-adịgide adịgide iji mebie aha ma ọ bụ ntụkwasị obi nke mmadụ
Okwu nkeá bụ 'ogbugbu mmadụ' ghọrọ ihe a ma ama bídó n'afọ 1930
Echiche a, dị ka isiokwu nke ọmụmụ ndị ọkà mmụta, bụ Davis (afọ 1950) webatara na nchịkọta edemede ya na-ekpughe ihe ize ndụ nke mgbasa ozi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Afọ iri isii ka e mesịrị, Icks na Shiraev (afọ 2014) mere ka okwu ahụ dị ọhụrụ ma mee ka mmasị agụmakwụkwọ dịghachi mma site n'ikwu okwu ma jiri ya tụnyere ihe omume igbu ọchụ dị iche iche
Icks na Shiraev (afọ 2014) na-ekwu ọtụtụ ụdị sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị iji kọwaa ihe kpatara CA site n'echiche onye na-awakpo ya
Ha kwenyere na mkpali onye na-awakpo na-adaberekarị na ebumnuche ibibi onye ahụ n'ụzọ uche ma ọ bụ belata nkwado ọhaneze ya na / ma ọ bụ ohere ịga nke ọma na asọmpi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, n'oge ntuli aka, a na-ejikarị mwakpo eme ihe iji mee ka ndị na-eme ntuli aka na-enweghị mkpebi, na-eme ka ndị na-eme ntuli aka ghara ịma aka, ma ọ bụ gbochie mgbagha nke ndị na-akwado ya
Mwakpo ndị a na-aghọ ụzọ dị irè iji megharịa ndị na-eme ntuli aka mee ihe dị mma
Ha na-emekwa ka ndị na-akwado ndị na-akwado ya izizi banye n'ọkwa nke ndị 'na-enweghị mkpebi' ma ọ bụ 'ndị na-enweghị nkwa'

Dị ka òtù Thomas si kwuo, igbu mmadụ bụ mgbalị ebumnuche, nke onye na-echegbu onwe ya na / ma ọ bụ ndị na-adabere na ya, iji metụta ngosipụta ma ọ bụ aha mmadụ n'ụzọ ga-eme ka ndị ọzọ nwee echiche na-adịghị mma ma ọ bụ na-adịghị mma maka ha

Ọ na-agụnyekarị ikwubiga okwu ókè ma ọ bụ iji eziokwu eme ihe n'ụzọ aghụghọ, ịgbasa asịrị na mgbasa ozi ezighi ezi iji gosipụta foto na-ezighi ezi nke onye a lekwasịrị anya, na nkatọ na-enweghị isi na oke
Ndị dere akwụkwọ Agwọ na Suits Mgbe Psychopaths Gaa n'ọrụ na-akọwa usoro ise nke otú onye na-arịa ọrịa uche n'ebe ọrụ si arịgo ma nọgide na-enwe ike
Na nkebi nke anọ (mgbagwoju anya), onye ọrịa uche ga-eji usoro igbu mmadụ iji nọgide na-eme atụmatụ ha
Otu mba ụwa maka ọmụmụ ogbugbu agwa (ISSCA) bụ ọkachamara na ọmụmụ agụmakwụkwọ na nyocha màkà ọtú e si gbuo mwakpo na igbu ọchụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme na n'oge a
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2011, ndị ọkà mmụta si obodo itoolu gbakọtara na Mahadum Heidelberg, Germany, iji gbaa ụka 'nkà nke ịkparị na nkwutọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme na taa'
Ha guzobere otu iji mụọ igbu mmadụ mgbe niile
Ndị otu a gụnyere ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na ndị ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ

Tọrọ ntọala n'afọ 2016 na mmekorita ya na ISSCA, Ụlọ nyocha nyocha maka igbu mmadụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị aha (CARP) gụnyere ndị ọkà mmụta nwere ụlọ ịdọ aka ná ntị na akparamaagwa, akụkọ ihe mere eme, nkwurịta okwu na mmekọrịta ọha na eze

Site na ndị nyocha sitere na Mahadum George Mason, Mahadum Baltimore, na Mahadum Amsterdam, ndị otu CARP na-elekwasị anya na mgbalị n'akụkụ atọ dị mkpa nyocha màkà ihe atụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na nke oge a nke igbu ọchụ; agụmakwụkwọ n'ihe gbasara ndị na-ege ntị na ndị na-ege ntị n'ihu ọha banyere ihe kpatara igbu mmadụ, mmetụta na mgbochi; na nyocha ihe ize ndụ iji chọpụta ihe ize ndụ maka ndị ọha na eze na-echegbu onwe ha banyere aha ha
Ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Mason CARP nwere ihe gbasara ụlọ nyocha na ọrụ ya

Ụlọ ọrụ CARP na-ebipụtakwa blọọgụ ma nwee njikọ na Global Informality Project, ihe ntanetị na-eduga maka ihe nzuzo ụwa, iwu ndị a na-edeghị ede na omume zoro ezo, akọwapụtara n'ụzọ gbasara agbasa dị ka 'ụzọ isi mee ihe' Nchịkọta a zuru ụwa ọnụ na nke na-eto eto nke omume a na-adịghị ahụ anya, ma dị ike na-eme ka o kwe omume site na mmekorita dị ịrịba ama nke ndị ọkà mmụta sitere na kọntinent ise

Charity Ogbenyealu Adule (amụrụ na 7 Nọvemba 1993) bụ onye Naịjịria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu maka klọb Spanish Primera División SD Eibar na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria
Na klọb, ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Rivers Angels, Bayelsa Queens na BIIK Kazygurt
Adule malitere ọrụ ya na Rivers Angels wee malite mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ na Female Challenge Cup 2006
Oge izizi ya bụ megịde Pelican Stars, nke o mechara kọwaa dị ka egwuregwu a na-echeta nke ọrụ ya
Ọ gbara, Rivers Angels wee bụrụ nke atọ n'ozuzu na asọmpi ahụ
N'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 2011, ọ hapụrụ Rivers Angels wee sonye na klọb bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Bayelsa Queens na Yenagoa
Adule gbara goolu 57 na egwuregwu 40, maka Bayelsa Queens, ma mee ka ọ bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta na ndị mmeri Kazakh BIIK Kazygurt na Septemba 2014
O mere nke mbụ ya maka BIIK na UEFA Women's Champions League na 8 Ọktoba 2014 megịde German FFC Frankfurt
N'ime afọ ise na BIIK, Adule meriri n'asọmpi ise wee ruo agba nke iri na isii nke 2016-17 UEFA Women's Champions League
N'oge mkpọsa ahụ, ọ gbara goolu megide Wexford Youths, Gintra Universitetas, Verona na Paris Saint-Germain
Na 19 Septemba 2019, a mara ọkwa Adule dị ka onye ọhụrụ bịanyere aka na SD Eibar nke Spain tupu oge 2019-20
Adule gbara bọọlụ maka Nigeria U20 na 2010 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup na Germany na 2012 FIFA U-20 women's World cup na Japan
Kemgbe afọ 2013, Adule agba bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Naịjirịa
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018, ọ kpughere na ọ jụrụ ụzọ ọ ga-esi nọchite anya otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Kazakhstan
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado klọb bọọlụ ụmụ nwoke nke dị na London, Chelsea FC Adule bụ onye okpukpe, ma na-ekwu na ọ bụ Chineke mere atụmatụ ọ bụla n'ọdịnihu ya, na-asị 'Chukwu nwere okwu ikpeazụ na ndụ m
Ekwenyere m na Chineke Pụrụ Ime Ihe Niile nke mere ka m nọrọ ebe a taa ga-akpọrọ m gaa ebe ikpeazụ o meere m
Ihe niile dị na ndụ bụ maka ihu ọma Chineke, ekwere m na ihu ọma Ya n'ebe m nọ, m ga-aga ebe dị anya

Ọrụ ebere Bainababo bụ onye agha Uganda, na onye omeiwu
Ọ na-anọchite anya ndị agha na-echebe ndị Uganda (UPDF) na ndị omeiwu nke Uganda
Bainababo bụbu ADC(Aide-de-camp) na onye isi nchekwa nke nwanyị mbụ nke Uganda na ministari nke agụmakwụkwọ Janet Kataha Museveni
Ọ bụ Brigadier nke Uganda People's Defense Forces (UPDF) na onye na esote onye isi nke SFC
Bainababo bụ onye nnọchi anya ndị agha na nzuko omeiwu nke Uganda ma na-arụ ọrụ abụọ dị ka Dean nke ndị agha nchekwa nke ndị Uganda (UPDF) MPs na nzuko
Charity Kaluki Ngilu (amuru 28 Jenuarị 1952) bu onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Kenya na onye gọvanọ nke abụọ ahọpụtara maka Ógbè Kitui
O nweghi ihe ịga nke ọma ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala mba Kenya na 1997
Ọ jere ozi dị ka onye minista ahụike site na 2003 ruo 2007 na onye minista mmiri na mmiri site na Eprel 2008 ruo 2013
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ Cabinet maka ala, ụlọ na mmepe obodo site na 2013 ruo 2015
A mụrụ Ngilu na Mbooni, Makueni District na 1952
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Alliance Girls High School, wee rụọ ọrụ dịka odeakwụkwọ nke Central Bank of Kenya, tupu ọ ghọọ onye ọchụnta ego
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke plastik
Charity Ọpara (amụrụ ya n'ọnwa ise na-afọ 1972 n'Owere, Imo Steeti) bụ onye Ǫgba-ọsọ nke obodo Naijiria nke kachara maaka na 400 Mitas
Ọ bụ Ǫkachamara n'ọsọ-ọgba anọ nke a na-akpọ 'relay race' na bekee nke omeriri nweta ọla edo n'Olimpik na-afọ 1996
A mara iwu chụpụ Ọpara n'Olimpik n'afọ 1992 na 1996 maka Ọgwụ n'ekwesighi ekwesi
Ọkachamma ya
Charity Chetachukwu Reuben (amụrụ ya na ọnwa disemba 25, n'afo 2000) O bụ onye Naijiria na akpa bọọlụ ukwu, O na agbara ndi BIIK Kazygurt
Ọ nọchitere anya Ibom Angels na Naijiria Women Premier League, na ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa na-erubeghị afọ iri abụọ
Maka asọmpi iko Naịjirịa nke afọ 2017, o nyere goolu asatọ, nke bụ nke kachasị di okpurukpu n'egwuruegwu niile
Mgbe o sonyere na Rivers Angels n'afo 2015, Reuben meriri ihe mgbaru ọsọ isii n'oge 2016 Naijiria Women Premier League
Charity so na asọmpi egwuregwu iko mba ụwa FIFA 2016 U-20 Iko Mba nile nke umu nwanyi

Na Febụwarị 2018, a họpụtara ya site na Naijiria Football Federation maka afọ 2017 umu nwanyi ọkpụkpọ nke afo ahu N’ọnwa Mee nke afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya ka onye kachasị egwu n’egwuregwu 2017 Naijiria Women Premier League na Naijiria Pitch Awards, ma na Rasheedat Ajibade tufuru onyinye a
Charity Reuben na agbara ndị umu nwanyi njikọ nke Kazakhstan maka BIIK Kazygurt football klọb kemgbe 2019
Charl Jean Francois Cilliers (nke a makwaara dị ka Charles Cilliers) (amụrụ na ubochi iri abụo na ise n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1941) bụ onye edemede na onye na-ede uri na South Africa
Ọrụ ya bipụtara gụnyere 'West-falling Light' (1971), 'Has Winter No Wisdom' (1979)
A mụrụ Cilliers na obodo Cape Town, ma too na Free State
Ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị n'ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche ka ezinụlọ ahụ na-agagharị
Ọ gara Clapham High School na Pretoria, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na afọ 1957
Cilliers kụziri ihe gbasara nkwukọrịta na Post Office Training Centre na Pretoria ruo n'afo 1968 mgbe ọ sonyeere ndị omeiwu dị ka onye ntụgharị
Mpịakọta ndị o bipụtara bụ

West-Falling Light, Tafelberg Publishers, 1971; Has Winter No Wisdom, Maskew Miller, 1979; Collected Poems (1960 wee ruo 2008), Malgas Publishers, 2008; Fireflies Facing The Moon (Children's Poems), Malgas Publicers, 2008); The Journey, Malgas Publishors, 2010; A Momentary Stay, Malgas Publicors, 2011; Karoo (Haiku Variations), 2012
Charl J
Cilliers bidoro na-ede uri mgbe ọ dị soso afọ iri na anọ
E bipụtara mpịakọta mbụ ya 'West-falling Light' na afọ 1971, 'Has Winter No Wisdom' sochiri ya n'afọ 1979
O bipụtara na magazin ndị gụnyere Standpunte, Contrast, Ophir, Poet (India), Purple Renoster, New Nation (nke ọ bụkwa onye nchịkọta uri), De Arte, Chirimo (Rhodesia) na Unisa English Studies
Ọrụ ya pụtakwara n'akwụkwọ akụkọ gụnyere 'Two Roads' (nke Ken Durham chịkọtara na afọ 1969), 'Seismograph' (nke Jack Cope chịkọtara n'afọ 1970), 'For All Seasons' (nke F
Rumboll na J

Gardener chịkọtara, 'Out Of The African Ark' (nke David na Guy Butler dezigharịrị na 1988), '25/25' (nkeDavid Bunyan dezigharụrụ na afọ 1989) na 'Somewhere I Have Never Travelled' (nke Terrillolay dezigharịa na afọ 1996)
Charles-Auguste Bontemps (Febụwarị 9, 1893 Ọktoba 14, 1981) bụ onye France na-eme ngagharị iwe, onye na-eme udo, onye na'iche echiche n'onwe ya na onye na-ahụ maka ọdịdị na onye edemede
A mụrụ Bontemps n'ọnwa Febụwarị 9, afọ 1893, na ngalaba Nièvre nke mba France
O jikọtara aka na mbipụta anarchist Ce qu'il faut dire nke Sébastien Faure duziri
Mgbe ọ sonyechara na French Communist Party n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe October Revolution na-aga n'ihu, ọ sonyeere otu ndị na-emegide agha 'Ligue Internationale des Réfractaires à la guerre'
N'oge Agha Obodo Spain ọ sonyeere 'Solidarité Internationale Antifasciste'
Ọ bụ onye dị mkpa na ntọala nke French Anarchist Federation
Bontemps na Maurice Joyeux dere ụkpụrụ ntọala ọhụrụ nke French Anarchist Federation nke guzobere nzukọ nwere ọtụtụ ọchịchọ na nnwere onwe nke otu ndị a haziri gburugburu ụkpụrụ synthesist
O sonyekwara na ntọala nke French Anarchist Federation n'afọ 1953

N'ihe dị ka n'afọ 1967, Bontemps, n'akụkụ Maurice Joyeux na Guy Bodson na akwụkwọ akụkọ Anarchist Federation ́s Le Monde libertaire, na ndị otu Situationist International gụnyere Guy Debord nwere nkatọ
Ọ bụ onye edemede na-edepụta ihe karịsịa na isiokwu nke ọgba aghara, echiche onwe, nkwado udo na Anarcho-naturism
Echiche ya banyere ọgba aghara dabeere na echiche ya nke 'Social Individualism' nke o dere nke ọma
Ọ gbachitere echiche anarchist nke dabeere na 'nchịkọta nke ihe na onye ọ bụla nke ndị mmadụ'
[Ihe e dere n'ala ala peeji] [CCFR, CP, IIHS]
Charles A
Cofield bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ ma na-akwado ndị nwere nkwarụ n'ọrụ ya na Massachusetts na Los Angeles
Cofield gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Howard ebe o merụrụ onwe ya ahụ n'ihi ihe mberede, nke mere ka aka ya na ụkwụ ya kpọnwụọ
Ọ bụ onye mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na MIT School of Architecture ebe ọ natara Bachelor of Science na Architecture na 1972, Master of Architecture na 1973 na Master in City Planning na 1974
N'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, ndị Urban Massachusetts Transit Authority na Ngalaba Housing Urban Development were Cofield n'ọrụ
Ọ nwetakwara MIT Graham-Rotch Foundation Fellowship na 1971, MIT Lawrence B
Anderson Fellowsship na 1972, wee gaa Europe iji mụọ obodo ndị nwere nkwarụ
Mgbe MIT gasịrị, ọ nwetara PhD ya site na UCLA's Urban Planning Program dị ka onye mbụ nwere nsogbu anọ
N'oge Cofield nọ na MIT na UCLA, o nwere ike inye aka iwebata ohere ndị nwere nkwarụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Cofield bụ onye mbụ nwere ikikere quadriplegic architect na steeti California na onye nduzi quadriplegical mbụ nke Los Angeles Housing Authority, nke ọ lekọtara ruo afọ iri abụọ na anọ
Charles Arizechukwu Igwe // (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1958) bụ prọfesọ Naijiria nke sayensị ala na onye isi oche nke iri na ise nke Mahadum Naijiria, Nsukka
Ọ sonyeere mahadum n'afọ 1976 dị ka onye enyemaka nyocha ala bia na 1976 ọ ghọrọ onye ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara Charles ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi ala (nchịkwa) ma họpụta ya ọzọ n'afọ 2018
A mụrụ Charles na Awka, Anambra steeti na ụbọchị iri abụọ na atọ nke Ọgọstụ n'afo 1958
Awka bụ isi obodo Anambra Steeti, Naịjirịa ma nwee ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi na ya dị ihe dị ka mmadụ 301, 657 ka ọ na-erule ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị Naịjirị nke afọ 2006
Awka dị ihe dị ka mili ruru 400 (640 kilomita ) n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Lagos, Naijiria n'etiti etiti obodo Igbo nke South East Nigeria
A mụrụ Charles Arizechukwu Igwe, Prọfesọ nke Sayensị Ala na Awka, Anambra Steeti, Naịjirịa n'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1958
O nwere nzere PhD, MSc
na B Agric na Sayensị ala na Mahadum Naịjiria, Nsukka
O nwetakwara diplọma postgraduate na sayensị ala na Mahadum Ọrụ Ugbo, Norway, Ås
Ọ bụ Onye isi ngalaba; Ony sotere Onye isi ngalaba ngalaba; Onye isi ngalaba ngalaba na Directors of Centres n'oge dị iche iche
Charles bụ onye nyocha / prọfesọ na-eleta na Mahadum ndị dị na Germany, Japan, Norway, Italy na France
Ọ bụ onye otu, Kansụl Na-achịkwa Mahadum ma lekọta ndị Undergraduates, Masters na ọtụtụ ụmụ akwụkwọ PhD na nkuzi ya
Ọ bụ onye nyocha mpụga na onye nyocha prọfesọ n'ọtụtụ Mahadum Naijiria na Europe
Nnyocha Prọfesọ Igwe na-elekwasị anya na onyinye nke organic na mineral colloids na nkwụsi ike nke ala okpomọkụ
O nyere aka nke ukwuu na ihe ọmụma banyere nkwụsi ike nke ala okpomọkụ na-adịghị akwụsi ike nke na-enwe ọdachi na mmiri ozuzo na-ezo n'ebe okpomọkụ
N'ihu Mgbanwe ihu igwe zuru ụwa ọnụ, ọ gbasaa oke nyocha ya iji tinye 'Carbon sequestration na ala okpomọkụ'
N'ọchịchọ ya iji wepụ ihe ndị dị n'ala na-emetụta erodibility (K) ihe nke ụdị erosion, o bipụtara ụfọdụ ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ na mgbasa nke ala
Ọ bụ onye edemede ma ọ bụ onye edemedo nke ọtụtụ isiokwu ndị ọgbọ na-enyocha na Journals of Soil / Environmental Sciences

Ọ bụ Onye ibe NORAD; Onye ibe nke Alexander von Humboldt (AvH) Germany; Onye mmekọ na-aga n'ihu, International Centre for Theoretical Physics, Trieste, Italy; Onye ibe, Japanese Society for Promotion of Science; onye meriri, University of Nigeria Vice-Chancellor's Faculty and University Prizes nke afo 1992/93; Ndepụta na Marquis Who's Who na Science na Engineering; na onye sonyere na German DAAD / DIES Deans Course 2009
Charles enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye fellowship
Charles Boyce (amụrụ n'afọ 1949 na Olive Branch, Mississippi), bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkiri nke a maara maka panel Compu-toon ya
A makwaara Boyce maka ịmepụta KeyPad Kid, onye na-ese ihe nkiri nke a na-eji eme ihe na mmemme mmata ọha na eze maka ọzụzụ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta
Boyce gara Memphis Academy of Arts n'afọ ndị 1960, na 1969 sonyere na United States Navy
Boyce ka na-emepụta Compu-toon site na sindication
Andrews McMeel Syndication na-ekesa ya
Boyce na nwunye ya bi n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Chicago
Boyce bụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi cARToon na Barrington Area Library na Jenụwarị 2007
Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara nchịkọta ihe osise akpọrọ Blues Arrangement Exhibit

Dị ka Boyce si kwuo, ihe osise ahụ gosipụtara ihe nkiri banyere bluus na Memphis site na mmalite nke narị afọ ruo ugbu a site na 'ụzọ nke ihe omume ndị ọ hụrụ ma ọ bụ nụ banyere ya', ma nwee foto nke ndị na-eti egwu bluus na ihe osise dị iche iche dị ka Lead Belly, Harmonica Player, Ducks otu, na Ducks abụọ
Ọ bụ ezie na e nwere ma ka nwere enweghị ọdịiche dị iche iche n'ime ihe nkiri, e nwere mmụba nke ndị na-ese ihe nkiri na-acha n'etiti afọ 1988-1998
N'afọ 1988, e nwere naanị otu onye na-ese ihe nkiri na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ; onye okike Wee Pals bụ Morrie Turner

E nwere ọtụtụ ihe nwere ike ịkpata mmụba a na mberede, dị ka Free Press na The Detroit News na-akwado asọmpi maka ndị na-ese ihe nkiri na-erughị eru yana enwere ohere mgbasa ozi na-elekwasị anya na nsogbu nke ịdị iche iche

Otú ọ dị, n'agbanyeghị nlebara anya na ilekwasị anya n'imeziwanye ọdịiche, a ka jụrụ ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe ọchị na-enweghị isi site na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị dị mkpa dabere n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ 'enwetala ndị na-atọ ọchị ole na ole', gụnyere ndị na-ese ihe ọchị Barbara Brandon na Rey Billingsley
N'isiokwu a, Boyce na-ekwu na ndị mmadụ bụ ndị na agbụrụ ahụ nwere mmetụta dị nta na obi ụtọ nke ihe ọchị; na obere ndị mepụtara ihe ọchị nwere mmasị dị ukwuu

A na-egosi nke a site n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe nkiri na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na-enweta akwụkwọ ozi ndị na-akwado ya site n'aka ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ ọcha, yana eziokwu ahụ bụ na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe ọ bụla na-atọ ọchị nke ndị mmadụ ole na ole gara n'ihu ruo 1988-1998, nke bụ ọnụego na-adọrọ mmasị karịsịa maka afọ iri
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2008, Boyce sonyere na ngagharị iwe nke kpọrọ maka nnọchiteanya ka ukwuu nke ndị na-ese ihe nkiri ojii na akwụkwọ akụkọ
Ngagharị iwe ahụ chọrọ ịdọrọ uche gaa na nsogbu nke 'tokenism' na akwụkwọ akụkọ, ma mee ka nsogbu ndị ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ihe ọchị ojii na-eche ihu mgbe ha na-anwa ibipụta ọrụ ha pụta ìhè
Na mgbakwunye na Boyce, ndị na-ese ihe sonyere na ngagharị iwe ahụ bụ Jerry Craft, Charlos Gary, Steve Watkins, Keith Knight, Bill Murray, na Tim Jackson

N'otu ụbọchị, ndị na-ese ihe nkiri ndị a niile sere ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị yiri nke ahụ, nke gosipụtara ihe nkiri nke onye na-agụ akwụkwọ ọcha na-ele anya na nkiri nke ndị na-erughị eru ma na-eme mkpesa na ọ bụ dokapu nke Boondocks
Charles Bukeko (10 Julaị 1962 - 18 Julaị 2020) bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ọchị
A maara ya maka igosi onye isi na usoro telivishọn Papa Shirandula, nke o mekwara ma merie 2010 Kalasha Award for Best Actor in a TV Series
Bukeko pụtakwara na ihe nkiri afọ 2012 The Captain of Nakara Bukeko nwụrụ na Julaị 18, 2020 site na ihe yiri mgbaàmà COVID-19
Bukeko bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ anọ nne na nna ya bụ Valeria Makokha na Cosmas Wafula
A mụrụ ya na Busia, Kenya
Bukeko gara Jogoo Road Primary School wee gaa Upper Hill Secondary, ụlọ akwụkwọ Middle na Nairobi, ebe ọ nwetara Kenya Certificate of Secondary Education (KCSE)
Bukeko lụrụ Beatrice Ebbie Andega ma ha mụtara ụmụ atọ Tony, Charlie na Wendy
Bukeko nwere ọrịa shuga
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ Karen dị na Nairobi, Kenya, na 18 Julaị 2020, mgbe ọ butere COVID-19 n'oge ọrịa COVID-19 na Kenya
Ọ dị afọ 58, ọ nwụrụ ụbọchị asatọ mgbe ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya gasịrị
Charles C
Dawson (ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 1889), bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ, na'ese ihe osise, na ónyé na-ese eserese
A mụrụ Dawson na Georgia na 1889
Ọ gụrụ nka na Tuskegee Institute na Alabama site na 1905 ruo 1907, wee kwaga New York City ịga Art Students League, ébé ọ bụ nwá akwụkwọ ojii mbụ

N'ịbụ ónyé ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ọ zutere na Art Students League na-enye nsogbụ, Dawson hapụrụ ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Art Institute nke Chicago, ebe ọ chọtara ego na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ebugharị ihe na dị ka ónyé nlekọta na klọb nka na akwụkwọ a na-akpọ Cliff Dwellers Club
N'ebe ahụ, a na-ekwu na ya na ndị otu klọb ahụ gụnyere Frank Lloyd Wright, James Henry Breasted, Henry Ossawa Tanner, na Oliver Dennett Grover zutere
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na School of the Art Institute of Chicago, Dawson sonyeere ndị agha ma zigara ya France dị ka otu n'ime ndị agha Buffalo
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ site na 1917 ruo 1919 wee laghachi Chicago mgbè ághá ahụ gasịrị
Charles C
Dawson dèrè akụkọ ndụ onwé ónyé a na-ebipụtaghị ebipụta nke akpọrọ 'Touching the Fringes of Greatness'
N'ime ọrụ akụkọ ndụ a, Dawson na-atụle ahụmahụ ya dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na Tuskegee Institute, Art Students League nke New York, na School of the Art Institute nke Chicago, yana ọrụ nka ya na nchụso ya
Dawson sonyere na mmemme abụọ nke Works Progress Administration
Site na 1936 ruo 1941 Dawson bụ ónyé nduzi nke nka na nka na ónyé nchịkwa nke City of Chicago Work and Training Program nke National Youth Administration of Illinois
N'ọrụ a, o mepụtara nhazi maka American Negro Exposition na Chicago Coliseum na 1940, otu ihe mejupụtara dioramas irí abụọ na-egosi akụkọ ihe méré eme nke Africa America
Dioramas ndị a dị ugbu a na nchịkọta nke George Washington Carver Museum na Tuskegee Institute
N'afọ 1933, Dawson bipụtara akwụkwọ ụmụaka nke o dèrè ma gosipụta, nke akpọrọ ABC's of Great Negroes Akwụkwọ ahụ nwèrè irí abụọ na isii linoleum prints na-egosi ndị isi na akụkọ ihe mere eme ojii
Ihe odide ọ bụla na-esonyere ederede dị mkpirikpi na-akọwa ihe ndị dị mkpa rụzuru na ụfọdụ ozi gbasara ónyé ahụ e gosipụtara
Frederick Douglass, Dr
George W
Carver, na Meta Warrick Fuller bụ ndị Africa America atọ a ma ama gụnyere n'akwụkwọ ahụ
Ụfọdụ ndị akụkọ ihe mere eme gụnyere Fero Ijipt Khufu Cheops, Princess Nefert, na Empress nke Ethiopia Zaudita (Zewditu)
Mbipụta ọ bụla dị n'ihe odide ahụ nwere onyinyo, aha onye ahụ, aha ma ọ bụ ihe ọ rụzuru, na-abụkarị mkpụrụedemede 'CCD' maka 'Charles C
Dawson'
A maara Dawson maka mgbasa ozi ya màkà ụlọ akwụkwọ mara mma na ngwaahịa ndị e lekwasịrị anya na ndị isi ojii, dị ka Annie Turnbo Malone's Poro College na Valmor Products
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka ndị ọchụnta ego ojii mgbe ọ laghachiri Chicago mgbè ọ rụchara ọrụ na Agha Ụwa Mbụ
Ndị ahịa Dawson gụnyekwara Anthony Overton na Jesse Binga, magazin Reflexus na ónyé nduzi Oscar Micheaux
Charles Charamba (amuru n'abalị iri abụo na asaa nke ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1971) bu onye egwu ozioma nke mba Zimbabwe na onye ozuzu ukochukwu na Apostolic Faith Mission Church of Zimbabwe (AFM)
Ọ malitela ụka ya
Ndekọ Charamba bụ egwu ozi ọma kacha ere na Zimbabwe kemgbe mmalite oge afọ 2000
Ọ gagharịala ma Great Britain na United States, na n'ebe ndịda Africa dum
Otu n'ime egwu Charamba ama ama bụ 'Machira Chete'
Nwunye ya, Olivia (née Maseko), bụkwa onye na-abụ abụ ozioma, ma soro ya pụta na ogbo ma na ọba egwu ya; a na-akpọkarị ha “ Ezinụlọ Mbụ nke Oziọma”
Dị ka Chinoitezvi Honor Charles charamba bi na The Surbub nke Gunhill na Harare
Ụmụ ya nwekwara nkà n'ịkụ egwú
A mụrụ Charamba na Mudzi District, nke dị ugbu a na Mashonaland East Province
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Masarakufa na Masarakufa Secondary School na Mudzi, ma mecha ọkwa O-Level ya
N'afo 1998, Charamba malitere ọmụmụ ya na Living Waters Bible College dị na Tynwald, Harare, ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta bachelor na nkà mmụta okpukpe
ma mgbe ọ rịgoro na stardom egwu ozioma, ọ laghachiri na mahadum n'afọ 2011 nata 'National Certificate in Music' site na Zimbabwe College of Music
N'afọ 2013, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ na jazz nakwa na Mahadum Afrịka

N'onwa August nke afọ 2004, Charamba ya na onye ọchụnta ego ya bụ Sebastian Mupa nọ na Agricultural Development Bank of Zimbabwe (Agribank) e boro ebubo aghụghọ n'ịgba ụgwọ mbinye ego $ nde iri anọ mechara kwụọ $ otu nde
Agbanyeghị, ka emechara nyocha ọzọ, ewepụrụ ebubo ahụ
Egwu ozioma nke Charamba nwere ihe sungura, jazz na jit
Enwere ike ịtọgbọ ya azụ, ma ọ bụ nke doro anya na egwu ọdịnala dịka mbakumba na mhande
Na mbụ, Charamba e dekọrọ Charamba na Gramma Label
Mana ka o nwetasịrị ego zuru oke, ọ rụrụ ụlọ ihe nkiri nke ya wee malite itinye ọba ya n'okpuru akara nke ya 'Ndị na-akụ azụ̀ mmadụ'
ọkpụkpọ òkù nke ndị na-eso ụzọ
Ihe egwu Charamba gụnyere
Chinedu Charles Ndukauba bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya onyoonyo
Charles malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị obere
Ndukauba charles bụ onye Ogboji sitere na Anambra East dị na mpaghara odida anyanwu nke Naijiria, na-adịghị anya na Ȯra Delta
Nne ya bụ onye na azu ahia, nna ya bụ onye isi ụka ma na elekwa ahia na Umuoji
Chinedu Ndukauba bu onye azụlitere nke ọma, nke ano n'ime ụmụ isii, ụmụ nwanyị atọ,umu ano
Ọ gara akwukwo na Holy family high school,Nkpor, Naijiria
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Amaka Boys, Onịchạ ebe ọ nwetara diplọma na asusu
Ndukauba bu onye na arusi orụ ime ihe nkiri Ike
Onye na-emepụta chọpụtara Chinedu Ndukauba na nyocha ọ gara gbasara Anambra state broadcasting service
Ọganihu ya bịara na 2022 mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ụwa gbasara umuaka na Naijiria

Lieutenant-Colonel Charles Collier Michell, KH (ụbọchị irí abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Machị 1793 nà Exeter rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Machị 1851 nà Eltham, London), nke e mechara mara dị ka Charles Cornwallis Michell, bụ ónyé agha Britain, ónyé nyocha mbụ na Cape, injinia okporo ụzọ, onye na-ese ihe, onye na ónyé na-ahụ màkà ihe okike
Ọ bụ nwa Admiral Sampson Michell na nwunye ya Anne Shears
Nwanne yá nwoke nke okenye bụ Admiral Frederick Thomas Michell
A gụrụ ya áhà Admiral George Collier Ónyé isi nnà ya n'oge ahụ

A mụrụ ya na Exeter, Devon, ma kpọọ ya Charles Cornwallis Michell mgbè e mesịrị na ndụ ya n'ihi ịdị nso ya na Cornwall nke ébé a mụrụ ya, Michell gụrụ akwụkwọ na Royal Military Academy, Woolwich ma nye ya ọrụ na Royal Artillery na 1809

Ọ duziri otu brigade n'agha nke Vittoria na Toulouse, sonyeere na Waterloo ma họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ ónyé nkụzi nke eserese agha na Royal Military College, Sandhurst n'ubochí irí abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Machị 1824 na prọfesọ nke mgbidi agha na Woolwich n'ubochí irí abụọ na isé n'ọnwa Disemba 1825 ma bulie ya n'ọkwa brevet nke onye isi n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị
Ọ maara Spanish, Portuguese na French nke ọma

A họpụtara Michell dị ka ónyé nyocha-ọchịchị na Cape na 1828, (ma eleghị anya ọ nụrụ banyere ọkwa ahụ site na nwa nwanne ya nwoke Rufane Donkin) n'otu oge ahụ na-ejide ọkwa ónyé nlekọta ọrụ ọha na eze na injinia obodo
Màkà ịrụ ọrụ ndị a, ọ natara ụgwọ ọnwa £ 800 kwa afọ
Ọrụ ónyé na-enyocha ala gụnyere ilekọta nyocha zuru ezu dị mkpà iji mepụta map dị mma nke Colony, melite ụzọ na okporo ụzọ na nyocha ókèala nke Colony n'ụzọ ziri ezi
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ pụrụ iche, na-ese ụlọ ụka dị íchè ichè dịka St
Paul na Rondebosch na St
John na Bathurst
Ọ tụrụ aro imeziwanye ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Table Bay ma mepụta ụlọ ọkụ na Mouille Point, Cape Agulhas (nke a na-eche na ọ bụ Pharos nke Alexandria) na Cape Recife
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote ónyé isi na Agha nke Isii na 1834

Ebe ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike bụ na atụmatụ na iwu okporo ụzọ, yana mmezi ha, na-ahụ màkà atụmatụ nke Michell's Pass dị nso na Ceres bụ nnukwu mmezi na Mostert's Hoek Pass ochie na Houw Hoek Pass dị nso Elgin, nke Andrew Geddes Bain rụrụ, yana Sir Lowry's Pass na Montagu Pass, nke ónyé injinia okporo ụzọ Australia bụ Henry Fancourt White wuru n'elu Ugwu Outeniqua na 184377
E wezụga nkà ya ndị ọzọ niile, Michell bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na mmiri, ọkachasị nke ọdịdị ala
Ihe osise ya pụtara na Narrative of a voyage of observation among the colonies of Western Africa and of a campaign in Kaffirland (1837), nke ọgọ ya nwoke, Capt
Sir James Edward Alexander E nyere ya ezumike nká na 1848 wee laghachi England, ebe ọ nwụrụ na n'ubochí irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Machị 1851 na Eltham
Mgbè e zigara Michell na Toulouse, ọ lụrụ nwa akwụkwọ nwanyị Anne D'Arragon n'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1814, mgbè ọ gbapụrụ
Ọ bụ naanị nwa nwanyị nke onye ọrụ lara ezumike nká na ndị agha nke Eze Louis nke Iri na Isii nke France na nne na nna ya ekwenyeghị n'alụmdi na nwunye ahụ
A mụrụ ụmụ abụọ mbụ ha na Lisbon, Julia Anne na 1815 na Frederica Louisa na June 1817
A mụrụ nke atọ, Lady Eveline Marie Alexander, na Nantes n'ubochí irí na isii n'ọnwa Eprel 1821, nà nkè ikpeazụ Anne na Cape Town n'ubochí irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1829
Sampson Michell *1755 Croft West (Admiral na-arụ ọrụ nke ndị agha mmiri Portugal) irí abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1809 Rio de Janeiro x Ann Shears si Somerset
Michell bụ nwa nwanne Sir Rufane Donkin, ónyé bụ gọvanọ nkè Cape of Good Hope
Charles Dago bụ onye Ivory Coast
Ọ bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ
Ọ gbara bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agba bọọlụ na KSC
Lokeren OV
na Belgium Pro League na Al-Arabi, Al-Salmiya na Al-Tadamon na Kuwaiti Premier League

Charles Davidson Bell FRSE (ubochí irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1813 rụọ úbọchị asaá n'ọnwa Eprel 1882) bụ ónyé na-enyocha ndị isi na Cape Colony, onye na-ese ihe, ónyé na'ihe ngosi, na ónyé na-emepụta ihe nrite na stampụ Cape
A mụrụ ya n'ubochí irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1813 na Newhall, Crail, Fife, Scotland, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum St Andrews
Bell hapụrụ Scotland wee gaa South Africa, daa na Cape of Good Hope n'afọ 1830 ma site na nwanne nna ya Sir John Bell, odeakwụkwọ nke gọọmentị Cape, e nyere ya ọkwa na ọrụ gọọmentị
A họpụtara ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na njem afọ abụọ nke Dr
Andrew Smith n'ebe ugwu ruo Limpopo n'afọ 1834
Ọ si na ónyé na-anọchite anya Clerk nke Kansụl Iwu na 1838, gaa na Assistant Surveyor-General na 1843, gaa na Surveyor'General na 1848
N'afọ 1851, o mepụtara ihe nrite ọlaọcha màkà gọvanọ Cape Sir Harry Smith iji nye ndị agha n'oge Agha Mpaghara nke asatọ
A na-akpọkarị nke a ihe nrite South Africa mbụ
Charles Bell bụ enyi Andrew Geddes Bain ma bụrụkwa onye na-eburu ozu ya na olili ozu ya n'afọ 1864
Mgbè ọ lara ezumike nká na 1872 ọ laghachiri Scotland na 1873 ya na Helena na ụmụ ha atọ dị ndụ, ebe Helena Bell nwụrụ n'ubochí irí n'ọnwa Septemba 1881 wee nwụọ n'ubochí asaá n'ọnwa Eprel 1882
Bell lụrụ Martha Antoinette Ebden na 3 June 1841
Charles Bell gbara Martha Ebden alụkwaghịm n'ubochí izizi n'ọnwa Julaị 1850 ebe o kwuru na Dr
Lestock Wilson Stewart bụ ónyé na-ede akụkọ
Ụlọikpe nyere Charles Bell ikike ilekọta ụmụ atọ ahụ
Martha mụrụ nwa nwanyị nke abụọ Charlotte Margaret n'ubochí irí na asaá n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1850
Charlotte Margaret nwụrụ tupu ụbọchị irí n'ọnwa Eprel 1866
Alụmdi nke abụọ Bell na Helena Krynauw n'ubochí asaá n'ọnwa Julaị 1859
Charles Ernest Peers (1875, Belfast, Northern Ireland na 1944, Higgovale, Cape Town, South Africa) bụ onye South Africa na-ese ihe
Peers nọrọ na Liverpool, England, ebe o dekọrọ ọrụ mbupu na Mersey
Ọ chọrọ ịghọ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụgbọ mmiri, mana ọ pụghị ịmụ ọrụ
Ọ nọrọ obere oge na Liverpool School of Art tupu ọ gaa South Africa na 1904
A họpụtara Peers ka ọ bụrụ onye otu South African Society of Artists na 1905, o wee bụrụ onyeisi oche nke South African Fine Arts Association
O meriri asọmpi ihe ngosi Cape Times na 1924, wee bụrụ onye otu South African Institute of Art na 1926

Peers mechara bụrụ onye isi oche nke Owl Club na 1934, onye isi oche nke K Club na 1935, New Group kpọrọ ya ka ọ sonye na ngosi mbụ ha na 1938, ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi ala nke otu ahụ, ọfịs ọ nọrọ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Peers na-ebi ndụ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ na ụlọ ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ dị iche iche, nke gụnyere Galvin & Sales na Cape Town
O gosipụtara The Seven Wonders of South Africa nke Hedley Chilvers na The Coast of Hermanus nke Will Costello
O mepụtara usoro kaadị sịga na-ese onyinyo maka United Tobacco Company album Our Land / Ons Land (1939), na ọtụtụ kalenda eserese n'oge afọ 1930 maka Vacuum Oil Company
Ndị ọgbọ na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa na watercolor, mana ha na-emepụta mmanụ na pastel yana ihe osise pensụl, etchings, linocuts, na lithographs
O lekwasịrị anya na ọdịdị ala, ihe owuwu, na ihe gbasara ụgbọ mmiri
Ihe ngosi onwe onye, Lezard's Gallery, Johannesburg, 1923
Ihe ngosi jikọrọ aka na Allerley Glossop, Taylor Art Gallery, Pietermaritzburg, 1924 Ihe ngosi onwe, Dempers na Wiley's Art Gallery, Cape Town, 1924
Ihe osise dị iche iche site na 1926, nke gụnyere ihe ngosi nke South African Institute of Art, Durban, 1927
Ihe ngosi jikọtara ya na J
Pope Ellis, Cape Town City, 1939
A nọchitere anya na ihe ngosi ọhụrụ ọhụrụ niile a na-eme kwa afọ site na 1938 ruo 1945
Peter Visser Antiques guzobere ihe ngosi ire ahịa mbụ nke ọrụ ya kemgbe afọ 1930 na 1991

Albany Museum, Grahamstown Cape Town Municipal Collection Durban Art Gallery Iziko Museum, Cape Town (South African National Gallery & Slave Lodge) Museum Afrika, Johannesburg Old House Museum, Durban Pretoria Art Museum Tatham Art Gallery, Pietermaritzburg University of Cape Town William Humphreys Art Gallery, Kimberley

Charles Okechukwu Esimone (nke amuru na 31 Disemba 1970) bu onye Naijiria bụrụ kwa ọka mmụta biopharmaceutics na ọgwụ biotechnology nke na-eje ozi ugbua dika osote onye isi oche nke Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe, Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye prọfesọ izizi nke ọgwu microbiology na ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ala Naijiria
Esimone sitere na Akwaeze nke dị na Anaocha LGA nke Anambra Steeti a mụrụ ya na 31 Disemba 1970 na Tiko, Cameroon
Ọ gara ụlọakwụkwọ praịmarị St Joseph's nke dị na Tiko, Cameroon site na 1976 ruo 1982 wee gaa na kọleji St
Joseph nke dị na Sasse, Buea n'ala Cameroon ebe ọ nwetara nzere siniọ sekọndri n'afọ 1987
Esimone malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụ internee wee mechaa bụrụ onye nkuzi laabu na ngalaba nke ọgwụ na Mahadum Nigeria
Ọ ghọrọ ọka mmụta nke biopharmaceutics na ọgwụ microbiology na afọ iri atọ na asaa (37years) ma bụrụ Dean nke mbu na Ngalaba Pharmaceutical Sciences, na kampus Agulu nke Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe
O jekwara ozi afọ abụọ ugboro abụọ dị ka osote Vice-Chancellor (Academic) nke Mahadum ahụ
Ọ bụ onye nyocha nwere akwụkwọ karịrị otu narị n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2019 ka a họọrọ ya dịka onye nke iri na asatọ na mmadụ iri abụọ na asatọ ndi ọkachamara kachasị ebipụtara na Nigeria
Ọka mmụta Esimone bụkwa onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Confucius Institute nke Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe
Na 14 Mee 2019, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Vice Chancellor ọhụrụ nke Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe
Ọ bụ onye nhazi steeti nke ọgbakọ Deeper Life Campus Fellowship, na Anambra Steeti nakwa onye otu, BOT (Board of Trustees) nke Anchor University, Lagos
Ọkammụta Esimone bụ onye natagoru ọtụtụ ihe nrite
Ha gụnyere
Charles Fernando (1941-1995) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-ese ihe na onye na-eri egwu jazz
Ụdị egwu ya nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu site na egwu ọ na-akpọ, ma gosipụta myirị na akara egwu na ndetu
Enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ ya na National Gallery of Zimbabwe
Ezinụlọ Charles si Mozambique, mana ọ tolitere na Mbare, ime obodo nke Harare
Ihe osise ya kachasị ukwuu bụ nke a na-ese n'ụdị dị iche iche
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị enyi ya ya na ya tolitere bụ; Christopher Chabhuka onye bụkwa onye na-ese ihe na onye na-akpọ piano Jazz
A maara Christopher nke ọma maka ígwè ya nke a na-egosikwa na National gallery nke Zimbabwe
Satcha (Tendai Silas Machakaire) bụ otu n'ime ezigbo ndị enyi Charles
N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya na 1965 site n'ụlọọrụ Harare Broadcasting Station, Satcha kwuru na ụgbọ ala ndị ga-abịa n'ọdịnihu ga-aga n'elu mmiri (A na-eji Hydrogen-Fuel Cell System eme ihe taa)
O doziri nsogbu nke ịgwakọta Ethanol na Diesel site na ịgwakọta ha dị ka anwụrụ ọkụ dị na cylinder
Charles Gaines (amụrụ n'afọ 1944) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nkè ọrụ ya na-ajụ okwu gbasara ịma mma, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na nkà ihe ọmụma
N'iwere ụdị eserese, usoro foto na ntinye vidiyo, ọrụ ahụ na-agụnye iji usoro, karịsịa n'ụdị grid, mgbé mgbè na njikọta ya na foto

Ọrụ ya gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ na Conceptual Art na mkparịta ụka ya na ndị na-ese ihe dịka Sol LeWitt, Lawrence Weiner na Mel Bochner na Gaines na-etinye áká na nkwenkwe ya nke itinye áká na nghọta na asụsụ

Dị ka otu n'ime naanị ndị na-ese ihe n'Africa na America na-arụ ọrụ na 1970s, ógè mgbè ngosipụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ nchegbu dị n'etiti ndị na-eme ihe n'Afrịka na America, Gaines bụ onye na-apụ apụ n'ịchụso abstraction na ụzọ na-abụghị nke nkuzi maka agbụrụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
E nwere eriri egwu siri ike na-agafe ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Gaines, nke pụtara ìhè na ojiji ọ na-eji egwu egwu ugboro ugboro yana na njikọ ya na echiche nke enweghị mkpebi, dịka John Cage na Sol LeWitt
A mụrụ Gaines na Charleston, South Carolina
A zụlitere ya na Newark, New Jersey, ọ gàrà Newark Arts High School ma nweta BA na Jersey City State College na 1966
Ọ nwetara MFA ya na 1967 dị ka ónyé Africa America mbụ a nabatara n'ime mmemme MFA na School of Art and Design na Rochester Institute of Technology
Site na 1967 rụo 1990 ọ bụ prọfesọ nke nka na Mahadum California State Fresno

Kemgbe afọ 1989, ọ bụ onye otu ngalaba na California Institute of the Arts, na-emetụta ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe na ya, n'etiti ha Edgar Arceneaux, Rodney McMillian, Andrea Bowers, Mark Bradford, Sam Durant, na Laura Owens
N'afọ 2008, Gaines kụziri na Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Los Angeles, California
Na Motion Trisha Brown Dance (1981), Gaines sere foto ónyé na-agba egwú postmodern Trisha Bro na-eme ihe nkiri Son of Gone Fishin
N'ịgụpụta oghere dị na grid nke kwekọrọ na ahụ na-agagharị, na ikpuchi grid ọzọ maka onyinyo ọ bụla na usoro ahụ, Gaines na-achọ ịsụgharị ahụ na- agagharị n'ụzọ foto ahụ na-enweghị ike
N'ime nke a, ọ na-emekwa ka e hichapụ ọdịdị dị íchè íchè nkè ahụ na-agbaso nkwenye Trisha Brown nke ihe ndị na-ekpuchi onwé ha
Site na usoro Walnut Tree Orchard, Charles Gaines malitere ịrụ ọrụ na foto na ọrụ nka ya na mgbakwunye na usoro mgbakọ na mwepụ, na-aga n'ihu na iji akwụkwọ grid
Na mgbakwunye na ịrụ ọrụ na nka ya, Gaines anọwo na-eje ozi na kọmitii ndụmọdụ nke Hauser & Wirth Institute kemgbe 2018
Gaines natara National Endowment for the Arts (NEA) Grant na 1977
Ọ natara California Community Foundation (CCF) na 2011, na Guggenheim Fellowship na 2013
Gaines natara CalArts REDCAT Award na 2018 ma nye ya ihe nrite Edward MacDowell nke 60 kwa afọ na 2019

Charles Gitonga Maina (a mụrụ n'afọ 1976) bụ onye amụrụ na Kenya nke a mụrụ na-emebu na mbụ ihe nkiri na onye na-akpọ èpèléǹkàtà nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri afọ̀ 1994 The Air Up There
A mụrụ Charles Gitonga Maina na mpaghara Buruburu nke Nairobi, Kenya
Nna ya bụ onye nyocha na ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta ma nne ya bụ onye nọọsụ
Maina bụ nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụ anọ, ọ bụkwa onye agbụrụ Kikuyu
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, ọ mụtara ịtụ èpèléǹkàtà na-egwu egwuregwu ya na ndị enyi ya na-agbaghị akpụkpọ ụkwụ N'afọ̀ 1991, Maina meriri na 1991 Nairobi Slam Dunk Championship
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ chọrọ ịmụ kọmputa na azụmahịa na Mahadum Nairobi, Maina kpebiri ịchụso basketball kama
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, Maina nụrụ banyere nyocha maka ihe nkiri The Air Up There
Maina nyochara maka ọrụ ndu, na-akọwa onwe ya dịka 'dunkaholic'
Dị ka onye nduzi Paul Michael Glaser si kwuo, nke a bụ akụkụ nke ihe mere ka ọ rụọ ọrụ ahụ
A họọrọ Maina na enyi ya n'etiti ndị egwuregwu iri anọ na isii ndị ọzọ, ma jiri ụgbọelu gaa Los Angeles maka nyocha ikpeazụ
Dịka Maina si kwuo, nke a bụ nke mbụ ọ hapụrụ Kenya
N'ikpeazụ, a họpụtara ya maka ọrụ ndu nke Saleh, onye otu agbụrụ Winabi na Kenya (nke dabere na ndị Samburu) nke onye Bacon na-achọ ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na US
Mgbe ihe nkiri ahụ gasịrị, Maina kpebiri ịnọ na United States iji nweta ohere kọleji, n'okpuru ndụmọdụ McAdoo, onye ya na ya nọ
Ọ gbara oge mbụ ya zuru ezu na Barton County Community College na Great Bend, Kansas
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ malitere dịka onye na-egwu bench, Maina ghọrọ onye mbido ọkara oge ahụ
Mgbe otu afọ gasịrị, ọ gafere na Miami-Dade Kendall Community College ka ọ nọrọ nso na McAdoo, ebe ọ gbakwara egwu dị ka onye mbido ma debe ọtụtụ ndekọ ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ịgba égbè egbochi
N'ikpeazụ, McAdoo kpọtụrụ Jeff Price, onye isi nkuzi nke Mahadum Lynn na Boca Raton, Florida
N'ihi ya, Maina nwetara agụmakwụkwọ basketball site n'afọ̀ 1997 ruo 1999
Onye nkuzi ya agaghị ekwe ka o jiri 'Jimmy Dolan Shake na Bake' mee ihe n'egwuregwu asọmpi
Maina ka nwere ndekọ Mahadum Lynn maka ọtụtụ blọọgụ n'otu egwuregwu (11), nke o nwetara megide Mahadum Barry na Disemba 7, 1998
N'oge 1997-98, ndị otu ya ruru NCAA D-II semifinals, na Price na-eto 'oge ya na ikike ya igbochi ịgba égbè'
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Kenya, Maina laghachiri na nne na nna ya na Buruburu
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2003, ndị ikom abụọ wakporo ya n'okporo ámá bụ ndị mara ya mma ma jiri nkume tie ya ihe
Maina gbakeere, mgbe ọ nọrọ izu atọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ na-agbaji taya na mmerụ ahụ ndị ọzọ
Ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị, ọ butekwara ụkwara nta, nke mere ka ọ daa mbà n'obi
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2016, Maina ka bi na mpaghara ahụ
Charles Eddie-Lee Hamilton, Jr

(amụrụ na Nọvemba 10, 1987) bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu, ónyé na-agụ egwu, na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya, ọ bụbu ónyé otu The Chosen Few, ọ bụkwa onye otu Lupe Fiasco's All City Chess Club
N'ịchụso ọrụ n'onwe ya dị ka ónyé na-eti egwu, Hamilton bịanyere aka na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ onwé ya Demevolist Music Group
N'afọ 2008, Hamilton wepụtara usoro mixtapes akpọrọ The Hamiltonization Process, na Disemba 8, 2008, Hamilton weputara abọm izizi ya akpọrọ The Pink Lavalamp
Hamilton nwetara nnukwu mmata mgbè egosiri ya na mkpuchi nke mbipụta Freshmen Class nke nke 2009 ma bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta nkesa nde dollar na Interscope Records, na 2008

Hamilton ga-ewepụta abọm izizi ya màkà Interscope nke akpọrọ This Perfect Life mana, na ngwụcha afọ 2009, n'ihi nsogbu uche nke Hamilton na-enweghị nchọpụta n'oge ahụ, ọ ghọrọ isi iyi nke esemokwu na nyocha ọha na eze màkà omume ya na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta na ntọala ọha na eze, na-eme ka a chụpụ Hamilton na akara ndekọ

74N'afọ 2010, Hamilton bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ ọhụrụ na NewCo Records ma ga-ewepụta abọm izizi ọhụrụ akpọrọ My Heart, mana màkà ihe ndị a na-amaghị ama Hamilton hapụrụ akara ahụ ma debe abọm ahụ
Site na 2011 kuya na 1914, Hamilton malitere ịtọpụta mixtapes n'onwe ya, ugboro ugboro site na blọọgụ nke onwé ya, ọ nwekwara ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ égwu ya a na-ebipụtabeghị na ntanetị
Na mbido afọ 2015, Hamilton bịanyere áká na nkwekọrịta ndekọ ọhụrụ na Turn First Records na Republic Records
N'afọ 2014, Hamilton wepụtara EP akpọrọ The Black Box
Hamilton wepụtara abọm izizi ya nke akpọrọ Hamilton, Charles na 2016
N'afọ 2015, Hamilton mèrè ihe nkírí egwu na ihe ngosi hip hop TV Empire
Charles Inojie bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Nigeria, onye na-akpa ọchị, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ egwuregwu ya
Charles si n’ezinụlọ ndị eze
O tolitere n'ụlọ nne nne ya, o siri ya ike icheta nne ya n'ihi na mgbe ọ dị na nwata, e zigara ya na mpaghara ọzọ maka ebumnuche nke ịchekwa nne nne ya merela agadi
Ọchịchọ obi ya bụ ịbụ onye ọka iwu, mana ọ gbanwere obi ya mgbe ọ gara ebe ndị ode akwụkwọ Bode Osoyin nọ, ebe ọ kpebiri inweta asambodo na nka
dị ịrịba ama n'afọ 1993, o mezuru ebumnuche a ma mesịa gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Port Harcourt n'afọ 1999
Mgbe o kpebiri ime ihe nkiri, ọ sonyeere otu dị iche iche na ihe nkiri na obodo ya wee malite ịme ihe nkiri

O mechara kpebie ịmatakwu ihe omuma banyere ịme ihe nkiri mgbe ọ debanyere aha maka mmemme otu afọ na Bode Osoyin's Writers Resort, bụ ebe ọ nwetara akwụkwọ asambodo na Dramatic Arts mgbe ọ mechara mmemme ahụ na 1993
Inojie sonyeere otu n'eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria akpọrọ Nollywood na-afọ
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkwa ihe nkiri na-enyere ya aka tupu ọ banye n'ime ihe nkiri oge niile na iduzi ihe nkiri
A maara ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị mgbe niile ma kpọọ ya dịka otu n'ime ndị ahịa kachasị mma nke Naijiria
Na mkparịta ụka ya na onye na-eme ihe ọchị na nso nso a, o mere ka a mata na mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Port Harcourt na-afo 1999, ọ kwagara na Lagos Steeti
Ọ ghọrọ onye osote onye ntụzi aka na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke Lancelot Oduwa Imasuen
N’afọ 2016, ndị otu Screen Writers Guild nke Naijiria (SWGN) jiri otu olu họpụta Inojie dịka onye isi oche otu ndị ọrụ ha
N’afọ 2016, ndị otu si na Screen Writers Guild of Nigeria (SWGN) jiri otu olu họpụta Inojie ịbụ onye isi otu ọrụ ha
Inojie lụrụ Obehi Obhiseh, ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
Ikike njikwa
Kofi Bucknor (1953–2017) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri nke pụtara na ihe nkiri dịka Heritage Africa (1989), African Timber [de] (1989), na Run Baby Run (2006)
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị 23 ọnwa Mee afọ 2017 na 37 Military Hospital, a maghị ihe kpatara ọnwụ ya
Charles Kwamina Tachie bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana bụrụkwa onye omeiwu nke mpaghara Tarkwa na ụlọ omeiwu nke mbụ nke mba nke abụọ nke Ghana
A mụrụ Tachie n'afọ 1920
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Roman Katọlik nke Tarkwa
Tachie rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta ọrụ
Ọ bụkwa onye ọchụnta ego
A họpụtara Tachie ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu ka ọ nọchite anya mpaghara Tarkwa n'ụlọomeiwu nke mbụ nke mba Ghana nke abụọGhan anian nzuko omeiwu
A họpụtara Tachie na vootu 4,197 n'ime vootu 8,477 zuru oke
A họpụtara ya na tiketi nke Progress Party
A họpụtara ya karịa Rowland Atta Kesson nke National Alliance of Liberals na Christian Buah Olivet-Ackim nke People's Action Party
Ndị a nwetara 1,155 na 3,125 n'otu n'otu nke ngụkọta vootu ziri ezi
Tachie bụ Onye Kraịst
Charles McGee (n'ubochí irí na isé n'ọnwa Disemba, 1924 rụọ úbọchị anọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị,
, 2021) ónyénye America na-ese ihe ónyénye nkuzi amaara maka ịmepụta ihe osise, nchịkọta, na ihe ọkpụkpụ
Ihe osise ya dị na nchịkọta nke Detroit Institute of Arts na Charles H
Wright Museum of African American History
O nwekwara ọtụtụ nnukwu ọrụ ọha na en'ọbọdọodo Detroit
A mụrụ McGee na Clemson, South Carolina, n'ubochí irí na isé n'ọnwa Disemba, 1924
Ọ bụ nné na nnà ya ochie zụlitere ya, ndị bụ ndị na-ekere òkè
Ọ natara mkpali nka mbụ ya mgbè ọ na-ewepụta ogho ma na-enyere nna nna ya aka ilekọta ala ahụ
N'ebe ahụ, 'ọ hụrụ n'onwe ya usoro na nkwekọrịta dị n'ime okike'
Ọ gụghị akwụkwọ ọ bụla ruo mgbè ọ kwagara Detroit mgbè ọ dị afọ iri, ebe ọ chọpụtara na 'ihe niile na-agagharị ma ọ naghị ebelata
' n'afọ 2017 o kwuru, 'Amụtala ihe na-anọghị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ n'ihi na ndụ bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ana m amụta ihe mgbe ọ bụla m na-agagharị
Ógè ọ bụla m na-agagharị na nkuku, a na-ekpughere m ihe ọhụrụ
Dị ka nwata nwoke, McGee gara George Washington Elementary ma mụọ ihe osise na McGregor Public Library na Highland Park
Ọ gàrà Cleveland High School dị nso na Hamtramck ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike dị ka ónyé na-emepụta ihe na onye nhazi nke ihe owuwu ụgbọ mmiri maka mmemme ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, McGee gàrà rụọ ọrụ na Briggs Manufacturing Company na Detroit
McGee debanyere aha na Marine Corps na 1943 ma jee ozi afọ atọ, gụnyere n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
E zigara ya na Nagasaki dị ka akụkụ nke ndị agha jikọrọ aka na Japan
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Detroit, o jiri ohere GI Bill gaa klas na College for Creative Studies, nkè a maara mgbè ahụ dị ka Society of Arts and Crafts
Ndị na-ajụ ase McGee were n'ọrụ na mmalite nke ọrụ ya bụ icheku ọkụ na eserese
O nwèrè otu afọ na Barcelona na 1968 iji mụta na njem nlegharị anya
Ahụmahụ a nọchitere anya ụzọ n'ọrụ nka ya
Ihe osise ọ mepụtara mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị na-elekwasị anya na ihe ndị bụ isi na obere ihe gbasara isiokwu, ọ hapụrụ eziokwu nke na-achịkwa ihe osise mbụ ya

Otu ihe dị ịrịba ama na nke a bụ na Igbe Noa 'Jenesis' (1984) na Detroit Institute of Arts, nke na-egosi ụmụ nwanyị na anụmanụ abụọ na-eme ihe n'Ijipt nke a na-egosi na 'dị mfe na-atọ ọchị, nke a na'ụzọ dị mfe'
Otú ọ dị, e kere ihe nnọchianya mmadụ ndị a n'ụzọ kwekọrọ n'ụdị ọ nabatara, na Jean Dubuffet aha ya dị ka isi ihe mkpali
Okike bụkwa isiokwu dị mkpà n'ọrụ ya, nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata mgbè ọ na-akọpụta ogho n'èzí
Otu n'ime ọrụ ikpeazụ ya, Unity (2018) sere n'èzí 28 Grand Building, na-ejikọta ya na okike na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
McGee na-akụzi nka mgbè niile na Mahadum Eastern Michigan site na 1969 ruo 1987
Ọ kụzikwaara na Mahadum Michigan na Birmingham Bloomfield Art Center
O guzobere Gallery asaá na obéré ụlọ akwụkwọ maka nka ebe ọ kụziri ihe
Ọ bụkwa ónyé na-ahụ màkà ịkwadebe na ịhazi ihe ngosi nka
A na-eme ihe osise, nchịkọta na ihe ọkpụkpụ McGee na nchịkọta US na mba ụwa, ma na-egosi ya na Detroit Institute of Arts, Dennos Museum, na Charles H
Wright Museum of African American History
A na-etinye ọrụ McGee na ntọala ọha na eze, gụnyere William Beaumont Hospital nke Royal Oak, Michigan na Detroit People Mover Broadway Station
O guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Contemporary Art Institute of Detroit (CAID) n'afọ 1978

Charles McGee Community Commons, nkè Marygrove College raara nye na 2016, guzo na nkuku West McNichols Road na Wyoming Avenue na Detroit, gafee okporo ámá site na oghere nke jere ozi dị ka ụlọ ọrụ McGee ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri ise
McGee's Playscape II bụ ihe dị n'etiti Commons
Dị ka Kresge Foundation si kwuo, 'McGee zụlitere iguzosi ike n'ihe na ọbọdọ ahụ na ndị bi na ya, ma nye ya ọtụtụ ike nka na ọrụ nka ya
'Detroit abuwo eluigwe n'ezie nye m,' ka McGee kọwara
'Ọ nyèrè m ùgwù ma jiri nkwanye ùgwù mesoo m ihe'
A kpọrọ McGee ónyé mbụ Kresge Eminent Artist na 2008
N'ịbụ nke College for Creative Studies na-achịkwa, onyinye a na-asọpụrụ otu ónyé na-ese ihe Detroit kwa afọ maka ihe ndị ọkachamara rụzuru, onyinye ọdịbendị, na ntinye aka na ndị ọrụ nka mpaghara
Kọleji ahụ nyekwara ya nzere doctorate maka ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé nkuzi
Na mbido 2019, Michigan Legacy Art Park kwupụtara na McGee ga-anata 2019 Legacy Award 'n'ịghọta ndụ nke ihe ịga nke ọma na mmetụta dị ka onye na-ese ihe, ónyé nkuzi, onye nkwado na nwa amaala ụwa
McGee nwere ọrịa strok na 2011, nke metụtara ikike ya ịmepụta nka
Ọ nwụrụ na Febụwarị 4, 2021, n'ụlọ ya na Detroit
Ọ dị afọ 96, ma nwụọ n'ihi ihe ndị sitere n'okike

Charles Norman Mills (n'ubochí irí na anọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 1920 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 2009) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe osise ya pụtara na ákwà na dị ka murals na mgbidi ndị agbata obi, na-elekwasị anya na ihe omume na akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọdịbendị Africa-America
A na-akpọ ọrụ ya Wall of History, ihe osise na-egosi ọtụtụ narị afọ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Africa na America, nke dị n'ọnụ ụzọ nke Sistrunk Boulevard nke Fort Lauderdale, ihe kachasị mmá ọ rụzuru
A mụrụ Mills n'ubochí irí na anọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 1920, na New York City ma too na Harlem
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nka na Manhattan

Dị ka ónyé ntorobịa, Mills mụtara banyéré mgbọrọgwụ ya site na nleta ọ na-eleta ugboro ugboro na nchịkọta akwụkwọ gbasara ọdịbendị na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị Africa America dị na okpukpu nke abụọ nke ụlọ dị na 135th Street, nchịkọta nke e mechara tinye na Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture
Mills jere ozi na ndị agha United States ma mgbè ọ rụchara ọrụ agha ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise ahụike na VA Medical Center na Brooklyn
Nke a bụ ọnọdụ nke nwa ya nwanyị kọwara dị ka 'wepụtara nka n'ime ya' na Mills ga-aga n'ihu na-etinye afọ iri abụọ na-emepụta ma na-ese akwụkwọ ahụike

Ọ malitere imepụta ihe osise mara mma, mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na The Career School of Commercial Illustration na New York na Brooklyn Museum, ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya gosipụtara na nchịkọta na gallery na New York City
Ọ kwagara South Florida na 1985, bírí na Fort Lauderdale
Ọ kụziri na Coral Springs Museum of Art, gaa n'ihu na-ese ihe ma gosipụta ọrụ ya na gallery na ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie

A na-ewere ihe osise ya n'ọnụ ụzọ Sistrunk Boulevard n'obodo nna ya, nke ọbọdọ Fort Lauderdale nyere iwu, dị ka ọrụ ya kachasị ukwuu, na-akọ akụkọ banyere ahụmịhe ndị Africa na America site n'ohu ruo n'oge a
N'afọ 2009, Jim Moran Foundation sọpụrụ ya dị ka onye Africa-America Achiever maka afọ iri isii nke eserese ya na ilekwasị anya na ahụmịhe Africa-America
Mills nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ irí asatọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba ubochí irí abụọ, 2009, n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Pembroke Pines, Florida
Nwunye ya, Thelma, yana ụmụ nwanyị abụọ Renee Chester na Denise Collins, ụmụ ụmụ ise na ụmụ ụmụ ise hapụrụ ya
Chinedu Charles Ndukauba bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya onyoonyo
Charles malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị obere
Ndukauba charles bụ onye Ogboji sitere na Anambra East dị na mpaghara odida anyanwu nke Naijiria, na-adịghị anya na Ȯra Delta
Nne ya bụ onye na azu ahia, nna ya bụ onye isi ụka ma na elekwa ahia na Umuoji
Chinedu Ndukauba bu onye azụlitere nke ọma, nke ano n'ime ụmụ isii, ụmụ nwanyị atọ,umu ano
Ọ gara akwukwo na Holy family high school,Nkpor, Naijiria
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Amaka Boys, Onịchạ ebe ọ nwetara diplọma na asusu
Ndukauba bu onye na arusi orụ ime ihe nkiri Ike
Onye na-emepụta chọpụtara Chinedu Ndukauba na nyocha ọ gara gbasara Anambra state broadcasting service
Ọganihu ya bịara na 2022 mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ụwa gbasara umuaka na Naijiria

Charles Osa Igbinovia (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 20 Nọvemba 1971), nke a maara dịka Charles Novia, bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Naijiria, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye na-ede ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-akọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na onye edemede
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Benin City, isi obodo Edo Steeti, a maara Novia maka ihe nkiri dịka Missing Angel (2004), Caught in The Middle na Alan Poza (2013)
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya dị ka akụkụ nke ndị otu Naịjirịa iji gosipụta ihe nkiri Nollywood maka ụdị asụsụ mba ọzọ kachasị mma nke Academy Awards site na Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
Charles Okonkwo bụbu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Naịjirịa
N'oge ọ na-en egwu, ọ gbaara Enugu Rangers na Nigerian Premier League
O sonyekwara na mbọ Naịjirịa maka iru eru maka 1990 FIFA World Cup
Charles Robert Searles (ubochí irí na otu n'ọnwa Julaị, 1937 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na asaá n'ọnwa Novemba, 2004) bụ ónyé Africa America na-ese ihe a mụrụ na Philadelphia na 1937
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike site na 1960s ruo mgbè ọ nwụrụ na 2004 site na nsogbụ sitere na ọrịa strok
Searles natara Cresson Traveling Scholarship na Ware Traveling Memorial Scholarships nke nyéré ya ohere ịga Nigeria, Ghana, na Morocco na 1972
Mgbè ọ laghachiri, o mepụtara usoro ọrụ akpọrọ Nigerian Impressions
Otu ọrụ a ma ama e sere na 1972 bụ Filas for Sale nke gosipụtara ihe oyiyi mara mma nke ihe nkpuchi na ụkpụrụ ndị jupụtara na etiti nke ihe osise ahụ
Ọ natara ọrụ mbụ ya mgbè a gwara ya ka o see ihe osise na William H
Green Federal Building na Philadelphia na 1974
Ọrụ Celebration, ọmụmụ màkà mgbidi ahụ, bụ nke Smithsonian American Art Museum mana ọ bụghị ugbu a
Ọ bụ 27 1/2 x 81 3/4 na acrylic na ọrụ ákwà nke na-egosi ndị na-agba egwú na-ekpuchi ihu na ndị mara mma
Charles Searles na-enwekarị mkpali site na egwu, usoro Dancers ya na 1975 gosipụtara ikike ya igosipụta mmegharị na ọrụ ya
Akụkụ ya Dance of the Twin Souls na-egosi na Pennsylvania Academy of Fine Arts Museum
Ọ biri na Philadelphia ruo 1978, mgbè ọ kwagara New York City
N'afọ ndị 1980 ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ n'usoro nnukwu ihe a tụrụ atụ gụnyere Warrior (1987) na Freedom's Gate (2000) nke dị n'etiti 8 na 10 ụkwụ ogologo
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2004 ma nwunye ya, Kathleen Spicer, hapụrụ ya
E tinyere ọrụ Searles na ngosi 2015 We Speak Black Artists na Philadelphia, 1920s-1970s na Woodmere Art Museum
E gosipụtara Charles Searles na ihe ngosi 'New Black Artists' nke a na-egosi na Brooklyn Museum site na Ọktoba 7 na Nọvemba 10, 1969
Ọ gụnyere ngụkọta nke ọrụ irí anọ na itoolu, ihe osise irí atọ na ihe ọkpụkpụ irí na itoolu, site n'aka ndị omenkà iri na abụọ Ellsworth Ausby, Clifford Eubanks, Jr, Hugh Harrell, William J
Howell, Tonnie Jones, Charles McGee, Ted Moody, Joseph Overstreet, Anderson J
Pigatt, Daniel Pressley, Charles Searles na Erik W
Stephenson
E gosipụtara ihe ngosi ahụ na Mahadum Columbia site n'ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba rụo ụbọchị irí na abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 1969
E gosipụtara ọrụ Searles mgbe ọ nwụsịrị na ngosi na Mahadum Diggs Gallery nke Winston-Salem State
Ihe ngosi ahụ, nke a na-ahụ site na ụbọchị asatọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị na ubochí irí atọ na otu n'ọnwa Machị, 2009
Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara ihe karịrị ọrụ nka irí isii nke Searles mepụtara na njedebe nke ndụ ya gụnyere ihe osise, ihe ọkpụkpụ, na eserese
Mahadum La Salle gosipụtara ọrụ irí isé na abụọ nke Searles nke gosipụtara site na ụbọchị irí na otu n'ọnwa Machị na úbọchị irí atọ na otu n'ọnwa Mee, 2013 na La Salle University Art Museum
Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara ọrụ site na ndụ ya niile, malite na ihe osise ya site na afọ 1960, ihe ọkpụkpụ na ihe osese site na afọ 1970, na mgbè e mesịrị ọrụ abstract
Ụlọ akwụkwọ nka Tyler na Mahadum Temple gosipụtara ihe osise na ihe ọkpụkpụ irí na asaá buru ibu site na Searles site na ụbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel na úbọchị irí nà isii n'ọnwa Juun, 2013
Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtakwara nnọkọ nke ụmụ akwụkwọ na-agba egwu na ihe osise ányá nke Searles kpaliri
E gosipụtara akwụkwọ Charles Searles na ihe ngosi na Lawrence A
Fleischmann Gallery na Washington DC
site na Septemba 23, 2016 - Machị 21, 2017
Ihe ngosi ahụ gụnyere akwụkwọ, eserese, akwụkwọ ndekọ, na ihe ndị ọzọ sitere n'aka ndị na-ese ihe dịka Henry Ossawa Tanner, Kehinde Wiley, na Alma Thomas
O gosipụtara otu ndị omenkà a si ahụ ma nyochaa ọdịbendị ọdịbendị, ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, na ihe omume ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị mkpa n'ihe odide onwe ha
Charles Sebree (1914-1985) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ede egwuregwu nke a maara nke ọma màkà itinye aka na ihe nkírí black arts nke Chicago nke 1930s na 1940s
Sebree bìrì na White City, nke dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Kentucky
N'afọ 1924, nne ya kwagara Chicago, Illinois, nke kpughere Sebree na mmetụta dịgasị iche iche nke nka
Otu n'ime ihe osise ya dị ka nwata nwoke ka Renaissance Society zụrụ maka dollar iri abụọ na ise ma mechaa gosipụta ya na mkpuchi magazin ha
Mgbè ọ gachara Art Institute of Chicago, Sebree nọgidere n'ebe ahụ wee sonye n'otu ndị na-ese ihe na South Side nke Chicago

Ndị na-ese ihe ojii nkè Chicago bịara na-asọ mpi na ike a hụrụ na Harlem Renaissance nke New York, Sebree ritere uru site na njikọ ya na ndị na-ese egwu dịka Margaret Taylor-Burroughs na Eldzier Cortor, yana netwọk nkwado nke e mepụtara site na njikọ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị ka South Side Community Arts Center na Art Institute
N'etiti 1936 na 1938, Sebree rụrụ ọrụ màkà New Deal's Works Progress Administration (WPA)
N'afọ 1942, a kwụsịrị ọrụ ya n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè e debara aha ya n'Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
E debere ya na Camp Robert Smalls, ngalaba nkewa nke Great Lakes Naval Training base, n'ebe ugwu Chicago
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, ọ zutere ónyé na-ede egwuregwu Owen Dodson, ónyé ga-aghọ ezigbo enyi na ónyé na-arụkọ ọrụ nka
Ha jikọrọ aka mepụta ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na Camp Smalls, gụnyere nke a raara nye ónyé isi ojii na-elekọta ụgbọ mmiri nke zọpụtara ndụ ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri ya na Pearl Harbor
Mgbè agha ahụ gasịrị, Sebree kwagara New York, ebe ọ chọtara ọbọdọ ndị na-ese ihe ọzọ, dịka ọ nwèrè na Chicago
Ndị ya na New York gụnyere ndị na-ese ihe dịka Billie Holiday na Billy Strayhorn
Ọ bụ onye natara fellowship site na Julius Rosenwald Fund na 1945, wee gaa n'ihu na-ede ihe nkírí Broadway nke na-aga nke ọma na 1954, 'Mrs
Patterson, 'nke Eartha Kitt gosipụtara
Sebree kwagara Washington, DC na 1947, ébé o bìrì ruo mgbè ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa na 1985

Charles Chukwuma Soludo CFR (// (na-ege ntị); amụrụ ya ka mkpụrụ ụbọchị dị niri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1960) Ọ bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ, na prọfesọ akụ na ụba nke jere ozi dị ka gọvanọ nke Anambra Steeti kemgbe Machị 2022
Ọ bụbu gọvanọ na onye isi oche nke ndị nduzi nke Central Bank of Nigeria
A họpụtara ya dị ka gọvanọ ụlọ akụ ahụ ka ọnwa Mee nọ na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụo na itolu n'afọ 2004

Soludo bụ onye otu British Department for International Development's,otu na enye ndụmọdụ n'ụwa nile yana otu onye n'ime otu na enye President Buhari ndụmọdụ n'ihe gbasara akụ n'ụba (Presidential Economic Advisory Committee)

Soludo abụwo onye ọkà mmụta na abịarute abịarute na International Monetary Fund, Mahadum Cambridge, Brookings Institution, Mahadum Warwick, na Mahadum Oxford yana prọfesọ na abịarute abịarute na Swarthmore College (USA)
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ maka ọtụtụ òtù mba ụwa, gụnyere Ụlọ Akụ̀ Ụwa, United Nations Economic Commission for Africa, na United Nations Development Programme
Soludo bụ onye isi ọkachamara na azụmahịa nke macroeconomics
O nwetara nzere atọ ya wee bụrụ prọfesọ na Mahadum Naịjirịa dị na Nsukka, Enugu Steeti

Soludo gụsịrị akwụkwọ wee jiri nzere ukwuu First Class Honours degree wee pụta n'afọ 1984, MSc Economics n'afọ 1987, na PhD n'afọ1989, Ọ nwetere ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka nwa akwụkwọ kachasị mara akwụkwọ na nzere atọ niile

Charles Sumner Duke (Julaị 21,1879 ruo Jụn 15, 1952) bụ onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, injinia, na onye ọrụ ọha na eze nke kwadoro ohere maka ndị Afrịka Amerịka ma nyere aka guzobe National Technical Association (NTA) na 1925
Onye nta akụkọ na onye isi ikike obodo bụ Jesse Duke bụ nna ya
A mụrụ Duke na Selma, Alabama
Nna ya, Jesse Duke, bụ onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ nke nchịkọta akụkọ ya na-emegide lynching kpatara nzaghachi nke mere ka ezinụlọ ahụ gbaga Pine Bluff, Arkansas
Duke gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Harvard na Mahadim Wisconsin Ọ kwagara Chicago n'afọ 1908
O guzobere National Technical Association n'afọ 1925 ma bụrụ onye isi oche mbụ ya
A na-akpọ NTA's Charles S
Duke Distinguished Lecture Series aha ya
Charles Thaddeus Russell (Jụn 19, 1875 ruo Ọgọọst 24, 1952) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ abụọ nwere ikikere Afrịka Amerịka architects na Virginia
Ọ bụ onye mbụ e nyere ikike na Richmond, Virginia ma ọ rụpụtara ụlọ na ihe a maara dị ka 'Black Wall Street of America'
A mụrụ ya na Richmond, Virginia na 1875
Ọ tolitere na mpaghara ojii nke Richmond a na-akpọ Jackson Ward
Ọ malitere ọmụmụ ya na Hampton Institute na 1893
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Institute na 1899 ma nata asambodo na ọkwa nkà
N'afọ 1901, ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi ịkwa nkà na Tuskegee Institute dị na Alabama
Russell rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ ma lekọta ọrụ ọkwá nkà niile
Ọ rụkọkwara ọrụ ma soro ndị na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ rụọ ọrụ na ọrụ ahụ
Ọ bụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ ka ọ mụrụ ihe osise na ihe owuwu ma rụọ ọrụ mmụta n'ezie
N'afọ 1907, ọ laghachiri Virginia wee bụrụ onye nlekọta ala na Mahadum Virginia Union
N'afọ 1909, onye isi ala Virginia Union nyere Russell ikike ịmalite ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Russell bụ otu n'ime ndị isi ojii abụọ mbụ nwere ikikere na Virginia
E nyere Russell akwụkwọ ikike ya maka iwu ụlọ N'Ọktoba 2, 1922
E nyere ikikere ahụ n'usoro mkpụrụ akwụkwọ ya mere e nyere onye ọzọ Afrịka Amerịka architect John A
Lankford ikikere ya tupu Russell
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị ọrụ na ndị ọrụ nkwekọrịta Russell were n'ọrụ bụ ndị isi ojii
O chepụtara ụlọ na ụlọ ahịa n'ihe a na-akpọ Postletown ma ọ bụ 'Apostle Town' (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Jackson Ward)
A kpọrọ mpaghara ahụ 'Posteltown' n'ihi na aha okporo ámá gụnyere aha ndịozi na Agba Ọhụrụ
Atụmatụ Russel nyere aka gbanwee mpaghara Jackson Ward ka ọ bụrụ mpaghara na-aga nke ọma maka azụmahịa
Atụmatụ ya nyere aka gbanwee mpaghara ahụ ka ọ bụrụ ihe a na-akpọ Black Wall Street nke America
N'afọ 1910, o sere ụlọ mbụ ya maka nwanyị ọchụnta ego Virginia Maggie Walker
E wuru ụlọ ahụ dị ka ụlọ akụ mana a maara ya ugbu a dị ka St
Luke Building nwere ụlọ iri na abụọ na ọkwa dị n'elu
A na-emezigharị ya ugbu a iji mepụta ụlọ elu
E depụtara ụlọ ahụ na National Register of Historic Places na 1982
N'afọ 1915, o chepụtara ụlọ maka dọkịta aha ya bụ William Henry Hughes
E jikwa ya n'ọrụ iji rụzigharịa 1873 Ebenezer Baptist Church na Jackson Ward
Ọ gbanwere atụmatụ nke ụka ahụ site na Victorian Gothic gaa na Neoclassical ma gbakwunye ogidi anọ pụrụ iche n'elu ụlọ ụka ahụ n'ọnọdụ steepụ
O chepụtara ụlọ ihe nkiri Rialto na Petersburg, Virginia nke a rụchara na 1923
N'afọ 1925, Russell rụzigharịrị ma gbasaa Chọọchị Baptist nke isii nke Ugwu Zaịọn
N'afọ 1942, n'otu n'ime ọrụ ikpeazụ Russell dị ka onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ, e nyere ya ọrụ ilekọta ịkwaga na iwughachi ụlọ Belgian na ala Mahadum Virginia Union
Belgium wuru ụlọ ahụ maka 1939 New York World's Fair
A ga-agbakọta ihe owuwu ahụ ma weghachite ya na Belgium mgbe ngosi ahụ gasịrị, mana mwakpo ndị Germany wakporo Belgium (1940) mere ka ụlọ ahụ fọdụrụ na United States
Ụlọ ọrụ iri abụọ na asaa dị iche iche chọrọ ụlọ ahụ mana e nyere ya Mahadum Virginia Union
Russell nwụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọọst n'afọ 1952 ma lie ya na Woodland Cemetery dị na Richmond
Luke Penny Savings Bank
Ebenezer Baptist Church
Ihe owuwu Belgium
