Charles Karumi Maina (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 17 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1991), onye a maara dịka Charlie Karumi, bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ngosi na Radio (NRG Radio / TV
Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu, usoro telivishọn na ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka Tony na ihe nkiri Kenya Jane na Abel na maka ịme ihe ngosi magazin ntụrụndụ Arena 254 na K24
A mụrụ Charlie na 17th August, 1991 na Nairobi, Kenya ma o tolite na Uthiru
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Alliance ebe a mụrụ ịhụnanya ya maka ogbo site na klọb ihe nkiri ụlọ akwụkwọ
O mechara sonye na mahadum Strathmore maka nzere na Business Information Technology ma mechaa malite ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya
O nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya na usoro TV nke Kenya;Changes
Kemgbe ahụ, o gosipụtara na ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ gụnyere; Lies that bind, Nairobi Half Life, Rush na Noose of Gold
N'afọ 2015, o ritere ihe nrite Kalasha maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kachasị mma maka ihe nkiri, 'Fundi-mentals'
A mụrụ Karumi na 17th nke August, 1991 na Nairobi ma o tolite na agbata obi Uthiru na mpụga obodo ahụ

Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Genesis Primary School na Uthiru, ma mesịa gafee Visa Oshwal Primary na Westlands na n'ikpeazụ White Cottage Primary na Gachie ebe ọ nọrọ ule Kenya Certificate of Primary Education (KCPE) n'afọ 2005
Ọ gara Alliance High School na Kikuyu maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na-anọdụ maka ule Kenya Certificate of Secondary Education (KCSE) n'afọ̀ 2008

Ọ bụ mgbe ọ nọ na Alliance High ka ọ chọpụtara ịhụnanya ya maka ogbo, sonye na klọb ihe nkiri nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ 'The Dramatics Society' ma nweta ọrụ na egwuregwu abụọ nke klọb ahụ na-emeri ihe nrite
N'afọ 2009, ọ sonyeere Mahadum Strathmore, Nairobi, wee nweta nzere bachelọ na Business Information Technology (BBIT) gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2013
Ọrụ ọkachamara Karumi malitere mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum na Strathmore
O nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya na-akwụ ụgwọ na usoro TV nke Kenya Changes
N'afọ 2009, ọ sonyeere ụlọ ihe nkiri a ma ama na Kenya bụ Phoenix Players ebe ọ zụrụ ma mee ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ egwuregwu ndị otu ahụ
Site na ọzụzụ ahụ, ọ malitere ọrụ ya na ọrụ ntinye akwụkwọ na ọtụtụ telivishọn na ihe nkiri Kenya dịka Higher Learning, Lies That Bind, Nairobi Half Life, Noose of Gold na Rush
N'afọ 2014, ya na Mumbi Maina, Brian Ogola, Lizz Njagah nakwa Sarah Hassan pụtara na Maisha Magic East Drama Jane na Abel
N'afọ 2015, ya na Gerald Langiri pụtara na ihe nkiri Fundi-Mentals, ọrụ nke mere ka ọ nweta ihe nrite Kalasha nke afọ 2015 maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma
N'afọ 2015, Karumi banyere n'ime TV hosting, na-ekere òkè na KTN The Presenter Season 2 talent search finishing in the final 10

Otu afọ ka e mesịrị, ọ gara nke ọma ma sonye na TLC's Africa wide talent search, TLC's Next Great Presenter Ọ pụtara na 2nd Runners Up mgbe mkpọsa gara nke ọma nke mere ka ọ ruo ọkwa ikpeazụ nke asọmpi ahụ

N'afọ 2017, ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi magazin ntụrụndụ Arena 254 na K24 tupu ọ debanye ọrụ na South Africa na Danish Broadcasting Corporation TV Series Liberty na-abịanụ, mgbanwe ihuenyo nke akwụkwọ Jakob Ejersbo nke otu aha ahụ
na 2021, Charlie malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Homeboyz Radio na ihe ngosi nri ụtụtụ na ego G dka onye na-elekọta ya mgbe ọ kwụsịrị NRG Radio
Charlie bụkwa onye na-ahụ maka Blogger mgbe niile, na-ekerịta usoro blog ya akpọrọ Charlie's Day Out '
Charlize Theron (/ʃɑːrˈliːz ˈθɛrən/ shar-LEEZ THERR-ən; Afrikaans ; a mụrụ n'abalị 7 ọnwa August afọ 1975) bụ onye South Africa na onye America na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe
Otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri a na-akwụ ụgwọ kachasị elu n'ụwa, ọ bụ onye natara onyinye dị iche iche, gụnyere Academy Award, Screen Actors Guild Award, na Golden Globe Award
N'afọ 2016, Time kpọrọ ya otu n'ime mmadụ 100 kachasị emetụta n'ụwa

Theron bịara bụrụ onye ama ama na mba ụwa n'afọ ndị 1990 site n'ịrụ ọrụ dịka nwanyị na-eduga na ihe nkiri Hollywood The Devil's Advocate (1997), Mighty Joe Young (1998), na The Cider House Rules (1999)

Ọ natara otuto dị egwu maka ngosipụta ya nke onye na-egbu ọtụtụ mmadụ Aileen Wuornos na Monster (2003), nke o ritere Silver Bear na Academy Award maka Best Actress, na-aghọ onye South Africa mbụ meriri Oscar na ụdị ime ihe nkiri
Ọ natara nhọpụta ọzọ nke Academy Award maka igwu egwu nwanyị a na-emegbu n'ụzọ mmekọahụ na-achọ ikpe ziri ezi na ihe nkiri North Country (2005)

Theron emeela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na-aga nke ọma, gụnyere The Italian Job (2003), Hancock (2008), Snow White and the Huntsman (2012), Prometheus (2012), Mad Max Fury Road (2015), The Huntsman Winter's War (2016), The Fate of the Furious (2017), Atomic Blonde (2017), The Old Guard (2020) na (2021)

Ọ nwetakwara otuto maka igwu ụmụ nwanyị nwere nsogbu na Jason Reitman's comedy-dramas Young Adult (2011) na Tully (2018), na maka igosipụta Megyn Kelly na ihe nkiri akụkọ ndụ Bombshell (2019), na-enweta nhọpụta nke atọ nke Academy Award maka nke ikpeazụ
Kemgbe mmalite afọ 2000, Theron etinyela aka na mmepụta ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ ya Denver na Delilah Productions
O mepụtara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, n'ọtụtụ n'ime ha o nwere ọrụ dị mkpa, gụnyere The Burning Plain (2008), Dark Places (2015), na Long Shot (2019)
Theron ghọrọ nwa amaala America n'afọ 2007, mgbe ọ na-ejigide nwa amaala South Africa
A na-asọpụrụ ya na ihe nkiri na Hollywood Walk of Fame
A mụrụ Theron na Benoni, na Transvaal Province (Gauteng Province kemgbe 1994) nke South Africa, naanị nwa nke ndị na-ewu ụzọ Gerda (née Maritz) na Charles Theron (27 Nọvemba 1947 21 June 1991)
, 34 Onye isi agha nke abụọ nke Boer War Danie Theron bụ nwanne nna ya
Ọ sitere n'ezinụlọ Afrikaner, ndị nna ya gụnyere Dutch yana French na German
Ndị nna nna ya French bụ ndị Huguenot mbụ na South Africa
'Theron' bụ aha nna Occitan (nke a na-asụ Théron) nke a na-akpọ na Afrikaans dịka [trɔn]
Ọ tolitere n'ugbo nne na nna ya na Benoni, nso Johannesburg
Na 21 June 1991, nna Theron, onye aṅụrụma, yiri Charlize na nne ya egwu mgbe ọ na-aṅụbiga mmanya ókè, na-awakpo nne ya ma na-agba ha abụọ égbè
Nne Theron weghachiri égbè nke ya, gbaa ya égbè ma gbuo ya
E kpebiri na ịgba égbè ahụ bụ iji chebe onwe ya, ọ dịghịkwa ebubo ọ bụla e boro nne ya
Theron gara Putfontein Primary School (Laerskool Putfontein), oge ọ kwuru na ya 'anabataghị'

Ọ na-arịa ọrịa jaundice ugboro ugboro n'oge ọ bụ nwata na ọgwụ nje a na-enye ya mere ka ezé mmiri ara ehi ya dị n'elu ree (a ga-ewepụ ha site na ịwa ahụ) ezé anaghị eto ruo mgbe ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ iri
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, e zigara Theron n'ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi wee malite ọmụmụ ya na National School of the Arts na Johannesburg
Ọ bụ ezie na Theron na-asụ Bekee nke ọma, asụsụ mbụ ya bụ Afrikaans
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-ahụ onwe ya dịka onye na-agba egwú, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, Theron meriri nkwekọrịta otu afọ nke ime ihe ngosi na asọmpi mpaghara na Salerno wee soro nne ya kwaga Milan, Ịtali
Mgbe Theron nọrọ otu afọ na-eme ihe ngosi na Europe dum, ya na nne ya kwagara US, ma New York City na Miami
Na New York, ọ gara Joffrey Ballet School, ebe ọ zụrụ dị ka onye na-agba egwú ballet ruo mgbe mmerụ ahụ n'ikpere mechiri ụzọ ọrụ a
Dịka Theron chetara n'afọ 2008
N'afọ 1994, Theron ji ụgbọelu gaa Los Angeles, na tiketi otu ụzọ nne ya zụtara ya, na-ezube ịrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri

N'ime ọnwa ndị mbụ n'ebe ahụ, ọ biri na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na mmefu ego $ 300 nke nne ya nyere ya; ọ gara n'ihu na-anata akwụkwọ ndọrọ ego site na New York ma na-ebi ndụ 'site na ụgwọ ọrụ ruo n'ókè nke izuru achịcha site na nkata na ụlọ oriri iji dịrị ndụ

Otu ụbọchị, ọ gara n' ụlọ akụ Hollywood Boulevard iji nweta akwụkwọ ndọrọ ego ole na ole, gụnyere otu nne ya zitere iji nyere aka na ụgwọ ahụ, mana a jụrụ ya n'ihi na ọ bụ onye na-abụghị steeti ma ọ bụghị nwa amaala America
Theron rụrụ ụka ma rịọ onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ ahụ arịrịọ ruo mgbe onye na-arụ ọrụ talent John Crosby, onye bụ onye ahịa ọzọ n'azụ ya, kwụrụ ya ego ma nye ya kaadị azụmahịa ya
Theron gosipụtara dịka onye na-ahụ maka nchekwa na nchekwa na ihe nkiri 2003 The Italian Job, nkwanye ugwu / remake nke ihe nkiri Britain nke afọ 1969 nke otu aha ahụ, nke F
Gary Gray duziri na Mark Wahlberg, Edward Norton, Jason Statham, Seth Green, na Donald Sutherland

Na Monster (2003), Theron gosipụtara onye na-egbu ọtụtụ mmadụ Aileen Wuornos, onye bụbu onye akwụna e gburu na Florida n'afọ 2002 maka igbu mmadụ isii (a kpasaghị ya ikpe maka igbu ọchụ nke asaa) na ngwụcha afọ 1980 na mmalite afọ 1990; onye na-enyocha ihe nkiri Roger Ebert chere na Theron nyere 'otu n'ime ihe ngosi kachasị ukwuu n'akụkọ ihe nkiri'
Maka ngosipụta ya, e nyere ya onyinye Academy maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na 76th Academy Awards na Febụwarị 2004, yana onyinye Screen Actors Guild Award na Golden Globe Award
Ọ bụ onye South Africa mbụ meriri Oscar maka Best Actress
AskMen kpọkwara ya nwanyị kachasị mma n'afọ 2003
Charlize Theron Africa Outreach Project (CTAOP) bụ nke Theron mepụtara n'afọ 2007, onye a kpọrọ onye ozi udo nke UN n'afọ sochirinụ, na mgbalị ịkwado ndị ntorobịa Africa n'ọgụ megide HIV / AIDS
Ọrụ a na-agba mbọ ịkwado òtù ndị na-arụ ọrụ na obodo na-ekwu maka ndị isi na-akpata ọrịa ahụ
Ọ bụ ezie na mpaghara CTAOP bụ Sub-Saharan Africa, isi ihe na-elekwasị anya bụ obodo Charlize nke South Africa
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2017, CTAOP enwetala ihe karịrị $ 63 nde iji kwado òtù ndị Afrịka na-arụ ọrụ n'ala
N'afọ 2008, a kpọrọ Theron onye ozi udo nke United Nations
N'ihe o kwuru, Ban Ki-Moon kwuru banyere Theron 'Ị raara onwe gị nye imeziwanye ndụ ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka na South Africa, yana igbochi na ịkwụsị ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ'
O dekọrọ ọkwa ọrụ ọha na eze n'afọ 2014 dị ka akụkụ nke mmemme Stop Rape Now
N'afọ 2007, Theron ghọrọ nwa amaala nke United States, ka ọ na-ejigide nwa amaala South Africa
Ọ bi na Los Angeles
Theron kuchiri ụmụ abụọ nwa nwanyị, Jackson na Machị 2012 na nwa nwanyị ọzọ, August, na Julaị 2015
Ọ na-enwe mmasị na nkuchi site na nwata, mgbe ọ matara banyere ogige ụmụ mgbei na ọnụ ọgụgụ zuru oke nke ụmụaka na ha
N'ọnwa Eprel 2019, Theron kpughere na Jackson, onye dị afọ asaa n'oge ahụ, bụ nwa agbọghọ transgender
O kwuru banyere ụmụ ya nwanyị, sị, 'A mụrụ ha onye ha bụ, na kpọmkwem ebe ha abụọ nọ n'ụwa na-ahụ onwe ha ka ha na-etolite, na onye ha chọrọ ịbụ, abụghị maka m ikpebi'
Ọ bụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Susan Sarandon na Sigourney Weaver kpaliri ya
Ọ kọwara mmasị ya na Tom Hanks dịka 'ihe gbasara ịhụnanya' ma kirie ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata

Ọ dịghị mgbe e gosipụtara ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Hollywood na magazin na South Africa n'ihi ya ọ maghị otú ọ dị ruo mgbe ọ kwagara na United States, nke a na-ekwu na ọ bụ ihe kpatara àgwà ya 'n'ala' maka ịbụ onye a ma ama
Mgbe emechara ihe nkiri maka That Thing You Do!, Theron nwetara akara aka Hanks na edemede ya
O mechara nye ya Cecil B
DeMille Award ya n'afọ 2020, nke Hanks kpughere na ya nwere mmasị maka ọrụ Theron kemgbe ụbọchị ọ zutere ya
Theron kwuru n'afọ 2018 na ọ gara ọgwụgwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ n'ihi iwe, na-achọpụta na ọ bụ n'ihi nkụda mmụọ ya na-etolite n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa, nke kwụsịrị mgbe ọ dị iri na ise
Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ 2020, ọrụ ihe nkiri Theron dị ukwuu enwetala nhọpụta 100 na mmeri 39
Charlotte Mensah bụ onye Britain / Ghanaian hairstylist

Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na onye nduzi okike nke Hair Lounge, na Portobello Road nke London N’ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018 ọ ghọrọ nwanyị isi ojii mbụ a kpọbatara n’ụlọ ezumezu nke British Hairdressing Hall of Fame
A mụrụ Mensah na United Kingdom
Ọ gara London College of Fashion
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nrite ndị ọ nwetara maka ọrụ ya gụnyere
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Charlotte Mensah Academy, site na nke ọ na-ahazi nkuzi iji zụọ ndị na-eto eto, ndị na-enweghị isi na Ghana nkà ya
O guzobekwara Ladies of Visionary Empowerment nke na-ezube ịkwalite ohere agụmakwụkwọ na inye ụmụ agbọghọ ike n'Africa

Kie Aïcha Charlotte Millogo (amụrụ na 14 Julaị 1998), nke a maara dị ka Charlotte Millogo, bụ onye Burkinabé na agba bọọlụ nke na agbachitere US des Ndị agha Armées ma bụrụ onye isi ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Burkina Faso
Millogo agbaala USFA bọọlụ na Burkina Faso
Millogo gbara Burkina Faso n'kwa dị elu n'oge asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke ụmụ nwanyị nke afọ 2022
Millogo bụkwa onye isi ndị uwe ojii

Charlotte Louise Nichols (amụrụ ya n'ụlọ jị nke 5 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1991) ọ bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ala British Labour Party bụ kwazi onye omeiwu nke Warrington North kemgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 2019
A mụrụ Nichols na Romford, London wee tolite na Reading, Berkshire tupu ọ kwaga Liverpool ebe ọ gụrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Liverpool, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2013

O nwere ụmụnne nwanyị atọ na ụmụnne nwanyị atọ Nna ya Ged Nichols sitere na Kirkby, Merseyside ma bụrụ onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke otu ndị ọrụ azụmaahịa na-ahụ maka ego a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke TUC na 2020
Nne ya si East London

Ọ bịara nwee mmasị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site na nwata wee kwuo na N'ajụjụ ọnụ na ọ na-enwe mmasị na onye na-ekwuchitere Ụlọ Nzukọ Alaeze n'oge ahụ Betty Boothroyd na ndị ọkà okwu na-eti mkpu 'Order'
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, o nwere otu n'ime ahụmịhe mbụ ya gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe o nyere aka na-eme mmemme nzuko omeiwu ndị ntorobịa UK na Prime Minister Conservative n'ọdịnihu Theresa May
Nichols bụ kwazi onye ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị di maka Young Labour

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Liverpool na 2013, Nichols rụrụ ọrụ na Salford afọ ise maka Union of Shop, Distributive and Allied Workers Na-akwado ndị ọrụ logistics sitere na Warrington na-arụ ọrụ na Hamis (Ugbu a Evri), Yodel na XPO Logistics nwere ụgwọ na mkparịta ụka ọnọdụ
Nichols wee gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ maka otu ndị ọrụ GMB dị ka onye nyocha mba na onye ọrụ amụma, ebe ọ na-akwado maka oge na ọnọdụ ka mma maka ndị ọrụ Amazon na Asda
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka GMB, Nichols mere ka gọọmentị tinye ego na teknụzụ nuklia dị ala

a Nichols guzoro dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Labour Party maka Warrington North na ntuli aka izugbe 2019 A họpụtara ya site n'ọtụtụ vootu 1,509 na-ejide ngalaba maka Labour Enwere mbelata n'ọtụtụ n'ozuzu nke gbasoro usoro sara mbara nke ntuli aka 2019, ebe ọtụtụ mpaghara ntuli aka ugwu, ndị Labour họpụtara Conservative maka oge mbụ akpọrọ 'Mgbidi uhie

Na Shadow Cabinet nke Jeremy Corbyn, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka PPS ka Tracy Brabin dị ka Shadow Secretary of State for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport maka obere oge n'oge ntuli aka onye isi ndị ọrụ 2020, tupu ebuga ya na Shadow Cabinet of Sir  Keir Starmer ịbụ PPS nye Emily Thornberry dị ka Shadow Secretary of State for International Trade Mgbe a kwalitere Ruth Jones na Shadow Air Qualities Minister, Nichols nọchiri ya dị ka PPS na Shadow Northern Ireland Secretary Louise Haigh
Na 12 Nọvemba 2020, a họpụtara Nichols onye minista na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na nha anya
Ọ gbapụrụ na ọrụ a na Septemba 2021, dabara na arụkwaghịm nke odeakwụkwọ Shadow nke steeti Marsha de Cordova, na-ekwu maka ebumnuche onwe ya
Nichols kwadoro Rebecca Long-Bailey na ntuli aka onye isi ndị Labour Party nke 2020, mana họpụtara Emily Thornberry ka ọ gbasaa mpaghara ndị ga-eme ntuli aka
N'ọnwa Eprel 2021, Nichols rịọrọ ndị njem mgbaghara mgbe o kesara akwụkwọ ntuli aka mpaghara nke kwere nkwa ịnagide 'mmekọrịta ndị njem'

E kesaala mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ na ngalaba Orford nke mpaghara ya n'oge ntuli aka ime obodo 2021, na nzaghachi nye ogige na ogige Poole dị nso Nichols rịọrọ mgbaghara ma wepụta nkwupụta, na-ekwu, sị “Agwara m ndị otu Labour mpaghara okwu, ewepụrụ mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ ma bibie mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ Ọ na-ewute m na e kesara akwụkwọ akụkọ a n'ime obodo Akwụkwọ nta ahụ adabaghị n'ụkpụrụ onwe m ma ọ bụ nke ndị Labour party' Nichols kwere nkwa na ya ga-abụ 'onye mmekọ' na obodo Gypsy, Roma na ndị njem

Na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọ na-akọwapụta dị ka onye nọ n'aka ekpe nke Labour Party ma si na nzụlite otu ndị ọrụ na-aga n'ihu  Nichols kwadoro Jeremy Corbyn na ntuli aka onye isi nke 2015 na 2016 Labour Party

Nichols tolitere n'ezinụlọ Katọlik nke nwere ụfọdụ ihe nketa Irish Mgbe ọ dị afọ 22, Nichols malitere ịga ọrụ kwa izu na Manchester Reform Synagogue; mgbe ọ gachara ozi ahụ, o kwuru na obi eruola ya ala karịa ka ọ na-etolite dị ka onye Katọlik Ọ tụgharịrị gaa n'okpukpe ndị Juu na 2014 wee mee mmemme bat mitzvah na ụbọchị ọmụmụ 27th ya

Ebe ọ bụ na ọ tụgharịrị na okpukpe ndị Juu, Nichols echewo mmejọ na-aga n'ihu maka nkwenkwe ya, gụnyere mgbochi Semitism sitere na onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi Conservative Party maka ntuli aka 2021 Warrington Borough Council Onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi zigara Nichols ozi site na Twitter na-ekwu 'Nọgidenụ na-agba ọsọ Aryan'
N'afọ 2021, a kọrọ na Nichols nwere nsogbu nrụgide post-traumatic, ebe a manyere ya ibibi nleta ndị omeiwu na Gibraltar mkpụmkpụ na-esochi 'ihe gbasara ahụike uche'
N'ajụjụ ọnụ 2021 Nichols kwuru na ọ na-akọwapụta dị ka nwoke idina nwoke

Tupu ntuli aka izugbe nke Disemba 2019, Nichols jiri akụkọ dị na webụsaịtị LabourList gbachitere ọbịbịa Corbyn na Seder iji mee mmemme Pesach nke ndị Juu, nke otu ndị Juu na-apụnara mmadụ n'ebe aka ekpe bụ Jewdas haziri Emechara katọrọ ihe omume ahụ n'akwụkwọ akụkọ pụtara na Times mgbe ebubo pụtara na ndị bịaranụ etinyela egwu nke 'na-egwu ndị uwe ojii' na 'na-egwu ndị agha

N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019 Nichols tweeted na otu ndị na-akwado SS Lazio bụ ndị emere ihe onyonyo ka ha na-ekele ndị Nazi na Glasgow kwesịrị 'gbaba isi ha' Nichols gbachitere okwu ya na Disemba, 'Ndị a bụ ndị na-eme ekele ndị Nazi n'okporo ámá Britain
Dị ka onye Juu nke nna nna ya lụrụ Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, n'ikpeazụ mgbe ụfọdụ m na-ekwere na a ga-eche ihu n'ụzọ anụ ahụ fascism'
Otu akụkọ e bipụtara na Daily Telegraph na 2019 kọrọ na Nichols kọwara ndị otu Green Party dị ka 'ndị bourgeois scab fucks' wee gwa otu onye ọrụ Twitter, 'Olile anya na ị ga-abụ onye na-amaghị nwoke'
Charlotte Wazen El Khoury (Arabic; amụrụ ya na June 23, 1942) bụ onye Lebanọn bụbu onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ site n'afọ 1963 ruo 1990 na ihe ngosi TV na redio dị iche iche
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ buru ibu, Wazen bụ nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụ isii
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ, a na-eto ya mgbe niile maka ịdị mfe ya n'ikwu okwu n'ihu ọha na ngosi
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Compagnie libanaise de Télévision (CLT) mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, na-egosi mgbasa ozi TV
Onye agbata obi na-arụ ọrụ na mmepụta ihe onyonyo gbara ya ume itinye akwụkwọ maka ọrụ na TV
Ọ bụ ezie na nna ya, onye isi ndị agha, enweghị mmasị n'echiche ahụ, o kwetara iso ya gaa ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ
Ozugbo ọ banyere n'ụlọ ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ gwara onye agbata obi nọ ebe ahụ, 'Mee ka ọ daa'
Kama nke ahụ, Jean-Claude Boulos, onye na-ahụ maka mmemme ahụ n'oge ahụ, tiri mkpu mgbe ọ hụrụ ya na nyocha 'Ọ bụghị ihe ọjọọ ma ọlị, onye ntakiri!'

N'afọ 1971, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Lebanọn nwere naanị ọwa TV abụọ dị iche iche, CLT (nke bụbu Tele Liban) na Tele Orient (nke mechara jikọta iji mepụta Tele Liban)) N'oge ahụ, Wazen na-arụ ọrụ maka CLT, na-ewepụta obere mmemme maka ihe ngosi Majallatiʹa kwa izu na-egosi asọmpi n'etiti ụmụ akwụkwọ na-anwale ihe ọmụma ha
E nyere ya ọkwa na Tele Orient dị ka onye na-akwado ihe ngosi a ma ama, nke Najib Hankach kwadoro
Ka oge na-aga n'ọrụ ya na Tele Orient, a họpụtara ya maka mmemme ọnwa isii na Glasgow, Scotland nke ntọala nke Thompson kwadoro, raara onwe ya nye ịzụ ndị nta akụkọ na mba ndị na-emepe emepe
Wazen zụrụ onwe ya na mmepụta, iduzi, ma bụrụ ọkachamara na mmepụta nke ihe ngosi maka ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka, nke nyere ya ohere igosi ihe ngosi dị otú ahụ mgbe o si Scotland lọta
Agha Obodo Lebanọn gosipụtara nnukwu mgbanwe na onye isi ala ọhụrụ (Elias Sarkis) na mgbanwe na nzukọ mgbasa ozi Lebanọn
N'afọ 1976, na mbido agha ahụ, Wazen kwụsịrị igosi ihe ngosi ya ma malite ịrụ ọrụ na ịkekọrịta ozi, site na ngalaba ozi
Tinyere onye na-elekọta TV, Wazen bụ onye na-akwado redio na Radio Liban, ebe ọ gosipụtara mmemme dị iche iche
N'ime afọ ndị 1990, Wazen kwagara Paris, France, ebe ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ngalaba akụkọ Lebanọn na Radio Orient
Ọ bụ ezie na a maara ya maka omume nzuzo ya, ịjụ ajụjụ ọnụ na ihe omume, Wazen enwetala nkwado dị ukwuu kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
Otu ihe omume o sonyere na ya bụ asọmpi Miss Lebanon nke afọ 1997, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka ikpe ya na ndị ọzọ a ma ama
A họpụtara Wazen dị ka onye kachasị maa mma na onye kachasị amasị ndị Lebanọn, na ntuli aka nke مشوار nke ndị na-agụ magazin ahụ
Wazen el Khoury meriri n'ọnọdụ mbụ ịbụ onye nnọchi anya ịma mma na ọkachamara, 'nke ndị mmadụ họpụtara maka ndị mmadụ' dịka onye nduzi magazin Sami Maksad si kwuo ya
N'afọ 1982, a họpụtara ya ọzọ dị ka nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri onyonyo kachasị ewu ewu na ihe nkiri onyonyo nke Lebanọn, n'oge a site n'aka ndị na-agụ magazin Le Réveil
Charlotte Wazen El-Khoury lụrụ Ibrahim El Khoury (1936-2013), onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Tele Liban, site n'afọ 1999 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2013
Ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Christine na Câline El-Khoury

Amụrụ Charly Boy, onye aha ọmụmụ ya bụ Charles Chukwuemeka Oputa ka mkpụrụ ụbọchị dị na iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1950 (a makwaara ya dị ka CB, His Royal Punkness, na Area Fada), Ọ bụ onye Naijiria na agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu, onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn, onye na'eme ihe nkiri, onye na -ebipụta akwụkwọ, onye na emepụta egwu Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ọha na eze na ekwu maka ha na-eme ihe ntụrụndụ na Naijiria
A maara ya nke ọma maka ụdị ndụ dị ichè ọ na ebi, echiche ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na mmepụta mgbasa ozi, ọkachasị The Charly Boy Show
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Performing Musicians Association of Nigeria, na 2011
Ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe Idol Series
Ọ bụ nwa nwoke nke abụọ nke onye bụbu onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu bụ Chukwudifu Oputa, a mụrụ Oguta na ezinụlọ ndị Katọlik, Ọ bụkwa nwa nwanne nne nke onye egwu Sweden bụ Dr
Alban
Dị ka ọ na-ajụkarị ikpughe ụbọchị amụrụ ya n'ajụjụ ọnụ, afọ ole ọdị bụ ihe zoro ezo ruo n'afọ 2011 mgbe ọmere emume ncheta ọmụmụ ya nke iri isii
Otú ọ dị, ụdị ndụ ya dị mgbagwoju anya ma Ọ mere ncheta ọmụmụ nke iri isii na atọ ya ka ọnwa Juunu dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na itoolu na afọ 2013, nke mere ka afọ ole ọdị bụrụ ihe esemokwu
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ kọwara ndị mụrụ ya dị ka ndị na-anabata ihe ndị na-agba kwa ụmụ ha ume ikwupụta obi ha n'enweghị ihe mgbochi, Oputa kwuputala na ha bụ ndị na chọ inọrọ onwe ha
Ọ chọburu ịbụ onye ụkọchukwu, mana ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ seminarị mgbe otu afọ gasịrị
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, ọ kwagara America ebe ọ gara kọleji, gụsịa akwụkwọ ma jiri nzere degree pụta na Communications
Oputa banyere ọrụ ịkụ egwu n'afọ 1982, o rue n'afọ 1984, nanị ya wepụtara otu egwu dị elu ana-kpọ Obodo GiriGiri

N'afọ 1985, ọ fọrọ obere ka ọ ghara ikwe ka ya na Polygram Nigeria nwee nkwekọrịta ndekọ n'ihi ọdịdị ya na-abụghị nke ọtụtụ mmadụ ghọtara ruo mgbe a kọwaara ya nye onye isi nchịkwa nke akara ahụ bụ Ton Seysener onye bịanyere aka na ya, ma mekwaa ka ọha na eze nụ egwu ahụ ana-kpọ Nwata Miss

Na ngwụcha afọ 80, Oputa, site n'enyemaka nke onye na-emepụta ejiji na onye na-agụ egwú / onye na-ede egwú onye ana-kpọ Tyna Onwudiwe, mepụtara mmadụ ọhụrụ punk nke nwere jaket akpụkpọ anụ na akpụkpọ ụkwụ buutu, ịnyịnya ígwè ike , mohawks, na ntụziaka ọhụrụ na egwu, na-ejikọta pop Africa na Afrobeat
Onye ọsụ ụzọ n'ime òtù punk nke Naijiria, n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ nwetara aha na-abụghị nke gọọmentị His Royal Punkness, ọ gbanwekwara aha ebe obibi ya na Legọsụ kpọ ya The Punk Palace
Charmaine Mujeri bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na mba Zimbabwe
N'afọ 2020, a họpụtara ya maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kachasị mma na Africa Movie Academy Awards
Mujeri bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'afọ 2017 Harare International Festival of the Arts N'afọ 2019, ọ pụtara n'egwuregwu, Ruvajena iji mee ka a mara banyere ọgụ nke ndị na-arịa ọrịa albinism
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado na ihe nkiri, Cooked Up
E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ n'ofe Afrịka, ọ bụkwa onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye site na National Art Merit Awards (NAMA) na Zimbabwe International Film Festival (ZIFF)
N'afọ 2020, ọrụ Mujeri na ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Mirage mere ka a họpụta ya na AMAA maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma
Na mmepụta mmekorita ya na USAID Shaina, Mujeri bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe iji wulite ikike nke ụmụ agbọghọ na Zimbabwe
Charmaine Pereira bụ odee na ọkà mmụta nwanyị na Abuja, Naijiria
Ọrụ ya gbadoro ụkwụ na echiche nwanyị, mmekọahụ, agụmakwụkwọ nwoke na nwanyị, na ọha obodo na steeti
Pereira bụkwa onye nhazi maka Initiative for Women's Studies na Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye otu Tapestry Consulting, otu nzukọ na-achọ ịmepụta nha anya nwoke na nwanyị n'ebe ọrụ na Africa
N'afọ 1991, Pereira nwetara PhD
na Psychology of Education si The Open University
N'afọ 2004, Charmaine Pereira na Jane Bennett deziri ụmụ nwanyị Jacket Qualitative Research Methodologies on Sexualities and Gender in Africa
Pereira na-akụzi ugbu a na ngalaba Sociology na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha ihe ịma aka nke onye nyocha na-ezute mgbe ọ na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ n'etiti omenala, okike, mmekọahụ, iwu, na okpukperechi

Tyrone Ollie Jr', (amụrụ n'ubochí iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1991), onye a maara dịka Chase N Dough (nke a na-akpọkarị ChaseNDough), bụ onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ America, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe osise si Chicago, Illinois

O mepụtara egwu n'ihe banyere ndị egwu dịka King Louie, Sasha Go Hard, Tink, Spenzo, Nick Cannon, RondoNumbaNine, Dreezy, Lil Durk, Fredo Santana, Young Chop, OTF NuNu, Eldorado Red, LEP Bogus Boys, Sir Michael Rocks, Big Pooh, Chella H, Rockie Fresh Treasur' na ụfọdụ ndị ọzọ
A maara ya n'ihe banyere Drill Music scene na Chicago
A mụrụ Chase N Dough n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'ubochí iri abụọ na abụọ, n'afọ 1991, na Chicago, Illinois na mpaghara Southside
O bu ụzọ bido ịkụ egwu na klas nke itoolu n'ụlọ enyi ya Terrell
Dough enwetụbeghị ohere ịnweta kọmputa
Ike gwụrụ ya otu ụbọchị mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụfọdụ demos ma kpebie ịchọ 'otú e si eme ihe na kọmputa gị'
O sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ na ndị bi gburugburu ya na-eme egwu ma ha abụghị ndị ama ama

mana ọ na-eji ya eme ihe n'ezie iji mee ka oge na-efe n'oge ahụ

O tinyekwara ọzọ nsụgharị ngosi nke FL Studio na kọmputa ya

Chaskele o bụ ihe egwuregwu bat-and-ball nke a na-eme n'etiti ìgwè abụọ nke ndị egwuregwu abụọ
Ọ bụ egwuregwu Ghana nke ụmụaka na-egwu ma ọ dị ka cricket
A na-eji ite ite a kụrisịrị akụrisị eme bọọlụ ahụ ma jiri osisi mee ihe dị ka ụtarị
A bu na-eji ite, osisi, taya ụgbọ ala ma ọ bụ bọket egwuri egwu Chaskele
Ọ dịkarịa ala ndị egwuregwu abụọ nwere ike ịmalite egwuregwu ahụ, otu na-amalite dị ka onye na-agbachitere na nke ọzọ, onye na-emeri
Onye na-agbachitere bụ iji jide n'aka na onye mmegide anaghị atụba bọọlụ n'ime bọket ma ọ bụ taya ụgbọ ala iji merie
Chauness Chauzje Choosha (amụrụ na 31 Disemba 1992) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ na Zambia
O sonyere na 2012 IAAF World Indoor Championships ebe o guzobere ndekọ mba Zambia ọhụrụ na mita 60, e wepụrụ ya na ọkara ikpeazụ nke mita 100 na African Championships in Athletics
Choosha ruru eru maka 2012 Summer Olympics site na wildcard ma erughị eru maka agba nke mbụ nke 100 mita
A mụrụ Choosha na 31 Disemba 1992 na Monze, Zambia
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Musuku High School
Choosha mere egwuregwu mba ụwa mbụ ya na afo 2012 IAAF World Indoor Championships na mita 60, ma setịpụ ihe ndekọ mba Zambia ọhụrụ na ọzụzụ ahụ, na oge nke 819 sekọnd
Otú ọ dị, ọ mechara nke asatọ (na nke ikpeazụ) na okpomọkụ ya ma ọ gaghị na ọkara ikpeazụ

O mechara gaa Benin iji sọọ mpi na afo 2012 African Championships in Athletics ebe o sonyere na mita 100 wee ruo eru maka ọkara ikpeazụ na oge nke 12 72 sekọnd, mana e wepụrụ ya na asọmpi mgbe ọkara ikpeazụ gasịrị
Phiri sonyekwara na mita 200 mana ọ banyeghị na ọkara ikpeazụ mgbe ọ gwụchara nke ikpeazụ na okpomọkụ ya na nke 30 n'ozuzu
Choosha ruru eru maka afo 2012 Summer Olympics na London site na wildcard mgbe onye na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge Tonny Wamulwa merụrụ ahụ n'ihe mberede okporo ụzọ izu atọ tupu egwuregwu ahụ amalite
O sonyere na 100 mita ụmụ nwanyị na agba nke mbụ n'ụbọchị nke atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ ma bụrụ onye a dọtara na okpomọkụ nke mbụ, na-emecha nke anọ n'ime ndị egwuregwu asatọ, na oge nke 12 29 sekọnd
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2016, oge ahụ bụ nke kachasị mma
Ọ nọ n'ihu Afa Ismail si Maldivies (1252 sekọnd) na Rima Taha nke Jọdan (1266 sekọnd), na okpomọkụ nke Feta Ahamada nke Comoros (1181 sekọnd)
N'ozuzu, ọ mechara nke 57 n'ime ndị asọmpi 78, ọ gakwaghị n'agba nke mbụ n'ihi na oge ya kachasị ọsọ bụ 005 sekọnd nwayọ karịa onye na-eme egwuregwu kachasị nwayọ nke gara n'ihu
Chavonda Jacobs-Young (amụrụ 1967 ) bụ onye isi gọọmentị America na-eje ozi dị ka onye nchịkwa nke Ọrụ nyocha Ugbo nke US Department of Agriculture's Agricultural Research Service
Ọrụ nyocha ọrụ ugbo bụ onye isi USDA, ụlọ ọrụ nyocha sayensị nke ụlọ nwere ndị sayensị otu puku na narị asatọ nakwa ụlọ nyocha iri itoolu n'ụwa niile
Jacobs-Young ka akpọrọ onye nchịkwa na February 2014; ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na onye nwere agba na-edu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Na 1998, Jacobs-Young ghọrọ nwanyị Africa-American mbụ nwetara PhD
na akwụkwọ sayensị
Jacobs-Young bụ onye Augusta, Georgia
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Hephzibah High School na 1985
N'oge ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na oge ya na North Carolina State University, o sonye na ihe omume dị elu ma bụrụ onye mmeri nke Atlantic Coast Conference ugboro atọ
Jacobs-Young nwetara nzere Bachelor nke Sayensị na sayensị akwụkwọ nakwa injinia (1989, NC State) nakwa nzere Masta nke Sayensị na sayensị osisi na akwụkwọ (1992, NC State)
Mgbe ahụ na 1998, ọ nwetara nzere PhD na sayensị akwụkwọ na North Carolina State University
N'afọ 2008, Jacobs-Young nwetara Asambodo Nduzi Ọha na mmejuputa iwu ọha site na Mahadum America dị na Washington, DC
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị PhD ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka Prọfesọ nke Sayensị akwụkwọ na Injinia na Mahadum Washington site na 1995 ruo 2002
Na 2002, a bịakwutere Jacobs-Young maka ịbanye na gọọmentị etiti
Ọ hụrụ ohere ịmụta banyere ọrụ gọọmenti etiti wee were ọrụ dị ka onye isi mmemme nke mba na nyocha, agụmakwụkwọ, nakwa Extension State Cooperative
N'ikpeazụ, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye isi nyocha amụma maka ọrụ ugbo na Office of Science and Technology Policy nke White House
N'ime ikike a, ọ kwadoro onye ndụmọdụ sayensị nke onye isi ala na ndị ọzọ nọ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ndị isi nke Onye isi ala na ọrụ dị iche iche nke sayensị ugbo
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ofe Gọọmenti Etiti iji kwalite imekọ ihe ọnụ na imekọ ihe ọnụ n'ihe gbasara sayensị kacha mkpa
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na USDA n'uju n'afọ 2010, Jacobs-Young nyere aka guzobe ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi onye isi nke nnyocha n'ụlọọrụ USDA
N'ebe ahụ, ọ kwadoro nhazi nke nduzi sayensị n'ofe Ngalaba ahụ ma hụ na ụkpụrụ kachasị elu nke ọgụgụ isi na iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe nke sayensị maka nyocha a na-agbasa site na ngalaba ahụ

Jacobs-Young jekwara ozi dị ka onye na-eme ihe nchịkwa maka National Institute of Food and Agriculture nke ụlọ ọrụ USDA tupu ọ banye na Ọrụ nyocha nke ọrụ ugbo na 2012 dị ka onye nchịkwa maka mmemme nyocha

Ọ bụ onye so na United States Senior Executive Service, onye otu American Association for the Advancement of Science, onye so na National Academy of Public Administration, na onye isi oche ọkwa onye mmeri

Na Machị 2022, a gụnyere Jacobs-Young na #IfThenSheCan - Ihe ngosi gburugburu National Mall n'ememe nke ọnwa akụkọ ihe mere eme ụmụ nwanyị; ihe ngosi ahụ nwere ihe oyiyi ruru otu narị na iri abụo nke ndụ nke ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ na mpaghara STEM
Chawne Monique Kimber (/ʃɔːn/ SHAWN; amụrụ n'afọ 1971) bụ ónyé African-American na-eme mgbakọ na mwepụ na ónyé na-eme akwa, a maara màkà igosipụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na akwa ya
Ọ bụ prọfesọ na Lafayette College, ébé ọ bụ onye isi ngalaba nke mgbakọ na mwepụta
Kimber bụ ugbu a Dean nke College na Mahadum Washington na Lee
Kimber si n'ezinụlọ ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị na-emepụta ihe owuwu na Alabama

Ọ bụ ezie na o dere na ọ 'hụrụ mgbakọ na mwepụ n'anya mgbè niile', ọ malitere ọmụmụ ihe ya na Mahadum Florida site n'ịmụ injinia tupu ọ gbanwee na mgbakọ na mwepụta n'ihi na ọ chọpụtara na ọ na-eju afọ
Ọ nwetara nzèrè masta na Mahadụ nke North Carolina na 1995, dị ka nwa akwụkwọ nke Idris Assani
Ọ laghachiri na Mahadwa Florida màkà ọmụmụ doctoral, mezue PhD
ya na 1999
Akwụkwọ édémédé ya, Prime Ideals in Rings of Continuous Functions, jikọtara algebra abstract na nyocha ọrụ ma Jorge Martinez lekọtara ya

Chaxiraxi bụ otu n'ime chi nwanyị ndị isi nke pantheon Guanche
E jikọtara ya na kpakpando Canopus
Dịka e kwenyere na ụmụ amaala nke Canary Islands bụ ndị Berber tupu mmepeanya, a na-eche na Chaxiraxi nwere ike ịbụ nke sitere na chi nwanyị Punic-Berber Tanit, e nyere aha dị iche na njirimara
Ụfọdụ na-ejikọkwa ya na ọdịdị a n'ihe dị ka 1392, 1400 maọbụ 1401 nke Virgin nke Candelaria na Güímar, n'àgwàetiti Tenerife, bu nwa ya, Chijoraji
A na-ewere Chaxiraxi dị ka chi nwanyị bụ isi nke okpukpe ọhụrụ na Chọọchị nke ndị Guanche
Chaz Guest (amụrụ na úbọchị abụọ n'ọnwa Mee, 1961 na Niagara Falls, New York) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nké na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi nke eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ
Huffington Post kọwara ya dị ka 'onye America na-ese ihe nke nwéré ọgụgụ isi dị ukwuu'
Nne na nna Guest bụ Algirtha Guest (amụrụ 1933) na Rev
Theodore James Guest (amụrụ 1922 - 2006)
Nnà ónyé ọbịa - Rev
Guest, bụ onye natara Purple Heart n'Agha Ụwa nké Abụọ
Guest bụ nwa nke asaa n'ime ụmụnne nwoke na ụmụnne nwanyị itoolu
Guest gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Science na Graphic Design na Southern Connecticut State University na 1985
Guest tolitere n'ọbọdọ dị jụụ na Niagara Falls, New York na ezinụlọ ya
Nné na nnà ya gbara alụkwaghịm mgbè ọ dị afọ iri
Mgbè ịgba alụkwaghịm gasịrị, ya na nné ya na ụmụnne ya kwagara Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Guest nwèrè ụmụ nwoke abụọ, a mụrụ otu n'afọ 1994 na otu n'ọnwa 2003
Ónyé ọbịa natara agụmakwụkwọ Gymnastic iji gaa Southern Connecticut State University (SCSU), iji mụọ Kinesiology ma nweta nzèrè na Graphic Arts
O mechara nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na mmemme Olympic nke US
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na SCSU, Guest kwagara New York City, ébé ọ debanyere aha na usoro ọmụmụ ejiji na Fashion Institute of Technology
Ọ bụ n'oge a ka ọ nụchara nkà ya n'ise ihe
Mgbè ọ nọ na Fashion Institute, Guest matara Antonio Lopez
Lopez kpaliri ma metụta mkpebi ya ịchọ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe osise
Guest gụrụ akwụkwọ na Fashion Institute ruo ọnwa itoolu
N'afọ 1986, Guest kwagara Paris, France ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe ejiji n'onwe ya
Guest sonyeere Joyce Magazine dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise màkà mkpuchi magazin ha, ọ bụkwa ya na-ahụ màkà ihe osise nke mkpuchi magazin JOYCE maka oge 1987/1988
Ọ bụ mgbè ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Joyce Magazine ka Guest zutere Christian Lacroix
Lacroix gbàrà ya ume itinye nkà ya na-ese ihe osise na eserese, mgbe Lacroix hụrụ otu n'ime ihe osise Guest nke ejiji ejiji mere maka Joyce Magazine
Mgbè ógè 1987/1988 gasịrị, Guest hapụrụ magazin Joyce wee kwaga Dax, France ebe ọ malitere ise ihe
Mgbè ọ hapụsịrị Fashion Institute of Technology, Guest malitere ịmụ ihe osise nke Pablo Picasso na Salvador Dalí
Ónyé ọbịa mụkwara ihe osise nke Balthus
N'afọ 1991, Guest resịrị ónyé na-agafe agafe ihe osise mbụ ya n'èzí ụlọ ya na Soho

Ihe ngosi nka mbụ nke ónyé ọbịa bụ ihe ngosi otu 'Decoding Identity I Do it for My People' (ubochí irí abụọ na ato n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 2009 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Machị, 2009) na Museum of the African Diaspora na San Francisco (MOAD)
N'afọ 2004, mgbè ọ nọ n'ụlọ Mattie na Michael Lawson na Hancock Park, Los Angeles, ọnụnọ Barack Obama, mgbè ahụ na-agba ọsọ maka Senate, kpaliri Guest Mgbè ya na ndị ọbịa na-emekọrịta ihe
Ihe oyiyi a nọgidere na ya, o mepụtara ihe osise nke Onye isi ala dabere na ihe oyiyi uche ahụ
Onye isi ala ahụ hụrụ ihe osise nke onwe ya na nchịkọta ego n'ụlọ Oprah Winfrey na 2008
QIhe osise Guest nke Justice Thurgood Marshall nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu kwụ n'ọfịs Oval nkè Onye isi ala Barack Obama na White House
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2005, ónyé omeiwu Obama nke ógè ahụ zigara Guest akwụkwọ ozi na-ekele ya maka ihe osise ahụ
Guest edeela usoro serigraph nke Ónyé isi ala Obama
N'ikpeazụ, Kouji Matsuzaki San, ónyé isi ọbọdọ Obama, Fukui prefecture kpọrọ Guest ka ọ gosipụta serigraphs
Na Febụwarị 24, 2010, Chaz Guest nyere Ónyé isi ala Gambia, Yahya Jammeh onyinyo nke Ónyé isi ala gambia
N'oge nleta ya na Gambia, Guest gwara ónyé ndu Gambia banyere mgbanwe aha James Island na Juffereh na North Bank Region
Ónyé ọbịa tụụrụ onye ndu Gambia aro ka a gbanwee aha agwaetiti ahụ ka ọ bụrụ 'Kunta Kinte' Island

Na Febụwarị 6, 2011, James Island, nke bụbu British Slave Fort nke a na-eji eme ahịa ohu nke ndị Afrịka nke dị na Osimiri Gambia na North Bank Region ka Onye isi ala Gambia gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Kunta Kinte Island
N'emume mgbanwe aha nke James Island na 2011, Guest kpughere obere ihe oyiyi ya nke 30 ụkwụ nke Kunta Kinte nke a ga-egosipụta na Kunta Kint Island
Guest mepụtara ihe osise abụọ iji nyere ezinụlọ Trayvon Martin aka, onye Africa-America nọ n'afọ iri na ụma nke e gburu n'ihe mere na Florida na 2012, iji kwado nwanne Martin nke obere
Onye ọbịa nyere onyinye ego sitere na ire ihe osise ahụ na Ezinụlọ Martin
Maazị Guest mekwara ihe osise nke Troy Davis - nwoke a mara ikpe ọnwụ maka igbu onye uwe ojii Georgia na 1991, maka Amnesty International, USA
A kpọrọ onye ọbịa Goodwill Ambassador na Republic of Gambia, West Africa na 2011, na ọnụ na-ekwuchitere US maka 2014 International Roots Festival na Gambia
Chaz Maviyane-Davies (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1952) bụ onye Zimbabwe a mụrụ onye na-emepụta ihe osise nke bi na Cambridge Massachusetts, United States
Magazin Design nke United Kingdom akọwawo Maviyane-Davies dị ka “onye agha nke eserese eserese” Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ maka BA na Mahadum Middlesex na MA na Central School of Art and Design, London
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Britain, Japan, Malaysia, United States, na Zimbabwe

N'ihi ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọjọọ n'ala nna ya nke Zimbabwe na ụdị esemokwu nke ọrụ ya, Maviyane-Davies kwagara United States n'afọ 2001, ebe ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ nke imewe na Massachusetts College of Art and Design na Boston
Na mgbakwunye na e bipụtara ya n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, magazin mba ụwa, na akwụkwọ akụkọ, e gosipụtara ọrụ ya nke ọma ma tinye ya na ọtụtụ nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide na ụlọ ngosi dị iche iche
Ọ bụ onye ọkà okwu a kpọrọ òkù na ọtụtụ mahadum na ikpo okwu okike
N'afọ 2009, e nyere ya akara ugo mmụta dọkịnta nke akwụkwọ ozi mmadụ na Mahadum Massachusetts, Lowell
Ruo ihe karịrị iri afọ atọ, ọrụ dị ike nke Maviyane-Davies ewerewo nsogbu nke ịzụ ahịa, ahụike, nri, ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, gburugburu ebe obibi na ikike mmadụ
N'afọ ndị 1980 na afọ 1990, Maviyane-Davies rụrụ ụlọ ọrụ na Zimbabwe nke a na-akpọ The Maviyane Projects nke bụ ọkachamara na ihe nkiri na eserese eserese
Ọ lụrụ Chiyoko ma nwee otu nwa nwanyị Djena

O gosipụtala ọrụ ya gburugburu ụwa site na ngosi ịkpọ òkù nke mpempe akwụkwọ na ihe ngosi naanị ya na China, Taiwan, South Korea, Japan, Russia, Poland, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Bulgaria, France, Ukraine, Argentina, Mexico, Brazil, England, na Netherlands n'etiti mba ndị ọzọ
Ụwa nke ajụjụ 120 posters on the human condition (2015)
Charles 'Chazz' Miller (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na anọ n'ọnwa Juun, 1963 [citation needed]) bụ ónyé America na-ese n'okporo ámá si Detroit, Michigan
Ọ bụ ónyé guzobere Ọbọdọ Artist, mmemme nke Motor City Blight Busters, otu na-enweghị uru dị na Old Redford nke ebumnuche ya bụ ime ka ọbọdọ Detroit kwụsie ike ma mee ka ọbọdọ Detroit dịghachi ndụ
Chazz bụkwa ónyé guzobere Detroit Public Art Workz (PAWZ), nke bụ atụmatụ iji kpalie uto ọbọdọ site n'inye ndị ntorobịa Detroit ụzọ okike iji mee ka ekele màkà nka
Miller tolitere n'ime ọbọdọ Detroit, ma gosipụta mmasị n'oge na-adịghị ányá na nka
Ya mèrè ọ kwagara Columbus, Ohio iji mụọ ihe osise na mgbasa ozi na Columbus College of Art and Design (1981-1986)
Ọrụ mmezigharị ọbọdọ mbụ dị ịrịba ama nke Miller bụ Artist Village, ebe ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ ọrụ na-ese ihe
Dị ka akụkụ nke ọrụ ya 'ịma mma ọbọdọ' ọ na-ese ihe osise na mgbidi mpụga nke ụlọ ọrụ Artist Village, yana ụlọ ndị ọzọ dị n'ógbè ahụ
Ọrụ mbụ Miller, PAWZ, na-enye mmemme nka na ihe nlereanya dị mma màkà ihe karịrị otu puku ụmụaka nọ n'ime Ọbọdọ kwa afọ
Ọbọdọ Detroit nyèrè iwu ka mmemme ahụ mepụta ihe osise na mpaghara Brightmoor, na-emetụtakwa ndị ntorobịa na okike
N'afọ 2010, Chazz Miller na ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo sere ihe osise plywood nke urukurubụba dị ka akụkụ nke mkpọsa mgbochi ọrịa a na-akpọ 'Papillion Effect' ('Papillon' bụ French màkà urukurubba)
Miller gbakwunyere ọtụtụ urukurubụba na ụzọ okike na Eliza Howell Park
Cheb Bilal bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu raï, amụrụ na 23 Julaị 1966 na Cherchell, Algeria
Ọ na-emepụta egwu ọdịnala nke gụnyere ngwá egwu dịka congas na violins
Bilal nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ntorobịa ya na Oran, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na nchekwa nke egwu
Ọ bụ nne na nna nna ya zụlitere ya mgbe nne na nna ya gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe ọ dị obere
Na mbido, Cheb Bilal rụrụ ọrụ na agbamakwụkwọ na ememme ndị ọzọ na gburugburu Oran
N'afọ 1980, o guzobere otu El Ahouar
N'afọ 1989 ọ gara Marseille, France, nke ọ kọwara dị ka oge mgbanwe n'ọrụ ya
Cheb Hasni (Arabic الشاب حسني), a mụrụ Hasni Chakroun (Arabic حسني شقرون) (1 Febụwarị 1968 29 Septemba 1994), bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu raï
Ọ bụ onye a ma ama na Maghreb, ebe ọ ruru ọkwa kachasị elu nke ọrụ ya na ngwụcha afọ 1980 na mmalite afọ 1990
Ọ bụ nwa nke onye na-agba igwe ọkụ ma too n'ezinụlọ na-arụ ọrụ ebe ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ asaa
A maara Hasni nke ọma maka abụ ịhụnanya ya, mana ọ na-emekwa ihe ndị a machibidoro iwu dị ka ịgba alụkwaghịm, ịhụnanya na mmanya na-aba n'anya
E gburu ya n'afọ 1994

Akụkụ okwu Hasni na-ese okwu (karịsịa ndị dị na egwu egwu 1987 'El Baraka', nke nwere okwu ndị na-aṅụ mmanya banyere mmekọahụ mmekọahụ) dọtara iwe nke ndị alakuba na-anụbigara okpukpe ọkụ n'obi ókè na Algeria ma kwenyere na e gburu ya n'ihi ya
A mụrụ ya na Oran, Algeria, Cheb Hasni nwere mmasị ime ihe nkiri site na nwata
N'ajụjụ ọnụ e bipụtara na akwụkwọ akụkọ French Libération na 1992, Hasni kọrọ otú 'onye ọ bụla si mara m n'ógbè anyị mgbe m bụ nwata
Ana m agagharị n'okporo ụzọ na akpa ụlọ akwụkwọ m tụpụrụ n'ubu m, na-abụ abụ m'
Ihe ngosi mbụ dị ịrịba ama nke Hasni dị ka onye na-agụ egwu mere mgbe ọ gara oriri agbamakwụkwọ dị n'ógbè ahụ, ebe otu ndị ụmụnne Naoui a ma ama na-edu na-agụ egwu
N'ịbụ ndị olu ya masịrị, ha kpọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ n'elu ikpo okwu na cabaret a ma ama, La Guinguette
Isi mmalite nke abụọ n'ọrụ Hasni bịara n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe onye na-emepụta ihe gwara ya ka ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Raï Chaba Zahouania dekọọ
N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1987, ha abụọ dekọrọ abụ na-akpali akpali site na ụkpụrụ Algeria, 'Beraka' ('The Shack'), na-eme ka ha mara nke ukwuu
Isiokwu nke abụ ya bụ ihe arụmụka ma mee ka abụ ahụ bụrụ ihe a ma ama n'etiti ndị ntorobịa Algeria, bụ ndị nyere aka na ahịa egwu ahụ nke otu nde
Ihe ịga nke ọma nke 'Beraka' mere ka Hasni bụrụ onye a ma ama, yana isiokwu na-ese okwu nke ndị nkatọ na ndị na-anụ ọkụ n'obi na-echegbu onwe ha banyere iwu ewu nke ụdị Raï
Ihe ọzọ dị mkpa bụ 'El Visa' abụ banyere ịkwaga, nke rere ihe dịka kaseti pụkụ narị abụọ na iri ise

Dị ka ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ na-agu egwu Raï bi na Algeria, Cheb Hasni nọrọ oge ukwuu na-eme ihe nkiri na mba ofesi (na-eme ihe ngosi n'ebe niile site na Paris, Marseilles, na Boston ruo Washington DC, Tunis, Casablanca, na Tokyo, ịkpọ aha obodo ole na ole) karịa n'ụlọ, n'ihi iwu nke mgbochi egwu na Algeria n'oge ahụ
Hasni ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na Raï, na-edekọ ihe dị ka kaseeti otu narị n'oge ọrụ ya
Ụdị 'Raï love' ya pụrụ iche n'oge na-adịghị anya kpaliri ndị na-eṅomi ya, ọkachasị Cheb Nasro, onye malitere ọrụ ya na 1988 na egwu 'Pour te faire plaisir'
Aha Hasni na abụ ndị na-ese okwu mere ka ọ nata egwu ọnwụ site n'aka ndị Alakụba siri ike
Ebe obibi ya bụ isi nọgidere na Oran, ọ bụ ezie na ezinụlọ ya biri na gburugburu ebe dị nchebe nke France
Na 29 Septemba 1994, ọ bụ onye egwu raï mbụ e gburu, n'èzí ụlọ nne na nna ya na mpaghara Gambetta nke Oran
Ọnwụ ya bịara n'etiti omume ime ihe ike ndị ọzọ megide ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Maghrebi ama ama
Ụbọchị ole na ole tupu ọnwụ ya, ndị GIA tọọrọ onye na-agụ egwu Kabyle Berber bụ Lounès Matoub
N'afọ sochirinụ, na 15 Febụwarị 1995, e gburu onye na-emepụta Raï Rachid Baba-Ahmed na Oran
N'agbanyeghị eziokwu ahụ bụ na Hasni nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị obere (afọ iri abụọ na isii), a na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị omenkà kachasị mma na-achọ egwu Raï mma
Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ iri afọ atọ mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, a ka na-ege egwu ya ntị n'ọtụtụ ebe ruo taa, ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ọgbọ na-eto eto na-enweta mkpali n'ihe o mepụtara
Nasereddine Souïdi (Arabic الدينيدي سو, amụrụ na 30 Nọvemba 1969), nke a maara dị ka Cheb Nasro na Nasro bụ onye na-agu egwu raï kachasị mma onye nwere ihe karịrị abọm otu narị na iri atọ na otu
Nasro edekọla egwu nke gụnyere 'Ndirek Amour' (M na-ahọrọ gị Ịhụnanya m) 'Ma Rkhalinich' (Ahapụla M) na 'Enfin Enfin' (n'ikpeazụ)
Ọ bụ naanị onye na-agu egwu Raï bịanyere aka na ụlọ ọrụ egwu America, Miles Copeland ARK21/Mondo Melodia
A mụrụ Nasro Nasereddine Souidi na 30 Nọvemba 1969 na Aïn Témouchent o wee too n'obodo ọdịda anyanwụ Algeria nke Oran
Oge izizi ya na egwu bịara mgbe ọ dị afọ abụọ mgbe nwanne nna ya zụtara ya drabouka (ịgba omenala)

Mgbe ọ bụ nwata, ọ na-esokarị Cheb Zahounie agbamakwụkwọ na-eme ka ọ pụta ìhè mbụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa na ụlọ ọgbakọ Nasro dị n'ógbè ahụ nwetara nkwanye ùgwù ma kpọọ ya òkù ka ọ bụrụ ihe ngosi kwa ụbọchị site na elekere nke ato nke ụtụtụ ruo elekere nke anọ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ
N'ime otu afọ, o dekọrọ abọm mbụ ya wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na Europe dum
N'agbanyeghị asọmpi, Nasro na Cheb Hasni ghọrọ ezigbo enyi

Olileanya nke Nasro n'oge ọrụ malitere ịla n'iyi mgbe e gbuchara Cheb Hasni na September 29, 1994, mgbe ọtụtụ ndị na-agu egwu raï kwagara Europe ma ọ bụ North America, ọ bụ otu n'ime mmadụ ole na ole gara n'ihu na-abụ abụ n'ala nna ya
O mechara kwuo, sị “Enwere m anụ ahụ́ nke ukwuu n’ihi nchegbu wee na-agagharị ọtụtụ ebe'

Cheb Sahraoui (onye amụrụ Mohamed Sahraouui, Tlemcen, Algeria, 1 Eprel 1961) bụ onye Algeria na-agu egwu raï, onye mbụ gara njem North America na onye mbụ itinye synthesizers eletrọniki n'ime ndokwa ya
Dị ka onye na-akpọ piano, ọ mụrụ egwu na ebe nchekwa egwu na Oran, wee malite ọrụ egwu ya site n'ịbụ abụ raï classics na egwu Beatles na klọb abalị nke obodo ahụ
E wepụtara egwu mbụ ya, 'Ana Mahlali Noum', n'afọ 1978
N'afọ 1983 ọ lụrụ onye na-agụ egwu Fadela Zalmat, nke a maara dị ka Chaba Fadela, ha abụọ malitekwara idekọ egwu dị ka mmadụ abụọ
Ihe ndekọ mbụ ha, 'N'sel Fik', ghọrọ ihe na-ewu ewu na mba ụwa, ma soro ya na ihe ịga nke ọma na njem, nke gụnyere njem nke USA na 1990 na 1993
Mgbe ha nọ na New York, ha dekọrọ abọm 'Walli' ha na onye na-emepụta ihe na onye na'ọtụtụ ngwá egwu Bill Laswell
Ha si Algeria kwaga France na 1994
Na ngwụcha afọ 1990, Sahraoui na Fadela kewara
A tọhapụrụ abọm izizi nke Sahraoui, Un Homme Libre (A Free Man), n'afọ 2000
Cheb Tarik (ezi aha ya bụ Tarik Belgot) bụ onye egwu Algeria, nke bi na Paris, France ugbu a, ma bịanye aka na Universal Music Group
Egwú mbụ ya, 'Reggae Raï' bụ mkpuchi, na ụtụ maka egwu 'Reggae Night' nke Cheb Hasni, onye egwu e gburu na Oran, Algeria site n'aka ndị Alakụba
'Reggae Raï' nwere ọnọdụ na chaatị ruo ọtụtụ izu, nke gafere pụkụ otú narị na iri asaa na otu na ahịa ma gaa n'ihu na-apụta n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta
N'afọ 2001, Tarik nyere aka na nchịkọta Big Men, ngwakọta nke raï na reggae
A maara ya maka igosi ụdị egwu dị iche iche, abọm ahụ ghọrọ ihe na-ewu ewu n'ihi egwu ahụ, 'J'ai pas besoin'
A tụbara aha Tarik n'ime ihe ngosi, na ahịa karịrị nde isii
O sonyere n'abụ 'J'ai vu trop de frères partir' na abọm 'Du mal a s'confier' nke Scred Connexion
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Cheb Tarik ebipụtala abọm atọ, na egwu isii
Abọm ndị ahụ gụnyere
Cheba Zahouania (Arabic الشابة الزهوانية ) (nke a na-akpọkwa Chaba), a mụrụ Halima Mazzi (Arabic حليمة مازي) (amụrụ na Mee 15, 1959) bụ onye na-agụ egwu Algeria nke a maara maka egwu raï
Ọ bi na France kemgbe e gburu onye ya na ya na-abụ abụ, Cheb Hasni, na 1994
A mụrụ Halima Mazzi na Oran, Algeria site n'aka nna onye Morocco na nne onye Algeria, na 1959
N'okpuru aha Chaba Zahouania, ọ ghọrọ onye na-agụ egwú a ma ama nke raï, ụdị egwu ọdịnala
N'afọ 1986, afọ ise mgbe ọ malitere ọrụ ya, ọ nwetara nkwado site na arụmọrụ ya nke 'Khâli ya khâli' (Nwanne nna m, oh, nwanne nna m) na Cheb Hamid
N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1987, Zahouania dekọrọ 'Beraka' ('The Shack'), ya na Cheb Hasni, nke ụkpụrụ Algeria weere dị ka ihe na-akpasụ iwe, nke dọtara uche ha

Ihe ịga nke ọma nke abụ ahụ mere ka Hasni bụrụ onye a ma ama ma gbakwunye na íwú ewu Zahouania, ọ bụ ezie na abụ ahụ nọgidere na-ese okwu n'ihi ndị nkatọ na ndị Alakụba, bụ ndị na-echegbu onwe ha banyere iwu ewu nke ụdị raï
E gburu Hasni na Oran na 29 Septemba 1994
Zahouania hapụrụ Algeria wee gaa biri na France
O nwere ike ịlaghachi na 1999 wee dekọọ na Algeria, gụnyere egwu ya na Cheb Abdou
N'afọ 2006, ọ malitere ịbụ abụ banyere isiokwu okpukpe mgbe Onye isi ala Abdelaziz Bouteflika kpọrọ ya ka ọ gaa Mecca na njem ala nsọ mbụ ya
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ masịghị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ya na ndị ọzọ na-agụ egwú raï sonyeere iji mepụta kọmitii nkwado maka Abdelaziz Bouteflika na 2009
Checkerspot bụ magazin mgbanwe ihu igwe na Canada nkè Canadian Wildlife Federation bipụtara
Obu Magazin dí n'efu, nkè a malitere mbipụta mbụ ya n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2007 ma kwụsị mmepụta n'afọ 2009 n'ihi ndakpọ akụ na ụba
Checkerspot kwùrù na ọ bụ akwụkwọ na-anọpụ iche na ihu igwe
A gụrụ magazin ahụ aha urukurubụba nkè e kwenyere na ọ na-agbanwe agbanwe n'ihi okpomọkụ ụwa
Canadian Wildlife Federation, otu n'ime nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na-enweghị uru na Canada, ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa na-abụghị nkè gọọmentị, na-arụ ọrụ iji chebe ụdị na oghere ọhịa nke Canada
E ji Checkerspot mee ihe iji kwalite ọrụ na ịkwalite mkparịta ụka banyéré mgbanwe ihu igwe
Checkerspot kwụsịrị mmepụta
Josephine Cheffi Meatchi bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba Togolese
Meatchi bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị isii a họpụtara ka ha bụrụ ndị omeiwu nke Togo na afọ 1979; ndị ọzọ bụ Abra Amedomé, Kossiwa Monsila, Essohana Péré, Zinabou Touré, na Adjoavi Trenou
Ọ bụ nwunye osote onye isi ala Togo Antoine Meatchi, ya onwe ya mechara rụọ ọrụ na gọọmentị; ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke steeti maka Social and Women's Affairs na afọ 1984
Cheick Fantamady Camara (1960 - Jenụwarị 7, 2017) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Guinea na-enweta ihe nrite
Ọ bụ onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri abụọ dị mkpirikpi na ihe nkiri abụọ
A mụrụ Cheick Fantamady Camara na 1960 na Conakry, Guinea
Mgbe ọ bi na France mgbe ọ dị afo iri anọ, ọ gara ọmụmụ ihe na edemede na Institut national de l'audiovisuel, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1997
Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, na 1998, ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri na Louis Lumière College
Camara malitere site na iduzi ihe nkiri abụọ dị mkpirikpi Konorofili nke afọ 2000 na Bé Kunko na 2004
O mechara duzie ihe nkiri abụọ Il va pleuvoir sur Conakry na 2006 na Morbayssa na 2010

Camara meriri Prix RFI du Public na 2007 Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou na Burkina Faso na 2008 Prix Ousmane Sembène na Khouribga African Cinema Festival na Morocco maka Il va pleuvoir sur Conakry
Camara nwụrụ na Jenụwarị 7, 2017, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ise na asaa
Cheick Omar Diabate bụ onye njikwa bọọlụ bu Nijeria
N'ịchịkwa Gernot Rohr dị ka onye nkuzi Niger n'afọ 2014, Diabate duziri Menas ka ha merie Cape Verde 3-1 ma gbaa 1-1 na Mozambique, n'ikpeazụ na-erughị eru maka iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2015
Tupu oge eruo, ọ bụ osote onye nkuzi nke otu mba ahụ mana e nyere ya ọrụ nke ịmecha mkpọsa iru eru mgbe ọpụpụ Rohr gasịrị
O gosikwara mkpebi nke Togolese Football Federation ịkwụsị egwuregwu nke obodo ha ma gwa ha ka ha maliteghachi ya
Cheik Ndoluvualu, onye a na-akpọ Cheik Ledy (1962–1997), bụ onye Congo na-ese ihe
A mụrụ ya na Kinto M’Vuila, Democratic Republic of Congo
Cheik Ledy mụrụ ọrụ n'aka nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye, onye na-ese ihe ịrịba ama Chéri Samba, mgbe ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na 1977, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka Samba ruo afọ iri na ụlọ ọrụ Kinshasa ya
Dị ka Samba, ihe osise Ledy na-ekwu maka nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke oge ya
Ọrụ ya na-ese okwu gụnyere ihe osise akara na iji condom na ọrụ
Ọ nwụrụ n'ihi nsogbu metụtara ọrịa AIDS na 1997 na Kinshasa
Ihe osise Ledy na-egosipụtakarị ihe osise na-eji agba na-egbuke egbuke
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụdị eserese akara ma jiri ederede French na Lingala
Ọrụ ndị a ma ama gụnyere 'Non comprendre' (Agaghị m aghọta) (1995), 'Arrosage' (Mmiri) (1995), 'Absence de morale' (Moral Absence) (1990)
Cheikh El Hasnaoui (1910 - 2002) bụ onye na-agụ egwu Berber nke amụrụ n'otu obere obodo dị nso na Tizi Ouzou na Algeria
Ọ bụrụ abụ chaabi nke Algeria, ya na Slimane Azem, bụ ndị na-ahụ maka ịtọ ntọala nke egwu Kabyle a ma ama nke oge a n'afọ ndị 1950s na 1960s
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2002 na Saint Pierre de la Reunion, France
Ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Cheik El Hasnaoui

Ọ bịara bụrụ onye ama ama na Nollywood site n'ihe nkiri mbụ ya bụ Silent Scandals ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ Genevieve Nnaji na Majid Michel
Ọ tụrụ ugo mmerii na'Most Promising Actress' nke emere maka ihe nkiri o mere na '6th Africa Movie Academy Awards'
A mụrụ Chelsea na Kano Steeti na agbụrụ Umuahịa, Abia Steeti
Nne na Nna ya na-arụ n'ụlọ akụ
Ọ gara akwụkwọ na Federal Government Girls Koleji Minjibir na StLouis Sekọndrị Sukulu, ha abụọ dị na Kano
Ọ mụrụ asụsụ bekee na asụsụ na Mahadum Maiduguri
Dịka mkparịta ụka ya na The Punch o kwuputara na 'Ntolite m bụ ihe obi ụtọ n'ihi na mgbe ahụ, Kano dị n'udo ma makwa mma'
Tupu O mee Silent Scandals, ọ bụ onye nlereanya nke naanị ihe nkiri ọ na-eme bụ n'egwuregwu, nke o mere n'ụlọ ụka
Onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri bụ Vivian Ejike kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa nyocha maka ọrụ nkwado na Silent Scandals, a họpụtara ya ka ọ pụta na onyonyo ahụ

A maara ya nke ọma maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ezinụlọ ya nke afọ 2019 bụ The Son of the House nke ọ nwetere ihe nrite Naịjirị Prize maka Literature awards na 2021

The kemịkalụ, ike, akwụkwọ, obibi akwụkwọ, osisi na ndị ọrụ jikọrọ aka (CEPPWAWU) bụ òtù ọrụ na-anọchite anya ndị ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche na South Africa
E guzobere njikọ ahụ site na njikọta nke
hemica Ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe (CWIU) Na akwụkwọ, mbipụta, osisi na ndị ọrụ jikọrọ aka (PPWAWU) 1lC
N'oge njikọta ahụ, njikọ ahụ nwere ndị otu 93,000, nke dara na ndị òtù 64,100 site na 2011

Chemistry gburugburu ebe obibi bụ ọmụmụ sayensị nke kemịkalụ na biochemical na-eme n'ebe eke
O kwesịghị inwe mgbagwoju anya na kemistri akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, nke na-achọ ibelata mmetọ nwere ike isi na ya
Enwere ike ịkọwa ya dị ka ọmụmụ nke isi mmalite, mmeghachi omume, njem, mmetụta, na akara aka nke ụdị kemịkalụ na gburugburu ikuku, ala, na mmiri; na mmetụta nke ọrụ mmadụ na ọrụ ndu na ndị a

Chemistry gburugburu ebe obibi bụ sayensị interdisciplinary nke gụnyere kemịlụ ikuku, mmiri na ala, yana ịdabere kpamkpam na kemịlụ nyocha yana metụtara gburugburu ebe obibi na mpaghara sayensị ndị ọzọ
Chemistry gburugburu ebe obibi gụnyere ịghọta nke mbụ ka ebe a na-emetọghị emetọ si arụ ọrụ, kemịkalụ kemịkalụ dị n'ụdị mkpokọta dị na ya, yana mmetụta ndị dị aṅaa
Ewezuga nke a, ọ gaghị ekwe omume ịmụ nke ọma mmetụta ụmụ mmadụ na-enwe na gburugburu ebe obibi site na mwepụta kemịkalụ
Ndị na-ahụ maka kemịkalụ gburugburu na-ewepụta echiche dị iche iche sitere na kemistri na sayensị gburugburu ebe obibi dị iche iche iji nyere aka n'ịmụ ihe na-eme ụdị kemịkal na gburugburu ebe obibi
Echiche izugbe dị mkpa sitere na kemistri gụnyere ịghọta mmeghachi omume kemịkalụ na nha anya, azịza, nkeji, nlele, na usoro nyocha
Ihe na-emerụ emerụ bụ ihe dị na okike na ọkwa dị elu karịa ọkwa edozi ma ọ bụ nke na-agaghị adị ebe ahụ
Nke a nwere ike ịbụ n'ihi ọrụ mmadụ na bioactivity
A na-ejikarị okwu ahụ na-emetọ eme ihe na-agbanwe agbanwe na ihe na-emetọ ihe, nke bụ ihe na-emetụta gburugburu ebe obibi

Ọ bụ ezie na a na-akọwa ihe na-emerụ emerụ mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka ihe dị na gburugburu ebe obibi n'ihi ọrụ mmadụ, ma na-enweghị mmetụta ndị na-emerụ ahụ, ọ bụ mgbe ụfọdụ ka nsí ma ọ bụ ihe ọjọọ sitere na mmetọ na-apụta ìhè naanị n'ụbọchị ọzọ

A na-akpọ 'ọkara' dị ka ala ma ọ bụ akụkụ ahụ dị ka azụ nke ihe na-emetọ ma ọ bụ ihe na-emerụ emerụ na-emetụta, ebe sink bụ ihe na-emepụta kemịkalụ ma ọ bụ ụdị nke na-ejigide ma na-emekọrịta ihe na-emetọ ihe dị ka carbon sink na mmetụta ya site na ụmụ nje

Usoro kemịkalụ nke ịdị mma mmiri gụnyere oxygen gbazere (DO), chọrọ oxygen oxygen (COD), chọrọ oxygen biochemical (BOD), ngụkọta agbazere siri ike (TDS), pH, nri (nitrates na phosphorus), ọla dị arọ, kemịkalụ ala (gụnyere ọla kọpa)
, zinc, cadmium, lead na mercury), na ọgwụ nje

A na-eji kemistri gburugburu ebe obibi na England, Natural Resources Wales, United States Environmental Protection Agency, Association of Public Analysts, na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ gburugburu ebe obibi na ndị nyocha gburugburu ụwa iji chọpụta ma chọpụta ọdịdị na isi iyi nke mmetọ
Ndị a nwere ike ịgụnye
Nyocha kemịkalụ ọnụọgụ bụ akụkụ bụ isi nke kemịkalụ gburugburu ebe ọ bụ na ọ na-enye data na-ahazi ọtụtụ ọmụmụ gbasara gburugburu ebe obibi
Usoro nyocha a na-ejikarị eme nchọpụta ọnụọgụ na kemịkalụ gburugburu gụnyere kemịkalụ mmiri oge gboo, dị ka usoro gravimetric, titrimetric na electrochemical
A na-eji ụzọ ndị ọzọ ọkaibe eme ihe na mkpebi nke ọla ndị na-achọpụta ihe na ogige organic

A na-atụkarị ọla site n'atomic spectroscopy na mass spectrometry Atomic Absorption Spectrophotometry (AAS) na Inductively Coupled Plasma Atomic Emission (ICP-AES) ma ọ bụ Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometric (ICP-MS)
A na-atụkarị ogige Organic, gụnyere PAHs, site na iji ụzọ spectrometric uka, dị ka Gas chromatography-mass spectrometry (GC/MS) na Liquid chromatography-mass spectrometry (LC/MS)
Tandem Mass spectrometry MS/MS na mkpebi dị elu/nke ziri ezi Mass spectrometry HR/AM na-enye obere akụkụ kwa puku ijeri
Ụzọ ndị na-abụghị MS na-eji GCs na LC nwere ihe nchọpụta zuru ụwa ọnụ ma ọ bụ kpọmkwem ka bụ isi ihe na ngwa agha nke ngwaọrụ nyocha dị
Akụkụ ndị ọzọ a na-atụkarị na kemistri gburugburu bụ rediochemicals
Ndị a bụ ihe mmetọ na-ebupụta ihe redioaktivu, dị ka akụkụ alfa na beta, na-etinye ihe egwu na ahụike mmadụ na gburugburu ebe obibi
A na-ejikarị countericle counters na scintillation counters maka nha ndị a
A na-eji bioassays na immunoassays maka nyocha nsi nke mmetụta kemịkalụ na ntule dị iche iche

Polymerase Chain Reaction PCR na-enwe ike ịchọpụta ụdị nje bacteria na ihe ndị ọzọ dị ndụ site na DNA na mkpụrụ ndụ RNA dị iche iche na mmụba ma na-egosi nkwa dị ka usoro bara uru maka ịchọpụta mmetọ microbial gburugburu ebe obibi
Ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị na ụlọ ọrụ nyocha nkeonwe ebipụtala ụzọ ule nyocha nke ndị ọgbọ
Ekwesịrị iji ụzọ ebipụta akwadoro mgbe a na-anwale iji gosipụta nrube isi n'usoro iwu
