Cheng Yen (Chinese 證嚴法師; ; Wade Tian Giles Yen2 Fa3-shih1; ; [lower-alpha 1] a mụrụ Chin-Yun Wong; 14 Mee 1937) bụ onye nọn Buddha nke Taiwan (bhikkhuni), nkuzi, na onye ọrụ ebere
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Buddhist Compassion Relief Tzu Chi Foundation, nke a na-akpọkarị Tzu Chi, otu ndị Buddha na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka na Taiwan
N'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ, a na-akpọ ya mgbe ụfọdụ 'Nne Teresa nke Eshia'
A mụrụ Cheng Yen na Taiwan n'oge ndị Japan bi
Ọ zụlitere mmasị na okpukpe Buddha mgbe ọ bụ nwata, na-edo onwe ya dịka onye nọn Buddha n'afọ 1963 n'okpuru onye a ma ama na-akwado okpukpe Buddha, nna ukwu Yin Shun

Mgbe ya na nwanyị dara ogbenye nke nwere ime ọpụpụ, na mkparịta ụka ya na ndị nọn Roman Katọlik na-ekwu maka ọrụ ebere dị iche iche nke Chọọchị Katọlik, Cheng Yen guzobere Tzu Chi Foundation n'afọ 1966 dịka òtù enyemaka ndị Buddha
Nzukọ ahụ malitere dịka otu ndị inyom iri atọ na-elekọta ụlọ na-echekwa ego maka ezinụlọ ndị nọ ná mkpa

Tzu Chi ji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-ewu ewu ma gbasaa ọrụ ya ka oge na-aga iji tinye ọrụ ahụike, gburugburu ebe obibi, na ọrụ enyemaka ọdachi, mechaa ghọọ otu n'ime nnukwu òtù ọrụ ebere n'ụwa, na nnukwu òtù Buddha na Taiwan
A na-ewere Cheng Yen dịka otu n'ime ndị nwere mmetụta kachasị na mmepe nke okpukpe Buddha nke Taiwan nke oge a

Na Taiwan, a na-akpọkarị ya otu n'ime 'Ndị Eze Eluigwe anọ' nke okpukpe Buddha nke Taiwan, ya na ndị ọgbọ ya Sheng-yen nke Dharma Drum Mountain, Hsing Yun nke Fo Guang Shan na Wei Chueh nke Chung Tai Shan

A mụrụ Cheng Yen 'Chin-Yun Wong' (Chinese; ; Pe̍h-ōe-jī __zul____zul____zul__ Kím-hûn) na 1937 na Kiyomizu Town, Taikō District, Taichū Prefecture, Japanese Taiwan (nke oge a bụ Qingshui, Taichung City, Taiwan)
N'adịghị ka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị isi ndị ọzọ a ma ama na Taiwan, a mụrụ Cheng Yen na Taiwan kama ịbụ China
Nwanne nna ya amụtaghị nwa, n'ihi ya, nwanne nne ya na nwanne nna ya zụlitere ya
Cheng-Yen tolitere n'oge ndị Japan bi na Taiwan n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ebe ọ hụrụ mmetụta na-ebibi ihe nke agha ma hụ bọmbụ na Taiwan
A na-ekwu na ahụmịhe ndị a na-enye aka n'ihe ọ weere dị ka eziokwu n'azụ echiche nke impermanence
N'afọ 1945, mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, ọ lekọtara nwanne ya nwoke na-arịa ọrịa n'ụlọ ọgwụ ọnwa asatọ, ya mere ọ mụtara nke ọma banyere ihe mgbu na enweghị enyemaka nke ndị mmadụ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na atọ, nna ya nwụrụ na mberede site na nsogbu ọbara ụbụrụ nke kpatara ọbara ọgbụgba na ọrịa strok
Ọ bụ n'ịchọ ebe a na-eli ya ka Cheng Yen zutere Dharma Buddha, ozizi ndị metụtara ya, na akwụkwọ nsọ Buddha (sutras)
Mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị, Cheng Yen weghaara nlekọta ụlọ ihe nkiri nna ya wee bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka ezinụlọ ya
Cher Lloyd (* 28 Julaị 1993) bụ onye Békè bụ na-agụ egwú
Lloyd nọ X Ihe 2010
Lloyd song 'Swagger Jagger' bụ # 1 na Njikota Ochíchìézè
Cherepon (Chiripon, Chiripong, Kyerepong), ma ọ bụ Okere, bụ asụsụ Guang nke ihe dika mmadu 111,000 na-asụ na obodo Ghana
Cherif Merzouki ma ọ bụ Cherif Merzougui ma ọ bụ Merzogui (February 8, 1951 Amentan, Menaa, Aurès - April 4, 1991 Aurès ) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-emeputa ihe osise
Cherifi bụ aha nna sitere na North Africa
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Chermoula (Berber tacermult ma ọ bụ tacermilt, Arabic شرمولة) ma ọ bụ charmoula bụ marinade na relish eji eme nri Algeria, Libya, Moroccan na Tunisian
A na-eji ya eme ihe iji mee ka azụ ma ọ bụ nri mmiri dị ụtọ, mana enwere ike iji ya mee ihe na anụ ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ nri ndị ọzọ
Ọ dịtụ ka chimichurri nke nde Latin America
Ihe ndị a na-ahụkarị gụnyere galik, cumin, coriander, mmanụ, mmiri epe ntiti, na nnu
Mgbanwe mpaghara nwekwara ike ịgụnye lemon echekwara, yabasị, ose chili, ose ojii, saffron, na ahịhịa ndị ọzọ
Ntụziaka Chermoula dịgasị iche iche site na mpaghara
Na Sfax, Tunisia, a na-ejikarị azụ nnu agwọ agwọ na chermoula n'oge Eid al-Fitr
Ụdị mpaghara a nwere purée raisin gbara ọchịchịrị kpọrọ nkụ nke a gwakọtara ya na yabasị e siri na mmanụ oliv na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ dị ka cloves, cumin, chili, ose ojii, na sinamọn
Ụdị Moroccan gụnyere parsley, cumin, paprika, na nnu na ose
A na-eri ụdị charmoula nke Libya dị ka nri dị n'akụkụ n'oge ọkọchị; O nwere oliv, tuna na ahịhịa ahịhịhịa dị iche iche
The Cherubim and Seraphim Society bụ òtù Ndị Kraịst sitere na Naijiria
Ọ bụ Christiana Abiodun Emanuel guzobere ya dị ka nkewa site na Order dị nsọ ebighi ebi nke Cherubim na Seraphim
Ndị otu ahụ bụ otu n'ime ụka Aladura
A na-azọrọ na Cherubim na Seraphim Society bụ ihe gbasara njikọ dị n'etiti Iso Ụzọ Kraịst na okpukpe ọdịnọdịna Afrịka
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na Lagos Steeti, Naijiria
Na Lagos, o nwere Holy Mary Cathedral Church (Lagos), nke e wuru na 1951
Ọ dịkwa na Northern Naijiria, kwa
Mba ndị ọzọ ọ nọ gụnyere Senegal, United Kingdom na United States
Ndị mmụọ ozi, ọkachasị onyeisi ndị mmụọ ozi Michael, bụ ndị isi na ọha mmadụ
Cheryl Patrice Derricotte bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkírí na-arụ ọrụ na iko na akwụkwọ
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na San Francisco, California
Derricotte si Washington, DC
O nwèrè Master of Fine Arts site na California Institute of Integral Studies (CIIS), Master of Regional Planning site na Mahadum Cornell, na BA
na Urban Affairs site na Barnard College, Mahadum Columbia
O gosipụtara na gallery, ébé ngosi ihe mgbè ochie na oghere nka

Ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya n'onwe ya na 2016, Ghosts/Ships, nkè emere na Museum of the African Diaspora na San Francisco, 'na-enye ọhụụ n'ahịa ohu Afrịka zuru ụwa ọnụ nke dị aghụghọ ma na-aga n'ihu na njikọ ya n'etiti ógè gárá aga na ugbu a'
N'afọ 2019 ọ bụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi nke Ancestral Journeysʹ na Euphrat Museum of Art, ihe ngosi nke 'na-egosipụta njirimara onwé onye, akụkọ ezinụlọ, mbata, na diasporas'

Ihe nríte ya gụnyere San Francisco Individual Artist Commission; Hemera Foundation Tending Space Fellowship for Artists; Rick and Val Beck Scholarship for Glass; Emerging Artist at the Museum of the African Diaspora; Gardarev Center Fellow; Art Alliance for Contemporary Glass Xia Visionary Scholarship, DC Commission on the Arts & Humanities/ National Endowment for the Arts Artist Fellowsship Grant, San Francisco Individualist Artist Commission, na Puffin Foundation Grant
Ọ bụ ónyé ikpeazụ màkà onyinye LEAP na 2016
Derricotte bụ odeakwụkwọ / Minista nke Ozi màkà Three Point Nine Art Collective, otu ndị na-ese ihe Black na San Francisco
Ọ bụkwa Chief Mindfulness Officer nke Crux, otu mba US nke ndị Black na-ese ihe 'na-arụ ọrụ na njikọ nke nka na teknụzụ site na ịkọ akụkọ (Virtual Reality)
' Ọ bụkwa akụkụ nke mkparịta ụka na okwu 'na-azaghachi nnọchiteanya nke agbụrụ na njirimara'
Cheryl Irene Hanna (amụrụ na úbọchị irí nà asaá n'ọnwa Jenụwarị, 1951) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese onyinyo
A mụrụ Hanna na Ann Arbor, Michigan, ọ hapụrụ Pratt Institute tupu ya enweta BA
ya na Pratt Institute na 1973
Hanna bụ ónyé na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ede ihe osise n'akwụkwọ ụmụaka nke a makwaara maka ọrụ ya na collage
E gosipụtara ọrụ Hanna na Newark Museum na National Museum of Women in the Arts
Akwụkwọ Hanna nkè 1987, 'The Enchanted Hair Tale', na mmekorita ya na onye edemede Alexis de Veaux nwetara onyinye Coretta Scott King
O gosikwara akụkọ ndụ nke Phillis Wheatley, Selma Burke, na Mary Fields
Cheryl Phillips (amụrụ na 23 Febụwarị 1962) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa si North West onye jere ozi na National Assembly kemgbe Mee 2019
Onye otu Democratic Alliance, ọ bụ osote minista na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, ọhịa na azụ kemgbe Disemba 2020
Ọ bụ osote minista na-ahụ maka ihe onwunwe na ike site na June 2019 ruo December 2020
Phillips jere ozi dị ka onye kansụl mpaghara na Rustenburg
Phillips mere mkpọsa maka votu 'Ee' na ntuli aka nke afọ 1992
Ọ kwagara Rustenburg na 2001 wee sonye na Democratic Party
O mechara sonye na Democratic Alliance
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na anọ a họpụtara ya na kọmitii nke ngalaba ya
A họpụtara Phillips dị ka onye kansụl mpaghara maka ngalaba 16 na ntuli aka na Jenụwarị 2016
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke South Africa na ndepụta mpaghara nke DA
N'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka ihe onwunwe na ike
Phillips lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ
Cheryl R
Riley (amụrụ n'afọ 1952) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-emepụta ụlọ
Ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ya bụ cherylrrileycom/
Riley chụpụrụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi na ejiji tupu ọ lekwasị anya na imewe
N'afọ 1986, Riley guzobere Right Angle Designs na San Francisco, malite site na imepụta na imepụta oche
A na-ekwu na ọ bụ otu n'ime naanị ndị na-emepụta ihe n'Afrịka America iji guzobe áhà mbà màkà imepụta ụlọ ya

A na-egosipụta ọrụ ụlọ ya ma na-egosiputa ya na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na United States, gụnyere Coin Encrusted Tudor Tables II & III (1992) na Cooper Hewitt National Design Museum, Sunburst and Starburst Chairs (1994) na de Medici Cabinets (1994) na Oakland Museum of California, Zulu Renaissance Writing Table for a Lady (1995) na Hunterakuba (1994-1998) na San Francisco Museum of Modern Art, na B Griffin Dining Table (1992) na The Mint Museum na Charlotte, NC
E gosipụtara ọrụ óche Riley n'ihe karịrị ihe ngosi 60 na United States na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onwé ónyé na New York na California, gụnyere Smithsonian's Cooper-Hewitt Design Museum na 1993
Chet Anekwe bụ omee ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ejije nke a mụrụ na Nigeria ma zụlitekwa ya na New York City
Ọrụ ya gbasara Hollywood, Nollywood na New York Theatre

Chetan Kumar (Kannada cultiv) (amụrụ na 24 Febụwarị 1983), nke a makwaara dị ka Chetan Ahimsa, bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri n'asụsụ Kannada, onye ọgụgụ isi ọha na eze na onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke bi na India
Chetan mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na ihe nkiri ọdịnala nke afọ 2007 Aa Dinagalu ma nye ya ihe nrite dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri izi ezi na Udaya Film Awards maka ihe nkiri ahụ
Ihe ịga nke ọma ya kachasị ọhụrụ bịara na 2013 hit Myna, nke arụmọrụ ya nwetara otuto siri ike
A mụrụ Chetan na 24 Febụwarị 1983 na Chicago, Illinois, US
Nna ya na nne ya, ha abụọ na-arụ ọrụ na US si Karnataka, India
Chetan nwere otu nwanne nwoke nke obere, Ashok Kumar, onye Oxford University PhD na Fulbright Scholar onye na-akụzi akụ na ụba ugbu a na Mahadum Birkbeck, UK
Chetan lụrụ onye ya na ya nọrọ ogologo oge Megha na Febụwarị 2, 2020, n'ụzọ dị mfe, nke na-abụghị nke okpukpe, na nke na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

Ememe agbamakwụkwọ ha, nke emere n'ụlọ ụmụ mgbei, nwere ekele maka atụmatụ dị ka kaadị ịkpọ òkù plantable (akwụkwọ mkpụrụ), nkwa alụmdi na nwunye nke onye na-eme ihe gbasara nwoke na nwanyị, na 'Ụkpụrụ Iwu India' dị ka onyinye nloghachi nye ndị ọbịa niile
A gbara ya akwụkwọ maka ọrụ na-emegide ọha na eze ọ na-etinye aka na steeti Karnataka ebe ọ bụ nwa amaala America
O kpalitere esemokwu site na tweet ịkpọasị megide onye ọka ikpe ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Karnataka
Dị ka akụkọ ndị dị na mgbasa ozi si kwuo, enwere ike ịlaghachi na US maka ọrụ iwu na-akwadoghị ya
Chetan gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-ekwu okwu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Marist High School, Chicago, IL
Chetan gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Yale na South Asian Studies na nkwenye na Comparative Theater (2005)
Nwa amaala US, Chetan bịara India dị ka Fulbright Scholar na 200506
Na Mahadum Yale, Chetan mepụtara isi nke ya n'okpuru ntuziaka Special Divisional Major

Degree BA, nke akpọrọ 'South Asian Studies with an Emphasis on Comparative Theater', gụnyere ikike n'asụsụ abụọ dị na South Asia na klas site na akwụkwọ, anthropology, akụkọ ihe mere eme, ihe nkiri, akụ na ụba, ọmụmụ okike, na ngalaba ndị ọzọ nke ụmụ mmadụ
Chetan makwaara jazz na saxophone Carnatic nke ọma
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2005, Chetan natara Fulbright Scholarship nke ọnwa iri na abụọ na Karnataka, India, ma rụọ ọrụ na National School of DramańBangalore
Ọ mụrụ mmekọrịta dị n'etiti arụmọrụ na ike, ọkachasị na Kannada
N'ime afọ Fulbright ya, Chetan so ndị otu ihe nkiri dị iche iche gaa Karnataka steeti, na-eme nchọpụta n'ebe ndị dị ka Mysore, Shimoga, Chamarajanagar, Dharwad, Mangalore, na ọtụtụ ebe ndị ọzọ

Tupu ọ banye na ihe nkiri, Chetan bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke na-amụ ihe na National School of Drama Tangalore, pụtara n'usoro ihe nkiri Kannada, na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri n'okporo ámá, ma na-eduzi ihe nkiri obodo nke na-ekwusi ike na ike ụmụ nwanyị na ihe ịma aka
Chetan Kumar malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri Kannada na mbido afọ 2006
O meela ihe nkiri Kannada abụọ Sethu Maadhavana Sallaapa na Sooryasthadinda Sooryodayadavarage na otu ihe nkiri Vistara nke dị na Bangalore na Mee 2006 na Ọgọst 2006
A họpụtara Chetan dị ka onye ndu na ihe nkiri mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na ihe nkiri Kannada na otu 'Vistara'
Chetan malitere dị ka dike na ihe nkiri Kannada site n'aka onye nduzi K
Chaitanya nke mbụ bụ Aa Dinagalu na 2007
Nke a mekwara ka o nweta Udaya Film Awards maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma
N'ịbụ nke ihe nkiri a sochiri, Chetan apụtala na ọrụ cameo na ihe nkiri Puneeth Rajkumar nke afọ 2009 bụ Raam
Ọ natara otuto ndị ọzọ maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Birugaali
Otú ọ dị, Myna nke a tọhapụrụ n'afọ 2013 ghọrọ ihe ịga nke ọma
Ndị mgbasa ozi na ndị na-ege ntị toro ya maka arụmọrụ ya
Ọ nwalere ihe nkiri oge Noorondu Nenapu nke dabeere na akwụkwọ akụkọ Marathi Duniyadari nke e wepụtara na 9 June 2017
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nke onye a na-akpọ 'Shreyas'
Ọ bụ ezie na ihe nkiri a emeghị nke ọma na ụlọ ọrụ ịkụ nzọ, a na-enwe mmasị na Chetan maka ime ihe dị iche iche ya
Na Chamarajanagara, Karnataka, ndị na-emebiga ihe ókè n'aka nri kwaturu ihe ngosi ma gbochie ihe nkiri ahụ ka a ghara igosi ya n'ihi nguzo ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Chetan
Ọzọkwa, mkpọsa n'ịntanetị nke ndị Hindu fundamentalists kwụsịrị 'Athiratha' na-ekwu maka ọrụ Chetan
Ọ bụ ezie na a mụrụ Chetan ma zụlite ya na Chicago, United States ruo afọ 23, a maara ya maka asụsụ Kannada nke ọma ma kwado asụsụ Karnataka na ihe kpatara Kannada
Chetan akwadowo òtù ndị ntorobịa na ụmụ akwụkwọ na-aga n'ihu, òtù ụmụ nwanyị, òtù ndị ọrụ ugbo, òtù ndị na-arụ ọrụ, na òtù ndị Dalit na Adivasi iji lụọ ọgụ maka ịha nhata na ikpe ziri ezi
O kwuru okwu n'ofe steeti ahụ, nke mgbe ụfọdụ mekwara ka ndị otu guzosiri ike na ndị otu na-akwado ya meghachi omume na-adịghị mma
A maara okwu Chetan dị ka nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nke na-emegide ọchịchị na nke na-akwado Kannada

Mmeri Chetan nwere n'ime ihe omume gụnyere ego mgbake sitere n'aka gọọmentị steeti maka ndị Endosulfan metụtara (2013), iwu ụlọ 528 maka ndị agbụrụ a chụpụrụ na Dhidalli, Coorg (2016), ntọala nke FIREńFilm Industry for Rights and Equality maka uru nke ụmụ nwanyị, ndị edemede, na ndị ọrụ na Kannada Film Industry (2017), njirimara a ma ama maka obodo Kadugolla (2018), 'ọnọdụ ndị nta' maka Lingayats (2018), n'etiti ndị ọzọ

N'inwe ihe ọmụma banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, akwụkwọ, na ihe ndị na-eme ugbu a, Chetan bụ onye ọgụgụ isi ọha na eze na-apụta, onye a na-akpọkarị dịka onye nnọchiteanya maka mkparịta ụka TV na mgbasa ozi gbasara nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

Ọ na-ekwupụta echiche ya site n'ihe odide banyere nchegbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya (dịka, ịtụ akwa, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mmiri, megide iwu àkwà mmiri ígwè, megide ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị obodo na nchedo maka ndị a na-akparaghị ókè) na iwu gọọmentị na-adịbeghị anya (Land Acquisition Bill, intolerance, na mbibi gburugburu ebe obibi)

Chetan anọwo na-ahazi, na-ekwu okwu ma na-enyere aka iduzi nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na steeti niile dị ka usoro ịha nhata nke klas / agbụrụ / nwoke na nwanyị, ebe ndị ọrụ onwe ha na-echekwa, ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii niile na-achọ, mmata ndị ntorobịa, mkparịta ụka na-emegide ọchịchị aka, na mkpakọrịta ndị ọrụ ugbo / ụmụ akwụkwọ / ndị ọrụ / ndị ọrụ nwanyị / ndị ntorobịa

Mpaghara ọrụ gafee Karnataka bụ Bengaluru, Bidar, Mysuru, Kalaburgi, Chamrajanagar, Kolar, Kodagu, Hassan, Hubli-Dharwad, Haveri, Chikkabalapura, Davangere, Mandya, Tumkur, Shimoga, Chitradurga, na Dakshin Kannad
Chetan, onye Ambedkarite siri ike, etinyela aka mgbe niile na ọgụ ịha nhata na ùgwù nke ndị Dalit ma n'ala ma site na ederede mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta ya
Ọ na-ede, sị 'Atrocities on Dalitsī otu ụzọ, mmegbu site n'elu ruo n'ala - abụghị ihe na-eme mgbe ụfọdụ
Casteism bụ usoro na ụlọ ọrụ gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ
Site na ọtụtụ ikpe na-ezighị ezi megide ndị Dalits, ọ bụ maka oge anyị kwụsịrị ịhapụ mkparịta ụka banyere ịha nhata ndị Dalit naanị na nchekwa
Ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya gụnyere ihe ndị a
Chetan nyere nkwado ya maka ọgụ na-achọ nlekọta ahụike awa 24 na mmụba ụgwọ ọnwa (site na Rs
1,000 ruo Rs
3,000) maka ndị Endosulfan na mpaghara osimiri Karnataka
Gọọmentị steeti mezuru ihe ndị a chọrọ site n'ikenye Rs
7290 crores maka imezigharị ndị nwere nsị ọgwụ ahụhụ, nke ọ na-aga n'ihu na-enye
Chetan duziri nnukwu mkpọsa iji weghachite agbụrụ Coorg 3,000 mgbe ha chụpụrụ n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị na Disemba 2016
A na-ewu ụlọ ugbu a n'okpuru nkwado gọọmentị na nso Kushalnagara na ọnụahịa nke Rs
4 lakhs / ụlọ maka ezinụlọ 528+
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2018, ndị Bharatiya Janata Party BJP boro ọgụ Dhidalli ebubo n'ụzọ iwu dị ka nke sitere na Naxalite, na-edepụta aha Chetan dị ka onye kpatara ya
Chetan agbaghawo ebubo ndị a na-ekwu na ngagharị iwe Dhidalli abụghị nke ime ihe ike na nke iwu kwadoro, na-achọ mgbaghara n'aka Minista Iwu na Onye isi ala BJP
Chetan keere òkè dị mkpa n'ịchọ na-aga n'ihu maka okpukpe Lingayat nwere onwe ya n'okpuru nchebe nke nkà ihe ọmụma Basava na akwụkwọ Vachana
O sonyere na nzukọ okpukpe pro-Lingayat na Bengaluru, Kalburgi, Hassan yana site na ọtụtụ mkparịta ụka TV na ajụjụ ọnụ
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2018, gọọmentị steeti Karnataka tụrụ aro ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nye ndị Lingayats ọnọdụ 'okpukpe ndị ka nta'
Chetan butere ụzọ ma merie njirimara gọọmentị nabatara maka obodo Kadugolla, ndị na-asụ asụsụ Kannada, ndị Adivasis na-azụ atụrụ nwere omume ọdịbendị na ọdịbendị dị iche iche na ihe oyiyi okpukpe

Tọrọ ntọala otu ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Kannada nke a na-akpọ FIRE (nke edebanyere aha na 2017) nke na-arụ ọrụ iji merie iyi egwu mmekọahụ n'ebe ọrụ, melite need nke ndị ọrụ ihe nkiri na ndị n'ahụ maka teknụzụ, ma guzobe otu ndị edemede nwere asambodo na ịkwụ ụgwọ maka ndị edemede
FIRE mere ka ọ dịrị ndị ọrụ sinima na-eme ihe nkiri na-emebi emebi mfe ịkekọrịta ụlọ 150+ maka ndị ọrụ sinema na-emepe emepe
Chetan kụziri echiche dị oke egwu na ihe ndị na-eme ugbu a n'ụlọ akwụkwọ obodo K-10 dị na Mullur, Karnataka, 25 kilomita na mpụga Mysore, malite na Septemba 2005
Usoro agụmakwụkwọ ụfọdụ gụnyere nnọkọ mmekọrịta, nzukọ mkparịta ụka, ọrụ ederede, ndị ọkà okwu ọbịa, na ọmụmụ meta-syllabus

N'oge ya dị ka onye ọkà mmụta Fulbright, Chetan duziri mmemme inye ụmụ nwanyị ike site na iji ihe nkiri dị ka mgbasa ozi maka mgbanwe akụ na ụba na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya maka ụmụ nwanyị obodo Chamrajnagar, Karnataka
Chetan duziri ihe nkiri nke na-agbasa mmata banyere mmerụ ahụ nke onyinye ma jiri ihe okike gosipụta ụzọ isi merie nna ochie
O nyekwara aka hazie ihe omume ahụ - 'Ujwala Andolana' na 2006 ebe ụmụ nwanyị 5,000 sonyere na mmemme ọdịnala
Kahina Chettout (amụrụ 20 Mee 1992) bụ nwa agbọghọ Algeria na egwu volleyball
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu volleyball ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Algeria
O sonyere na 2014 FIVB Volleyball Ukwu ụwa Prix
N'ọkwa klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ maka NR CHLEF nafọ 2014
Kemgbe afọ 2015, ọ malitere igwu egwu maka GS Pétroliers (Groupement Sportif des Pétroliers) nke Algiers
Ọ bụ onye na etinye ihe
Chewa nwere ike izo aka na

Cheyna Lee Matthews (née Williams, amụrụ na 10 Nọvemba 1993) bụ onye America a mụrụ na Jamaica ọkachamara na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba bọọlụ n'ịrụ maka otu Racing Louisville nke National Women's Soccer League (NWSL) na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Jamaica
N'afọ 2012, Williams gara Mahadum Vanderbilt, ebe ọ ga-apụta ugboro iri na asaa, nye goolu isii ma debanye nnyere aka isii n'afọ mbụ ya
N'ịdabere na oge na-aga nke ọma, ọ malitere egwuregwu ịrị na asatọ niile n'afọ nke abụọ ya, na-enye goolu ịrị na isii ma na-edebanye aha ise
Ọrụ ya na 2013 kpọrọ ya First-Team All-SEC
N'afọ 2014, Williams gara Mahadum Steeti Florida, ebe ọ ga-aga n'ihu n'ụdị ya
O bidoro ịrị abụọ na anọ (mpụta ịrị abụọ na isii) ma nyere ndị Seminoles aka imeri NCAA National Championship mbụ ha na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Williams ga-emecha afọ oge ya na egwuregwu ịrị abụọ na ise ọzọ ọ gbara ma nye goolu ịrị
Washington Spirit deputara Matthews na agba nke mbụ nke 2016 NWSL College Draft
Ọ bịanyere aka n'ọnwa Eprel 2016
N'oge ọhụrụ ya, Matthews gbara egwuregwu iri na asaa, asatọ malitere, ngụkọta nkeji iri asaa na asaa ma gbaa goolu atọ
Nwa amaala Georgia nyere goolu mbụ ya na 31 Julaị 2016 megide Sky Blue FC
Ndị otu ahụ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe ngosi mbụ ya na NWSL Championship, n'ikpeazụ na-efunahụ Western New York Flash na penalti
Matthews yi uwe ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya a na-ejighị mee ihe
Otú ahụ lụrụ ọgụ na oge 2017 mana Matthews ghọrọ onye na-enye aka mgbe niile na-apụta mpụta ịrị abụọ na otu ma na-enye goolu ise (nke abụọ na otu ahụ)
Matthews nọrọ n'èzí n'oge 2018 n'ihi ime ime
Tupu oge 2020, otu ahụ kwupụtara na Matthews ga-enweta ezumike a kwụrụ ụgwọ iji lekwasị anya na ọnọdụ ezinụlọ ya, ọkachasị ikike di ya, Jordan Matthews, nwere ịkwaga n'ime NFL
A na-atụ anya na ezumike a kwụrụ ụgwọ ga-adịgide ruo Mee nke afọ ahụ ma kwuo na Matthews nwere ike ịga n'ihu n'ọrụ ya n'ebe ọzọ, ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị mkpa
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, e debere Matthews na NWSL Re-Entry Wire site n'otu The Spirit
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2020, Racing Louisville FC họpụtara Matthews na NWSL Re-Entry Wire
Matthews nọchitere anya otunke dị n'okpuru afọ ịrị abụọ na atọ n'afọ 2015
O nwekwara ike igwu egwu maka Jamaica site n'aka nne ya, onye amụrụ na Portland Parish
Na Jenụwarị 2019, Reggae Girlz kpọrọ ya na nke mbụ ya, sonyeere ndị otu ahụ n'ogige ọzụzụ iji kwadebe ihe ngosi FIFA Women's World Cup mbụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Jamaica
O mere nke mbụ ya na mmeri enyi na enyi megide Chile na 28 Febụwarị 2019
A họpụtara Matthews maka ndị otu 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup nke Jamaica
O mere mpụta nke mbụ ya na World Cup n'oge egwuregwu mbụ nke otu ahụ megide Brazil na Grenoble
Matthews lụrụ onye na-anabata San Francisco 49ers Jordan Matthews na Febụwarị 2018 ebe ha zutere mgbe ha abụọ gara Mahadum Vanderbilt
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Josiah na Lionel
Matthews bụ Onye Kraịst
Na Machị 2022, Matthews kwupụtara na a na-atụ anya nwa nwoke nke atọ
Chez Ntemba bụ ọtụtụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke onye ọchụnta ego Kongo Augustin kayembe nwere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Chez Ntemba nke mbụ malitere na 1992 na Lusaka
Dị ka nke 2014[mmelite] enwere klọb abalị iri anọ na otu n'ofe ndịda Sahara Africa

'Chi-Chi' Igbo (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 1 n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ1986) bụ nwafọ Naijiria nakwazị Denmark bụ onye ọgba bọọlụ lagoro ezumike nká
Igbo malitere oru ya na 2000 ya na FCT Queens nke Abuja
N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2002, ya na ndị otu ya Capital Queens gụsịrị akwụkwọ na asọmpi ndị ntorobịa dị na Denmark
A kpọrọ Igbo n’onwe ya onye kacha gbaa bọọlụ, ma ka o mechara otu afọ,ọ gara Fortuna Hjørring na Denmak
Na Hjørring mgbe ọ dị nanị afọ 15, asọmpi izizi ya na asọmpi Danish kachasị elu, n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2003 nke mmeri ka ọgara tupuu ọ banye Hjørring
A hoputara ya n'afọ 2005 nakwazị n'afọ 2011 dịka onye egwuregwu bọọlụ kachasị nke asọmpi oge ahụ
N'oge asọmpi nka afọ 2008/09 n'afọ 2009/10 ya na ndị otu ya Fortuna Hjørring meriri n'asọmpi Danish
O kpebiri ị la ezumike nká n'afọ 2016, mgbe afọ 14 gachara ọ nọ na Fortuna Hjørring, bụ ebe ọ gbara asọmpi 270 ma rite asọmpi liigi anọ na iko atọ
Kemgbe afọ 2004, ọ gbara ndị bọọlụ
Ọ nọchitere anya obodo ya na 2007 FIFA Women's World Cup na Chaịna
Chinyere Eda 'Chi-Chi' Nwanoku OBE ( /tʃ ɪ tʃ i N w æ n oʊ k ụ / ; amuru ya na ọnwa June n'afọ 1956) bu onye obodo Britian na aku ngwa egwu na akpọ bass na asụsụ bekee

Ọ bụkwa onye na ọka nmuta na ihe gbasara ngwa egwu Bass (prọfesọ) na Royal Academy of MusicNwanoku bụ onye bidoro ma burukwa onye isi ndị ngwa egwu na Orchestra of the Age of Enlightenment, ọkwá ọ nọrọ afọ iri atọ
Nwanoku bụ onye Naijiria na onye obodo bekee Ireland
Ọ guzobere ma burukwa onye nduzi egwu na otu nzukọ egwu akpọrọ Chineke ! Orchestra
Otu a bu ndị otu ndi okacha mara nke mbu na mba Europe nwere otutu ndi ojii, ndi Eshia na ndi agbụrụ di iche-iche
Nwanoku bu onye Nigeria ma burukwa onye Irish
Ọ bụ nwa nke mbụ na nke mbụ n’ime ụmụ ise nke nne na nna ya, dibia bekee (Dr) Michael Nwanoku na nwunye ya Margaret ( née Hevey) muru

Ndị nne ya ochie jụrụ nne ya bu Margaret nne n'ihi na ọ nwere mmekọrịta agbụrụ, were lụọ di onye ojii Agbanyeghị nke a, nne Margaret gara na nzuzo na London na ọnwa atọ ka amụrụ Nwanoku ihu nwa nwa ya
A mụrụ Nwanoku na Fulham, London, ma na tupu ya eruo ogo ịmalite ụlọ akwụkwọ ọ nọrọ afọ ole na ole na Imo steeti, Nigeria, ebe ezinaụlọ ya gara afọ abụọ
Nwanoku gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Kendrick Girls Grammar School na Reading, Berkshire

Mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya dịka onye na-akụ egwu oge gboo - na mbụ ọ malitere ịmụ ihe gbasara ngwa egwu a'na akpọ piano, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ ọ malitere ịmụ ihe maka ngwa egwu bass
Nwanoku mechara gụ akwụkwọ na Royal Academy of Music mgbe ọ na-azụ ọzụzụ dịka onye na-agba ọsọ 100-mita mana ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ egwuregwu igba ọsọ mgbe ọmmerụ ahụ na ikpere
Nwanoku bu onye hiwere otu egwu Chineke! Orchestra, ìgwè ndị egwu mgbe ochie na mba Europe nwere ọtụtụ ndị egwu ojii na ndị agbụrụ ndị ọzọ dị ọbere , ndị ha na ya na-etikọrita egwu oge niile

Ndi otu ndi egwu a nwere ndi mmadu iri isii na abụọ sitere n’ime obodo iri-ato n’otu di iche iche rụrụ ọrụ ha nke mbụ n’afo 2015 na nnukwu ọnụ ụlọ nke akpọrọ Queen Elizabeth Hall Gbakwunye oru ya na Chineke! Orchestra, Nwanoku arụọla ọrụ dịka onye ngwa egwu bass abụọ nke mkpokọta Endymion, London Mozart Players, Academy nke St Martin na Field, ndị England Baroque Soloists, ndị London Classical Player na Orchester Revolutionnaire et Romantique
Ọnọdụ ndị ọzọ Nwanoku nwere gụnyere ịbụ onye otu Board nke National Youth Orchestra, Tertis Foundation, London Music Fund, Royal Philharmonic Society (Council)
Na mbụ Nwanoku nọbu na Board Association British Orchestras
Ọ bụ kwa Patron (onye nlekọta) nke Music Preserved, ndị Cherubim Trust
N’afọ 2019, Nwanoku mepere ebe ohuru nke Hackney New Primary School, ụlọ akwụkwọ ọkachamara maka ụmụaka chọrọ ịmụta egwu
Nwanoku na ụmụ abụọ ya - Jacob Hugh na Phoebe Hugh, yana nwa nwa ya nwanyị, Maya Ekene Hugh, bi na London

N’afọ 2001, a họpụtara Nwanoku dịka onye otu Order nke British Empire (MBE) na 2001 Birthday Honors na Officer nke Order nke British Empire (OBE) na 2017 Birthday Honors, Ihe onyinye na nsọpụrụ abụọ bu maka ọrụ Nwanoku na ihe gbasara egwu
Na mgbakwunye, akwanyere ya ugwu mee ya Fellow nke Royal Academy of Music na Trinity Laban Conservatoire of Music
Chi nke kpotara na Igbo Chukwu, Chineke ma obu otutu chi nke di icheiche
Chi Ewere Ehihe Jie (asụsụ Inglish Night has fallen in the afternoon) bu novel written by the Ị̀gbò author Joseph Uchechuku Tagbo Nzeako
Tagbo Nzeako was born on 14 Juun 1940 in Ȯra Anambra (Anambra State) as one of ten children
Lateron he studied journalism and worked then for the Nigerian Television Agency in Enugu
Other publications on his behalfe are Okuku Agbasaa Okpesi, 1964 (Thomas Nelson, Naigeria); Erimma, 1973 (Thomas Nelson, Naigeria); and Juochi, 1981 (Macmillan, Naigeria)
The novel Chi Ewere Ehihe Jie, written, by J
Tagbo Nzeako, was edited by F
Ogbalu, BSc, Econ
(Lond), University Publishing Company (Printed at Varsity Industrial Press, 11 Central School Road, Onitsha), yet undated, but approximately written in 1980 (?)
Chi Limited, nke e debara aha na afọ 1980, bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-azụ ahịa ngwa ngwa nke na-enye ngwaahịa ndị ahịa na ngalaba mmiri ara ehi, ihe ọṅụṅụ na ihe oriri
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị na Lagos, Naịjirịa ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ Coca-Cola nwe ya
Isi ụlọ ọrụ Chi Limited dị na Lagos
Ngwaahịa ndị isi nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ Capri-sonne na Chivita, ọ nwere ikikere Naijiria iji ree Caprisun
N'ịbụ nke onye ọchụnta ego Dutch, Cornelis Vink, debanyere aha na Naịjirịa na afọ 1980, ọ malitere ọrụ na Machị nke otu afọ ahụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ghọrọ akụkụ nke Tropical General Investment (TGI) conglomerate nke nwere ọdịmma azụmahịa dị iche iche na nri, ahụike, ọrụ ugbo, injinia na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere nkesa nke Capri sonne na 1982 nke mesịrị pụta dị ka otu n'ime akara ya
N'afọ 1990, ọ malitere ire mmiri CHI n'ahịa, nke a na-ere na mbụ na ite mana mgbe afọ ole na ole gachara, a na-etinye ya na Tetra Pak
N'afọ 1996, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ webatara mmiri oroma Chivita n'ahịa ma dị ka ihe ọṅụṅụ gara aga, a na-ere ya na mbụ na ite ruo n'afọ 1997 mgbe etinyere igwe nkwakọba akwụkwọ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mechara wepụta ụtọ atọ ọhụrụ na Tetra Brik pineapple, mango na apụl na 1999 ọ webatara ngwakọta oroma na pineapple
CHI Limited bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'iji nkwakọba Tetra Pak maka ngwaahịa mmiri ara ehi ya, Hollandia
Na 30 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2016, Coca-Cola kwupụtara nkwekọrịta na-ejikọta maka ụlọ ọrụ Coca-Cola iji nweta òkè mbụ nke Chi Limited

N'ime nkwekọrịta ahụ, Coca-Cola mere ntinye ego 40 percent mbụ na Chi Limited ma na-ezube ịbawanye onye nwe ya ruo 100 percent n'ime afọ atọ, dabere na nkwado nchịkwa, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na usoro azụmahịa ndị ọzọ ogologo oge
Na Jenụwarị 30, na afọ 2019 Ụlọ ọrụ Coca-Cola kwupụtara na ọ nwere ugbu a pasent 100 nke CHI Limited
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị 60% fọdụrụnụ, ọ nweghịzi nke ya
Chi Limited bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwado na Manchester United FC
na-eme ka ha bụrụ ndị mmekọ ihe ọṅụṅụ nke Manchester United F'C
na Naịjirịa
Njikọ ahụ na-enye ohere ka CHI Limited jiri akụ Manchester United FC na ngwaahịa Chi dị iche iche na Naịjirịa
A na-atụ anya na mmekọrịta ahụ ga-eme ka onyinyo ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị mma karịsịa n'etiti nde mmadụ iri ise na-eso Manchester United FC na Naịjirịa
Nana Kwame Appiasei (amuru na Maachị 12 1977) onye amara dika Smallgod, bu onye omuru egwu Ghana, omenaala na ihe nleba anya n'uwe okporo ámá ruo otutu afo onye mechara were okwukwe buru ibu
nka Ntụnye aka ya na ụlọ ọrụ egwu Ghana enwetala ya ọtụtụ nkwanye ugwu, nke kacha pụta ìhè bụ,'Abonten Father

Smallgod n'oge ọ bụ nwata aghaghị ịgagharị gburugburu A zụlitere ya n'etiti London, Ghana na Netherlands Omenala ndị a dị iche iche jikọtara ọnụ iji mepụta ụtọ dị iche iche na egwu nke gafere omenala na ụdị ma na-egosi ọrụ egwu dị iche nke Smallgod taa
Ọ malitere itinye aka na egwu site na imeghe klọb abalị a na-akpọ 'Basement' na 2003 nke ọ na-agba ọsọ ruo afọ 4
Site na nke ahụ, ọ zutere ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe n'oge ahụ wee malite ijikwa ọrụ Reggae nke Ghana Black Prophet, wee gaa n'ihu ịbịanye aka na onye na-eti egwu nke Ghana J-Town
N'oge a, ọ na-ejikọ ma na-enyere ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na Ghana aka na-apụta n'oge ahụ
Afọ ole na ole n'ahịrị, ọ chịkọtara onye na-ese ihe Alté nke Naijiria bụ Wavy The Creator na onye na-eti egwu na onye na'agụ egwu nke Ghana-UK bụ Eugy
O nwekwara ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ na ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ a na-akpọ Nasecworld na onye na-eti egwu na London Lp2loose dị ka onye na-etinye aka ugbu a

Smallgod bụkwa nnukwu onye na-anụ ọkụ n'obi n'ihe ejiji, ebe ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ na ụfọdụ ụdị ejiji dị n'ógbè na nke dị iche iche dị ka 'FREE THE YOUTH,' 'Daily Paper,' 'FILLING PIECES,' 'STEELO,' 'ụmụ nwoke mpaghara,' 'BIKERZ SUNDAYS,' 'THE NEW ORIGINALS' na 'Xpltcstudio'
Smallgod abụwo onye mmadụ mgbe niile, na n'ìhè
Nke a emeela ka a kpọọ ya 'President Accra'
Ọ bụ ebe mbụ ndị na-ese ihe si mba ọzọ na-abata na Ghana, na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri si Ghana na-aga na diaspora
A na-ejikọta Smallgod na ndị dị ka Wizkid, Tiwa Savage, Tory Lanez, Sarkodie, Headie One, King Promise, Black Sherif na ndị ọzọ
Nke a, na mgbakwunye na egwu ya na mbọ ndị ọzọ emeela ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama; ịhụ ya na magazin GQ ugboro abụọ, yana VOGUE, EBONY na INDUSTRIE AFRICA
Chiamaka Enyi-Amadi bụ onye Naijiria-Irish na-ede uri, onye edemede, onye ndezi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri

E bipụtara uri Enyi-Amadi na Architecture Ireland, Poetry International, Poetry Ireland Review, The MASI Journal, RTÉ Poetry Programme, Smithereens Press, The Bohemyth, The Irish Times, na mpịakọta Art of the Glimpse 100 Irish Short Stories (2020)
Ọ natara 2019 Poetry Ireland Access Cúirt Bursary
N'afọ 2018, ọ bụ ọkà okwu na Dublin Human Rights Festival n'akụkụ Clara Rose Thornton na Farah Elle
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka akụkụ nke 2019 International Women's Day na Poetry Ireland
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị a kpọrọ oku na 2019 Measuring Equality in the Arts Sector conference
The Irish Museum of Modern Art nyere ya ọrụ ide uri atọ na nzaghachi maka ihe ngosi 2019 A Fiction Close to Reality
N'afọ 2019, Enyi-Amadi so Pat Boran dezie otu mpịakọta nke uri, Writing Home The New Irish Poets, nke gosipụtara uri sitere n'aka ndị na-ede uri kwagara Ireland
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị edemede na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri maka emume Nollaig na mBan nke 2020 na Epic, Irish Emigration Museum
Ya na onye na-ede uri na onye na-agụ egwú, Christie Kandiwa, rụkọtara ọrụ na mpempe akwụkwọ akpọrọ SEE x SEA maka Mother Tongues Festival na Febụwarị 2020
A mụrụ Chiamaka Enyi-Amadi na Lagos, Naijiria, wee kwaga Galway, Ireland mgbe ọ dị afọ 10
Ọ gara Mahadum College Dublin ma gụsịa akwụkwọ na BA na Bekee na nkà ihe ọmụma
Mgbe ọ nọ na UCD, o dezigharịrị ma nye aka na magazin Otwo maka The University Observer
Chiamaka Madu (amuru 27 Julaị 1996) bụ onye Naijiria bụ ọkachamara n'egwuregwu bọọlụ nke na-agba Enugu Rangers, dị ka onye na-agba etiti na-akwado inye ọkpụ na Nigeria Premier League
Ọ gbaala otu Premier League nke Nigeria bụ nke a maara dị ka Rivers United F
nke a kpọburu Sharks maka oge asọmpi atọ
Ọ bụ onye egwuregwu nwere ekere uche sịrị ike bụ nke o ji emepụta ọkpụ mana enyekwa ọkpụ

Chiamaka Madu bụ onye chọpụtara ya bụ Karamone bidoro ọrụ egwuregwu bọọlụ mbụ ya na Ocean Boys FC ebe ọ nọrọ oge abụọ dị ka onye ntorobịa wee mecha sonye na Rivers United FC nke a kpọburu Sharks na 2012 ebe ọ gbara egwuregwu bọọlụ atọ
O mechara bịanye aka na Enugu Rangers na Nigeria Premier League season 2015 nke o nyere ọkpụ na egwuregwu mpụta mbụ ya na Kano Pillars FC Akpọrọ ya na Nigeria U-20 na 2014
Ya na ndị otu ya bụ Enugu Rangers meriri asọmpi Premier League Nigeria 2016
Chiamaka Cynthia Nnadozie bụ onye ọgba bọọlụ Naịjirịa na-agbara Paris FC bọọlụ na ngalaba egwuregwu nke French Division 1 Féminine league
Nnadozie binyere aka maka klọb Rivers Angels na mbido afọ 2016
N’afọ 2019 Nnadozie rụrụ nnukwu ọrụ mere ka otu asọmpi Rivers Angels 2019–2020 Season merie NWPL n'asọmpi league ha
Na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa nke mbụ (Jenụwarị) n'afọ 2020 o sonyere otu klọb na French aha ya bụ Paris FC na nkwekọrịta ọnwa nke iri na asatọ
N’oge asọmpi 2018 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup Nnadozie gbara ụgbọrọ anọ
Mgbe a gbaara Haiti, o nwetara aha nsọpụrụ nke 'Dare to Shine' maka ezigbo arụmọrụ ya

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe asọmpi U-20 gasịrị, ahọpụtakwara ya maka asọmpi 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations nke afọ 2018 ebe ọ nọdụrụ n'oche maka egwuregwu ise niile, na asọmpi Iko WAFU nke 2019 ọ nọ na goolu maka arụmọrụ Super Falcons dị egwu, wee nweta ọkwa dịka otu n'ime ndị nche atọ na-anọchite anya Super Falcons nke Naijiria na 2019 FIFA Women's World Cupin emere na France
Ọ bụkwa mmemme izizi Nnadozie ghọrọ onye nche bọọlụ nwere ndekọ maka enyeghị gọọlụ na egwuregwu iko mba ụwa mgbe Naịjirịa jiri gọọlụ abụọ merie Korea
Ka egwuregwu iko mba ụwa mechara, Nnadozie nyekwara ndị Falconets aka rite ọla edo na egwuruegwu mba Afrịka na Morocco mgbe o chekwara penariti atọ n'ịgba bọọlụ ha na Cameroon

Chiamaka Obuekwe bụ onye na-ahụ maka ịkọ akụkọ na onye isi ala Naijiria nke Social Prefect Tours (nke malitere na 2015 site na blọọgụ ya), ụlọ ọrụ ndị njem nlegharị anya n'Afrịka nke na-achọ ijikọ ndị mmadụ n'ofe kọntinenti site na nduzi njem n'ime Afrịka, njem ụlọ akwụkwọ, otu njegharị ma na-akwado ezumike
Obuekwe gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị StGloria, Ikeja, ma gakwuo Faith Academy, Ota maka agụmakwụkwọ ya nke abụọ
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta okokporo na Mmekọrịta Mba na Mahadum Convenant, Ota
Obuekwe rụrụ ọrụ na Jumia Naijiria dịka onye mgbasa ozi na Ọkachasị Ọkachamara si Nọvemba 2013 rue Ọktọba 2015
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ e-commerce Mumsfavecom dị ka onye na-elekọta onye Njikwa Mgbasa Ozi site na December 2015 wee kwụsị February 2016 iji lekwasị anya na Social Prefect Tours
A hoputara ya n’ime ndi isi umu nwanyi iri ise nke Maggi mere iji mee emume ncheta afọ iri ise ha
N’oge onyinye nke Eloy na 2017, enyere ya Eloy nke ụmụ nwanyi onye n’enye onyinye na njem nlegharị anya
Emere ya atụmatụ ọma na CNN's n'ime Afrịka
Chiara Sacchi (amụrụ n'afọ 2002) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe na Argentina si Buenos Aires
A mụrụ Chiara Sacchi ma zụlite ya na Haedo, Buenos Aires, ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Elmina Paz de Gallo, na El Palomar

Dị ka ajụjụ ọnụ Slow Food si kwuo, Sacchi tolitere n'ezinụlọ ebe ọ na-echegbu onwe ya mgbe niile maka iri nri dị mma, ọ bụkwa ya mere ọtụtụ n'ime omume ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe ji agba gburugburu nsogbu a
O gosikwara n'okwu dị iche iche na ajụjụ ọnụ na a gbara ya ume ime ihe maka mgbanwe ihu igwe ka ọ na-atụ egwu mgbanwe okpomọkụ mberede n'ala nna ya
Chiara Sacchi bụ akụkụ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ŌChildren vs
Mgbanwe ihu igwe, tinyere Greta Thunberg na ndị ọzọ na-eto eto ịrị na isii na-eme ngagharị iwe
Nke a bụ atụmatụ nke rịọrọ Kọmitii Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Nwatakịrị ka ha jide Argentina, Brazil, France, Germany na Turkey maka enweghị ọrụ ha n'ihu nsogbu ihu igwe
Arịrịọ a bụ mkpesa mbụ nke otu ụmụaka na-erubeghị afọ iri na asatọ tinyere banyere mgbanwe ihu igwe n'okpuru Nkwekọrịta Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu na Ikike nke Nwatakịrị
Sacchi esonyewo dị ka onye na-eme ihe ike na netwọk Slow Food Argentina, otu zuru ụwa ọnụ nke na-arụ ọrụ maka ichebe ụdị dị iche iche na nri dị mma, dị ọcha, na nke ziri ezi
Banyere ọrụ metụtara iri nri dị mma, ọ sonyekwara na Terra Madre Salone del Gusto na ọrụ nke La Comunidad Cocina Soberana de Buenos Aires, obodo na-eri nri na Buenos Aires
Ọ na-ekwu okwu n'ezoghị ọnụ banyere ọbụbụeze nri

Ana m akwado ụkpụrụ Slow Food n'ihi na ekwere m na e nwere ụzọ ndị ọzọ isi mepụta nri, ndị na-adịghị emerụ okike na ụmụ mmadụỌ bụghị naanị na gọọmentị anaghị arụ ọrụ idozi ma gbochie mmebi nke usoro nri kpatara, ha na-ekwe ka nsí na-aga n'ihu na-ada na efere anyị
Sacchi bụkwa onye na-akwado ịrụkọ ọrụ ọnụ
Nnukwu mgbanwe ọ bụla na-abịa site na ndị mmadụ, site na ndị ọzọMgbe m na-ekwu maka ịga n'okporo ámá, m na-ekwupụta banyere ịhazi, nke ịmepụta ike otu
A maara ya maka okwu njirimara ya bụ 'Give Us Back Our Future' , Sacchi bụ akụkụ nke òtù ndị ntorobịa na-eto eto nke na-akwalite ikpe ziri ezi n'etiti ọgbọ na omume ihu igwe
Chibou Amna bụ onye na-akụ ọkpọ na Nijeria
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwoke na 1984 Summer Olympics
Chibuike Iteogu (amuru ya na abali iri-abuo na anọ n’onwa itoolụ afọ 1985) bu onye krikita nke ndi Naijiria Na Septemba 2018, akpọrọ ya na ndị otu Naijiria maka 2018 Afrịka T20 Cup
Ọ mere Twenty20 nke izizi ya maka Naịjirịa na 2018 Afrịka T20 Cup na abali iri na ise n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2018
Chibuike Okeke (amụrụ ya na abali itoolụ n'ọnwa itoolụ afọ 1979) bụ onye Naijiria ọkachamara na bọọlụ na-egwuri dị ka onyemidfielder
Chibuku bụ biya sorghum azụmahịa nke dabere n'ụlọ ọdịnala Umqombothi nke e mere biya Africa, ọka ndị a na-eji eme ihe bụ sorghum na ọka ma ọ nwekwara ike ịnwe millet

Aha Chibuku sitere n'omume Max Heinrich nke idekọ ihe ndị ahịa niile kwuru na mgbanwe usoro n'akwụkwọ, Chibuku bụkwa mgbanwe nke okwu obodo maka 'akwụkwọ' - 'Chi' bụ prefix nke pụtara 'nnukwu', 'buk' = 'akwụkwọ', na njedebe 'u' bụ n'ihi na ọtụtụ aha ndị Afrịka na-ejikarị ụdaume euphonic mechie
Akpịrị na-abịa site na emume nke mbụ ịkwagharị biya tupu ịṅụ mmanya mbụ
Beer ahụ nwere starch, germ na yeast (ihe niile a na-ewepụkarị na lagers na ales) ma ebe ọ bụ na ihe siri ike na-adaba na ala nke katọn ahụ, ọ dị mkpa ka a na-ama ya tupu a ṅụọ ya

Ihe ọṅụṅụ na-aba n'anya dị na Chibuku ọhụrụ dị ala ma malite na ihe dị ka 05% ABV n'ụbọchị mbụ, mana ka fermentation na-aga n'ihu na katọn, ka a na-edebe ya ogologo oge tupu a ṅụọ ya, otú ahụ ka ọ na-esiwanye ike
Ọ nwere ike iru 4% ABV tupu ndụ nchekwa ahụ agwụ mgbe ụbọchị 4 na 6 gachara mgbe nkwakọ ngwaahịa
Chibuku bụ ụdị biya sorghum opaque pan-African nke ndị na-emepụta mmanya dị iche iche mere n'Afrika
Otu n'ime ihe kpatara ihe ịga nke ọma nke akara ahụ bụ usoro ịṅụ mmanya azụmahịa na usoro iji hụ na ngwaahịa dị mma nke dị mma maka ndị na-azụ ahịa

Chibuku na-abụkarị nhọrọ nke ndị na-azụ ahịa na-abaghị ọgaranya na-enweghị ike ịzụta biya a na-etinye na karama, nke a ka nwere ike ịbụ eziokwu maka ọtụtụ ndị na-ere ahịa na Zimbabwe, Zambia, Malawi na Botswana
Otú ọ dị, e nwekwara ndị na-azụ ahịa n'etiti ndị na apụta na-enwe mmasị na biya dị ka ihe kachasị mma, n'ihi ụtọ na maka ihe gbasara ahụike
Chibuku na-aṅụ mmanya ugbu a n'ofe Afrịka site n'aka ndị na-rme mmanya dị iche iche
Imachibundu Oluwadara Onuzo FRSL (amuru ya na afọ 1991)
Ọ bu onye ọdee akwụkwọ na Naịjirịa

Akwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ Nwa nwanyị Spider King, meriri onyinye Betty Trask, ka edepụtara aha maka Dylan Thomas Prize na ihe onyo Commonwealth Book Prize, ma bụrụkwa ndị tegoro aka e wepụtara aha ha maka Desmond Elliott Prize na Etisalat Nrite maka ọdee akwụkwọ
A mụrụ Chibundu Onuzo na Naịjirịa na afọ otu puku 1, nke ọdụdụ n'ime ụmụaka anọ nne na nna bụ ndị dọkịta, tolitere na Lagos

Ọ gakwara England mgbe ọ dị afọ ịrị na ano, ka ọ gaa gụọ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị niile na Winchester, Hampshire, maka GCSEs, na mgbe ọ dị afọ ịrị na asaa ka ọ malitere ide akwụkwọ mbụ ya, nke Faber bịanyere aka na akwụkwọ na ya na afọ abụọ mgbe e mesịrị Faber bipụtara ya bụ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị afọ ịrị abụọ na ọtụ
Ọ bụ ya bụ nwata nwanyị pekarichara mpe na ọrụ ọdee akwụkwọ nke na-ede akwụkwọ nke ndị na ebipụta akwụkwọ weghaara

Na ntule akwụkwọ ya nke abụọ, Nnọọ na Lagos (afọ puku abụọ na iri na isii), Helon Habila dere na The Guardian 'Ngosipụta nke Onuzo banyere agwa mmadụ na-abụkarị nchekwube, echiche ya banyere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọha na eze na-enwe obi ebere; obodo Lagos, ikekwe agwa kacha mma na-adọrọ mmasị

Onuzo nwetara akara ugo mmụta bachelor nke mbụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme na King's College London (afọ puku abụọ na iri na abụọ), ma gaa n'ihu inweta ugo mmụta masters na iwu ọha na eze na Mahadum College London
N'ihe dị ka afọ puku abụọ na iri na asaa, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ PhD na King's College London
Ọ bụ onye ntinye aka na akwụkwọ anthology New Daughters of 2019, nke Margaret Busby deziri
Nwa nwanyi Spider King meriri onyinye Betty Trask (afọ puku abụọ na iri na atọ), ma na afo puku abụọ na iri na abụọ ka edeputara aha ndi Dylan Thomas Prize na akwukwo ndi Commonwealth
Nke ozo bu na achọrọ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ maka Desmond Elliott Prize na onyinye Etisalat maka akwụkwọ na afọ puku abụọ na atọ

Na Eprel afọ puku abụọ na iri na ato ka ahoputara Onuzo maka akwụkwọ ndi Hay Festival nke Afrịka iri atọ na itenanị nke ndi ode akwukwo iri ato na ato nke di Sub-Saharan ndi erubeghị afo iri ano nwere ikike ha bu iji akowaputa odi n’iru n’ederede ala Africa
Na ọnwa Juun afọ puku abụọ na asatọ ka a họpụtara Onuzo ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndị Royal Society of Literature na atụmatụ ya na “40 Under 40”
Na afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ American Black Film Festival, HBO Short Film Asọmpi nke meriri bụ Dolapo Is Fine, nke Onuzo dekọtara ya na ya bụ nke sitere na obere akụkọ ya bụ 'Sunita'
Chicago bu ama ukwu kárírí ívu mádu na Njikota Obodo Amerika, na etítì ama sárá nke Illinois, nke bu ótụ na ùwà kárírí madu
Bu ama oganiru, Illinois nwèrè íké na áhiá ùwà nílé, nká, oménàlà, ndọùwé, ọtúihe, ómúmú, na mmemmé
Ka onye jídéré Íshí Ọtú Mbà, ọ di kwà mkpà na ihe ne me na ùwà
Ha na kpo ámá nke The Windy City ma ọ bu City of Chicago Í me ka ya na nkeji obodo Illinois gị dị ichè, nke ọ nọr
Tebogo Chichi Letswalo (amụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 1981), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe ngosi telivishọn South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn; Generations, Isithembiso na Lingashoni
A mụrụ Letswalo n'abali iri na anọ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 1981 na Alexandra, Gauteng, obodo dị na mpụga Johannesburg, South Africa dịka okenye n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ụmụnne atọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Wendywood High School
Ọ gara Akademie vir Dramakuns afọ abụọ
N'oge a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ, o kwuru, ọ chọrọ ibi naanị ya, na-enweghị di na ụmụaka
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye nkwuputa ngosi n'oge mmemme eziokwu SABC3 Ihe ngosi Wedding nke emere na Rosebank Mall na Johannesburg na 2003
Ya na Ed Jordan rụkọrọ ihe ngosi ahụ
N'afọ 2007, ọ kwagara New York wee mụọ ọrụ nka na Michael Howard School of Film, Theater and Television
Mgbe afọ ise na USA, ọ laghachiri South Africa na 2012
O gosikwara mmemme nkwalite dịka; Ciao Cocktails na Handy Andy Homemaker show
N'afọ 2014, o mere ihe ngosi telivishọn mbụ ya na Soap opera akpọrọ Generations wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka 'Zandi Mbisi'
O mere obere ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ncha dịka etv
ejije Backstage, ihe nkiri SABC1 Tshisa
Na 2013, o sonyeere ihe ngosi Zaziwa
N'afọ 2017, o sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ugboro ugboro nke Mzansi Magic Television soapie Isithembiso ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka'Claudia Kunene' na oge abụọ mbụ
Mgbe ahụ na 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka'Dipuo Lesolle' na usoro Grassroots
Na 2021, o sonyeere na oge mbụ nke serial Lingashoni ka ọ rụọ ọrụ nke 'Mrs Mkhize'
Chicmah Obodo bụ Naijiria judoka onye zọrọ mpi nke ụmụ nwanyị na udi
O ritere nrite ọla nchara n'afọ 1999 n'egwuregwu nke nile Afrịka na otu arọ iri asaa
N'afọ 1999, o sonyere na egwuregwu niile nke Afrịka nke emere na Johannesburg, South Afrịka
O nwetara ọla nchara n’ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị nke arọ iri asaa
Chico Ejiro (a mụrụ Chico Maziakpono; died 25 December 2020) bụ onye ntụzi ihe nkiri Naijiria, onye na-ese ihe na onye na-emepụta ihe
Amachaghị maka Ejiro ma ọbụghị na a mụrụ ya na Isoko, Delta, Nigeria, nakwa na ọ gụrụ ọrụ ugbo na mbụ, wee dọba ya n’ime ihe onyonyo n’ihi na ndị Naijiria agaghị azụta kaseti vidiyo efu
Nnukwu ọrụ ya bụ ụdị nke ọgbọ nke abụọ malitere na 1990 mgbe akụrụngwa mmepụta vidiyo dị ọnụ ala dị na mba ahụ
O nwere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta a na-akpọ Grand Touch Pictures, nke dị na ya Lagos
A na-akpọ ya Maazị Prolific, duziri ihe nkiri 80 n'ime oge afọ ise-nke ọ bụla gbara ihe dịka ụbọchị atọ
Ha gosiri akụkọ gbasara ndị Naịjirịa
Amabeghị ọnụ ọgụgụ ihe nkiri ọ rụrụ na ya dịka onye ntụzi, onye na -emepụta ihe, ma ọ bụ ha abụọ amaghi ama, mana ọ ruru narị otu narị n'afọ 2007
A kọwara ya na New York Times, na magazin Time na 2002
Ọ nwụrụ n'isi ụtụtụ nke ụbọchị ekeresimesi, Disemba 25, 2020
Ejiro lụrụ Joy Ejiro, ha mụtakwara ụmụ anọ
O nwere ụmụnne abụọ Zeb Ejiro, onye a kacha mara amara nke ndị na-eme ihe nkiri sinima Naijiria ọhụrụ na mpụga obodo, na Peter Red Ejiro, bụkwa onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Ejiro pụtara na akwụkwọ akụkọ 2007 Welcome to Nollywood, sochiri ya ka o mere ihe Family Affair 1 na Family Affair 2
Chidera Eggerue (aha edemede, The Slumflower) bụ onye edemede Naijiria na onye na-ede blọgụ ejiji
A maara ya nke ọma maka akwụkwọ ya, What a Time to Be Alone, na mkpọsa n'ịntanetị #SaggyBoobsMatter
A zụlitere Eggerue na Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ London na Peckham, mpaghara nke ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị Naijiria Britain
Eggerue gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Goose Green
Eggerue wee gaa Notre Dame School maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ezinụlọ ya bụ ndị Igbo
Ọ gara kọleji iji mụọ ihe ejiji mana enweghị ike ịmecha akara ugo mmụta ya n'ihi ịda mbà n'obi
N'afọ 2017, Eggerue malitere #SaggyBoobsMatter, hashtag nke ghọrọ ihe a ma ama na Twitter na Instagram, iji maa mgbakọ ahụ aka na ụmụ nwanyị nwere nnukwu ara ga-eyi brọsh ma ọ bụrụ na ara ha adaa
Dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, ọ na-enwe obi erughị ala n'ihi na ara ya adịghị ka ihe nlereanya na nkwakọ ngwaahịa nke brọ mbụ ya
O mechara kpebie ịnakwere ọdịdị ya wee bipụta foto na-eyi uwe na-enweghị brọsh na Septemba 2017, na-eji hashtag
Dị ka Eggerue si kwuo, E nwere ohere zuru ezu maka onye ọ bụla nọ n'ime mmegharị ahụ
Mana anyị ga-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji mee ka ohere maka ndị a chụpụrụ karịa anyị
' Eggerue enwetala mmeghachi omume na mkpọsa ahụ
Na mbido afọ 2018, otu n'ime foto ya na-enweghị isi ghọrọ meme nke na-ezo aka na ya na nwanyị ojii ọzọ dị ka ndị na-adịghị mma
Mgbe ahụ, ọ malitere blọọgụ a na-akpọ The Slumflower iji mee ka ejiji nke a na-ekpuchighị n'ime usoro
Aha ahụ na-ezo aka n'echiche nke rose na-etolite site na simenti, ma sitere na ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri Street Etiquette mepụtara
Blog ahụ gosipụtara ejiji n'okporo ámá nke oge a nke dị ọnụ ala
Ọ na-edekwa banyere isiokwu ndị dị ka ọbụbụenyi, mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwanyị, ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, na ịkpa ókè nwoke na nwanyị
Na mbido afọ 2018, ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi Newsbeat nke nyochara ntutu isi na ahụmịhe nke ya na traction alopecia
O kwuru na Munroe Bergdorf, Reni Eddo-Lodge na Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie bụ ndị kacha mkpali ya
Ọ bụ onye nduzi okike maka Innclusive, ụlọ ọrụ na-akwụ ụgwọ ụlọ nke na-elekọta ndị na-ege ntị agbụrụ dị iche iche
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2020, o gosipụtara ihe ngosi Channel 4 Bring Back the Bush, na-enyocha ihe mere ụmụ nwanyị ji akpụ isi ha
Mgbe ndị na-eso ụzọ dijitalụ gbara ya ume, Eggerue mepụtara zine na Adobe InDesign na ndụmọdụ gbasara ịhụ onwe onye n'anya
Mgbe a nabatara ya nke ọma, ọ malitere ịchọ onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ
Eggerue bipụtara akwụkwọ akpọrọ What a Time to be Alone The Slumflower's Guide to Why You Are Already Enough na July 2018 n'okpuru Quadrille Publishing
Ụbọchị ole na ole mgbe e bipụtara akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ ghọrọ akwụkwọ Sunday Times kacha ere ahịa
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-elekwasị anya n'ịhụnanya onwe onye ma nwee ndụmọdụ banyere otu ụmụ agbọghọ nwere ike isi nwee obi ụtọ naanị ha
Eggerue na-eji ilu Igbo eme ihe n'akwụkwọ ahụ dum
O dekọrọ Tedx Talk banyere ịhụnanya onwe onye aha ya bụ akwụkwọ ahụ n'otu ọnwa a tọhapụrụ ya
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2020, o bipụtara How To Get Over A Boy, akwụkwọ enyemaka onwe onye nke na-enye ndụmọdụ gbasara mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwanyị
Chidera Ejuke (amụrụ ya na abali abụọ n'ọnwa Jenụwari afọ 1998) bụ onye Naijiria ọkachamara na bọọlụ onye n'agbara ndi njikọ Premier nke Russian klọb CSKA Moscow ya na mba otu naijiria
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2017, Ejuke bịanyere aka na Eliteserien n'akụkụ Vålerenga nkwekọrịta afọ atọ
Na Jụlai 2019, ọ kwagara Netherlands ka ọ gbaa maka SC Heerenveen, na-eleghara mmasị site na klọb dị ka Besiktas JK na Lazio Roma
Na abali iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa asatọ afọ 2020, CSKA Moscow kwupụtara mbinye aka nke Ejuke site na Heerenveen na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ
Na 30 Septemba afọ 2020, O nyere goolu nke atọ n'ime mmeri derby 3-1 meriri Spartak Moscow
Ejuke pụtara maka otu ndị otu Naịjirịa na otu egwuregwu na enyi 1-1 na Tunisia na 13 ọktoba afọ 2020
Àtụ Updated
Chidera Kennedy Ezeh (amụrụ ya na 2 Oktoba afọ 1997) bụ onye Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ,n'agbara ndị Portugal maka under-23 squad nke Portimonense
Ọ mere ọkachamara mbụ ya na Segunda Liga maka Portimonense na 20 Nọvemba afọ 2016 na egwuregwu megide Braga B
O meriri na 2013 FIFA U-17 World Cup na Naijiria, na-atụle ihe mgbaru ọsọ na ọkara egwuregwu ikpeazụ megide Sweden

Chidera Nneoma Okolie amụrụ n’abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ime ọnwa atọ n’afọ 1993 bụ̀ ode akwụkwọ agụmagụ nke alaNaịjirịa onye nwetara nlebaa anya nke mba mgbe akwụkwọ m̀bụ̀ ya bụ ,'Silence Become Too Loud' nwetara ézí nkwado na 2015 site n’aka onye isi ala Naịjirịa n’oge ahụ bụ Goodluck Jonathan
Á mụ̀rụ̀ Okolie na Enugu na southeast Nigeria

Okolie bidoro igosipụ̀ta ḿmásị́ ya ebe agụmagụ nọ̀ mgbe ọ́ ka bụ nwata, síté n'ime nke ọma na ngalaba akwukwo agụ́mágụ́ na ulo akwụkwọ ma ó bidokwara idere ụmụ akwụkwọ ibe ya obere akwụkwọ akụkọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Okolie gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara ìwú na Mahadum nke Naijiria,ma anabatakwara ya n'ụlọọrụ ndị òkaiwu Naijiria na Nọvemba 2016
Okolie bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya, 'when silence Became Too Loud'na Disemba 2014 mgbe ọ́ ka bụ nwata akwụkwọ mmụta iwu
N'ọnwa Maachi 2015, akwụkwọ a nwètàrà ezi nkwado n' aka Onye bụ onye isi ala Naijiria ógè ahu, bụ Goodluck Jonathan, na ọ́gbákọ̀ atụmatụ nkwalite aka ọrụ Onwe na Abuja
Na Septemba 2017, o wepụtara akwụkwọ nke abụọ ya, bụ Nọt Forgiven,nke bụ mkpokota obere akụkọ gbasara mmetụta echiche
Na February 2018, Okolie guzobere Idios Creatives, otu ịkpọ na ịnye ndị na-eto eto òhèrè ,bụ ńdí nwéré mmásị́ ma chọsie ike ka ha gosipụta ihe okike/echiche ha

N’Epril 2018, ọ́ tụ́pụ̀tàrà atụmatụ ńchémì echiche nke ihe ńríté sò nke lekwasịrị ányá nà akụkọ echepụtara echepụta/emeghị eme, nke dọtara ụmụaka ụlọ akwụkwọ opekarịa mmadụ narị atọ,iri itoolu na asaa

Ọ bụ Okolie họpụtara akụkọ otu narị ma chịkọta ya n’akwụkwọ nke akpọrọ The Future Nchịkọta akwụkwọ abụ na obere akụkọ nke Umuaka Ndị ahọpụtara n'ụfọdụ ụlọ akwụkwọ nọ na Naịjirịa, nke ewepụtara na Nọvemba 2018

N'ọnwa Jun 2015, Okolie nwetara ihe ńríté African Achievers Awards[Tinye edensibịa] Na 2016, é nyere ya aha dị ka odéé kachasị n'akụkọ echepụtara echepụta nke afọ ahụ ma bụrụkwa ótù n'ime otu narị odee áká ńkō na Naịjirịa na-agafebeghi afọ iri anọ na mmemmé nke mbu na mbụ nke Nigerian writers Awards
Á kọwapụtakwara ya dị ka odee kachasị n' agụmagụ echepụtara echepụta nke Xperience Womanity Awards
Na Jenụwarị 2019, edepụtara ya na otu narị ụmụ ntorọbịa kachasị n'iweta mgbanwe nke AvanceMedia na ngalaba Iwu na ọchịchị
Chukwudi 'Chidi' Imoh (amụrụ 27 Ọgọst 1965) bụbu onye oso si Nigeria onye meriri nrite ọlaọcha Olympik na ọsọ 4 x 100 mita relay na 1992 Summer Olympics
O nwetakwara ihe nrite ọlaọcha na 100 mita na egwuregwu 1986 Goodwill Games, gbachara n'azụ Ben Johnson na n'ihu Carl Lewis
Ọ meriri nrite ọla nchar nke 60 mita na asọmpi ime ụlọ nke ụwa nke 1991, wee bụrụ onye mmeri Africa na 1984 na 1985
Na 1986 o biputere oge na-edu ụwa maka afọ ahụ na 100 mita
Ọ meriri ọsọ 100 mita na 1987 All-Africa Games
Imoh bụkwa onye ogba ọsọ na Mahadum Missouri dị na Columbia
Ọ na-ejide ihe ndekọ ahụ n'ebe ahụ na 200 m n'èzí na oge nke 199, 100 m n'èzí na oge 1000 na 55 m n'ime ụlọ na oge 610
Àtụ Footer All-Africa Champions 100 m MenÀtụ Footer African Champions men's 100 metresÀtụ Footer Universiade Champions 100m Men
Chidi Kwubiri (* a mụrụ ya n'afọ1966 na Umuahia, Naijiria) bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri onye Naijiria na Jamanị (Germany) agwakọtara agwakọta
Chidi Kwubiri bụ nwa akwụkwọ ọbịa mbụ na afọ 1993
Na obere oge mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ nwa akwụkwọ zuru ezu na amụ maka ihe eserese na Kunstakademie Düsseldorf n'okpuru Michael Buthe
Mgbe Buthe ọnwụ na afọ 1994 ọ gbanwere ma ga soro na masterclass nke AR Penck
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ Düsseldorf Art Academy na afọ 2002 dị ka onye gara akwukwo nke ukwu na n'okpuru AR Penck
Kamgbe afọ 2000 Kwubiri na ezinụlọ ya bi na Pulheim dị nso na Cologne, ebe o nwere ụlọ ọrụ studio ya na WALZWERK, ebe agbanwere ụlọ dị cha ochie ka ha ghọrọ ụlọ ebe ọhụrụ ebe ndị mmadu na emepụta ihe
Chidi Kwubiri enweela ọtụtụ ngosipụta aka ọrụ ya na ụwa
Mgbe ụfọdụ naanị ya, oge ụfọdụ na otu na otu, o gosiwo ngosi na Europe, Africa, Middle East na USA
N’afọ 2016 o mere MISEREOR lenten veil, nke nwere ọdịnala ihe karịrị afọ iri anọ, maka MISEREOR Lenten Mgbasa Ozi 2017/2018

Chidi Mokeme (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke 17 n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 1972) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ngosi
O si Oba na Idemili South LGA nke Anambra steeti, ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye nhazi nke Gulder Ultimate Search Reality-show
Chidi bụ onye ntụziaka nke nke ihe ngosi Television Gulder Ultimate Search maka afọ ole na ole
Chidi Anthony Okezie (amụrụ na abalị asatọ n'ime ọnwa asatọ n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n'atọ (August 8, 1993) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ na US nke sitere na Naijiria na Jamaica
Okezie na-asọ mpi mba ụwa maka Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye nwetara ọla nchara ugboro abụọ na African Championships na mita 400
Nna ya, Moses Okezie bụ onye Naijiria na nne ya Carol Morris bụ onye Jamaica
O nwere ụmụnne itoolu
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Hampton na afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise (2015) ma nwee nna ukwu na egwuregwu nchịkwa (Masters in Sports Administration)
Okezie so na ndị otu American 4 × 400 m relay team nke meriri nrite ọla edo na afọ puku abụọ na iri na abụọ (2012) World Junior Championships in Athletics na Barcelona
Ọ nọchitere anya Naijiria na 2018 Commonwealth Games wee ruo ọkara ikpeazụ nke 400 m
Ọ gbakwara ụkwụ arịlịka maka mba ahụ n'ime ọkụ relay 4 x 400
Ndị otu ahụ gụchara nke abụọ mana emecha chụpụ ha maka mmebi nke ụzọ
2018 African Championships bụ ihe ịga nke ọma maka Okezie
O meriri ọla nchara n'otu n'otu na mita 400 n'azụ Baboloki Thebe na Thapelo Phora
Nke a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye nwetara ọla nchara ugboro abụọ na African Championships ebe ọ meriri ọla nchara na afọ puku abụọ na iri na isii (2016) Championships na Durban
O mechara mee ka ndị otu Naijiria 4 x 400 m relay nweta ọla nchara n'azụ Kenya na South Africa
Okezie bụkwa onye otu African quartet nke nọ n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ na ngwakọta 4 x 400 m relay na afọ puku abụọ na iri na asatọ (2018) IAAF Continental Cup
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteolu (2019), o ritere ọla nchara na 4 × 400 mita nke ụmụ nwoke na 2019 African Games nke e mere na Rabat, Morocco
O nwetakwara ọla nchara na mita 400 nke ụmụ nwoke
Ihe kacha mma ya na mita 400 bụ 4524 nke o setịpụrụ na afọ puku abụọ na iri na asatọ (2018) Culturama Games na Nevis

Chidinma Ekile (amụrụ na 2 Mee 1991), nke a maara dịka Chidinma, bụ onye Naijiria hip-hop ghọrọ onye na-agụ egwú gospel na onye na-ede egwu
N'afọ 2010, ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama mgbe ọ meriri oge nke atọ nke Project Fame West Africa
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ vidiyo egwu maka egwu ya 'Emi Ni Baller', ọ ghọrọ nwanyị egwu mbụ ruru n'ọkwa 1 na chaatị MTV Base Official Naija Top 10
N'afọ 2011, o wepụtara egwu Sound Sultan-enyere aka'Jankoliko'
A tọhapụrụ abọm izizi ya bụ Chidinma saịtị na usoro egwu Spinlet; ọ kwadoro ya saịtị na egwu 'Jankoliko', 'Buru Gi Go', 'Kedike' na 'Run Dia Mouth'
Abọm ahụ gosipụtara ndị ọbịa si Sound Sultan, Tha enyo enyo, Olamide na Muna
Chidinma meriri Iwu kacha mma nke ụmụ nwanyị West Africa na 2012 Kora Ihe nrite ma mee 'Kedike' na emume ezé
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ bịanyere aka na Echiche Eeezee, saịtị na ntọhapụ nke abụ ozioma dị ka nwanyị alaeze, nke akpọrọ 'Jehova Mechie'
Abọm kachasị ọhụrụ nke Chidinma Ekile bụ Nsọ (mimo mimo)
A mụrụ Chidinma Ekile na Ketu, Kosofe, Lagos Steeti na nne na nna sitere na Imo Steeti
Ọ bụ nwa nke isii n'ime ụmụ asaa
Chidinma tolitere na nna na-enye ọzụzụ ma malite ịbụ abụ mgbe ọ dị afọ isii
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, ọ sonyeere ndị ukwe chọọchị ya
Ọ malitekwara ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya saịtị na igosi ihe nkiri 2017 (ihe nkiri akwa mmiri) nke Kunle Afolayan duziri
Chidinma gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na Ketu tupu ya na ezinụlọ ya kwaga Ikorodu
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-akwalite azụmahịa na Lagos tupu ọ gaa nyocha maka oge nke atọ nke Ama ama Project West Africa
Chidinma chọrọ ịmụ nkwurịta okwu ọha na eze mana o mechara nweta akara ugo mmụta na Mahadum Lagos
Chidinma jụrụ nnabata ya na Mahadum Lagos na mbụ n'ihi ọganihu ya na Ama ama Project West Africa
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na YNaija gbara ya, o kwuru na ọ na-ewere ụlọ akwụkwọ n'ụzọ siri ike mgbe niile na mkpebi ya ịbanye na Unilag bụ ihe a na-apụghị izere ezere
O kwukwara na egwu anaghị adị mgbe niile na atụmatụ ya, mana o kpebiri ịnwale ya mgbe o meriri asọmpi egwu
Mgbe ntutu isi ya na-acha ọbara ọbara ma nweta mohawk, ndị mmadụ malitere ile ya anya dị ka ezigbo nwa agbọghọ na-emebi emebi
N'ajụjụ ọnụ e bipụtara na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Daily Independent, Chidinma kwuru na ọ ka bụ otu na na ọ na-agbanwe ma na-etolite dị ka onye egwu
N'ikwesị ntụkwasị obi n'okwu ya, Chidinma banyere n'ụlọ ọrụ egwu Gospel mgbe Eezee Conceptz bịanyere aka na ya, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ozioma kachasị elu
Tupu ọ na-ege ntị maka mbipụta nke atọ nke Project Fame West Africa, ọ rọrọ nrọ ịbụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi telivishọn
Site n'enyemaka na nkwado sitere n'aka ezigbo enyi ya, Chidinma hapụrụ ụlọ ya na Ikorodu wee gaa Ultima Ụlọ ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ otu n'ime puku mmadụ asatọ na-asọmpi gara n'afọ ahụ iji gosipụta nkà ha
N'ikpeazụ, Chidinma sonyeere ndị asọmpi 17 ndị ọzọ na agba nke Ụlọ akwụkwọ ama ama
Ruo izu iri, ndị ọkachamara n'egwú zụrụ Chidinma na ndị ọzọ na-asọmpi ndị nkuzi olu, ndị ọkà okwu na-akpali akpali, ndị egwu guzosiri ike, na ndị na-enye ọrụ azụmahịa egwu
Ọzọkwa, a kụziiri ndị na-asọmpi ihe nkiri na ọtụtụ ntụgharị ntụgharị
A mara ọkwa Chidinma dị ka onye mmeri nke asọmpi ahụ na 26 Septemba 2010
O meriri ọtụtụ ihe nrite, gụnyere nde, 2011 Toyota RAV4, na nkwekọrịta mmepụta
Na Mee 2013, Chidinma bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwado na MTN Nigeria
Chidinma malitere ịrụ ọrụ na abọm studio mbụ ya bụ Chidinma mgbe ọ wepụtara ọrụ mmekorita ya na ndị ọzọ na-emechi oge 3
E mere ndokwa ka ewepụta abọm ahụ na nkeji iri na ise nke afọ 2011
Chidinma kwuru banyere abọm ahụ n'ụzọ dị mkpirikpi ma kwuo na ọ tinyere ume dị ukwuu na ya
Ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-emepụta ihe rụkọtara ọrụ, gụnyere Cobhams Asuquo, Tee-Y Mix, WazBeat na Oscar Heman Ackah
O weputara egwu 'Jankoliko' na 'Carry You Go' na 22 Febụwarị 2011
Ọ bụ Oscar Heman Ackah dere ma mepụta abụ abụọ ahụ
N'ajụjụ ọnụ e bipụtara na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ Weekly Trust, Chidinma kwuru na obi dị ya ụtọ na nzaghachi dị mma ọ natara mgbe a tọhapụrụ egwu ahụ, ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ ike iji melite ọrụ ya
Na 4 June 2011, Chidinma wepụtara vidiyo egwu Clarence Peters maka 'Jankoliko'
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2011, ọ wepụtara 'Kedike' dị ka egwu nke atọ nke abọm ahụ
Abụ ahụ sụgharịrị ka ọ bụrụ 'Heartbeat' ma Cobhams Asuquo mepụtara ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Entertainment Rave, Chidinma kpughere na ya na ndị na-emepụta ya chepụtara aha egwu ahụ ma kwuo na ọ na-egosi ịhụnanya
E wepụtara vidiyo egwu Clarance Peters maka 'Kedike' na 24 Jenụwarị 2012
Onye na-agụ egwu Naijiria bụ Dammy Krane gosipụtara mmasị ịhụnanya Chidinma na vidiyo ahụ
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2011, ọ weputara egwu nke anọ nke abọm ahụ 'Run Dia Mouth'
Na 14 Septemba 2012, ọ wepụtara egwu Illbliss na Tha Suspect nyere aka 'Emi Ni Baller'
Ọ bụ Legendury Beatz mepụtara abụ ahụ

Chidinma Nkeruka Okeke (amụrụ n'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2000) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba maka Madrid CFF
Ọ nọbu na FC Robo na Nigeria Women Premier League, ọ gbakwara bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Naịjiria

N'afọ 2017, Rasheedat Ajibade meriri ya na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị nke Nigeria Freestyle Football
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2018, onye nkuzi Christopher Danjuma kpọrọ ya aha na ndepụta ikpeazụ nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjịrịa na-erubeghị afọ 20 maka 2018 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
Na 2019 WAFU Women's Cup, Okeke nọ na scoresheet ka ndị otu Naịjịria meriri Niger iji ruo eru maka ọkara ikpeazụ
A gụnyekwara ya na ndị otu Naijiria maka 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2019, Okeke bịanyere aka na Madrid CFF na Spanish Primera División, wee mee egwuregwu mbụ ya na mmeri megide Real Betis na 8 Septemba 2019

Steeti ha Enugu, Enugu State, Nigeria

Chidinma na Chidiebere Aneke bụ ụmụ ejima enwere n'ụlọ ọrụ Nollywood, ndị ama ama dịka ejima Aneke
A mụrụ ha na ndịda nke Nigeria, steeti Enugwu kpọmkwem
Ọ bụ ha bụ ụmụ ikpeazụ nye ezinụlọ Aneke
Ha bụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Chidinmma na Chidiebere n'ụbọchị mbụ nke ọnwa Ọgọọstị1986 na steeti Enugu, Nigeria n'ime ezinaụlọ ụbara nke nwere ndị nwunye atọ
Ha nwere nna bara ọgaranya nke lekọtara ha anya nke ọma mana ihe gbanwere mgbe nna ha nwụsịrị na e kewara ihe onwunwe ya n'etiti ndị ezinụlọ ha
Ha nwetara asambodo iha akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị na steeti Enugwu

Mgbe ha gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị, Chidinma na Chidiebere gara Mahadum nke Nigeria, Nsuka ebe ha gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor na Mass Communication na Bachelor na Banking na Finance n'otu n'otu
Ụmụ ejima Aneke sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ Nollywood na 1999 ebe ha so wee mepụta ihe nkiri 'Ebuka' nke bụ ihe nkiri mbụ ha
N'afọ 2004, ụmụ ejima Aneke bụụrụ ndị ama ama n'ihe nkiri aha ya bụ 'Desperate Twins' nke mere ka ha nweta nhọpụta maka Ọrụ Kachasị Mma nke Nlele Anya na Onyinye Nleta Ndị Anwansi nke Africa

Chidozie Collins Awaziem (ka a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke mbụ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1997) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa nke na-agbara otu Alanyaspor bọọlụ site na Boavista
A mụrụ ya na steeti Enugu, Awaziem sonyeere FC Porto site na Portugal n'afọ 2014, ebe ọ nọrọ n'afọ ikpeazụ ya dị ka onye na-eto eto ma merie aha egwuregwu ahụ
Emere ya na ndị otu B na Segunda Liga
Na 27 Jenụwarị 2016, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, Awaziem pụtara na egwuregwu asọmpi mbụ ya na ndị isi otu, gosipụtara nkeji 90 zuru ezu na mmeri 2-0 megide CD
Feirense na Taça da Liga Ngosipụta mbụ ya na Primeira Liga mere na 12 Febụwarị, ka ọ malitere ọzọ na mmeri 2–1 na SL
Benfica n'ihi nsogbu mmerụ ahụ na ngalaba nchebe
A gbazinyere Awaziem na klọb FC Nantes nke France maka oge 2017–18
Na Jenụwarị 2019, Awaziem sonyeere Çaykur Rizespor na mgbazinye ego ruo na njedebe nke mkpọsa ahụ
Na 15 Ọgọstụ, n'otu ọnọdụ ahụ, ọ kwagara CD Leganés
Ka ọ bụ Porto nwe ya, Awaziem bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nwa oge na Boavista FC - na Portugal na obodo Porto - tupu 2020–21, na ọrụ nke nkwekọrịta afọ anọ na-adịgide adịgide na 30 June 2021
Ọ laghachiri na Turkish Süper Lig na 8 Septemba 2021, a gbazinyere ya Alanyaspor
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, Naịjirịa kpọrọ Awaziem maka egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Mali na Luxembourg, na 27 na 31 Mee 2016
O mere nke mbụ ya na 1 June 2017, malite na mmeri 3–0 megide Togo na Paris na egwuregwu ngosi ọzọ
E tinyere Awaziem na ndị otu Gernot Rohr nke mmadụ iri abụọ na atọ maka 2018 FIFA World Cup na Russia, ebe ọ bụ onye egwuregwu a na-ejighị mee ihe ka asọmpi ahụ kwụsịrị na ọpụpụ nke otu
A họpụtakwara ya maka 2019 na 2021 Africa Cup of Nations

Charlene Chiedza 'Chi' Kudzai Mhende (a mụrụ na 19 Ọktoba 1991), bụ onye Zimbabwe na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi na onye na-ese okwu
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịkpasu ndị na-ege ntị akpata oyi n'ahụ site na ngosipụta nwoke ya nke 'Wandile Radebe' na South African soap opera Generations
A mụrụ Mhende n'abalị 19 ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1991 na Harare, Zimbabwe
N'afọ 2015, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ncha na South Africa Generations ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Wandile Radebe', ọrụ nwoke
Ihe ngosi ahụ ghọrọ ihe na-ewu ewu ma gaa n'ihu ruo oge 4 gụnyere 1000 ihe omume
N'afọ 2006, Mhende kwagara Cape Town iji mụọ na The School for the Creative Economy
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri na ọrụ 'Lady Capulet' na mmepụta Artscape Romeo na Juliet
Site na arụmọrụ magburu onwe ya na ya, a họọrọ ya maka ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dịka K
Sello Duiker's The Quiet Violence of Dreams, JM Coetzee's Waiting for the Barbarians, A Midsummer Night's Dream, Taming of the Shrew, The Comedy of Errors, na Richard III
Ọ pụtara na Generations The Legacy ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwoke
N'afọ 2008, o ritere ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na AFDA awards
O mechara soro òtù ndị dịka 'Bonfire Improv Theatre Company' na 'Zakheni Arts Therapy Foundation' rụọ ọrụ ma nye aka na ihe nkiri na South Africa
A makwaara ya dịka olu nke 'Siyaya' na usoro ahụike zuru ụwa ọnụ nke Al Jazeera 'Lifelines'
N'afọ 2014, Mhende mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri Love the One You Love
N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara ya maka onyinye Promising Young Artist na Africa Movie Academy Awards
Chief Daddy bụ ihe nkiri ejije ntọọchị Naijiria nke afọ 2018 nke Niyi Akinmolayan duziri, nke Bode Asiyanbi dere ma Mosunmola Abudu na Temidayo Abudu mepụtara nke ewepụtara na onwa Disemba 2018
O gosipụtara ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood ama ama dị Funke Akindele Bello, Kate Henshaw, Nkem Owoh, Joke Silva, Patience Ozokwor, Richard Mofe Damijo na Racheal Oniga
Chief Daddy bụ gbasara onye bụ ide n'emepụta ihe bụ Chief Beecroft, onye nọ dị ka onye na-enyere ezinụlọ buru ibu nke ndị ikwu, ndị ọrụ ụlọ na ndị nne na nna tinyere ndị enyi ya nwaanyị aka

Akindele
E weputara Chief Daddy na Nigeria na ubochi iri abuó na ano na onwa Disemba, 2018 yana na Netherlands ubochi iri ise na onwa Machị na afo 2019 site na Netflix
Emere ihe nkiri a na Oriental Hotel dị na Legọs, ndị n'eme ihe nkiri Nollywood karịrị iri anọ bịara gụnyere Olu Jacobs, Joke Silva na Richard Mofe Damijo
Ebony Life Films mere ihe nkiri a ma Film One Entertainment kesara ya na Nigeria tinyere na Netflix na Netherlands
Onye isi ọrụ okpomọkụ, ma ọ bụ CHO,bụ onye ọrụ gọọmentị ime obodo lekwasịrị anya n'ịlụso ihe egwu dị n'oke okpomoku ọgụ na ibelata mmetụta agwaetiti okpomọkụ nke obodo mepere emepe
Obodo, mpaghara, na ụdị gọọmentị ime obodo ndị ọzọ na-ewe ọtụtụ ndị isi ọrụ okpomọkụ n'ọrụ

Ọnọdụ ahụ pụtara na mbido afọ nke 2020, na ọtụtụ obodo na ihu igwe na-ekpo ọkụ na-ahọpụta ndị isi ọrụ okpomọkụ iji gbalịa ibelata mmetụta na-arịwanye elu nke mgbanwe ihu igwe site na ịbawanye ndò, na-enye ebe oyi, ịkụ osisi, na ịhazi ọrụ mgbochi okpomọkụ
E mepụtara ọkwa ndị ọrụ okpomọkụ mbụ na Los Angeles, Miami-Dade County, Melbourne, Athens, na Freetown
Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ Adrienne Arsht-Rockefeller Foundation Resilience Center nke Atlantic Council haziri atụmatụ ịmepụta ọnọdụ ndị ahụ
Chief Stephen Osita Osadebe (March 17, 1936 – May 11, 2007), often reference to as just Osita Osadebe, was a Nigerian highlife musician from Atani
N'ime oge ọrụ ya ruru ihe karịrị iri afọ anọ, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị egwu ama ama na Igbo highlife
Ihe egwu kacha ama ama bụ 1984 otu ' Osondi Owendi ' nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ndu n'ụdị egwu dị elu ma bụrụkwa otu n'ime ndekọ ndekọ aha kacha ewu ewu na Naijiria
A mụrụ Osadebe na March 17, 1936, n'obodo Igbo dị na Atani na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria
O si n'ahịrị ndị na-abụ abụ na ndị na-agba egwu n'ala Igbo
Ụdị ya, Highlife, gụnyere ihe egwu Igbo na omenala
N'akụkụ nke a, calypso, Samba, bolero, rumba, Jazz na waltz nọkwa n'ụdị egwu Osadebe
Ọ bụ n'afọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Onitsha, bụ nnukwu obodo azụmahịa dị nso na Atani, ka Osadebe tolitere mmasị n'egwú
Osadebe bidoro egwu ya n'ụlọ egwu abalị dị na Legọs dị na mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naijiria
Ọ bụbu akụkụ nke The Empire Rhythm Orchestra, nke EC Arinze na-edu na ya mụtara ọtụtụ n'ime nkà egwu ya
Osadebe bụ onye na-ede egwú nke mbụ wepụtara n'afọ 1958 ma gaa n'ihu dee egwu karịrị narị ise; ọkara n'ime ha ka a tọhapụrụ n'ahịa
Ka ya na ndị otu Stephen Amache na ndị Central Dance Band nọrọ n'ihe dị ka afọ 1964, Osadebe kụpụrụ dịka onye otu ya na ndị otu ya bụ Sound Makers
Ka ọ na-esiwanye ike, ụdị Osadebe tolitere wee tinye nkọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, nke yiri ya, mana ọ bụghị nke esemokwu ka Fela Kuti
Ọnwụnwa onwe onye na mkpagbu na-abụkarị isi okwu nke nkọwa ya
Ọ bụrụ na bekee, pidgin bekee na Igbo
Osadebe na-agbatịkarị egwu ya maka ọñụ ndị na-ege ya ntị, na-enye ohere maka 'ndị nọ n'ụlọ ịgba egwu' ka ha na-egwu egwu
Ọ nwetara aha ya bụ 'Dọkịta nke ọbara mgbali elu' na-ekwu maka 'ikike ọgwụgwọ nke egwu ya'

Osadebe bu onye mere nke oma n'ipu na otu egwu akporo Conventional big band nke bu ndi otu egwu buputara ya bu egwu, o bu egwu na ato ezigbo uto nyere obi nke ndi oyibo kporo 'Melodic Progressions' na mita, nke a bukwa egwu uka a mara ama
Omechara wee mee nke oma n'Igbanwe egwu hailaif n'udi aguo azaa nke egwu Afrika

Mgbe agha obodo Naijiria mechara na ngwụcha afọ 1960, nnukwu ọpụpụ nke ndị ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria (karịsịa ndị Igbo) si na ọdịda anyanwụ Naijiria butere ọnwụ nke Highlife ama ama na isi obodo Legọs mgbe ahụ
N'oge agha na mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị Osadebe nọgidere na-eme ihe omume ndụ ya akwadoro
Egwu Jùjú na emesia Afrobeat buru ụzọ na Legọs, na n'afọ 1970 James Brown na ụdị egwu dị iche iche ghọrọ ewu ewu n'obodo ahụ
N'ime afọ iri a, ọrụ Osadebe eruola nke ọma
Mgbe Osadebe gbachara afọ 50 na 1986, Osadebe malitere ibute ụzọ nna wee were oge ya nye nwa ya nwoke Obiora na ụmụ ya ndị ọzọ site na ndị nwunye ya
One of Osita Osadebe's last albums is Kedu America
Osita Osadebe nwụrụ na St
Mary's Hospital Waterbury, Connecticut na 11 Mee 2007 ka ọ nwesịrị nnukwu nsogbu iku ume
Chief of Naval Staff (CNS) bụ onye isi agha na onye isi agha kachasị elu nke ndị agha mmiri Naịjirịa
Onye isi ndị agha mmiri na-abụkarị onye kachasị elu na onye isi ndị agha na-achi na ndị agha Naịjirịa ọ gwụla ma Onye isi ndị ọrụ nchekwa bụ onye ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri
Ọkwá ahụ na-abụkarị onye isi ọrụ kachasị elu nke onye isi ndị agha nke Naịjirịa họpụtara
Onye isi ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri na-agwa Onye isi ndị agha nchekwa, onye na-agwakwa onye ozi nke Nchebe
Ọrụ iwu nke diri onye ọrụ ahụ bụ ịhazi ma mezuo iwu maka iru eru kachasị elu nke nchekwa obodo Naijiria na ikike ọrụ nke ndị agha mmiri Naịjirịa
Onye isi ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri ugbu a bụ Vice Admiral Awwal Zubairu Gambo onye Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara na 26 Jenụwarị 2021 iji nọchie Ibok Ekwe Ibas
Tebụl dị n'okpuru ebe a bụ ndepụta nke ndị isi na-ejide ọkwa nke Chief of Naval Staff (CNS)
