Àtụ Infobox JudgeChile Eboe-Osuji
Chile Eboe-Osuji (bu onye amụrụ na 1962) bụ onye ọka ikpe nke ụlọ ikpe mpụ nke mba uwa, nke nwere ọnọdu n' Hague bido na Machị afọr puku abụọ na-iri na abuo
Ahọpụtara ya di ka onye isi nke Ulọ ikpe ahu na ubọch iri na otu nke ọnwa Maachị afọr puku abuọ na iri-na asato, ebe ọchiri afọr atọ
Ọrukwara ọrụ dika onye ndụmọdụ nke onye nchikota ihe banyere ikike ruru mmadu nke otu mba ụwa United Nations
Amụrụ Ọka-ikpe Eboe-Osuji Anara, Isiala Mbano, na obodo Imo, ala Naịjirịa , n' ubọchi nke abua na ọnwa itolu nke afọr 1962

Onwetara akwụkwọ nzere n' ikàiwu n' ulo akwukwo mahadum Naịjirịa nke di na Kalabar, Onwetakwara nzere masta ọka-iwu site na Mahadum McGill Montreal, Quebec, Canada, n' ikpeazu, onwetekwuru dọkịta nke ogo iwu na mahadum nke Amsterdam, Netherlands
A kpọrọ Eboe-Osuji na Ogwe ọka-iwu nke Naịjirịa na afọr 1986 oruru oru nwantitnti oge ebea
Mgbe o nwetere nzere masta ọka-iwu na McGill na afor 1991, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu na Canada, ebe akpọrọ ogwe ọka-iwu nke Ontario na British Columbia na afor 1993
Bido 1997 rue 2005, Eboe-Osuji rụrụ ọrụ n' ụlọ ikpe mpu mba uwa maka obodo Rwanda dị ka onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ikpe na onye ọka iwu gbasara ndị ọka ikpe nke ikpe ahụ
Bido afor 2005 rue 2007, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Canada dịka onye ọka iwu nakwa onye nkuzi iwu n' ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum

Ọrukwara ọrụ n' ụlọ ikpe Pụrụ Iche maka Sierra Leone dị ka onye ọka iwu na-arịọchitere ikpe na 2007/08 ma laghachi na ICTR site na 2008 ruo 2010 dị ka Onye isi nke berslọ, ọ ghọrọ Onye Ndụmọdụ Ndụmọdụ nke Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Ruuru Mmadụ na United Nations Navi Pillay na 2010, ma nwee nkwekọrịta dịka onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ikpe na-ekpe ikpe na Courtlọikpe Pụrụ Iche maka Sierra Leone, n'okwu nke Charles Taylor, onye bụbu Onye isi mba Liberia
Odeela akwụkwọ abụọ na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ iwu na iwu mba ụwa
Na ụbọchi iri na isi nke onwa Disemba afor 2011, ahoputara Eboe-Osuji dika onye ikpe nke ụlọ ikpe mpụ nke mab ụwa
Onwetere ọkwa ahu site na inwe mmeri ntuli aka nke iri na ise nke otu nlekọta anya ya bu ụlọ ikpe akporo 'Assembly' Ọmalitere ọrụ na ubọchi iri na otu onwa Maachị afor 2012

Bido na ọnwa Septemba 2013, Eboe-Osuji sonyere ndi ọka ikpe Olga Venecia Herrera Carbuccia na Robert Fremr - duziri n' ikpe osote onye isi ala William Ruto nke Kenya, bụ onye e boro ebubo na ọ na-egbu mmadụ maka uru ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ntuli aka mba Kenya na 2007

Na mbido, ọ dọrọ ndị mgbasa ozi na ndị na-ede blọgụ na Kenya aka n' nti kwuo na onye ọbula nke ga ekpughe njirimara nke onye akaebe echedoro na ikpe Ruto nwere ike inata ama ikpe nke nlelị ụlọ ikpe; na mbu, Onye isi ọkaiwu ICC , Fatou Bensouda, mere mkpesa na ụfọdụ ndị akaebe na-atụ ụjọ na Kenya, ụfọdụ n'ime ha hapụrụ ikpe ahụ

N'ịgbaso arịrịọ Eboe-Osuji n'onwe ya, ndị isi oche nke ICC kpebiri ịmaliteghachi ime ụlọ ikpe V (b) na ikpe megidere Uhuru Muigai Kenyatta ma were Onye oka ikpe Geoffrey Henderson dochie n' ọnọdu ya na mbido 2014
Agbanyeghị nkea, Eboe-Osuji gara nihu ibụ onye isi nchikota ikpe n’ụlọ mgbakoba ikpe V (a) nke na-aga n’ihu na-anụ ikpe megidere Ruto na onye ruburu ọrụ mgbasa ozi n' Kass FM mbụ Joshua Sang
N’ ọnwa April 2014, ụlọ ikpeya nyere akwụkwọ ịkpọ oku maka ọtụtụ ndị akaebe ndi na na-achọghịzi ịgba akaebe na ikpe ahụ

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Eboe-Osuji gbaruru ihu nye gọọmentị Kenya banyere imaku ụkpụrụ nke ọbụbụeze 'n'oge ọ bụla dabaara ya, na ebumnuche pụtara ìhè nke ime ka egwu we tụo ndị ọka ikpe '
A mụrụ Chileshe Mpundu Kapwepwe na Zambia na 10 Julaị 1958
(Ụbọchị ọmụmụ chọrọ edezi
Gịnị kpatara ụbọchị ọmụmụ dị iche na nwanne ya nwanyị ejima Mulenga Kapwepwe?) O nwere nwanne ejima, Mulenga Mpundu Kapwepwe, onye bụ onye edemede na onye rụpụtara onye Zambia
Ụlọ ihe ngosi nka nke ụmụ nwanyị
Chileshe Kapwepwe jide Master of Business Administration na bụ Chartered akwụkwọ Akaụntụ
Ọ bụ onye otu nke Association of Chartered and Certified Accountants (ACCA) nke United Kingdom, na onye otu nke Zambia Institute of Chartered Accountants (ZICA)
Nwada Kapwepwe bụ ọkachamara na-akwụ ụgwọ ego, nwere ahụmahụ na mpaghara ọchịchị, amụma ọha na eze na njikwa ego
Ọrụ ya gbatịrị ihe karịrị narị afọ anọ na ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara, na nke mba ụwa, na mpaghara ọha na nke onwe
Clement Chima Nwafor bụ dọkịta na-awa ahụ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote gọvanọ mbụ nke Abia Steeti site na afọ 1992 ruo 1993
Chima Nwosu (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 12 n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1986) bụ nwanyị na-agbachitere mba Naijiria bọọlụ
O so na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụnwanyị Naịjirịa na 2004 Summer Olympics
Na ọkwa klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ na Inneh Queens

Chima Simone Benson bụ onye na agba na igwe onyonyo ma bụrụ kwa onye odeakụkọ na arụrụ onwe ya, njirimara ya bụ na ọgbara na egwuregwu na pụta ihe a n'akpọ Bigi Brọda Ọ nyiri ọnwụ onye ogbu-ọchụ a n'akpọ Dale Devon Scheanette na gbam-gbam isa ahụ Akọrọ akụkọ gbasara nyiri ọnwụ ya na igwe onyonyo a n'akpọ true crime cable television show Cold Case Files ya na akwukwọ egosi ihe ngosi nke a n'akpọ Unusual Suspects and Surviving Evil na Investigation Discovery
Simone anọwo na ọrụ ndeakụkọ
Chima Ugwu (amuru 19 Julaị 1973 n'Enugwu ) bu onye ogbugbu Naijiria
Ọ na-asọkwa mpi mgbe ụfọdụ n'ịtụfu discus
Ọ gbara asọmpi na 1996, 2000, 2004 Summer Olympics, na asọmpi ụwa na 1993, 1997 na 2003 na-eruteghị ikpeazụ asọmpi ahụ
Nke kacha mma nke onwe ya ọ turu bụ 2026mita, nke ọ nwetara na Julaị 2000 na Lagos
Nke a bụ ndekọ Naijiria gara aga, wee nye ya ọkwa nke ise na-eso ndi South Africa Janus Robberts, Burger Lambrechts na Karel Potgieter
Àtụ Footer All-Africa Champions Shot Put Men

Chima Williams bụ onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, onye ọka iwu gburugburu ebe obibi nke na-alụso ma na e megide ikpe na-ezighị ezi gburugburu ebe obibi ma nwee ụlọ ọrụ mba dị iche iche dị ka Shell iji kwụọ ụgwọ maka mmebi ha kpatara ma kpatara ụfọdụ obodo na Niger-Delta
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere otu ikpe ziri ezi nke ụmụ akwụkwọ mbụ na NaịjirịaA kpọrọ ya ony na-agbachitere ụwa

Chima Williams dị ka nwa akwụkwọ sonyeere Nigerian Environmental Movement n'afọ 1990s ebe ọ wepụtara onwe ya maka Environmental Rights Action (ERA), otu NGO nke e guzobere n'afọ 1993, nke na-akwado ikike gburugburu ebe obibi na Naijiria
N'afọ 1998, Chima guzobere otu ikpe ziri ezi nke ụmụ akwụkwọ mbụ na Naịjirịa
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye ọka iwu gburugburu ebe obibi na-ekpe ụlọ ọrụ mba dị iche iche ikpe maka ikpe mmetọ gburugburu ebe obibi Naịjirịa
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2020, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Environmental Rights Action / Friends of the Earth Nigeria (ERA / FoEN)
Environmental Rights Action (ERA) nke bụ otu NGO na-akwado ndị mmadụ nke e guzobere na Jenụwarị 11, 1993 na Naijiria iji lụso nsogbu ndị ruuru mmadụ gburugburu ebe obibi ọgụ na Naijeria
ERA bụ isi nke Naijiria nke Friends of the Earth International (FoEI)
Chima Williams bụ otu n'ime ndị nwetara onyinye nke 2022 Goldman Environmental Prize gafee ụwa
Ọ bụ onye Naijiria nke atọ nwetara ihe nrite ahụ
E nyere onyinye ahụ maka ọrụ ya n'ichebe ụwa site n'ịgba Royal Dutch Shell ụta maka mmanụ si n'ụlọ ọrụ ha wụba n'ime obodo Niger Delta
A na-enye onyinye Goldman iji kwanyere ùgwù ma nwee ekele maka ọrụ nke ndị na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi n'ụwa niile na-arụ ọrụ iji chebe ụwa

Chinụa Achebe (site n'aha a gụrụ ya Albert Chinụalụmọgụ Achebe; 16 Nọvemba 1930 – 21 Maachị 2013) bụ onye Igbo a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke iri na isii n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1930 n'obodo Ogidi nke dị n'ala Naijiria
Ọ bụ ya dere akwụkwọ a na-akpọ Things Fall Apart
E si n'akwụkwọ ahụ mara aha ya nke ukwuu n'ụwa nile
Chinụa Achebe, onye nke nne na nna ya kpọrọ Albert Chinụalụmọgu Achebe, gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nta nke ndị uka, gakwaa Government College n'Umuahia
Ọ mechara gakwaa mahadum nke Ibadan University of Ibadan, Ȯra Ọyọ (Oyo State) ebe ọ gụrụ asụsụ békè' site n'afọ 1948 ruo afọ 1953
Ka ọ gụchara akwụkwọ nke mahadum, ọ rụtụkwara ọrụ n'ụlọakwụkwọ dị iche iche nakwa n'ụlọọrụ mgbasa ozi
Site na 1958 ruo 1966, Chinụa Achebe bụ onye nhazi na-ahụ maka African Writers Series
Mgbe Achebe dere Things Fall Apart, akwụkwo ahu rere nke ukwuu, mkpụrụ nde iri
A tụgharịkwaala akwụkwụ a n'olu asụsụ iri ise
Chinụa Achebe rụkwara ọrụ onye diplomat n'ọchịchị nke Biafra site na 1967
Mana site na 1967 ruo 1981, ọ kụzikwara na mahadum dị iche iche n'ala Naijiria, ma bụrụkwa onye nhazi maka akwụkwọ edemede nke a na-akpọ Okike
N'afọ 1981, Chinụa Achebe sokwa na ndị bidoro Otu Ndi Odee Nke Naijiria, nke a na-akpọ Association of Nigerian Authors
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ onye isi were ruo 1986
A bịa n'etiti Ndị Nka, yaa bụ ndị na-ede edemede nke Modern African Literature, ihe a na-akpọ Chinụa Achebe bụ Nna
N'afọ 2002 ka e nyere ya Peace Prize nke German Book Trade
A makwa Chinua Achebe dị ka onye na-enweghi onye e ji atụnyere ya maka ịmalite edemede n'asụsụ bekee' n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ n'ala Afrịka
Ọ luru nwanyi; aha nwunye ya bụrụ Christiana Chinwe Okoli

Lychee mkpụrụ bụ ụdị China 3
Ọkà mmụta sayensị mepụtara iche iche iche litchi, N'etiti ha, China 3 'ndị a dị iche
The ụdị osisi bụ obere ka na-ajụ-sized, The nkezi elu bụ na gburugburu 5 na 6 mita
The nkezi mkpụrụ nke 124 kg kwa osisi
Otú ọ dị, na a mgbe niile, kwa afọ, ma ọ bụ adịghị amị mkpụrụ
Ụsọ Oké Osimiri East
Mmepe Ndịda Anyanwụ (asụsụ China dị mfe 'Akụkụ ndịda anyanwụ, Nnukwu mmepe' ), yana usoro mmepe ndịda anyanwụ ukwu ma ọ bụ Mkpughe Mmemme ndịda anyanwụ, bụ amụma akwadoro maka ndịda anyanwụ China
Iwu a kpuchiri mpaghara isii ( Gansu, Guizhou, Qinghai, Shaanxi, Sichuan na Yunnan), mpaghara ise kwụụrụ onwe ya (Guangxi, Mongolia n'ime, Ningxia, Tibet na Xinjiang ), na otu obodo ( Chongqing)

Mpaghara a nwere pacent iri asaa na ụma anọ nke mpaghara ala China, mana naanị pacent iri abụọ na ụma asatọ nke ndị bi na ya, na ngwụcha afọ 2002, yana pacentị iri na itoolu na ụma itoolu nke ngụkọta akụ na ụba ya, dịka nke afọ 2015
N'okpuru ọchịchi Deng Xiaoping, ndị mba China bidoro mmezigharị akụnụba ya n'afọ 1978 site n'ịgbanwe site na akụnụba iwu gaa na akụnụba ahịa
Mpaghara ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri ọwụwa anyanwụ China ritere uru dị ukwuu site na ndozigharị ndị a, akụ na ụba ha gara n'ihu ngwa ngwa
Otú ọ dị, ọkara ọdịda anyanwụ China adaala nke ukwuu
N'ọnwa Maachị nke afọ 1999, Onye odeakwụkwọ izugbe Jiang Zemin kwupụtara atụmatụ usoro mmepe maka ọdịda anyanwụ n'ógbè Nzukọ mba nke itoolu
Ọ ga-akọwapụta atụmatụ a nke ọma n'ọnwa June afọ 1999, bụ mgbe e ji ahịrịokwu ahụ nnukwu mmepe ọdịda anyanwụ, na -aka akara mmalite nke amụma a
Onye isi Zhu Rongji gara na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ iji kpokọta echiche ndị isi ọdịda anyanwụ banyere atụmatụ a
N'ihi nke a, Kọmitii na-ahụ maka nhazi steeti depụtara atụmatụ mbụ maka atụmatụ ahụ tupu ha nyefee ya n'akaKọmitii Na -ahụ Maka Ọchịchị Politburo n'ọnwa Nọvemba nke afọ1999
Otu ndị ọchịchị maka mmepe mpaghara ndịda anyanwụ (西部 地区 开发 领导 小组) bụ ndị Kansụl Steeti e mepụtara n'ọnwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 2000, nke Zhu duru

Akụkụ nke atụmatụ a gụnyere mmepe nke akụrụngwa (ụgbọ njem, osisi ọkụ eletrik, ike, na nkwukọrịta), ịrata itinye ego nke mba ofesi, itinyekwu mbọ na nchedo gburugburu ebe obibi (dịka ịgha mkpụrụ osisi ), ịkwalite agụmakwụkwọ, na njigide akaraka na -abawanye gaa mpaghara ndị bara ụba
Dị ka afọ 2006, ejirila ngụkọta otu ijeri yuan wuo ihe owuwu na ọdịda anyanwụ China

Ụlọ ọrụ mmepe ọdịda anyanwụ nke jikọrọ aka na kansụl steeti wepụtara ndepụta nke nnukwu ọrụ iri ga-ebido n'afọ 2008, yana mkpokọta mmefu ego ijeri yuan narị anọ na iri atọ na isii (ijeri dollar iri isii na anọ na ụma iri na abụọ)

Ọrụ ndị a gụnyere ahịrị okporo igwe ụgbọ oloko ọhụrụ na-ejikọ Guiyang na Guangzhou, Lanzhou na Chongqing, Kashgar na Hotan dị na Xinjiang; okporo ụzọ dị n'etiti Wanyuan na Dazhou na mpaghara Sichuan, Shuikou na Duyun na mpaghara Guizhou; ọrụ mgbasawanye ọdụ ụgbọ elu na Chengdu, Chongqing na Xi'an
Ha gụnyekwara ịrụ ụlọ ọkụ eletrik, ebe a na-egwupụta kol, mmanu gas na na okpokoro eji ewefe mmanụ yana ọrụ ọhaneze na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ
Na ngwụsị afọ 2007, China amalitela ọrụ owuwu ihe iri itoolu na abụọ dị mkpa na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ, yana itinye ego karịrị otu ijeri yuan na ùma atò
Ọrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè Qinghai-Tibet a ma ama n'ụwa niile setịpụrụ ihe dị mkpa na mmepe obodo Tibet
O jikọtara Tibet na mpaghara etiti China
Tibet abụghịzi mpaghara dịpụrụ adịpụ nke ụgbọ okporo ígwè na-apụghị iru

The Ahịrị ukwu nke mpaghara ndịda anyanwụ, ihe nwere ike ime na Nyefe ọrụ ngọ mpaghara ndịda na mgbago ugwu, bụ atụmatụ maka ịwepu mmiri site n'akụkụ mmiri nke osimiri isii na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ China, gụnyere Mekong, Yarlung Tsangpo na Salween, na mpaghara akọrọ nke mpaghara ugwu China site na usoro nchekwa mmiri, ọwara mmiri na osimiri eke
Ihe oru ngo a nwere ike bụrụ atụmatụ kacha arụrịta ụka ruo taa
Mgbalị China ịmepe mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ ya enweela mmetụta dị iche iche na mmepe akụ na ụba mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ

Ọ bụ ezie na nnukwu itinye ego akwalitela mmepụta mpaghara a, na-ewelite GDP nke ọma na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ niile, ọrụ ahụ emezughị ebumnuche ya nke iwepụ ọdịiche akụ na ụba n'etiti mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụnke China
Site n'afọ 1999 ruo afọ 2001, Xinjiang na Guangxi gosipụtara mmụba GDP kwa afọ nke ruru Pacentị iri atọ
Mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke China akọpụtala ọnụego uto akụ na ụba kwa afọ nke Pacentị iri na ụma isii maka afọ isii n'usoro

Mkpokọta GDP nke mpaghara ndị ọdịda anyanwụ ruru Puku Ijeri atọ na ụma atọ n'afọ 2005, ma e jiri ya tụnyere otu puku ijeri na ụma iri isii na isii n'afọ 2000, ebe ego ha nwetara na-eto nkezi Pacentị iri maka ndị bi n'obodo mepere emepe na ọdịda anyanwụ yana mmadụ pacentị iri isii na asatọ bi n'ime ime obodo

Atumatu na-agba ndị China ume site na mpaghara ndị bara ọgaranya na ndị mmadụ juputara na China ịkwaga na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ na-enweghị ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ emeela ka mmụba ndị mmadụ na [obodo ole na ole], ọkachasị Qinghai nke mmụba ya dị pacentị iri abụọ na ụma isii
Ka o sina dị, uto akụ na ụba nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ China na-aga n'ihu karịa nke ndịda ayanwụ, na-eme ka akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke ngwaahịa ụlọ gara n'ihu na-ada
Ntụkọ ndịda ayanwụ nyere na GDP belatara site na Pacentị iri abụọ na ụma iri asatọ na asatọ n'afọ 1990 ruo Pacentị iri na asaa na ụma iri na atọ n'afọ 2000
Mmekọ ọnụ nke GDP kwa mmadụ na ọdịda anyanwụ belatara site na Pacentị iri asaa na atọ na ụma iri atọ n'afọ 1990 ruo Pacentị iri isii na ụma iri asatọ na asaa n'afọ 2000
N'afọ 1990, GDP nke onye ọ bụla na Shanghai bụ ugboro asaa na ụma atọ nke Guizhou, ógbè kasị daa ogbenye na China; ka ọ na-eru 2000, ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ amụbaala ugboro iri abụọ na itoolu

Ihe akaebe sitere na Akwụkwọ afọ mgbakọ na mwepụ nke China na-egosikwa ọdịiche akụ na ụba na-abawanye n'etiti China na ọdịda anyanwụ na ọwụwa anyanwụ, na-egosi na ọnụ ọgụgụ GDP nke ọwụwa anyanwụ na ọdịda anyanwụ mụbara site na abụọ na ụma iri itoolu na asatọ n'afọ 1980 ruo anọ na ụma iri atọ na atọ n'afọ 2000

Kemgbe ewebatara mgbanwe akụ na ụba na amụma mmeghe ụzọ n'afọ 1978, mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ anọwo n'ọnọdụ akụ na ụba na-adịghị mma n'ihi na ọ na-ekwe nkwa mweghachite obere nye ndị na-etinye ego karịa ndị ntinye ego ọzọ nọ na-ọwụwa anyanwụ ya
Ya mere, otu n'ime ebumnobi nke mkpughe atụmatụ nke ndịda anyanwụ bụ iwebata ndị itinye ego mba ofesi site na imepụta gburugburu itinye ego kwụsiri ike site na nrụpụta akụrụngwa

Nke a bụ ihe ịga nke ọma maka ọrụ mmepe ọdịda anyanwụ na ọkwa ụfọdụ, maka ọnụ ọgụgụ na-egosi nnukwu mmụba na itinye ego mba ofesi na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ, site na US $ otu puku, narị asatọ na iri atọ na asaa ma ụma iri atọ na ise n'afọ 1999 ruo nde $ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri abụọ na abụọ na ụma iri na itoolu n'afọ 2001
Agbanyeghị, ọ bụghị mpaghara niile dị na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ sonyere n'ọganihu a

Ọ bụ ezie na itinye ego na mba ofesi na Chongqing toro US nde $ iri na asaa na ụma iri ise na isii n'etiti 1999 n'afo 2001 (site na US nde $ narị abụọ na iri atọ na asatọ ruo nde $ narị abụọ na iri ise na isii na ụma iri anọ na itoolu), itinye ego mba ofesi na Guizhou, Guangxi na Ningxi belatara nke ukwuu, na-agbada ihe dị ka USD $ nde iri na itoolu na ụma iri asaa na otu , $ nde narị abụọ na iri ise na ụma iri itoolu na isii, na $ nde iri atọ na anọ na ụma iri ise na anọ n'otu n'otu
Ọnọdụ Guizhou kpughere mmetụta ọjọọ nke Mmemme Mmepe Ọdịda Anyanwụ

N'agbanyeghị eziokwu ahụ bụ na Guizhou nwetara iri ise na atọ na ụma atọ ijeri yuan na owuwu ihe owuwu n'afọ 2001 naanị, karịa ngụkọta ego nke Atụmatụ Afọ ise nke itoolu (1995-2000) nyere, ego mba ofesi ya belatara site na $ nde iri anọ na ụma itoolu n'afo 1999 ruo $ nde iri abụọ na itoolu na ụma iri abụọ na itoolu n'afọ na 2001, mbelata dị ịtụnanya Pacentị iri atọ na otu, na -eru ebe kachasị ala kemgbe 1997

N'adịghị ka steeti ahụ zubere, ọrụ mbufe ọkụ eletrik ndịda anyanwụ - ọwụwa anyanwụ dị na Guizhou kwenyesiri ike na mmụba na-aga n'ihu na itinye ego mba ofesi n'ụsọ oké osimiri, ebe a na-ebufe ọtụtụ ọkụ eletrik na Guizhou na Guangdong

Tim Oakes, onye prọfesọ na-ahụ maka ọdịdị ala na Mahadum Colorado dị na Boulder, na-arụ ụka na ọdịda nke itinye ego na mba ofesi na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ ụfọdụ bụ nsonaazụ nke mbọ Beijing mere ime ka akụ na ụba mpaghara site na nnukwu oru ngo dị ka ndịda anyanwụ - ọwụwa anyanwụ Guizhou
Ịkwalite njikwa etiti n'etiti akụ na ụba emebiwo ntụkwasị obi nke ndị ọchụnta ego si mba ofesi

Banyere Guizhou, ebe gọọmentị etiti China bu n'obi ịrabata itinye ego mba ofesi na mpaghara ike site na Mgbasa Ọkụ ndịda anyanwụ - ọwụwa anyanwụ, naanị Pacentị ise nke itinye ego si mba ofesi banyere na mpaghara ike
Banyere Pacentị iri asaa na ise nke ntinye ego mba ofesi Guizhou ka etinyere ịmepụta ịhe yana Pacentị iri na ise maka mmepe ala na ụlọ
N'ihi na atumatu akụ na ụba nke mkpọsa ahụ bụ atụmatụ nke etiti, mkpọsa ahụ emeela ka e nwee nkụda mmụọ na ntinye ego nke mba ofesi, na-arụ ọrụ megide ebumnuche mbụ ya
N'ịhụta nnukwu mmetụta gburugburu ebe obibi na mmemme mmepe akụrụngwa buru ibu, steeti na-akpọsa nchekwa gburugburu ebe obibi na mkpọsa ya imepe mpaghara ndịda anyanwụ
Mgbanwe ala ubi na oke ọhịa na ahịhịa bụ atụmatụ kachasị maka mbọ a, na-elekwasị anya na mpaghara dị mkpa maka nchekwa Yangtze
Na Sichuan, gọọmentị chọrọ ichebe oke ọhịa dị nde iri na itoolu na ụma iri abụọ na atọ ma kụọ ọhịa ọhụrụ nde hekta abụọ na ụma iri itoolu na atọ iji belata oke silt na-asọba na Yangtze
Ihe dị ka puku ala iri abụọ ka a tụgharịrị na Guizhou n'afọ 2001, mpaghara dị mkpa maka nchekwa Yangtze
Na Shaanxi, a gbanwere ala ubi hekta puku narị ise na iri asaa na otu na hekta puku narị anọ na puku abụọ na asaa ka ọ bụrụ ọhịa ma ọ bụ ahịhịa n'etiti 1999 na 2002
hekta Ala ubi puku narị abụọ na puku iri asatọ ọzọ na otu mbara ala tọgbọrọ n'efu ka a tụgharịrị n'afọ 2003
Mmemme gburugburu ebe obibi China na ọdịda anyanwụ emeela China “otu n'ime mba ole na ole n'ụwa nke na-amụba oke ọhịa ha ngwa ngwa,” dị ka David Dollar, onye isi ụlọ akụ ụwa na China si kwuo
Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ a yiri ka ọ na-aga nke ọma, ọ na-ewepụta gọọmentị nnukwu nsogbu ego
Mgbanwe oke ala ubi na -achọ nnukwu ego maka ịtọgharị ndị ọrụ ugbo
Na mgbakwunye, iji kwụọ ndị ọrụ ugbo ụgwọ maka mfu ha nwetara na ọrụ ugbo, steeti agbaala mbọ inye ha mkpụrụ na ego maka ịkụ osisi na ahịhịa
Nke a na-ebute oke iwu nke yuan iri isii kwa mu nke amụma etiti

Ihe mgbagwoju anya ọzọ bụ enweghị afọ ojuju nke ndị ọrụ ugbo mgbe gọọmentị na-emezughị nkwekọrịta ya, ebe ọ bụ na gọọmentị ime obodo na-akwụkarị ụgwọ maka nrụpụta ya nke ọma, na-ebute nkwụghachi n'etiti yuan iri abụọ ruo iri ise, yana mgbakwunye mkpụrụ ọka narị atọ
Ndị ọrụ ugbo na-erite uru na nkwụghachi ụgwọ nwa oge ga-adabere na enyemaka gọọmentị ozugbo arụchara ọrụ ịkụ osisi

tọn ọka puku iri asatọ, nde otu narị na puku iri ise na anọ na mbelata ego enyemaka na nde narị abụọ na iri isii na isii maka ịkpụ osisi n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ezinụlọ Puku narị asatọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbo nke etinyegoro na Shaanxi
Ọ bụrụ na gọọmentị mpaghara ekpebie ịsọpụrụ nkwa ya ruo afọ ise ruo asatọ ọzọ, ọ ga-efu ngụkọta yuan ijeri iri na otu na ụma asaa na ọka na enyemaka ego
Ọnụ ego dị oke ọnụ na-eme ka arụrụ ọrụ nke gburugburu ebe obibi bụrụ ihe a na-enyo enyo

Ọzọkwa, ọ bụ ezie na a na-ekwusi ike banyere ọrụ gburugburu ebe obibi na mkpọsa ahụ, a kpachapụghị anya maka mmetụta nke mmịpụta kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ, mmụba nke ọrụ ọkụ, nju mmiri, na ụgbọ njem na usoro ahịrị nnyefe, ha niile na -emepụta mmetụta ka njọ
gburugburu ebe mmemme gburugburu ebe obibi nwere ike kwụọ ụgwọ ya

Na ihe egwuregwu nke (Athletics at the 2007 All-Africa Games) o mecharu onye nke ano, o jiri o nu ogugu centi mita abua were daa imeri
Na (2008 African Championships) o meriri akara ola ocha

o nwete ra ya na onwa ise, n'afo puku abuo na asaa

O so n’otu ndị otu egwu bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa
Na ọkwa otu ọ na-egwuri egwu maka Rivers Angels tupu ọ kwaga Braga na Portugal

N'oge 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations Uchendu na-egwu egwuregwu ikpeazụ, ebe ọ nọrọ n'okpuru nkeji 8 tupu ngwụcha oge ahụ

Na nke e mere n'Agadir, dị na Moroko, o meriri otu n'ime ọla nchara n'ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị 53kg
N'afọ 2019, ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na e mere na Rabat, dị na Moroko ma rite nrite ọla edo n'ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị 53kg
N’ikpeazu, o meriri Oumaima El-Bouchti nke Moroko

Chinedum Enyinnaya Orji // (ege ntị) bụ onye isi ocheụlọ nzukọ Abia Steeti iri na otu na nke ugbu a, na-arụ ọrụ kemgbe ụbọchi iri nke ọnwa June afọ, 2019

A họpụtara ya dị ka onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya Umuahia Central State Constituency na 2015 ma họpụta ya ọzọ n'oge ntuli aka 2019 nke Gọvanọ na Ụlọ Nzukọ nke Steeti na Abia Steeti na ikpo okwu nke Peoples Democratic Party
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Ụlọ nzukọ Abịọ́ steeti n'ụbọchị nke iri nke ọnwa juun afọ 2019 n'oge nraranye nke ụlọ nzukọ Abia steeti nke asaa

A mụrụ Chinedum Enyinnaya Orji n'ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 1970, n'ezinụlọ onye ọrụ gọọmentị a ma ama ghọrọ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Senator Theodore na Chief MrsOdochi Orji nke Amaokwe na Ugba village, Obodo Ugba nọọrọ onwe ya na Umuahia North Local Government Area nke Abia State, Nigeria
Chinedum gara akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị obodo nke Ugba, Umuahia Ibeku site n'afọ 1976 ruo afọ 1982, ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke gọọmenti, Owerri, site n'afọ1982 ruo afọ 1987
Ọ nwetara nnabata na Mahadum Gọọmentị etiti nke dị n'Owerri ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nweta nzere bachelọ na Civil Engineering n'afọ 1996
Chinedum Enyinnaya Orji bụ onye otu ọha mmadụ Injinia Naịjiria (MNSE), nzukọ nche anwụ maka Ọrụ ọkachamara Injinia na Naijiria
Tupu ọ tụba okpu ya n'ime mgbanaka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Rt Hon Chinedum E

Orji MNSE emeela onwe nkewapụta dị ka onye ọrụ ebere pụrụ iche nke metụrụ ndụ ndị mmadụ aka site na ọtụtụ ntinye aka ya nke hụrụ na mmezu nke ọrụ na onyinye nvke ihe ndị metụrụ ndụ nke ndị mmadụ aka kpọmkwem site na Direct Touch Initiative nke hụkwara ike nke ọtụtụ ndị Abians karịsịa ndị ntorobịa na ụmụ nwanyị site na inweta ọtụtụ onyinye na mma maka ya

N'ịbụ onye ndị mmadụ hụrụ n'anya, ọ bịara dị ya mfe ịpụta dị ka onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya mpaghara etiti Umuahia na Ụlọ nzukọ Abịa Steeti na ntuli aka afọ 2015 ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi nke ụlọ ruo 2019 mgbe a họpụtara ya ọzọ na mgbakọ nke asaa
N'ụbọchi nke iri nke ọnwa June afọ 2019, Chinedum Enyinnaya Orji pụtara dị ka onye isi oche nke mgbakọ nke asaa nke Abịa steeti mee ka ọ bụrụ nwa amaala nke atọ na steeti ahụ
Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị People's Democratic Party

Orji dọrọ ndọrọ nke Ikwuano/Umuahia North/ mgbakọ etiti ụmụahịa south nke Abia State na ntuli aka nke ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa February afọ 2023 nke Ụlọ ndị nnọchiteanya mana onye mmegide ya Obi Aguocha nke Labour Party nke meriri ya nwetara vootu 48,199 iji merie Orji nwetara vootu 35,195
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2020, Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Mpụ akụ n'ụba na ego mara ọkwa nyocha banyere Orji, nna ya Theodore, na nwanne ya nwoke Ogbonna dabere na mkpesa nke kọmitii ahụ natara n'afọ 2017

mkpesa ahụ, nke Fight Corruption Save Nigeria Group tinyere, depụtara ihe karịrị ijeri ego ọha na eze 500 nke e kwuru na ezinụlọ Orji zuru mgbe Theodore jere ozi dị ka Gọvanọ Abia Steeti site n'afọ 2007 ruo afọ 2015

A na-eche na ego ahụ bụ ijeri 383 site na akaụntụ gọọmentị etiti, ijeri 55 nke ego nrụpụta karịrị akarị, ijeri 23 site na ego SURE-P, ijeri 18 site na ego gburugburu ebe obibi, ijeri 105 nke ego ebitere ụlọ akụ first bank , ijeri 4 nke ego ebitere Diamond Bank , ijeri 12 nke ekwesịrị ịnyeghachi Paris Club, ijeri 2 nke ego mbinye ndị ọrụ ugbo, na ijeri 55 nke ego nke mmepe mpaghara Abia State n'emeputa mmanu tinyere ego gọọmentị ndị ọzọ gụnyere nde 500 ego nche kwa ọnwa

Ka e mesịrị n'ọnwa Febụwarị nke afọ 2020, a gbara ma Theodore na Chinedu Orji ajụjụ ọnụ ka nyocha ahụ chọpụtara na Chinedu nwere akauntu 100 dị iche iche a na-enyo enyo na ụlọ akụ nke e nwere ike iji zoo ego ezuru
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2021, e jidere Theodore n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu mba ụwa Nnamdi Azikiwe mgbe ọ na-erubeghị isi n'ọnọdụ ntọhapụ ya ma tụfuo paspọtụ ya na EFCC
Ka e mesịrị n'ụbọchị ahụ, Chinedu nyefere onwe ya nke mere eji jide ya
A gbara ha abụọ ajụjụ ọnụ tupu a tọhapụ ha na mgbapụta ma gwa ha ka ha laghachi maka ajụjụ n'ọdịnihu

N'ụbọchị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba, Chinedum Enyinnaya Orji nwetara onyinye The Sun Public Service Award 2020, site n'aka The Sun Publishing Ltd, ndị na-ebipụta The Daily Sun Newspapers maka ndụ na-emetụ n'ahụ
Chinedum Enyinnaya Orji bụ Knight nke Anglican Communion
Chineke bụ aha ọzọ ndi Igbo n' omenala Igbo kpọrọ Chukwu
Mgbe ndị bekee bịara, ha mee ya nke ndi okpukpere ụka
N'echiche ndi okpukpere chi nke Omenala Ndi Igbo, Christianity, Judaism, ma Islam, Chineke nwere ọtụtụ utu aha, ma nwee nanị otu aha
Ụzọ abụọ e si akpọ aha ahụ bụ 'Jehovah maọbụ Yahweh'
N' ọtụtụ Akwụkwọ Nsọ, e wepụla aha Chineke ma jiri utu aha bụ 'Onyenwe Anyị' maọbụ 'Chineke' dochie ya
Ma mgbe e dere akwụkwọ nsọ, aha ahụ bụ Jehova pụtara n’ime ya, ihe dịka ugboro pụkụ asaa(7,000)
N'ime akwụkwọ nsọ nke ọhụrụ nke edere n'asụsụ ndi girik, aha Chineke, dika Jehova na Yaweh apụtaghi, kama aha ya n'ọnọdụ dika 'Onyenwe Anyi' ya na 'Chineke' pụtara nke ụkwụ
N'eto nụ aha nsọ Chineke nna anyi n'asụsụ ọbula n'ime mmụọ n' eziokwụ
Maka na amara ya gbara ndi n'eso ụzọ ya gburu gburu

Nke a pụtara na m na-agbado anya, na-achọsi ihe ụwa ike maka ọganihu
Ma ọ pụtakwara na m maara nke ọma ị bụ onye ndozi ụlọ
Nnem na=aga n'ihu, ma n'ime ụlọ ma n'ezi
Ọ na-eme nri, sie nri na ihe niile
Ruo taa, ọ ka na-eme nri nna m,ọ masịrị ya ime
A zụrụ m n’ebe e nweghị nnukwu nsogbu gbasara ilekọta ụlọ
Dịka nwatakiri, m ga-ezo na-agụ akwụkwọ na nna m ga-achọ m gwa m, ị ga-amụta etu esi esi nri, ị sa akwa na i dobe ụlọ n'ihi na ị gosibeghị m ihe ọ bụla gosiri na ị ga-akwụ ụgwọ odibo ụlọ
Chinelo nwetara nzere bachelọ nke iwu na Mahadum nke Naijiria,n'Enugu n'afọ 1996
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na n'afọ 1997
N’afọ 2000, ọ natara nzere masta na Computer and Communications Law site na London School of Economics
Dịka akụkụ nke mmụta ya; n'afọ 2008 ọ gara Columbia University Graduate School
N’afọ 2007, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na JF Kennedy School of Government na Mahadum nke Harvard
N'afọ 2002, ọ nọ na Wharton Business School, Mahadum nke Pennsylvania agụmakwụkwọ ndị isi
Ugbu a (2016), Chinelo bụ Director General na CEO nke PenCom, ụlọ ọrụ nwere uru bara uru karịa N5bn
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị Pension Reform Team nke webatara ntụnye ego ezumike nka na Naịjirịa
Tupu ọkwa ya dịka DG nke ọrụ kọmishọnụ ahụ, ọ bụ ọsụ ụzọ odeakwụkwọ / Onye Ndụmọdụ iwu nke kọmịshọn ahụ
E boro ya ebubo ị bufe ego nke onye Pension Fund Administrator to nye onye PFA ọzọ bụ onye ezinụlọ ya
N'ihe metụtara nke a, Ụlọ ikpe Kasị Elu nke gọọmenti etiti n'Abuja gbochiri ya ime iheharị ahụ n'ụbọchị nke 11 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ nke afọ 2016
Ọ bụ onye otu London stock exchange Africa Advisory group
E wepụrụ ya ọrụ ya dịka DG nke PenCom site n’aka onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari n'afọ 2017

Ọzọkwa, ụlọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya Naijiria degaara National Pension Commission (PenCom) akwụkwọ n'ọnwa Mee nke afọ 2019 iji gwa ha mmaka mmalite nke nyocha banyere nrụrụ ahịa mere n'oge ọchịchị ya, na ebubo nke mmejọ, mmebi iwu na mmebi iwu nke Public Procurement Act, nke afọ 2007
Chinelo Iyani (a mụrụ na ụbọchị abụọ nke ọnwa Febrụwarị n'afọ 1998) bụ onye na anochi anya obodo Naijiria na asọmpi mba ụwa
Ọ gbara onye nke 44th maka ọkpụ obi ụmụ nwanyị nke mita iri ise n'oge asọmpi mba ụwa na afọ 2019
Ọ zọkwara asọmpi mita otu narị nke ara ya na nke mita iri ise nke ụmụ nwaanyị ukurububa na afọ 2016 n'oge asọmpi ndị na-egwu mmiri na Afrịka na obodo
Senegal
Chinelo Okparanta (a mụrụ n'afọ 1981) bu onye Naijiria-Amerika bụrụkwa onye ode akwukwo na ode akwụkwọ di nkenke
A mụrụ ya na Port Harcourt, Nigeria, ebe a nọrọ zụlite ya ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, bụ mgbe ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara United States
Chinelo Okparanta bụ onye a mụrụ na Port Harcourt, nke obodo Naijiria , ma mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara obodo Amerịka
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Pennsylvania State University ( Schreyer Honors College ), Mahadum Rutgers ya na Iowa Writers' Workshop
Okparanta ebipụtala nkenke akụkọ mbipụta nke gụnyere Granta, New Yorker, Tin House, The Kenyon Review, The Southern Review, TriQuarterly, Njikọ, Subtropics na The Coffin Factory
Edemede ya apụtala na blọgụ nke AGNI,
lọgụ ihe nriteya Akblọgụ nke ụkọ, na Mahadu, blọọgụ Mmemme Writing International
Okparanta enweela mkpakọrịta ma ọ bụ nkuzidịkaaọkammụta nleta na Mahadum nke Iowa, Mahadum Colgate, Mahadum Purdue, College City College of New York, na Mahadum Columbia
Ọ bụ ọkammụtarọfesasụsụnbekee ya na nke ide akụkọ ifo l ifo) na Mahadum Bucknell, ebe ọ otu onye n'ime ndị na-eme nyocha na ngalaba bụkwa C
Graydon & Mary E
Rmawbụrụkwa ọkammụta nke odee abụ na ode ihe okike nke yana Margaret Hollinsheaitinafọ g ruo 2021
Ugbu aosote ọkammụta nrịtasụsụ a nke bekee na onymgbazismemideeihe okike i'ụlọiakwụkwọ ng na Swarthmore College

Nchịkọta nkenke akụkọ so na akụkọ mpụta mbụ ya, Obi Ụtọ, Dị ka Mmiri (Granta Books na Houghton Miffin Harcourt ), bụ nke a gụnyere n'afọ 2013 maka Frank O'Connor International Short Story Award, ọ ruru na agba nke ikpeazụ n'afọ 2014 maka ihe nrite New York Public Library Young Lions Award, wee nweta 2014 Lambda Literary Award for Lesbian Fiction
Ahọpụtala ya maka mkpakọrịta ndị nka na United States ma bụrụ onye ruru na agba nke ikpeazụ na Rolex Mentor na Protegé Arts Initiative in Literature n'afọ 2014

Ihe nkwanye ùgwù ndị ọzọ gụnyere ihe nrite Society of Midland Authors (maka onye ruru na agba nke ikpeazụ nke afọ 2013), ihe nrite Caine Prize for African Writing (maka onye ruru na agba nke ikpeazụ nke afọ 2013), na ihe nrite ndị ọzọ
Nkenke akụkọ ya akpọrọ 'Fairness' bụ nke a gụnyere na PEN/O
Obi Ụtọ, Dị ka Mmiri bụ ndị nchịkọta akụkọ họrọ maka Nyocha Akwụkwọ New York Times na Septemba 20, 2013

Edepụtara mkpokọta ahụ dị ka otu n'ime akụkọ ifo nke Africa kacha mma nke The Guardian nke afọ 2013, ekwuputara dị ka onye ruru na agba nke ikpeazụ maka ihe nrite Etisalat nke Naijiria maka akwụkwọ edemede n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, N'okpuru Osisi Udala, bụ nke ebipụtara na 2015

Onye nyocha New York Times kpọrọ Okparanta “onye ode akwụkwọ mara mma na nke ziri ezi”, The Guardian (UK) kọwara akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka 'akwụkwọ akụkọ na-adọrọ adọrọ banyere nwa agbọghọ nwere mmasị na ụmụ nwaanyị ibe ya tolitere na Naijiria n'oge agha obodo Nigeria
' n'ime nkea '
Okparanta kọwara nke ọma etu a ga-esi nwee nhazi n'etiti akụkọ ịhụnanya na akụkọ agha'
N'okpuru Osisi Udala bụ Nhọrọ Ndị nchịkọta akụkọ Nleba Akwụkwọ New York Times yana nke ahọpụtara maka ihe nrite Kirkus Reviews gbasara ide akụkụ ifo nke afọ 2015

Otu n'ime NPR 's 'Akwụkwọ kacha mma afọ 2015', ọ bụkwa 'akwụkwọ' kacha mma' nke Buzzfeed, The Wall Street Journal, The Millions, Bustle, Shelf Awareness, and Publishers Lunch ma bụrụkwa nke 'a kasị atụ anya' ndepụta, n'etiti ndị ọzọ

Edepụtara ya ogologo oge maka ihe nrite Center for Fiction First Novel Prize, nke afọ 2015 họpụtara maka ihe nrite NAACP Image Award n'afọ 2016 maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo pụrụ iche , a họpụtara ya maka ihe nrite Hurston-Wright Legacy Award n'afọ 2016 nke akụkọ ifo, onye ruru na agba nke ikpeazụ maka ihe nrite ndị odee Bipụta Triangle ( Ferro-Grumley Award ), ọkara ikpeazụ maka ihe nrite VCU Cabell First Novelist Award afọ 2016, depụtara ogologo oge maka ihe nriteChautauqua Prize nke afọ 2016, wee nweta ihe nrite 2016 Lambda Literary Award na katigori akụkụ ifo gbasara ndị nwanyị na nwanyi
N'okpuru osisi Udala tụrụ ugo n'afọ 2016 maka ihe nrite na akụkọ ifo nke Jessie Redmon Fauset Award ma bụrụ nhọrọ afọ 2017 maka Amelia Bloomer Project American Library Association
N'afọ 2017, Okparanta nwetara ihe nrite nturu ugo nrịbama Triangle nke 2016 Betty Berzon Emerging Writer
N'okpuru osisi Udala bụ nke e depụtara maka International Dublin Literary Award nke afọ 2017
Pulse nke Naijiria kpọrọ akwụkwọ a bụ n'okpuru osisi Udala aha dịka otu n'ime akwụkwọ iri pụtara ìhè nke Naijiria maka afọ 2015
YNaija depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime akwụkwọ iri kachasị ama ama nke 2015
Afridiaspora depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ Afrịka kacha mma nke 2015
N'ọnwa nke anọ afọ 2017, Granta họpụtara Okparanta maka otu oge n'ime afọ iri Best of Young American Novelists list
Edemede ya 'Trump na klas' ka a gụnyere na anthology New Daughters of Africa, nke Margaret Busby deziri n'afọ 2019
Chinelo Onwualu bụ onye Naijiria bụrụkwa nchịkọta akụkọ ya na onye na -ede akụkọ ifo na-akọ nkọ
Ọ so na onye bidoro magazin Omenana ma bụrụkwa onye nchịkọta akụkọ
Ọ bụkwa onye nchịkọta akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ Anathema
A mụrụ Onwualu na obodo Naijiria
Akwụkwọ akụkọ akpọrọ Omenana Magazine bụ ya na Mazi Nwonwu bidoro ya
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ akwụkwọ akụkọ Anathema Magazine na onye na-ede akwụkwọ na NPR
Ọrụ ya apụtala na Uncanny Magazine, Slate Magazine na Strange Horizons
Ọ bụ onye nkwado na New Sun anthology nke nweta goro nyocha dị mma
A họpụtara ya maka Nommo Awards, British Science Fiction Award, na Short Story Day Africa Award
Ọ bụ onye ikpeazụ maka onyinye Ignyte maka onyinye na afọ 2021 ọnyinye Community na Andrew Wilmot
Nkeke akụkọ ya akpọrọ Ihe Nwoke Nwụrụ Anwụ kwuru ka a gụnyere dị ka otu n'ime akụkọ ise na a kọwa maka oge ọgwụgwụ oge nke ndị edemede Africa sitere na Torcom
Ọ so na ndị ode akwụkwọ gara mmemme akwụkwọ Houston nke 2021

Chinenye bu nwa nke asaa amuru na etiti umu asato ma burukwa ejima Ka ogu chara sekondiri na Regan Memorial Secondary School,o turu ugo na egwuregwu eji ama nwa ada mara oke nma na obodo anyi naijiria na aro puku abuo na abuo mgbe o na eche na nnabata ya na mahadum
Na agbayehi na oturu ugo ma kpuru okpu ola edo nke nwa ada mara oke nma na uwa ndum o rughi umu ada nke iri na egwuregwu ahu
Nwa ada Chinenye mere ofuma na mba afrika gbasara ihe egwureugu nwa ada mara oke nma

Chinenye guru akwukwo na mahadum nke legos steeti ebe o guru ihe gbasara agumagu ego ma jekwa akwukwo na oke mahadum di na Greenwich nke ndi bekee na akpo 'university of Greenwich London' na aro puku abuo na asato
O laghachitere ala nna ya bu naijiria ebe oruru oru na Exxon Mobil
Chinenye nuru di mkpa nwoke onye oji ego achu ego aha ya bu Mazi Kunle Akinlade
Chukwu jiri umu abuo cho ya nma
Chinenye Fidelis (amụrụ 28 Ọktoba 1993) bụ onye n'eme egwuregwu ibu ibu na Naịjirịa
Ọ na-anọchite anya Naịjirịa ma mba na mba niile
Osola n'asọmpi egwuregwu mba Naijiria, asọmpi ibu arọ nke Africa na asọmpi ibu arọ ụwa
Fidelis n'afọ 2008 nọchitere Naijiria n'asọmpị ụmụ nwoke nke iri na itoolu na umu6 nwanyị nke asatọ n'Africa ebe ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke mbụ na mmemme kg iri anọ na asatọ
N'afọ 2011, ọ sọrọ asọmpi n'asọmpi ibụ arọ nke ụwa ebe ọ nọ n'ọkwa nke iri na atọ na mmemme kg iri ise na atọ
Ọ sonyeere asọmpi n'asọmpi ibu arọ nke Afrịka nke afọ 2012 ebe o debere ndekọ akụkọ nturugo ọhụrụ n'Africa wee nweta ihe nrite ọla edo na mmemme + kgiri ise na atọ
N'ememme egwuregwu mba nke iri na asaa na Port Harcourt, Naijiria, ọ nwetara ndekọ mba na mmemme ịnwụnarị kilogram iri ise na atọ
Fidelis buliri mkpokọta kgiri asatọ na ise iji merie ndekọ ochie nke kg iri asatọ na abụọ na ụka ise nke Patience Lawal setịpụrụ na mbipụta 2006 nke egwuregwu
Fidelis debere ndekọ ọhụrụ maka Africa na mmemme Clean na Jerk
O buliri ihe dị kilogram otu narị na iri abụọ na-akụri ndekọ kg otu nari iri na abụọ ochie nke bụkwa nke Patience Lawal
Ọ nọchitere Naijiria na asọmpi ibu arọ nke Afrịka nke 2016 emere na Yaoundé ogo nke mbụ na Clean and Jerk na Snatch event

N'oge asọmpi Afrịka - Continental Olympic Qualification Event na Nairobi, Kenya, Fidelis weliri ndekọ kọntinent anọ n'ụbọchị mbụ site na ibuli kg iri asatọ na asaa wee mechie na ngụkọta nke kg nari abụọ na abụọ bụ ma ogo ndị okenye na nke ndị n'esote africa
Chinenye Fidelis nwetara onyinye mmụta site na National Sports Commission (NSC)
Àtụ Infobox government agencyUlo akwukwo nke China nke Sayensị mmụta Ala ( CAGS ; Asụsụ China ) bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-etinye aka na nyocha Sayensị ụwa na Mba nke China
E hiwere ụlọ akwụkwọ mmuta a n'afọ 1956 wee hazigharịa ya n'afọ 1999
Na Nchịkwa ọ nọ n'okpuru PRC Ụlọ ozi n'ahụ maka Ala na ihe onwunwe

Ụlọ akwụkwọ mmuta ahụ na-eme nyocha sayensị n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke mmụta ala na geophysics, dị ka usoro nyocha na nyocha nke nkwụnye mineral, hydrogeology, geology engineering, geology gburugburu ebe obibi, karst geology, geophysics na geochemistry
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ nyocha na paleontology, ma sonye n'ịchọpụta dinosaurs ọhụrụ, gụnyere Zhenyuanlong, Xixiasaurus, na ụdị Tyrannosaur Qianzhousaurus ọhụrụ
yana anụmanụ ndị ọzọ dịka Castorocauda na Rugosodon
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị a na -esonye na ụlọ akwụkwọ sayensị China nke mmụta ala

CFA sonyeere njikọ mba nke Eshia n'afọ 1974 nke FIFA na-esote ya ọzọ n'afọ 1979

Kemgbe ọ laghachiri na FIFA, CFA na-ekwu na ọ bụ ndị na ọ bụghị otu nke gọọmentị na otu anaghị akpa ego mana n'ezie ọ bụ otu ụlọ ọrụ nke njikwa etiti nke bọọlụ bụ ngalaba nchịkwa gburugburu egwuregwu bọọlụ nke steeti
Ka ọ na-eru afọ 2015, e nwere mkpokọta ndị otu mkpakọrịta iri anọ na anọ so na CFA

Mgbe emezigharịrị ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ China n'afọ 1955, ọ ga anọ n'okpuru nchịkwa izugbe egwuregwu wee were n'ụgwọ onye isi ala onye jere ozi n'otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba China PR dịka onye njikwa ma ọ bụ onye egwuregwu

Nke a ga-agbanwe n'afọ 1989 mgbe mkpakọrịta ahụ chọrọ ka ha nwekwuo aka ọrụ wee malite ikewapụ onwe ya dịka otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na ọgbakọ anaghị akpa ego wee were n'ụgwọ onye osote onye isi ala nke na-abụkarị onye isi ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị --Nchịkwa Etiti egwuregwu bọọlụ

Àtụ Infobox Artwork
Nwa nwanyị China (nke a na -akpọkarị The Green Lady ) bụ ihe osise Vladimir Tretchikoff mere n'afọ otu puku narị iteghete na iri ise na abụọ (1952)
Mbipụta arụpụtara nke ukwuu n'ime afọ ndị sochirinụ so na ahịa kacha ere na narị afọ nke iri abụọ

Ihe osise a bụ nke nwa agbọghọ China n'ihi ọ bụ a mara ya nke ọma maka ụcha akpụkpọ anụ ahụ na-adịghị ahụkebe ma bụrụ nke pụrụ iche na nke ibe bụ nke ejiri see ihu ya bụ ụcha na achaba n'anya bụ ucha agbugba akwụkwọ ndụ, nke nyere eserese ahụ aha ya na-ewu ewu ma bụrụ eserese ama ama nke bụ The Green Lady

Ọ bụ ezie na Tretchikoff kwusiri ike na ebibiela ụdị mbụ nke eserese a na Cape Town na ọ sere ụdị nke ọhụrụ n'oge njem ya n'afọ otu puku narị iteghete na iri ise na atọ (1953 )na USA, ndị nchọpụta ahụghị ihe akaebe ma ọ bụ nke gosiri na ọ bụ eziokwu ọ bụla na nkwupụta a

E rere ihe mbụ esere ọnụ ego pụtara puku Yuro iteghete na iri asatọ na abụọ na iri ise(£ 982,050) na ụlọ nrepu ma ọ bụ ụlọ mkpọwa ahịa achọ irepu ọsọ bụ Bonhams na London ka ọnwa Maachị gbara mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ n'afọ Puku abụọ na iri atọ (2013)
Ọ bụ onye ọchụnta ego ndị Britain bụ Laurence Graff zụrụ ya
Kemgbe ọnwa iri na otu n'afọ bụ Nọvemba gbara ụbọchị iri atọ n'otu afọ ahụ, e gosila ya n'ihu ọha na Esteti Delaire Graff dị nso na Stellenbosch, South Africa
A na -ejikwa foto ahụ dị ka mkpuchi ihu maka albọm Slap nke afọ ndị gbakwunyere afọ1990
site na otu egwu Britain Chumbawamba
Monika Sing-Lee dị ihe dị ka afọ iri abụọ n'oge ahụ, ma nwee ụfọdụ agbụrụ ndị Europe

ejikwa aha ebe ọ lụrụ di ya bụ aha ọlụlú ya bụ, Pon-Su-San makwaara ya, Tretchikoff zutere ya, na aro nke onye na-agba egwu Russia Masha Arsenyeva, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ulo ọrụ akwa nwanne nna ya nwoke na Cape Town, South Africa
Pon-Su-San nwụrụ na Johannesburg mgbe ọnwa isii bụ Jun gbara mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na anọ (June 14, 2017)

Waini China bụ ihe nkiri nke metụtara mmekọahụ akpọrọ romans nke akụkọ ihe mere eme ma ọ bụ ejiji nke puku afọ abụọ na iri na isii 2016 nke Song Juan, bụ oji nka duziri , ma nduzi a o dụzịrị ihe nkiri a Mgbakwunyere ndị nwere nka bụ Huang Yi, Van Fan, Winston Chao, Hou Tianlai, Shi Zhaoqi, ma tinyekwara Terence Yin
E wepụtara ya bụ ihe nkiri na China ka ọnwa Jenụwarị gbara mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na ise , n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na isii
waịnị China metụtara ihe nkiri nke oji nka bụ song dụzịrịakụkọ mebere anya na mmekọahụ bekee kpọrọ 'romance'nke pụtara ìhè n' afọ puku abụọ na iri isii

Ọtụtụ ndị nwere nka sonyekwara na ndúzi butere ọganihu ihe omume aNdi gunyere Winston Chao,Hou Tianlai,Shi Zhaoqi,Huang Yi,Van Fan Na Terence YinNdi a gbara ọbara ma mee ka ihe omume a pụta ìhè site na nnọchiteanya dika omee na ihe nkiri a nke ha mere nke ọmaEsere ihe nkiri na Yunhan, Guizhou, Chongqing Na afọ 2015
Mwepụta ihe nkiri a pụtara ìhè na abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ puku abụọ na iri iseE nwetere ọtụtụ ego na ihe nkiri a mgbe emere na mbụ nke otu Yem na uma atọ na iri abụo na asaa
Esere onyonyo ihe nkiri a na Yunnan, Guizhou, na Chongqing
Ka ọnwa Disemba gbara mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na ise n'afọ puku abụọ na iri isii (2015)ulọ ọrụ Kweichow Moutai Co, Ltd
kwupụtara na e hiwere iwepụta ihe nkiri ahụ ka ọnwa Jenụwarị gbara mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na ise n'afọ puku abụọ na iri ise 2016
E wepụtara ihe nkiri ahụ ka ọnwa Jenụwarị gbara mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na ise n'afọ, puku abụọ na iri na isii, 2016, na China
Ego mmeghe ụbọchị ihe nkiri ahụ bụ (￥ 1327 )otu nde Yem na ụmụ narị atọ na iri abụọ, na ngwụsị izu, mkpokọta ego ihe nkiri ahụ ruru nde Yem atọ na ụmụ iri asatọ na ise (385)

Akpọrọ ya otu Njikọ bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị China sitere n'afọ 2011 ruo afọ 2014
Njikọ otu a ahụ malitere n'afọ otu puku narị iteghete na iri iteghete na asaa (1997) dị ka Njikọ Premia nke ligi bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị China
Ebu ụzọ nweta aha Super League nke ụmụ nwanyị n'afọ Puku abụọ na anọ (2004)

N'ime oge afọ puku abụọ na irir na otu wee ruo Puku abụọ na iri na anọ (2011- 2014), a kpọgharịrị otu egwuregwu ahụ otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ligi ụmụ nwanyị nke otu mba[women National Football League] wee kwụsịusoro nkwalite na ma enwekwara ọdịda n'ihi enweghị na ndị otu egwu bọọlụ enweghị ọnatarachi ma ọ bụ nkwudosi ike ịgba bọọlụ
N'afo puku abụọ na iri ise (2015), ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ China maliteghachiri otu egwuregwu, ọzọ dị ka Super League nke ụmụ nwanyị yana ya na ngalaba nke abụọ nwere mmekọ, CWFL
O nwetakwara onye nkwado aha ya, LeTV Holdings Co Ltd
Njikọ ahụ bịanyere aka na ụlọ ọrụ uwe nke Spanish bụ Kelme na nkwekọrịta afọ ise iji nye uwe

Itinye ego na klọb ụmụ nwanyị gbalitere ngwa ngwa mgbe oge 2016 gachara ya na ndị nkwado ụlọ ọrụ na ndị na-etinye ego, dị ka Quanjian Group na Guotai Junan Securities, site n'ikwalite ụgwọ ndị òtù egwuregwu ahu na iwere ndị òtù egwuregwu ma ihe ana arụ site na klọb ndị kacha elu na Europe

Nke a gụnyere oji nka bọọlụ Brazil bụ Cristiane si Paris Saint-Germain gaa Changchun Zhuoyue, n'afọ puku abụọ na iri isii(2016) Toppserien onye ritere akpokpo ukwu ọlaedo akpọrọ golden boot n'olu bekee bụ Isabell Herlovsen si LSK Kvinner FK gaa Jiangsu Suning FC, na nwafọ Nigeria bụ okibe ma bụrụ onye e ji Aba bụ Asisat Oshoala si Arsenal LFC na nwafọ Cameroon bụ isi ahụrụ kwa okpu bụ Gaelle Enganamouit si otú egwu bọọlụ Rosengård gaa otu egwu bọọlụ bụ Dalian Quanjian

Àtụ Chinese
Okpukpe ọdinala ndị China, nke a makwaara dị ka okpukpe ndị China ama ama, bụ okwu n'ozuzu na -ekpuchi ọtụtụ omume ọdịnala nke Han Chinese, gụnyere ndị China bi na mba ọzọ

Vivienne Wee kọwara ya dị ka 'nnukwu efere efu, nke nwere ike jupụta na ọdịnaya nke okpukpe emebere eme dịka Buddha, Taoism, Confucianism, okpukpe mmekọrịta ndị China' Nke a gụnyere nsọpụrụ nke (mmụọ) na ndị nna nna, ịchụpụ mmụọ ndị mmụọ ọjọọ, na nkwenye na usoro okike nke okike, itule na mbara ụwa na eziokwu nke mmadụ na ndị ọchịchị ha, yana mmụọ na chi nwere ike imetụta
Ofufe dịịrị chi na ndị na -adịghị anwụ anwụ, ndị nwere ike ịbụ chi nke ebe ma ọ bụ ihe okike, nke akparamagwa mmadụ, ma ọ bụ ndị malitere nhiwe agbụrụ ezinụlọ
A na -achịkọta akụkọ banyere chi ndị a n'ime nchịkọtaakụkọ ifo ndị China
Site na usoro eze nke Song (960-1279), agwakọtara omume ndị a na ozizi Buddha na nkuzi Taoist ka ha wee bụrụ usoro okpukpe a ma ama nke nọrọla n'ọtụtụ ụzọ ruo taa

Ọchịchị nke ugbu a nke mainland China na Taiwan, dị ka usoro ndị eze, na -anabata òtù okpukpe a ma ama ma ọ bụrụ na ha na -akwalite nkwụsi ike ọha mana na -egbochi ma ọ bụ na -akpagbu ndị ha na -atụ egwu na ha ga eleda ya a
Ka ọdịda alaeze ukwu ahụ gachara na 1911, gọọmentị na ndị nwere agba nke ọgbara ọhụrụ katọrọ 'nkwenkwe ụgha' ma megide ma ọ bụ ikpochapụ okpukpe ọdịnala iji kwalite ụkpụrụ ọgbara ọhụrụ
Ka ọ na -erule ngwụsị narị afọ nke 20, àgwà ndị a malitere ịgbanwe ma na Taiwan ma na China
Ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta ugbu a na -ele okpukpe ọdịnala anya n'ụzọ dị mma
N'oge ndị na -adịbeghị anya, okpukpe ọdịnala na -enwe mmaliteghachi na China na Taiwan
Ụdị ụfọdụ enwetala nghọta ma ọ bụ nnabata dị ka ichekwa ọdịnala ọdịnala, dịka Mazuism na nkuzi Sanyi na Fujian, ofufe Huangdi na ụdị ofufe obodo ndị ọzọ, dịka ọmụmaatụ Longwang, Pangu ma ọ bụ Caishen
Okpukpe ndị China nwere ụzọ dị iche iche, ụdị mpaghara, nzụlite na ọdịnala nkà ihe ọmụma

N'agbanyeghị 'ọ́dịdị̀ iche a, enwere otu isi nke enwere ike ichikota dị ka echiche mmụta okpukpe anọ, kosmolojikal, na omume Tian ( Chinese ), pinyin tian,lit (eluigwe),nnwere onwe nke omume pụtara; qi ( Chinese; Pinyin qi ), ume ma ọ bụ ike nke na -eme ka ụwa dị; jingzu ( Chinese Pinyin ), nsọpụrụ nke ndị nna ochie; na bao ying ( Chinese ), ime omume dị mma; yana echiche ọdịnala abụọ nke akara aka na ihe ọ pụtara ming yun ( Chinese ), ọdịnihu onwe onye ma ọ bụ mmụba; na yuan fen ( Chinese yuánfèn), “ adaba ”, ohere ọma na ihe ọjọọ na mmekọrịta nwere ike

Yin na yang ( Chinese ) bụ nkewa na -akọwa usoro nke eluigwe na ala, na -enwe nguzozi site na mmekọrịta nke ụkpụrụ nke “mgbatị” ( Chinese ) na ụkpụrụ 'ịlaghachi' ( Chinese ),gui(mmụọ) na yang ('act') ka ajọ karịa yin ('nnabata') n'okpukpe nkịtị
Ling ( Chinese ), “ numen==ma ọ bụ “ dị nsọ ”, bụ “uzo nke Steeti abụọ ahụ na usoro okike adịghị mma
Asụsụ Chinese n'akụkọ ihe mere eme enwebeghị ncheechiche ma ọ bụ aha karịrị akarị maka 'okpukperechi'
N'asụsụ bekee, a na -eji okwu bụ 'okpukpe a ma ama' ma ọ bụ 'okpukpe ndị mmadụ' pụtara ndụ okpukpe obodo
N'akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ China na ojiji a na -ejikarị 'okpukpe ndị mmadụ' ( Chinese ) na -ezo aka n'òtù okpukpe omenala ndị a haziri ahazi

ihe ọmụmụ nke oge ochie nke òtù nzuzo ọdịnala na imepụta ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị nke nyere okpukperechi okpukpe a iwu ewepụtala atụmatụ iji mezie aha na imekọ ihe ọnụ nke ọma banyere ndị otu okpukperechi ma nyere aka na nyocha na nchịkwa echiche

Okwu ndị atụpụtara gụnyere 'okpukpere chi ala China' ma ọ bụ 'okpukpere eke ụmụ amaala China' ( Chinese ), 'okpukpe agbụrụ ndị China' ( Chinese ), ma ọ bụ naanị 'okpukpe ndị China' ( Chinese ) a na -ahụta ka atụnyere iji okwu a bụ ' Hinduism ' maka okpukpe ndị India,

Na Malaysia, ka ọkà mmụta Tan Chee-Beng na-akọ, ndị China enweghị okwu a kapịrị ọnụ maka okpukpe ọdịnala ha, nke a abụghị ihe ituanya n'ihi na 'a na-ekesa okpukperechi n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke omenala ndị China'
Ha na ahụta okpukpe ha dị ka bai fo ma ọ bụ bai shen, nke kpaliri Allan AJ Elliott iji tụọ okwu ahụ bụ 'shenism' ( Chinese )

Tan agbanyeghị, nkọwa ndị na -abụghị ụzọ ndị China si ahuokpukpe ha, nke n'ọnọdụ ọ bụla gụnyere ofufe ndị nna ochie, ọ bụghị naanị shen, ma na -atụ aro na ọ bụ ihe ezi uche dị na ya iji naanị 'Okpukpe China'
'Shenxianism' ( Chinese , n'ụzọ nkịtị, 'okpukpe chi dị iche iche na ndị na -adịghị anwụ anwụ '), bụ okwu nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nke Elliott, 'Shenism'

Na ngwụcha ichi eze Qing, ndị ọkà mmụta usoro ọmụmụ Yao Wendong na Chen Jialin jiri okwu shenjiao na ahutaghi ya ka Shinto dị ka usoro okpukpe doro anya, kama ha nwere na nkwenye nke shin mpaghara na Japan
Okwu ndị ọzọ bụ 'òtù nzuzo ndị mmadụ' ( Chinese ), 'okpukpe na Chinese ), 'okpukperechi (ma ọ bụ ndụ)' ( Chinese ), 'okpukpe obodo' ( Chinese ), na “okpukpe gbasasịrị” ( Chinese )
'Nkwenkwe ndị mmadụ' ( Chinese ), bụ okwu a na -adịghị ahụkarị nke ndị ọkà mmụta na Taiwan chịrị site n'aka ndị Japan n'oge ọrụ Japan (1895 - 1945)
Ejiri ya n'etiti 1990s na mmalite narị afọ nke 21 n'etiti ndị ọkà mmụta ala China
'Shendao' ( Chinese ) bụ okwu ejirila na Yijing na ahụta usoro nhazi nke okike
n'ime oge mgbasa nke Buddha na oge Han (206 TOA - 220 OA), ejiri ya mata ọdịiche okpukperechi ụmụ amaala oge ochie na okpukpe mbubata
Ge Hong jiri ya na Baopuzi ya dị ka myiri Taoism
E mechara nabata okwu ahụ na Japan na narị afọ nke isii dị ka Shindo, emesịa Shinto, nke nwere otu ebumnuche nke ịmata okpukpe ụmụ amaala Japan
Na narị afọ nke iri na anọ ji, Eze Ukwu Hongwu (Taizu nke usoro ndị eze Ming, 1328 - 1398) jiri okwu ahụ bụ 'Shendao' mee ka amata òtù nzuzo nke ụmụ amaala, nke o wusiri ike ma hazie

'nkwenye ndị China', ọ bụghị n'echiche nke ' nna', nke ahụ bụ sistemụ ngwa ụwa niile, nke ahụ bụ Tian n'echiche ndị China, bụ nsụgharị nke Jan Jakob Maria de Groot nke ana agụta ka usoro ihe atụ nke dị n'azụ okpukperechi ndị China
omenala
De Groot na -akpọ Mahadum China 'echiche ihe atụ oge ochie nke na -arụ ọrụ dị ka ntọala nke echiche ndị China oge gboo
Na Universism, akụkụ atọ nke eluigwe na ụwa agbakwunyere - ghọtara na nkenke, 'eluigwe, ụwa na mmadụ', ma ghọta ya n'ụzọ iwu, ' Taiji (mmalite dị ukwuu, nke kachasị elu), yin na yang'- ka etinyere '
Na 1931 Hu Shih rụrụ ụka na 'Okpukpe abụọ dị ukwuu arụwo ọrụ dị oke mkpa na akụkọ ntolite China niile

Otu bụ Buddha nke batara na China ma eleghị anya tupu oge Ndị Kraịst mana nke malitere inwe mmetụta na mba niile naanị mgbe narị afọ nke atọ AD Okpukpe ọzọ dị ukwuu enweghị aha nkịtị, mana m na-atụ aro ịkpọ ya Siniticism

Ọ bụ okpukpe ọdịnala oge ochie nke ndị Han Chinese ọ malitere na mgbe gara aga, ihe karịrị afọ Puku , ma gụnye usoro mmepe ya niile dị ka Moism, Confucianism (dị ka okpukpe steeti), na ọkwa niile dị iche iche
okpukpe Taoist
Ndị ọkà mmụta China nke oge a achọpụtala ihe ha chọpụtara na ọ bụ ihe dị mkpa n'okpukpe China (ma ọ bụ ụmụ amaala)
Dị ka Chen Xiaoyi si kwuo ( Chinese ) okpukperechi ụmụ amaala obodo bụ isi ihe dị mkpa maka 'ihe ọmụmụ okpukperechi okpukpe' ( Chinese ), nke ahụ bụ nguzozi nke ike na obodo enyere
Prọfesọ Han Bingfang ( Chinese 韓秉芳) kpọrọ aha agbagọ ( Chinese Aha agbagọ bụ 'ọrụ nkwenkwe ụgha' ( Chinese ) ma ọ bụ 'nkwenkwe ụgha feudal' ( Chinese ), nke etinyere n'ike n'ike n'okpukpe ụmụ amaala
Ndị ozi ala ọzọ nke Ndị Kraịst jikwa akara mgbasa ozi 'nkwenkwe ụgha feudal' mebie onye asọmpi okpukpe ha
Han na -akpọ maka nnabata nke okpukpe China oge ochie maka ihe ọ bụ n'ezie, 'isi na mkpụrụ obi nke ọdịbendị a ma ama' ( pinyin )
Dị ka Chen Jinguo ( Chinese ), okpukpe ndị China oge ochie bụ isi ihe gbasara mmata ọdịbendị na okpukperechi nke Chinese )
Ọ tụpụtala nkọwa nkọwa nke okpukpe ụmụ amaala China na 'agwa atọ enweghị ikewapụta' ( Chinese ), o doro anya na ọ sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nye nkeechiche Tang Junyi
I buOmume okpukpe ndị China oge ochie dị iche iche, na -adịgasị iche site na mpaghara ruo na ógbè na ọbụna site n'otu obodo ruo n'ọzọ, n'ihi na omume okpukpe na -ejikọ na obodo, njikọ na gburugburu
N'ọnọdụ ọ bụla, ụlọ ọrụ na omume omume na -ewere ụdị nke ahaziri nke ọma
Ụlọ nsọ na chi dị n'ime ha na -enweta agwa ihe atụ ma na -arụ ọrụ dị iche iche metụtara ndụ kwa ụbọchị nke obodo
Okpukpe mpaghara na -echekwa akụkụ nke nkwenkwe okike dịka totemism, animism, na shamanism
Okpukpe ndị China oge ochie gbasara akụkụ niile nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

Ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta, na -agbaso nduzi nke onye na -ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze CK Yang, na -ahụ okpukpe ndị China oge ochie etinyere n'ime ezinụlọ na ndụ obodo, kama igosipụta ya na nhazi nzukọ dị iche dịka 'ụka', dịka na West
Chi ma ọ bụ mkpakọrịta ụlọ nsọ na mkpakọrịta agbụrụ, mkpakọrịta ndị njem ala nsọ na ikpe ekpere, emume na ngosipụta nke omume ọma, bụ ụdị nhazi ọgbakọ okpukperechi China na mpaghara
Ememe mmalite ma ọ bụ isonye na nzukọ ọgbakọ nke dịpụrụ iche site na njirimara onye obodo bụ iwu iji tinye aka na mmemme okpukpe
N'adịghị ka okpukpe ụlọ ọrụ, okpukpere chi ndị China anaghị achọ 'ntụgharị' maka isonye
Mgbanaka njikọta ndị China bụ kpochapụ nke anwansi efu
Na mmetụta ọdịnala, mgbanaka igwe siri ike na -egosi njikọ na nkopu njikọ, gafere onwe ha, wee mepụta ụdọ na usoro na nhazi ndị ọzọ dị mgbagwoju anya
E nwedịrị ike inye ndị na -ege ntị mgbaaka ahụ maka nyocha
Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na -akpọ onye otu na -ege ntị ka ọ bịa n'elu ihe nkiri ka ya na onye dibịa afa mee ihe dị ka akụkụ nke usoro 'mee ka m si mee'
Onye dibịa anwansị nke China Ching Ling Foo (1854 - 1922) bụ otu n'ime ndị bidoro omume mgbanaka njikọ n'ụdị a maara taa
Ihe osise nke Giacomo Mantegazza mere na 1876 gosiri otu nwa agbọghọ na -agba akwụna nke weliri mgbaaka n'elu isi ya
Nchọpụta nkọwa gbasara mgbaaka sitere na Turkey, Egypt na Middle East na ogologo oge gara aga dị ka narị afọ nke mbụ
Onye dibịa anwansi France Philippe (Jacques Andre Noel Talon) bụ otu n'ime ndị dibịa anwansị mbụ e dere iji mgbaaka ahụ
N'ime ọkara nke abụọ nke ihe nkiri ya, o nyere uwe mwụda na okpu kọnikal
Ọ weere mgbanaka igwe siri nke inch asatọ (200 mm) ma mee ka ndị na -ege ntị nyochaa ha
O kwuru na ya mụtara ha n'aka otu ndị oji ka nke China na Britain
Mgbe eweghachiri mgbaaka ndị ahụ, Philippe gara n'ihu na -ejikọ ma ewepu ha
Site n'ebe ahụ, ọ jikọtara okirikiri na -egbu maramara n'ime atụmatụ dị mgbagwoju anya
Idabere n' okwuRobert-Houdin, o kwuru na njedebe, Philippe fụrụ ha,ha wee daa iche iche n'ala
Robert-Houdin mekwara ụdị aghụghọ ahụ

Chinenye 'Chiney' Ogwumike bụ onye (amụrụ na Machị 21, 1992) bụ onye Naijiria-Amerịka ọkachamara na-agba bọọlụ maka Los Angeles Sparks nke Women's National Basketball Association (WNBA)
Ka ọ na-erule 2020, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị ojii mbụ na-akwado ihe ngosi redio mba maka ESPN, bụrụkwa onye egwuregwu WNBA mbụ mere ya
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-akọwa ihe mbụ na ndị na-eto eto a kpọrọ aha onye nyocha NBA maka netwọk na-ekpuchi NBA, WNBA, na egwuregwu dịgasị iche iche, mgbe ọ na-egwu na WNBA n'otu oge
Chiney bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Stanford, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na mmekọrịta mba ụwa
Ọ gbara bọọlụ n'egwuregwu Final Fours atọ ma mechie dị ka onye ndú nnọkọ na ịgba goolu na rebounding ka ọ na-erule Jenụwarị mkpụrụ ụbọchị atọ, 2014
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2016, a họpụtara Ogwumike ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke WNBA Players Association, ma bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta nkwado na Adidas
Na Mee 2018, Ogwumike bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọtụtụ afọ na ESPN iji bụrụ onye nyocha basketball oge niile
A mụrụ ya na Tomball, Texas, Ogwumike gara Cypress Fairbanks High School na Cypress dị nso, Texas, merie 5A State Championship na oge nke abụọ na oge ndị okenye
A kpọrọ Ogwumike WBCA na McDonald's All-American
O sonyere na 2010 WBCA High School All-America Game, ebe o nwetara akara iri abụọ na anọ , ma nweta nsọpụrụ MVP maka ndị otu White
Ogwumike họọrọ Stanford karịa Connecticut na Notre Dame, sonyeere nwanne ya nwanyị Nneka Ogwumike
Ogwumike kwụsịrị ọrụ Stanford ya na 2014 dị ka onye ndu na-agba ọsọ oge niile maka nwoke na nwanyị ọ bụla na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Pac-12, ndekọ nke dara na 2016 na Kelsey Plum nke Washington
A kpọrọ Ogwumike aha na otu USA Basketball U18

Ndị otu USA bụ otu n'ime ndị otu asatọ si North, South na Central America, tinyere Caribbean, kpọrọ ka ha sonye na 2010 FIBA Americas U18 Championship For Women, nke emere na US Olympic Training Center, na Colorado Springs, Colorado
Jennifer Rizzotti zụrụ ndị otu ahụ
Ogwumike malitere egwuregwu ise niile ma bụrụ onye na-ebute akara na 132 n'egwuregwu ọ bụla
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ebute ụzọ na 74 rebounds kwa egwuregwu
Ndị otu USA meriri egwuregwu ise niile wee nweta ihe nrite ọla edo
Usoro a na-ahụkarị bụ maka ndị egwuregwu nọ na otu U18 ịkwaga na otu U19
Otú ọ dị
Ogwumike gbara nke ọma dị ka U18 nke na a kwalitere ya na otu World University Games maka 2011 World University Games nke emere na Shenzhen, China
Chiney abụghị naanị Ogwumike nọ n'òtù ahụ, dịka nwanne ya nwanyị, Nneka Ogwumike, nọkwa n'òtle ahụ
Ha abụọ malitere egwuregwu ọ bụla, na Chiney na-enweta ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ akara iri n'egwuregwu ọ bụla
Ọ gbara iri abụọ na ise n'ime iri atọ na asaa ịgba égbè maka otu na-eduga 676% ịgba égbè
O nyeere USA aka imeri egwuregwu isii niile ma nweta ihe nrite ọla edo
N'afọ 2014 na Europe, Ogwumike gbara bọọlụ na Ịtali maka Famila Schio
N'oge oge WNBA nke afọ 2016, Ogwumike bịanyere aka na Henan Phoenix nke WCBA maka oge China nke afọ 2016 na afọ 17

N'egwuregwu nke ise ya na ndị otu ahụ, Ogwumike nwetara akara iri ise na isii (na 23 nke 24 field goal shooting) yana 12 rebounds Ọ ga-emecha merie MVP nke mbụ, na-enweta akara 336 kwa egwuregwu na 124 rebounds kwa egwuregwu, tupu mmerụ ahụ achilles ya
Ogwumike bụ onye mbụ e dere n'ozuzu ya na 2014 WNBA draft site na Connecticut Sun
N'oge ọhụrụ ya, Ogwumike ghọrọ onye mbido, na-enweta akara 155 dị elu n'egwuregwu ọ bụla na 75 rebounds kwa egwuregwu
A kpọrọ ya WNBA All-Star ya na nwanne ya nwanyị Nneka Ogwumike, na-aghọ ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ mbụ a họpụtara n'egwuregwu WNBA All
Ogwumike ga-emeri WNBA Rookie of the Year Award na 2014
Ogwumike nọdụrụ n'oge niile nke afọ 2015 ka ọ na-agbake site na micro-fracture na ikpere aka nri ya nke ọ nwere ọtụtụ ọnwa tupu oge ahụ
Ogwumike laghachiri n'ụzọ dị mma maka oge 2016, na-egwu egwuregwu iri atọ na atọ na iri na asatọ na-amalite mgbe ọ na-enweta akara 126 kwa egwuregwu
O nwetara akara 26 kachasị elu na 15 rebounds na mmeri egwuregwu oge niile megide Dallas Wings
N'ọnwa Disemba 2016, a mara ọkwa na a wara Ogwumike ahụ mgbe ọ merụrụ ahụ mgbe ọ na-egwuri egwu na mba ofesi na China n'oge WNBA offseason
E wepụrụ ya na oge mgbake nke ọnwa isii na itoolu, nke mere ka ọ hapụ oge WNBA nke afọ 2017
N'ọnwa Eprel 2017, Sun kwụsịtụrụ Ogwumike maka oge niile nke afọ 2017 iji wepụta ebe a na-edepụta aha n'ihi mmerụ ahụ ya na n'otu ọnwa ahụ, ọ bịanyekwara aka na nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta
Na ụbọchị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Mee , 2018, Ogwumike laghachiri na Sun na oge izizi ha, na-egwu egwuregwu WNBA mbụ ya n'ime afọ abụọ
N'ime nkeji iri na asaa nke egwuregwu, o nwetara akara itoolu na mmalite na mmeri 101 na 65 na Las Vegas Aces
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2018, Ogwumike nwetara akara ọhụrụ dị elu nke akara iri atọ na mmeri 103 na Seattle Storm
Ka e mesịrị na oge 2018, a mara ọkwa na a họpụtara Ogwumike n'ime 2018 WNBA All-Star Game, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nke abụọ ya
Sun mechiri dị ka mkpụrụ nke anọ na league na ndekọ 21 z13, na-enweta bye na egwuregwu nke abụọ
Sun ga-efunahụ Phoenix Mercury na 9686
N'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa April 2019, e rere Ogwumike na Los Angeles Sparks maka nhọrọ nke mbụ nke afọ 2020, na-eweghachi ya na nwanne ya nwanyị Nneka
Sparks mechiri dị ka mkpụrụ nke atọ na ndekọ 22-12, na-enweta bye na agba nke abụọ
N'egwuregwu nke abụọ, Sparks meriri onye na-agbachitere Seattle Storm 92-69
Na ọkara ikpeazụ, ndị otu mbụ ya, Connecticut Sun, wepụrụ Sparks na egwuregwu atọ
Na June 2020, Ogwumike kwupụtara na ọ ga-anọdụ ala na oge WNBA nke 2020 n'ihi nchegbu ahụike nke igwu egwu na bubble n'oge ọrịa COVID-19
Na-enweghị Ogwumike, Sparks mechiri oge 15-7 dị ka mkpụrụ nke atọ na-aga na agba nke abụọ mana Connecticut Sun ga-ewepụ ya na egwuregwu mmeri
Na Febụwarị 2021, Ogwumike bịanyere aka na Sparks maka nkwekọrịta ọtụtụ afọ
Na Mee 2018, Ogwumike bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọtụtụ afọ na ESPN iji bụrụ onye nyocha basketball oge niile
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2020, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị ojii mbụ na-akwado ihe ngosi redio mba maka ESPN, ebe ọ ghọkwara onye egwuregwu WNBA mbụ mere ya
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-akọwa ihe kachasị ọhụrụ a ga-akpọ onye nyocha NBA oge niile maka ESPN, mgbe ọ na-egwu na WNBA n'otu oge
Ogwumike na Mike Golic Jr, jikọrọ aka, dị ka onye na-akwado ihe ngosi redio ESPN Chiney & Golic Jr
Mgbe a haziri ihe nkiri NBA nke ESPN, ọ sonyeere usoro NBA Today kwa ụbọchị dị ka onye nyocha na-agbanwe agbanwe na studio

Chineze Anyaene (a muru n'ụbọchị nke 28 n’ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 1983) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka nkiri ya dị egwu nke afọ 2010, Ijé The Journey
A mụrụ Chineze Anyaene ma zulite ya n'Abuja, nke Naijiria, dị na West Afrịka
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Theater Art na mahadum nke Abuja, dị na Naijiria
N'afọ 2005, ọ kwagara Amerịka ebe o nwetara nzere masta na Directing na New York Film Academy (NYFA)
Chineze Anyaene, onye agụụ i me ihe nkiri na-anụ ọkụ n'obi i ji nkọwapụta dị omimi na-akọ akụkọ na nke tozuru etozu a nabatara na mba ụwa niile
Onye guzobere / onye isi oche nke Xandria Productions, ụlọ ọrụ nke mmepụta ihe nkiri zuru oke nke na-ahụ maka naanị mmepụta, nnweta, azụmaahịa na nkesa ihe nkiri n'ime Afrịka n'ahịa mba ụwa
Xandria Productions nwere ihe nkiri izizi ya bụ 'Ije The Journey' n'afọ 2010 bụ nke Chineze Anyaene mepụtara ma duzie ya,nke Omotola Jalade-Ekeinde na Genevieve Nnaji tinyere nkwado mmepụta ndị Kodak
Ije na-akọ akụkọ banyere ụmụnwaanyị abụọ ndi Naijiria, Chioma na Anya, na otu Chioma si a ga mba Amerịka i nye aka ị zọpụta nwanne ya nwanyị n'ikpe igbu ọchụ

E mere ihe onyonyo ọma a na Naijiria na mba Amerịka dị ka ihe nkiri mbụ e mere nke nwata akwụkwọ New York Film Academy mere; 'Ije The Journey' gara gburugburu na mmemme nkiri dị iche iche n'ụwa, rite ugwu dị icheiche dị elu ma bụrụ ihe nkiri Nigerian box office nke kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ ma nyekwa aka na mgbanwe nke ihe nkiri sịnịma Naijiria
N'afọ 2012, Anyaene mepụtara obere ihe nkiri, 20 Years Later, nke Larry Ulrich duziri na nke Jeff Handy, Chris Oliver na Angel Princess pụtara na ya
N'ihi ego nrụpụta nke Ijé The Journey, n'afọ 2013, ọ ka na-achọ ego iji mee ihe nkiri ọzọ ugbu a
Chineze bu onye kwuru okwu na mmemme nke 14th Edition of African Business Club, Harvard Business School, n’isiokwu bu ‘Entertainment A Nexus of the Movie and Music Industries in Africa
African Business Club bụ emume kasị ukwuu n'ụwa niile nke ụmụ akwụkwọ haziri na-elekwasị anya n'azụmahịa n'Afrịka

Ọ na - akpọkọ karịa ndị mmadụ 900, ndị ọkachamara n'azụmaahịa si gburugburu ụwa ebe ha na - enye ohere maka ịkparịta ụka na mmemorịta maka ndị azụmaahịa na ndị isi obodo, ụlọ ọrụ, ndị na - akwado ha, ụmụ akwụkwọ Harvard MBA na ndị ka ga-abịa, ụmụ akwụkwọ sitere na mmemme ndị ọzọ na ndị nkuzi si gburugburu ụwa
Isiokwu nke agba nke iri na anọ nke Chineze so na ya bụ Africa Incorporated Cultivating an Integrated Market

Chineze Anyaene duuru ndị nnọchi anya ya na Tope Oshin Ogun, Ramsey Nouah, Charles Novia ị nọchite anya ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke Naijiria na World Economic Forum nke e mere n'Abuja n'afọ 2014 dịka ndị ga-atụle gbasara Nollywood na ọdịnịhụ ya
Chineze na-enyekwa ndụmọdụ onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri nye akara nke mejupụtara chanelụ asaa na Sub-Saharan African direct broadcast satellite service

Chineze Anyaene mebere Kọmitii Nhọrọ Oscar nke Naijiria (NOSC) were nata nnabata site na Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences n'afọ 2012 dịka nzukọ Naịjirịa kwadoro i dobe ma nọchite anya ntinye ihe nkiri nke mba ahụ na kaigori International Feature Film (IFF); a kwadoro kọmitii ahụ ọ bụ onye isi oche ya maka ọrụ nchịkwa afọ 5
E meghachiri kọmitii ahụ n'afọ 2019 site na Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences Awards tinyekwa ya ka onye isi oche nke kọmitii mmadụ iri n'abụọ
N'afọ 2019, kọmitii ahụ nyefere ntinye mbu nke Oscars maka Best International Feature Film nke a na-akpọbu Best Foreign language category
Onyinye ndị a ma ama bụ
Award of Excellence na Canada International Film Festival,
The Golden Ace Award at the Las Vegas International Film Festival,
The Silver Palm Award at the Mexico International Film Festival,
The Melvin van Peebles Award at the San Francisco Black Festival, na
The Festival Prize for Best International Student at Swansea Bay Film Festival, awarded by Catherine Zeta-Jones and Michael Sheen
Oladipo Olamide Emmanuel (amụrụ ya na 13 septemba1993), onye amaara ama dika Chinko Ekun, bu onye na-eti egwu na onye na ede egwu Naịjirịa
A mụrụ Chinko Ekun na Ikeja, Legọọsụ Stee
ti, Naịjirịa, n'ime ezinụlọ dị atọ, ebe ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Ikare, Ondo Steeti, Naịjirịa
Chinko Ekun gara Blessing Nọsịrị na Praịmarị Sukulu, Oshodi, Legọọsụ Steeti na Remade Nọsịrị na Praịmarị Sukulu, Igando, Legọọsụ Steeti
Ọ gara Baptist Model High Sukulu, Ijegun, Legọọsụ Steeti maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ogo na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo
Ọ gara obodo nna ya ozi na Legọọsụ Steeti
Mgbe Chinko Ekun dị afọ asaa, ọ malitere inwe mmasị n’egwú
N’afọ mbụ ya na mahadum, o nwere mmasị na azụmahịa na egwu rapụ
Chinko Ekun ji ikike ya bido ọrụ egwu ya n’afọ 2011, ọ na-egosi vidiyo egwu ya na Instagram
N’afọ 2013, o weputara “Ekun” dika egwu izizi ya
N’afọ 2014, Chinko Ekun pụtara na abọm egwu Olamide 'Street OT', n’ime egwu “100 To Million”, “Bang” na “Usian Bolt” Ọ pụtara na 'Olamide Live In Concert'(OLIC) 2014, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ firistaịlụ
Chinko Ekun gụrụ egwu na Bekee, Pidgin na Yoruba, na-elekwasị anya na egwu hipu họpụ
Aha ya 'Chinko Ekun' site n'okwu abụọ 'Chinko' na 'Ekun'
'Chinko', n'ihi na a gwara ya na ọ dị ka onye China n'oge ọ nọ na mahadum na 'Ekun', n'ihi na ọ bụ egwu mbụ ya
N'afọ 2015, Chinko Ekun sonyeere ' YBNL Nation ' nke Olamide
Ọ wepụtara ọkwa izizi ya nke akpọrọ 'Alejo Oran' na 'Emi Na Re' site na YBNL Nation na 25 Febuwarị 2015
Ka otu afọ gachara, ọ hapụrụ aha ndekọ ahụ mgbe nkwekọrịta ya gwụchara, ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya Adekunle Gold na Viktoh
Na 2017, o sonyeere Dek-Niyor Entertainment, ndekọ lebeelụ na Dubai
Na 13 Septemba 2018, ọ wepụtara egwu nke akpọrọ 'Able God' nke gosipụtara Zlatan na Lil Kesh
Egwú ahụ nyere ya ihe nrite Headies mbụ ya dịka 'Best Street Hop Artiste' na The 'Headies' 2019
Egwu a natara nhọpụta nke 'Popular Song of the Year' na 2019 'City People Music Awọdụ'
Ọ meriri 'Street Song of the Year' na 2019 'City People Music Awọdụ
Chinko Ekun alụbeghị nwanyị ma kpughee na ya adịbeghị njikere maka alụmdi na nwunye
Chinonso Arubayi bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na televishon na Naijiria, onye na-eme ihe ngosi televishon nakwa onye na'emepụta ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri My Flatmates, Rumour Has It, nakwa mmepụta ihe nkiri mbụ ya, I Am Nazzy n'akụkụ IK Ogbonna na Jidekene Achufusi
Amatakwara ya maka oge ọ na-akwado ihe nkiri Urban Kitchen Show
A mụrụ Chinonso na Warri, obodo dị na Delta steeti, na ndịda Naịjirịa
Ọ tolitere na Legos, ma bụrụkwa onye Igbo, site na Awka, na steeti Anambra, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Mass communication na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe
Mgbe ọ nọ na mahadum, ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi na ụlọ ọrụ redio campus
N'afọ 2005, Chinonso meriri n'asọmpi Miss Teen Nigeria
Chinonso malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya dịka onye na-egwu egwu ụbọchị na usoro televishon M-Net, The Johnsons na 2014
Ọ malitere ide ma mepụta maka Consolidated Media Associates, ndị nwe obodo Sound, Trybe Tv na Spice Tv na ihe ngosi, On The Couch, Project Swan, You've Got Issues na ndị ọzọ ole na ole
N'afọ 2018, Chinonso debanyere aha na ụlọakwụkwọ na amụ ihe nkiri, na Mahadum Pan Atlantic, ebe ọ gụrụ Business of Film Making maka ndị na-emepụta ihe nkiri

O nwere nnukwu ezumike na 2020, mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na mmepụta ihe nkiri Mary Remmy Njoku, Beyond Pardon Kemgbe ahụ, ọ gosipụtara na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn ama ama, gụnyere, NDANI TV's Rumour Has It, My Flatmates, Crazy Grannies, Lockdown, Loving Amanda, Survivors na ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2018, ọ malitere ịnabata ihe ngosi TV Filmhouse ma mesịa kpughere ya dịka onye na-elekọta ihe ngosi nri ama ama, Urban Kitchen, nke ọ kwadoro oge abụọ

N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022, Chinonso wepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya, I Am Nazzy Kayode Peters duziri ihe nkiri ahụ ma gosipụta ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Naijiria ama ama gụnyere, Jimmy Odukoya, Denrele Edun na IK Ogbonna
Ọrụ ya, dịka onye ndu na usoro mbụ nke Africa Magic TV, Sisi Eko nwetara otuto site n'aka ndị na-akwado ya na ndị nkatọ
Chinonso lụrụ onye na-agụ egwú gospel nke Naijiria bụ Eric Arubayi n'afọ 2014 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2017
Ha nwere nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Jayden
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021, ọ natara nhọpụta maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke afọ na Africa Choice Awards, n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ a họpụtara site na Ghana na South Africa
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2023, ọ natara ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke afọ mgbe ana enye ihe nrite umunwanyi Naijiria
Chinonso Nnamdi Offor (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2000) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ dịka onye ọgbọsọ n'òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ Major League Soccer club CF Montreal
A mụrụ Offor n'abalị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2000 na Jos, Naịjirịa mana o tolitere na Ekwulobia dị na steeti Anambra mgbe ọ gbapụrụ na Jos n'ihi ọgba aghara
N'afọ 2012, ọ malitere ịgba bọọlụ n'òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ Real Sapphire dị na Lagos
N'afọ 2017, Offor kwagara Northern Cyprus wee sonye na Binatlı Yılmaz, òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ na-esoghị na FIFA maọbụ UEFA
N'afọ 2019, Offor natara onyinye ịbanye n'òtù egwuregwu bọọlụ Latvian Daugavpils wee bịanye aka isoro ha gbaa bọọlụ n'afọ ahụ
N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 2019, Offor mere asọmmpi mbụ ya n'òtù ahụ, megide òtù Jelgava maka iko Latvian, wee merie ha 2 - 1
N'egwuregwu ọzọ n'etítì òtù egwu bọọlụ Virslīga megide Jelgava, o nyere ọkpụ goolu mmeghe na nkeji nke abụọ, nke mechara gwụ na 2-2 draw
Offor mechiri oge mbụ ya na Latvia site n'inye ọkpụ goolu isii n'ugboro iri na anọ ọ gbara bọọlụ
N'afọ sochirinụ, Offor gbara goolu mbụ ya n'afọ ahụ na 25 June 2020 na mmeri 6 - 0 Tukums 2000
Offor wee gbaa bọọlụ mbụ ya na 29 June na mmeri 4-2 na Metta
N'ọnwa Julaị 2020, Offor kwagara RFS, kwa a Latvian league
O mere nke mbụ ya wee gbaa goolu mbụ ya maka klọb ahụ na 21 Julaị na mmeri 3 - 0 megide Tukums 2000
Ọ gwụchara oge nke abụọ ya na Latvia na egwuregwu 21 na goolu 10 ọ gbara
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2020, Offor sonyeere klọb bọọlụ Major League Soccer Chicago Fire
O mere nke mbụ ya maka Fire na 17 Eprel 2021 megide New England Revolution, malite na 2-2 draw
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya maka Fire na 7 Julaị na mmeri 3 na 1 megide Orlando City
Chinonso Darlington Onuh (amụrụ ya na abali abụọ n'onwa Mee afọ 1992) bụ onye Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ, bụ onye na-egwuri egwu ugbu a maka Besa Kavajë
nke 8 disemba 2018
Kpọpụta njehie tag was found
Chinonso Ukah (amụrụ na Mee 27, 1996)// (gee ntị) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emetụta ma na-eme ihe nkiri, nke a maara aha ya bụ Nons Minaj ma ọ bụ Ada Jesus
A mụrụ Chinonso Ukah na Abia Steeti, Naịjirịa
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Command Secondary School ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Babcock University ebe ọ nwetara MBA na Public Administration
O sonyere na Next Movie Star, Nigerian TV reality show wee bụrụ onye nke mbụ
Chinonso malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'etiti afọ 2015, na-eme ihe nkiri egwu Nollywood 'Quiet'
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri oge niile n'afọ 2017, mgbe ọ batara na mahadum
O gosipụtala na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood ndị ọzọ gụnyere, Imperfect (2019) Pandora's Box (2020), Our Wife (2019), The Third Wheel (2021), Hustle (2021), n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Nons Minaj nwetara ọkwa na ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ihe ọchị site n'itinye ihe nkiri nne ya na soshal midia
Ụfọdụ n'ime uwe ya gosipụtara ndị ama ama na Naijiria gụnyere KanayoO
Kanayo, Don Jazzy, Peruzzi, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Chinonye Chukwu (/ˈtʃiːnoʊjə ˈtʃuːkuː/; amụrụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Naijiria-Amerịka nke a maara nke ọma maka ihe nkiri Clemency Ọ bụ nwanyị ojii mbụ turugọ US
Dramatic Grand Jury Prize na Sundance
A mụrụ Chukwu na Port Harcourt, Nigeria
Mgbe ọ dị ihe karịrị otu afọ, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Oklahoma, wee kwaga ọzọ na Fairbanks, Alaska mgbe ọ dị afọ isii
Ha gara Naịjirịa ugboro ugboro

N'ịbụ onye na-etolite na Alaska, Chukwu na-abụkari naanị onye na-acha iche na klas ya, ọ gbakwara mbọ ịsonye N'oge ọ bụ nwata, ọ na-eche ịda mbà n'obi ihu, nke obere ìhè ehihie n'oge oyi na Alaska mere ka ọ ka njọ
Iji nagide ya, ọ gụrụ Maya Angelou wee sonye na klọb na-ebuli ihe dị arọ
Chukwu chọrọ ime ihe nkiri mgbe niile

N'oge ọ nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, o bu akwụkwọ akụkọ na ọ ga-ede echiche maka ihe nkiri na vidiyo egwu Ọ na-edekarị akụkọ banyere ụmụ agbọghọ Naijiria-Amerịka na-ejikọghachi na ịhụnanya ma ọ bụ ụmụnne furu efu
Ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Bekee na Mahadum DePauw, ebe ọ sonyeere Zeta Phi Beta
O mechara banye n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri na Mahadum Temple
Chukwu duziri The Dance Lesson na afọ 2010, banyere nwa agbọghọ ọnye ojii nke na-agba mbọ ịghọ onye na-agba egwú n'ime obodo na-abawanye ụba
A jụrụ ihe nkiri ahụ site na mmemme ọ bụla na mmemme nyocha ọ tinyere akwụkwọ
N'afọ 2013 o duziri A Long Walk (2013), ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi banyere nwatakịrị nna ya na-akwa emo n'ihu ọha
Clemency (2019) bụ Chukwu dere ma duzie ya
Mmụọ ya maka ihe nkiri ahụ sitere n'okwu Troy Davis, onye mkpọrọ e gburu na 2011
Ọ kwagara Los Angeles na 2017 iji gbaa ihe nkiri ahụ
Ọ natara onyinye nke US
Dramatic Grand Jury Prize na 2019 Sundance, nwanyị ojii mbụ mere ya
Chukwu dere ma duzie ihe nkiri 2022 Till, ihe nkiri akụkọ ndụ banyere ịchụso ikpe ziri ezi nke Mamie Till-Mobley mgbe e gbusịrị nwa ya nwoke dị afọ 14 Emmett Louis Till na 1955
N'afọ 2019, a kọrọ na Chukwu ga-eduzi A Taste Of Power, ihe nkiri dabere na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke otu aha nke Elaine Brown
Chinonyelum Ohadugha (onye a muru n'ụbọchị nke 24 n’onwa Maachị nke afọ 1986) bu onye Naijiria na-eme egwuregwu ị wụli elu
N’afọ 2006, ọ gbara onye nke anọ na Commonwealth Games
N'afo 2007, o ritere ihe nrite ọla ọcha n'asọmpi site na ịwụli elu nke mita 1421, ndekọ ọhụrụ nye Naijiria
O ruteghi agba nke ikpeazu na 2007 World Championships, mana o nwetara nrita ọla nchara na
Ọ sọrọ asọmpi na 2008 Olympic Games mana ọ ruteghị agba nke ikpeazụ
O mechakwara onye nke ise na na 2005 Summer Universiade

Chinụa Achebe (site n'aha a gụrụ ya Albert Chinụalụmọgụ Achebe; 16 Nọvemba 1930 – 21 Maachị 2013) bụ onye Igbo a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke iri na isii n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1930 n'obodo Ogidi nke dị n'ala Naijiria
Ọ bụ ya dere akwụkwọ a na-akpọ Things Fall Apart
E si n'akwụkwọ ahụ mara aha ya nke ukwuu n'ụwa nile
Chinụa Achebe, onye nke nne na nna ya kpọrọ Albert Chinụalụmọgu Achebe, gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nta nke ndị uka, gakwaa Government College n'Umuahia
Ọ mechara gakwaa mahadum nke Ibadan University of Ibadan, Ȯra Ọyọ (Oyo State) ebe ọ gụrụ asụsụ békè' site n'afọ 1948 ruo afọ 1953
Ka ọ gụchara akwụkwọ nke mahadum, ọ rụtụkwara ọrụ n'ụlọakwụkwọ dị iche iche nakwa n'ụlọọrụ mgbasa ozi
Site na 1958 ruo 1966, Chinụa Achebe bụ onye nhazi na-ahụ maka African Writers Series
Mgbe Achebe dere Things Fall Apart, akwụkwo ahu rere nke ukwuu, mkpụrụ nde iri
A tụgharịkwaala akwụkwụ a n'olu asụsụ iri ise
Chinụa Achebe rụkwara ọrụ onye diplomat n'ọchịchị nke Biafra site na 1967
Mana site na 1967 ruo 1981, ọ kụzikwara na mahadum dị iche iche n'ala Naijiria, ma bụrụkwa onye nhazi maka akwụkwọ edemede nke a na-akpọ Okike
N'afọ 1981, Chinụa Achebe sokwa na ndị bidoro Otu Ndi Odee Nke Naijiria, nke a na-akpọ Association of Nigerian Authors
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ onye isi were ruo 1986
A bịa n'etiti Ndị Nka, yaa bụ ndị na-ede edemede nke Modern African Literature, ihe a na-akpọ Chinụa Achebe bụ Nna
N'afọ 2002 ka e nyere ya Peace Prize nke German Book Trade
A makwa Chinua Achebe dị ka onye na-enweghi onye e ji atụnyere ya maka ịmalite edemede n'asụsụ bekee' n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ n'ala Afrịka
Ọ luru nwanyi; aha nwunye ya bụrụ Christiana Chinwe Okoli

Mmeme Akwụkwọ Chinua Achebe bụ ihe mmeme ide akwụkwọ kwa afọ nke eji akwanyere Chinua Achebe ugwu onye edemede na - akuko edemede ya, nke a na-akpọ Things Fall Apart(1958), Emume a bụ maka icheta ọrụ ya na ihe gbasara ide akwụkwọ
Chinụa Ezenwa-Ọhaeto bụ onye Naijiria na-ede uri na agụmakwụkwọ
A mụrụ Chinua Ezenwa-Ohaeto na 1992 na Awka, Anambra State, ebe nna ya Ezenwa- Ohaeto kụziri na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe
Ọ tolitere n'etiti Germany na Naịjirịa n'ihi ọrụ nna ya
A gụrụ ya aha Chinua Achebe, onye bụ onye nkuzi nna ya
Ka ọ na-etolite, Ezenwa-Ohaeto chere na ọ ga-abụ onye na-emepụta ihe mana ọ gbanwere obi ya mgbe ọ malitere ịgụ uri nna ya
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na masta ya na asụsụ Bekee na akwụkwọ edemede na Mahadum Naịjirịa, Nsukka
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ PhD ugbu a makaEdemede ihe okike na mahadum Nebraska -lincoln
Na 2009 chinua nwetara ihe nrite uri ana/mazariy ya teen dika onye ohuru na Mahadum Nigeria,Nsukka
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na 2014 maka Etisalat Prize for Literature, ụdị akụkọ ifo
N'afọ 2017, o bipụtara akwụkwọ chapbook, The Teenager Who Became My Mother, site na Sevhage Publishers

N'afọ 2018, ọ meriri ihe nrite Castello di Duino Poesia maka uri a na-ebipụtaghị ma bụrụ onye nataraNew Hampshire institute of arts 2018 Ihe nrite ide, yana onye natara akwụkwọ mmụta na ụlọ akwụkwọ MFA
2019, Ọ bụ onye meriri ihe nrite uri sevhage/Angus na onye gbara ọsọ nke abụọ na asọmpi uri Singapore nke ise
Chapbooks
'Chinwe' bụ aha ndị Igbo nke South-Eastern Naijirịa nyere ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị mana ọ na-abụkarị ụmụ agbọghọ
Ọ pụtara 'Chineke nwere' (Chi = Chineke, nwe = nwe) ma bụrụ ụdị dị mkpirikpi nke njedebe ya nwere ike igosi n'ọtụtụ ụzọ dabere na ebumnuche dị n'azụ aha ahụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ
A na-eme ka ọ dị mkpirikpi na 'Chichi' ma ọ bụ naanị 'Chi' mana ihe onwunwe a abụghị naanị ya, aha Igbo niile na-amalite na Chi nwere ike ime ka ọ dị nkenke
Chinwes ama ama
Chinwe Veronica Anunobi bụ nnukwu ọka mmụta e nwere na Naịjiria
Ọ nwere nzere dị iche iche ma nọdụkwa n'isi ọba kachasị na Naịjịrịa
O bidoro agụmakwụkwọ ya n'afọ 1992 nweta nzere MSC, n'afọ 1997 ọ nwere nzere Mastas , n'afọ 2006 ọ nwere nzere Phd
N'agụmakwukwọ ya nịile , ihe ọ na-agụ maka ya gbasara ihe niile metụtara ọba akwụkwọ na nka ọba akwụkwọ
O bidoro ọrụ dịka ọnye nchedo ọba akwụkwọ na Mahadum nkanụzụ dị n'Owere
Ọ bụ ya bidoro ma kwalite ọba akwụkwọ nke ọgbara ọhụuu eji ama saịba egosipụta na Mahadụm nke Nnamdị Azikiwe dị n'Oka
