Chokwe (nke a makwaara dị kà Batshokwe, Ciokwe, Kioko, Kiokwe, Quioca, Quioco, Shioko, Tschiokloe mà ọ bụ Tshokwe) bụ asụsụ Bantu nkè ndị Chokwe nkè Democratic Republic of the Congo, Angola ná Zambia na-asụ
Á ghọtara yá dị kà asụsụ mba nkè Angola, ebe e mere atụmatụ ná ọkara nde mmadụ na-asụ yá nà 1991; ọkara nde ndị ọzọ na-asụrụ yá biri ná Congo ná 1990, ná ìhè dị kà 20,000 ná Zambia ná 2010
Á na-eji yá eme Ihe dị kà asụsụ na-asụ n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Angola
Angola's Instituto de Línguas Nacionais (National Languages Institute) eguzobewo iwu mkpụrụ ókwú màkà Chokwe iji mee kà ọ dịkwuo mfe mà kwalite ojiji yá
A pụkwara ịnụ ụdaume dị kà nasalized mgbe ọ na-ebute ụdaume imi
Á pụkwara ịkpọ ụda /t͡ʃ, d͡ʒ, nd͡ʒ/ dị kà nkwụsị ọnụ [c, ɟ, ɲɟ]
Chokwe nwere ụda atọ dị ka /v́/, /v̀/, na /v̂/
Nzaghachi
-Mwane

N'ime ndị a, mmadụ 35,200 na-asụ ụdị asụsụ Jibana (Dzihana, Chidzhihana) nke ha na Chonyi jikọtara ọnụ
Chorba frik (Arabic) bụ ofe ọdịNacala a kwadebere na obodo Algeria ya na obodo Tunisia nke e ji nwa atụrụ maọbụ anụ ehi, akwụkwọ nri, ya na ihe ndi pụrụ iche a na-akpọ frik were mee
Frik bụ ụdị ọka wit nke a na-ewepụta mgbe ọ ka na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ ma sie ya ma kpochaa ya iji wepụ mkpo dị n'èzí
A na-akpọnwụ mkpụrụ ahụ ma nwee ike ichekwa ya maka iji ya mee ihe mgbe e mesịrị
Iji mee chorba frik, a na-ebu ụzọ na-acha anụnụ anụnụ n'ime ite na yabasị ya na galik, mgbe ahụ a na-agbakwunye mmiri na akwụkwọ nri, nke na-agụnyekarị karọt, celery, tomato, ya na chickpeas
A na-agbakwunye frik n'ime ite ahụ ma jiri ihe ndị ọzọ sie ya ruo mgbe ofe ahụ siri ike ma na-atọ ụtọ
A na-agbakwunye ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na ahịhịa dị iche iche dịka turmeric, cumin, coriander, ya na mint iji nye ofe ahụ ụtọ pụrụ iche
Chorba frik bụ ofe na-edozi ahụ nke na-ewu ewu na obodo Algeria ya na obodo Tunisia karịsịa n'oge ọnwa oyi na karịsịa n'afọ Ramadan
A na-ejikarị achịcha n'akụkụ ya eme ya, a na-ewerekwa ya dịka nri ndị obodo Algeria na obodo Tunisia

Choro Mbenga bụ onye Gambia na-azụ bọọlụ na onye bụbu onye egwuregwu, onye bụ onye njikwa nke otu Gambia Red Scorpions FC [de], na onye na-enyere onye nchịkwa nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Gambia aka

Nwanne Choro Mbenga bụ Des Samba bụ onye nkuzi na onye njikwa na Red Scorpions FC [de], ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị maka Gambia Football Association (nke bụ Gambia Football Federation ugbu a) maka oge abụọ na-abụghị n'usoro
Mbenga gbara bọọlụ maka otu Gambia Red Scorpions FC dị ka onye na-edebe goolu
N'afọ 2011, Mbenga kwadoro usoro nkuzi bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Confederation of African Football na Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
Site na afọ 2014 ruo 15, ọ bụ onye nhazi bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Gambia Football Federation
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ọrụ ahụ, ọ haziri mmemme bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ na Gambia, maka ụmụ agbọghọ dị n'agbata afọ 6 na 12 na Yundum

Mbenga rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Red Scorpions FC, yana dịka onye na-enyere onye nchịkwa nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Gambia aka, na otu egwuregwu bọlụ ụmụ nwanyị na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa nke Gambia
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị Gambia nwere ikikere FIFA B
O duuru Red Scorpians gaa n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ na 2009 Division One League Championship
N'afọ 2016, a kwụsịtụrụ Mbenga na onye na-enyere ya aka Dodou Faye maka ịwakpo onye nnọchiteanya
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi nke onye na-agba bọọlụ Gambia na Red Scorpians Fatim Jawara, onye nwụrụ na afọ 2016 mgbe ọ nwara ịgafe Oké Osimiri Mediterenian
Mbenga duziri Red Scorpions na afọ 2019 Division One League Championship
Chraime (Arabic, Hebrew) bụ nri azụ̀ na-esi ísì ụtọ ya na tomato si n'Ebe Ugwu Afrika
Aha nri ahụ sitere n'okwu Arabic maka 'ọkụ'
Ndị Juu na-eri nri Chraime na Erev Shabbat nakwa na Rosh Hashanah na Paschal maka Seder
Ndị Libya na-akwaga mba ọzọ emeela ka nri ahụ bụrụ ihe a ma ama n' obodo Izrel
Christopher Abani (amụrụ na abalị iri abụọ na asaa, n'onwa iri na abụọ n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri isii na isii (27 Disemba 1966) bụ onye edemede Naijiria-America na Los Angeles
Ọ na-ekwu na ọ bụ otu n'ime ọgbọ ọhụrụ nke ndị edemede Naijiria na'ọrụ iji nye ndị na - asụ Bekee ahụmịhe nke a mụrụ ma zụlite na 'mba Afrịka ahụ nwere nsogbu'
A mụrụ Abani na Afikpo, Ebonyi Steeti, Nigeria
Nna ya bụ onye Igbo, ebe nne ya sitere na ndị Bekee
Abani bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, Masters of the Board, na afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asatọ na ise (1985) mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii
Ọ bụ ihe na-akpali akpali nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nke atụmatụ ya bụ akụkọ ihe atụ dabere na nnupụisi e mere na Naịjirịa obere oge tupu edee ya
A tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ọnwa isii n'ihi na a na-enyo ya enyo na ọ na'ịgbalị ịkwatu gọọmentị

Ọ gara n'ihu na-ede akwụkwọ mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ, mana a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ otu afọ mgbe e bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asatọ na asaa (1987) Sirocco N'oge a, e jidere ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Kiri Kiri a ma ama, ebe a tara ya ahụhụ
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ n'oge a, ọ mere ọtụtụ egwuregwu ndị na-emegide ọchịchị bụ́ ndị e mere n’okporo ámá dị nso n’ụlọ ọrụ gọọmenti ruo afọ abụọ
A tụrụ ya mkpọrọ nke ugboro atọ ma tinye ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ọnwụ

Otú ọ dị, ndị enyi ya nyere ndị ọrụ gọọmentị aka azụ maka ntọhapụ ya na afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu na otu (1991), ozugbo ahụ Abani, nne ya, na ụmụnne ya anọ kwagara United Kingdom, biri ebe ahụ ruo afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu na iteolu (1999)
Ọ kwagara na United States, ebe ọ bi ugbu a
Abani nwere nzere BA

na Ọmụmụ asụsụ Bekee na akwụkwọ site na Mahadum Imo State, Nigeria; MA na okike na omenala si nsite n'aka Birkbeck College, Machị nke London, MA n'asụsụ English site Na Maọndị Southern California; na PhD
n-aka edemede na edemedo site'asụsụ Maazị nke Southern Californie
E nyela Abani onyinye PEN / Barbara Goldsmith Freedom to Write Award, (afọ puku abụọ na otu)2001 Prince Claus Awards, Lannan Literary Fellowship, California Book Award
Nhọrọ nke uri ya pụtara na akwụkwọ akụkọ n'ịntanetị Blackbird
Site na afọ puku abụọ na asaa ruo afọ puku abụọ na iri na abụọ (2007 ruo 2012), ọ bụ Prọfesọ nke Creative Writing na Mahadum California, Riverside
Ọ bụ ugbu a Board of Trustees Professor of English na Northwestern University

Akwụkwọ uri ya, Sanctificum nke afọ puku abụọ na iri (2010) nke Copper Canyon Press bipụtara, bụ usoro nke uri ndị jikọtara ọnụ, na-ejikọta ememe okpukpe, asụsụ Igbo nke ala nna ya Naijiria,na reggae rhythms na a postracial, liturgical abụ ịhụnanya
Ihe Abani mere n’ibipụta ihe emeela ka e nwee usoro uri nwa ewu (Black Goat), nke bụ akara nke Akashic Books nke dị na New York
Ndị na-ede uri Kwame Dawes, Christina Garcia, Kate Durbin, Karen Harryman, Uche Nduka, Percival Everett, Khadijah Queen na Gabriela Jauregui ka Black Goat bipụtara
Akwụkwọ mpụ Abani bụ The Secret History of Las Vegas meriri Edgar Award dị ka Best Paperback Original na afọ puku abụọ na iri na ise (2015)

N'oge ọkọchị na afọ puku abụọ na iri na isii (2016), obere ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ n'onwe ya bụ Ra'av bipụtara nhọrọ dị ukwuu nke ọrụ ya na Israel n'okpuru aha Shi'ur Geografia (Hibru maka 'Ọmụmụ ihe gbasara ọdịdị ala'), nke Noga Shevach na onye na'ede uri bụ Eran Tzelgov dezigharịrị
Nchịkọta ahụ nwetara nyocha dị ukwuu ma nye ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ Hibru izute abụ Abani nke mbụ

N'afọ puku abụọ na otu ( 2001), Abani natara Middleton Fellowship site na Mahadum nke Southern California
N'afọ puku abụọ na atọ (2003), ọ natara Lannan Foundation Literary Fellowship, yana Hellman / Hammet Grant site na Human Rights Watch
N'afọ puku abụọ na isii (2006), Ịghọ Abigail ka aha ya bụ akwụkwọ Nhọrọ Editor maka The New York Times, na Critic'S Choices maka Chicago Reader
Ọ bụkwa nhọrọ klọb akwụkwọ maka Essence Magazine na Black Expressions
N'afọ puku abụọ na asaa (2007), Nwa agbọghọ na-amaghị nwoke nke ire ọkụ na abụ maka abalị bụ nhọrọ ndị nchịkọta akụkọ maka The New York Times
The Virgin of Flames bụkwa Barnes & Noble Discovery Selection, na Becoming Abigail bụ New York Libraries Books For Teens Seletion
N'afọ puku abụọ na asatọ (2008), Abani natara onyinye Humanist Distinguished Award site na Mahadum California, Riverside
N'afọ puku abụọ na iteolu (2009), Abani nwetara Guggenheim Fellow na Fiction
Christiana 'Chris' Anyanwu MFR (onye a muru n'ubochi iri abuo na asato n'onwa Oktoba, n'afo 1951) bu onye Naijiria, ma burukwa onye nta akuko, onye ode akwukwo nakwa onye ndorondoro ochichi
Gomenti etiti nke Sani Abacha tubara ya n'ulo mkporo site na afo 1995 rue n'afo 1998 maka ihe aru o mere megide gomenti ala Naijiria, mgbe o soro ndi choro i wepu gomenti ochichi n'oge ahu
Mgbe o no na mkporo, ndi mba ofesi enyego ya ihe nrite di iche iche n'oru nta akuko, otu n'ime ha bu ihe nrite si n'aka UNESCO/Guillermo Cano World Press Freedom Prize
Maka na o chere, ma kwerekwa na o ga-aba uru karia na ndorondoro ochich, o zoro oche 'Senator' ndi Imo East (Owerri), ma meriekwa n'afo 2007
Aha di ya bu Dr Casmir Anyanwu

A muru Anyanwu na Mbaise, Imo State O guru akwukwo sekondiri na Owerri Girls Secondary School tupu ya agafee n'obodo Amerika ebe o guru akwukwo n'ihe gbasara ichu nta akukuo na mahadum a na-akpo University of Missouri
O mechakwara gaa n'ihu guo oke akwukwo a na-akpo 'master's degree' na mmuta ihe nchikota ozi ('Mass Communication' n'asusu bekee) na mahadum Florida State University

Mgbe o guchara akwuko n'Amerika, o loghachiri Naijiria, nwete oru n'ulo oru nchikota na mgbasa akuko Naijira, NTA, nakwa n'ulo oru nchikota na mgbasa akuko nke Imo Steti, 'Imo Broadcasting Corporation' ka onye ogu-akuko (news reader) na onye ochu nta akuko (reporter)

N'afo 1987, a hoputara ya ka komishona Imo Steti na ministri na-elekota ihe gbasara mgbasa ozi, ndi ntorobia, egwuregwu, omenala na odimma ndi obodo (Imo State commissioner for Information, Youth, Sports, Culture and Social Welfare) mgbe Amadi Ikwechegh bu govano Imo Steti
Mgbe o chichara ka komishona ka o biputara akwukwo ozi na-ekwu ihe gbasara ochichi obodo, a na-akpo TSM (The Sunday Magazine), nke a na-ebiputa kwa izu uka
N'onwa May 1995, Anyanwu deputara ma biputa akuko gbasara mnwepu mberede a choro i nwepu gomenti onye isi ala Naijiria Sani Abacha, onye nke o kwadoghi ka onye isi ala
Ya na ndi otu ya, ndi ochu nta na mgbasa akuko ozo whom she had refused to endorse as president; she and several Nigerian journalists were accused of being 'accessory after the fact of treason'

Anyanwu was prosecuted in camera by a military court and sentenced to life imprisonment on 4 July 1995, later reduced to 15 years in October 1995 following pressure from national and international human rights groups
While being held in Gombe prison, she went partially blind
Doctors warned that she was in danger of losing her sight completely if she failed to receive medical attention
Chris Attoh (amuru Christopher Keith Nii Attoh ; Mee 17, 1979) bụ onye omere Ghana, onye nduzi ihe nkiri, onye na-egosi ihe onyonyo na onye nrụpụta
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka 'Kwame Mensah' na ihe nkiri usoro Nigeria Tinsel
Ọ gara New York Film Academy, Achimota School na Accra Academy
Na Accra Academy, ụmụ klas ya gụnyere onye ọchụnta ego mgbasa ozi na àgwà redio Nathan Adisi
Ọ gakwara na KNUST ebe ọ gụrụ nzere Bachelor nke Art na nzere ihe eserese
O mechara gaa London ka ọ gụọ akwụkwọ gbasara Ụlọ akụ na Nchekwa
Ọ so bụrụ onye nnabata mbiputa 2016 nke Vodafone Ghana Music Awards na Naa Ashorkor na DJ Black
Ọ bụkwa MC nke mbipụta 2014 nke FACE List Awards na New York City yana Sandra Appiah
Ọ lụrụ Damilola Adegbite na mbụ, mana a kọrọ na ọ gbara alụkwaghịm na Septemba 2017
Ọ lụghariri nwanyi ọzọ na Satọde 6 Ọktoba 2018 bu Bettie Jennifer, nwanyị ọchụnta ego nke US na emume nzuzo na Accra
Chris Ihidero (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 19 Machị 1976) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye isi edemede / onye nchịkọta akụkọ na ihe nkiri TV nke MNet bụ Hush
Ihidero nwere akara ugo mmụta nke mbụ na nke abụọ na Literature-in-English na Lagos State University na University of Ibadan
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe nkiri, onye mgbasa ozi, onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye nchịkọta akụkọ magazin na onye nkuzi mahadum
Site n'afọ 2005, ọ kụziri na School of Part-time Studies nke Lagos State University
N'afọ 2007, o sonyeere Amaka Igwe Studios, nke bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa, dị ka onye nduzi ọzụzụ
Site n'ebe ahụ, ọ biliri wee bụrụ onye isi ọrụ n'afọ 2010
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Director of Studies na Centre for Excellence in Film and Media Studies na Lagos, nke bụ ngalaba nyocha na ọzụzụ nke Amaka Igwe Studios
N'ọnwa Septemba 2013, Ihidero ghọrọ onye isi ọrụ nke Q Entertainment Network
Na Septemba 2014, ọ malitere PinPoint Media ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na mmepụta ihe 360
PinPoint Media bụ ụlọ ọrụ nne na Lagos Film Academy (LFA), ScreenKraft na TNS
N'afọ 2015, ọ bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na Shuga Series 4
Ihidero etinyela aka n'ịzụ ndị Naịjirịa na nkà ịkọ akụkọ
Ihidero bụ onye isi oche nke Editorial Board nke Nigerian Entertainment Today (NET) kemgbe afọ 2012
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke MADE, magazin ndụ ụmụ nwoke
site n'afọ 2007 ruo afọ 2009
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, maka The Guardian, TheNET na TNS ihe karịrị afọ iri
Ihidero eduziela ihe karịrị otu narị awa nke ihe nkiri TV
O meela obere ihe nkiri abụọ, gụnyere Big Daddy (2012), ihe nkiri banyere ndina n'ike, nke gosipụtara na Silverbird Cinemas na Lagos n'ọnwa Disemba 2011
N'ihe karịrị 500,000 nlele, ọ ghọwo obere ihe nkiri kachasị ele anya na Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2015, Ihidero nyere aka duzie It Happened to Me, obere ihe nkiri nke Amaka Igwe dere
E gosipụtara ya na isi ụlọ ọrụ UNESCO na Paris na Nọvemba 2013, na Naịjirịa n'ọnwa Eprel 2015

E nyere ihe nkiri a ọrụ dị ka akụkụ nke United Nations Programme on HIV / AIDS (UNAIDS) nke ebumnuche ya bụ iji usoro ọdịbendị kwesịrị ekwesị iji mee ka ndị ntorobịa na-etinye aka na ọrụ mgbochi HIV / AIDS na Nigeria
Chris Nkulor (nwụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Nollywood nke gụnyere, Battle of Indemnity, Hidden Treasure na Hidden Treasure 2
Nkulor nwụrụ na 22 Eprel 2014 na ụlọ ọgwụ Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo site na ọrịa akụrụ

Chris Okagbue (a mụrụ ya Okechukwu Christopher Ofala Okechukwu Okagbue, 23 June 1987) bụ onye nlereanya Naijiria, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke Gulder Ultimate Search season 8 reality show
Ọ bụ onye agbụrụ Igbo ma bụrụ nwa onye bụbu Obi nke Onitsha
Okagbue si Onitsha na Anambra steeti
Ọ bụ ejima
A mụrụ ya n'ime ezinụlọ eze nke onye bụbu Obi nke Onitsha, HRH
Obi Ofala Okechukwu Okagbue na Ogechukwu Clara Okagbue, n'ụbọchị 23 Juun 1987

Nne na nna ya nwere ụmụ isii, ya bụ nwanne ya nwanyị nke okenye Sandra Okagbue bụ onye bụbu onye nlereanya na eze nwanyị mara mma, ejima ya nwoke Christian, na ụmụnne nwanyị atọ tọrọ ya, Jane, Christabel na Bella
O nwere nzere na sociology na Mahadum nke Lagos
Ọrụ mbụ ya n'ime azụmahịa ngosi bụ dị ka ihe nlereanya n'afọ 2004, mgbe ọ pụtara na mgbasa ozi maka ụdị dị ka Cadbury Plc, MTN, Nigerian Breweries, Coca-Cola na Airtel mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa
Ọ banyere n'ime ihe nkiri n'afọ 2007 mgbe e nyere ya akụkụ mgbe o sonyere ndị enyi ya gaa nyocha ma kpebie ịnwale ya
Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara dị ka Preye Pepple na usoro TV The Station
Achor Yusuf duziri usoro a nke nyekwara ya ọrụ nke abụọ ya dị ka Lucky Edeghor na usoro TV The Maze
Okagbue wepụtara ezumike site na ime ihe nkiri ruo oge ụfọdụ ruo mgbe ọ chọtara ọrụ ọ masịrị ya, na-egosi TV

O nwere obere oge na Koga Studios ma n'oge ahụ ekpuchiela ndụ red carpet nke ihe omume ndị a ma ama dị ka mmalite nke abọm mbụ nke Wizkid, Superstar, Yemi Sax's Sax Appeal concert na DJ Jimmy Jatt's Jimmy's Jumpoff concert
Ọ laghachiri ime ihe nkiri n'oge na-adịghị anya dị ka Victor na usoro TV Secrets and Scandals
Oge ezumike ya bịara mgbe e nyere ya ọrụ nke Emil Haruna na usoro M-NET TV Tinsel
Ọ pụtara nke mbụ ya na ihe nkiri sinima na obere ọrụ na ihe nkiri A Wish, sochiri ihe nkiri Playing Safe, nke Elvis Chuks duziri

N'afọ 2012, Orange Drugs Limited mere Okagbue onye nnọchi anya maka Passion Energy Drink

Emere ihe ngosi a na Kukuruku Hills na Egbetua quarters, Akoko-Edo nke Edo Steeti ma kpọọ ya 'The Contest of Champions'
Ọrụ ahụ bụ ịchọta okpu agha nke abụọ furu efu nke General Maximilian N'ime ndị asọmpi iri atọ mbụ, a họpụtara ndị mmeri iri ka ha pụta na ihe ngosi ahụ

Ihe nrite ya dị ka onye mmeri gụnyere ego nde naira Naịjirịa asaa, SUV na ego uwe bụ Narị Puku ise (₦500,000) maka otu afọ

N'ihi ịbụ onye a họpụtara otu n'ime ndị mmeri atọ gara aga nke ihe ngosi ahụ, ọ laghachiri na Gulder Ultimate Search oge 9 nke akpọrọ 'Gatekeepers' Fortune' ebe e nyere ya ọrụ pụrụ iche nke Gatekeeper

Chris Okewulonu // (Onye amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Disemba, 1960) bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọchụnta ego
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ndị ọrụ nke Emeka Ihedioha bụ Gọvanọ nke Imo Steeti site n'ụbọchị nke atọ n'ime ọnwa Juunu, 2019 ruo n'ụbọchị nke iri na ise n'onwa Jenụwarị, 2020
Ọ bụ onye otu People's Democratic Party
A mụrụ Okewulonu na Amaeke, Avutu, Obowo n'afọ 1960
A kpọrọ ya n'ọrụ ikpe n'afọ 1986 o wee malite ọrụ ọka-iwu ya na ụlọ ọrụ iwu nke Gọvanọ mbụ na-abụghị onye agha nke Imo Steeti ochie, Onye ịsị oche Sam Mbakwe
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ nọ n'ọkwá na Gọọmentị Naijiria dịka onye a họpụtara n'ime Ụlọ Nzukọ nke Imo Steeti
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu, Avutu Development Union site n'afọ 1988 rue n'afọ 1999
N'afọ 1999, ọ ghọrọ onye na-enyere gọvanọ nke Imo Steeti aka
Ma n'afọ 2001, ọ ghọrọ onye kọmishọna maka Ọrụ, Ụlọ na Ụgbọ njem na Imo Steeti
N'afọ 2004, ọ ghọrọ Onye isi oche / Onye nhazi nke Heartland Football Club ma n'afọ 2006, a họpụtara ya dị ka SSG nke gọvanọ imo steeti
N'afọ 2008, Onye isi ala Naịjịrịa bụ Goodluck Johnathan họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Kọmishọna Federal, na-anọchite anya Ndịda Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ n'ihe gbasara Fiscal Responsibility komishon
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara Okewulonu dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Ntuli aka maka ịhọpụta gọvanọ Ikedi Ohakim
ọzọ kwa, n'afọ 2015, a họpụtakwara ya dị ka onye nduzi ukwu nke Chukwuemeka Ihediohaz Gọvanọship Campaign

N'ụbọchị mbụ nke n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2019, mgbe a ṅụrụ iyi nke Onye Ukwu Chukwuemeka Ihedioha dị ka Gọvanọ Ọchịchị nke Imo Steeti, Okewulonu bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ a họpụtara ka ha ṅụọ iyi dịka Chima Nwana na a ṅu iyi ka ọ bụrụ Onye isi ndị ọrụ ma bụrụ kwa zie osote Onye isi ndị isi dika m sị kowaa

Christian Tsui Hesse, onye a maara nke ọma dị ka Chris Hesse (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1932) bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Onye nchịkwa ihe nkiri, na-ese foto na onye ụkọchukwu chọọchị Presbyterian nke a maara maka ihe nkiri ya n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ndị nwetara ihe nrite dịka Love Brewed in the African Pot (1980) na Heritage Africa (1989)
Ọ bụ onye na-ese foto nke onye isi ala mbụ nke Ghana, Dr Kwame Nkrumah
Chris Hesse nyere aka dee akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmepe nke mba ahụ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ maka United Nations, na-eje ozi dị ka onye na-ese foto, na-edekọ nsogbu Congo na 1960
A mụrụ Chris Tsui Hesse na 29 August 1932 na Osu, Accra
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Presbyterian nke ụmụ nwoke niile, Salem School na Odorgonno Secondary School, wee nweta asambodo Cambridge Overseas na 1954
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ghana Film Industry Corporation (GFIC)
Ọ gara National Film School na Łódź na Poland ma gụsịa akwụkwọ na 1960
O nwetakwara asambodo post-graduate na Film na TV Arts na Mahadum Sorbonne na Paris
Nzere agụmakwụkwọ ya ndị ọzọ gụnyere Bachelor of Divinity (1985) na PhD (1989) na Film and Arts, ha abụọ nwetara na Mahadum nke Southern California, California
Ọrụ ya niile were afọ iri anọ (1954-1994), nke ọ nọrọ n'ọrụ nke Gold Coast Film Unit, nke a na-akpọ Ghana Industry Corporation
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na British Academy Film Award nke e mesịrị họpụta maka Best Film site n'ebe ọ bụla, The Boy Kumasenu (1952) nke onye nduzi Britain Sean Graham duziri
Hesse bilitere site n'ọkwa wee bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Ghana Film Industry Corporation (GFIC) ruo afọ iri ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ gọọmentị n'afọ 1994
O meriri ihe nrite Golden Camera Award (First Prize in Cinematography in Africa) na Pan African Film Festival na Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso (FESPACO) n'afọ 1985
Ọ bụ onye nduzi foto maka ihe nkiri Kwaw Ansah nke nwetara ihe nrite Love Brewed in the African Pot (1980) na Heritage Africa (1989)
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi foto maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ato Yanney Snr
South His Majesty's Sergeant (1984)
Ọ gakwara ọtụtụ ebe n'ụwa niile na-eme ihe nkiri na UN, Commonwealth, OAU, Non-Aligned Movement, nleta nke ndị isi ala na nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe mba ụwa dị iche iche
A maara Chris Hesse dị ka onye na-ese foto agha mbụ nke sere ihe nkiri na Congo Crisis na 1960 maka nkesa zuru ụwa ọnụ dị ka onye isi ala na Peace Keeping Force na 1960
Site na mgbe ọchịchị ndị ọcha ruo mgbe Ghana nweere onwe ya (1956-1966), ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri na Kwame Nkrumah (1956-1966) nakwa na ndị isi ala ndị sochirinụ bụ J
Ankrah, A
Afrifa, K
Busia, I
Acheampong, Fred Akuffo, Hilla Liman na J
Rawlings
E chiri ya ụkọchukwu ka ọ bụrụ onye ozi Ndị Kraịst nke Presbyterian Church of Ghana na 1985 ma jee ozi n'ọtụtụ ọgbakọ
Ọ ghọkwara onye isi nchịkwa nke Ụlọ Mkpọrọ nke Ghana
Chris Hesse lụrụ Regina Hesse (onye lara ezumike nká na Bank of Ghana) kemgbe 1959 ma ha nwere ụmụ na ụmụ ise toro eto
Ihe ntụrụndụ ya gụnyere tenis, ịgba ọsọ, ịgba ịnyịnya ígwè na yoga
Ọ na-asụ Bekee, French, Ga na Twi nke ọma

N'afọ 2014, a kwanyeere Chris Hesse ugwu maka nnukwu onyinye ya na ihe nkiri na mba ahụ na 3rd NAFTI Film Lectures on the Motion Picture Industry nke lekwasịrị anya n'ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe nkiri, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-ese foto
Hesse bụ otu n'ime ndị mmadụ na-akpọ oku mgbe niile maka ịgafe iwu ihe nkiri nke ebumnuche ya bụ itinye usoro na usoro niile dị mkpa maka ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri
Chris Tsui Hesse bụ onye guzobere na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Ghana Academy of Film and Television Arts (GAFTA)
N'afọ 2017, a kwanyeere Hesse ùgwù na abalị National Film and Television Institute Awards na Accra
Chrisland Schools bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ na-enye agụmakwụkwọ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ Nursery, Primary na Secondary School na Naịjirịa, ụlọ akwụkwọ ya gbasara na Lagos na Abuja
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị ahụ mechiri n'ọnwa Eprel 2022 site n'aka Ministry of Education Office of Education Quality Assurance ka a na-echere nyocha
Onye nkuzi, High Chief Dr
(Mrs) Winifred Adefolahan Awosika, OON, na Ikeja
Ewezuga ogige Ikeja, ebe ụlọ akwụkwọ dị ugbu a na Lekki, Ladipo Oluwole, Festac, Idimu, Victoria Garden City (VGC), na Abuja
N'afọ 2016, nne nwa akwụkwọ dị afọ abụọ mere mkpu na onye nkuzi ya, Adeboyega Adenekan, dinara nwa ya n'ike
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ gọnahụrụ nkwupụta ahụ ma soro onye nkuzi ahụ guzo site n'ikwu na aka ya dị ọcha

Gọọmentị steeti Lagos weghaara ikpe ahụ ma n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2019, ụlọ ikpe Ikeja Sexual Offences and Domestic Violence Court chọpụtara na onye nkuzi ahụ nwere ikpe maka ebubo ndina n'ike nke otu onye
A mara ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ iri isii

N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022, a kọrọ na a manyere nwa akwụkwọ Chrisland dị afọ iri ka ya na ụfọdụ ụmụ akwụkwọ nke otu ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ nwee mmekọahụ na World School Games na Dubai mgbe ọ na-eme egwuregwu eziokwu ma ọ bụ egwu
E mere ihe nkiri ma kesaa omume mmekọahụ ahụ n'ọtụtụ usoro mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta na Naịjirịa
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, n'akwụkwọ ozi boro onye na-eto eto ebubo na ọ na-ekere òkè n'omume mmekọahụ ahụ n'afọ ofufo ma ya mere kwụsị ya
Nne nwata ahụ na vidiyo na-efe efe kwuru na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ yiri egwu igbu nwa ya nwanyị ma ọ bụrụ na ọ kwuo okwu, ma na-ekwusi ike na e dinara nwa ya n'ike
O kwekwara nkwa ịmalite nyocha na ikpe
Ogige VGC nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ mere emume ụbọchị ọrụ ya na 30 Eprel afọ 2015
Onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, prọfesọ John Viljoen haziri ihe omume ahụ
N'afọ 2016, Chrisland Schools meriri ndị ọzọ sonyere gụnyere Atlantic Hall, Meadow Hall, Day Waterman College, Temple Schools na Noble house iji merie asọmpi AISEN Volleyball na Senior Girls Category
N'ụbọchị nke atọ nke Disemba 2016, Chrisland Schools, Lagos, meriri asọmpi Loya Milk Swimming nke ụlọ akwụkwọ iri nke akpọrọ Loya Swim Meet
N'afọ 2016, Chrisland High School, Ikeja meriri obere ngalaba maka mpaghara Lagos (nke gụnyere ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na mpaghara ndịda nke mba ahụ) nke asọmpi akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mba na akara iri asatọ
Uwetu Obadiah-Franklin nke Chrisland High School, Abuja meriri ndị asọmpi si mba iri na isii ndị ọzọ iji merie asọmpi 2016 TSL International Schools Essay / Debate na Dubai
Ọzọkwa n'afọ 2016, Chrisland High School, VGC mechara nke mbụ n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ iri atọ na asaa sonyere na mpaghara South Western Zone Nigeria nke International Geography Olympiad
Na asọmpi edemede kwa afọ, nke a na-akpọ Teecoks edemede asọmpi nke e mere na Febụwarị afọ 2017, Ibukunoluwa Addy nke Chrisland College, Idimu, mechara nke mbụ na ngalaba ederede nke asọmpi ahụ

Dị ka akụkụ nke ncheta afọ iri anọ ya, Chrisland Schools n'ụbọchị nke abụọ nke Maachị, 2017, nyere Chrisland High Performance Centre ọrụ na 24th Annual Inter-house Sports Competition nke Chrisland College Idimu, Lagos Steeti na ọtụtụ ndị isi na-abịa

Na Machị 2017, ụmụ akwụkwọ Chrisland School sonyere na PROJECT WET; atụmatụ nke Nestle Nigeria Plc na ncheta nke United Nations World Water Day maka njikwa mmiri kwesịrị ekwesị na ọha mmadụ dị ka ọkọlọtọ maka izute ihe ịma aka mmiri iji chekwaa gburugburu ebe obibi na usoro gburugburu ebe obibi

Ọ bụ ezie na a na-anụ olu ya n'abụ ahụ dum, a naghị agụ ya na ndị ọzọ na-arụkọ ọrụ
Nanị onye na-ese ihe a ma ama maka abụ ahụ bụ Boli Mootseng
Ọ bụ naanị n'afọ 2001, mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye otu na onye na-emepụta otu R&B X-Plode nke gosipụtara ndị otu Jaicee James na Lizell Swartz, ka a maara ya na ụlọ ọrụ egwu Namibia
Taa, Warner 'akpụla niche dị ka onye na-ede uri nke Namibia, nke nwere ike iguzo n'ubu n'ubu ya na ndị nwoke ibe ya'
Na Mee afọ 2008, Warner wepụtara abọm izizi ya, I Found My Rhythm
A mụrụ Warner na Windhoek, Namibia, n'aka nne naanị ya nke nwere ndị nna nna Liberia
Nne ya, Margareth Warner, bụ onye na-ese ejiji n'oge ọ bụ nwata, ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Air Namibia tupu ọ laa ezumike nká
Warner malitere ide uri mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị
Naanị mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, o jisiri ike soro ndị na-abụghị ezinụlọ ya kerịta okwu ya
Ọ na-eto onye nkuzi French ya na Franco-Namibian Cultural Centre maka inyere ya aka ịchọta ụzọ ịbanye n'ụwa nke uri
'Onye nkuzi ya hụrụ akwụkwọ ndekọ ya jupụtara na uri, wee duzie ya na Bricks Community Project'
Warner lụrụ di ma biri na Oxford, UK
Onye Kraịst bu onye bi na echiche adi-kpo Christianity
Christian Lattier (1925–1978) bụ onye Ivory Coast na-akpụ ihe nke amụrụ na Grand Lahou, Côte d'Ivoire (Ivory Coast)
Christian Lattier bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe a ma ama si Côte d'Ivoire, ọ bụkwa onye na-ese ihe n'etiti senchiri nke iri abụọ
N'oge ọ dị obere, Lattier gụrụ akwụkwọ na Catholic Mission na Abidjan na Côte d'Ivoire
'Onye na-akpụ ihe n'eyighị ihe ọ bụla n'aka,' dị ka ụfọdụ na-akpọ ya, si Ivory Coast kwaga France na 1935 maka ebumnuche agụmakwụkwọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, ọ gara Marist Brotherhood nke Saint-Chamond na Loire, ụlọ akwụkwọ Katọlik nke Marcellin Champagnat hiwere
Na 1945 Ọ malitere ọmụmụ ya na Écoles des Beaux-Arts (School of Fine Arts), Saint-Étienne, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu
N'oge ọ nọ na Saint-Étienne, ọ mụrụ ihe n'okpuru Henri Barthelemy, onye ọkachamara na-akpụ ihe, na Joachim Durand, onye na-emepụta ihe nlereanya
N'afọ 1947, ọ gafere na École des Beaux-Arts de Paris ebe ọ gụrụ gbasara ọkpụkpụ ihe na ise ụkpụrụ ụlọ n'okpuru ọtụtụ ndị ama ama nke ihe ọkpụkpụ, ụkpụrụ ụlọ na ịkpụ osisi
Ọ pụtara na nraranye na-enweghị atụ maka ihe ọkpụkpụ nke oge a, na-anwale ụdị ọhụrụ na ihe ndị a na-adịghị ahụkebe
N'oge na-adịghị anya, a nabatara ya maka ikike nka ya na ụdị ọrụ ya dị iche iche
Ọ hapụrụ École des Beaux-Arts de Paris na 1956 ma nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ na-eme ngosi ihe tupu ọ laghachi Côte d'Ivoire mgbe ọ nweere onwe ya n'aka France na 1960
Ọ laghachiri na Côte d'Ivoire n'ihe dị ka 1961-62 iji kụzie dị ka prọfesọ maka nka ihe ọkpụkpụ na École Nationale des Beaux-Arts na Abidjan
Ọ nọrọ afọ ndị fọdụrụnụ n'ebe ahụ ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na mberede na 1978
Ụdị ihe ọhụrụ nke Christian Lattier bụ isi ihe na mmepe nke modernism na ihe ọkpụkpụ na Côte d'Ivoire na France
N'ihi na France na-achị Côte d'Ivoire site na 1893-1960, omenala dị ọtụtụ narị afọ na omenala Europe na West Africa metụtara ya
O sitere na mkpali nke ihe nkpuchi ndị Afrịka ma jiri eriri, waya na ụcha na-acha ọbara ọbara na ihe ọkpụkpụ ya
N'oge ndụ ya niile, o mepụtara ihe karịrị atụmatụ pụkụ atọ, na-edebe ihe kachasị mma ya ma na-ebibi ndị ọzọ
Lattier bụ onye pụrụ iche mgbe ọ bịara n'ihe ọkpụkpụ ya; ọ na-ebibi ọrụ ya ma malite ọzọ ọtụtụ oge ruo mgbe ọ ruru ogo ọ chọrọ
Lattier jiri oge ya niile na-arụ ọrụ ma na-eme nchọpụta iji meziwanye ọrụ ya
A maara ọdịdị ya na-arụsi ọrụ ike ma mee ka ndị gbara ya gburugburu nwee mmetụta
Akụkụ iri na itoolu nke ihe ọkpụkpụ Christian Lattier dị ugbu a na nchịkọta nke Musée National de Côte d'Ivoire na Abidjan
Ụdị Christian Lattierī bụ iji usoro ọdịnala ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka nke ịkpa ihe nkpuchi gburugburu etiti waya ma ọ bụ kee ya na echiche ndị sitere na nka na akụkọ ọdịbendị Europe
Lattier na-eji nkume, waya, osisi, na eriri hemp siri ike arụ ọrụ
Lattier bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ na ihe ọkpụkpụ nke oge a na Côte d'Ivoire na France
Ụdị ya a na-ahụtụbeghị mbụ mepụtara ihe ọkpụkpụ, nke mesịrị wetara ya ọtụtụ onyinye na ihe ịga nke ọma
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke The Short Century nke bụ ihe ngosi banyere nnwere onwe na nnwere onwe n'Africa n'etiti 1945-1994 nke gara Munich, Berlin, Chicago, na New York site na Mee 18, 2001 ruo Julaị 29, 2001
Christian Obumeneme Madu (amuru 9 Julaị 1993 na Enugu, Nigeria ) bu onye okachamara n'egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria
Ọ na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye na-awakpo etiti makaEnugu Rangers
Ọ bụbu onye ọkpọ egwuregwu etiti na-agba Enugu Rangers
A mụrụ Christian na mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo Udi na steeti Enugu na 9 Julaị 1993
O tolitere na Oji River nwa oge ebe ya na nne na nna ya biri tupu ha kwaga Abuja
Mgbe ọ nọ na Oji River ọ gara Federal Co-operative College wee gụchaa na OND na 2012
Christian malitere ọrụ football ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata, mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji na 2012 ọ malitere ịgba bọọlụ oge niile
N'afọ 2014, ọ bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta afọ anọ na Enugu Rangers wee malite ịgba bọọlụ ọkachamara, wee nweta onye ọkpụkpọ nke ọnwa Enugu Rangers na oge 2015-16

N'afọ 2017, ka ọ ka na-agba Enugu Rangers, Christian anọghị na egwuregwu na ọzụzụ ruo ọtụtụ izu n'enyeghị ndị otu ahụ ọkwa na mgbe ọ na-anọghị ya, ndị isi Enugu Rangers wepụtara nkwupụta na Christian apụọla ' AWOL '
N'ime oge ahụ ha bụ asịrị na ọ bịanyere aka n'òtù ọzọ
N'August 2018, mgbe nkwekọrịta Christian na Enugu Rangers gwụchara ọ soro ndị otu Portuguese CD Nacional bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ
Nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ ya na CD Nacional bụ nkwekọrịta afọ anọ
Madu hapụrụ klọb ahụ site na nkwenye ọnụ na 10 Jenụwarị 2019
Chinonso Christian Obiozor (amụrụ ya na 31 n'ọnwa Oktoba afọ 1994) bụ onye Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ, ọ na egwuru Enyimba International FC
Na Jenụwarị afọ 2014, onye nchịkwa Stephen Keshi, kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ nke Naịjirịa maka Asompi onye mmeri nke afrịka n'afọ 2014
O nyeere ndị otu ahụ aka ịnọ n'ọkwa nke atọ mgbe Naịjirịa jiri ọkpụ goolu ha merie Zimbabwe

Christian Chukuwuma Onoh, onye a ma ama dị ka CC Onoch, (amuru ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1927 nwuru n'ubọchi nke-ise nke ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2009) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye ọka iwu Naijiria nke ghọrọ gọvanọ nke Anambra Steeti n'afọ 1983 na njedebe nke Republic nke Abụọ nke Naịjirịa
Ọ bụkwa nna nwunye Emeka Ojukwu
Amụrụ Onoh n’abalị iri abụọ na asaa n’ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1927 n'Enugu Ngwo, na mba coal n'ihe bụzi Enug State
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, nwa nwanne nna ya Donald Oji zụlitere ya
Malite na ngwụcha afọ 1940, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ngo, wee mepụta onye nyocha ma mesịa na-ere anụ ụlọ
Site n'iji ego sitere na ọrụ ndị a, ọ kwadoro agụmakwụkwọ ya na United Kingdom, nweta akara ugo mmụta iwu na Mahadum Wales na Aberystwyth na 1957
N'afọ 1958, a họpụtara Onoh ka ọ bụrụ onye ụlọ omebe iwu maka mpaghara Enugwu
O mechara gbaa arụkwaghịm iji nweta nhọpụta dị ka onye isi oche mbụ nke Board of the Nigerian Coal Corporation
Site n'afọ 1961 ruo n'afọ 1966 ọ nọ na bọọdụ nke Nigeria Railway Corporation
N'oge agha obodo, a họpụtara Onoh dịka onye nchịkwa nke Enugu Capital Territory
N'afọ 1970, ọ laghachiri na ndụ onwe onye dị ka onye na-ere osisi
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Club 13, nke ghọrọ Nigerian People's Party (NPP), mana o mechara kwaga na National Party of Nigeria ( NPN)
Ọ lụrụ ọgụ n'enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma maka ọchịchị Anambra Steeti na ikpo okwu NPN na 1979
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke Nigeria Mining Corporation, na 1982, onyeisi ụlọ ọrụ Associated Ore Mines
A họpụtara Onoh ka ọ bụrụ gọvanọ nke Anambra Steeti n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1983 na National Party of Nigeria (NPN), na-emeri Jim Nwobodo nke Nigerian Peoples Party ( NPP)
Nhọrọ ahụ mebiri site na egwu zuru ebe niile, ime ihe ike na ịtụ vootu
A na-arụrịta ụka banyere ntuli aka ahụ, mana o mechara kpebie na ụlọ ikpe kachasị elu
Ọnwa atọ mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, n’abalị iri atọ na mbụ nke ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1983, ndị agha weghaara ikike n'okpuru General Muhammadu Buhari na Onoh, tinyere ndị gọvanọ ndị ọzọ niile, chụpụrụ
Onoh gara n'ihu na-eme ngagharị iwe maka steeti dị iche maka ndị Waawa, e mechakwara nweta nke a mgbe ọchịchị ndị agha nke General Ibrahim Babangida duziri kere steeti Enugu n'afọ 1991
Onye bụbu onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu Anthony Aniogulu kwuru na 'Christian Onoh
na-alụ ọgụ mgbe niile ma n'alụso ikpe na-ezighị ezi ọgụ mgbe niile
Mana ọ gaghị echegbu onwe ya site na iji usoro na-ezighị ezi lụso ikpe na-ezighị ezi ọgụ

Nwa ya nwanyị, Nuzo Onoh, bụ onye edemede Britain a ma ama na onye ọsụ ụzọ nke African Horror, { [circular reference]}, ebe nwa ya nwaanyị nke ọzọ, Bianca Odumegwu-Ojukwu, ghọrọ eze nwanyị mara mma, onye ndụmọdụ onye isi ala ma mesịa bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Naịjirịa na Alaeze nke Spain

A na-echetakwa ya maka mmekọrịta esemokwu ya na alụmdi na nwunye ya na Chukwuemeka Odumegwu Ojukwu Ikemba nke Nnewi na onye bụbu onye isi ala Biafra, onye ji ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ karịa yaIhụnanya ha bụ isi okwu mba na mbido 1990s
Nwa nwanyị ọzọ, Lilian Onoh bụ onye nnọchi anya Naịjirịa ugbu a na Namibia
Nwa ya nwoke Josef Onoh sokwa na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị wee bụrụ Onye isi oche nke Enugu State House of Assembly Committee on Finance and Appropriation
Josef Onoh bụkwa onye nwe ụlọ nkwari akụ a ma ama, The Arriba (Voodoo Lounge) Enugu na onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche nye gọvanọ Enugu State

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Enugu Capital Territory Development Authority ugbu a ma na-achọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke steeti Enugu n'okpuru The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) Christian Onoh nwụrụ na 5 Mee 2009 mgbe ọ dị afọ 82
Chief Oriakụ Caroline Chinweolu Onoh Amụrụ iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1935, Nwụrụ ụbọchị iri na asaa n'ọnwa June n'afọ 2016

Dọkịnta Josephine Onoh {A mụrụ 2 April 1959, Nwụrụ 28 November 1983 na ihe mberede ụgbọelu na Enugu, Nigeria}, Gabriel Onoh, Nuzo Onoh {British Author, nke a maara dị ka 'The Queen of African Horror', Stella Ani, Ambassador Lilian Onoh, Ambassador Bianca Odumegwu-Ojukwu, Christian Chinyelugo Onoh (Jnr) Nwụrụ 29 Maachị 1991}, Dr
Ken Josef Umunnakwe Onoh {Onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọchụnta ego, ugbu a bụ onyeisi oche nke Enugu Capital Territory}

Onoh nwere ụmụ ụmụ iri na itoolu n'etiti ha bụ Candice Onyeama, onye na-emepụta ihe nrite nke Britain, onye edemede-ode akwụkwọ, na onye nduzi na nwa nwanyị nke Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ihe mba ọzọ na Naịjirịa, Geoffrey Onyeuma, Christian C Onoh Jnr (111) Chineme Odumegwu-Owujuk na Jija Carmen Orka-Gyoh
Christian Onyia bụ bishọp ndị Anglican na laa Naijiria ọ bụ Bishọp nke Nike ugbu a
A raara ya na ọlụ̀ dị ka Bishọp nke Nike n'ọnwa Eprel 2019 na St David's Anglican Cathedral Church, Ijomu, Akure, site n'aka Onye isi nke All Nigeria, Nicholas Okoh
Ighodaro Christian Osaguona (amụrụ 10 Ọktoba 1990) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa nke gbara bọọlụ na nso nso a na Al-Shorta nke nọ na Iraq Premier League dị ka onye ọkpọ
Na 13 Jenụwarị 2020, Osaguona bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọkara oge ya na ndị mmeri Persian Gulf Pro League Persepolis
Ọzọkwa, ndị Reds Iran nwere nhọrọ ịgbatị nkwekọrịta ya maka otu afọ ọzọ
Na 9 Septemba 2020, onye ọkpọ ahụ hapụrụ Persepolis ka ya na Al-Shorta banye nkwekọrịta na Premier League Iraq

Akpọrọ Osaguona maka otu mba maka asọmpi ntozu mba Africa nke 2015 wee soro ndị otu egwuregwu mba ụwa mbụ ya na 10 Septemba 2014 n'ime na megide South Africa (0–0), ka ọ batachara dịka onye nnọchi Gbolahan
Salami na nkeji 63 nke egwuregwu ahụ
Christiana Boateng nwere ike ikpo ya
Christiane Lambert (née Foulier; amụrụ na 25 June 1961) bụ onye ọrụ ugbo na onye ọrụ ugpo nke France bụ onye isi nke Fédération Nationale des Syndicats d'Exploitants Agricoles kemgbe 2017
N'afọ 2020, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Comité des Organisations Professionnelles Agricoles - Comité Général de la Coopération Agricole de l'Union Européenne
A mụrụ ya na Saint-Flour (Cantal) na 1961, Christiane Lambert bụ nwa nwanyị nke Guy Foulier na Marie Berthuy, ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na Jeunesse Catholique Agricole
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 19, ọ nwetara Brevet de Technicien Supérieur techniques agricole site na Saint-Dominique Institute na Puy-en-Velay
O guzobere ugbo mmiri ara ehi ya nke dị hekta 25 na ezì 40 na Massiac
Ọ bụbu onye mmeri handball
N'afọ 1985, nna ya nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ọrụ
Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, na 16 August 1986, ọ lụrụ Thierry Lambert onye ya na ya mụrụ ụmụ atọ
N'afọ 1989, ya na di ya weghaara ugbo nke nne na nna ya, dabere na ịzụ ezì na Bouillé-Ménard, na Maine-et-Loire
Ọ bụ otu ìgwè ọrụ ugbo na-agụnye 106 hekta nke ihe ọkụkụ (mkpụrụ, ọka wit, ọka bali, ahịhịa na ndina n'ike) maka ugbo ezì 230 nke ụmụ ehi
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 20, Christiane Lambert malitere ọrụ ya site n'ịghọ onye isi oche nke Cantonal Centre of Young Farmers na Massiac
Ọ nọgidere n'ọkwa a ruo n'afọ 1984
Site na 1982 ruo 1988, ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke Departmental Centre of Young Farmers of Cantal na onye isi oche mbụ nke Regional Centre of Young Fermers of Auvergne na 1986
N'afọ 1994, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche mbụ nke National Centre of Young Farmers ruo n'afọ 1998

N'afọ 1999, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke Forum des Agriculteurs Responsables Respecteux de l'Environnement (Forum of Responsible and Environmentally Friendly Farmers) na VIVEA (ego agụmakwụkwọ na-aga n'ihu maka ndị ọrụ ugbo)
Ọ hapụrụ FARRE na VIVEA n'afọ 2005
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Departmental Federation of Farmers' Unions site na 2001 ruo 2011
N'afọ 2010, ọ ghọrọ osote onyeisi oche nke Fédération Nationale des Syndicats d'Exploitants
Mgbe ọnwụ Xavier Beulin gasịrị na 2017, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke FNSEA ma họpụta ya dịka onye isi oche mbụ na 29 Machị 2017 na Brest Congress
Onye isi oche ya ghọrọ onye ọrụ na 13 Eprel 2017 n'oge nzukọ ụlọ ọrụ
Mgbe a họpụtara ya n'ụzọ iwu ma nabata ọhụụ mgbanwe, Christiane Lambert gosipụtara ọrụ otu na ntụziaka nke Xavier Beulin na-eduzi iji chebe ọrụ ugbo
Na France, ọ chebere ọrụ ugbo site na itinye aka na ọha mmadụ ma na-ebute 'ọrụ ugbo, ọdịmma anụmanụ, òtù ndị na-emepụta ihe, ọnụahịa ziri ezi maka ndị na-arụ ọrụ n'ime usoro iwu Sapin 2'
Mgbe ọ nọ na European Union, ọ lụrụ ọgụ maka ibelata ọdịiche dị n'etiti asọmpi n'etiti mba ndị otu site n'ịkwado mmejuputa ụgwọ ọrụ kacha nta na mba ọ bụla
Christiane Lambert gara n'ihu ma chebe ọrụ ugbo site n'ịkwado ha ezigbo ego
Emere ya site na Etats Généraux de l'Alimentation (General States of Food), nke Emmanuel Macron guzobere iji nye 'ezi ụgwọ maka ndị ọrụ ugbo na nri dị mma maka ndị mmadụ'

N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2017, ha guzobere akwụkwọ ikike ebe ndị ọrụ ugbo, nhazi na ndị nnọchi anya nkesa ga-etinye aka n'inye ngwaahịa nri ka mma, nghọta na mmekọrịta ha, na-eburu n'uche mmepụta nke ngwaahịa ugbo
A bịanyere aka na ya n'ihu Minista Ọrụ Ugbo nke France Stéphane Travert na odeakwụkwọ nke Minista akụ na ụba nke France, Benjamin Griveaux

Iji mezue nkwekọrịta ahụ ma kwekọọ na FARRE, Christiane Lambert tinyere 'nkwekọrịta ngwọta maka ọrụ ugbo na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na dijitalụ' site n'iwepụ ọgwụ ahụhụ na iji teknụzụ nchebe ihe ọkụkụ lụso mgbanwe ihu igwe ọgụ

Na ngwụcha nke International Planet A Forum nke emere na 29 June 2018 na Châlons-en-Champagne, Christiane Lambert na Pascal Canfin, General Director nke WWF France (World Wide Fund for Nature) sonyeere ndị agha iji kwalite ọrụ ugbo na-adịgide adịgide
Ebumnuche ha bụ 'ịmepụta ala, mmepe nke methanisation, nkesa ziri ezi nke uru n'etiti ndị niile metụtara na usoro nri na nchekwa nke ndị ọrụ ugbo megide ọrụ ugbo ndị ọzọ'
N'afọ 2018, ọ malitere Agridemain movement nke ebumnuche ya bụ 'ịgbanwe onyinyo nke ọrụ ugbo n'etiti ọha na eze'
Na 18 Septemba 2020, Christiane Lambert ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii nke Òtù Ọrụ Ugbo - Kọmitii Ọchịchị nke Ọrụ Ugbo nke European Union
Ọ na-achịkwa ọkwa onye isi oche nke COPA-COGECA yana FNSEA

Dị ka onye isi oche nke COPA-COGECA na FNSEA, ọ na-agbachitere mgbanwe nke Common Agricultural Policy ebe ndị ọrụ ugbo na-alụ ọgụ megide mgbanwe ihu igwe nwere ike ịnweta enyemaka kpọmkwem agroecology, agronomy, ọdịmma anụmanụ wdg
Ihe enyemaka ndị a na-enyere ndị ọrụ ugbo aka itinye ego na ihe onwunwe na ngwá ọrụ (dịka fatịlaịza) ma bụrụ ndị a zụrụ maka omume ọhụrụ

Na 29 Nọvemba 2017, Christiane Lambert natara '2017 Women of Political Influence Price nke klọb Génération femmes d'influence (Influence Generation Women Club) nyere ya nke na-akwalite ọchụnta ego ụmụ nwanyị ma nyefee ya nye ụmụ nwanyị niile na-arụ ọrụ ugbo'
Na 1 Jenụwarị 2021, ọ natara Legion of Honor

Christina Maisenne Lee (Chinese, amụrụ n'afọ 1977) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Hong Kong

Lee bụ ada nke onye ọchụnta ego Joseph Lee Chung-tak, onye guzobere Wofoo Group, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta plastik O tolitere na Hong Kong, na-aga Maryknoll Convent School ebe ọ bụ onye isi ndị otu egwuregwu igwu mmiri, ma na-ekerekwa òkè n'ọtụtụ mmemme mmemme gụnyere ballet na piano N'adịghị ka ọtụtụ n'ime ndị enyi ya, ọ nwere mmasị na mbụ ịga mba ọzọ maka ịga n'ihu ọmụmụ ihe, mgbe ọ gụchara Form 4 na Hong Kong ọ họọrọ ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na United States wee banye na Mahadum Chicago Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ na nzere ọha na eze tupu ọ gawa na Mahadum Oxford iji nweta nzere masta na comparative social policy O mechara nweta Master of Education na Mahadum Bristol
Lee laghachiri Hong Kong na 1999 iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nchịkwa
N'afọ 2002, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ahụ iji were ọnọdụ na azụmaahịa ezinụlọ Wofoo Group, na-elekọta nsogbu ndị ọrụ na ọrụ ebere
Ọ sonyekwara na Hong Kong Chinese Importers' and Exporters' Association, na-aghọ onye otu Standing Committee ma na-ekere òkè na ọzụzụ ndị ntorobịa
Lee lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ nwoke abụọ na otu nwa nwanyị
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado inye ara

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2011, ọ gbara ọsọ maka oche a na-enweghị mgbagha dị ka onye otu Kọmitii Nhọrọ na Ngalaba Nweta na Mbupụ, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị otu narị na iri abụọ na abụọ Hong Kong nwere ikike ịtụ vootu maka Chief Executive nke Hong Kong na ntuli aka afọ 2012
Ka e mesịrị na 2012 ọ gbara ọsọ na ntuli aka nke Kansụl Iwu dị ka onye nke anọ na Democratic Alliance for the Betterment and Progress of Hong Kong list na New Territories West, mana a họpụtaghị ya
Christina McAnea (amụrụ n'afọ 1958) bụ onye isi otu ọrụ na Scotland
bu onye ndu otu ndi ahia nke Scotland A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Unison n'ọnọdụ nke Dave Prentis
Wee weghara ọkwa ahụ na 22 Jenụwarị 2021
A mụrụ Christina McAnea na 1958 na Glasgow wee tolite na mpaghara Drumchapel, ebe ọ gara St
Pius School (ugbu a ebe Drumchapel High School)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Civil Service, National Health Service na retail, tupu ọ gaa na Mahadum Strathclyde iji mụọ Bekee na akụkọ ihe mere eme
Mgbe mahadum gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Glasgow City Council dị ka onye ọrụ ụlọ tupu ọ malite ịrụ ọrụ maka GMB, ebe ọ dụrụ ndị ọrụ ọdụ ka ha na-ekpe ikpe n'ihu ndị were ha n'ọrụ
McAnea rụrụ ọrụ na Unison kemgbe e guzobere ya na 1993
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mbụ na National and Local Government Officers' Association (NALGO), na mbụ dị ka onye isi ụmụ nwanyị, tupu e jikọta ya na Unison
Ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị odeakwụkwọ ukwu ise nke Unison na Mee 2018

A họpụtara McAnea ka ọ nọchie Dave Prentis ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Unison na 11 Jenụwarị 2021, mgbe ọ nwetasịrị 477% nke votu ndị otu Prentis abụrụla odeakwụkwọ ukwu afọ iri abụọ Ọ malitere ọrụ na Jenụwarị 22, 2021
McAnea luru di ma bikwara na ndịda London
O nwere ụmụ abụọ ndị toro eto
McAnea soro ma bụru kwa onye otu Labour Party
Na mbido afọ 1980, ọ bụ onye otu Communist Party of Great Britain (CPGB)

Christina Parie (amụrụ 10 February 1996), makwaara site na aha ogbo ya KYA na Christina Castle, bụ onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-agụ abụ Australia, nke a kacha mara amara dị ka onye ikpeazụ na oge nke atọ nke X Factor Australia na 2011
O mechara binye aka na Warner Music Australia wee wepụta otu mpụta mbụ ya '16 & Unstoppable' na Julaị 2012
Parie wee gbanwee aha ọkwa ya ka ọ bụrụ KYA, wepụta otu akpọrọ 'Ihe M Na-ebi Ndụ' na LDN Noise na Mee 2014
E wepụrụ nwa agbọghọ na-eto eto na egwu Warner mana ọ nọgidere na-abụ abụ ma na-arụ ọrụ mgbe ọ bụla ọ nwere ike n'okpuru aha Penny Lane iji chekwaa ego zuru oke iji kwaga America
Christina gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na America ebe ọ na-alọghachi na 2019 n'okpuru aha Christina Castle na-ewepụta 3-track EP akpọrọ Isi nke 1

Nke a EP gụnyere Penny Lane raw na nke mepere emepe nke mgba ya gara aga, na-amụta ịnagide ihe niile na-eme mgbe X-Factor na-efunahụ akara ya dị ka onye na-eduga otu na-esote sexy 'American Hustle' na mmetụta mmetụta 'Hey Papa'
N'oge na-adịghị mgbe ntọhapụ nke a Christina pụta na 'Crazy Lover' ft Gangsta Boo, bụ ukwe maka ndị inyom niile ndị e mejọrọ na kwere na ịbọ ọbọ
A mụrụ Christina Parie na 10 February 1996 nye Jim na Mary Papoulias, wee bịa na Castle Hill, New South Wales
Amụrụ dị ka nwa etiti, Parie nwere nwanne nwanyị tọrọ, Alexa, na nwanne ya nwoke nke obere, Jordan
Ọ bụ naanị ya bụ onye ezinụlọ ya na-abụ abụ ma kpọọ Avril Lavigne, Kelly Clarkson, Pink na The Cranberries dị ka mmetụta egwu ya
Parie malitere ọrụ egwu ya na mbụ dị ka onye ndu onye na-abụ abụ nke otu ise Losing Sight, onye na-eme ihe mgbe niile na cafes, mmemme na ebe egwuregwu n'ofe Sydney
Site na klas asatọ ruo iri, ọ gara Mount St Benedict College na Pennant Hills, New South Wales
Mgbe ọ na-esiri ike ịga n'ihu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na ọkwa iri na otu n'ihi oge ya na X Factor, Parie kwụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ iji gbasoo ọrụ egwu ya
Parie auditioned maka oge nke atọ nke The X Factor na 2011, na-abụ abụ Kelly Clarkson's ' Adịghị m nkokọ ' n'ihu ndị ikpe Ronan Keating, Guy Sebastian, Natalie Bassingthwaighte na Mel B

Keating kọwara ọnụnọ Parie dị ka 'ihe ịtụnanya' ebe Mel B kwuru, 'Ọ tụrụ m n'anya na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ anaghị anwa ijide gị ugbua' Sebastian kwuru, 'ị zuru oke, ndị mmadụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ na-achọ ndị dị ka gị' Parie gara n'ihu na ọkwa bootcamp ebe etinyere ya na ngalaba ụmụ agbọghọ, nke Mel B na-eduzi ya
Mgbe bootcamp gasịrị, ọ gara n'ihu na ọkwa nleta ụlọ ebe ụmụ agbọghọ na-aga na Hollywood, California iji mee n'ihu Mel B na onye ọka ikpe ọbịa Melanie Chisholm

N’ụbọchị ikpeazụ nke nleta ụlọ, Mel B họpụtara Parie, ya na Tyla Bertolli na Jacqui Newland, maka ngwụcha ndụ—usoro ihe ngosi ndụ ndụ iri kwa izu nke a na-eji nke nta nke nta wepụ ndị asọmpi site na ntuli aka ọha
