Wodtke (amụrụ n'October 22, 1966) bụ onye ọchụnta ego America na ọkachamara na mpaghara nke echiche imewe, ihe owuwu ozi na Management Science (na-ahụ maka OKR na mmepụta otu)) Ọ bụ onye nkuzi na HCI na Mahadum Stanfo7rd ugbu a

Wodtke enweela ọtụtụ ọrụ ndị isi na ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ, ọkachasị ndị na-eduga ndị otu wuru ikpo okwu omume ma mepụta algọridim maka akụkọ Linkedin, na-edughachi imepụta Myspace na ibe profaịlụ ya ma na-edugu imepụta na ịmalite ikpo okwu ịgba chaa chaa Zyngacom
Wodtke bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche gara aga nke ozi Architecture Institute
Dị ka onye ọkachamara na Ahụmahụ Onye Ọrụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị ka Yahoo, Hot Studio, The New York Times, na Zynga iji melite ma melite ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ha
Wodtke guzobere magazin Webby-nominated nke echiche imewe [Boxes and Arrows] ma bipụta ya mgbe niile (yana onye na-enye onyinye oge ụfọdụ)
Boxes and Arrows bụ magazin nke mbụ dị n'ịntanetị nke e mere naanị maka ndị na-emepụta na-arụ ọrụ, ma kpalie ọtụtụ 'zines ndị ọzọ dị n'Ịntanet, site na UXmatters ruo Johnny Holland
[citation needed]
A na-achọkarị ya dị ka ọkachamara maka ajụjụ ọnụ na okwu gbasara imewe weebụ mmekọrịta, gamification, ahụmịhe onye ọrụ njikwa mmalite, na ihe ọhụrụ
Christine Hellen Amongin Aporu bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Steeti maka Teso Affairs n'ọfịs Praịm Minista na Cabinet nke Uganda
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 27 Mee na afo 2011
Ọ nọchitere anya Kumi District na Parliament dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị
A mụrụ ya na Kumi District na 22 Mee na afo 1958
Ọ gara Nabuyanga Primary School na Soroti Secondary School
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na St
Aloysius Teachers College, na Ngora District, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Grade III Certificate in Teaching, na afo 1979
N'afọ 1986, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Institute of Teacher Education Kyambogo, nke bụzi akụkụ nke Mahadum Kyambogo
O nwere nzere Bachelor of Education, nke ọ nwetara na Mahadum Makerere na afo 1996
O nwekwara diplọma postgraduate na Management site na Uganda Management Institute (UMI), nke enyere na afo 2005
O nwetara nzere masta ya na Human Resources Management na UMI n'afọ 2009
Amongin Aporu malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na afo 1980, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo na afo 1984
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ITEK na afo 1986, ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi na kọleji ọzụzụ ndị nkuzi, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo na afo 1996
A họpụtara ya na mbụ ka ọ nọchite anya Kumi District na afo 1996
N'agbata afọ 2001 na afọ 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista Steeti
Ọ bụ onye otu Demobilization Resettlement Team nke Amnesty Commission, mgbe ọpụpụ nke LRA si n'ala Uganda
Mgbe ntuli aka mba nke afọ 2011 gasịrị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke steeti maka ihe gbasara Teso
Christine Apolot bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda
Ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ mpaghara ise(LC5) oche maka Kumi District
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ n'ọnwa June 2016
N'afọ 2021, ọ gbara ọsọ dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Kumi District n'okpuru National Resistance Movement party na-ama Amoding Monicah aka
Amụrụ Apolot na Kumi District
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Kumi
O nwekwara asambodo na iwu nchịkwa site na Law Development Centre(LDC)
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Machị 2021, ọ na-agbaso akara ugo mmụta na nchịkwa ọha na eze na Uganda Management Institute(UMI)

Apolot malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, mgbe ahụ ọ sonyeere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'afọ 2016 n'okpuru National Resistance Movement(NRM) dị ka onye isi oche nke Local Council 5 (LC5) na Kumi District
Ọ bụghị naanị na ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ nọrọ n'oche na mpaghara teso kamakwa otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ na mba ahụ ghọrọ ndị isi oche LC5 na Uganda
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke ụlọ omebe iwu a họpụtara maka Kumi District na ụlọ omebeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Christine Ayo Achen nke a makwaara dị ka Achen Christine Ayo (amụrụ na 7 Julaị, na afọ 1983) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nchịkwa nke Uganda
Ọ bụ nwanyị nnọchi anya distrikti nke Alebtong na 10th parliament nke Uganda
Ọ nwere njikọ na National Resistance Movement na-achịkwa otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụkwa onye na-achọ ịbụ onye omeiwu nwanyị maka afọ 2021-2026 na Alebtong
Christine nwere diplọma na ọmụmụ mmepe site na Nzamizi Training Institute of social development
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu na ụlọ omeiwu nke Uganda kemgbe afọ 2016 ruo taa
Ọ na-eje ozi na ọrụ ọzọ dị ka onye otu kọmitii na Gender Labour and Social Development na PAC ime obodo gọọmentị na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda
Ọ bụ onye otu Uganda Women Parliamentary Association nke 10th Parliament of Uganda
Tupu ntuli aka nke afọ 2021, o nwere onye na-asọmpi maka oche nwanyị omebe iwu nke Alebtong District, Ms Barbra Akech
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu vootu ee na ọgụgụ nke abụọ nke Iwu Ndezigharị Iwu na afọ 2017
Ọ lụrụ di
Ọ bụ onye Anglịkan site n'okwukwe
Christine Blower, Baroness Blower (amụrụ 20 Eprel 1951) bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke iri na otu nke National Union of Teachers, otu ndị ọrụ na-anọchite anya ndị nkuzi tozuru etozu n'ofe England na Wales
N'ọnwa Maachị afọ 2018, ọ kwụrụ maka ntuli aka wee depụta aha ya maka ọkwa odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Labour Party
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke otu nrụgide Unite Against Fascism
Amụrụ ya na Surrey, akụkụ nke Obodo Obodo
Nna ya bụ onye na-egwu kol n'oge ọ dị obere na ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ England, wee bụrụ onye injinia GPO, yana onye na-akwado ndị ọrụ

She grew up in Chessington and attended Ellingham County Primary School and then Tolworth Girls School, a bi-lateral school where she was educated in the grammar streamN'ịbụ onye tụgharịrị uche n'ọrụ iwu ma ọ bụ ọrụ nwa oge, ọ zụrụ azụ dịka onye nkuzi
N'afọ 1973, ọ were ọkwa nkuzi mbụ ya, na Holland Park School, ụlọ akwụkwọ zuru oke na Kensington na Chelsea nke bụ akụkụ nke Inner London Education Authority, ebe ọ kụziri French
N'oge ahụ, ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ agbanweela site na nkuzi na-agagharị agagharị gaa na nkuzi nwere ike ịgwakọta, ụdị nkuzi ọ na-ahọrọ n'ihi na ọ naghị 'mepụta ọnọdụ atụrụ na ewu nke e guzobere iji zere'
Nwa ya nwanyị Sophie mechara gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Na 1980, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nke asụsụ ọgbara ọhụrụ na St Edmund's Secondary School na Fulham, wee bụrụ onye isi ngalaba na Quintin Kynaston School na Westminster na 1983

Site na egwu nkewa nke ILEA, Blower laghachiri Hammersmith na Fulham na 1990 wee lekwasị anya n'ịrụ ọrụ na ndị na-eto eto nọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke nlekọta ma ọ bụ nlekọta na Farm Lane Adolescent Resource Centre
Mgbe e mechiri ya, e zigara ya ọzọ dị ka onye otu ndị na-akwado omume nke ndị ọchịchị mpaghara
Dị ka ọ kọwara na 1997, 'Ihe dị mkpirikpi nke otu ahụ bụ ịnwale ma dozie omume ahụ iji mee ka obi dị ụmụaka mma, mee ka ha lekwasị anya n'ọrụ ka ha wee nwee ike ịnọ n'usoro'
Blower sonyeere NUT na mmalite nke ọrụ nkuzi ya
N'agbata 1986 na 2004 ọ nwere ọkwa dị iche iche na òtù West London, gụnyere odeakwụkwọ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche mba nke NUT n'etiti 1992 na 2000
Ọnọdụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere osote onye isi ala na 1996 na onye isi ala nke 125 nke NUT site na 28 Machị 1997 ruo 10 Eprel 1998, na-anọchi Carole Regan
Blower jiri ikpo okwu a rụọ ọrụ dị ukwuu maka ndị nkuzi na-arụ ọrụ na-arụ n'ịgba ọsọ nke Pupil Referral Units na maka 'nkwado ụlọ akwụkwọ kwesịrị ekwesị'
Ọ bụ onye nkatọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ grammar, SATs na onye na-achịkwa ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'ime nke ikpeazụ, o kwuru na 'ọtụtụ ihe ndị mmadụ ga-eme maka Ofsted bụ mmebi oge zuru oke'

Blower failed in her bid to be elected as general secretary in 1999, with incumbent Doug McAvoy re-elected with a 17,000 majorityEmechara họpụta ya osote onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu na 28 Jenụwarị 2005 n'okpuru onye nọchiri ya Steve Sinnott

Mgbe ọnwụ mberede nke Sinnott mgbe ọ nọ n'ọkwa, ọ ghọrọ onye na-anọchite anya odeakwụkwọ ukwu na 5 Eprel 2008, ma duzie ọgbaghara mba mbụ nke otu ahụ n'ime afọ iri abụọ - maka ụgwọ ndị nkuzi - izu abụọ ka e mesịrị
Na 5 Mee 2009, a họpụtara ya n'enweghị onye na-emegide ya dị ka nwanyị mbụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke NUT
Na Febụwarị 2013, n'ụzọ kwekọrọ na NUT, Blower so na ndị nyere nkwado ha na People's Assembly n'akwụkwọ ozi nke akwụkwọ akụkọ The Guardian bipụtara
O kwukwara okwu na Nzukọ Ndị Mmadụ nke e mere na Westminster Central Hall na 22 June 2013
Blower etinyela onwe ya na nkatọ ogologo oge nke NUT banyere ule nyocha (ma ọ bụ SATs) n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, gụnyere boycotts mba nke otu ahụ duziri na 1993 na 2010
Mmegide ya lekwasịrị anya n'iji ule mee ihe na nchịkọta nke tebụl league mba, nke NUT ga-achọkwa ịhụ ka ewepụ ya

Blower zoro aka na ule ndị ahụ dị ka 'ihe dị elu', na ndị nkuzi nọ n'okpuru nrụgide iji belata usoro mmụta ahụ, 'na-eme ka ihe niile mee ka ụmụ akwụkwọ ha nwee ike ịwụli elu n'usoro hoops na-enweghị isi'
N'ikwu okwu banyere ọnọdụ Gọọmentị na magazin Tribune, o dere, sị 'Nnyocha anaghị eme ka ụkpụrụ dị elu
Ha na-akpata nrụgide ọzọ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ, ndị nkuzi na ndị nne na nna
Ndị nkuzi na-agba ọsọ mgbe niile iji nye nnukwu usoro mmụta nke na-emecha bụrụ ihe na-adịghị mma n'ihi nrụgide iji ruo ihe gọọmentị setịpụrụ
Ọtụtụ ndị na-eche na ha enweghị ike ịhapụ ihe mgbochi nke usoro agụmakwụkwọ mba
N'okpuru nduzi Blower, NUT ebipụtala atụmatụ ya maka ụzọ ndị ọzọ maka nyocha, n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na njikọ aka na NAHT na 2009 na ATL na 2010
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ọzọ nke ndị otu atọ ahụ dere na Disemba 2010
N'okwu onye isi ala ya na NUT Conference na 29 Machị 1997, Blower kọrọ na n'afọ gara aga ewepụla nwa ya nwanyị Sophie na ule Key Stage 2
Ọ gwara ndị nnọchiteanya, 'Dịka nne na nna na onye nkuzi, m ga-aga n'ihu na-akwado mkpọsa iji wepụ akwụkwọ mmụta nke ule blanket nke ụmụ anyị' Enwere nnukwu nkatọ maka 'omume kpọmkwem'

na ndị nta akụkọ, mana na-agbachitere onwe ya, Blower rụrụ ụka na '[Sophie] mere ihe bara uru na oge ya karịa ma ọ bụrụ na ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ n'oge ule'Ụfọdụ kọwara akụkụ a nke okwu ya dị ka ihe atụ nke ndị agha aka ekpe siri ike
Ụfọdụ ndị gosipụtara akụkụ a nke okwu ya dị ka ihe atụ nke agha siri ike
NUT n'okpuru nduzi Blower abụwo onye nkatọ olu nke mmemme Academies, ma na ụdị ọrụ ọhụrụ mbụ ya site na mgbasawanye nke Iwu Academies 2010 nke na-akwado ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị Ofsted kpọrọ 'dị ịrịba ama'
Iwu nke Michael Gove webatara na-enyekwa ohere maka ụlọ akwụkwọ n'efu, ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị e guzobere ọhụrụ na ndị a na-enye ego n'onwe ha iji mezuo mkpa mpaghara na nnwere onwe yiri nke Academies
NUT na-emegide Free Schools na Blower ekwupụtala nchegbu na ha nwere ike iwe ndị nkuzi n'ọrụ na-enweghị ọnọdụ onye nkuzi ruru eru
Ụdị ụlọ akwụkwọ abụọ a nọ n'èzí nchịkwa LEA ma nwee ike ime ka nkwekọrịta mkpokọta sie ike
Blower arụrịta ụka banyere ihe ịga nke ọma nke usoro Swedish yana ụlọ akwụkwọ charter nke America, nke Michael Gove na-ekwukarị dị ka ihe atụ nke ibelata nkewa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

N'akụkọ mkpuchi maka magazin The Spectator n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2010, a na-azọrọ na ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe NUT na-emegbu ndị isi nkụzi a maara na ha na-atụle ntụgharị ụlọ akwụkwọ na, ya na ya, ezumike site na nchịkwa mpaghara
Blower bụ onye otu Labour ruo na mbido afọ 1990

N'afọ 1982, ọ guzoro dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye ọrụ maka East Putney na Wandsworth Council, mana a họpụtabeghị ya, ebe oche atọ ahụ bụ nke Conservative Party; otu n'ime ndị Conservative meriri bụ onye omeiwu Christopher Chope
N'ikwu okwu tupu ntuli aka May 1997, ọ kewapụrụ onwe ya na onye isi Labour Tony Blair's New Labour rebranding of the party
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ gwara onye nta akụkọ na ọ nọ 'n'aka ekpe nke Labour ochie' ma kwado na ya enweghị njikọ ọ bụla na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma ọ bụ otu
Otú ọ dị, n'afọ 2000, ọ bụ onye otu London Socialist Alliance, n'ihu ntuli aka nke Greater London Assembly
O kwuru n'oge ahụ na 'e guzobere ya iji gbochie nkụda mmụọ na Labour na-amụ nwa ọhụrụ n'aka nri dị anya dị ka ọ mere na 1970s'
Na ntuli aka a, ọ gbara ọsọ maka ntuli aka dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa na West Central na usoro ndepụta nke ọtụtụ ndị otu; ọ nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na ha abụọ
Na Machị 2016, tupu ọpụpụ ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke NUT, Blower kwupụtara na ọ ga-esonye na Labour Party 'nke Jeremy Corbyn na-edu, iji lụọ ọgụ maka ụwa ka mma anyị maara na ọ gafere'
E depụtara ya maka ọkwa odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Labour na 2018, mana ọrụ ahụ gara onye mmegide ya, onye otu ọrụ ibe ya bụ Jennie Formby
A họpụtara Blower maka ndụ peerage na 2019 Prime Minister's Resignation Honours
E kere ya Baroness Blower, nke Starch Green na London Borough nke Hammersmith na Fulham, na 15 Ọktoba 2019
Dị ka onye ọrụ ibe ya, ọ nọdụrụ na House of Lords kemgbe 4 Nọvemba 2019
onyebuchigege@gmailcom ya na ya nọrọ afọ iri atọ na asaa, Dennis Charman, onye nkuzi lara ezumike nká, bụ odeakwụkwọ nke Hammersmith na Fulham NUT
Ụmụ ya nwanyị abụọ ewerela aha nna Charman-Blower
Sophie gara Mahadum nke Edinburgh, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere Edinburgh maka njikọ aka Stop the War, ka ọ na-amụ mmepeanya oge ochie nke Mediterenian na Middle East
Ọ sochiri nke a na MA na iwu ikike mmadụ na SOAS, Mahadum London, ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a maka Marie Stopes International
Ọ nwara ka a họpụta ya dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye ọrụ maka mpaghara London Assembly nke West Central na 2020, mana enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
Christine Ayanda Botlogetswe (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1995) bụ onye na-agba ọsọ si Botswana nke na-asọ mpi na mita 400
O sonyere na afọ 2016 Olympics, na-agba ọsọ 5237 na-erughị eru na agba nke mbụ
Ọ na-agba ọsọ maka Orapa Athletics Club ma onye Justice Dipeba na-azụ ya, onye na-azụkwa Isaac Makwala, nwoke nke asaa kachasị ọsọ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
O ruru eru ịnọchite anya Botswana na afọ 2020 Summer Olympics
N'èzí
Christine Dixie (amụrụ n'afọ 1966) bụ ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ nà South Africa

A mụrụ yá nà Cape Town, Dixie nwetara BFA ya na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand; mgbè nke a gasịrị ọ gàrà Mahadum Cape Town màkà ụlọ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, na-enweta ma nzere post-graduate ya na MFA ya site na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1993
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ, ma mepụta ọtụtụ nnukwu ihe
Ọrụ nrụnye ya nke afọ 2009 The Binding, nke nwéré ihe ọkpụkpụ isii, ebe ịchụàjà isii, etchings isii, na mbipụta dijitalụ abụọ, bụ nke National Museum of African Art zụrụ na 2010

Ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie ahụ nwekwara mbipụta nke 2000 mezzotint Hide to contain or retirement from sight, ya 2001 ọrụ Unravel, na ya 2007 Even in the Long Descent I-V A pụkwara ịchọta ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke New York Public Library, Johannesburg Art Museum, na Isiko National Art Museum
Dixie akụziwo na Mahadum Rhodes na Grahamstown n'oge ọrụ ya
N'afọ 2012, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà iri na ise nyèrè onyinye Artist Research Fellowship site na Smithsonian Institution
Ọrụ ya, nke akpọrọ The Heroic Explorer and Angelic Girl, lekwasịrị anya na ụdị nwoke na nwanyị nke narị afọ nke irí na itoolu ma jiri ihe na National Portrait Gallery na Museum of American History
Bevan de Wet, ónyé na-ebi akwụkwọ na Johannesburg, bụ otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ mbụ ya
Christine Nakwang Tubo nke a makwaara dị ka Christine Tubo Nakwang bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda bụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị nke ndị omeiwu nke Kaabong District ugbu a

Christine so na onye nnọchi anya National Resistance Movement (NRM) na ntuli aka nke 2021 nke mere n'ihi na Rose Lily Akello onye bụbu onye nnọchianya nwanyị nke Kaabong District họọrọ ịnọchite anya Karenga District e mepụtara ọhụrụ nke e wepụtara na Kaabong district
A họpụtara ya karịa Fadouta Ahmed na Agnes Napio bụ ndị nọkwa n'okpuru tiketi NRM
Nakwang na-asọ mpi na onye nnọchiteanya nke Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) Judith Adyaka Nalibe onye hapụrụ asọmpi ahụ n'ihi ebubo nke nkwado dị nta site na pati ya
Mkpa ọ dị imeziwanye ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ na ahụike na Kaabong District edepụtara dị ka isi ebumnuche nke onye omeiwu a họpụtara ọhụrụ bụ Christine Tubo Nakwang
A mụrụ Christine na 7 Nọvemba 1967 na Kaabong District
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego site na ọrụ
Ọ malitere njem agụmakwụkwọ ya na Komukuny Girls maka praịmarị ya ebe ọ nwetara asambodo Primary Leaving Examinations na 1982, wee gaa Kangole Girls Secondary School ebe ọ nwetara nzere UCE na 1986
O mechara sonye n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Moroto maka UACE n'afọ 1989
Ọ sonyeere Mahadum Nkumba maka diplọma dị elu na Accounting na 1992
N'ikpeazụ, ọ gara Mahadum Kampala International ebe ọ gụrụ nzere bachelors na nchịkwa azụmahịa (BBA) n'afọ 2006
Christine malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ụmụ nwoke Komukuny nakwa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Kaabong
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-anọchite anya onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na Kangole Girls SS na 1990, site na 1993 ruo 1994 ọ bụ onye na-akwụ ụgwọ na Moroto Catholic Procure

N'afọ 1995, ọ ghọrọ onye na-elekọta ụlọ ahịa nke ụlọ ọrụ Oxfam GB Kotido Field, mgbe ahụ onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na Dodoth Agro-pastoralist development Organization gara n'ihu wee sonye na Terra Firma Construction Company dị ka onye nchịkwa n'otu oge ahụ na-eje ozi dị ka onye kansụl LC5 nke Kaabong District site na 1996 ruo 2000
Ọ ghọrọ onye omeiwu maka Kaabong District site na 2001 ruo 2011
Ọ ghọrọ onye otu na Kaabong District service Commission na 2012 na 2015 ma bụrụkwa onye otu ndị omeiwu site na Septemba 2019 ruo taa
Christine malitere njem ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya dị ka onye kansụl LC5 nke Kaabong District site na 1996 ruo 2000
O meriri na ntuli aka nke afọ 2006 maka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị nke ndị omeiwu ebe ọ gbara ọsọ dị ka onye na-azọ onwe ya
N'oge ntuli aka nke afọ 2006, Akello Lucy gbara akwụkwọ megide Christine n'ụlọ ikpe ebe ọ bụ na ọ naghị enwe afọ ojuju na nsonaazụ ntuli aka 2006

Nke a mere ka ewepụta Christine maka nwanyị so na ndị omeiwu ma mee ntuli aka dịka iwu si dị na Akello Lucy ghọrọ nwanyị so na omeiwu nke Kaabong District na 2017Mgbe Akello Lucy họọrọ ịnọchite anya Karenga District, ọ hapụrụ oche efu ma nke a dugara n'ịhazi ntuli aka na 2019 ebe a họpụtara Christine wee bụrụ nwanyị so na ndị omeiwu
Ọ gara n'ihu na-asọ mpi maka otu ọkwa ahụ na ntuli aka ndị na-adịbeghị anya nke 2021 dị ka onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ NRM ebe ọ pụtara dị ka onye mmeri
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Kaabong District

Christine Nyatanyi (16 Julaị 1965 26 Septemba 2011) bụ onye Rwandan na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye jere ozi dị ka Minista nke steeti na-ahụ Maka ihe gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Ministrị nke Gọọmentị Obodo, site n'ọnwa October 2003 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'ọnwa Septemba 2011
A mụrụ ya na Rwanda n'ụbọchị 16 Julaị 1965
Ọ gara Kharkiv National University of Economics, na Kharkiov, Ukraine, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Economics n'afọ 1987
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Odessa Institute of National Economy, gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1991 na Masters na atụmatụ ụlọ ọrụ
Christine Ijeoma Ohuruogu, MBE (a mụrụ na 17 May 1984) bụ onye ọsọ na egwuregwu nke British nke na-agba ọsọ 400 metres, ebe o si tuta ugo Olympic, Ụwa nakwa Commonwealth champion
Onye mmeri nke Olympic n'afọ 2008, nakwa onye ugo ọla ọcha n'afọ 2012, ọ tụrụ ugo ụzọ abụọ nke Ụwa, maka na o meriri na 400 m na asọrọma mpi nke Ụwa na 2007 nakwa 2013

O ritekwara ugo ọla nke ụwa ugboro isii na 4 x 400m relay nke ụmụ nwanyị ka onye otu ndị Great Britain nakwa Northern Ireland (atọ ka e nyere ya maka mwepụ e wepụrụ ndị ọzọ maka ị ñụ ọgwụ) nakwa ọla bronze na Olympic na 4 x 400m relay umu nwanyi na 2008 Beijing Games nakwa 2016 Rio Games, Olympic ya nke ikpeazụ
Ohuruogu na Merlene Ottey nakwa Usain Bolt kere ọnụọgụ ugo nke ụwa - 9 n'etiti 2005 World Championships in Athletics nakwa Olympic nke afọ 2016

Oge mgbacha ọsọ nke Ohuruogu bụ 4941 seconds, nke o nwetara na 2013 World Championships, gafere oge nke UK si n'aka Kathy Cook n'afọ1984 n'oge 002 seconds, n'otu aka ahụ nke mere ya nwanyị British mbụ ritere ugo ụwa abụọ, nakwa nwanyị British nke mbụ nwetara ugo ụwa atọ
Her relay bronze at the 2016 Summer Olympics made her only the second British track and field athlete, after Steve Backley to win medals at three successive Olympic Games
She is coached by Lloyd Cowan
Christine Douts Qunta (amụrụ 1952) bụ onye odee South Africa, ọka iwu na onye ọchụnta ego
Ọ jerela ozi na bọọdụ dị iche iche nke ọha na nke onwe, na ọrụ ya n'akụkụ dị iche iche a kọwawo dị ka nke a na-ejikọta ya site n'ọchịchọ maka ọha mmadụ na-akwụwa aka ọtọ na nke nweere onwe ya

Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe ike na mgbochi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ Black Consciousness Movement (BCM) n'oge 1970 wee nọrọ afọ iri na asaa na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na-amụ ma na-eme iwu na Australia, Botswana na Zimbabwe, tupu ọ laghachi South Africa n'afọ 1993
A mụrụ Christine Qunta na Kimberley, South Africa n'afọ 1952
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ ya na 1970, o tinyere onwe ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ

Ọ bụ onye isi mpaghara nke South African Students' Organisation na Mgbakọ Ndị Ojii na Mahadum Western Cape na 1970s wee so na narị narị ụmụ akwụkwọ na-akwado ụmụ akwụkwọ hapụrụ agụmakwụkwọ ha n'oge ọpụpụ afọ 1973 iji rụkwuo ọrụ

ya na ndị mmadụ na-akpachi anya, nke 'na-achịkọta obodo ruo n'ókè nke na a manyere ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ iwere onye isi osote onye isi ojii mbụ, Richard van der Ross' Mgbe gọọmentị nwụchiri ya maka ịgba mbọ ya, ọ gbapụrụ na mba ahụ wee nye ya mgbapu na Botswana, nọrọ na ndọrọ n'agha ruo afọ nke 1993
Ọ gara n'ihu mụọ iwu n'Australia na Mahadum New South Wales, Sydney (BA, LLB, 1981), mechara na-eme iwu na Australia, Botswana na Zimbabwe, tupu ọ laghachi South Africa n'afọ 1993 wee rụọ ọrụ
dị ka onye ndụmọdụ gbasara iwu maka Sanlam
N'afọ 1994 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Restructuring of Business Institute na International Development Law Institute na Rome, Italy
Mpaghara nka ya bụ iwu ụlọ ọrụ na-elekwasị anya na iwu ụlọ ọrụ
N'afọ 1995 ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ iwu nke ya ọkachamara na iwu ụlọ ọrụ, Qunta Incorporated, na CBD nke Cape Town bụ ụlọ ọrụ ojii mbụ mere ya
Ọ bụkwa onye isi na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ruo afọ 2008 mgbe ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ka ọ lekwasị anya na azụmahịa ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi South Africa ruo mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'afọ 2009

Qunta malitere ibipụta ihe odide ya mgbe ọ nọ na mba ọzọ, gụnyere mkpokọta uri Hoyi Na! Azania Poems of an African Struggle (1979) na Heroes & other Treasures (1990), yana edezi akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo na-abụghị akụkọ ifo Women in South Africa (1987)

Ọ bụkwa onye edemede nke onye na-atụ egwu ime ihe ike Ntuziaka vlanahụ maka ndị ọkachamara ojii (1995) na akwụkwọ ọhụrụ ya bụ Why We are Not a Nations Essays on agbụrụ na mgbanwe na South Africa (2016)
Qunta abụrụla onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, na ọrụ ya apụtala n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, n'ime ha bụ anthology Daughters of Africa (1992)

N'afọ 2013, ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na-abụghị uru Seriti sa Sechaba (aha nke pụtara 'nsọpụrụ nke mba') na-achọ 'ibipụta akụkọ ifo na ndị na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nke ndị Black (African, Colored and Indian) na-ede akwụkwọ na-egosipụta ahụmahụ na omenala ndụ
n'ime ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na South Africa', na bekee na asụsụ ụmụ amaala
Christine Ross Barker bụ onye amụrụ na (2 Jenụwarị 1866 na 25 June 1940) bụ onye Canada na-eme udo na onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị, na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'oge agha
Ọ bụ onye otu Georgist Movement, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Women's Henry George League na Manhattan ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere na onye isi oche mbụ nke Women't Peace Union
A mụrụ Christine Ross na 2 Jenụwarị 1866 na Little Bras d'Or na Cape Breton Island, Nova Scotia, Canada na Christina Isabella (née MacKay / McKay) na John Ross
Obere ihe ka a maara banyere ndụ ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata, mana ọ kwagara New York City wee lụọ Wesley E
Barker na 23 Disemba 1903 na Manhattan
Barker bụ nwa Hersey (née Knowlton) na Wesley E
barker, Sr
nke Springfield, Massachusetts
Di ya, nke a maara dị ka 'Will' bụ onye nta akụkọ na onye otu onye otu onye Canada bụ onye nkuzi, Mary Manhattan, bụ onye Canada, Mary, bụ onye a ga-asọpụrụ, na 1905 bụ onye Canada Single Tax Club
Barker sonyere n'òtù ụmụ nwanyị na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị nakwa Women's Henry George League (WHGL) nke Manhattan
Ka ọ na-erule 1904, ọ na-ekwu okwu maka otu ahụ, na-eme ihe ngosi na Carrie Chapman Catt na Maud Nathan
Ka ọ na na-erula 1905, ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche nke WHGL, nke ebumnuche ya bụ iji otu ụtụ isi dochie ụdị ụtụ isi niile na ihe onwunwe, ya bụ ụdị ịgbazite ala
O sonyere na Progressive Women's Suffrage Union's Parade na Wall Street na Manhattan na 1908, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị otu ndị otu nzukọ ahụ
N'ime ha na-ahụ maka ya
Nchịkwa ha
Nọgharị United States, dị ka ọ laghachiri na Canada, dị ka onye Canada, Ka ọ na Canada, ka ọ na-akọta, ka ọ sonyeere United Canada,
N'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, Barker kewapụrụ onwe ya na klọb ụmụ nwanyị azụmaahịa na Toronto, nke ọ na-eduzi, n'ihi na ha kwadoro agha
Kama nke ahụ, ọ kwadoro nzukọ ụmụ nwanyị na The Hague, ndị ga-emepụta Women's International League for Peace and Freedom (WILPF)

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ onye otu WILPF, Barker chere na ha enweghị mkpebi siri ike ịnọgide na-alụ ọgụ dị ka ndị na-eme udo ma mee nkwekọrịta maka agha site na ịzụta nkwekọrịta agha, ịkpa ngwongwo na ịkpa bandeeji

Mgbe na 1921, Barker tụrụ aro ka e nwee nzukọ na Niagara, Ontario n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị America na Canada iji kwurịta ebumnuche udo ha, ọ gakwuuru Women's Peace Society (WPS) karịa WILPF iji nyere ya aka ịhazi ya
WPS kewara na WILPF n'ihi otu enweghị nkwenye maka ihe kpatara ya nke na-enye nsogbu Barker

Site na nzukọ ahụ, nke e mere n'etiti 19 na 21 Ọgọst, e kere Women's Paz Union, iji jikọta ụmụ nwanyị si Canada, Latin America na United States, onye na-agbata, onye isi oche, bụ onye isi oche nke United States, ka ọ rụkọọ ọrụ maka udo
Thomas Tone, bụ onye mbụ, ka New York City, Thomas Tker, nyere iwu, nyere iwu dị ka New York, gaa rụọ ọrụ maka udo, ka New City, Thomas,
Na Septemba 1927, Barker bụ otu n'ime ndị ọkà okwu a kpọtụrụ aha na Henry George Congress, nke e mere na New York City
Ọ bụghị naanị na ọ sonyere na Congresses nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, na-aga nzukọ 1934, 1936, na 1938, kamakwa ọ na-etinye aka na Henry George School na Toronto
Di ya nwụrụ na 26 June 1936 izu abụọ mgbe ha gachara 1936 School Dinner na New York Town
Barker nwụrụ na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa June 2021 na afọ 1940 na London, Ontario, Canada ma lie ya na Brookside Cemetery, New Glasgow, Pictou County, Nova Scotia
Christmas pudding bụ pudding mkpụrụ osisi a mịrị amị na-atọ ụtọ nke a na-ejikarị eme ihe dị ka akụkụ nke nri abalị Krismas na mbà Britain na mba ndị ọzọ a na ebupụ omenala ahụ
Ọ malitere na England oge ochie, na ntụziaka mbụ na-eji mkpụrụ osisi kpọrọ nkụ, suet, achịcha, ntụ ọka, àkwá na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, yana mmiri dị ka mmiri ara ehi ma ọ bụ mmanya siri ike
Ka oge na-aga, usoro nri ghọrọ ihe dị mgbagwoju anya
N'afọ 1845, onye na-ede akwụkwọ nri Eliza Acton dere usoro nri mbụ maka ihe ọ kpọrọ 'Christmas pudding'
A na-akpọ nri ahụ mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka plum pudding (ọ bụ ezie na nke a nwekwara ike izo aka na ụdị pudding ndị ọzọ e siri esi nke gụnyere mkpụrụ osisi kpọrọ nkụ)
A na-eji okwu 'plum' eme ihe maka ihe anyị ga-akpọ ugbu a 'mkpụrụ vaịn' kemgbe narị afọ nke iri na asatọ, na pudding enweghị n'ezie plums
Ọtụtụ ezinụlọ nwere usoro nri nke ha maka pudding Krismas, ụfọdụ na-enye site n'ezinụlọ ruo ọtụtụ ọgbọ
N'ụzọ bụ isi, usoro nri ahụ na-ejikọta ihe ndị dị oké ọnụ ma ọ bụ ihe ndị dị oke ọnụ, ọkacha ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ nke dị oke mkpa n'ịzụlite ísì ya pụrụ iche, ma na-ejikarị suet eme ya
Ọ gbara ọchịchịrị, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ oji n'ọdịdị n'ihi shuga gbara ọchịchukwu na treacle ojii n'ọtụtụ ntụziaka, na ogologo oge isi nri ya

Enwere ike iji mmiri nke mkpụrụ osisi citrus, brandy na mmanya na-aba n'anya mee ka ngwakọta ahụ dị mmiri (ụfọdụ usoro nri na-akpọ maka biya gbara ọchịchịrị dị ka nke dị nro, nke siri ike ma ọ bụ nke na-ebu ibu)
Tupu narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, a na-esi pudding Krismas nke England n'ime ákwà pudding, a na'egosipụtakarị ya dị ka gburugburu
Ụdị ejiji nke oge Victorian gụnyere itinye bat n'ime efere wee kpoo ya, wee gbasaa pudding, tinye ya na efere, ma jiri ihe na-acha uhie uhie chọọ elu ya mma
Isi nri mbụ na-agụnyekarị ịṅụ mmiri ruo ọtụtụ awa

Ọtụtụ ntụziaka tupu narị afọ nke iri abụọ na-eche na a ga-enye pudding ozugbo, mana na ọkara nke abụọ nke narị afọ nke abụọ, ọ ghọrọ ihe a na-ahụkarị iji mee ka pudding dịghachi n'ụbọchị a na-enye ya, na ntụziaka gbanwere ntakịrị iji nye ohere maka ntozu okè
Iji jee ozi, a na-eme ka pudding ahụ dịghachi ọkụ site na ịṅụ mmiri ọzọ, ma jiri brandy na-ekpo ọkụ kpuchie ya nke a na-etinye ọkụ
Enwere ike iri ya na ofe siri ike (na-abụkarị brandy butter ma ọ bụ rum butter), cream, lemon cream, ice cream, custard, ma ọ bụ bechamel na-atọ ụtọ, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-agbanye ya ihe uto
Enwere ike ịme ihe atụ nke usoro nri oge Great Depression maka pudding Christmas kama izu ole na ole tupu ya dịka ọ dị na pudding ọdịnala, ọ bụ ezie na a ka na-esi ya ma ọ bụ na-esi ísì
N'iburu n'uche ihe onwunwe dị ụkọ maka ezinụlọ ndị dara ogbenye n'oge ịda mbà n'obi, usoro nri a na-eji tii oyi eme ihe maka ụtọ kama brandy ma ọ nweghị àkwá eji na ngwakọta ahụ
Nchịkọta a adịghị arọ dị ka pudding ọdịnala

E nwere akụkọ ifo a ma ama na njikọ nke plum pudding na Krismas laghachiri na omenala na England oge ochie na 'a ga-eme pudding na abalị iri abụo na ise na ụbọchị Sundai mgbe Atọ n'Ime Otu gasịrị, na a kwadebere ya na ihe 13 iji nọchie anya Kraịst na ndịozi 12, nakwa na onye ọ bụla nọ n'ezinụlọ na-akpali ya site n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ gaa n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ iji sọpụrụ ndị Magi na njem ha n'akụkụ ahụ'
Otú ọ dị, usoro nri maka pudding plum na-apụta karịsịa, ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị kpamkpam, na narị afọ nke 17 na mgbe e mesịrị
Mary Kettilby nyere otu n'ime usoro nri mbụ nke plum pudding n'akwụkwọ ya nke afọ 1714 ihe njikota gụnyere ihie dị karịa ihe ngosi nke ụgwọ akwuru di nde narị ato na isi nri, Physick na nyocha ahu

E nwere akụkọ ifo a ma ama na nke na-enweghị ihe akaebe na afọ 1714, George nke Mbụ nke Great Britain (nke a na-akpọ mgbe ụfọdụ Pudding King) rịọrọ ka e nye pudding plum dị ka akụkụ nke oriri eze ya na Krismas mbụ ya na England
Ndị nna nna Christmas pudding nwere ike ịgụnye pudding dị ụtọ dịka ndị dị na Harleian MS 279, croustades, malaches whyte, creme e siri esi (ụdị custard a kpaliri), na sippets
Ihe dị iche iche na usoro dị iche iche nke usoro nri ochie ndị a na-apụta na pudding prune mbụ

Ihe atụ mbụ nke akpa pudding (na-enweghị mkpụrụ) bụ 'fraunche mele' na Liber Cure Cocorum Pudding 'nwere nnukwu uru' nke na ọ dịghị mkpa ka esi ya n'ọkụ, ihe 'ọtụtụ ezinụlọ ndị nọ n'ọkwá dị ala enweghị'
Pudding bu ụzọ na-enwekarị anụ, yana ihe ndị na-atọ ụtọ, na tupu a na-etinye ya n'ime ákwà, enwere ike itinye ihe ndị ahụ n'ime eriri afọ ma ọ bụ afọ nke anụmanụ, dị ka haggis ma ọ bụ sausages
Ọ bụghị ruo n'afọ 1830 ka achịcha e siri esi nke ntụ ọka, mkpụrụ osisi, suet, shuga na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, niile jupụtara na holly, mere ka ọ pụta ìhè, na-ejikọwanye na Krismas
Onye na-esi nri n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Sussex Eliza Acton bụ onye mbụ zoro aka na ya dị ka 'Christmas Pudding' n'akwụkwọ ya kacha ere ahịa na 1845 Modern Cookery for Private Families
Ọ bụ na ngwụcha oge Victorian ka akụkọ ifo 'Stir up Sunday' malitere ịmalite

Nchịkọta maka Sunday tupu Ọbịbịa na Church of England's Book of Common Prayer na-amalite site n'okwu ndị a 'Kwụsị, anyị na-arịọ gị arịrịọ, O Onyenwe anyị, uche nke ndị gị kwesịrị ntụkwasị obi; ka ha, n'ụzọ zuru oke mụọ mkpụrụ nke ezi ọrụ'
Nke a dugara n'omenala nke ịkwadebe pudding Krismas n'ụbọchị ahụ nke a maara dị ka Stir-up Sunday, nke jikọtara ya na megharị nke pudding Krismas
Omenala nke iri pudding Krismas bụ nke ndị Britain na-achị ala ọzọ buuru n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke ụwa

[citation needed] Ọ bụ nri a na-ahụkarị na Republic of Ireland [citation necessary], Australia, New Zealand [citation required], Canada na South Afrika [citation mkpa] N'oge niile nke ndị Britain, pudding bụ nnọchiteanya nke ịdị n'otu n'Alaeze Ukwu Britain
N'afọ 1927, ndị Empire Marketing Board (EMB) degaara Master of the Royal Household akwụkwọ ozi, na-arịọ ka e nye ya akwụkwọ nri e ji mee pudding Krismas maka ezinụlọ eze
Eze na Eze Nwanyị nyere Leo Amery, onye isi nke EMB, ikike iji usoro nri ahụ mee ihe na mbipụta na Nọvemba na-esote
Onye isi nri nke eze, Henry Cédard, nyere usoro nri ahụ
Iji kesaa ntụziaka ahụ, EMB ga-emeri ihe ịma aka abụọ nha na ihe ndị mejupụtara ya
Nke mbụ, a tụrụ usoro nri mbụ iji jeere mmadụ iri anọ ozi, gụnyere ezinụlọ eze niile na ndị ọbịa ha
A mara EMB aka ka ọ rụgharịa usoro nri ahụ iji jeere naanị mmadụ asatọ ozi
Nke abụọ, a ghaghị ịgbanwe ihe ndị e ji mee pudding iji gosipụta echiche nke Alaeze Ukwu ahụ
A ghaghị iji nlezianya mee ka mmalite nke ihe ọ bụla na-emepụta ihe na-anọchite anya nke ọ bụla n'ime ọtụtụ ógbè Alaeze Ukwu ahụ
Brandy si Saịprọs na nutmeg si West Indies, nke e chefuru n'amaghị ama na ntụziaka gara aga, mere ngosipụta pụrụ iche
Otú ọ dị, e nwere ọtụtụ ógbè ndị na-emepụta otu nri ahụ
Nchịkọta ikpeazụ gụnyere Australian currants, South African stone raisins, Canadian apụl, Jamaican rum na English Beer, n'etiti ihe ndị ọzọ niile sitere n'ebe dị n'Alaeze Ukwu ahụ
Mgbe emechara ihe ndị ahụ, e zigara akwụkwọ akụkọ mba na magazin ụmụ nwanyị a ma ama usoro nri eze
A na-ebipụtakwa mkpụrụ akwụkwọ ma nyefee ọha na eze n'efu
Nchịkọta ahụ bụ ihe ịga nke ọma dị egwu, ebe ọtụtụ puku arịrịọ maka ntụziaka ahụ jupụtara n'ọfịs EMB
N'afọ 1931, e mere ahịa Krismas kwa afọ nke People's Dispensary for Sick Animals na Royal Albert Hall na 24 na 25 Nọvemba
A na-egosipụta pudding Krismas nke dị tọn iri, nke kachasị ukwuu e mepụtara ruo n'oge ahụ
A maara usoro nri ahụ dị ka 'Prince of Wales' Empire Christmas Pudding'
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Times kwuru na 'Onye isi obodo London ekwewo nkwa inye pudding mbụ ya
Ndị Kọmishọna Ukwu nke Dominions ga-eso ya, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọha na eze ga-enwe ohere ịkpali ya
Prince of Wales (Edward nke asatọ) bụ onye nkwado nke ọrụ ebere PDSA
E kewara ya na obere pudding 11,208, nke e kesara n'etiti ndị ogbenye na mba ahụ dum
Ma Manchester na Salford, dịka ọmụmaatụ, nwetara 512 nke ọ bụla
Na America, omenala nke Christmas pudding abịala n'ụbọchị tupu nnwere onwe
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akpọrọ The Williamsburg Art of Cookery nke Helen Bullock dere na US n'afọ 1742
N'etiti ihe ndị a na-etinye ya, ọ na-agụnye otu pound nke mkpụrụ osisi na shuga dị iche iche, gbakwunyere ọkara pound nke ọ bụla nke akpụkpọ anụ (citron, oroma na lemon)
Ọ na-agbakwunye otu pint nke brandy na àkwá 12
N'oge Victorian, omenala toro na a ga-eme pudding Krismas na ma ọ bụ ozugbo Sunday gasịrị 'na-esote tupu Ọbịbịa', ya bụ, izu anọ ruo ise tupu Krismas
Nchịkọta maka Sunday ahụ na Book of Common Prayer nke Chọọchị England, dị ka e ji ya mee ihe site na narị afọ nke 16 (ma ka dị na chọọchị ọdịnala), na-agụ

Christophe Madihano (amụrụ na 10 Ọktoba 1995 na Goma) bụ onye na-ese foto azụmahịa nke Congo, onye edemede, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe osise nke ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na isiokwu Afrofuturism na ọdịbendị, njirimara, na akụkọ ifo
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Madi TV, ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn na-akwụ ụgwọ ntụrụndụ na Democratic Republic of the Congo

Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 2017 ma dọta uche mba ụwa na ọrụ ya 'The Kongo Kingdom', nke onye na-agụ egwu Swedish-Congolese Mohombi pụtara dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi nke Kongo Kingdom

A mụrụ ya n'abalị 15 ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1981 na Harare, Zimbabwe
O nwere ejima, Matt Hoffman
Christopher Rajendran Hyman CBE (amụrụ na 5 Julaị 1963 na Durban, South Africa) bụ onye isi (CEO) nke Serco Group plc site na 2002 ruo Ọktọba 2013
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka Arthur Andersen
N'afọ 1989, o meriri mgbanwe ọnwa iri na asatọ na Ernst & Young na London, bụ ndị were ya n'ọrụ mgbe ọnwa anọ gasịrị
Serco chụrụ ya n'afọ 1994, Hyman ghọrọ onye nduzi ego Europe, na 1999 e mere ya onye nduzi ego otu
N'afọ 2002, Hyman ghọrọ onye isi
A họpụtara Hyman ka ọ bụrụ ọchịagha nke Order of the British Empire (CBE) na 2010 Birthday Honours maka ọrụ maka azụmahịa na ọrụ ebere
Hyman gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọrụ ya nke onye isi oche nke Serco n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2013 na-esote ebubo na Serco kwụrụ ndị ahịa gọọmentị ụgwọ karịrị akarị
Hyman bụ onye na-agba ọsọ ụgbọ ala ma sọọ mpi na usoro Formula Palmer Audi na FIA GT3 European Championship
Di na nwunye a lụrụ Lianne, onye South Africa ibe ya, nwere ụmụ abụọ
Ọ nọ n'okpukpu nke iri anọ na asaa nke World Trade Center n'oge mwakpo September 11 na 2001
Sir Christopher Frank Caradini Lee, CBE, CStJ, (27 nke Ọ́nwá 5, 1922 - 2015) bụ̀ ónyé onye Àlá Bekee bụ òmẹ́kà nà ọ̀bụ́ ábụ̀
nwa Lee bìdòrò ị́ mẹ̀ kà ndi ájọ̄ nà há màkàrì yá màkà ihnye ó mẹ̀rẹ̀ kà Kauntu Dracula nà úsòrò òzìjè nke Mmẹ-ójọ́ Anyịke

Ihnye ózọ́ mádu màrà ya màkà bụ kwa nwa Francisco Scaramanga nà òzìjè James Bond nke The Man with the Golden Gun (1974), Saruman nà òzìjè gbà àtọ́ The Lord of the Rings (2001–2003) nà òzì àtọ́ The Hobbit film (2012–2014), nà Count Dooku nà òzìjè nke ògụ àbúo nke Star Wars (2002, 2005)
Christopher R
Mwashinga, Jr (a mụrụ na 9 Jenụwarị 1965) bụ onye edemede na onye na-ede uri nke Tanzania si Mbeya, Tanzania nke bi na United States
O bipụtara akwụkwọ nke uri Ndị Kraịst, nkà mmụta okpukpe, ozi ala ọzọ, na akụkọ okpukpe
E bipụtara uri ya n'akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị a ma ama na United States, na mba ndị ọzọ gụnyere Kenya, Singapore, na Tanzania
Ọ na-ede akwụkwọ na Bekee na Kiswahili
A mụrụ Christopher Richard Mwashinga nye Richard Male Mwashinga Na Christine Mwashinga n'ógbè Igawilo nke Mbeya, Tanzania
Ọ nọrọ afọ 20 mbụ ya na West Kilimanjaro ihe dịka 1,000 kilota (620 mi) site n'obodo ya dị n'ebe ndịda ugwu nke Tanzania
Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụ iri na otu nne na nna ya mụrụ

Maka ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya, Mwashinga gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praemari Ngare-Nairobi dị na West Kilimanjaro tupu ọ kwaga n'ebe ndịda ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Igawilo dị na Mbeya (O-Levels), na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọrịta nwoke na Songea (A-Level) na Tanzania

A zụrụ ya na nkà mmụta okpukpe na Tanzania Adventist College (nke bụzi Mahadum Arusha) na Tanzania na Mahadum nke Eastern Africa, Baraton na Kenya ebe ọ nwetara nzere BA na nkà mmụta nkà mmụta okpukpe
Mgbe ahụ, ọ kwagara maka ọmụmụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Seventh-day Adventist Theological Seminary na campus nke Mahadum Andrews, nke dị na Berrien Springs, Michigan, US
Na seminarị, Mwashinga nwetara nzere masta abụọ Master of Divinity na Master of Arts in Religion (Systematic Theology)
Ọ na-emecha PhD na Systematic Theology n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ugbu a
Mwashinga lụrụ Ruth Michael Mwashinga ma ha mụtara ụmụ atọ Christopher Richard Mwashinga nke Abụọ, Anna Nakijwa Mwashinga, na Richard Aaron Mwashinga
Mwashinga na-enwe mmasị ịga njem na ọdịbendị ọhụrụ ka ọ na-ekwusa ma na-ede uri Ndị Kraịst ya na akụkọ ifo
Abụ uri
Ọrụ nke Christopher Mwashinga oru ngo 1 (Bekee)
Ọrụ nke Christopher Mwashinga 2 (Swahili)
Christopher Dean 'Chris' Myers bụ ónyé édémédé America na ónyé na-ese ihe, na-emepụta ọrụ ọdịbendị dị iche iche n'ọtụtụ ụzọ
Ụzọ ọ na-emekarị ka njikọ dị n'etiti ndị na-ese ihe ndị ọzọ dị mfe
Myers esorola nná ya, Walter Dean Myers, rụkọọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ foto ụmụaka, ọ bụkwa ónyé natara onyinye Coretta Scott King, yana nsọpụrụ dị iche iche
Chris Myers nwèrè akwụkwọ na Random House ugbu a
Myers gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Brown na 1995 na BA
na Art-Semiotics na American Civilization, nà Whitney Museum of Art Independent Studio Program nà 1996
Ọ bi na New York ugbu a
Christopher Myers egosila n'ọtụtụ ebe n'ụwa niile; ónyé na-ese ihe nwéré ndepụta dị ukwuu nke ihe ngosi onwé ya na nke otu
Myers aghọwo onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye, nsọpụrụ, na ebe obibi n'oge ogologo ọrụ ya

Christopher Ifekandu Okigbo (16 Ọgụstụ 1932-1967) bụ onye Naịjirịa na-ede Abụ, Onye nkuzi, na Onye ọgba akwụkwọ, onye nwụrụ maka nnwereonwe Biafra
A maara ya ebe niile dịka onye pụtara ihe ka ndị ọcha chịsịrị anyị dịka onye Afrịka na-ede Abụ na bekee na kwa onye ọgbara ọhụrụ na-ede akwụkwọ na 20 Senturi
A mụrụ Okigbo na 16 Ọgụstụ 1932, na obodo Ojoto, ihe dịka 10 maịlu (16 km) site na obodo Onịcha na Anambra Steeti
Nna ya bụ onye nkuzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndịozi ala ọzọ nke Katọlik n'oge ọchịchị Briten na Naịjirịa
Okigbo ji afọ ndụ ya niile na-agagharị na ọdụ
N'agbanyeghị na nna ya bụ ezigbo onye okpukperechi Kraịst, Okigbo nwere mmekọ, were kwere n'ikpeazụ ndụ ya, na nna nna nne ya lọrọ ya ụwa, dibịa arụsị Idoto bụ chi ndị Igbo
Idoto bụ aha mmiri a na-akpo mmiri ndị na obodo okigbo na kwa mmụọ mmiri nke mmiri ahụ nke pụtara nke ọma na Abụ ya 'Heavengate' (1962) nke malitere etu a
mgbe ọ nọ na 'Ebe dị aña' (1964), ọ mere- mmeme maka ịlaghachi okpukpe ọdịnala ya

Onye ọzọ bara uru na mbido ndụ Okigbo bụ nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye Pius Okigbo, onye mechara bụrụ onye ama ama n’ihe gbasara akụnaụba na onye nnọchite anya obodo Naịjirịa na European Economic Commission (EU)

Okigbo gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Government Koleji Umuahia (nke dị ugbu a na Abia Staeeti, Naịjirịa) afọ abụọ mgbe Chinua Achebe gụchara, onye edemede Naijiria ọzọ ama ama, nwetara onwe ya aha dịka onye na-agụ akwụkwọ na onye na-egwu egwuregwu
N’afọ sochirinụ, a nabatara ya na Mahadum Ibadan
Na mbụ ọ bu n'uche ịmụ ọgwụ, ọ gbanwere na Klasiks na afọ nke abụọ ya
Na kọleji, o nwetakwara mmata dịka ọpị pịyano nwere nkà, o soro Wole Soyinka na ngosipụta ọhaneze ya nke mbụ dịka onye ọbụ abụ
Ekwenyere na Okigbo dekwara egwu mbụ n'oge ahụ, agbanyeghị na ọ nweghị nkea dịgide nụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1956, ọ malitere ọtụtụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ebe na mba ahụ niile, ebe ọ na-eme ihe nkiri mbụ ya na abụ

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị Ụtaba na Naịjirịa nke 'United Africa Company', na 'Fiditi Grammar School' (ebe ọ kụziiri Latin), na n'ikpeazụ dịka onye nnyemaaka ọba akwụkwọ na Mahadum Naịjirịa na Nsụka, ebe o nyere aka mepee ọgbakọ ndị odee akwukwọ na Afrịka Association

N'ime afọ ndị ahụ, ọ malitere ibipụta ọrụ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ dị iche iche, ọkachasị Black Orpheus, akwụkwọ akụkọ edemede bu n'obi iji kpokọta ọrụ kacha mma nke ndị edemede na Afrịka na ndị Afrịka bụ Amerịka

Ọ bụ ezie na a pụrụ ịgụ abụ ya ụfọdụ dịka ngosipụta nkwado mba ka ndị ọcha chịsịrị mba Afrịka, o ji obi ike busoo Negritudu, bụ nke ọ katọrọ dị ka ịchụso ịhụnanya nke ' mistiki nke ojii ' maka ọdịmma ya; N'otu aka ahụ, ọ jụrụ echiche nke ahụmịhe nke otu ihe dị n'etiti ndị Afrịka na ndị isi ojii Amerịka, ezigbo echiche nkà ihe ọmụma dị iche na usoro nchịkọta akụkọ nke Black Orpheus
Ọ bụ maka ihi nke a ka ọ jụrụ ihe nrite mbụ nke abụ Afrịka enyere ya na 1966 'World Festival of Negro Arts' na Dakar, ọ na-ekwupụta na ọ dịghị ihe dịka 'Negro' maọbụ odee abụ ojii

Na 1963, ọ hapụrụ Nsụka ka ọ were ọnọdụ nke onye nnochi anya nke mkpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka na ',Cambridge University Press' na Ibadan, ọnọdụ ga-enye ya oghere ị na-aga 'United Kingdom', ebe a matara ya nke ọma
Na Ibadan, ọ bụ onye otu nke Mbari, litirarị klọb

O dere ma bipụta ọrụ ya mgbe o tolitere nke gụnyere ' Limits '(1964), ' Silences '(1962-1965), ' Laments of the Masks '(nke na-echeta ọmụmụ afọ otu narị nke WB Yeats nke agụrụ na Abụ Yoruba na 1964), Dance of the painted maiden (na-eto ọmụmụ nwa ya nwanyiị bụ Ọbịageli maọbụ Ibrahimat, onye echere dịka onye nne ya lọrọ ụwa) na Abụ ikpeazụ ya bụ ' Path of Thunder'(1965-1967) nke ebipụtara mgbe ọ Nwụrụ na 1971, ya na ọrụ ya kachasị mma bụ 'Labyrinths' nke chịkọtara abụ ndị ọzọ
Na 1966, nsogbu Naịjirịa bịa kaa njọ
Okigbo bi na Ibadan oge ahụ lotara na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa ka o chere ihe ga-eme nke mụtara na nkewa ndị ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa ka ha nwere onwe ha bụrụ Bịafra na 30 Mee 1967
O bi na Enugu
Ya na Achebe lụkọrọ ọrụ mmepe ụlọ ọrụ mbipụta bụ Citadel Press
Site na nkewa nke Biafra, Okigbo batara ozugbo soro na ndị agha steeti ọhụrụ, onye isi oru ebe a
Egburu ya na agha, aghagburu ya n'oge agha nke ndị agha mgbe lụrụ ọgụ na Nsukka, na obodo mahadum dị ebe ọ hụrụ olu ya dịka onye na-ede abụ, nke ọ ñụrụ iyi na iji ndụ ya chebe

Na mbụ, na ọnwa Julaị, ụlọ ya nke dị na Enugu, ebe ọtụtụ ederede ya (gụnyere mbido akwụkwọ ya) ka emebiri na nwakpo nke ndị agha NaịjirịaỌzọ ebibiri bụ 'Pointed Arches', akụkọ onwe ya nke ọ kọwara n'akwụkwọ ozi o degaara enyi ya na onye na-ede akụkọ ndụ ya bụ Sunday Anozie, dịka akụkọ banyere ahụmịhe nke ndụ na akwụkwọ ozi nke nyere aka iji mee ka echiche okike ya dị nkọ
Ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ ndị o dere nke na-emebighi na agha nke nwa ya nwanyị bụ Obịageli ketara, onye guzobere 'Christopher Okigbo Foundation' na 2005 iji mee ka ihe ncheta ya dịgide
Chukwuma Azuonye, Prọfesọ nke Agụmagụ Akwụkwọ ndị Afrịka na Mahadum Massachusetts Amherst na Boston, bụ onye nyere ndị ntọala ahụ aka hopụta ha na Jenụwarị 2006
ha maka Nationstù Mmụta, Sayensị na Ọdịbendị nke Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu (UNESCO)
Nchọpụta mbụ nke akwụkwọ Azụonye gosiri na-agbagheghị Abụ ọhụrụ ya na bekee nke gụnyere ukwe ala Bịafra, akwụkwọ Okigbo gụnyere nke e dere n'asụsụ Igbo

Abụ ndị Igbo na-atọ ụtọ nke na ha na-emepe ụzọ ọhụrụ na ọmụmụ abụ Okigbo, na-egbochi echiche ụfọdụ ndị nkatọ, ọkachasị troika ( Chinweizu, Onwuchekwa Jemie na Ihechukwu Madubuike) na 1980 'Towards the Decolonization of African Literature', na o ji ụbụrụ Afrịka ya were chụọ aja ka ọ were nweta mgbagoju nke 'Euro-modernism
'Elegy for Alto', abụ ikpeazụ nke Path of Thunder, ka a na-agụ taa dịka akwụkwọ ọgbụgba ndụ ikpeazụ 'nke na-egosipụta amụma nke ọnwụ nke ya, dịka atụrụ ejiri chuo aja maka nnwere onwe mmadụ
Nwanne nwoke Okigbo, Pius, bụ onye ọka mmụta akụnụba
Christopher Odhiambo Okinda (a mụrụ na 15 Disemba 1980), bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri The Constant Gardener na The White Massai E wezụga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa onye nduzi ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye edemede na onye na-egosi redio
A mụrụ ya na 15 Disemba 1980 n'obodo Mombasa, Kenya nye Elizabeth Apiyo Aruwa na Alois Okinda
Nna ya lụrụ karịa otu nwanyị, ya mere nne ya zụlitere ya, onye ya na ya bi
O bu ụzọ gaa Aga Khan Primary School (Parklands, Kenya) wee gaa Our Lady of Mercy Primary School n'afọ 1992
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ kwagara St Peter's Mumias Boys primary n'afọ 1994 ma mesịa St Mary's School (na Yala) n'afọ 1996
N'afọ 2005, ọ malitere ihe nkiri izizi na ihe nkiri na-akpali akpali The Constant Gardener nke Fernando Meirelles duziri
Okinda rụrụ obere ọrụ nkwado dịka 'Dọkịta' na ihe nkiri ahụ
Site na ihe ịga nke ọma nke nwa agbọghọ mbụ ya, a họpụtara ya na 2005 The White Massai
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri 'Something Productions'
Site na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, o mere egwuregwu ahụ n'asụsụ Dholuo nke nne ya
E wezụga ime ihe nkiri, ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye na-ahụ maka redio ụtụtụ na onye nduzi okike nke 'Hot 96 FM' na Kenya
Christopher Oywecha bụ onye na-ese ihe na-adịghị ahụ anya nke ọrụ ya na-egosi 'echiche ya banyere ọnọdụ mmadụ' dị ka nkọwa na-adịghị adị nke ndụ a na-ebi kwa ụbọchị
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa na mmanụ na acrylic na ihe osise dị egwu, nke dị n'ala nke ụdị ya
Ọ na-egosi ihu na mmetụta ndị mmadụ, na ihe omume na-emetụta ha na gburugburu ha
Oywecha emepụtala ọrụ maka ọrụ ndị metụtara UN ma gosipụta ihe osise na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche na Kenya

Sri Lankabhimanya Christopher Gregory Weeramantry, AM (17 Nọvemba 1926 意 5 Jenụwarị 2017) bụ onye ọka iwu Sri Lanka bụ onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Ikpe Mba Nile (ICJ) site n'afọ 1991 ruo afọ 2000, na-eje ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche ya site n'afọ 1997 ruo afọ 2000
Weeramantry bụ onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Sri Lanka site n'afọ 1967 ruo afọ 1972
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ emeritus na Mahadum Monash na dịka onye isi oche nke International Association of Lawyers against Nuclear Arms
Christy Ekpukhon Ihunaegbo (amuru 6 Febrụwarị 1985 na Asaba ) bu onyeoso si Naijiria nke ọkachamara na 400 mita
Oge kacha mma nkeonwe ya bụ 5111 sekọnd, ọ nwetara na Mee 2007 na Brazzaville
Na 2008, a mara ya ikpe nke metinolone doping
Enyere ngwaele ahụ na 17 February 2008 na ule asọmpi na Leipzig
Ekpukhon nwetara nkwusioru site na Maachị 2008 ruo Maachị 2010
Christy Uduak Essien-Igbokwe MFR (11 November 1960 - 30 June 2011) bụ onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-eme ihe egwuregwu na Naijiria
Mgbe ọ di ndụ, a na-akpọkarị ya Nigeria's Lady of Songs, a makwaara ya site n' abụ ya nke akpọrọ 'Seun Rere'
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke mbụ nke Òtù na-ahụ maka Ịkụ egwú nke 'Performing Musicians Association of Nigeria' (PMAN)
Ọ bụkwa onye nlekọta na-eduzi Soul Train entertainment limited
Essien-Igbokwe na-abụ abụ ya n' Igbo, Ibibio, Efik, Hausa, Yoruba nakwa n'asụsụ Bekee
N'ihi na Essien bụ onye n'asụ asụsụ Igbo, Hausa, Yoruba, English nke ọma, onyere ya ezi nnabata n;agbụrụ di iche iche
na nwaazụ ya Ibibio mere ka ọ bụrụ mkpesa nke na-agafe n'ahịrị agbụrụ
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ a na-akọwaghị na Lagos
A mụrụ Essien-Igbokwe na Okat, Onna Local Government Area nke Akwa Ibom State, Naijiria
Nne ya nwụnahụrụ ha mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ nakwa Nna ya n'afọ 2005
Ọ bụ n' Aba n' Abia State ka enyi nne ya ya na ya bi gbara ya ume ka ọ bụwa abụ ma zụtakwara ya otu ihe eji echebe egwu iji dee abụ ya
Essien-Igbokwe bidoro ọrụ agụm egwu ya n'otu di iche iche n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndiri dika Uka Onu's Club n' Unikoko n' Aba, Abia State
Ọ pụtara n'ihe omume 'Now Sound' na Nigerian Television Authority Channel 6, Aba
N'oge ahu otu emume a na-akpọ 'The New Masquerade' was also airing na-ezikwa n'otu Steshọn a
Mgbe otu n'ime ihe ngosi ahụ na-aga n'ihu, ọ tụziri otu onye nkedo nke na-ekwu usoro ya n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi, emesia e nyere ya ọkwa n' usoro a
N'afọ 1976, o sonyeere 'The New Masquerade' ma soro Akpenor, nwunye nke nwoke ahụ, bụ Jegede Sokoya (nke Claude Eke mere)Ọrụ ya n' ihe ngosi a mere ka ọ pụta ihe n'afọ 1977
O bidoro kwalite ọrụ egwu ọkachamara site na-iwepụta abụm egwu nke mbụ ya a na-akpọ 'Freedom'
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe odide ya ghọrọ egwu ama-ama, ma ọ dịghị nke mere nkeọma karia abụm ya n'afọ 1981 nke akpọrọ 'Ever My Liked My Person' nke Lemmy Jackson dere

Mgbe ọ bụla, ọ na-agba mbọ ịkwụsi nsogbu na-emetụta ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri nke Nollywood dika 'Flesh and Blood' na 'Scars of Womanhood',ha abụọ na-ekwu okwu banyere mmegbu ụmụaka na ibi úgwù ụmụ nwanyị
N'inwe ọchịchọ ime ka ndụ dị mma maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria,'Nigerian artists',ekwuru na ya malitere nzukọ mbụ nke mere ka e guzobe Performing Musicians Association of Nigeria na 1981
Ka otu afọ mesịrị, e guzobere òtù ahụ ma Eze Sunny Adé ghọrọ onyeisi oche na nwa Sonny Okosun na-eje ozi dị ka onye na-esote ya, ebe ya onwe ya bụ onye nlekota ego
N'agbata afọ 1996 na afọ 1999, ọ ghọrọ nwanyi isi nke mbụ nke òtù ahụ

Nwanyi omee nke Akwa Ibom a pụtara ihe na ihe ngosi a na-egosi n'ọtụtụ mba na mba ụwa ma nweekwa nsọpụrụ nke ịgụ na ime ihe a ga-emesị mara dị ka ụda egwu nke obodo ya, 'Akwa Ibom Mmi (My Akwa Ibom') na 1987, afọ nke okike ya
Ọ nwere ụlọ ahịa na Etinan, obodo ya dị n'Akwa Ibom State Akwa Ibom State ebe ọ na-ere ígwè obibi akwụkwọ
Ihe omume ndi ebere ya sitere n'afo 1980 mgbe ọ malitere imeri ihe kpatara obere ihe omuma n'ime obodo anyị gbasara umuaka Naijiria
Nke a pụtara ihe n' ọrụ ya dị ka
N'ezie, uru si n'ahịa nke akwụkwọ ya ndị gara aga na-anọgide na-eduzi ọrụ ebere na ndị nọ ná mkpa na ọha mmadụ

Christy Obekpa bụzị Oriakụ Aremu (A mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 15 n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1971) bụ onye Najiria na-eme egwuruegwu judoka, onye so sọọ mpi na katigori ọkara nke ndi oke ibu nke ụmụ nwanyị
O ritere ọla nchara n'afo1990 n'emume egwuruegwu Judo nke ndi Commonwealth na ọla ọcha na CW Judo Championship n'afo 1992
Oriakụ Aremu bụ nwaanyị mbu Naịjirịa ritere ola n'ihe emume egwuruegwu Judo
O ritekwara ola nchara abuo na 1999 n'emume All-African Games na otu ola nchara n'emume African Judo Championships n'afo 2000
N'afo 1990, na Commonwealth Judo Championship nke e mere na Auckland, New Zealand, o sonyere na ihe omume nke 72kg ebe o ritere ọla nchara
Na 1992 Commonwealth Judo Championships nke e mere na Cardiff, Wales, o sonyekwara ma ritekwa ọla ọcha na ihe omume 72kg
N'egwuruegwu All-Africa Games nke afo 1999 na Johannesburg, Obekpa sonyere n'emume nke 78kg na Open, ebe o ritere ola nchara abụọ
N'egwuruegwu African Judo Championship nke afo 2000 e mere na Algiers, Algeria, Obekpa ritere ọla nchara n'ihe omume nke 78kg
O sokwara n'emume Open were gbaa onye nke asaa
Christy Ohiaeriaku (amụrụ na 13 Disemba 1996) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị na-agba dịka onye na-edebe goolu
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Naijiria
Na klọb ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Osun Babes na Rivers Angels na Naijiria, na kemgbe 2016 maka IFK Ostersund na Sweden
Ohiaeriaku gbara Osun Babes bọọlụ dị ka onye na-edebe goolu mbụ ha họọrọ na Nigeria Women Premier League, ebe ndị otu ahụ mechara n'ọnọdụ nke atọ
Ọrụ a mere ka a kpọọ onye ahụ nọ n'afọ iri na ụma ka ọ bịa n'òtù mba
O mechara hapụ ya ka ọ sonye na ndị mmeri na-achị Rivers Angels mgbe ha meriri n'asọmpi abụọ ọzọ, tupu ha agafee Osun Babes na mbido afọ 2016
Na nkwupụta, o kelere ndị otu na ndị ọrụ nkwado na Rivers Angels, na-akọwa ha dị ka ezinụlọ
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ọ gafere n'akụkụ Swedish IFK Ostersund na nkwekọrịta otu afọ na nkwekọ nke nwere ike ịgbatị otu afọ ọzọ
Tupu asọmpi asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị nke Afrịka nke afọ 2014, a gụnyere Ohiaeriaku na ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Naijiria
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup, ebe ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-edebe goolu atọ ahọpụtara
Ọ bidoghị egwuregwu ọ bụla, kama ịbụ onye a na-ejighị dochie anya maka egwuregwu megide United States, Australia na Sweden n'ihe a kọwara dị ka 'ìgwè ọnwụ'
Na mbido 2016 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup, ọ nwere olileanya na ọ gara n'ihu na bọọlụ na Sweden ga-enyere ya aka inweta ọnọdụ na ndị otu ahụ
E mechara kpọọ aha ya na ndị otu maka asọmpi ahụ

Chrysoula Argyros (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na itoolu n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1954, Greek ) bụ Ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa nke na-ese na mmịrị na mmanụ
Ihe ndị Chrysoula họọrọ bụ n'ozuzu foto, ihe nkiri ndị Gris, ụlọ ochie na ndị mmadụ
Ọ sonyeere Watercolor Society nke South Africa n'afọ 1991 wee nweta mmekọrịta n'afọ 1993 na mmekọrịta dị elu n'afọ 2005, ma nata ọtụtụ onyinye site na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
E nyèrè Chrysoula ọrụ ise ihe màkà onye bụbu onye isi ala FW
De Klerk n'afọ 1994
Ọ sonyeere Miniature Art Society nke South Africa n'afọ1992 ma nata ọtụtụ onyinye
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ ónyé otu Miniature Painters, Sculptors & Gravers Society n'afọ 2006
Ndị otu a bụ site na ịkpọ òkù, site na votu nke ndị otu ahụ
A họpụtara Chrysoula n'afọ 2007 n'ime Miniature Artists of America dị ka onye otu mbinye aka
E guzobere ndị na-ese ihe nke America iji sọpụrụ ndị ọrụ pụrụ iche n'ọhịa nke obere ihe
A na-ahọrọ ndị na-achọ ịbata n'etiti ndị na-emeri ihe nrite na-aga n'ihu na nnukwu ihe ngosi nka
A họpụtara ya n'afọ 2012 dị ka onye otu Hilliard Society na UK
A họpụtakwara ya n'afọ 2013 dị ka onye otu Royal Miniature Society na UK
A mụrụ Chrysoula n'àgwàetiti Limnos nke Gris ma soro ezinụlọ ya kwaga South Africa n'afọ 1956
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na General Smuts High School na Vereeniging na Art dị ka otu n'ime ihe ọmụmụ ya
Chrysoula bịdọrọ ise ihe n'afọ 1982 n'okpuru nduzi nke Sheila Santilhano na ógè e mesịrị na 1998 na Hazel Thompson

Francis Chuck Patton bụ onye African-American na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri DC Comics a kpọrọ 'Justice League of America na 1980s, kpọmkwem maka oge ndị otu ahụ kwagara Detroit ma nwee ndị dike ọhụrụ, ndị nwere ọtụtụ ọdịbendị
Ya na onye edemede Gerry Conway, Patton kere Gypsy na Vibe, yana ịhazigharị Vixen na Steel, The Indestructible Man
Ọ bu onye na-ese ihe nkiri nke kụziri onwe ya, ọ bụ ezie na ọ nwere nzere na nka, mmetụta Patton gụnyere José Luis García-López, John Buscema, Gil Kane, Neal Adams, na Dick Giordano
Patton nwere mmasị na ọrụ nta akụkọ, mana a dọtara ya n'ọrụ ọchị n'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'ihi Giordano n'oge ahụ ọ bụ onye isi na DC
Patton banyere ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ihe nkiri na 1983 site na ịde obere akụkọ azụ nke Creeper na The Flash

Mgbe ọ dọtara udi aha dị iche iche nke gụnyere Green Lantern, The Brave and the Bold, na 'Green Arrow' nkwado ndabere na Detective Comics, Patton ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe nke Justice League of America malite na mbipụta August 1983
N'oge a, onye ya na Patton bi bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri Shawn McManus

Patton sere mbipụta # # 217–227 na 233–239 nke JLA, oge n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke aha ahụ mgbe ọ gbanwere mgbanwe dị ukwuu - gụnyere ndị ịsị omere nke Superman, Batman, na Wonder Woman na-ahapụ ndị otu ahụ, na iwebata usoro ọdịbendị ọhụrụ
Ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ anabataghị mgbanwe ndị a nke ọma, Patton hapụkwara aha ahụ ka ọ na-ewe iwe nke ndị Fans
for Na mgbakwunye na Gypsy na Vibe, Patton mekwara Cadre, Overmaster, na Paragon
Vibe aghọwo onye na-akwado ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn nke CW The Flash, nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Carlos Valdes gosipụtara
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Justice League, Patton enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma n'inweta ọrụ pensụl ọzọ

Kama nke ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na otu mbipụta ma ọ bụ obere oge nke utu aha DC dị ka Action Comics Weekly, Blue Beetle, Legion of Super-Heroes, The New Teen Titans, Omega Men, The Outsiders, Secret Origins, na Vigilante
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị nyere aka na DC Challenge limited series na 1985
N'oge a, Patton rụrụ ọrụ oge ụfọdụ maka Eclipse Comics na Marvel Comics, na utu aha ndị dị ka New DNAgents, Daredevil, na Classic X-Men
E lere ya anya iji dochie Todd McFarlane na-apụ apụ na The Incredible Hulk, mana ọ jụrụ onyinye ahụ mgbe a gwara ya ka ọ ṅomie ụdị nka McFarlane
N'afọ 1988, mgbe ọkara afọ iri gasịrị na ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ihe nkiri, Patton nwere nkụda mmụọ na ihe nkiri ma kwaga n'ime ihe nkiri telivishọn ụmụaka
Ọ bi na Los Angeles n'oge a, nke bụ ebe e mepụtara ọtụtụ usoro ihe nkiri
Ihe Patton nwetara gụnyere Dinosaucers, GI
Joe, Captain N The Game Master, The Adventures of Super Mario Bros
3, Inspector Gadget Saves Christmas, na Teen Titans

Patton aghọwo onye nduzi ihe nkiri na-aga nke ọma, na-elekọta ọrụ ndị dị ka Dead Space Downfall, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles na Todd McFarlane's Spawn, nke Patton nwetara Emmy Award maka 'Outstanding Animated Program'
