Chude Jideonwo (amụrụ na abalị iri na isii n'onwa Maachi, n'afọ 1985) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn Naijiria, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye ọchụnta ego mgbasa ozi
Ọ bụkwa onye ọka iwu
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Joy, Inc, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe ga-abara Amerika n'uru, nwere ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka na Naijiria, nke ebumnuche ya bụ ime ka ndị mmadụ nwee obi ụtọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọtụtụ afọ na mgbasa ozi, mgbasa ozi na-agwa ndị mmadụ maka ngwaahịa na mmekọrịta ọha na eze
Ọ na-etinye aka na akụkọ, mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta na ụdị ndụ ndị ntorobịa

Ọ bụ onye isi mmepụta na onye na-elekọta ihe a na-akpọ na bekee #WithChude, usoro pụrụ iche nke mgbasa ozi (vidiyo, ọdịyo, ederede, ihe omume), mkparịta ụka na nyocha nke na-eme ka olu ya, mmekọrịta ya na ndị mmadụ, agụụ na ajụjụ ọnụ ya pụta ìhè maka nsogbu dị ala, agụụ Ị mara ihe, na ije gharị ije nwere nkpalite dị ọkụ; karịsịa n'Afrịka na maka ndị Afrịka

Na-elekwasị anya na akụkọ ndị na-eme ka uche (ahụike uche), obi (ahụike mmetụta uche), na mmụọ (ahụike ime mmụọ), isiokwu nke #WithChude na-elekwasịkwa anya na ọmịiko, ịpachapụ anya, ahụịke, aṅurị, ịhụnanya, obi ụto, na nrị nke mkpụrụ obi

Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi nke #ChudeExplains, usoro ihe nkiri nke na-ewepụ akụkọ na isi akụkọ ma na-aga n'ime iji chọta ma kọwaa eziokwu zoro ezo nke na-akọwa onye anyị bụ na ebe anyị na-aga ma na-elekwasị anya na ikpe ziri ezi na omenala
A họpụtakwara ya maka echichi, a kpọrọ n'olu bekee, The Force of Wellness Prize na mmemme a kpọrọ n'olu bekee, Trend Upp Awards n'afo 2021
Tupu Joy Inc, ọ chiri otu mgbasa ozi Afrịka, a kpọrọ n'olu bekee Red Africa ruo afọ iri na atọ, na-arụ ọrụ na ntuli aka mba na mmegharị ọha na eze na Naịjirịa, Ghana, Kenya na Liberia

Ọ bụ onye guzobere ihe a kpọrọ n'olu bekee The Future Project, nke lekwasịrị anya n'ịkpali ndị ndu, iwulite ndị ọchụnta ego, na iji mgbasa ozi (ọdịnala na ọhụrụ) dị ka ngwá ọrụ maka ịgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Site na ihe a kpọrọ n'olu bekee Red Africa, ndị otu ya eduziwo mkpọsa nkwukọrịta maka ndị isi ala Naịjirịa abụọ na onye isi ala Ghana
A mụrụ Jideonwo na Lagos n'ezinụlọ Ifeanyi S
Jideonyo na Ngozi A
Jideónwo
Ọ gara K
Kotun Memorial Primary School, Adebola Baptist High School na Mayflower School, Ikenne
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ maka ịbụ onye Ọka ikpe na Mahadum Lagos, na-apụta dị ka nwa akwụkwọ kacha mma na ọkaikpe gbasara ala
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka iwu Naịjirịa n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2007
Jideonwo mechara agụ m akwụkwọ Mastas na mgbasa ozi na nkwukọrịta na Mahadum Pan-African, Lagos

Jideonwo malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi ihe onyonyo na NTA, wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nchọpụta na ihe nkiri akpọro Celebrating Jesus (MBI) na Inside Out with Agatha, ihe ngosi ihe onyonyo ya na Agatha Amata jikọtara ya na mba ahụ ọ zutere Adebola Williams onye ya na ya mechara guzobe ihe a kpọrọ n'olu bekee Red Africa
Ọ nọkwa na ihe a kpọrọ n'olu bekee New Dawn, nke e gopsiputara na NTA Netwọk, ruo afọ atọ, na-ebili ịghọ onye na-emepụta ihe yana iduzi ngalaba ọrụ pụrụ iche
Ihe nrite ya dị ka onye edemede, osote onye nduzi, na onye ọbịa gụnyere The Academy, Patito's Gang, Video 10, Big Brother Naịjirịa n'afọ 2006 na Moments with Mo (MNet) otu afọ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado ihe ngosi okwu a kpọrọ n'olu bekee Rubbin' Minds n'ihe onyonyo aha ya bụ n'olu bekee Channels na ugboro ugboro moonlights dị ka ihe omume na-eme
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na New Dawn na Funmi Iyanda, Jideonwo zutere ndị mmekọ ya n'ọdịnihu, bụ ndị ha abụọ nwere ihe ngosi na netwọk NTA a na-akpọ Youth Talk
N'oge ọrụ ha n'afọ 2004, ha zutere ma kpebie ịmepụta ụlọ ọrụ lekwasịrị anya n'iji mgbasa ozi dị ka ngwá ọrụ iji kpalie ma mee ka ndị na-eto eto mee ihe
RedSTRAT, ngwaahịa nke njikọ a, debanyere aha ya n'afọ 2005
Ọ bụ onye na-elekọta #WithChude, netwọk nke ngwaahịa mgbasa ozi gafee igwe onyonyo, Redio, Podcast, akwụkwọ ozi na Blog na-akọ akụkọ ndị na-enyere ma na-eme ka uche, obi, na mmụọ sie ike

A na-agbasa ajụjụ ọnụ kwa izu n'ọtụtụ Channels TV, Rave TV na WaZoBia Max, niile nwere ike ịnweta na TV, GOTV, StarTimes na DSTV, na usoro mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta na-eru opekata mpe nde mmadụ asatọ kwa izu
Ndị ọbịa na ihe ngosi ahụ gụnyere ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ndị ndu omenala, na ndị na-agaghị ewere onwe ha dị ka ndị a ma ama
Ọ ghọwokwa ebe dị nchebe maka onye ọbịa ikwu okwu banyere ihe n'ihu ọha na nke mbụ; Joke Silva kwuru banyere otu di ya, Olu Jacobs si emeso ọrịa uche na ahụ Lewy na nke mbụ na #WithChude
Jim Iyke kwuru banyere alụmdi ya na nwunye ya dara ada na ịmụ ụmụ na nke mbụ ya
Ihe ngosi ahụ emeela ka a na-ahụkarị ihe ndị dị oke egwu, ma na-akpali mkparịta ụka mba niile banyere isiokwu ndị a tụlere na ihe ngosi ahụ
N' ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2022, Kemi Afolabi kwupụtara banyere ahụmahụ ya na Lupus na #WithChude N'ọnwa ahụ, lupus, Kemi Afolabi so n'ime nchọpụta Google Naịjirịa kachasị elu
Jideonwo edeela ma dezie ihe karịrị akwụkwọ iri na ise n'ime na n'èzí mba ahụ
Ọ sonyeere NEXT Newspapers, dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ n'ọnwa Julai n'afọ 2009, onye kachasị nta n'ọkwa ahụ, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye otu nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ
Ọ gbara kọlụm, Sons and Daughters, ruo afọ atọ na mbipụta Sọnde nke akwụkwọ ozi The Guardian, na-akọwa ụmụ nke ndị ọgaranya na ndị a ma ama
N'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2014, a malitere nchịkọta edemede ya, nke akpọrọ Are We The Turning Point Generation? na Legosi, Naịjirịa
N'ịbụ nke Farafina bipụtara, ọ gara Legosi, Abuja, Johannesburg, London, Paris na New York

N'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2017, Jideonwo wepụtara ihe a kpọrọ n'olu bekee How to Win Elections in Africa - edemede mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke na-enyocha ihe niile na-enye aka na ihe ịga nke ọma ma ọ bụ n'ụzọ ọzọ nke mkpọsa ntuli aka na-adabere na ntuli aka n'afọ 2016 nke butere Donald Trump n'ọchịchị, na ntuliaka Brexit na United Kingdom
Nke Farafina bipụtara
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Jideonwo bụ onye guzobere Joy, Inc
ma nọrọ na bọọdụ RED, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi zuru oke, nkwukọrịta na mmepe nke ya na ya guzobere, nke rụrụ ọrụ maka ọtụtụ akara mba na nke mba ụwa
Ọ zutere Adebola Williams, onye guzobere Red na setịpụrụ Inside Out na Agatha, na Agatha Amata, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka mmepụta

Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi nke #ChudeExplains, usoro ihe nkiri nke na-ewepụ akụkọ na isi akụkọ ma na-aga n'ime iji chọta ma kọwaa eziokwu zoro ezo nke na-akọwa onye anyị bụ na ebe anyị na-esote na-elekwasị anya na ikpe ziri ezi na ọdịbendị

Joy Inc, ụlọ ọrụ nkuzi na mgbasa ozi debanyere aha dị ka ụlọ ọrụ bara uru, na uru ya ka a ga-etinye ego na ọrụ ebere ahọpụtara na-eme ka nyocha na ihe akaebe banyere ọganihu mmadụ gbanwee omenala ma wuo ọgbọ ọhụrụ nke ndị Afrịka lekwasịrị anya na obi ụtọ kachasị maka ọtụtụ
Ngwaahịa nke mmalite mgbanwe gụnyere #WithChude, The Joy Masterclass, The Joy Congress, Joy The Podcast, The Joy Clubs, The Joy Store na The Daily Vulnerable
N'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2022, Joy, Inc
kpughere TherapyWithChudecom, usoro mmụta na ọgwụgwọ nke na-enye usoro bara uru maka nsogbu ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto na-eche ihu
Ụfọdụ n'ime nsogbu ndị dị na ikpo okwu mmụta gụnyere otu esi emeso ịda mbà n'obi mgbe amụrụ nwa, otu esi emegide ịda mbà na nchegbu na otu esi emeri Iso Ụzọ Kraịst na-egbu egbu
Ụdị RED gụnyere ihe a na-akpọ n'olu bekee The Future Awards Afrika, Red Media Afrika, StateCraft, Inc
na YNaija, ọ nyeela ndumodụ nye ụdị ulọ orụ a maara n'ụwa gụnyere Microsoft, Google, British Council na Gọọmentị United States
Ọ jisiri ike jikwaa nkwukọrịta mkpọsa maka ndị isi ala Naijiria abụọ n'usoro
Site na Statecraft Inc, ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta ọchịchị Red, Jideonwo duziri n'ihu nkwukọrịta maka mkpọsa Muhammadu Buhari n'afọ 2015
N'afọ 2016, StateCraft Inc
duziri akụkụ nkwurịta okwu nke mkpọsa ahụ nke hụrụ Nana Akufo-Addo merie ntuli aka onye isi ala na Ghana mgbe mgbalị atọ na-enweghị isi
N'afọ 2011, nwa okorobịa Jideonwo gbara onye isi ala Naijiria ka n'achị Naijirịa ajụjụ ọnụ; na-eme ka ya na Goodluck Jonathan nọrọ ọdụ

A makwaara ya dị ka onye na-enyocha akwụkwọ, akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, a na-akpọ n'olu bekee His Father's Knickers, nke e dere mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, nkea malitere n'afọ 2001 na njikọ aka na Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka Nhazi mba na ihe a na-akpọ na bekee French Cultural Centre

N'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2012, a họpụtara Jideonwo dị ka onye kachasị nta n'ime kọmitii onyinye maka Ford Foundation Jubilee Transparency Award na n'ọnwa Julaị a họpụtara ya n'ime British Council's Steering Group maka Creative Industries Expo
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Naịjirịa kwa ụbọchị, The Punch depụtara Jideonwo na mmadụ iri na atọ ndị ọzọ, dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eto eto ga-ele na 2012
Ọzọkwa, n'afọ 2012, BusinessDay gụnyere ya na onye mmekọ azụmahịa ya, Williams, na ndepụta iri anọ n'okpuru iri anọ
N'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2013, a kpọrọ aha Jideonwo na Williams na Forbes iri ato - ndị na-agbabeghi afọ iri ato dika ihe a kporo Africa's Best Young Entrepreneurs na bekee
A họpụtara Jideonwo dị ka onye ji ihe nrite nke 2017 Greenberg Fellow na Mahadum Yale, New Haven, Connecticut
Na Machị n'afọ 2018, a họpụtara Jideonwo n'akụkụ ọtụtụ ndị isi iri na asaa ndị ọzọ na-eto eto si n'akụkụ niile nke Afrika maka mmemme nduzi a kpọrọ Tutu Leadership Programme nke afọ 2018
N'afọ 2020, o nyere onyinye Naịjirịa maka ọdịiche na ịdị iche iche otu nde naira

Ihe nrite ahụ ga-achọta ma kwado ndị na-eto eto gafee Naịjirịa na-emepụta oghere dị nchebe ma na-enye ndị dị iche iche olu na mpaghara asaa dị mkpa okike, mmekọahụ, okwukwe na ime mmụọ, ahụike uche na mmetụta uche, nka, mkpa pụrụ iche, na ikike mmadụ
N'afọ 2021, a họpụtara ya maka onyinye a akpọrọ n'olu bekee The Force of Wellness na Trend Upp Awards nke afọ 2021
N'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2022, ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Awaiting Trial, bụ onye nhọpụta na onye a họpụtara maka Africa International Film Festival
Na mbido afọ 2023, a họpụtakwara ihe nkiri ahụ maka ihe akpọrọ n'olu bekee Best Documentary in Africa Magic Viewers Choice Award 2023
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Lagos, Nigeria

Chuka Harrison Umunna // (na-ege ntị) (/ˈtʃʊkə əˈmuːnə/; amụrụ na'abali iri na asaa nke ọnwa iri n;afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asaa n'asatọ) (17/10/1978) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Britain na onye bụbu onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị jere ozi dị ka onye omeiwu (MP) maka Streatham site n'afọ puku abụọ na iri ruo n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (2010 - 2019)
Onye bụbu onye otu Lebọ Patị, ọ bụ akụkụ nke Shadow Kabinet site na afọ puku abụọ, na iri n'otu ruo n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'se (2011- 2015)
Ọ hapụrụ ọrụ n'ime ọnwa abụọ na afọ puku abụọ, na iri n'iteolu (February 2019), mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm iji guzobe otu nwere onwe, mgbe e mesịrị gbanwee UK, ya na ndị omeiwu isii ndị ọzọ
Ka e mesịrị na n'afo puku abụọ n'iteolu (2019), ọ hapụrụ Mgbanwe UK ma, mgbe obere oge dị ka onye omeiwu nwere onwe ya, sonyeere ndị Liberal Democrats
Na ntuli aka nke afọ puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (2019), o nweghị ike ịga nke ọma n'ịhọpụta ya ọzọ dị ka onye omeiwu ma ọ laghachighị na House of Commons
A mụrụ ya na Lambeth na nna Naijiria na nne Bekee-Irish, Umunna gụrụ akwụkwọ na St Dunstan's College, ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe onye na Catford, Lewisham
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu na Mahadum Manchester na Mahadum Nottingham Trent
Onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma nke Liberal Democrats, ọ sonyeere Lebọ Patị n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n'asaa (1997) mgbe pati ahụ na-akpọ onwe ya 'ọrụ ọhụụ (New Labour)'
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu na obodo London, nke mbụ maka Herbert Smith na mgbe ahụ maka Rochman Landau, mgbe ọ na-ede edemede maka Kọmpass tink tankị
A họpụtara Umunna dị ka onye omeiwu Lebọ maka Streatham n'afọ puku abụọ na asatọ (2008), a họpụtakwara ya dịka onye omeiwu na ntuli aka nke afọ puku abụọ n'iri (2010)
Mgbe ọ nọ na nzuko omeiwu, ọ sonyeere usoro 'Blue Lebọ' nke pati ahụ, nke jụrụ akụ na ụba neoliberal
Ọ nọrọ na Kọmitii Nhọrọ nke Akụ ruo n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'otu (2011), mgbe ọ sonyeere Ed Miliband's Shadow Kabinetị dị ka ode akwukwọ steetị maka azụmahịa, ihe ọhụrụ na nkà
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na ntuli aka afọ puku abụọ na iri n'ise nakwa afọ puku abụọ na iri n'asaa {2015 and 2017)

Mgbe Miliband gbara arụkwaghịm, a họpụtara Jeremy Corbyn ka ọ bụrụ onye ndu Ọrụ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'ise (2015); Umunna katọrọ ndị isi otu ahụ ma gbaa arụkwaghịma na Shadow Kabịnetị iji nọrọ dị ka onye na-anọ n'azụ
Onye na-akwado mkpọsa ntuli aka na-enweghị isi na afọ puku abụọ na iri n'isii (2016) iji jigide ndị otu UK nke European Union, Ummuna mere mkpọsa maka ntuli aka maka nkwekọrịta ikpeazụ ya na EU
N'ọnwa abụọ n'afọ puku abụọ n'iteolu (February 2019), ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na Ọru wee sonye na Otu Ṅwèrè Onwe, mgbe e mesịrị Mgbànwè UK

Ọ bụ ọnụ na-ekwuchitere otu ya mana ọ hapụrụ na ọnwa isii n'afọ puku abụọ n'iteolu (June 2019) ka ọ nọrọ dị ka onye omeiwu nwere onwe ya na-esote 'ihe na-akụda mmụọ' na ntuli aka nke European Parliamentị na-egosi na pati ahụ 'emezughị inweta otu onye omeiwu a họpụtara'
Otu izu mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Umunna sonyeere ndị Liberal Democrats ma bụrụ onye isi Vince Cable họpụtara dị ka onye na-ekwuchitere Àku na Azụmahịa
N'ọnwa asatọ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (august 2019), onye ndu ọhụrụ bụ Jo Swinson họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ihe gbasara mba ofesi, mmepe mba ụwa na azụmahịa mba ụwa
Ọ guzoro maka obodo London na Westminster na ntuli aka afọ puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (2019) mana Nickie Aiken nke Conservatives meriri ya
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ n'otu (2021), ọ ghọrọ onye na-etinye ego na JPMorgan Chase, dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke otu ndụmọdụ ya na London
A mụrụ Umunna na Lambeth, London na abali iri n'asaa n'ime ọnwa iri n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asaa n'asatọ (17/10/1978)
Nna ya, Bennett, nke agbụrụ Igbo nke Naijiria na onye nwe azụmahịa mbubata na mbupụ, nwụrụ n'ihe mberede okporo ụzọ na Naijiria n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n'abụọ (1992)
Nne ya, Patricia Milmo, onye ọka iwu, bụ onye Bekee-Irish
Nne nne ya bụ Joan Frances Morley, Lady Milmo na Sir Helenus Milmo QC, onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu
Umunna gụrụ akwụkwọ na Hitherfield akwukwọ Nke mbu na Streatham, Ndida London, na Christ Church Praịmarị skuul dị na Brixton Hill

Ọ na-ekwu na ndị mụrụ ya chere na ụlọ akwụkwọ steeti dị n'ógbè ahụ 'mere ka ọ 'gbuo' ma n'ihi ya kwagara ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke ụmụ nwoke St Dunstan's College, na Catford na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ London, ebe ọ na-akpọ cello
N'oge a, ọ bụkwa onye na-agụ egwú na Southwark Cathedral
Dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, ọ bụ onye otu Liberal Democrats
E nyere ya nzere bachelọ nke abụọ na English na French Law site na Mahadum Manchester
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ maka otu oge na Mahadum Burgundy na Dijon, tupu ọ gụọ maka Master of Arts na ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu nke Mahadum Nottingham Trent
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, n'afọ puku abụọ n'ise (2005), Umunna malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọka iwu maka ụlọ ọrụ Herbert Smith nke Obodo London
N'afọ puku abụọ na isii (2006), ọ sonyeere Rochman Landau (nke bụzi Ashfords LLP), na-ahụ maka iwu ọrụ na inye ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ na esemokwu azụmahịa na ndụmọdụ

Site na afọ puku abụọ n'isii (2006), ọ malitere ide ma nye nkọwa banyere Lebọ Patị, yana nsogbu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na akụ na ụba, na-abụkarị na ikike ya dị ka onye otu Kọmitii Nchịkwa nke otu nrụgide Compass nke Lebọ-kwadoro
O dekwara edemede maka Ègò Ugbòrò, Tribune, Nkè Olù, Nkè Onye Nchè na Ndị Ochịchị Ọhụụ, wee malite ịpụta na mmemme redio na igwe onyonyo dị iche iche dị ka onye na-akọwa ihe

O guzobere ma dezie magazin ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ịntanetị, The Multicultural Politic N'afọ puku abụọ na asaa (2007), o mere mkpọsa iji kwado mgbalị Jon Cruddas na-enweghị isi ịghọ osote onye isi Labọ
N'ime ọnwa atọ, afọ puku abụọ n'asato (Machi 2008), a nabatara Umunna dị ka onye ga-abụ onye omeiwu nke Lebọ Patị maka Streatham

Na ntuli aka nke afọ puku abụọ n'iri (2010), a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu (MP) maka Streatham na ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu nke onu ogugu puku atọ, narị abụọ na iri ise n'iteolu (3,259); o kwuru okwu mbụ ya na abalị abụọ nime ọnwa isii n'afọ puku abụọ n'iri (2 June 2010)
O nwere mmasị pụrụ iche na iwu akụ na ụba na mgbanwe nke obodo ahụ
Umunna kọwara onwe ya dị ka 'Otu Mba Ọrụ' ma dee edemede na-akwalite 'Blue Lebọ'

O kwuru na gọọmentị jikọrọ aka nke Mmekọrita Kọnzavetiv- leed kwesịrị ịtụle usoro ihe omume ya nke nkwekọrịta ego, were nguzo siri ike na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ Britain ma mee ihe iji gbanwee ahịa ụlọ ọrụ nyocha ego
Umunna bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu iri isii n'atọ (63) nke Lebọ họpụtara Ed Miliband na ntuli aka ndị isi Lebọ nke afọ puku abụọ na iri (2010) iji nọchie Gordon Brown dị ka onye isi otu
Na ọnwa isii nke afọ puku abụọ n'iri (6/2010), a họpụtara Umunna dị ka onye otu Treasury Select Committee

N'ọnwa mbu, afọ puku abụọ na iri n'otu (1/2011), ọ jụrụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Barclays, Bob Diamond, ajụjụ n'ihe gbasara ọrụ ezere ụtụ isi nke ụlọ akụ ahụ kwuru na ụlọ akụ ahụ jiri ihe karịrị ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka onu ọgụgụ narị atọ (300) mee ihe na ikike ndị dị n'èzí

N'ịzaghachi ajụjụ ya, Diamond kwuru na ọnwa abụọ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'otu (2/2011) na Barclays kwụrụ na ha akwughachiwo onu ego otu nde narị na iri n'atọ nke ego pounds (£ 113) na ụtụ isi ụlọ ọrụ UK n'afọ puku abụọ n'iteolu (2009), agbanyeghi inwete ijeri iri n'otu, na nari iri isii nke onu ego pound (£ 116bn) na uru
Umunna nọ n'ọkwa a na Kọmitii Nhọrọ ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya dị ka Minista Nchịkọta maka Obere Azụmaahịa na Azụmalite

N'ọnwa iri n;afọ puku abụọ n'iri, (10 Ọktoba 2010), mgbe a họpụtara Miliband dị ka onye isi otu, a họpụtara Umunna ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ onwe onye nke ndị omeiwu ya, na ọnwa ise n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'otu (Mee 2011), a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka obere azụmaahịa na ụlọ ọrụ ruo mgbe o nwetere nkwalite ya nke shadò kabinet

A kwalitere Umunna dị ka odeakwụkwọ azụmaahịa Shadow na abalị asaa, n'me ọnwa iri, n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'otu (7 Ọktoba 2011), na-anọchi John Denham, onye kwupụtara ezumike nká ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ihu
Mgbe a họpụtara ya, Umunna kwupụtaghachiri mkpebi nke Lebọ iwebata ụtụ isi maka ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ọnọdụ ụgwọ agụmakwụkwọ mahadum

N'ọnwa mbu n'afọ puku abụọ, na iri n'abụọ (Jenụwarị 2012), Umunna sonyeere Ed Miliband na onye isi ode akwukwo na Akụ nke Shadò Rachel Reeves na-akpọ PM David Cameron ka ọ gbochie ego-ego onụ ego otu nde na narị isi nke ego pound (£ 16m) maka Stephen Hester, onye isi ọrụ nke Royal Bank of Scotland Group

N'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'atọ (2013), Umunna duziri nkwupụta na ọnụ ahịa gọọmentị nke Royal Mail n'oge nkeonwe ya 'gbanwere' onye na-atụ ụtụ isi, echiche a kwadoro site na ịrị elu dị ịrị elu na ọnụahịa òkè na-esote ire ya na ịkpọ ndị ụlọ akụ maka nyocha ndị omeiwu
Onye otu Lebọ Enyi nke Isrelu, ya na Liam Byrne mere nleta gọọmentị na Isrelu n'ọnwa iri n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'abụọ (Ọktoba 2012) dị ka akụkụ nke otu LFI's UK-Isrelu Economic Dialogue group
Mgbe ọ bụ onye otu LFI, ọ katọrọ ụlọ ikpe ndị agha Isrelu maka mmeso ha na-emeso ụmụaka Palestine a na-ebo ebubo mpụ agha na ọnwa iri n'abụọ, n'afọ puku abụọ n'atọ (Disemba 2013)

N'ọnwa anọ, n'afọ puku abụọ n'iri n'atọ (Eprel 2013), e jikọtara ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọka iwu nke Umunna na mmelite dị mma e mere na ibe Wikipedia ya n'afọ puku abụọ n'asaa (2007), nke gụnyere ntinye aka n'iji ya maa atụ a na-akpọ ya 'Barack Obama nke Britain'
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, a katọrọ Umunna maka ihe o kwuru n'etiti afọ iri abụọ (20) ya na netwọk mmekọrịta ASmallWorld banyere West End nke London

Onye omeiwu Kọnzavetivu Chris Heaton-Harris kwuru na nkwupụta nke afọ puku abụọ n'isii (2006), na-akọwa ndị na-eleta ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ abalị na West End dị ka 'ihe mkpofu' na 'ndị na-achọ ndepụta c', gosipụtara 'enweghị nkwanye ùgwù maka ọha na eze'; Umunna kwuru na nkwukọrịta ahụ bụ 'obi dị mfe na ụda na gburugburu' mana ọ nwere ekele na 'nhọrọ nke okwu eji eme ihe ekwesịghị ekwesị' ma rịọ mgbaghara maka mmejọ ọ bụla

E boro Umunna ebubo ihu abụọ maka ịnakwere onyinye onu ego puku iri abụọ (£ 20,000) nke onu ego pound site n'aka onye isi ịgba chaa chaa n'agbanyeghị mkpọsa megide mgbasa nke ụlọ ahịa ịgba chaa chaa na mpaghara ya ma kwe nkwa ike ọhụrụ iji belata ha

Na mbido ọnwa ise n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'anọ (Mee 2014), Umunna welitere nchegbu na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu na ọha na eze banyere atụmatụ iweghara AstraZeneca, site n'aka nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ America Pfizer, n'ihi na ọ ga-ahụ na ọrụ na ọdịmma ndị Britain
N'agbanyeghị mmesi obi ike sitere n'aka Pfizer, Umunna gara n'ihu na-akatọ n'ihu ọha atụmatụ iweghara ya na-ekwupụta na mmesi obi obi ike Pfizer 'abaghị uru akwụkwọ ha dere'
Mgbalị nnweta ahụ mechara daa na ngwụcha ọnwa ise n'afọ puku abụọ n'anọ (Mee 2014) mgbe ụlọ ọrụ AstraZeneca jụrụ onyinye ikpeazụ nke Pfizer

N'ọnwa ise n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'anọ (Mee 2014), Umunna katọrọ akụkọ onye ode akwụkwọ ahụike ibe ya bụ Andy Burnham banyere ụzọ ndị nwere ike isi gbochie ire na mgbasa ozi nke mmanya, nri na-adịghị mma, na ụtaba
E hotara ya ka o kwuru na usoro omume dị otú ahụ dị ka akọwapụtara na akụkọ ahụ ga-ahụ dị ka 'ndị na-emegide azụmaahịa na ndị na-etinye aka'

Umunna arụrịta ụka maka steeti gọọmentị etiti nke Britain ọtụtụ oge, ma kwuo na ndị na-aga n'ihu ekwesịghị ịhapụ echiche George Osborne nke 'Nọtan Pawahaụsụ', na-arụ ụka na nkwenye ka ukwuu, njikọta nke UK Lebọ Pat n'ime ndị otu Lebọ nke na-anọchite anya mba ọ bụla nke UK, nnwere onwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ka ukwuu maka England karịsịa, ikike mpaghara ndị ọzọ na 'ọgbụgba gọọmentị' dị mkpa iji kwalite Lebọ Patị
Umunna mụbara ihe ka ọtụtụ ya ruo onu ọgụgụ puku iri n'atọ, nari iteolu na iri atọ n'anọ (13,934) na ntuli aka nke afọ puku abụọ na iri n'ise (2015), na 53% nke ntuli aka na mpaghara ya
Mgbe e meriri Lebọ na ntuli aka na arụkwaghịm nke Ed Miliband dị ka onye ndú, a chọpụtara Umunna dị ka otu n'ime ndị nwere ike ịghọ onye ndú nke pati ahụ
Ọ kpọrọ ndị ọrụ aka ka ha lekwasị anya na ndị Kọnzavetiv na 'ndị na-achọsi ike, ndị na-eme ntụli aka n'etiti', na-ekwu na pati ahụ kwesịrị 'n'akụkụ ndị na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma'
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Mee, ọ kwupụtara na ọ ga-azọ ọkwa onye isi otu Lebọ Patị
Ụbọchị atọ ka e mesịrị, ọ hapụrụ asọmpi ahụ, na-ekwu na ọ 'na-enwe obi erughị ya' na 'nchọpụta nyocha agbakwunyere nke bịara na ịbụ onye ndu'
N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Mee, ọ kwupụtara nkwado ya maka Liz Kendall, onye na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na mgbalị ya maka idu ndú Lebọ

Na ọnwa iteolu, n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'ise (Septemba 2015), mgbe nhọpụta Jeremy Corbyn dị ka onye ndú nke Lebọ Patị, Umunna kwupụtara arụkwaghịm ya na Shadò Cabinet wee laghachi n'azụ oche, na-ekwu maka esemokwu banyere ntuli aka Brexit na nsogbu nke ọrụ ndị minista
Umunna kwadoro 'Nọgide' na ntuli aka Brexit
Mpaghara ya nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu nke ntuli aka ka ọ dịgide, na 795%

N'ịgbaso mmeri maka mkpọsa ezumike, Umunna tụrụ aro ka e mezigharịa iwu ahụ iji mee ka Akụkụ nke iri ise (50) na-akpọ gọọmentị ka ha nyochaa mmefu onu ego nari atọ na iri ise nke ego pound (£ 350) kwa izu na NHS, nke gọọmentị meriri
O mechara ntuli aka maka iwu a na-agbanwebeghị iji hapụ EU, na-edegara West Streeting na 'dị ka ndị na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, anyị ga-agbaso nsonaazụ mba'
Na mkpọsa ntuli aka nke afọ puku abụọ na iri na asaa (2017), Umunna megidere ntuli aka abụọ gbasara Brexit

Mgbe a họpụtara ya ọzọ na ntuli aka nke afọ puku abụọ na iri n'asaa (2017), Umunna tụrụ aro ka e mee mgbanwe nnupụisi na Okwu Eze Nwanyị na-akpọ gọọmentị ka ọ 'kwụsị ịpụ na EU n'enweghị nkwekọrịta' ma 'na-ewepụta atụmatụ ka ha nọrọ n'ime Òtù Cọstọm na Otu Ahịa (Single Market)'
A chụpụrụ ndị isi oche atọ nke Lebọ maka ịkwado mgbanwe ahụ e meriri, nke ndị isi Lebọ kwuru na ọ na-emegide mkpebi ha iji kwụsị nnwere onwe ịgagharị

N'abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa anọ, n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'asatọ (Eprel 2018), Umunna gara mmemme mmalite nke ntuli aka Otutu Mmadu (Pịpul's Vootu), otu mkpọsa na-akpọ oku maka ntuli aka ọha na eze na nkwekọrịta Brexit ikpeazụ n'etiti UK na European Union
Umunna kwadoro ntuli aka nke abụọ na Brexit
Umunna dere na mkpọsa ịhapụ EU ghaara ụgha n'oge mkpọsa ahụ ma mebie iwu na-emefu ego karịa ka enyere ikike
Umunna ekwuola na ndị Britain maara eziokwu ugbu a ma kwesị ikwu okwu nke abụọ ma UK ọ ga-ahapụ European Union
N'ọnwa asaa n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'asatọ (Julaị 2018), Umunna dere, 'Ọ bụrụ na atụmatụ ndị PM na-agbaso na-adị ka ihe a na-anabataghị n'ọtụtụ ndị na-eme ntụli aka, nke ahụ na-ekwu ihe

Ndị mmadụ tuliri aka ịhapụ ma nọrọ n'ihi ihe dị iche iche, mana ọ bụ ihe nzuzu ikwu na onye ọ bụla tuliri aka maka Brexit na ntuli aka EU mere ya n'ihi na ha ji otu olu kweta ịhapụ otu ahịa na njikọ omenala, na-etinye nkwekọrịta Guud Friday n'ihe ize ndụ, na-enwetaghị ego ọzọ maka NHS (dị iche na ihe a gwara ha) na nwere ike ịga n'ihu ọtụtụ afọ nke nkwụsi ike

N'ọnwa asatọ, n'afọ puku abụọ na asatọ (Ọgọstụ 2018), The Guardian kọrọ na 'Umunna na onye otu Lebọ MP Chris Leslie kwenyere n'ọtụtụ ebe ha na-atọ ntọala maka ịmepụta otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọhụrụ ọ bụ ezie na ha abụọ agọnahụla nke a'
N'ọnwa iri n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'asatọ (Ọktoba 2018), a mara ọkwa na Umunna ga-eje ozi dị ka onyeisi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ a na-akpọ Progressive Centa UK
A kpughere na ọ ga-enweta onu ego pound nke putara puku iri isii n'ise (£ 65,000) kwa afọ maka ọrụ ya na bọọdụ ndụmọdụ

Na abali iri n'asato, n'ime ọnwa abụọ n'afọ puku abụọ n'iteolu) (18 Febụwarị 2019), Umunna na ndị omeiwu isii ndị ọzọ (Luciana Berger, Chris Leslie, Angela Smith, Mike Gapes, Gavin Shuker, na Ann Coffey) hapụrụ Lebọ iji mee mkpesa na idu ndú Jeremy Corbyn iji guzobe Otu Nwere Onwe (mgbe e mesịrị Mgbanwe UK)
Òtù Nwere Onwe kpọrọ Umunna dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ya n'abali iri abụọ n'asatọ, n'onwa abụọ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (28 Febụwarị 2019)

N'abalị iri abụọ n'anọ, n'onwa ise n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (24 Mee 2019), Umunna dere na akwụkwọ akụkọ na Mgbanwe UK ga-emeghe maka nkwekọrịta pro-EU na ndị Liberal Democrats iji jikọta ntuli aka Remain

N'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Juun, mgbe Mgbanwe UK si na ntuli aka EU pụta, Umunna hapụrụ pati ahụ na mmadụ ise n'ime ndị omeiwu ya ndị ọzọ na-achọghị ka Mgbanwe UK kwado ndị na-azọ ọkwa na ntuliaka n'ọdịnihu
N'ikpeazụ, onye ndu ọhụrụ nke Mgbanwe UK, Anna Soubry, kwuru na Umunna mere 'nnukwu njehie' n'ịhapụ pati ahụ
Na abalị iri n'atọ, n'ọnwa isii, n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (13 June 2019), Umunna mara ọkwa na The Times na ọ ga-esonyere ndị Liberal Democrats

O kwukwara na ya 'eleghara oke anya etu o siri sie ike ịmepụta otu ọhụrụ zuru oke na-enweghị akụrụngwa dị ugbu a', mgbe Mgbenwe UK nwetara naanị 34% nke ntuli aka, na ntuli aka EU, n'azụ 20% nke Liberal Democrats
Ọ gbakwụnyere, n'okpuru usoro ịtuli aka nke Britain, a gaghị enwe 'ebe maka ihe karịrị otu etiti etiti' na ntuli aka n'ozuzu
O kwukwara na 'ọtụtụ' ndị omeiwu ndị ọzọ nwere ike ịpụ na Liberal Democrats

Na ọnwa iteolu n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (Septemba 2019), n'okwu mbụ ya na Liberal Democrat Federal Conference, Umunna kwuru na Britain enweghị ike itinye ikike omume ya megide ndị isi ọchịchị aka ike n'ụwa n'oge Praịm Minista Boris Johnson na-eyi egwu imebi iwu gbasara Brexit
Na ntuli aka nke United Kingdom nke afọ puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (2019), Umunna guzoro na Obodo nke London na Westminster, ma merie onye otu Cọnzavetiv Patị, Nickie Aiken
Helen Thompson nọchiri ya dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa Lib Dem na Streatham, ma merie
Kemgbe ọnwa anọ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ, (Eprel 2020), Umunna abụwo onye nduzi na-abụghị onye isi nke Advanced na onye ndụmọdụ na Digital Identity Net UK

N'ọnwa Julaị afọ puku abụo na iri abụọ (2020), a họpụtara Umunna ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi nke ndị ndụmọdụ gburugburu ebe obibi, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ọchịchị (ESG) n'ime ndị ọkachamara na ìsì ahịa na ndị ọrụ ego na ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ ahịa Edelman UK
Umunna kwuru banyere nhọpụta ahụ 'Ọ bụrụ na anyị ga-agbanwe n'ụzọ dị mkpa ihe nlereanya nke akụrụngwa anyị ga-ahụ na ọtụtụ azụmaahịa na-ejikọta ihe ESG n'ime mkpebi ụlọ ọrụ dị ka ọ dịtụbeghị

N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ n'otu (2021), ọ sonyeere ụlọ akụ itinye ego JPMorgan Chase dị ka onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi nke mbọ ndụmọdụ ESG ya na Europe, Middle East na Africa, yana iduzi otu ụlọ akụ itinye aka ESG zuru ụwa ọnụ
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ n'abụọ (2022), Umunna so n'òtù JPMorgan na-adụ Vesa Equity ọdụ, azụmaahịa itinye ego nke Daniel Kretinsky, na itinye ego ha na Britain nke gụnyere 23% nke Royal Mail
Umunna lụrụ Alice Sullivan, onye ọka iwu na-ahụ maka ọrụ
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere nwa nwanyị, amụrụ n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'asaa (2017)
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado Crystal Palace FC
O kwuru na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na ụkpụrụ omume ya sitere na Iso Ụzọ Kraịst, mana na ọ 'abụghị onye okpukpe'

Ọtụtụ afọ tupu ọ hapụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, a kpọtụrụ Umunna aha dị ka otu onye n'ime mmadu otu nari ndị amama na Afrịka kachasị nwee mmetụta site na magazin New African n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'ise (2015)

Chukwuebuka 'Chuks' Anyaduba (amụrụ na abalị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa atọ, afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n'anọ (Machị 27, 1984) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ọka iwu, onye ọrụ ebere na onye ndụmọdụ njikwa ọrụ
A mụrụ Anyaduba na Onitsha na Onitsha North Local Government Area nke Anambra Steetị
O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke iwu na Mahadum Abuja na Naịjirịa
Dị ka onye na-agụsibeghi akwụkwọ, Chukwuebuka bụ nwa akwụkwọ nwa akwụkwọ ika nnọchiteanya na-edu maka Nokia
Ọ malitere ma mee mkpọsa na ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ụdị ndị ọzọ dịka BlackBerry na Chivita
Ọ bụ onye AIESECalumnus
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri Anyaduba malitere na MNET Africa mgbe ọ pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri TV kachasị ogologo nke Africa Tinsel
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood
O mepụtara ihe nkiri abụọ The Onye mmekọ na Mmetụta dị n'akụkụ
Anyaduba bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke TOG Media Consults, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, mmepe ọdịnaya na mmepụta ihe omume

Ọ haziri ma mepụta ọtụtụ ihe omume gụnyere; Nigeria Radio Awards, African Achievers Awards (2011 na 2012), Ndị na-eto eto CEO Business Summit (2014), Daalụ maka ndị nna,, Warri ọzọ, Ọgbakọ Afrịka na-eto eto (2017), Seyi Tinubu Empowerment Project (STEP) na Nigeria Roadsafety Forum
Anyaduba na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye nduzi ọrụ nke Ned Nwoko Ọrụ mkpochapụ ịba, atụmatụ nke Ned Nwoko Foundation
Ọ bụ onye nduzi nke International Security Cooperation na Onye isi mgbasa ozi dijitalụ na African Bar Association
Ọ bụ onye njikwa nkà maka egwu rap na ihe nlereanya Descushiel

Anyaduba bụ onye na-akwado Ebumnuche mmepe na-adịgide adịgide nke United Nations na onye guzobere International Initiative for the Advancement of SDGs in Africa (IIASDG), otu NGO nke na-akwalite Ebumnuche mmepe na-adịgide adịgide nke United Nations na Africa

Ọ bụ onye malitere ụfọdụ ọrụ nkwado nke gụnyere; Daalụ maka ndị nna; Ihe omuma banyere ọrịa cancer prostate, Nigerian Road safety Forum na Naịjirịa iji mee ka a mara banyere ụzọ ndị na-aga ije na nchekwa nke Ụmụaka na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ, Na-eji kpakpando agba agba; Ihe omume inye ego maka ndị ọrịa Sickle cell, wdg
Ọ bụ onye nduzi maka oru ngo na mmekorita na Ụlọ ọrụ nkwado Sickle Cell Africa, otu NGO mba ụwa nke dị na US

Dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere na onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta maka The Good Fathers Foundation, ọ haziri ọrụ dị mma nke Lita nke Light Project, Mmepe obodo na ọrụ nkwado mmadụmaka ndị nna na ụmụaka na-enweghị nna na mmekọrịta ya na Mahadum Nottingham UK na Litre of light

Na afọ puku abụọ na iri n'asaa (2017) Izu nchekwa okporo ụzọ United Nations, ọ haziri ọrụ SAFECROSS; Mmata n'ebe ndị mmadụ na-agafe na Naịjirịa na nkwado nke Ụlọ Ọrụ Ozi United Nations (UNIC) na Lagos Nigeria
Anyaduba nwere mmasị na SDGs, Ahụike, Agụmakwụkwọ na Nkwado Ndị Ntorobịa
Ọ bụ ugbu a Kọmishọna Maka Ndị Ntorobịa Nigeria na Onye otu Board nke Global SDGs Ndị ntorobịa Summit Board
Site na IIASDG, o guzobere SDGMpaghara mgbasa ozi Africa ma hazie mbipụta atọ (3) na Naijiria, Liberia na Ghana ma na-eme atụmatụ iwere ya gafee mba ndị ọzọ n'Africa
N'ọdinala Igbo site n'ezi obodo, Chukwu bụ eze chi nile na ndi uwa
Aha ya nonyere 'chi' la 'ukwu'
Chukwu bụ onye kere ihe nile (chi- n'eke)
Nke a bụ nke a na-kpọ ya Chineke ugbua
Chukwu abughi nwoke, ọ bughi nwanyï
Mgbe ndi bekee biara, ha wee kporo Chukwu chi nke ndi Christian, me ya nke nwoke
Ka bụ nke ndi Igbo nnuku bụ Christians ugbua
Aha nna Chukwu sitere na Naijiria Igbo ma nwee ike izo aka na
Chukwudi bụ aha Naijiria
Ndị ama ama nwere aha a gụnyere ndia
Chukwudi Iwuji (/ˈtʃʊkʊdi ɪˈwuːdʒi/; amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 15 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1975) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria na Britain
Ndị nne na nna zigara Iwuji n'ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi na England mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, mgbe ha si Nigeria kwaga Ethiopia ịrụ ọrụ maka United Nations
N'agbata afọ 1987 n'afọ 1993, ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na Caterham School, Surrey Ọ gara Mahadum Yale wee nweta nzere bachelọ ya na akụ na ụba
Mgbe ahụ, ọ laghachiri United Kingdom
[nkọwa dị mkpa]

Iwuji arụla ọrụ n'elu ikpo okwu maka Royal Shakespeare Company (dochie David Oyelowo na ọrụ aha nke Henry VI trilogy na 2006 revival nke This England The Histories project), Royal National Theatre (Welcome to Thebes, 2010), Old Vic (na 2011 Richard III) na Comedy Theatre (na mmepụta nke afọ 2009 nke The Misanthrope), yana ihe nkiri Britain, redio na telivishọn
Ihe ndị ọzọ gụnyere Othello na mmepụta nke Othello nke The Public Theater na Delacorte Theater na June 2018

Nke a ga-abụ mmepụta nke ise ya na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, dịka ọ pụtara na Antony na Cleopatra dị ka Enobarbus na 2014, King Lear dị ka Edgar na 2014, Hamlet dị ka Hamlet na 2016, The Low Road dị ka John Blanke na Machị 2018, na Daniel Isn't Real dị ka Braun n'afọ 2019
Chukwudiebere ' Chu ' Maduabum (amụrụ ya na Machị 19, 1991), mgbe ụfọdụ ana - akpọ kwaya ' Chuk ', ' Chuck ', ma ọ bụ ' Chu Chu ', bụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke Naịjirịa
Ndị Los Angeles Lakers gụnyere ya na 56th n'oge 2011 NBA draft tupu ha're ikike ya nye Denver Nuggets
Maduabum, onye toro nnukwu ogologo 6'9 ' na atu bọl nkata ọfụma na oso na ndị na anọ n'ihu egwuregwu
Ọ bụ ọkpụkpọ onye egwuregwu nke atọ akpọrọ ozugbo site na D-League, na-esote ndị ọzọ dịka Mike Taylor na Latavious Williams
Ọ gbara otu egwuregwu abụọ mgbe ọ nọ na Naịjirịa tupu ọ gaa D-League ndị Dodan Warriors na Kano Pillars
Ọ gbakwara egwuregwu bọl na FIBA Africa Club Championship
Na Machị 18, 2011,Maduabum bidoro ọrụ bọọlụ na nke ndị Bakersfield Jam naágba na NBA D-League
Ọ turu bọl wee nweta akara nke nkezi 07 ya na 10 nkanka na egwuregwu atọ n'oge 2010-11
Na ụbọchị iri abụọ na atọ na ọnwa June, n'afọ 2011, ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ Los Angeles Lakers họpụtara Maduabum na ntuli aka 56th na 2011
E mechara ndị Denver Nuggets kpọrọ Maduabum
Na ọnwa Jenụwarị 24, n'afọ 2012, ndị Bakersfield Jam kpọghachitere Maduabum
Kaosinadị, a hapụrụ ya na February 1, 2012 ka ọgba naanị otu egwuregwu n'ihi mmerụ ahụ
Na July 2012, Maduabum sonyere ndị Nuggets maka NBA Summer League nke 2012 ebe ọ gbagoro ihe ruru akara 23 na 27 na egwuregwu atọ
Na Febụwarị 19, 2015, ndị Nuggets zụrụ ahịa na Maduabum, yana JaVale McGee na ndị ga-agba okirikiri nke mbụ site na Oklahoma City Thunder, gaa na Philadelphia 76ers
Na ụbọchị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị, n'afọ 2016, ndị 76ers nyefere Maduabum na aka ndị Houston Rockets dịka akụkụ nke azụmahịa atọ ndị na egwuregwu ha egwu bọl
Ndị Detroit Pistons sokwa na azụmahịa
Agbanyeghị, nka ikike laghachiri ndị 76ers ụbọchị anọ ka e mechara, maka ndị Pistons kwụsịrị ahịa ahụ n'ihi Donatas Motiejūnas onye nke iyocha ahụ ya agaghi ọfụma
Na Jenụwarị 2013, Maduabum na Al-Shamal nke Qatar's D1 league bịanyere aka nkwekọrịta ebe ọ turu bọl di'egwu nwete akara gosire na ọ na arụ ọrụ ya nke ọma
Na Nọvemba n'afọ 2013, Maduabum na Tallinna Kalev nke Estonia binyere aka na nkwekọrịta maka oge bọl nke 2013–14
Na Disemba 2013, ọ hapụrụ Tallinna mgbe ọ gwuchara egwuregwu asọmpi nke atọ na Estonia na abụọ nke Baltic League
Na Jenụwarị 2014, Maduabum na Khasiin Khuleguud nke Mongolia bianyere aka na nkwekọrịta maka oge foduru na 2013 –14
Ọ gara n'ịhu na-enweta nturu ugo nke asọmpị All-Star
Onye kwa'ra ndi Klob ahụ aka nweta imeri na asọmpi n’afọ 2014
Ka ọnwa Nọvemba dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị abụọ n’afọ 2014, ndị Fort Wayne Mad Ants nwetara Maduabum dị ka onye egwu bọl
Na Disemba 2, 2014, ndị Mad Ants hapụrụ ya mgbe ọ pụtachara na egwuregwu anọ
N’ụbọchị itoolu na ọnwa Jenụwarị , 2015, Maduabum na Tallinna Kalev bianyere aka nkwekọrịta ọzọ
Mana ọ mechara hapụ ndị klọb ahụ bu Tallinna Kalev
Na ụbọchị asaa na Ọgọstụ, 2015, Maduabum na Keflavík nke Icelandic Premier League bianyere aka mgbe egwuregwu ya gbachani'te ọfụma n'oge ọ na gbara ndi Tallinna Kalev
N'ime ọnwa Septemba, Maduabum bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọrụ ya na ndị Finnish Korisliiga team Tampereen Pyrintö na'ebe ọgba bọl nkata ugboro asato
Ọ gbakwara otu egwuregwu maka ndị Pyrintö II na Nkebi nke mbu
N'oge ndị ọzọ na afọ 2015-16, Maduabum gwuru egwuregwu bọl nkata na Gegeen Khangai Leader na mba Mongolia
Emechara kpọọ ya nnukwu nmadu nke na eme ihe ahụ dị iche n'afo abụọ n'oge bọl na Mongolia
Na ụbọchị iri abụọ na mbụ nke ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2016, Maduabum na Kagoshima Rebnise nke ngalaba nke abụọ nke Japanese bianyere aka nkwekọrịta
Na July n'afọ 2017, ọ kwagara Cyberdyne Ibaraki Robots
Na August 2018 ya na Passlab Yamagata Wyverns nwekwa nghọta

Chukwuebuka Cornnell Enekwechi (amuru n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa Jenuarị afọ 1993, na Queens, New York ) bu onye Naijiria- Amerika na-eme egwuregwu egwu na ama egwuregwu, ọpụrụ iche na mmemme ịtụ ihe
Ọ na-asọ mpi mba ụwa n'aha Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye mmeri ọla ọcha nke egwuregwu Commonwealth nke afọ 2018 na onye mmeri Africa na-achị achị n'agba mmemme egwuregwu shotput
Ọ bụkwa onye mmeri egwuregwu mba Afrịka nke afọ 2019 na onye mmeri na-achị achị nke National Sports Festival nke Naijiria
Nne na nna ya bụ Christian na Christiana Enekwechi bụ ndị Naijiria si Anambra na Imo steeti n'otu n'otu
O nwere ụmụnne atọ
Enekwechi na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị West Lafayette
Dịka ọ na-asọ mpi n'aha Mahadum Purdue, ọ tụpụrụ ogbunigwe, discus , hama na ibu
Ọ gbara ọsọ na asọmpi NCAA nke 2016 na ogbunigwe na- onye nke isii na hama n'otu ụbọchị ahụ
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke mmadụ iri dị elu n'ịtụ hama nke afọ 2014 na 2015 yana onye egwuregwu nke afọ 2015
Mgbe ọ nọ na Ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị nke Francis Lewis, ọ meriri asọmpi obodo ugboro abụọ, ma bụrụ onye mmeri nke asọmpi ndị ntorobịa USATF nke afọ 2012
Enekwechi tụrụ ihe karịrị mita iri abụọ na egwuruegwu shot put nke mbụ n'afọ 2016
Ọ meriri aha mba mbụ ya na asọmpi Naijiria nke afọ 2016 na Sapele na anya nke mita 1960
Ọ chụpụrụ agbapụ iru eru n'egwuregwu Olympic tinye akara nke mita 2050 mana ọ jisiri ike nweta naanị mita 2045 bụ ọkacha mma n'afọ ahụ
Ọ bụ n'afọ 2017 ka ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na mba ụwa
Na Asọmpi mba ụwa London , ọ pụtaghị na agba nke iru eru
Ọ nọchikwara anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi ime ụlọ nke ụwa nke afọ 2018
Afọ 2018 bụ afọ pụrụ iche na ndụ Enekwechi
N'egwuregwu Gold Coast Commonwealth, ọ meriri ihe nrite ọla ọcha n'azụ Tom Walsh jiri ịtụ mita 2114
N'oge ahụ, nke a bụ ọ kacha mma nke onwe ya
Enekwechi gakwara n'ihu nweta mmeri n'asọmpi Afrịka n'Asaba n'ime afọ ahu
Akara mmeri ya nke mita 2108 bụ ndekọ nke asọmpi Africa
Dị ka onye mmeri nke Africa a họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchite anya Africa na iko kọntinent Ostrava
N'ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 2018, o meriri ma shot put na hamma n'ememme egwuregwu mba nke iri na itoolu na Abuja
O debere ndekọ ememme egwuregwu mba nke mita 2036 iji merie agbapụ ahụ
Ọ malitere oge egwuregwu nke èzí ya n'afọ 2019 site na iji egwuregwu shotput tinye ọ kacha mma onwe nke mita 2128 na òkù Taylor George Glass
Akara a nọgidere bụrụ otu n'ime ihe iri kachasị elu n'ụwa ruo mgbe ọ mere karịa ya na Grande Premio Brasil Caixa de Atletismo nzukọ ịma aka mba ụwa
O debere ndekọ Naijiria ọhụrụ nke mita 2177 iji merie mmemme ahụ
Ndekọ a mere ka ndekọ gara aga Stephen Mozia nwere nke bụ mita 2176 Enekwechi nọchitere anya Naijiria na egwuregwu mba Afrịka nke afọ 2019
N'ịbanye n'asọmpi ahụ, ọ mere ka ndekọ obodo ya dịkwuo mma site na ịtụba mita 2180 ma obere ihe karịrị otu izu tupu egwuregwu ahụ
N'igosi nguzosi ike dị egwu, ọ meriri emume ahụ site n'itụ mita 2148, nke bụkwa ndekọ egwuregwu Afrịka
Nke a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ikom Naijiria nke atọ meriri asọmpi n'asọmpi egwuregwu mba Afrịka
Ọ ga-anọchi anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi mba ụwa nke afọ 2019 na Doha
N'ịbanye n'asọmpi, ọ ka nọ n'ọkwa nke iri kacha elu n'ụwa

Chukwuemeka bụ okwu Igbo nke pụtara 'Chineke emeela ọtụtụ ihe'
Ọ bụ ma ezinụlọ ma aha e nyere madu
Enwere ike ime ka ọ dị mkpirikpi ka ọ bụrụ Emeka ma nwee ike izo aka na ndia
Chukwuemeka Fred Agbata Jnr

(amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1979) nke a makwaara dị ka CFA bụ onye nta akụkọ Naijiria, onye ọchụnta ego teknụzụ, onye nkuzi azụmaahịa, ọkà okwu ọha na eze na onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn na Channels TVebe ọ na-akwado ihe ngosi ihe ndị pụtara ọhụrụna teknụzụ
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ede akụkọ maka The Punch nke a na-akpọ ụlọ ọgwụ ICT
Ọ bụ onye so guzobe godong, onye nduzi nke Innovation Support Network Hubs na onye nduzi Founder Institute Lagos, na onye guzobere CFAtechng
Maazị Agbata bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nkà mmụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Mahadum Ekiti Steeti dị na Ado Ekiti, Naịjirịa
Agbata malitere ọrụ ya dị ka ọkachamara na-ire ahịa na Globacom na Lagos, Nigeria site n'afọ 2003 ruo afọ 2007
N'afọ 2015, Channels TV malitere igosi ihe ngosi ya Tech Trends (ihe ndị putara ọhụrụ na teknụzuụ nke a na-egosi n'ụbọchị Fraịdee n'elekere ihe ji nkeji iri atọ gafee elekere isii nke abalị (GMT +1)

Ihe ngosi ahụ na-elekwasị anya na ijide na ịkekọrịta usoro teknụzụ kachasị ọhụrụ, ngwaọrụ mmepụta ihe, ekwentị na ngwa PC, yana ozi kwesịrị ekwesị nke ga-enyere ndị na-ekiri aka ịghọ ndị maara teknụzụ iji nwee ike iji teknụzụ rụọ ọrụ nke ọma

N'afọ 2015, ọ malitere ihe ngosi redio na Family Love Radio Network nke a na-akpọ Tech on Wheels na CFA ma na-egosi ya na Wednesday site na ihe ji nkeji iri na ise gafere elekere ise ruo ihe ji nkeji iri atọ gafee elekere ise nme mgbedd
na 977 Love FM Port Harcourt; Ihe ji nkeji iri atọ gafee elekere isii nke mgbede ruo ihe fọdụrụ elekere iri na ise ka ọ kụọ elekere asaa nke mgbede na 1045 Love FM Abuja na 7 30-7 45 pm
N'afọ 2018, o guzobere GoDoHub, ebe a na-amalite ọrụ nwere ụlọ ọrụ iji nyere ndị ọchụnta ego aka iji teknụzụ na ihe ọhụrụ malite ma na-arụ ọrụ ha
e kpughere GoDoHub na Ikeja, isi obodo Lagos Steeti, n'ụbọchị mbụ nke ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2018 site n'aka John Obaro nke SystemSpecs Nigeria Limited

N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2019, CFA ghọrọ onye nduzi nke The Founder Institute Lagos, ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzụzụ nke na-enyere ndị mbido aka itolite site na ọzụzụ ọchụnta ego site n'inyere aka igbochi enweghị nhazi, ntụziaka na mmekọrịta
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2019, ụlọ ọrụ iri asaa na ise na gburu gburu Naịjirịa gbakọtara ọnụ iji guzobe njikọ aka iji bulie ihe ọhụrụ na ọchụnta ego
Netwọk a, nke a na-akpọ Innovation Support Network (ISN) nwere CFA dị ka otu n'ime ndị nduzi ya
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị isi nke ise nke ndị nduzi na Nigeria Internet Registration Association
(NiRA), site n'afọ 2017 ruo ọnwa Eprel afọ 2019, ọ ghọkwara onye otu ndị nduzi nke isii

Ọ bụ onye na-akpọkọta nguzobe mkpakorita CFA, ụzọ dị mma maka mmaliteSME izute ma mụta ihe site n'aka ndị ọchụnta ego ihe na-agara nke ọma, site na mkpakọrita ga-enyere ha aka ịzụlite mmalite ha dị iche iche yana netwọkụ ibe ha
Ikpo okwu a nabatara ndị ọchụnta ego dị ka John Obaro, Ommo Clark, Obi Asika
A na-akwado ya na Lagos, Naịjirịa
N'ọnwa June afọ 2019, Swedish Institute

kpọrọ CFA dị ka ọkachamara mba ụwa dị ka akụkụ nke Innovation Ecosystem Programme ha iji zute ndị guzobere na ndị ọchụnta ego maka mmalite ndị a ma ama na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na-elekwasị anya na ịmepụta ihe ọhụrụ
N'afọ 2018, Consul General nke Federal Republic of Germany, Ingo Herbert kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke ndị ọka ikpe maka Falling Walls Lab Lagos nke mbụ nke bụ ncheta nke ọdịda nke Berlin Wall
N'afọ 2018, ọ bụ onye mgbasa ozi na Deutsche Welle Global Media Forum (GMF) na Bonn, (Germany), ebe ọ tụlere ọrụ nke ndị nta akụkọ na-amalite na usoro mgbasa ozi na-enweghị nnwere onwe

Ọ bụkwa onye ppanellistalongere onye bụbu Minista Ozi nke Naijiria Frank Nweke Jnr, onye bụbu Mịnịsta Aviation Osita Chidoka, na Genesys Ignite Tech Conference nke Genesys Tech Hub haziri kwa afọ na Enugu, ebe ọ na-eduzi nnọkọ panel na mmepe na ihe ọhụrụ nke isi obodo mmadụ

Slush Global Impact Accelerator, mmemme e mepụtara na njikọ aka na Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland na ọtụtụ ndị mmekọ ndị ọzọ gburugburu ụwa na ebumnuche nke ịkwado mmalite mmetụta na igosi ohere azụmaahịa na-akpali akpali na ahịa na-apụta, họọrọ CFA dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọkàikpe na Naịjirịa maka ihe ịma aka 2018
N'afọ 2017, ọ bụ onye na-eme mkparịta ụka na Genesys Ignite Tech Conference kwa afọ nke Genesys Tech Hub haziri na Enugu, tinyere Ommo Clark nke iBez Nigeria nakwa Obi Asika, mgbe Sen
Ken Nnamani (onye bụbu onyeisi ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu Naịjiria ) kwuru nke a bụ isi okwu
N'afọ 2014, CFA bụ onye nnọchiteanya na Nzukọ Ahịa Digital nke Naijiria nke emere na Lagos
The Nigeria Internet Registration Association (NIRA) nyere CFA na NiRA Presidential Award for Youth Development n'afo 2016
N'afọ 2015, ọ natara onyinye nke ịdị mma site n'aka ndị isi nke Naịjirịa na IT & Software Industry
N'afọ 2015, YNaija kpọrọ ya otu n'ime mmadụ otu narị kacha nwee ọgụgụ isi na teknụzụ na Naịjirịa
Igwe Vincent Chukwuemeka Ike OFR, NNOM (28 Eprel 1931 – 9 Jenụarị 2020) bụ onye eze Naijiria, agụmakwụkwọ na ode akwụkwọ a mara nke ọma maka ngwakọta oriọna, ọchị na satire
O ji ntakiri ụdị ya were zụlite omenala Igbo
Ọ gụrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme, Engilish na Religious Studies na mahadum nke di na Ibadan wee nweta nzere masta na mahadum nke Stanford
N'ime ọtụtụ n'ime ọgbọ mbụ nke ndị edemede Naijiria, ọ bụ onye a ma ama nke ọma dị ka onye edemede nke Expo '77, nlezianya anya na mmejọ ule agụmakwụkwọ na West Afirika
Ike bụbu onye ndeba aha na West African Examinations Council (WAEC)
A mụrụ Ike n'ezinụlọ eze na Ndikelionwu na steeti Anambra
Ọ gara Government College Umuahia maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ malitere ide ihe na Umuahia maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ụlọ akwụkwọ, The Umuahian, na ndị nkuzi gụnyere Saburi Biobaku, onye nwere nkwanye ùgwù na Bekee sitere na Cambridge
Ụfọdụ ndị odee Naijiria a mara nke ọma gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ gụnyere Chinua Achebe, Christopher Okigbo, na Ken Saro Wiwa
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na mahadum nke dị na Ibadan
Mgbe ọ nọ na kọleji, Chinua Achebe kpọrọ ya òkù ka o banye n'otu ụlọ ọrụ magazin
O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke nka na History, Engilish, na Religious Studies na mahadum di na Ibadan na 1955, were lụọ nwanyi na 1959 nye Adebimpe Olurinsola Abimbolu
Na 1965, o bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ nke mbụ ya bu Toads for Supper
O nwetara nzere mastas na Mahadum Stanford na 1966
Onye bụbu onye na-edeba aha na Mahadum Naijiria, Nsukka
Na 1971, ghọrọ onye isi oche nke West African Examinations Council
N'afọ 2008, ọ bụrụ eze Ndikelionwu
Otu nwa ya nwoke bụ Prince Osita Ike nwụrụ na 2016
Ọ bụ Igwe, Eze Ndikelionwu nke Ndikelionwu dị n'ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria, nwere aha 'Ikelionwu XI' n'obodo ya bụ Ndikelionwu na steeti Anambra
Ike jere ozi dịka onye nkuzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị nke dị na Amichi site na 1950 ruo 1951 na n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị na Nkwerre site na 1955 ruo 1956
N'agbata 1957 na 1960, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye enyemaka nchịkwa na mahadum, Ibadan
Ọ sonyeere Mahadum nke Nigeria, Nsukka ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka osote onye ndeba aha site na 1960 ruo 1963 na onye na-edeba aha na onye odeakwụkwọ nke Council site na 1963 ruo 1971
Ike rụrụ ọrụ na Biafra dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na mpaghara Umuahia site na 1968 ruo 1969 na ịsị ụlọ ọrụ ọchịagha Scout na mpaghara Nsukka site na 1970-71
Mgbe aluchara agha na obodo Naijiria, a họpụtara ya di ka onyeisi oche, Kọmitii nhazi na nhazi nke Mahadum Naigeria, Nsukka
Ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka ịmalitegharị na ijikwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa oge ozugbo agha ahụ gasịrị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-edeba aha nke West African Examination Council site na 1971 ruo 1979 dị ka onye isi nchịkwa mbụ nke ala Naijiria
Chukwuemeka Nwajiuba // (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ nke afọ1967) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọka iwu Naijiria

Ọ bụ Minista nke Steeti maka agụmakwụkwọ nke Federal Republic of Naijiria site n'afọ 2019 ma gbaa arụkwaghịm n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022, mgbe ọ natara akwụkwọ APC ngosipụta mmasị and nhọpụta iji chọọ ịbụ onye isi ala nke Nigeria na ntuli aka 2023 nke Project Nigeria Group nyere
Ọ rụburu ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke TETFund Board of Trustees
A mụrụ Nwajiuba n'ụbọchị iri abụọ nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1967 na Umuezeala Nsu na gọọmentị ime obodo nke Ehime Mbano na Imo Steeti, na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria
Ọ gụsịrị Okokporo nke Iwu (LLB) na Mahadum Imo Steeti
Ọ banyere na Mahadum Lagos wee gụchaa nzere Ọkachamara nke Iwu (LLM) were Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) soro ya na Iwu site na Mahadum nke Jos
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria n'afọ 1989
Nwajiuba malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye isi nke Ayodeji C
Emeka Ibrahim &Co n'afọ 1991
O sonyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gọvanọ Imo na ikpo okwu nke All People's Party n'afọ 2003, 2007 na 2011
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Ụlọ ndị nnọchite anya n'afọ 1999 - 2003 ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onyeisi oche kọmitii ụlọ ndị nnọchite anya na Ala, iwu ụlọ and na ọrụ
Ọ so na otu ndị guzobere All Progressives Congress na odeakwụkwọ nke kọmitii na-edepụta ụkpụrụ iwu nke mepụtara ụkpụrụ iwu nke mụrụ All Progressive Congress n'afọ 2013
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Tertiary Education Trust Fund site n'afọ 2017 ruo afọ 2019
A họpụtara Nwajiuba ọzọ dịka onye otu Okigwe North Federal House of Representatives na 2019 n'okpuru Accord Party
A họpụtara ya maka ọrụ minista wee bụrụ Minista nke Mmụta nke Federal Republic of Nigeria n'afọ 2019
Chukwuemeka 'Emeka' Odumegwu Ojukwụ, Ikemba Nnewi, onye amụrụ n'afọ (4111933) bụ onye ndụ Bịafra sịte n'afọ (1967–1970)
Há bidoro mahadum ahụ n'iwu nke iri na atọ nke afọ 2000 nke Anamabra Steeti gọọmeti nwetere, ma nweekwa ụlọ akwụkwọ abụọ
Isi ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum ahụ dị na Uli, n'ebe mbụ nke Ekwenugo Okeke Polytechnic, nke ana-akpọ Anambra State Polytechnic
Ụlọ akwụkwọ nke abụọ dị na Igbariam na saịtị mbụ nke College of Agriculture
Iwu guzobere mahadum ahụ wepụrụ State Polytechnic na mahadum ketara akụ na ụgwọ ya

N'aka nke ọzọ, iwu mahadum dara ịkagbu Iwu guzobere College of Agriculture, Igbariam, n'ihi y, n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro, mahadum na kọleji ahụ dị n'akụkụ ọnụ na saịtị Igbariam, ruo n'afọ 2006 mgbe gọọmenti bupụrụ College of Agriculture
ruo Mgbakwu, ihe dị ka kilomita iri na ise site na Igbariam
Iwu mmeghari nke 2006 nyekwara na Alor Campus ga-edobe isi ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa nke Mahadum n'ihi na etiti ya na ogige ndị ọzọ
Agbanyeghị, Alor Campus ewepụghị, n'agbanyeghị na iwu na-enye ohere nyere iwu ka e guzobe ya
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ngalaba abụọ nke Iwu na Science Management dị na Igbariam Campus nke mahadum

Agbanyeghị, na 2010 College of Medicine and Teaching Hospital a na-arụ na Amaku General Hospital, Awka nwetara nkwado iwu ka ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti gafere ihe ndozigharị iji mee ka ogige ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke atọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum atọ dị na Uli ( Anambra South), Awka (Anambra Central) na Igbariam (Anambra North)
Ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum a bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ndị Nigeria Security and Exchange Commission na-enyere aka n'ịhazi mmemme na Capital Market Studies
A na-eme mmemme a na ngalaba sayensị njikwa na Igbariam Campus
Chukwuemeka 'Emeka' Odumegwu Ojukwụ, Ikemba Nnewi, onye amụrụ n'afọ (4111933) bụ onye ndụ Bịafra sịte n'afọ (1967–1970)
Ndị ama ama naza aha nna Chukwuka gụnyere
Chukwuma Akabueze (amụrụ n'ụbọchị isii nke ọnwa Mee afọ 1989), nke a na-akpọ 'Bentley', bụ onye Naijiria na-agbara Gençlerbirliği bọọlụ
Onye bụbu onye na-agbachite ihu/enye goolu nke Kwara United tupu a kpọga ya na Odd Grenland n'ọnwa July nke afọ 2007
O nwere ezigbo ụkwụ aka ekpe nke o ji nye Zambia goal na-agba nke abụọ nke iko mba ụwa ndị n'akaribeghi afọ iri abụọ nke afọ 2007
Amamihe ya bụ ihe ọzọ eji mara ya nke doro anya site na goolu o nyere na 1-1 onye lawa onye lawa na Rosenborg BK n'ụbọchị abụọ nke ọnwa ọgọstụ nke afọ 2009
N'ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2011 ọ bịanyere aka na SK Brann
N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2013, Bentley gafere na klọb Chinese Super League Wuhan Zall
Ọ bụ onye otu Naijirịa nke sonyere na Iko mba ụwa FIFA nke ndị n'akarịbeghị afọ iri abụọ nke afọ 2007 na Canada nke Chile wepụrụ ha na nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ

Chukwuma Frank Ibezim // (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ na abalị iri n'isii nke ọnwa iri n'abụọ, afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri isii n'anọ (Disemba 16, 1964) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria na onye omeiwu ugbu a na-anọchite anya North Senatorial District nke Imo Steetị na nzukọ mba nke Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye otu All Progressive Congress (APC), otu na-achị mba ahụ
A mụrụ Ibezim nye Sir Hezekiah na Lady Priscilla Ibezim n'Ezeoke Nsu, Ehime Mbano Local Government Area nke Imo State
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na St
Stephens Primary school Umuahia wee gaa n'ihu iji nweta asambodo West African Examinations Council (WAEC) ya na Uboma Secondary School na afọ otu puku, narị iteolu n'iri asatọ (1980)

Ibezim nwetara nzere bachelọ na Industrial Chemistry na afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asatọ n'asaa (1987) na Mahadum Imo Steetị wee mechaa otu afọ ya National Youth Service Corps, (NYSC) na afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asatọ n'iteolu (1989) na Nigerian Bottling Company (Coca-Cola) Port Harcourt
Ọrụ ọha na eze gara aga nke Ibezim gụnyere ije ozi dị ka Kọmishọna maka Ọrụ Ugbo na Akụnụba, Imo Steetị n'etiti oge nke afọ puku abụọ na iri n'anọ na afọ puku abụọ na iri n'ise (2014 na 2015)
Onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche (ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị) nye Minista nke Mmụta n'etiti afọ puku abụọ na iri n'ise na afọ puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (2015 na 2019)
N'afọ puku abụọ n'iri (2010), Ibezim chọsiri ike ịnọchite anya Okigwe South Federal Constituency na House of Representatives, mana onweghị ike ịga nke ọma
E mechara mee ya onye nduzi, kọntaktị na mkpokọta nke All Nigeria Peoples Party (ANPP)
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'atọ (2013), Ibezim sonyeere ndị a na-ekwu na ha bụ ndị guzobere All Progressives Congress (APC), otu na-achị Naịjirịa

N'oge ọ na-achọ ịbụ onye omeiwu, ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke Naijiria na abalị ise nke ọnwa iri n'abụọ, afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ (5 Disemba 2020) wepụrụ Ibezim n'ihi ebubo ebubo ụgha nke asambodo na ime ka mmadụ; e nyekwara mkpebi ikpe ahụ maka onye na-emegide ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Senator Ifeanyi Godwin Ararume

Ma na abalị isii nke ọnwa abụọ, afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ n'otu (Febụwarị 6, 2021), Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu, ụlọ ikpe kachasị elu nke Naịjirịa gbanwere mwepụ Ibezim n'ihi na ikpe nke dugara na mwepụ Ipezim bụ iwu machibidoro n'ihi ne etinyeghị ya n'ime oge a kara aka
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa anọ (Eprel 27) n'afọ ahụ, a ṅụrụ Ibezim iyi n'ime ndị omeiwu

Patrick Chukwuma 'Kaduna' Nzeogwu (26 Febụwarị 1937 29 Julaị 1967) bụ onye agha Naijiria na onye na-eme mgbanwe nke keere òkè dị mkpa na nnupụisi ndị agha mbụ nke 15 Jenụwarị 1966, nke kwaturu mba Naijiria mbụ
A mụrụ Patrick Chukwuma Nzeogwu na Kaduna isi obodo nke Northern Region na nne na nna nke ndị Anioma na obodo Okpanam nke Mid-Western Region (n'akụkụ Asaba na Delta State nke oge a)

Nzeogwu gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Katọlik nke Saint Joseph na Kaduna maka agụmakwụkwọ elementrị ya na maka agụmakọta sekọndrị ya gara Saint John's College na Kaduna, ebe ya na Christian Anufuro ghọrọ ezigbo enyi
Na Machị 1957, Nzeogwu debanyere aha dị ka onye isi na Naịjirịa Regiment nke West African Frontier Force wee gaa n'ihu na ọzụzụ ọnwa isii na Ghana, mgbe ahụ Gold Coast
Ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ ya na Ghana n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1957 wee gaa Royal Military Academy, Sandhurst ebe e nyere ya ọrụ dị ka onye isi ndị agha n'afọ 1959
O mechara gaa n'ụlọ akwụkwọ onye isi ndị agha na Hythe na ụlọ akwụkwọ onye isi squad na Warminster

Max Siollun, onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke agha kọwara Nzeogwu dị ka 'onye Katọlik na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, onye na'aṅụ mmanya, onye na na-adịghị aṅụ sịga, na agbanyeghi na ọ bụ onye na-alụbeghị di, o tinyeghị oge dị ukwuu na-achụ ụmụ nwanyị'
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa na onwa Mee 1960, e zigara Nzeogwu na 1st Battalion na Enugu ebe Major Aguiyi-Ironsi bụ onye nke abụọ na-achị n'okpuru onye ọrụ Britain
E mechara ziga ya na 5th Battalion na Kaduna ebe ya na Olusegun Obasanjo ghọrọ enyi
Ndị ọrụ ibe ya bụ Hausa na ndị agha Naijiria nyere ya aha 'Kaduna' n'ihi mmekọrịta ya na obodo ahụ

Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na Congo na 1961, e kenyere Nzeogwu ọrụ dị ka onye na-enye ọzụzụ na Army Training Depot na Zaria ruo ihe dị ka ọnwa 6 tupu e zigara ya na Lagos ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ngalaba nzuzo ndị agha na isi ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha ebe ọ bụ onye ọrụ Naijiria mbụ

Onye bu ụzọ nke Naijiria Army Intelligence Corps (NAIC) bụ ngalaba nchekwa (FSS) nke Royal Nigerian Army, nke e guzobere na 1 Nọvemba 1962 na Captain PG Harrington (BR) dị ka General Staff Officer Grade Two (GSO2 Int)
FSS bụ n'ezie òtù nchekwa nke ọrụ ya gụnyere nyocha nke ndị ọrụ ndị agha Naịjirịa (NA), nchekwa akwụkwọ na ihe nzuzo
Major Nzeogwu bụ onye ọrụ Naijiria mbụ nwere nhọpụta ahụ site na Nọvemba 1962 ruo 1964
Dị ka onye ọrụ nzuzo nke ndị agha, o sonyere na nyocha ikpe nke Obafemi Awolowo na ndị ọzọ so n'òtù Action Group
Dị ka Olusegun Obasanjo si kwuo, 'Chukwuma nwere okwu ọjọọ ọ ga-ekwu banyere nchekwa mba [Naijịrịa], na banyere ndị a na-enyocha
Ọ bụrụ na o nwere ụzọ ya, ka o kwuru, otú o si mesoo ikpe ahụ dum ga-adị iche
' A kọrọ na Nzeogwu na-emegide ụfọdụ ndị ọrụ ibe ya na ndị agha na ikike ya dị ka onye ọrụ nzuzo ndị agha ma ọbụna na-ese okwu na Minista nke State maka ndị agha, Ibrahim Tako
N'ihi ya, e zigara ya na kọleji ọzụzụ ndị agha Naịjirịa na Kaduna ebe ọ ghọrọ onye isi nkuzi

Atụmatụ nke nnupụisi ahụ malitere site n'aka ndị isi na-eto eto gụrụ akwụkwọ na mahadum bụ ndị bu n'obi mgbanwe agha mba site n'inweta ike na isi obodo Kaduna (mpaghara ụgwụ) na Ibadan (mpaghra odida aṅyaṅwu), ma mesịa weghara Lagos (oke ala gọọment etịtị)

E nyere Nzeogwu ọrụ iduzi mgbanwe na mpaghara ugwu malite na Operation Damisa na 15 Jenụwarị 1966 na, n'oge ndị ọzọ, Operation Kura, Operation Zaki na Operation Giwa nke ga-eme ka ogbugbu nke ụlọ ọrụ ugwu
Nzeogwu malitere nkwadebe ya site n'ịhazi mmega ahụ abalị ụbọchị abụọ 'Damisa' (Operation Tiger) iji zụọ ndị agha na usoro ọgụ ọhụrụ

Ndị isi nke 1st Brigade Headquarters kwadoro mmega ahụ n'ụzọ doro anya na ha amaghị ezi ebumnuche nke Nzeogwu na Brigade Major, Alphonso Keshi zigara akwụkwọ ozi na ndị niile na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru Brigade iji nye ndị agha aka maka ihe ịga nke ọma nke mmega ahụ
Ka ọ na-erule oge Major Keshi ghọtara na 'Operation Damisa' bụ n'ezie nkata agha ọ gafeela oge iji gbochie ọrụ ahụ

N'isi ụtụtụ nke Jenụwarị 15, 1966, Nzeogwu duuru otu ndị agha gaa n'ihe a na-eche na ọ bụ ọzụzụ agha, na-akpọrọ ha ịwakpo ebe obibi nke onye isi ala nke ugwu, Sir Ahmadu Bello n'ọchịchị ọbara nke hụrụ ogbugbu nke ndị isi ala nke ugwu na odịda Nịajịria
E gbukwara Praịm Minista (Abubakar Tafawa Balewa), onye minista gọọmentị etiti (Festus Okotie-Eboh), na ndị isi ndị agha si n'ebe ugwu na ọdịda anyanwụ nke mba ahụ

Site na gọọmentị dị ugbu a, onye isi ala nke mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ (Michael Okpara), Onye isi ala nke Njikọ Naijiria (Nnamdi Azikiwe) na Onye isi ndị agha Igbo (Johnson Aguiyi-Ironsi) bụ ndị a ma ama lanarịrị
Modus operandi nke Nzeogwu na North nyere aka n'ụzọ dị nta na ihe ịga nke ọma nke nnupụisi ahụ na mpaghara ugwu Naịjirịa
Dị ka akụkọ pụrụ iche nke ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa si kwuo, Nzeogwu gburu ma ọ dịkarịa ala ndị agha na ndị ọrụ nchekwa ndị uwe ojii anọ gụnyere otu n'ime ndị ikom nọ n'òtù ya (Sergeant Daramola Oyegoke)
Nzeogwu sonyekwara na ogbugbu nke Col
Raph Shodeinde, onye isi ya na Nigerian Military Training College ma a kọrọ na ọ gbagburu ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka na-agba ọsọ n'enweghị onye na-ele ha anya n'ihu

Mgbe ọ na-echere ọkwa redio n'isi ụtụtụ site n'aka Major Adewale Ademoyega na Lagos nke emeghị n'ihi ọdịda nke nnupụisi ahụ na Lagos, Major Nzeogwu mere ọkwa n'etiti ehihie, na-ekwupụta iwu agha na mpaghara ugwu Naịjiria
N'ịgbaso ọkwa sitere na Kaduna, na ozi na Nzeogwu na-achịkọta ndị agha iji wakpo Lagos nke bụ nnukwu ohere n'oge ahụ, ọnye isi ndi Army, Maj
Gen
Aguiyi Ironsi zigara ndị ozi nke otu nwoke Maj
Nzeogwu a na-akwanyere ùgwù nke ukwuu, Lt
Col
Conrad Nwawo, gaa Kaduna iji soro Maj kwurịta okwu udo
Nzeogwu na inyefe onwe ya
Maj
Nzeogwu setịpụrụ ọnọdụ nke Gen
Ironsi kwetara
Aguyi Ironsi weghaara ọchịchị, e mesịkwara jide Nzeogwu na Lagos na 18 Jenụwarị 1966 n'ụzọ megidere nkwekọrịta dị n'etiti Nzeogwu Na Ironsi

E jidere ya na Kirikiri Maximum Security Prison na Lagos tupu ebufee ya n'Ụlọ Mkpọrọ Aba na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ ebe Gọvanọ nke mpaghara Ọwụda Anyanwụ na onye ga-abụ onye isi ala Biafra Chukwuemeka Ojukwu tọhapụrụ ya na Machị 1967

Na 30 Mee 1967, Biafra kwupụtara nnwere onwe ya site na Naịjirịa; nke a sitere na ogbugbu na-adịghị akwụsị akwụsị nke ndị Igbos na ugwu Naịjirịa na ịjụ nke onye isi agha nke oge ahụ General Yakubu Gowon ịhazi ndị ọrụ nchekwa iji kwụsị ogbugbu ahụ
N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1967, Nzeogwu - onye e buliri n'ọkwa Biafran Lt
Colonel - tọrọ n'ọgba aghara dị nso na Nsukka mgbe ọ na-eduzi ọrụ nyocha abalị megide ndị agha gọọmentị etiti nke 21st battalion n'okpuru Captain Mohammed Inuwa Wushishi
E gburu ya n'agha ma mechaa mata ozu ya; Otú ọ dị nwanne ya nwanyị siri ọnwụ na ọ gburu onwe ya iji zere imenye ya ihere site n'aka ndị agha gọọmentị etiti
Mgbe e merisịrị Biafra, onye isi ndị agha Naijiria bụ General Yakubu Gowon nyere iwu, ka e lie ya n'ebe ili ozu ndị agha dị na Kaduna na nsọpụrụ agha zuru oke

Echiche ụfọdụ emeela ka Nzeogwu bụrụ onye na-eme mgbanwe mana omume ya na nke ndị na-agba izu ọchịchị mgba okpuru na Jenụwarị 15, 1966 mejupụtara nnupụisi megide gọọmentị Naijiria a họpụtara site na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya

Mgbagha ọchịchị ahụ dugara na ogbugbu nke ndị isi gọọmentị ma nye ohere maka ọchịchị ndị agha afọ 13 (1966 ruo 1979), nke gọọmentị Naijiria na-achị ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya site na 1979 ruo 1983, nke ndị agha ọzọ kwụsịrị nke were afọ 16 ọzọ ruo 1999
Àtụ Infobox NFL biography

Chukwuma Okorafor (amụrụ n'ọnwa asatọ, afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n'asaa August 8, 1997) bụ onye Naijiria ọkachamara na-egwuruegwu bọọlụ nke America maka Pittsburgh Steelers nke National Football League (NFL)
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji na Western Michigan
A mụrụ Okorafor na Naijiria, ma biri na South Afrịrịka na Botswana tupu ezinụlọ ya akwaga mba United States na afọ puku abụọ na iri (2010)
Ọ gara Southfield High School na Southfield, Michigan wee malite ahịrị iwe na nchebe
247Egwuruegwu (247Sports) kpọrọ ya onye natara kpakpando atọ (3 staa) ma were ya dịka onye nke iri na otu (11) kachasị mma na Michigan dị ka onye okenye

Chukwuma natara onyinye site n'ọtụtụ mmemme, ụfọdụ n'ime ha gụnyere Arkansas, Florida, Iowa, Nebraska, North Carolina Steetị, Ohio Steetị, na Oklahoma, mana ọ họọrọ igwu egwu na Western Michigan n'ihi na ọ dị nso n'ụlọ na nkwa ụlọ akwụkwọ na-amalite ya dị ka onye ọhụrụ ọhụr ezigbo onye ọhụrụ
Okorafor gbara bọọlụ kọleji maka Western Michigan site na afọ puku abụọ na iri n'anọ ruo n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'asaa (2014 ruo 2017)
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'isii na puku abụọ na iri n'asaa (2016 na 2017), a kpọrọ aha ya na ndị otu mbụ nke All-MAC
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'asaa (2017), a kpọrọ ya FWAA First Team All-American

Na abalị iri abụọ n'asaa nke ọnwa mbụ, afọ puku abụọ na iri n'asatọ (Jenụwarị 27, 2018), Okorafor gbara bọọlụ na 2018 Reese's Senior Bowl ma bụrụ akụkụ nke ndị otu North nke meriri ndị otu South na 45-16
Ọrụ ọkachamara
Okorafor gara mmega ahụ onwe onye na nleta ya na Washington Redskins na Philadelphia Eagles

A họọrọ ya dị ka onye nke isii (6) kachasị mma n'iwe iwe n'ime akwụkwọ ahụ site na Sports Illustrated, onye nke itoolu kachasị mma n'iwe iwe n'usoro site na DraftScoutcom, na onye nke iri (11) na otu kachasị mma site n'aka ScoutsÀtụ NFL predraft
Pittsburgh Steelers họọrọ Okorafor na agba nke atọ (92nd n'ozuzu) nke 2018 NFL Draft
Okorafor bụ onye nke iri na otu e dere na 2018

Na abalị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa ise, afọ puku abụọ n'iri n'asatọ (Mee 22, 2018), ndị Pittsburgh Steelers bịanyere aka na Okorafor maka nkwekọrịta afọ anọ, n'onu ego dọla nke putara nde atọ, na narị puku iri anọ ($ 340) nke gụnyere ego mbinye aka nke $ 812,364

Na abalị iri abụọ n'ise nke ọnwa iri n'otu, afọ puku abụọ na iri n'asatọ (Nọvemba 25, 2018), megide Denver Broncos, Okorafor mere mmalite NFL mbụ ya na aka nri n'ihi mmerụ ahụ Marcus Gilbert na Matt Feiler
N'oge oge NFL nke afọ puku abụọ na iri n'asatọ (2018), ọ malitekwara ugboro abụọ dị ka njedebe siri ike, ndị Steelers na-eji ya eme ihe dị ka ihe mgbakwunye

Na abalị iri nke ọnwa iri n'otu n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (Nọvemba 10, 2019), megide Los Angeles Rams, Okorafor malitere nke mbụ ya n'oge NFL nke afọ puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (2019) n'ihi mmerụ ahụ Ramon Foster

Na abalị iri n'anọ nke ọnwa atọ, afọ puku abụọ na iri abụọ n'abụọ (Machị 14, 2022), Okorafor bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ, nke onu ego ya putara na dọla nde iri abụọ n'iteolu na narị iri abụọ n'ise ($ 2925) na Steelers

A kpọtụrụla Chuma Mmeka dịka 'onye Naịjirịa bu opụrụiche na ọrụ akaỌ mara ọrụ na azụmahịa niile ma na-emekwa ya nke ọma
Ọ kpọkọtara ndị edemede 77 ka na-eto eto na ndị omee nkiri na Ọwerị, Imo Steeti na Ọktoba 2015, iji gbaa ama gbasara mkposa n'etiti ndị ama ama na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ ya malitere 'The Safe Child Project' nke o bidoro na 2009 ebe ọ kwalitere ụmụaka na-enweghị nne na nna 1000 na Imo
Na 2002, ọ kpọkọbara asọmpi maka mma izizi nke Misi Imo, ebe onye turu ugo mmeri na ya bụ Miss Chidimma Dike, nke enyere ya ụgbọala ọhụrụ na ihe nrite ndị ọzọ
Ọ na-achịkọba mmemme na-akwalite ndị ntorobịa na Afrịka
Akwụkwọ Chuma Mmeka bụ 'Job Secret Book Series' na-akwalite aka ọrụ ndị Afrịka na-agba mbọ
O na-enyere ha aka ilebanye anya na ọtụtụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ dịka etu esi e weta ego eji akwado ihe na kwa ka esi eme ihe nkiri
’ z
Mmeka so n'otu ndị ọhụrụ na-ede abụ nke ogbara ọhụrụ
Ọ pụtara ihe site na mbipụta Abu dị iche iche nke ụwa niile
Abụ ya na-egosi mmegbu a na-emegbu ụmụ nwanyị na ka nwoke na nwanyị ga-esi bụrụ otu na Abụ
ha na-akwalite ọdịnala Afrịka, ma na-achịkọta ya mba niile maka ebumnuche agụmakwụkwọ

Ọ na-etinye atụmatụ ya na Kọmitii Mahadum Colgate nke Dove Tales kwadoro maka, Jonalu nke nka zuru ụwa ọnụ, i ji were kwalite udo n'ụwa, njirimara ezinụlọ na ọdịbendị Nchịkọta nke abụ ezi 'The Broken Home' na 'Echoes of the Mind' enwetala mgbasa ozi zuru ụwa ọnụ na ụlọ ọrụ edemede akwụkwọ nyocha
A kọwara Chuma dịka onye na-akpali mmụọ ndi agbọ ohụrụ Naịjirịa na-ede Abu
Ọ bụ onye na-ede abu kemgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
E depụtara abụ ya na 'Best Poets New African 2015 na Anthologies nke 2016'

O meriri onyinye nke umuaka nke Maryam Babangida na Naịjirịa mgbe ọ di afọ iri na atọ na 'Emerging African Poet toga' na 2017 Ndị Actors Guild nke Naịjirịa nyere ya onyinye dịka onye kachasị eme ihe nkiri bịara ọhụrụ na Nolịwudu (2019)
O ritela ọtụtụ onyinye maka ọrụ enyemaka ya na gburugburu ụwa

E depụtara ya dị ka onye ama ama na Naịjirịa, Chuma Mmeka esonyela n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa dịka Beyond Beauty, The King Must Marry A Strange Virgin, The 3 Idiots, The Arrogant Sisters, I Choose a Dirty Palace Maid, Broken Smile, Ezigbo Ọnụ Ọchị, Our Village Priest, The Village Girl, The Crippled Maid Agụrụ Agwụrụ na My Gateman Stole My Heart On Saturday

A makwaala ya dịka onye na-esonye na ihe nkiri Nolịwudu dika Samgold nke mepụtara King Akubueze (2014) onye nduzi bu Nonso Emekaekwue, ndị so na ya bụ Clems Ohameze, Joyce Kalu, Rachael Okonkwo na Mike Godson; Ghetto Republic (2014) ndị nsonye Francis Duru onye mmepụta bụ Pressing Forward; Men In August Meeting (2014) onye nduzi bụ Evans Orji na ndị nsonye Dede One Day; Beyond Beauty (2015) ndị nsonye Chacha Eke na Victor Osuagwu onye nduzi bụ Andy Chukwu nke Andybest Production; Secret Palace Mission (2014) Richrock Production ndị nsonye Olu Jacobs na Chacha Eke Faani; Royal Assassins (2015) onye nduzi bụ Sylvester Madu; Equalizer 3000 (2016) onye nduzi bu Austin Faani, ndị nsonye Harry B Anyanwu, Chelsea Eze, Emeka Enyiocha na Walter Anga; My State Governor (2016)onye nduzi Goodnews Erico; Hanging Coffin (2016) onye nduzi bụ Kalu Anya; Family Ambition (2016) onye nduzi bụ Sylvester Madu na ndị nsonye Freddie Leonard; Tony Montana (2017 ndị nsonye Zubby Michael na onye nduzi Emeka Jonathan Hills); Deadly Gang (2017) onye nduzi Chidox na ndị nsonye Junior Pope; Return of the Book of Evil (2017) nke Pressing Forward Production; Millionaire Sisters (2018 ndị nsonye Regina Daniels; Tears of My Destiny (2018ndị nsonye Pete Edochie na onye nduzi Emeka Titus; One More Bullet (2019) ndị nsonye Sam Dede na onye nduzi Collins Okoro Boko; Ndaa Letti (2017), Uwadiegwu (2017), The Evil Man (2018) na Royal Twist (2018) ha niile bụ Divine Touch Production; na ndị ọzọ

Cidoxepin (aha koodu mmepe mbụ P-4599), nke a makwaara dị ka cis-doxepin ma ọ bụ (Z) -doxepin, bụ ọgwụ antidepressant tricyclic nke e mepụtara na 1960s mana ọ dịghị mgbe a na-ere ya
Ọ bụ cis ma ọ bụ (Z) stereoisomer nke doxepin, ngwakọta nke (E) na (Z) isomers nke a na-eji azụmaahịa eme ihe na ihe dịka 85 15 na cidoxepin dị ka obere ihe

Otú ọ dị, ọgwụ ahụ nwere onye isi oche nkeji nke ụmụaka hụrụ na mmiri nke dị ka ndị mmadụ nwere ọrụ yiri nke doxepin, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka serotonin-norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor, H1 antagonist anabata, na anticholinergic, ma karịsịa a na-eche na ọ nwere ọrụ antidepressant karịa trans-doxepin
A kọọrọ na ọrụ mgbochi nke cidoxepin bụ okpukpu atọ karịa nke trans isomer na ụmụ oke

Cierra Kaler-Jones (amụrụ na Mee 29, n'afọ 1993) bụ onye America mara mma nke e chiri Miss New Jersey n'afọ 2014
Ọ bụ onye Afrịka nke abụọ meriri Miss New Jersey mgbe Suzette Charles gasịrị n'afọ 1983
Ihe nketa ya gụnyere ndị Amerịka, Irish, Filipino na German
Kaler-Jones si Galloway Township, New Jersey ma gaa Absegami High School
Kaler-Jones bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Rutgers ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Social Work na itinye uche na Women's & Gender Studies, na Critical & Comparative Race & Ethnic Studies
Ọ gara Rutgers dị ka nwa akwụkwọ kọleji ọgbọ mbụ

Na mgbakwunye, ọ nọrọ afọ atọ mbụ ya na Rutgers na Rutgers University otu na agba egwú ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka nyocha na Rutgers School of Social Work ma tinye aka na ACLU nke New Jersey na ngalaba ikpe ziri ezi nke ụlọ ọrụ onye ọka iwu steeti
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ugbu a na Education and Human Development
Kaler-Jones bụbu Miss Atlantic County, Miss Northern Lakes, Miss Cape Shores, na Miss Coastal Shore

N'ịza ajụjụ banyere mkpa nke asọmpi Miss America, o kwuru, sị 'Gịnị dị mkpa karịa nwanyị dị ike?' A kpọrọ ya Miss New Jersey n'afo 2014 na June 14 na ikpo okwu 'Empowering Today's Youth Through Arts Education' Nkà ya bụ ịgba egwu nke oge a na-eme onwe ya na 'Listen' nke Beyonce
(Ọ bụ onye otu Rutgers Dance Team)

Kaler-Jones sọrọ mpi n'otu akụkụ n'ihi na ụfọdụ ndị gwara ya na ọ 'enweghị ike ịbụ Miss New Jersey n'ihi na anaghị m ele anya n'ụzọ ụfọdụ ma ọ bụ na-adabaghị n'ụdị ụfọdụ' ma ọ na-eche ihe kpatara na ọ gaghị
Ndị ama ama aha nna ha bụ Cilliers gụnyere
Cinazepam (BD-798, nke a na-ere n'okpuru aha Levana) bụ ihe na-adịghị ahụkebe nke benzodiazepine
Ọ na-emepụta mmetụta hypnotic, sedative, na anxiolytic na obere mmetụta myorelaxant na ụdị nke ụwa na ngwa mma na onye isi oche nkeji nke ụmụaka hụrụ

Na mgbakwunye, n'adịghị ka ọtụtụ ọgwụ ndị ọzọ na-adịghị na ụdị nke ụwa họrọ site na iji bịa na ímé ihe nọr na mkpóró ndị na eme ka benzodiazepine hypnotics dị ka diazepam, flunitrazepam, na zopiclone, cinazepam anaghị emebi usoro ụra, na ịga n'ihu nke ụra na-adịghị ngwa ngwa na ụra REM na-abawanye

N'ihi nke a, cinazepam na-emepụta ọnọdụ ụra dị nso na nke ahụ, na n'ihi nke ahu ndi, ọ nwere ike ịba uru ma e jiri ya tụnyere ọgwụ ndị ọzọ, ndị metụtara ya na ọgwụgwọ nke ehighị ụra na nsogbu ụra ndị ọzọ
Cinzepam nwere usoro dị ala maka onye na-anabata benzodiazepine nke mgbagwoju GABAA ma e jiri ya tụnyere benzodiazepines ndị ọzọ a ma ama dị ka nitrazepam na phenazepam
Ọzọkwa, na ụmụ oke, a na-agbari ya ngwa ngwa, naanị 5% nke isi ihe fọdụrụ n'ime nkeji 30 nke nchịkwa
N'ihi ya, a na-ewere cinazepam dị ka ọgwụ benzodiazepine; ọkachasị, na 3-hydroxyphenazepam, dị ka isi metabolite na-arụ ọrụ
Cindy Estrada bụ onye isi ndị ọrụ America, onye bụbu osote onye isi oche nke United Auto Workers union, na onye na-agba mbọ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ikike ndị ọrụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi oche UAW site na 2010 ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na 2022, ọ bụkwa onye Latina mbụ mejupụtara ọrụ ahụ
Estrada gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Arts na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Michigan ma na mbụ na-eme atụmatụ ịghọ onye nkuzi
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji, o nwere ohere ịrụ ọrụ na mkpọsa n'akụkụ ndị ọrụ ugbo na onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ Dolores Huerta, na-ahazi ya na United Farm Workers union
Ọ na-ekwu maka ahụmịhe ndị a n'ịdọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nhazi ọrụ
Estrada malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka UAW na 1995
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ sonyere, o nyere aka ịhazi ndị ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Mexico, nke mere ka 'otu n'ime mmeri kachasị ukwuu nke UAW n'etiti ndị ọrụ na-emepụta ihe na-asụ Spanish'
A họpụtara Estrada ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche UAW n'afọ 2010
N'ọrụ a, Estrada bụ onye isi na-ekwu maka ihe karịrị ndị otu UAW 17,000 n'ime Michigan
N'afọ 2014, Estrada ghọrọ onye isi nke Ngalaba General Motors nke UAW, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ na Latina mbụ iji mejupụta ọrụ ahụ
A họpụtakwara ya maka oge nke abụọ ya dị ka osote onye isi oche UAW
N'afọ 2017, a na-ewere Estrada dị ka 'ihe na-adọrọ mmasị' na nyocha gọọmentị etiti gbasara ego na-ezighị ezi maka ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ nke UAW na Fiat Chrysler jikọrọ aka rụọ ọrụ
Ọ dịghị mgbe e boro Estrada ebubo ma ọ bụ kpọọ aha ya n'ụlọ ikpe ọ bụla, mana ebubo nrụrụ aka megide onye bu ya ụzọ, Joe Ashton, onye mechara maa ikpe
N'afọ 2018, Estrada weghaara nduzi nke ngalaba Stellantis (nke bụbu ngalaba Fiat Chrysler Automobiles)
Estrada kwupụtara ezumike nká ya dị ka osote onye isi oche UAW na 2022
Estrada bụ onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ikike ndị ọrụ
N'okwu banyere ikike ụmụ nwanyị, Estrada kwuru otú o si 'kwere na ụmụ nwanyị kwesịrị ịnọdụ ala na tebụl iji nụ'
Maka ikike ndị ọrụ, Estrada depụtara ọmụmụ ihe ndị na-egosi etu njikọ ọrụ si emepụta ụgwọ ọrụ na uru dị elu maka Latinos
N'ịkpọ ya 'ihe gbasara akụ na ụba', Estrada kwuru, sị 'Anyị kwesịrị iru ebe ọ na-aghọ ihe na-ekwesịghị ekwesị maka ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ na-enweta nde $ 20 kwa afọ ka ha na-akwụ ndị ọrụ ha $ 10 kwa awa
N'afọ 2021, e nyere Estrada onyinye Human Rights Award nke Kọmitii Ọrụ ndị Juu nke 2021
Onye isi oche UAW Ray Curry kwuru na 'Cindy na-arụ ọrụ kwa ụbọchị na ebumnuche nke ichekwa ùgwù nke ikike mmadụ niile n'ebe ọrụ anyị na ọha mmadụ anyị'
Estrada bụ nne ụmụ ejima
Cindy Le Coeur bụ onye na-edekọ egwu, onye na-agụ egwu, na onye na-agba egwu si Democratic Republic of the Congo
Ọ bụ onye otu egwu Congolese Quartier Latin International, nke onye egwu Koffi Olomide guzo ma duzie
Cindy Lee Sheehan (née Miller; Amụrụ nonwaj Julaị 10, 1957) bụ onye America na-emegide agha, onye nwa ya nwoke, US
Army Specialist Casey Sheehan, nwụrụ site n'aka ndị iro n'oge Agha Iraq
Ọ dọtara uche ndị mgbasa ozi mba na nke mba ụwa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2005 maka mkpesa ya na-emegide agha n'ogige a na-eme na mpụga ụlọ ọrụ President George W
Bush nke Texas nke dọtara nkwado na nkatọ
Sheehan gbara ọsọ na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma maka Congress n'afọ 2008
Ọ bụ onye na-akatọ iwu mba ọzọ nke Onye isi ala Barack Obama
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ncheta ya, Peace Mom A Mother's Journey Through Heartache to Activism, n'afọ 2006
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na The Daily Beast n'afọ 2017, Sheehan gara n'ihu na-akatọ George W

Cindy Swanepoel (a mụrụ na 15 Disemba 1981) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri ndị a ma ama Generations, Binnelanders na Egoli Place of Gold
A mụrụ ya na 15 Disemba 1981 na Krugersdorp, Transvaal, South Africa ma zụlite ya na Pretoria
N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ biri na Cape Town ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Durbanville High School
N'afọ 2003, ọ nwetara nzere BA Drama na Mahadum Stellenbosch
O mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na mmepụta ihe nkiri, Circles in a Forest nke Marinda Engelbrecht duziri
E mere ihe ngosi ahụ na Artscape Theater na Cape Town
N'afọ 2004, e mere mmepụta ahụ na Klein Karoo National Arts Festival
N'afọ 2005, ọ si Cape Town kwaga Johannesburg wee mee ihe nkiri igwe onyonyo mbụ ya na usoro telivisheneng, Egoli Place of Gold
N'egwuregwu ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'July'
Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma nke egwuregwu ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Houtkruis nke Elzette Maarschalk duziri n'afọ 2008 na Stephen van Niekerk n'afọ 2011
Ọ sonyeere mmepụta The Crucible nke Alby Michaels duziri
Ọ sonyekwara na ọtụtụ usoro telivishọn gụnyere The Mating Game, 90 Plein Street na Skeletons in the Closet, yana ihe nkiri ncha, 7th Avenue, Villa Rosa na Generations
Ọ pụtara na usoro ihe ọchị, Laugh out Loud na Proes Street
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na usoro kykNET, Sterlopers
N'afọ 2010, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Chrystal' na ihe nkiri Getroud Met Rugby
E mechara gbasaa ihe nkiri ahụ ka ọ bụrụ usoro telivishọn na kykNET
O mekwara ihe nkiri Nation's Garage, The Street's Bull na Ballad for a Single
N'afọ 2011, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri, 'Pôkô Events and Productions' ya na ndị mmekọ abụọ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-echegbu onwe ya banyere mmepụta na ihe nkiri ụmụaka
N'afọ 2013 ọ pụtara na Curl Up and Dye nke onye na-ede abụ, Sue Pam-Grant duziri
N'afọ 2015 ọ sonyeere ndị soapie a ma ama Binnelanders ma rụọ ọrụ 'Annelize Roux'
Site na oge nke iri na abụọ n'afọ 2016, ọ ghọrọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri mgbe niile
Cinga Samson (amụrụ n'afọ 1986) bụ ọ́nyé na-ese ihe na South Africa
Samson egosila ọrụ ya na Amsterdam, Berlin, Minneapolis, Norway, na Mexico ma gosipụta ya na Artsy
N'ịbụ ónyé sitere na Xhosa, Samson tolitere na E'Thembeni, Northern Cape, South Africa, na-elekọta ehi na ụmụ okorobịa ndị ọzọ
O kwùrù ozugbo ọ hapụrụ ọbọdọ ya gaa Cape Town, 'Amara m banyere ọdịiche agbụrụ na South Africa, ihe nketa nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, na nrọ ọjọọ nke eziokwu m'
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ gàrà Stellenbosch Academy of Design and Photography, na Stellenbosch, Western Cape, ọ na-akụziri onwé ya ihe Ọ zutere ụlọ ọrụ ónyé omenkà mbụ ya ógè ọ dị afọ irí na itoolu
Samson enweela ihe ngosi onwé ya na New York City na Cape Town, a gụnyekwara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi otu na Amsterdam, Berlin, Minneapolis, Norway, Vermont, na Mexico
Blank Projects na-anọchite anya ya na Cape Town na White Cube gallery na London
Artsy dere banyere 'ọganihu kwesịrị ekwesị ya n'ụwa nka'
Ọ bi na Cape Town ugbu a

Ihe osise Samson bụ ihe gbara ọchịchịrị, ihe ọ na-ekwu bụ ndị isi ojii n'ìgwè ma ọ bụ dị ka ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu, nke e mèrè ka ọ bụrụ onwe ya ma ọ bụ ndị ọ maara; ọ na-eji anya ọcha na-ese ha iji mee ka mmụọ na nkwenkwe ụgha pụta ìhè
O kwuru na 'ihe m hụrụ n'anya banyere anya na enweghị ụmụ akwụkwọ bụ na ha na-enye echiche dị ka nrọ, n'adịghị ka ányá nke na-ejikọta ha karịa etiti ákwà
Anya ndị a na-emesi ike na onye ahụ maara ihe, kama ile anya n'ụzọ na-enweghị isi
Mmetụta Samson bụ Paul Gauguin na Andrew Wyeth
Ọ gwara magazin Ocula, 'Enwere m mmasị
ịmalite mkparịta ụka dị iche na nnọchiteanya karịa ndị dị adị
Achọkwara m ịnọchite anya ọnọdụ ime mmụọ nke ebe m si, ka m na-ahapụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nkè nnọchiteanya màkà ndị na-ege ntị ịkọwa
A zụlitere m na-ahụ ememe na omenala omenala nke ọtụtụ nwèrè íke ile anya dị ka ọchịchịrị
Cinolazepam (nke a na-ere n'okpuru aha Gerodorm) bụ ọgwụ nke bụ benzodiazepine
Ọ nwere ihe na-eme ka nchegbu kwụsị, ihe na-egbochi nkụchi, ihe na'ime ka ọ dị jụụ na ihe na-ehi ụra
N'ihi ikike ya ahazi na ụdị nke ụwa na ụdị ke amụta site na iji Tinye na Enyi siri ike, a na-eji ya eme ihe dị ka ọgwụ na-eme ka mmadụ kwụsị
E nyere ya ikike n'afọ 1978 ma malite iji ya mee ihe n'ụzọ ọgwụ na 1992
A kwadoghị Cinolazepam maka ire ere na United States ma ọ bụ Canada
