Circle of Poison (COP) na-arutu aka na mbupụ ọgwụ a machibidoro n'ụlọ maka iji ya na nri wee wega ha n'ebe ndị ọzọ, ụfọdụ n'ime ha na-alaghachi site na mbubata
'Okirikiri' ahụ zuru ezu mgbe a na-eji kemịkal na-egbu egbu nke a na-ebupụ wee na-azu mkpụrụ osisi, anụ, na ihe ndị a na-ebubata maka oriri n'ụlọ
E bu ụzọ chọpụta gburugburu a gbasara United States mana mmekọrịta ahụ dịkwa n'etiti mba ndị ọzọ nke Global North na South
A na-emepụta ọtụtụ kemịkal a machibidoro, ọkachasị ọgwụ ahụhụ, na United States ma na-ebupụ ya na ndịda ụwa
A na-ejizi kemịkal ndị a machibidoro na 'ihe ọkụkụ ego', nke a na-ebupụ na United States na mba ndị ọzọ mepere emepe maka nnukwu uru

Nnyocha nke Wier na Schapiro mere gosiri na kemịkal dị ike ma dị ize ndụ nke a na-eji na ọrụ ugbo n'ụlọ mere ka ọha na eze na-eti mkpu maka iwu siri ike, nakwa na ọgwụ ahụhụ na-enye aka n'ịgbasawanye nke ọrụ ugbo na-ebupụ ngwaahịa na mmefu nke mmepụta nri maka mkpa obodo
Ọbụna ebe a na-etinye ha na ihe ọkụkụ nri, a na-ejikọkarị ọgwụ ahụhụ na Green Revolution, nke nwere ike ịpụta agụụ karịa ọbụna mgbe ọ na-ebuli mmepụta
Ha na-arụ ụka na ọgwụ nje abụghị ihe ngwọta maka agụụ, ha na-agafe mkpa nke ndị ogbenye bụ ndị 'enweghị ego ịzụta nri ma ọ bụ ala ha ga-akọ nri na ya'
Ọzọkwa, ha na-ekwu n'ihi na ụlọ ọrụ agrochemical na-enweta uru, ha ahaziela ụkpụrụ iji kwe ka mbupụ kemịkal dị ize ndụ n'enweghị ihe mgbochi
Wier na Schapiro na-arụ ụka na oghere a bụ ọdachi
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1991, Senator Patrick Leahy (D-VT) webatara 'Circle of Poison prevention Act' na Senate nke United States ya na ndị nnọchi anya Mike Synar (D-OK) na Leon Panetta (D-CA) n'ụlọ omeiwu
Iwu a gaara etinye njikwa siri ike na mbupụ kemịkal dị ize ndụ
Iwu yiri nke ahụ gafere ụlọ abụọ nke Congress mana ọ nwụrụ na kọmitii ogbako
Na nkenke, 'Iwu mgbochi nke Circle of Poison' ga-enwe
United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) nwere ikike ịchịkwa ire na ojiji nke ọgwụ ahụhụ na United States; tupu e ree ọgwụ ahụhụ, EPA ga-enye ya ikikere ma ọ bụ debanye aha ya
Ọ bụ ezie na ndebanye aha abụghị 'nkwado' nke EPA, ọ pụtara na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ekpebiela na ọgwụ ahụhụ agaghị akpata 'mmetụta ọjọọ na-enweghị isi' n'ebe ụmụ mmadụ nọ ma ọ bụ gburugburu ebe obibi
EPA nwere ike ịkagbu ma ọ bụ kwụsị ndebanye aha ọgwụ ahụhụ, ma ọ bụrụ na ihe akaebe ọzọ na-egosi na ojiji ya na-eweta ihe ize ndụ na-enweghị isi
Ma ọ bụ ọ nwere ike igbochi ojiji nke ga-eme ka e ree ya maka ihe ọkụkụ

EPA enweghị ikike igbochi mbupụ ọgwụ ahụhụ a kagburu ma ọ bụ kwụsịtụ; ọ nweghịkwa ike igbochi mbupụ ọgwụ ahụhụ a machibidoro iji ya eme ihe nke nwere ike ịdị ize ndụ n'aka ndị na-enweghị ọzụzụ ma ọ bụ ogige ọhụrụ, nke enwetụbeghị ndebanye aha
N'ihi ya, a na-ebuga ọtụtụ nde pound nke ọgwụ ahụhụ, nke ekpebiri na ọ dịghị ize ndụ maka iji ya na United States, gaa n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri mba ọzọ

Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act (FIFRA), na Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act, bụ iwu abụọ bụ isi na-ahụ maka njikwa ọgwụ ahụhụ na Ngalaba Ọrụ Ugbo nke United States, ma bụrụkwa ndị na-ahụ maka nchekwa nke nri nwere ọgwụ ahụhụ na Ngalaba Ahụike, Mmụta, na Ọdịmma
Odeakwụkwọ ahụ enyefeela ọrụ a n'aka Food and Drug Administration
Cissie Cahalan (1876 - 27 Ọgọst 1948) bụ onye Irish na-ahụ maka ọrụ, onye na-ahụ Maka ụmụ nwanyị, na onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị
A mụrụ Cahalan na Cork ma ọ bụ Tipperary, ọ bụkwa nwa nwanyị nke onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ahịa dị n'obodo Dublin, ọkachasị na ụlọ ahịa ngalaba Arnotts
Cahalan sonyere n'ọtụtụ òtù ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe
Ọ bụ onye otu Irish Drapers' Assistants' Association (IDAA), nakwa Irish Women's Franchise League (IWFL), malite na 1908
A kọwara Cahalan dị ka otu n'ime naanị ụmụ nwanyị sitere na ndị na-arụ ọrụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Irish suffragette movement
N'afọ 1912, ọ bụ onye isi nke 'Ladies Committee' nke alaka Dublin nke IDAA, ọ bụkwa onye na-enye aka na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke otu ahụ na-achịkwa
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ chọrọ nkwado nke Dublin Trades' Council maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị, na ọrụ ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya IWFL
Cahalan nọ na kọmitii nduzi nke IWFL site na 1917-1918
N'oge ụfọdụ ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke Irish Women's Franchise League
N'afọ 1917, ọ gara Irish Trades Union Congress dị ka onye nnọchi anya IDAA

Ọ duziri ọgbaghara na Arnotts mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ, ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'inweta mmụba ụgwọ 30% Cahalan jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke IDAA ugboro atọ, a họpụtara ya na 1922, 1923, na 1924
Dị ka akụkụ nke IDAA, ọ gara nke ọma na mkpọsa maka ụgwọ ọrụ kacha nta
Site na 1922 ruo 1923, ọ nọkwa na kọmitii na-ahụ maka IDAA, mana ọ gbara arụkwaghịm iji mee mkpesa, na-ekwu maka enweghị ihe ọ bụla gbasara ịtụ mkpọrọ
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ n'ụbọchị ya n'akụkụ ọrụ ya ruo 1932, ọ rụkwara ọrụ nwa oge na St Ultan's Hospital
Ọ gara n'ihu na-ede maka akwụkwọ akụkọ union n'afọ ndị 1930
Ọ lụrụ John Burns na 1932; Burns nwụrụ afọ anọ ka e mesịrị
Ọ bụ ezigbo enyi nke onye Irish na onye ibe ya bụ Hanna Sheehy-Skeffington
Ọ nwụrụ na 27 August 1948
Cahalan nwere arụmụka a kpọsara nke ọma na onye otu ya bụ Louie Bennett na 1919, banyere isiokwu nke ịbụ onye otu ọrụ
Arụmụka ahụ mere n'ụdị ederede na akwụkwọ akụkọ The Irish Citizen
Ọ bụ ezie na Bennet kwadoro maka njikọ dị iche iche maka ụmụ nwanyị, Cahalan kwadoro njikọ ngwakọta, ma tinye ọrụ n'ahụ ụmụ nwanyị maka ịghara ịrịgo n'ọkwá ikike
Cahalan kwukwara na òtù ndị na-ekewapụ onwe ha ga-enye ndị nwe ha ngwá ọrụ mgbe esemokwu bilitere
N'otu edemede dị na The Irish Citizen, Cahalan kwetara na ịbanye ụmụ nwanyị n'òtù ndị ọrụ emeela ka ndị ọrụ nwoke na-emegide ha n'ihi ụgwọ ọrụ dị ala
Otú ọ dị, o kwuru na
Onye na-emegide Agha Ụwa Mbụ, Cahalan hụkwara ya dị ka ohere iji melite ọnọdụ ọrụ maka ụmụ nwanyị, wee sonye na Kọmitii Ọrụ Ụmụ nwanyị
O kwekwaara na ndị ọrụ na-emeghe ndị ọrụ niile (gụnyere ndị ikom na ndị inyom), ma mee mkpọsa maka ịkwụ ụgwọ nhata maka ndị ọrụ niile
Cissy Dionizia Namujju (amụrụ na 15 Julaị 1977) bụ onye omeiwu Ugandan, na ọkachamara ICT
Ka ọ na-erule Machị 2021, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị a họpụtara maka Lwengo District na omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ nwere njikọ na National Resistance Movement n'okpuru tiketi ya ọ gbara ọsọ na ntuli aka nke 2021
Cissy jere ozi na Nzukọ nke iri nke Uganda n'okpuru otu òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ
Cissy Dionizia Namujju nwetara asambodo agụmakwụkwọ nke Uganda (UCE) na 2005 na asambodo agụmụ ihe nke Uganda Advanced (UACE) na 2007 site na Modern Secondary School
O nwere diplọma na Information Systems Management site na APTECH (2010)
Cissy Namujju bụ onye nlekọta na AGOA Girls (2002-2003) tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka State House (2003 - 2015)
Kemgbe afọ 2016 ruo ugbu a ọ bụ onye omeiwu
Na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri nke Uganda, ọ na-eje ozi na Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Na-eme ná Mba Ọzọ na Kọmiti Sayensị na Teknụzụ
Ọ lụbeghị di
Ihe ntụrụndụ ya bụ egwuregwu na, ịgụ akwụkwọ
Ihe Cissy nwere mmasị bụ ilekọta ndị agadi, ndị inyom di ha nwụrụ na ụmụ mgbei, ịkwalite ọrụ ugbo nke oge a na mmata obodo
Ikenna Samuelson Iwuoha (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke asaá n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1970) bụ onye na-akwado ezi ọchịchị, nkwuwa okwu na ịza ajụjụ na Naịjirịa nke dị na Owerri, Imo Steeti
A maara ya maka nguzo ya na iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe
A mụrụ Iwuoha na Nkwerre, Imo Steeti nke Naịjirịa
Ọ gara Uzii Layout Primary School na Government Secondary School na Owerri, Imo State
O nwetara nzere na njikwa azụmahịa na Mahadum Imo State

Ọ ghọrọ onye ọhaneze n'afọ 2010 ógè o boro ebubo na gọvanọ na-eje ozi nke Imo Steeti n'onwe ya pịara ya ihe n'ụlọ gọọmentị, oche ọchịchị, ma mesịa bụrụ otu n'ime ndị lụrụ ọgụ iji hụ na gọvanọ enweghị oge nke abụọ ya n'ọkwa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka pụrụ iche na mgbasa ozi na onye enyemaka pụrụ iche na ọrụ pụrụ iche nye Ọkà Okwu nke Imo State House of Assembly site n'afọ 2011 ruo 2013
Ọ bụ onye ahịa na onye ọchụnta ego tupu a họpụta ya
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Ikenna Samuelson Organizations, otu ụlọ ọrụ n'ubochí irí na isé n'ọnwa June 1988, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-azụ ahịa nde n'ubochí iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa August 1994 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na anọ
O nwere Aboki Holdings na Nwachinemerem Stores, niile na Owerri-Imo State, Nigeria
Dị ka onye edemede a ma ama, Iwuoha nwere ihe karịrị isiokwu 5800 bipụtara maka otuto ya kemgbe 2007
N'afọ 2010, Ụlọikpe Magistrate Owerri mara Iwuoha ikpe ịga mkpọrọ ọnwa atọ banyere ileda ụlọ ikpe anya
Ikpe ọ rịọrọ na-ebo ebubo na gọọmentị na-eche ihu
O meriri na mkpesa ya ma a tọhapụrụ ya ógè ọ nọrọ ụbọchị iri atọ na otu n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
N'afọ 2011, e mere ya onye enyemaka pụrụ iche nke Ọkà Okwu nke Imo State House of Assembly, mana n'afọ 2013, ihe dara n'etiti ha [n'ụzọ wee gbaa arụkwaghịm na nhọpụta ya

Ka ọnwa ole na ole gachara, e mere ya ma ziga ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ebe ọ nọrọ ụbọchị narị atọ na iri abụọ na asatọ n'enweghị ikpe ebe nwunye ya nọrọ ụbọchị otu narị na iri asatọ na isii n'ụlọ mkpọrọ tupu a kagbuo ikpe ahụ na Eprel 27, 2015 site n'enyemaka nke ndị na-ahụ maka ikike mmadụ Emeka Ononammadu, Kenneth Uwadi na Barrister Louis M
Alozie na Ụlọikpe dị elu nke 4 na Owerri ebe Justice Irene Duruoha Igwe nọ n'isi
Ọ lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
City FM 1051 bụ ụlọ ọrụ redio egwu dị na Lateef Jakande Road, Agidigbi, Ikeja, Lagos Steeti, Naijiria
Àtụ Lagos Radio
Ụlọ Nzukọ Obodo Lagos, nke e guzobere n'afọ 1900, bụ odeakwụkwọ nke gọọmentị ime obodo kachasị ochie na Naịjirịa
Ọ dị n'ime mpaghara Brazil, n'etiti mpaghara azụmahịa Lagos
Ọ dịkwa nso na King's College, Lagos, St
Nicholas Hospital, Lagos na Cathedral of the Holy Cross, Lagos
Ụlọ Nzukọ Obodo bụbu isi ụlọrụ gọọmentị ime obodo na ime ụlọrụ mpaghara ndị ọzọ na-ejere gọọmentị mpaghara niile ozi na Lagos na mgbe nwere onwe Naịjirịa gasịrị
Ụlọ nzukọ obodo ahụ bụ isi iyi nke nchịkwa gọọmentị ime obodo na Naijiria na odeakwụkwọ nke gọọmentị mpaghara Lagos Island, onye isi nke nchịkwa ala Naijiria ma ọ bụ nke ala kemgbe 1900
Ụlọ nzukọ ahụ bụ ihe ngosi akụkọ ihe mere eme, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọdịbendị maka obodo ukwu Lagos
Lagos City Mall bụ ụlọ ahịa ọgbara ọhụrụ bụ nke dị na Onikan, Lagos Island
Ọ dị nso na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi Lagos a ma ama dị ka Muson Centre, Tafawa Balewa Square, Onikan Stadium, National Museum na Radisson Blu Anchorage Hotel, Victoria Island
Ihe owuwu na City Mall na Lagos gụnyere
Civic Tower, nke a na-akpọkwa Civic Center Towers, Civic Towers, bụ ụlọ ọrụ dị okpukpu iri na isii na Lagos (ebe ndị ọzọ na-ekwu okpukpu iri ise)
Ọ dị n'ebe dị nso site na Civic Center na Ozumba Mbadiwe Avenue, Victoria Island, Lagos
Emeghere ya na afọ 2015 ma ọ bụ Business Tycoon Uzor Christopher nwe ya
N'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2018, a na-enwu ọkụ na Civic Towers na Civic Centre na-acha uhie uhie iji mee emume ncheta afọ iri ise nke Special Olympics n'akụkụ ihe ngosi 225 n'ụwa niile
Ọchịchị steeti mepere anya bụ obodo na -anọchite anya mpaghara n'abụghị naanị mpaghara akụkọ ihe mere eme, otu agbụrụ, ma ọ bụ otu ọchịchị, kama ọ bụ mmepeanya pụrụ iche n'onwe ya
Ọ dị iche na echiche nke steeti mba site n'ịkọwa ụdị mmekọrịta ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke obodo dị ka nke mejupụtara otu nke karịrị otu mba
Mgbe ị na -eke steeti dị ka steeti nwere mmepeanya, a na atọ ntọala n'ịkwalite akụkọ ihe mere eme nke obodo na ịdị n'otu omenala n'ofe nnukwu mpaghara
Ewepụtara okwu a na mgbe mbụ n'afọ ndị dị n'agbata 1990 Dịka ụzọ esi akọwa China, mana ejirikwara ya kọwaa mba ndị dịka Russia, India na Turkey

Ndị ọkà mmụta ji okwu ahụ bụ mmepeanya-steeti' na mbụ n'afọ ndị di n'agbata 1990 iji kọwaa China dị ka obodo nwere akparamagwa mmekọrịta ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị dị iche, dịka a jụrụ ile ya anya dị ka steeti mba Dị n'ụdịdị Europe

Ojiji nke okwu ọhụrụ a na -egosi na China bụ ma ka bụrụkwa “alaeze ukwu” nke nwere ọdịnala ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị pụrụ iche na usoro ọchịchị gọọmenti, ndị na -akwado ya kwukwara na usoro steeti mba akọwaghị mmalite mgbanwe nke steeti China
Ndị na-akwado akara ahụ na -akọwa China dị ka mba nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọdịbendị pụrụ iche, nke sitere na usoro na-aga n'ihu nke mmekọrịta mmekọrịta
E mere ka okwu a bụrụ okwu ama ama mgbe Martin Jacques jiri ya mee mgbe China na -achị ụwa

Dabere na Li Xing na Timothy Shaw, isi ihe dị na nyocha China dị ka obodo mepere anya bụ nhụta na steeti China na-enweta ikike ya kwụ ọtọ site na ịga n'ihu n'usoro ọchịchịr mmekọrịta ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke na -egosi na steeti ahụ nwere ikike ebumpụta ụwa karịa ndị ọ na -achị
' Ọ na-elekọta' ụmụ amaala ya na obodo ha, echiche steeti nke dị iche na ụdị steeti mba Westphalian

Ndị ọkà mmụta ndị ọzọ na-ekwu na isi ihe dị na mmepeanya-steeti bụ idobe ụkpụrụ ịdị n'otu nke ọdịbendị n'agbanyeghị na-egosipụta oke ọdịbendị dị iche iche, n'ime ọtụtụ narị afọ nke akụkọ ntolite na nnukwu oghere
Ụfọdụ na -adọrọ uche gaa ogologo oge nke usoro ide ihe nke China , ma ọ bụ kọwaa ọdịdị China dị ka Obodo nwere Njikọta akụkọ mere na Ndịn'azụ
Guang Xia na-agbagha azụ n'echiche nke ịdị iche nke mmepeanya steeti China
Xia na-ekwu na okwu mmepeanya-steeti n'ọmụmụ ihe China bụ mmepe dị mkpa ma dị mma, ebe ọ na-enye ohere ka e nyochaa njirimara steeti China ọgbara ọhụrụ na akụkọ nke akụkọ ha

Agbanyeghị, Xia kwubiri na n'ikpeazụ, mmepeanya niile ga-enwetaghachi onwe ha na akụkọ ha nke akụkọ ihe mere eme, na ọ bụ ihie ụzọ iwere China dị ka ihe kwụ akwụ ma ọ bụ gosipụta ya dị ka ejikọtara ya na ihe gara aga karịa ụwa ndị ọzọ

Ọ bụ ezie na echepụtara echiche nke India ọgbara ọhụrụ dị ka obodo nnwere onwe ya mgbe pụrụ na Ọchịchị Britain, a tụpụtala India ka ọ bụrụ atụ nke steeti mepere anya, ya na ndị na-akọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na -arụ ụka na njirimara ndị India kesara tupu ọchịchị Britain na mwakpo ndị Alakụba
Nchịkwa ọchịchị Vladimir Putin anabatala okwu mkparị nke ịkọwa Russia dị ka obodo mepere emepe nke Eurasia

Onye odeakụkọ Gideon Rachman rụrụ ụka na 2019 na echiche steeti mepere anya adabaghi n'echiche ọgbara ọhụrụ nke ikike ụmụ mmadụ zuru ụwa ọnụ na ụkpụrụ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, na ọ bụ naanị nke ndị otu pere mpe n'anaghị ekerịta atụmatụ ndị nke na-akọwapụta otu ọnọdụ mmepeanya
(dịka ọmụmaatụ, ha nwere ike nwee okpukpe ọzọ)
Ciwogai (Tsagu) bụ asụsụ ndị Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na Bauchi State, Nigeria
Clara Grace James (30 Ọktoba 1866 - 10 Ọgọst 1954)bụ onye Britain na-arụ ọrụ n'ịzụ ahịa
A mụrụ ya na Deptford mgbe ahụ na Kent, nne na nna James nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị obere, onye bụbu onye ọrụ nna ya zụlitere ya
Ọ chọtara ọrụ na-eme achịcha, na 1889 ọ sonyeere Women's Trade Union Association (WTUA)
N'ihi ya, a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ ya, mana WTUA nyeere ya aka ịchọta ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ, ebe ọ wepụtara onwe ya dị ka onye nhazi na osote odeakwụkwọ nke WTUA
Onye na-eme ihe ike ya bụ Amie Hicks nyere ya ebe obibi ma nabata James n'ụzọ iwu dị ka nwa ya nwanyị
Site na WTUA, James guzobere Confectioners' Union, ma jee ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ ukwu ya

Ya na Clementina ojii na John na-ere ọkụ rụkọtara ọrụ iji merie ọgbaghara n'etiti ndị na-emepụta chocolate na 1890, mana ndị otu ahụ chere mmegide dị elu site n'aka ndị were ha n'ọrụ na ndị ọrụ na-agagharị agagharị ihu, na-eduga na ọdịda ya na mgbasa ya na 1892
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, James lekwasịrị anya na mgbalị ya ịhazi ndị na-eme igbe
Lilian Gilchrist Thompson kwụrụ WTUA £ 70 kwa afọ maka afọ abụọ iji were James n'ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha
James na Hicks bụ naanị ụmụ nwanyị abụọ nyere ihe akaebe na 1891 Royal Commission on Labour
James jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya na London Trades Council, ma ruo oge ụfọdụ ọ bụ naanị nwanyị mere ya
E guzobeghachiri WTUA na 1894 dị ka Women's Industrial Council (WIC), James nọgidekwara na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ime ya, na-eje ozi na kọmitii nyocha na nhazi ya
Otú ọ dị, na nkwado ya agwụla, Thompson kwụrụ ụgwọ maka ọzụzụ ya dị ka onye nkuzi mmega ahụ
Ozugbo o mechara nke a, James guzobere usoro 'Working Girls' Clubs', na-enye nkuzi, ọzụzụ anụ ahụ, nzukọ mmekọrịta na klas ụmụ amaala
Ihe ndị a gosipụtara na ha na-ewu ewu, na 1899 WIC guzobere Clubs Industrial Association iji mee ka ọrụ a bụrụ nke a
Otu n'ime ụmụ agbọghọ gara klas ya bụ Margaret Bondfield
James mechara hapụ Clubs Industrial Association, guzobe otu Working Girls at Play, nke site na 1909 haziri klọb 22 na London
Ọ malitere ịrịa ọrịa ma kwụsị ịkụzi ihe, laa ezumike nká na Canvey Island
N'ebe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kansụl parish, ma na-elekọta ụlọ ezumike maka ụmụ agbọghọ na-arụ ọrụ na London
Clara Ragaz (30 Machị 1874 7 Ọktoba 1957) bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ahụ maka udo na Switzerland nke ọkara mbụ nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Swiss Federation of Abstinent Women, otu nzukọ na-akwado mmegharị nke temperance na Switzerland
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche mba ụwa nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom (WILPF) site n'afọ 1929 ruo afọ 1946
A mụrụ Clara Nadig n'ụbọchị 30 Machị 1874 na Chur, na Grisons canton nke Switzerland na Christina (née Plattner) na Johann Josua Nadig
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ịbụ onye nkuzi, mechaa ọzụzụ ya n'afọ 1892 na ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Aarau
Nadig bu ụzọ kụzie na England na France tupu ọ laghachi Switzerland
Ọ kụziri ihe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Sunday ma tinye aka n'ọrụ ozi ala ọzọ, nke bụ otu o si zute onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze Leonhard Ragaz n'afọ 1893, onye ọ lụrụ n'afọ 1901
Ọ were ọnọdụ nkuzi na ndagwurugwu Engadin, mgbe di ya jere ozi dị ka isi ndị ụkọchukwu Protestant nke Chur n'etiti afọ 1902 ruo afọ 1906
N'afọ 1902, ọ bụ otu ndị guzobere Swiss Federation of Abstinent Women (German Schweiz Bundes abstinenter), aka nke mba ụwa na nwunye ya nọ na Switzerland
N'afọ 1908, ha kwagara Zürich, ebe Ragaz gara n'ihu na-akụzi ihe ma di ya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ nke nkà mmụta okpukpe na Mahadum Zurich

Na Zürich Ragaz sonyeere ndị na-azụ ahịa a maara dị ka Social Buyer's League (German ), nke bu n'uche imeziwanye ọnọdụ ndị ọrụ site na ụzọ ndị na-azụta ihe, ma nọgide na-abụ akụkụ nke otu ahụ ruo n'afọ 1915
Ya na Emma Pieczynska-Reichenbach ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji melite ụgwọ ọrụ kacha nta nke ndị ọrụ
Clara Sophie Tybjerg née Sarauw (1864-1941) bụ onye Danish na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru ụmụnwanyị, onye na-ahụ udo na onye nkuzi
N'afọ 1915, ọ gara Nzukọ Ụmụnwanyị nke Mba Nile na The Hague, ya na Thora Daugaard

Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o nyere aka guzobe ma, site n'afọ 1916 ruo 1920, duzie Danske Kvinders Fredskæde ma ọ bụ Danish Women's Peace Chain nke ghọrọ alaka Danish nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom
A na-echetakwa ya maka inye aka n'iweta ụmụaka agụụ na-agụ site na Vienna gaa Denmark mgbe Agha Ụwa Mbụ gasịrị

A mụrụ ya na 3 Machị 1864 na Kalvehave Parish dị nso na Vordingborg, Clara Sophie Sarauw bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye na-elekọta ọhịa Conrad August Nicolaus Sarauw (1816-1886) og Betzy Wilhelmine Hansen (1834-1909)
Mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị, ọ kwagara Copenhagen ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Den Kellerske Åndssvageanstalt nke na-ahụ maka ịkụziri ụmụaka nwere nkwarụ
Ọ gara United States ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ma gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Pennsylvania Training School for Feebleminded Children ruo n'afọ 1892
Na 18 Mee 1893, ọ lụrụ onye ọka ikpe ụlọ ikpe dị elu Erland Tybjerg (1863ī1925)
N'afọ sochirinụ, e were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi Bekee na H
Adlers Fællesskole, ụlọ akwụkwọ ngwakọta mbụ na Denmark, ebe ọ nọrọ ruo 1915
Ọbụna mgbe ọ hapụrụ, ọ nọgidere na-enwe mmasị na agụmakwụkwọ, ọkachasị n'ihe gbasara ụmụaka nwere nkwarụ
Tybjerg bụ onye na-ekere òkè na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'òtù ụmụnwanyị Danish
N'afọ 1913, ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ mba ụwa maka Danske Kvinders Nationalråd (The Women's Council in Denmark) ma bụrụkwa onye otu Kvindelig Læseforening (Women Readers' Association)
Ruo mgbe ụmụ nwanyị Danish mechara nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'inweta ikike ntụli aka zuru ụwa ọnụ na 1915, ya na nwanne ya nwanyị Elna Munch lụrụ ọgụ maka ihe kpatara ya
N'afọ 1915, ọ gara nzukọ udo ụmụnwanyị nke mba ụwa na Hague
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Denmark, ya na Thora Daugaard, hiwere Danske Kvinders Fredskæde (DKF), aka Danish nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom
Tybjerg bụ onye na-ahụ maka ịmepụta netwọk ọmụmụ nke nwere ụmụnwanyị 30, gụnyere Gyrithe Lemche, Henni Forchhammer, Estrid Hein, Matilde Bajer na Ellen Hørup
Ha gara Denmark niile na-agba ụmụnwanyị ume ịghọ ndị otu DKF site n'ịkwụ otu 'okpueze udo' (fredskrone) ma bịanye aka na ndepụta na-akpọ maka 'Ikpe ziri ezi karịa Ike'
Tybjerg bụ onye isi oche nke nzukọ ahụ site n'afọ 1915 ruo 1920, na-eme ka ndị otu ruo ihe dị ka 10,000
Mgbe e guzobere alaka mpaghara na Denmark dum, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke alaka Copenhagen site n'afọ 1921 ruo 1925
Thora Daugaard nọchiri ya dị ka onyeisi oche nke DKF
Mgbe esemokwu nke Agha Ụwa Mbụ mechara kwụsị, WILPF haziri nzukọ nke abụọ na Zurich
Tybjerg, onye na-anọchite anya alaka Danish, kpọrọ oku ka e lekwasị anya pụrụ iche na mkpa ụmụaka na ndị na-eto eto
Site n'ihe dị ka 1921, ọ gbasiri mbọ ike inye nkwado maka ụmụaka nọ na Vienna na-arịa ọrịa na-edozi ahụ
O nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ime ka a kpọbata ọtụtụ n'ime ha na Denmark ebe ha nwere ike iweghachi ahụike n'ụlọ ndị Denmark
Tybjerg lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ
Mgbe di ya nwụsịrị n'afọ 1925, ọ nọrọ afọ ole na ole na Hillerød ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-ekere òkè na atụmatụ udo
Ọ nwụrụ na Copenhagen na 14 Jenụwarị 1941
E liri ya na ili ozu Tibirke dị nso na Tisvilde
Marxism na Leninism
Clara Zetkin (/ˈzɛtkɪn/; German ; née Eißner ; 5 Julaị 1857- 20 June 1933) bụ onye German Marxist theorist, onye na-ekwuchitere ndi mmadu, na onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị
Tutu ruo afọ 1917, ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Social Democratic Party nke Germany
Mgbe ahụ, ọ sonyeere Independent Social Democratic Party of Germany (USPD) na akụkụ aka ekpe ya, Spartacist League
Nke a mesịrị ghọọ Communist Party of Germany (KPD), nke ọ nọchitere anya na Reichstag n'oge Weimar Republic site n'afọ 1920 ruo 1933
A mụrụ Clara Josephine Eißner (Eissner) diọkpara n'ime ụmụ atọ na Wiederau (Saxony) [de], obodo ndị ọrụ ugbo na Saxony, nke bụzi akụkụ nke obodo Königshain-Wiederau

Nna ya, Gottfried Eissner, bụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ, onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara na onye Protestant na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, ebe nne ya, Josephine Vitale, nwere mgbọrọgwụ French, sitere n'ezinụlọ nọ n'etiti na Leipzig ma gụọ akwụkwọ nke ọma
N'afọ 1872, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Leipzig, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Leipzig Teachersī College for Women
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ya na nwa ọhụrụ Sozialdemokratische Partei Deutschlands (SPD; Social Democratic Party) guzobere mmekọrịta

N'ihi mmachibido iwu nke Bismarck tinyere na ọrụ ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Germany n'afọ 1878, Zetkin gara Zurich n'afọ 1882 wee gaa biri na Paris, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ịbụ onye nta akụkọ na onye ntụgharị
N'oge ọ nọ na Paris, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na ntọala nke otu Socialist International
Ọ nabatakwara aha onye ọ hụrụ n'anya, onye Russia-Jewish Ossip Zetkin [de], onye Marxist raara onwe ya nye, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Maxim na Konstantin (nke a maara dịka Kostja)
Ossip Zetkin dara ezigbo ọrịa na mbido 1889 wee nwụọ na June nke afọ ahụ
Mgbe onye ọ hụrụ n'anya nwụsịrị, Zetkin na ụmụ ya kwagara Stuttgart
Ọ lụrụ onye na-ese ihe Georg Friedrich Zundel, onye ji afọ iri na asatọ tọọ ya, site n'afọ 1899 ruo 1928
Mgbe Adolf Hitler na ndị Nazi Party ya weghaara ọchịchị, a machibidoro ndị Communist Party nke Germany iwu, mgbe ọkụ Reichstag gbara n'afọ 1933
Zetkin gara mba ọzọ n'oge ikpeazụ, n'oge a na Soviet Union
Ọ nwụrụ n'ebe ahụ, na Arkhangelskoye, nso Moscow, na 1933, mgbe ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 76
E debere ntụ ya na Kremlin Wall Necropolis, site na Moscow Kremlin Wall, nso Red Square
Ndị isi ndị Kọmunist si Europe niile bịara ememe olili ozu ahụ, gụnyere Joseph Stalin na Nadezhda Krupskaya (nwunye Lenin)
Mgbe 1949 gachara , Zetkin ghọrọ onye dike a ma ama na German Democratic Republic (East Germany), obodo ukwu ọ bụla nwere okporo ámá aha ya
A ka nwere ike ịchọta aha ya na map nke ala ndị bụbu GDR
E nwekwara okporo ámá dị na Tula, Russia nke aha ya bụ Zetkin (Kla Цеткин) nke na-aga n'otu akụkụ na Red Army Prospect nke bụ okporo ụzọ bụ isi na-eduga na Moscow Train Station na obodo ahụ
Clara Zetkin (N'ụbọchị 5 Julaị 1857 ruo ụbọchị 20 June 1933) bụ onye German Marxist theorist, onye na-eme ihe, na onye na-akwado ikike ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 1911, ọ haziri Ụbọchị Ụmụ nwanyị nke Mba Nile nke mbụ
Nke a bụ akwụkwọ Clara Zetkin, gụnyere ihe odide, okwu, akwụkwọ ozi na ndị ọzọ
Clare Pauline Abbott (née Hinshelwood, amụrụ n'ubochí isé n'ọnwa Julaị 1921) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-eme ihe osise na South Africa
Ọ bụ ezie na a mụrụ ya n'England, ọ biri na South Africa ma mepụta ihe osise akụkọ ihe mere eme zuru ezu nke e ji mee ihe n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ
O mekwara ka efere agba dị iche iche màkà mbipụta America nke akwụkwọ Rowland Ward nkè nnukwu egwuregwu

Clare Akamanzi bụ onye ọka iwu Rwanda, onye nchịkwa ọha na eze, onye ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye jere ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi nchịk nke Rwanda Development Board, kemgbe ụbọchị 4 Febụwarị 2017
Ọnọdụ a bụ nhọpụta nke onye isi ala nke Rwanda
N'ime mgbanwe nke ụbọchị 31 Ọgọstụ 2017, Akamanzi nọgidere na kọmitii ma ọ nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ ya
A mụrụ Akamanzi na Uganda n'aka nne na nna ya bụ ndị Rwanda gbara ọsọ ndụ n'afọ 1979
Ọ bụ nwa nke anọ n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụnne isii
Ọ nwetara agụmakwụkwọ tupu mahadum n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke Uganda
Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara ọtụtụ ebe, n'ihi na ndị mụrụ ya bụ ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na Uganda
Ọ lụrụ di ma nwee otu nwa
O nwere nzere Bachelor of Laws, nke Mahadum Makerere nyere, na Kampala, isi obodo Uganda
O nwekwara diplọma na Legal Practice, nke ọ nwetara na Law Development Centre, kwa na Kampala
E nwetara Master of Laws ya na iwu azụmahịa na itinye ego na Mahadum Pretoria, na South Africa
O nwekwara nzere masta na Public Administration, nke ọ nwetara na Mahadum Harvard, na Cambridge, Massachusetts, na United States
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Iwu site na Mahadum Concordia n'afọ June 2018

Clare Ezeakacha (amụrụ na Mee 26, 1985) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, onye nduzi ihe nkiri Naijiria, onye mgbasa ozi na onye na-ahụ maka ụmụaka nke a maara maka ihe nkiri ya Arima na Gone Grey
A mụrụ Clare Ezeakacha na Lagos mana ọ bu onye Anambra State, Nigeria
Ọ gara Charles Heery Memorial Junior na Secondary maka agụmakwụkwọ ya dị ala
Ezeakacha nwere BSc na Computer Science site na Mahadum Madonna, Elele na diplọma postgraduate site na Machịum Nigeria Nsukka
Clare malitere ọrụ ya na 2011 dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri

N'afọ 2016, ọ banyere n'ime ihe nkiri ma mepụta ma duzie ọtụtụ ihe nkiri nollywood, gụnyere 'Jack of All Trade', 'Two Wrongs', 'Arima' na 'Smoke' nke a họpụtara maka asọmpi kacha mma na 2018 Africa International Film Festival

Clarence Major (amụrụ na Disemba 31, 1936) bụ ónyé America na-ede uri, ónyé na-ese ihe, na ónyé na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ; ónyé mmeri nke 2015 'Lifetime Achievement Award in the Fine Arts', nke Congressional Black Caucus Foundation gosipụtara
E nyere ya 2016 PEN Oakland/Reginald Lockett Lifetime Achievement Award
A mụrụ Clarence Major na Disemba 31, 1936, na Atlanta, Georgia, ma too na Chicago, Illinois
Dị ka ónyé nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, ọ malitere ise ihe na ise ihe, na-ede uri na akụkọ ifo
Na mbido afọ iri abụọ ya, ọ malitere ibipụta magazin nke ya, Coercion Review, nke gosipụtara ndị na-ede uri na ndị édémédé dịka Henry Miller, Kenneth Patchen na Lawrence Ferlinghetti
Dị ka ónyé nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, nnukwu ihe ngosi Van Gogh nke ihe osise na eserese na Art Institute nke Chicago, February 1 ̊ Eprel 16, 1950, metụtara Major
Mgbè ọ nọsịrị na Air Force, ọ hapụrụ Midwest wee kwaga New York City na Disemba 1966
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, All Night Visitors, na 1969 na nchịkọta uri mbụ ya, Swallow the Lake, n'afọ sochirinụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nwa ógè dị ka ónyé nyocha nyocha màkà Simulmatics, n'okpuru nduzi nke ónyé na-ahụ màkà mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya Dr
Sol Chaneles
Major nyochara akụkọ akụkọ banyere ọgba aghara nke afọ 1960
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'ọhịa na ọgba aghara, na Detroit na Milwaukee, tupu ọ gbanwee, na 1967, na nkụzi
Mbụ, ọ kụziri na Harlem na New Lincoln School, na mmemme oge okpomọkụ
O mechara kụzie ọmụmụ akwụkwọ America nke ógè a na ogbako édémédé na mahadum
Ihe ngosi mbụ ya nke ihe osise bụ na Sarah Lawrence College na ọbá akwụkwọ na mbido afọ 1970
Ya na John A
Williams, na 1968, ọ kụziri màkà ógè na Girard College na Philadelphia
N'oge a, Major na-enyekwa ọgụgụ ọha nke uri ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ndị nchịkọta akụkọ nke ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ (dị ka Caw! na The Journal of Black Poetry) ma dee kọlụm ógè niile màkà American Poetry Review
Ọ bụ ónyé nchịkọta akụkọ mbụ nke American Book Review
Ọ gụrụ uri ya na Guggenheim Museum, Folger Theatre na mahadum, ụlọ ihe nkírí na ebe ọdịnala
Major meriri National Council on the Arts Award màkà nchịkọta uri ya Swallow the Lake na 1970, na afọ sochirinụ e nyèrè ya onyinye New York Cultural Foundation màkà uri
Reflexe et Ossature (1982), nsụgharị French nke Reflex and Bone Structure (1975), a họpụtara ya maka Prix Maurice Coindreau (1982)
Such Was The Season (1987) bụ nhọrọ nke otu akwụkwọ Literary Guild na 1988
N'otu afọ ahụ, The New York Times Book Review tụrụ aro ya na ndepụta 'Summer Reading' ya kwa afọ
Painted Turtle Woman With Guitar (1988) ka The New York Times Book Review depụtara dị ka 'Akwụkwọ A Ma Ama nke Afọ' 1988
N'afọ 1990, a họpụtara nchịkọta akụkọ ya dị mkpirikpi, Fun & Games, màkà Los Angeles Book Critics Award
Major meriri ọla nchara dị ka ónyé ikpeazụ màkà National Book Award na 1999 màkà Configurations New and Selected Poems 1958 1958 1958 (Copper Canyon Press)
O meriri Pushcart Prize màkà akụkọ mkpirikpi 'My Mother and Mitch', n'afọ 1989
N'afọ 2002, o ritere ihe nrite Stephen Henderson Poetry Award for Outstanding Achievement, nke African American Literature and Culture Society nyere
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke 1986 My Amputations meriri Western States Book Award ma bipụtaghachi ya na 2008 na mmeghe nke Lawrence Hogue
Dirty Bird Blues meriri Sister Circle Book Award na 1999
E nyere Major ihe Nríte International Literary Hall of Fame (Chicago State University) n'afọ 2001
Ọ natara '2015 Lifetime Achievement Award in the Fine Arts' site na Congressional Black Caucus Foundation
E nyere ya onyinye PEN Oakland/Reginald Lockett Lifetime Achievement Award nke iri abụọ na isii kwa afọ na Disemba 3, 2016
Na Jenụwarị 2017, a họpụtara From Now On New and Selected Poems maka 2017 Northern California Book Award nkè The Northern California Independent Booksellers Association kwadoro
N'afọ 2021, a nabatara Major n'ime Ụlọ Nzukọ Ndị edemede Georgia
Major agaala ma ọ bụ nata nzere site na ụlọ ọrụ ndị a
Clarence K
Moniba, PhD (amụrụ na Maachị 15, 1979) bụ onye ọrụ gọọmentị Liberia
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kachasị nta n'akụkọ nke mba ahụ iji ọkwa Minista nke Steeti na-enweghị ọfịs, yana Onye isi oche nke Board nke ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik Liberia
Ọ bụ onye isi ndụmọdụ na onye njikwa ọrụ nke onye isi ala Liberia na onye isi na mmepe akụrụngwa na Liberia site n'afọ 2014 ruo afọ 2018
Moniba n'oge dị iche iche duziri Diaspora Engagement Unit, Philanthropy Secretariat na President Delivery Unit nke na-ahụ maka mmejuputa ọrụ ndị dị mkpa
Moniba n'ọrụ ndị gara aga arụwo ọrụ na African Development Bank South Level Panel na Post Conflict & Fragile States, yana United Nations Post-2015 Development Agenda
E nyere ya ihe nrite mba Knight Commander of the Most Venerable Order of Pioneers - nke Onye isi ala Ellen Johnson Sirleaf kwuru na ọ bụ maka ọrụ ya pụrụ iche na nke pụrụ iche na gọọmentị
Tupu ọrụ ya na gọọmentị Liberia, Moniba bụ onye America na-agba bọọlụ na Arena League (2001 - 2004)
Ọ bụkwa onye dere akwụkwọ The Official Guidebook to a College Football Scholarship
Ọ bụ onye ọtụtụ ndị na aghụghọ lọtrị adịgboroja metụtara, nke kwuru na o nwere, ma dị njikere ịzụ ahịa ọtụtụ nde dollar na diamond na ọlaedo Afrịka
Moniba mere ihe nkiri bọọlụ na ihe nkiri Radio, ebe o mere egwuregwu mmeri nke egwuregwu maka ndị otu ụlọ TL
Hanna High School
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ nduzi nke egwuregwu bọọlụ na ihe nkiri Invincible ebe ọ gara megide onye isi Vince Papale, nke Mark Walhberg gosipụtara, ọ pụtakwara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri bọọlụ nke We Are Marshall
Moniba dere 'The Official Guidebook to a College Football Scholarship' nke e bipụtara na mba niile nke United States na 2011
Moniba gbara bọọlụ kọleji ya na Mahadum New Mexico State site n'afọ 1999 ruo 2001
Ọ gara n'ihu na-egwuregwu bọọlụ ọkachamara ruo afọ anọ na Arena Football League maka òtù Carolina na New York
Clarence bụ nwa ikpeazụ nke onye bụbu osote onye isi ala Liberia, Dr
Harry F
Moniba, onye jere ozi n'ọkwa ahụ site na 1984 ruo 1990
Moniba nwetara nzere PhD ya na Mahadum New Mexico State ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ wee nweta nzere na Rhetoric na Professional Communications
O lekwasịrị anya na Intercultural na International Communications
O nwetakwara nzere masta ya na International Relations
Akwụkwọ edemede ya e bipụtara bụ 'Ethnic Exclusion in Government São - A Case Study of the Republic of Liberia'
Moniba nwetara nzere masta na Public Administration site na John F
Kennedy, School of Government na Mahadum Harvard
Clarence Peters (onye amụrụ Clarence Abiodun Peters) bụ Nigerian music video director, onye mmepụta ihe nkiri fim na cinematographer
Ọ bụ ya guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Capital Dream Pictures production company nke na ahụ maka performing arts fim nakwa ihe nkiri vidio
O guzobekwara ụlọ ọrụ ọzọ a kpọrọ Capital Hill Records, ụlọ na- ahụ maka ndi na-eti egwu bụ nke nwaada Chidinma, Tha Suspect na Illbliss so na ya
A họọrọ ya dika onye nke abụọ n'ime mmadụ iri aha ndi Channel O' wepụtara gbasara ndị daịrektọ nwere ọhụrụ banyere iti egwu nakwa imeputa vidio egwu ahụ
N'afọ 1998, o sonyere ma kwado vidio egwu nke Mobil bụ nke metụtara ọria AIDS
Ọ haziri ihe nkiri a kpọrọ Everyday people nwere nkeji iri anọ n'onyonyo
Peters ahiziela vidio egwu ndi na-eti egwu di iche iche ụfọdụ gụnyere Darey, Durella, na Wizkid,
N'afọ 2012, o gosịri vidio egwu maka Shuga', nke Boneye ji P-Unit wee dokwara,Banky W, Wizkid and L-Tido
Peters egosipụtala ihe akụkọ mere eme dị iche iche dị utọ n'onyonyo, ihe ngosi maka azụmahịa, nkenke fim nakwa ihe ndị ọzọ N’April 2014, Absolut Vodka kwanyere ya ugwu maka nka ọrụ aka ya
N'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2015, Peters kwupụtara ebumnuche ya maka ngosipụta ihe nkiri fim na-eyi egwu dị nkeji iri abụọ na ise akpọrọ Hex
E wepụtara nkeji nke izizi na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa September n'afọ, 2015
A mụrụ Peters n'ezinụlọ ndị ama ama bụ Sir Shina Peters,oti egwu na Clarion Chukwura, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri egwuregwu n'onyonyo
Ọ gụrụ praịmarị ya n' ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị BI, gụọ sekọndịrị na Government College Ikorodu
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị sekọndrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ atọ n'ụlọ ọrụ Alpha Visions
Ọ gụrụ na City Varsity, ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na Cape Town South Afrika bụ na -akụzi maka ihe niile gbasara fim
Ọ gụrụ ihe gbasara sinimatografi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ a
Mgbe ọ na-eto , Peters bụ onye ọgbaa bọọlụ

N'ajụjụ ọnụ etinyere n'akwụkwọ akụkọ Daily Times of Nigeria webụsaịtị, Nne ya kwuru na ya chọrọ itepụ afọ ime ya mana tụgharia uche maka na o kwenyere na Peters bụ Nna ya nwụrụ anwụ lọọrọ ya ụwa mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu
Mgbe o si South Africa laghachiri Naịjirịa , Peters sonyere ndị otu na-eme ihe nkiri fim wee guzobe ụlọ ọrụ akpọrọ Alliance Film Company, nke eji Allied Film Company mara
Peters rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ a otu afọ tupu o wee guzobe nke ya
Peters akpọwo Steven Spielberg, Hype Williams, DJ Tee, Akin Alabi, Wudi Awa, HG2films, Director dove Kemi Adetiba, Sesan, Aje, and AK 1 dika ndị ọ na eṅomi
Mgbe Peters nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ zutere Tha Suspect, Ya na ya bụ enyi ma gụzobe otu Capital Hill bụ nke Peters guzobere na Nigeria mgeb osi South Africa lọta
Ya na Suspect kpebiri ịchọ nwata nwaanyi maara agụ egwu
E mechara Peters chọta Kel onye nke Terry tha Rapman gwara ya maka ya
Ya na Kel binye aka n'akwụkwọ irụkọ ọrụ
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2010, Kel na Peters nwere nghọtahie, nke mere ka ọ kwụsị nkwekọrịta na nkwado ya
Kel jisiri ike wepụta album egwu izizi ya, The Investment,
N'ikpeazụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ ọzọ bụ Goretti Company,rụkọrọ bụ nke Illblissnwe
Na Jenụwarị afọ 2014,amara ya ikpe gbasara maka egwu nke Tiwa Savage's 'Eminado o mere na vidio
O zuru at umatụ ngosi nke 'Asinamali' nke Tumi and the Volume weputara iji kwanyere Seydou Keïta
Tumi ugwu
Seydou Keïta gara na twitter kwutọọ Peters
Ọ gbara ndị enyi ya ka ha tinye ọnụ n'okwu ahụ
Onye nledo Savage, Tunji 'Tee Billz' Balogun, tinyer ọnụ n'okwu ahụ
O kwuru na ha amaghi na vidio ahụ ṅuomi vidio onye ọzọ na ọ tụr u ha n'anya dika o si tụọ mmadụ niile
Ka egosipụtara vidio nke Ice Prince's 'VIP ka ọnwa Jun di na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na otu n'afọ 2013, eboro Peters ebubo ọzọ gbasara ṅuomi onye Slaughterhouse's 'My Life' n'ụdị ezighị ezi
Na Febuwarị afọ 2014, Ice Prince gbachitere Peters wee kwuo na ọ bụ ya gwara ya echiche ndị otinyere na egwu ya
O kwukwara na ọ bụrụ na enwere onye nwere nsogbu na ọnọdụ a, na onye ahụ taa ya ụta
nhọputa
Clarice Ahanotu (amụrụ na 27 Julaị afọ 1939) bụ onye na- agba oso na Naijiria
O sonyeere 100 mita nke ụmụ nwanyị na 1964 Summer Olympics
Chief Clarion Chukwura (onye aha eji mụọ ya bụ Clara Nneka Oluwatoyin Folashade Chukwurah ; 24 Julaị 1964) bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa na- eme ihe nkiri na inyere mmadụ aka

Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Lagos ma mesịa gụọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Queen of the Rosary College, Onitsha mechaa gụọ Ime ihe na Okwu na Ngalaba Arts dị egwu nke Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo
A nabatara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya udo nke United Nations maka ọrụ ebere ya n'ofe Africa
ọ malitere ọrụ ya na 1980 mana ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama mgbe o gosipụtara n'ihe nkiri 'mirror in the Sun'
Ọ bụ onye Nigeria izizi meriri na ngalaba Best Actress na 1982 na FESPACO emume nkiri na Burkina Faso
Chukwura bụ naanị otu nwa nwanyị n'ime ezinụlọ nke ha di anọ na 24 Julaị 1964
Ọ bụ nne nke onye na-ahụ maka ntụzi aka ihe nkiri Clarence Peters
O si na Anambra steeti
N’afọ 2016, Chukwura lụrụ Anthony Boyd nke mere ya di ugboro atọ, ma gbanwee okwukwe nke di ọhụrụ nke Ndịàmà Jehova
Clarissa Scott Delany, nke a na-akpọ Clarissa Mae Scott (1901 1910-1927) bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na-ede uri, onye edemede, onye nkuzi na onye ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze metụtara Harlem Renaissance
Clarissa Mae Scott bụ nwa nwanyị nke Emmett Jay Scott, odeakwụkwọ Booker T
Washington, na Elenor Baker Scott
A mụrụ ya ma too na Tuskegee, Alabama, ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Bradford Academy na Wellesley College, sonye na Delta Sigma Theta ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Phi Beta Kappa n'afọ 1923
Mgbe ọ gachara France na Germany, ọ kụziri ihe afọ atọ na Dunbar High School na Washington, DC
Mgbe ọ nọ na Washington, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Georgia Douglas Johnson, Saturday Nighters Club
Abụ anọ Scott bipụtara dị iche n'ihi na ọ naghị ekwu maka ọgụ ụfọdụ, mana ọ na-ekwu okwu n'ụzọ ihe atụ
Alice Dunbar-Nelson, Angeline Weld Grimké, na W
Du Bois nabatara ọrụ ya nke ọma
N'afọ 1926, Scott lụrụ ọkàiwu Hubert Thomas Delany, ha kwagara New York City
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na-anakọta ọnụ ọgụgụ maka 'Study of Delinquent and Neglected Negro Children' na New York City na National Urban League na Women's City Club
N'afọ 1927, ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa akụrụ, mgbe ọ nwesịrị ọnwa isii nke ọrịa streptococcal
Onye edemede Amerịka, prọfesọ na onye na-enyocha akwụkwọ Samuel R
Delany bụ nwa nwanne ya
Clarissa T
Sligh (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọọst 30, afọ 1939) bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka na-ese akwụkwọ na onye na-ese foto nke bi na Asheville, North Carolina
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ bụ onye isi mkpesa n'okwu ikpe nke ụlọ akwụkwọ na Virginia
N'afọ 1988, ọ ghọrọ onye guzobere Coast-to-Coast A Women of Color National Artists' Project, nke lekwasịrị anya n'ịkwalite ọrụ ndị inyom na-acha ọbara ọbara rụzuru
A mụrụ Sligh na Washington, DC
Ọ tolitere n'ezinụlọ buru ibu na-arụ ọrụ ma 'ga ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche na mpaghara Virginia nke ndị ọcha'
N'afọ 1955, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ bụ onye isi mkpesa n'okwu ikpe nke ụlọ akwụkwọ na Virginia (Thompson v County School Board of Arlington County)
Sligh gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Afrịkan-Amerịkan Hampton Institute dị na Hampton, Virginia, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na mgbakọ na mwepụ n'afọ 1961
N'afọ 1972, ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na Visual Arts na Mahadum Howard dị na Washington DC, n'afọ 1973, MBA na Wharton School na Mahadụ Pennsylvania
N'afọ 1999, ọ nwetara nzere Master of Fine Arts na Visual Arts na Mahadum Howard
Tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe, Sligh nwere ọrụ na NASA ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mmemme ụgbọ elu ụgbọ elu
N'afọ 1987, Sligh nwere ike ịhapụ ọrụ ụbọchị ya iji lekwasị anya n'ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Museum of Modern Art na New York City, Jewish Museum na New York Town, na Walker Art Center na Minneapolis, Minnesota
E gosipụtakwara ọrụ ya na National African American Museum Project, na Smithsonian Institution na Washington, DC, onye bu ụzọ na National Museum of African American History and Culture
Clarisse Rasoarizay (amụrụ na Septemba 27, na afọ 1971) bụ nwanyị na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge si Madagascar, onye nọchitere anya mba Afrịka ya na afọ 2004 Summer Olympics na Athens, Gris
O meriri na marathon ụmụ nwanyị na afọ 2003 All-Africa Games na Abuja, Nigeria na afo 1997 Jeux de la Francophonie
Claude Clark (November 11, 1915 eprel 21, 2001) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, onye na-ebi akwụkwọ na ónyé nkụzi nka
Isiokwu Clark bụ diaspora nke ọdịbendị ndị Africa America, gụnyere ebe ịgba egwú, urchins n'okporo ámá, ndụ mmiri, ọdịdị ala, na ihe oyiyi okpukpe na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ejiri mma palette gbuo
A mụrụ Claude Clark n'ugbo na Rockingham, Georgia na Nọvemba 11, 1915
Na mbido Ọgọst 1923, nne na nna Clark hapụrụ ndịda màkà ndụ ka mma na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania n'oge Great Migration
Clark gàrà Roxborough High School ébé o dere uri mana ọ chọpụtakwara nkà màkà ise ihe
Ónyé nkuzi Sunday School ya gbara ya ume igosi na klas Sunday school na chọọchị
Claude Clark gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Roxborough High School
Site na 1935 ruo 1939, Clark gụrụ akwụkwọ na Philadelphia Museum School of Industrial Art (mgbè e mesịrị Mahadum nke Arts) na agụmakwụkwọ zuru oke
Mgbè ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ, ọ hụrụ ọrụ Van Gogh
Ụdị na usoro Van Gogh bụ ihe ndabere nke ụzọ Clark si ese ihe na eserese, nke nwéré ọdịdị dị omimi na-acha uhie uhie ma na-etinye ihe osise na-enweghị isi site na iji mma palette
Clark tozuru oke na nka site n'ịghọta ohere ya ịzụlite n'enweghị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, ịda ogbenye na enweghị nhata nke ajọ mbunobi na ákàrà na-eweta
Ọrụ ya gosipụtara eziokwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ụdị ọgbara ọhụrụ na nke a na-adịghị ahụkebe
Mgbè Clark enweghị ike ịzụta ihe osise, ọ chụpụrụ ite ihe osise site na ihe mkpofu n'azụ ụlọ akwụkwọ nka ma gwakọta nke ya
N'enweghị ike ịzụta brọsh na kemịkal iji sachaa ha, ọ maara iji mma palette
[citation needed]
N'afọ 1955, mgbè ọ na-akụzi na Talladega, Clark malitere inwe mmetụta nkè nrụgide ego wee mee mkpebi ịkwaga ezinụlọ ya na steeti nwunye ya nke California iji chọọ ohere ka ukwuu
Clark debanyere aha na Mahadum Steeti Sacramento ma kụziere ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ na-agụsị akwụkwọ nka ka ọ na-enweta nzèrè Bachelor of Arts n'otu ógè ahụ

Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1958, Clark nabatara ọkwa nkụzi nka na Alameda County, California (1958-1967) ma mesịa nweta ọkwa ngalaba n'ime usoro Mahadum California dị ka ónyé nkụzi nka (Merritt College, 1968-1981)
Claude Haffner ( Arabic ; amụrụ n'afọ 1976), bụ onye French-Congolese na-eme ihe nkiri na onye njikwa mmepụta ihe nkiri na-eduzi ihe nkiri
O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri a ma ama gụnyere Ko Bongisa Mutu, Défilé Célianthe na Noire ici, blanche là-bas
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1976 na Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo, nna ya bụ onye France na nne ya bụ onye Congo
Nna ya bụ Pierre Haffner bụkwa onye nchọpụta na onye nkuzi ihe nkiri na French Cultural Center na Kinshasa, nke na-emetụta Claude ịmalite ọrụ sinima ya
Nne ya bụ Sudila Mwembe si Zaïre (nke bụ Democratic Republic of the Congo taa)
Mgbe ọ dị obere, ya na ezinụlọ ya gara France ma ọ laghachighị Congo
Mgbe ahụ, ya na nwanne ya nwoke Frédéric Haffner tolitere na Alsace
Nna ya nwere nchịkọta nka nke Afrịka tinyere foto na ihe ndekọ banyere Congo na Afrịka
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2000, ebe Claude kpebiri ịlaghachi Congo na nne ya izute ezinụlọ Congo ya
Site na 1994 ruo 1999, ọ gụrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na diplọma Mahadum na Cinema na Audiovisual na Mahadum Strasbourg N'afọ 2005, Claude mechara nzere masta ya na Mahadum Sorbonne
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ obere ihe nkiri iji mụta usoro ịme ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2000, Claude rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta edemede maka obere ihe nkiri La fourchette
Ọ sonyeere dị ka onye enyemaka mmepụta na 'Canal +', ebe ya na Agnès Varda, 'onye nduzi' ya nwere ike ịrụ ọrụ, na nhazi nke ihe nkiri Les Glaneurs et la Glaneuse
Mgbe ihe nkiri ahụ gasịrị, ọ malitere inwe mmasị iduzi ihe nkiri
Ya mere, n'afọ 2002, ọ gbasoro ọzụzụ ọzụzụ na ịme ihe nkiri na Altermédia (ụlọ ọzụzụ Saint-Denis)
N'oge a, ọ gbara nne ya bi na Brunstatt ajụjụ ọnụ banyere mba ya, ezinụlọ ya na akụkọ ihe mere eme ya
N'afọ 2002, Haffner gụrụ ihe nkiri na Altermedia School na Paris
Nduzi izizi ya bụ 'ihe nkiri-ihe nkiri' nke akpọrọ Ko Bongisa Mutu na ụlọ ntutu isi Congo na Paris
N'afọ 2004, ọ duziri ihe nkiri La Canne musicale, nke ya na onye French na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ede agbụrụ Jean Rouch
Nke a mere ụbọchị ole na ole tupu ọnwụ ya
N'afọ 2005, mgbe afọ abụọ nke nnyocha na African Cinema, o mere ihe nkiri D'une fleur double et de 4000 autres nke lekwasịrị anya na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke African Cinema
Mgbe ihe nkiri ahụ gasịrị, ọ kwagara South Africa n'otu afọ ahụ
N'afọ 2009, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa mmepụta na onye na-eme nchọpụta na ihe nkiri The Manuscripts of Timbuktu nke Zola Maseko na By Any Means Necessary nke Ramadan Suleman
Claude gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ma na-akụzi na African Cinema na ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri abụọ dị na Johannesburg AFDA, The School for the Creative Economy (AFDA) na Big Fish School of Digital Filmmaking
N'afọ 2011, ọ laghachiri France iji nweta ihe nkiri ya Noire ici, blanche là-bas
Claude Kelly (amụrụ n'afọ 1980) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na ónyé na-emepụta egwu

Ọ bụ ónyé a họpụtara ugboro anọ na Grammy Award, ma dee ma ọ bụ soro dee egwu maka Michael Jackson, Whitney Houston, Kelly Clarkson, Britney Spears, Ariana Grande, Bruno Mars, Christina Aguilera, Adam Lambert, Jennifer Lopez, Kesha, Brandy, na One Direction
Ya na Chuck Harmony mejupụtara R&B duo Louis York, ma guzobe otu egwu Weirdo Workshop
A mụrụ Kelly ma zụlite ya na New York City
Nné ya a mụrụ na Jamaica mere ka ọ mata ụdị egwu dịgasị íchè íchè, gụnyere jazz, reggae, blues na R&B
Ka ọ na-etolite, ọ mụrụ piano na ọjà na Third Street Music School Settlement ma soro New York Boys Choir bụrụ abụ
Kelly gara Grace Church School, Riverdale Country School, na Berklee College of Music na Boston, Massachusetts, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na azụmaahịa egwu / njikwa na 2002
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Berklee, Kelly rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-agụ egwú na East Coast, tupu ọ malite ide egwu nke ya
O tinyere egwu mbụ ya n'afọ 2002, mgbe 'You're Taking It' gụnyere na nchịkọta CD maka uwe ndị Japan A Bathing Ape
O dere 'Daddy's Little Girl' màkà Frankie J, nke e wepụtara dị ka otu na 2006, ma mee ka nkwekọrịta mbipụta na Warner / Chappell Music
N'afọ ahụ, a kọwaara Kelly ónyé na-emepụta RedOne, wee malite iso ya na Lady Gaga rụọ ọrụ, onye na-arụ ọrụ na abọm mbụ ya n'oge ahụ
Nke a dugara na mmeghe Akon
Kelly na Akon so dee 'Hold My Hand' na Whitney Houston n'uche, mana Akon nwere mmasị n'abụ ahụ nke ukwuu nke na o kpebiri idekọ ya dị ka duet na Michael Jackson
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ihe ndekọ ikpeazụ nke Jackson, ma pụta na album ya nke 2010 Michael
Claudette Schreuders (amụrụ n'ubochí isii n'ọnwa Febụwarị, n'afọ 1973) bụ onye South Africa na-akpụ ihe na onye na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ na Cape Town, South Africa
A maara ya karịsịa n'ihe banyere osise osisi ya a pịrị apị ma pịrị apị, nke egosipụtala n'onwe ya na mba ụwa na ụlọ ngosi nka na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie
Ọ bụ onye izizi na-ese ihe na South Africa nwere ihe ọkpụkpụ nke Metropolitan Museum of Art nwetara
Schreuders abụrụla onye ikpeazụ maka Daimler Chrysler Award (South Africa) na FNB Vita Art Prize (South Africa), nke bụ nsụgharị South Africa nke Turner Prize
A mụrụ Schreuders na Pretoria (Tshwane), Gauteng Province, South Africa n'ubochí isii n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1973
Ọ bụ ọgbọ izizi nke ndị South Africa nke nne na nna Dutch mụrụ
Oge uto Schreuders bụ n'oge na-eduga na njedebe nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'afọ 1994
Ọ gara Linden High School na Johannesburg ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1990

Ọ gara Mahadum Stellenbosch, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Fine Arts na 1994, ógè nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara Michaelis School of Fine Art na Mahadum Cape Town n'ihe banyere Master of Fine Arts (1997)
Schreuders malitere igosi ọrụ ya n'afọ 1998, na ihe ngosi akpọrọ Family Tree Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ Burnt by the Sun (afọ 2001), Crying in Public (afọ 2002), The Long Day (afọ 2004), na The Fall (afọ 2007)
Ọ bidoro naanị site na ịkpụ osisi mana kemgbe ahụ ọ gbasaa iji mepụta ihe ọkpụkpụ ọla nchara, mbipụta lithographic, etchings, na eserese

E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Museum of Modern Art, Metropolitan Museum of Art, National Museum of African Art na Smithsonian Institution, Nobel Peace Center, British Museum, na Fowler Museum na Mahadum California, Los Angeles
O nwere ihe ọkpụkpụ ọha abụọ
Otu dị na Cape Town's Nobel Square ihe oyiyi nke mmadụ anọ South African Nobel Peace Prize laureates Nelson Mandela, FW de Klerk, Achịbishọp Desmond Tutu na Albert Lutuli
Nke ọzọ dị na Aga Kahn Walk na Nairobi, Kenya osisi dị mita asaa nke akpọrọ Thomas
A na-eto ọrụ ya dị ka 'nkà nke ịkpụ' site na Metropolitan Museum of Art ma jiri ya manyere ọrụ nke ndị ọzọ na-akpụ ihe Jeff Koons na William Kentridge

A kọwakwara ya dị ka 'nyocha nke njirimara onwe onye, ọdịbendị na-adịghị mma na ọnọdụ ime mmụọ siri ike ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụ igwe ojii' na ngosipụta nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-apụta 'monolithic, stoic na enweghị oge' ma 'na-egosipụta mgbagwoju anya nke ịchọ njirimara 'Africa' n'oge post-apartheid' na 'mgbanwe nke njirimara Africa n'oge apartheid'
Onye nkatọ nka Okwui Enwezor ekwuola na ọrụ ya 'na-atụ aro asụsụ ọhụrụ nke sitere na njikọ nke ụdị ihe atụ nke Africa na Europe
Ihe oyiyi osisi ya anaghị esi n'ihe Schreuders guzobere dị ka ụdị onwe ya
Nke izizi, ọrụ ya na-abụkarị akụkọ ndụ ya

Ọrụ isii mbụ ya nọchiri anya mgbe dị iche iche nke ndụ ya ihe ngosi ya gụsịrị akwụkwọ gosipụtara ndụ ya dị ka nwa akwụkwọ; nchịkọta nke abụọ ya gosipụtara oge ya na ebe obibi na mba ndị ọzọ; nke atọ ya gosipụtara nnabata nke ọrụ ya, ọrụ ndị na-esonụ metụtara ọmụmụ nwa izizi ya na ndụ ụlọ
Schreuders na-ekwu na 'Enwere m mmasị na nka nke ị nwere ike ịhụ ndụ ebe o si bịa
Art nke bụ naanị banyere nka abụghị ihe na-adọrọ mmasị m dị ka ógè enwere ndụ n'èzí ọrụ
Osisi ọ na-ejikarị akpụ ihe oyiyi ya bụ jacaranda; osisi dị mfe na Pretoria, obodo ya
Nke abụọ, ahụ bụ 'ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke nwere isi na aka buru ibu, nke a pịrị n'osisi ma jiri eserese enamel mee ya

' Nke atọ, ọrụ ya nwere 'obere ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-anọ naanị ya nwere ọdịdị nke akụkọ a na-adịghị ahụ anya ma ọ bụ nke a na-amaghị ama [na] ihu na-enweghị ngosipụta nke na-ekpuchi mmetụta ọ bụla doro anya ma ọ bụ siri ike
' Nke anọ, ihe ngosi ya nke ndụ South Africa kwa ụbọchị na-ekwu màkà ihe fọdụrụ n'oge ọchịchị South Africa na mmekọrịta ya na akụkọ ihe mere eme South Africa

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, otu ihe ọkpụkpụ bụ nke 'nwanyị ojii nke nwere nwa ọcha n'azụ ya' na 'a na-ewuli nwa ahụ site na mmerụ ahụ, dị ka a ga-asị na nwatakịrị ahụ ga-ada n'ime iberibe mgbe nwanyị ahụ tọhapụrụ blanket ahụ
' Nke ise, ọnụ ọgụgụ ya na-enwekarị 'nlegharị anya na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla' na 'ịdị nkọ, ọbụnadị nkwarụ nke mmegharị' na-ekwupụta na 'ihe niile abụghị ihe o yiri'
Ihe oyiyi osisi ya a pịrị apị na-amalitekarị site na otu osisi, dịka omenala nka nke Afrịka, ọkachasị ihe oyiyi ndị West Africa na ihe ọkpụkpụ Baule Blolo nke Ivory Coast
Ihe ọkpụkpụ Colon malitere dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ n'ihe banyere emume ụmụ amaala, mana ka decolonization batara n'ime obodo Afrịka, ndị Europe bidoro inye ha ọrụ dị ka ihe osise nke onwe ha
Christopher Steiner na-akọwa mkpa nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị colon dị ka 'ihe nnọchianya nke ọnọdụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
[onye] onye nwe ya site n'aka onye ọdịda anyanwụ na-egosi nhazigharị Afrịka ma si otú a were ya kpọrọ ihe dị ka ihe oyiyi nke na-asọpụrụ mmeri nke kọntinent ahụ
' Schreuders ekwuola na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ahụ 'dị oke mkpa nye m n'otú m chọrọ ka ihe ọkpụkpụ m yie' n'ihi ịdị ndụ ha
Claudia Joan Alexander (Mee 30, 1959 - Julaị 11, 2015) bụ onye ọkà mmụta sayensị America mụrụ na Canada ọkachamara na geophysics na sayensị mbara ụwa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na United States Geological Survey na NASA 's Jet Propulsion Laboratory
Ọ bụ onye njikwa ọrụ ikpeazụ nke ọrụ nke Europe na-edu iji mụọ Comet Churyumov–Gerasimenko
A mụrụ Alexander na Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada
Nne ya bụ Gaynelle Justena Williams Alexander (1929-2017), onye na-agụ akwụkwọ ụlọ ọrụ maka Intel ; nna ya bụ Harold Alfred Alexander (1917-2010), onye na-elekọta mmadụ
Ụmụnne Alexander bụ Suzanne na David
Alexander zụrụ nne ya na Santa Clara, California
Alexander chọrọ ịbụ onye nta akụkọ ma ndị mụrụ ya—ndị na-akwụ ụgwọ maka agụmakwụkwọ ya—chọrọ ka ọ bụrụ injinia
Mgbe ọrụ okpomọkụ gasịrị na Ames Research Center, ọ nwere mmasị na sayensị mbara ala

Ọ bụ ezie na e goro ya ịrụ ọrụ na ngalaba injinia, ọ na-ezoba na ngalaba sayensị bụ́ ebe ọ chọpụtara na ọ bụghị nanị na ọ mara ezigbo mma n’ọrụ ahụ, kama na ọ dị ya mfe ma na-atọ ya ụtọ karịa ka ọ tụrụ anya ya
Na 1983, Alexander nwetara nzere bachelọ na Mahadum California, Berkeley na geophysics, nke o chere na ọ ga-abụ ezigbo ndabere maka onye sayensị ụwa
Alexander nwetara nzere Master ya na Mahadum California, Los Angeles na geophysics na mbara physics na 1985
Tesis nke nna ukwu ya jiri data Pioneer Venus Orbiter mụọ mgbanwe okirikiri anyanwụ na oke ultraviolet radieshon nke Venus ionosphere na mmekọrịta ya na ikuku anyanwụ
O nwetara PhD
na Atmospheric, Oceanic na Space Sciences, ọkachamara na physics nke oghere plasma, na Mahadum Michigan na 1993
Alexander rụrụ ọrụ na United States Geological Survey na-amụ tectonics plate na Ames Research Center na- ekiri ọnwa Jovian, tupu ọ kwaga NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory na 1986
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nhazi sayensị maka akụrụngwa ebili mmiri plasma n'ime ụgbọ mbara igwe Galileo tupu ọ bụrụ onye njikwa ọrụ nke ozi ahụ na ngalaba ikpeazụ ya
Ọrụ ahụ chọpụtara ọnwa ọhụrụ 21 nke Jupita na ọnụnọ ikuku na Ganymede
Nchọpụta nke ikuku, kpọmkwem 'n'elu bound exosphere ', mere ka ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị chegharịa echiche ha na Ganymede bụ ọnwa anaghị arụ ọrụ
Ọ bụ onye njikwa ọrụ ikpeazụ maka ozi ahụ, wee leba anya na imikpu ụgbọ elu ahụ banye n'ikuku Jupita na njedebe ozi ahụ na 2003

Alexander rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme nchọpụta na isiokwu dị iche iche, gụnyere evolushọn na ime physics nke comets, Jupiter na ọnwa ya, magnetospheres, plate tectonics, oghere plasma, nkwụsị na mgbasa nke anyanwụ na ifufe, na mbara ala Venus
Ya na ndị otu ọrụ ahụ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye nhazi sayensị na ozi Cassini na Saturn
O dere ma dekọọ akwụkwọ iri na anọ
Ọ bụ onye nkwado siri ike maka ụmụ nwanyị na ndị pere mpe na mpaghara STEM na onye na-akpakọrịta sayensị na-anụ ọkụ n'obi

N'April afọ nke 2015, o gosipụtara okwu TEDx na Columbia College Chicago, 'The Compelling Nature of Locomotion and the Strange Case of Childhood Education', na-akọwa ụzọ ya maka ịkụziri ụmụaka banyere sayensị
Ọ kụzikwaara ndị na-eto eto, karịsịa ụmụ agbọghọ nwere agba, ka ha gbaa mmasị ha nwere maka sayensị
Site n'afọ 2000 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ, Alexander jere ozi dị ka onye ọkà mmụta sayensị na-ahụ maka ọrụ NASA na Rosetta, ọrụ European Space Agency na-amụ na ọdịda na comet 67P/Churyumov-Gerasimenko
Na ozi ahụ ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ngwá ọrụ $35 nde, na-anakọta data dị ka okpomọkụ site na ngwa atọ dị na orbiter
Ọ na-ahụkwa maka nsochi na nkwado ịnyagharị site na NASA's Deep Space Network maka ụgbọ elu ahụ
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ sayensị ya, Alexander nwere mmasị ide ihe
O dere akwụkwọ ụmụaka, gụnyere ụfọdụ n'ime usoro 'Windows to Adventure', 'Olee n'ime Ugwu Kasị Ukwuu nke Niile?' na 'Windows ruo Morning Star'
Ọ dekwara akụkọ ifo sayensị ma bụrụ onye otu ndị edemede Romance nke America
Ime njem na ịnya ịnyịnya na-atọkwa ya ụtọ
Na July 11, 2015, Alexander nwụrụ na Arcadia, California mgbe ọ lụsịrị ọrịa cancer afọ 10 afọ
Akpọrọ ya ọnụ na Oak Hill Memorial Park na San Jose, California
N'afọ ọ gụchara akwụkwọ na Mahadum Michigan, a kpọrọ ya 'UM Woman of the Year in Human Relations', na 2002 ọ nwetara ihe nrite nke Atmospheric, Oceanic na Space Sciences Alumni Merit

Na afọ 2003, Alexander nwetara Emerald Honor for Women of Color in Research & Engineering site Career Communications Group, Inc-onye na-ebipụta Onye injinia ojii na akwụkwọ akụkọ teknụzụ ozi - na National Women of Color Research Sciences and Technology Conference
E mepere nkuzi Claudia Alexander maka ụmụ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum ya na 2007 site n'aka nwanne nna ya, Jiles Williams
Ọmụmụ ihe na-akwado ụmụ akwụkwọ dabere na mkpa na-amụba na Climate na Space Sciences na Engineering na Mahadum nke Michigan's College of Engineering
Alexander bụ onye so na American Geophysical Union —ebe ọ jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke subcommittee diversity— na Association for Women Geoscientists, ebe akpọrọ ya 'Nwanyị nke Afọ'
N'afọ 2015, ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị sitere na European Space Agency's Rosetta mission kwanyere onye ọrụ ibe ha nwụrụ anwụ ugwu site n'ịkpọ aha ya na ebumnuche ozi ahụ, comet 67P/Churyumov-Gerasimenko
Ihe dị ka ọnụ ụzọ ámá dị na comet ka a na-akpọ C
Alexander Gate
Mahadum nke Michigan Women in Science and Engineering office na-enye onyinye kwa afọ maka nsọpụrụ ya onyinye Claudia Joan Alexander Trailblazer maka mmezu na ntinye aka na STEM
Claudia Kanne (amuru Septemba 29, 2000) bu onye omere si Netherlands
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ ọ mere mpụta mbụ ya na ihe nkiri ntorobịa TIM
nke Rolf van Eijk dere
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na-eduga dị ka Kiki
Na Oude Liefde nke Nicole van Kilsdonk sitere na 2017, o gosipụtara agwa Myrthe
Kemgbe 2018 ọ na-arụ ọrụ ndu dị ka Jackie Oleander na usoro telivishọn SpangaS
Claudia Nonhlanhla Ndaba (amụrụ na 30 Julaị 1968) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa

Onye otu African National Congress, ọ jere ozi dị ka Onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na Women, Youth na People with Disabilities kemgbe 2019 ma bụrụ onye otu National Assembly of South Africa kemgbe 2014
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Ad Hoc na Filling of Vacancies na Commission for Gender Equality ugboro abụọ n'oge mbụ ya na ndị omeiwu
Tupu a họpụta ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu, Ndaba jere ozi dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Gauteng Provincial Legislature site na 2009 ruo 2014
A mụrụ Ndaba na 30 Julaị 1968
Ka ọ na-etolite, ụmụnne nna ya bụ ndị otu ndị agha nke African National Congress, UMkhonto we Sizwe
Ọ debanyere aha na Ann Latsky Nursing College na Johannesburg n'afọ 2002 wee zụọ ka ọ bụrụ onye nọọsụ debanyere akwụkwọ ma mechaa ọzụzụ ya n'afọ 2004
N'afọ 2021, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Pretoria na Bachelor of Public Administration
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ann Latsky Nursing College, ọrụ nọọsụ ya emeghị ka ọ dị ka ọ tụrụ anya ya n'ihi nhọpụta ya dị ka odeakwụkwọ nchịkwa n'ọfịs nke osote minista nke azụmahịa na ụlọ ọrụ
N'afọ 2009, a họpụtara Ndaba ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu Gauteng Provincial Legislature dị ka onye nnọchi anya ANC
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote odeakwụkwọ mpaghara nke African National Congress Women's League na 2012, ọkwá ọ nọrọ ruo n'afọ 2015
Ọ bụkwa onye otu National Executive Committee nke league ụmụ nwanyị
A họpụtara Ndaba dị ka onye otu National Assembly na ntuli aka 2014 site na ndepụta Gauteng nke ANC
A kpọrọ ya aha na Kọmitii Portfolio na Ahụike
N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Kọmitii Ọrụ Mba nke Njikọ ụmụ nwanyị nke ANC
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2016, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Ad Hoc na Filling of Vacancies for Gender Equality
Ndaba ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya Kọmitii Ad Hoc na-ahụ maka ego nke òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 21 June 2017
N'etiti Ọktọba na Nọvemba 2017, ọ bụ onye otu Portfolio Committee on Economic Development, tupu ọ bụrụ onye ọzọ so na kọmitii portfolio

E guzobeghachiri Kọmitii Ad Hoc na-ahụ maka imejuputa oghere na Commission for Gender Equality na 2018 ma họpụta Ndaba ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche ọzọ n'enweghị onye na-emegide ya, n'agbanyeghị na ndị otu mmegide na-ahọpụta onye otu ANC Grace Tseke
Tseke jụrụ nhọpụta ahụ
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara Ndaba ọzọ na National Assembly, n'oge a dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa na ndepụta mba ANC
Mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na Kọmitii Portfolio na Women, Youth and People with Disabilities
A họpụtara Ndaba ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke kọmitii ahụ, na-anọchi Thandi Memela, onye hapụrụ ndị omeiwu na ntuli aka ahụ

Claudie Titty Dimbeng née Claudie Adonit Manouan (amụrụ n'afọ 1968), nke a na-akpọkarị Dimbeng, bụ onye amụrụ na Ivory Coast, onye na-ese ihe nkiri nke bi na Paris kemgbe 1987
Onye na-akwado ụzọ ihe atụ nke 'Mixed Art Relief', ọ na-eji ihe ndị dị na Ivory Coast eme ihe iji gosipụta njikọ ya na mba ya

A mụrụ ya na 1968 na Abidjan, Claudie Titty Dimbeng bụ nwa nwanyị nke French-Ivorian Monique née Wirth na nwoke Ivory Coast aha ya bụ Manouan Adonit, onye bụ onye nnọchi anya
N'ihi ọrụ ndị mụrụ ya na-arụ, ọ nọrọ na Germany na Austria mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na French lycée na Vienna (1986), ọ tụrụ anya ịghọ onye na-ese ihe mana nna ya ekwenyeghị
Dị ka nkwekọrịta, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ mbụ na Académie Charpentier (1986-1987), wee gaa n'ihu na-amụ ihe owuwu ime ụlọ na École Supérieure des Arts Modernes (1987-1991)
N'afọ 1999, mgbe ọ na-ekpebi ilekwasị anya n'ise ihe, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Valérie Nîdri na Valentin Caro

O mepụtara ụdị nke ya, 'Mixed Art Relief', na-eji usoro sfumato nke Renaissance na ọtụtụ akwa ágbá iji gosipụta relief

N'iji akwa ndị dabeere na osisi na raphia mee ihe nke ukwuu, ọrụ ya na-egosi ọdịdị na-egosipụta nnụnụ, osisi ma ọ bụ jacarandas na-agbasa okooko osisi, mgbe ụfọdụ na-ejikọta mmadụ, osisi na anụmanụ n'ụdị onwe ya

Clean Air Society of Australia and New Zealand (CASANZ) bụ òtù na-abụghị nkè gọọmentị, nke na-enweghị uru nke e guzobere n'ebe afọ 1960s iji mee ka ndị mmadụ nwee mmasị na ikuku dị ọcha na ọmụmụ nke mmetọ ikuku
Ébé ọ bụ na ọ na-elekwasị anya na-agụnye ihe gbásárá nchịkwa gburugburu ebe obibi sárá mbara, mànà na-ekwusi ike na ikuku dị mmá na nsogbu ndị metụtara ya

Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2005, otu ahụ nwèrè ndị otu narị asatọ na iri atọ na isii (narị isii na iri asatọ na atọ na Australia, otu narị na iri anọ na New Zealand, na iri na atọ ná mba ndị ọzọ)
Na Septemba 2007, CASANZ kwadoro 14th IUAPPA World Congress na Brisbane, Australia
CASANZ na-akwalite nchedo nkè gburugburu ébé obibi site na ọrụ dịgasị iche ichè, gụnyere
CASANZ na-arụ ọrụ site na alaka ndị na-achị onwé ha nke na-ekpebi mmemme nke ọrụ ha, gụnyere nzukọ teknụzụ, nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe, ogbako, nzukọ, ọmụmụ ọzụzụ, wdg
A na-ekesa nkọwa nke ọrụ ndị a na ndị otu alaka ma tinye ya na ébé nrụọrụ weebụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
CASANZ na-achịkwa site na Kọmitii Nchịkwa nke nwéré
Kọmitii Nchịkwa na-achịkwa ọrụ kwa ụbọchị nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ma na-eduzi ọrụ nke Ónyé Nchịkwa
Ka ọ na-erule ọnwa Septemba afọ 2013, CASANZ nwèrè Special Interest Groups asatọ (nke a na-akpọkarị SIGs), nke ọ bụla n'ime ha na-atụle n'ụzọ dị mkpirikpi na ngalaba ndị a

Ebumnuche nke Modelling Special Interest Group bụ ijikọ ndị otu CASANZ nwèrè mmasị na mmepe na / ma ọ bụ itinye n'ọrụ nke modeling mgbasa ikuku iji nye echiche, chọpụta nsogbu ndị a na-ahụkarị, mee ka ndị otu màrà mmepe ọhụrụ, ma guzobe, dịka o kwesịrị, 'ModSIG view' na nsogbu ndị dị mkpa

Nkọwa mgbasa na-aghọwanye akụkụ nke ikikere ikuku na ikuku n'Australia dum, a na-enwekwa mmata na-arịwanye elu banyéré ọrụ nke ikuku ikuku nwèrè ike ịrụ na mpaghara dịka njikwa ikuku, nyocha ihe ize ndụ na atụmatụ iji ala eme ihe
Òtù Na-adọrọ mmasị pụrụ iche bụ nzukọ dị mkpa màkà mgbanwe ozi, yana ịgba ume ka omume ka mmá na nha ísì, imepụta, nyocha, njikwa, njikwa na nlekota
The Indoor Air Special Interest Group na-akwalite mkparịta ụka na arụmụka banyéré ọnọdụ ihe ọmụma na ogo ikuku ime ụlọ, yana nchegbu ahụike gburugburu ébé obibi
Otu ahụ na-agba ume nyocha, agụmakwụkwọ, mmata obodo na njikwa nke okwu ndị metụtara isiokwu a
Ebumnuche nkè Greenhouse Special Interest Group bụ ụzọ atọ

Clem Ohameze bụ onye na- eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa nke nọ goro afọ iri abụọ n'ịrụ ọrụ ahụ

A mụrụ Clem Ohameze na 27 June 1965 na Port Harcourt, Rivers, Nigeria
Ọ gara Holy Family College / Baptist High School maka akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya

Ọ laghachila azụ n'ọrụ nkiri ya

Ngwakọta okpukpu abụọ
Clementina Maria Black (27 Julaị 1853 – 19 Disemba 1922) bụ onye odee Bekee, onye nwanyị na onye ọsụ ụzọ, ya na ndị Marxist na Fabian socialists nwere njikọ chiri anya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka rig ụmụ nwanyị ikike n'ebe ọrụ na maka ịhọpụta ụmụ nwanyị

A mụrụ Clementina Black na Brighton, otu n'ime ụmụ asatọ nke onye ọka iwu, odeakwụkwọ obodo na onye nchọpụta nke Brighton, David Black (1817-1892), nwa nke onye na-ese ụgbọ mmiri nke Czar Nicholas nke Mbụ nke Russia, na nwunye ya, Clara Maria Patten (1825-1875), nwa nwanyị nke onye na'ụlọ ikpe
Black gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ, na 58 Ship Street, Brighton karịsịa site n'aka nne ya, ọ ghọkwara onye na-asụ French na German nke ọma
tN'afọ 1875, nne Clementina nwụrụ n'ihi mgbawa nke o buliri di ya na-abaghị uru, bụ́ onye na-ejighị ụkwụ abụọ eme ihe
A hapụrụ Clementina, dị ka ọkpara, onye na-elekọta nna na-adịghị mma na ụmụnna nwoke na ụmụnna nwanyị asaa, yana ịrụ ọrụ nkụzi
Ụmụnne ya gụnyere ọkà mmụta mgbakọ na mwepụ Arthur Black na onye ntụgharị okwu Constance Garnett
a na ụmụnne ya ndị nwanyị kwagara na 1880s na Fitzroy Square na London, bụ ebe o jiri oge ya na-amụ banyere nsogbu mmekọrịta ọha na eze, na-arụ ọrụ akwụkwọ, na nkuzi na akwụkwọ 18th narị afọ
Black matara ndị Marxist na ndị Fabian socialists, dị ka Olive Shreiner, Dolly Maitland Ratford, na Richard Garnett nke British Museum
Ọ ghọkwara enyi ezinụlọ Marx, ọkachasị Eleanor Marx
O tinyere aka n'ime ogologo oge na nsogbu nke ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ na òtù ndị ọrụ na-apụta
N'afọ 1886, ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ nsọpụrụ nke Women's Trade Union League ma mee ka a kwụọ ụgwọ nhata na 1888 Trades Union Congress
N'afọ 1889, o nyere aka guzobe Women's Trade Union Association, nke mesịrị ghọọ Women's Industrial Council
Black so na ndị na-ahazi Bryant na May strike na 1888
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na Fabian Society

N'afọ 1895, ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Women's Industrial News, akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Women 's Industrial Council, nke gbara ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ọkwá dị n'etiti ume ime nchọpụta ma kọọ banyere ọnọdụ ọrụ maka ụmụ nwanyị dara ogbenye, ka ọ na-erule afọ 1914, ọ nyochara ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọrụ 120

N'afọ 1896, ọ malitere ime mkpọsa maka ụgwọ ọrụ kacha nta nke iwu dị ka akụkụ nke Consumers League ma kwado ya dị ka onye na-etinye aka na esemokwu ụlọ ọrụ Bryant & May ebe ndị ọrụ nwanyị na-erigbu mechara mee ihe

Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ 1900, Black nọkwa na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mkpọsa ụmụ nwanyị na-eto eto, na-aghọ odeakwụkwọ nsọpụrụ nke Kọmitii Nkwupụta Nkwupụta Ụmụ nwanyị, nke chịkọtara akwụkwọ mkpesa nke 257,000 bịanyere aka
Black sonyeere National Union of Women's Suffrage Societies (NUWSS) na London Society of Women'l Suffrage

Ka ọ na-erule 1912-1913, Black bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke The Common Cause 'akụkụ nke òtù ụmụ nwanyị maka mgbanwe', na-eji ederede ya karịa ime ihe kpọmkwem (n'adịghị ka ndị suffragettes) iji metụta mgbanwe
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ nke asaa nke Black, A Sussex Idyl [sic], na 1877
An Agitator (1894) metụtara onye ndú ndị Socialist
Eleanor Marx kọwara ya dị ka 'akụkọ ziri ezi nke ndị ọrụ Britain'
Ndị ọzọ ya abụghị ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nke ikpeazụ, The Linleys of Bath (1911), so na ndị kasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị abụọ nke Black, Sweated Industry and the Minimum Wage (1907) na ndị na-emepụta uwe anyị Case for Trade Boards (ya na C
Meyer, 1909) ka a na-akpọ 'ọrụ mgbasa ozi dị ike
Nkọwa sitere na British Library catalogue
Clementina Black nọgidere na-alụghị di

Ọ kpọbatara n'ụlọ nwanne ya nwanyị Gertrude Speedwell, mgbe nna nwa agbọghọ ahụ, nwanne Clementina Arthur, gbuchara nwunye ya na nwa ya nwoke, wee gbuo onwe yaỌ nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya na Barnes, Surrey na 19 Disemba 1922 wee lie ya na ili ozu East Sheen, London
Ihe odide Akwụkwọ Nsọ n’ili ya sitere na Ndị Filipaị 4 8 gụrụ

N'ikpeazụ, ụmụnne, ihe ọ bụla bụ eziokwu, ihe ọ ọ bụla bụ ihe ziri ezi, ihe ọ bụ ihe ọ bụla dị ọcha, ihe ọ dị mma, ihe ọkpụkpọ ọ bụla nwere ezigbo akụkọ; ọ bụrụ na enwere omume ọma ọ bụla ma ọ bụrụ na e nwere otuto ọ bụla, chee echiche banyere ihe ndị a
Clement Ashiteye nke a maara dị ka Clemento Suarez, bụ onye Ghana na-akpa ọchị na onye na- eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Clemento Suarez na Tema ; nna ya bụ Victor Tetteh nke Teshie
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Vichrist Parents' School, Betel Junior High School, wee gaa n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Tema
Ọzụzụ agụmakwụkwọ ya bụ na Ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ime nka na Mahadum Ghana dị na Legon ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2010
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, Clemento Suarez malitere ọrụ ọrụ ya na 2011 site n'ịrụ ọrụ akwụghị ụgwọ
O mechara kpebie ịghọ ọkachamara na-akpa ọchị

Ọ kwadoro mbipụta nke atọ nke ihe nrite egwu 3 Music na OB Amponsah nke bụ ihe ngosi ihe nrite izizi emere na Ghana n'oge oge mkpọchi n'ihi COVID-19

Cleopatra Koheirwe bụ onye Uganda na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede, onye na-agụ egwu na onye mgbasa ozi
Ọ pụtara na mbụ na ihe nkiri dị ka Joy na eze ikpeazụ nke Scotland na afọ 2006
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ nwetara ọtụtụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri na telivishọn dị iche iche na mpaghara na mba ụwa gụnyere ọrụ na Netflix's Sense8 dị ka Nne na oge 2

N'afọ 2001, ọ sonyeere otu egwu, ịgba egwu na ihe nkiri a ma ama nke a maara dị ka Obsessions (nke bụ Obsessions Africa ugbu a) ruo n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2007 mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'òtù ahụ iji gaa n'ihu n'ụzọ nke ya
O mekwara ihe ngosi The Dream Breakfast na Satọdee site na 6am ruo 10am na Hakeem Saga aka
Mee ka nrọ ahụ dị

Ọ gara ezumike ịmụ nwa na Disemba 2013 wee gaa Kenya
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2016, ọ maliteghachiri ịrụ ọrụ na Radiocity dị ka onye na-akwado Mid-Morning Magazine na Peace Menya ruo na ngwụcha Mee 2019 mgbe ọ kwagara na StarTimes
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka ikpe na ihe ngosi TV WBS nke akpọrọ The Icon, ihe ngosi nke na-achọ onye na-esote TV
N'afọ 2012, ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe na ihe ngosi egwu akpọrọ UG Factor, nke a na-achọ onye ọzọ nwere nkà egwu
N'afọ 2013, ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe ọbịa na ihe ngosi talent nke M-Net nke akpọrọ Maisha Superstar

Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri mgbe ọ sonyeere Obsessions na-arụ ọrụ onye na-agba egwu na Cleopatra na afọ 2001, Princess Elminia na Queen of Sheeba, Queen na Heart of a Dancer na Queen na Legend of the Sceptre
O mekwara ihe nkiri Adam na Iv
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Kona, usoro ihe nkiri M-Net TV ebe ọ na-eme Jakki, onye na-achọ ịkụ ọkpọ na-anwa ịmekọrịta nna ya, onye nkuzi ịkụ ọkpọ
Ọ pụtara na Sense8, Netflix Original Series dị ka Nne
Cleopatra ga-apụta na usoro TV ọhụrụ Nana Kagga duziri Reflections dị ka Ebony, otu n'ime ndị isi anọ nke usoro ahụ

O mere ihe odide onwe ya maka Health & Sanitation Magazine, Magazine7, ma nye aka na weebụsaịtị dịka Music Uganda na UG Pulse
Cleopatra bụkwa onye nyere aka na Drum Magazine Kenya site na afọ 2014 ruo afọ 2015
Cleopatra na-enwe mmasị ịkpali na iduzi ndị mmadụ karịsịa ndị ntorobịa
N'afọ 2011, o sonyere ma pụta na mkpọsa a kpọrọ ŌSpeak Out-No Fear, nke na-emegide ime ihe ike n'ụlọ na mmetọ ụmụaka n'okpuru Domestic Violence & Child Protection Awareness Program
N'afọ 2012, Reach a Hand Uganda (RAHU), otu NGO nke na-achọ inye ndị ntorobịa ike, ka ha na ndị ntorobịa nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche kwurịta okwu, họọrọ ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị njem ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, RAHU jara ya mma dị ka onye isi nke izu
Cleopatra bụ otu n'ime ihe ngosi ọdịbendị mbụ na Reach a Hand Uganda (RAHU) ma na-etinye aka ruo n'afọ 2014 mgbe ọ ga-ewe ezumike n'ọrụ iji zụlite nwa ya
Cleopatra gụrụ akwụkwọ na Nakasero Primary School (PLE), Bugema Adventist Secondary School (UCE) na Namasagali College (UACE) na Mahadum Makerere

O nwekwara asambodo na Community Journalism site na Mahadum nke South Afrika (UNISA)
Cleopatra bụ naanị nwa Jocelyn Twinesanyu 'Sanyu' Rwekikiga na Anthony Abamwikirize Bateyo mụrụ na afọ 1982

Cleopatra nwere nwa nwanyị amụrụ na afọ 2014 ya na enyi nwoke Lwanda Jawar, onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nlereanya, na onye nduzi / onye nhazi
Ọ mụrụ nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Aviana Twine Jawar na 22 Jenụwarị afọ 2014

Cleopatra Tawo, nke a na-akpọkarị Cleo Tao (nwụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 1 n'ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 2017) bụ onye ọrụ redio na Planet FM 1011 n'Uyo,dị n'Akwa Ibom Steeti, na Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye nhazi nke emume redio nke a kpọrọ DayBreak on Planet na AutoMania
Tupu Tawo abanye na Planet FM, Tawo rụrụ ọrụ na Rhythm FM 937 na Port Harcourt, dị na Rivers Steeti, ebe o mere ihe emume dịka Morning Drive, Afternoon Drive, Sunday and Rhythm na Midnight Caller
A zụlitere Tawo na Port Harcourt, isi obodo Rivers Steeti, nke Naijiria
O tolitere n'ezinụlọ Katọlik nke sitere na Boki, n'agbanyeghị na ndị mụrụ ya na-ebi ndụ mnwere onwe nke na-akwado ntụrụndụ n'ụlọ ha
A zụrụ Tawo dị ka onye ọka ikpe tupu ọ banye na mgbasa ozi redio n'afọ 2000
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ onye ọrụ nhazi iheomume redio na Rhythm FM 937 ndị Silverbird na Port Harcourt
N'ebe ahụ, ọ haziri ọtụtụ ihe omume gụnyere Morning Drive, Afternoon Drive, Sunday at the Rhythm na Midnight Caller
E mechara nye ya ọrụ na Planet FM 1011 Uyo, ebe ọ na-akwado ihe omume dịka Daybreak on Planet na AutoMania
Tawo bụkwa onye isi ọdụ mmemme n'ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
N’ụbọchị nke 19 n'ọnwa Disemba nke afọ 2005, ndị ọrụ nchekwa obodo (SSS) jidere ya na onye otu ya Klem Ofuokwu
E boro ha ebubo na ha na-agbasa ozi agbagọrọ nke ọma gbasara ọdịda akwa mmiri na Rhythm 937 FM Port Harcourt
Ha anọọla izu ụka abụọ tupu a gbapụta ha
Na ngwụsị ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2017, Tawo bidoro ịrịa ọrịa iku ume, e were nabata ya n'ụlọọgwụ
N'ụbọchị nke 1 n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2017, ọ nwụrụ na University of Uyo Teaching Hospital
A nabatara Tawo na ngalaba nlekọta mberede ngwa ngwa UUTH
Tupu ọ nwụọ, o tinyela ọkwa na akaụntụ facebook ya na '[ọ] nwere nsogbu iku ume, a na m a nara ọgwụgwọ
A ga m apụta n’oge na-adịghị anya
Ndewo maka ekpere ọma gị '
Cletus Madubugwu Ibeto (amụrụ ya na Nọvemba nke isiị, na afo otu puku na narị iteghete na iri ise na abụọ bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria si n'obodo Nnewi
Ọ bụ onye isi nke otu Ibeto , nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa sitere na Nnewi, obodo pụrụ iche maka mmụọ ọchụnta ego ya
Na mbido afọ otu puku na narị iteghete na iri asatọ, mgbe ihe mberede mmanụ na usoro ikikere mbubata na-ese okwu na-emebi gburugburu ebe nrụọrụ meputa Naijiria, Nnewi gafere oge uto
Ibeto Group n'okpuru nduzi Ibeto bụ onye na-aga n'ihu na mpaghara na azụmaahịa mba na mmepe mmepụta mgbe e mesịrị

Cletus Ibeto malitere dị ka onye na-ere ahịa na-ebubata Akụkụ ụgbọ ala mapụtara a maputa, mgbe ọ nọsịrị oge dị ka onye mmụta na azụmaahịa akụkụ moto, nzọụkwụ nke ọtụtụ ndị ahịa ọwụwa anyanwụ ji nwayọọ nwayọọ mee
N'ọnwa Machị afọ otu puku na narị iteghete na iri asatọ na asatọ, ọ kwụsịrị mbubata batrị ụgbọ ala na-ebute mmiri na ihe ndị na-arụ ọrụ plastik, mgbe ọ rụchara ụlọ ọrụ ya na Nnewi
Ka ọ na-erule afọ otu puku na narị iteghete na iri itoolu na ise, otu Ibeto aburula otu n'ime nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta akụkụ ụgbọ ala na mba ahụ

N'October abụọ, otu puku na narị iteghete na iri iteghete na isii, o guzobere Ibeto Petrochemical Industries Ltd, nke na-etinye aka na ngwakọta mmanụ mmanụ yana mmepụta nke ụdị ngwaahịa mmanụ dị iche iche maka ahịa mpaghara na nke mba ụwa
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere otu n'ime nnukwu ụlọ nchekwa mmiri maka ngwaahịa mmanụ na Naịjirịa nwere ikike nke ihe karịrị Puku iri isii metric ton dị na Apapa Wharf na Ibru Jetty Complex, Lagos

N'ọnwa Mee afọ Puku abụọ na iri na asatọ, Ibeto Cement Company Limited kwuputala njikọta ya na Century Petroleum Corporation, ụlọ ọrụ nyocha na mmepụta mmanụ ala na-ere ahịa na United States n'ihu ọha na-aga ịbanye n'ahịa ụwa ma na-agafe usoro dị mgbagwoju anya nke ndepụta
Ibeto nwetara pasent iri asaa na-achịkwa osisi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ma mee Cletus Ibeto onye isi oche nke Otu ndị isi oche
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Naijiria, Nsukka na nzere na Akaụntụ
N'afọ Puku abụọ na asatọ, Ibeto natara nsọpụrụ mba nke onye isi nke Order of the Niger (OON) site na Federal Republic of Nigeria maka onyinye ya pụtara ìhè nye mba ahụ site na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ya
N'afọ Puku abụọ na iri na abụọ, e nyere ya Honour of Commander of the Order of the Niger (CON) maka ọrụ ọ gara n'ihu na mba ahụ
