Mgbe ahụ, ọ malitere ihe ngosi na-atọ ọchị, na ihe omume ndị dịka Africa stand up na Parlement du rire

N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2020, ndị ikom abụọ na-anwa izuru ekwentị ya mara Colonel Dinar mma n'isi na obi mgbe ọ na-alaghachi Chad site na ihe ngosi na Cameroon
E liri ya na 19 Febụwarị 2020 na Cimetière de Lamadji na N'Djamena
Colorado bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika

N'oge oyi, Colorado lows na-akpata ọtụtụ snow nke Midwest na-enweta; Otú ọ dị, usoro ógè okpomọkụ nwere ike ịkpata usoro convective na-adịte aka, gụnyere ihu igwe siri ike
Ógè opupu ihe ubi na mmalite ógè okpomọkụ Colorado low cyclogenesis nwèrè ike ịkpata nnukwu ajọ ifufe na Great Plains na Midwest

Nne na nna ya bụ Etim Udoh Isok na Nyong Sam Akpan
Ọ malitere ndụ ya dịka onye nkuzi ụlọụka na onye enyemaka nkuzi na Mahadum Cross River site na 1983 ruo 1991

Nke a bụ n'ihi ebubo mwakpo mmekọahụ na ụgha eboro Essien bụ nke a na-ekwu n'akwụkwọ akụkọ
Comfort Iyabo Amah Momoh, MBE (a mụrụ n'afọ 1962) bu onye na-enyere ndị dị ime aka ị mụpụta nwa nke bu onye okachamara na ọgwọgwọ nke ndi nwanyi e bere ugwu
A mụrụ ya na Naijiria,ma Momoh bụ onye otu ndi Britain FGM national clinical group,e guzobere n'afọ 2007 iji zụọ ndi okachamara banyere otu esi a rụ ọrụ ahụ
Ruo afọ 2017, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọkachamara ahụike ọha na eze na Guy and St Thomas 'NHS Foundation Trust na Lọndọn
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Female Genital Mutilation (2005)
A mụrụ Momoh na Legos,na Naijiria,n'ezinụlọ ndị Naijiria na Gana
Nne nne ya nwụrụ ụbọchị ole na ole tupu ọmụmụ Momoh, ọ kachasị bụrụ nne nna ya zụlitere ya
N'afọ 1981, ọ kwagara UK maka ọ zụzụ ị bụ nọọsụ na North Middlesex Hospital
Ọ bụ na Middlesex ka ọ malitere ị mụ banyere FGM, nke ndị agbụrụ ya anaghị eme na Naijiria
N'afọ 2002,o nwetara nzere bachelọ na nlekọta ahụike ụmụ nwanyị site na Florence Nightingale School of Nursing and Midwifery,nke King's College dị na Lọndọn

Ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ n'efu nke Florence Nightingale Foundation n'afọ 2007 i ji mee nnyocha banyere ibi nwanyi ugwu n'Afrịka, yana n’afọ 2015 otu ahụ nyere ya njem mmụta n'efu i ji gaa Amerịka i ji mụọ ụzọ ha si e so i bi nwanyi ugwu
N’afọ 1997, Momoh guzobere ụlọọgwụ African Well Women Clinic na St Thomas’s Hospital, nke ewepụtara maka ilekọta ụmụ nwanyị i bi ugwu metụtara
N'ime afọ 2013, ụlọọgwụ ahụ na-eleta ihe dị ka ụmụ nwanyị 300 kwa afọ ma na-arụ ọrụ defibuleshọn abụọ kwa izu ụka, nke gụnyere ịmepe ikpu e mechiri n'ihi i be ugwu nke Type III
Momoh rụtụrụ ọrụ dịka onye ndụmọdụ na World Health Organisation n'afọ 1999 were nọchite anya UK na United Nations Commission on the Status of Women n'afọ 2001
Site n'afọ 2007, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọkachamara n'ahụike ọha na eze na Guy's and St Thomas 'NHS Foundation Trust, tupu ị la ezumike nká n'afọ 2017
Momoh nwekwazị Global Comfort Ltd, ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ
A gụnyere ya na ndepụta nke London Evening Standard nke afọ 2014 nke mmadụ1000 kasị nwee mmetụta na Lọndọn
Na 2008 New Year Honours, a họpụtara Momoh ka ọ bụrụ (MBE) maka ọrụ nlekọta ahụike ụmụ nwanyị
E nyere ya nzere dọktọreti na Mahadum nke Middlesex n'afọ 2008
N’afọ 2011, o ritere ihe nrite ‘Gathering of Africa’s Best (GAB)
King's College London họpụtara ya dị ka 2015 Alumna of the Year , ma n'afọ 2016, e nyere ya mkpakọrịta site na Royal College of Midwives
Ihe omume a nyochara ibu ndi isi ochichi Briten nyere banyere i nyocha umuaka nwanyị maka ibi nwanyi ugwu na ebubo n'ule a mere ka obi ghara iru umuaka a ala n'ihi na-ebibeghi ha ugwu
Ezinaụlọ dị iche iche na-atụ ụjọ na a ga-ebo ha ebubo ma kewaa
Kemgbe afọ 2012, Royal College of Paediatrics and Child Health chọrọ ka ndị dibia bekee na-enyocha ụmụaka e metọrọ bụrụ ndị ọpụrụiche

Newsnight kwuru na Momoh kọwara onwe ya ka 'Dọkịnta', agbanyeghị na dọktọreti ya bụ nke onyinye nsọpụrụ, na n'oge ikpe ụlọ ikpe n'afọ 2014, onye ọka ikpe, James Munby, katọrọ ihe akaebe ya dị ka ihe apụghị ịtụkwasị obi
Momoh zara na o nweghị ihe ọjọọ o mere na o nweghi ihe ọ bụla ọ na-ezo
Nimco Ali, onye na-emegide FGM, gwara Times, 'Comfort a rụọla ọrụ i ji kwụsị i bi ugwu ihe karịrị afọ 30 ma mee ka ndụ ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka nwanyị baa ọgaranya

Kọmitii maka nka dị mkpa nke a na-akpọ Committee for Relevant Art (CORA) na bekee bụ otu Naijiria na-anaghị achọ uru nke ndị na-ese ihe, ndị na-enyocha nka na ndị na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, na onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ
Ndị otu ahụ na-akọwa onwe ha dị ka ndị na-ahụ maka ọdịbendị, ma na-elekwasị anya na itinye aka na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na arụmụka gbasara ọdịbendị

Toyin Akinosho, Yomi Layinka, Josey Ogbuanoh, Tunde Lanipekun na Chika Okeke-Agulu guzobere nzukọ ahụ na June 2, 1991, ma na-etinye aka na nhazi nke ihe omume na ọrụ dị iche iche na-akwado ngosipụta ọdịbendị na nka nke oge a
CORA na-elekwasị anya na Naijiria, mana ọ na-ezute nzaghachi sara mbara na kọntinent Afrịka ndị ọzọ
Nzukọ ahụ na-elebara anya n'ọtụtụ ngosipụta ọdịbendị, dị ka akwụkwọ, ihe nkiri, cabaret, ihe nkiri mmemme telivishọn na egwu
CORA bụ onye na-ahazi ọtụtụ ihe omume na Lagos, dị ka Art Stampede kwa nkeji iri na ise na Lagos Book & Art Festival (LABAF) kwa afọ, Cinema Carnival na Lagos Comics Carnival

Ndị American Indian jikwa ya mee ihe iji kpuchie ntutu isi
N'etiti ndị Zuni, onye dọkịta na-ata mgbọrọgwụ ọhụrụ ma ọ bụ nke kpọrọ nkụ tupu ọ mịnye nsí site na agwọ ma tinye ọgwụ na ọnyá ahụ
A na-etinye ihe mgbochi a nke mgbọrọgwụ na ọtụtụ ememe iji taa agwọ
Otú ọ dị, maka ndị ọrụ ugbo na-azụ ahịa na-akụ ihe ọkụkụ ndị ọzọ, a na-ewere sunflower ọhịa dị ka ahịhịa
Karịsịa na Midwestern US, a na-ahụkarị ụdị ọhịa (na-adịgide adịgide) n'ubi ọka na soybean ma nwee ike belata ihe ọkụkụ
Enwere ike ịkọwa mbelata nke mmepụta na mmepụta nke phenolic compounds nke a na-eji belata asọmpi maka ihe oriri na mpaghara na-adịghị edozi ahụ nke sunflower nkịtị

Enwere ike iji Sunflowers mee ihe na phytoremediation iji wepụ ihe ndị na-egbu egbu n'ala, dị ka ọdu, arsenic na uranium, ma jiri ya mee ihe na rhizofiltration iji gbochie radionuclides na ihe ndị ọzọ na-egbu mgbu na nje bacteria na-emerụ ahụ site na mmiri
E ji ha wepụ caesium-137 na strontium-90 n'ọdọ mmiri dị nso mgbe ọdachi Chernobyl gasịrị, a rụkwara mkpọsa yiri nke ahụ iji meghachi omume na ọdachi nuklia Fukushima Daiichi
Mkpụrụ e wepụrụ akpụkpọ ahụ (n'aka ekpe) na mkpokoro (n'akụkụ aka nri)
Mmepụta nke sunflower n'ụwa niile
Isi na-egosipụta okooko osisi na-agba gburugburu nke 34 na 55 gburugburu n'èzí
Mkpụrụ osisi na-acha odo odo
N'ime narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, ekwere na osisi ndị dị nso nke ụdị ahụ ga-echebe ụlọ pụọ na ịba
Ndị Zuni na-eji okooko osisi eme ememe maka ofufe mmadụ
Ndị Inca na-efekwa okooko osisi anyanwụ ofufe n'ihi na ha lere ya anya dị ka ihe nnọchianya maka Anyanwụ
Sunflower bụ okooko osisi mba nke Ukraine

N'oge mwakpo Russia na Ukraine na 2022, vidiyo a na-ekesa n'ọtụtụ ebe na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta gosipụtara otu nwanyị Ukraine na-eche onye agha Russia ihu, na-agwa onye agha Russia ka ọ ' were mkpụrụ ndị a tinye ha n'akpa gị ka ọ dịkarịa ala, sunflowers wee too mgbe ị niile dina ebe a'
Sunflower aghọwo ihe nnọchianya zuru ụwa ọnụ nke nguzogide, ịdị n'otu, na olileanya
Sunflower bụkwa okooko osisi steeti nke steeti US nke Kansas, na otu n'ime okooko osisi obodo nke Kitakyūshū, Japan
Okooko osisi ndị ahụ bụ isiokwu nke usoro Vincent van Gogh's nke ihe osise ndụ nwụrụ anwụ
N'ime ngwụcha senchiri nke irí na itoolu, a na-eji okooko osisi ahụ eme ihe dị ka ihe nnọchianya nke Aesthetic Movement
A na-ejikarị sunflower eme ihe dị ka ihe nnọchianya nke echiche akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ
Sunflower bụkwa ihe nnọchianya nke Vegan Society
A họọrọ sunflower dị ka ihe nnọchianya nke Chọọchị Spiritualist maka ọtụtụ ihe, mana karịsịa n'ihi na ọ na-eche ihu n'anyanwụ ka 'Spiritualism na-eche n'ìhè nke eziokwu'
Dị ka e kwuru na mbụ n'isiokwu ahụ, nke a bụ n'ezie, ọ bụghị eziokwu
Ndị mmụọ nke oge a na-enwekarị nka ma ọ bụ ọla nwere atụmatụ sunflower
Sunflower bụ akara dị n'azụ Sunflower Movement, ngagharị iwe nke afọ 2014 na Taiwan
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2015, a nwetara mkpụrụ dị mma n'ọhịa ebe Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 dara n'otu afọ gara aga ma zụlite ya iji kwanyere ndị Dutch ịrị na ise bi na Hilversum nwụrụ

Na mbido afọ ahụ, onye isi na-ede akwụkwọ na Fairfax bụ Paul McGeough na onye na-ese foto bụ Kate Geraghty anakọtara 15 kilogram nke mkpụrụ sunflower site na ebe ahụ kpuru maka ezinụlọ na ndị enyi nke ndị Australia 38 nwụrụ, bụ ndị bu n'obi inye ha akara olileanya na-emetụ n'ahụ

Na Mee 13, 2021, n'oge asọmpi ejiji mba nke asọmpi ịma mma nke Miss Universe 2020, Miss Dominican Republic Kimberly Jiménez yi uwe 'Goddess of Sunflowers' nke e ji ọla edo na odo rhinestones kpuchie nke gụnyere ọtụtụ ezigbo sunflowers a dụkọtara n'elu ákwà ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na otu n'ime ha dara ma dina n'azụ ya n'elu ikpo okwu n'oge ọ na-eme ihe
Otú ọ dị, sunflowers abụghị nke Gris ma ọ bụ Ịtali, kama na North America
The Community Earth System Model (CESM) bụ ihe ngosi ọnụọgụ zuru oke nke usoro ụwa nke nwéré ikuku, oké osimiri, ice, ala, okirikiri carbon, na ihe ndị ọzọ
CESM na-agụnye ihe nlereanya ihu igwe na-enye ihe ngosi nkè ógè gara-aga, ugbu a, na ọdịnihu nke ụwa
Ọ bụ ónyé nọchiri Community Climate System Model (CCSM), ọkachasị mbipute 4 (CCSMv4), nke nyéré akụkụ ikuku mbụ màkà CESM
E mepụtara ikike ịkọ ọdịnihu siri ike, CESM-LE (CESM-Large Ensemble), na mbido iji chịkwaa njehie na ajọ mbunobi gafee ụdị dị íchè íchè (mmepụta)
A na-emepụta simulations site n'elu ụwa site na thermosphere site na iji Whole Atmosphere Community Climate Model (WACCM)

A tọhapụrụ CESM1 n'afọ 2010 na mmepe mbụ site na Climate and Global Dynamics Division (CGD) nke National Center for Atmospheric Research (NCAR), na nnukwu ego site na National Science Foundation (NSF) na Ngalaba Energy (DoE)

Obodo Sahel–Saharan States (CEN-SAD; Arabic French Communauté des Etats Sahélo-Sahariens; Portuguese Comunidade dos Estados Sahelo-Saarianos) bu n'obi ịmepụta mpaghara azụmahịa efu n'ime mpaghara Africa
Enwere ajụjụ gbasara ma ọkwa nke njikọta akụ na ụba ya mere ka ọ ruo eruo n'okpuru ntinye aka nke General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)
E guzobere CEN-SAD na February 1998 site na mba isii, ma kemgbe ahụ ndị otu ya amụbaala ruo 29

Otu n'ime ebumnuche ya bụ iji nweta ịdị n'otu akụ na ụba site na mmejuputa nnwere onwe nke ndị mmadụ na ngwa ahịa iji mee ka mpaghara ahụ weghara site na mba ndị otu mpaghara azụmaahịa efu Na ọkwa mba ụwa, CEN-SAD nwetara ọkwa onye na-ekiri ihe na UN General Assembly na 2001 wee mechie mkpakọrịta na mmekorita ya na United Nations Economic Commission for Africa (ECA) yana ụlọ ọrụ UN pụrụ iche na ụlọ ọrụ dịka UNDP, WHO, UNESCO, FAO, na kọmitii Interstate na-adịgide adịgide maka njikwa ụkọ mmiri ozuzo na Sahel
Ndị isi Afrịka chọrọ ime ka esemokwu dị n'etiti ndị agbata obi Chad na Sudan dị n'ihi esemokwu Darfur ma bulie Gọọmentị Federal nke Somalia na-alụ ọgụ na nzukọ mpaghara na Libya na June 3, 2007
Nzukọ nke iri nke ndị isi ala nke Community of Sahel-Saharan States (CEN-SAD) zutere na June 28, 2008 na Cotonou na June 18
Isiokwu ya bụ Rural Development and Food Security na mpaghara CEN-SAD
A họpụtala onye isi ala Benin bụ Yayi Boni ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ala CEN-SAD ugbu a maka otu afọ

Malite n'afọ 2009, mba ndị otu CEN-SAD ga-ekere òkè na mmemme egwuregwu na ọdịbendị mba ụwa, nke a maara dị ka Community of Sahel-Saharan States Games (Jeux de la Communauté des Etats Sahélo-Sahariens)
E mere egwuregwu CEN-SAD mbụ na Niamey, Niger site na 4-14 Febụwarị 2009

Mba iri na atọ na-asọ mpi n'egwuregwu ndị na-erubeghị afọ iri abụọ (egwuregwu, basketball, judo, bọọlụ bọọlụ, handball, table tennis na ịgba mgba ọdịnala) na mpaghara isii nke asọmpi ọdịbendị (abụ, okike ọdịnala na ịgba egwu, eserese, ihe ọkpụkpụ na foto)
E mere ndokwa ka egwuregwu CEN-SAD nke abụọ mee na isi obodo N'Djamena na Febụwarị 2011
Àtụ Community of Sahel–Saharan States
Community Youth Development (CYD) bụ nkà ihe ọmụma na-ekwusi ike na ọdịdị symbiotic nke mmepe ndị ntorobịa na mmepe obodo site na itinye omume abụọ ahụ n'otu usoro

CYD na-ejikọta ikike okike nke ndị na-eto eto ka ha na-achọ ịmepụta mgbanwe na gburugburu ha site n'ịzụlite mmekọrịta n'etiti òtù ndị na-emetụta ndị ntorobịa na ụlọ ọrụ mmepe obodo iji nweta ohere ọhụrụ maka ndị ntorobịa ijere obodo ha ozi na inwe ikikere izụpụta akara aka nke onwe ha

Compagnie Commerciale de Colonization du Congo Français, nke a makwaara dị ka CCCCF ma ọ bụ 4CF, bụ ụlọ ọrụ nkwekọrịta colonial guzobere na mpaghara Sangha River nke Republic of Congo na mmalite narị afọ nke 20
Compagnie Béninoise de Négoce et de Nkesa, nke a maara dị ka CBND, bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ere ahịa na azụmaahịa dabere na Benin
Enwere ike ịkọwa CBND dị ka ụlọ ọrụ abụọ, Innovation SA na STND, ha abụọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na nkesa ngwaahịa aha ama ama n'Africa
Uwe eji ebi ebi bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke ọrụ otu ahụ yana CBND ewepụtala akwa na Benin na njikọ nke CFAO Groupe
Ndepụta nnọchiteanya nke ngalaba na aha aha aha otu ahụ

Ndị mmekọ ụlọ akụ CBND
Complete Sports bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ egwuregwu mba Naijiria kwa ụbọchị ma nwee isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Isolo, mpaghara gọọmentị dị na Lagos Steeti
E bipụtara ya na 1995 dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ kachasị elu nke Complete Communications Limited ma gaa n'ihu ịghọ otu n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-agụkarị na Naịjirịa
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ na-elekwasị anya na ndị egwuregwu Naijiria karịsịa ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria
A na-ekesa Complete Sports gburugburu Naijiria na akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Benin Republic na Cameroon nke mere ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-ekesa na West Africa
Composite reflectivity bụ ihe mgbagwoju ike dBZ kachasị site na akụkụ ọ bụla nke radar ihu igwe NEXRAD
Ntụgharị na akụkụ PPI ọ bụla na-egosi ike mmiri ozuzo na akụkụ ahụ kpọmkwem n'elu horizon
Ụfọdụ n'ime akụkụ ndị a bụ5, 145, 24, na 335 degrees na Doppler radar nwere ihe rúrú akụkụ iri na anọ mgbè ọ nọ na Severe Mode
Na Composite, a ga-egosipụta ike kachasị elu n'etiti ndị dị na akụkụ dị íchè íchè n'elu ébé ọ bụla nke onyinyo ahụ
Na netwọk radar ihu igwe nke Canada, a na-akpọ nke a MAXR, màkà Maximum reflectivity na kọlụm ahụ

Màkà radar WSR-88D, nkè National Weather Service na-eji, ngwaahịa radar nke na-egosipụta ihe na-egbuke egbuke na-achịkọta data site na akụkụ niile dị elu nke ihe a nyèrè iji gosipụta nkezi nke ihe ahụ
Ngwongwo radar kacha elu na-egosipụta ihe na-ejikọta data site na akụkụ niile dị elu nke ihe a nyèrè iji gosipụta ihe kacha elu nke ihe ahụ

Mgbè e jiri ya tụnyere ntụgharị ntụgharị ntụziaka, ntụgharị ntụrụndụ kachasị ala nke ịdị elu, ntụgharị ihe mejupụtara, gụnyere ozi nyocha elu dị elu, nwere ike iyi ka ọ na-egosi mmiri ozuzo zuru ébé niile
Nke a nwèrè ike igosi otu n'ime ihe abụọ
Compromised Counterintelligence and the Threat of Donald J
Trump bụ akwụkwọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nke edere n’ afo Puku abuo Na iri abuo (2020) nke onye bụbu onye ọrụ FBI bu Peter Strzok dere

Dịka osote osota onye nduzi nke ngalaba nzuzo nke FBI, Strzok duziri nyocha nke Crossfire Hurricane nke CIA banyere mmetụta Russia na-ekwu na ọ bụ onye isi ala Donald Trump na mkpọsa Trump nke afọ 2016
Akwụkwọ Strzok dere na-akọwa ihe niile gbasara nyocha ahụ ma gosipụta Trump dịka nnukwu egwu nye nchekwa mba
Nnyocha Strzok banyere ndụ Trump, ya na ihe ọmụma ya na nchọpụta ya dịka onye isi na-ahụ maka nzuzo na FBI, mere ka o kwere na Trump 'na-emebi' ma si otú a, n'amaghị ama maọbụ n'amagwa, ji Putin ụgwọ
Ọ kọwara ọtụtụ ihe (kompromat) Trump mere ma kwuo tupu ma n'oge ọ bụ onye isi ala nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye na'okpuru nrụgide na nrụrụ aka sitere n'aka ndị iro mba ọzọ

Strzok na-ajụ ajụjụ a si 'Mgbe onye isi ala bidoro itunyere ebumnuche ya na nke ndi Russia karia nke Obodo anyi, o burula onye n’eyi egwu? Ọ kpọtụrụ otu ihe atụ ọha na eze metụtara ọrụ azụmahịa Trump na Russia nke mepụtara ọnọdụ dị mkpa maka Trump ka ọ gbanwee
Obodo Kọmputa bụ ahịa ngwa ahịa nke Teknụzụ Ozi na Mkparita uka (ICT) nke dị na obodo a na-akpọ Otigba, nke dị na Ikeja, isi obodo Lagos State, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Nigeria
Ahịa ahụ bụ ahịa ngwa ICT kachasị ukwuu n'Africa
Ọ bụ ahịa asọmpi zuru oke, n'okpuru nchebe nke Computer and Allied Products Dealers Association of Nigeria (CAPDAN)
Ewezuga ire ahịa nke ozi na teknụzụ, ahịa na-arụkwa ọrụ na nrụzi ekwentị mkpanaaka na kọmputa
Nrụzi kọmputa na ekwentị nwere ike ịbụ na ngwanrọ ma ọ bụ ngwaike dabere na ọdịdị nke mmejọ ahụ

Ahịa na ọrụ azụmahịa ya dịgasị iche iche na-enye ohere maka ndị injinia kọmputa na ndị na-ahụ maka ọrụ na-arụzi kọmputa na ekwentị mkpanaaka iji soro ndị na-ere ahịa nke ngwa ICT, si otú ahụ mepụta ohere ọrụ maka ha
A na-emeghe ahịa kwa ụbọchị ma e wezụga na Sọnde na ezumike ọha

Mmekọrịta azụmahịa a na ewu ewu kwa ụbọchị adọtawo ndị na-etinye ego ọhụrụ na ndị na-ere ahịa ICT gafee Africa wee gbasaa ọnụ ọgụgụ ahịa na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na akụ na ụba Lagos State
Ahịa ngwa ICT dịbu na Ogunlana Drive, Surulere na mbido afọ 1990 na ebe ọ dị ugbu a bụ naanị ebe obibi na ọfịs
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Gomentị Steeti Lagos mere atụmatụ ịkwaga ihe karịrị ndị ahịa 3000
Ahịa bụ ahịa zuru oke nke ọ dịghị onye na-ere ahịa na-emetụta ọnụahịa nke ngwaahịa ọ na-azụta ma ọ bụ na-ere n'ime ahịa
E nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ndị na-azụ ahịa na ndị na-ere ahịa n'ahịa tinyere ọnụ ọgụgụ buru oke ibu nke ndị ahịa nwere njikere ịzụta ngwaahịa na ọnụahịa ụfọdụ gbasara mkpa na ego ha na-enweta
Enweghị ihe mgbochi ịbanye na ịpụ n'ahịa, na-enye ohere mgbanwe ogologo oge iji gbanwee ọnọdụ ahịa
Ndị na-ere ahịa ICT na ndị na-azụ ahịa nwere ihe ọmụma zuru oke banyere ọnụahịa, ogo nke ngwaahịa na uru ya na efu efu efu na-efu n'oge azụmahịa ha
Ahịa ahụ na-enye aka ndị na-azụ ahịa ohere ịzụta ihe ezi uche dị na ya dabere na ozi na ihe ọmụma ọnụahịa

Ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ n'ofe mba ahụ akatọla ọrụ ụfọdụ n'ahịa ahụ n'ụzọ siri ike, ndị nwere ihe mgbu na-efu ego na ngwaọrụ ndị dị oké ọnụ ahịa na atụmatụ nke ndị injinia na ndị aghụghọ na-enweghị ike, ndị na-eji ahịa ọgba aghara dị ka ihe na-eme ka ndị mmadụ na-apụ ma ọ bụ na-ere ngwaahịa na ọrụ adịgboroja, dị ka ekwentị mkpanaaka, ngwanrọ, ngwa ngwa, wdg

E nwere ọtụtụ akụkọ banyere ekwentị ndị e zuru ezu nke na-enwekarị ụzọ ha ga-abanye n'ahịa, mana ndị ahịa na ndị na-ere ahịa na-edebanye aha na-emekarị ihe ndị a iwu na-akwadoghị, ụfọdụ n'ime ha na-eme azụmahịa na okpu ụgbọala, okporo ụzọ, na ngosipụta karịa ụlọ ahịa brik na mortar kwesịrị ekwesị

Otú ọ dị, e nwere ụdị abụọ dị mkpa nke ndị ahịa n'ahịa ahụ, ndị debanyere aha na ndị na-edeghị aha ma ọ bụ ndị ahịa nweere onwe ha, ndị na-erekarị n'ụzọ na-agagharị agagharị na nke a na-apụghị ịkọwapụta
Ụdị ndị ahịa nke ikpeazụ bụ ndị na-eme mpụ n'ahịa n'ụzọ dị mfe, n'ihi nnwere onwe ha na-agagharị agagharị
Ka o sina dị, a na-eguzobe usoro iji chebe ndị na-ere ahịa, ndị na-azụ ahịa, na ndị na-edozi

Concha Jerez ( Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, 1941) ọtụtụ inye ozuzo bụ omenkà Spanish mara dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ na nka echiche
Otu n'ime axes etiti nke ọrụ ya bụ nyocha dị oke egwu nke mgbasa ozi

Concha Jerez gụrụ piano na Madrid Royal Conservatory, na 1958-1959 ọ nwetara akwụkwọ mmụta na Washington-Lee High School na Arlington, Virginia, ebe ọ nwere mmasị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta ọha na eze
Nke a mere ka ọ mụọ akwụkwọ maka ikike ya na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Complutense nke Madrid
N'afọ 1970, o kpebiri ịrara onwe ya nye n'ihe ngosi nka, wee mee ihe ngosi mbụ ya na 1973
Ka ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'okpuru iyi egwu nke mmechi nke ọchịchị Franco, ọrụ mgbasa ozi, nyocha, na nyocha onwe onye na- abụkarị n'ọrụ nkà ya
N'afọ 1976 o gosipụtara nnukwu nrụnye mbụ ya, Autocensura, ka amachibidoro na akwụkwọ ebipụtara
N'afọ 1983 o gosipụtara echichi Retorno al coienzo na Museo Vostell Malpartida
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ meghere ụzọ maka iji ụdị ohere nkà na ụzụ ọhụrụ ọ bụla, dị ka vidiyo, nrụnye mmekọrịta, foto, na nrụnye ọdịyo dị ọcha

Kemgbe ahụ Jerez lekwasịrị anya n'ọrụ ya n'ọhịa nke nkà na-arụ ọrụ na mmepe nke echiche nke nrụnye dị ka ọrụ na ọnọdụ, na nnukwu oghere, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-ejikọta ihe ngosi nke mgbasa ozi dị iche iche
A matala ya dị ka onye so na ọgbọ mbụ nke Spain nke ndị na-ese ihe
Ọ malitere videocreación [ es ] na mmalite 1980s
Ntinye vidiyo izizi ya gbadoro ụkwụ na steepụ
E gosipụtara ya na Ememme Vidiyo Mba Nile nke Madrid nke emere na Círculo de Bellas Artes na 1984
Mgbe e mesịrị n'ime afọ iri, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ ntinye na mbụ Mgbasa ozi nka ememme na Osnabrück, Germany
Jerez emepụtala mpempe akwụkwọ nka redio maka ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ Europe
Kemgbe 1976, ya na onye na-ede egwú na onye na-ese ihe dị iche iche bụ José Iges jikọrọ aka na ọtụtụ ọrụ, onye ya na ya gosipụtara Media Mutaciones na La Tabacalera na Madrid na 2015
Nke a bụ njem nlegharị anya nke ọrụ nkwonkwo ha, na-ekpuchi ọrụ jikọtara ya na ihe nketa nke 1970 na omume ha na-ahụ anya na ụda dị ugbu a
Site na Julaị 2014 ruo Jenụwarị 2015, Museo de Arte Contemporáneo de Castilla y León gosipụtara Interferencias en los medios ya

Na 2015, Jerez meriri National Award for Plastic Arts 'maka akụkụ ọsụ ụzọ ya n'iji teknụzụ eme ihe, n'ihi ịbụ onye nnọchianya nke ọgbọ ndị na-ese ihe nke gosipụtara mgbanwe site na oge analọg gaa na omenala dijitalụ, na nyocha ya, ihe okike, na ihe ngosi ya, na ọhụrụ' na ọrụ ya na echiche okike
Jerez bụkwa onye nkuzi na Mahadum Salamanca 's Ngalaba nke Fine Arts Site na 1991 ruo
Feminism na nguzo n'akụkụ aka ekpe bụ nke a ma ama n'ime ọrụ ya, yana n'èzí ya

Jerez abụrụla onye nhazi, onye nhazi, na onye na-agba ọsọ ndụ nke òtù dị iche iche nke ụmụ nwanyị na ndị na-ese ihe, gụnyere Asociación de Mujeres en las Artes Visuales (MAV), nke nyere ya ihe nrite na 2012 dị ka nkwado nke ọrụ ya
Na 2018 o sonye na ihe ngosi mkpokọta haziri nke CentroCentro, La NO comunidad, ya na ọrụ Soliloquios cotidianos
E gosipụtara nke a dị ka edemede gbasara owu ọmụma n'ụwa nke oge a
Ọzọkwa na 2018, na emume nke iri anọ ncheta nke Iwu nke Spain, echichi ya Textos autocensurados
Versión 1,1976 so na ọrụ ahọpụtara n'aka Museo Nacional Centro de Arte Reina Sofia maka ihe ngosi El poder del arte, nke dị na ụlọ nke Congress of Deputies na Senate
Confederation of African Football, ma ọ bụ CAF maka mkpirikpi (French Confédération Africaine de Football, Arabic , ), bụ òtù nchịkwa na nchịkwa maka egwuregwu bọọlụ, futsal na bọọlụ osimiri n'Africa

E guzobere ya na 8 Febụwarị 1957 na Grand Hotel dị na Khartoum, Sudan site n'aka ndị otu bọọlụ mba nke Egypt, Ethiopia, South Africa na Sudan, na-esochi mkparịta ụka nkịtị n'etiti otu ndị ahụ a kpọtụrụ aha na FIFA Congress mere na 7 June 1956 na Avenida Hotel na Lisbon, Portugal

Otu n'ime ọgbakọ kọntinent isii nke otu na-ahụ maka egwuregwu bọọlụ ụwa, FIFA, CAF na-anọchite anya otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Africa, na-agba otu mba na asọmpi kọntinent na klọb ma na-achịkwa ego nrite, ụkpụrụ na ikike mgbasa ozi maka asọmpi dị otú ahụ

A ga-ekenye CAF 9 ntụpọ na FIFA World Cup malite na 2026 ma nwee ohere nke ntụpọ iri yana mgbakwunye nke asọmpi egwuregwu etiti mba ụwa nke gụnyere otu isii iji kpebie ebe abụọ FIFA World Cup ikpeazụ (46 + 2)
Isi ụlọ ọrụ CAF dị na Khartoum n'ime ọnwa mbụ e guzobere ruo mgbe ọkụ gbawara n'ụlọ ọrụ nke Sudan Football Association mgbe nzukọ a kwagara na nso Cairo, Egypt
Youssef Mohamad bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu mbụ na Abdel Aziz Abdallah Salem, onye isi ala mbụ
Kemgbe afọ 2002, ebe nchịkwa dị na 6th of October City na Cairo, Egypt
CAF ugbu a nwere ndị otu Iri ise na anọ bụ ndị otu zuru oke, ebe Zanzibar na Réunion bụ ndị otu mmekọ (lee ngalaba CAF Members and Zones n'okpuru)
Onye isi ala ugbu a bụ Patrice Motsepe si South Africa, onye a họpụtara na 12 Machị 2021 na ntuli aka na-enweghị mmegide nke e mere na Rabat, Morocco
Na 18 Septemba 2017, CAF malitere asọmpi maka ndị niile na-ede egwu n'Afrịka iji mepụta abụ ya na-enweghị okwu iji gosipụta ihe nketa ọdịbendị na egwu Afrịka

Ebipụtara ukwe ahọpụtara, onye dere ya bụ nke amabeghị taa ma dị sekọnd Iri asaa na anọ n'ogologo, ebipụtara ya na saịtị ahụ na 16 Jenụwarị 2008 ma ọ bụ egwu ntinye maka asọmpi asọmpi CAF gọọmentị ọ bụla
A na-ejikwa ya maka asọmpi asọmpi gọọmentị ọ bụla nke ndị otu mpaghara CAF gụnyere WAFU, COSAFA na CECAFA
Ebe e si nweta ya
Na mgbakwunye, enwere mpaghara dị na Africa nke na-esoghị CAF ma ọ bụ ọgbakọ ọ bụla ọzọ ruo n'ókè ọ bụla
Ụfọdụ steeti dị na Afrịka nwere nkwenye mba ụwa ma ọ bụ enweghị nkwenye mba nwere ndị otu mba, mana ọ dịghị nke a tụlere maka ndị otu CAF
Kama nke ahụ, ha na òtù ndị dị ka CONIFA nwere njikọ

Maka otu mba ụmụ nwoke, asọmpi bụ isi bụ iko mba Afrịka nke malitere n'afọ 1957
N'afọ 2009, CAF malitere ịhazi asọmpi ọzọ maka otu mba ụmụ nwoke, asọmpi mba Africa, oge a na-egosi ndị egwuregwu na-egwu egwuregwu n'asọmpị mba ha
CAF na-agbakwa asọmpi mba na ọkwa n'okpuru 20 na Under-17, nke na-ejekwa ozi dị ka asọmpi ntozu maka FIFA U-20 World Cup na FIFA U-17 World Cup n'otu n'otu
Maka ndị otu mba ụmụ nwanyị, CAF na-arụ ọrụ asọmpi na-eje ozi dị ka asọmpi iru eru maka asọmpi FIFA-ahazi nke malitere n'otu afọ ahụ ha malitere
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2022, Women's Africa Cup of Nations, nke a malitere n'afọ 1991 maka ndị otu mba dị elu, na-eme ka ndị otu anọ ruo FIFA Women's World Cup ma kpuchie onye mmeri

Ma asọmpi African U-20 Women's World Cup qualification tournament, nke malitere n'afọ 2002 na African U-17 Iko mba maka ụmụ nwanyị, nke malitere n'afọ 2008, nke ọ bụla enweghị onye mmeri kama ọ na-eme ka ndị otu 2 ruo eru maka asọmpi na FIFA U-20 Womenʼs World Cup na FIFA U-17 Women's ịkọ mba ụwa n'otu n'otu

CAF na-ejikwa asọmpi klọb abụọ dị n'Afrịka CAF Champions League, nke mbụ e mere n'afọ 1964 dị ka African Cup of Champions Clubs (ma ọ bụ naanị African Cup) ma gbanwee aha ya n'afọ 1997 maka ndị mmeri nke African leagues na ndị na-esote league-agwụcha otu iri na abuo kachasị elu nke mba ndị otu; na CAF Confederation Cup, nke malitere n'afọ 2004 dị ka njikọta nke African Cup Winners' Cup, nke bidoro na asọmpi nke atọ, CAF Cup, nke mba ndị mmeri na ndị otu iri na abuo kachasị na mba
CAF Super Cup, nke na-emegide ndị meriri CAF Champions League megide ndị meriri CAF Confederation Cup (bụbu ndị meriri iko ndị mmeri nke iko mba Afrịka), n'afọ 1993
A haziri asọmpi Afro-Asian Club Championship na AFC n'etiti ndị mmeriri CAF Champions League na ndị mmeriri AFC Champions League
Ebidoro CAF Women's Champions League na 12 Septemba 2020, na-agụnye ndị mmeri nke asọmpi iru eru nke CAF maka ndị otu klọb ụmụ nwanyị

N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2004, nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta South Africa, MTN, gbara nkwekọrịta afọ anọ iji kwado asọmpi CAF nke ruru US $ 125 nde, nke bụ nkwekọrịta nkwado kachasị na akụkọ egwuregwu Afrika n'oge ahụ

CAF mepere oku nkwado ọhụrụ mgbe nkwekọrịta MTN gwụchara yana nnukwu nkwukọrịta French, Orange nwetara ya na Julaị 2009, bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ 8 zuru oke ogologo oge ekpughere iji kwado asọmpi CAF na ọnụ ahịa 100 million

N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2016, nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ France na-ahụ maka ike na mmanụ ala, Total SA, dochiri Orange dị ka onye isi na-akwado ya na ngwugwu nkwado afọ asatọ sitere na CAF maka uru nke nde € 950 nde iji kwado asọmpi ya
Total gbanwere aha ya dị ka TotalEnergies n'afọ 2021, ọ bụ ezie na nkwado ya na CAF gara n'ihu n'okpuru aha ọhụrụ ahụ
Ndị isi na-akwado CAF ugbu a bụ

Klọb ndị Ijipt bụ ndị kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma, na ngụkọta nke ihe nrite asọmpi iri anọ na otu

Klọb ndị Ijipt nwere mmeri dị iche iche na African Cup of Champions Clubs / CAF Champions League (16), African Cup Winners' Cup (8), CAF Super Cup (12) na Afro-Asian Club Championship (3), ndị Tunisian clubs nwere ihe nrite asọmpi iri abuo na anọ sochiri ha nwere mmeri kachasị na CAF Cup (4)
N'ọnọdụ nke atọ n'ozuzu, klọb Moroccan enwetala ihe nrite asọmpi iri abuo na atọ ma ha nwere ọtụtụ mmeri na CAF Confederation Cup (7)

Maka asọmpi ọ bụla, E gosipụtara ọkọlọtọ nke mba ndị ọbịa na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị otu na asọmpi ikpeazụ ọ bụla (na brackets)
A na-ahazi ndị otu site na ọnụ ọgụgụ ha pụtara
Na ọmụmụ nzuzo, nne na eweputara ndị ọchịchị njirimara ya, mana ọ choghi ka ndị ọchịchị kpughe njirimara ya
N'ọtụtụ mba dị iche iche, a kwadoro ọmụmụ nzuzo ruo ọtụtụ narị afọ iji gbochie igbu ụmụ amụrụ ọhụrụ ugboro ugboro, ọkachasị n'èzí alụmdi na nwunye
Ikike nne nke mkpebi onwe onye kwụsịtụrụ ikike nwa ahụ ịma gbasara ndu nna nna ha ruo mgbe ọ gbanwere obi ya ma ọ bụ ruo mgbe nwatakịrị tozuru etozu rịọrọ ka a kpughee ya n'oge ọzọ
Echiche ọzọ nke ọmụmụ a na-amaghị aha, ebe nne na-ekpugheghị ndị ọchịchị njirimara ya ma ọlị, ma ọ bụ ebe njirimara ya ka na-enweghị njedebe, gafere nke a
Enwere ike ịhụ onye bu ụzọ maka iwu ọmụmụ nzuzo na Sweden, ebe Iwu igbu ụmụaka nke 1778 nyere ndị nne ikike na ụzọ ịmụ nwa n'amaghị aha
Otú ọ dị, mmezigharị nke 1856 nke iwu ahụ gbochiri iwu a na ọmụmụ nzuzo, ebe e nyere onye na-amụ nwa e nyere iwu idebe aha nne ahụ n’ime envelopu mechiri emechi
Na France, a kwadoro ọmụmụ nzuzo na 1793, mgbe Isiokwu 326 nke Code Civil webatara ma echiche nke ọmụmụ na-amaghị aha na nzuzo

Ịmata nwa ọhụrụ site na nkọwa bụ mmadụ na-ama ụma gbuo nwatakịrị na-erubeghị afọ nke ezi uche, nke na-adịgasị iche n’ebe ọ nọ, mana a na-ewerekarị na ọ dị afọ itoolu, n’agbanyeghị na n’ụka Katọlik, afọ a dị afọ asaa

Ọ bụrụ na nne egbuo nwa ya ma lụọ di, mgbe ahụ, a gaghị ekpe ikpe ahụ dị ka igbu mmadụ kama ọ bụ iwu nkịtị n'okpuru igbu ọchụỌ bụrụ na a mụrụ nwa ahụ, nne ahụ ga-eji otu akaebe gosi ya na akwụkwọ onye ọrụ nke ụmụ amụrụ ọhụrụ
Ogbugbu ụmụaka bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na narị afọ nke iri na asatọ na nke iri na itoolu n'ihi ihe isi ike nke ikpe na ọdịdị nke mmejọ ahụ
N'ọtụtụ ebe, echiche enyemaka mmadụ mere ka ndị na-ekpe ikpe tụlee na mgbe ndị na-eto eto na-alụbeghị di gburu ụmụ amụrụ ọhụrụ, ntaramahụhụ ahụ ekwesịghị ịdị njọ
Ogbugbu ụmụaka belatara ka mkpebi bịara nke gbanwere echiche nke ụmụ nwanyị n'ebe onwe ha na ndị ọzọ nọ
Ụfọdụ obodo bịara ghọta na omume mmegbu n'ebe ụmụ nwanyị nọ na-ebutekarị ọnwụ ụmụ ha
Nke a gbara ọha mmadụ ume ka ha tụleghachi usoro na ọrụ ha na-arụ
Konfúkius (Asụsụ China 孔子; pinyin Kǒng zǐ; Wade-Giles K'ung-tzu, mà Chinese 孔夫子; pinyin Kǒng Fūzǐ; Wade-Giles K'ung-fu-tzu), bu onye échiche na onye ílúnílú
Ílúnílú ya dàr`a na óbị mádu na óbị ndi ochíchí, ezíbóte mmekotá na ñkitị, na eziokwu na ihe mmé ézíbóté ihe
Óbị onwèrè mèrè ka ó gáfè nke ndi ozor di kà nché échìchè Ihe íwú (法家), nché Tao (道家) na mbgè Ọchíchí nke umunna Han (206 BCE – 220 CE)
Échìchè Confucius mèrè ka ihe ndi bekee na kpí Confucianism (儒家) dí
Ọ byàrà Europe shí ónyé Italy nke Jesuit Matteo Ricci, ónyé kéré áhà 'Confucius' nạ asụsụ Latin
The Congolese Plantation Workers Art League (ma ọ bụ CATPC) na-eme ihe ọkpụkpụ chocolate
Ndị otu a bụ ndị ọrụ nke onye Dutch na-ese ihe bụ Renzo Martens si n'ugbo nke ụlọ ọrụ na-azụ ahịa Unilever
A maara Martens n'oge gara aga maka mkpasu iwe ya, gụnyere ihe nkiri afọ iri gara aga nke na-atụ aro na ndị Congo na-eji ịda ogbenye ha dị ka akụ na ụba

Ndị na-ese ihe na CATPC - Djonga Bismar, Mathieu Kilapi Kasiama, Cedrick Tamasala, Mbuku Kimpala, Mananga Kibuila, Jérémie Mabiala, Emery Mohamba, na Thomas Leba - na-arụ ọrụ ya na onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na ndị na-ese ihe na Kinshasa
Martens na-ere ọrụ ha na ụlọ ngosi ya na Berlin na Amsterdam
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụsị afọ 2016, ndị ọrụ na ndị na-ese ihe natara pụkụ dọla ịrị atọ na ise, ma ọ bụ ihe Martens mere atụmatụ dị ka ụgwọ ọnwa iri na ise ọzọ kwa afọ kewara n'etiti otu ahụ
Martens chọkwara iweghachi ego nke ọrụ ndị ọrụ ugbo site n'ịgwa ndị isi na-ese ihe ka ha nye onyinye nka na ụlọ ngosi nka ọhụrụ dị ka ụgwọ ọrụ maka ịnata nkwado Unilever site na Tate Modern
Onye na-ese ihe bụ Carsten Höller enyewo onyinye
Ụlọ ngosi cube ọcha mepere n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2017

Connie Temweka Gabisile Chiume (amụrụ n'abalị ise nke ọnwa Jun, 1952), bụ onye ome ihe nkiri nke South Africa ma bụrụ agbụrụ Malawi
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na fiim Black Panther, Black Is King na Blessers yana na telivishọn maka Zone 14 na Rhythm City

Nna ya bụ, Wright Tadeyo Chiume, sitere na Usisya, Nkhata Bay, Malawi ma nne ya bụ, MaNdlovu, sitere na KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa

Ọ nọrọ oge nwata ya na Welkom, bụ́ ebe ọ gakwara akwụkwọ
Ọ kwagara Eastern Cape iji mechaa matrick
Otú ọ dị, ọ gụchaghị akwụkwọ ọmụmụ nọọsụ n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ka a zụọ ya dị ka onye nkụzi
Site na mmasị ahụ, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mmụta nkuzi na 1976
Mgbe afọ ole na ole nke ịkụzi ihe gasịrị, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm wee gaa Izrel
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ kwagara Gris ka ọ malite ọrụ ime ihe nkiri
Nne ya nwụrụ na Machị 2020
Nwa nwanne nna ya, Ephraim Mganda Chiume bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Malawi
Connie lụrụ di na 1985 wee gbaa alụkwaghịm na 2004
Ọ bụ nne nke ụmụ anọ ụmụ nwoke abụọ na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Mgbe ọ kwagachara Gris na 1977, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri n'ọrụ mbụ ya dị ka Porgy na Bess, Ipi Ntombi, na Little Shop of Horrors
N'afọ 1989, ọ pụtara na usoro onyonyo Inkom'Edla Yodwa ka ọ laghachiri na South Africa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'Thembi' na usoro ahụ
Mgbe usoro ihe omume ahụ gasịrị, a kpọrọ ya òkù ka ọ Sonye na film Warrior from Hell na 1990, nke mere ka ọ pụta ìhè na sinima
N'afọ 2000, ọ meriri ihe nrite Connie the Avanti maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na usoro ihe nkiri n'oge mmemme ihe nkiri South Africa na Television Awards (SAFTA)
Na 2005, o gosipụtara agwa dị ka 'Stella Moloi', na usoro ihe nkiri SABC1 Zone 14, ebe ọ ritere ihe nrite Golden Horn
Site na usoro ihe nrite ahụ ọ ghọrọ onye n'ewu ewu nke ukwuu, ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ndu ruo 2010
Ọ nwetakwara ihe nrite maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nkiri n'oge SAFTA nke atọ
Na 2015, ọ pụtara na soap opera nke Rhythm City gosipụta agwa ọrụ nne dị ka 'Mamokete Khuse'
Ihe ngosi a ghọrọ nke ama ama nke ukwuu na South Africa
N'afọ 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ isi n'ime ihe nkiri nkwago ndị dị ka You Strike the Woman and you Strike the Rock
N'afọ 2020, ọ gbara n'usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn Gomora na ngosipụta agwa dị ka'Mam'Sonto Molefe'
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ pụtakwara na usoro telivishọn ọzọ bụ Black Is King
N'ime usoro ahụ, ọ n'egosiputa n'ihe nkiri dị ka nne na-enweghị isi
N’ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, e nyere ya onyinye nhọpụta First Feather
N'afọ 2018, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Hollywood blockbuster Black Panther Onye ama ama South Africa bụ omee John Kani
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka okenye n'ami mmanụ nụ Mining Tribe Elder n'ihe nkiri ahụ
Constance Ferguson (née Masilo; a mụrụ na 10 June 1970) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Botswana na South Africa, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, onye na'emepụta ihe na onye ọchụnta ego
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka 'Karabo Moroka' na ihe nkiri ncha kachasị ewu ewu na South Africa, Generations Ọ pụtara na ihe ngosi ahụ site na mmalite ya n'afọ 1994 ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ n'afọ 2010
N'afọ 2014, ọ maliteghachiri ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi ahụ mgbe afọ 4 gachara obere oge
Ferguson nọ n'ihu magazin Forbes Woman Africa n'afọ 2018
N'afọ 1994, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị mkpa nke Karabo Moroka, nwunye Tau Mogale na nwanne nwanyị Archie Moroka, na ihe nkiri ncha South Africa kachasị ewu ewu, Generations
Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri n'akụkụ Menzi Ngubane, Slindile Nodangala na Sophie Ndaba
N'afọ 2010, mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ Karabo Moroka ruo afọ iri na isii, Connie kwupụtara ọpụpụ ya na Generations 'iji nweta nhọrọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ'
Ferguson hapụrụ Generations na ezigbo ederede ka ọ laghachiri na soapie afọ anọ ka e mesịrị iji nyere aka ịmaliteghachi Generations The Legacy
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị Generations n'afọ 2010, ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri nke M-Net telenovela The Wild, nke a gbagburu na ugbo egwuregwu South Africa
Ya na di ya na-eme ihe nkiri ruo mgbe a kagburu ya n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2013
Connie na di ya, Shona, malitere ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn Ferguson Films n'afọ 2010
M-Net nyere iwu ka ha mepụta ihe mbụ, Rockville, afọ atọ ka e mesịrị
Ihe ndị ọzọ a na-emepụta gụnyere iGazi, Onyinye, Throne, Eze Nwanyị na Onye na-akparị
Di na nwunye ahụ na-apụta mgbe niile na mmepụta nke ha; dịka ọmụmaatụ, Connie na-arụ ọrụ Harriet Khoza na The Queen
A họpụtara Eze Nwanyị n'ọtụtụ ụdị na South African Film and Television Awards n'afọ 2018
Ferguson wepụtara ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ a na-akpọ True Self n'afọ 2008, na ihe na-asi ísì ụtọ n'afọ 2014
Ferguson (nke bụ Masilo n'oge ahụ) lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Neo Matsunyane n'afọ 1993
Na Disemba 1992, ha nabatara nwa nwanyị
Ha gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ1998, mgbe afọ ise nke alụmdi na nwunye gasịrị
Na July 2001, Ferguson zutere onye na-eme ihe nkiri Shona Ferguson
Na Nọvemba 2001, afọ atọ ka ya na Matsunyane gbara alụkwaghịm, ha lụrụ
Na June 2002, di na nwunye ahụ nabatara nwa nwanyị
Mgbe ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 20 nke alụmdi na nwunye gasịrị, Shona Ferguson nwụrụ n'ehihie nke 30 Julaị 2021 site na nsogbu metụtara COVID-19
Connie Galiwango Nakayenze (amụrụ na 31 Ọgọst a afọ 1967) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na nwanyị na-anọchite anya Mbale District na Nzukọ nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Connie jere ozi dị ka onye omeiwu na nke itoolu nke Uganda
Ọ nwere njikọ na pati na-achị achị, National Resistance Movement
Ọ bụ nwanyị lụrụ di
Connie nọdụrụ maka ule Primary Leaving Examinations (PLE) na afọ 1981 na Gangama Primary School
O mechara nweta asambodo ndị nkuzi nke Grade III na afọ 1989 site na Kabwangasi Primary Teachers College na Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education (UACE) na 1992 site na Mbale Hall
O nwekwara diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị site na National Teachers College, Nagongera (1995)
N'afọ 2001, e nyere Connie nzere Bachelor of Arts na Social Sciences site na Mahadum Islamic dị na Uganda
Nke a sochiri Master of Arts na Education Management na afọ 2008 site n'otu Mahadum ahụ
Ihe omume ntụrụndụ Connie bụ Volleyball, Music na Net Ball
Connie bụ onye nkuzi na Nabuyonga Primary School n'etiti afọ 1989 na afọ 1993 tupu ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Mbale SS (1995), na Mbale High School (20032011)
N'agbata afọ 2011 na 2016, ọ sonyeere ndị omeiwu nke Uganda dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu
A họpụtakwara Connie maka ndị omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda n'oge ntuli aka Jenụwarị, na afọ 2021 na Uganda
Na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri nke Uganda, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka Onye isi oche nke Kọmitii na Education & Sports
Tụkwasị na nke a, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu Kọmitii na HIV / AIDS & Related Disease na onye otu Kọمitii Azụmaahịa
Connie M'Gadzah (a mụrụ n'afọ 1971) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a mụrụ na Zimbabwe nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka Lucas Madikane na The Archers
Ọ bi na London, England ugbu a ma bụrụ onye otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke Ambridge Extra (nke sitere na The Archers), ebe ọ na-enyekwa olu maka mmemme TV dịka One Night, Luther na Ashes to Ashes
M'Gadzah pụtakwara dịka onye na-asọ mpi na The Chase n'afọ 2012, ebe onye na-achụ nta Anne Hegerty jidere ya ma pụọ n'enweghị ihe ọ bụla
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ikom atọ na ihe omume ahụ, nke e wepụrụ ha atọ
https //wwwyoutubecom/watch?v=KK8I9106cfc - Comic Relief - Ricky Gervais
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Sydney Johnson na usoro Netflix The Crown (2019) The Crown (season 3)
Ọ gara St Aloysius' College na Highgate, London
Cornelia 'Connie' September (Amụrụ n'ọnwa 26 June 1959, Cape Town) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa lara ezumike nká nke jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Ebe obibi mmadụ site n'afọ 2013 Xia2014
Septemba tolitere na West Coast ebe nne ya ga-eziga ya maka ezumike

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ ejiji na Salt River na-enweghị mmasị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma ọ bụ òtù ndị ọrụ, ọ bụ ezie na ọ malitere ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya ebe a na òtù ndị ọrụ na òtù ndị otu ọrụ

Constance Glerah 'Conny' Nxumalo (18 Febụwarị, na afọ 1967 na 22 Ọgọst, na afọ 2020) bụ onye ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze na onye ọrụ gọọmentị nke South Africa, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya 'Onye isi ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha mmadụ na eze nke South Africa'
A mụrụ Constance Glerah Nxumalo na Rolle, Mpumalanga province, nwa nwanyị Anny, na nwa nwanyị Ezrom Makhubela
Nne ya bụ onye nkuzi; nna nna ya bụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Mahadum nke Limpopo n'afọ 1989
O mechara nweta nzere masta na njikwa na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand
Nxumalo rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Gazankulu mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji
Ahụmahụ ya na-arụ ọrụ na steeti Black-only n'okpuru ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nyeere ya aka inye aka na gọọmentị ọhụrụ mgbe afọ 1994 gasịrị
O nyere aka dee iwu gbasara ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ọkachasị ndị na-ejere ụmụaka ojii, ụmụ nwanyị, ezinụlọ, na ndị agadi ozi
Ọ ghọrọ onye nduzi nke Mpumalanga Ministry of Social Development, ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi mba nke Ngalaba Mgbochi Ezinụlọ na Mpụ Ọha
O nyere aka na iwu mba lekwasịrị anya na usoro nlekọta nkuzi, ọgwụgwọ ọgwụ ọjọọ, na mgbochi ime ihe ike n'ụlọ
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi nchịkwa nke ọrụ ọdịmma na Ngalaba Mmepe Ọha
A na-akpọ ya mgbe ụfọdụ 'Onye isi ọrụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke South Africa'
N'afọ 2016, o kwuru okwu na nnọkọ nke United Nations banyere ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị, nke emere na Pretoria
Na mbido afọ 2020, o tinyere aka n'inyere ụmụ amla South Africa aka ịlaghachi South Africa n'oge mgbochi njem na mmechi ókèala n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19
Nxumalo nwere ụmụ nwanyị atọ
Conny Nxumalo nwụrụ na Pretoria n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ na afọ 2020, site na coronavirus
Ọ dị afọ iri ise na atọ
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ gọọmentị ya, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na doctorate na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand

Rory Truell, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke International Federation of Social Workers, zigara nkwupụta na ozi ncheta ya na-agụ, n'akụkụ ụfọdụ, 'Nkwado ya maka nchebe ụmụaka na mkpebi ịkwụsị ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ihe nlereanya maka gọọmentị gburugburu ụwa
Ndụ ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ ka mma n'ihi Conny Nxumalo, ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya siri ike n'ihi conny Nxumaalo
Conor Marie Leslie (amụrụ na April 10, na afọ 1991) bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri
Malite ọrụ ya na ngwụcha afọ 2000, ọrụ mbụ ya bụ na ihe nkiri Chained (nke afọ 2012)
Site na 2015 ruo 2018, ọ pụtakwara na oge atọ mbụ nke Amazon Prime Video ọzọ akụkọ ihe mere eme The Man in the High Castle
Leslie nwetakwara ọganihu maka igosipụta Donna Troy / Wonder Girl na DC Universe / HBO Max superhero series Titans (2018[[present), nke ọ bụ akụkụ nke ndị isi na-eme ihe nkiri kemgbe oge nke abụọ
A mụrụ Leslie na Livingston, New Jersey ma biri na Millburn
Tinyere ime ihe nkiri, Leslie zụlitere mmasị na ese foto
Ọ gara Millburn High School, gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka onye na-eto eto na 2008, ma mesịa kwaga New York City
Conor Matthew Mccreedy (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na otu n'ọnwa Febụwarị 1987 na Johannesburg, South Africa) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'oge a, ónyé na-echekwa ihe na ónyé na-anakọta ihe na Switzerland
Na atụmatụ ego ruru ihe dị ka dollar irí asaá nde
Agba na-acha anụnụ anụnụ pụtara ìhè n'ọrụ ya
A mụrụ Mccreedy na Johannesburg, South Africa na 1987
Ọ bụ nwá nwà nke Sir Theophilus Shepstone, ónyé ọchịchị Britain
Nnà ya bụ ónyé French-Irish Ancestry, nné ya bụ ónyé South African architect na ónyé na-ese ihe n'ime ụlọ
Mccreedy na-echeta ise ihe mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ site na iji brọsh na kọfị nne ya
Ka ógè na-eto eto, ọ ghọrọ ónyé na-ese ejiji, na-arụ ọrụ màkà ụlọ ejiji gụnyere Calvin Klein
Ọ gakwara Hilton College
N'afọ 2006, Mccreedy nwetara agụmakwụkwọ golf iji gaa Barton College na North Carolina
Mccreedy hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ nka na Pratt Institute na New York City iji chụsoo ọrụ nka onwé ya na 2007
N'afọ 2013, SA Style Awards kpọrọ Mccreedy 'Ónyé kachasị mma' na South Africa
A na-ewu ebe ngosi nka nke ga-egosipụta nchịkọta nke ya na-eto eto nke ndị na-ese ihe n'oge a na mgbakwunye na ọrụ nke ya
Mgbè ọ hapụsịrị kọleji, Mccreedy malitere ire ihe osise ya n'okporo ámá Union Square na New York City
Mgbe onye na-ahụ màkà ahịa bụ Mick Rock chọpụtara ọrụ Mccreedy na gallery, ọ gbara ya ume ka ya na Aldon James Jr, ónyé isi oche nke National Arts Club, klọb onwé ónyé kwurịta okwu
Mccreedy mèrè ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya n'onwe ya ebe a, nke akpọrọ Outliers, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe kachasị ọhụrụ nwere ihe ngosi nke onwé ya n'ebe ahụ
Ihe ngosi ahụ nwere foto anụ ọhịa nke o sere na South Africa na ihe osise ndị metụtara safari Africa
N'afọ 2011, Time Warner nyere ya ọrụ ka o see ụdị akara ngosi ya màkà nnọkọ mmalite site na iji agba 'Mccreedyblue' ya
Agba eji mee ihe n'ihe osise ya niile bụ ngwakọta nke ihe ise dị iche iche na-acha anụnụ anụnụ

N'afọ 2012 o mepụtara ihe ngosi 'Oké Osimiri Africa' na Charles Bank Gallery, dị ka akụkụ nke Witness Hilton Arts Festival na Hilton College, na Selected Works, 2006-2012, na Ernie Els' Estate na Stellenbosch N'afọ 2013 ọ bụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi otu na Everard Read Gallery, Johannesburg
Ọrụ nke ọrụ Mccreedy gụnyere murals e sere na ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị na New York City dị ka Soho House Hotel na penthouse nke Bowery Hotel
N'afọ 2014 o nwèrè ihe ngosi onwé ya na Gallery Proarta
Ihe ngosi onwe onye
N'afọ 2015, ọrụ ọhụrụ ya guzobere ihe ngosi Mccreedyblue, nke emere na Hong Kong, China na Cat Street Gallery
O mekwara ihe ngosi onwé ya na Zurich na Palm Beach
John Cole-Morgan nke South Africa kwuru màkà ihe ngosi ya na Hong Kong na ọrụ Mccreedy bụ 'ike, ike na n'ezie hypnotic'
Amber Genuske kọwara ihe osise ya na Huffington Post dị ka ihe na-egosi 'mmegharị na-agagharị agagharị' na 'ihe okike na-egosipụta onwé ya'
O kwuru n'ọtụtụ ajụjụ ọnụ na Pablo Picasso bụ otu n'ime mmetụta kachasị ukwuu ya
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị o dere sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ónyé bụbu ónyé isi ala South Africa bụ Nelson Mandela na njedebe nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2013, e zuru ihe osise Mccreedy n'ụlọ ngosi ihe nkiri dị na New York City
Otu n'ime ihe ndị e zuru bụ onyinyo nke Nelson Mandela
E meghere ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya n'Eshia n'afọ 2015
A na-ere ihe osise ya rụọ dollar otu narị puku na iri ise
'Mcreedyblue' nke Mccreedy bụ ngwakọta nke ihe ise na-acha anụnụ anụnụ
Mccreedy na-akwado ọtụtụ ọrụ ebere
N'oge Art Basel, Switzerland na 2017, o nyèrè obere ụlọ omebe iwu ya, ihe osise London ya na UNAIDS, ntọala United Nations
A na-ere ihe osise ahụ n'oge oriri oriri abalị na Basel
Mccreedy bụ onye guzobere Protecting African Lions, NPO e guzobere iji chebe ọnụ ọgụgụ ọdụm ọhịa na-ebelata
Ego sitere na ire obere 'Splash Painting' ya na nso nso a gara n'ihe kpatara ọrịa ụbụrụ, akụkụ nke Gracious Hearts Foundation
A kpọrọ ihe osise ahụ 'Feelings' A na-ere ya na Christie's na London ma Simon de Pury na-ere yango
O nyèrè obere 'Angel Painting' na Ellerman House, Art Angels Foundation
Ntọala ahụ dị na mbà ya
South Africa
Ọ bụ oriri ọrụ ebere kwa afọ iji baara Click Foundation uru
Mccreedy esorowo Bulgari na Rolex rụkọọ ọrụ
O meela ihe osise a na-akpọ 'My Blue Heaven'

Constance Bapela (nwụrụ n'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2018) bụ onye bụbu ọkà okwu maka obodo Johannesburg nke ndi South Africa, na nwunye onye osote minista na-ahụ maka ọchịchị na ọdịnala Obed Bapela
Bapela nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi, ụbọchị atọ mgbe a wasịrị ya, na 16 Febụwarị na afọ 2018
Constance Cummings-John (1918 na 21 Febụwarị puku abụọ) bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Sierra Leone
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ n'Africa sonyeere kansụl obodo ma na 1966 ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ jere ozi dị ka onye isi obodo Freetown
Ọ nọ na London, England, maka akụkụ ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya

GA mụrụ ya Constance Agatha Horton n'ime ezinụlọ Creole nwere mmetụta, ndị isi ojii si Amerịka kwaga West Africa na narị afọ nke iri na asatọ bụ ndị site na narị afọ iri abụọ ghọrọ ndị nwere ọgụgụ isi, ndị ọchụnta ego, na ndị ọrụ
Nna ya, John William Horton (1861 Xi-1916), bụ onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba obodo Freetown, ebe nne ya, Regina Horton, nke a mụrụ Awoonor-Wilson, bụ onye na'egwuregwu piano
Constance n'onwe ya gara London na 1935, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, iji zụọ dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, ọ sonyeere West African Students' Union na League of Coloured Peoples
Mgbe ọ nwetara asambodo nkuzi ya, ọ gara n'ihu na United States na Mahadum Cornell
Mgbe ọ laghachiri London, ọ sonyeere International African Service Bureau, n'okpuru nduzi nke George Padmore, wee lụọ Ethnan Cummings-John, onye ọka iwu siri ike
N'afọ 1937, ọ laghachiri Freetown dị ka onye isi nke African Methodist Episcopal Girls' Industrial School, mana ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya kpatara nnukwu nsogbu ya na British Colonial Office
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ na-egwupụta ihe, nke mesịrị bụrụ isi iyi ego dị mkpa maka ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya
N'agbata afọ 1946 na afọ 1951, ọ biri na New York City, ebe nwanne ya nwoke Asadata Dafora Horton bụ onye na-eti egwu na onye na-agba egwu
Mgbe ọ bi na US, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ma rụọ ọrụ na ndị isi nke American Council for African Education na Council on African Affairs, nke abụọ n'ime ha bụ nke Paul Robeson duziri
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Freetown na 1951, Cummings sonyeere ndị Sierra Leone People's Party
O nyere aka guzobe Sierra Leone Women's Movement na 1951

O guzobekwara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ maka ụmụ nwanyị, ụlọ akwụkwọ Eleanor Roosevelt, nke site na 1953 nwere ihe karịrị ụmụ akwụkwọ narị isii N'ime afọ ndị a Cummings-John nwetara ikikere na London College of Preceptors, na 1952 Gọvanọ Sierra Leone, Sir George Beresford-Stooke, họpụtara ya na Freetown Council
Na ntuli aka nke afọ 1957 ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị abụọ a họpụtara na House of Representatives ọhụrụ, ọ bụ ezie na ụmụ nwanyị enwebeghị ikike
Ndị mmegide nke Krio duziri mechara nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịchọ ka ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ahụ gbaa arụkwaghịm, mana n'afọ sochirinụ, a họpụtara Cummings-John na Kansụl Obodo Freetown
N'afọ 1961, mgbe Sierra Leone nweere onwe ya, di Cummings-John ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya mba ọhụrụ ahụ na Liberia
N'afọ 1966, Praịm Minista Albert Margai họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi obodo Freetown, na-anọchi Siaka Stevens, mana ọ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ naanị ọnwa ole na ole
Òtù ya meriri na ntuli aka nke 1966, mgbe ahụ, e nwere ọganihu ndị agha megide gọọmentị ọhụrụ ahụ
A na-ebo Cummings-John ebubo nrụrụ aka ego mgbe ọ nọ n'èzí mba ahụ ma dọọ ya ọdụ ka ọ ghara ịlaghachi
Ọ gara biri ọzọ na London, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye otu Labour Party na Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament nakwa gọvanọ ụlọ akwụkwọ
Cummings-John bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na United Kingdom na United States nakwa na Sierra Leone, ya na I
Wallace-Johnson bụ naanị ndị Krio na-alụ ọgụ maka itinye aka nke ụmụ amaala 'Ndị nchebe' na usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke West Africa
Omume ya mekwara ka e guzobe Sierra Leone Market Women's Union na Washerwoman's Union
N'agbanyeghị mgbalị na-enweghị isi ịlaghachi Sierra Leone na 1974 na 1996, Cummings-John biri ndụ ya fọdụrụ na London
N'afọ 1995, o bipụtara akụkọ ndụ onwe onye
Ọ nwụrụ na London na 21 Febụwarị 2000 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na abụọ
Constance Mantey (amụrụ n'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1976) bụ onye Ghana bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa nke na-agba dịka onye na-edebe goolu
Mantey agbaala bọọlụ klọb maka Asante Kotoko na Goldfields Obuasi
Ọ gbakwara Ghana bọọlụ mba ụwa, nweta okpu abụọ n'afọ 2000, ọ bụkwa onye otu egwuregwu na African Cup of Nations n'afọ 1998 na 2000
Constance Seoposengwe bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Onye otu African National Congress, ọ bụ onye otu National Assembly of South Africa ugbu a
Seoposengwe bụ onye otu United Democratic Front na onye nhazi maka South African Domestic Workers Union
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi
Mgbe ọ dị ime mgbe ọ dị afọ 22 na 1987, a tara Seoposengwe ahụhụ ma jide ya na okpukpu nke isii nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii Transvaal na Kimberley
Mgbe ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Northern Cape Provincial Legislature na 1994, na-anọchite anya African National Congress
N'afọ 1999, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke ndị omeiwu
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Executive Council (MEC) maka nchekwa na nchekwa n'afọ 2000
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ kpughere otú ndị uwe ojii ọcha na-aṅụbiga mmanya ókè si emegbu ya n'ọnụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii Hartswater
A họpụtara Seoposengwe ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke ndị omeiwu mgbe ntuli aka 2004 gasịrị, ọkwá ọ nọrọ ruo 2009
Seoposengwe emeela mkpọsa maka ịgbanwe aha ebe na Kimberley
Ọ mere mkpọsa maka ịgbanwe aha ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii Transvaal na 2011, ma kemgbe ahụ, a gbanwere ya ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị Uwe Ojii Kimberley
N'afọ 2013, a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ maka ụlọ ọrụ SABC
Seoposengwe pụtara na ndepụta ANC nke ndị na-azọ ọkwa ndị omeiwu mba na 2019
A họpụtaghị ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na ntuli aka ahụ, Otú ọ dị, n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ banyere na National Assembly dị ka onye nọchiri Sibongile Besani
Seoposengwe bụ onye otu Standing Committee on Auditor General na onye ọzọ so na Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa

Constance Stuart Larrabee (ụbọchị asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1914 rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2000) bụ onye England na-ese foto nke a maara nke ọma maka foto ya nke South Africa na foto-akwụkwọ akụkọ ya na Europe n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na-ede akụkọ agha na South Africa
A mụrụ Constance Stuart n'ubochí asaá n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1914, na Cornwall, England, wee kwaga Cape Town, South Africa na nne na nna ya mgbe ọ dị ọnwa atọ
Ọ biri n'ebe a na-egwupụta tin n'ebe ugwu Transvaal, ebe nna ya bụ injinia na-egwe ihe
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara Pretoria n'afọ 1920, ebe ọ nọrọ ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ọ bụ nwata
Mmasị Stuart nwere na foto bịdọrọ n'afọ 1924 ógè e nyere ya Kodak Box Brownie banyere ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya nke iri
N'afọ 1930, o gosipụtara foto asatọ e ji igwefoto mbụ ya mee n'oge Boys and Girls Achievement Week na Pretoria Agricultural Society Show, wee merie n'ọnọdụ mbụ na Photography
Stuart laghachiri England n'afọ 1933 iji mụọ na Regent Street Polytechnic School of Photography, London
N'oge ọ nọ n'ebe ahụ, ọ bụ onye mmụta na ụlọ ọrụ abụọ na-ese foto n'okpuru Yevonde Middleton, onye na-ese ihe na Berkley Square, na Yvonne, onye na'ese foto na Soho
Stuart kwagara Munich n'afọ 1935 iji gaa n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya na Bavarian State Institute for Photography
Ọ bụ n'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Munich ka a mara ya igwefoto Rolleiflex, nke o ji mee ihe n'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ
Ọ tụfuru ụdị ihe osise ịhụnanya ya iji kwado ụzọ kwụ ọtọ, nke a na-ejighị n'aka màkà ihe banyere foto ojii na nke ọcha
Ógè ọ laghachiri South Africa n'afọ 1936 o guzobere Constance Stuart Portrait Studio na Pretoria
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na-ese foto, ma na-ese ọtụtụ ndị isi ọchịchị, ndị ọchịagha, ndị na-ese ihe, ndị edemede, ọha na eze na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri n'oge ahụ
N'afọ 1946, ọ meghere ụlọ ọrụ nke abụọ na Johannesburg
N'agbata afọ 1937 na kwà afọ 1949, Stuart zụlitere mmasị ndụ ya niile na idekọ na igosi ọdịbendị agbụrụ na-apụ n'anya nke South Africa Ndebele, Bushmen, Lobedu, Zulu, Swazi, Sotho na ndị Transkei
Ụfọdụ n'ime ha ọ kpọọrọ n'oge nleta nke ndị eze Britain na South Africa n'afọ 1947
Stuart bụ onye na-ese foto nke njem eze, na ógè ọ na-eme njem na Basutoland (Lesotho), Swaziland na Bechuanaland (Botswana), nke bụ n'oge ahụ ndị Britain atọ na-echebe na South Africa
Ọ na-ese foto ndị agbụrụ yi uwe n'ihe banyere oge ahụ na ejiji obodo ha
O gosipụtara foto ndị a, na ọtụtụ ndị dị ka ha na Preotria, Johannesburg na Cape Town, nke dugara na nhọpụta ya dị ka nwanyị mbụ na-ede akụkọ agha na South Africa maka magazin Libertas
N'agbata afọ 1945 na afọ 1955 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Egypt, Italy, France na England, na American Army nké asaa na South African Division nké isii na Italian Apennines
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ naanị na e goro ya ka ọ see foto ndị agha South Africa nọ n'usuu ndị agha, Stuart gafere ọrụ ya
O sere foto ndị agha America, French, British na Canada yana ndị obodo ya South Africa
Ọ na-ese foto ndị nkịtị ndị agha zutere n'ụzọ na-aga Germany, ọ na-ese obodo nta, obodo nta na obodo ukwu ndị e bibiri ebibi n'ụzọ ha
Dị ka nwanyị na-ede akụkọ agha, a na-ejikarị Stuart eme ihe n'ihu ruo ọtụtụ ụbọchị, ebe ọ bụ na a na-akwụ ya ụgwọ iche na ndị ọrụ ibe ya nwoke, ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọ nwere na-enwekarị ahụ erughị ala
O weere ihe isi ike niile n'ụzọ dị mfe, na-anabata ha dị ka akụkụ nke agha, ma nweta nkwanye ùgwù nke ndị gbara ya gburugburu ngwa ngwa
Otu onye ọrụ ibe ya dere, sị 'Constance Stuart
emeela ezigbo nkà nke ịgagharị n'ihu
Ọ hụla ọtụtụ agha karịa nwanyị ọ bụla ọzọ m zutere' [citation needed]
Ọ bụ ezie na e kweghị ka o debe akwụkwọ akụkọ n'ihu ya, ọ chịkọtara ihe odide foto ya na akwụkwọ ozi ya n'ime akwụkwọ ncheta aha ya bụ Jeep Trek, nke e bipụtara n'afọ 1946
Ógè ọ laghachiri South Africa n'afọ 1945 ọ gara mba ahụ niile na-egosi ọtụtụ n'ime foto ndị a, yana ihe ngosi ya nke ndị agbụrụ South Africa
N'afọ 1948, National Party bịara n'ọchịchị na South Africa ma guzobe iwu nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ siri ike
N'afọ sochirinụ, Stuart hapụrụ South Africa gaa America
Mgbe Stuart bi na New York, ọ bídóghachiri ịmara enyi ochie ya, Sterling Larrabee, onye ọ zutere n'oge agha ógè ọ bụ onye agha US na South Africa
Ya na Larrabee lụrụ n'afọ 1949 wee kwaga Chestertown, Maryland, ebe ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ya n'ịzụlite ndị Norwich terriers na-enweta ihe nrite
Di na nwunye ahụ nọrọ oge na Tangier Island, nke ndị mmadụ na ebe Larrabee malitere ise foto n'afọ 1951
Mgbe ọ bi na Chestertown, o guzobere mmekọrịta ogologo oge na Washington College
Ọ kwadoro mmemme nka ya, ọ bụ Onye isi oche nke Washington College Friends of the Arts nké afọ 1983 rụọ afọ 1984 ma nyere aka guzobe Constance Stuart Larrabee Arts Center
Di ya nwụrụ n'afọ 1975
Constance Stuart Larrabee nwụrụ n'ubochí irí abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2000 n'ụlọ ya na Chestertown, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na ise
Constantin Xenakis (28 Disemba 1931 - 6 June 2020) bụ onye Gris na-ese ihe nke bi na France
Ọrụ ya na-agụnyekarị edemede ederede, ọkachasị mkpụrụedemede Hibru

akara na koodu nke ndụ kwa ụbọchị, akara okporo ụzọ, alchemy, zodiac, akara mgbakọ na mwepụ na nke kemịkal, ihe odide ndị Ijipt, mkpụrụedemede sitere na mkpụrụedemede Grik, Phoenician na mkpụrụ edemede Arabic
A mụrụ Xenakis na Cairo, Egypt, na 28 Disemba 1931
Ọ bi na Paris kemgbe 1955
N'afọ 1976, ya na onye na-ede egwu bụ Jean-Yves Bosseur rụkọtara ọrụ n'ọrụ Ornigrammes
E mere ya Chevalier de l'Ordre des Arts et des Lettres n'afọ 1986
N'afọ 1996, Institut de France nyere ya Prix Delmas, na aro nke French Academy of Fine Arts
E meghere Ụlọ Constantin Xenakis na etiti obodo Fameck na 1991
N'afọ 1998, e nyere ya 'Award of Appreciation' na 24th Olympiad site na National Museum of Contemporary Art, Korea
A na-arụ ọrụ ya na National Gallery nke Gris na Macedonian Museum of Contemporary Art
Ọ nwụrụ na 6 June 2020, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na asatọ
Constantin Freiherr von Economo (Grik ; 21 Ọgọst 1876 - 21 Ọktoba 1931) bụ onye Austria na-ahụ maka ọrịa uche na akwara
A maara ya nke ọma maka nchọpụta ya nke encephalitis lethargica na atlas ya nke cytoarchitectonics nke ụbụrụ ụbụrụ
A mụrụ Constantin Economo von San Serff na Brăila, Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman, na Johannes na Helene Economo, ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya nwere nnukwu ala na Thessaly na Macedonia

Ezinụlọ Economo (Οικονόμου, Oikonomou) sitere na Edessa, na Ottoman Sanjak nke Salonica (Edessa nke oge a, Central Macedonia, Gris) ebe ụfọdụ n'ime ndị nna nna Constantin bụ ndị a ma ama, ezinụlọ ya gụnyere ọtụtụ ndị bishọp
N'afọ 1877, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Trieste, Austria-Hungary, Constantin wee nọrọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na ntorobịa ya na Trieste
Ọ bụ ezigbo nwa akwụkwọ, na-asụ ọtụtụ asụsụ nke ọma
N'afọ 1906, e mere ezinụlọ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama ma Economo nwetara aha 'Freiherr' (Baron)
Na arịrịọ nke nna ya, Economo malitere ọmụmụ ya nke injinia igwe na Mahadum Polytechnic nke Vienna na 1893 mana ọ gbanwere ọgwụ mgbe afọ abụọ gasịrị
E bipụtara ọrụ sayensị mbụ ya, 'Zur Entwicklung der Vogelhypophyse' ('On the Development of the Pituitary Gland in Birds') n'afọ 1899
Economo rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka Sigmund Exner site na 1900 ruo 1903
Ọ natara akara ugo mmụta ọgwụ na 1901
Ọ lụrụ Eleonora (Lola) Glaser, nwa nwanyị nke onye Slovene na-amụ asụsụ na onye na-ede akwụkwọ Karol Glaser, ma mesịa bụrụ nwanyị na-echere Queen Maria nke Yugoslavia
Ha abụọ gbara alụkwaghịm tupu 1924
Site na 1903 ruo 1904, ọ bụ onye bi na Clinic of Internal Medicine n'okpuru Carl Wilhelm Hermann Nothnagel
N'ikpeazụ, ọ gara Europe ruo afọ abụọ ma rụọ ọrụ maka ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị
Ọ gụrụ neurology, histology, na psychiatry na Paris (n'okpuru Alexis Joffroy, Valentin Magnan na Pierre Marie)
Na Nancy, a mara ya maka hypnosis (n'okpuru Hippolyte Bernheim); na Strasbourg, ọ matara usoro nyocha microscopic nke usoro akwara (n'etiti Albrecht von Bethe)
Na Munich, von Economo so Emil Kraepelin na Alois Alzheimer rụọ ọrụ ma dee edemede ya 'Contribution to the normal anatomy of the ganglion cell'
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na psychiatry nke Berlin n'okpuru Theodor Ziehen na na neurologic ambulatory n'okpuru Hermann Oppenheim ma, n'ikpeazụ, mee nyocha anụmanụ na Trieste (n'okpuru Carl Isidor Cori)
Mgbe afọ abụọ a gasịrị, ọ laghachiri Vienna ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka na Clinic for Psychiatry and Nervous Diseases (nke Julius Wagner-Jauregg duziri) na Vienna's General Hospital
Von Economo nwetara ikike ya na 1913
Na 1919 mgbe ọ dị afọ 43, ọ lụrụ Princess Karoline von Schönburg-Hartenstein
N'afọ 1921, a họpụtara von Economo ka ọ bụrụ Prọfesọ nke Psychiatry na Neurology
Ọ ga-eme nnyocha ya na Clinic for Psychiatry and Nervous Diseases na Vienna maka ndụ ya fọdụrụnụ, mana n'afọ 1931, e mere ya onye isi nke ngalaba nyocha ụbụrụ ọhụrụ
Ọ nwụrụ ọnwa ise ka e mesịrị
Von Economo abụghị naanị onye ọkà mmụta sayensị a ma ama kamakwa ọ bụ onye na-anya ụgbọelu na-anụ ọkụ n'obi

N'afọ 1907, ọ zụlitere mmasị na ụgbọelu bu the first sudtstin having an international pilots diploma in 1912from1910 until 1926 he was the president of the Austrian aero club and chairman of the aviation board at the Austrian ministry of commerce and transport
During world war he served first in the automobile corps at the Russian front and In 1916 as a pilot at the front in South Tyrol
In the same year at the request of his parents he returned to Vienna to care as a military physician for patient with head injuries
Here he saw his first cases of encephalitis ethargica
N'afọ 1931, von Economo nwụrụ na Vienna, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ise na ise, n'ihi nkụchi obi
E ji stampụ Austria sọpụrụ ya n'afọ 1976
Kemgbe 1966, enwere ike ịchọta bust na-egosi ya na 'Arkadenhof' nke Mahadum Vienna
Economo bipụtara ihe dị ka isiokwu na akwụkwọ 150

N'ọmụmụ ihe mbụ ya, o lekwasịrị anya na neuroanatomy na physiology nke midbrain, pons na ụzọ akwara trigeminal ma dee edemede na-ekwu maka ihe atụ na choreic hemiplegia, pontine tumors, ata na deglutition
Encephalitis a na-ebute ọzịza nke ihe na-acha ntụ ntụ mere n'ụdị ọrịa zuru ụwa ọnụ site na 1915 ruo ihe dị ka 1924, karịsịa na Europe na North-America, na-akpata mmerụ ahụ na substantia nigra
Von Economo kọwara n'ụzọ zuru ezu mgbaàmà, ọrịa na histology nke ọrịa ahụ nke a kpọrọ n'oge na-adịghị anya ọrịa Von Economo
Enwere ike ịmata ụdị ọrịa a atọ
Mgbaàmà nke ụdị ụra-ophthalmoplegic bụ ụra, na-edugakarị na coma na ọnwụ, nkwarụ nke akwara isi, akụkụ na uru anya na ihu na-enweghị ngosipụta

Ụdị hyperkinetic gosipụtara onwe ya na enweghị obi ụtọ, nsogbu mmegharị ahụ dị ka ịnyagharị nke ìgwè uru ahụ, mmegharị na-enweghị isi, ọnọdụ uche na-echegbu onwe ya na ehighị ụra ma ọ bụ ntụgharị nke usoro ụra
Ụdị amyostatic-akinetic na-edugakarị ọnọdụ na-adịghị ala ala yiri ọrịa Parkinson, nke a na-akpọ postencephalitic parkinsonism
Mgbaàmà ndị ahụ bụ adịghị ike nke uru ahụ, nkwụsi ike nke mmegharị na ehighị ụra ma ọ bụ ntụgharị ụra

Von Economo bipụtara nchọpụta ya n'otu edemede nke 1917, 'Die Encephalitis lethargica, na n'akwụkwọ 'Die Encepthalitis letargica, ihre Nachkrankheiten und ihre Behandlung' na 1929 (Encephalitis Lethargica - Ihe ndị na-eso ya na ọgwụgwọ ya)
Ọnọdụ ahụ emeghị kemgbe 1940
Ọrịa a kpaliri Von Economo ịchọ ebe ụra dị n'ime ụbụrụ

Mgbe mgbalị mbụ nke ịkewa cortex mmadụ n'ime mpaghara dị ka cytoarchitecture si dị site na Theodor Meynert, Vladimir Betz, Alfred Walter Campbell, Grafton Elliot Smith na Korbinian Brodmann, von Economo malitere ọrụ nke ya na 1912 ma sonyeere ya na 1919
N'afọ 1925, e bipụtara nnukwu ọrụ ha 'Die Cytoarchitektonik der Hirnrinde des erwachsenen Menschen' ('Cytoarchitectonics of the Adult Human Cerebral Cortex')
E gosipụtara ọrụ a na mpịakọta abụọ, akwụkwọ nkuzi nke ihe karịrị peeji 800 na atlas nwere nnukwu efere microphotographic 112 nke cortex
Akwụkwọ nkuzi ahụ nwere nkọwa zuru ezu nke ọmụmụ ha na mmeghe maka akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nyocha cytoarchitectonic
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, e bipụtara nsụgharị dị mkpirikpi, 'Zellaufbau der Großhirnrinde' ('The Cellular Architecture of the Cerebral Cortex') ma sụgharịa ya n'asụsụ French, Italian na Bekee

Site na atlas ha, von Economo na Koskinas nwere olileanya ịmepụta ihe ndabere maka nyocha ụbụrụ n'ọdịnihu na ebe ọrụ ụbụrụ dị ebe ọ bụ na ha chere na ọdịiche cytoarchitectonic na-egosipụta ọdịiche dị iche iche
E bipụtara atlas ahụ ọzọ n'afọ 2008
Von Economo na Koskinas kewara cortex n'ime lobes asaa (Lobi) na nkewa ndị ọzọ (Regiones na Areae)
Okwu ahụ bụ 'von Economo neurons' ma ọ bụ spindle neurons e nyere nnukwu mkpụrụ ndụ akwara bipolar nke von Economo chọpụtara na Layer V nke anterior cingulate na fronto-insular cortex
For von ecnomo
Iwu nke Mandatory Palestine, nke a maara dị ka 10 August 1922 Palestine Order-in-Council, bụ iwu iwu nke Palestine Mandatorial
E bipụtara ya na mbụ na 1 Septemba 1922 na mbipụta pụrụ iche nke Palestine Gazette

Ụkpụrụ iwu ahụ, nke e bipụtara ihe dị ka izu abụọ ka Njikọ Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu kwadoro ikike maka Palestine, jiri ọchịchị obodo dochie ndị agha Britain na-arụ na Palestine, bụ nke na-arụ ọrụ kemgbe njedebe nke Agha Ụwa Mbụ, na ọchịchị obodo
Usoro iwu ahụ gụnyere usoro ndị a

N'ọnwa ole na ole tupu ndị Britain apụ na Palestine, Iwu nke 1922 na Council gbakwunyere na Iwu Palestine na Kansụl, 1948, nke nyere Kọmishọna Ukwu ikike 'site na iwu mee ndokwa dị otú ahụ dị ka o si yie ya naanị n'uche ya ka ọ dị mma maka Gọọmentị Palestine ruo mgbe Eze ya apụọ na Gọmentụ Palestine ma ọ bụ na-atụle maọ bụ ịkwadebe maka mwepụ ahụ', nke dị n' nro naanị na nlekọta nke okpueze Britain
E debere iwu a na Council n'ihu Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu na Jenụwarị 27, 1948 wee malite na Machị 1, 1948
N'Izrel, e ji Iwu na Nchịkwa nke 1948 dochie anya ọtụtụ n'ime ndokwa ya, mgbe ahụ site na Iwu Mgbanwe nke 1949, ma mesịa site n'Iwu Ndị Isi nke Israel
Taa, akụkụ nke iwu ahụ ka na-arụ ọrụ na Israel na mpaghara Palestine

Onye na-azụ ahịa bụ mmadụ ma ọ bụ otu ndị na-ezube inye iwu, inye iwu, ma ọ bụ jiri ngwongwo, ngwaahịa, ma ọ bụ ọrụ zụrụ azụ karịsịa maka mkpa onwe onye, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ezinụlọ, ezinụlọ na mkpa ndị yiri ya, na-enweghị njikọ kpọmkwem na azụmahịa ma ọ bụ azụmahịa
'Ndị ahịa, site na nkọwa, gụnyere anyị niile,' Onye isi ala John F
Kennedy nyere nkọwa ya na United States Congress na Machị 15, 1962
Okwu a ghọrọ ntọala maka ịmepụta Ụbọchị Ikike Ndị Ahịa Ụwa, nke a na-eme ugbu a na Machị 15
N'okwu ya John Fitzgerald Kennedy kọwara ọrụ dị mkpa nye ndị na-azụ ahịa site na gọọmentị ha iji nyere aka mee ihe ikike ndị ahịa, gụnyere
Na akụ na ụba, onye na-azụ ahịa na-azụta ngwaahịa ma ọ bụ ọrụ karịsịa maka oriri ma ọ bụghị maka ire ere ma ọ bụ maka ebumnuche azụmahịa
Ndị na-azụ ahịa na-akwụ ego ụfọdụ (ma ọ bụ ihe yiri ya) maka ihe - ngwaahịa ma ọ bụ ọrụ - nke ha (ma ọ bụ ezinụlọ ha) na-eri (iji)
Dị ka ndị dị otú ahụ, ndị na-azụ ahịa na-arụ ọrụ dị mkpa na usoro akụ na ụba nke usoro akụ na ụba ma bụrụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke akụ na ụba ọ bụla
Enweghị mkpa ndị ahịa, ndị na-emepụta ihe agaghị enwe otu n'ime isi mkpali iji mepụta ire ndị ahịa
Onye na-azụ ahịa na-emekwa otu njedebe nke usoro nkesa

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya [mgbe?] na ahịa, kama ndị na-ere ahịa na-emepụta profaịlụ ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ sara mbara na profaịlụ Fisio-graphic nke akụkụ ahịa, ndị na-ere ahịa amalitela itinye aka na ahịa onwe onye, ahịa ikike, na nhazi ọtụtụ mmadụ iji lekwasị ndị ahịa anya

N'ụzọ dị ukwuu n'ihi ịrị elu nke Intanet, ndị na-azụ ahịa na-agbanwewanye [quantify] n'ịghọ prosumers, ndị na-azụ ahịa bụkwa ndị na-emepụta ihe (mgbe mgbe nke ozi na mgbasa ozi na weebụ mmekọrịta) - ha na-emetụta ngwaahịa ndị e kere (dịka site na nhazi, nchịkọta ego ma ọ bụ ibipụta mmasị ha), na-ekere òkè na usoro mmepụta, ma ọ bụ jiri ngwaahịa mmekọrịta
Iwu ahụ na-eji echiche nke onye na-azụ ahịa n'ihe gbasara iwu nchedo ndị ahịa, na nkọwa nke ndị na-azụ ahịa na-abụkarị ndị dị ndụ (ọ bụghị ụlọ ọrụ ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ) ma wepụ ndị ọrụ azụmahịa
Otu echiche iwu kwadoro maka ichebe onye na-azụ ahịa na-adabere n'echiche nke ọdịda ahịa ndị uwe ojii na arụpụtaghị ihe, dị ka enweghị nhata nke ike nkwekọrịta n'etiti onye na-azụ ahịa na azụmahịa
Dị ka ndị niile nwere ike ịtụ vootu bụkwa ndị na-azụ ahịa, nchedo ndị ahịa nwere ihe doro anya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Nchegbu banyere ọdịmma nke ndị na-azụ ahịa emeela ka ndị na-azụ ahịa na-eme ihe ike, ebe ndị na-eme nnyocha, agụmakwụkwọ na nkwado iji meziwanye onyinye nke ngwaahịa na ọrụ
E tinyela agụmakwụkwọ ndị ahịa n'ime ụfọdụ usoro ọmụmụ ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'India, Iwu Nchedo Ndị Ahịa nke 1986 na-eme ka oriri nke ngwaahịa ma ọ bụ ọrụ dị iche maka ojiji onwe onye ma ọ bụ iji nweta ndụ
Naanị ndị na-azụ ahịa na-echebe site na omume a na onye ọ bụla, ụlọ ọrụ ma ọ bụ nzukọ na-azụta ngwaahịa maka ihe azụmahịa na-ahapụ uru ọ bụla nke omume a
Cont Mdladla Mhlanga bụ onye Zimbabwe na-ede egwuregwu (1957/1958 - 3 Ọnwa asatọ 2022), onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere ma bụrụ onye isi nke ụlọ ọrụ Amakhosi Theatre Productions, nke e guzobere n'afọ 1982
Ọ bụ onye na-akatọ ọchịchị Robert Mugabe, a na-ejide ya ugboro ugboro maka nkwupụta echiche ya n'ihu ọha

Conya Doss (amụrụ n'ọnwa Juun n'ubochí iri nà atọ, n'afọ 1972) bụ onye America na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, na onye na-eti ọtụtụ ngwa egwu, ọ bụkwa onye isi na egwu onwe ya ihe karịrị otu afọ iri
A maara Conya dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe ọhụrụ ma mara ya nke ọma n'ihi ọrụ eclectic ya na ụda olu ya
A maara ya dị ka Queen of Indie Soul Egwú ya jikọtara R&B, mkpụrụ obi, funk, neo soul, na jazz
E wepụtara abọm izizi ya A Poem About Ms
Doss n'afọ 2002
N'ime ọtụtụ afọ, ọ ga-ewepụta abọm abụọ ọzọ Just Because (afọ 2004) na Love Rain Down (afọ 2006)
E wepụtara abọm ọganihu ya bụ Still
n'afọ 2008, nke gosipụtara egwu 'What I'd Do'
N'afọ 2010, Doss wepụtara abọm nke ise ya Blu Transition wee soro A Pocketful of Purpose n'afọ 2012
Conya wepụtara abọm nke asaa ya bụ Seven VII n'afọ 2015
A mụrụ Conya na Cleveland, Ohio, nke Ronald Pruitt na Carolyn Pruitt
Ọ malitere inwe mmasị na egwu ógè ọ dị ntakịrị
Mgbe ya na ndị otu ya 'Lyrik' dekọchara egwu, ọ gbasoro ọrụ naanị ya
Doss anọwo na-abụ abụ kemgbe ọ dị afọ ise
O tolitere na-ege ndị dị ka Bonnie Raitt, The Doobie Brothers, Stevie Wonder, Prince, Angela Winbush, Nina Simone, na Jane Child
Ọ gara Cleveland School of the Arts ya na Avant na 71 North ma soro enyi nwata, Stacy Richardson-Crawford (onye bụbu onye na-abụ abụ azụ n'ihe banyere Gerald Levert na Anthony Hamilton na duo Lyrik
Ka ọ tolitere, Conya dere maka otu 3LW (ndị na-abụ abụ nke egwu a na-akpọ, 'Ọ dịghị ọzọ
Baby, I'ma Do Right'), ma soro Gerald Levert na PAJAM rụọ ọrụ tupu ha abanye n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese egwu
Ógè ọ na-anata nzere bachelọ na kemịkal
O mechara nweta nzere nkuzi ya ma bụrụ onye nkuzi nke ụmụaka nwere mkpa pụrụ iche na usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze nke Cleveland
Ọ malitere iji egwu na klas ya dị ka ụzọ isi jikọọ ụmụ akwụkwọ ya na abọm izizi ya A Poem About Ms
Doss sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ site na akwụkwọ ozi sitere n'aka otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ ya
N'afọ 2001, Conya Doss malitere akara ndekọ nke ya Conya Doss Songs wee bídó idekọ abọm izizi ya
N'afọ 2002, Doss wepụtara egwu mbụ ya 'Good Good' na 'Coffee' nke sochiri ntọhapụ nke abọm ya, nke akpọrọ A Poem About Ms
Doss
Abọm nkè ahụ mepụtakwara egwu 'Starship' na 'You Really Hurt Me'
Doss mechara malite ime ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ ebe Midwest
Na Febụwarị 2003, Doss rụrụ na Cleveland's Rock and Roll Hall of Fame

Maka abọm izizi ya, ọ natara 3 Stars na USA Today ebe onye nkatọ egwu bụ Steve Jones kwuru 'N'agbanyeghị ihe mmekọrịta nwere ike ime, o yighị ka ha na-eme ka onye ọhụrụ a na-ekwu okwu mmanụ aṅụ si Cleveland daa mbà
Doss na-akpali mmetụta uche na egwu mbụ ya, 'Coffee', ma na-enwe mmasị n'ebe mkpụrụ obi ya / jazz mgbọrọgwụ ya na mkpuchi nke Norman Connors 'Starship
uri ya bụ nke dị nro ma na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ nke bara uru karịa naanị ọgụgụ dị nro
N'afọ 2003, Doss laghachiri na studio iji bídó ịdekọ maka ihe banyere abọm nke abụọ ya
N'afọ 2004, Doss wepụtara egwu 'Missin' You'
Otu egwu a mepụtara ụda maka abọm ya na-abịanụ, Just Because nke ewepụtara n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2004
N'afọ 2005, Doss bidoro idekọ oge n'ihe gbasara abọm nke atọ ya
Mgbe afọ abụọ gasịrị, ọ wepụtara abọm nke atọ ya, Love Rain Down n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2006
Mgbè na-adịghị anya ógè a tọhapụrụ abọm ahụ, Doss malitere ịgagharị ma na-eme ihe nkiri n'ebe ụwa niile
N'afọ 2007, Doss mere egwu 'Tell Me Why' na BET J
Ọnụnọ Doss nwere ntutu isi afro ya
Enwere ike ịhazi Doss dị ka alto na falsetto
Doss gosipụtara ụdị alto ya na egwu dịka 'Something 2Nite', 'It's Over', na 'Starship', ebe n'abụ dịka 'Message', 'Good Good', 'I Miss You' bụ ebe ọ na-egosi ụdị falsetto ya
O hotara Stevie Wonder, Donnie Hathaway, Chaka Khan, Prince, Steely Dan, Natalie Cole, Sade, Jodeci, Rude Boys, Lauryn Hill, na D'Angelo dị ka mkpali egwu ya
N'afọ 2010, Doss mụrụ nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Landon Blu
Ọ kpọrọ abọm nke ise ya aha nwa ya
Conya na-enyekwa ụmụ agbọghọ nọ n'afọ iri na ụma ndụmọdụ, ndị nkuzi, ma bụrụ onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka maka ọrịa kansa ara, HIV / AIDS, na mmata ahụike uche
N'ọnwa Machị ụbọchị asatọ, na House of Blues, na Chicago, ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji baara AIDS Foundation nke Chicago uru
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya n'ihe gbasara mgbasa ozi BET's Rap-It-UP na 2013, sonyeere Brandy Norwood na onye ndu Civil Rights, Julian Bond maka 'Keep The Promise' March & Rally na Ohio, US
Ndị a bụ ihe nrite nke onye na-agụ egwu R&B nke America bụ Conya Doss meriri
