Ụlọ akụ ahụ nwere ntọala nwe sara mbara yana usoro nwe dị iche iche[1
Site na mgbanwe nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, ngalaba ọrụ ego na-apụta lekwasịrị anya na ndị ọgaranya na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ n'ime obodo
Ndị bi n'ime ime obodo, ọkachasị ndị ọrụ ugbo, obere azụmaahịa, na obodo ndị ha na-akwado, ewepụrụ na ọrụ ego
N'ihi ya, e hibere ụlọ akụ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji dozie ọdịda ahịa a na iji merie nsogbu ndị metụtara ozi asymmetric maka ndị na-agbaziri ego
N'ihe gbasara Etiopia, mba ahụ nwere ọrụ ego dị ala dịka ụlọ ọrụ ego ndị a na-ahụkarị na-adabere n'obodo ukwu nwere ezigbo akụrụngwa, na-ahapụ mpaghara ime obodo na-enweghị ọrụ
Dị ka omenala si dị, 'Equbs' na 'Idirs' bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-abụghị nke gọọmentị nke gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ ike na ndụ obodo ma na-egbo mkpa ego nke ndị obodo ime obodo ruo n'ókè ụfọdụ

Enweghị mmasị na ikike dị ala nke ụlọ ọrụ ego dị na mba ahụ iji jeere ndị obodo ime obodo ozi, ọdịiche dị n'ahịa ego karịsịa n'ime ime obodo, tinyere mmata nke ndị ọrụ ugbo ka a hazie ha n'ime ụlọ ọrụ na mkpa na-arịwanye elu maka ịkwụ ụgwọ ụlọ ọrụ na-akpọ maka nguzobe ụlọ akụ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ
Ọzọkwa, ego yiri ka ọ bụ ihe mgbochi dị oke egwu iji kwado ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na n'ikpeazụ ndị ọrụ ugbo
Ọ bụ nsogbu ndị a niile malitere mmalite na nguzobe nke Cooperative Bank of Oromia

Haile Gebre Lube, onye a na-ewere dị ka nna guzobere (onye na-akwado) nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị otu Etiopia, wetara echiche nke ịmepụta ụlọ akụ ahụ n'ihi na o kwenyere na ụzọ kachasị mma iji lụso ịda ogbenye ọgụ bụ site na imekọ ihe ọnụ
N'ịmepụta ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ na 2002, e guzobere ụlọ akụ ahụ na ọtụtụ ndị nwere òkè bụ ndị otu na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ
A na-enye ụlọ akụ ahụ ikike ịzụ ahịa na Ọktoba 2004 wee malite ọrụ na Machị 2005
Ebe ọ bụ na enweghị usoro iwu kwadoro ka e guzobe ụlọ akụ na-emekọ ihe na mba ahụ, e debanyere ụlọ akụ ahụ n'akwụkwọ dịka 304 nke koodu azụmahịa nke Etiopia
Ụlọ akụ ahụ nwere nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na usoro dị iche iche
Ọ na-agụnye ndị otu Cooperatives na ndị na-abụghị ndị otu
Ndị otu na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ gụnyere Primary Cooperatives, Cooperative Unions na Cooperatives Federation ebe, ndị na-abụghị ndị otu na-agụnye Organizations, Associations na ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu
Ụlọ akụ Coopbank nwere ugbu a ngụkọta uru bara uru karịa ijeri ETB 121
Ụlọ akụ ahụ nwere netwọk alaka karịrị Narị isii na iri ndị na-ejide akaụntụ nde iri, yana ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ 11,500
Coordinated Universal Time na bekee, (UTC), bu otu adi-iji amata ihe oge bu n'elu uwa nile
O bu taa ndi mmadu no n'uwa nwe ọtu ha nwere-ike ima oge ma mgbe ha gara ogbozo
Ndi International Atomic Time bu ndi n'eleekotawa machine nke n'emee oge uwa di mma
Ha na guta ihe oge bu mgbe ha n'eleewa ọtu uwa di-igba anyawu buru-buru, ma otu onwa na gba anyi buru-buru
Ikwesiri ma time zone i-no la, gi tinye m'obu mee nwefu oke ikwesiri
Ndi no la New York kwesiri nwefu ise na oge no n'elu
Ndi no na Naigeria kwesiri tinye otu
Ịkọ nne na nna bụ ụlọ ọrụ nke ndị nne na nna na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na mmekọrịta, nlekọta, na ịzụlite ụmụaka ha na-ekere òkè nhata
Mmekọrịta nne na nna dị iche na mmekọrịta chiri anya n'etiti ndị okenye n'ihi na ọ na-elekwasị anya naanị na nwa
Okwu yiri nke ahụ na evolushọn bayoloji bụ nlekọta nne na nna abụọ, ebe nne na nna na eweta ego nne na nna
Ihe izizi nke nne na nna na-emekọ ihe jikọrọ ya na ezinụlọ nuklia

Naagbanyeghi, ebe ọ bụ na Nkwekọrịta Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu Maka ikike ụmụaka, 20 Nọvemba 1989, ụkpụrụ na nwatakịrị ga-anọgide na-enwe mmekọrịta siri ike na nne na nna ya, ọ bụrụgodị na ha ekewapụ, aghọwo ikike a ghọtara
N'ihi ya, echiche nke nne na nna na-emekọ ihe gbakwunyere ndị nne na nna gbara alụkwaghịm na ndị kewara ekewa na ndị nne na nna na-ebikọtabeghị ọnụ
Uru ụmụaka na enweta site na nne na nna, mana ọnụ ọgụgụ nke nne na nna na-adịgasị iche n'etiti di na nwunye

Bryndl Hohmann-Marriott achọpụtala na ọkwa nke mmekorita nne na nna dị elu n'etiti ndị nne na nna na-alụbeghị di na nwunye na n'etiti ndị lụrụ di na nwunye maka afọ ime, ma e jiri ya tụnyere di na nwunye dị ime n'oge alụmdi na nwunye
N'ime òkè ịkpata n'alụmdi na nwunye/ na-ekerịta, a na-ekewa nlekọta ụmụaka n'otu n'otu ma ọ bụ n'otu n'etiti nne na nna abụọ
N'alụmdi na nwunye nne na nna, ndị nne na nna na-ebi ma na-azụ ụmụ ha ọnụ n'alụmdi na nwunye dabeere na ebumnuche n'enweghị mmekọrịta anụ ahụ ma ọ bụ atụmanya ịkekọrịta ịhụnanya ịhụnanya
Nne na nna mgbe ha kewara na-akọwa ọnọdụ ebe nne na nna abụọ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji zụlite nwa mgbe ha gbara alụkwaghịm, kewaa, ma ọ bụ na ha ebighi ọnụ

Ndị na-akwado nne na nna na-emegide omume inye naanị nne ma ọ bụ nna soso ya ikike ilekọta nwa ma na-akwalite nne na nna dị ka nchebe nke ikike ụmụaka ịnọgide na-enweta nlekọta na ịhụnanya site n'aka ndị nne na nna niile
Nnyocha banyere ọrịa na-efe efe egosiwo na nlekọta nkwonkwo na ndokwa ndị ọzọ ebe ụmụaka nwere ohere dị ukwuu na nne na nna ha abụọ na-eduga n'ihe dị mma n'ahụ, uche na ahụike maka ụmụaka
Nhọrọ nne na nna, nke ámá dị ka mmekọrịta nne na nna ma ọ bụ nne na nna, nwere ike iji ya mee ihe dị ka nhọrọ banyere n'aka ndị mmadụ na-achọ ịmụ ụmụ mana ndị na-achọghị ịbanye na mmekọrịta nkịtị
Ihe omume a bụ ihe a na-emekarị maka ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị na-edina nwanyị n'oge gara aga, echiche a aghọwo ihe a na-ahụkarị n'etiti ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị na-edina nwoke na nwanyị

N'okpuru iwu nke mba ha bi, ihe karịrị ndị okenye abụọ nwere ike ịbanye na nkwekọrịta iji lekọta nwatakịrị ọnụ n'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ naanị mmadụ abụọ n'ime ha nwere ike inye ikike iwu kwadoro n'ọtụtụ mba
Netherlands na-atụle [mgbe?] iwu ọhụrụ na-eme ka ọ bụrụ iwu maka ndị nne na nna anọ ka e nye ha ikike
N'otu oge, ezinụlọ nwere nne na nna anọ nke tinyere di na nwunye na-edina nwoke na nwanyị na-elekọta nwa ha dabere na nkwekọrịta iwu

E guzobere ụkpụrụ a nke nne na nna jikoro ọnụ na obodo Italy na mmalite narị afọ nke iri abụọ na otu site n'aka ndị otu nke ndị nne na nna kewara ekewa nke kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ na-alụ ọgụ megide ọdịbendị, echiche mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na usoro iwu na usoro iwu nke na-akpa ókè n'etiti ụmụ nwoke na nwanyị [nkọwa dị mkpa] na esemokwu dị n'etiti ndị mmekọ mbụ, ọkachasị mgbe ụmụaka na-etinye aka

Mkpakọrịta ndị dị otú ahụ na-agbakwa mbọ n'ezie idozi ọtụtụ nsogbu metụtara nkewa na ịgba alụkwaghịm, dị ka ịtọrọ ụmụaka mba ụwa, ọrịa nkewa nke ndị nne na nna [na-arụrịta ụka], na ikike nhata n'etiti nwoke na nwanyị na nkewa ikpe na ịgba alụkwaghịm [nkọwa dị mkpa]

Mmebi iwu nwebiisinka (mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ piracy) bụ ojiji nke ọrụ echekwara site na nwebisiinka na-enweghị ikike maka ojiji ebe achọrọ ikike dị otú ahụ, si otú ahụ na-emebi ụfọdụ ikike pụrụiche enyere onye ji nwebisiinka, dị ka ikike imepụtagharị, kesaa, igosipụta
ma ọ bụ rụọ ọrụ echedoro, ma ọ bụ rụọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe
Onye ji ikike nwebiisinka na-abụkarị onye mepụtara ọrụ ahụ, ma ọ bụ onye mbipụta ma ọ bụ azụmahịa ọzọ ekenyela ikike nwebiisinka
Ndị ji ikike nwebiisinka na-akpọku usoro iwu na teknụzụ iji gbochie na taa ntaramahụhụ nwebiisinka
Iwu nwebiisinka nke United States na-enye nchebe naanị maka 'ọrụ mbụ nke ode akwụkwọ'

Site na ebumnuche ekwuru iji kwalite nka na omenala, iwu nwebiisinka na-ekenye ndị na-ede akwụkwọ ikike dị iche iche ime na ire mbipụta nke ọrụ ha, imepụta ọrụ ewepụtara, na ịrụ ma ọ bụ gosipụta ọrụ ha n'ihu ọha
Ikike ndị a pụrụ iche dị n'okpuru oke oge, yana n'ozuzu ya ga-agwụ afọ 70 ka onye odee nwụsịrị ma ọ bụ afọ 95 ka ebipụchara
Na United States, akwụkwọ ndị e bipụtara tupu Jenụwarị 1, 1927, dị na mbipụta akwụkwọ
Iwu ikike nwebisiinka nke United States na-agbaso usoro ọmụmụ ya laghachi na British Statute of Anne, nke metụtara iwu ikike nwebesiinka nke mbụ nke United States, Iwu Nwebisiinka na 1790
Ogologo ikike nwebisiinka nke ndị nna guzobere bụ afọ iri na anọ, gbakwunyere ikike imezigharị ya otu oge, maka afọ iri na ise ọzọ
Afọ iri anọ ka e mesịrị, a gbanwere okwu mbụ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri abụọ na asatọ

Corneille Akilimali Bufole (August 4, 1992), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Cor Akim, bụ onye Congo na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-eti egwu, a mụrụ ya na Bukavu, isi obodo nke South Kivu Province na ọwụwa anyanwụ Democratic Republic of Congo
Coral Reefs bụ akwụkwọ sayensị a na-enyocha kwa nkeji iri na ise nke a raara nye ọmụmụ nke coral reefs
E guzobere ya n'afọ 1982 ma Springer Science + Business Media bipụtara ya n'aha International Society for Reef Studies, nke ọ bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ gọọmentị
Akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka International Coral Reef Society
Onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ bụ Morgan Pratchett (Mahadum James Cook)

Ha ebipụtala ọtụtụ isiokwu miri emi na-ekpuchi isiokwu coral reef dị ka nchekwa nke azụ coral reif na ụzọ dị iche iche nke na-ejide mgbagwoju anya nke coral refs mgbe ha na-enyocha ihe ndị na-emepụta okpokoro

Dị ka Springer si kwuo, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ nwere mmetụta mmetụta nke afọ 2020 nke 3902, mmetụta mmetụta nke 3880, na ka ọ na-erule afọ 2021 nwere nbudata narị anọ na iri ise na anọ, narị asaa na iri anọ
Mpịakọta iri anọ na otu, mbipụta nke abuo, Eprel 2022 nwere isiokwu 20 na-ekpuchi isiokwu dịgasị iche iche ọtụtụ n'ime ha nwere ike ịnweta na-enweghị akaụntụ mgbe ha ka nwere ọtụtụ ozi zuru ezu
Mbipụta a na-ekpuchi isiokwu gụnyere ọmụmụ nke coral na Oké Osimiri Uhie na ọnụ ụzọ okpomọkụ ya nke enwere ike nyochaa iji tụọ anya nsonaazụ ọjọọ nke mgbanwe ihu igwe
Isiokwu ọzọ n'ime mbipụta a gụnyere nyocha nke coral reefs dị mgbagwoju anya na otu nke a si emetụta kpakpando mmiri corallivorous na Maldives
Okwu a nwere ọtụtụ akụkọ ndị ọzọ niile na-egosi ọkwa omimi na nghọta nke isiokwu ndị a na-atụle
Corbin Bleu Reivers (mù yá na 21 Febrụwarị 1989 na Brooklyn, nor na Nú Yọk ime ọbọdọ Amerikạ) bu onye Amerikạ na bu abu pop-R&B
Coreen Simpson (amụrụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị 18, afọ1942) bụ onye ama ama na-ese foto na onye na-emepụta ọla, onye ọrụ ya nwere isiokwu Afrịkan-Amerịkan
A mụrụ Simpson na Brooklyn ma zụlite ya na nwanne ya nwoke site n'ezinụlọ nkuchi na Brooklyn
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Samuel J
Tilden High School na Brooklyn
Ọ gara ọmụmụ ihe na Fashion Institute of Technology na Parsons School of Design, ma soro Frank Stewart, Studio Museum na Harlem n'afọ 1977
Ọrụ Simpson malitere mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ maka magazin Unique New York n'afọ 1980, ọ malitekwara ise foto iji gosipụta isiokwu ya
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese foto ejiji n'onwe ya maka Village Voice na Amsterdam News na mbido afọ 1980, ma kpuchie ọtụtụ ihe omume ọdịbendị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ndị Afrịka Amerịka n'etiti afọ 1980
A makwaara ya maka ọmụmụ ya banyere ndụ abalị nke Harlem
O wuru ụlọ ọrụ a na-ebugharị ebugharị ma weta ya na klọb dị n'etiti Manhattan, ebe a na-akpụ isi na Harlem, na ụlọ ịkpa ákwà na Queens
E jirila ikike ọrụ ya gosipụtara isiokwu dịgasị iche iche na 'omimi nke àgwà na ùgwù' tụnyere nke Diane Arbus na Weegee
Na mgbakwunye na foto ya, Simpson mepụtara ọla
A maara ihe ndị ọ kacha mara amara dị ka The Black Cameo (1990)
Nchịkọta ahụ weghachiri ọdịnala oge ochie nke cameos, mana ọ na-egosipụta foto nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii
Ihe osise ndị ahụ na-egosi ọtụtụ ihe dị iche iche nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ nke Simpson bụ na nwanyị ojii ọ bụla ga-enwe ike ịmata ihe osise dị n'ime ọla ya
Ndị ahịa nke nchịkọta Black Cameo gụnyere Ruby Dee na Oprah Winfrey
Simpson na Avon Products banyere n'otu njikọ aka n'afọ 1993 wee mepụta Coreen Simpson Regal Beauty Collection, usoro mmefu ego nke atụmatụ nke gụnyere ọnụahịa dị ala nke Afrịkan Amerịkan cameo
Simpson bi na New York City

Ọrụ Simpson anakọtara site na Museum of Modern Art, Bronx Museum of the Arts, Musee de la Photographie na Belgium, Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture, International Center for Photography, Harlem State Office, na James Van Der Zee Institute
Corine Onyango (amụrụ 1984/1985 ) bụ onye omere na onye na-akwuputa ihe redio na Kenya
Onyango amụrụ ya na Kenya, na nna ya rụrụ ọrụ na African Development Bank
O nwere ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ, Janet na Annabel, ma tolite na Kenya, Ivory Coast, Tunisia, England, Zimbabwe na United States
Onyango gara Northwwest University, ebe ọ gụrụ nzikọrịta ozi wee gụchaa na 2007
Mgbe ọ gụchara akwụkwọ, ọ lọghachiri Kenya na ezumike ma kpebie ịnọrọ
Onyango nwetara ọrụ dị ka onye mgbasa ozi redio mgbe nwanne nna ya bụ Nina Ogot kwuputara na enwere oghere na Homeboyz Radio
Ọ ghọrọ onye ọbịa nke 'The Jumpoff', ihe ngosi hip hop
Onyango kọwara ya dị ka nzọụkwụ site nzọụkwụ mmụta mmụta maka ụlọ ọrụ na onwe ya
N'afọ 2008, Onyango mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Wanuri Kahiu 's From a Whisper
Ọ na-egwu Tamani, nwa nwanyị nke onye ọchụnta ego nke matara na e gburu nne ya na-anọghị ogologo oge na bọmbụ 1998 na Nairobi, ma na-anagide ya site n'ịde akwụkwọ n'ime ogige ncheta
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na onye ndu na Africa Movie Academy Awards
N'afọ 2010, Onyango kwuputara ụda mmiri n'usoro ihe onyonyo ụmụaka Tinga Tinga Tales
Onyango nwere nwa-nwoke, King Kwe
Ọ na-asụ Bekee na French
Corinne Mitchell (1914-1993) bụ onye America na-ese ihe na onye nkuzi
Ọ bụ onye Africa America mbụ nwere ihe ngosi onwe ya na National Museum of Women in the Arts
A mụrụ Mitchell née Howard na Machị 10, 1914, na Baskerville, Virginia, nké iri na otu n'ime ụmụ iri na asatọ
Ọ gàrà St Paul's College na-enweta akara ugo mmụta na 1935, Virginia State College na- nwetara BA na 1951, na Mahadum George Washington na-enweta MA na 1965
N'afọ 1938 ọ lụrụ William E
Mitchell
Di na nwunye ahụ nọ na Washington, DC

Mitchell gàrà n'ihu na-akụzi na Montgomery County Schools ruo n'afọ 1982Site n'ọrụ ikike ọbọdọ ya, Mitchell matara ndị na-ese ihe na mpaghara Washington Loïs Mailou Jones, Delilah Pierce, na Alma Thomas
N'afọ 1992, National Museum of Women in the Arts mèrè ihe ngosi Glimpse of Joy, nke bụ ihe ngosi mbụ nke NMWA nke nka nwanyị Africa America
N'afọ 1993, ụlọ akwụkwọ Charles Sumner mèrè ihe ngosi nkè ihe osise ya iri abụọ na itoolu
Ọrụ ya dị na The Johnson Collection, Spartanburg, South Carolina
Mitchell nwụrụ n'April 21, 1993, na Washington, DC
Coritiba Foot Ball Club bu footbol klub onye Curitiba, Brazil
Cortez 'Corky' McCoy bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe osise si Los Angeles
A maara ya màkà ihe osise ya nke ndị Afrịka-Amerịka bi n'ọbọdọ ukwu na mkpuchi album Miles Davis
Ozi gbásárá ndụ McCoy tupu ya ezute Miles Davis dị ụkọ
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe mgbè ọ zutere Davis
Ha abụọ ghọrọ ezigbo ndị enyi, Davis na McCoy nwekọrọ ụlọ na New York City na West 77th Street
McCoy mepụtara ihe osise mkpuchi màkà abọm Davis On the Corner (1972), In Concert Live at Philharmonic Hall (1973), Big Fun (1974), na Water Babies (1976)
E mepụtara ihe osise màkà mkpuchi nke On the Corner na nkwali Davis
Ọ na-echegbu onwé ya na egwu ya eruteghị ndị na-ege ntị Africa-America, ọ chọkwara ka McCoy mepụta ihe ha ga-emetụta
Mmeghachi omume sitere na Columbia Records mgbè ha hụrụ nsonaazụ ahụ abụghị ihe dị mma
Davis siri ọnwụ na iji ihe osise McCoy
Davis chetara n'ụdị ajụjụ ọnụ ya
Davis gbalịrị ịnye ndị na-ese ihe nkírí Europe abụọ dị iche iche ọrụ iji mepụta ihe osise mkpuchi màkà abọm ya Rubberband n'oge afọ 1980
O nweghị afọ ojuju na nsonaazụ ya, a tọhapụrụ abọm ahụ n'ikpeazụ
N'afọ 2007, Columbia wepụtara igbe 6-CD The Complete On the Corner Sessions nke gụnyere ihe osise ọhụrụ nke Corky McCoy
McCoy mepụtara ihe osise mkpuchi màkà abọm Fresh Mode, nkè otu hip-hop Ugly Duckling wepụtara, na 1999, yana egwu abụọ a wepụtara na nkwalite nke LP
McCoy mepụtara ihe osise màkà akwụkwọ 2000 nke ónyé na-eme ihe ọchị Tim Meadows bụ The Ladies Man Sexin' and Lovin' Leon Phelps Style, nke ya na Andrew Steele na Dennis McNicholas dere
E wepụtara akwụkwọ ahụ n'ihe gbasara ihe nkiri Tim Meadows The Ladies Man nke gosipụtara otu ónyé nwere otu ihe mara mma nke 1970s nke jikọtara ya na mkpuchi album McCoy màkà Davis

Cornelia Hilda Kühn (a mụrụ ya 11 Disemba, n'afọ 1944)
Ọ bụ onye odee Afrikaans amara n'okpuru aha pen Corlia Fourie
Ọ meriri ihe nrite ATKV maka akụkọ akụkọ dị mkpirikpi Liefde en geweld na ihe nrite MER maka Die Towersak na akụkọ ndị ọzọ
Na 1995 ọ natara Alba Bouwer Prize
Ọ bụ ada onye edemede Mikro (C H Kühn)

Emebere ihe nkiri ya Moeders en dogters maka telivishọn na redio ma Kruik gosikwara ya
Cornelia O'Dwyer (a muru n'afọ 1984) bu onye nhazi Talk Show, onye edemede, onye isi nrụpụta na onye okike ihe ngosi vidiyo onye bi na Legos,nke Naijiria, ma n'obodo New York
Ọ bụ onye nhazi ihe ngosi mkparịtaụka nke Ndani TV nke a kpọrọ Ndani Real Talk, na onye bụbu onye na-ahazi ihe omume ụtụtụ nke Smooth 981 FM nke a kpọrọ Grapevine 981
Ọ bụkwa onye ọdee akwụkwọ nke Today's Woman Magazine (TW)
Cornelia bụ onye nhazi na onye isi nrụpụta nke Talk Show Chick Chat Live na Fox Life Africa a na-egosi na DSTV, Startimes, na Kwese TV na gburugburu Sahara Afrịka
Ọ bụkwa Onye isi okike nke Carmarcon Media
A mụrụ Cornelia na San Francisco, were zụlite na Naijiria
N’afọ 1998, ọ hapụrụ Naịjirịa gawa Ingland mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ mgbe nne ya nwụrụ n’ihe mgbawa gaas
N'afọ 2005, o nwetara nzere bachelọ nke nka (BA) na ihe nkiri, omenaala na agụm akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi sna Mahadum nke West nke England na Bristol
Mgbe ọ gbara afọ iri abụọ na otu, ọ kwagara obodo New York, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ihe dị ka afọ asaa tupu ọ laghachite Naịjirịa n’afọ 2011
Cornelia bụbu onye enyemaka ndị isi na Morgan Stanley, na nnukwu obodo New York site n'afọ 2005 ruo afọ 2008
Ọ gara AIG, n'obodo New York n'afọ 2008 dị ka onye enyemaka ndị isi na onye nnyocha ọghọm, ebe ọ na-achịkwa akụkụ nke AIG na-ahụ maka ọghọm na inshooransi
Ọ gakwara rụọ na Citi,n'obodo New York dị ka ọkachamara na nchịkwa ego,n'afọ 2011
Cornelia laghachiri Naịjirịa ma sonyere Bestman Games dị ka onye njikwa mmepe azụmaahịa na onye enyemaka onye isi ọrụ (CEO), n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2012
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ a, ọ ghọọrọ onye njikwa kampeenu na TRACE n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2014
Ọrụ Cornelia dị ka onye njikwa mmepe azụmaahịa na onye njikwa kampeenu kwụsịrị n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2015 na Nọvemba afọ 2015 n'otu
N’afọ 2015, ọ ghọọrọ onye nhazi ihe omume nke Ndani TV a kpọrọ 'Real Talk'
N'afọ 2017, ọ malitere Chick Chat Live TV Show na mmekorita ya na DZRPT TV na otu 5ive Music
Cornelia Ramondt-Hirschmann (29 Julaị 1871 20 Nọvemba 1957) bụ onye nkuzi Dutch, onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị, onye na'ahụ maka udo na onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ọkara mbụ nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ndị sonyere na mmegide nke ndị na-ahụ maka udo n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ maka ndị isi ụwa ka ha zụlite ndị ogbugbo iji rụọ ọrụ maka udo
Ihe kachasị elu nke mgbalị ha ga-abụ ihe Njikọ Mba rụzuru mgbe agha ahụ kwụsịrị
N'agbata afọ 1935 ruo n'afọ 1937, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi oche mba atọ nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom (WILPF)
A mụrụ Susanna Theodora Cornelia Hirschmann, nke a maara dị ka 'Cor', n'ụbọchị 29 Julaị 1871 na The Hague, Netherlands na Sophie (née Bahnsen) na Frederik Willem Louis Antonie Hirschmann
Nna ya bụ onye nchịkwa maka Royal Dutch Navy ma nwụọ mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu, n'oge njem site na ndị Dutch na-achịbu na India
Ọ bụ nne ya zụlitere ya na The Hague ma gaa Christian Educational Academy na The Haye
N'afọ 1889, ọ nwetara asambodo nkuzi nke Lower Education (Dutch ) ma n'afọ sochirinụ nweta asambodo maka French
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Hirschmann na nne ya kwagara Nijmegen, ebe ha ji ụgwọ ezumike nká nke nne ya di ya nwụrụ na ego ọ na-enweta site na nkuzi na-akwado onwe ha
O nwetara asambodo ya maka agụmakwụkwọ mmega ahụ na 1893
O yikarịrị ka n'oge ha nọ na Nijmegen, Hirschmann zutere Dirk Ramondt, onye na-arụ ọrụ na post
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ gụsịrị ọzụzụ ya, ya na nne ya kwagara Utrecht ma n'ebe ahụ n'ụbọchị 15 June 1899, ọ lụrụ Ramondt
Di na nwunye ahụ na-eto eto kwagara Breda ma biri ebe ahụ mgbe amụrụ nwa ha nwanyị Sophie

Cornelio Sommaruga (Amụrụ n'ọnwa Disemba 29, 1932 na Rome) bụ onye Switzerland na-ahụ maka ọdịmma mmadụ, onye ọka iwu na onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ nke a maara nke ọma maka ịbụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Mba Nile nke Red Cross (ICRC) site n'afọ 1987 ruo afọ 1999
Taa, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Geneva International Centre for Humanitarian Demining (GICHD) na Geneva
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ n'ọtụtụ bọọdụ, dị ka International Union Against Cancer

Ugbu a ọ bụ Onye isi oche nke Board of Directors nke Foundation For the Future, otu a raara nye ịkwalite ikike mmadụ na Middle East na North Africa, na onye isi ala nke Initiatives of Change International, otu zuru ụwa ọnụ raara onwe ya nye 'iwulite ntụkwasị obi gafee ụwa' nke ọdịbendị, mba, nkwenye, na ndabere
Cornelius Adam Igbudu (1914-1981) bu onye ozioma nke Naijiria hibere Anglican Adam Preaching Society (AAPS), otu ndi ozioma na Churchka Anglican nke Nigeria
Enyere ya ikike ibibi nsogbu ahu ike
N'afo 1992, Profesor Michael Y
Nabofa dere akwukwo gbasara ndu ya nke a kporo 'Adam The Evangelist'
Na May 1998, Profesor Sam U
Erivwo dere na Cornelius Adam Igbudu bu onye Bishop Agori Iwe ji 'na oke nkwanye ugwu'
Cornelius Bernhard Hanssen (25 Febụwarị 1864 na 16 Eprel 1939) bụ onye nkuzi Norwegian, onye nwe ụgbọ mmiri na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Liberal Party
Amụrụ ya na Feda na Vest-Agder, Norway
Ọ bụ nwa onye ọrụ ugbo, na nwanne nwoke nke onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Anders Kristian Rørvik
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na seminarị ndị nkuzi na Christianssand (nke bụzi Kristiansand) n'afọ 1883, rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi site n'afọ 1883 ruo afọ 1891
Ọ zụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Agder na Flekkefjord wee malite dị ka onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ site n'afọ 1892
Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, ọ malitere mbipụta, Det Norske Fredsblad nke o bipụtara ma dezie site n'afọ 1894 ruo afọ 1899
Ọ malitere dị ka onye nwe ụgbọ mmiri n'afọ 1898 na-elekwasị anya na tankers
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị Norwegian Shipowners' Association na onye otu nlekọta nke Den Norske Amerikalinje
O jere ozi dị ka onye otu Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Norway maka mpaghara Flekkefjord site n'afọ 1900 ruo afọ 1915 na site n'afọ 1919 ruo afọ 1921
A họpụtara ya ugboro atọ maka Liberal Party na ugboro abụọ maka Liberal Left Party
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka osote onye nnọchi anya n'oge afọ 1922 na 1924 n'afọ 1925 ruo afọ 1927
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu kansụl obodo Flekkefjord n'afọ 1931, ọ bụkwa onye isi obodo Flekquefjord n'afọ 1933, 1936 ruo n'afọ 1937
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Norwegian Peace Association (Nordisk Fredsforbund) n'afọ 1895, wee bụrụ onye otu nsọpụrụ
O sokwa guzobe Nordic Peace Fund (Norges Fredsfond) n'afọ 1917 na Nordic Inter-Parliamentary Union n'afọ 1906, ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke mbụ
Ọ nọrọ na Kọmitii Nobel nke Norway site n'afọ 1913 ruo afọ 1939, site n'afọ 1923 dị ka osote onyeisi oche

Ụlọ ọrụ Alexandria Confectionary & Chocolate (Arabic شركة الإسكندرية للحلويات والشوكولاتة Sharkat Al Iskandariyah Lal Ḥalawiyat Wal Shokalatat, nke a maara dị ka Corona), nke e guzobere n'okpuru aha Royal Chocolate Works of Egypt na 1919 bụ Tommy Chocolate Works of Egypt na 1919
n'ahịa Ijipt

Mgbe nnupụisi ọchịchị nke afọ 1952 gasịrị, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze na 1963 site na usoro nke mba nke gọọmentị mgbanwe ahụ weghaara ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ niile na akụ nke onwe
N'afọ 2000, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ghọrọ nke onwe ọzọ mgbe e rere ya na Samcrete Egypt
Components
Cosmas Maduka // (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ na Disemba 24, 1958) CON bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria na onye ọrụ ebere, onye guzobere, onye isi, na onye isi oche nke ogbako Coscharis

N'afọ 2015, e gosipụtara Maduka na usoro igwe onyonyo Forbes nke Africa 'ubosi jokarisiri na Peace Hyde' ma mee atụmatụ na ọ ga-aba nde nari ise USD ma, akokwara na a ghogburu Ifeanyi Ubah nke Capital Oil and Gas ego Naira Ijeri iri abou na otu na azụmahịa
Maduka apụtawokwa na ajụjụ ọnụ ebe ahia CNN Africa site na Zaner Asher
A mụrụ Maduka, onye Igbo na eso ụzo Christ si na Nnewi, Anambra State n'ezinụlọ Maazị Peter na Oriaku ya Rose Maduka na obodo Jos
Maduka malitere njem ịchụnta ego ya mgbe ọ dị afọ isii, ka afọ abụọ gasiri mgbe nna ya nwụru
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị wee malite ire Akara, nri Naijiria a ma ama nke e ji agwa mee iji kwado nne ya
Maduka banyere n'azụmahịa mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa mgbe nwanne nna ya chụpụrụ ya n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi na ego nari naira abuo nke were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-amụ oru ụgbọ ala
Ya na enyi ya aha ya bụ Dave guzobere ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta akụkụ ugbo ala maputara, a maara dị ka CosDave

Mmalite ahụ kụrụ afọ n'ala n'oge, karịa ka a tụrụ anya ya ma Maduka gara n'ihu chọta Coscharis Motor na ngụkọta ego narị naira atọ nke lekwasịrị anya na ire ahịa nke akụkụ ụgbọ ala maputara na afo1977
Aha ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka o si kwuo bụ ngwakọta nke aha mbụ ya, Cosmos, na aha nwunye ya, Charity, onye ọ lụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abuo na otu
Ọganihu azụmahịa Maduka malitere na afo 1982 mgbe gọọmentị Naijiria nyere ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ ala iri ikikere mbubata, nke e sosr họrọ Coscharis

Taa, Coscharis Group bụ ụlọ ọrụ nwere ego ruru nde dolar nari ise na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka gụnyere ulo uro mmeputa ihe, Teknụzụ kọmputa ozi, Petrochemical, nlekota ugboala na ngwa ugbo ala Auto, ire ugboala na ndokwa ya, ngalaba azumahia Ugbo, na ihe jikoro ugbo
Coscharis Motors na-edu na-ikesa ọtụtụ ụdị ụgbọala ndị oké ozu gụnyere Range Rover, Ford, na Jaguar

N'afọ 2015, ulo orụ Coscharis Motors bu naanị ya na-ekesa BMW na Naịjirịa ma burukwa na ụlọ ọrụ mbụ wuru ebe a-na amgbakọ ubgoala Ford Ranger na Naịjarịa wee turu ugo Auto Brand na-afo nke ihe nrite azumafi uwa nke emere na Ghana
N'afọ 2016, steeti Anambra kwadoro ala dị hekta puku ise nye ugbo Coscharis iji kọọ osikapa, akuko kọrọ na ọrụ ngo ahụ mepụtara ọrụ puku ato mgbe emechara ya
A na-ahụta Coscharis Group dị ka otu n'ime ụdị iri ise kachasị elu na Naịjirịa site na udi iri ise kachasi elu Nigeria
Maduka kwuru na ihe kpatara azumahia ya ji a-ga nke ọma bụ njikọ ya na ndị Japan

Dị ka Maduka si kwuo, mmekọrịta chiri anya ya na ndị Japan mekoritara, mere ka ọ zụlite ụkpụrụ nke mkpebi, ịdị umeala n'obi, izi ezi, na ịrụsi ọrụ ike nke bụ isi ihe na-eme ka ọ nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na azụmahịa
O kwere nkwa ịnakwere nke a n'akụkọ ndụ ya
Cosmas Maduka na-anọdụ ala na bọọdụ nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na òtù a ma ama
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi na Access Bank Plc, otu n'ime ụlọ akụ ndị na-edu na Naịjirịa ruo afọ iri na abụọ, site na 2000 ruo 2012
Cosmas Maduka na-etinye aka na ntụziaka na inye ikike azụmaahịa
Ọ na-akọ nke a n'akụkọ n'oge a-chikotara 'Stanel klasi nna ukwu nke inye ndi ntorobia ike' emere na Stanel Dome na Awka, Anambra Steeti otu o si nye Dr

Stanley Uzochukwu, bu onye isi oche na onye nwe Stanel Group ikike site na inye ya ego ụlọ ọrụ na-amalite azụmahịa nke putara otu narị na iri ise nde Naira ma mee ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị Naijiria nwere ọtụtụ ijeri
A maara Cosmas Maduka maka okwukwe ya n'uzọ Kraịst, a pụkwara ịhụ ya ugboro ugboro ka ọ na-ekwusa ozi ọma na ụka ma ọ bụ nzukọ ndị ntorobịa na Naịjirịa

Dị ka Maduka si kwuo, o nyere Jizọs ndụ ya n'oge ọ dị obere ma nke a nwere mmetụta dị mma na ndụ ya, tinyekwara na ige ntị n'okwu ndị sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke Reverend William Branham nwụworo anwụ kwuru
Ọ lụrụ Charity Maduka (1958 -2021), nwere ụmụ nwoke anọ na nwa nwanyị
Ọ bi na Lagos, Naịjirịa

N'afọ 2015, Cosmos Maduka pụtara na nkpuchi akwukwo Forbes Africa dị ka nwoke nke tụgharịrị otu dollar ruo nde dollar nari ise, ma n'oge ahụ, e gosipụtara ya na ajụjụ ọnụ pụrụ iche nke usoro igwe onyonyo Forbes Africa akporo 'ubosi jokarisiri ya na peace hyde'
Dị ka Maduka si kwuo, ọ na-enwe mmasị igba na ikiri bọọlụ
O kwupụtara n'otu oge a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ na ọ nwere mmasị n'ụgbọala na ọgba tum tum, na-ekwu, sị 'na ezinụlọ ya dum bụ ndị na-agba ịnyịnya ígwè'
N'afọ 2003, Cosmas Maduka nwetara nzere Dọkịta nke nchikwa azumahia (PhD) na Mahadum Nigeria, Nsukka
Maduka jere ozi dị ka onye isi / onye isi oche nke NigeriaTable Tennis nile ruo afọ iri na isii n'oge Nigeria duziri Africa na ihe omume niile
O duru ndị otu Naijiria gaa n'egwuregwu Olimpik; Atlanta '96, Athens 2000, Sidney 2004 na Beijing 2008
N'afọ 2012, a nabatara ya dị ka onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na uloakwukwo azumahia dika ọ gụru maka agumakwụkwọ mmemme ndi ezecutive
Cosmos Maduka so n'ime mmadụ ole na ole onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan jiri ugwu mba nke ochiagha nke osoro nke Niger wee sọpụrụ na afo 2012

Cosmo George Leipoldt Pieterse (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1930 na Windhoek, Namibia) bụ onye na-ede egwuregwu na South Africa, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede uri, onye na -enyocha akwụkwọ na onye na-akọ akụkọ
Cosmo Pieterse gara Mahadum Cape Town ma kụzie na Cape Town ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ South Africa na 1965
A machibidoro ya iwu n'okpuru Iwu Mgbakọ Ọgba aghara nke 1962
O mechara kụzie na London na Mahadum Ohio na United States Mgbe ọ bịarutere na Mahadum Ohio na 1970, ọ ghọrọ onye otu ngalaba na 1976
Otú ọ dị, mgbe ọ gachara izute onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ ya na London na 1979, a jụrụ ya ịlaghachi na US na ozi nzuzo, na-ekwu na ọ bụ ' onye a na-enyo enyo na onye Kọmunist'
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri mgbe ụfọdụ, Pieterse pụtara na The Burning, ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke nkeji iri atọ na 1968 nke Stephen Frears duziri

Dị ka onye na-ede uri, a kọwapụtara Pieterse dị ka onye na'emepụta ọrụ nke bụ 'European na ụda ya, ihe atụ, na nnyefe ya', dịka Laura Linda Holland dere, sị 'Abụ Cosmo Pieterse, dị ka nke [Dennis] Brutus, jupụtara na mmetụta, nchegbu, na ebumnuche ndị Ọdịda Anyanwụ ka ha na-ejigide ajọ mbunobi AfrịkaCosmo Pieterse na-eji ịhụnanya ya maka okwu mepụta uri nke olileanya na mmelite
Pieterse deziri ọtụtụ akụkọ ọdịnala nke egwuregwu na uri maka usoro ndị ode akwụkwọ Africa nke Heinemann bipụtara
Cossy Orjiakor // (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ na 16 Ọktoba 1984) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu
Ọ batara n'ọkwa mgbe ọ gosipụtara na vidio egwu nke obesere , a makwaara ya nke ọma maka igosi nnukwu obi ya na mmemmé mmekọrịta na vidio egwu
N'afọ 2015, o mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Power girls, n'okpuru ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ya Playgirl pictures
A mụrụ Orjiakor na 16 Ọktoba 1984 na Anambra Steeti
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na klas nke abụọ dị elu na ndekọ ego na njikwa na Mahadum Naịjirịa, Nsukka ma nweta nzere masta na mahadum Lagos state
Orjiakor etinyela aka n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nkè ntụrụndụ
O gosipụtara na vidio egwu, mere ihe nkiri ma nwee abọm aha ya, wepụtara abọm mbụ ya Nutty Queen na 2013
O gosipụtara ngosipụta nkè áhụ ya dị ka akụkụ nke akara ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe ntụrụndụ

Coster Balakasi (a mụrụ n'afọ 1972) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
A mụrụ ya na Harare nye nna Malawi na nne Zimbabwe, ọ tolitere na mpaghara Tafara nke obodo ahụ, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị
N'afọ 1988, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ ya na ndị na-akpụ ihe dịka Miger Padaso na Dominic Benhura na Tafara
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ ya na onye na-ese ihe Cosmos Muchenje na Greendale, Hararae, 1993
N'afọ 1998, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ Muchenje wee malite ịrụ ọrụ nke onwe ya
N'afọ 1999, ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na Chapungu Sculpture Park
O gosipụtala na Canterbury na Spain yana ebe dị iche iche na Zimbabwe
Balakasi nyefere ọdịnala nke ihe ọkpụkpụ Shona nye nwa nwanne ya, Gift Tembo
Ihe ọkpụkpụ ya gụnyere 'Seated Girl', nke a na-egosipụta ugbu a na Knebworth House
Balaksi bụ onye York's Shona Gallery na New York na Ukama Gallery na Vancouver, BC

Justin Booth bụ ónyé Los Angeles, California
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ede egwu, onye na-emepụta ihe na ónyé injinia nke mepụtara egwu maka Chris Brown, Alesha Dixon, Sevyn Streeter, Nappy Roots na Lil Mama

Countee Cullen (onye amụrụ Countee LeRoy Porter; n'ọnwa Mee 30, afọ 1903 - rụo ọnwa Janụwarị 9, afọ 1946) bụ onye Amerịka na-ede uri, onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye na'ede akwụkwọ ụmụaka, na onye na-eme egwuregwu, nke a maara nke ọma n'oge Harlem Renaissance
A mụrụ Countee LeRoy Porter n'ọnwa Mee 30, afọ 1903, n'aka Elizabeth Thomas Lucas
N'ihi enweghị ihe ndekọ banyere nwata ya, ndị ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme enweela nsogbu ịchọpụta ebe a mụrụ ya
Baltimore, Maryland, New York City, na Louisville, Kentucky ka edepụtara dị ka ihe nwere ike ime
Ọ bụ ezie na Cullen kwuru na a mụrụ ya na New York City, ọ na-ekwukwa Louisville, Kentucky ugboro ugboro dị ka ebe a mụrụ ya n'akwụkwọ iwu
Amanda Porter kpọtara Cullen na Harlem mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu, onye kwenyere na ọ bụ nne nne ya, onye lekọtara ya ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1917
Reverend Frederick A

Cullen, pastọ nke Salem Methodist Episcopal Church, ọgbakọ kachasị ukwuu na Harlem, na nwunye ya, onye bụbu Carolyn Belle Mitchell, kuchiri Countee Porter dị afọ 15, ọ bụ ezie na nkuchi ahụ nwere ike ọ bụghị nke gọọmentị
Frederick Cullen bụ onye dị mkpa na ndụ Countee, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka nna ya
Minista ahụ nwere mmetụta ga-emesị bụrụ onye isi oche nke ngalaba Harlem nke National Association for the Advancement of Colored People (NAACP)
Cullen banyere DeWitt Clinton High School, nke dị na Hell's Kitchen
Ọ gara nke ọma n'agụmakwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ wee malite ide uri
O meriri asọmpi uri obodo niile
Na DeWitt, a họpụtara ya n'ime òtù nsọpụrụ, ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa izu, a họpụtakwara ya dịka osote onye isi oche nke klas ya na-agụsị akwụkwọ
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 1922, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Latin, Greek, Mathematics, na French
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara Mahadum New York (NYU)

N'afọ 1923, Cullen nwetara ihe nrite nke abụọ na asọmpi Witter Bynner National Competitions for Undergraduate Poetry, nke Poetry Society of America kwadoro, maka uri ya akpọrọ, 'The Ballad of the Brown Girl'
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ na-ebipụta uri na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba dị ka a ma ama na mba
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ nọkwa nke abụọ na asọmpi ahụ, n'ikpeazụ merie ihe nrite mbụ n'afọ 1925
O meriri na asọmpi uri nke Opportunity kwadoro wee bịa na nke abụọ na 'To One Who Say Me Nay', na-emeri Langston Hughes's 'The Weary Blues'
Cullen gụsịrị akwụkwọ na NYU n'afọ 1925 ma bụrụ otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ iri na otu ahọpụtara na Phi Beta Kappa
Intanet bu oke network ukwu n'uwa dika otu na dibe mgbu
Nde Department of Defense na government Njikota Obodo Amerika bu nde bidoro Internet mgbe ha dila kpo ya ARPANET
Obu Internet mere anyi nwe ike ihu he m'obu iku la onye madu no n'ebe ozo n'uwa
Coupé Décalé bu otu egwu nke ukwu na madu na gbá nkwà shí Cote d'Ivoire na ndi Ivorie di na mba ébé Paris, France
O jìkotàrà egwu Zouglous na egwu ndi na ó nwèrè egwu na da kạ egwu Afrika nwéré ụdụ di ukwu, na á gbáriá na ha dòsèrè ya ntakírí

Courtney Ozioma Dike (amuru 3 Febrụwarị 1995) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa nke na-egwu egwu n'ihu
O tozuru oke ịkpọrọ otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa site n'aka nne na nna ya na ihe nketa Naịjirịa
Amụrụ na Edmond, Oklahoma, Courtney gara Edmond North High School wee gbaa bọọlụ kọleji na Mahadum Oklahoma State
N'ime afọ anọ ya na Edmond North High School, ọ meriri ihe mgbaru ọsọ iri itoolu
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ndekọ ego na Mahadum Oklahoma State wee kpọọ otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Mahadum Oklahoma

N'afọ 2014, Courtney nwetara ọkpụkpọ oku ka ọ nọchite anya ndị otu mba Naijiria U-20 maka asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke FIFA U-20 nke afọ 2014 na Canada ebe o meriri goolu kachasị ọsọ na akụkọ ntolite asọmpi ahụ ka naanị iri na atọ sekọnd n'asọmpi megide North
Korea
Ngosipụta ya na asọmpi ahụ nwetara nhọpụta atọ ya na ihe nrite egwuregwu Nigeria nke afọ 2014
Courtney gara n'ihu na-anọchite anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi Iko Mbaụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị 2015 na Canada
Na 12 June 2015, o mere akụkọ ihe mere eme site na ịghọ onye mbụ Oklahoman na-egwu egwu na world cup mgbe ọ bịarutere Asisat Oshoala na egwuregwu megide Australia
O nwere ụmụnne abụọ, Bright na Daryl, na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ, Kimberly na Brittny
A kọrọ na mgbasa ozi na ọ jụrụ ego a na-enye ya maka ọrụ ya na 2014 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
Ọ kọwara n'akwụkwọ ozi o zigara ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa na 'Obi na-atọ m ụtọ ịgbara Naịjirịa bọọlụ mgbe ọ bụla akpọrọ m ya
Amaara m tupu m ahapụ ịga iko mba ụwa nke U-20 na agaghị m anabata ego ọ bụla
Ịnabata ego nrite megidere ụkpụrụ NCAA (otu ngalaba na-ahụ maka kọleji nke ngalaba 1) ebe a na US, yabụ nke ahụ bụ isi ihe kpatara ịjụ ya
Àtụ Nigeria squad 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup
A cradle bụ àkwà nwa ọhụrụ nke na-agba nkume ma ọ bụghị nke na-agagharị agagharị
Ọ dị iche na nke ukwu nke ụwa họrọ site ya na ezinụlọ na bassinet nkịtị nke bụ akpa yiri nkata na ụkwụ kwụ ọtọ nwere ụkwụ
A chọtara ebe a na-ere ọkụ n'ime ihe ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị na ụdị nke ụwa ndị fọdụrụ na Herculaneum nke e wepụrụ site na mbibi nke obodo ahụ site na mgbawa nke Ugwu Vesuvius na 79 OA

Craig O'Neil Grant (December 18, 1968 , March 24, 2021), nke a makwaara dị ka muMs the Schemer, bụ onye Amerika na-ede abụ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Arnold 'Poet' Jackson na usoro HBO Oz
A mụrụ Grant na New York City ma zụlite ya na Bronx
Nna ya, Samuel, bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ na ọkwa nkà na ụlọ ọgwụ Montefiore, nne ya, Theresa (née Maxwell), bụ onye nkuzi

O bu ụzọ nweta nlebara anya dị ka onye na-ede uri na onye na-eme ihe nkiri mgbe e gosipụtara ya na ihe ngosi SlamNation, nke sochiri ya na ndị ọzọ na-ede abụ nke afọ 1996 Nuyorican Poetry Slam Team (Saul Williams, Beau Sia na Jessica Care Moore) ka ha na-asọmpi n'afọ 1996 National Poetry Eslam
Grant weere aha 'muMs' mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụo ma na-eme ihe na otu egwu rap

N'ihi na ọ na-echekwa ihe ịrịba ama nke mkparị nwata, otu enyi tụrụ aro ka ọ kpọọ onwe ya ŌMumbles, nke Grant belatara ka ọ bụrụ 'muMs', dị ka acronym maka 'onye na-achịkwa n'okpuru Manipulation shhhhhhh!'

N'akwụkwọ Words in Your Face A Guided Tour Through Twenty Years of the New York City Poetry Slam, onye edemede Cristin O'Keefe Aptowicz dere banyere oge muMs na abụ slam, na-ekwu na ederede ya 'bụ abụ okporo ámá n'ụzọ dị ọcha
N'iche echiche, nke ziri ezi ma ọ bụghị nke na-enweghị ọchị, ọrụ ya kwuru n'eziokwu banyere ndụ ya na ndị enyi ya na ezinụlọ ya biri na obodo ọ hụrụ n'anya
muMs mere uri ya na oge 2, 3 na 4 nke HBO's Def Poetry Jam, ọ bụkwa onye otu LAByrinth Theater Company nke New York City
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2007, muMs rụrụ ọrụ na A View from 151st Street, egwuregwu banyere ndị mmadụ na-anwa ịmegharị ndụ ha mgbe a gbagburu ha
Na Septemba 2014, muMs dere ma mee 'A Sucker Emcee', abụ hip-hop na slam, dabere na ncheta onwe ya

N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2015, emere egwuregwu muMs, nke akpọrọ 'Paradox of the Urban Cliché', banyere di na nwunye na-eto eto bi na Harlem, na Wild Project dị ka akụkụ nke mmemme Poetic Theater Productions' Poetic License
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2015, muMs rụrụ ọrụ na 'The Insurgents', egwuregwu banyere iwe n'etiti ndị nweere onwe ha, ndị nwere obi ike, na ndị a na-enweghị ikike, nke LAByrinth Theater Company mepụtara
Grant bụ onye ọbịa na 2016 Netflix usoro Luke Cage dị ka Reggie 'Squabbles', ma gosipụta ya dị ka onye na-apụta ugboro ugboro, Ricardo, na omume atọ nke Louis CK's web series Horace and Pete
Grant nwụrụ na Wilmington, North Carolina na Machị 24, 2021, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ịse na abụọ
Craig Jamieson Mack (May 10, 1970 na March 12, 2018) bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
O nyere aka wuo ntọala màkà Bad Boy Records, akara nwere mmetụta na hip hop na ụlọ ọrụ egwu

A mụrụ ya na The Bronx ma zụlite ya na Long Island, Craig Mack malitere ịgba egwu rap dị ka ónyé nọ n'afọ iri na ụma n'okpuru aha MC EZ wee wepụta otu egwu na 1988, 'Just Rhymin kwadoro na 'Get Retarded', dịka akụkụ nke MC EZ & Troup
Mack wee bụrụ enyi na onye ọrụ hip hop nke Long Island EPMD ma mesịa soro ha gaa njem, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-arụ ụzọ
Mgbè afọ ole na ole gachara n'enweghị ọganihu n'ọrụ ndekọ ya, Mack jiri ohere rap maka Sean Combs, wee nwéta nkwekọrịta ndekọ na akara ọhụrụ nke Combs, Bad Boy
A maara Mack nke ọma màkà egwu ya nke afọ 1994, 'Flava in Ya Ear'
E wepụtara egwu mbụ ya 'Get Retarded/Just Rhymin n'okpuru aha MC EZ na 1988 na Fresh Records
A maara Mack nke ọma màkà egwu egwu ya nke afọ 1994 'Flava In Ya Ear', nke e wepụtara n'okpuru ezigbo aha ya
Remix nke egwu ahụ bụ ngosipụta nke The Notorious BIG, yana otu n'ime ngosipụta mbụ nke Busta Rhymes

Ọ bụ ezie na Mack bụ ónyé na-eti egwu mbụ wepụtara egwu na Bad Boy Records, ihe ịga nke ọma nke The Notorious BIG's debut album Ready to Die, nke wepụtara kpọmkwem ụbọchị asaa tupu Mack's debut album Project Funk da World, kpuchiri ihe ịga nke a ma ama na ákàrà ahụ
Creedence Clearwater Revival, nke a na-akpọkwa Creedence na CCR, bụ otu egwu egwu America nke e hibere na El Cerrito, California
Ndị otu ahụ na mbu nwere onye ndu Uda olu, onye na-agu egwu na onye edemede mbu bụ John Fogerty; nwanne ya nwoke, rythm guitarist Tom Fogerty;bassist Stu Cook; na onye na-egwu egwu Doug Clifford

Ndị otu a agbakorola ọnụ kemgbe 1959, nke mbụ dị ka Blue Velvets na emesịa dị ka Golliwogs, tupu ha ebie na Creedence Clearwater Revival aha na 1967Ndi otu ahu rụrụ ọrụ na ememme Woodstock 1969 na Upstate New York, ma buru mmemme izizi izizia bịanyere aka na ya pụtara ebe ahụ
CCR gbasasia nke oma na ngwụcha 1972 ka afọ anọ nke ihe ịga nke ọma na-emepe chaati gasiri
Tom Fogerty ahapụla n'afọ gara aga, John na ndị otu fọdụrụnu na-emegidekwa ihe gbasara azụmahịa na njikwa nka, Ihe niile butere ikpe n'etiti ndi otu egwuregwu mbu

Esemokwu Fogerty na onye nwe Fantasy Records bụ Saul Zaentz dugara n'okwu ikpe ndị ọzọ na John Fogerty jụrụ iso ndị otu abụọ ndị ọzọ dị ndụ rụọ ọrụ na ntinye Creedence na 1993 na Rock and Roll Hall of Fame

Agbanyeghi na ndi otu ahu ejikotabeghi onu n'ihu oha, John Fogerty gara n'ihu na-egwu egwu CCR dị ka akụkụ nke omume solo ya, ebe Cook na Clifford rụrụ oru dị ka Creedence Clearwater Revisited kemgbe afọ 1990
Egwú CCR ka bụ isi Ihe egwu egwu egwu egwu egwu egwu US
ama ama rock airplay; E reela ndeko CCR nde 30 na US naanị
Ndeko mkpokota Chronicle The 20 Kasi ukwuu Hits, nke ewepụtara na mbu na 1976, ka dị na chaatị album Billboard 200 wee ruo akara izu 500 na Disemba 2020
Enyere ya platinum 10 ×
John Fogerty, Doug Clifford, na Stu Cook zutere na Portola Junior High School na El Cerrito, California
N'ikpọ onwe ha Blue Velvets, ndi atọ ahụ na-egwuri egwu ngwá na 'ụkpụrụ jukebox', ma kwado nwanne John nke okenye Tom na ndekọ na Ihe ngosi tupu o banye n'òtù ahụ
Ndi otu ahụ eweputala alulu atọ, nke abụọ bụ Casey Kasem, onye rụrụ ọrụ na KEWB, Oakland
Na 1964, ha bịanyere aka na Fantasy Records, akara jazz nooro onwe ya na San Francisco
Ndị otu ahụ dọtara na labelu ahụ mgbe ha nụrụ ndekọ nke Vince Guaraldi akpọrọ 'Cast Your Fate to the Wind' nke akara ahụ wepụtara ka o nwee oganihu mba
Maka mweputa mbụ nke otu ahụ, onye nwe Fantasy Max Weiss dehariri aha otu ahụ The Golliwogs (site na onye edemede ụmụaka bụ Golliwog)
Tupu aha Golliwog, Weiss akpohariri ha aha ka ọ bụrụ Vision
Ọrụ ndị otu band gbanwere n'ime oge a Cook gbanwere site na piano gaa na bass guitar yana Tom Fogerty site na Uda ndu gaa na guitar rythm; John ghọrọ onye ndu Uda olu na onye na-ede abu mbu
N'okwu Tom 'Enwere m ike ịbụ abụ, mana John nwere ụda!'
Na 1966, e debara aha John Fogerty na Doug Clifford n'ime ndi agha US; Fogerty sonyeere US Army Reserve mgbe Clifford sonyeere US Coast Guard Reserve
N'ikwu okwu banyere ahụmahu ya na US Army, Fogerty kwuru, sị 'M ga-aghọ aghugho-enweghị ma banye n'ọhụụ
M wee malite ịkọ akụkọ a n'onwe m, nke bụ abụ 'Porterville'
John Fogerty mesiri weghaara ya
otu ahụ site n'ịbụ abụ ndu, ma na-ama ifuru n'ime ọtụtụ ngwá ngwu ndi na-akpo kiibood,harmonica, na saxophone na mgbakwunye na guitar ndu
Ka ọ na-erule 1967, ọ no na-emepụta ihe ndekọ nke otu ahụ
1967, Saul Zaentz zụtara Fantasy Records ma nye igwe ahụ ohere idekọ album zuru oke
N'ịbụ ndị kpọworọ aha 'The Golliwogs' asị site na ubọchị mbụ, igwe ahụ kpebiri n'aha nke ska ha, Creedence Clearwater Revival (CCR), nke ha weere na Jenụwarị 1968

Di ka ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ndị otu igwe afọ iri abụọ ka e mesịrị, ihe aha ahụ sitere na isi mmalite atọ enyi Tom Fogerty Credence Newball, onye aha ya gbanwere na-etolite okwu Creedence (dị ka nkwenkwe); mgbasa ozi telivishọn maka Olympia Brewing Company ('mmiri doro anya'); na ndị otu ahu nweghachikwara nkwa maka otu ahu
[citation needed] Ndị na-aso mpi a jụrụ maka aha otu ahụ gụnyere 'Muddy Rabbit', 'Gossamer Wump', na 'Creedence nuball na Ruby'; Otú ọ dị, nke ikpeazụ bu malitere nke igwe ahu wetara aha ikpeazụ ha
Cook kọwara aha ahụ dị ka 'dị egwu karịa Buffalo Springfield ma ọ bụ ugbo elu Jefferson '
Na mbido 1968,ndi òtù ahụ malitere ịpụta mgbe niile na klọb mpaghara San Francisco na be egwuregwu gụnyere Dino na Carlo's Bar, Avalon Ballroom, na Fillmore West
Mgbe afo ahu gachara, ndị otu ahụ malitere igagharị mba ahu n'ofe US wee mee ngosi mbụ ha na New York City na Fillmore East
Ka ọ na-erule 1968, ndị na-eme redio AM na gburugburu US ribs ama mgbe mkpuchi CCR nke 1956 rockabilly song p'Susie Q' nwetara nnukwu egwuregwu na San Francisco Bay Area na Chicago's WLS-AM
Ọ bụ Otú nke abụọ nke igwe ahụ, nke mbụ ya ruru Top 40 (No
11), na nanị ToBuoxwa 40 kuru O bughi John Fogerty dereAbuo ndi ọzọ singles e wepụtara na ha
Mgbe ha nwechara Ihe I ga nke oma CCR malitere igagharị ma malite oba egwu nke abuo ha,Bayou Country (wepụtara jenuwari 1969) na RCA studios na Los Angeles

ndeko a gosikwara mmeghari nke rock & roll classic'Good Golly, Miss Molly' na ihe ngosi ndu nkeji itoolu nke otu ahụ nso, 'Nogide na Chooglin

Na United Kingdom, 'Bad Moon Rising' nọrọ izu atọ na onu ogugu nke mbu na UK Singles Chart n'oge Septemba na Ọktoba 1969, na-aghọ naanị onuogu otu na UK
Album nke atọ nke otu ahụ, Green River, sochiri na Ọgọstụ 1969, bụ album mbụ ha nwetara n'elu Billboard 200, wee gaa ọla edo yana otu 'Green River', nke ruru ozo 2 na chaatị Billboard

30 na mmesi Ike nke otu ahụ na mmeghari nke okachamma ochie ha gara n'ihu na 'Oge abali bu oge kwesiri ekwesi'
CCR gara n'ihu na-eme njem mgbe niile na Ihe ngosi na July 1969 na Atlanta Pop Festival na n'August 1969 na Woodstock Festival
Agunyeghi ntoala ha na ihe nkiri Woodstock ma ọ bụ ụda uda n'ihi na John chere na arụmọrụ nke band ahu di ala
Egwú anọ sitere na mmemme ahụ (n'ime ngụkọta nke iri na otu) mechara tinye na igbe ncheta nke 1994 setipuru Woodstock Ụbọchị atọ nke udo na egwú
'Down on the Corner' na 'Fortunate Son', nke ha abụọ rụrụ na The Ed Sullivan Show na Nọvemba 16, 1969, rịgooro na No

14, n'otu n'otu, ka o na-erule na ngwusi afọ
ndeko a bụ CCR n'udi okolota, na-egosiputa mmalte fogerty na mkpuchi Lead Belly arughariri arughari, 'Ubi owu' na 'Midnight special'
Qfo 1969 aburola afo eserese did iriba ama maka otu ahu oba atọ,Top Ten,otu egwu egwu ano (charting na no2,no 2, no-2, na no3) nwere akuku ato ozo nwere chaati B
CCR wepụtara ọzọ okpukpu abụọ a-akuku hit, 'Travelin' Band'/'Onye ga-akwusi mmiri ozuzo', na Jenụwarị 1970
The ngwa ngwa 'Travelin' Band' na obere Richard uda siri ike, agbanyeghi nwere oke myirita na 'Ezi Golly, Miss Molly' iji kwado akwukwo nke onye mbiputa egwu; E mechara dozie ya n'uloikpe
Egwu a mechara puta na nomba n'onwa Febuwari Oakland Coliseum Arena, e gosipụtara CCR na mkpuchi Rolling Stone, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ naanị John ka a gbara ajụjụ ọnụ na isiokwu so ya
N' April 1970, akwadoro CCR imalite njem njem Europe mbu ha

ndi otu ahụ laghachiri na Wally Heider Studios na San Francisco na June ka ha dekoo ulo oru Cosmo

E nweputara ulo oru Cosmo na Julai 1970, ọ bụkwa nọmba nke mbụ na US maka izu itoolu

& the MG's, onye ndị otu otu ahụ kpochiri akpochi

N'ihe di ka n'oge a, nghọta dị ukwuu n'etiti ndị otu ndi ọzọ na John na-achịkwa gabiga oke ma na-achị n'ime otu ahụ na-abiaru nso n'ebe na-esi ísì uto
Tom Fogerty kpebiri na ya nwere ezuru ma hapu CCR na mmalite 1971 mgbe ndeko nke Pendulum;Emepurara ọpụpụ ya na ihu oha Febụwarị na-esote

N'oge opupu ihe ubi nke 1971, John Fogerty, nwere nkụda mmụọ maka mkpesa ndị otu ya fọdụrụnụ na-eme mkpesa mgbe niile na ekweghị ka ha dee ma mepụta abụ nke ha, mere ihe gbasara ihu wee gwa Cook na Clifford na CCR ga-aga n'ihu naanị site n'inweta
usoro nke ochichi onye

a 1975, o wepụtara naanịobammgbapu ya,ahaeonwe ya John Fogerty

sieIhe na-esote ya bụ Centerfield, ihe ịga nke ọa na chaatị na 1985 Na a njemnleghari anya na 1986,Otu o di, Fogerty nwere mkpesa makaojuju o juru one egwu CCR ma a-ahuhu a nnsogbuudau ugboro ugboro nke ọ boro ebubona o ga-agba akaebe n'ụlọ ikpe
Nkọwa Fogerty maka ịkpghiọ ihe CCR bụ na ọ ga-akwriri ụgwọ ọrụeze Maka ony ji iikike nwebisiinka Zaentz, nakwa na ọ bụ 'ihe mgbu' ịlaghachi na egwu nke oge gara aga

Site na album Centerfield, Fogerty hụkwara onwe ya na Zaentz gbara akwukwo ohuru, tit-for-tat maka egwu 'The Old Man Down The Road' nke bụ, dị ka Zaentz si kwuo, edegharighachi nke Fogerty n'onwe ya na 1970 CCR kuru'Gaa n'ime ohia'

Ebe ọ bụ na Fogerty ejirila ikike ya na egwu CCR na 1980 kagbuo ọrụ nkwekọrịta ya fọdụrụnụ, Fantasy nwere ikike ugbua 'Run Through the Jungle' wee kpee Fogerty akwụkwọ n'ụzọ bụ isi maka ịpụtaghachi onwe ya
Mgbe ndi juri na- achi na ihu Fogerty, o doziri akwukwo nkwutọ nke Zaentz gbara maka egwu 'Mr
Greed' na 'Zanz Kant Danz'
A manyere Fogerty o dezie ndekọ ahụ, na-agbanwe aha'Zanz' na'Vanz'
Na Febụwarị 19, 1987, na Palomino Club (North Hollywood) na Los Angeles, Fogerty mebiri mmachibido iwu onwe ya na ime CCR hits
Bob Dylan na George Harrison (ya na Taj Mahal na Jesse Ed Davis) sonyeere ya na ogbo, na-adu odu si, 'Ọ bụrụ na ị imeghi, ụwa dum ga-eche 'Nganga Mary' bụ abu Tina Turner
' Na ihe nkiri 1987 ụbọchị nnwere onwe maka ndị agha Vietnam, Fogerty mechara banye na ndepụta CCR hits, malite na 'A muru na Bayou' wee mechie 'Mary mpako'
Na 1986, o weputara album Warner Bros, ya nke abuo Eye of the Zombie
Fogerty laghachiri na egwu ozo na njedebe 1980 mana o laghachiri na 1997 na Blue Moon Swamp nke meriri Grammy
Fogerty ka na-eme njem ugboro ugboro ma ugbu a na-eme CCR oge ochie n'akụkụ ihe solo
Tom Fogerty wepụtara ọtụtụ oba solo, n'agbanyeghi na ọ nweghi nke ruru ihe ịga nke ọma nke CCR
Album solo ya nke 1974 Zephyr National bụ onye ikpeazụ iji gosipụtara ndị otu CCR anọ mbụ
Ọtụtụ egwu na-ada Uda di ka ụdị CCR, ọkachasị nke akpọrọ 'Mbilite n'Onwu Onú' nke ndị otu anọ niile na-egwuri egwu, n'agbanyeghi na John Fogerty dekọrọ akụkụ ya iche
Tom Fogerty nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya di na Scottsdale, Arizona, na Septemba 1990 n'ihi mgbagwoju anya ọrịa AIDS, but nke ọ nwetere site na mmịnye ọbara meruru emeru nke ọ natara mgbe ọ na-awa ahu azụ
Tom na John jisiri ike di ná mma tupu Tom anwuo, na n'otu ekele o kwuru na olili ozu Tom, John kwuru si, 'Anyị chọrọ itolite na ibụ ndị na-egwụ egwú
Echere m na anyị nwetara ọkara nke ahụ, ghoo rock 'n roll stars
Ọ bụchaghị na-eto eto'
Ndị enyi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Doug Clifford na Stu Cook gara n'ihu na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ mgbe onwu nke CCR ma dịka ndị egwuregwu nnoko na ndị otu Don Harrison Band
Ha toro ntoala Factory Productions, ọrụ ndekọ ekwenti na mpaghara Bay
Clifford wepụtara ndeko solo, Cosmo, na 1972
Cook mepụtara onye na-ese ihe nkiri Roky Erickson's The Evil One wee bụrụ onye bassist na obodo ama ama eme Southern Pacific na 1980s
Clifford mekwara Groovers Paradise maka onye bụbu Sir Douglas Quintet naTexas Tornados Doug Sahm
Ma Clifford na Cook egwuri egwu na album nke ewepụtara na Warner Bros
Clifford gara n'ihu na-eme ma na-edekọ na Sahm site na 1980s
N'igbaso ogologo oge nke enweghị egwu egwu, Cook na Clifford hibere Creedence Clearwater Revisited na 1995 ya na ọtụtụ ndị egwu ama ama
Nlegharighari na-aga n'ihu na-eme njem nleghari anya zuru ụwa onu na-eme klaasi nke band mbụ
Ntuziaka John 1997 manyere Creedence Clearwater Revisited ka o gbanwee aha ya nwa oge gaa na 'Cosmo's Factory', mana ụlọ ikpe mechara kpebie na Cook's na Clifford kwadoro

Mgbe CCR gachara, Fantasy Records weputara ọtụtụ ngwungwu kacha egwu di ka1972's Creedence Gold, 1973's More Creedence Gold na 1975's Pre-Creedence,album mkpokọta nke ndekọ mbụ Golliwogs Fantasy weputara album abụọ na-aga nke ọma nke ukwuu Chronicle, nchịkọta nke Creedence's iri abụọ hit singles, na 1976
Ọtụtụ afọ ka e mesịrị, akara ahụ wepụtara ndekọ dị ndụ nke akpọrọ The Royal Albert Hall Concert
N'adịghị ka aha ya, e dekọrọ arụmọrụ 1970 na ￼￼Oakland, California, o bughi na Royal Albert Hall na London
E degharịrị mbipụta ndị na-esote nke album mbụ nke 1981 naanị The Concert
E wepụtara ọba abụọ ọzọ nke ihe kacha mma na 1986 dị ka Ihe E Mere Chronicle Volume Two
Ọganihu nke CCR mere Fantasy na Zaentz nnukwu ego, na Fantasy wuru ụlọ isi ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ na 1971 na 2600 Tenth Street na Berkeley, California
Zaentz jikwa akụ na ụba ya mepụta ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na-aga nke ọma, gụnyere Best Picture Oscar meriri One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest, Amadeus, na The English Patient

Na 2004, o rere Fantasy Concord RecordsDị ka ihe ngosi ọma,,[Tinye edensibịa]Concord sọpụrụ nkwa nkwekọrịta emezughị emezu Fantasy kwere n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri anọ tupu mgbe ahụ, n'ikpeazụ na-akwụ CCR ọnụ ahịa eze dị elu na ire ha wee weghachi John nwe nke egwu ya
John, ebe ọ hụrụ na Zaentz adịghịzi etinye aka na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, bịanyekwara aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ na Concord/Fantasy
Na 2005, a tọhapụrụ akara ahụ The Long Road Home, nchịkọta CCR na Fogerty solo kpochapụwo

Mgbe Revival pụtara na akara Fantasy na Ọktoba 2007 mana tupu album ya na-esote Blue Ridge Rangers Rides Again (ihe na-esote album 1973) ka ewepụtara na 2009, Fogerty si na Fantasy gbanwee gaa na akara nke ya, Fortunate Son Records, nke ekesara

Ndị otu anọ niile nọ na ọba Tom 1974 , na mgbe e mesịrị n'agbamakwụkwọ ya n'October 19, 1980
John, Cook, na Clifford na-egwuri egwu na 20th ha
El Cerrito High School nnọkọ na 1983, mana dị ka incarnation mbụ ha, Blue Velvets
N'afọ ndị 1980 na 1990, ikpe ọhụrụ nke ikpe dị n'etiti ndị otu ahụ, yana megidekwa njikwa mbụ ha, mere ka iro ha dịkwuo ukwuu
Site na mgbe ewebatara CCR n'ime Rock and Roll Hall of Fame na 1993, John jụrụ ime ya na Cook na Clifford
E gbochiri ụzọ abụọ ahụ site na ogbo ahụ, ebe John na-egwu egwu egwu egwu niile gụnyere Bruce Springsteen na Robbie Robertson
Nwanyị Tom di ya nwụrụ bụ Tricia tụrụ anya na a ga-enwe nnọkọ CCR na ọbụna weta nsị nke nwere ntụ di ya na ememe ahụ

Iwe iwe, Cook na Clifford, bụ ndị ha na ezinụlọ ha nọ ọdụ n'oche dị n'ofe ụlọ ahụ site na Fogerty's, si na ụlọ ịgba egwu ahụ pụta ka arụ ọrụ ahụ malitere, ma mesịa dee akwụkwọ ozi dị iche iche nye ndị isi oche nke Rock and Roll Hall of Fame
na-ekwu na ọ bụ 'na-emerụ ahụ' na 'mkparị' ikwe ka arụmọrụ ahụ gaa n'ihu na-enweghị ha
N'ajụjụ ọnụ July 2011 na ndị Calgary Herald, John kwetara na ọ dịkarịa ala na ya ga-adị njikere ịtụleghachikọ ya na Cook na Clifford
Mgbe a jụrụ ya ọzọ na October 2011 banyere atụmanya nke njikota, o siri 'M na-ekwu na ọ ga-ekwe omume, eeechere m na oku ahu [ọchị] ga-abu na o ga-esi n'èzí puta
Onye ga-eme ka m bia lee ihe anya n'ụzọ ọhụrụ
' Otú ọ dị, Cook na Clifford abuo kwuru na mbipụta February 2012 nke akwukwo akuko Uncut na ha enweghị mmasị na nnọkọ CCR
'Leopard anaghị agbanwe ntupo ha
Nke a bụ naanị mmega ahụ na-eme ka Ihe oyiyi na-egbuke egbuke John
Ekwentị m agbabeghị agba', Cook kwuru
Clifford gbakwunyere 'Ọ nwere ike ịbụ echiche mara mma afọ iri abụọ gara aga, mana o gaferela'
Na Mee 2013, Fogerty kwuru ọzọ na ya ga-emeghe maka nnọkọ, mana ọ hụghị Cook na Clifford dị njikere ịgbanwe ọnọdụ ha
Ọ gwara ya Charlie Rose na CBS This Morning 'Site n'oge ruo n'oge, m ga-ekwu ihe na ọ ga-na-ebipụta na ma eleghị anya nke ahụ ga-eme, na ozugbo m ga-anụ azụ ihe na-adịghị ada ka ọ ga-ekwe omume
Echere m na ọ ga-ekwe omume n'ọdịnihu, ị maara

Ọ bụghị ihe m na-achọsi ike, mana anaghị m emegidekwa echiche ahụ kpamkpam' Na Septemba 2017 Clifford ọzọ wepụrụ ohere ọ bụla nke Cook na ya onwe ya ga-ejikọtaghachi na John, na-ekwughachi, 'Ọ gaara abụ nnukwu afọ iri abụọ, afọ iri abụọ na ise gara aga
Ọ dịla anya ugbu a
A na-ejikarị ma o but tunye aka na katalogu egwu CCR na omenala ndi a ma ama,akụkụ n'ihi na John Fogerty bịanyere aka na njikwa iwu nke ndekọ ochie ya na akara ndekọ nke band, Fantasy Records
N'ajụjụ ọnụ NPR, Fogerty jụrụ ihe o weere dị ka iji egwu ya eme ihe n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi
Ihe na-adọrọ mmasị karịsịa bụ iji abụ mkpesa ya 'Fortunate Son' na mgbasa ozi blue jeans
N'okwu a, onye mgbasa ozi ahụ mechara kwụsị iji abụ ahụ, dịka Fogerty kọrọ n'ajụjụ ọnụ e mechara gbaa ya

Ụdị egwu CCR gụnyere egwu egwu, egwu obodo, mgbọrọgwụ rock, rockabilly, rock na roll, blues, Southern rock, blues rock, rock, rock rock, rhythm na blues, acid rock, mkpụrụ obi na-acha anụnụ anụnụ, folk rock, New Orleans rhythm and blues and space rock
A kpọtụrụ òtù ahụ aha dị ka ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke egwu egwu na egwu obodo

N'ịdabere na mmalite ha na mpaghara East Bay nke San Francisco Bay Mpaghara, òtù ahụ na-ejikarị okwu gbasara bayous, catfish, Osimiri Mississippi na akuku ndị ọzọ nke ihe ngosi nke Southern United States
Egwú ndị otu ahụ anaghị emetukari na ịhụnanya ịhụnanya, na-elekwasị anya na egwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya gbasara isiokwu dịka Agha Vietnam
Rolling Stone họọrọ CCR nke 82 na 100 Kasi mma artists nke oge niile
Na 2003, ndepụta Rolling Stone's 500 Kasi mma artists nke oge niile gụnyere Green River na nọmba 95, Cosmo's Factory na nọmba 265, na Willy and the Poor Boys na nọmba 392

Na 2004, na ndepụta 500 Kasi Ukwuu songs nke oge niile, Rolling Stone gụnyere 'Fortunate Son' na nọmba 99, 'Proud Mary' na nọmba 155, 'Who'll Stop the Rain' na nọmba 188, na 'Bad Moon Rising' na nọmba 355
Dị ka Acclaimed Music si kwuo, ha bụ onye omenkà nke 61st kacha eme eme akụkọ na egwu a ma ama
A gbakwunyere 'Fortunate Son' na Library of Congress' National Recording Registry ndepụta nke egwu egwu nke 'dị mkpa na ọdịbendị, akụkọ ihe mere eme, ma ọ bụ mara mma' na 2013
'Fortunate Son', 'Proud Mary', na Cosmo's Factory ka etinyerela n'ime ulo Grammy Hall of Fame
'Proud Mary' nọ na nomba 39 na VH1's '100 Greatest Rock Songs'
'Bad Moon Rising' but nke a hooro na nọmba 363 na NME's '500 Greatest Songs of All Time' ndepụta

Ụlọ ọgwụ creek (Federal Staff Hospital) na Awolowo Road, Ikoyi, Lagos gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Apo Legislative Quarters mgbe ndị ọrụ gọọmenti etiti si Lagos gaa Abuja
E kwalitere ụlọ ọgwụ creek site na ụlọ ahụike dị akwa 28 gaa na ụlọ ọgwụ 150-bed iji nye ndị Lagos ọrụ ahụike ọzọ
Crezane Bosch (amụrụ na 7 Mee, na afọ 1982) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye otu Democratic Alliance nke Gauteng Provincial Legislature maka nke isii
Tupu a họpụta ya na ndị omeiwu mpaghara, ọ bụ onye kansụl Tshwane
Bosch nwere diplọma na ụlọ ọrụ oku na njikwa ahịa site na Damelin na asambodo na njikwa mmekọrịta ọha na eze site na Public Relations Institute of Southern Africa
O nwekwara asambodo ọmụmụ ihe gbasara iwu na testament, ala na mbufe ma nwee nzere na profailing obodo, ngosi azụmahịa na ikwu okwu n'ihu ọha nke ọ nwetara na Mahadum Pretoria
Bosch nwetara asambodo na enyemaka ndị ọrụ na mmemme ahụike site na UP
Ọ na-amụ ugbu a maka LLB na Mahadum nke South Africa
Ọrụ Bosch na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị malitere na afọ 2006 mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye na-eme ihe ike na Democratic Alliance na onye isi oche nke alaka DA nke 5 na Tshwane (Pretoria)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ oge niile nke DA na dị ka onye njikwa ọrụ mpaghara na afọ 2007
N'afọ 2009, a kpọrọ Bosch aha dị ka onye njikwa ọrụ mpaghara nke mpaghara Gauteng East nke DA
A họpụtara Bosch dị ka onye kansụl Tshwane na ntuli aka ime obodo nke afọ 2011
A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'afọ 2016
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi nke DA caucus na Tshwane
N'ọnwa Ọktoba, na afọ 2017, a họpụtara Bosch ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche mpaghara nke DA maka ntuli aka na ntuli aka ọzọ na Tshwane

A họpụtara Bosch ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu Gauteng Provincial Legislature na-esote ntuli aka nke Gauteng nke afọ 2019, ebe ọ bụ onye nke iri na abụọ na ndepụta nke pati ahụ ma pati ahụ meriri oche iri abụọ
A ṅụrụ Bosch iyi dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu mpaghara na 22 Mee na afọ 2019
Ọ natara ọrụ kọmitii ya na 13 Juun
Ọ na-eje ozi na Kọmitii Social Development Portfolio na Kọmiti Sports, Arts, Culture and Recreation
Bosch nwere nwa nwanyị
Cri-Zelda Brits nke enwekwara ike dekwa ka Crizelda Brits ma ọbụ‬ Cri-zelda Brits (Ọmụmụ 20 November, 1983) bụ onye nke na egwu egwuregwu aka nke ndi bekee na akpọ Cricket na ụwa nịịle
Brits bụ onye obodo ndi South Africa
Criegee intermediate (nke a na-akpọkwa Criegee zwitterion ma ọ bụ Criegee biradical) bụ carbonil oxide nwere akuku abụọ
Kemikall ndị a nwere ike imeghachi omume na sulfur dioxide na nitrogen oxides na ikuku ụwa, ma na-emetụta mmepụta nke aerosols, nke bụ ihe dị mkpa na ịchịkwa ihu igwe ụwa
Criegee intermediates bụkwa isi iyi dị mkpa nke OH (hydroxyl radicals)
OH radicals bụ ihe kachasị mkpa oxidant na troposphere, ma dị mkpa n'ịchịkwa ịdị mma ikuku na mmetọ
Mmeputa Nke udi a Nne mbu bu n'afo 1950 site n'aka Rudolf Criegee, onye nke abaghariri aha site na ya
I bughi ruo n'afo 2012 ka emere nchoputa wee hu kemikal ndi ahu
Infrared Spectroscopy tunyere alo nke Eletrik structure ka ekwukwaziri nwere agwa Zwitterionic karia agwa biradika nke ewputaburu na mbu
Criegee intermediates na-emepụta site na mmeghachi omume gas-phase nke alkenes na ozone na ikuku ụwa
Ozone na-agbakwunye gafee njikọ carbon abụọ nke alkene iji mepụta molozonide, nke na-agbawa iji mepụta carbonyl (RR'CO) na carbonyl oxide
A maara nke ikpeazụ dị ka Criegee intermediate
Mmeghachi omume alkene ozonolysis bụ oke exothermic, na-ewepụta ihe dị ka 50 kilocalories kwa mole (210 kJ / mol) nke ike karịrị akarị
Ya mere, a na-emepụta Criegee intermediates na nnukwu ike dị n'ime
Mgbe e mepụtara Criegee intermediates, ụfọdụ n'ime ha ga-emebi ngwa ngwa unimolecular, na-emepụta OH radicals na ngwaahịa ndị ọzọ
Otú ọ dị, ha nwere ike ịkwụsi ike site na mmekọrịta ya na ụmụ irighiri ihe ndị ọzọ ma ọ bụ meghachi omume na kemịkal ndị ọzọ iji nye ngwaahịa dị iche iche
Criegee intermediates nwere ike ịkwụsi ike site na mgbagwoju anya na molecules ndị ọzọ na ikuku
Ndị a kwụsiri ike Criegee intermediates nwere ike ịnata okpomọkụ unimolecular decay na OH radicals na ngwaahịa ndị ọzọ, ma ọ bụ nwere ike ịnwe mmeghachi omume bimolecular na ụdị ikuku ndị ọzọ

Na usoro mmeghachi omume ozonolysis, Criegee intermediate na-emeghachi omume na carbonil compound ọzọ (n'ozuzu aldehyde ma ọ bụ ketone byproduct nke Criegee-intermediate formation reaction n'onwe ya) iji mepụta ozonide (1,2,4-trioxolane)
Crispen Chakanyuka (1943 - 2002) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara Guruve, Chakanyuka gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1960, wee gaa Nyanga ịchọ ọrụ
N'ebe ahụ ka o zutere Joram Mariga, onye John Takawira kpọbatara ya
Mariga kụziiri ya ịkpụ ihe, n'oge na-adịghị anya o zigara ya Frank McEwen na National Gallery of Zimbabwe
McEwen wegara Chakanyuka na Nyarutsetso Art Centre, ebe ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ na-akpụ ma na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkụzi
Ozugbo e guzobere ya, ọ laghachiri Guruve ma mepee ụlọ ọrụ
Na 1966 Tom Blomefield, onye nwe Ugbo Tengenenge na Guruve, gwara Chakanyuka ka ọ kụziere ya ịkpụ ihe
Chakanyuka mere nke a, na-achọpụta ọtụtụ akụ nke serpentinite n'ugbo ahụ
Ka United Nations malitere itinye ihe mgbochi na Rhodesia, ọrụ ugbo ụtaba malitere ịbụ ihe na-abaaghị uru, ya mere ndị ikom abụọ ahụ mere ka ugbo ahụ ghọọ Tengenenge Sculpture Community
Chakanyuka nọrọ ọnwa ụfọdụ, na-akụziri ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto na-akpụ ihe
A manyere Chakanyuka ịhapụ ọrụ ya wee bụrụ onye na-ewu ụlọ mgbe agha nnwere onwe nke Zimbabwe malitere
Ọ gara n'ihu n'usoro ọrụ a ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ tupu ọ laghachi na ihe ọkpụkpụ na 1994, mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe na Chapungu Sculpture Park
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ laghachiri na ikpu ihe ọkpụkpụ, ma gosipụta ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mba ụwa ma sonye na ọtụtụ ọmụmụ ihe n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya
Ọrụ Chakanyuka na-emetụta nka nke ndị Shona, a pụkwara ịhụ ihe atụ nke ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na Chapungu Sculpture Park
Katarina Boshoff (onye amụrụ n'abalị asatọ nke ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1980 dị ka Katarina Cristina Boshoff ) bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu pop na onye na-eti egwu na Cape Town
A mụrụ Boshoff na Stellenbosch, ma nwee ikike amaala abụọ na South Africa na Spain
Ọ malitere ịkpọ piano mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, ma nweta nkwekọrịta ndekọ mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ
Katarina bụ onye akụkụ nke South Africa,na onye akụkụ nke Dutch
Boshoff wepụtara egwu mbụ ya, 'I'm only human' n'afọ 1999
Otu egwu a nọ n'elu chattị nke South African National Campus
Ọ nọrọ izu itoolu nke ogo iri anọ nọ n'elu nke South African National Top 40 Charts, ebe ọ ruru ọkwa nke isii
N'afọ 2000, ọ sokwunyere egwu ahụ na abọm mbụ ya, This is me

Maria Cristina Lopes Almeida Fontes Lima (amụrụ n'afọ 1958) bụ onye ọka iwu na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Cape Verde nke jere ozi dị ka minista ikpe ziri ezi site n'afọ 2001 ruo afọ 2006, Minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa site n'afo 2006 ruo afọ 2011 na osote praịm minista na minista ahụike site n'afo 2011 ruo afọ 2016
A mụrụ Fontes Lima n'afọ 1958
N'afọ 1981, ọ nwetara nzere iwu na Faculdade de Direito da Universidade Clássica de Lisboa
N'afọ 1996, ọ nwetara Master of Public Administration na Mahadum Southern Illinois
Fontes Lima bụ onye otu African Party for the Independence of Cape Verde
Praịm Minista José Maria Neves họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na 13 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2001, dị ka Minista Ikpe Ziri Ezi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ a ruo na 8 Machị, na afọ 2006, mgbe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta nke Onye isi oche nke Kansụl nke Ndị Minista, Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mgbanwe nke steeti na Mịnịsta Nchebe
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara Fontes Lima ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Ahụike na osote Praịm Minista
Dị ka Minista Ahụike, ọ lekọtara mmeghachi omume mba ahụ maka ọrịa Ebola na mba ndị agbata obi na ọrịa Zika nke metụtara ihe karịrị mmadụ 7,000 na Cape Verde
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2014, ọ duziri ịbịanye aka na nkwekọrịta ahụike mba
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014, mgbe Neves kpebiri ịghara ịgba ọsọ maka oge nke anọ, Fontes Lima bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye ndu nke pati ahụ
Ọ bịara nke atọ na 85% nke votu na Janira Hopffer Almada (512%) na onye isi ndị omeiwu Felisberto Alves Vieira (403%)
Ọ hapụrụ ndị isi mgbe e meriri pati ahụ na ntuli aka 2016

Na Septemba, na afọ 2016, Fontes Lima bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa kansụl obodo Praia, mana onye na-agba ọsọ Movement for Democracy Oscar Santos meriri ya bụ onye nọchiri Ulisses Correia e Silva mgbe ọ hapụrụ iji gbaa ọsọ maka idu ndú mba ahụ

Crotylbarbital (Mepertan, Kalipnon, Barotal), nke a makwaara dị ka crotarbital, bụ ihe barbiturate nke Eli Lilly mepụtara n'afọ ndị 1930 Ọ nwere mmetụta sedative na hypnotic, ma jiri ya mee ihe maka ihe na eme ka ndị ọzọ na ụdị nke ụwa ọgwụgwọ ehighị ụra ruo mgbe e ji ọgwụ ahụ nwere ndị ọzọ dochie ya na obere mmetụta na obere ihe ize ndụ nke ịṅụbiga ya ókè
Ihe ana-kpo Crusades bu agha ano ndi Christians ma ndi Muslim luru na oge 1095 ru 1291
O bidoro mgbe ndi Christian choro uzo ha nwere ike wefu ndi Islam na ala wo di kpo Holy Land (ebe Jerusalem ma Israel), ebe ndi Jews binala, mgbe gara-aga
Ha luo ogu wo, luo-luo, ndi Islam a nonye
Ndị ama ama naza Cruywagen bụ afa nna nke Africans gụnyere
Cry the Darkness One Woman's Triumph over the Tragedy of Incest bụ akụkọ ndụ onwe onye nke Donna L
Friess dere nke na-akọwapụta mmetọ mmekọahụ nna ya na nwa nwanne ya nwaanyị, na otu Friessa si emeso ya
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ahụ na N’afo Puku nari itolu na iri itolu na ato (1993) site n'aka mgbasa Ozo ahuike

Crystal Cox (amụrụ na ọnwa Machị 28, na afọ 1979, na Norfolk, Virginia) bụ onye America na-eme egwuregwu track and field onye nọ na otu mba na 2004 Athens Summer Olympics ma pụta dị ka onye na-asọmupi na oge nke iri na asaa nke usoro ihe omume Survivor
Cox ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na 4x400 m relay ụmụ nwanyị na 2004 Athens Summer Olympics
E mechara napụ ya ọla edo n'afọ 2012 mgbe ọ kwetara na ọ na-eji ọgwụ ọjọọ eme ihe
N'Atens, ọ gbara ọsọ na agba nke mbụ mana ọ bụghị na nke ikpeazụ
DeeDee Trotter, Monique Henderson, Sanya Richards na Monique Hennagan gbara ọsọ na ngwụcha
N'afọ 2004, ọ bụ onye mmeri America nke 200m n'ime ụlọ
Na ọnwa Jenụwarị 29, na afọ 2010, Associated Press na ESPNcom kọrọ na Cox kwetara na ọ na-eji anabolic steroids site na 2001 ruo 2004
N'ihi ya, ọ tụfuru nsonaazụ ya niile site n'oge ahụ, wee kweta na a ga-akwụsị ya afọ anọ nke gwụrụ na Jenụwarị 2014
IAAF atụwo aro ka e wepụ ihe nrite ha n'òtù egwuregwu Olympic 4x400 nke ụmụ nwanyị US nke afọ 2004
N'afọ 2013, ma IAAF na IOC kwupụtara na a ga-ekwe ka ndị otu America (ma e wezụga Cox) jide ihe nrite ọla edo ha
Cox bụ otu n'ime ndị na-asọmupi na Survivor Gabon, nke gosipụtara na Fall 2008
N'agbanyeghị ọzụzụ Olympic ya, Cox meriri 11 n'ime ihe ịma aka agbụrụ 13, ọ bụ ezie na ọ banyere na isii ikpeazụ
Njikọ ya bụ Kenny Hoang, Jessica 'Sugar' Kiper, Susie Smith, na Matty Whitmore
Na Disemba 11, 2008, ihe omume, a họpụtara Cox wee bụrụ onye nke ise n'ime ndị ọka ikpe

Crystal Lee bụ onye so chọpụta Silicon Valley mmalite LifeSite Lee bụ onye mbụ gbara ọsọ na asọmupi Miss America 2014, Miss California 2013, Miss Chinatown USA 2010, na Miss California's Outstanding Teen 2008
Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye na-elekọta ndị Golden State Warriors
A mụrụ Lee na San Francisco, California ye nna ya bụ onye China-American na nne ya bụ onye Taiwan
Lee gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ruth Asawa San Francisco School of the Arts

ya na bayoloji mmadụ na MA

Lee bụ onye nke mbụ na asọmupi Miss America 2014 ebe ikpo okwu ya bụ 'Women in STEM'

N'oge ikpeazụ nke asọmupi Miss America, Lee na Miss New York Nina Davuluri bụ ndị asọmupi ikpeazụ fọdụrụ n'elu ikpo okwu
Onye na-akwado ha bụ Lara Spencer bịakwutere ha bụ onye jụrụ ha otú obi dị n'oge ahụ

N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Michel Martin nke NPR mechara, Davulri kọwara oge ahụ dị ka, 'ahụmahụ dị egwu, nke na-abụghị nke ahụ, ịnọ ebe ahụ na abụọ ikpeazụ

Mụ na Miss California, Crystal Lee, na-ejide aka, anyị abụọ na-eguzo n'ebe ahụ n'oge akụkọ ihe mere eme dị otú ahụ - ndị Eshia-Amerịka abụọ ga-ewere aha ahụ ma bụrụ ihe nnọchianya ọhụrụ nke olileanya na agbamume
Mgbe a gwara Lee ka ọ kwurịta okwu ikpeazụ n'ajụjụ ọnụ o mechara kwuo na ọ
lekwasịrị anya na ọkwa nke nsonaazụ ma echeghị banyere anyị ịbụ ndị Eshia

Ana m eche mgbe niile na onwe m bụ onye America dị ka m bụ onye Eshia

Enwere m olileanya na ọ na-asụ asụsụ abụọ, kwa!

iwu nri okpukpe nwekwara ike nwee mmetụta siri Ike na nri, dika HinduismSikhism in Punjabi cuisine, Buddhism in punjabi cuisine, Buddhism in East Asian cuisine, iso ụzọ Kraịst na European cuisine, Islam in Middle Eastern cuisine, and Judaism in Jewish na Israeli cuisine
