Ihe ụfọdụ nwere mmetụta na nri mpaghara gụnyere ihu igwe nke mpaghara ahụ, azụmahịa n'etiti mba dị iche iche, iwu okpukpe ma ọ bụ nke dị oke ọnụ na mgbanwe ọdịbendị nri
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, nri ndị dị n'ebe okpomọkụ nwere ike ịdabere na mkpụrụ osisi na akwụkwọ nri, ebe nri ndị dị na polar nwere ike ịdaba na anụ na azụ
Ọnọdụ ihu igwe nke mpaghara ahụ, n'ụzọ dị ukwuu, na-ekpebi nri ndị dị
Na mgbakwunye, ihu igwe na-emetụta nchekwa nri
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, nri echekwara maka oriri n'oge oyi site na ịṅụ sịga, ịgwọ ọrịa, na ịpị nri anọgidewo na-adị mkpa na nri ụwa maka mgbanwe ha na-atọ ụtọ
Azụmaahịa dị n'etiti mba dị iche iche na-emetụtakwa nri mpaghara

Site na azụmaahịa ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ oge ochie, ihe oriri ndị dị ka sinamọn, cassia, cardamom, ginger, na turmeric bụ ihe dị mkpa nke azụmahịa na mmalite mbụ nke azụmahịa, India bụkwa ahịa zuru ụwa ọnụ maka nke a
Cinnamon na cassia chọtara ụzọ ha gaa Middle East ma ọ dịkarịa ala afọ 4,000 gara aga
Ụfọdụ nri na nri ndị a kwadebere chọrọ ma ọ bụ machibido iwu site na okpukpe ma ọ bụ iwu dị elu, dị ka iwu nri ndị Alakụba na iwu nri ndị Juu
Mgbanwe omenala nri bụkwa ihe dị mkpa maka nri n'ọtụtụ mpaghara ngosipụta mbụ nke Japan na West bịara na mbata nke ndị ozi ala ọzọ Europe na ọkara nke abụọ nke narị afọ nke iri na isii

N'oge ahụ, njikọta nke usoro ịgba nri egwuregwu Spanish na Portuguese na usoro East Asia maka isi akwụkwọ nri na mmanụ dugara na mmepe nke tempura, 'nri ndị Japan a ma ama nke a na-eji ihe oriri mmiri na ọtụtụ ụdị akwụkwọ nri dị iche iche kpuchie ya na ntụ ọka ma sie ya nke ọma'
Nri malitere n'oge ochie
Ka nri malitere ịchọ atụmatụ ndị ọzọ, e nwere mpụta nke nri ndị dị gburugburu ọdịbendị
Nri na-aga n'ihu na-agbanwe, a na-emepụta nri ọhụrụ site na ihe ọhụrụ na mmekọrịta ọdịbendị

Otu ihe atụ na-adịbeghị anya bụ nri ngwakọta, nke jikọtara ihe dị iche iche nke ọdịnala nri dị iche iche ma ọ bụghị ụdị nri ọ bụla, ma na-ezo aka na ihe ọhụrụ n'ọtụtụ nri ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke oge a kemgbe afọ 1970

Nouvelle cuisine (Nri ọhụrụ) bụ ụzọ isi sie nri na nri ngosi na nri French nke ndị na-akatọ nri Henri Gault, bụ ndị mepụtara ahịrịokwu ahụ, na ndị ọrụ ibe ya André Gayot na Christian Millau mere ka ọ bụrụ ihe a ma ama na 1960s na nduzi ụlọ oriri ọhụrụ, Gault-Millau, ma ọ bụ Le Nouveau Guide
[citation needed] Molecular cuisine, bụ ụdị nri nke oge a nke na-eji ọtụtụ ọhụrụ teknụzụ sitere na ọzụzụ sayensị (molecular cuisine)

Okwu a sitere n'afọ 1999 site n'aka onye France na-ahụ maka ọgwụ INRA Hervé n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ịmata ọdịiche dị n'etiti ya na aha Molecular gastronomy (ọrụ sayensị) nke ya na onye nwụrụ anwụ na Oxford physicist Nicholas Kurti webatara na 1988
A na-akpọkwa ya nri nwere ọtụtụ mmetụta, nri nke oge a, physics nri, na nri nnwale site n'aka ụfọdụ ndị na-esi nri
E wezụga nke ahụ, azụmaahịa mba ụwa na-eweta nri ọhụrụ gụnyere ihe ndị dị na nri dị ugbu a ma na-eduga na mgbanwe

Iwebata ose ọkụ na China site na South America na ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri na asaa, na-emetụta nri Sichuan nke ukwuu, nke jikọtara ụtọ mbụ (site na iji ose Sichuan) na ụtọ ose ọkụ ọhụrụ ma mepụta ụtọ mala pụrụ iche nke na-esi ísì ụtọ ma na-esi ụtọ
Nri zuru ụwa ọnụ bụ nri a na-eme gburugburu ụwa, a pụkwara ịhazi ya dịka ojiji a na-ejikarị nri, gụnyere ọka, mmepụta na abụba
Nri nri mpaghara nwere ike ịdịgasị iche dabere na nnweta na ojiji nke ihe ụfọdụ, omenala na omume nri mpaghara, yana ọdịiche ọdịbendị n'ozuzu
Ihe ndị dị otú ahụ nwere ike ịbụ otu ihe ma ọ bụ obere n'ofe ókèala dị iche iche, ma ọ bụ dịgasị iche iche n'ime mpaghara ọ bụla
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, na Central na North South America, ọka (mkpụrụ), ma dị ọhụrụ ma kpọnwụrụ akpọnwụ, bụ nri bụ isi, a na-ejikwa ya n'ọtụtụ ụzọ dị iche iche
N'ebe ugwu Europe, ọka wit, rye, na abụba sitere na anụmanụ na-ebute ụzọ, ebe n'ebe ndịda Europe mmanụ oliv dị ebe niile na osikapa jupụtara
N'Ịtali, nri nke ugwu, nke gosipụtara bọta na osikapa, dị iche na nke ndịda, ya na pasta ọka wit na mmanụ oliv
N'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke China, osikapa bụ isi, ebe na ndị ọzọ ọrụ a jupụtara na noodles na achịcha
N'ebe niile dị na Middle East na Mediterenian, ihe ndị a na-ahụkarị gụnyere nwa atụrụ, mmanụ oliv, lemon, ose, na osikapa
Iri akwụkwọ nri a na-eme n'ọtụtụ ebe n'India emeela ka pulses (ihe ọkụkụ a na-ewe naanị maka mkpụrụ kpọrọ nkụ) dị ka chickpeas na lentils dị mkpa dị ka ọka wit ma ọ bụ osikapa
Site na India ruo Indonesia, ojiji a na-eji ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ eme ihe n'ụzọ sara mbara; a na-ejikwa akị bekee na nri mmiri na mpaghara ahụ dum dị ka ihe oriri na ihe na-atọ ụtọ
Cullen Washington, Jr
(amụrụ n'afọ 1972) bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe osise nke ógè a
Washington bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na New York
A mụrụ Cullen Washington, Jr
na Alexandria, Louisiana na 1972
Dị ka nwatakịrị, ọ hụrụ sayensị n'anya, mana ọ makwaara na ọ chọrọ ịbụ ónyé na-ese ihe mgbè ọ dị obere
Ọ tolitere n'ebe nkwado dị ukwuu, ebe ọ bụghị naanị nne na nna ya kamakwa ụmụnne ya nwanyị abụọ gbara ya ume ịzụlite nkà nka ya
Mgbè ọ dị afọ itoolu, o gosipụtara ihe ngosi nka mbụ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị ya dị na Alexandria, nke mere ka mmasị ya na nka na-eto ngwa ngwa
O nwetara ákàrà ugo mmụta MFA ya na Tufts University / School of the Museum of Fine Arts Boston, na ákàrà ugo mmụta BFA na Louisiana State University
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na The Studio Museum na Harlem, The Contemporary Arts Museum Houston, Saatchi Gallery na London, na Museum of Science and Industry na Chicago

Site na Jenụwarị ruo Machị 2020, Mahadum nke Michigan Museum of Art gosipụtara ọrụ Washington na ihe ngosi akpọrọ Cullen Washington, Jr The Public Square Ọ bụ ezie na a haziri ka ọ rụọ ọrụ ruo na Mee, e belatara ihe ngosi ahụ mgbe ụlọ ngosi ahụ mechiri n'etiti Machị n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19
N'ihi ya, ébé ngosi nka ahụ tinyere ọrụ Washington na ébé nrụọrụ weebụ ha dị ka ihe ngosi n'ịntanetị

Washington abụwo ónyé na-ese ihe na-ebi na Amherst College (2016ī17), Fountainhead Residency (2016), The Studio Museum in Harlem (2013); Rush Arts Gallery (2012), Yaddo (2011), na Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture (2010)

Ihe osise Washington na-ejikarị ihe ndị dị ka 'tape, canvas, acrylic paint, charcoal dust, Black chalkboard paint, akwụkwọ, Black copier toner, acrylik medium, Black ink, Kraft paper, wax coated cotton string, latex house paint, rubber, waya, hot plastic glue na ear cushions'
Ọ kọwara ọrụ ya dị ka 'nke na-anọchite anya'

Omenala ( / ˈkʌl tʃər / ) bụ okwu nche anwụ nke gụnyere omume ọha mmadụ na ụkpụrụ ndị a na-ahụ na ọha mmadụ , yana ihe ọmụma, nkwenkwe, nka, iwu, nri, ntimiwu,igba afa,omenala, ikike na omume nke ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu na ndị a
otu
N'ihe gbasara mmadụ, otu echiche omenala dị ka njirimara maobu ilu ihe bara na mmadụ bụ ogo nke ha zụlitere ọkaibe na nka, sayensị, agụmakwụkwọ ma ọ bụ omume
A na-ejikwa ọkwa ọkaibe omenala eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ iji mata ọdịiche mmepeanya na obodo ndị na-adịchaghị mgbagwoju anya

A na-ahụkwa echiche usoro nhazi ndị dị otú ahụ na klaasị n'etiti oke omenaala nke ọha mmadụ na omenala dị ala, omenala ewu ewu, ma ọ bụ omenala ọha nke klaasị dị ala, nke a na-ahụta site n'inweta isi obodo omenala di iche iche
N'asụsụ nkịtị, a na-ejikarị omenala na-ezo aka kpọmkwem na akara ngosi ndị agbụrụ na-eji amata onwe ha n'ụzọ pụtara ìhè na ibe ha dị ka mgbanwe ahụ, uwe ma ọ bụ ọla
Omenala Mass na -ezo aka n'ụdị omenala ndị ahịa ewepụtara na n'ọtụtụ ebe nke malitere na narị afọ nke 20
Ụfọdụ ụlọ akwụkwọ nke nkà ihe ọmụma, dị ka Marxism na oké egwu tiori, na-arụ ụka na omenala na-ejikarị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ka ngwá ọrụ nke elites na-emegharị proletariat na ike ụgha nsụhọ
Echiche ndị dị ofu ahụ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na ọzụzụ nke ọmụmụ omenala

Na sayensị ọha mmadụ sara mbara, echiche echiche nke ịhụ ihe onwunwe n'anya omenala na -ekwu na omenala ihe atụ nke mmadụ na-esite na ọnọdụ ihe onwunwe nke ndụ mmadụ, dị ka ụmụ mmadụ na-emepụta ọnọdụ maka ịdị ndụ anụ ahụ, nakwa na a na-achọta ndabere nke omenala na ọdịdị ọdịdị ndụ
Mgbe ejiri ya mee ihe dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ, 'omenala' bụ usoro omenala, omenala na ụkpụrụ nke obodo ma ọ bụ obodo, dị ka agbụrụ ma ọ bụ mba
Omenala bụ usoro ihe ọmụma enwetara ka oge na-aga
N'echiche a, multiculturalism ji ịdị n'otu udo na nkwanye ùgwù dị n'etiti omenala dị iche iche na-ebi n'otu mbara ala kpọrọ ihe
Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-ejikwa “omenala” kọwaa omume dị iche iche n'ime otu obere obodo, obere omenala (dịka ọmụmaatụ, ' bro omenala ' ), ma ọ bụ ihe mgbochi

N'ime nkà mmụta ihe omimi nke omenala, echiche na nleba anya nke nkwekọ omenala na- ekwenye na omenala enweghị ike ịdepụta ma ọ bụ nyochaa ngwa ngwa n'ihi na nleba anya ọ bụla dị n'ime usoro uru nke omenala enyere

Okwu ọgbara ọhụrụ a bụ 'omenala' gbadoro ụkwụ n'okwu onye ọkà okwu Rome oge ochie Cicero ji mee ihe na esemokwu Tusculanae ya, bụ ebe o dere maka ịkọ mkpụrụ obi ma ọ bụ 'cultura anime,' na-eji ihe atụ nke ugbo maka mmepe nke a
mmụọ nke nkà ihe ọmụma, ghọtara teleologically dị ka kasị elu kwere omume maka mmepe mmadụ
Samuel Pufendorf weghaara ihe atụ a n'oge ọgbara ọhụrụ, nke pụtara ihe yiri ya, mana ọ naghịzi eche na nkà ihe ọmụma bụ izu oke okike mmadụ
Ojiji ya, na nke ọtụtụ ndị edemede na-esote ya, ' na-ezo aka n'ụzọ nile nke ụmụ mmadụ si emeri omume ọjọọ mbụ ha, na site na nkà, ghọọ mmadụ zuru oke'

na mbụ pụtara cultivation nke mkpụrụ obi ma ọ bụ uche, na-enweta ọtụtụ n'ime ya mesịrị n'oge a pụtara na odide nke narị afọ nke 18 German na-eche echiche, bụ ndị nọ n'ọkwa dị iche iche na-emepe emepe Rousseau nkatọ nke ' Modern liberalism na Enlightenment' Ya mere, ọdịiche dị n'etiti 'omenala' na ' mmepeanya ' na-apụtakarị n'ime ndị ode akwụkwọ a, ọ bụrụgodị na akọwapụtaghị ya
Sociology nke omenala metụtara omenala dị ka egosipụtara na ọha mmadụ

Maka ọkà mmụta mmekọrịta ọha na eze Georg Simmel (1858-1918), omenala na-ezo aka na 'ịkụ mkpụrụ nke ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu site na ụlọ ọrụ nke ụdị dịpụrụ adịpụ bụ nke a kwadoro n'ime akụkọ ihe mere eme' N'ihi ya, a pụrụ ịkọwa omenala na ngalaba mmekọrịta ọha na eze dị ka ụzọ iche echiche, ụzọ e si eme omume, na ihe onwunwe na-ejikọta ọnụ na-akpụzi ụzọ ndụ ndị mmadụ
Omenala nwere ike ịbụ ụdị abụọ ọ bụla, omenala na-abụghị ihe onwunwe ma ọ bụ omenala ihe onwunwe

Omenala na-abụghị nke ihe onwunwe na-ezo aka n'echiche ndị na-abụghị nke anụ ahụ nke ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu nwere banyere omenala ha, gụnyere ụkpụrụ, usoro nkwenye, iwu, ụkpụrụ, omume, asụsụ, òtù, na ụlọ ọrụ, ebe omenala ihe onwunwe bụ ihe àmà anụ ahụ nke omenala na ihe ndị ahụ
na architecture ha mere ma ọ bụ mee
Okwu a na-achọsi ike naanị na ọmụmụ ihe ochie na ihe gbasara mmadụ, mana ọ pụtara kpọmkwem ihe akaebe ihe onwunwe niile nwere ike ịsị na omenala, n'oge gara aga ma ọ bụ ugbu a

Usoro mmekọrịta ọha na eze na-etolite site na njikọ dị n'etiti sociology (dị ka ndị ọkà mmụta oge mbụ dị ka Marx, Durkheim, na Weber ) nwere ọzụzụ na-eto eto nke nkà mmụta ihe ọmụmụ, bụ ebe ndị nchọpụta sụrụ ụzọ ethnographic atụmatụ maka ịkọwa na nyochaa omenala dị iche iche gburugburu ụwa

Akụkụ nke ihe nketa nke mmalite mmepe nke ubi na-adabere na usoro (ọtụtụ omenala, nchọpụta mmekọrịta ọha na eze bụ qualitative), na chepụtara (ụdị dị iche iche dị oke egwu na-abịaru nso na sociology bụ isi na obodo nyocha ugbu a), na n'ụzọ dị ịrịba ama na-elekwasị anya
nke ubi
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, mmekọrịta dị n'etiti omenala ndị a ma ama, njikwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na ọha mmadụ bụ nchegbu mbụ na nke na-adịgide adịgide n'ọhịa
Na United Kingdom, ọmụmụ omenala na-elekwasị anya n'ịmụ banyere omenala ndị a ma ama; ya bụ, n'ihe gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke ọtụtụ ndị na-azụ ahịa na ihe ntụrụndụ
Richard Hoggart chepụtara okwu ahụ na 1964 mgbe ọ tọrọ ntọala Birmingham Center for Contemporary Cultural Studies ma ọ bụ CCCS
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ na-enwe mmekọrịta siri ike na Stuart Hall, bụ onye nọchiri Hoggart dị ka onye nduzi

Ya mere, a pụrụ ile ọmụmụ omenala n'echiche a anya dị ka obere ntinye uche gbadoro anya na mgbagwoju anya nke ịzụ ahịa, bụ nke sitere na omenala sara mbara mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ' mmepe anya Western Western ' ma ọ bụ ' ịkọ ụwa ọnụ'
Site na 1970s gaa n'ihu, ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ Stuart Hall, yana nke ndị ọrụ ibe ya Paul Willis, Dick Hebdige, Tony Jefferson, na Angela McRobbie, kere otu ọgụgụ isi mba ụwa

Ka ogige ahụ malitere, ọ malitere ijikọta akụ na ụba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nkwurịta okwu, nkà mmụta mmekọrịta ọha na eze, nkà mmụta mmekọrịta ọha na eze, edemede edemede, usoro mgbasa ozi, ọmụmụ ihe nkiri / vidio, omenala anthropology, nkà ihe ọmụma, ihe ngosi ihe ngosi nka, na akụkọ ihe mere eme nkà iji mụọ ihe ngosi omenala ma ọ bụ ederede omenala
N'ebe a, ndị nchọpụta na-etinyekarị uche n'otú ihe pụrụ iche si metụta echiche echiche, mba, agbụrụ, klaasị, na/ma ọ bụ okike
Ọmụmụ omenala na-emetụta ihe pụtara na omume nke ndụ kwa ụbọchị
Omume ndị a gụnyere ụzọ ndị mmadụ si eme ihe ụfọdụ (dịka ikiri telivishọn ma ọ bụ iri nri) na omenala enyere
Ọ na-amụkwa ihe ọ pụtara ma na-eji ndị mmadụ akọwapụta ihe dị iche iche na omume
Kpọmkwem, omenala gụnyere ihe pụtara na omume ndị a na-ejide onwe ha n'enweghị uche

Ikiri ihe onyonyo iji lelee anya ọha na eze na ihe omume akụkọ ihe mere eme ekwesịghị iche dị ka omenala ma ọ bụrụ na ọ na-ezo aka na igwe onyonyo n'onwe ya, nke nwere ike ịbụ na a họrọla ya na omenala; Otú ọ dị, ụmụ akwụkwọ na-ekiri telivishọn mgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ na ndị enyi ha ka ha 'daba adaba' na-ruru eru n'ezie ebe ọ bụ na ọ dịghị ihe gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ ihe mere mmadụ na-ekere òkè na omume a
Enwere ọtụtụ na ndiozo nkwekọrịta mba ụwa na iwu obodo gbasara nchekwa omenala na ihe nketa omenala
UNESCO na ndị otu ya dị ka Blue Shield International na-ahazi nchedo mba ụwa na mmejuputa obodo
N'ụzọ bụ isi, Nkwekọrịta Hague maka Nchedo nke Omenala Ngwongwo n'ihe omume nke Armed Conflict na UNESCO Convention for Protection of Cultural Diversity na-ekwu maka nchebe nke omenala

Curtis Harding (amụrụ na June 11, 1979) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu na ónyé na-ede egwu
N'ịbụ ónyé na-ese mkpụrụ obi, ụdị 'slop 'n' mkpụrụ obi' ya na-ebu mmetụta nke ụdị gụnyere blues, gospel, psychedelia, R&B, na rock
Abọm mbụ ya, Soul Power (2014), Face Your Fear sochiri ya na 2017, na mmepụta sitere na Danger Mouse na Sam Cohen
A mụrụ Harding na Saginaw, Michigan, ezinụlọ ya bírí na Atlanta mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
A kpughere ya egwu mgbè ọ dị obérè ka ezinụlọ ya na nne ya, ónyé bụ onye na-agụ egwú gospel, na-eme njem
N'afọ 2000, Harding kwadoro CeeLo Green, o guzobere R&B / garage rock band Night Sun na Atlanta na ndị Black Lips na 2009
A mụrụ Harding na June 11, 1979, na Saginaw, Michigan
Nna ya bụ onye na-arụzi ụgbọala, nné ya, Dorothy, bụ onye na'agụ egwú gospel
A zụlitere ya na ụmụnne ya ise dị ka ndị Mennonite
Ha kwagara Alabama Mgbè ọ dị afọ atọ, wee gaa Arizona, California, Texas, na akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke United States
Ezinụlọ ya enweghị ebe obibi na-adịgide adịgide ruo mgbè ha biri na Atlanta, Georgia, mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
His mother toured in a van, stopping to sing at churches and work at homeless shelters
Though he originally wanted to play professional sports, Harding grew up around his mother's music, occasionally joining her on stage as a backing singer until age 15
His family would stay – sometimes for months – at communities with churches of any denomination
Harding's sister, an amateur rapper, introduced him to secular music
Dwan Howard, ónyé a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Curtiss King bụ ónyé America na-edekọ hip hop na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ nke sitere na Inland Empire

N'ịbụ ónyé bịanyere aka na akara onwe ya, Black Cloud Music, a makwaara King màkà mmepụta ya na ndị na-ese ihe dịka Murs, Noa James, Top Dawg Entertainment na-edekọ Ab-Soul, Glasses Malone, Mack 10 na ndị ọzọ

Curtiss King tolitere dị ka nwatakịrị na-eme ihere, ọkachasị mgbè ọ na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ Curtiss Middle, ọ chọtara ụzọ iji lụso enweghị ntụkwasị obi ya ọgụ site n'ige egwu na ịla n'iyi na sitcoms 90s; na-enye ya aha egwu ya Curtiss King

Site na mbido, site n'enyemaka nkè enyi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, YouTube, na kaadị ọbá akwụkwọ, Curtiss King malitere ịkụziri onwe ya otu esi emepụta, injinia ma dee ndekọ nke ya, dezie vidiyo nke ya, mepụta mkpuchi abọm nke ya, dee ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nkè ya, ma wuo akara ya site na ala
A cushion bụ akpa dị nro nke ihe ịchọ mma ụfọdụ, nke a na-ejikarị ajị anụ, ntutu, ábụ́bà, eriri polyester staple, ihe na-abụghị ákwà, ogho, ma ọ bụ ọbụna akwụkwọ a dọwara n'ime iberibe

Ekwere ndị mmadụ n'ihe dị ka onye isi oche nkeji nkeji obodo ndị mee ụdị ntọala ike iji ya mee ihe maka ịnọdụ ala ma ọ bụ ikpere n'elu, ma ọ bụ iji mee ka ike ma ọ bụ akụkụ nke oche ma ọ bụ oche dị nro
Ihe ịchọ mma na-enwekarị ihe mkpuchi, a na-ejikwa ya eme ihe maka ihe ịchọ mma maka nsogbụ ụra akpa dị ka onye isi oche n'ime ndị oche
Enwere ike iji cushions na tapis mee ihe nwa oge n'èzí iji mee ka ala siri ike dị nro
Enwere ike itinye ha na sunloungers ma jiri ha gbochie iwe site na ahịhịa na-ekpo ọkụ na ụmụ ahụhụ na-ata
Ụfọdụ olumba ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mere n'oge gara aga akụkọ nke Bekee na-eji okwu a na-ezo aka n'ịtụfu ohiri isi
Ihe mkpuchi ahụ bụ ihe mkpuchi oge ochie; ndepụta nke ihe dị n'obí eze na nnukwu ụlọ na mmalite oge etiti na-ekwu maka ha mgbe niile
Cushions na-adịkarị ukwuu, na-ekpuchi akpụkpọ anụ, ma sie ike iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka oche, mana ọchịchọ siri ike nke oche niile abụwo ịbawanye obere ka oge na-aga
Taa, a na-ewere cushion dị ka ihe mkpuchi
Okwu cushion sitere na Middle English cushin, site na Anglo-French cussin, quissin, site na Vulgar Latin *coxinus, na site na Latin coxa, hip
Ojiji mbụ a maara nke okwu cushion bụ na narị afọ nke iri na anọ
A maara Cushions maka ịdị mma na ịdị nro
Cuthy Mede bụ onye na-ese ihe na Malawi
A mụrụ Cuthy Mede nye nne na nna ndị Malawi na Zimbabwe na 1949
Ọ tolitere na Likoma Island na Lake Malawi
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gụrụ Fine Arts na Chancellor College
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na 1970s na alma mater ya
N'afọ 1980, Mede guzobere Gallerie Africaine, ụlọ ngosi nka mbụ nke onye na-ese ihe n'ógbè ahụ na Malawi
Mede gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Lilongwe's City Centre, na-ere ọrụ ya nye ndị nchịkọta mba ụwa
Mede gbara ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe na Malawi ume ka ha bụrụ ndị na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ndị na-ere ahịa n'okporo ámá na-ere ihe osise ọdịnala na ihe osise osisi
O wetara ọrụ nka mara mma site n'aka ndị na-ese ihe ndị ọzọ na Malawi n'ime ụlọ ngosi ya
Otu ọrụ bụ maka nnukwu mgbidi na-achọ ụlọ ọrụ obodo ahụ mma
A maara Mede nke ọma maka ụdị nka nke oge a nke oge a, nke ọdịnihu, nke cubist, na nke pointillist, nke nwere isiokwu mpaghara siri ike

Ihe osise ya na-egosi ndị obodo, ihe ndị mere n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na ihe ndị dị ugbu a na Malawi, ihe odide Bible na nkọwa mpaghara, okwu okpukpe ụmụ amaala, na ihe osise banyere echiche ndị dị ka Ikpe Ziri Ezi, Anyaukwu, Nwoke na ìgwè ọrụ
Cuvok (French Tchouvok) o bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ n'ebe ugwu Cameroon
Ihe dị ka ndị ọkà okwu 5,000 na-asụ Cuvok (ALCAM 1983) na gburugburu Tchouvok, nso Zamay (Mokolo commune, Mayo-Tsanaga department), Far North Region
Cuvok nwere njikọ chiri anya na Mefele (karịsịa asụsụ Muhura) dịka North Mofu dị na South Mofu
Keldrick Sapp, onye a maara nke ọma dị ka Cyber Sapp bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na ónyé na-ede egwu si Atlanta, Georgia, onye a ma ama maka ịmepụta egwu Gucci Mane 'Freaky Gurl'

Cash 'Keep Doing It' nke gosipụtara Lamar Starzz

Cynthia Onyedikachi Aku (amụrụ na 31 Disemba 1999) bụ onye Naịjịrịa na-agba bọọlụ, onye na-agba ọsọ maka Ataşehir Belediyespor na Turkish Women's Football Super League
Ọ nọchitere anya Naijiria na ọkwa ndị ntorobịa, tupu ya emee nke mbụ ya maka ndị otu okenye
Aku gbara bọọlụ na mba ya maka Rivers Angels na Naijiria Women Premier League
Na mbido afọ 2022, ọ kwagara Turkey, wee sonye na klọb Kireçburnu Spor nke dị na Istanbul iji gbaa bọọlụ na 2021-22 Turkish Women's Football Super League
N' ubọsi iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2022, ọ gafere na Ataşehir Belediyespor maka oge Super League ụmụ nwanyị nke 2022-23
Na 2019 WAFU Zone B Women's Cup, a kpọrọ Aku onye egwuregwu nke egwuregwu na mmeri Naịjirịa 15 na Niger

Cynthia Djohore (amụrụ na 16 Disemba na afọ 1987) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na mba Ivorian
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu Ivorian maka 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup
Cynthia Jele bụ onye edemede South Afrika
Obi ụtọ akwụkwọ akụkọ ya bụ Okwu Akwụkwọ Ozi anọ meriri ihe nrite afo 2011 Commonwealth Writers' for Best Book, Africa Region na ihe nrite ihe nkiri M-Net na afo 2011 M-Net Literary Awards
E mechara gbanwee akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri
O tolitere na Mpumalanga
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na North Central College, na BA na International Business na afo 2003
Jele rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ahụike ọha maka ngalaba ahụike Mpumalanga, wee nọrọ otu afọ na United States dịka au pair
N'afọ 2006, Jele bipụtara akwụkwọ ntuziaka n'onwe ya, yabụ ị chọrọ ịbụ Au Pair, ihe ụlọ ọrụ gị agaghị agwa
Dị ka ya si kwuo, ọ ghọrọ onye edemede na mberede, mgbe ọ gachara nnọkọ nke onye America na-ede akwụkwọ, bụ onye mere ka ndị na-ege ntị na-arụ ọrụ na mkpirikpi ederede
Onye edemede ahụ gụpụtara otu akụkụ nke akwụkwọ ma gwa ndị na-ege ntị ka ha dechaa paragraf abụọ mbụ
Ọ gara n'ihu biri na United Kingdom otu afọ
Mgbe ọ laghachiri South Afrika, Jele rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka njikwa
O guzobela ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ gbasara mmepe akụ na ụba, Lombuso Consulting Group
Na afo 2008 BTA/Anglo-Platinum Short Story Competition, ọ meriri ebe 1st
N'afọ 2011, ọ meriri ihe nrite afo 2011 Commonwealth Writers' Prize for the Best Book na mpaghara Afrịka maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ya Obi Ụtọ bụ Okwu nwere mkpụrụedemede anọ
Akwụkwọ akụkọ a bụ akụkọ gbasara enyi nwanyị anọ bi na Johannesburg
Edepụtakwara akwụkwọ akụkọ a maka onyinye nturu ugo ndị na-ere akwụkwọ afo 2011
E mechara gbanwee akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri
Mgbe ewepụtara ya na South Afrika na afo 2016, ọ ghọrọ ihe ịga nke ọma n'ọfịs igbe
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka njikwa, ma biri na Johannesburg
Cynthia Jerotich Limo (amụrụ na 18 Disemba na afọ 1989) bụ nwanyị Kenya na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-asọ mpi na asọmpi ịgba ọsọ n'okporo ụzọ
O nwere onye nrite ọlaọcha na IAAF World Half Marathon Championships na 2016
Ọkara marathon nke onwe ya kacha mma nke 66 04 nkeji, nke e debere na 2016, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị nke anọ kachasị ọsọ maka anya
Limo nwere ihe ịga nke ọma mbụ ya na mpaghara na afọ 2009 Baringo 15K, ebe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke atọ
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ gbara ọsọ na Kenyan Cross Country Championships, mana ọ nọ n'ọhịa, na-emecha nke 46
Ọ bụ n'okporo ụzọ nke France ka ọ malitere iguzobe onwe ya dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ dị elu
O nwere akara atọ kachasị elu na 2010 Nancy Half Marathon na 20 Kilomètres de Paris
Ọ gara n'ihu na-elekwasị anya na agbụrụ French n'ime afọ abụọ sochirinụ
Mmeri mbụ ya bịara na 20 Km de Tours na afọ 2011 ma na afọ 2012 o gosipụtara ọganihu ya site na mmeri na Humarathon ọkara marathon na nkeji 70 06 kacha mma na mmeri dị na Paris 20K na nkeji 65 36
Limo nyere ya mbụ na-erubeghị nkeji iri asaa iji merie na afọ 2013 Rabat Half Marathon
Ọ gwụchara n'elu abụọ n'ime agbụrụ okporo ụzọ ya niile n'afọ ahụ, ma e wezụga njedebe nke atọ na Humarathon
Ọ meriri Saint Denis Marathon ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ na Paris 20K na Marseille-Cassis Classique Internationale

Ọ gara n'ihu site na French circuit na oge 2014, malite site na mmeri na Madrid Half Marathon mgbe ahụ njem na-aga nke ọma nke agbụrụ America nke gụnyere ọtụtụ podium finishes, n'etiti ha mmeri na Steamboat Classic, Garry Bjorklund Half Marathon na onye nke abụọ na-agwụ na CrimMiler 10- na Boston Half Marathon, na-esetịpụ ihe ọhụrụ kachasị mma nke 68 24 nkeji na nke ikpeazụ
O nwere mmeri mbụ ya n'ụlọ na Baringo Half Marathon na Nọvemba
Na afọ 2015 gosipụtara na ọ bụ afọ Limo banyere n'ime ndị isi ụwa nke ọkara marathon na-agba ọsọ
O mere n'elu atọ na Ras Al Khaimah Half Marathon na nke kachasị mma nke 67 02 nkeji mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị nke ise kachasị ọsọ n'ụwa n'afọ ahụ
Ọ bụ onye mmeri Hy-Vee ọkara marathon jikọtara ya na Drake Relays, bụ onye nke abụọ na Boston na Luanda Half Marathon, wee gaa n'ihu n'ọhịa na Delhi Half Marathon
Ihe ịga nke ọma ya na American gara n'ihu na mmeri na Cooper River Bridge Run, Lilac Bloomsday Run na njedebe nke abụọ na Cherry Blossom 10-Miler, Freihofer's Run For Women na Utica Boilermaker

Houston Half Marathon bụ asọmpi mbụ nke Limo na 2016 na ọgụ ya na Mary Wacera Ngugi dugara n'oge ngwa ngwa, na Limo n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ na nkeji 66 41 nke pụtara na ọ gara n'ihu ruo nke iri na otu na ndepụta oge niile maka ọkara marathon ụmụ nwanyị
Otu ọnwa mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara n'ihu ruo nkeji iri isii na isii na nkeji iri anọ na isii na asọmpi Ras Al Khaimah nke mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị nke atọ kachasị ọsọ na ọsọ ahụ
Ọ nwetara nhọpụta maka 2016 IAAF World Half Marathon Championships n'ihi ya na ọ bụ ya mbụ mba ụwa na-akpọ oku ma bụrụ otu n'ime ndị ọkacha mmasị, n'akụkụ Ngugi
N'asọmpi e mere na Cardiff, ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị ise nke Kenya mejupụtara ọtụtụ n'ime ndị isi mbụ
Mgbe ọkara gachara, ọ bụ naanị Limo, Ngugi na Peres Jepchirchir fọdụrụ
Jepchirchir na-enweghị ahụmahụ meriri Limo na njedebe ọsọ
Ha atọ mere ka ụmụ nwanyị Kenya nweta aha otu ahụ ma Limo nyere aka mezue ọkwa na Jepchirchir na Ngugi

Cynthia Ikponmwenosa Morgan (a mụrụ ya n'ubochi iri-abuo na-ato n' onwa Septemba n' afo 1991), a mara ya nke oma n'oge gara aga dịka Cynthia Morgan, mana ugbu, ọ bụ Madrina k'ejiri mara ya nke oma dịka nwa-ada Nigerian nke na-ede abụ, na-agụkwa egwu
Egwu ya bụ ngwakọta nke pop,hip hop,dancehal na rap

Aha ya pụtara ihe ngbe ọgụpụtara egwu abụọ dị iche nke a akpọrọ 'Etiwala Obi M' na 'Duru m na-aga', nke a gbasara nke oma na site n'igwe nkiri onyo-nyoo na redio, nwetakwa nnyocha dị mma n'aka ndị nkọcha
Cynthia mere ihe egwuregwu mbụ ya na ihe nkiri Nollywood n'afo 2016 'Ajọ Nkpụru ọgụgụ' nke natara ntụzi aka Saint Joseph ovensehi na ihe nkiri ọchị nke AY nke akpọrọ, 'njem ejere n'obodo Jamaica'
A mụrụ Cynthia Morgan na Benin City, Edo State ebe ọ gụsịrị agụmakwụkwọ ọta-akara mgbe ọgbara afọ atọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ, ọ bụrụ-kwara onye na-abụ abụ nkwado ndi otu egwu nne ya
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, Cynthia Morgan malitere ide egwu, mgbe o ruru afọ iri na asaa, o depụtara egwu izizi ya nke General Pype so na ya nke akpọrọ 'Dutty Stepping'
N’afọ 2008, ọ kwagara Lagos ka ọ gakwuo n’ihu n’egwú ya
ọ na-akpọ onwe ya ' Killa Marshal ' nke na-akwalite ugwu ya n'ogbe egwu
N'ụbọchi iri abụọ na abụọ, n'ọnwa August, n'afọ 2013, Cynthia Morgan bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ maka ịnonyere Northside Entertainment Inc
nke Jude 'Engees' Okoye nwe

mgbe ọnwa ole na ole gasịrị, ọ wepụtara egwu abụọ nke a nke dara, ha bụ 'Etiwala Obi M' na 'Duru m na-aga' nke nwetara nnyocha dị mma site na ndị nkwado ya; ahịrị egwu nke ikpeazu ya nwetala ya nhọpụta nke “Best Reggae / Dancehall Single” na The Headies 2014

N'ubọchị iri abụọ na-ato, nke ọnwa May, n'afọ 2020, Cynthia Morgan, na ọnọdi dịka onye ewepụtabeghị abụ ruo ọtụtụ afọ na nnọkọ Instagram kọwara na aha ogbe egwu ya fulahara ya, 'Cynthia Morgan', ejirimara ya n' VEVO, usoro ndị eze, ejiri mara ya n'Instagram na ihe ndị ọzọ n'ihi nkwekọrịta o bianyere Jude Okoye aka
O kowara na-obi dara ya mbà mgbe ya na Jude Okoye nke Northside Entertainment nwerechara nsokwu, mana ọ gwaghị ndị mmadụ gbasara nsogbu ya
Fans gara n'ihu inye onyinye ihe ịchụ nta ego nke edobere maka ya ma ọbụnadị Afrobeats Superstar Davido tụlere ma gwa ya ka ọ kpọọ ya maka imekọ ihe ọnụ

Cynthia Quartey (amụrụ na 3 Nọvemba na afọ 1965) bụ onye Ghana bụbu onye na-eme egwuregwu nke bụ ọkachamara na sprinting
Ọ nọchitere anya mba ya na afọ 1984 Summer Olympics na Los Angeles, ebe o sonyere na 4 x 100 mita relay wee merie ihe nrite

Rosenzweig (née Ropes) (amụrụ n'ihe dị ka n'afọ 1958) bụ onye America agronomist na climatologist na NASA Goddard Institute for Space Studies, nke dị na Mahadum Columbia, 'onye nyere aka ịmalite ọmụmụ nke mgbanwe ihu igwe na ọrụ ugbo
' Ọ bụ onye isi nchọpụta sayensị na Columbia Climate School ma nwee ihe karịrị akwụkwọ 300, ihe karịrị isiokwu 80 ndị ọgbọ nyochara, dere ma ọ bụ dezie akwụkwọ asatọ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'ọtụtụ òtù dị iche iche na-arụ ọrụ iji mepụta atụmatụ iji jikwaa mgbanwe ihu igwe, na ọkwa ụwa na IPCC yana na New York City mgbe Hurricane Sandy gasịrị
Rosenzweig gara Cook College (na Mahadum Rutgers) wee nweta nzere Bachelor of Arts na sayensị ọrụ ugbo na 1980

Rosenzweig lekwasịrị anya n'ọrụ ugbo malitere na 1969, mgbe ya na onye ga-abụ di ya gbazitere ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbo na Tuscany, Ịtali, na-ewe mkpụrụ vaịn na oliv ma na-azụ anụmanụ dị ka ewu, ezì, ọbọgwụ, na geese
O kpebiri ịlaghachi na mahadum iji mụọ ọrụ ugbo, nweta nzere Master of Science na Soils and Crops na Mahadum Rutgers na 1983
N'oge ọ nọ na Master, NASA Goddard Institute for Space Studies were ya n'ọrụ iji mụọ ihe ọkụkụ site na iji data satellite
O mechara nweta PhD
ya na Mahadum Massachusetts Amherst na Plant, Soil and Environmental Sciences na 1991
O ka na-aruru NASA, ebe obu onyeisi nke otu Climate Impacts Group kemgbe 1993
Oru ya na ndi IPCC Task Force na Data bu nke amaara mgbe 2007 Nobel Prize ka agbakwunyere na Al Gore na IPCC
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi ugbu a dị ka onye nkuzi prọfesọ na Barnard College ma bụrụkwa onye nkuzi onye sayensị na-eme nchọpụta na Columbia Climate School na Mahadum Columbia
Mgbe o no na NASA na Kolumbia Goddard Institute for Space Studies, Rosenzweig bu onye mbu kwadoro ogugu nke bekee kporo Climate Change na mmputara ya na iko ugbo nakwa ebe mmadu bi
Osorola na otu di iche iche nke na-agbo mbo ilekota mgbanwe gburugburu nke gunyere
Enwere ike inweta nkọwa zuru ezu nke nyocha Rosenzweig na profaịlụ Google Scholar ya
Enwere ike inweta ndepụta zuru ezu nke akwụkwọ ya site na bibliography ya na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ NASA Goodard Institute for Space Studies

Cynthia Stockley (7 Julaị 1873 – 15 Jenụarị 1936) bụ onye odeakụkọ South Africa mara maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ịhụnanya ya na-edobekarị na Rhodesia (ugbu a Zimbabwe ) na South Africa
A mụrụ Stockley na Bloemfontein, South Africa

Nne ya, Mary Ann Webb (Corbett), si na County Clare na Ireland pụọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, n'afọ 1859, ebe nna ya, Abel Arthur Webb, si Northamptonshire, England, n'afọ 1861, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụo na atọ
Nne ya nwụrụ mgbe Cynthia dị afọ abụọ
Nna ya mechara lụọ nwanyị ọzọ, Cynthia wee soro ụmụnne anọ biri (otu onye nwụrụ n'oge ọ bụ nwata), nne di ya, nwanne nne ya, na ụmụnne abụọ
Mgbe ọ gachara ụlọ akwụkwọ St
Michael, Bloemfontein, ọ kwagara ya na nwanne ya nwanyị biri na Mashonaland
N'afọ 1895 ọ lụrụ Philip Stockley (1870-1917), onye otu ndị uwe ojii Mashonaland Mounted, na Salisbury (ugbu a Harare )
Ha kwagara Umtali (nke bụzi Mutare ) ebe a mụrụ ada ya nwanyị Dorothy n'afọ 1896
Stockleys kewara mgbe e mesịrị na 1896 ọ na-amalite ọrụ na oru nta akuko na-ede, ọ isonye na Boer War
N’iche na e gburu Philip na Agha Boer, ọ lụgharịrị
Di ya bụ Joseph Byrne (1870-1945), onye dọkịta Irish na New York; A mụrụ nwa ha nwoke Patrick n'ebe ahụ n'afọ 1905 pp99
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri wee zụta ugbo na Rhodesia na ụlọ na Norfolk
N'afọ 1916 lụrụ Harold Pelham Browne (1880 -1939), onye isi ndị agha Britain na-eje ozi na Paris pp288
Stockley nwụrụ na London na Jenụwarị 1936, na-agbanye onwe ya n'ụlọ ya
A kọrọ ọnwụ ya n'akwụkwọ akụkọ gburugburu ụwa
Onye nyocha ahụ weghachiri ikpe ọnwụ site na nsi gas 'mgbe obi adịghị ya mma'
E liri ya na Sheringham, Norfolk
Akwụkwọ ya iri na isii gụnyere
Site na ọbịbịa nke ihe nkiri nkịtị, e mere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ya ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri
Cynthia Uwak (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 15 n'ọnwa Julaị nke afọ 1986 n'Akwa Ibom Steeti ) bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa na-agbara Åland United bọọlụ ugbua na Naisten Liiga na Fịnland
Ahụmahụ mbụ Cynthia Uwak nwere n'ịgba bọọlụ dụ ya n'ụmụ nwoke n'okporo ámá nke obodo ya
Nne ya kwadoro ya ị chụso ị gba bọọlụ, o were nwee ike ijikọ egwuregwu bọọlụ na agụmakwụkwọ ya
Cynthia Uwak malitere ọrụ klọb ya n'akụkụ KMF ụmụ nwanyị Finnish, ma rụọkwa ọtụtụ ọrụ klọb ya na Scandinavia ma e wezụga nke France na Germany
O so n'òtù Olympique Lyonnais nke meriri na Division 1 Féminine na France n'afọ 2009
Mgbe ọ kwagara n'akụkụ Aland United nke Finnish, o meriri mmeri Naisten Liiga ọzọ n'afọ 2013, bụrụkwa onye kachasị nye goolu n'asọmpi ahụ
Ọ bụkwa onye otu egwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa
Uwak gbara asọmpi 2008 Summer Olympics nakwa 2007 FIFA Women's World Cup
Ọ soghị ndị otu egwuregwu nke 2010 African Women's Championship na Saụt Afrịka n'ihi mmerụ ahụ
Onye nkuzi Eucharia Uche kwuru n'oge ahụ na nke a agaghị apụta na a ga-ahọpụ ya n'otù 2011 FIFA Women's World Cup n'afọ na-esote
Kaosiladị, mgbe a kpọpụtara ndị otu egwuregwu iko mba ụwa, akpọghị Uwak aha
E nweghi ihe pụrụ iche e kwuru kpatara mwepụ ya, na nkwupụta izugbe na-ekwu 'Onye nchịkwa ahụ a hụrọla ndị egwuregwu nwere ike ịme mba mpako na World Cup na Germany'
A tụlere ya maka ịlaghachi na otu egwuregwu Naijiria site n'aka onye nchịkwa Florence Omagbemi n'afọ 2016 maka Africa Women Cup of Nations na Kameruun
Onye nkuzi a na-ele nnọchịte ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ na-ịgba mbọ iji bulie ohere otu ahụ n'egwuregwu ahụ
Uwak ekwuola okwu megide echiche ahụ na ụmụ nwanyị niile na-agba bọọlụ bụ ndị mmekọ nwanyị na nwanyị ; 'i kwu n'ụmụ nwanyị na-agba bọọlụ bụ nwanyị nwere mmasị na nwanyị bụ ihe mwute
Ị nweghị ike ịkpọ ndị mmadụ aha dị aṅaa dabere n'echiche gị

Cynthia Wandia bụ onye injinia eletriki nke Kenya, polyglot, onye ọchụnta ego, nwanyị na-azụ ahịa na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ, onye bụ onye isi ọrụ na onye guzobere Kwara Limited, usoro ụlọ akụ dị n'ịntanetị na ekwentị sitere na Kenya maka ndị otu, otu kredit na ụlọ akụ obodo
Ọ n'otu oge na-eje ozi dị ka Managing director nke ASTRA Innovations, ụlọ ọrụ dị na Germany nke ọ kwadoro
A mụrụ ya na Kenya, n'ihe dị ka afọ 1986
Ọ gara Alliance Girls High School na obodo Kikuyu, na Kiambu County, na Kenya
Na afo 2005, Ọ gakwara wee debanye aha na Mahadum Yale nke dị na United States
Cynthia gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afo 2009 na nzere bachelọ sayensị na Injin Eletriki
Ọ gbasoro nke ahụ na Advanced Management Program na Dartmouth College
Cynthia nọrọ ọnwa isii nke afọ 2010 na Monterrey, Mexico, na-eje ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ mmepe azụmahịa maka Aceleradora de Empresas ITESM (Business Accelerator Network na Tecnológico de Monterrey)
Ọ kwagara Düsseldorf, Germany iji soro EON rụọ ọrụ, na ngalaba ngwaahịa ha zuru ụwa ọnụ, dịka akụkụ nke mmemme iru eru ahia
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọzụzụ ahụ mere na Madrid, Spain
O jere ozi n'ọkwa ahụ otu afọ na ọkara, ruo na Mee 2012
N'ime afọ abụọ na ọnwa isii, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na EON, nke dị na Essen, Germany, dị ka onye nyocha arụmọrụ ụgbọ mmiri maka ihe dị ka ọkara n'oge ahụ, mgbe ahụ dị ka onye njikwa maka ọrụ pụrụ iche
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014, ọ hapụrụ EON wee soro hiwe Astra Innovations
A kọrọ na Cynthia Wandia maara asụsụ Bekee, Spanish, French, German na Mandarin nke ọma
Na afo 2018, Business Daily Africa, akwụkwọ akụkọ Bekee kwa ụbọchị na Kenya, kpọrọ Cynthia Wandia, otu n'ime ndị Kenya kacha iri anọ n'okpuru ụmụ nwanyị iri anọ (Kenya Top 40 Under 40 Women)

Ụlọ ọrụ ya kachasị ọhụrụ, nke ọ kwadoro na nke ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche, bụ Kwara Limited, ngwa ụlọ akụ n'ịntanetị na nke na-agagharị agagharị nke na-enyere ndị otu na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ, ụlọ akụ obodo na ụlọ ọrụ kredit aka ịnọgide na-egbo mkpa ego na ọnọdụ nke ndị otu ha n'oge
Nke a na-enye ụlọ ọrụ ohere ịzaghachi ngwa ngwa maka mkpa nke ndị òtù ha, si otú a na-edobe ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke ndị ahịa nwere obi ụtọ, na-ebuli uru na usoro ahụ
Cyperus constanzae bụ ụdị sedge nke bido tobe n'akụkụ Caribbean
Cyperus ekmanii bụ ụdị sedge nke sitere n'otu mpaghara Cuba
Ọ bụ onye ọkà mmụta ihe ọkụkụ bụ Georg Kükenthal kọwara ụdị ahụ n'afọ 1926
Cyperus ferax bụ ụdị sedge nke dị na mpaghara America
Ọ bụ onye ọkà mmụta ihe ọkụkụ bụ Louis Claude Richard kọwara ụdị ahụ n'afọ 1792
Cyperus nanus, nke a maara dị ka Indian flatsedge, bụ ụdị sedge nke bidoro tobe n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Mexico na agwaetiti Caribbean
Cyperus ovatus bụ ụdị sedge nke bidoro tobe na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke North America na ụfọdụ agwaetiti Caribbean

Cyprian Ekwensi MFR (26 Septemba 1921 - 4 Nọvemba 2007) bụ onye Naịjirịa na-ede idụazị, obere akụkọ, na akwụkwọ ụmụaka
A mụrụ onye Igbo bụ Cyprian Odiatu Duaka Ekwensi na Minna, Niger Steeti
Ọ bụ nwaafọ Nkwelle Ezunaka dị na okpuru ọchịchị ime obodo Oyi, Anambra Steeti, Naịjirịa
Nna ya bụ David Anadumaka, onye na-akọ akụkọ banyere ọchụnta enyí
Ekwensi gara ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị na Ibadan, Oyo Steeti, Achimota Koleji na Ghana, na 'School of Forestry', Ibadan, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ abụọ dịka onye ọrụ oke ohia
Ọ gụkwara akwụkwọ Famasiti na ụlọ akwụkwọ Yaba Teknụzụ , 'Lagos School of Pharmacy', ya na Chels
Cyprien Tokoudagba (1939 - 5 Mee 2012) bụ onye na-ese ihe si na Abomey, Benin

Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eweghachi ihe ngosi nka Abomey n'afọ 1987, mgbe e were ya n'ọrụ iji mepụta ihe osise mbụ nke kọrọ ọtụtụ akụkọ na akụkọ Dahomey mgbe ọ na-eme emume ndị eze n'otu n'otu maka ihu obí eze ọhụrụ Eze Glelé, n'etiti obí eze nke Abomey nke gọọmentị Benin dozighachiriri
Tokoudagba gara n'ihu na omenala nke bas-relief ọ bụ ezie na ojiji nke simenti na ihe osise na-ere ahịa, ebe ọ na-emepụta ọrụ na canvas, frescoes na ihe ọkpụkpụ
N'afọ 1989, Cyprien hapụrụ Benin iji gosipụta na SãoMagiciens de la Terreʹ na Paris, France
E gosipụtara ọrụ Tokoudagba na mmemme 'Ouidah '92', nke mere emume nka Vodun sitere na Benin na African Diaspora na Ouidah, Benin na Febụwarị 1993

E gosikwara ọrụ ya na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ndị a ụlọ ọrụ Smithsonian - National Museum of African Art, Washington, DC; Musée Dapper, Paris, France; Museum Kunst Palast, Düsseldorf, Germany; Hayward Gallery, London, Englands; Centre Georges Pompidou, Paris, Francia; Mori Art Museum, Tokyo, Japan; São Paulo Biennale, Brazil
Cyrée Jarelle Johnson (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1990) bụ onye Amerika na-ede abụ, onye nchịkọta akụkọ, na onye na-ahụ maka ọbá akwụkwọ
O so hiwe akwụkwọ akụkọ Deaf Poets Society ma bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka ọbá akwụkwọ na Pratt Institute ugbu a
Nchịkọta uri izizi ya bụ Slingshot natara Lambda Literary Award for Gay Poetry
A zụlitere Johnson na Piscataway, New Jersey, ma tolite ezinụlọ ọ kọwara dị ka 'na-emegbu mmadụ'
O nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Hampshire College ma gụchaa MFA ya na edemede okike na Mahadum Columbia n'afọ 2019
A chọpụtara na Johnson nwere autism mgbe ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ anọ ma nwee lupus na kọleji
O kwuru n'ajụjụ ọnụ maka Mashable, 'Autism scholarship na-egosipụta ndị nọ n'ụdị dị ka 'ndị oji na ndị ọcha na-eche echiche' - nke ahụ bụkwa eziokwu nye m
Ihe m hụrụ n'anya, enwere m mmasị na obi ụtọ na ịnụ ọkụ n'obi
Ihe m kpọrọ asị, akpọrọ m asị site na obi ụtọ na ịnụ ọkụ n'obi
Johnson bụ onye nchoputa na onye nchịkọta akụkọ abụ nke Deaf Poets Society literary magazine, nke e kere n'afọ 2016 iji gosipụta ọrụ ndị edemede nwere nkwarụ na ndị d / Deaf
E mepụtara magazin ahụ n'uche nnweta, dị ka ịnye ọrụ n'ụdị dị iche iche gụnyere ederede, ọdịyo, na ihe oyiyi
Johnson bụ osote prọfesọ na Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Librarian na Pratt Institute
Ọ bụkwa onye bụbu onye isi nke Ndụ ndị ojii dị mkpa Philadelphia

Ọ kọwara ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-ekwu maka nkwarụ na 'ihe [ọ] ga-eme iji nọgide na-adị ndụ' O bipụtara nchịkọta uri izizi ya Slingshot n'afọ 2019 n'okpuru Nightboat Books Na nyocha nke New York Times Stephanie Burt kọwara nchịkọta ahụ 'Ọ bụ ọrụ siri ike, n'asụsụ ya, akụkọ ya, ntụgharị ya n'okpuru ọdịbendị ('prince died for fem bois'), mana ọ na-enye mmekọrịta chiri anya'
Johnson bụ transmasculine ma na-eji nnọchiaha ya
Johnson bụ nwoke idina nwoke
Ọ lụrụ Azure D Osborne-Lee ma ha bi na Brooklyn
A mụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na South Afrịka, Cyril Fradan na Johannesburg n'afọ 1928
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ, ma mesịa kụzie ihe na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand ma mee ihe ngosi mbụ ya na Johannesburg n'afọ 1954
N'ịkwaga London na 1960, Fradan gosipụtara nke ọma n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ nka nke Britain na Europe
Fradan rụrụ ọrụ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ naanị na eserese acrylic ma jiri usoro ịcha
Ọzọkwa, ọ bụ onye na-aga nke ọma na onye nwere nkà nke ụdị Baroque eji eme ihe n'oge a, okwu ndị na-abụghị ihe atụ
Ihe nke a pụtara bụ na Fradan na-agwakọta echiche efu, ìhè na agba, na mmetụta nke mmegharị na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, niile gbakọtara iji merie onye na-ekiri ya site na arịrịọ mmetụta uche kpọmkwem

Ojiji ya nke mmetụta ndị dị otú ahụ dị ka contour gbazee, ntụgharị nke mmegharị site na ìhè na-egbuke egbuke, jikọtara ya na iji agba na-egbuke egbuke, mere ka ọ bụrụ ụdị nke nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na ndị na-ege ntị na South Afrịka hụrụ ya
Fradan anaghị akpọ ihe osise ya, na-ekwere na ihe oyiyi ndị a na-akpali n'ime onye na-ekiri ya site n'ụdị ndị na-agbagharị agbagharị, nke nwere ume na akwa ya bụ, n'ezie, ndị ziri ezi
'Onye ọ bụla na-ekiri ihe nkiri ga-ahụ n'ihe osise m ihe ọ chọrọ - ekwenyeghị m na onye na-ese ihe kwesịrị itinye aka na utu aha, nke na-eduhie eduhie n'ụzọ ọ bụla

Tinyere eserese, Fradan nyere atụmatụ ejiji maka mmepụta ihe nkiri gụnyere mmepụta Margaret Inglis nke 1955 nke Shakespeare's Hamlet Ọzọkwa, o nyere ejiji ejiji maka mmepụta Gordon Crosse nke 1966 nke W
Yeats's Purgatory
Fradan bụ onye a hụrụ n'anya nke ukwuu ma bụrụ onye a na-akwanyere ùgwù nke ọma na London arts scene
Emume egwu ya kwa afọ n'oge okpomọkụ nke a na-eme n'ụlọ ya na 23 Lower Addison Gardens, bụ ihe na-enye ndị hụrụ egwu n'anya ọṅụ ma nye ohere ile ọrụ ya
N'afọ ndị sochirinụ, Fradan zere ebe ngosi nka, na-ahọrọ ụzọ ememme ya na-ere ihe osise ya na-ewu ewu
Ya na ọtụtụ ndị na-elekọta ya nwere mmekọrịta onwe onye, ndị na-ezukọ mgbe niile n'ụlọ ya; ọkachasị n'oge ememme
Cyril Fradan gosipụtara ọtụtụ ihe - gụnyere na Royal Academy, London na 1963
A na-anọchite anya ọrụ ya na nchịkọta ọha na eze ndị a

Cyril Ikechukwu Nri (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1961) bụ onye Britain na Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede na onye nduzi nke a maara nke ọma maka igwu egwu Superintendent Adam Okaro na usoro TV ndị uwe ojii The Bill
A mụrụ Nri na 25 Eprel 1961 na Naịjirịa
Ezinụlọ Nri bụ ndị Igbo; ha gbapụrụ mba ahụ n'afọ 1968 tupu agha obodo Naịjirịa agwụ
Ọ kwagara Portugal mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, ma mesịa gaa London
Nri gara Holland Park School na West London wee pụta na mmepụta ihe nkiri nke ụlọ akwụkwọ a kpọrọ Three Penny Opera
Ọ gara Young Vic Youth Theatre na Waterloo, London
Ọ nwetara ọzụzụ na Bristol Old Vic Theatre School
Nri bi na ndịda London kemgbe afọ 1980
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịrụ ọrụ nke Superintendent Adam Okaro, onye mechara bụrụ onye isi nlekọta, na ihe nkiri ndị uwe ojii ITV The Bill
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ihe nkiri na Bristol Old Vic, Nri malitere ndụ ime ihe nkiri na Royal Shakespeare Company ebe ọrụ mbụ ya bụ Lucius na mmepụta Ron Daniel nke Julius Caesar n'afọ 1982
Ọ gbara Ariel na Max Von Sydow's Prospero na mmepụta nke Jonathan Miller na 1988 nke The Tempest
N'afọ 2009, ọ pụtara na The Observer na Royal National Theatre
N'afọ 2009 na 2010 ọ pụtara na Law & Order UK dị ka Onyeikpe Demarco ma maliteghachi ọrụ a na usoro 2012 na 2013 nke ihe ngosi ahụ
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2010, ọ bụ onye ọbịa na Doctors
Na Nọvemba 2010, ọ pụtara na Usoro nke anọ nke The Sarah Jane Adventures, na 'Lost in Time'
O mechara pụta ọzọ n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2011, na mmalite nke Usoro 5, 'Sky'

N'afọ 2012–13, ọ gbara Cassius na Greg Doran's Royal Shakespeare Company production nke na Stratford upon Avon, London na New York, ebe na nnyocha ya na New York Times Ben Brantley kwuru okwu banyere Nri, 'Okwu Maazị Nri ka ọ na-edebanye okwu Caesar bụ nke nwoke na-enwe mmetụta nke eriri na-agbasi ike n'olu ya
N'ịbụ onye na-eche nche na aghụghọ, ụjọ na onye na-achịkwa, Maazị Nri bụ ezigbo Cassius, na-ejide ihu igwe nke paranoia na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke na-eme ka ikuku sie ike
N'afọ 2016, ọ nwetara nhọpụta British Academy Television Award maka arụmọrụ ya dị ka Lance na Russell T
Davies TV series
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe omume nke na-egwu dọkịta n'ụlọ ọgwụ ebe Yvonne Sparrow tụfuru nwa ya a na-amụbeghị amụ (usoro nke anọ)
N'afọ 2016, ọ gbara Polonius na mmepụta nke Simon Godwin nke Hamlet maka Royal Shakespeare Company
Na ngwụcha Ọktọba 2016 o mere nke mbụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe ugboro ugboro na Doctor Who spin-off Class
N'afọ 2021, ọ gbara Sheldon na Royal National Theatre nke Trouble in Mind nke Alice Childress
Nri alụọla di, ma ugbu a ọ na-akọwa dị ka nwoke idina nwoke
O nwere ụmụ abụọ tozuru etozu

Cythna Lindenberg Letty (ubochí mbú n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1895, na Standerton rụọ úbọchị àtó n'ọnwa Mee 1985, na Pretoria), bụ onye na-ese ihe ọkụkụ na South Africa ma a na-ewere ya dị ka ónyé isi nke nka botanical nke South Africa n'ihi ogo na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ihe osise ya na ihe osise pensụl, nke e mepụtara n'ime afọ irí ànó na National Herbarium na Pretoria
A na-echeta Cythna Letty nke ọma màkà akwụkwọ ya Wild Flowers of the Transvaal nke e bipụtara na 1962
Mgbe ewepụtara ego iri na South Africa, a gwara ya ka ọ mepụta ihe osise okooko osisi maka mkpụrụ ego cent irí, irí abụọ na irí isé
E wezụga ise ihe osise, ọ bụ ónyé na-ede uri nke ọma ma bipụta Children of the Hours mgbè ọ dị afọ iri asatọ
Cythna bụ nwa mbụ nke nné ya Josina Christina Lindenberg lụrụ nke abụọ ma kpọọ ya aha ónyé dike na uri Percy Shelley 'The Revolt of Islam'
Lettys nwere ụmụ ise ma rụọ ọtụtụ afọ ụmụ isii sitere na alụmdi na nwunye mbụ Josina bụ akụkụ nke ezinụlọ sara mbara, nke a na-adọ aka ná ntị
A kụziiri ha ịkpọ ọtụtụ ngwá egwu
Nna Cythna, Walter Edward Letty, nwèrè ọtụtụ mgbanwe ọrụ na ezinụlọ ahụ na-agbakarị
N'ihi ya, Cythna gara ụlọ akwụkwọ iri na atọ, na-agwụ na Pretoria Girls' High School
Mgbè Agha Ụwa Mbụ tiwapụrụ, Walter debanyere aha ma jee ozi na France, ma nọrọ ébé ahụ mgbè ekwupụtara udo
Josina kwadoro ezinụlọ ahụ site n'igosi chaatị usoro ọmụmụ
E nyefere ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ ya nkà nka ya, mana ọ bụ naanị Cythna nwèrè mmasị na ihe gbasara ihe ọkụkụ
A chụsasịrị ntụ ya na Cythna Letty Nature Reserve dị nso na obere ọbọdọ Barberton na Mpumalanga

N'afọ 1989, National Botanical Institute bipụtara akwụkwọ mpịakọta nke ihe osise okooko osisi asaá ahọpụtara site na akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ nke nné Cythna, Josina Letty, debere na Mary Gunn Library nke Institute na Pretoria
The Botanical Society of South Africa chetaara ya site n'inye ya 'Cythna Letty Medal' nke a na-enye màkà onyinye dị mkpà màkà ịkwalite osisi South Africa site na ihe osise ma ọ bụ eserese botanical
Osisi ndị a gụrụ áhà yá gụnyere Crassula letyae Phillips na Aloe letyae Reynolds
A na-egosi ya site na mkpirisi onye edemede Letty Mgbè ọ na-ezo aka na aha botanical

Oladapo Daniel Oyebanjo (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 9 n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1980), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ D'banj, bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu, onye na-eti egwu, onye ọchụnta ego na onye guzobere Mo' Hits Records na onye mmepụta Don Jazzy

O ritela ọtụtụ onyinye egwu, gụnyere onyinye maka Best African Act na MTV Europe Music Awards 2007, Artist of the Year na MTV Africa Music Awards 2009, Best International Act Africa na 2011 BET Awards, na Best-selling African Artist na 2014 World Music Awards, Evolution award na 2015 MTV Africa Music awards
Oyebanjo nakweere aha ọgbọ D'banj, ngwakọta nke aha mbụ ya, Dapo, na aha nna ya, Oyebanjo

A maara D'banj nke ọma na mba ụwa maka egwu ya n'oge okpomọkụ nke afọ 2012 'Oliver Twist', nke na-agba egwu nke Afrobeats na egwu egwu eletrik nke kachasị na chaatị Afrịka n'afọ 2011 ma bụrụ egwu iri kachasị elu na chaatị UK n'afọ 2012 ruo No
2 na chaatị R&B nke UK
O kwuru na a ga-eji ụdị Grand mara afọ 2021 ma ọ ga-ewepụta abọm ya nke akpọrọ 'Ikebe' tupu ngwụcha nkeji nke mbụ

A mụrụ D'banj, nke a makwaara dị ka Kokomaster ma ọ bụ Bangalee, na 9 June 1980 na Zaria, akụkụ ugwu nke Naịjirịa, nye onye ọrụ agha nke na-eduzi ndị agha na-agba égbè na nwanyị ọchụnta ego dị elu nke chọọchị nke si Shagamu na Ogun State
Dbanj nwere ejima dị ka ụmụnne, Taiwo na Kehinde Oyebanjo
Nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye, Femi Oyebanjo, onye nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ụgbọelu mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, mere ka D'banj mara harmonica

Site n'ịhụnanya D'banj nwere maka egwu karịa ọchịchọ agha nke ndị mụrụ ya, ọ gbasiri mbọ ike maka nkwado nke ndị mụrụ mụrụ ya; nke a nwere ike ịnụ nke ọma site na egwu abọm, All Da Way site na abọm izizi ya
Mgbe nwanne ya nwoke dị afọ iri na asaa nwụsịrị, D'banj haziri ihe onwunwe ya niile n'elu àkwà ya mgbe a kpọtara ha n'ụlọ ma were harmonica ya
'M ga-akpọ ya iji cheta ya'
Ka e mesịrị, na mahadum, ọ ghọtara ikike nke nkà ọhụrụ ya na ngwá ọrụ ahụ
'M ga-aga n'ụlọ ndị inyom mgbe ha nwesịrị nkuzi, ọbụlagodi na enweghị ọkụ eletrik m nwere ike igwu egwu n'ebe ahụ'
Ọ na-echeta ịmụta Celine Dion's 'My Heart Will Go On' mgbe Titanic pụtara 'nke ahụ mere ka m nwee ọtụtụ ụmụ agbọghọ!'
D'banj wee gaa n'ihu na-amụ injinia igwe na Mahadum Lagos State, mana n'ihi ọgbaghara na ọtụtụ mmebi iwu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ, o kpebiri ịpụ
Atụmatụ ịga n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya dị ka injinia na London kwụsịrị mgbe ọ rutere UK na 2001, wee zute Don Jazzy onye na-anwa inwe ọganihu dị ka onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe
D'Banj malitere ịkwụ ụgwọ gburugburu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, na-enweta ego mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nche
'Ọ dị mma, n'ihi na m na-eme abalị', ka ọ na-ekwu, 'ka m wee nwee ike ige egwu na ekweisi m'
Don Jazzy gwara Kokomaster na ya chere na ọ bụ kpakpando na-eme ya, ma na-eche na egwu egwu na Naịjirịa 'na-agbawa', ha abụọ laghachiri Lagos n'afọ 2005
N'otu afọ ahụ, otu 'Tongolo' bịara; nne D'Banj kwụrụ ụgwọ vidiyo ahụ
Ọ ghọrọ ihe na-ewu ewu ozugbo, ma nweta otuto dị ukwuu na mba ahụ
Nkwado mbụ ya bụ ihe ọṅụṅụ na-enye ume a na-akpọ Power Fist
Dị ka ụtụ nye onye nkuzi ya Fela, D'banj na-eji ngwakọta nke Afrobeat na Afropop mee ka egwu ya dị ndụ na narị afọ nke 21 na ịnụ ọkụ n'obi na-enweghị ume yana ezigbo ọchị
Abụ ya dabere na ndụ ya, na-abụkarị ihe ọchị ma nwee nkọwa miri emi nke na-edekọ mgba nke nwa okorobịa Naijiria na-anwa imezu nrọ ya
Ọ na-eme ihe na Yoruba, Bekee na Pidgin English
E wepụtara abọm izizi D'banj, No Long Thing, n'afọ 2005
Ọ wepụtara ọtụtụ egwu na Tongolo dị ka onye isi egwu
Nke a gosipụtara na ọ bụ egwu ọganihu ya na ihe na-ewu ewu
O nyekwara onye Koko Master ya, na okwu ahụ, koko, na-ewere ihe dịgasị iche iche
Ihe ịga nke ọma mbụ nke D'banj dugara na mmekorita ya na ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ, gụnyere Dare Art Alade na Ikechukwu
PDP (otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-achị na Naịjirịa) jiri otu koko D'Banj mee ihe dị ka isiokwu mkpọsa ya maka ntuli aka 2007
Abọm nke abụọ nke D'banj bụ Rundown Funk U Up, nke e wepụtara na afọ 2006, wepụtara ọtụtụ egwu gụnyere otu klọb, Tongolo (Remix), na otu egwu Why Me?
Nke a gosipụtara na ọ bụ ihe ọzọ na-ewu ewu
D'banj, dị ka onye na-ese ihe nke Mo'Hits Records,
bụkwa onye otu ya, Mo' Hits Allstars (gụnyere ndị na-ese ihe Dr SID, Wande Coal, KaySwitch, na D'Prince)
A hụla ya na otu n'ime ndị na-agụ egwú kacha nwee nkà na Naịjirịa, 'Smile Lasisi'
E wepụtara abọm izizi nke otu ahụ, Curriculum Vitae, na Disemba 2007
Ọ gụnyere egwu egwu, 'Be Close To You', 'Booty Call' na 'Move Your Body', nke bụ egwu mbụ
E gosipụtara D'banj na egwu Ikechukwu nke afọ 2008, 'Wind Am Well'
Na ọnwa Julaị, na afọ 2008 hụrụ ntọhapụ nke abọm nke atọ nke D'banj, The Entertainer, na egwu 'Gbono Feli Feli', 'Kimon', 'Olorun Maje' na 'Entertainer'
Na ọnwa isii, na afọ 2011, D'banj bịanyere aka na Kanye West GOOD Music record label dị ka onye na-ese ihe
Na 9 June 2011, D'banj dere na akaụntụ Twitter ya, @iamdbanj, 'Dị ka ụnyaahụ, mụ na nwanne m nwoke mere Tongolo
Afọ asaa ka e mesịrị, Mo'Hits bịanyere aka na GOOD Music
Onyinye ụbọchị ọmụmụ kacha mma
Chineke kelere gị
Na Septemba 2016, a mara ọkwa na a tọhapụrụ D'banj na GOOD Music
Mgbe ọtụtụ ọnwa nke ịkọ nkọ na asịrị na-enweghị isi, onye na-emepụta ihe, Don Jazzy kwupụtara site na akaụntụ Twitter ya na nkewa nke Mo'Hits

Mgbe nkewa ahụ gasịrị, Don Jazzy, D'Prince, Dr SID, Wande Coal malitere Mavin Records ebe D'banj guzobere DB Records ma dịka a tụrụ anya ya, ọ bịanyere aka na nwanne ya nwoke nke obere Kayswitch na akara ahụ n'akụkụ ndị na-emepụta ihe abụọ, Jaysleek na Deevee
Na Disemba, na afọ 2012, D'banj bịanyere aka na nnukwu nkwekọrịta na Sony

N'ikwu okwu banyere mkpa nkwekọrịta ahụ dị na Sony, onye isi nchịkwa nke Sony Music Entertainment, Sean Watson, kwuru, sị 'Ịrụkọ ọrụ na D'Banj bụ ihe dị mkpa nye anyị na Sony Music Entertainment Africa
Anyị na-enwe mmasị mgbe niile na nkà ya na inwe ike inye aka n'iweta egwu D'Banj nye ọtụtụ nde ndị na-akwado ya, nke guzosiri ike na nke ọhụrụ, gafee kọntinent ahụ bụ ihe ùgwù nye anyị
Anyị nwere obi ụtọ nke ukwuu na anyị bụ akụkụ ya
' [Ihe odide a chọrọ ihe e depụtara]
A kọwara nkwekọrịta ahụ dị ka 'Pan African, nkwekọrịta ọtụtụ album na Sony Music's RCA Records
Ọ na-agụnyekwa nkwekọrịta njikwa pụrụ iche na Sony Music na onye mmekọ ROCKSTAR4000 maka kọntinent ahụ
Tinye na nke ahụ ọtụtụ abọm, nkwekọrịta zuru ụwa ọnụ na onye na-agụ egwú na onye na'ede egwú nke Naijiria bụ Kayswitch na mmekọrịta mmekọrịta na D'Banj's Nigerian record label DB Records
Otu egwu na-abịanụ 'Bother You', nke sitere na ihe nkiri Half of a Yellow Sun, ka Mi7 Records na akara D'banj bụ DKM Media wepụtara na 7 Eprel afọ 2013
Na onwa isii, na afọ 2014, D'banj gosipụtara ndị na-ese ihe n'okpuru akara ndekọ ya, nke gụnyere ya, nwanne ya nwoke nke obere Kay Switch, ụmụnne MossKriss na Ralph Kriss na Tonto Dikeh, Ebeneztizzy
O weputara abọm akpọrọ King Don Come, ya na ihe ngosi ndị ọbịa sitere na Gucci Mane, Wande Coal, Harry Songs, Bucie, Busiswa wdg n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ
Abọm ahụ gụnyere egwu 'It's Not A Lie', 'El Chapo yana egwu egwu ya nke afọ 2012 'Oliver Twist'
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Femi Kuti's ọhụrụ Afrikan Shrine na Ikeja, Lagos nakwa na Shrine Synchro System's regular London Night at Cargo

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Black President Concert iji cheta nka na ihe nketa Fela na Barbican na London, yana ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na mba ụwa na Naịjirịa dị ka Kelly Rowland na 1st Edition nke MTV Africa Music Awards 2008 na Abuja, Naịjiria
D'banj bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri mgbe niile maka ThisDay Africa Rising Music Festival kwa afọ
O sonyere n'otu n'ime ihe omume ndị a na-atụ anya ya n'oge ahụ, 'Koko Concert'
E debere usoro ahụ maka abalị na-akpali akpali na mmetụta Koko bụ n'ezie LIVE na London ka ndị na-akwado D'Banj na Mo' Hits jupụtara n'ọgbọ egwuregwu O2 ruo ikike
Dị ka a tụrụ anya ya, ihe ndị ahụ nọgidere na-abịa ma na-aga n'ihu na-agagharị na ihe ndị na-eme n'elu ikpo okwu site n'aka ndị omenkà niile
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2010, Mo' Hits All Stars wetara Koko Concert na Lagos na D'banj nọgidere na-eme ihe ngosi siri ike nke mere ka ndị na-ege ntị na-eti mkpu
Ndị ọrụ ibe dị ka MI, eLDee, Jesse Jagz, na Wizkid sonyekwara n'elu ikpo okwu
Enwekwara ihe ngosi zuru ụwa ọnụ nke 'Mr Endowed (Remix) ' a na-atụ anya ya nke ukwuu nke gosipụtara Snoop Dogg yana egwu 'Blame It on the Money' nke gosipụtara nwa amaala California na Big Sean
Na 23, na onwa isii, na afọ 2012, D'banj rụrụ ọrụ na Hackney Weekend iji mee emume 2012 Summer Olympics, nke Jay-Z na Rihanna duziri
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ enyi ya, na onye ibe ya na Universal Music Group, Rita Ora na 30 Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2012 na SCALA London Live Music, Clubs and Arts Venue iji mee emume ntọhapụ nke abọm izizi ya Ora
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na emume mmechi AFCON 2013 nke e mere na South Africa

N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2015, D'banj mere n'ụbọchị ụwa nke ụmụ amaala n'efu na Capitol Hill (Washington Monument Grounds) maka ncheta afọ iri anọ na ise nke ụbọchị ụwa nke Global Poverty Project na Earth Day Network mere
Site na abọm mbụ nke D'banj bịara nkwado mbụ ya site na ihe ọṅụṅụ ike a na-akpọ Power Fist
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2013, a kpọrọ D'banj onye nnọchi anya ụlọ akụ nke ụlọ ọrụ (BOI)
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2013, D'banj bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta Naira ọtụtụ nde na Globacom, ụlọ ọrụ ọ kewara na 2010
Na June 2014 D'Banj Secures Deal na Heritage Bank
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2014, a kpọrọ D'banj onye nnọchi anya Afrịka maka Beats site na Dre
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2015, a họpụtara D'banj dịka onye nnọchi anya Afrịka maka Ciroc Nigeria
N'akụkọ pụrụ iche na Tush Magazine Issue 11, Banky W na Dbanj nwetakwara ìhè banyere otu ha si ghọọ ndị nnọchi anya Ciroc
Na Septemba 2015, e mere D'banj onye nnọchi anya SLOT, ekwentị mkpanaaka a ma ama, na ngwá ahịa eletrọniki
Dbanj bụzi otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe Afrobeats kacha baa ọgaranya na Naịjirịa
D'banj bụ onye guzobere Koko Foundation for Youth and Peace Development
Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya ndị ntorobịa mbụ nke United Nations maka udo na Naijiria
Dbanj bụ onye nnọchi anya otu mkpọsa; ọ wepụtara egwu 'Cocoa Na Chocolate' iji kwado itinye ego n'ọrụ ugbo
'Cocoa Na Chocolate' gosipụtara ndị omenkà Africa 18 ndị ọzọ ma merie Best African Collaboration na All Africa Music Awards na afọ 2014

N'afọ 2015, onye isi ụlọ akụ ụwa, Jim Yong Kim, kelere ya maka iji ike egwu ya na ọnọdụ onye ama ama dị elu iji mee ka a mara okwu ndị siri ike na ndị dị oke egwu n'Africa na-elekwasị anya n'ọrụ ugbo na ibelata ịda ogbenye
E hotara Jim Yong Kim na-ekwu na 'Enwere m obi ụtọ izute D'banj n'ọnwa gara aga ma hụ ya ka ọ na-eme ihe
Enwere m obi ụtọ na ọ bụ onye omenkà mbụ sonyere na usoro Music4Dev ọhụrụ anyị na-agba onye omenkọ ụwa ume ịkwalite mmata banyere ịda ogbenye na nsogbu ndị metụtara ya
N'afọ 2015, D'banj wepụtara vidiyo ahụ na 'Extraordinary' iji mee ka a mara banyere ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na inye ụmụ nwanyị ike
Ụlọ akụ ụwa kwadoro abụ ahụ dị ka abụ maka mmata ụmụ nwanyị
D'Banj mikpuru onwe ya nke ukwuu na teknụzụ ozi, ọkachasị na mpaghara ọrụ bara uru na nkesa dijitalụ ọdịnaya

O nwere MCOMM Ltd (Median Mobile Communications Limited, A Value Added Service Content Provider) na D' Kings Men Media Limited (a 360 Media Company), nke na-ahụ maka nnukwu njem dijitalụ ya n'oge na-adịbeghị anya

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2016, D'banj's D'Kings Men Media jikọtara aka na MTN Nigeria na Bank of Industry iji malite THE CREAM PLATFORM, ikpo okwu nwere nkà okike nke e guzobere iji nyere aka ịchọpụta uche ndị na-eto eto na Naịjirịa site na ịkpọ koodu USSD na ekwentị mkpanaaka

A kọrọ na ikpo okwu ahụ, dị ka ọ dị na Disemba, na afọ 2016, nwere ihe karịrị nde mmadụ abụọ na-akwụ ụgwọ ma chọpụta ọtụtụ narị talent site na ụdị egwu naanị, yana ọtụtụ iri vidiyo egwu na ọtụtụ nde Naira nyere ndị mmeri
D'banj lụrụ Lineo Didi Kilgrow na onwa isii, na afọ 2016
Ọ mara ọkwa ọmụmụ nwa ha nwoke, Daniel Oyebanjo III, na Mee, na afọ 2017; mmiri riri nwa ahụ na onwa isii, na afọ 2018

N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2020, mgbe D'banj biputara na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta ka ọ 'na-ekwu na ọ gaghị idina ya n'ike,' Seyitan Babatayo boro ya ebubo idina ya na 2018, na-ekwu na ya chọrọ '[ịkpọ] ya na hyprocrisy ya
' N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ furu efu ruo ụbọchị abụọ, mgbe ọ na-efu ozi ndị e mere na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta ya kwuru na ebubo ahụ bụ ihe mgbasa ozi iji kwado otu D'banj na-abịanụ
Dị ka The Guardian si kwuo, a chọtara ya site n'enyemaka nke NGO Stand to End Rape (STER)
O kwuru na ndị uwe ojii Naijiria tọọrọ ya, bụ ndị nyefere ya n'aka ndị otu nchịkwa D'banj bụ ndị kwadoro mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta ya wee mee ka ọ laghachi azụ
D'banj gọnahụrụ ebubo ahụ, na-akpọ ha 'ebubo ụgha na ụgha sitere n'olulu hel'
Mgbe ọtụtụ ụbọchị gasịrị, Babatayo wepụtara nkwupụta na-ekwu na ya na D'banj ekwekọrịtala nkwekọrịta 'na-abụghị ego', na-asị, 'Achọrọ m udo m'
Na 3 Julaị, na afọ 2020, D'banj gbara Babatayo akwụkwọ maka ijeri N15
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, onye bụbu onye njikwa D'banj bụ Franklin Amudo kọrọ na Babatayo gwara ya na D'ban j dinaa ya n'ike n'ụbọchị sochiri ebubo ndina n'ike ahụ
Onye na-ede egwu dị afọ iri anọ kwuru okwu n'oge ọ pụtara na 'Bliss Experience', ihe omume ụka nke Moses Bliss, onye na-ese egwu, kwadoro
Na ọnwa isii, na afọ 2018, Dbanj na Lineo Didi Kilgrow, nwunye ya, bere arịrị maka ọnwụ Daniel Oyebanjo nke Atọ, nwa ha nwoke dị otu afọ
A kọrọ na mmiri riri nwata ahụ n'oge ahụ n'ọdọ mmiri dị n'ụlọ onye na-agụ egwú ahụ na Ikoyi, Lagos
N'icheta ọdachi ahụ mere, Dbanj kwuru na Chineke emeela ka o nwee ọganihu site n'ịgọzi ya na ọ bụghị otu ma ọ bụ ụmụ abụọ
'Ihe m na-anwa ikwu bụ na amụrụ m ọzọ n'ezie
Mgbe m kwuru na Jizọs bụ koko, m kwuru ya
Ọ bụrụ na onye ọ bụla maara akụkọ m, maka nke ọ bụla n'ime abọm m, ana m enye nsọpụrụ mgbe niile onye nsọpụrụ kwesịrị, 'a pụrụ ịnụ ka ọ na-ekwu
'Amaara m mgbe niile isi iyi nke ebe m guzo
Afọ atọ gara aga, nwa m nwoke mbụ nwụrụ
Ma Onyenwe anyị weghachiri m
E nwere ihe ị ga-agwa ndị mmadụ ma ha agaghị ekwurịta okwu n'ihi na ha kwenyere na ị maghị ihe ha na-agafe
'Ma Chineke ga-etinye gị na njem ụfọdụ ka ị wee guzoro[inaudible] Ekele dị ukwuu
Chineke gọzie gị

Désirée van der Walt (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1956) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu National Assembly nke South Africa maka ndị mmegide Democratic Alliance (DA) kemgbe afọ 2014
Ọ jere ozi na Nzukọ ahụ site na 2004 ruo 2010
Ọ nọchitere anya pati ahụ na Limpopo Provincial Legislature site na 2010 ruo 2014
Van der Walt anọwo n'ọkwá ndị isi dị iche iche na Democratic Alliance na Shadow Cabinet
A mụrụ Désirée van der Walt na Pietersburg na Transvaal Province
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ anọ
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ bụ nwata
O nwere ọchịchọ ịghọ onye nkuzi, mana ọ pụghị n'ihi nsogbu ego
Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ were ya n'ọrụ
O mechara lụọ di ma mụọ ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Van der Walt rụrụ ọrụ nwa oge maka Ngalaba Mmụta Mba
A họpụtara Van der Walt ka ọ bụrụ onye kansụl obodo Roodepoort na 1995 ma jee ozi ruo n'afọ 2000
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye kansụl obodo Tzaneen n'afọ 2000 ma jee ozi ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya na National Assembly n'afọ 2004
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ọnụ na-ekwuchitere DA na nka na ọdịbendị
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi mpaghara nke Limpopo Democratic Alliance na 2008

A họpụtara Van der Walt ọzọ maka oge nke abụọ dị ka onye otu National Assembly na 2009, mana ọ gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye omeiwu na 10 Septemba 2010, ka a ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka onye so na Limpopo Provincial Legislature
N'afọ 2012, onye omeiwu DA bụ Jacques Smalle wepụrụ ya dị ka onye isi mpaghara nke pati ahụ
Ọ laghachiri na National Assembly nke South Africa na 2014
Ọ malitere ọrụ na 21 Mee 2014
Onye isi ndị omeiwu nke DA a họpụtara ọhụrụ bụ Mmusi Maimane họọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ osote minista na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ
Ka oge na-aga, ọ ghọrọ Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ ọha na eze na nchịkwa
A họpụtara Van der Walt ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke Democratic Alliance na Febụwarị 2015
A họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị osote onye isi oche atọ nke Democratic Alliance na Federal Congress nke pati ahụ na Mee 2015
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ Ivan Meyer na Refiloe Nt'sekhe ruo n'afọ 2018 mgbe e meriri ya maka nhọpụta ọzọ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Democratic Alliance Women's Network n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2017, dịka Lindy Wilson nọchiri ya dị ka osote onye isi oche mpaghara
N'afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke mpaghara Mopani nke Democratic Alliance
Ọ bụbu onye isi nke mpaghara Waterberg South nke pati ahụ
Na 5 June 2019, a họpụtara Van der Walt dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ
Van der Walt na Manny de Gouveia nwere mmekọrịta ruo afọ iri
Ha biri na Tzaneen
De Gouveia nwụrụ site na COVID-19 na 22 Jenụwarị 2021 n'oge ọrịa COVID-19 na South Africa
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Dị ka Turque nwere nsọtụ abụọ na-agagharị agagharị na baldachin n'akụkụ, bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ ngwaahịa nke narị afọ nke 18
N'ihi nchegbu maka ihe ọ bụla pụrụ iche ma ọ bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe site na mba ndị ọzọ, àkwà, oche na ihe ndị ọzọ gosipụtara ụdị a

Nhazi nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ụmụ nke àkwà a enweghị njikọ kpọmkwem ka ndị ọzọ ụra mbụ Nile nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ụmụ ndị ikom abụọ igbu na nhazi ọ bụla nke Turkey, mana ọ na-egosipụta atụmatụ okomoko na ịhụnanya nke kpaliri ndị omenkà nke oge a

A na-etinye àkwà nke ụdị a n'akụkụ na mgbidi na baldachin n'elu ma ọ bụ kwụ n'elu elu ụlọ, ma ọ bụ na-agbanye na ụdị nke dị na ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mere n'oge ochie site na mgbidi ma ọ bụ osisi dị n'akụkụ mgbidi
Ọtụtụ mgbe, a na-etinye àkwà ndị a na wiil na-enye ohere ka a dọpụta ahụ n'àkwà ma mee ya n'ụzọ dị mfe, ebe azụ ga-anọgide na mgbidi
Ndị ọzọ nwere onwe ha, na okpueze a na-etinye n'elu osisi naanị n'otu akụkụ (akụkụ abụọ na-eme ka ọ bụrụ àkwà Polish)
Ụdị ejiji maka ihe ndị Turkey ruru na narị afọ nke 18 mgbe Madame de Pompadour nwere ụlọ ihi ụra a na-akpọ chambre à la turque (Ụlọ ihi ụra ndị Turkey)

Dọkịta na-awa nke crowthorne akụkọ banyere igbu ọchụ, ara na ịhụ okwu n'anya bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nke onye edemede Britain bụ Simon Winchester, bipụtara nke mbụ na England na 1998 ọ degharịrị aha ya he Prọfesọ na onye ara akụkọ banyere igbu ọchụ, ara na ime akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu Oxford na United States na canada
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-akọ akụkọ banyere imepụta Oxford English Dictionary (OED) na otu n'ime ndị na'oge mbụ nyere aka, William Chester Minor, onye dọkịta na -wa ahụ nke United States Army lara ezumike nká
Minor, n'oge ahụ, nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na Broadmoor Criminal Lunatic Asylum, nso obodo Crowthorne, na Berkshire, England
'Pọfesọ' a kpọtụrụ aha na aha North America bụ Sir James Murray, onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ nke OED n'oge ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ahụ
Murray bụ onye ọkà mmụta asụsụ nwere nkà ma nwee mmasị ndị ọzọ, ma kụzie n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ma rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ akụ

N'ịbụ onye na-eche nnukwu ọrụ nke ịmepụta akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu zuru oke ihu, na ntinye nke na'ihe na - na ihe akaebe maka ojiji mbụ nke okwu ọ bụla, Murray nwetara enyemaka nke ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ dị ka ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo
Onye nta akụkọ nwere ahụmahụ afọ iri atọ, na onye dere akwụkwọ iri na abụọ sitere na njem, atụmatụ mbụ Winchester dere maka ide akwụkwọ banyere onye na-ede akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu a na'amaghị ama na mbụ
Naanị mgbe onye nchịkọta akụkọ HarperCollins bụ Larry Ashmead gụrụ aro ahụ ma kwado akwụkwọ ahụ ka Winchester ji ịnụ ọkụ n'obi chụsoo nyocha dị mkpa
Banyere ọrụ ahụ, Ashmead kwuru na 'anyị nwere ike ime ka akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu dị mma'
Ọ bụ Ashmead mere ka Winchester kpọọ mbipụta North America The Professor and the Madman (n'ihi mmegide Winester na Murray abụghị prọfesọ), na-ekwu 'Ọ dịghị onye maara ebe a ihe hel bụ Crowthorne
Akwụkwọ ahụ bụ nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma
Winchester gara n'ihu dee The Meaning of Everything The Story of the Oxford English Dictionary (2003) banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme sara mbara nke OED
A tọhapụrụ ihe nkiri nke akwụkwọ ahụ, nke Mel Gibson dị ka Murray na Sean Penn dị iche iche dị obere ma bụrụ nke Farhad Safinia duziri n'okpuru aha P
Shemran, na 2019 n'aha The Professor and the Madman
Gibson's Icon Productions zụrụ ikike ihe nkiri maka akwụkwọ ahụ na 1998
John Boorman dere edemede ma bụrụ onye a kpọrọ ka ọ bụrụ nduzi, dị ka Luc Besson
Mmepụta malitere na 2016, mana esemokwu iwu n'etiti ndị otu na mmepụta ihe nkiri ahụ mere ka ewepụta ya

Moanda, onye a mụrụ Vital Moanda-di Veta (?-1984) bụ onye na-eti egwu na onye na-egwu conga nke otu egwu Zaiko Langa Langa, si Congo-Kinshasa nke e mechara kpọọ Zaire, nke a na-akpọzi Democratic Republic of Congo
A maara ya nke ọma n'ihu ọha na Congo maka ihe nketa egwu Congo ya na dịka onye guzobere otu egwu a ma ama Zaiko, n'afọ 1969
Moanda nwụrụ n'afọ 1984 na Kinshasa
http //wwwkasaflonet/artistes/liste/zaiko/biographie3htm
Akwụkwọ ozi Semitic Dāleth nwere ike si na logogram maka azụ ma ọ bụ ọnụ ụzọ pụta
Enwere ọtụtụ hieroglyph ndị Ijipt dị iche iche nwere ike kpalite nke a
Na Semitic, Greek Ochie na Latin, leta ahụ nọchiri anya /d/; na mkpụrụedemede Etruscan akwụkwọ ozi ahụ bụ nke ochie, mana ka edobere ya (lee leta B)
Akwụkwọ ozi Grik yiri ya bụ Delta, Δ
