Dmytro Vyacheslavovich Kuznetsov (April 1, 1996, Redkino, Tver Region, Russia), nke a maara nke ọma n'okpuru usoro aha DIAO - onye na -ede egwú Rọshịa, DJ, onye na- agụ egwú, onye na-ede egwú, onye na- emepụta egwu
Onye mmeri nke asọmpi pop artist 2016 na nhọpụta - duet kacha mma, bụkwa onye mmeri nke 'Asọmpi Patriotic' na nhọpụta - duet kacha mma
Onye so na ihe ngosi a' Egwu ' na TNT, oge nke 1, na onye nzuzo nke asọmpi 'Parade of Talents'
A mụrụ Dmytro na Eprel 1, 1996 na obodo Redkino, mpaghara Tver, n'ime ezinụlọ nke ndị ọrụ nkịtị
Papa m hapụrụ ezinụlọ ahụ n'oge, Dmytro na nne ya na nne nne ya biri
Mgbe ahụ, nne ahụ lụrụ nwaanyị, mụọkwa otu nwanna nwaanyị
Dmytro nwere mmasị na egwu kemgbe ọ bụ nwata
Dmytro gụrụ akwụkwọ na 'MBUSOSH No
3' n'ime obodo Redkino, wee banye 'TKSiT' na obodo Tver maka ọrụ nke bred-confectioner, nwetara ọzọ mmụta dị ka osi nri
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ egwu na Redkino na klas Domra
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Dmytro banyere Music School of Arts aha ya Art
Na Andreev, dị ka klas ' Percussion '
O tinyere aka na football, na-egwuri egwu maka Redkino FC na Volga Tver, ma n'ihi mmerụ ahụ, a manyere ya ịkwụsị football
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 10, ọ na-egwuri egwu na ụmụ nwoke na band na drum, ma a chụpụrụ ya mgbe ọnwa 3 gasịrị, ma kemgbe ahụ jisiri ike dekọọ otu
Na Redkino, Dmytro chọpụtara banyere onye na-egwu egwuregwu football - Serhiy Korovushkin, mgbe Serhiy na-egwuri egwu maka ndị otu mpaghara, Dmytro nyeere aka gbaa egwuregwu football
Dmytro malitere nkwalite ya na 2008
Ugbua na nwata, ọ malitere ide abụ
Mgbe ahụ, a na-enye ya ka ọ tinye uri na egwu, mmalite nke ọrụ okike ya dị nnọọ mma, e dekọrọ egwu mbụ na dictaphone na igwe okwu karaoke BBK
Dmytro amaliteghị ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-egwu egwu ozugbo, ọ na-eme egwuregwu egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ, asọmpi n'ime kọleji na ụlọ akwụkwọ
Na 2014, ọ gbara vidiyo egwu maka egwu 'Site n'ụbọchị ruo ụbọchị'
Na mahadum, ọ zutere onye nkụzi - Petrov Kostyantyn Vyacheslavovich, bụ onye nyeere Dmytro aka imeziwanye, ma nyere ya aka imeri ọtụtụ mmeri na asọmpi
N'afọ 2014, Dmytro dekọrọ egwu mbụ ya 'Too Late' na ụlọ ọrụ ọkachamara
E nwere nkwụsịtụ na nkwalite maka ihe dị ka otu afọ, n'ihi na ọ sonyeere ndị agha, ma ọbụna n'ebe ahụ ọ kwụsịghị, dekọọ na filmed, na-echefughị ọkacha mmasị ọrụ

N'afọ 2018, mgbe ahapụchara album ahụ 'Wepụ n'oge gara aga' , Dima aghaghị ịgbanwe pseudonym ya na 'DIAO', n'ihi na enwere nnukwu nsogbu na mmepụta ihe na aha ndị na-ese ihe nke otu aha, dị ka ' DK na ndị na-ese ihe 'DK' na 'D - igodo'

Ange Didier Houon (26 Jenụwarị na afọ 1986 na 12 Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2019), nke a maara dịka DJ Arafat, Arafat Muana na aha ndị ọzọ dị iche iche, bụ onye mba Ivory Coast na akụ egwu bu DJ na onye na-agụ egwu nke mere egwu na ụdị Coupé-Décalé
'Jonathan', '202', 'Dosabado', 'Kpangor', 'Zoropoto' na 'Enfant Beni' bụ ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị isi ya
Ọ bụ onye a ma ama na mba ndị na-asụ French n'Africa
E nyere ya 'Best Artist of the Year' na Coupé-Decalé Awards n'afọ 2016 na 2017
Ọ nwụrụ n'ihe mberede ọgba tum tum na 12 Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2019
A mụrụ Arafat dị ka Ange Didier Houon na 26 Jenụwarị, na afo 1986
Ọ bụ nwa Tina Glamour [fr], onye na-agụ egwú a ma ama, na onye na-eti egwu na onye injinia ụda Pierre Houon nwụrụ anwụ
O nwere nwanne nwoke tọrọ ya nke a maara nke ọma dị ka DJ TV3
Ange Didier malitere ọrụ egwu ya na mbido afọ 2000 dị ka DJ mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ 14 na Yopougon, mpaghara ndụ abalị na Abidjan
Ọ gara France iji melite ọrụ ya ma ọbụna nọrọ na visa ya
N'afọ 2005, ọ nọrọ otu ọnwa n'ụlọ mkpọrọ dị ka onye mbịarambịa na-enweghị akwụkwọ
Aha egwu Arafat na-ezo aka na onye ndú Palestine Yasser Arafat; o kwuru na ndị enyi Lebanọn nọ na Ivory Coast nyere ya aha njirimara n'ihi na ọ bụ ̆hardcore
A na-ewere ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị omenkà Afrịka kachasị ewu ewu na mba ndị na-asụ French gburugburu ụwa
Ọ ghọrọ kpakpando nke ụdị ya n'afọ 2009
O weputara abọm egwu iri na otu nke a ma ama n'ụdị egwu egwu 'Coupé-Décalé', n'ọrụ ya nke were afọ iri na ise
Egwú ahụ na-agụnye ụda ngwa ngwa, bass miri emi na ụda olu hip-hop
Arafat ghọrọ ihe nnọchianya nke ụdị ndụ ejiji mara mma nke jikọtara ya na egwu
Abụ ya bụ Dosabado bụ otu n'ime egwu ya kachasị ewu ewu
Ọ nwere mmasị na ọgba tum tum ma gosipụta ha na 'Moto Moto' nke e wepụtara na Mee, na afo 2019
O nwere ọtụtụ ihe mberede ọgba tum tum, otu n'ime ha na afọ 2009, dị oke njọ
Ihe mberede ọgba tum tum Arafat mere na afo 2019 bụ ihe na-egbu egbu
Arafat mechara bụrụ onye a ma ama na Europe na United States mgbe ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-eme egwuregwu mere ka usoro ịgba egwu nke ụdị coupé-décalé bụrụ ihe a ma ama
'Dosabado', 'Kpangor', 'Zoropoto', 'Enfant Beni' na 'Moto, Moto' bụ ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị isi ya
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, na afo 2019, Arafat nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ Abidjan mgbe ihe mberede ọgba tum tum mere na Abidjan, Ivory Coast
A na-ekwu na ọgba tum tum ya na ụgbọ ala kụrụ n'ógbè Angre na Sọnde, 11 Ọgọstụ, na afo 2019
E mechara kpọbata ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Abidjan maka ọkpụkpụ okpokoro isi tupu o mesịa nwụọ n'ihe dị ka elekere asatọ nke ụtụtụ
UTC na 12 Ọgọstụ, na afo 2019

Mgbe akụkọ ọnwụ ya gbasara, na 12 Ọgọstụ, na afo 2019, ihe dị ka 1,000 n'ime ndị na-akwado ya gbakọtara na mpaghara Cocody dị nso n'ụlọ ọgwụ ebe ọ nwụrụ, wee kwaa ákwá ọnwụ ya na-eti 'Arafat enweghị ike ịnwụ'
Mgbe e liri ya, ụfọdụ ndị na-akwado ya gwupụtara ili ya mgbe asịrị zuru ezu na e nyere ndị òtù nzuzo ozu ya
Ndị uwe ojii gbasiri mbọ ike ịchịkwa ìgwè mmadụ gbakọtara n'ógbè ahụ
Ìgwè mmadụ nke ndị na-akwado ya gbakọtakwara gburugburu ụlọ ya na-abụ ụfọdụ n'ime egwu ya
Maurice Kouakou Bandaman, Minista Ọdịbendị nke Ivorian, kwara ya obi ụtọ maka ọnwụ ya ma mee ụtụ iji sọpụrụ ya
E nyere ya 'Best Artist of the Year' na Coupé-Decalé Awards na afọ 2016 na 2017
O nwetakwara ihe nrite abụọ nke WatsUp TV Africa Music Video Awards na afo 2016

Ange Didier Houon (26 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1986 - 12 Ọgọstụ, na afọ 2019), nke a makwaara dị ka DJ Arafat, ma ọ bụ Arafat Muana na aha ndị ọzọ dị iche iche, bụ onye Ivorian DJ na onye na-agụ egwu, onye mere egwu na ụdị Coupé-Décalé
'Dosabado', 'Kpangor', 'Zoropoto', 'Enfant Beni' na 'Moto, Moto' bụ ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị isi ya
Ọ bụ onye a ma ama n'etiti ndị na-asụ French n'Africa
E nyere ya 'onye omenkà kachasị mma n'afọ' na Coupé-Decalé Awards n'afọ 2016 na 2017
Nonso Temisan Ajufo nke a maara dịka DJ Big N bụ onye Naijiria hip hop DJ
Dị ka akụkụ nke Mavin Records, DJ Big N akwadola ọtụtụ n'ime ihe omume kachasị elu nke labelụ ahụ, gụnyere ịkwado Tiwa Savage na njem mbụ ya na America
O weputara ọtụtụ mixtapes Mavin, gụnyere 'Mavin All Stars' mixtape, 'Surulere Mixtape Volume 1', na 'ENERGY Mixtape', n'etiti ndị ọzọ
A mụrụ Big N na Legos Steeti site na nne na nna Naijiria ma ugbu a ọ bi na Legos steeti, Naịjirịa mgbe o si United Kingdom laghachi ebe ọ gara ịga n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya
O nwetara nzere MBA na mahadum Coventry dị na England
O nwekwara nzere Bsc na Psychology na Mahadum nke Lagos
Ọ bụ ọkara nke abụọ nke ụmụ ejima
O nwere nwanne nwanyị ejima
Ọ gara King's college Lagos na Corona primary school Victoria Island Legos
Dj Big N malitere ọrụ ya na UK na-egwu klọb obodo na West Midlands tupu onye ọbịa na-egwu na Palms Club na Coventry yana onye ọbịa na-egwu na Club 'Release'
Ọ gbakwara bọọlụ maka nnwere onwe Naịjirịa n'afọ 2009 na Coventry, ebe o nwetara nnukwu ezumike ya
Dj Big N emeela ihe nkiri n'akụkụ ihe nkiri dịka Kool and the Gang, Maxi Priest, Dru Hill, Billy Ocean na Joe
Ọ bụkwa onye isi DJ maka ihe ngosi Jarule na Ashanti nke emere na Lagos n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2014
Na ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe ndekọ Mavin, Dr
Sid official Disk Jockey
O mechara bụrụ onye isi DJ maka njem Mavin UK
Na ọnwa Septemba afọ 2014, DJ BIG N wepụtara mixtape MAVIN mbụ
Ọ bụ onye isi Dj maka ihe omume Centenary nke Naijiria nke weere ọnọdụ na Abuja na ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2014
O weputara nke mbụ MAVIN ALL STARS MIXTAPE
Kemgbe ahụ, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye ọrụ MAVIN Records DJ

Akwuba Charles Ugochukwu (amụrụ ya na Nọvamba 4, 1989), nke a na-akpọ DJ Coublon, bụ onye mmepụta ndekọ egwu na onye ndozi ụda egwu olu Anaara ịa dika onye na-ụteputndị ndi egwu ama, ama egwu na-ụda udụ ọ'ọrụ oru egwị Naịjiriị ndiụ egwu Nigeria, gụnyere Kiss Daniel, Iyanya, Yemi Alade, Tekno Miles Seyi PatoranaaShay, n'titi ndị ọzọ
A mụrụ ya na Nọvemba 4, 1989, ọ malitere ịnwe mmasị n’egwú mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Physics na Electronics na Mahadum Veritas na Abuja, Naịjirịa
DJ Coublon malitere ọrụ egwu ya na Onịcha, Anambra Steeti, Ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Na 2013 ọ kwagara Legọọsụ ebe ọ zutere ndị ọzọ na-eti egwu dịka Iyanya na Kiss Daniel
Ebinyere ya aka na Made Men Music Group n'etiti Septemba 2014 rue 2016
Florence Ifeoluwa Otedola (amuru na Nọvemba 11, 1992), nke amara aha ya dika DJ Cuppy, ma obu nani Cuppy, bu onye Naijiria na-arụ ọrụ dịka diski jockey na onye na-emeputa ihe
Ọ bụ ada onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria bụ Femi Otedola
O tolitere na Lagos wee kwaga London mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ
Cuppy biri na Ilupeju afọ isii tupu ọ kwaga Ikeja ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Grange, Ikeja
Ọ kwagara London maka GCSEs na ule A-Level ya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na King's College London na Julaị 2014, wee nweta akara ugo mmụta n'azụmaahịa na akụnụba
O nwetakwara nzere masters na azụmahịa egwu na Mahadum New York na 2015
Site na Ọktoba 2021, Cuppy debara aha ma na-agbaso akara ugo 'Masters' na African Studies na Mahadum Oxford
Na 2014 Cuppy bụ DJ na MTV Africa Music Awards na Durban
Ọ mere egwu na Tatler na Christie's Art Ball na London, nakwa na Financial Times Luxury Summit nke weere ọnọdụ na Mexico City
Na Julaị 2014, ọ wepụtara House of Cuppy dị ka ngwakọta mkpokọta mbụ ya na London na Lagos, tupu ịmalite ya na New York na Septemba 2, 2014
Site na House of Cuppy, o mepụtara EDM-esque nke bu ngwakọta nke egwu sitere n'aka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri afropop
N'otu afọ ahụ, Cuppy malitekwara njikwa egwu dabeere na London na azụmahịa mmepụta ọdịnaya, Red Velvet Music Group
Na Jenụwarị 2015, e gosipụtara Cuppy na mkpuchi nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Guardian Life
Ihe mkpuchi ahụ mere ememe ọgbọ ọhụrụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Africa
Na Maachị bula 2015, e nyere Cuppy ọrụ gọọmentị dika onye DJ maka 2015 Oil Barons Charity na Dubai, wee ghọọ onye mbụ Africa na-eme ihe na ihe omume ahụ
E gosipụtara ya na mbipụta 2015 nke April / May nke Forbes Woman Africa
Na June 2015, Cuppy wepụtara House of Cuppy II
N'Ọgọst 2015, Cuppy malitere njem nlegharị anya DJ mbụ ya na mba asatọ dị na Africa, nke akpọrọ 'Cuppy Takes Africa'
Ọ gara mba dị iche iche nke gunyere Nigeria, Senegal, Ghana, Kenya, Tanzania, Rwanda, Uganda na South Africa
Njem 'Cuppy Takes Africa' gụnyere mmemme, mmekorita ndị isi na-agụ egwu na ọrụ ebere nke GTB Bank na Dangote Foundation kwadoro
Mgbe afọ ahụ gachara, ọ tinyere akwụkwọ n'ụlọọrụ Jay-Z a kpọrọ Roc Nation
N'October 2016, njem Cuppy Takes Africa gosipụtara na Fox Life Africa dị ka usoro akwụkwọ akụkọ nwere usoro ihe omume asatọ
Na 2016, Cuppy bụ onye DJ maka nke ihe nkiri MTV2 a kpọrọ Uncommon Sense with Charlamagne Tha God
Ọ mepụtara egwu abụọ, 'Vibe' na 'The Way I Am', nke pụtara na 'Afrobeats' EP nke Young Paris ewepụtara na Maachị 24, 2017
N'Ọktoba 13, 2017, o wepụtara 'Green Light', egwu mbụ ya n'ihu ọha
Egwu a nwere olu ndị ọbịa sitere na onye na-abụ abụ na onye na-emepụta ihe na Naijiria, Tekno
Na Maachị 30, 2018, ọ wepụtara 'Vybe', egwu ya nke abụọ n'ihu ọha
Egwu a nwere olu ndị ọbịa sitere na onye na-agụ egwú Ghana bụ Sarkodie
Na Ọgọst 24, 2018, ọ wepụtara Currency, egwuya nke atọ n'ihu ọha ebe o gosipụtara LAX
Na Ọktoba 5, 2018, ọ wepụtara Werk, egwu ya nke anọ na-egosi Skuki
Na Eprel 19, 2019, ya na Kwesi Arthur rụkọrọ ọrụ maka egwu ya nke ise ọ kpọrọ Abena
Na Ọgọst 16, 2019, ọ wepụtara Gelato, egwu ya nke isii na-egosi Zlatan
N'afọ 2020, ewebatara Cuppy n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ Forbes nke a kpọrọ '30 under 30'
Na Mee 28, 2020, ọ ghọrọ onye ọbịa nke 'Africa Now Radio' na Apple Music Beats 1
Na Julaị 16, 2020, ọ wepụtara Jollof On The Jet, egwu ya nke asaa na-egosi Rema & Rayvanny
Na Ọgọstụ 24, 2020, ọ kpughere album mbụ ya Original Copy
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2021, ya na Apple Music jikọrọ aka wee malite ihe ngosi redio mbụ ha na Africa
Na Septemba 2021, ekwuputara Cuppy dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri maka ihe nkiri TV Channel 4 a kpọrọ High Life, ihe ngosi na-elekwasị anya n'ọrụ nke ndị Britain nwere agburu West Africa
Ha abụọ nọchiri Remi Burgz, onye gara n'ihu nọchie Yasmin Evans na ihe ngosi oge ehihie nke ụbọchị izu 1Xtra
N'ajụjụ ọnụ Tush Magazine, Cuppy kọwara ụda ya dị ka 'Neo-Afrobeats', nke bụ ngwakọta nke ụlọ Electro na Afrobeats
Na Eprel 14, 2020, DJ Cuppy kpughere na Twitter na ọ bụ onye na-adịghị eri anụ

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Cuppy onye natara onyinye pụrụ iche nke Ferrari Portofino nke ruru nde naira iri asatọ n'aka nna ya n'oge COVID-19, kwuputara na ọ bụzi onye nwe ụlọ na United Kingdom, London nke ọ kpọrọ PinkPentHouse
O mere ya ka ọ pụta ìhè n'ihu ọha na 8 Eprel, 2021
Nke a nwetara ọtụtụ mmeghachi omume na mgbasa ozi ọha e gosipụtkwara ya na MTV Cribs
Na Julaị 2018, Cuppy tọrọ ntọala Cuppy Foundation
N'afọ na-esote (November 2019), ntọala ahụ haziri Gold Gala wee wepụta ihe karịrị ijeri naira ise maka atụmatụ Save the Children Nigeria
Onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria Dangote na nna ya nyere onyinye

N'April 2014, onye minista na-ahụ maka njem nlegharị anya, omenala na mba Nigeria (Edem Duke) họpụtara Cuppy ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya njem nlegharị anya maka mkpọsa 'Fascinating Nigeria' nke obodo ahụ
Cuppy ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị DJ na-nọchi anya Pepsi ya na mmadụ atọ ndị ọzọ na Nigeria
Na Machị 20, 2018, ekwuputara Cuppy dị ka onye nnọchi anya DJ maka Pepsi
Ọ pụtara n'ihe ngo nke ụlọọrụ Pepsi a kpọrọ '#NaijaAllTheWay' mgbasa ozi tupu asọmpi Iko Mbaụwa nke 2018
Na June 5, 2018, ekwuputara Cuppy dị ka onye nnọchi anya agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ amaala zuru ụwa ọnụ
Na Nọvemba 28, 2018, ekwuputara Cuppy dịka onye nnọchi anya Save The Children UK
Na Julaị 28, 2021, ekwuputara Cuppy dị ka onye nnọchi anya Lagos SDGs Youth Alliance
Naijalegit (2021) DJ Cuppy Net uru na akụkọ ndụ
Dacoury Dahi Natche (amụrụ na Machị 10, 1983), nke a maara dị ka DJ Dahi, bụ onye American DJ, ónyé na-ede egwu, ónyé na'emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye na-agụ egwu si Inglewood, California

Dahi bụ onye a maara nke ọma màkà ịmepụta 'Money Trees' nke ónyé America rapper Kendrick Lamar, nke ónyé Canada rapper Drake, na 'I Don't Fuck with You' nke onye American rapper Big Sean, nke ruru n'elu 20 nke US Hot 100 chart
Dahi emepụtawokwa ọtụtụ egwu maka ndị omenkà dị iche iche gụnyere Dr
Dre, Freddie Gibbs, Dom Kennedy, Lupe Fiasco, Vince Staples, Mac Miller, Pac Div, Vic Mensa, Casey Veggies, Logic, Big KRIT, na Childish Gambino n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Ewezuga ọrụ mmepụta onwe ya, Dahi bụkwa onye otu mmepụta DRUG$
DJ Dahi malitere na egwu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-agba diski mgbè ọ na-aga Mahadum California, Santa Cruz
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na Film na American studies
Ọ malitere inweta ụda na-emepụta màkà ndị na-eti egwu na Los Angeles dịka Pac Div, TiRon, na Fashawn
Nnukwu ọkwa mbụ ya ga-abụ 'My Type of Party,' nke Dom Kennedy si na mixtape ya, The Yellow Album (2012)
'Ụdị m nke nnọkọ' gosipụtara 'ikpo igwe ojii nke ụfụfụ na-enweghị isi n'elu ụfụ na ụfụ
' N'afọ 2012, o mepụtara ScHoolboy Q's 'Sexting,' na mmepụta ya a ma ama, 'Money Trees' site na album platinum nke Kendrick Lamar Good Kid, MAAD City
N'afọ 2013, o mepụtara 'Hell of a Night' nke Schoolboy Q na 'Worst Behavior' nke Drake nke gosipụtara na nọmba 89 na US Hot 100
'Money Trees', nke na-egosi 'Silver Soul' nke otu egwu indie rock Beach House, akpọrọ nke itoolu kachasị mma n'ime afọ ise gara aga, site na Complex na Septemba 3, 2013
Ọzọkwa ka e mesịrị na Septemba 2013, Complex kpọrọ ya ónyé nke itoolu kachasị mma na-emepụta hip hop n'oge ahụ
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ya na Lecrae, Kendrick Lamar, Big KRIT, Jazmine Sullivan na Elle Varner na ndị ọzọ nwere ógè ndekọ
N'afọ 2015, o jikọtara aka mepụta egwu atọ na 'Compton A Soundtrack' album nke Dr
Dre
Daryl McPherson, ónyé a maara dị ka DJ Durel, bụ onye America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, injinia ndekọ, na DJ si Cleveland, Ohio
Ọ bụ ónyé isi DJ nke otu egwu rap nke Atlanta, Migos
Ná ngwụsị afọ 2017, Control the Streets, Vol
1, abọm nchịkọta nkè Quality Control Music wepụtara, gosipụtara egwu isii nkè DJ Durel mepụtara - karịa ihe ọ bụla ọzọ na-emepụta ihe na abọm 30
N'afọ 2018, Migos wepụtara Culture II, na-enye DJ Durel na Quavo otuto dị ka ndị isi na-emepụta abọm ahụ
E depụtara DJ Durel dị ka ónyé na-emepụta egwu iri na abụọ n'ime egwu iri abụọ na anọ dị na abọm ahụ nakwa dị ka ónyé injinia na-edekọ ihe màkà abọm ahụ dum
Durel na-azọrọ na ọ bụ ónyé nke anọ so na Migos na Instagram bio ya, n'agbanyeghị na otu ahụ bụ mmadụ atọ nabatara onwé ha
Eniola Olamilekan Adedeji,e ji aha ọgbọ ya bụ DJ Enimoney mara ya, bụ onye DJ na Naịjirịa na-edekọ egwu
Enimoney bụ onye ọrụ DJ nke YBNL Nation na nwanne nwoke nke obere onye na-eti egwu Naijiria, Olamide
Onye na - eso ya bụ 'WOBEY DJ CAMPUS TOUR' - a ọtụtụ njegharị egwu kampụs nke hụrụ ya ka ọ na-egosi egwu ya na mahadum dị na Naịjirịa
A mụrụ DJ Enimoney na Legọọsụ nke nne na nna ya bụ ndị Naịjirịa
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Legọọsụ Steeti Sekọndarị Sukulu
Ọ mụrụ kọmputa sayensị na Legọọsụ City Politekniki
DJ Enimoney bidoro ọrụ ọkachamara DJ ya mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 2015 na Bariga
Ọ nwetara mmata na 2016 na mbido egwu mbụ ya 'Oya dab' nke gosipụtara Olamide
Na mbipụta 2018 nke 'City People Muziki Awọdụ', nke emere na Legọọsụ, otu egwu DJ Enimoney 'Diet' nke gosipụtara Tiwa Savage & Slimcase meriri 'Mmekọrịta Egwu Kachasị Mma nke Afọ'
N'afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya na Ntụrụndụ Naịjirịa maka 'Diet' na 'Otu Egwu Kacha mma nke DJ'
Kevin Bell (amụrụ na Septemba 12, 1971), nke a maara dị ka DJ Head, bụ onye na-emepụta hip-hop na-emeri Grammy Award ugboro atọ na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri hip-hop site na Detroit, Michigan
A maara ya nke ọma màkà imepụta na imepụta egwu màkà Eminem, Xzibit, Jay Z, D12, Valid, Obie Trice, Bizarre, na dị ka Eminem's first touring deejay site na 1997 rụo 2002

A zụlitere Kevin Bell na Detroit, ọ gara Gesu Elementary School ma bụrụ ónyé gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Shrine Catholic High School na Royal Oak, Michigan (klas nke 1989), ọ bụkwa ónyé gụsịrị anya na Mahadum Michigan State (Bachelor of Science, Engineering 1994)
Ọ gakwara ụlọ akwụkwọ egwu Detroit Community Music School, na-amụ Classical na Jazz Piano (1978-1989)
Egwú
Khalil Abdul-Rahman Hazzard (amụrụ n'October 16, 1973), nkè a maara dị ka DJ Khalil, bụ onye America na-emepụta egwu na DJ si Los Angeles
Ọ bụ ọkara nke ndị hip hop duo Self Scientific (ya na onye na-eti egwu Chace Infinite) na ónyé otu The New Royales, nké gụnyere Liz Rodrigues, Erik Alcock na Pranam Chin Injeti
O mepụtara abọm Recovery na The Marshall Mathers LP 2 nkè onye na-eti egwu Eminem, yana otu platinum 'The Man' nke Aloe Blacc
Ọ bụ nwá nwoke nke atọ nke onye bụbu ónyé egwuregwu UCLA na ónyé nkụzi na ónyé egwuregwu NBA Walt Hazzard
Khalil malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agba diski (DJ), ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mmepụta egwu
O mepụtara màkà ọtụtụ ndị isi na-ese ihe na hip-hop, R&B na ụdị pop, gụnyere Kanye West, 50 Cent, Pink, The Game, ASAP Rocky, Drake, Eminem, G-Unit, Wale, Usher na Guess Who
Olawunmi Okerayi, ónyé eji aha nkwago bụ DJ Lambo mara, bụ nwaafọ Naịjịrịa nwere nka n'ịkpọ egwu diski
Egwu ya bu 'Drank' bụ nke Reinhard mepụtara ,nke emere ezi nnyocha gbakwunyere ọkpụkpọ egwu ogologo oge
A bịanyere aha ya na otu egwu Loopy na 2013 tupu ya na Chocolate City emekọ bụrụ otu na 2015
O meriri DJ nwanyị nke Afọ na 2016 City People Entertainment Awards
Nigerian Entertainment Today (NET) depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime DJ Naịjirịa ise bụ ísí ahụrụ kwawa okpu ndị a ga atụ anya ha na 2015
Na 2017, DJ Lambo so na DJ ole na ole ahọpụtara ịkpọ egwu na Big Brother Nigeria ’agba nke abụọ na emume Satọdee nke ihe ngosi Big Brother Naija
DJ Lambo toro n'etiti ụmụnne nwoke ano na Nigeria
Nna ya, DJ Tony Lewis metụtara ọrụ ya dị ka diski jockey
Ọ malitere ọrụ aka ya na 2008–2009 dịka onye ama ama na Redio bụ Redio personality ((OAP) na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi redio bụ Raypower 1005 FM, Rhythm FM 947 Abuja, na Love 1045 FM Abuja
DJ Lambo na-akọwa ụda egwu ya dị ka njikọta nke egwu ụlọ,techno, afropop na hip hop abụ ya bụ 'Drank' bụ nke Reinhard mepụtara ma mee ya ezi nnyocha tinyere ohere ọkpụkpọ ogologo oge
Edebanyere aha ya na otu egwu Loopy na 2013 tupu ya na Chocolate City emekọnụ bụrụ otu na 2015
N'ọnwa Maachị, 2017, ụlọ ọrụ Smirnoff hiwere ọgbakọ ime nhatanha nhọrọ egwu na nnọchite nke International Women's Day ,iji too umu nwanyị n'akpò egwu na gburugburu ụwa
DJ Lambo bụ onye nke iri na asatọ n'ọnụ ọgụgụ ahọpụtara ,nke gbasara ụmụ nwanyị bụ ísí ahụrụ kwawa okpu na nhọrọ' Smirnoff Top Women Electronic Artists playlist' nke eji egwu'Motion' ya

N'abalị̀ iri abụọ n'ọnwa Maachị, 2017, Smirnoff Nigeria mekwara emume nke Ụbọchị ncheta Ụmụ nwa na mba ụwa na ụlọ ezumike Crest dị na Jos ,nke ndị ahọpụtara ka ndị isi mmeri atọ ikpeazụ sokwa nọrọ na asọmpi nke Smirnoff X1 gbasara ụmụ nwaanyị n'akpọpụta egwu, ndị gụnyere DJ Lambo na DJ Spinall na mmemme ahụ
N'abalị̀ iri na otu n'ọnwa Jun, 2017, e mere ya onye isi na onye isi oche nke Choc Boi Nation (CBN), akara ndekọ pụrụ iche nke Chocolate City Music
Site na ọkwa a ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime nwanyị gbara mgbọrọgwụ na-ahụ maka ndekọ egwu na ụlọ ọrụ egwu na Nigeria
Nzuko ndị ọrụ nta akuko a, nke emere na Lagoosụ, nke MI Abaga, Dice Ailed,joker na Loose kaynon, ndị otu ya na ndekọ labeelụ bịara
DJ Lambo nwere akara nzere na English and Literature na University of Abuja
Ọ gosipụtala n'ọtụtụ ihe omume na ihe ngosi na-ewu ewu kemgbe ogbakotere n'ọkwa, gụnyere

Imohiosen Patrick (amụrụ na 25 Septemba) amaara ya dịka DJ Neptune, bụ a Naịjirịa na-eme DJ na Mmepụta Ndekọ
Ọ sitere na ezinụlọ nke dị anọ nke gụnyere ụmụnne ya ndị nwanyị atọ ndị okenye ya
Deidra Muriel Roper (amụrụ Ọgọst 3, 1970 ma ọ bụ 1971), mara ọkachamara dị ka DJ Spinderella ma ọ bụ nanị Spinderella, bụ onye American DJ, onye na-agụ egwú na onye na-emepụta ihe
A maara Roper nke ọma dị ka onye so n'òtù hip-hop Salt -N-Pepa
Roper na-apụta mgbe ụfọdụ na The Salt-n-Pepa Show, usoro ihe nkiri TV n'ezie na-elekwasị anya n'ịgbanwe otu na nke na-agbasa na netwọk VH1 na 2008
A mụrụ Deidra Muriel Roper August 3, 1970 ma ọ bụ 1971, wee zụlite na Brooklyn, New York City, na United States, otu n'ime ụmụaka ise
Mmetụta mmalite Roper na egwu malitere mgbe ọ bụ nwata, na-enwe mmasị na nchịkọta ndekọ nna ya na-etolite
Roper malitere ọrụ ya dị ka DJ mgbe ọ dị afọ 14
N'ime afọ nke abụọ ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Roper malitere ịkpa onye DJ obodo ọ mụtara usoro DJ
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Roper malitere ịzụ ahịa onwe ya dị ka DJ na mpaghara gburugburu Brooklyn
Mgbe ọ dị afọ 16, otu nwa akwụkwọ ibe ya bịakwutere ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ bụ́ onye jụrụ ya na ọ ga-enwe mmasị isonye n'òtù rap nke ụmụ nwanyị nile
Nwa klas ahụ maara Hurby 'LuvBug' Azor, onye na-emepụta otu ahụ, ma mee ndokwa ka Roper nyochaa ya
Akpọbatara Roper na onye na-emepụta Salt-N-Pepa Hurby Azor obere oge tupu otu a pụta na Westchester Music Festival na 1986
DJ mbụ nke otu ahụ, Latoya Hanson, Agbagharala ọtụtụ mmegharị ahụ na ngosipụta nke otu, ndị otu ahụ na-achọkwa onye ga-anọchi ya
Ọdịnihu redio na omume TV Wendy Williams enyochala dị ka DJ
A họpụtara Roper dị ka DJ nke otu ahụ site na Azor (na-ewere aha Spinderella) gburugburu oge ewepụtara album mbụ nke otu ahụ
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ dị afọ 16 n'oge ọ sonyere, nne na nna Ropers aghaghị inye ya ikike ịgagharị obodo ahụ
Atọ atọ ahụ ghọrọ otu n'ime omume hip-hop nwanyị kacha aga nke ọma n'oge niile
Ha wepụtara ọba studio ise wee hụ ọtụtụ platinum na otu ọla edo
Spinderella ewepụtala egwu dị iche iche na ọba egwu otu ahụ
Na 1993, e gosipụtara ya dị ka onye rapper na album Big Daddy Kane dị ka ọrụ maka… na nke abụọ, Pụrụ Iche nke ga-aga n'ihu wee bụrụ naanị Big Daddy Kane kacha 40 kụrụ
Nnu-N-Pepa gbasasịa na 2002, wee gbanwee na 2007 - mechara gbaa Spinderella na 2019

Site na 2003 ruo 2006, Spinderella rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye redio na KKBT 1003 nke na-adịghị agwụ agwụ ugbu a na Los Angeles, na-akwado The BackSpin, ihe ngosi redio nke mba ahụ na-eme kwa izu na-egosi hip-hop ụlọ akwụkwọ ochie
Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke usoro VH1 The Salt N Pepa Show
Site na Septemba 2010 ruo Maachị 2011, Roper mere etiti ụbọchị na KSOC-945 'K-Soul' na Dallas, Texas

Spinderella bụ akụkụ nke American Diabetes Association Celebrity Cabinet, onye nnọchi anya TV ONE UnSung, onye na-akwado Saving Daughters Mentoring Programme, na onye nchoputa nke Spinderella DJ Academy
Ọ pụtara obere oge na VH1 mbụ kwa afọ Hip Hop Honors na Nọvemba 2004, ya na ndị otu ya, mana ha emebeghị
Ndị otu atọ ahụ mere na nkwanye ugwu Hip Hop nke abụọ na Septemba 22, 2005
Nke a bụ arụmọrụ mbụ ndị atọ ahụ dị ka Nnu-N-Pepa kemgbe 1999
Na 2007, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka DJ maka Comedy Central Roast of Flavour Flav
N'October 23, 2008, otu ahụ mere egwu egwu ha dị egwu 'Shoop', 'Push It' na ' Whatta Man ' na 2008 BET Hip Hop Awards
Mgbe otu ahụ pụtara na Wendy Williams Show iji mee 'Push It' na December 18, 2015, onye ọbịa Wendy Williams gbalịrị aka ya na DJ'ing tupu Spinderella apụta ka ọ nọgide na-arụ ọrụ
Na Mee 3, 2019, Spinderella kwuputara na posta Instagram na ọ 'kwụsịla' na Salt-N-Pepa dịka nke Jenụwarị 2019, wee gbachie ọnụ ya mgbe ndị otu ahụ emeghị ọkwa ọha na eze gbasara nkewa ha
N'afọ 1992, Spinderella pụtara na fim ahụ nọrọ na-ekiri
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ mụrụ nwa mbụ ya na otu nwa ya nwanyị aha ya bụ Christy, ya na onye ọkpụkpọ basketball NBA Kenny Anderson
Na 1996, ọ pụtara na fim Kazaam, bụ nke gbara Shaquille O'Neal
Ọ mepere ụlọ ịsa ahụ mara mma nke ya na Ọktoba 21, 1997, otu afọ ahụ otu ahụ wepụtara album ikpeazụ ha Brand New
Mgbe ọba egwu a gachara, ọ ga-ewepụta ọba solo, mana nke a emebeghị ka Red Ant, akara ndekọ Salt-N-Pepa kwụsịrị ịrụ ọrụ
Nwa ya nwanyị Christy mechara pụta na ihe omume nke My Super Sweet 16
Gary Rafael Hill (amụrụ n'April 21, 1989), nke a maara dị ka DJ Spinz, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé na-ede egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkírí diski
Ọ bịanyere aka na DJ Scream's Hoodrich Entertainment
Spinz ghọrọ DJ na ngwụcha afọ 2000 tupu ọ ghọọ Onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
O mepụtara egwu màkà ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ dịka Future, Ty Dolla Sign, Rich Homie Quan, iLoveMakonnen, French Montana, Cash Out, na Zach Farlow
A mụrụ Hill n'April 21, 1989, ma too na Augusta, Georgia
Nné nnè Spinz na nwanne nna ya na-elekọta klọb nri abalị ma ọ maara DJ n'ebe ahụ kemgbe ọ dị afọ atọ ma ọ bụ anọ
Spinz na-ele ya DJ, yabụ ọ kpaliri ya n'ezie
Mgbè Spinz dị afọ iri na anọ, nne ya zụtara ya turntables mbụ ya
Ụlọ ọrụ redio dị na Augusta ga-agbasa egwuregwu bọọlụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ma Spinz mere ezigbo mmetụta na ónyé nduzi mmemme nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Spinz malitere deejaying n'oge ezumike mgbasa ozi nke egwuregwu ahụ
Mgbe Spinz dị afọ iri na isii, ọ zutere DJ Scream mgbe ọ gara Atlanta na Guitar Center ịzụta ụfọdụ eriri maka ngwá ọrụ ya
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na isii, ónyé nduzi mmemme nyèrè Spinz ébé redio nke ya
N'oge ahụ, ónyé ọ bụla gbara ya gburugburu chọrọ ịbụ ónyé na-egwu basketball ma ọ bụ onye na-eti egwu, mana deejaying nọgidere na ya ma ọ chọrọ inwe ike ịchịkwa ìgwè mmadụ ahụ
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, Hill hapụrụ Augusta
Ozugbo Spinz zutere DJ Scream, ha rụkọtara ọrụ na Sirius XM Holdings na Spinz bịanyere aka na Hoodrich Entertainment
N'afọ 2009, Spinz kesara ébé mgbede na Atlanta's Hot 1079's Hoodrich Radio
N'oge ọ malitere 1079, Spinz malitere ịbanye na mmepụta
Ọ were keyboard ma gbalịa ime ka ọ na-akụ ma na-agbasi mbọ ike ugboro ole na ole ma na-anọ mgbè ụfọdụ n'oge ọ chọrọ ịhapụ, mana ọ nọgidere na-agbalị imeziwanye nkà ya
N'afọ 2010, Spinz mepụtara egwu egwu màkà Travis Porter, nke akpọrọ 'Go Shorty, Go'
Aha ọma nke abụ ahụ gbara Spinz ume ka ọ chọọ ịnọgide na-arụ ọrụ
N'afọ 2011, Spinz mepụtara 2 Chainz', 'Riot'
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, Spinz mepụtara egwu izizi nke Ca$h Out, 'Cashin' Out' na Ca$hOut abịaghị na akara n'oge ahụ
Spinz bụkwa ónyé DJ mixtape
Spinz na onye mmekọ ya DJ Pretty Boy Tank, anọwo na-arụ ọrụ na usoro mixtape Space Invaders kemgbe afọ 2006
Ihe ndị ọ na-emepụta nwèrè mkpado 'Kpọọ ya!' nke nwanne ya nwoke kwuru
DJ Spinz 808 nke a makwaara dị ka 'Spinz 808' ma ọ bụ 'TCE Spinz 80 8' bụ ọdịiche nke Roland TR-808 bass drum, nke a na-ekwu na ọ bụ Hill
Ụda nke a na-eji na hip-hop, pop, na R&B, bụ nke a ma ama maka ịbụ otu n'ime ụda kachasị ewu ewu na nke Iconic na egwu ọnyà
N'ịbụ nke e kere na 2011, ihe nlele ahụ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama n'etiti ndị na-emepụta ọnyà n'ihi nnukwu ọnụnọ ya dị ala, yana ezigbo ọkpọ
O mepụtara ọtụtụ ọdịiche nke ya, nke ọ bụla nwere ọkwa dịgasị iche iche nke Distortion, Equalization, na mgbanwe ndị ọzọ
A na-eji ihe nlele ahụ eme ihe mgbe a na-etinye ya na octave dị ala iji rụọ ọrụ dị ka bass na trap beats
'Spinz 808' ahụla ojiji site na ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-emepụta ihe kachasị ewu ewu n'ụwa dịka Metro Boomin, Pi'erre Bourne, 808 Mafia, na Wheezy
E gosipụtara ya dị ka bass na ọtụtụ egwu, ihe atụ a ma ama bụ 2019 hit Old Town Road nke Lil Nas X nke ruru #1 na Billboard Hot 100 ma nọrọ na #1 maka ndekọ 19 izu
Mthokozisi Khathi (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 24 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1976) nke a maara aha ya bụ DJ Tira, bụ onye South Afrika DJ, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye na-ese Kwaito
A mụrụ ya na Hlabisa, Tira kwagara Durban mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ n'afọ 1979
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke mkpokọta nke chọpụtara ụdị egwu Gqom
Ọrụ egwu ya malitere mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ n'afọ 1996, mgbe ọ na-aga Mahadum nke KwaZulu-Natal wee bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ ma wepụta album nchịkọta Real Makoya n'afọ 2001
Khathi ghọrọ onye ama ama mgbe o meriri asọmpi Smirnoff SA DJ Knockout n'afọ 2000
E wezụga ọrụ naanị ya, a makwaara ya dị ka onye otu egwu South Africa Durbans Finest
Tira bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Kalawa Jazmee na afọ 2005 wee guzobe akara ndekọ nke ya Afrotaiment na afọ 2007, abọm mbụ ya Ezase Afro Vol 1 (2008), bụ ihe ịga nke ọma azụmahịa
Abọm nke anọ nke Tira bụ 21 Years Of DJ Tira (2020), nke ndị Recording Industry of South Africa (RiSA) kwadoro platinum Abọm ahụ gụnyere chaatị kachasị elu 'Nguwe' na 'Uyandazi'
Abọm studio nke ise ya bụ Rockstar Forever (2021), debuted nọmba 1 na chaatị iTunes
Khathi mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya pụtara dị ka onye ọka ikpe ọbịa na ihe ngosi telivishọn nke 1 na nke 2 (2021)
A mụrụ Khathi na obodo KwaHlabisa, KwaZulu-Natal, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Durban na afọ 1979
Khathi gara Mlokothwa High School ma debanye aha ya na afọ 1995, na-amụ akụ na ụba mmadụ na Mahadum Natal nke a maara ugbu a dị ka UKZN
Ọ malitere inwe mmasị ịbụ DJ mgbe ọ ka nọ na varsity mgbe ọ malitere igwu egwu dị ka DJ, N'afọ 1996
N'ihe dị ka afọ 2001, o wepụtara ndekọ mbụ ya aha ya bụ Real Makoya, nke bụ album nchịkọta ya na DJ Khabzela
N'afọ 2005, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ ya na Kalawa Jazzmee Ọ rụrụ n'okpuru otu aha ya bụ Tzozo En Prọfesọ ma mesịa mepụta Durbans Finest ya na DJ Sox nke dịkwa n'okpuru Kalawa Jazmee Records
O nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme na Oskido dị ka onye bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta egwu mbụ ya, kemgbe ahụ ọ ghọrọ kpakpando
O guzobere Ezase Afro nke dara n'okpuru Kalawa mgbe e mesịrị bụrụ naanị ya
Tira na Sox ọnụ ha wepụtara usoro nchịkọta albums aha ya bụ n'okpuru Durbans Finest
N'afọ 2007, Ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ ya Afrotainment ma bịanye aka na DJ Cndo dị ka onye mbụ na-ese ihe na akara ndekọ ya
Ebe ọ bụ na ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mmepụta nke ya, ọ ghọrọ onye na-emepụta egwu
Mgbe e mesịrị n'otu afọ ahụ, DJ Tira bịanyere aka na otu kwaito Big Nuz mgbe o si Johannesburg kwaga ebe ha si, Durban
N'afọ 2008, DJ Tira dị ka onye na-ese ihe, ọ pụtara na egwu abụọ na chaatị redio obodo na chaatị ụlọ ahịa egwu n'akụkụ 'Ubala Lolo' nke Big Nuz na 'Mahamba Yedwa' nke DJ Clock
N'afọ 2008, o wepụtara ọrụ izizi ya n'okpuru akara ndekọ ya aha ya bụ Ezase Afro Vol 1
Ncedo Mbundwini, onye si Ugwu Frere bụ onye na-emepụta ọtụtụ egwu kachasị egwu na abọm a
A na-akwado abọm ahụ site na ndị ọbịa nke Bricks, Daddy, Big Nuz na Joocy nke Afrosoul
Ezase Afro vol 1 ghọrọ abọm na-ewu ewu ma mee ihe dị ịrịba ama n'ahịa ka ọ rere ihe karịrị puku iri abụọ
Na ọnwa Machị afọ 2019, ewepụtara egwu ya 'Amachankura' nke gosipụtara TNS dị ka egwu mbụ nke abọm
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2019, ewepụtara egwu nke abụọ 'Thank You Mr DJ' nke gosipụtara Joocy
Tira wepụtara Ikhenani na Septemba 13, na afọ 2019
Ikhenani meriri Best Kwaito Album na mmemme nke iri abụọ na isii nke South African Music Awards
Na August 24, afọ 2020, ewepụtara abọm studio nke anọ ya 21 Years of DJ Tira na South Africa, na-eme ememe afọ iri abụọ na otu na ụlọ ọrụ egwu
Ụlọ ọrụ na-edekọ ihe na South Afrika (RiSA) kwadoro album ahụ na platinum
Na Machị afọ 2021, ọ na-akwado asọmpi SABC 1 nke a na-akpọ 1 na 2 oge 6
Na June 25, na afọ 2021, o wepụtara abọm studio nke ise ya Rockstar Forever, nke ewepụtara na South Afrika
Abọm ahụ nwere Q Twins, Makhadzi, Western Boyz, Jumbo, Prince Bulo, Biza Wethu, Mampintsha, Joocy, Ntencane, Proffesor, Beast, Worst Behaviour, Dladla Mshunqisi, BlaQRythm, Mtebza & Khazozo
Rockstar Forever ọkwa nọmba 1 na iTunes chaatị South Afrika

Aldrin Davis (amụrụ n'August 2, 1969), nke a maara dị ka DJ Toomp, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé na-ede egwu, na DJ
DJ Toomp malitere na 1985, ya na Atlanta MC Raheem the Dream, na-emepụta ihe ndekọ aha ya mgbè ọ dị naanị afọ iri na isii
Na ngwụcha afọ 1980, ọ bụ MC Shy-D's DJ ma soro ya na 2 Live Crew mee njem, ka ha na-eme ihe n'ebe dị iche iche gafee mba ahụ na ihe omume hip hop ndị ọzọ dị ka NWA
na Ice-T
Mgbe MC Shy'D hapụrụ Luke Records, Toomp gárá DJ maka JT Money na Poison Clan
Mgbe 2 Live Crew kewara, ya na ónyé bụbu ónyé otu Brother Marquis, nke a na-akpọ Indecent Exposure, rụrụ ọrụ na abọm, n'okpuru aha 2 Nazty; mkpuchi ahụ kwuru na ọ bụ ónyé otu Poison Clan
N'afọ 2006, Toomp sonyeere ónyé agha hip hop Bernard Parks, Jr, iji malite NZone Entertainment, ákàrà ndekọ nke ha
DJ Toomp malitere inweta nkwado ka ukwuu site n'ịrụ ọrụ na onye na-eti egwu ndịda TI, ónyé sikwa Atlanta, Georgia
Ha bu ụzọ rụkọọ ọrụ ọnụ na TI

nke mbụ na 2001 I'm Serious, ébé ọ bụ na ha abụọ wuru ọbụbụenyi na mmekọrịta ọrụ, ya na ya ghọrọ ónyé isi na-emepụta TI' Toomp tinyere aka nke ukwuu na abọm anọ mbụ nke TI; ha abụọ wetara egwu ọnyà n'ime ndị isi
Toomp wee nweta otuto dị egwu na 2006, màkà ịmepụta egwu egwu TI
'What You Know', nke ruru n'ọkwa # 3 na US Hot 100, egwu ahụ nwetara ma Toomp na TI, Grammy Award mbụ ha
N'afọ 2007, ónyé America na-eti egwu na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ Kanye West kpọrọ DJ Toomp, iji nye aka na mmepụta na abọm nke atọ ya bụ Graduation
Toomp, n'akụkụ West, jikọtara aka mepụta egwu 'Can't Tell Me Nothing' na 'Good Life', yana album nke ọzọ 'Big Brother', ode màkà ọbụbụenyi nwanne West na onye America rapper Jay-Z
Troy Ryan (amụrụ n'October 25, 1986), nke a maara nké ọma site na aha egwu ya DJ Webstar (ma ọ bụ naanị Webstar) bụ ónyé American DJ na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
N'afọ 2006, egwu ya 'Chicken Noodle Soup', ghọrọ ihe a ma ama ma ghọọ meme n'ịntanetị, na ndị na-akwado ya na-ebugo vidiyo ndị na-agba egwu na egwu ahụ
Ịbụ ónyé a ma ama n'abụ ahụ mèrè ka ụlọ ọrụ Universal Records bịanye aka na ya
Donald Joseph White, 'DONDI' (ubochí asaá n'ọnwa Eprel, 1961 rụọ úbọchị abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1998) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara East New York nke Brooklyn, Dondi bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ ise
Ọ bụ onye Africa America na ónyé Italian America
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ Katọlik n'oge ọ nọ n'afọ nke abụọ
Ka ọ na-erule 1975, East New York ghọrọ mpaghara na-adịghị akwụsi ike nke nwéré esemokwu agbụrụ na esemokwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya dị ka ndị otu
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Zephyr gbara ya, Dondi kwuru na ya sonyeere ọtụtụ òtù ndị omempụ n'afọ ndị 1970 iji zere mwakpo
N'ịchegbu onwe ya ịhapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị n'azụ, ọ nwetara GED ya na 1984, were ọrụ n'ọfịs gọọmentị, wee malite itinye mmasị ya na graffiti
Ihe odide ghọrọ akụkụ dị mkpa nke ndụ Dondi n'etiti afọ ndị 1970
O jiri 'NACO' na 'DONDI' mee ihe, ma rụọ ọrụ n'ịmeziwanye ụdị ya, jiri nwayọọ nwayọọ na-aga site na mkpado dị mfe gaa n'ịrụpụta ihe ndị ọzọ
A na-ewere iji áhà Dondi (ụdị áhà ya) dị ka ihe dị ize ndụ n'oge ahụ, dịka Metropolitan Transportation Authority na Ngalaba Ndị Uwe Ojii New York (NYPD) na-anwa imegide ndị edemede
N'afọ 1979, Dondi nabatara áhà ya mgbè o sere nnukwu ihe n'elu ụlọ ya
Ọ ghọrọ ónyé otu TOP crew (The Odd Partners) n'afọ 1977
N'afọ 1978, Dondi guzobere ndị otu nke ya, nke akpọrọ CIA (Crazy Inside Artists), nke gụnyere ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ a ma ama dịka ezigbo enyi ya DURO
N'ime afọ iri abụọ sochirinụ, Dondi ghọrọ ónyé a ma ama dị ka ọkọlọtọ ejiji, na-emetụta ọgbọ nke ndị na-ede ihe odide
Dondi bụ ónyé ọsụ ụzọ n'ọtụtụ ụdị na usoro ndị na-ese ihe n'oge a ka na-eji

[citation needed] Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-emekarị ihe ndị na-eme ihe màkà abamuru nke ndị edemede ndị ọzọ (dị ka ihe a ma ama 2MANY), ọ chọrọ ka ọha na eze nwee ike ịgụ ma nwee obi ụtọ n'ọrụ ya, ya mèrè ọ ga-elekwasị anya na akwụkwọ ozi ndị a na-agụ na mgbagwoju anya
Ọrụ ya a ma ama bụ Children of the Grave Parts nké mbụ, abụọ na atọ - zuru ezu ụgbọ ala na New York City Subway n'afọ 1978 ruo 1980
[citation needed] A natara aha nke otu ahụ na abụ Black Sabbath
Ónyé nta akụkọ Martha Cooper sere ihe nkiri ikpeazụ site na mmalite ruo na njedebe
N'ime ihe ikpeazụ a, Dondi nabatara ihe nkiri eserese site na Vaughn Bode nwụrụ anwụ
O mechara see otu ụdị nke Children of the Grave 3 n'ime ụlọ ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ese mbụ nwere ihe ngosi otu onye na Netherlands na Germany, ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbè ochie Europe na-anakọta ọrụ ya

Dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ na magazin nkè mmalite afọ 1980 gosipụtara, dị ka magazin People, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Fun Gallery yana ndị na-ese ihe dị ka Jean-Michel Basquiat, Lee Quinones, Keith Haring, ERO (Dominique Philbert), Rammellzee, Fab 5 Freddy, Futura 2000, Toxic, Zephyr, na ndị ọzọ, ọ butere ihe osise Graffiti site n'okporo ámá gaa n'ụlọ ngosi nka, na ebe ngosi nka nke United States, Europe, na Japan
Dondi nwụrụ n'ọrịa AIDS n'ubochí abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 1998
Dondi enweghị ụmụ mana ezinụlọ ya, gụnyere nwanne ya nwoke Michael White na nwa ya nwoke Mike White anọwo na-ebugharị ihe nketa ya n'ihu
Dondi hapụrụ ọtụtụ narị ihe osise na ihe osise, nke a ka na-arụrịta ụka banyéré ónyé nwe ya
Zephyr, IZ the Wiz, Doc na Keo sere n'etiti afọ 1998 na 2000
Ónyé na-ese ihe na-acha odo odo bụ Marbleslinger gosipụtara stencil Dondi n'usoro ihe site na 2008
E gosipụtara Dondi na akpụkpọ ụkwụ Converse dị ka akụkụ nke ọrụ Product Red (2007) yana na uwe capsule nke Kool Sugar Apparel nke ga-adị na 2016
Akụkụ ụfọdụ nke ego a na-enweta na-aga màkà ọrụ ebere ọrịa AIDS
N'afọ 2019, Dondi White Foundation sonyeere Virgil Abloh màkà uwe uwe ya na-acha ọcha
Ego e nyere Chineke anyị na-enyefe
A ga-etinye njikọ aka niile na-abịanụ na Instagram @dondi_the_real

Na Jenụwarị 2018 na ire ere Artnet, ihe osise Dondi nke afọ 1984, nke akpọrọ Solid Formation, nke e mèrè atụmatụ n'etiti dollar puku iri ise na dollar puku iri asaa rere màkà dollar narị puku abụọ na iri anọ
Da, DA, dA, DÄ na ụdị ndị ọzọ nwere ike na-ezo aka
Fasasi Mobolaji Gaius, onye a maara dị ka Da Emperor, bụ nwa amaala Naịjirịa na-eti egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na onye na-ede egwu
O nwere mgbọrọgwụ ezinụlọ na Ogun Steeti, Naịjirịa
Ọ na-eti egwu n'asụsụ ala ya, Yoruba, ma na-etinye Pidgin na Bekee
Da Emperor edekọwo egwu ya na ndị egwu dịka Gabriel Afolayan, Small Doctor, na Oritse Femi
O wepụtara egwu ya nke abụọ akpọrọ 'Firewood', nke nwere olu sitere n'aka Oritse Femi
Nke a sochiri egwu 'Shake it' na 'I'm a Sinner'
E nyere Da Emperor ọkwa nke onye nnọchi anya njem nlegharị anya na Septemba 3rd, 2021 site na Bauchi State Tourism Board
N'afọ 2013, ya na onye na-ese reggae nke Jamaica bụ Kisco rụkọrọ ọrụ
Da Emperor edekọwo egwu ya na ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na-abịa n'ihu
Ya na Davido na Tiwa Savage esorola ihe nkiri ahụ
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2013, e gosipụtara ya na egwu 'Be Ma Boo' nke onye egwu Afro-Pop bụ Slim Joe
N'afọ 2013, o wepụtara otu egwu 'Para Mode' nke Indomix gwakọtara; vidiyo egwu ya agafeela 100,000 YouTube ma wepụta ya n'afọ 2014
Na 2 Febụwarị 2014, o wepụtara egwu iji kwado mkpọsa Gọvanọ Akinwunmi Ambode
Otu 'Liar' nọchiri ya, mkpuchi nke 'Loyal' nke Chris Brown gosipụtara Lil Wayne na Tyga
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2015, ya na Oritse Femi jikọrọ aka wepụta egwu 'Firewood' nke indomix gwakọtara
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2016, o wepụtara egwu a nabatara nke ọma 'I'm a Sinner'
Na 5 Machị 2016, Da Emperor tinyere aka na mmekorita mba ụwa ya na onye na-ese ihe na America bụ Stylezz na onye na-ese ihe n'asụsụ Bekee bụ Shyboss
Naanị ụbọchị ole na ole mgbe ọ wụchara egwu Olamide 'who u epp', nsụgharị Da Emperor kụrụ nọmba 4 na Spotify, nke onye egwu Naịjirịa bụ Olamide wepụtara egwu
Ndepụta nke ndị egwu Naịjirịa

Oladapo Olaitan Olaonipekun, nke a makwaara dị ka Dagrin (25 Ọktoba na afọ 1984 - 22 Eprel na afọ 2010), bụ onye na-eti egwu na Naijiria si Ogun, Naịjirịa
E wepụtara ihe nkiri nke ndụ ya nke akpọrọ Ghetto Dreamz n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011
Ụlọ Olaonipekun dị na Meiran, Alagbado, Lagos
O weputara abọm studio mbụ ya bụ Still On The Matter, mana abọm ahụ kụrụ afọ n'ala n'ihi enweghị nkwalite zuru oke
N'afọ 2009, o wepụtara abọm studio ya nke abụọ a kpọrọ CEO
(Chief Executive Omoita)
N'afọ 2010, a họpụtara ya maka ihe nrite ntụrụndụ nke Naịjịrịa maka Abọm kacha mma (CEO), Hottest Single 'Pon Pon Pon', Best Rap Act na Best Collaboration with vocals
Abọm ya CEO
(Chief executive Omota English Chief Executive Thug) meriri Hip hop World Award afọ 2010 maka abọm rap kacha mma
Site na ya, egwu 'Pon Pon Pon', na 'Kondo'

Dagrin na ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe na Naijiria rụkọrọ ọrụ dịka YQ, 9ice, MI, Iceberg Slim, Omobaba, Terry G, Ms Chief, Owen G, K01, code, MISTAR DOLLAR, TMD entertainment, Omawumi, Chudy K, Bigiano, na Konga
Ya na ndị na-emepụta egwu dị ka Sossick, Dr Frabz, Sheyman, Frenzy, 02 & Heavy L Beatz

bụ If I Die, ọ dị ka ọ maara na ọ ga-anwụ n'ezie mgbe ewepụtara abọm ahụ
E hotara Da Grin dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke ndị na-abụ abụ rap nke asụsụ Yoruba na Pidgin na Naijiria
Onye nta akụkọ Naijiria, Idoko Salihu nke Premium Times kwuru na 'Da Grin bụ onye na-eti egwu nke gbanwere ụlọ ọrụ rap nke Naijiria, ọ na-etinye Bekee na asụsụ ala ya'
E meela ihe nkiri nke ndụ ya Ghetto Dreamz, nke Trybson Dudukoko na Doris Simeon-Ademinokan gosipụtara dị ka enyi ya nwanyị ma wepụta ya n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011
Olaonipekun nwere ihe mberede na Eprel 14, afọ 2010 ma nwụọ mgbe ụbọchị asatọ gasịrị mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na ise na 22 Eprel afọ 2010 mgbe ihe mberede ụgbọala mere na Legos, Naijiria

Jim Ness na Susan Ness bụ́ ndị nsụgharị Bible na ịgụ akwụkwọ na Wycliffe chepụtara nsụgharị bara uru ma bipụta akwụkwọ mkpụrụ akwụkwọ 1995

Ẹma ẹmịn̄ Gospel Mark ke 1997, ẹnyụn̄ ẹmịn̄ mme edikabade Bible eken ke 1999

Daatsʼiinbụ asụsụ Gumuz nke ọdịda anyanwụ Etiopia

Enwere obodo abụọ nke ndị na-ekwu okwu n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Etiopia, otu na Mahadid, na ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Alitash National Park, na otu na Inashemesh, na ókèala Sudan, n'ebe ndịda nke ogige ebe Rahad River na-esi na Etiopia na-agafe Sudan
A kọrọ Daatsʼiin na 2013 ma kọwaa ya na 2014
Ahland kọwara ya n'ihu na 2016
Ndepụta okwu ntụnyere nke Daatsʼiin, Northern Gumuz, na Southern Gumuz dị na Ahland & Kelly (2014)
N'ime asụsụ ndị ọzọ Gumuz, Daatsʼíin nwere ihe yiri Southern Gumuz, mana ìgwè abụọ ahụ na-ekwurịta okwu na Arabic ma ọ bụ Amharic
Daba bu nwere ike izo aka na
Daba (Amharic ዳባ) bụ aha nwoke sitere na Etiopia
Dabara na Iri isé na ise bụ ngwugwu nke European Union mere iji belata ikuku ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ nke European Union site na pasentị iri ise na ise ka ọ na-erule afọ 2030
European Commission chepụtara ngwugwu ahụ n'ọnwa Julaị 2021
N'okpuru usoro iwu ngwa ngwa, atụmatụ ahụ nwere ike ịghọ iwu n'afọ 2022

Nzọụkwụ gụnyere nkwado ọzọ màkà njem dị ọcha, renewables, na ọnụahịa a na-akpọ Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism na ikuku màkà mbubata carbon dị elu site na mba ndị na-enweghị usoro mbelata gas nke ha
Ọ na-atụ aro ịgbatị European Union Emissions Trading System na njem na okpomọkụ
E jiri ya tụnyere ihe omume net-zero site na International Energy Agency, atụmatụ ahụ nwèrè usoro ndị ọzọ iji hụ na ike ka dị ọnụ ala
Òtù na-ahụ màkà gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi Greenpeace katọrọ ngwugwu ahụ màkà na ọ gaghị adaba màkà ịkwụsị okpomọkụ ụwa na mbibi metụtara usoro nkwado ndụ dị mkpa n'ihi na ebumnuche a tụrụ anya ya dị ala
Nzukọ ahụ katọrọ nkewa nke bioenergy dị ka ike na-agbanwe agbanwe na ire ụgbọala ndị na-enweghị ikuku site n'afo 2035
Dabengwa bụ aha nna
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna a gụnyere
Dabó kolo (Amharic ዳቦ ቆሎ (d'abo kolo), Oromo Boqqolloo daabboo) bụ nri ndị Etiopia na Eritrea na nri mkpịsị aka nke nwere obere achịcha
Dabo kolo pụtara achịcha ọka n'asụsụ Amharic, na dabo maka achịcha, na kolo maka ọka ma ọ bụ ọka bali a siri esi, chickpeas, mkpụrụ sunflower, mkpụrụ ọka ndị ọzọ na ahụekere
Ndị na-ere ahịa na ndị na-ere n'okporo ámá na-erekarị achịcha Kolo a na-ekpuchi n'ime akwụkwọ
A na-akwado be ya site n'itinye obere ntụ ọka e wepụrụ na mpịakọta
Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-agbakwunye mmanụ aṅụ iji mee ka dabo kolo dị ụtọ
A na-ewerekwa Dabo kolo dị ka nri mkpịsị aka nke Congo
Nchịkọta ọzọ a na-adịghị ahụkebe bụ dabo kolo nke e ji agwa kọfị mee
Dabo kolo bụ nri pụrụ iche n'oge emume Afọ Ọhụrụ nke Etiopia
Ọ na-eri n'oge nri Shabbat site na Beta Israel (Ndị Juu Etiopia)
Akpojivi Joel Onoriode, nke a makwaara dị ka Daddy K bụ onye Naịjịrịa onye na-ese ihe bị na Dubai
A mụrụ Onoriode na 19 Eprel 1989 na Delta Steeti
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Samrute Nursery and Primary School na Ovwian, Warri ebe ọ gụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Ovwian secondary school
E nyere ya BA na Fine and Applied Arts na Delta State University n'afọ 2003
Onoriode bụ onye nwe Finishing Glance Limited na onye isi nchịkwa nke Porsh na Glance General Trading, ụlọ ọrụ dị na Dubai
A makwaara ya maka ọrụ ebere ya ma nye ya onyinye ọrụ ebere na 2019 site n'aka MC Orange Foundation
Ọrụ Onoriode lekwasịrị anya na 'mixed media painting na ihe osise pensul nakwa hue, texture, na symbolism'
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ n'afọ 2008 ma duzie ya maka enweghị akụrụngwa na teknụzụ n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Afrịka
Na mmekorita ya na Art Smiley Gallery, Dubai, Onoriode gosipụtara na ihe ngosi otu na Dubai nke gụnyere ihe ngosi ya na mbipụta nke isii nke World Art Subai
Ụfọdụ n'ime utu aha nke eserese ya gosipụtara bụ 'Dubai Frame', 'World Pandemic', 'Brothers Keeper', 'Music Lives Forever', 'Technology is the new learning', na 'All Races Are Equal'
E boro Onoriode ebubo aghụghọ n'afọ 2019, ndị Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) jidere ya, ma bo ya ebubo n'ụlọ ikpe mana e mechara tọhapụ ya ma kwụsị ikpe ahụ
Dadju Djuna Nsungula (French pronunciation ; A mụrụ na 2 Mee 1991), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha Dadju ma ọ bụ mgbe ụfọdụ Prince Dadj, bụ onye na-agụ egwu French
Ọ bịanyere aka na akara Wati B ma n`afọ 2017 bịanye aka na Polydor Records nke Universal Music Group
Ọ bụ onye otu egwu Shin Sekaï n'akụkụ onye na-eti egwu Abou Tall site n`afọ 2012 ruo n`afọ 2016
Duo ahụ bụ akụkụ nke akara Wati B ma wepụta abọm Indéfini
Duo ahụ kwupụtara na ha na-ekewa ka onye ọ bụla n'ime ha wee nwee ike ịgbaso ọrụ onwe ya
Dadju wepụtara abọm ya Gentleman 20 n'afọ 2017
Dadju si n'ezinụlọ na-agụ egwú
Nna ya bụ Djanana Djuna, onye na-agụ egwú Congolese nke otu Papa Wemba
Nwanne ya nwoke bụ Gims, onye a ma ama na-eti egwu na onye bụbu onye otu egwu rap nke France Sexion d'Assaut, nnukwu ọrụ n'okpuru akara egwu Wati B
Ụmụnne ya ndị ọzọ Bedjik na Xgangs bụkwa ndị na-eti rap n'onwe ha
N'afọ 2016, ọ lụrụ di ma mụọ nwa nwanyị ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị
Ọ nabatara nwa nwoke n'afọ 2020
Egwú bu na ịgba egwú Dagbani o bụ omenala bụ isi nke Dagbamba nke West Africa
Ndị Dagbamba na-asụ asụsụ Dagbanli
Ha bụ agbụrụ kachasị n'alaeze Dagbon nke dị na mpaghara ugwu nke Ghana
Egwú na ịgba egwú na-arụ ọrụ dị mkpa na Dagbon
Ọ bụ site na nka ndị a ka Dagbamba chebere akụkọ ihe mere eme ha kemgbe ọtụtụ narị afọ

Dagbamba na-ele ịgba egwú anya dị ka ụdị ngosipụta mmetụta uche, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, arụmọrụ ime mmụọ ma ọ bụ ọbụna mmega ahụ nke na-enyere ha aka ịkọwa ma ọ bụ gosipụta echiche ma ọ bụ kọọ akụkọ
N'ọtụtụ ọnọdụ, egwu na Dagbon na-esonyere ịgba egwú iji mepụta akụkọ zuru ezu
Dagmar Havlová (amụrụ ya na ónws 22 Machị 1953) ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Czech
Ọ lụrụ Václav Havel, onye bụbu onye isi ala Czech, na Jenụwarị 4, 1997
O mụtara otu nwa nwanyị, Nina Rusikrnová (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1976), site n'alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya na Radvít Novák (1975-1980)
A mụrụ Havlová n'aka Markéta Turnová na onye na-eme nkwekọrịta Karel Turnkrna na 22 Machị 1953 na Brno
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Brno Conservatory na 1971
N'afọ 1975, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na utu aha nke a na apụ'Magister artis' (nke ya na Master of Fine Arts) site na Janáček Academy of Musical Arts
Ọ pụtara ihe karịrị 50 na ónụ ógogo fim na 200 na telivishọn
Servare na Manere Enyi nke Udo
Kemgbe afọ 2020 ọ ghọrọ onye enyi udo nke International Tree of Peace Project nakwa onye nlekọta nke Czech Republic
Dagmar Searchinger Wilson (Jenụwarị 25, afọ 1916 - Jenụwarị 6, afọ 2011) bụ onye mba America na-emegide nyocha nuklia, onye na-ese ihe, na onye na-egosi akwụkwọ ụmụaka maka Whitman's Children's Books
A mụrụ ya na Manhattan, New York City, nne na nna ya bụ Cesar na Marion Searchinger
Wilson guzobere Women Strike for Peace n'afọ 1961 iji kwụsị nnwale nke ngwá agha nuklia
Dahab (Egyptian Arabic دهب, IPA , 'ọlaedo') bụ obere obodo Ijipt dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Sinai Peninsula na Ijipt, ihe dịka 80 (50 mi) n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa Anyanwụ Sharm el-Sheikh
N'ịbụbu obodo ịkụ azụ Bedouin, a na-ewere Dahab ugbu a dị ka otu n'ime ebe ndị a kacha nwee ọnụ ahịa n'Ijipt
Mgbe Agha Ụbọchị Isii gasịrị, Izrel weghaara Saịnaị ma Dahab ghọrọ nke a maara dị ka Di-Zahav (Hibru), mgbe otu ebe a kpọtụrụ aha na Bible dị ka otu n'ime ọdụ ndị Izrel n'oge Ọpụpụ si Ijipt
E weghachiri ala Sinai n'okpuru ọchịchị Ijipt n'okpuru nkwekọrịta udo Egypt-Israel na 1982

Onye bụbu onye isi ala Ijipt, Hosni Mubarak nyere aka n'ịbịaru ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ njem nleta nke obodo na nke mba ụwa, ụlọ nkwari akụ, na nguzobe nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ emeela ka obodo ahụ bụrụ ebe a ma ama maka ndị njem nleta
Ọdụ ụgbọ elu Sharm el-Sheikh International na-eje ozi na Dahab
Masbat (n'ime Dahab) bụ ebe a ma ama na-egwu mmiri, enwere ọtụtụ (50+) ebe a na-egwu egwu dị n'ime Da Hab
Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ebe Dahab na-abanye n'ime mmiri bụ ebe a na-abanye na mmiri n'ụsọ osimiri
Enwere ike kewaa Dahab n'akụkụ atọ dị mkpa
Masbat, nke gụnyere obodo Bedouin Asalah, dị n'ebe ugwu
Ndịda Masbat bụ Mashraba, nke na-eme njem nleta ma nwee ọtụtụ họtel
N'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ bụ Medina nke gụnyere mpaghara Laguna, nke a ma ama maka ọmarịcha mmiri na-adịghị omimi na ikuku
Mpaghara Asalah mepere emepe ma nwee ọtụtụ ogige ntụrụndụ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ
Ọtụtụ ndị gara Dahab n'oge gara aga bụ ndị na-etinye akpa n'azụ nwere mmasị n'ịda mmiri na ịnya mmiri n'Oké Osimiri Uhie
Obodo Dahab nwere ihe dị ka mmadụ 15,000 bi na ya
Dahab na-adọta ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ndị njem nleta
A maara ya n'ụwa niile maka ikuku ya
Ifufe a pụrụ ịdabere na ya na-enye ọnọdụ mmiri dị larịị n'ime ájá Dahab
N'ebe dị anya site n'ikpere mmiri, ọnọdụ ebili mmiri na-ejikọta ya na ifufe siri ike iji nye ọnọdụ dị egwu maka ndị na-agba ọsọ ikuku
Otú ọ dị, n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, ndị kitesurfers agafeela ọdọ mmiri dị n'ime ájá ahụ, na ụlọ akwụkwọ abụọ nke Russia na-emeghe n'ụsọ osimiri
SCUBA diving, free-diving na snorkelling bụkwa ihe omume na-ewu ewu na ọtụtụ reefs dị nso na họtel ndị dị n'akụkụ mmiri
Blue Hole dị nso (nke a na-akpọ 'The World's Most Dangerous Diving Site') na Canyon bụ ebe a ma ama n'ụwa niile

Mbibi na-arịwanye elu nke coral site na ndị na-egwu mmiri na-enweghị uche / ndị na-abanye n'ime mmiri bụ nsogbu dị mkpa nke na-akpata nchegbu ụfọdụ, na-akpali mkpa ọ dị ịchịkwa ndị na-etinye n'ime ya nke ọma
Ihe omume ndị dabeere n'ala gụnyere ịrị ugwu, ịgba kamel, ịgba ịnyịnya, ịgba ịnya ịnyịnya ígwè, njem ịnyịnya ígwè ugwu, njem jeep na quad
Ugwu Sinai bụ njem awa abụọ, ebe ebe obibi ndị mọnk nke Saint Catherine bụ ebe ndị njem nleta na-ewu ewu
N'akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọtụtụ ndị ọbịa na Dahab bụ ndị na-eme njem n'onwe ha ma nọrọ na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ụlọ oriri na nkwari, ma ọ bụ ụlọ ndị ọbịa na mpaghara Masbat

N'ime afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, mmepe nke họtel dị na mpaghara Medina emeela ka ọ dịrị ọtụtụ ndị njem nleta mfe, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-eleta Dahab kpọmkwem iji sonye na surfing, windsurfing, diving, kite surfing, sailing, na ihe omume ndị ọzọ
Okwu Dahab bụ Arabic maka ọlaedo ma eleghị anya na-ezo aka na mpaghara ala; ọlaedo a na-asacha site na ugwu ọzara nwere ike ịba ụba na ala mmiri ozuzo ebe e wuru obodo ahụ
Aha ahụ nwekwara ike ịbụ ihe na-ezo aka na ụcha ájá dị n'ebe ndịda obodo ahụ n'onwe ya
Ụfọdụ ndị obodo ahụ na-ekwu na aha ahụ sitere na ụcha nke eluigwe ozugbo anyanwụ dara
Otu akụkọ obodo banyere aha obodo ahụ bụ na ọ sitere na idei mmiri nke na-asa obodo ahụ kwa afọ ise ma ọ bụ isii
Oké ifufe na-efe n'oge n'ugwu na-eme ka nnukwu mmiri na-agbadata n'oké osimiri, na-adọkpụ nnukwu ájá
N'oge a, idei mmiri ahụ kewara obodo ahụ ụzọ abụọ, a na-akpali ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ ma ájá na-eme ka ọ bụrụ odo odo
Nke a na-adịkarị ụbọchị ole na ole, ma kpatara mmebi na ọnwụ nke ndụ n'oge gara aga ka ndị mmadụ na-amaghị banyere mmalite mberede na ike mmiri na-aga
Taa, ndị obodo ahụ dị njikere mgbe ha hụrụ igwe ojii n'elu ugwu
Dị ka ndị Bedouin nke mpaghara ahụ si kwuo, agbanyeghị aha 'Dahab' nwere mmalite dị iche
Mgbe ndị Bedouins bịara ebe ahụ, ha kpọrọ ya 'Waqaat Thahaab' nke a sụgharịrị n'ụzọ nkịtị dị ka 'Time Goes'
Aha a sitere n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na mgbe ị nọ ebe ahụ, ị nwere ike ịhapụ oge n'ụzọ dị mfe ka ụbọchị ga-amalite ịgba ọsọ ọnụ
E mebiri aha ahụ ka ọ bụrụ 'Thahaab' (牙), mana ndị njem chere na ha na-ekwu Dahab aghọtaghị ya
Ọtụtụ n'ime coral ndị dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri na-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-apụ n'anya, n'ihi na a na-ewepụ ndị na-enweghị ahụmahụ n'ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu
Nsogbu ọzọ dị ukwuu bụ na na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ndị dị na Masbat na-atụfu ájá na nkume n'ime oké osimiri iji gbasaa ụsọ mmiri, na-akpata nsogbu na coral reefs
Ụmụaka Bedouin nọ n'ime obodo, ndị ezinụlọ ha na-agba ume mgbe ụfọdụ, na-abịa na cafes na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ n'ụsọ oké osimiri iji ree ihe dị ka mgbaaka kpara akpa nye ndị njem nleta
Obodo a nwere ọtụtụ ebe nkiri ama ama na Ras Abu Gallum, ebe nchekwa ihe okike na mpaghara mmiri mmiri
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ebe mgbaba ama ama n'ụwa

Mpaghara Kanoun bụ otu n'ime ebe mmiri mmiri kacha mma na Al-Asala, mpaghara ebe ihe dị ka 75% nke ndị bi n'obodo ahụ kewara ụzọ atọ (Mubarak City, Zarnouk, Al-Asala), Coral Island, na foduru nke obodo

Ebe ewusiri ike nke ndị Crusaders wuru, Al-Mellil, okporo ụzọ dị n'akụkụ okporo ụzọ, nke gụnyere ụfọdụ obere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, cafeterias na ụlọ, Isi agbata obi nke obodo ahụ na-amalite na Al Fanar Street na Masbat Bay
Ọ na-agụnye ọtụtụ ụlọ ahịa, ụlọ ịgba mmiri, cafes, ogige na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ
Ọ gụnyere ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke cafeterias na ebe mmiri mmiri
Ọ gụnyekwara naanị mmetụta ebe ahụ bụ Tel Mashraba
Ọ dị na Dahab ochie

Mpaghara Wadi Qani, mpaghara na-anọchi anya mgbasawanye obodo mepere emepe n'ọdịnihu n'ihi na ọ gụnyere ọtụtụ ụlọ oriri na ọ hotelsụ hotelsụ, ọrụ na ogige obibi, yana mpaghara Lighthouse na Ogige Ubi na Oasis

Dahab nwere ọwara mmiri abụọ, Laguna ma ọ bụ Ghazala, bụ nke e ji naanị osimiri nwere aja na olulu mmiri nke obodo ahụ, yana ebe ntụrụndụ n'akụkụ oke osimiri ya na-ejikọta ya na ihe ndị gbara ya gburugburu na ụlọ osisi osisi na nkwụ maka ndị njem nlegharị anya
Dahab nwere ihu igwe ọzara na-ekpo ọkụ (Köppen BWh) dịka ndị ọzọ nke Egypt
Ihu igwe n'ụbọchị ọkọchị na-ekpo oke ọkụ yana oke ọkụ n'abalị
Ụbọchị oyi na-ekpo ọkụ ma abalị dịkwa nro
Dahab nwere ihu igwe kpọrọ nkụ nke ukwuu na mmiri ozuzo adịghị ụkọ, ọbụlagodi n'oge ọnwa oyi
Oke mmiri ozuzo na-aka na February
29Àtụ Egyptian Cities
Dahalo bụ asụsụ Cushitic dị n'ihe ize ndụ nke ihe karịrị mmadụ 400 Dahalo na-asụ n'ụsọ oké osimiri Kenya, n'akụkụ ọnụ Osimiri Tana
Dahalo bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'etiti asụsụ ụwa n'iji usoro ikuku anọ niile dị n'asụsụ mmadụ - pịa, implosives, ejectives, na consonants nkịtị
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ maara asụsụ ahụ n'ụzọ bụ isi dị ka 'Dahalo', okwu ahụ n'onwe ya bụ exonym nke ndị na-asụ Aweer na-ekwu na n'onwe ya pụtara 'nzuzu' ma ọ bụ 'abaghị uru'
Ndị na-asụ asụsụ n’onwe ha na-akpọkwa asụsụ ahụ “numma guhooni”
Ndị Dahalo, bụbu ndị achụ nta enyí, gbasasịrị n'etiti Swahili na ndị Bantu ndị ọzọ, na-enweghị obodo nke ha, ma na-asụ asụsụ abụọ n'asụsụ ndị ahụ
Ụmụaka anaghịzi amụ asụsụ ahụ, nke ga-eme ka ọ daa mbà, ọ pụkwara ịla n'iyi
Dahalo nwere usoro ụda dịgasị iche iche site na iji usoro ikuku anọ niile dị n'asụsụ mmadụ pịa, ejectives, na implosives, yana ụda akpa ume zuru ụwa ọnụ
Na mgbakwunye, Dahalo na-eme ọtụtụ ọdịiche a na-adịghị ahụkebe

Ọ na-emegide nkwụsị laminal na apical, dị ka n'asụsụ nke Australia na California; nkwụsị epiglottal na glottal na fricatives, dị ka na Mideast, Caucasus, na American Pacific Northwest; ọ bụkwa ma eleghị anya naanị asụsụ n'ụwa iji gosipụta ọdịiche dị n'etiti alveolar lateral na palatal lateral fricatives na africates

A na-enyo enyo na ndị Dahalo nwere ike ịsụ asụsụ Sandawe- ma ọ bụ Hadza-dị ka asụsụ, nakwa na ha jidere ịpị aka n'okwu ụfọdụ mgbe ha gbanwere na Cushitic, n'ihi na ọtụtụ n'ime okwu ndị nwere ịpị bụ okwu ndị bụ isi
Ọ bụrụ otú ahụ, ịpị na-anọchite anya substratum
A na-akpọkwa Dahalo Sanye, aha ya na Waata agbataobi na-ekekọrịta, nke ndị na-achụ nta mbụ na-asụkwa
Ndị Waata nwere ike na-asụbu asụsụ dị ka Dahalo tupu ha atụgharịa na Oromo
Nkewa nke Dahalo bụ ihe omimi
Na omenala gụnyere na South Cushitic, Tosco (1991) na-arụ ụka kama na ọ bụ East Cushitic, na Kießling (2001) kwetara na ọ nwere ọtụtụ atụmatụ Eastern ka ọ bụrụ South Cushitic
Dahiru Barau Mangal (amuru Ọgọst 3, 1957) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Max Air na 2008

Dahiru Mangal Amụrụ Dahiru Barau Mangal Ọgọst 3, 1957 (afọ 64) Katsina, Katsina State Obodo Naijiria Ọrụ Onye ọchụnta ego Afọ arụ ọrụ 2008 ruo taa Mara maka Max ikuku Ọrụ ama ama Ụgbọ elu, njem na ihe owuwu
Dahlia Ravikovitch (Hibru; N'ọnwa November 17, 1936 ruo n'ọnwa August 21, 2005) bụ onye Israel na-ede uri, onye ntụgharị, na onye na-eme udo
A mụrụ Ravikovitch na Ramat Gan n'ọnwa Nọvemba 27, 1936
Ọ mụtara ịgụ na ide mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ
Nna ya, Levi, bụ onye injinia ndị Juu sitere na Russia nke si China bịa Palestine Mandatory
Nne ya, Michal, bụ onye nkuzi si n'ezinụlọ okpukpe
Mgbe Dahlia dị afọ isii, onye ọkwọ ụgbọala mmanya na-egbu kụrụ nna ya ma gbuo ya
Ya na nne ya kwagara Kibbutz Geva mana ọ dabara n'echiche nke ndị otu ma mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ ọ kwagara n'ụlọ nkuzi na Haifa, nke mbụ n'ime ọtụtụ ụlọ nkuzi
Ọ bụ n'ime afọ ndị ahụ ọ malitere na Haifa ka o dere uri mbụ ya, 'Painting', nke gosipụtara ọdịiche dị n'etiti anụnụ anụnụ nke ala dị n'akụkụ osimiri na odo na ntụ ntụ nke ụwa ya dị n'ime
Ravikovitch lụrụ di mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, mana ha gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe ọnwa atọ gasịrị
Alụmdi na nwunye ya ndị ọzọ mechakwara gbaa alụkwaghịm
O nwere otu nwa nwoke, Ido Kalir
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ ya na Israel Defense Forces, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Hibru nke Jerusalem
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ na onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ sụgharịrị ọrụ nke WB Yeats, TS Eliot na Edgar Allan Poe, na akwụkwọ Mary Poppins n'asụsụ Hibru
Ravikovitch na-arụsi ọrụ ike na òtù udo nke Israel
Site n'ụlọ ya dị n'etiti Tel Aviv, ya na ndị na-ese ihe, ndị na-eti egwu na ndị ọha na eze na-achọ udo, nha nhata na ikpe ziri ezi
N'ime afọ ndị ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya, ọ tara ahụhụ site na oke ịda mbà n'obi
N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2005, a hụrụ Ravikovitch nwụrụ anwụ n'ụlọ ya
Abụ mbụ Ravikovitch pụtara na akwụkwọ edemede asụsụ Hibru Orlogin (Hourglass), nke Avraham Shlonsky dezigharịrị, ọ bụkwa Shlonssky gbara ya ume ịchụso ide ihe dị ka ọrụ
Akwụkwọ uri mbụ ya, The Love of an Orange, nke e bipụtara n'afọ 1959, mere ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-eto eto na-ede uri a mụrụ n'Izrel
Abụ mbụ ya na-egosi iwu ya nke usoro iwu n'ebughị ụzọ chụọ n'àjà mmetụta nke olu ya dị iche iche mgbe niile
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ hapụghị kpamkpam usoro uri ọdịnala, ọ mepụtara ụdị ejiji na iri afọ ikpeazụ nke ọrụ ya

Dị ka ọtụtụ n'ime uri Ravikovitch, ọ nwere ike ịdọrọ onye na-agụ ya dịka, n'otu oge, ihe na-emetụ n'ahụ, ihe atụ, ihe na ọbụna ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị 'Ọ bụrụ na mmadụ si n'ụgbọelu daa n'etiti abalị / naanị Chineke nwere ike ibuli ya elu'
N'akwụkwọ ya bụ Haifa City of Steps, onye na-enyocha akwụkwọ bụ Nili Gold kwuru na Haifa na ala ya dị oke mkpa iji ghọta uri mbụ nke Ravikovitch, ọkachasị 'Painting' na 'Day Unto Day Uttereth Speech'
Gold arụrịtakwara megide nkọwa a ma ama nke uri Ravikovitch 'Hovering at a Low Altitude' dị ka uri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, kama na-ekwu na a ga-aghọta ya dị ka nke onwe, nke abụ
N'ozuzu, Ravikovitch bipụtara mpịakọta iri nke uri n'asụsụ Hibru ya
Na mgbakwunye na uri, o nyere aka n'ọrụ edemede (gụnyere nchịkọta akụkọ mkpirikpi atọ) na akwụkwọ ụmụaka, ma sụgharịa uri n'asụsụ Hibru
E debere ọtụtụ n'ime uri ya na egwu
Abụ ya a kacha mara amara bụ Booba Memukenet (English Clockwork Doll)
A na-akụzi uri ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na mahadum

Ndị ọkà mmụta na Mahadum Pennsylvania dị na Philadelphia kwadoro 'Memorial in Piano, Poetry, and Song' iji sọpụrụ ya n'ụbọchị Machị 21, 2006; otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe omume a bụ onye Moroccan na-ede uri na onye na-eme egwu, Fatema Chebchoub
Ọtụtụ n'ime uri Ravikovitch ghọrọ abụ a ma ama
A sụgharịrị uri ya n'asụsụ iri abụọ na atọ
Dahmane El Harrachi (aha ya bụ Abderrahmane Amrani), (July 7, 1926 na August 31, 1980), bụ onye Algeria Chaâbi na-agụ egwu nke Chaoui
Abụ ya Ya Rayah mere ka ọ bụrụ onye kacha mma na-agu egwu Chaabi nke a tụgharịrị egwu ya n'asụsụ ndị ọzọ
Ọ kwagara France na 1949 na-ebi na Lille, mgbe ahụ Marseille, tupu o mechaa biri na Paris
Ọ bụ na Paris ebe o meere onwe ya aha, na-agu egwu n'ọtụtụ ebe oriri Algeria n'ebe ahụ
Nna ya, onye sitere n'obodo Chaoui nke Djellal na mpaghara Khenchla, bụ muezzin na ụlọ alakụba Djamaa el Kebir na Algiers
N'afọ 2009, nwa ya nwoke Kamel El Harrachi wepụtara CD otuto nye nna ya, nke akpọrọ 'Ghana Fenou'
Egwú El Harrachi wetara mmetụta nke oge a na châabi, na-etinye isiokwu dị ka ọgụ ndị mbịarambịa na agụụ maka ala nna ya n'ime abụ ya, nke o dere ihe karịrị narị ise
Ọ bụ ihe na-akpali otu ọgbọ nke ndị na-ese ihe na France, gụnyere Rachid Taha
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1980 n'ihe mberede ụgbọala n'okporo ụzọ awara awara dị na Algiers
E liri ya n'ebe olili ozu El Kettar
