Daily Post Nigeria nwetara ihe nrite 'Custodian of the Nigerian Dream' na 2016
Daily Times bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Lagos
N'oge ọ kacha emeputa, n'afọ ndị 1970, ọ bụ otu n'ime azụmaahịa nwere mpaghara na-aga nke ọma na Africa
Ụlọ ọrụ Printing na Publishing Naịjirịa, a webetara ndị na-ebipụta Daily Times bụ Richard Barrow, Adeyemo Alakija, VR Osborne na ndị ọzọ na 6 June 1925
Ha bipụtara nke mbụ dị ka Nigerian Dailytimes na 1 June 1926
Alakija bụ onye ọka iwu Afrịka, ebe ndị ọzọ bu ndi nguzobe nọchitere anya otu mmasị ndị Europe na chamba nke commerce Lagos
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kpebisiri ike inweta African Messenger nke Ernest Ikoli bipụtara wee weghara mbipụta nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Reuters iji nyere ndị ahịa aka
Ernest Ikoli bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ mbụ na Alakija bụ onyeisi oche nke Board
Alakija na Ikoli tinyere aka na otu ndi ntorobia Naijiria na-akwado obodo
Ka emechara, Ikoli ghọrọ onye otu ọgbakọ omebe iwu n'afọ 1941, ebe a họpụtara Alakija ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ọchịchị Gọvanọ na 1943
N'afọ 1947, Otu Daily Mirror nke dị na London, nke Cecil King na-eduzi, zụtara Dailytimes, Gold Coast Daily Graphic, Accra Sunday Mirror na Sierra Leone Daily Mail
King ewebata igwe obibi akwụkwọ rotary nke mbụ enwere na Naijiria, gbakwunyere ihe osise foto, nhazi ụdịỌ kpọbatara ndị nta akụkọ nwere nkà, mana gbasoo ụkpụrụ Africa nke kpachapụrụ anya

Otu Mirror webatara ihe ọhụrụ ndị a ma ama dị ka paragraf dị mkpirikpi na ahịrịokwu, ọtụtụ ihe atụ na foto na akụkọ mgbasara mmadụNkesa akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ sitere na puku 25,000 kwa ụbọchị na 1950 ruo 95,000 na 1959
N'ime 1950s Nigerian Dailytimes rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na usoro butere nnwere onwe na 1960
Na mbido afọ ndi 1950's Ụlọ ọrụ wèrè Percy Roberts na orụ ịbụ onye nta akụkọ dịka onye ndụmọdụ nchịkọta akụkọ na mgbe e mesịrị bụrụ General Manager
Roberts wepụtara akwụkwọ ọhụrụ dịka Sunday Times na Sporting Record
Gọọmenti etiti Naijiria nwetara 60% nke Dailytimes na onye iro ya bụ New Nigerian Newspaper, na 1 Septemba 1975
Nkwupụta gọọmentị kwuru
N'okpuru ọchịchị ndị nkịtị nke President Olusegun Obasanjo, Ụlọ Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Ụlọ Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Ụlọ Ọrụ malitere usoro nke iweghachi Dailytimes na nkeonwe
Mgbe a nwara ọdịda nke ọha na eze ( IPO ), Dailytimes Nigeria Plc ka a kpọsara ọrịre na 2003
Na 2004 Folio Communications ka akwadoro dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ masịrị, na-enweta njikwa na 965% nke mbak
Usoro ire ere nwere mgbagwoju anya, kpatara ikpe dị iche iche
Ndị ọrụ bụbu ndị ọrụ enwetaghị elele nkwụsị ha

Mgbe e mesịrị, Folio kwụrụ ụfọdụ n’ime ndị ọrụ a chụrụ n’ọrụ ụgwu mgbe e mechiri akwụkwọ akụkọ n’afọ 2007, ma ọtụtụ n’ime ha akwụbeghị ụgwọ n’afọ 2010 n’agbanyeghị mgbalị ndị otu ha gbara iji nweta ego eji ha Folio Communications, onye weghaara nnukwu mgbasa ozi na 14 Maachị 2007, boro ebubo ịpụnara ihe onwunwe
Daisuke Ishiwatari, (a mụrụ na 14 Ọgọst 1973 na Johannesburg, South Africa) bụ onye South Africa- Japanese ne-emepụta egwuregwu vidiyo, onye ngọsị, ọgụ egwu, ochepụta egwu na onye ome ejije olu
Ishiwatari rụrụ ọrụ na Arc System Works na Guilty Gear mbụ ozugbo ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Daisuke, ya na Yoshihiro Kusano, dekwara egwu maka BlazBlue, yana ise ihe osise nke nhọrọ njirimara maka ihe na-esote, BlazBlue Continuum Shift
Tinyere nke a, o dekwara maka Hard Corps Uprising
A makwaara Daisuke Ishiwatari dịka onye na-ede egwu na ụdị metal na rock
Ihe ndị o dere, nke a chọtara na usoro akara ya, Guilty Gear, gosipụtara ọrụ guitar dị mgbagwoju anya, dịka ihe ndị o dere na BlazBlue
Abọm Guilty Gear XX na LA na Guilty GearXX na NY gụnyere olu maka egwu ahọpụtara, dịka abọm atọ na Japanese site na otu Lapis Lazuli

Daisy Ehanire Danjuma (onye a muru n'ụbọchị nke 6 n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1952) bu onye ndọrọ-ndọrọ ochichi nke ala Naijiria nke bu sịnetọ nke nọchiri anya Edo South Senatorial District nke Edo steeti n'ụlọ Sịnetị nke Naijiria site n'afọ 2003 ruo afọ 2007
Ọ zọghachikwara n'oge ntuli aka nke Naijiria n'afọ 2011, mana ihe agaghịrị ya nke ọma
A mụrụ Daisy Ehanire Danjuma n'ụbọchị nke 6 n'ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1952 na Benin City, nke Edo Steeti,dị na Naijiria
Danjuma gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị gọọmentị n'obodo Benin, n'Edo steeti, tupu ọ gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Ahmadu Bello,na Zaria, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere bachelọ na Iwu n'afọ 1976
N'afọ 1977, a kpọrọ ya na dịka ọkaikpe
Danjuma malitere ọrụ i ji otu afọ fee ala nna ya (NYSC) dịka onye ndụmọdụ steeti na Mịnịstrị nke Ikpe ziri ezi nke Legos Steeti, bụrụkwazị onye ọka ikpe nye Council of Aid Council of Nigeria
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka ndị isi na Nigerian Acceptances Limited (NAL), ụlọ akụ, site n'afọ 1977 ruo afọ 1978
Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ulọ Ọrụ / Onye Ndụmọdụ Iwu nya Nigerian Television Authority (NTA) site n'afọ 1982 ruo afọ 1992
A hoputara Danjuma dika onye Sịnetọ nke obodo Naijiria (2003-2007) na-anọchite anya Edo South
Na , a hoputara Danjuma ka o buru onye nnọchite anya Edo South nke Edo Steeti n'ụlọ nzuko omeiwu nke Naijiria site n'afọ 2003 ruo afọ 2007 n’okpuru Action Congress Party (AC)
Dika onye omeiwu, o jere ozi dika onye isi oche, ndi otu kọmitii sịneti na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyi na mwulite ndi ntorobia, onye otu komiti sineti na-ahụ maka, ahụike, agụmakwụkwọ, ego, na njem ụgbọala
Ị bụ sinetọ si Naịjirịa nyere Danjuma ohere ị bụ onye otu Commonwealth Parliamentary Association (CPA)
O jeekwala ozi dị ka Onye isi oche, Women and Child Right Committee nke Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS Parliament)

Danjuma zọrọ ọkwa nke abụọ ya maka ọfịs ndị omeiwu na ntuli aka nke afọ 2011 mana o mrghi ọfụma mere Ehigie Edobor Uzumere jiri merie ya ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ okpukpu abụọ nke votu ya; site na vootu 135,346 na 70,725
Nke a gosiri Uzamere ihe ịga nke ọma maka ntuli aka ọzọ na ntuli aka Eprel afọ 2011 maka Edo South Senatorial District
Mgbe a rịọchara arịrịọ ugboro ugboro, n'ọnwa Juunu afọ 2009, ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị kwuru na n'eziokwu na-ahọpụtara Uzamere n'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị
Danjuma lụrụ onye bụbu onye isi ọchịagha Naịjirịa na mịnịsta na-ahụ maka nchekwa nke Naịjirịa, Theophilus Yakubu Danjuma onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ nchọpụta mmanụ, South Atlantic Petroleum
Ha abụọ nwere otu nwa
Daisy Ducati (a mụrụ 8 Disemba, 1989) bụ Amerikạ akpali agụụ mmekọahụ omee
Enye ama odụk okenye ịse ụlọ ọrụ na 2013 na afọ na 24 ma pụtara ihe karịrị 31 nkiri
Daisy Wotube Okocha (amụrụ ya na ụbochi ịrị na ịse na ọnwa Jenụwarị na afọ 1951) o gara ozi dị ka onye isi ikpe nke asaa nke Rivers Steeti, na-elekọta Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke steeti ahụ, na Ụlọ Ọrụ Ikpe
Gọvanọ Ezenwo Wike họpụtara ya na ụlọ ọrụ na 4 Jenụwarị na afọ 2016, ọ nọkwa na oche ahụ ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike ọrụ na Jenụwarụ 15 n'afọ 2016
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye ịsị ịkpe na ikike ime ihe tupu ọ nweta nhọpụta dị mkpa
A mụrụ Okocha na ubochi ịri na ịse na ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1951 na Obio-Akpor, Rivers Steeti, Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye ebo Ikwerre
Nna ya, Jonathan Okocha, bụbu kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii, nne ya, Helen Nonyelum Okocha, bụ onye na-esi nri ọha
Daisy natara LL yaB
(Hons) site na Mahadum nke Zaria n'afo 1978
N'afọ ọzọ, na ubochi ịr abuọ na ịteghete na ọnwa June, a nabatara ya n'ụlọ ikpe
O nwekwara diplọma post-graduate na nkà mmụta okpupere, nke ọ gbasoro na Redeemed Christian Bible College (RCBC)
N'afọ 1981, Okocha sonyeere ndị ọka ikpe na obodo ya bụ Rivers Steeti
Ọ malitere ịlụ ọrụ dị ka onye oka ikpe nke mbu na-aga n'ihu n'ọkwa ụlọ ikpe dị iche iche
N'afọ 1991, a họpụtara ya n'ụlọ ikpe dị elu, ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi ikpe na ngalaba Port Harcourt
A họpụtara ya iji nochie Iche Ndu dị ka onye isi ikpe n'afọ 2013
Ọ bụ ezie na mba ikpe Kansul tụrụ alo ya, gọvanọ Chibuike Amaechi jụrụ ịhọpụta ya
Dị ka o si kwuo, o tozughị oke ịnochi nke ọma CJ lara ezumike nká, kansụl ahụ họpụtara ya maka ọdịmma onwe ya
Na ọnwa June n'afọ 2015, n'okpuru nchịkwa ọhụrụ nke Ezenwo Wike, e dụrụ Okocha n'iyi ọlụ n'ikpeazụ dị ka onye isi ikpe nke Rivers Steeti
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ nwere ọnọdụ a, ebe NJC họpụtara ya dị ka onye ọka ikpe kachasị elu n'ụlọ ikpe dị elu

Okocha bụ onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba nke mba otu ụmunwanyi ndi ọka ịkpe na ṅaijiria, onye bụbu onye isi nke mba ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyi ndi ọka ịkpe na Rivers Steeti, onye otu Commonwealth onye ọka ịwu na ndi ikpe' otu, onye otu ugbu a, mba ụwa otu ụmu nwanyi

Daju Mongo, bụkwa Wadai Daju ma ọ bụ Dar Daju Daju, bụ asụsụ Sudan nke dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ, otu n'ime asụsụ atọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na mpaghara a na-akpọ 'Daju' (nke ọzọ bụ asụsụ Nyala na asụsụ Sila
A na-asụ ya na Chad na Chad
Ndi Dar daju daju no nso oke Darfur, enwere olumba ato bu Bardangal, Eref na Gadjira
Àtụ Eastern Sudanic languages
Àtụ Infobox ethnonym
Lela ma ọ bụ C'lela (Chilela) bụ asụsụ Kainji nke Naijiria
A maara ya dị ka Dakarkari na Hausa n'ihi na ndị Dakarkari bụ ndị na-asụ ya
Àtụ Platoid languages
Ndị Dakarkari a makwaara ha dị ka Lena bụ otu n'ime abụrụ dị no na Naịjirịa nke nwere ihe dịka mmadụ 136,000
A na-ahụkarị ha na Zuru Donko-Wasagu, na Sakaba Local Government Areas nke Kebbi State (nke bụ akụkụ nke Sokoto steeti) na ụfọdụ gọọmentị mpaghara ndị ọzọ na steeti Niger dị ka Rijau na Mariga
A na-ekewa ha n'ìgwè dị iche iche nke bụ Bangawa kafawa, Kelawa, Lilawa
Taa, enwere ike ịchọta ha na Kebu, Roma, Dogo, Isgogo, Dabai, Rikoto, Peni, Zuru, Manga, Senchi, Ushe, Tadurga, Diri, Ribah, Conoko na Rade
Ndị Dakarkari sitere na alaeze Kebbi ruo na narị afọ nke iri na asatọ
Ndị Dakarkaris bụ ndị agha ụkwụ nke alaeze nke aha ha sitere na ya; daakaaree nke pụtara onye agha na asụsụ Hausa
Otú ọ dị, mgbe ọdịda nke Alaeze Kebbi gasịrị, ha kwagara n'ebe ndịda ebe ha nwere ike ịkọ ugbo n'enweghị nsogbu
Omenala alụmdi na nwunye nke ndị Dakarkari bụ omenala pụrụ iche n'akụkụ ugwu nke mba ahụ
Ọ dịghị abụrụ ọzọ nwere omenala alụmdi na nwunye yiri ya
N'ọdịnala, a ghaghị ịmalite nwoke na Golmo na emume U'hola kwa afọ tupu ya alụọ di
A naghị ele onye ọ bụla a na-amaghị aha ya anya dị ka onye nwere ọrụ ma enweghi ike inye ya nwunye
Ọzọkwa, a na-atụ anya na nwa di ga-arụ ọrụ n'ugbo nna nna ya n'ọdịnihu ruo afọ asaa na-ezo aka n'ihe Mozis mere na Bible
Ndị Dakarkari bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị na-achụ nta
Iji chọọ ala na-eme nri, ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime ha akwagala na steeti Niger ma ha na-alaghachi n'ụlọ maka ememme na olili ozu
A na-ahụkarị ndị Dakarkari na ndị agha Naịjirịa
A na-ejikọta nke a na obi ike na obi ike ha nke a mụtara n'oge mmalite na omenala golmo
Emume U'hola bụ emume a na-eme kwa afọ nke a na-eji echeta ihu ọma nke Chineke ha na owuwe ihe ubi ha
A na-ejikwa ya eme emume ngụsị akwụkwọ nke ndị na-achọ ịlụ (Yadato) bụ ndị jeerela nna nna ha ozi na (Golmo)i

A dakimakura (抱き枕; site na daki 抱き 'embrace' na makura 枕 'pillow') bụ ụdị nnukwu ohiri ndị mmadụ n'ihe dị ka ndị ọzọ ụra mbụ Nile dị ka onye isi na peeji nke iri abuo isi sitere na Japan nke a na-ejikọkarị na mkpuchi ohiri isi na-egosi ihe odide anime
A na-asụgharịkarị okwu ahụ n'asụsụ Bekee dị ka pillow, waifu pillow, ma ọ bụ husbando ohiri isi
Na ,ohiri isi dakimakura yiri ohiri isi ọkpụkpụ nke ọdịda anyanwụ, ndị ntorobịa Japan na-ejikarị ya eme ihe dị ka 'ihe nkasi obi'

N'ime ngwụcha '90s na mmalite 2000s, dakimakura malitere ijikọta na omenala otaku, na-eduga ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị na eme ka ndị ọzọ ndị nwere mmasị nwanyị Mmekọahụ ike ịbelata ọtụtụ ojiji ndị na ụdị ke amụta na mmepụta nke mkpuchi ohiri isi nke gosipụtara ihe oyiyi e biri ebi nke bishōjo na bishōnen gosipụtara na-edina ala site na egwuregwu anime ma ọ bụ bishōjo dị iche iche
A tọhapụrụ ọtụtụ n'ime mkpuchi otaku dakimakura ndị a site na Cospa, ụlọ ahịa ngwaahịa na uwe nke na-aga n'ihu na-ewepụta mkpuchi dakimakura
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-akpọ dakimakura mgbe ụfọdụ 'nwunye Dutch', nkọwa mbụ nke ahịrịokwu a dị nso na chikufujin, ma ọ bụ 'nwunye bamboo'
Afọ 2015 hụrụ ụfọdụ n'ime akwa ahụ mbụ na-ekwu okwu na Ita-Supo na mascot ya, Rina Makuraba
Ọ bụ onye nchọpụta nke ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ nke Kyushu, Koichi Uchimura, mepụtara ya
Tupu etiti afọ 00, dakimakura dị n'otu nha; 160 cm (63 in × 20 in)
Kemgbe ngwụcha afọ 00, 150 50 cm (59 in × 20 in) dakimakura ghọrọ ihe dịnụ ma na-ewu ewu ego ụgbọ mmiri na-echekwa site na ịnọ n'okpuru 2 kg (4 ) oke ibu
N'ihi mmụba nke ewu ewu, e mepụtara nha ọhụrụ iji kwekọọ na ịdị elu na afọ niile, ọ bụ ezie na e nwere nha ndị ọzọ dị, nha 5 kachasị ewu ewu bụ 180x60, 170x60, 160x60, 150x50 na 140x40 cm
Okpu ịhụnanya bụ akụkụ nke dakimakura na-egosipụtakarị foto ndị dị ndụ nke ndị na-ese onyinyo
Ha nwere ike igosi ihe odide anime, ihe odide furry, ma ọ bụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ
Dakkada FC (a mara oge gara aga dịka Akwa Starlets FC) bụ a klọbụ egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa
Ha na-egwu egwu ugbu a na Lig ọrụ nke egwuregwu bọọlụ na Naịjirịa mgbe ha nwesịrị nkwalite site na Lig ọkachamara Mba Naịjiria n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Julai nke afọ 2019
Dakkada FC dị na Uyo, Akwa Ibom steeti
Ụlọ egwuregwu ha bụ Ụlọ egwuregwu mba Godswill Akpabio
N'afọ 2019, ha meriri nkwalite igwu egwu na oge 2019-2020 nke asọmpi egwuregwu kerre nke Naịjirịa, asọmpi bọọlụ ndị ọkachamara na Naịjirịa
Nzere ha mere ka steeti Niger Delta nke Akwa Ibom nwere mmanụ dị na steeti naanị gọọmentị steeti na-akwado klọbụ abụọ ugbu a na asọmpi egwuregwu Premiya, ewezuga steeti Abia bụ agbata obi
Dakkada FC nke bụ Akwa Starlets FC n'oge gara aga ka hiwere n'afọ 2004 site na Gọọmenti Akwa Ibom Steeti n'aka kọmishọna ndị ntorobịa na egwuregwu Chris Ekong dịka ndị otu obere nke Akwa United FC
Mgbe e hiwere Dakkada FC, ha buru ụzọ gbaa bọọlụ na Lig ndị n'amu amụ na Mba Naịjirịa nke mbụ wee jiri nta nke nta nweta nkwalite
Na ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 2019, Akwa Starlet bụ onye mmeri nke 2019 Lig Mba nke Naịjiria
N'ụbọchị iri atọ na otu nke ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2019, njikwa klọb ahụ nyere klọb ahụ aha ọzọ na-agbanwe aha site na Akwa Starlet FC gaa Dakkada FC
Dị ka ụbọchị iri atọ nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 2020
Dakore Egbuson-Akande (amụrụ Dakore Omobola Egbuson ) bụ onye na- eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Amnesty International, Amstel Malta na Oxfam nke America
A mụrụ Dakore na Bayelsa State dị ka nwa mbụ nne na nna ya
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Corona na kọleji ụmụ nwanyị gọọmentị etiti na Lagos na Bauchi n'otu n'otu
Ọ gụrụ maka nkwukọrịta uka na Mahadum Lagos nke ọ kwụsịrị n'ihi ịgba abụba ọrụ na -adịghị akwụsị akwụsị
Ọ lụọla di ugbu a ma nwe ụmụ abụọ
Na Septemba 2019, Dakore pụtara dị ka akụkụ bụ isi na katalọgụ njikọ visual, na mbipụta isiokwu Vivencias nke asụgharịrị ịbụ 'nchịkọta Ahụmịhe' n'asụsụ Spanish
A gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ tụmadị mmadụ iri atọ sitere gburugburu ụwa dịka Kelli Ali, Adelaide Damoah na Desdamona
Na Sepa 2019, Dakore A gbara ya ndị ọnụ tụmadị ndị iri atọ sitere gburugburu ụwa dịka Kelli Ali, Adelaide Damoah na Desdamona

Na Mee 2020, N'ajụjụ ọnụ Dakore na ihe nchịkọta otu njikọ visual a na-bipụtapụta usoro mgbochi TwentyEightyFour, nke ewepụtara n'oge oke oria ojoo COVID-19, ọkpọ egwu si French bụ Les Nubians, onye na-echepụta egwu si Japan bụ Rika Muranaka na onye na-akpa ọchị si Nigeria bụ Chigul ere na otu olu
Dakore emeela ihe nkiri karịrị iri ise, ụfọdụ n'ime ha gụnyere
Dalal Abdel Aziz (17 Jenụwarị 1960 - 7 Ọgọst 2021) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ nwunye onye na-eme ihe nkiri Samir Ghanem site na 1984 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 2021
Abdel Aziz nwere nzere bachelọ ya na Faculty of Agriculture na Mahadum Zagazig
O mechara gụọ akwụkwọ na Faculty of Mass Communication, English Literature and Political Science na Mahadum Cairo

Abdel Aziz banyere n'ọrụ ime ihe nkiri na 1977 na obere ọrụ, nke gụnyere ọrụ ya na usoro 'Bint Al Ayam', na mmalite ya n'ezie bụ mgbe onye na-ese ihe Nour El Demerdash mere ka ọ mata ihe nkiri, ọ sonyeere ọtụtụ usoro, egwuregwu na ihe nkiri, dị ka 化Five-Star Thieves化 (1994) na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Egypt a ma ama Salah Zulfikar, na ọrụ ndị a ọ nwere ike inweta ọtụtụ onyinye dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri kachasị mma
Abdel Aziz lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Samir Ghanem; ha bụ nne na nna nke ndị na-eme egwuregwu Donia na Amy
Ghanem nwụrụ site na nsogbu nke ọrịa akụrụ na mucormycosis metụtara COVID-19 na El Safa Hospital, Mohandiseen, Giza na 20 Mee 2021, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na anọ
Abdel Aziz n'onwe ya nwụrụ na 7 Ọgọstụ, n'ihi nsogbu ndị metụtara COVID-19 ụbọchị otu narị mgbe o butesiri ọrịa ahụ
Dalenda Abdou, aha egwu nke Khira Bent Abdelkader Gharbi (Arabic; 2 Nọvemba 1928 - 29 June 2021), bụ onye mba Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Abdou malitere ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri n'afọ 1947 na ndị otu Al Ittihad Al Masrahi de Béchir Rahal
Ọ na-agbanwere n'etiti ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ, dịka Troupe du théâtre populaire nke Abdelaziz El Aroui duziri
Ọ nakweere aha 'Dalenda Abdou' mgbe nduzi sitere n'aka Béchir Rahal, onye ọsụ ụzọ nke ihe nkiri Tunisia na nna onye na-agụ egwu Oulaya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, dịka The Two Orphans
N'afọ 1951, Abdou mere nke mbụ ya na Redio Tunis, ebe ọ zutere onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi Mongi Ben Yaïche
Ọ malitere ịpụta na ihe ngosi telivishọn, ọkachasị na-egwu Hnani na Mhal Chahed Ọ na-emekarị ka ndị agadi nwanyị na telivishọn, onye a na-ewere na ọ maara nke ọma
N'abalị 29 ọnwa June afọ 2021, Dalenda Abdou nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ndị agha nke Tunis [fr] n'ihi COVID-19 mgbe ọ dị afọ 92
Dalene Matthee (13 Ọktoba na afo1938 – 20 Febrụwarị na afo 2005) bụ onye odee South Africa kacha mara amara maka “akwụkwọ akụkọ ọhịa” anọ ya, nke edere na na gburugburu ọhịa Knysna
Asụgharịla akwụkwọ ya n'asụsụ iri na anọ, gụnyere Bekee, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Hebrew na Icelandic, na ihe karịrị otu nde ka erere n'ụwa nile
A mụrụ ya Dalena Scott na Riversdale na Cape Province mgbe ahụ na afo 1938
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na afo 1957, ọ gụrụ egwu na ụlọ akwụkwọ nchekwa na Oudtshoorn yana na Holy Cross Covent na Graaff-Reinet
Akwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ akụkọ ụmụaka, Die Twaalfurstokkie (The Twelve-el-clock Stick), nke e bipụtara na afo 1970
N’afọ 1982, e bipụtakwara akwụkwọ akụkọ dị mkpirikpi a na-akpọ Die Judasbok (Ewu Judas)

Tupu ọ nweta aha ya na nkwanye ugwu maka 'akwụkwọ akụkọ ọhịa' mbụ ya, o dekwara akụkọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ yana akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ a ma ama - ' n Huis vir Nadia (A House for Nadia) (1982) na Petronella van Aarde, Burgemeester (Petronella van) Aarde, onye isi obodo) (1983)
Kringe in 'n Bos ( Circles in a Forest ) (1984) bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ gbasara mkpochapụ enyí Knysna na nrigbu ndị na-egbu osisi nke ọhịa Knysna, na-emetụtakwa enyí ọhịa
Ọ bụ ihe ịga nke ọma n'ụwa niile ma sụgharịa ya n'ọtụtụ asụsụ, onye odee sụgharịa akwụkwọ ahụ n'onwe ya site na Afrikaans gaa na Bekee
Abụọ ndị ọzọ nwere nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma 'akwụkwọ akụkọ ọhịa' sochiri Fiela se Kind ( Nwa Fiela ) na afo 1985 na Moerbeibos (The Mulberry Forest) na 1987

E bipụtara Brug van die Esels (Bridge of the Mules) na afo 1993, sochiri Susters van Eva (Sister of Eve) na afo 1995, Pieternella van die Kaap (Pieternella si Cape) na afo 2000 na nke anọ 'Forest Novel' Toorbos (Dream)
Forest) na afo 2003
Ọ nwetara ọtụtụ ihe nrite agụmagụ maka ọrụ ya ndị a ma ama, e mekwara Fiela's Child and Circles in a Forest ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ nọsịrị obere ihe ndina nke nkụda mmụọ obi kpatara, ọ nwụrụ na Mossel Bay, South Africa, ụmụ ya nwanyị atọ lanarịrị
Di ya, bụ́ Larius, nwụrụ n’afọ 2003
Ntụ Matthee gbasasịa na Krisjan-se-Nek, otu n'ime ebe kacha amasị ya na ọhịa Knysna
Na afo 2008, e wuru ihe ncheta ebe a na ebe nchekwa ya na osisi Yellowwood dị afọ 800 guzo n'ebe ahụ ka ahagharịrị Dalene Matthee Big Tree
Aha okporo ụzọ njem na-amalite na Krisjan-se-Nek ka a na-akpọ ugbu a Circles in a Trail Forest

Dali Tambo (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 1959) bụ onye mgbasa ozi South Africa nke a maara nke ọma dị ka onye na-egosi ihe ngosi telivishọn SABC a kpọrọ People of the South na dịka onye guzobere otu ndị na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ (Artists Against Apartheid)
Dali Tambo bụ nwa Oliver Tambo, onye bụbu onye isi oche nke African National Congress, na Adelaide Tambo

Tambo gara Lancing College na West Sussex, United Kingdom, tupu ọ gaa gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum America na Sorbonne na Paris, France, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na International Affairs na Political Science
Dali Tambo lụrụ Rachael Tambo ma ha nwere ụmụ anọ; a na-akpọ nwa ha nwoke nke okenye aha nna ya (OR Tambo)

N'afọ 1983, Dali Tambo na onye egwu Jerry Dammers guzobere otu na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ (Artists Against Apartheid) Nzukọ ahụ haziri ọtụtụ ihe ngosi egwu na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na Europe n'oge afọ 1980
Tambo laghachiri South Africa na 1991 ka ịkpa ókè agbụrụ kwụsịrị
Tambo kwadoro ihe ngosi okwu People of the South na SABC site n'afọ 1994 ruo 2002 na ọzọ site na 2012 ruo 2013
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2013, ndị mmadụ nke ndịda gosiri ajụjụ ọnụ Tambo juru onye isi ala Zimbabwe Robert Mugabe naanị ọnwa abụọ tupu ntuli aka Zimbabwe nke afọ 2013
A kọrọ na o were Tambo afọ atọ iji hazie ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ezinụlọ Mugabe

Ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ kpatara esemokwu ụfọdụ ma katọọ ya maka ịbụ 'sycophantic' site na akwụkwọ akụkọ Mail & Guardian, ma kpọọ ya 'mmekọrịta ọha na eze' maka Mugabe site na onye na-eme ihe ngosi redio CapeTalk567, Kieno Kammies

N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara Kammies na CapeTalk567 Tambo zaghachiri na 'Ndị bi na ndịda [bụ] ọ bụghị Hard Talk' nakwa na usoro ihe ngosi ahụ na-abụghị nke esemokwu ga-emegide ịma Mugabe aka na ebubo nke mmebi ikike mmadụ, aghụghọ ntuli aka, na mmemme mgbanwe ala na-ese okwu nke Mugabe duziri
Kemgbe ọ hapụrụ People of the South na 2013, Tambo lekwasịrị anya n'ịkwalite echiche nke ogige ihe ncheta na obodo Tshwane
Ogige ntụrụndụ a na-eme atụmatụ ga-egosipụta ihe oyiyi ọla nchara narị anọ ruo narị ise nke ndị na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ a na-akwanyere ùgwù
Site na ụlọ ọrụ ya Koketso Growth, ọ nwetara onyinye iji mee ihe oyiyi
Otu ihe atụ dị otú ahụ bụ Ihe oyiyi nke Nelson Mandela na veranda nke Ụlọ Nzukọ Obodo Cape Town
O nyere Barry Jacksen na Xhanti Mpakama ọrụ ịrụpụta ọrụ ahụ
E kpughere ya na 24 Julaị 2018
Dalia Djebbar (amụrụ n'Eprel 6, 1996, Béjaïa, Algeria), bụ nwa agbọghọ Algeria na egwu volleyball
Klọb dị ugbu a ASW Bejaia
Dalia Mahmoud Quotb El Behery (amụrụ n'October 15, 1970) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
O meriri Miss Egypt n'afọ 1990, wee bụrụ onye nke iri abụọ na asaa na asọmpi Miss Universe nke 1990 na Los Angeles
El Behery nwetara nzere bachelọ na Faculty of Tourism and Hotels na Mahadum Helwan, ma rụọ ọrụ na mmemme na Egyptian Satellite Channel na ime ihe ngosi
Ọ pụtara mputa nke mbụ ya dị ịrịba ama bụ na vidiyo nke egwu 'Tegeesh neaeesh', nke Ali El Haggar
Ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi kwadebere ụzọ maka ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya
Ya na ndị ama ama dịka Adel Imam rụkọrọ ọrụ na ihe nkiri ya Al Safara fe Al Emara yana ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe ọchị na ndị na-agụ egwu nke gụnyere Hany Ramzy, Moustafa Amar na Khaled Selim

El Behery kwuru n'otu n'ime ajụjụ ọnụ ya na telivishọn na ọ chọrọ igosipụta ọrụ nke Eze Nwanyị Fero 'Nefertiti' na ihuenyo, na-agọnahụ asịrị na ọ na-ala azụ banyere ngosipụta nke Eze Nwụ 'Cleopatra' site n'aka onye na-eme ihe nkiri Siria Solaf Fawakhirji

Site na 2008 ruo 2013, ọ lụrụ onye ọchụnta ego Farid El Mourchedi (nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Fred Morse), nwa nwa nke onye na-ese ihe Farid Shawki site na nwa ya nwanyị onye na-emepụta Nahed Farid Shawiki
Dalia na Farid nwere nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Khadija, onye nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị ọnwa asatọ n'ihi ọrịa a na-adịghị ahụkebe
N'afọ 2016, El Behery lụrụ Hassan Samy
El Behery bịanyere aka dị ka onye nnọchi anya Goodwill maka World Stroke Day na Nọvemba 2010,

N'ime mkparịta ụka ekwentị ya na ụlọ ọrụ 'Al Arabiya', o kwupụtara obi ụtọ ya na mgbanwe udo nke Egypt nke afọ 2011 na ihe ndị a chọrọ maka ikike ndị bụ isi dị ka nnwere onwe, mgbanwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mgbalị jikọrọ aka maka iwulite mba
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Dalia kwuru na enweghị nchebe mere ka ọ na-echegbu onwe ya, dị ka ndị ọzọ bi na ya
Nchegbu ahụ, ka ọ kọwara, anọwo na-akawanye njọ mgbe ọtụtụ narị ndị mkpọrọ gbapụrụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Al Faiyum
Ọ gbakwụnyere na nnupụisi ndị ntorobịa ahụ amalitela n'okporo ámá ndị Ijipt ma kelee ndị Ijipt ibe ya bụ ndị jikọtara ọnụ iji chebe ihe onwunwe ọha na eze, ọkachasị Ebe Ngosi Ihe Ochie Ijipt

Dalia Mostafa (amụrụ na 12 Eprel 1976) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nlereanya
Mostafa lụrụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri Sherif Salama
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme mkpọsa TV ma malite ime ihe nkiri na 1995
Dị ka onye nlereanya, Mostafa chere mmeghachi omume ihu maka itinye foto n'ime uwe ịsa ahụ, na-akpali mkparịta ụka ọha na eze banyere mmeso ụmụ nwanyị Arab na Ijipt
Dalila Meftahi (Àtụ Lang-ar) bụ onye Tunisian na-eme ihe nkiri
Dallal Merwa Achour (amụrụ na Nọvemba 3, 1994 na Blida, Algeria) bụ onye Algeria na egwu volleyball
A họpụtara Achour ka ọ gbaa bọọlụ maka otu egwuregwu volleyball ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Algeria na 2012 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ

Dalton Minimum bụ ógè nkè ọnụ ọgụgụ nké gbadara àlà ébé anyanwụ, na-anọchite anya ọrụ dị ala nke anwụ, nke akpọrọ aha ónyé England na-ahụ màkà ihu igwe John Dalton, nke na-adị site n'afo 1790 ruo afọ 1830 ma ọ bụ afọ 1796 ruo 1820, nke kwekọrọ na ógè okirikiri anyanwụ 4 ruo okirikiri nke anyanwụ 7
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ejikarị Dalton Minimum tụnyere Maunder Minimum, ọnụ ọgụgụ sunspot ya dịtụ elu ma kọọrọ sunspots na-ekesa na hemispheres anyanwụ abụọ n'adịghị ka Maunder Minimal

A na-egosipụta ihe ndị na-acha uhie uhie na Ezra Ames na José Joaquin de Ferrerz na ihe osise eclipse n'afọ 1806 ma gosipụta ọdịdị nke magnetik ya ọ bụghị nke Maunder Minimum kama na nke okirikiri anyanwụ nke ógé a
Dị ka Maunder Minimum na Spörer Minimum, Dalton Minimum dakọtara na ógé okpomọkụ ụwa dị ala karịa nkezi
N'oge ahụ, enwèrè mgbanwe nké okpomọkụ nkè ihe dịka otu Celsius na Germany
A ghọtachaghị ihe kpatara okpomọkụ dị ala karịa nkezi na njikọ ha nwèrè ike inwe na ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ala nke anyanwụ
Akwụkwọ ndị na-adịbeghị ányá atụwo aro na ịrị elu nkè mgbawa ugwu bụ ihe kpatara usoro oyi

Ọ bụ ezie na Afọ Na-enweghị Oge Ọchịchị, n'afọ 1816, mèrè n'oge Dalton Minimum, isi ihe kpatara okpomọkụ dị jụụ nke afọ ahụ bụ mgbawa ugwu nke ukwuu n'afọ gara aga nke Ugwu Tambora na Indonesia, nke bụ otu n'ime mgbawa abụọ kachasị ukwuu n'ime afọ 2000 gara-aga

Otu ónyé ga-echekwa na ịrị elu nke mgbawa ugwu nwèrè ike ịbụ site na ọkwa dị ala nke mmepụta anyanwụ n'ihi na enwèrè njikọ na-adịghị ike ma dị ịrịba ama n'etiti mbelata nke mmepụta nke anyanwụ na mmụba nke mgbawa ọkụ
Mkpúrù èdè íke
Damaturu bụ ama ukwu no na Afrịka ala ana-kpo Naigeria
Damaturu bụ ịsị óche Ȯra Yobe (Yobe State), nwéré madu ha sị rùrù, 87,706 (Local Government Area; 2006; census) na 104,480 (Local Government Area; 2011; projection)
Dambou (nke a na-akpọkwa Dambu) bụ nri sitere na Zarma na Songhai nke ndị mpaghara Ndida na ebe Odida anyanwu Steeti Niger nke e ji ọka na Moringa mee
A na-eri ya n'oge ọ bụla mana ọ bụ n'oge ememme dịka n'èzí na agbamakwụkwọ
Nri a bụkwa ihe a na-ahụkarị n'etiti ndị Dendi nke North Benin na obodo ndị ọzọ dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka
Ọ bụkwa ihe a na-ahụkarị na Zongo Settlements ebe Songhai na Zarma na-eme njem
(site na nsụgharị French nke nri ahụ)
A na-akwadebe Dambou dịka ọchịchọ na ọchịchọ nke onye na-esi nri si dị
Maka nri dị mfe, ndị na-esi nri na-ejikarị ntụ ọka osikapa ma ọ bụ ezigbo ọka wit siri ike semolina (couscous semolina) ma ọ bụ millet, ọka wit ma ọ bụ ọka
A na-esi ọka ahụ ọkụ ruo ihe dị ka nkeji iri abụọ na iri atọ ma tinye akwụkwọ moringa siri esi
N'ikpeazụ, a na-agbakwunye ihe ndị ọzọ na ọnọdụ ha ya bụ yabasị, chili, nnu, broth, ahụekere, mmanụ akwụkwọ nri, anụ ma ọ bụ azụ dị ka nri dị n'akụkụ
Dambu bụ nri hausa nke e ji ọka a maara dị ka tsaki ma ọ bụ osikapa, akwụkwọ moringa na carrot mee
E nwere ụdị Dambu dị iche iche, mana ụdị ndị a na-ahụkarị bụ Dambu shinkafa; nke a bụ Dambu e ji osikapa mee
A na-esi osikapa n'ọkụ nke mere na eji na-egbutu ha n'ime obere iberibe
A na-etinye akwụkwọ Moringa, carrot mgbe nkeji ole na ole gasịrị, a na-etinye ya ose agwakọta ma na-esi ya na ọkụ ruo ihe dị ka nkeji 45
A na-agbakwunye mmanụ a mịrị amị ma na-enye ya
Dambu Masara, Dambu gero na ndị ọzọ bụ ụdị Dambu ndị ọzọ e mere na Hausa
Damon J
Blackman (amụrụ n'August 9, 1974), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwú ya bụ Dame Grease, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ si New York City
N'afọ 1996, ọ nwetara nkwado na ụlọ ọrụ hip hop site na ọrụ mmepụta ya na Bad Boy na The LOX, mgbè ọ na-eguzobe ụda nké DMX na Ruff Ryders
Dame N'Doye (amụrụ na 21 Febụwarị 1985) bụ onye Senegal na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-aga n'ihu
Ọ nọrọ akụkụ ka mma nke ọrụ ya na Copenhagen, na-eje ozi ugboro abụọ na klọb ahụ ma bụrụ onye kachasị mma na 2018
Ọ nọchitekwara anya ndị otu na Qatar, Portugal, Greece, Russia, England na Turkey
N'Doye meriri Senegal nke mbụ ya n'afọ 2010, wee gbaa bọọlụ maka mba ahụ na asọmpi iko mba Afrịka abụọ
A mụrụ ya na Thiès, N'Doye malitere ọrụ ya na ASC Jeanne d'Arc
N'afọ 2006, ọ bịanyere aka na Al Sadd SC na Qatar Stars League
N'Doye rutere Europe n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2006, sonyeere Académica de Coimbra
Site na 2007 ruo 2009 ọ gbara ọsọ na Super League Greece, na Panathinaikos FC
na OFI Crete FC
Na 12 Jenụwarị 2009, N'Doye kwagara na klọb Danish Superliga FC
Copenhagen
Ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya na 7 Machị 2009, nyere aka na mmeri 3 na-aga n'ihu na Randers FC, ma jiri goolu iri na anọ mechie oge mbụ ya zuru ezu, ka klọb ahụ megharịrị ịdị elu ya n'ime ụlọ
N'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2010, N'Doye meriri onye mmeri nke 3102 (nakwa akara ngụkọta) na nkeji nke 59 nke agba nke UEFA Champions League megide FC BATE Borisov
N'ọkwa nke otu, o nyeere ndị otu ya aka ịghọ ndị mbụ na mba ahụ iji ruo n'ọkwa knockout site na goolu megide FC Rubin Kazan (1[[0, n'ụlọ) na Panathinaikos (2[[0 na Athens)
N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2012, N'Doye bịanyere aka na otu egwuregwu Premier League nke Russia FC Lokomotiv Moscow maka ego a na-akọwaghị

Ọ ghọrọ onye mbụ a họọrọ ngwa ngwa, na-agba bọọlụ ugboro asaa na ọkara mbụ nke mkpọsa ahụ; na Nọvemba 2012, ọ meriri ntuli aka weebụ nke ndị na-akwado klọb mere ka a họpụta ya dịka onye egwuregwu nke ọnwa, na-emegharị ihe omume ahụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba nke afọ na-esote
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2015, N'Doye kwetara na ya na Hull City ga-arụ ọrụ afọ abụọ na ọkara maka ego a na-akọwaghị
O mere Premier League mbụ ya ụbọchị ise ka e mesịrị, na-abịa dị ka onye na-anọchi Gastón Ramírez na nkeji nke iri asaa na isii na Manchester City
Mmalite mbụ ya mere n'ụbọchị egwuregwu na-esote, ebe ọ gbara goolu nke abụọ na mmeri Aston Villa n'ụlọ
N'abalị iri n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2015, N'Doye kwagara Trabzonspor maka £ 22 nde
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị na-esote, ọ kwagara klọb na mba ọzọ, sonye na Sunderland ruo na ngwụcha oge
Ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya maka nke ikpeazụ na 1 Machị, na-agbanwe site na ịgbapụ iji mee ka ndị ọbịa nọ n'ihu n'egwuregwu 2 na Crystal Palace
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2018, onye nweere onwe ya bụ N'Doye laghachiri na FC
Copenhagen na nkwekọrịta otu afọ
Ụbọchị iri abụọ na asaa ka e mesịrị, n'egwuregwu ya na Aalborg Boldspilklub na Parken Stadium nke mechara n'ime nkeji iri na ise iji bụrụ onye kachasị mma na klọb ahụ, mgbe ọ gafere César Santin
N'Doye hapụrụ n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2020 ka nkwekọrịta ya, nke e mezigharịrị na Jenụwarị 2019, gwụrụ
N'Doye mere nke mbụ ya maka Senegal na 17 Nọvemba 2010, na mmeri enyi na enyi megide Gabon
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na-asọmpi na 2012 Africa Cup of Nations, na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-anọchi anya na ọdịda Zambia na 2 Xia 1 na ọpụpụ nke otu
Nwanne N'Doye nke okenye, Ousmane, bụkwa onye na-agba bọọlụ mba ụwa

Dami Àjàyí (amụrụ n'afọ 1986) bụ onye Naijiria na-ede uri, dọkịta, onye order edemede na onye nkato egwu
O so guzobe magazin Saraba na afo 2008
Ọ bụ onye dere nchịkọta Uri nabo chapbook
A mụrụ Dami Àjàyí na Naijiria nafo 1986
Mgbe ọ bụ undergraduate nagụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo nke dị na Ile-Ife, ya na nwa akwụkwọ ọzọ gikoro-onu Saraba Magazine
O sokwa guzobe ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi The Lagos Review na YabaLeft Review, ya na ndị edemede Toni Kan na Tunji Olalere
Nafọ 2011, edepụtara Àjàyí n'etiti 'Ndị Naijiria Uri fa neye obi uto' nime Sentinel UK Poetry Blog
Nchịkọta mbụ ya nke uri, Clinical Blues, depụtara (n'ụdị akwụkwọ) maka Melita Hume Prize na 2012
Ọ bu ndi WriteHouse bipụtara ya nafọ 2014, ma depụta ya maka Wole Soyinka Prize for Literature in Africa
Nafọ 2017, n'chikota Uri abuo ya, A Woman's Body is a Country, but ndi Quida biputere ya

Banyere ọrụ ahụ, Àjàyí na-ekwusị 'Achọrọ mu ka akwụkwọ m gosi etu aha 'mmetụta' si ghọọ ngwaa, na mgbalị m na-esite n'ebe nchekwa nke onwe m, na-enwe olileanya na ahụmịhe m bụ otu na nke zuru ụwa ọnụ'
A kọwara na odị ka onye 'na-ede banyere ịhụnanya dị ka mmanya na-aba n'anya nke na-eme ka mmadụ banye n'ime mmetụta ya'
Àjàyí edego mkpirikpi akuko e bipụtara na Naịjirịa na mba ozo
ugbu a ọ na-enye nyocha dị egwu banyere egwu Naijiria na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ntanetiị
Ọ na-enye nyocha dị oke egwu banyere egwu Naijiria ugbu a na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ntanetị

Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ From Limbe to Lagos NonFiction from Cameroon and Nigeria, nke bụ nsonaazụ nke ọmụmụ ihe ederede nke e mere na Limbe maka ndị edemede na-eto eto nke Africa
Dami Elebe bụ onye na-ede ihe nkiri na Naijiria nke a maara maka usoro ntanetị dị ka Skinny Girl In Transit na Rumour Has It
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ikuku, onye na-ese ihe na onye egwu
Elebe gụrụ mgbasa ozi na nka
Elebe bụ onye na-ahụ maka ikuku (OAP) na Classic FM, Beat FM na Naija FM n'ime afọ 7 wee dee ihe nkiri ahụ, Up North nke Tope Oshin duziri
Na ELOY Awards n'afọ 2018, ọ natara ihe nrite Scriptwriter Of The Year
Ya na Sharon Ooja, Nonso Bassey, Jon Ogah, Etim Effiong, Damilola Adegbite, na Shaffy Bello rụkọrọ ọrụ
N'abalị asaa nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2018, ọ kwupụtara na peeji Instagram ya na ọ ga-ahapụ Beat FM, na-akọwa oge ya na ụlọ ọrụ redio dị ka 'nnukwu njem'
ụbọchị ọmụmụ
A mụrụ Damian na Jenụwarị 1957 na Nguru, Mbaise, Imo State, Nigeria
agụmakwụkwọ
Anyanwu onye e were dị ka Senior Assistant site na ngalaba Physics nke Mahadum Nigeria Nsukka (UNN) na mmalite 80s ọbụlagodi na-agụghị akwụkwọ mahadum
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa
Ọ bụ onye nchoputa Damian Anyanwu Research Center inc (DARCI) na United States
N'afọ 1979, o wuru ụlọ ọrụ redio nke mbụ na-arụ ọrụ na Naijiria, nke a maara dị ka Radio Mbaise Fame
A na-esi na granules herbal juru n'ọkụ na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla, waya na ihe ndị a na-emezigharị n'ime obodo mere ihe mgbasa ozi redio ya
N'afọ 1983, onye bụbu onye isi ala Naijiria, Alhaji Shehu Shergari kpọrọ ya onye ji ihe nrite mba chọọ Damien mma, maka nnukwu onyinye o nyere mmadụ
A na-asọpụrụkwa ya na mba ụwa - Onye isi ala US, George W
Bush kpọrọ Damien na Washington DC maka nri abalị onyeisi oche ebe Onye isi ala na ndị ụlọ ọrụ ya na-asọpụrụ ya
Ebe e si nweta ya Amara ya nke ọma maka ịrụ ụlọ ọrụ redio mbụ nke Naijiria - Radio Mbaise Fame na 1979

Ịsọmpi dị ka nke nwaada si Rivas bụ'Miss Rivers', Damiete pụtara dịka onye mbụ na MGBN 2012 nke ngwụcha emere na ezigbo ụlọ oriri na ezumike bụ Western Hotel na Benin City, Edo State na Satọdee abalị ise n'ime ọnwa Mee 2012
Damilola Adegbite (amuru Oluwadamilola Adegbite ; 18 Mee 1985) bu onye omere na Naijiria, onye na-eme ihe nlereanya na omume onyonyo
Ọ gbara Thelema Duke na ihe nkiri usoro Tinsel, na Kemi Williams na ihe nkiri Flower Girl
Ọ meriri onye na-eme nkiri kachasị mma na ihe nkiri TV na 2011 Nigeria Entertainment Awards
Amuru ya na Surulere, Lagos State
Ọ gara Queen's College dị na Yaba, Legọs wee mụọ nchịkwa azụmahịa na Bowen University dị na Iwo, Osun State
Tinsel bụ onye mere mpụta mbụ ya
Ọ pụtakwara na mgbasa ozi TV ma na-akwado mmemme na TV
N'August 2014, Adegbite gbara aka na Chris Attoh, onye omekorita ibe ya o zutere mgbe ha na-eme ihe nkiri Tinsel
Na Septemba 2014, di na nwunye ahụ nabatara nwa ha nwoke Brian
Adegbite na Attoh lụrụ na nzuzo na Accra, Ghana na 14 February, 2015

Damilola Ogunbiyi bụ onye na-akwado ume ike na-adịgide adịgide nke Nigeria
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Sustainable Energy maka mmadụ niile, onye nnọchi anya pụrụ iche nke Secretary General for Sustainable Energy for All, na Co-Chair of UN-Energy
Ogunbiyi bụ onye na-ekwu maka ịnweta ume ọhụrụ, ebumnuche mmepe Sustainable na nsonye ụmụ nwanyị na ndị ntorobịa na ngalaba ike
Odela maka mkpa ọ dị inweta ume maka ọrụ nlekọta ahụike n'oge ọrịa COVID-19 yana ka ohere ike nwere ike isi kwado mgbake akụ na ụba site na ọrịa na mba ndị dị ka Nigeria
Damlanci (Damlawa, Damla) bụ asụsụ Southern Bantoid Jarawan nke Naijiria
Roger Blench kọrọ ya (2019), mana akọghị ya na Ethnologue ma ọ bụ na Glottolog
Ndị na-ekwu okwu karịrị afọ iri ise dị n'obodo Maccido, Alkaleri LGA, nke Bauchi State
Dammam (الدمام Ad Dammām) bu ama ukwu nor na ama Eastern Province ime obodo Saudi Arabia
Damoctocog alfa pegol, nke ana-ere n'okpuru aha Jivi bụ ọgwụ ngwako ọnụ nke eji agwọ hemofilia
Mmetụta ndị ana-ahụkarị na-agụnye isi ọwụwa, ụkwara, agbọ onunu na ahụ ọkụ
A kwadoro Damoctocog alfa pegol (ihe na-emegide ọbara mgbali elu- recombinant pegylated-aucl) maka iji ọgwụ na United States n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2018, na European Union na Nọvemba 2018

Na United States, a na-egosi damoctocog alfa pegol maka iji ya mee ihe na ndị okenye na ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma (afọ iri na abụọ ma ọ bụ karịa) nwere hemophilia A (nchaghị nke Factor VIII) maka (1) Ọgwụgwọ na njikwa nke ọbara ọgbụgba; (2) Nchịkwa oge nke ọbara ọwụwa; (3) Mgbochi usoro iji belata ugboro ole ọbara ọgbụrụ
Na ngalaba irope, ana egosi na ọgwụ damoctocog alfa pegol bu na maka ọgwụgwọ na mgbochi nke ọbara ọgbụgba na ndị a gwọrọ n'oge gara aga na haemophilia A (ihe ọmụmụ nke asatọ)
Damon Anthony Dash (amụrụ na Mee 3, 1971) bụ ónyé ọchụnta ego America na ónyé isi ndekọ
A maara Dash nke ọma dị ka onye guzobere Roc-A-Fella tinyere Jay-Z na Kareem Burke
A mụrụ ya na New York City, Dash na-ekpocha ala nke ụlọ ahịa ịkpụ isi dị n'ógbè ahụ ma na-ere akwụkwọ akụkọ iji zụta sneakers na uwe elu mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
Dash 'amụrụ ịgba ọsọ', n'okwu nke ya, site n'ihe nlereanya nke nne ya, ónyé nwụrụ site na ọrịa ụkwara ume ọkụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
N'otu afọ ahụ, a chọpụtara na Dash nwèrè ụdị ọrịa shuga 1
'Tupu a chọpụta m
Agara m ihe dị ka otu ọnwa ma ọ bụ abụọ naanị na-aga n'ụlọ ịsa ahụ n'akwụsịghị akwụsị ma na-ebelata ibu, 'Dash chetara
'Ọ ka chọpụtara na Magic Johnson nwere ọrịa AIDS, nke mere na ihe m chere na enwere m
Egwu tụrụ m ọbụna ịga dọkịta
Echere m na m ga-anwụ
Dash jere ozi dị ka ónyé njikwa Jay-Z na ónyé mmekọ azụmahịa na Roc-A-Fella Records, na 1999, ọ haziri njem màkà Jay-Z nke mere $ 19 nde
Mmekọrịta ha dị njọ n'ihi ihe abụọ sochirinụ
Nke mbụ bụ mgbe Def Jam Recordings zụrụ Roc-A-Fella Records (nke nwere naanị ọkara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ) na 2004, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị Jay-Z kwetara ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé isi oche Def Jam
Mgbe ahụ, na ngwụcha afọ 2005, Jay-Z zụrụ Dash site na òkè ya na Rocawear

Dash zutere ónyé na-agụ egwu R&B Aaliyah na New York City n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2000 site n'aka onye na-ahụ maka ego ya, wee soro ya ruo mgbè ọ nwụrụ n'August 25, 2001, n'ihe mberede ụgbọelu na Bahamas
Ọ bụ ezie na ha ekweghị nkwa ọlụlụ, n'ajụjụ ọnụ e nyere mgbe ọnwụ Aaliyah gasịrị, Dash kwùrù na di na nwunye ahụ mere atụmatụ ịlụ
N'afọ 2005, Dash lụrụ onye na-emepụta ejiji bụ Rachel Roy, ónyé ya na ya na-akpa tupu ya na Aaliyah nwee mmekọrịta
Ha zutere mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-arụ akwụkwọ na Rocawear
Ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, Ava Dash (amụrụ na Disemba 7, 1999) na Tallulah Dash (amuru na Mee 14, 2008)
Mgbè ịgba alụkwaghịm ha na 2009, ha nwere ọgụ siri ike maka nlekọta
Dash na ónyé ọ na-achọ ịlụ Raquel Horn nwèrè nwa nwoke, Dusko Dash, amụrụ na Nọvemba 14, 2020
Damon Davis (amụrụ n'afọ 1985) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-eti egwu na ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí nke dị na St
Louis, Missouri
A chịkọtara ihe osise ọha na eze ya nke afọ 2014 'All Hands on Deck' na National Museum of African American History and Culture
Ọ bụkwa ónyé guzobere Far-Fetched, otu ndị na-ese ihe na St
Louis, na ónyé nduzi nkè Whose Streets?, ihe ngosi banyéré ọgba aghara Ferguson na-esote ónyé uwe ojii Darren Wilson gbùrù Michael Brown
Ihe nkírí ahụ gosipụtara na Sundance Film Festival na 2017
Nwá nkè onye na-ere ahịa (nné ya) na Black Panther (nnà ya), Davis tolitere na East St
Louis
Ọ gàrà Mahadum St
Louis, na mbụ na-agụ akwụkwọ na nka fine arts mana ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na nkwukọrịta
Davis na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe kemgbe afọ 2010
Davis guzobere duo hiphop Scriptz 'N Screwz na 2011, nke o sonyere na ya site na iji aha egwu LooseScrewz
O mechara guzobe otu ndị na-ese ihe na akara ndekọ Far-Fetched, na 2013 na-ewepụta abọm eklektrip na ónyé na-arụkọ ọrụ Corey Williams (aha ihe nkiri Thelonius Kryptonite)
N'afọ 2016, Davis malitere ịtọpụta egwu n'okpuru aha nke ya, ya na usoro abọm atọ lekwasịrị anya na isiokwu Afrofuturist, gụnyere akụkọ sayensị, ihe omimi Creole na 'ọchịchịrị ọzọ', n'okwu ya

Na Ferguson, Missouri na 2014, mgbè ọ na-echere mkpebi nnukwu ndị ọka ikpe ma ọ ga-ebo ónyé uwe ojii Darren Wilson ebubo màkà ịgba Michael Brown égbè, Davis mepụtara ọrụ nka ọha na eze n'ihu ụlọ ahịa ndị a na-etinye n'ụgbọ mmiri na-atụ anya ọgba aghara
Na-arụ ọrụ na ndị nwe ụlọ ahịa, ọ na-eji usoro ihe ngosi sitere na foto aka ya na 'aka elu' nke Brown na-ekwu na ọ na-eme mgbe Wilson gbàrà ya égbè
Davis kọwara ọrụ ahụ na ebumnuche ịmepụta 'ihe na-adọrọ mmasị, naanị iji nye ndị mmadụ olileanya, ma mee ka ha márá na anyị na ha na-eguzo'
Mic kpọrọ ọrụ ahụ 'ihe osise okporo ámá kachasị ike na America'
N'afọ 2016, Museum of Contemporary Art San Diego gosipụtara foto sitere na ọrụ ahụ na ihe ngosi a na-akpọ 'Damon Davis All Hands on Deck'
Ogwe windo mbụ sitere na ntinye Ferguson bụ akụkụ nkè nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide na National Museum of African American History and Culture
N'afọ 2016, a kpọrọ ya otu n'ime ndị Filmmaker Magazine's Twenty Five New Faces of Independent Film na Independent Magazine's 10 Filmmakers to Watch

William Kalubi Mwamba (amụrụ na 10 Mee na afo 1992 n' Kinshasa), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Damso (French ), bụ onye na-eti egwu, onye na-agụ egwu, na onye na-ede egwu na Belgium-Congo
Ọ bụ onye a ma ama na obodo France, ebe a kwadoro egwu ya niile ma ọ dịkarịa ala platinum
A mụrụ Kalubi na Kinshasa, Zaire (nke bụ Democratic Republic of the Congo ugbu a)
Mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu, ya na ezinụlọ ya hapụrụ mba ahụ n'ihi agha ọbara ma kwaga Belgium
Ha mechara biri na Matonge, mpaghara Congolese dị na Ixelles, Brussels
Nne William bụ Rose Marthe
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ndị mụrụ Damso gbara ya ume ka ọ gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya, ọ gbakwara nzere na ahịa na nkà mmụta uche
Otú ọ dị, ọ malitere iwepụta oge dị ukwuu na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ, akara ya dakwara
Nke a dugara na esemokwu ya na ndị mụrụ ya, ọkachasị nna ya, onye bụ dọkịta na Kinshasa
'A chụpụrụ m n'ụlọ!' ka Damso kọwara
Nke a ghọrọ oge ọgụ dị mkpa maka onye na-ese ihe, nke mere ka ọ biri na squats dị iche iche nke obodo ahụ ma mee ka Damso ghara ịzụ ahịa ma ọ bụ ree ngwongwo ya maka ego
Onye na-ese ihe na-ekwu, sị 'M mere ahịa na nkà mmụta uche, mana ịkpa ókè agbụrụ metụtara nhọrọ ndụ m
Enwetụbeghị m mmetụta na a nabatara m n'ihi nke ahụ
Agbalịrị m ịchọta ọrụ, enwere m ajụjụ ọnụ, mana ọ rụtụghị ọrụ
Ikekwe ọ bụ n'ihi ịdị elu m, ana m atụ egwu, amaghị m
Ọ bụkwa ihe kpaliri m ime ihe iwu na-akwadoghị; anaghị m agbalị ịbụ onye aghụghọ, naanị ego dị m mkpa
Ihe a niile na-eme ka iwe were gị, mana ọ na-emekwa ka ị chọọ ime nhọrọ nke gị
Ịrụ ọrụ n'azụ tebụl na onye isi nke na-akpọ gị 'onye ojii na-adịghị ọcha' abụtụbeghị mmasị m
Achọghị m ịnata ọgwụgwọ dị otú ahụ, naanị n'ihi na m ga-akwụ ụgwọ m na ngwụcha ọnwa
Ọ kpaliri m'
Damso malitere ọrụ egwu ya na AFỌ 2006 site n'ịrụ ọrụ na ihe omume obodo na nke dị n'okpuru ala
Na mbido ọrụ rap ya, ya na enyi ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata Dolfa guzobere otu egwu rap OPG
Ha mechara nata Ducke, Lio Brown, na Rex
O weputara oru ngo nke mbụ ya Salle d'attente n'ịntanetị dị ka nbudata n'efu na 2014
N'ịrụkọ ọrụ na otu egwu ya bụ OPG, na nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye bụ Mehdi Rais kpaliri ya nke ukwuu, ọ wepụtara mixtape ya MMMXIII na 24 Septemba 2014
Damso mere aha ya na 2015 n'ihi egwu ya 'Poseidon', nke pụtara na Booba's OKLM mixtape
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, ọ sonyeere Booba's 92i collective ma bịanye aka na Universal Music
Ọ pụtara na album Booba bụ Nero Nemesis na egwu 'Pinocchio', ya na Booba na onye na-eti egwu Gato Da Bato
Ndị mmadụ na ndị mgbasa ozi hụrụ amaokwu Damso, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama ma na-emewanye ndị na-ege ya ntị
Na France, abọm niile nke Damso enwetala asambodo platinum kacha nta
Na Julaị 8, na AFỌ 2016, a tọhapụrụ abọm studio mbụ ya, nke akpọrọ Batterie Faible, na akara Booba 92i Records
Ọrụ ahụ, nke Krisy gwakọtara ma dekọọ kpamkpam, enwetala platinum na France na-ere ihe karịrị 100,000
E wepụtara abọm nke abụọ ya bụ Ipséité na Eprel 28, na AFỌ 2017, ma bụrụ platinum atọ n'ihe na-erughị ọnwa isii
Abọm ahụ bụ diamond ugbu a na ihe karịrị 900,000 ngụkọta ahịa abọm na France
N'afọ 2018, abọm nke atọ nke Damso bụ Lithopedion nwetara platinum n'ime otu izu mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya ma ugbu a, a kwadoro platinum atọ
O meriri ihe nrite kachasị mma nke onye egwu
N'afọ 2020, o wepụtara abọm QALF
Nke a bụ ugbu a akara platinum atọ
Ndị otu bọọlụ mba na-enyekarị ndị egwu ọrụ ịmepụta egwu maka nnukwu asọmpi dị ka ụzọ isi wulite mmụọ na igosipụta njirimara mba
N'afọ 2018, Belgian Football Association kwupụtara na ọ ga-ewe Damso n'ọrụ iji kwadebe ukwe maka isonye na FIFA World Cup nke afọ ahụ
Otú ọ dị, Belgian FA nwetara nkatọ siri ike site n'aka ọha na eze na ndị na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị n'ihi ihe na-asọ ụmụ nwanyị na ihe na-emetụta ụmụ nwanyị n'egwú Damso
N'ọnwa Machị afọ 2018, ọ kwupụtara na ya na Damso kwụsịrị mmekọrịta ha na ya, dịka nkwupụta si kwuo
Njikọ ahụ gara n'ihu na-ekwu, sị, anyị chọrọ ịrịọ mgbaghara nye ndị niile na-ewe iwe, ịkpa ókè megide ma ọ bụ belata site na nhọrọ nke onye na-ese ihe a na-ekwu okwu ya

A na-ejikarị ama egwuregwu nke a maka egwuregwu bọọlụ mkpakọrịta
Ama egwuregwu ahụ bụ kwa ụlọ egwuregwu maka ndị Heartland FC
Ama egwuregwu a nwere ike ịbata mmadụ puku iri

Dana Air bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu Naijiria nke nwere isi na Ikeja ma dabere na ọdụ ụgbọ elu mba ụwa Murtala Muhammed nke Lagos
Na Mee 2021, Dana Air jikọtara ya na Ibom Air iji malite nkwekọrịta codeshare nke mbụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu Naịjirịa
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2022, ndị ọchịchị Naijiria kwụsịtụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ ma ikikere ya ma asambodo ya mgbe e weere ya na ego na-erughị eru iji nọgide na-arụ ọrụ
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Febụwarị, na afọ 2021, Dana Air na-eje ozi n'ebe ndị a
Ka ọ na-erule Julaị, na afọ 2022, tupu nkwụsị ọrụ, ụgbọ elu Dana Air nwere ụgbọ elu ndị a

Dana Petroleum plc bụ ụlọ ọrụ nyocha na mmepụta mmanụ na gas nke dị na obodo Aberdeen, di na Scotland
Ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya na North Sea, Afrika ya na Middle East
Ọ bụ onye enyemaka nke Korea National Oil Corporation ma bụrụkwa onye bụbu onye otu FTSE 250 Index
Tom Cross guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na afo1994 iji mebie ohere mmanụ North Sea
N'afọ 2007, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwetara Ener Petroleum maka nde £24 yana ọrụ mmanụ na gas nke Devon Energy Corporation na Egypt maka US nde $375

Na June 2010, Dana Petroleum kwetara inweta Petro Canada Netherlands site na Suncor Energy maka ihe dịja nde $393, mgbe e mesịrị na onwa Septemba n’afo 2010 ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwupụtara nnweta ọzọ nde $372 nke ụfọdụ akụ Petro Canada ya na UK
Asụsụ Dana, nke e zoro aka na ya na akwụkwọ ochie dị ka Buldit, bụ asụsụ Koman nke South Sudan a ghọtara na nso nso a
Ọ dị nso na asụsụ Opuuo na mpaghara ala mana ha na ya aghọtachaghị ya
Danai Jekesai Gurira (/dəˈnaɪ ɡʊˈrɪərə/; a mụrụ na Febụwarị 14, 1978) bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ede egwuregwu

A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka Michonne na usoro ihe nkiri egwu AMC The Walking Dead (2012X2020) na dịka Okoye na ihe nkiri Marvel Cinematic Universe superhero Black Panther (2018), Avengers Infinity War (2018), na Avengers Endgame (2019)
Gurira bụkwa onye na-ede egwuregwu nke egwuregwu Broadway Eclipsed, nke a họpụtara ya maka Tony Award maka Best Play
A họpụtakwara Gurira maka ihe nrite Pulitzer maka ihe nkiri maka egwuregwu ya In The Continuum, nke o sokwa dee ma mee ihe nkiri

A mụrụ Gurira na Grinnell, Iowa, nye Josephine Gurira, onye na-elekọta ọbá akwụkwọ kọleji, na Roger Gurira, prọfesọ na Ngalaba Chemistry na Grinnel College (ndị nne na nna abụọ mechara sonye na ndị ọrụ nke Mahadum WisconsinńPlatteville)
Nne na nna ya si Southern Rhodesia, nke bụ Zimbabwe ugbu a, kwaga United States n'afọ 1964
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụnne anọ; Shingai na Choni bụ ụmụnne ya nwanyị na Tare, nwanne ya nwoke, bụ onye chiropractor
Gurira biri na Grinnell ruo n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1983, mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, ya na ezinụlọ ya laghachiri Harare, isi obodo Zimbabwe, mgbe Robert Mugabe malitere ịchị n'afọ 1979
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Dominican Convent High School
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ laghachiri na United States iji mụọ na Macalester College na Saint Paul, Minnesota, na-agụsị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Arts na psychology
Gurira nwetakwara Master of Fine Arts na ime ihe nkiri na Mahadum New York's Tisch School of the Arts
Gurira kụziri edemede egwuregwu na ime ihe nkiri na Liberia, Zimbabwe na South Africa
Otu n'ime ihe ngosi mbụ ya a ma ama mere n'afọ 2001, dịka onye okenye na Macalester College

Gurira rụrụ ọrụ na mmepụta nke ihe nkiri Ntozake Shange bụ maka ụmụ agbọghọ na-acha ọbara ọbara bụ ndị tụlere igbu onwe ha / Mgbe ụyọkọ na-acha odo odo, nke Dale Ricardo Shields duziri ma mee ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ nwa agbọghọ nwere ọgụgụ isi, siri ike ma nweere onwe ya, ka Shields kwuru
Ọ bịarutere ọmụmụ ya, klas ya, na ọtụtụ ihe, ị nwere ike ịhụ otu ihe ahụ na arụmọrụ ya na Black Panther Ọdịdị
Gurira kwuru na ọ malitere ide ihe nkiri na mgbalị iji jiri ike ya mee ihe nke ọma dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na ịkọ akụkọ ndị na-enye echiche banyere ụmụ nwanyị siri ike ọ na-ejikọta
Dịka onye na-ede egwuregwu, Yale Repertory Theatre, Center Theatre Group, Playwrights Horizons, na Royal Court enyewo ya ọrụ

Gurira so dee ma soro mee ihe nkiri na In the Continuum, nke mbụ na Woolly Mammoth Theatre Company ma mesịa Off-Broadway, nke meriri ya Obie Award, Outer Critics Circle Award, na Helen Hayes Award maka Best Lead Actress
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2011, In the Continuum mere ememe ncheta Ụbọchị Ọrịa AIDS Ụwa 2011
N'ịbụ nke United States Embassy na Zimbabwe kwadoro, emere egwuregwu ahụ na Harare's Theatre ma gosipụta akụkọ ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na-agagharị n'ụwa mgbe ha butere nje HIV
N'afọ 2009, Gurira mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Broadway na egwuregwu August Wilson Joe Turner's Come and Gone na-egwu Martha Pentecost
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, Gurira natara Whiting Award maka onye edemede egwuregwu na-apụta
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2015, Familiar, egwuregwu nke Gurira dere ma bụrụ nke Rebecca Taichman duziri, meghere na Yale Repertory Theatre
O mechara gosipụta na Off-Broadway na New York na Playwrights Horizons
Gurira pụtara na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri The Visitor n'afọ 2007, nke o ritere ihe nrite Method Fest Independent Film Festival Award maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma

Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Ghost Town nke afọ 2008, ihe nkiri 3 Backyards na My Soul to Take nke afọ 2010, na Restless City n'afọ 2011, yana usoro telivishọn Law & Order Criminal Intent, Life on Mars, na Law & Order
Site n'afọ 2010 ruo 2011, ọ pụtara na usoro ihe nkiri HBO Treme
N'afọ 2008, Gurira pụtara na Global Green Sustainable Design Awards iji gụọ akwụkwọ ozi nke nwa amaala New Orleans nke ajọ ifufe Katrina chụpụrụ
N'afọ 2011, Gurira jikọtara aka guzobe Almasi Arts, otu a raara nye ịga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ nka na Zimbabwe
Gurira na-eje ozi ugbu a dịka onye isi nka
Gurira bụ Onye Kraịst ma biri na Los Angeles, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-anọkarị na New York City
Ọ na-akọwa onwe ya dịka onye Zimbabwe-American
Ọ na-asụ asụsụ anọ French, Shona, isi Xhosa, na Bekee ma na-anọgide na-enwe ahụike site na Pilates na ọzụzụ cross
DanceAfrica bụ ihe nketa na emume obodo nke a na-eme kwa afọ na ụdị ịgba egwú dị iche iche nke African Diaspora
A gụnyere ime ụlọ na ime ụlọ gụnyere egwu dị ndụ, usoro ihe nkiri, master classes, mmemme agụmakwụkwọ, na ahịa n'èzí
Onye nduzi nka ya ugbu a bụ Abdel R
Salaam
Mgbanwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 1960s na uto nke ịgba egwú na 1970s dugara na mmepe nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ịgba egwú ndị Africa America
Ememe DanceAfrica, nke Chuck Davis mepụtara, wuru na ume nke 1960s na 70s site na ngosipụta nke ọdịnala na ụdị nka nke Africa na Africa America

N'afọ 1940 na 1950, a matara ọdịbendị ndị Africa America, nke Pearl Primus na Katherine Dunham mere na BAM, a gbanwere ịgba egwú site na ntụrụndụ gaa na ịgba egwú nke oge a ka ha na-ejikọta ihe ndị Afrịka
N'afọ 1960, Alvin Ailey, Talley Beatty, na Donald McKayle pụtara na BAM
Ndị omenkà a nọ na Harlem Cultural Center na New Dance Group mgbe Chuck Davis rutere na mbido afọ 1960
Davis kwagara New York City iji soro onye egwu Babatunde Olatunji rụọ ọrụ; ọ mụkwara usoro Dunham na jazz na Syvilla Fort
N'afọ 1967, Davis guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Chuck Davis Dance Company na South Bronx Community Action Theatre, mgbe e mesịrị ọ kwagara na Bronx Community College
N'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1977, ụlọ ọrụ Chuck Davis Dance Company rụrụ ọrụ n'obodo nta e wuru n'Afrịka na BAM Lepercq Space
Dabere na ihe ịga nke ọma nke nkwa ahụ, DanceAfrica malitere n'oge opupu ihe ubi na-esote malite na ahịa Afrịka nke ga-ewe otu ụbọchị

Arthur Hall, Charles Moore, Chuck Davis, Dinizulu, na International Afrikan American Ballet sonyere na emume ahụ, nke nyere ihe ngosi ise na BAM Playhouse ma mechie na ụlọ ọrụ ise niile - ihe dịka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri 70 - na Opera House

A mụrụ emume, na-etolite n'ime emume kachasị ukwuu kwa afọ nke ịgba egwu ndị Africa na ndị Africa America na, na-agbakwunye ụbọchị na obodo ndị ọzọ dị ka Chicago; Washington, DC; Los Angeles; Miami; Minneapolis; Philadelphia; Pittsburgh; na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Dallas mere emume ahụ ihe omume kwa afọ
DanceAfrica bụ usoro arụmọrụ kachasị ogologo nke BAM - ma ghọọ omenala ngwụsị izu nke Memorial Day na Brooklyn
Agbamakwụkwọ, baptism, na ememe ndị ọzọ emeela n'oge DanceAfrica - na-agafe arụmọrụ ma na-aghọ ememe - ememe obodo nke njirimara Afrịka
Rennie Harris bụkwa otu onye na-eme ihe nkiri
N'afọ ndị 1980 Chuck Davis gbakwunyere master classes na African movement na egwu
DanceAfrica 1993 meghere site na ngagharị ụgbọala site na Harlem ruo na steepụ nke BAM

Ndị otu iri ise na abụọ nke Imperial Bikers Motorcycle Club, onye ọ bụla na-ebu ọkọlọtọ nke mba Afrịka, sonyeere Council of Elders, ndị na-ese ihe, na ndị isi maka emume ịwụsa mmanya nke gụnyere nnukwu achịcha carrot nke e mere n'ụdị Afrịka

Ememe ncheta afọ iri abụọ na 1997 malitere BAM / Restoration DanceAfrica Ensemble, mmekorita n'etiti BAM na Bedford Stuyvesant Restoration Corporation's Youth Arts Academy nke ghọrọ ọkacha mmasị ndị mmadụ kwa afọ
DanceAfrica egosila ndị otu dị na Africa na African Diaspora gụnyere ọtụtụ ndị si New York
Ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche na-adị site na ụmụ amaala Africa ruo na hip-hop nke obodo ukwu America
DanceAfrica egosila na egwú 'ọdịnala' nke Africa anaghị edozi n'oge ma na-anọgide na-agụnye ma dịgasị iche iche, nakwa na ọbụna ihe nkiri kachasị mma nwere ike ịnwe mmetụta Africa

DanceAfrica na-egosipụta ọdịnala, kamakwa mmụọ nke mgbanwe na uto na-alaghachi n'oge gara aga na n'ihu n'ọdịnihu, na-anabata njikọ dị n'etiti ọdịbendị gafee African Diaspora, na-ebu ozi mgbe niile, 'Udo, ịhụnanya, na nkwanye ùgwù maka onye ọ bụla!'

N'afọ 2007, DanceAfrica mere emume nke iri atọ ya na afọ iri atọ nke DanceAfrica Cheta! Nsọpụrụ! Nkwanye ùgwù! Egwú Egwú nke Afrịka, ma na-egosi ihe ọzọ dị ịrịba ama - onye guzobere ya Baba Chuck Davis' ụbọchị ọmụmụ afọ 70
Kemgbe 1987, kwa afọ na June, Chuck Davis na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi emume nke emume ahụ na Washington, DC, nke Dance Place kwadoro
DanceAfrica, DC bụ emume obi ụtọ kwa afọ nke ọdịbendị nke Africa na diaspora ya na isi obodo mba ahụ
N'ịbụ nke emume Brooklyn Academy of Music kpaliri na n'okpuru nduzi nke Dr
Baba Chuck Davis, Dance Place butere usoro na omenala pụrụ iche nke ya maka emume a dị mkpa ma dị egwu na 1987
Taa, onye nduzi nke African Dance Program Sylvia Soumah na-eje ozi dị ka onye nduzi nka na Griot kemgbe ọnwụ nke onye anyị hụrụ n'anya Baba Chuck Davis na 2017
DanceAfrica, DC bụ otu n'ime ndị na-agba ọsọ kachasị ogologo nke ihe omume mba a, na-eme emume ihe karịrị afọ 30 nke agụmakwụkwọ, nka na nkwado maka ọdịbendị Afrịka na isi obodo anyị
DanceAfrica Chicago malitere na 1990 ma bụrụ nke Columbia College Chicago gosipụtara
Emume ahụ emeghị n'etiti afọ 2006-2007
Ịgba egwu na Zimbabwe bụ ihe dị mkpa nke omenala, ọnọdụ ime mmụọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Zimbabwe
E nwere ọtụtụ ịgba egwú ndị na-egosipụta omenala ndị mmadụ, n’agbanyeghị na igba egwú ahụ nwere ike gbanwee kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
Ịdịiche agbụrụ bụkwa isi ihe na-emetụta egwu omenala Zimbabwe
Egwu ndị a na-egosipụta bu maka obodo niile n'ihi na abu na egwu niile bụ mmemme ọha
Ịgba egwu ndị Zimbabwe bụ ihe ime mmụọ, dị ike nke na-aga n'ihu n'ọdịnala, na-akọkwa ihe omume dị mkpa nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na omenala ha
Republic of Zimbabwe nwere onu ogugu ndi mmadu nke di ihe dika nde mmadu iri na isii; Ihe ka n'ọnụ ọgụgụ, ihe dị ka 76%, bi n'ime ime obodo
Nke a bụ nkọwa dị oke mkpa n'ihi ọtụtụ ihe ọkụkụ Zimbabwe na-emepụta kọfị, ọka, ọka wit, shuga, tii, na owu
Akụkụ a nke ọrụ ugbo na-apụta ìhè n'ọtụtụ egwu ndị ha na-eme Asụsụ obodo a na-asụ bụ Bekee, n'agbanyeghị na a na-ekpekwa okpukpe Alakụba, Hindu, Bahá'í na okpukperechi
E nwere opekata mpe agbụrụ iri abụọ na Zimbabwe, ihe ka ọtụtụ bụ Shona (ihe dị ka nde mmadụ ise), Ndebele (ihe dị ka nde mmadụ abụọ)
na ndị ọzọ bụ Ndau, Venda, Tonga kwuru naanị ole na ole
Enwere ụfọdụ nkewa n'etiti otu ndị a n'ihi agha dị n'etiti ndị Shona na Ndebele na narị afọ gara aga
Otu ọ bụla nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ya, obodo nta, na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ma ha nwekwara ọtụtụ nkwenkwe okpukpe na omenala
Akụkụ ọ bụla nke omenala ha na-emetụta egwu ha na-agba
Ngwa atọ pụrụ iche nke Zimbabwe gụnyere ịgbà (ngomas), mbira, (hosho) na marimba
Nha dị iche iche, ụdị dị iche iche, mkpụchi nke akpụkpọ ahụ, na ihe ndị a na-eji eme ụda na-emepụta ụda na ụda dị iche iche, dịka osisi dị iche iche nke marimba na-emepụta ụda dị iche iche
Mbira bụ ma eleghị anya ngwá egwu kacha mkpa
A na-eji mkpịsị aka na-adọpụ ya iji mepụta abụ ahụ, ndị na-ajụ ndị mmụọ na-ejikarị eme ihe n’ememe okpukpe iji soro ndị mmụọ nna kparịta ụka
Mbira, na n'ihi ya, ịgba egwu mbira, adịla kemgbe ogologo oge, dịka ihe omimi nke ihe ochie siri kwuo
Mbiris ka ekpughere ma dee ya na narị afọ nke iri na abụọ
Egwu ọdịnala na Zimbabwe na-agbanwe mgbe niile
Egwu ọdịnala ga-adabarịrị n'oge na-agbanwe agbanwe na-edobeghi oke n'ọdịdị ọdịda anyanwụ ka omenala ọdịnala wee dịgide
Ndị Zimbabwe na-akwado mgbanwe, mana ha chọrọ ime ya n'ime onwe ha, ọ bụghị mgbanwe site na mmetụta omenala ndị ọzọ
Egwu ọdịnala ga-anabatarịrị mgbanwe ka ha wee nọgide na-ọdịnala, ma gaa n'ihu na-anagide ule nke oge
Ebumnuche ọdịnala maka ọtụtụ ịgba egwu agbanweela, ihe kpatara ịgba egwu na-agbanwe, n'agbanyeghị ihe egwu egwu pụtara na mkpa ya na-adịgide
N'otu oge, ndị Zimbabwe na-agba egwu maka ndị dị mkpa, dịka ọmụmaatụ, n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu na mbata nke ndị ọrụ gọọmentị
N'ọdịnala, egwu Zimbabwe anaghị akwado maka egwuregwu egwu
Ịgba egwu, dị ka ememe nke inwe mmụọ, nwere ike ịdịru awa iri na abụọ, ma ọ bụ ọbụna ụbọchị n'ogologo
Oge bụ akụkụ dị oke mkpa nke egwu egwu ndị a n'ihi na onye na-agba egwu ga-enwerịrị oge ịbanye na ụwa mmụọ nke ihe onwunwe, ma banye ọzọ n'ụwa ihe onwunwe
Ahụmahụ ime mmụọ a siri ike ịme n'ọgbọ egwu na-enwe obere oge, a na-emekarị ya, ma ọ bụ nkenke n'ụdị ntọala egwu
A na-akacha mma ịme egwu ndị a n'ụdị okike
Na egwu ọdịnala ọhụrụ, n'aka nke ọzọ, ọnọdụ egwu egwu agbanweela, a na-ewerekwa ya dị ka 'omenala-dị ka'
Egwu a nwere ike ibu otu mkpa ahụ, ma nwee otu mmegharị ahụ, mana ebe ọ bụ na ihe gbara ya gburugburu agbanweela, a naghị ele egwu egwu ahụ anya dị ka omenala
Egwu egwu ọdịnala ndị a bụ ọmarịcha ndị na-edebe akụkọ ihe mere eme, na ndị na-ede akụkọ oge na-agbanwe maka nke a
Ka egwu egwu na-agbanwe iji gosipụta mgbanwe omenala dị ka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ihu igwe, ime obodo, na mmetụta ndị dị n'èzí, ha na-egosi usoro iheomume nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na omenala
Egwu Mbira bụ ihe e ji ama ama, egwu ọdịnala, nke eji ngwa mbira na-agba ya
E mere ya maka oge ụfọdụ, na-abụkarị okpukpe, a na-ejikwa ya akọwa ndị mmadụ
A na-ejikarị egwu Mbira na-arata ndị mmụọ ka ha si na ndị na-emeputa ndị mmụọ pụta ha na ndị mmadụ na-ekwurịta okwu
A na-agba egwu a site n'aka ndị okenye nke ebo, ma dị ike na omenala ime mmụọ ya
Egwu Dinhe bụ egwu okpukpe a na-emekwa iji rata ndị mmụọ ịgwa ndị mmadụ okwu
A na-eji ọtụtụ mmegharị agha na mmegharị ọṅụ na-agba egwu a
Egwu a na-egosipụtakwa akụkụ ọrụ ugbo nke ndụ, a pụkwara iji ihe ndị dị otú ahụ na-egosipụta isiokwu ndị a
Egwu Dinhe na-eji egwu dị iche iche soro agba egwu ahụ, ọnọdụ egwu ahụ na-egosikwa mmụọ ndị na-achọ ka a na-agbakọta egwu
Ndị otu Midlands na-eme egwu Mhande na omenala dị oke mkpa maka ịgba egwu ahụ
Egwu Mbakumba bụ uda egwu di ụdị nke a na-eme n'oge owuwe ihe ubi nke a na-ejikwa taa maka ntụrụndụ
Egwu Jerusarema na egwu Muchongoyo bụ egwu abụọ kacha mkpa, egwu dị iche iche na Zimbabwe, a na-ejikwa ụgba soro ha abụọ
Egwu abụọ ndị a bụ omenala ndi Zimbabwe, ndị mmadụ nwere ike ịmata ya ozugbo na mmegharị ole na ole mbụ nke ịgba egwu ahụ
Egwu Jerusarema na-anọchi anya omenala Shona na ọ bụ uda egwu nwere mmegharị okirikiri, na nwughari na ikwugharị na-mkpa nke ukwuu
Egwu Jerusarema bụ egwu ọdịnala nke a na-eme n'ememme, emume olili ozu, asọmpi ntụrụndụ, ma bụrụkwa nke a na-eme dịka egwu agha
Olili ozu nwere nzube dị ịrịba ama maka ịgba egwú ahụ n'ihi na a na-eji agba egwú ahụ eme ka ndị nwụrụ anwụ pụta na n'ime ụwa mmụọ nke ndị nna ochie bụ́ ebe a pụrụ ịkpọ ha n'ememe n'ọdịnihu

A na-eji uwe ọdịnala, nke gụnyere uwe mwụda ahịhịa kpọrọ nkụ na igbe akwụghị ọtọ, mgbe a na-eme egwu Jerusarema, a na-eyikwa agba ojii ma ọ bụ ojii na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na nke ọcha, nke bụ agba ọdịnala nke ndị Shona
Edebere egwu Mbende Jerusarema na Ndepụta Nnọchiteanya nke Ihe Nketa Ọdịnala nke Mmadụ na 2008
Na mgbakwunye, ndị ozi ala ọzọ nke Ndị Kraịst machiri Mbende/Jerusarema n'oge ọchịchị n'ihi mkpasu iwe nke mmegharị ahụ na-egosi ụdị egwu a
Egwu Muchongoyo na-anọchite anya omenala Ndebele ma bụrụ nke a na-eme na nkwadebe maka agha na mgbe agha gasịrị, karịsịa mgbe Ndebele meriri
A na-ejikwa Muchongoyo dị ka ọzụzụ ọzụzụ ndị agha, a na-ejikwa osisi na ọta agba ya
Egwu Muchongoyo bụkwa egwu ọha na nke ntụrụndụ, ọ nweghịkwa akụkụ okpukperechi; kama ọ na-egosipụta ihe omume nke ọha mmadụ
Ntugharị mbinye aka bụ stampụ, na mmegharị ahụ dị egwu yana mmewere mimetic dị mkpa
Uwe ahụ bụ neo-omenala, na-anabata oge na-agbanwe agbanwe, ma ka na-eyi uwe omenala

Laud Anoo Konadu (amụrụ na Mee 25, 1992), nke a maara dị ka Dancegod Lloyd, bụ onye na-agba egwú, onye nkuzi ịgba egwú, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Ghana
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ ịgba egwú, DWP academy
N'afọ 2020, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na vidiyo egwu 'Already' nke Beyonce, nke gosipụtara Shatta Wale

A mụrụ ya na Maazị Theophilus Konadu, nna ya na Oriakụ
Agnes Konadu, nne ya

N'afọ 2017, Dancegod na onye njikwa ya, Quables, na onye na-agba egwu, Afro Beast, malitere otu ọrụ ebere a na-akpọ 'Dance With Purpose Academy', nke ebumnuche ya bụ inyere ndị na-eto eto, ndị na-agba egwú nwere nkà aka n'okporo ámá
Dance with Purpose Academy nwere ndị na-agba egwú dị ka Endurance Grand, Richael, Real Cesh, Energetic Tymlez, Demzy Baye, Lisa Quam na Afronitaaa
Ndị a bụ ndị na-agba egwú a ma ama, n'ime ihe karịrị ma ọ bụ ihe na-erughị ndị na- ịgba egwú 200 debanyere aha na Dwp Academy; enwere ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ n'ebe ahụ
Shoo - bụ abụ nke Kwamz na Flava mana a na-ekwu na Dancegod Lloyd mepụtara usoro ịgba egwú

Dancing Pallbearers, nke a makwaara site na aha dịgasị iche iche, gụnyere Dancing Coffin, Coffin Dancers, Coffin Dance Meme, ma ọ bụ naanị Coffin Dance, bụ otu ndị Ghana na-ebu ozu ndị bi n'obodo Prampram dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri na mpaghara Greater Accra nke ndịda Ghana, ọ bụ ezie na ha na-eme n'ofe mba ahụ nakwa n'èzí Ghana
Onye guzobere na onye ndú nke otu ahụ bụ Benjamin Aidoo

Brian Joseph Burton (amụrụ n'ọnwa Julaị ubochi irí abụọ na itoolu, n'afọ 1977), nke a maara dịka Danger Mouse, bụ onye America na-eti egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
Ọ bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama n'afọ 2004 ógè ọ wepụtara The Grey Album, nke jikọtara egwu olu sitere na Jay-Z's The Black Album na ngwá ọrụ sitere na Beatles' The Beatles (aka White Album)
Esquire Magazine kpọrọ ya otu n'ime mmadụ iri asaa na ise kachasị nwee mmetụta na narị afọ nke iri abụọ na otu
O guzobere Gnarls Barkley na CeeLo Green ma weputa abọm ya St
Elsewhere na The Odd Couple
N'afọ 2009, ya na James Mercer nke indie rock band The Shins rụkọrọ ọrụ iji mepụtakwa otu Broken Bells
Na mgbakwunye, Burton na onye egwu MF Doom rụkọrọ ọrụ dị ka Danger Doom wee wepụta abọm The Mouse and the Mask
A mụrụ Brian Joseph Burton na White Plains, New York
Ọ nọrọ ụfọdụ oge nwata ya na Spring Valley, New York
Burton kwagara Stone Mountain, Georgia, nke dị na Atlanta
Ọ gara ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Redan High School na Stone Mountain, GA

O biri na Athens, Georgia, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na nkwukọrịta na Mahadum Georgia na agụmakwụkwọ, na ebe njem hop ya na-arụ ọrụ (The Chilling Effect (afọ 1999), Rhode Island (afọ 2000), na Pelican City / Scanner - Pelican City vs
A tọhapụrụ Scanner (afọ 2002) ógè ọ ka bụ nwa akwụkwọ

Mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum Georgia, e mere ka ọ mata Nirvana, Pink Floyd, na Portishead, wee mara ihe nkiri indie rock na Athens, ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe n'obodo, gụnyere Neutral Milk Hotel, na DJ'd maka ụlọ ọrụ redio Mahadum Georgia WUOG-FM
Site na 1998 ruo 2003, Burton mekwara usoro CD remix na ndekọ n'okpuru aha ogbo Danger Mouse
O ji uwe òké mee ihe nkiri n'ihi na ọ na-eme ihere nke na ọ gaghị egosi ihu ya, ma were aha ya site na usoro ihe osise ndị Britain bụ Danger Mouse
Ógè ọ nọ n'Atens, Burton nọ n'ọkwa nke abụọ n'asọmpi talent nke afọ 1998 ma a gwara ya ka ọ mepee n'ihe banyere egwu na Mahadum Georgia nke gosipụtara OutKast na Goodie Mob
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Burton na-ekwu na ọ gakwuuru CeeLo Green, onye otu Goodie Mob, ma nye ya teepu ngosi egwu
Cee Lo echetaghị nke a ma enwetụbeghị nkwenye na teepu ngosi egwu
Trey Reames onye kwalitere ihe ngosi izizi nke Cee Lo na Georgia, kwagara London wee bụrụ onye njikwa mbụ nke Burton
Ọ tụrụ aro ma kwurịta maka mpụta Cee Lo na 26 'Remix nke Danger Mouse na ndekọ Jemini
Mgbe Burton zutere Cee Lo maka ọrụ a, o kesara ụfọdụ egwu nke mere ka ha na-arụkọ ọrụ dị ka Gnarls Barkley

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2007, Danger Mouse mepụtara mmekorita ọzọ ya na Damon Albarn na The Good, the Bad & the Queen, ya na onye na-egwu egwu Clash Paul Simonon, onye bụbu onye na-egwu egwu Verve bụ Simon Tong na onye ọsụ ụzọ Afrobeat na onye na-agba egwu Africa iri asaa bụ Tony Allen
N'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2008, ewepụtara The Odd Couple, abọm nke abụọ nke ọrụ Gnarls Barkley ya na CeeLo Green
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2008, ewepụtara abọm ya na Martina Topley-Bird, nke akpọrọ The Blue God
Martina jikọrọ aka na 'All Alone', otu egwu na Danger Mouse mepụtara Gorillaz LP nke abụọ, Demon Days

A tọhapụrụ ya na Mee 2008 bụ Replica Sun Machine, abọm ya na ndị otu The Shortwave Set, gụnyere mmekorita ya na Van Dyke Parks na Velvet Underground's John Cale, dị ka magazin egwu Britain New Musical Express si kwuo
Na Machị 2019, ya na Karen O rụkọrọ ọrụ iji mepụta abọm Lux Prima
Ndị nkatọ enwetala nyocha dị mma nke abọm ahụ
Mbinye
Ngwongwo dị ize ndụ, nke a na-akpọ DG, bụ ihe ndị mgbe a na-ebugharị ha bụ ihe ize ndụ nye ahụike, nchekwa, ihe onwunwe ma ọ bụ gburugburu ebe obibi
A maara ụfọdụ ngwongwo dị ize ndụ nke na-eweta ihe ize ndụ ọbụna mgbe a na-ebughari ha dị ka ihe ndị dị ize ndụ (nke a na-akpọ HAZMAT ma ọ bụ hazmat)
Ihe ndị dị ize ndụ na-abụkarị n'okpuru iwu kemịkal

Ndị otu Hazmat bụ ndị ọrụ a zụrụ azụ n'ụzọ pụrụ iche iji jide ngwongwo dị ize ndụ, nke gụnyere ihe ndị na-egbuke egbuke, na-ere ọkụ, na-agbawa agbawa, na-emebi emebi, oxidizing, asphyxiating, biohazardous, toxic, pathogenic, ma ọ bụ allergenic

A gụnyekwara ọnọdụ anụ ahụ dị ka gas na mmiri ma ọ bụ ihe ndị na-ekpo ọkụ, gụnyere ngwongwo niile nwere ihe ndị dị otú ahụ ma ọ bụ kemịkal, ma ọ bụ nwere ike inwe njirimara ndị ọzọ na-eme ka ha dị ize ndụ n'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ
A na-egosipụtakarị ngwongwo dị ize ndụ site na akara ngosi dayamọnd na ihe ahụ (lee NFPA 704), akpa ya, ma ọ bụ ụlọ ebe echekwara ya

Agba nke dayamọnd ọ bụla na-egosi ihe ize ndụ ya, dịka ọmụmaatụ, a na-egosi ọkụ na-acha uhie uhie, n'ihi na ọkụ na okpomọkụ na-acha uhie uhie, a na-egosikwa mgbawa na oroma, n'ihi na ịgwakọta uhie (na-ere ọkụ) na odo odo (onye na-emepụta oroma

A na-eji akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ egosi gasi na-adịghị ere ọkụ na nke na-adịghị egbu egbu, n'ihi na ụgbọ mmiri ikuku niile bụ agba a na France mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị, na France bụ ebe usoro dayamọnd nke njirimara hazmat malitere
Mmepụta kemịkal sịntetik amụbaala na-esote mkpaghali ọ natara n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Mmepụta kemịkal gụnyere ihe niile site na herbicides, pesticides, na fatịlaịza na kemịkal ụlọ na ihe ndị dị ize ndụ

E wezụga mmụba nke ikuku gasi na-ekpo ọkụ na mbara igwe, kemịkal ndị na-echegbu onwe ha gụnyere ọla dị arọ, nsị nuklia, chlorofluorocarbons, ihe mmetọ organik na-adịgide adịgide na kemịkal niile na-emerụ ahụ nwere ike ịba ụba
Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ kemịkal sịntetik adịghị emerụ ahụ, ọ dị mkpa ka a nwalee kemịkal ọhụrụ, na mba niile, maka mmetụta ọjọọ gburugburu ebe obibi na ahụike
E guzobere iwu mba ụwa iji dozie nkesa zuru ụwa ọnụ na njikwa ngwongwo dị ize ndụ
Mmetụta nke ụfọdụ ndị na-ahụ maka kemịkal chọrọ ogologo oge na ọtụtụ agha iwu iji ghọta ihe ize ndụ ha na ahụike mmadụ
Nhazi nke ndị na-egbu egbu na-akpata ọrịa kansa bụ nke International Agency for Research on Cancer na-ahụ maka ya
Ibelata ihe ize ndụ ndị metụtara ihe ndị dị ize ndụ nwere ike ịchọ itinye nlezianya nchekwa n'oge njem ha, ojiji, nchekwa na mkpofu ha
Ọtụtụ mba na-achịkwa ihe ndị dị ize ndụ site na iwu, ha na-adaberekwa ọtụtụ nkwekọrịta mba ụwa
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, mba dị iche iche nwere ike iji dayamọnd dị iche iche maka otu ngwaahịa ahụ

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, na Australia, a na-ahazi amonia anhydrous UN 1005 dị ka 23 (gasi na-egbu egbu) na ihe ize ndụ enyemaka 8 (na-emebi emebi), ebe na United States, a na-ahazi ya naanị dị ka 22 (gas na-adịghị ere ọkụ)
Ndị na-ejide ngwongwo dị ize ndụ ga-eyikarị ihe nchebe, ngalaba ọkụ obodo ukwu na-enwekarị ndị otu nzaghachi a zụrụ azụ iji dozie ihe mberede na ihe ọ wụfuru
Ndị nwere ike ịbịakwute ngwongwo dị ize ndụ dị ka akụkụ nke ọrụ ha na-abụkarị ndị a na-enyocha ma ọ bụ nyocha ahụike iji hụ na ikpughe ha agafeghị oke ikpughe ọrụ
Iwu na ụkpụrụ banyere ojiji na njikwa ihe ndị dị ize ndụ nwere ike ịdị iche dabere na ọrụ na ọnọdụ nke ihe ahụ
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, otu usoro ihe achọrọ nwere ike itinye aka na ojiji ha n'ebe ọrụ ebe usoro ihe dị iche iche nwere ike itinye aka na nzaghachi mmịfe, ire ere maka iji ndị ahịa, ma ọ bụ njem
Ọtụtụ mba na-achịkwa akụkụ ụfọdụ nke ihe ndị dị ize ndụ
Usoro iwu kachasị etinye n'ọrụ bụ nke maka njem nke ngwongwo dị ize ndụ

Kọmitii na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu na-enye ndụmọdụ UN banyere njem nke ngwongwo dị ize ndụ, nke bụ ntọala maka ọtụtụ atụmatụ nchịkwa mpaghara, mba, na mba ụwa

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, International Civil Aviation Organization mepụtara ụkpụrụ ngwongwo dị ize ndụ maka njem ụgbọelu nke ihe ndị dị ize ndụ nke dabere na ihe nlereanya UN mana gbanwere iji kwado akụkụ pụrụ iche nke njem ụgbọelu
A na-etinye ụgbọelu na ihe ndị gọọmentị chọrọ na nke a site na International Air Transport Association iji mepụta iwu IATA usoro iwu ngwongwo ndị ize ndụ (DGR)

N'otu aka ahụ, International Maritime Organization (IMO) mepụtara International Maritime Dangerous Goods Code ('IMDG Code', akụkụ nke Mgbakọ mba ụwa maka nchekwa ndụ n'oké osimiri) maka njem nke ngwongwo dị ize ndụ site n'oké osimiri
Mba ndị otu IMO emepụtala nkwekọrịta HNS iji kwụọ ụgwọ ma ọ bụrụ na ngwongwo dị ize ndụ wụfuo n'oké osimiri

Òtù Gọọmentị na-ahụ maka ụgbọ ala mba ụwa site na ụgbọ okporo ígwè mepụtara ụkpụrụ gbasara ụgbọ ala mba ụwa nke ngwongwo dị ize ndụ site na ụgbọ okporo ígwè ('RID', akụkụ nke nkwekọrịta gbasara ụgbọ ala mba ụwa site na ụgbọ okporo ígwè)
Ọtụtụ mba n'otu n'otu ahaziela ụkpụrụ njem ngwongwo ha dị ize ndụ iji kwekọọ na ihe nlereanya UN na nhazi yana ihe ndị a chọrọ
Usoro nkwekọ zuru ụwa ọnụ nke nhazi na akara nke kemịkalụ (GHS) bụ usoro mba ụwa kwekọrịtara iji dochie nhazi na akara dị iche iche eji na mba dị iche iche
GHS na-eji ụkpụrụ na-agbanwe agbanwe maka nhazi na akara na ọkwa zuru ụwa ọnụ

Ihe mgbaru ọsọ mmepe na-adịgide adịgide nke 3 nwere ebumnuche a gbasara kemịkal dị ize ndụ 'Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2030, belata ọnụ ọgụgụ ọnwụ na ọrịa sitere na kemịkal dị ize ndụ na ikuku, mmiri na mmetọ ala na mmetọ
' Ọzọkwa, Ebumnuche mmepe na-adigide 6 nwere ebumnuche a 'Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2030, meziwanye ịdị mma mmiri site na ibelata mmetọ, iwepụ ịtụfu na ibelata ntọhapụ nke kemịkal na ihe ndị dị ize ndụ []'
A na-ekewa ngwongwo dị ize ndụ n'ime klas itoolu (na mgbakwunye na ọtụtụ ) na ndabere nke njirimara kemịkal a kapịrị ọnụ na-emepụta ihe ize ndụ ahụ
Rịba ama Ihe osise na ederede dị n'isiokwu a na-anọchite anya akara nchekwa ngwongwo dị ize ndụ sitere na usoro United Nations nke ịchọpụta ngwongwo dị ize ndụ
Ọ bụghị mba niile na-eji otu eserese ahụ (akara, mpempe akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ ozi ederede) na ụkpụrụ mba ha
Ụfọdụ na-eji akara eserese, ma na-enweghị okwu Bekee ma ọ bụ na okwu yiri ya n'asụsụ mba ha
Na-ezo aka na ụkpụrụ njem ngwongwo dị ize ndụ nke mba nwere mmasị
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, lee TDG Buletin Akara Nchebe Ngwongwo dị ize ndụ dabere na Iwu Ụgbọ njem Canada nke Ngwongwo Dị Ọjọọ
Nkwupụta ahụ dị n'elu na-emetụta n'otu aka ahụ na klas ngwongwo niile dị ize ndụ a tụlere n'isiokwu aÀtụ Hazardous Material Placards
Dangote Cement Plc bụ onye Naijiria na-ere ahịa ciment na mba dị iche iche nke nwere isi na Lagos
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ n'ịmepụta, ịkwadebe, mbubata, nkwakọba, na nkesa nke simenti na ngwaahịa ndị metụtara ya na Naịjirịa, ma nwee ụlọ ọrụ ma ọ bụ ọdụ mbubata na mba Afrịka itoolu ndị ọzọ
A mara ya n'oge gara aga dị ka Obajana Cement Plc, ma gbanwee aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Dangote Cement PlC na Julaị, na afọ 2010
E hiwere Obajana Cement Plc na afọ 1992
Dangote Cement Plc bụ onye enyemaka nke Dangote Group ma bụrụkwa ụlọ ọrụ kachasị na-ere ahịa na Nigerian Stock Exchange
Dangote Cement depụtara na Naịjirịa Stock Exchange n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2010 nakwa dị ka ọ dị n'ọnwarị afọ 2014 maka pasent 20 nke ngụkọta ahịa ahịa nke Exchange
N'afọ 2014, ụlọ ọrụ Investment Corporation nke Dubai (ICD) zụrụ $ 300 nde na Dangote Cement
Aliko Dangote etinyela US $ 65 ijeri n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'etiti afọ 2007 na afọ 2012
Cement mejupụtara ihe dịka pasent 80 nke azụmahịa Dangote Group ka ọ na-erule afọ 2011
Ụlọ ọrụ Dangote Cement dị na Obajana, Kogi, bụ nke kachasị ukwuu na Sub-Saharan Africa na 1025 nde tọn kwa afọ ikike gafee ahịrị atọ na nde tọn 3 ọzọ kwa afọ ikike a na-ewu ugbu a
N'afọ 2012, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ meghere ụlọ ọrụ simenti $ 1 ijeri na Ibese, Ogun
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ike ịmepụta nde 6 nke simenti kwa afọ, na-ebuli ngụkọta mmepụta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ site na pasent 40 n'oge ahụ
Ụlọ ọrụ China na-ewu ụlọ na injinia Sinoma wụnyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, ọ na-anọchite anya otu n'ime nnukwu itinye ego na-abụghị mmanụ na Naịjirịa
Ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị na Gboko, Benue nwere ikike nde tọn 3 kwa afọ na nkwalite ruo nde tọn 4 kwa afọ nke a haziri na afọ 2013
Otu ụlọ ọrụ na Senegal tinyere otu ụlọ ọrụ na Tanzania meghere na afọ 2015
N'otu afọ ahụ, e meghere ụlọ ọrụ na Etiopia kwa, nke nọ n'okpuru egwu nke ọgba aghara obodo na afọ 2017 na agha obodo na afọ 2021
The Dangote Group bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe dị iche iche nke Naijiria, nke Aliko Dangote guzobere
Ọ bụ nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na West Africa na otu n'ime ndị kasị ukwuu na kọntinent Afrịka
Otu ahụ na-ewe ihe karịrị mmadụ 30,000 n'ọrụ, na-enweta ego karịrị ijeri US $ 41 na afọ 2017
E guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na afọ 1981 dị ka ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa, na-ebubata shuga, simenti, osikapa, azụ, na ihe ndị ọzọ maka nkesa na ahịa Naịjirịa
Ìgwè ahụ banyere n'imepụta ihe n'afọ ndị afọ 1990, malite na akwa, na-aga n'ihu na igwe ntụ ọka, nhazi nnu na nhazi shuga na njedebe nke afọ iri
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gara n'ihu na mmepụta simenti, na-eto ngwa ngwa ma na-aga mba ndị ọzọ dị n'Afrịka
Nnukwu njikọ kwụ ọtọ bụ akara nke atụmatụ ọrụ Dangote Group

Otu ahụ nwere ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a karịa ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka 18, na-arụ aiki na mba iri nke Afrịka
Dangote Cement, bụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka ndị a edepụtara na Naịjirịa Stock Exchange, na ahịa ahịa ya na-eme ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ pasent 20 nke ngụkọta nke Naịjirị Stock Exchange
Dangote Group nwere isi na Lagos
N'afọ 2016, Dangote bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ya na otu CNOOC maka ntinye nke nnukwu paịpụ mmiri n'okpuru mmiri
Paịpụ ahụ, mgbe arụchara ya ga-esi na Bonny (Rivers State) gafee Ogedegbe, Olokola ruo Lekki na paịpụ Escravos Lagos, n'ikpeazụ kwụsị na West Africa Gas Pipeline
E guzobere Dangote Group na ngwụcha afọ 1970, mgbe Aliko Dangote guzobere ụlọ ọrụ na-ere shuga na ihe ndị ọzọ na-azụ ahịa, nke ego $ 3,000 sitere n'aka nna nna ya kwadoro
Ka oge na-aga, otu ahụ ga-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ gbasaa n'ịzụ ahịa ngwaahịa ndị ọzọ dị ka osikapa

N'afọ 1981, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa abụọ, Dangote Nigeria Limited, na Blue Star Services, nke a bụ oge a chọrọ ikikere mbubata iji bubata ngwaahịa buru ibu, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ wee chọọ inweta ikikere mbupụ maka ngwaahịa dị iche iche gụnyere ígwè, nri nwa, na ngwaahịa aluminum
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gbakwunye ebupu na mbubata simenti na pọtụfoliyo nke otu ya
Dangote na-asọ mpi (ma na-asọmpi) na Lafarge, ụlọ ọrụ French nke na-ebubata ma na-emepụta ọtụtụ simenti Afrịka
Mgbe a kwụsịrị oge ikike mbubata na afọ 1986, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ lekwasịrị anya na mbubata nnu, shuga, na osikapa ma jiri nwayọọ nwayọọ belata azụmahịa simenti ya
Ntinye mbụ nke otu ahụ n'ime mmepụta malitere na afọ 1989 na akwa Mills Limited, na-arụ ọrụ abụọ, ụlọ akwa akwa na Kano na ụlọ ọrụ akwa akwa Naịjirịa na Lagos

Malite na afọ 1997, na-esote mbelata nke ngalaba akwa, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ lekwasịrị anya n'ịmepụta ngwaahịa ndị ahịa ọ na-ebubata na Naịjirịa dị ka refining shuga na flour milling, na nke mbụ ọ na-asọ mpi na ngwaahịa ndị si ná obodo Brazil na Europe
Otu n'ime nnukwu ndị na-ekesa shuga na Naịjirịa, ụlọ ọrụ na-agbanwe shuga Dangote malitere mmepụta mpaghara na afọ 1999
Atụmatụ maka njikọta azụ dugara n'ịmepụta ụlọ ọrụ pasta na ịkpụ ntụ ọka iji nye ihe ndị a na-emepụta maka ime pasta

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ wee tinye ego na ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta simenti na Obajana, Kogi State, site na atụmatụ siri ike, ụlọ ọrụ Obajana malitere mmepụta na nde tọn simenti 5, otu ahụ wee tinye mbongo na ọrụ simenti ọzọ na Ibeshe, Ogun State iji kwado ngalaba mmepụta mpaghara site na ihe dị ka nde tọn 25 ruo ruo nde tọn 8
Iji belata ihe ize ndụ akụ na ụba na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ime mba ahụ, otu ahụ malitere ịchọ ohere ịgbasa karịa Naịjirịa
Atụmatụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ lekwasịrị anya na mgbasara kọntinent site na iwu na inweta ụlọ ọrụ simenti na mba Afrịka
Taa, Dangote Group bụ ụlọ ọrụ dịgasị iche iche, nke nwere isi na Lagos, nwere mmasị n'ọtụtụ ngalaba dị iche iche n'Africa
Mmasị dị ugbu a gụnyere simenti, shuga, ntụ ọka, nnu, ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, pasta, ihe ọṅụṅụ na ala, yana ọrụ ọhụrụ na mmepe na mmanụ na gas, nkwukọrịta, fatịlaịza na ígwè
Ndị na-asọmpi na Naijiria na akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke Africa gụnyere Stallion Group

N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2010, otu ahụ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ya na Gọmentị Zambia iji wuo ụlọ ọrụ simenti US $ 400 nde na Zambia

E wuchara ya na afọ 2015 ma dị na Ndola, Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-emepụta simenti 425-ọkwa iji sọọ mpi megide ngwaahịa 325 dị ala ma na-achịkwa n'ahịa, a na-atụ anya na ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ ahụ ga-enwe mmepụta kwa afọ nke 15 nde metric ton nke simenti
