Dani Behr (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 9 n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1970) bụ onye Bekee bụbu onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ekwuputa okwu, na onye na-egosi ihe ma kwuo ihe n'telivishọn
A mụrụ Behr na Mill Hill, London, nke sitere na ndị Juu South Africa
Nna ya bụ onye mmekọ na ndị na-ahụ maka ala na London Behr & Butchoff

Behr bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Sylvia Young Theatre School, onye njikwa Pet Shop Boys bụ Tom Watkins chọpụtara ya, onye tinyere ya n'echiche Bros nwanyị ya, Faith Hope & Charity na-abụ abụ n'akụkụ Diana Barrand na onye otu Xpansions n'ọdịnihu Sally Ann Marsh, bịanyere aka na WEA

Daniel Akpeyi (bu onye a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1986) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa nke na-agbara Kaizer Chiefs na ndị otu mba Naịjirịa bọọlụ
Akpeyi malitere ọrụ ya na Gabros International FC ma bulie ya na otu mbụ na afọ 2005, mana ọ kwagara Nasarawa United FC na Jenụwarị 2007
Ọ bụ onye mbido na-enweghị mgbagha maka klọb abụọ ahụ
Akpeyi joined Heartland FC
for their 2010 CAF Champions League campaign, and was again first-choice

In February 2014, it was announced that he had left Heartland to join league rivals Warri Wolves, but a few days later, Heartland denied the move by an official statement, stating that they had no intention to sell their first choice goalkeeper
N'ọnwa sochirinụ, Otú ọ dị, a kwadoro nkwekọrịta ahụ ọzọ ma Akpeyi sonyeere Warri Wolves
N'afọ 2015, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ na Chippa
N'afọ 2019, ọ bịanyere aka na Kaizer Chiefs (nke a na-akpọ Amakhosi)
Akpeyi lụrụ enyi ya nwanyị Emmanuella Ebert-Kalu na ọnwa Disemba 2016
Na Julaị 2018, ha nabatara nwa mbụ ha, Prince Jason Akpeyi, onye amụrụ na Port Elizabeth
A na-eto ya maka ịchọta Daniel Akpeyi Children Empowerment Foundation (Dacef) nzukọ na-abaghị uru nke e hiwere na 2020
Ebumnuche ntọala ahụ bụ inye aka melite Afrịka site n'inyere ụmụaka na-enweghị ihe ùgwù aka inweta agụmakwụkwọ dị mma
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Dacef gakwuuru ndị mmadụ na Gauteng, Johannesburg n'oge mkpọchi Covid19 n'ụwa niile

Akpeyi bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa n'okpuru afọ iri abụọ na 2005 FIFA World Youth Championship na Netherlands ma nọ na ndị otu mmadụ iri abụọ na abụọ tupu Beijing 2008 Summer Olympics, mana ọ hụghị ihe na asọmpi ọ bụla
A kpọkwara ya na ndị otu mmadụ iri abụọ na atọ maka 2014 African Nations Championship dị ka onye nkwado Chigozie Agbim
N'ụbọchị nke isii n'ọnwa nke ise afọ 2014, a kpọrọ Akpeyi aha na ndị otu mmadụ iri atọ tupu 2014 FIFA World Cup
O mere okpu mbụ ya zuru oke na 2015, a kpọrọ ya maka enyi na enyi vs
South Africa dị ka onye nnọchi anya Vincent Enyeama merụrụ ahụ
Ọ zọpụtara ntaramahụhụ ma too ya maka njigide siri ike ya na arụmọrụ Man of the Match ya
Naịjirịa họpụtara ya maka ndị otu ha dị mmadụ iri atọ na ise maka 2016 Summer Olympics
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2018, a kpọrọ ya aha na ndị otu egwuregwu iri atọ nke Naịjirịa maka 2018 FIFA World Cup na Russia
E tinyere Akpeyi na ndepụta ikpeazụ nke mmadụ iri abụọ na atọ nke otu ahụ na 2019 Africa Cup of Nations O debere akwụkwọ ọcha na egwuregwu abụọ mbụ nke otu ahụ
N'egwuregwu ikpeazụ nke otu Ikechukwu Ezenwa kwetara ugboro abụọ na mmeri 2–0 nke Naịjirịa meriri Madagascar
Akpeyi laghachiri n'usoro mmalite na agba nke iri na isii megide ọdụm na-enweghị atụ nke Cameroon ebe o nyere goolu abụọ na ndị otu ya mmeri atọ - abụọ
Ọ nọkwa na goolu na mmeri ikpeazụ nke otu ahụ meriri South Africa na 2 - 1 S
ikpeazụ ha meriri Algeria
Francis Uzoho nọ na goolu maka egwuregwu nke atọ megide Tunisia
Na 29 Jenụwarị 2020, Akpeyi gbatịkwuru nkwekọrịta ya na South African Premier Soccer League site na ịbịanye aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ nke ga-ejigide ya na Amakhosi ruo June 2022
N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2021, onye nkuzi oge Naịjirịa bụ Eguavoen họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị otu egwuregwu ikpeazụ nke mmadụ iri abụọ na asatọ maka iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2021

Daniel Annerose bụ onye isi na onye guzobere Manobi, azụmahịa Senegal, nke na-anakọta data banyere ọnụahịa dị ugbu a maka ngwaahịa ndị a na-ere na mpaghara na gburugburu Dakar, wee nye ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị ọzọ na-emepụta ihe na Senegal ozi ọnụahịa site na ekwentị
A mụrụ Annerose na Dakar
O nwetara PhD na Biology na Mahadum Paris XI, ọ bụkwa onye otu l'Académie des Sciences et Techniques du Sénégal (Senegalese Academy of Sciences and Technology)

Annerose zụrụ ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ọkà mmụta sayensị ihe ọkụkụ ruo afọ iri na asatọ, ọkachasị na mkpụrụ ọrụ ugbo na mpaghara akọrọ na ọkara akọrọ na usoro mgbakọ na mwepụ maka ịkọ mkpụrụ na ịtụ anya nsogbu nri
Daniel Attoumou Amicchia (1908-1994) bụ onye Ghana na-ese foto nke biri na Grand-Bassam, Côte d'Ivoire
Amicchia malitere ihe gbasara foto na 1920s
O mechara biri na Grand-Bassam, Côte d'Ivoire na 1948 ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo 1970
Na Grand-Bassam, ọ nọgidere na-akpọtụrụ ndị Ghana na-asụ Bekee na Côte d'Ivoire bụ ndị ọ na-ese foto nke ukwuu
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'onye ahịa na-eme njem' ma mepụta foto nke ezinụlọ na azụmaahịa
A maghị ọtụtụ ihe banyere ndụ na ọrụ Amicchia n'ihi na ọ nweghị akwụkwọ ndekọ nakwa n'ihi na ezinụlọ ya tụfuru ihe ndekọ ya mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
Otú ọ dị, onye otu Amicchia bụ Joseph Ernest Kouao, debere ma chekwaa ihe ndị fọdụrụ n'ihe ndekọ nke onye na-ese foto
Revue Noire gosipụtara foto Amicchia na 1991
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, foto ya pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na ọdịda anyanwụ
Amicchia nwụrụ n'afọ 1994 n'ihi ọrịa kansa
Daniel Effiong (amuru 17 June 1972 na Calabar ) bu onye oso lagoro ezumike nka si Naijiria
Ọ ghọrọ onye mmeri na 100 Africa ya na Universiade na 1993

Ya na Innocent Asonze, Francis Obikwelu na Deji Aliu nwetara ihe nrite ọla nchara na 4 x 100 mita n'asọmpi ụwa nke 1999, mana e mechapụrụ ndị otu ahụ (na August 2005) n'ihi na Innocent Asonze dara ule doping na June 1999
N'ime 100 mita oge kachasị mma nkeonwe ya bụ 998 sekọnd,ọ nwetara na ọkara ikpeazụ nke 1993 World Championship
Nke a mere ya ọkwa nke isii na Naịjirịa, n'azụ Olusoji Fasuba, Davidson Ezinwa, Olapade Adeniken, Francis Obikwelu na Uchenna Emedolu
Na 200 mita oge kachasị mma nkeonwe ya bụ 2010 sekọnd, ọ nwetara na May 1994 na Ugwu Sac
Nke a mere ya ọkwa nke abụọ na Nigeria, naanị n'azụ Francis Obikwelu, na nke anọ na Africa, n'azụ Frankie Frederick, Obikwelu na Stéphan Buckland
Ọ agbaghara asọmpi egwuregwu ụwa nke 1995 n'ihi ule ọgwụ dara ada na asọmpi Naijiria, ebe ọ nwalere ihe ọma maka methyltestosterone na ephedrine
Ọ natara mmachibido iwu afọ anọ n'egwuregwu ahụ
Àtụ Footer All-Africa Champions 4 × 100 m relay MenÀtụ Footer African Champions men's 100 metresÀtụ Footer Universiade Champions 100m Men
Àtụ MedalTableTop
Baraladei Daniel Igali (amụrụ na Febụwarị 3, na afọ 1974 na Eniwari, Bayelsa Steeti, Naijiria) bụ onye Canada na-agba mgba n'efu bụ onye nwetara ọla edo nke Olympic
Ọ bi na Surrey, British Columbia
Dị ka onyeisi ndị otu ịgba mgba nke Naijiria, ọ bịara Canada iji sọ mpi na 1994 Commonwealth Games
Ọ nọgidere na mba ahụ mgbe ọ na-achọ ọnọdụ onye gbara ọsọ ndụ n'ihi ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Naịjirịa
Ọ nwetara nwa amaala n'afọ 1998
Na Canada, Igali meriri egwuregwu ịgba mgba 116 n'usoro na Mahadum Simon Fraser site na afọ 1997 ruo afọ 1999
Ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke anọ na asọmpi ụwa nke afọ 1998
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na afọ 1998 World Cup wee nweta ọla nchara na afo 1999 Pan American Games
Ọ bụ Nasir Lal, onye Canada na-eme egwuregwu Olimpik ugboro abụọ si Afghanistan zụrụ ya
Na afọ 2000 Summer Olympic Games na Sydney, Australia, Igali ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na ịgba mgba nke ụmụ nwoke 69 kilogram
Ọ nọchitere anya Canada n'ọkwa ụwa
Na afọ 2002 Commonwealth Games na Manchester, Igali ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na 74 kilogram freestyle wrestling nke ụmụ nwoke
E mechara kpọbata ya na Canadian Olympic Hall of Fame n'afọ 2012
A na-egosipụta ọrụ ịgba mgba ya na ihe ngosi telivishọn nke Joel Gordon duziri nke a na-akpọ, 'Wrestling with Destiny The Life and Times of Daniel Igali'
CBC Television na-agbasa ihe nkiri akụkọ ndụ ahụ na afọ 2004 dị ka ihe omume nke usoro Life and Times TV

Igali ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Nigeria Wrestling Federation, na-emepụta ndị na-eme egwuregwu kachasị elu maka afọ 2018 Commonwealth Games, na ndị na-atụ anya nrite kachasị elu maka Nigeria na egwuregwu ahụ
Ndị otu Naijiria nwere mmụọ na-adịghị mma n'èzí ịgba mgba
Na Septemba, na afọ 2022, a họpụtara Igali dị ka onye otu UWW (United World Wrestling) maka afọ ise
Na Febụwarị 10, na afọ 2005, Igali kwupụtara na ọ ga-achọ nhọpụta dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa na Surrey-Newton maka British Columbia Liberal Party na ntuli aka mpaghara nke afọ 2005 na British Columbia
Ọ meriri nhọpụta ahụ, mana onye mmegide New Democrat bụ Harry Bains meriri ya na ntuli aka ahụ
Ọ gụsịrị nzere Master of Arts na criminology na Mahadum Simon Fraser, ebe ọ gara Douglas College
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na nzere masta ya, ọ zụrụ na SFU ma nwee mmasị inyere onye nkuzi aka
Igali bụ ugbu a [mgbe?] onye nkuzi nke Nigerian National Wrestling Team
N'ọnwa Nọvemba, na afọ 2006, Igali merụrụ ahụ n'oge a na-apụnara ya ihe mgbe ọ nọ na Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2020, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Nigeria Wrestling Federation
Ọ bụ onye otu Bayelsa State Assembly ugboro abụọ nakwa onye isi egwuregwu ya
N'afọ 2012, Igali bụ otu n'ime ndị natara Top 25 Canadian Immigrant Awards nke Canadian Immigrant Magazine gosipụtara
Daniel Kanayo Daniel (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụo na abụo nke ọnwa Mee, afọ 1986) bụ ome ihe nkiri onyonyo na fiim nke Naijiria na onye na-eme ihe nkiri ihe nlere anya, onye egwu na onye ihe omume compere

A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe ngosi agwa nke Bossman na ihe nkiri A Soldier's Story, nke onwetara ihe nrite Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards (AMVCA) na Africa Movie Academy Awards (AMAA) nwoke omee kacha mma na ọrụ ya na mpempe oge ụbọchịiri asaa na isii, nke ndị so mekwa ya bụRamsey Noah, Chidi Mokeme na Rita Dominic na Mummy Dearest tinyere Onye na-eme ihe nkiri Naijiria bụ Liz Benson
Daniel Kanayo Daniel bụ onye amụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ nkụzi nke Mahadum Maiduguri , Maiduguri, Steeti Borno, na ndida Ugwu nke Naijiria na Mee 22, 1986
Mgbe Daniel bụ nwata, ezinụlọ ya kwagara Steeti Lagos na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naijiria wee gaa na steeti nọ na ndịda anyanwu nke Naijiria nke Enugu, bụ ebe ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya
Daniel bụ onye Igbo, bụrụkwa onye Nenwe dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Ani-Nri nke steeti Enugwu
A zụlitere ya n'ụlọ Ndị Kraịst

Nna ya, Chris Daniel bụ onye injinia na nne ya bụ Kande Daniel bụ onye mgbasa ozi na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Nigeria Association of Women Journalists, ma na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche nye Minista Ike Nigeria na okwu gbasara mgbasa ozi
Ọ bụ onye mbụ n'ime ụmụaka anọ, otu n'ime ha bụ Chris Daniel Jnr (Kris'D) onye egwu na onye nka
Daniel bụụru onye nduihe nkiri na otu ọgbakọ arụmụka nke ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya, na Command Children Schoolma n'eme Nkeoma Na klasi ya
ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 1996
Ọ debara aha na Command Day Secondary School Enugu, ma mechaa gafee na Federal Government College Enugu na 1999 ka ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ sekọndrị

Daniel chọsiri ike ọzụzụ ịbụ onye na-anya ụgbọ elu, ebe ọ nwere ndị ọkwọ ụgbọ elu atọ bụ ihe nlereanya n'ime ezinụlọ ya nna nna ya, onye bụbu Chief of Air Staff, (Late) Air Marshal Ibrahim Alfa, na nwanne nna ya atọ - Squadron Leader John Chukwu, Air Vice -Marshal Chris Chukwu, na Shu'aibu Alfa (onye na-anya ụgbọelu)
Olileanya Daniel lụrụ afọ n'ala mgbe a chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa anya bụmyopia (ịhụ ụzọ mgbe ihe dị nso) ma gwa ya na ọ ga-esiri ya ike imezu nrọ ya site ihi ọrịa anya a
N'oge a nna ya kwagara Port Harcourt, Rivers State na South-south Nigeria, ebe nne ya kwagara Federal Capital Territory (FCT) Abuja, na ọrụ mba dị iche ọ nwere
O wee nweta nnabata na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe Awka, na steeti Anambra n'afọ 2004 ka ọ gụọ Applied Biochemistry
Na Nọvemba 2004, ndụ Daniel gbanwere nke ọma ka nna ya nwụnahụrụ ya n'ihe mberede ụgbọ ala dị egwu na ịbụ nwa mbụ, ọ ghaghị itolite
N'afọ 2005, ezinaụlọ ya kwagara Abuja ka nna ya nwụsịrị na Port Harcourt ebe agụmakwụkwọ ya gara n'ihu na mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe bụ ebe ọ malitekwara ọrụ nke ngosi
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum na 2009 wee jikwaa azụmahịa nwanne nna ya bụ Twinkles Catering Service, ebe iri nri na Gusau, Zamfara State n' ọnwa anọ
Daniel malitere ọrụ nlereanya ya mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, na-eme mkpọsa ozi telivishọn ụfọdụ nke Zandas Cosmetics
N'afọ 2009 ka o si mahadum lọta Abuja, o so na ihe ngosi ole na ole gụnyere Abuja Moroccan Fashion Show
Mgbe otu n'ime ihe ngosi ahụ gasịrị, onye ukwu n'ihe nlereanya bụ Steiner Eunice Opara, dọkpụrụ Daniel onye n'enweghị mmasị ime ihe nkiri gaa na ngosi ihe nkiri
Nkà Daniel masịrị ndị nduzi bụ- Kabat Esosa Egbon na Tola Balogun ma ha nye ya ọrụ izizi mbụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri Television All About Us

N'abalị ise nke ọnwa Maachị , afọ 2016, Daniel ritere Awọd nke omee nwoke kacha mma n'(Ejije) na Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards (AMVCA) mbipụta afọ 2016, maka agwa ya na ngosipụta nkpali nke gbasara agha Naijiria na A Soldier's Story
N'otu afọ ahụ, Daniel nwetakwara ihe nrite 12th Africa Movie Academy Awards maka onye na- eme ihe nkiri kacha mma n'ọrụ onye ndu maka otu ihe nkiri ahụ
Daniel Kamwa (amụrụ na 14 Eprel 1943) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ememe ihe nkiri si Nkongsamba, Cameroon
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara ihe nkiri na Paris, France, tupu o mepụta ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Boubou-cravate, na 1973
E tinyere ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 1981 Our Daughter n'ime 12th Moscow International Film Festival
Daniel Pule Kunene (afọ 1923 ruo 2016) bụ onye ọkà mmụta akwụkwọ South Afrika, onye ntụgharị na onye edemede
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ Emeritus nke Asụsụ Afrika na Akwụkwọ edemede na Mahadum Wisconsin-Madison
A mụrụ Daniel Kunene na ọnwa Eprel 13, 1923, na Edenville, South Afrika
O nwetara nzere BA n'afo 1949 na Mahadum South Africa, MA na 1951 na Mahadụ Cape Town na PhD na 1961 na Mahadim Cape Town
Ọ lụrụ Selina Sekhuthe n'afọ 1953
N'afọ 1963, ya na ezinụlọ ya hapụrụ South Africa, chọta ebe mgbaba ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na United States mgbe ha nọrọ na London
Kunene kụziri na UW Madison ruo afọ iri atọ na atọ
Ọ kụzikwaara na Mahadum Cape Town, Mahadum London, Mahadim California, Los Angeles, na Mahadim Johannes Gutenberg nke Mainz
N'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 1993, Kunene gara South Afrika, ohere mbụ ya ịlaghachi mgbe afọ iri atọ nke ịgba ọsọ ndụ gasịrị
Nwunye ya Selina nwụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1993
N'afọ 2003, ọ lụrụ Marci Ellis ọzọ ,ma Ọ nwụrụ na Mee 27, afọ 2016
Daniel Lind-Ramos (amụrụ n'afọ 1953) bụ ónyé Africa-Puerto Rican na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese ọkpụkpụ nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Puerto Rico
A mụrụ Lind-Ramos na 1953 na Loíza, ọbọdọ dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri na Puerto Rico
Ọ gụrụ ihe osise na Mahadum nke Puerto Rico na 1975 ma na 1980 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na NYU na nzere masta nke nka
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ studio ya, Lind-Ramos na-akụzi ugbu a na Ngalaba Humanities na Mahadum Puerto Rico na Humacao
Lind-Ramos na-ese ihe na ákwà na mmanụ site na iji usoro ọdịnala na nke a na-adịghị ahụkebe site na brushes ruo spatulas

Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na ihe ndị a na-emegharị ma ọ bụ ndị a na'eji éme ihe ọzọ dị ka katọn, ihuenyo waya, ngwá ọrụ ndị a tụfuru atụfu, akụkụ ụgbọ ala, akwụkwọ osisi akị bekee, ngwá egwú a gbajiri agbaji na ihe ndị ọzọ a na-eji eme ihe

A kọwara ya dị ka 'kpakpando' ma ọ bụ ihe dị mkpà nke 2019 Whitney Biennial site n'ọtụtụ ndị na-enyocha ya, na New York Times na-ede na ihe ọkpụkpụ ya Maria Maria gosipụtara akụkụ dị na Biennial nke 'na-egosipụta ike nke ime mmụọ

' Ónyé nkatọ Holland Cotter kọwara ihe ọkpụkpụ ahụ, na-akọwa etu Lind-Ramos 'esi jiri osisi, beads, akị bekee na tarp FEMA na-acha anụnụ anụnụ mepụta, ihe oyiyi nke bụ ma Virgin Mary na onyinyo nke ajọ ifufe nkè bibiri agwaetiti ahụ na 2017
ihe ahụ yiri ka ọ dị ebube
Ọrụ ya na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Museum of Latin American Art, El Museo del Barrio, na Puerto Rico Museum of Contemporary Art
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ngosi Lind-Ramos gụnyere
N'afọ 2021, e nyere Lind-Ramos MacArthur Fellowship
